news_detail: Hyderabad. Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen (AIMIM) aur Owaisi Group of Hospitals ki janib se selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke awam ke liye 25 lakh rupay maliati mukhtalif nauiyat ki adwiyaat aaj Darussalam se gaadiyon ke zareya Kerala rawana ki ja rahi hain. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen wo Rukn e Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ki nigrani mein yeh adwiyaat aaj shaam Darussalam se rawana ki ja rahi hain. Yaad rahay ke Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ne ‘Majlis Charitable Trust’ ke zareya 16 lakh rupay ki maali imdaad karne ka bhi faisla kya hai jo Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief Fund mein jama karwai jayen gi. Trucks ke sath Doctors aur tibbi amlah ki bhi aik team rawana ki jarahi hai. is mauqa par Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ke farzand master Sultan Salahuddin Owaisi aur Joint Editor Roznama Etemaad janab Aziz Ahmed ke alawa Owaisi Hospital and Reserch Center aur Princess Esra Hospital ke Doctors aur amlah maujood thae. Adwiyaat ke intikhab aur un ki khareedi mein Qayed Majlis Muqannanah Party wo Managing Dirctor Owaisi Group of Hospitals janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ke alawa mazkoorah dono Hospitals ke Doctors aur amlah ki muawinat rahi hai.
2.title: AIMIM ki 25 lakh rupay ki adwiyaat Kerala rawana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Maroof Social Media application ‘Whatsapp’ ke Chief Executive Officer Mr. Chris Daniels, jinhon ne wazeer Information Technology o Sanat Mr. K T Rama Rao se jumaraat ko mulaqaat ki, Hyderabad mein ‘Whatsapp’ ka aik Customer Service Operations Center qaayim karne se kaafi dilchaspi ka izhaar kya hai. Qabal azeen mulaqaat ke dauran Mr. K T Rama Rao ne Daniels se khwahish ki thi ke Hyderabad mein Customer Service Operations Center qaayim kere aur riyasat mein Information Technology se mutaliq umoor par tabadlah khayaal kiya. Wazeer ne unhen bataya ke woh kis terha mukhtalif sarkari pahel ke liye ‘Whatsapp’ ka extensive istemaal kar rahay hain aur Hukoomat mein communication ko baqayeda bananay mein madad kar rahay hain. Mr. K T Rama Rao ne kaha ke woh khud 100 Whatsapp groups ka hissa hain aur unhon ne bataya ke woh kis terha Whatsapp ka kaisay kaisay istemaal karte hain. Wazeer ne Whatsapp ke CEO se khwahish ki ke woh mann ghadat khabron ke maamla ka jaiza lein aur kaha ke Whatsapp ke zareya jhooti khabron ke phelnay par control karne policy ki zaroorat hai. Whatsapp ke CEO ne Wazeer se wada kya ke jaraayim se nimatnay aur khoj laganay mein Whatsapp ka kaisay istemaal kya jaye uss par Police ke sath workshops munaqqid karen ge.

Facebook India , ke Public Divsion ke sarbarah Shivnath Thakral ne bhi Wazeer Information Technology se mulaqaat ki aur Hyderabad mein business ke imkani wusat par tabadlah khayaal kiya. Aik aur ijlaas mein CEO Novartis Mr. Vas Narsimhan  ne bhi Mr. K T Rama Rao se mulaqaat ki aur dono ne riyasat mein LifeSciences Echo System par tabadlah khayaal kiya.
14.title: KTR se Whatsapp CEO ki mulaqaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke kuch ilaqon mein 29

August ko pani ki sarbarahi masdood rahay gi chunkay Hyderabad Metro Politan Water Supply & Sewerage Board (HMWS&SB), HUDCCO ke tehat Kabeernagar, Moosapet section par pipeline par junction work se nimatnay ke liye 24 ghanton ka shut down rakhnay ki tajweez rakha hai. Yeh shutdown 25
August ko subah 6:00 bajey se 26
August 6:00 subah tak rahay ga jis ke baayis 29

August ko O&M Division number VIke tehat 11, 000 connections ka ihata karne walay ilaqon Rajiv Nagar, Kalaya Nagar venture 3, Sri Ram Nagar, Jayaanti  Nagar, Fatima Nagar, Nataraj Nagar, Netaji Nagar, Sanjay Nagar, Sultan Nagar, Hemavati Nagar, Shastri Nagar, Janapriya Apartments, Gautam Puri Colony waghera aur O&M Division number IX ke tehat 300 connections ka ihata karne walay ilaqon BSP Colony, Moti Nagar East mein pani ki sarbarahi nahi hogi.
29.title: Hyderabad ke kuch ilaqon mein 29th  August ko pani ki sarbarahi masdood

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr.r K. Chandrashekar Rao ney Masjid ke Imams and Mauzzans ko Waqf Board ke tavassut se dyie jany walay remuneration (remuneration) ki raqam ko 1, 500 rupay se badha kar 5,000 rupay mahana kardainay ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke izafi shuda remuneration ki adai 1

September se amal mein aeye gi. Chief Minister ke daftar se jari kardah press release mein bataya gaya ke Mulk bhar mein pehli martaba Telangana riyasat mein Aimma wo Mauzineen ko mahana remuneration ada karne ka silsila shuru kya gaya tha. Pehlay unhen mahana aik hazaar rupay dyie jatay thae jis mein izafah karte hue 1, 500 rupay kardiya gaya tha. Chief Minister ney kaha kay is raqam mein izafah karte hue 1
September se itlaq ke sath 5,000 rupay kardiya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke is faisla se Masajid ke 9,000 Imams aur Mauzzans ko faida puhanche ga.
41.title: Imams & Mauzzans ka remuneration 5,000 kardiya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein Kongara Kalan mein 2

September ko munaqqid shudni Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting ke muqam par jari taiyarion ka Chief Minister Telangana wo Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ne aaj mushahida kiya hai. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki janib se 2

September ko zabardast jalsa aam karne ka faisla kya hai jis mein zayed az  25 lakh logon ki shirkat ki tawaqqa ki jarahi hai. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke is jalsa e aam se Telangana Rashtra Samiti apne intikhabi muhim ka aaghaz kardey gi. Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ne party qaideen aur ohdedaron ko hidayat di ke jalsa aam mein shirkat ke liye anay walay logon ko kisi qisam ki koi takleef nahi pahonchni chahiye. Unhon ne Police Commissioner Rachakonda Mr. Mahesh Bhagwat ke hamrah intizamaat ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya. Telangana Rashtra Samiti (TRS) ne Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting mein 2014 ke aam intikhabaat ke baad Telangana mein qaayim un ki hukoomat ki chaar sala karkardagi ka muzahira paish kere gi aur is ki yeh koshish hai ke is public meeting mein lakhon awam ki shirkat ko yakeeni banatay hue yeh payam diya jaye ke riyasat ke awam, uss ke sath hain. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao isi ijlaas mein aayindah aam intikhabaat mein Party ke Lok Sabha aur Assembly ke liye Party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar dein ge taakay woh abhi se intikhabaat ki taiyarion mein jut jaayen.
63.title: KCR ne ” Pragathi Nivedana” ki taiyarion ka mushahida kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein senior IAS ohdedaron ke tabadlay amal mein aeye. Mehakuma Municipal Administration ke senior IAS ohdedaron ke tabadlay karte hue Commissioner Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) Mr. B. Janardhan Reddy ka tabadlah karte hue Commissioner Hyderabad Metro Politan Development Authority (HMDA ) muqarrar kya gaya hai. Managing Director Hyderabad Metro Politan Water Supply and Sewerage Board Mr. Dana Kishore ko Commissioner GHMC muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Mr. Dana Kishore mazeed ehkaam ki ijrayi tak Hyderabad Metro Water Supply & Sewerage Board ka full additional charge ( FAC ) rakhnay ke sath sath Secretary mehkuma Aqliati Behbood bhi hon ge. Commissioner HMDA Mr. T. Chiranjeevulu  ka tabadlah karte hue Commissioner and Inspector General Rsegistrations and Stamps muqarrar kya gaya hai. Vakati Karuna ko Commissioner Registrations and Stamps ki izafi zimma daari se subukdosh kardiya gaya hai. Commissioner GHMC Mr. B. Janardhan Reddy Swacch Bharat muhim ke tehat Nav Bharat Times Best Commissioner Award haasil karne is waqt Mumbai mein hain.
75.title: Dana Kishore Commissioner GHMC muqarrar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana mein qabal az-waqat intikhabaat ki paish qiyasion ke darmyaann Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandershekar Rao ne aaj TRS  ke MPs aur MLAs se kaha ke intikhabaat ke ineqad ke talluq se woh munasib waqt par munasib faisla karen ge aur is khusoos mein paish qiyasian karne ki qatayee zaroorat nahi hai. Unhon ne id-daa kya ke aayindah intikhabaat mein Party 100 se zayed nashiston par kamyabi haasil kere gi intikhabaat jab kabhi hon, taham unhon ne awaami numaindon par zor diya ke woh intikhabaat ke liye Party Cadre ko mutharrak kar dein. Chief Minister ne jummay ko yahan Telangana bhavan mein Party ke MLAs, MLCs aur MPs ke aik ijlaas ki sadarat ki jis mein mukhtalif umoor bashamool intikhabaat, sarkari Schemes ke farogh aur Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein Outer Ring Road ke qareeb Kongara Kalan mein 2

September ko munaqqid shudni ‘Pragathi Nivedana’ jalsa aam ka ihata kya gaya. Qabal azeen unhon ne Kongara Kalan ka daura karte hue jalsa ki tayarion ka mushahida kya. Zaraye ne kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ne nishandahi ki ke TRS intikhabaat ka kabhi bhi saamna karne tayyar hai aur who is ziman mein munasib waqt par munasib faisla karen ge magar woh chahtay hain ke Party Cadre abhi se tayyar rahay. Muntakhiba numayindon ne Party sarbarah ko tayaqqun diya ke woh intikhabaat ke silsila mein un ke faisla ki pabandi karen ge. Aik senior Rukn e Assembly ne kaha ”Chief Minister ne hamein Pragathi Nivedata se  Party Cadre ko mutharrik karne ke ziman mein zaroori Hidayat dein. Hum pur etemaad hain ke un ke ehkaam ki tameel hogi aur sarkari schemes ko awam tak pahonchayen ge. Aik Senior Wazeer ke mutabiq Mr. K. Chandershekar Rao ‘Pragathi NIvedata’ ke stage se hi aayindah intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne walay umeedwaron ki fehrist jari karen ge. Yeh jalsa e aam, mamool ka siyasi jalsa nahi hoga balkes is mein Telangana riyasat ki guzishta chaar barson mein taraqqi aur paishraft ka jaayeza paish kya jaye ga jabke Chief Minister 20 nukaati karkardagi report paish karen ge. Iss jalsa e aam ko ghair mamooli taur par kamyaab bananay har aik Legislatures par yeh zimma daari aayed ki gayi ke woh is jalsa mein apne apne Halqa e Assembly se 20 taa 30 hazaar logon ki shirkat ko yakeeni banaye. Yeh jalsa e aam Mulk ka sab se bada siyasi jalsa hoga. Iss jalsa e aam ko kamyaab bananay zilayee satah par Party kaarkunon ke ijlaas munaqqid kiye jayen ge. Jalsa e aam ko kamyaab bananay Mr. Chandershekar Rao Orgamozing Committee aur deegar Committees ka bhi elaan karen ge.
89.title: Intekhabaat ka munasib waqt par faisla: KCR

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par ‘Haq e Wapsi’ March ke dauran Israeli Fouj ki puraman Falesteenion par firing ke nateeja mein kam se kam 190 shehri zakhmi hogaye. Gaza ki patti mein Falasteeni wizarat sehat ke tarjuman Dr Ashraf al Qadrah ney bataya ke Falasteeni muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye Israeli Fouj ney jummay ke roz ansoo gas shell fire kiye jis se 189 Falasteeni zakhmi hue. 10 Falasteeni shehri barah e raast golian lagnay se zakhmi hue. Un mein do bachay aur do khawateen bhi shaamil hain. Gaza ki sarhad par lagai gayi Israeli sarhadi baad ke qareeb Juma ko Falesteenion ney Haq e Wapsi ke liye muzahira kiya. Ayini shahideen ke mutabiq Falesteenion ki badi tadaad ney Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par Israeli Fouj ki taraf se khadi ki gayi rukawaten hataane ki koshish ki. khayaal rahay ke Falasteeni shehri 30

March 2018 ke baad se Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par har jummay ko ehtajaji muzahirey karte hain. Falasteeni muzahireen ke puraman honay ke bawajood Israeli Fouj un ke khilaaf taaqat ka istemaal karti hai jis ke nateeja mein ab tak 170 Falasteeni shaheed aur 18 hazaar se zayed zakhmi ho chuke hain. Nama nigaron ke mutabiq jummay ke roz Falesteenion ney Israeli riyasat ke mazalim ke khilaaf ehtijaj kya magar is mauqa par koi aatish geer kaghazi jahaaz ya garam hawa ka ghubarah Israel ki taraf nahi uchala gaya jab ke is se qabal Palestine Israel sarhadi ilaaqon mein gassee ghubaare aur aatish geer jahaaz dropping ke zareya aag laga dete they jis par Israel ko Falesteenion ke khilaaf sakht gham wo ghussah hai. Iss mauqa par Hamas ke muqami rehnuma Khalil al Haiyya ney kaha ke Gaza ki sarhad par Falasteeni muzahireen ka puraman ehtijaj Cairo mein jari jung bandi baat cheet ko kamyaab karne ka mauqa faraham karna hai. Hamas rehnuma ka kehna tha ke jamaat ki qayadat aur deegar Falasteeni dhadon ke zimma daraan kal itwaar aur somwaar ke roz qahira mein Israel ke sath Gaza mein jung bandi aur aapas mein masalihati amal par baat cheet karen ge.
107.title: Gaza ki sarhad par Israeli fouj ke hamle mein 190 Falasteeni zakhmi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Tappa Chabotra Police Station hudood mein waqay Sharda Nagar, Gudimalkapur ilaqa mein aik qaata e araazi se jis ke bichon beech aik qabar waqay hai, kal shaam namaloom afraad ne Ganesh ki tooti phooty Moorti rakh di thi, Police ko is ki khabar milnay par fauri harkat mein atay hue Moorti ko wahan se hata diya gaya aur Police Station muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Police ne isteqdami karwai karte hue khamoshi ke sath is Moorti ko htadya hai. Police ohdedaron ne bataya ke mumkin hai ke tooti phooty iss Moorti ko kisi ne yahan khuli zameen dekh kar chod gaya hoga taham hum is baat ka pata laganay ki koshish kar rahay hain ke aaya yeh na danista amal tha ya kisi ki shararat. Iss ilaqa ke CC TV footages ke zareya iss ka pata laganay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Sharda Nagar colony mein taqreeban 200-250 murabba gaz ki aik khuli araazi hai jis ke beechon beech aik khuli qabar hai. Yeh qabar kis ki hai is ke baaray mein qareebi ilaqa ke Musalman bhi kuch bataney se qassir hain. Logon ne bataya ke aik arsa se yahan aik qadeem qabar hai jis par ab kuch logon ne chadar chadha rakhi hai taakay is qabar ki nishani baqi rahay. Iss qabar ke atraaf koi aur qabar na honey ki wajah se yeh ehtemaal nahi rehta hai ke yeh qabrastan hai taham yeh kisi walii ya buzurg ki qabar hosakti hai. Chunkay is ilaqa ki abadi ziyada tar ghair Muslims par mushtamil hai is liye sahib e qabar ke baaray mein kuch ziyada maloomat nahi hosaki. Waqf Board mein bhi is ka koi record shaed maujood nahi hai chunkay kuch baras qabal is qabar ke atraaf kachra phenka ja raha tha jis ki safai muqami naujawanon ne ki thi aur uss waqt Waqf Board ke arbab se rabita qaayim karte hue iss qabar aur iss ke tehat araazi ki Sayanat karne ka mutalba kiya gaya tha.
125.title: Gudimalkapur mein aik qabar ke paas rakhi gayi Ganesh Moorti hatadi gayi

news_detail:
Hind wo Pak ke namwar taraqi pasand shayar mumtaaz maahir e  taleem o shayr  nigaar Ahmed Faraz ku dunyae faani se guzray 10 baras beeet gaye lekin un ki shayiri ab bhi un ke madahon ke dil o dimagh par chhai hui hai. Namwar shayar Faraz 12
  January 1931 ku Kohat mein paida hue, unhon ney ibtidayi taleem ki takmeel ke baad shayr o-shayari ka aaghaz kar diya, woh mukhtalif taleemi idaron mein maahir taleem ke taur par bhi apne farayez sar-anjaam dete rahay, unhein General Zia ul Haq ke daur mein paband e salasil bhi rakha gaya. Ahmed Faraz ne hazaron nazmein kahin aur un ke 14 majmoa kalaam shaya hue jin mein Tanha Tanha, Dard Aashoob, Shab Khoon, Mere Khawab Rezah Rezah, Be Aawaz Gali Kochoon Mein, Nabina Shaher Mein Aaina, Pas Andaaz Mausam, Sab Aawazian Meri Hain, Khawab Gul e Pareshaan Hai, Bood Lik, Ghazal Bahana Karoon, Janaan e Janaan aur Ae Ishhq Junoon Pesha shaamil hain. Ahmed Faraz ki tasaneef ke trajim Angrezi, French, Hindi, Yogoslavia ki Serbo-Croatian, Swedish, Rusian, German aur Punjabi mein hue. Ahmed Faraz Urdu, Persian, Punjabi sameit deegar zabanon par bhi mukammal uboor rakthe thae, umar ke aakhri ayyaam mein woh gurdon ke aarzah mein mubtala hogaye, Ahmed Frazne hazaron nazmein aur darjanon majmoa kalaam bhi tehreer kiye, Ahmed Faraz 25
  August 2008 ko wafaat pagye thae. Ahmed Faraz ney apni aadbi zindagi ka aaghaz taalib Ilmi ke daur se kya aur kayi asnaaf e sukhan mein taba aazmai kar chukay hain magar bunyadi taur par yeh ghazal ke shayar hain. Ahmed Faraz ko un ke adabi fun ki wajah se mutadid Awards bhi miley hain. Unhen Hilal e Imtiaz, Sitara e Imtiaz, Nigaar awards aur Hilal e Pakistan jaisay bawaqar Awards se nawaza gaya tha.
Un ki kayi ghazlon ko bahut se gulukaron ney gaaya un ki shayari aur gazalain aaj bhi filmon, dramon aur geeton mein shaamil hoti hain. Ahmed Faraz ki mashhoor ghazlon mein ”ab ke bichhde”, ”suna hai log usay”, ” phir isi raah guzar par”, ”yun they” sameit deegar shaamil hain. Ahmed Faraz ki gazalain ganey walon mein Pakistani gulukar Noor Jehan aur Salma Agha hi nahi balkay Bharati maroof ghazal gayik Jagjit Singh bhi shaamil hain.
139.title: Ahmed Faraz ki dasvin barsi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Selaab ki tabah karyon se pareshan haal riyasat Kerala ke liye sab se badi raahat ka samaan huwa hai. United Arab Emirates ney museebat zadgaan e selaab ki raahat o baazaabadkaari ke liye 700 crores rupay ki khateer maali imdaad faraham karne ka wada kya hai. Chief Minister Kerala Pinarayi Vijayan ney yahan aik press conference mein zaraye ablaagh ko is ke baray mein waaqif kerwatay hue United Arab Emirates ka shukriya ada kya. Chief Minister ney bataya ke Abu Dhabi ke Wali Ahad Sheikh Mohammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan ney Lulu group ke Sadarnashin M. A. Yusuf Ali ko is se aagah kiya hai. Kerala ke kayi logon ke liye Khaleeji Mumalik Watan e saani ki hesiyat rakhtay hain. Wahan Keralites sirf workers nahi hain balkay wahan ke har ghar ka kisi na kisi etebaar se Keralites ke sath talluq hota hai. Wahan har cheez mein Malyali touch zaroor millta hai. Chief Minister ney kaha ke hamari maujooda museebat mein Khaleej ke awam hamari terha hi jazbati hain. unhon ney hamaray liye 100 million dollars, approximately 700 crores Indian rupess ki imdaad dainey ka faisla kya hai. mein saddar United Arab Emirates Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Naib Sadar wo Wazir e Azam Sheikh Mohammad bin Rashid ka Malyali awam ki taraf se shukriya ada karna chahta hon. Lulu Group ke Sadarnashin ney jab Abu Dhabi ke Wali Ahad se inhen Eid uz Zuha ki mubarakbaad dainey mulaqaat ki to unhon ney is faisla se aagah kiya. UAE ke 700 crores rupay ki maali imdaad ke barkhilaf markazi hukoomat ney Kerala ke liye sirf 600 crores rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya hai. Qabal azeen Wazeer e Dakhla Mr. Rajnath singh ney 100 crore rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya tha. Wazeer e Azam ney riyasat ke apne daura ke mauqa par 500 crores rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya, jabkay Chief Minister ney bohraan se nimatney ke liye fori 2000 crores rupay ki imdaad ka mutalba kya tha. Kerala mein shadeed barish aur selaab ke baais 8 taa 20 augst Zayed از 250 afraad halaak hogaye hain jabkay 10, 28, 073 log 3, 274 relief camp mein sahara lainey par majboor hue hain. yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke jahan Khaleeji Mumalik ke sarbarah, Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ki imdaad ke liye barri farakhdili ka muzahira kar rahay hain aur is bohraan mein khud ko shaamil kar rahay hain wahein androon malik Kerala ke awam ke sath kuch reyasti hukoomaton aur awam ka rawayya intehai muandana hai. Relief kamon ko bhi mazhab ki aeinak se dekha ja raha hai aur firqa parast anasir hindustani awam ko Kerala ki awam ko relief pohanchaney se rokney ki koshish kar rahay hain.
3.title: Kerala ke liye UAE ki 700 crores rupay ki imdaad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ki mukhtalif Eidgahon aur ahem Masajid mein 22
August Wednessday salaat Eid ul Azhha ke auqaat paish hain.

Eidgah Mir Alam mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha theek 9:30 bajay hogi. Maulana Hafiz Mohammad Rizwan Qureshi imam o khateeb Makkah Masjid imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge. namaz se Qabl Ameer Millat e Islamia Telangana wo Andhra Pradesh Maulana Hussamuddin Sani Jafer Pasha aur Sheikh-ul-adb Jamia Nizamia Maulana Saifuddin ka urdu mein khitaab hoga.
Masjid o Eidgah Ujaley Shah sahib mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Khalid Saifullah Rahmani khutba deinge aur Hafiz o qaari Imran Taqiuddin Sharfi namaz ki imamat farmaen ge.
Eidgah hazrat Amber Shah Baba Amberpet mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 9:30 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Dr. Syed Mohammad Hamiduddin Sharfi Director IHARC fazayal e Eid ul Azhha bayan karen ge.

Eidgah Paanch Khanah Langar Houz mein Namaz e Eid 9:30 bajay hogi. Qablaz Namaz Maulana Syed Shah Zahiruddin Ali Sufi sjjadahnasheen Dargah hazrat Sufi  Azam ka khitaab hoga. Maulana Hafiz o qaari Hasan Khan kaamil ul Hadis Jamia Nizamia khutba deinge aur imamat karen ge.
Eidgah Sanatnagar mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay hogi. Dr. Mohammad Siraj ur Rehman Farooqi Professor Osmania Dental College imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge.
Eidgah ahal sunnat wa-aljamaat Chilkalguda Secunderabad mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Namaz se Qabl Maulana Syed Khwaja Ziauddin Sabri bayan karen ge aur imamat karen ge.

Eidgah Bilali Hockey Ground mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 8:15 bajay ada ki jaye gi Maulana Shah Jamal ur Rehman ka Qabl namaz bayan hoga. Maulana Hafiz o Qaari Asad imamat karen ge. Barish ki soorat mein Jamia Masjid A C Guards mein namaz ada ki jaye gi.
Eidgah Gumbadan e Qutub Shahi , Golconda mein Namaz e Eid 8:45 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Imamat o Khitabat ke faraiz Maulana qaari syed Mateen Ali Shah Quadri anjaam deinge .
Eidgah hazrat Salaar Auwlia Hafizpait : Eidgah hazrat Salaar Aiwloa New Hafizpait mein Namaz e Eid 8:30 bajay hogi.
Eidgah Pahadi Shareef mein Namaz e Eid 9:00 bajay subah ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Mohammad Abdur Rahman imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge.

Eidgah Jilania mut-tasil Dargah hazrat Mohammad Jilani Quadri Kalimi nazd Lohay ka Charminar Hitec City mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 9:00 bajay hogi. Maulana syed Abdul Quadri Jilani fazayal e qurbani bayan farmaen ge aur imamat o khatabat ke faraiz anjaam deinge.

Eidgah Waadi e Mustafa Jal Pally ke paas Eid ul Azhha ki namaz theek 9:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Sadar Committee janab Mohammad Abdur Rauf ka bayan hoga aur eid ka namaz Hafiz o Qaari Riyaz Ahmed Ashrafi padhhayenge.

Tareekhi Makkah Masjid mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha theek 9:30 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Hafiz o Qaari Mohammad Lateef Ahmed molvi kaamil Jamia Nizamia imamat karenge aur khutba deinge.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukan Assembly Gosha Mahal Raja Singh Lodha ko mangal ke din Police ney giraftar karliya. Gau Raksha ke naam par qanoon ko hathon mein lainay par un ke khilaaf darj muqadmaat ke khilaaf ba taurr ehtijaj Hyderabad Police Commisionerate ke rubaroo dharna dainay ki dhamki par unhen girftar karliya gaya hai. Peer ki shab se Rukn Assembly ki rihayish gaah par Police ko taiynaat kardiya gaya tha aur jab woh Mangal ki subah apne ghar se bahar nikalney ki koshish ki to unhen girftar karliya gaya. Iss mauqa par Raja Singh ney baat cheet karte hue kaha ke Police, un Hindus ke khilaaf muqadmaat darj kar rahi hai jo gaaye ki rakhsa karne ki koshish kar rahay hain. Unhon ney Gau Rakshakon ke khilaaf darj muqadmaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne ka mutaliba kya aur woh chahtay hain ke jo gaayein zabt ki gayeen unhen Gaushalah muntaqil kya jaye, halaanke ab tak Eid ul Azhha ke silsila mein kisi gaaye ko zabt nahi kya gaya hai. Unhon ney intikhabaat ke paish e nazar kattar pasand Hindus ke vote batorne ki niyat se is saal Gau Raksha ke naam par na sirf BJP Party se istifa dey diya hai balkay kuch Hindu naujawanon ko ikhatta karte hue un ke Gau Raksha dal qaayim kiye hain aur unhen shaher ke muzafaat mein tolyon ki shakal mein bhaijtay hue Eid ul Azhha ke silsila mein janwaron ko muntaqil karne wali gadiyon ko zabardasti rok kar unhen apne qabza mein karne ki koshish kar rahay hain. Yahan yeh baat qabil e zikar hai ke khud Musalmanoon ney razakarana taur par kayi barson se gaaye ki qurbani na dainay ka faisla kya hai. Yeh sirf apne aap ko kattar Hindu saabit karne ke liye har saal Gau Raksha ke naam par uddham machate hain magar is martaba kuch ziyada hi kar rahay hain. Un ki inhi harkaton ki wajah se khud BJP Party ki riyasti unit ke qaayideen aajiz aachukay hain aur unhen party programmes se kayee dinon se door rakha gaya hai. Aisa lagta hai ke unhen khud yeh yaqeen hochla hai ke woh is martaba dubarah Gosha Mahal halqa Assembly se muntakhib nahi ho payinge is liye woh Gau Raksha ke naam par yeh sab drama baazi kar rahay hain.
25.title: Raja Singh giraftar. Gau Raksha ke naam par Police Commisionerate par dharna dainay ki dhamki ka shaksana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen Party ke Social Media ke Head Mr. Syed Abdahu Quadri @ Kashaf ko jaan se maar daine ki dhamkiyaan di jarahi hain. Mr. Kashaf ne aaj Deputy Commissioner of Police East Zone Mr. M Ramesh se mulaqaat karte hue unhen aik tehreeri mahzar paish kya jis mein unhon ne shikayat ki ke guzashta chand dinon se raat dair gaiy unhen koi call karta hai aur dhamkian deta hai aur badtameezi karta hai. Unhon ne shikayat ki ke woh unhen yeh kahte hue musalsal dhamkian daiy raha ha  ”Tu aja Volta Moghalpura ke paas teku chaurrastey pe goli martey”, ”tu kaha thata baithta sab malum nai bachta ab tu”. Mr. Kashaf ko yeh calls, un ke cell phone number par internet numbers i.e.+ 6373785 aur + 501 se kiye jarahay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke woh is amar se aajiz aachukay hain khaas kar jab woh bahar hotay hain ya kaam par hotay hain. Woh mehsoos karte hain ke koi un ka taaqub kar raha hai aur un ki naqal o harkat par nazar rakh raha hai. Mr. Kashaf ne Police se darkhwast ki ke is ko roka jaye qabal is ke ke un par koi asar pade. Unhon ne is maamla ki tehqeeq karne aur qusoor waar ke khilaaf sakht karwai karne ki appeal ki hai. Bataya jata hai ke DCP ne unhen tayaqqun diya ke woh is ki tehqeeq karenge. DCP ne Station House Officer Chadarghat ko is khusoos mein muqadma darj karne aur tehqeeq karne ki hidaayat di hai. Mr. kashaf ne apne twitter payam mein kaha ke woh in cheezon se ghabranay walay  nahin hain. Aisay waaqiaat un ki zindagi ke roz marrah mamlaat ka hissa ban gay hain, un kath putliyoun se nimatnay ke aadi ban gaiy hain. Unhon ne apne ann dekhe dushmanon ko mukhatib karte hue kaha ke puranay din ja chukay hain, apni ankhen kholeen. AIMIM Party mazboot hathon chalayee jarahi hai. Mr. Kashaf ko di jane wali dhamkion aur un ki police mein shikayat se mukhtalif qisam ki chaymegoyaan ho rahee hain aur bahut se logon ke zahnon mein yeh sawal uth raha hai ke woh kaun hain jo is terha ki dhamkian de raha hai aur is ke pas e parda kya muharikaat ho saktay hain? kya yeh niji maamla hai ya phir Party umoor se is ka koi talluq hai? Shikayat mein yeh bataya gaya ke koi unhen Volta Hotel ke paas anay ka challenge kar raha hai aur wahein chaurasta par golian maardenay ki dhamkian de raha hai jis se kuch log yeh soch rahay hain ke kahin yeh Party ka dakhli maamla to nahi hai?
35.title: AIMIM ke Social Media Head ko dhamkiyaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Barr e Saghir Hind o Pak ke qalamkaar  sahafi janab Kuldip Nayar ka Dehli mein jumaraat ko mukhtasir si alalat ke baad bah umar 95 baras inteqaal hogaya. Janab Kuldip Nayar Punjabi thae magar un ki paidaiesh 1923 mein Sialkot mein hui thi. Indira Gandhi ney jab emergency nafiz ki thi to uss waqt janab Kuldip Nayar pahelay sahafi thae jinhein jail mein daal diya gaya tha. Woh Hind-Pak pur aman bahami taluqaat ke bohat baday wakeel thay. janab Kuldip Nayar  1947 mein Dehli se shaya honay walay Urdu akhbar ”Anjaam” se apni sahaafat ka aaghaz kiya tha. Sahaafat ke sath siyasat ka bhi woh taweel tajurbah rakhtay thae, aqwam e mutahidda mein Hindostan ke numainda aur Bartania mein High Commissioner of India rehne ke sath Rajya Sabha ke member bhi reh chuke, Hind o Pak ke darmiyan behtar taluqaat bananay ki unhon ney hamesha koshish ki aur isi par woh aksar likhte rahay, woh kayi baras tak pabandi se 14/15 August ko Amritsar mein waqay Hind o Pak ke Attari-Wagha par jaakar shama roshan karte rahay. 1923 mein Sialkot , Punjab Pakistan mein un ki paidaiesh hui wahein unhon ney wakalat tak ki taleem haasil ki, 47 mein hindostan aagaye aur waqalat karne ke bajaye sahaafat se wabista hogaye, phir yahin ki shehriat unhon ney hamesha ke liye ikhtiyar karli. Un ka column “between the lines” (bain as sutoor in Urdu) bahut maqbool huwa. Un ka column 80 se zayed akhbarat mein shaya huwa karta tha.
55.title: Buzurg sahafi Kuldip Nayar ab nahi rahay

news_detail: Israa al-Ghomgham pehli khatoon insani huqooq karkun hain jinhein Saudi Arabia mein szaye mout hosakti hai, Un par muzahireen ko ishtial dilanay aur fsadyon ki akhlaqi himayat ka ilzaam hai, Shiah mazhab se talluq rakhney wali Israa ko 2015 mein shohar ke sath girftar kya gaya tha, jabkay adalti karwai 32 mah baad shuru hui. Amnesty International ne Saudi hukoomat se mutalba kiya hai ke woh khatoon rukn ko szaye mout dainay ke iradah ko tark kardey, tanzeem ke mutabiq May se ab tak 9 khawateen sameit 12 kaarkunon ko girftar kya ja chuka hai. Muzahireen ko tashadud par ubhaarne ke liye kam az kam 13 khawateen ko hirasat mein liya gaya tha jin mein se 4 ko rihaa kardiya gaya. Udhar Canada ne bhi un karwaiyon par Saudi Arabia se apni tashweesh ka izhaar kya tha jis ke baad dono Mumalik ke darmyaan taluqaat mein bigaad aagaya hai, tarjuman Canadian wizarat kharja ka kehna hai ke huqooq niswaan, insani huqooq aur azadi izhaar e raaye ke liye khaday rahen ge, Isi muamlay par Canada aur Saudi Arabia mein tanaoo paaya jata hai.

Human Rights Watch ki janib se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Israa al-Ghomgham ko phansi dainay ki sifarish sara sar zulm hai. Wazeh rahay ke Saudi prosecutor ne Israa al-Ghomgham sameit 5 khawateen ko szaye mout ki sifarish ki hai, Israa al-Ghomgham ke khilaaf 32 mah baad adalti karwai hui hai. Paanchon karkunaan ke muqadmaat dehshat gardi ki Secret Trial Court mein zair samaat hain, Prosecutor ne Israa sameit insani huqooq ke 5 karkunaan ko szaye mout ki sifarish ki hai. Siyasi taur par fa-aal Israa al-Ghomgham ko 2015 mein Saudi Arabia se girftar kya gaya tha, al-Ghomgham par muzahireen ko ishtial dilanay aur fsadyon ki ikhlaqi himayat ka ilzaam lagaya gaya hai, 29 sala Israa ne Saudi arab ke tamam shehrion ke liye yaksaa huqooq ka mutalba kya tha. Woh 2015 mein apni giraftari tak Saudi Arbia ke mashriqi soobah mein 2011 se zabardast muzahiray karti aa rahi thi. Saudi Arabia ne Israa sameit deegar huqooq insani kaarkunon ke khilaaf karwaiyon ko tark kardainay ke mutalba ko Mulk ke dakhli umoor mein madakhlat par mahmool karte hue mustard kardiya hai.
77.title: Israa al-Ghomgham ko szaye mout hosakti hai

news_detail: Afghan Taliban ney budh ko toseeq ki ke woh Rusia mein aindah mah munaqqid shudni aman mazakraat mein apne qasid rawana karen ge. Rusian wazeer kharja Sergey Lavrov ney kaha hai ke Afghan Taliban 4 September ko moscow mein honay walay aman mazakraat mein hissa len ge. Idhar Rusian wizarat kharja ki taraf se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke aayindah mah Moscow mein honay walay aman mazakraat mein America samait 12 mumalik ko dawat di gayi hai. Moscow mein Afghan aman mazakraat is ka wazeh saboot hai ke Rusia ka Afghanistan mein kirdaar barh raha hai. Rusian wizarat kharja ney Afghan hukoomat ki taraf se teen mah ki mashroot jung bandi ki himayat ki hai magar Taliban is tajweez ko mustard kar chukay hain. Rusian wizarat kharja ke aik ohdedar Zamier Cabuloof ney kaha ke Moscow ney Taliban jinhein woh dehshat gard qarar day kar pabandiyan bhi laga chuka hai ko mazakraat mein shirkat ki dawat di hai. Rusian khabar rasan agency ‘Interfax’ ney Rusia mein Afghanistan ke safeer Abdul Qayyum Kochai ka aik bayan naqal kya hai jis mein un ka kehna hai ke Taliban ka Moscow mein aman mazakraat mein shirkat ka elaan musbit iqdaam hai aur Kabul is ka khair muqaddam karta hai. Kabul se Reuters ki ittila ke mutabiq Rusia ki janib se pehal kardah aman mazakraat mein Afghan hukoomat shirkat nahi kere gi. Khabar rasan agency ney hukoomat ke do senior ohdedaron ke hawala se kaha gaya ke Afghanistan , mazakraat mein hissa nahi le gajs ke baayis Mulk ke mustaqbil par tabadlah khayaal karne bain mumlikati Conference ke liye Rusia ke mansoobah par pani phirsakta hai. Afghanistan ke aik sarkardah Security ohdedar ki janib se is bayan ke kuch der baad hi hukoomat Afghan ka faisla samnay aaya hai jis mein unhon ney tawaqqa zahir ki thi ke kabul hukoomat ke sath aman mazakraat mein shaamil honay ke liye Rusia Taliban par dabao daaleyga.
94.title: Taliban ki aman mazakraat mein shirkat, Afghan hukoomat ka guraiz

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ghairat ke naam par mushtaba qatal  (suspect Honor Killing) ke aik waqea mein Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein jumaraat ko aik baap ne apni beti ka gala (throat) kaat diya chunke iss ne uss shakhs se shadi karli thi jis se woh pyar karti thi. Mutafiyah ki shanakht Jaya Amma ki hesiyat se ki gayi jis ne apne padosi Suresh se paanch saal qabal shadi karli thi. Shadi ke baad yeh joda basti chod kar chala gaya tha. Unhen aik do sala larka bhi hai. taham yeh khandan abdullah poor wapas lota tha taakay Suresh ki maa ki aakhri mazhabi rasomaat mein shirkat kar sakay, jin ka haal hi mein dehaant huwa tha. Jaya Amma ke waalid ko apni beti ke wapas lout anay ka ilm hogaya, Iss ke waalid Narsimha ne gussa mein biphar kar apni beti ka gala kaat diya jis ke nateeja mein bar sar e mauqa halaak hogayi.
110.title: Honor Killing- Baap ne beti ka gala kaat diya

news_detail: Kurnool. Sabiq wazeer aanjhani Bhuma Nagi Reddy aur Shobha Nagi Reddy ki Dukhtar o aandhraprdish ki wazeer sayahat Bhuma Akhila Priya ney shadi ke bandhan mein bndh jaaney ka faisla karliya hai. Shadi ki is taqreeb ko aik bahut baday ijtima mein tabdeel karne ki mansoobah bandi ki jarahi hai. Zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq shadi ki taqreeb mein logon ko madoo karne ke liye lorry bhar ruqqey print kurwaye gaye hain, aur unhen 30, 000 logon mein khaas kar Allagadda aur Nandyal Assembly halqon ke Telugu Desam Party kaarkunon mein taqseem kiya jaye ga. Bhuma Akhila Priya ki shadi sanatkar Madhur Bhargava Ram Naidu se 29
August ko shobha Nagi Reddy Engineering College Allagadda mein anjaam paye gi. Shadi ke intizamaa ke liye Goa ki aik Event Management Company ki khidmaat se istifada kya gaya hai.
126.title: Andhrayee Wazir ki shadi. 30,000 logon ki dawat

news_detail: Hyderabad. High Court ney aaj Super Speciality Medical Post Graduation Courses mein dakhla ke liye managment quota ke tahet nashiston ke liye fees ko 5 lakh rupay se badha kar 25 lakh rupay kardainay se mutaliq sarkari ehkaam par amal aawri par hokum e iltiwa jari kardiya hai. Health Care Reforms Association ney GO ki mukhalifat karte hue High Court mein aik Writ Petition dair ki thi. Muqadma ki samaat karte hue Adalat ney fees mein be tahasha izafah ko na munasib paaya aur GO par amal aawri ko kaladam qarar day diya. Darkhwast guzar Association ney majhool GO par High Court ke hokum e iltiwa ki sataish ki.
140.title: Medical PG Courses mein fees mein izafah par High Court ka hokum e iltiwa

news_detail: Hyderabad. America ki khufia agency Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) ki shaya kardah ‘World Fact Book’ ke taaza tareen addition mein Hindustan ka mabsoot tazkara kya gaya hai. is dastaweez mein jahan mulk ki siyasi partiyon ka tazkara kya gaya hai wahein political pressure groups ka bhi tazkara kya gaya hai. jis mein rashtrih soyam syok se mulhiq do ahem tanzeemon Bajrang Dal aur Vishwa Hindu Parishad ka taaruf mazhabi intahaa pasand tanzeemon ke taur par kya gaya hai jabkay RSS ko aik qoum parast tanzeem ke taur par tasleem kya gaya hai, jabkay waadi kshmirmin kal jamati hurriyaat conference ko alhdgi pasand group ke taur par paish kya gaya hai. Jamiat Ulama e Hind (Mahmood Madni) ko aik mazhabi tanzeem ke taur par muta-arif karwaya gaya aur is ke quied ke taur par molana syed Mahmood Madni ka naam paish kya gaya hai. jab se yeh baat aam hui ke CIA ki dastaweez mein Bajrang Dal aur Vishwa Hindu Parishad ko mazhabi intahapasand tanzimon ke taur par paish kya gaya hai dono tanzeemon ke qaideen ki tashweesh barh gayi hai aur woh is fehrist mein un ki shanakht intehapasand tanzeem ke taur par hataane ke liye qanooni charah joi ke imkanaat talaash kar rahay hain, kyunkay woh achi terhan jantay hain ke is terhan ke tag lag jaaney ki soorat mein inhen beron mulk chand jama karna bara mushkil hojaye ga. Bajrang Dal ke National Cinvenor Manoj Verma ney ‘The Print’ se baat cheet karte hue toseeq ki ke woh qanooni pehluo ka jaiza le rahay hain. unhon ney kaha ke chand dinon qabal hamaray ilm mein yeh baat aayi hai, hum mahireen se mahswara kar rahay hain aur is ke counter ke liye qanooni imdaad talabb kar rahay hain. singh ki tanzeemon ke qaideen ney id-daa kya ke mazhabi janooniat se koi sarokaar nahi hai aur un ki tanzeemen sirf qoum parast aur saqafati noiyat ki hain. Bajrang Dal ke qayed ney kaha ke kisi mulk ki antli jins agency ko hamari tanzeem ko intahaa pasand qarar dena chahiye. inhen is ka haq kis ney diya hai? hum bain al aqwami shaakhen rakhtay hain lekin hum ney kisi ko mushkil mein nahi dala. hum qoum parast hain. hum dekhen ge ke usay sudharnay kya kya ja sakta hai. aik baat ghhor karne ki yeh hai ke America ki janib se un tanzeemon ko intehapasand qarar dyie jaaney ke bawajood abhi taq un tanzeemon ney sarkon par koi muzahira nahi kya hai hatta ke yeh log apna khamosh ehtijaj bhi darj nahi kurwaye hain aur nah hi Amrici sifarat khanah ko maktoob ehtijaj paish kya gaya hai balkay America ko yeh qaail karwnay ki koshisho mein hai ke un par lagey intahaa pasandi ke tag ko nikaal kar RSS ki terhan qoum parast tanzeemon ke taur par tasleem kya jaye. agar aisa hi kisi muslim mulk ki khufia tanzeem ki janib se kya jata to ab taq is mulk ke hazaron parcham aur yahan mojood musalmanoon ki crore ha rupiyon ki amlaak ko yeh tabah kardete. yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke yeh report 2016 mein liye gay jaiza par mabni hai. ho sakta hai ke aindah report mein un tanzeemon ko bhi America qoum parast tanzeemon ke taur par tasleem karle ga. shaed is liye bhi ke trmp ki kamyabi ke liye un Hindu junoneyon ney mulk ke mukhtalif mqama t- par pooja bhi ki thi aur un ke muslim dushman banaya t- par un ki aarti bhi utari thi.
6.title: CIA ki nazar mein Bajrang Dal aur VHP mazhabi intehapasand tanzeemen

20.title: Masharti aitbaar se mazhabi taasub mein Hindustan sare fehrist

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aalami shohrat yafta buzurg mizah nigaar janab Mujtaba Hussain ne Urdu Academy ke Mujalla ‘Qaumi Zabaan’ ke June ke shumara mein Mr. Mohammad Ali Riffat aayi ae s ( retired ) ke mazmoon ”Ggadha Shree” ki ishaat par qanooni notice jari kar di hai. Secretary mehakma aqliati behbood Mr. Dana Kishore, Director aqliati behbood Mr, Shahnawaz Qasim , Secretary Urdu Academy Professor S. A. Shukoor, mazmoon nigaar Mr. Mohammad Ali Rafat ke alawa Taahaa Print Systems Abids ke naam qanooni notice jari ki hai. Yaad rahay ke mazkoorah mazahiy mazmoon mein mazmoon nigaar ne aik gadhay ki sarguzssht paish ki hai jis mein unhon aalmi shohrat yafta mizah nigaar Padma Shri janab Mujtaba Hussain ka naam liye baghair tamaskhur uraya hai. janab Mujtaba Hussain aik aalmi shohrat Yafta mazah nigaar hain jinhein nah sirf hukoomat hind ne Padma Shri award se nawaza hai balkay kayi reyaston ki adabi anjmnon aur Academies ne aizaz se sarfraz kya hai.

Janab Mujtaba Hussain ne kaha ke agarchay mazmoon nigaar ne kahin bhi un ka naam istemaal nahi kya hai taham aisay wazeh isharay kiye hain jo unhi ki taraf nishandahi karte hain. unhon ne kaha kay is mazmoon mein nah sirf un ki shakhsiyat par keechar uchala gaya balkay qaumi awards, ilmi jamiyaat aur mohqiqeen ki bhi tazheek ki hai. Janab Mujtaba Hussain ne herat ka izhaar kiya ke kis terhan aik sarkari idaara ki janib se shaya kiye jane walay Mujalla mein qaumi award Yafta shakhs ke khilaaf harzah saraai ki ijazat di ja sakti hai. Unhon ne kaha ke aik sarkari Mujalla ko zaati mkhasmt aur kirdaar kashi ke liye istemaal kya gaya hai jo intahi mayoob baat hai. Is mazmoon ki ashaat par shehar ke udaba o shouraa aur mizah nigaron ne bhi sakht mazammat ki hai. janab Mujtaba Hussain kuch dinon se aleel thay aur woh Hospital mein shareek thay. Taham Hospital se discharge honay ke baad unhon ne qanooni notice jari ki hai.
33.title: Mujtaba Hussain ne qanooni notice bhaij diya

news_detail: Telangana State Waqf Board ney achanak tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi masdood kar di hai jis ke baayis Waqf Board se rujoo honey walay Nav Muslim afraad ko ajeeb o ghareeb sorat e haal ka saamna karna pad raha hai aur woh apne ahem kamon ki anjaam dahi se mehez is liye maflooj hogaye hain ke un ke paas Waqf Board ka jari kardah sadaqatnama tabdeeli e mazhab maujood nahi hai, is liye woh Waqf Board mein aik ohdedar se dosray ohdedar ke paas daudtey minnat samajat karte hue nazar atay hain. Waqf Board arsa daraaz se hi jahan sadaqatnama Nikah aur sadaqatnama Talaq o Khula jari karta hai wahein woh tabdeeli mazhab ka bhi sadaqatnama jari karta hai aur yeh sadaqatnaame nasirf Mulk balkay bairoon Mulk bhi tasleem o qubool kiye jatay hain. Yeh sadaqatnaame bauhat se umoor mein nihayat hi kaar amad saabit hotay hain khaas kar Passport ki tayari aur kayi mumalik ke family visas ke husool ke liye un sadaqtnamon ki peshkashi zurori hoti hai. Sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab Nikah ke liye bhi zurori hotay hain. Agar koi mard ya aurat dosray mazhab ko tark karkay Islam qubool karte hain to unhen Nikah karne aur Passport ki tayyari ke liye Waqf Board ke jari kardah sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab ki peshkashi zurori hoti hai. Har saal aik andazay ke mutabiq Telangana Waqf Board ki janib se salana taqreeban 500 sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab jari kiye jatay hain. Yahan yeh wazahat zurori hai ke Waqf Board yeh sadaqatnaame apne taur par tahaqeeq karte hue jari nahi karta hai balkay Qazion ki janib se jari kardah Booklets aur chand mustand Mili idaron aur mazhabi shaksiaat ki janib se jari kardah sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab ki asaas par jari karta hai. Is terha un sadaqtnamon ki hesiyat sirf toseeqi hoti hai magar deegar ahem umoor jaisay Passport ki tayari, Family Visas ka husool aur Nikah ke liye Waqf Board ki janib se jari kiye jaany walay sadaqtnamon ka hi aitbaar kya jata hai. Waqf Board ki website par paish kardah adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq Waqf Board ney Jaria saal 1
January se 31
March tak teen mah ke arsa mein Nikah ke 10,200, ghair mulkion ko Nikah ke 158, Talaq ke 150, Khula ke 50 aur tabdeeli mazhab ke 118 bamaavezah sadaqatnaame jari kiye hain.

Yaad rahay ke mutahidda Andhra Pradesh mein Nikah, Talaq o Khula aur tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi mein yaksaniyat paida karne Waqf Board ki tajweez par mehakuma Aqliati behbood ki janib se aik sarkari hukumnama GO MS no. 37 dated 10

November 2002 jari kya gaya tha jis mein kaha gaya ” Chief Executive Officer A.P. State Waqf Board ki janib se paish kardah report ke tanazur mein Hukoomat ney maamla ka bareek beeni se jaiza lainey ke baad Nikah/Talaq/tabdili e mazhab ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi mein saari riyasat mein Quzath ke aik uniform system ko ikhtiyar karne ka faisla kya hai. Telangana mein jari nizaam Quzath ko Andhra aur Rayalaseema khitton tak bhi wusat di jaye gi. Chief Executive Officer A.P. State Waqf Board ko ikhtiyar diya jata hai ke Telangana khitta ke khutoot par Andhra aur Rayalaseema khitton mein Qazion ko sadaqatnama Nikah Booklets jari kiye jayen.” Agarchay yeh GO darasal Telangana mein raayej nizaam Quzath ko Andhra o Rayalaseema mein bhi raaij o ikhtiyar karne ke liye jari kya gaya tha chunkay Telangana mein Asif jahi daur se hi baani Jamia  Nizamia Moulana Anwaarullah Farooqi ka waza kardah aik jame
chala aaraha tha jabkay Andhra aur Rayalaseema mein aisa koi Nizaam nahi tha .

Telangana State Waqf Board ney sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab ki ijrayi ki masdoodi  se mutaliq na hi koi bazaabta elaan kya hai aur na hi is ki wajohaat batayi hain. Is khsoos mein jab ohdedaraan Waqf Board se rabt paida kya gaya to sirf itna hi bataya gaya ke Chief Executive Officer ney tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi masdood kardainey ka hukum diya hai aur yeh bataya hai ke is khsoos mein mazkoorah baala GO ki roshni mein riyasati Hukoomat se mazeed wazahat o Sarahat ke baad hi jari kiye jayen ge. CEO ke is iqdaam par muntkhiba Board bhi khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye hue. Sadarnasheen Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem bhi is khsoos mein lab kushayee se guraiz kar rahay hain. Is khusoos mein jab tahaqeeq ki gayi to ghair mussadeqa zaraye se pata chala ke aik intahi baa-asar Gair-Muslim khandan ki aik ladki ka tabdeeli mazhab ka sadaqatnama jari kya gaya tha jis par yeh maamla Waqf Board se rujoo kya gaya aur Waqf Board ki janib se is terha ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi ke ikhtiyar ke baaray mein sawalaat uthaaye gay hain jis ki binaa par yeh faisla kiya gaya hai. Yeh baa- asar khandan kisi sayasatdan ka hai ya koi bohat baday Officer ka hai maaloom nahi ho saka .

Ab sawal yeh paida hota hai ke agar Waqf Board Nav Muslim ko sadaqatnama jari karne se inkaar kardey to phir yeh log deegar ahem dastawizaat ke husool ke liye kaunsa rasta ikhtiyar karen? Agar yeh dekha jaye ke kya Waqf Board, ‘sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab’ ki ijrayi ka majaz hai ya nahin? toh jawab yahi hai ke qanoon Waqf ke tehat Waqf Board par yeh zimme daari aayed nahi hoti hai bilkul usi terha jis terha Waqf Board mein shoba Quzath ka qiyam aur Nikah/Talaq/ Khula ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi Waqf Board ke dairakaar mein nahin aate hain. Agar Waqf Board ke daira ekhtyaar ki bunyaad par sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab ki ijrayi masdood kar di gayi hai to phir Waqf Board ko shouba Quzath ke sath sath Nikah/Talaq/ Khula ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi bhi masdood kardeni chahiye aur is ziman mein koi mutabadil intizam kiya jana chahiye magar achanak sadaqatnama tabdeeli mazhab ki ijrayi ki masudi  se un Nav-Muslim ko sakht karb o azmaish se guzarna pad raha hai jis ka madavah jald az jald kya jana chahiye.
46.title: Waqf Board ney tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqtnamon ki ijrayi rok di!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K. K. Chandrashekar Rao jab kabhi Musalmanoon ke beech hotay hain yeh kehte hue nahi thkte ke aqliton ki Falah o behbood ke liye funds ki koi kami nahi hai. isi terhan deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mohammad Mahmood Ali aur TRS Party se wabsta qaideen bhi yeh raag alapte rehtay hain magar amli aitbaar se un daawon ki koi sadaqat nahi hoti hai. TRS hukoomat, mukhtalif programmes ke liye be daregh raqam kharch karti hai magar jab aqliton ka maamla aata hai to aisa lagta hai ke TRS hukoomat ke khazana mein paisa nahi hota hai ya phir woh aqliton ke liye ruqumaat kharch karne par amaada nahi hai. waqf board se mahana wazifa panay wali Muslim mutalqa khawateen guzashta 7-8 mahinon se wazifa panay se qassar hain. qanoon waqf mein yeh gunjaish hai ke Muslim mutalqa khawateen ki kifalat karne wala koi nah ho to inhen baad magistrate hukum, waqf board se un ki zaroriat ke mutabiq mahana wazifa ada kya jaye. tlnganh waqf board se taqreeban 340 mutalqa khawateen mahana wazifa panay ki mustahiq hain jinhein guzashta kayi barson se bar waqat mahana wazifa haasil nahi ho raha hai. Is martaba to woh kayi mah se musalsal mahroom horahee hain. un khawateen ko wazifa ki adai ke liye mahana taqreeban 5 laakh rupay ke masarif atay hain magar waqf board itni haqeer raqam bhi ada karne se qassar hain chunkay is khsoos mein TRS ki hukoomat ki janib se faraham ki jaany wali grant masdood hai. maali saal ke aaghaz ke 4 mah guzarnay ko hai magar hanoz pehli sah mahi qist bhi jari nahi ki gayi hai. Jabkay August mein Hukoomat ko doosri qist ada karna hota hai. Riyasti Hukoomat ki janib se aqliton se mutaliq kisi bhi idaara ko Jaria maali saal ke douran aik rupiya bhi ada nahi kya gaya hai. hatta ke aazmin Hajj ki rawaangi ka camp 28 July se shuru hojaye ga magar usay bhi hanoz raqam jari nahi ki gayi hai. funds ki qillat ke baais tlnganh urdu Academy ke mulazmeen do mah se tankhwahon se mahroom hain. aqliati idaron ko Budget gunjaish ke mutabiq ruqumaat ki aajilaana ijrayi ke iqdamaat karne ki bajaye cheif secretary ny un idaron ke arbab se kaha hai ke woh mawazna takhsees ke lehaaz se ruqumaat ki ijrayi ke liye israar karne ki bajaye inhen mah mein intahi zaroori umoor ki injaam dahi ke liye darkaar ruqumaat ki tafseelaat paish ki jaye taakay is lehaaz se ruqumaat jari kiye ja sakain. agar yahi haal raha to aqliati idaron ki janib se chalaye jaany wali tamam schemes aur programmes thap ho jaien ge aur aqliati Aqamati Schools ke contractors ruqumaat ki adam adai par aik din giza aur deegar zaroriat ki sarbarahi se inkaar kar dein ge aur in bachon ko faqa kashi par majboor hona parre ga. shadi mubarak scheme ke tehat di jaany wali raqam ko bhi badha dene ka elaan kardiya gaya hai magar maloom huwa hai ke guzashta 6 mah purani darkhwaston ki hanoz yaksoi nahi hui hai. kuch khawateen to aisi hain jo shadi ke baad haamla hochuki hain aur ab woh shadi mubarak scheme ki raqam panay ke liye aik idaara se dosray idaara ke chakkar kaatnay par majboor hai. agar mazeed taakheer hojaye to yeh khawateen apni goudon mein sheerkhaar bachon ko thaamay phirti dikhayi den gi. aqliton se mutaliq jab Aiwaan committee ka ijlaas hota hai ya phir koi jalsa hota hai to TRS ke arbab baarha yeh kehte hain ke hamaray Chief Minister chahtay hain ke woh aqliton ko deegar abnaye watan ke shana bah shana khara deikhna chahtay hain.
66.title: Aqliati idaron ke liye funds ki ijrayi masdood

news_detail: Haj Camp se aazmin Hajj ki rawaangi ki reporting karte hue sihafi hazraat dil par pathar rakh kar yeh likh to dete hain ke rawaangi ke waqt rooh parwar manzar thaiy magar haqiqat toh yeh hai ke Haj Housen Nampally ke ihata mein qaim Haj Camp mein aazmin Hajj ki rawaangi ka jo manzar hota hai woh rooh farsaa hai. Jo kuch in dinon wahan dekhnay ko aarhahe agar ehtyaat ko malhooz rakhen to kam azkam usay behudgion se tabeer karna padega. Aazmin e Hajj ko rawana karne se qabl jo Stage sajaya jata hai us par jagah panay ke liye siyasi karkun oochi harkatein karne lagey hain. Aazmin se khitaab ke liye madou kuch aala qisam ke siyasi qaideen ki jo taqareer horahi hain us se aisa lag raha hai ke un ke siyasi aaqaon ki jo karam farmaniyan un par hui hain woh us ka haq ada kar rahay hain. Ulama o Mashaykheen ko bhi aazmin Hajj se khitaab ke liye madou kya jata hai jo aik rasam ki adai ke siwa kuch nahi hai. Woh safar e Hajj par rawana honay walay khush naseeb Zuyuf ur   Rehman ko manask e Hajj ki adayi ke douran jo ehthyat ko malhooz rakhna hai us par roshni to daaltay hain magar Haj Camp mein jo kuch ho raha hai shaed woh nahi dekh paarhe hain ya phir un mein bhi itni jurraat baqi nahi rahi ke woh apne saath shahnasheen par baithnay walay siyasi qaideen aur Haj Committee ke zimm- daaron ko pund o nasihat karen ke dosaron ki ibadat k u apni ryakari aur shohrat panay ka zareya na banaya jaye. Aazmin e Hajj ki basoon ko jhandi dikhaane ke waqt to siyasi karkun tasweer ke frame mein anay ki khatir aisi dhinga mashti karte hain ke unhen dekh kar shareer bachay bhi sharmaa jayen. Us waqt aik toofaan e badtameezi khada hojata hai jo us waqt tak jaari rehta hai jab tak un ki tasweer kashi karne walay Photographers taswerain khenchna band na kar dein. Haj House ke dar-o-deewar ko dekhen to aisa lagta hai ke yahan se aazmin Hajj ko rawana nahi kya jata hai balkay yahan abhi abhi zirayi market committee ke intikhabaat hue hain. Aala ohdon par fayez barsr e iqtedaar siyasi party ke qaideen mein aik qisam ki musabiqat nazar aati hai ke kis ka banner kitna purkashish hai aur kis ko kitni numaya jagah mili hai. Poster baazi ki jiddat ko dekh kar koi hukoomat se yeh mutalba na krbithe ke Haj Camp ke ekhtataam par in poster muqablon par inaam rakh diya jaye. HajjRabb ke liye ki jaaane wali aik khalis ibadat hai magar is ko siyasat zada kardiya gaya hai. Siyasi qaideen, aazmin Hajj ki khidmat ke naam par apni siyasi dukaan chamkanay mein lagey hue hain. Koi ghirat mand aisa nahi hoga jo in harkaton ko gawara kere. Aik ajeeb baat dekhnay mein aaye hai ke hamaray siyasi kaarkunon ko aazmin Hajj ki naam nihaad khidmat ka khayaal unhi dinon mein aata hai jab un ki party brsraqtdar rehti hai. Un ki party ke oppostion mein jatay hi yeh siyasi karkun bhi bilaa lehaaz party, Haj Camp se gayab ho jatay hain. Shaed un ke oppostion mein chalay jaaane se Hajj ki sharayi ahmiyat ghatt jati hai ya phir woh samjhtae hain ke sirf Iqtidaar mein rehne par hi aazmin Hajj ki khidmat karni chahiye. Is ke barkhilaf Millat ke naujawanon ka aik khamosh giroh bhi hai jo har saal pabandi se aazmin Hajj ki khidmat discipline ke sath anjaam deta hai, yeh na hi tasweeron mein atay hain aur na hi Haj Camp mein sarbarah ki jaaane wali ashyae khord o nosh istemaal karte hain. Kash ke ryakaari ku chodh kar Allah ki raza ke liye aazmin Hajj ki dil se khidmat ki jati.
81.title: Kya Haj Camp mein waqai rooh parwar manazair dekhnay ko mil rahay hain. .. .?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hindustan mein Musalmaanoon ki abaadi zayed az 13 feesad hai magar taraqqi ke maamla mein Musalmaanoon ki sharah kisi bhi shouba haaye hayaat mein un ki abaadi ke mutanasib nahi hai. Taaleem ho ya Sanat o Hirfat Musalmaan apne abnaye Watan se bahout peechay hain. Jahan tak mutamavvil tareen Hindustanion ki darjah bandi ka talluq hai, doulat ke aitbaar se 100 Hindustanion mein sirf teen Musalmaan hi jagah bana paye hain. Duniya bhar mein doulat ke aitbaar se darjah bandi karne walay Magazine ”Forbes” ne saal 2017 ke amirtreen afraad ki fehrist jari ki hai. 100 mutamavvil Hindustanion mein sar e fehrist Mukesh Ambani hain jabkay teen Musalmaanoon mein Azim Premji Chairman Wipro  M A Yusuff Ali Managing Director Lulu Group International aur Yousuf Hamied Non Executive Chairman Cipla shaamil hain. Un teen mutamavvil Musalmaanoon ka mukhtasir sa taaruf paish kya jata hai.

Azim Hashim Premji Sadarnashin Wipro Limited, Reliance Group ke Mukesh Bhai Ambani ke baad Hindustan ke dosray mutamavvil tareen shehri hain. Jaria saal un ki doulat ka andaza 17.7 billion dollars kya gaya hai jabkay 2017 mein woh 19 billions dollar ke maalik they. Aalami aitbaar se duniya ke mutamavvil tareen afraad ki fehrist mein un ka number 58 waan hai. 72 sala Azim Hashim Premji ko Hukoomat e Hind ne Padam Bhushan se bhi nawaza hai. Azim Premji bahot mukhayyar waqay hue hain jinhon ne apni company ke 39 % hisas apne khandan Trust ko dey di hain. Is terha un ki aamdani ka qabil lehaaz hissa Khairati kaamon mein sarf hota hai. Azim Premji ne 24

July 1945 ko Mumbai mein aik Nizari Ismaiyli Shia khandan mein aankhh kholi thi. Taqseem e Hind ke baad jab Jinah ne Azim Premji ke waalid Mohammad Hashim Premji ko Pakistan muntaqil hojane ki dawat di to unhon ne is mahswara ko qubool nahi kya aur Hindustan mein hi rehna pasand kya.

Yousuf Ali Musalmaan Veettil Abdul Khder ‘Lulu Group International’ ke baani o Managing Director hain, Jin ka kaarobar yun to duniya bhar mein phela huwa hai magar Mashriq  e Wasta mein Lulu Hyper Market aik jana pehchana naam hai. Yousuf Ali M A, 4. 2 billions dollar ki doulat ke sath Hindustan ke 27 weyn doulat mand shehari hain. Aalami satah par un ka muqaam 388 wahn maqam hai. Yousuf Ali 15 November 1955 kerrala ke Thrissur zila ke Nattika mauza mein paida hue, jahan taleem panay ke baad woh Gujarat muntaqil hogaye aur wahan se business Management and Admnistration mein Diploma karne ke baad 1973 mein Abu Dahbi ke liye chalay gay aur apne chacha ke business mein shaamil hogaye. 2017 mein woh 5 billions dollar doulat ke maalik they. Lulu group ke sirf gulf regain mein 132 stores hain. Lulu group International ko Hindustan ke bahar Hindustanion ko sab se ziyada mulaazimaten faraham karne ka bhi aizaz haasil hai. Arab duniya mein tijarat karne walay 100 sarkardah taajireen mein woh sar e fehrist hain. Hukoomat e Hind ne inhen Padma Shri ke aizaz se bhi nawaza hai. Yeh bhi aik mukhayyar insaan hain aur Arab duniya mein Hindustanion ki Falah o behbood ke liye unhon ne karhaaye numayan anjaam diye hain. Unhon ne Gaza aur Nepal mein Dubai Cares ke sath mil kar Schools ko adopt kya hai. Unhon ne Sharjah mein Hindustanion ke liye 8.3 acres araazi par hama mazhabi shehar khmoshan multi faith funeral centre basaayaa hai.

Scientist Yousuf Khwaja Hamied maroof dwasaz company Cipla ke Non Executive Chairman hain. 2017 mein un ke khandan ki doulat ka takhmeenah 2.6 billions dollar lagaya gaya hai. Generic Medicines tayyar karne wali is Company ki binaa Yousuf Hamied ke waalid Khwaja Abdul Hamied ne 1935 mein daali thi. Un ke waalid babaye qoum Gandhi ji ke pairokaar they. Yousuf Hamied ki walida Farida Yahoodi un-nasal theen. Un ke waalid Gandhi ji ke sath they. Mumtaz maahir taleem Sir Sayyad Ahmed Khan un ke rishta daar hotay hain. Dr. Hamied ne 1960 mein Cipla Limited mein Officer -Incharge of Research and Development ki haisiyat se shumoliat ikhtiyar ki. Bartanwi Raaj ke baayis inhen apne waalid ki Company mein kaam karne ke liye hukoomat se ijazat haasil karni padti thi chunancha un ki ibtidayi thankhah teen saal ke liye 1500 rupay muqarrar hui aur mukammal aik baras kaam karne ke baad inhen apni pehli thankhah mili. Apne waalid ke intqaal ke baad unhon ne Company ko sanbhala. Kaam karne ki ijazat milnay ke baad unhon ne mehsoos kya ke har badi dawa jo woh banana chahtay they patents ke tehat theen, aisi dawaein baraamad karna taqreeban namumkin tha aur androon Mulki Market par Multinational companiyon ka qabza tha. Is liye unhon ne Hindustan ke pitnt qawaneen ko tabdeel krwane 1961 mein indian Drugs Manufacturers  Association qayim ki. Aakhir-kaar 1972 mein un ki mehnetain rang layein aur Hindustani Pharma sanat ko Mulk mein darkaar kisi bhi dawa ki tayari aur farokht karne ki qanooni azadi dey di gayi, jis ke nateeja mein Mulk mein Pharmaceutical  sanat ko khoob badhawa mila. Hukoomat e Hind ne inhen ‘Padma Bhushan’ awards se nawaza hai. Un ki Company aids ki dawa sab se kam qeemat par farokht karne wali Company hai. Unhon ne Pune mein Cancer ke mareezon ke liye Care Unit bhi qayim kya.
96.title: Hind ke teen mutamavvil Musalmaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Bharat mein mardum shumari 2011 ke lehaaz se hanoz Muslim Mulk ki doosri badi aabaadi hai taham guzisshta aik dahey mein Muslims ki aabaadi mein farogh ki sharah mein zabardast kami aayi hai jo guzisshta  6dahon ki sab se ziyada girawat hai. Muslims ki aabaadi ki sharah numoo jo 1991-2001 ke dauraan 29. 52% thi iss mein zabardast girawatt aayi aur ab 2001-2011ke dauraan sirf 24.60% hi rahi hai. Agarchay hanuz Muslims ki sharah numoo, Hindus aur deegar tabqaat se ziyada hai magar girawatt ka tanasub dekha jaye to woh Hindus se badh kar hai. Hindus ki aabaadi mein izafah ki sharah 1991-2001mein 19. 92% thi jo ghatt kar 16.76% hogai hai jabkay Muslims ki aabaadi mein izafah ki sharah 29.52% se ghatt kar 24.60% tak pahonch gayi hai. Iss tarha Muslims ki aabaadi mein izafah ki sharah qader mein 4.92% ki kami aayi hai jabkay Hindus ki aabaadi mein izafah ki sharah mein sirf 3.16% hi kami aayi hai. Muslims ki sharah numoo sab se onche rehne ki aik wajah logon ka isslam qubool karna bhi hai chunkay Christianity  aur Islam mein hi dawah ka kaam hota hai, jiss ko roknay ke liye Hindu firqa paraston ne love Jihad ki isstilaah isstemaal karte hue Dawah ke kamon par rok laganay mukhtalif harbe ikhtiyar kiye jarahay hain, hatta ke ab sarkari satah par bhi aissa kya jaany laga hai. NIA jaissi tehqiqati agency ke zareya yeh tehqeeq karwai jarahi hai ke aissay cases ka pata chalaya jaye jiss mein shadi ke liye Islam qubool karwaya gaya hai. Hindustan mein Muslims ki aabaadi takreeban 17. 22 crores hai aur Mulk ki aabaadi mein un ka tanasub 14. 23% hota hai. Duniya ki Muslim aabaadi ka 11% Hindustan mein hai. Yeh qiyaas ghalat hai ke Pakistan ke muqabil Hindustan mein Muslim ziyada rehtay hain. Agarchay donon Mumalik mein Muslims ki aabaadi ka farq ziyada bada nahi hai magar Hindustan ke muqabil Pakisstan mein Muslim ziyada rehtay hain jo mumkin hai aanay walay dinon mein badal jaye aur Muslim aabaadi ke hissaab se Hindustan duniya ka dosra Mulk ban jaye. Indonesia aur Pakistan ke baad Hindustan mein Muslims ki sab se badi aabaadi hai. Andaza hai ke Hindus, Muslims aur Christians ki sharah numoo mein aayindah do dahon  mein mazeed girawatt aaskati hai jabkay deegar tabqaat ki sharah numoo mein koi qabil e lehaaz farq nahi aeye ga. Aabaadi ke lehaaz se Hindus ka ghalba Manipur, Arunachal Pradesh, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Mizoram (Christian ghalba wali riyasaten), Punjab ( Sikh ghalba wali riyasat ) aur Jammu & Kashmir aur  Lakshadweep (Muslim ghalba wali riyasaten) ko chod kar maabaqi 28 riyasaton mein hai. Mashriqi Hindustan mein Christians ki aabaadi ka ghalba hai. Mazhabi aitebaar se 4 riyasaton Nagaland, Mizoram Meghalaya aur Manipur mein Christians ka ghalba hai jabkay Arunachal Pradesh, Kerala, Tamilnadu, Goa aur Indoman & Nikobar mein un ki aabaadi qabil lehaaz hai. 2 riyasaton Jammu & Kashmir aur  Lakshadweep mein Muslims ka aur aik riyasat Punjab mein Sikhs ka ghalba hai.

Mazhabi lehaaz se Bharat mein 96.62 crore (79. 80%) Hindus, 17.22 crore (14. 23%) Muslims, 2. 78 crore (2.30%) Christians, 2.08 crore (1.72%) Sikhs, 84.43 lakh (0.70%) Budhists, 44.52 lakh (0.37%) Jain mazhab ke maan-ne walay hain. 79.38 lakh (0.66 %) afraad deegar mazahab ke maan-ne walay hain jabkay 28.67 lakh afraad (0.24%) ne apna mazhab zahir nahi kya hai. Mutahidda riyasat aandhra pradesh mein Muslims ki aabaadi 9.52% hai. Telangana ka alahda data hanuz dastyab nahi ho saka. Bharat mein shehri ilaaqon mein tamam mazahab ke maan-ne walay 37.71 crore log baste hain jin mein Hindu 28.22 crore (74.82%), Muslim 6.87 crore (18.23%), Christian 1.12 crore (2.96%), Sikh 59.02lakh (1.57%), Budhists 36.28 lakh (0.96%), Jain Mat ke maan-ne walay 35.47 lakh (0.94%), deegar mazahab ke maan-ne walay 7.39 lakh (0.20%) aur jin logon ne apna koi mazhab nahi zahir kya un ki tadaad 12.24 lakh (0.32 %) hai. Isi tarah dehi Bharat mein 83.38 crore log baste hain jin mein Hindu 68.41 crore (82.05%), Muslim 10.35 crore (12.41%), Christian 1.67 (2. 00%), Sikh 1.49 crore (1.79%), Budhists 48.15 lakh (0.58%), Jain mazhab ke maan-ne walay 9.04 lakh (0.11%), deegar mazahab ke maan-ne walay 72 lakh (0.86%) aur mazhab ka zikar nah karne walay 16.44 lakh (0.20%) paye jatay hain.

Aabaadi ke lehaaz se sab se ziyada Muslim Uttar Pradesh mein paye jatay hain jahan un ki majmoi aabaadi 3, 84,  83,967 hai, jahan Muslims kul aabaadi ka 19.26% hain jabkay Muslim aabaadi ke lehaaz se doosri badi riyasat West Bengal hai jahan Muslims ki majmoi aabaadi 2, 46, 54, 825 hai jo kul aabaadi ke 27.01% hain. Iss ke baad Bihar ka number aata hai jahan Muslims ki kul aabaadi 1, 75, 57, 809 hai jo majmoi aabaadi ka 16.87% hai. choutha number Maharashtra ka hai jahan Muslims ki aabaadi 1, 29, 71, 152 hai jo majmoi aabaadi ka 11.54% hai aur kaseer Muslim aabaadi ke lehaaz se panchwin number par Asam hai jahan Muslims ki majmoi aabaadi 1, 06, 79, 345 hai jo riyasat ki kul aabaadi ka 34.22% hotay hain. Yeh paanch riyasaten hi aissi hain jahan Muslims ki majmoi aabaadi 1 crore se zayed hai iss tarha un paanch riyasaton mein basnay walay Muslims ki kul aabaadi 10, 43, 47, 098 crore hai. Iss lehaaz se un paanch riyasaton mein Mulk ke 60. 58% Muslims rehtay hain aur issi tarha das badi riyasaton mein Muslim 14, 39, 78, 909 baste hain jo Mulk ke Muslims ki aabaadi ka 83. 59% hotay hain. Riyasat ki aabaadi mein Muslims tanasub ke etebaar se  Lakshadweep mein 9 6. 58% , Jammu & Kashmir mein 68.31%, Aasam  mein 34.22%, West Bengal mein 27.01% aur Kerala mein 26. 56 % hain.

Isi tarha Sikkim mein sab se kam Muslim baste hain jahan kul Muslim aabaadi sirf 9, 867 hai aur woh Sikkim  ki majmoi aabaadi ke 1.62% hi hain. Muslims ki kam aabaadi ke lehaaz se dosray number par Dadar wo Nagar Haveli hai jahan Muslims ki kul aabaadi 12, 922 hi hai aur majmoi aabaadi mein tanasub 3.76 % hai, teesray number par Mizoram hai jahan kul Muslim aabaadi 14, 832 hai aur riyasat mein un ka tanasub 1.35% hai, chouthay number par Daman and Diu hai jahan kul Muslim aabaadi 19, 277 hi hai aur majmoi aabaadi mein un ka tanasub 3.76% hai. Panchwin number par Arunachal Pradesh hai jahan Muslim aabaadi sirf 27, 045 hai aur riyasat mein Muslims ka tanasub 1.95% hai. Mulk mein das riyasaten aissi hain jahan Muslims ki majmoi aabaadi aik lakh se kam hai. yeh das riyasaten jin mein markaz ke zair e intizam ilaqay bhi shaamil hain yeh hain Sikkim, Dadr & Nagar Haveli, Mizoram, Daman and Diu, Arunachal Pradesh, Indoman & Nikobar Islands, Nagaland, Chandigarh,  Lakshadweep aur Pondicherry hain.
109.title: Bharat mein Mazahab wari Aabaadi-Kuch Haqayeq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik aysey daur mein jab nafrat ka mahol hai aur Aur Moghal Shenshah Aurangzeb ko munafirat ki alamat ke taur par paish kiya jata hai chand Hyderabadiyon ney juraat ka muzahira karte huwe Aurangzeb ki yaum-e-paidayesh ke 400 saal par aik do roza International Seminar & Exhibition ka ihtemaam karne ka faisla kiya hai taakay is Badashah ke baray mein paayi jaany wali ghalat fehmiyon ka azaala kiya jasakay aur un ki haqeeqi tasweer ko ujagar kiya jasakay. Mumtaz Mahir Assaar e Qadima o tareekh daan janab Mohammad Safiullah ney bataya ke Mughal Shenshah Aurangzeb Alamgir ki paidayesh 3

November 1618 mein huwi jis ki munasibat se hum ney faisla kiya hai ke is azeem Badashah ki 400 ween saalgirah ka Hyderabad mein ihtemaam kiya jaye. Is khusos mein do roza Programme Salar Jung Museum mein rakhney ka iradah hai jis ke liye Museum ke hukkaam se baat cheet ki jarahi hai. Iss do roza Programme mein aik International Seminar bhi rakha jaye ga jis mein Mulk aur bairon Mumalik ke mumtaz morkhin aur scholars ko madoo kiya jaye ga. Iss mauqa par aik exhibition ka bhi ihtemaam kiya jaye ga jis mein un ki naadir tasaveer ke alawa Farameen rakhi jayen ge. Unhon ney kaha ke kitabon aur deegar zaraye ke zareya Aurangzeb ki shabeeh ko bigaadney ki koshish ki jarahi hai iss ke rafa ki iss se behtar soorat nahi hosakti ke un ki 400 ween saalgirah par aik Seminar rakhtay huwe haqayiqe ko manzar aam par laya jaye. Unhon ney bataya ke Aurangzeb ko aik zalim aur Hindu dushman Badashah zahir karne ke liye tareekhi waqhiyat ko tod marod kar paish kiya jaaney laga hai. Misaal ke taur par fouji khidmaat se isteshna ke liye jo jiziya rakha gaya tha uss ko mazhabi tax ke taur par paish kiya jaany laga hai. Aurangzeb ke baray mein yeh mashhoor kardiya gaya hai ke unhon ney kayi Mandir todrey hain jabkay haqeeqat yeh hai ke unhon ney zayed az 622 Manadir ko Jagiraat aur raqmi inamaat ataa kiye thay. Unhon ney bataya ke bahau kam log jantay hon ge ke Mughal sikkun ke aik rukh par kalma tayyiba kanda huwa karta tha magar Aurangzeb ney sikkun par se kalma ko hata diya tha. Hamari yeh koshish hogi ke Aurangzeb ke talluq se payi jaany wali ghalat fehmiyon ka azaala karen aur un ko aik achay Badashah ke taur par paish keren jo aik haqeeqat hai.
130.title: Aurangzeb par Seminar aur Exhibition
