news_detail: America mein honay walay aik surway mein nisf American ney saddar Trump ko nasal parast qarar diya hai.  Quinnipiac Universityuniversity ke surway mein 49 feesad American ney Trump ko nasal parast qarar diya. surway mein shaamil 44 feesad safaid faam afraad aur 79 fisad Siah form afraad ka kehna hai ke Trump nasal parast hain jabkay 58 feesad haspanwi nazaad afraad ki Trump ke baaray mein yahi raye hai. surway mein shaamil 19 feesad siyah faam afraad ney is raye se ikhtilaaf kya hai jabkay 2 feesad afraad ney apni raye nahi di.  Quinnipiac Universityuniversity ney 27 June taa yakam July malik bhar mein 1020 raye dahindon ki Ara haasil ki thi. isi terha Associated Press-NORC Center for Public  Affairs Reserch ney bhi February mein aik surway kya tha aur is mein bhi taqreeban nisf feesad safaid formm American ney khayaal zahir kya tha ke Trump nasal parast hain. isi terhan aik Israeli akhbar Haaretz ke liye kiye gaye surway mein yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke Israeli Obama ke maqabil Trump ko tarjeeh dete hain. is surway ke mutabiq 49 feesad Israelion ney Trump ki purzor himayat ki jabkay 23 feesad ney juzwi himayat ki aur sirf 22 feesad Israelion ney Trump ko mustard kya. is surway ke mutabiq 44 feesad Israelion ka Aiqan hai ke Trump ka aman mansoobah mawafiq Israel hai, jabkay sirf 7 feesad Israelion ka yeh sochna hai ke yeh aman mansoobah mawafiq Palestine hai jabkay 31 feesad Israelion ka yeh maanna hai ke Trump ka mansoobah aman mutawazan hai.
5.title: Trump nasal parast hain ؛nisf Americans ney faisla suna diya

news_detail: Hukoomat Hind ke musalsal dabao ke tehat ‘Whatsapp’ ney afwahon aur jhooti khabron ku pahelhane apne plateform ke istemaal ko muaser andaaz mein roknay ke liye paighamaat, tasaveer aur video ko barray pemana par farod karne par nai thdidat ka elaan kya hai.’ Whatsapp’ ney jummay ko jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha ke who ”Hindustan” mein’ Whatsapp’ par forwarding ko tajribati taur par mehdood kar raha hai. Deegar mumalik ke muqabil Hindustan mein log paighamaat, tasaveer aur videos baday pemana par forward karte hain. Bayan mein kaha gaya ke hum bayak waqt 5 chats ki had muqarrar karne katjrb_h karen ge aur hum media msges ke baad’ koyik forward’ ka button nikaal den ge.’ Whatsapp’ ney chand saal qabal aik fichr kaazafh kya tha jis ke tehat awam aik pegham ko mutadid chats ko forward kar saktay thay. jumaraat ko hukoomat hind ney ‘Whatsapp’ ko aik maktoob rawana karte hue mazeed muaser hal talaash karne par zor diya tha jo jawab dahi peda kar sakay aur malik mein haugume tashadud ke waqeat ko’ Whatsapp’ par uksanay ke liye istemaal karne par qanoon ke nifaz mein Muawin ban sakay. Ekectroncs & IT Ministry ney Jaria mah ke awail mein bhi’ Whatsapp’ ko sakht warning di thi aur Facebook ki malkiat walay messaging plate form ko intibah diya tha keh woh –apne plate form ko afwahon a war ishtial angazi par mabni ghair zimma daarana aur dhamaku payamaat ko phelanay ka zareya ban’nay se rokay jis par’ Whatsapp’ intizamia ney hukoomat ko jawab diya tha ke woh mukhtalif tiknalojiz aur features ko istemaal karte hue forwarded messages  ki nishandahi ki jaye gi aur is ki rokkk thaam ke liye iqdamaat kiye jayen ge.
15.title: Ab Whatsapp par messages forword karne par Tahdeed

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ney tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee ko bahaal karne kafislh kya hai. waqf bordke shoba Khuzaah ki janib se Nikah/Talaq/Khula ke sath sath qubuliat e Islam ke sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee amal mein layi jati hai aur yeh amal guzashta tariban 45 barson se jari tha magar achanak baghair kisi paishgi ittila ke khamoshi ke sath kuch dinon se Waqf Board se rujoo honay walay nomslmon ko tabdeeli mazhab ke sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee masdood kar di gayi thi. Waqf Board ke arbab masdoodi ki bhi wajah nahi bata rahay thay aur inhen sirf yeh bataya ja raha tha ke Chief Executive Officer ki Hidayat par sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee rok di gayi hai, jis ke baayis reverted Muslims ko Nikah karne aur Passport ke husool mein dushwariyan paish aa rahi theen. Y This News Portal par is khsos mein khabar ki ashaat par board ke hakkaam ney sadaqtnaame jari karne se ittafaq kya. Is khusoos mein Chairman Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem aur Chief  Executive Officer Mr. Shahnawaz Qasim ney tabadlah khayaal kiya aur yeh faisla kya ke kisi idaara ki tasdeeq ki bunyaad par Sadaqatnama qubuliat e Islam jari karne ki bajaye Board bhi apne taur par tanqeeh karte hue yeh sadaqtnaame jari kere ga. Hanoz yeh tye nahi kya gaya ke kis terhan Waqf Board tanqeeh kere ga. Waqf Board zaraye ka kehna hai ke is khsos mein Waqf Board ke aik mulazim ko mamoor kya jaye ga. yahan yeh janna zaroori hai ke kayi mili idaray aisay hain jo Islam qubool karne walon ki shahadat aur un ke baaligh honay ki tasdeeq karne ke baad Notary Affidavit haasil karte hue qubuliat Islam ka Sadaqatnama jari karte hain jis ki asaas par Waqf Board apni taraf se aik aur Sadaqatnama jari karta hai jo khangi idaron ki janib se jari kiye jane walay sadaqatnaamon se ziyada moutabar samgha jata hai. Maloom huwa hai ke guzashta dinon aik shumali riyasat ki Police ke ohdedar, Waqf Board ke arbab se rujoo hotay hue Sadaqatnama qubuliat Islam jari karne se mutaliq Waqf Board ke ikhtiyar ke baaray mein istafsaar kiye thay aur yeh id-daa kya gaya tha ke board ney aik larki ke qubuliat Islam ka Sadaqatnama jari kya jabkay is larki ney Islam qubool hi nahi kya tha jis par CEO ney shoba Khuzaah ko Hadayat jari ki thi ke mazeed ehkaam tak Sadaqatnama qubuliat Islam jari nah kiye jayen halaank reyasti hukoomat ney is terhan ke sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee ka Waqf Board ko ikhtiyar diya tha. maloom huwa hai ke Y This News ke zareya sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee ki masdoodi ke baaray mein pata chalne par Waqf Board ke aik rukan mister vhid Ahmed ney Sadarnashin Waqf Board se is masla par guftagu ki aur un par zor diya ke woh fauri tor par sadaqatnaamon ki ijrayee ko yakeeni bananay ke iqdamaat karen.
26.title: Sadaqatnama qubuliat Islam ki ijrayee bahaal karne Waqf Board ka faisla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Public Service Commission (TSPSC) ney 293 sarkari jayidadon Bashmole field Assistant, Sanitary Inspector, Health Assistant, Bill Collector, Assistant Stores Officers, Account Officerr Assistant aur Assistant Account Officer ki jayidadon ke liye elaamia jari kardiya hai. Beshtar mazkoorah jayidadon ke liye online darkhwast ke adkhaal shuru kardiya gaya hai aur umeedwaar apni darkhwasten Commission ke website tspsc.gov.in par daakhil kar saktay hain. Darkhwast guzaron ko jin ki umrein 18-44 ke darmain hain, TSPSC ki janib se munaqqid kiye janay walay Computer asaasi imthehaan ya offline OMR asaasi imthehaan mein shirkat karna hoga, is ke baad un ka intikhab amal mein aaye ga. makhlua jayidadon ki tafseelaat kuch is terha hain:
Field Assistant: 8 jayidadin ( Telangana State Dairy Development Cooperative Federation Limited)
Health Assistant: 50 jayidadin ( Baldi Nazm o Nasq o Shahri Taraqqiat)
Sanitary Inspector: 35 jayidadin ( Baldi Nazm o Nasq o Shahri Taraqqiat)
Bill Collector: 124 jayidadin (Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation)
Assistant Accounts Officer: 13 jayidadin (Telangana State Beverages Corporation Limited)
Assistant Stores Officer: 55 jayidadin (Telangana State Beverages Corporation Limited)
Account Officerr Assistant: 8 jayidadin (Telangana State Beverages Corporation Limited)
45.title: TSPSC taqarrurat- 293 jayidadon ke liye darkhwaston ke adkhal ka aaghaz

news_detail: Hyderabad. molana azad national Urdu University, Hyderabad aur Lucknow Campus mein mukhtalif Under Graduate aur Post Graduate Programmes mein chand nashistain dastyaab hain jin mein merit ki asaas par 12

August ko 9:30 bajey subah ahal umeedwaron ko barsar e mauqa dakhla diya jaye ga. Prof. Fazl ur Rahman , Director Nizamat e Dakhla ke bamawajib Hyderabad mein M.A.( Hindi, Translishn Studies, Farsi, Women studies, Public Administration, Social Work, Islmaic Studies, Siyasiyaat, Tareekh, Sociology, Muashiaat), M.Com, M.Sc (riyaazi), B.A, B.Sc ( MPCS, MPC) aur B.com mein barsar e mauqa dakhlay diye jarahay hain. Isi tarha Lucknow Campus mein M.A(Arabi, Farsi aur Angrezi) aur B.A mein dakhlay dastyaab hain. barsar e mauqa dakhlay ka amal Hyderabad mein MANUU Polytechnic aur Lucknow Campus mein munaqqid hoga. Daakhlay ke khawahishmand talba tamam zurori asnaad aur un ki do set photo copy ke alawa apne hamrah Debit, Credit Card ya net banking ka password waghera sath rakhen taakay admission ke fauri baad online fees daakhil kar saken. Ahliat o deegar tafseelaat ke liye University website
dekhi ja sakti hai.
68.title: Urdu University mein Itwaar ko barsar e mauqa daakhlay

news_detail: Hyderabad. Cyber Crime Police Station, Detective Department Hyderabad City ne Bhoji Reddy College of Engineering Santosh Nagar, Hyderabad mein Social Media, job Frauds, One Time Paasword (OTP) Debit/Credit Card Frauds ke baaray mein Cyber baydaari ka ihtimaam kya aur is ziman mein pamphlets taqseem kiye. Police ohdedaron ne is taraha ki dhoka dahi aur farebi hathkandon se bachney ke liye kiye jaaney walay ahteyati tadabeer se waaqif karwaya. Is noiyat ki dhoka dahi se bachney ke liye kya karna aur kya nahi karna chahiye is ke baaray mein bhi roshni daali gayi. Additional Deputy Commissioner of Police Cyber Crimes, Hydraabad ki zair e nigrani aur Mr.  G. Chakravarthi Assistant Commissioner of Police ki zair e qayadat team mein G Janardhan SI aur Police Constables P. Prashant, D. Y. Raghu, Nehru shaamil they.
86.title: Police ki Cyber Frauds par shaoor baydaari muhim

news_detail: All India Islamic Teachers Association ki janib se  ‘Child Abuse’ se Bachon Bachiyon ki hifazat ke liye 23 tajaweez paish ki gayi hain. Association ki janib se mukhtalif pheluon ka jayiza lainey ke baad Walidain ke liye chand tajaweez paish ki gayeen hain jin par amal karte huwe hum apne bachon ko jinsi heerani se bacha sakte hain. Association ney is khusoos mein kaha ke be shak awam ke jaan o maal ka tahaffuz aur izzat wo aabaroo ki hifazat hakoomat waqt ki awaleen zimma daari hoti hai. Aaj hukoomat se le kar School intezamia tak tamam idaray ” Bohat Masroof” hain. Agar hukoomat kisi bhi wajah se nakaam hojaye to kiya khayaal hai hum apne lakht e jigar ko wehshi darindon ke liye chode den ke woh inhen nochte phiren nai har geez nai, to phir hamein apne tor par apne Bachon ki hifazat karna hogi, lehaza bachon khasosan masoom Bachiyon ki hifazat ke liye chand tajaweez, mashwaray aur guzarishaat paish khidmat hain:

(1) Walidain ko chahiye ke woh apne bachon ki har qisam ki hifazat az khud hi karen. Chowkidaar, School intezamia aur deegar afraad par na chod0en. Apne bachon ki lamha bah lamha khabar rakhen ke woh is waqt kahan par hain.

(2) Bachon ko batayen ke woh kisi se bhi koi cheez na len. Agar koi ajnabi ya gair ajnabi shakhs khaney peeney ki cheez ya raqam dainey ki koshish kere to har geez har geez na len. Sakhti se mana kar dein.

(3) Bachon ko bitayen ke school jatay waqt ya ghar se bahar atay jatay waqt koi shakhs apne aap ko aap ka rishta daar betaye aur aap usay phelay se na jantay hon to is ke behkaway mein har giz na ayen. Saaf inkaar kar dein. Un ke qareeb bhi na khadey hon. Un ki baat bhi na sunen. Un ki taraf dekhen bhi nai.

(4) School atay jatay waqt koi shakhs aap ko pakadney ki koshish kere to zor zor se chillate huwe School, Madrassa ya ghar ki taraf daud lagadin. Madad ke liye pukaarain. Cheekhain, chilayein, royain .

(5) Walidain rozana ki bunyaad par apne bachon ko kam az kam aik ghanta dein, aur un se rozana ki rudaad aur poooray din ki kargzari sunen. Apne bachon ko apne se itna qareeb karen ke woh har baat aap ko khul kar batadain.
(6) Apne bachon ko khud etemaad banayen. Apne bachon ko haisiyat den. Unhen achay buray ki tameez aur Dost Dushman ki pehchan sumjhaayein.

(7) Apne bachon ko pooray kapday pahenayein. Bachiyon ko bhadkeelay aur ishtial angaiz kapdey hargiz hargiz na pahenayein. 7 saal se badi bachiyon ko hijaab pahenayein aur 10 saal ke baad mukammal parda karwaen, kyun kay umooman 10 saal ki bachiyan mushteha hojati hain.

(8) Apne bachon ko khud School wo Madrassa pahonchayein aur wapas le kar aayein. Bachiyon ke maamla mein kisi par bhi aitebaar na karen. Yeh waqt aur daur shehwat parasti ka hai. Maghribi tahazeeb aur Filmon dramon ney nojawanon ko aisa darinda banadiya hai ke hama waqt masoom ko  ochkaney ke liye tayyar rehta hai.
(9) Apne bachon ko achi khoraak dein, kayun kay sahet par, halaat par, mahol par aur bachon ke aasaab aur zahen par khoraak ke asraat musallam hain.

(10) Ghar mein jab koi mard mehmaan khususan gair mehram naujawan aaye to mehmaan khana mein apne bachon aur khususan bachiyon ko hargiz akela na bhejen. Aesay waqhiyat paish aachukay hain ke haiwaan numa insaan ney apne Mehram bachiyon ko bhi na chooda .

(11) Dukanon par apni bachiyon ko akailey hargiz cheez lainey ke liye na bhejen. Agar majburan bhejna pade to samjha kar bhejen ke dukandaar koi cheez muft dein to hargiz na lein. Hans kar baat kere to jawab na dein. Agar koi dusra shakhs dukaan par khada khair khabbar maloom kere ya baat karne ki koshish kere to bilkul bhi tawajjoh na dein. Bas apni matlooba cheez le kar fauran ghar wapas pahonchain .

(12) Apne bachon ko, apne gharane ko, apne khandan ko balkay pooray muashiray ko ba-haya bananay ki koshish karen. Maghribi tahezeeb aur Tv Channel par chalne wali be-hooda Filmon aur fahush dramon ki wajah se hamara khandani nizaam toot phoot ka shikaar hota ja raha hai, chunancha  apne gharon se Tv nikaal bahar karen.

(13) Apne bachon ke hathon Android aur Camera wala balkay kisi qisam ka mobile hargiz na dein. Mobile, Whats App ki wajah se aaj naujawan nasal tabah ho rahi hai. Agar bachon ko mobile dena nihayat hi zaroori ho to un ki poori nigrani karen. vaqtan fawaqtan un ke mobile ki jaanch padtaal karen .

(14) Rozana ki bunyaad par apne gharon mein deeni taleem karen. Iss douran ghar mein maujood sab bachay, walidain aur deegar afraad maujood hon. 2 minute ki taleem ke baad halaat e hazerah se bachon ko waqfiyat den. Unhen Hushiyar karen.

(15) Agar walidain ke paas waqt na ho to bachon ke dada dadi waghera ki zimma daari lagayen ke woh bachon ki nigrani karen. Gharon mein boodhay afraad umooman farigh hi hotay hain. Bachon ko School chodne aur lainey ki zimma daari yeh hazraat bhi le satke hain. Iss tarha un ki warzish bhi hojaye gi aur bachay bhi bahifazat pahonch jayein ge.

(16) Bachon khusosan bachiyon ko tanha School, Madrassa aur Tution Center na bhejein. Poori koshish karen bahen bhaiyon ke sath ya phir gali mohalla ke deegar baetemaad bachon ke sath bhejen. Kam az  kam do bachay ya do bachiyan laazmi hon. Akailey ko shaitan uchakney ki koshish karta hai, jabkay jamaat par Allah ki rahmat hoti hai .

(17) Walidain aur asateza bachon ko apne tahaffuz aur difaa ke liye karate, Tykondo waghera ki zaroori mashq karwaen. Schoolon mein deegar khail kood ke sath sath is ko lazim qarar diya jaye. Iss se warzish bhi hogi aur difaa bhi mazboot hoga.

(18) Family System mazboot karen. Woh is tarha ho sakta hai ke jab Joint System ho, aik hi ghar mein dada dadi, sab bhai aik sath rahne ko tarjeeh dein. Jab hamaray haan yeh system mazboot tha toh masayeil bhi na thae. Ab jabkay shadi hotay hi har shakhs allag rahne ko tarjeeh deta hai to gharron mein bachay tanha hogaye hain. Un ki hifazat karne wala koi nai hota.

(19) Apne bachon ke sath waqt guzaraian aur unhen yaqeen dilayein ke hum jo kuch bhi kar rahay hain aur jo bhi pabandiyan laga rahay hain woh sab tumahray tahaffuz aur behtari ke liye hi hain. Jis din bachon ko yeh yaqeen aajay ga is din aap kamiyaab ho jaien ge.

(20) Bachon ko gahe ba gahe Aulia Allah aur naik logon ki sohbat mein le jaya karen. Murabbi se tarbiyat dilwayin. Bachay sohbat se bahut jaldi sikhte hain. Naik sohbat ke asraat muratab hotay hain. Hamaray walidain hamein aqabreen ki sohbat mein le jaya karte thea.

( 21 ) Yeh bachay aap (walidain) ke hain, un ki taleem o tarbiyat ki asal zimma daari walidain ki hi hai. walidain hi sab cheezon ke zimma daar hain. Agar walidain apni zimma daari poori karen toh masayel paida hi na hon. Har shakhs zimma daar hai aur qayamat ke din se iss ki iss zimma daari ke baray mein poocha jaye ga .

( 22 ) Apne bachon aur bachiyon ki sohbat ka bahut khayaal rakhen. Woh kin logon mein uthte baithttay hain aur kin kin logon ke sath khailtay hain. Bachiyon ko hargiz akailey mohalloon ke gharron mein na bhejen. Un ko samjhayen ke jab bhi ghar se bahar jayen to apni walida hi ke sath jayen .

( 23 ) shaneed hai ke pooray Mulk mein aik giroh hai jo masoom khusosan ghareeb aur pasmandah ilaqon ki bachiyon ko aghwaa karkay ghir akhlaqi filmein bana raha hai aur phir maghribi mumalik mein mehangay damon beech raha hai. Security idaron ko is par bhi tahaqeeq karni chahiye. Mohalla aur gali ki satah par Committees tashkeel dein, jo aanay jaane walay afraad par nazar rakhen .
Sab yaad rakhen! yeh bachay hi kal hamara mustaqbil hain. Agar un ki bunyadain mazboot hongi toh iss par khadi honay wali imarat bhi dairpa hogi.
97.title: Child Abuse: Islamic Teachers ki tajaweez

news_detail: Hyderabad. Directorate of Government Examinations Telangana ney SSC, OSSC  aur SSC Vocational Course Public Examinations March 2019 ke liye fees ki adaai ki tawareekh ka elaan kardiya hai. Regular umeedwaron ke liye tamaam mazameen ke liye 125 rupay hogi jabkay Vocational Courses ke umeedwaron ke liye SSC Academic Courses ke liye musriha 125 rupay ki regular imtihani fees ke alawa izaafi 60 rupay ada karni hogi. Baghair deraana ke fees ki adaai ki aakhri tareekh 29
October muqarrar ki gayi hai. Umeedwaar 50 rupay deraana ke sath 12
November tak, 200 rupay deraana ke sath 26
November tak aur 500 rupay deraana ke sath 12

Decemeber tak fees ada kar saktay hain. Directorate ney yeh wazahat ki ke mazkoorah tawareekh ko aam tateel ka elaan karne ki soorat mein is ke fauri baad dosra kaam ka din aakhri tareekh musatawir hoga. Yeh bhi sarahat kar di gayi hai ke mazkoorah tawareekh mein kisi bhi soorat mein tausee nahi ki jaye gi .

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi khatoon se aiktarfa mohabbat karne walay aik Bahrain noujawan ney dilbardashtah hokar aaj khud par kerosine chidak kar khatoon ke makaan mein daakhil hogaya aur uss se lapait kar khud ko aag lagali. Puraney shehar ke Tappachabutra mein hafta ke roz yeh waqhiya paish aaya. Aag laagne ke baais dono buri terha jhulas gaye jabkay aag bujhaney ki koshish mein khatoon ke  2 bhawajen bhi jhulas gayin. Aag se jhulas jaane wale teenon ko jhulasi huwi haalat mein Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya. Khatoon ki haalat naazuk batayi jati hai. Police ke bamawajib Ibrahim jo Bahrain ka native hai, Facebook par Shabana Begum se muta-arif huwa aur phir apne piyar ka izhaar kiya. Ladki ney yeh kehte huwe ke woh phelay se hi shadi shuda noujawan ki shadi karne ki peshkash ko thukradiya. Phir woh Shabana se mulaqaat karne Hyderabad aaya aur un se mutalba kiya ke woh is se shadi karle. Mutadid baar mutnabba karne ke bawajood Bahrain shehri jo do bachon ka baap batya jaata hai, usay harasan karta raha aur aaj khatoon ke ghar mein daakhil hokar khud ko aag lagali jis ke baais tenu jhulas gaye. Police ney aik muqadma darj karte huwe tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya.
147.title: Aiktarfa mohabbat mein Bahrain citizen ney khud ko aur mehbooba ko aag lagadi

news_detail: Saudi Arab ki General Presidency baraye alhrmin alshrifin ney Hajj season ke liye apne do mahi mansoobah par amal daraamad ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Is ki ibtida yakam zo al-qada se hui hai aur yeh zo al-haja ke ekhtataam tak jari rahay ga. Authority ke sadar Sheikh Dr. Abdul Rahman bin Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais ka kehna hai ke un ka idaara is saal 1439 h ke Hajj season ke liye tamam tayariyaan bar waqat mukammal karna chahta hai aur Hajjaj karaam ko intizami se le kar insani wasail tak aur reh namai se fani khidmaat tak har terhan ki saholaten muhayya ki jayen gi taakay woh baasani aur behtar tareeqa se mnask Hajj ada kar saken. Unhon ney bataya ke aazmin Hajj ko sharai usoolon ke mutabiq mnask Hajj ki adai mein muawnat aur reh namai muhayya karne ki gharz se iqdamaat kiye gaye hain. is zimn mein vrkshapon ka ineqad kya gaya hai jahan shyokh, ulama, Instructors aur mazhabi shaksiaat ney lecture diye they. Is ke ilawa quran Majeed ke nuskhay, mazhabi kutub aur pmflts ki taqseem ki jarahi hai aur Masjid alhram mein diye jaaney walay jummay ke khutbaat ke das zabinon mein trajm aazmin Hajj o Umrah aur zaireen mein taqseem kiye jarahay hain. Sheikh Sudais ney bataya ke Hajj season ke douran mein Masjid alhram ke tma meem 210 darwazay aur Masjid nabwi ke aik so darwazay khulay rahen ge. Masjid alhram ke 38 dakhli darwazay khusoosi afraad aur saat sirf khawateen ke liye mukhtas kiye gaye hain. Masjid alhram mein aabِ zam zam lainay ke liye marbl ke 660 fawaray lagaye gaye hain aur Masjid nabwi mein un ki tadaad 60 hai. Masjid alhram mein peenay ke pani ke 25 hazaar dispensers aur Masjid nabwi mein 23 hazaar disperer nasb kiye gaye hain. Quwatِ e samaat se mahroom afraad ke liye jummay ke khutbaat ki allamti zabaan mein wazahat ke liye intizamaa kiye gaye hain. khusoosi afraad ke ilawa zaeef alamr aazmin ko mnask Hajj ki adai ke liye laane aur le jaaney ki gharz se scootys ke alawa machini aur hath gadiyaan muhayya ki jayen gi. Shah Abdul Rahman Foundation Ghilaaf Kaaba Kaswa ki Tazaeen o aarayesh ke zariye apna hissa daal rahi hai aur is ko 9 zo al-haja ko tabdeel kya jaye ga. Masjid alhram aur Masjid Nabawi ke dakhli raastoon par anay walay aazmin ko khush aamdeed kehnay ke liye khusoosi tor par tayyar kardah masnoi hawai khushboyaat ka chidkao kya jaye ga. un se kisi qisam ki buu ke baghair thandak ka ehsas hoga. Sheikh Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais ka kehna tha ke aazmin Hajj o Umrah ki bdhti hui tadaad ke paish e nazar Masjid Al-Haram ke tosiay mansoobah ka teesra marhala jari hai. is waqt har ghanta mein aik laakh saat hazaar aazmin Masjid alhram mein pahunchte hain. un ke liye hazaron ki tadaad mein beeet al khala taamer kiye gaye hain aur wudu ke liye bhi hazaron tabs lagai gayi hain. un ka kehna tha ke aazminِ ko Hajj season mein behtar se behtar khidmaat muhayya karne ki gharz se is tamam mansoobah par amal daraamad mein das hazaar se ziyada ahelkaar hama waqt khidmaat muhayya kar rahay hain. un ke ilawa Saudi wizarat dakhla samait tamam mutaliqa idaray bhi apna apna bharpoor kirdaar ada kar rahay hain.
9.title: Hajj season ke liye tamam tayariyaan mukammal, do mahi mansoobah par amal daraamad ka aaghaz

news_detail: Harmain Sharifain ke umoor ki intizamia ki janib se itwaar ke roz ghilaaf Kabah ke nichale hssh ko zameen se teen meter buland kar diya gaya. Sath hi buland kiye jane walay hisseh ko charon taraf se safaid cotton ke kapday se dhaanp diya gaya jis ka arz do meter ke qareeb hai. Ghilaaf e Kabah yani “Kiswa” se mutaliq King Abdulaziz Complex ke Director General Ahmed bin Mohammad Almnsori ke mutabiq rawan baras 1439 hjri mein bhi hajj season ke liye intizamia hasb e mamool apne mansoobah par amal pera hai. Kiswa ko zameen se buland karne ke iqdaam ka maqsad ghilaaf e Kabah ki safai barqarar rakhna aur is ki hifazat ko yakeeni banana hai. Is liye ke Hajj season mein Hujjaj karaam ki aik badi tadaad ghilaaf e Kabah ko choone aur is se lipatne ki khwahish mand hoti hai jis ke nateeja mein ghilaaf ko kuch nuqsaan bhi pohanchana hai. Almnsori ne bawar karaya ke baaz Hujjaj karaam ghilaaf e Kabah ka kuch hissah kaatnay aur ghilaaf e Kabah se barkat haasil karne ki koshish karte hain, un ka yeh qadam ghalat nazriaat ka haamil hai. isi vaaste ghilaaf ko teen meter buland kar diya jata hai aur Hajj season ke baad usay apni purani haalat par kar diya jata hai. Almnsori ka mazeed kehna tha ke King Abdulaziz Complex poooray saal ghilaaf e Kabah ki khusoosi dekh bhaal ki zimma daari anjaam deta hai jis ki Hidayat khadim Harmain Sharifain ki janib se di gayi hai.
28.title: Ghilaaf e Kabah ka nichala hissa zameen se 3 meter buland kyun kar diya gaya?

news_detail: Khadim ul Harmain al Sharifain ke musheer, Makkah Moazimma ke Governor aur Makkah Development Authority ke Chairman Shehzada Khalid Alfaisal ne Hajj 1439h ke Operational Plan ka elaan kardiya hai. Rawaan saal Hajj ke mauqa par duniya bhar se aaye aazmeen Hajj ki khidmat par 14 hazaar ahelkaar aur 400 gadiyaan mukhtas ki gayi hain. Hajj Operational Plan ke elaan ka maqsad Hajj ke hawala se tayyar kardah mansoobon ko amli shakal mein lana aur un ki kaarkardagi se istifaada karna hai. Hajj operation Plan ki nigrani Mashayer Muqaddisa Authority ko sonpi gayi hai. Is mein Mashayer Muqaddisa train, Aljamraat tansibaat, sewerage, taharat khaanoon ka qiyam aur pani ki farahmi, Hujjaj Baitullah ko pani pilanay ka mansoobah, Hajj services ki karkardagi behtar bananay ke liye deegar khidmaat shaamil hain. Hajj Operational Plan ki nigran Authority ke tarjuman engineer Jalal bin Abduljlil Kaaki ne aik bayan mein kaha ke Hujjaj karaam ko behtar saholaten faraham karne ka mansoobah Governor Makkah ki zair e nigrani robah amal hai. Governor Makkah aur un ke naib Hajj se mutaliq services ki barah e raast nigrani kar rahay hain. Aik sawal ke jawab mein engineer Kaaki ne kaha ke Hajj ke mauqa par intizami aur takneeki amlay sameit 14 hazaar afraad ko Hujjaj ki khidmat par mamoor kya ja raha hai jab ke Hujjaj karaam ki aamad wo raft ke liye 400 gadiyon ka bhi bandobast hai. Unhon ne kaha ke Hajj Operational mansoobay ke tehat al-Mashayer train 8th zulhaj ko Minaa se Hujjaj karaam ko Arfat, wahan se phir Mina laaye gi. yun al-Mashayer train ki madad se 3.5 lakhs Hujjaj karaam ko Arfat tak tansport ki sahoolat muhayya ki jaegi jab ke ayyaam Tashreeq mein majmoi taur par aik million se zayd aazmeen Hajj al-Mashayer train se safar kar sakenge. Hujjaj karaam ko sahoolat ke liye Mashayer mein 36,000 hungami ghusal Khanoon ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai. Hujjaj karaam ko peenay ka pani faraham karne ke liye Mashayer Muqaddisa mein 600 water tanks nasb kiye gayi hain jahan aik ghanta mein ausatan 700 cubic meter pani muhayya kya jaye ga
43.title: Aazmeen Hajj ki khidmat ke liye 14 hazar ahelkaar aur chaar sau gaadiyan mamoor

news_detail: Fareeza Hajj ki adayee ke dauran Aazmeen Hajj muqam Arafat mein waqay Jabal al Rahmah ki ziyarat ka sharf haasil karne ki gahri tamanna rakhtay hain. Manasik Hajj shuru honay se qabal Jabal e Arafat par aazmeen ka jam e ghafeer jama hota hai jahan yadgaari tasaveer banatay aur wahan se tuhayef khareed karte hain. Saudi Arab ki sarkari khabar rasan agency ‘SPA’ ke mutabiq Jabal e Arafat Makkah Muazzama ke pahadon mein se aik pahad hai magar is ki asal pehchan is ke pehlu mein maujood Maidan e Arafat hai. Yeh pahad Makkah aur Taif ko milaane wali sadkon par waqay hai. Jabal e Arafat mein aanay walay Hujjaj karaam Rasool Allah sale Allah alaihi wasallam ke is aakhri khutba Hajjata ’alvidah’ ki yaad bhi taaza karte hain jo aap ney apne aakhri Hajj ke mauqa par irshad farmaya tha. Jabal e Arafat ki satah hamwar aur kushadah hai taham is ke atraaf mein bhaari bharkam gole pathar bhi maujood hain. Un mein se beshtar patharon ka rang siyah hai. Yeh pahad, mehal wuqoo ke aitbaar se maidan Arafat ke mashriq mein hai. pahar ki lambai 300 aur qutar 640 meter hai. Zameen se is ki bulandi 65 meter hai. Jabal e Arafat ke kayi dosray naam bhi mashhoor hain jin mein Jabal Alal, Jabal e Tauba, Jabal e Dua aur Jabal e Alqarin ziyada mashhoor hain. Saudi Arab mein amar bilmaaroof aur naahi an ilmunkir shoba ki taraf se yahan aanay walay zayireen ki har mumkin rehnumai ka ihtimaam kya jata hai. Mukhtalif zabanon ke mutrajim apni khidmaat anjaam dete hain. Is jagah aanay walon ko bidaat se roknay aur Quran wo Sunnat ki taalimaat ke khilaaf kisi qisam ki mazhabi sargarmi ki ijazat nahi di jati.
58.title: Jabal e Arafat kya hai?

news_detail: Saudi Arab ki taraf se hafta ke roz jari aik report mein khanah e Kabah ke gird fi ghanta tuwaf karne aur namaz ada karne walon ke aadad o shumaar jari kiye gaye hain. Sarkari Idarah e Shumariyat ki taraf se jari report mein bataya gaya hai ke Haram Makki mein namazion ki tadaad aur khanah e Kabah ke gird tuwaf karne walay muatamarin ki tadaad mein kami beshi hoti rehti hai. saal 1439 h ke Hajj ke liye lakhoon farzandaan toheed Haram muki mein pahonch chuke hain. aik andaza ke mutabiq un dinon Masjid Haram mein fi ghanta 2 lakh 78 hazaar afraad namaz ada karte hain jab ke aik lakh 70 hazaar aazmeen Hajj aik ghantay mein khanah Kabah ke tuwaf ki Saadat haasil karte hain. report mein bataya gaya hai ke Masjid Haram aur Masjid Nabwi ki nigran General Presidency ke 10 hazaar mulazmeen aazmeen Hajj ki khidmat baja laane par maamoor hain jo 54 hazaar 501 alaat aur machines ki madad se aazmeen ki muawnat karte hain. Inhen Zam Zam paish karte hain. Haram muki mein 2000 ton Zam Zam aur Masjid Nabwi mein rozana 300 ton aabb Zam Zam sarf kya jata hai. Masjid Nabwi aur Masjid Haram mein aabb e Zam Zam sirf karne ke liye 25000 therms muhayya kiye gaye hain jo 24 ghantay masroof rehtay hain. Aazmeen Hajj ke samaan ki muntaqili ke liye 13 hazaar 560 trollys muhayya ki gayi hain jin mein 700 barqi trollys shaamil hain. isi terha Masjid Haram mein 20 muazzineen baari baari namazon ki azaan dete jab ke 10 Aima karaam, 123 tuwaf guide sargaram hain. Masjid Haram mein English, French, Urdu, Malavi aur kayi doosri zabanon mein Quran e Pak ke translation aur tafaseer bhi maujood hain jin se aazmeen Hajj istifada kar saktay hain.
73.title: Khanah e Kabah ke gird aik ghanta mein 2.78 lakh afraad namaz ada aur 1.70 lakh afraad tuwaaf karte hain

news_detail: Masjid e Nabwi salle Allhau alehi wassalam ke Imam aur khateeb Hajj Dr. Hussein bin Abdul Aziz Al-Asheikh  ka kehna hai ke jo Allah se dartay hain darasal wohi kamyaab hain, shirk se door rehna chahiye, taqwa ikhtiyar karna chahiye. Hajj ka rukn e azam jari hai, jis ki adaigi ke liye maidan Arfat mein lakhoon aazmeen maujood hain, maidan Arfat mein waqay Masjid Nimra mein khutba Hajj dete hue Dr. Hussein bin Abdul Aziz Al-Asheikh  ka kehna hai ke Allah taala farmate hain ke sirf meri ibadat karo, meri yaad ke liye namaz qaim karo, Allah pak ne khairaat ka hukum diya hai, tamam anbiya-e karaam alehi salam ne Allah taala ka paigham pahonchaya. Unhon ne kaha ke Allah taala khud farmate hain ke unhon ne kisi ko hidayat bakhshi, kisi ko seedhay rastay se bhatka diya, ibadat ke laiq sirf Allah taala hi hain, un hi se daron, un ki hi ibadat karo, Nabi e kareem salle Allhau alehi wassalam ki layi hui Shariat ke mutabiq zindagi basar ki jaye, Allah taala ka farmaan hai ke unhon ne Nabi e kareem salle Allhau alehi wassalam ko khush khabri dainay wala banakar bheja. Khateeb e Hajj ka kehna hai ke imaan walon aur naik aamaal karne walon ko jannat ki khush khaberi di gayi, namaz woh rukan hai jo Islmam par Daleel hai, be hiyai se rokti hai, Fajar ke waqt tilawat Quran kareem afizal hai, namaz ki pabandi, zkoh ki adaigi, Nabi kareem salle Allhau alehi wassalam ki itaat ka hukum diya gaya hai. Sheikh Hussain bin Hussein bin Abdul Aziz Al-Asheikh  ne kaha ke Mohammad Mustafa Salle Allah aleh wasallam par imaan kaamil aur ahkamaat ko bar haq maanna imaan ka ahem juz hai. Islmam ki asal tasveer ahsan aamaal par hai, Allah ne wahdaniyat par yaqeen rakhnay walon se kamyabi ka wada kya hai, har tarha ki kamyabi Allah ki wahdaniyat aur Rasool Allah ki risalat mein hai, Allah taqwa ikhtyar karne walon ko pasand karta hai, logon taqwa ikhtiyar karo taakay tum Falah pao, Islmam aur Deen ki azmat ki bunyaad tauheed hai, Allah se daro aur kisi ko is ka shareek na taherao, shirk karne walay ka anjaam bura hoga, Allah ka hukum hai ke tum mujh se mohabbat karte ho to Rasool Allah salle Allhau alehi wassalam ki itaat karo. Unhon ne kaha ke Allah pak ne sahib istetaat afraad par Hajj farz kya, Nabi e kareem salle Allhau alehi wassalam ke behtareen akhlaq ka bayan farmaya hai, aaj hamein mamoolaat e zindagi guzarnay ke liye behtar akhlaq ki zaroorat hai, aap salle Allhau alehi wassalam ne khutba Hajj mein farmaya hai ke tumhara maal, izzat aur khoon aik dosray par haraam hain.

Dr. Hussein bin Abdul Aziz Al-Asheikh  ka kehna hai ke Rasool Allah salle Allhau alehi wassalam ne farmaya tum mein sab se achay woh hain jo akhlaq mein achay hain, Islmam khair, ahsaan, kharch aur sakhavat par ubharta hai, ummat Muslimah Quran pak par jama hai, aik hi qibla rukh karti hai, Allah taala farmate hain ke mere bandon se keh dijiye ke bahut hi achi baat mun se nikalo, ae imaan walon, ehad o paiman pooray karo, waday wafa karo. Islmam zulm o ziyadati ko pasand nahi karta, Musalman ko chahiye ke kisi ke sath ziyadati na kare, Nabi pak salle Allah aleh wasallam ki paish kardah akhlaqiaat kisi bhi be gunah ko nuqsaan pahonchaney se rokti hain, muashray ke aman keliye hrmslman ko koshish karni chahiye, akhlaq husna muashray ko kamyabi ki taraf le jata hai, poori duniya ko Quran pak ke mutalea ki dawat dete hain, Quran seedhay rastay ki taraf le kar jata hai. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke Allah taala ne walidain, rishtay daaron aur padosion ke huqooq ada karne ka hukum diya hai, Allah pak takkabur karne walon aur shekhi khoron ko pasand nahi farmate, walidain kay sath husn e sulook aur narmi se baat karne ki hidayat ki gayi, Allah pak ne biwi se bhalai karne, insaaf karne ka hukum diya hai. Khutba e Hajj mein khateeb Hajj ne farmaya ke Allah taala ki janib se naap toal poori karne, amanat ki hifazat, adal o insaaf se faislay karne ki hidayat ki gayi hai, Allah pak ne ahal e eesaar, khair ki raah mein kharch karne walon ko pasand farmaya hai, akhlaq fazila ke silsilay mein Allah pak ne Quran pak mein kayi ehkamaat diye. Imamِ Masjid e Nabwi salle Allhau alehi wassalam ka mazeed kehna hai ke baa akhlaaq logon, gussa peenay walon, naiko karon ke liye jannat ki basharat di gayi hai, Allah taala ne tauba karne walon, imaan laane walon aur raah e raast par chalne walon ko bakhash dainay ka faisla sunaya hai, Allah pak Arfa ke roz naik logon ko bakhash dete hain aur farishton mein un ka zikar karte hain, maidan e Arfat mein husn e akhlaq mukammal kardiye gay hain. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke Allah pak ne surah Hujraat mein afwahon ki tasdeeq karne ka hukum diya hai, Allah pak ne farmaya hai ke Quran seedha rasta dekhata hai, kitaab Allah ne Musalmanoon ke ittehaad par zor diya hai, makr o fraib se bachney ki hidayat di hai, Shariat ne sood khori aur juve ko haraam qarar diya hai, Allah pak ne apni, apne Nabi salle Allhau alehi wassalam aur apne Umraa ki itaat ka hukum diya hai, un ehkamaat ka maqsad is liye diya ke Musalman ghalba haasil kar saken. Hukumaraan aisa hona chahiye ke Allah ki itaat kere aur har tarah ki burayee ko rokay, hukmarani aisi ho jis mein Allah aur is ke Rasool salle Allhau alehi wassalam ke ehkamaat ki pairwi ki jaye, Shariat ke mutabiq zindagi busr ki jaye, Allah ka hukum hai faisla saazi adal ki bunyaad par ki jaye, siyasat aur maeeshat ko deen ke mutabiq dhaalne ki zaroorat hai. Khutba Hajj ke baad namaz e Zahar aur Asar ek sath ada ki jayen gi, jis ke baad aazmeen ghuroob aftaab ke sath hi Muzdalfah rawana hon ge, jahan woh namaz-e maghrib aur isha ada karen ge, aazmeen Hajj raat bhar khulay aasman taley qiyam karen ge aur rami ke liye kankariyan jama karen geDr. Abdul-Aziz ibn Abdullah Al ash-Sheikh ka kehna hai ke Rasool Allah salle Allhau alehi wassalam ne farmaya tum mein sab se achay woh hain jo akhlaq mein achay hain, Islmam khair, ahsaan, kharch aur sakhavat par ubharta hai, ummat Muslimah Quran pak par jama hai, aik hi qibla rukh karti hai, Allah taala farmate hain ke mere bandon se keh dijiye ke bahut hi achi baat mun se nikalo, ae imaan walon, ehad o paiman pooray karo, waday wafa karo. 91.title: Allah se darny walay hi kamyaab : Al ash-Sheikh ka khutba e Hajj

news_detail: Duniya bhar se aaye hue 20 lakhs se ziyada Bandgaan e Haq Hajj ke rukn e Azam wuqoof Arfa ki takmeel ke baad Muzdalifa rawana hogaye hain jahan woh Maghrib aur Isha ki namazain ikathe ada kiye hain aur phir khulay aasman taley raat guzaraian ge. Iss se pahelay unhon ne Makkah Murkrama ke nawah mein waqay Midanِ e Arfat mein khutba e Hajj samaat kya aur naveen Dhul-hijja ka Sooraj dhalnay tak wahein qiyam kya. Masjid e Nabwi ke imam Mufti e Azam Dr. Sheikh Hussain bin Abdul Aziz Al- as Sheikh ne khutba Hajj mein Musalmanoon par naik aamaal aur akhlaq e husnah apnane aur unhein bure kamon se bachney ki talqeen ki hai. Unhon ne kaha ke hamein apni siyasat aur mayishat ko Islami talemaat ke mutabiq dhaalne ki zaroorat hai. Hujjaj karaam Muzdalifa mein raat qiyam ke baad mangal ko wapas Mina chalay jayen ge jahan woh shaitan (jmrat) ko kankariyan maarny ki sunnat ada karen ge aur is ke baad janwar qurbaan karen ge. Yeh amal teen roz tak jari rahe ga. Iss dauran mein Hujjaj karaam apne sar mundhwaiyen ge aur Kabatullah ka aakhri tuwaf ”tuwaf zyarah” karen ge aur yun un ke manasik e Hajj ki takmeel hojaye gi. Yaad rahay ke Hujjaj karaam Jabal e Arafat se namaz Zuhar aur Asar ada karne ke baad rawana hue thay aur woh kharamaan kharamaan chaltay hue 7 kilometers ka faasla taiy karkay Muzdalifa pahunch chuke hain. Saudi hukoomat ne Hajj infrastructure ke tehat guzashta barson ke douran mein Arafat se Muzdalifa taks makhsoos rastay aur shahrahin bana di hain taakay Hu jjaj karaam ba aasani paidal safar kar saken. Baaz Hujjaj zaati gadiyon ya basoon ke zareya bhi yeh safar taiy kiye hain. Taham ziyada tar paidal hi Arafat se Muzdalifa pahonche hain.
106.title: 20 lakhs se ziyada Bandgaan e Haq ka Wuquf e Arfa ke baad Muzdalifa mein padaoo

news_detail: Hajj ke liye Saudi Arab aanay walay zaireen ne Mina aur masjid alhram wapsi ka safar shuru kar diya hai taakay woh Eid al-Adha ke pehlay din ki mutabiqat se manasik Hajj ki adayigi jari rakhen. Hajion ne guzashta raat Muzdalifa mein guzaarne ke baad Hajj ke farayez ada karne ke liye Mina aur Makkah ka rukh kya hai. Un farayez mein se aik Rami Jamrat bhi hai jis mein shaitan ko kankariyan maari jati hain. Rami Jamrat ke liye Hujjaj karaam kayi manzila pul par se shaitan ki numaindagi karne walay teen sutunon ko pathar maartay hain. Raitilay toofan ki wajah se Arafat aamad mein takheer hui jis ke nateeja mein aksar Hujjaj karaam ko sakht dhoop mein maidan e Arafat pahonchna pada. Hujjaj karaam mazhabi josh wo jazba se sarshaar hokar is shadeed garmi ka muqaabla karte rahay. Iss mauqa par muqami tibbi amla ne Hajion ko pani pohanchanay aur rastay mein zakhmi honay walay Hajion ko bharpoor madad faraham ki. Aarzi shelters mein tabiyat ki bahaali ke liye ruknay walay Hajion ke groups shadeed thakan ke bawajood baar baar Labaik Allahumma Labaik ka vird kar rahay thaiy.
117.title: Zaireen Hajj Rami Jamrat ke liye Mina wapas pahonch gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher ki haliya tareekh mein 25

September siyah din ke taur par dekha jata hai chunkay isi din Shaher ke do muqamat Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park mein dhamakay hue thae jin min majmoyi taur par 42 log halaak hogaye thae jabkay 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thae. Shaher ke deegar muqamat par mazeed do Bombs ko nakara banadiya gaya. Shaher ke tafrehi maqam ”Lumbini Park” mein 25

August 2007 ko shaam 7:45 bajey aik zor daar dhamaka huwa jis ke 5 minute baad hi qalb e shaher mein masroof tareen muqam Kothi par Chat ki mashhoor dukaan ”Gokul Chat Bhandar” ke paas aik aur dhamaka huwa. Baadazaan Shaher ke do muqamat se do bombs ko baraamad kiya gaya aur inhen phatt padney se qabl hi nakaarah banadiya gaya tha. Un dhamakon mein marnay walay mukhtalif tabqaat se talluq rakhtay thae jin mein bachay, tulba aur khawateen bhi shaamil thae. Un judwaan bomb dhamakon ka muqadma 27

August peer ko faisal honay wala hai. Is khusoos mein Hyderabad Police ki Counter  Intelligence Wing ney aik muqadma darj kiya tha aur Mohammad Sadiq , Ansar Ahmed Badshah Shaikh, Akbar Ismail Choudhry aur Syed Anique Shafeeq ko girftar karte hue adalat mein paish kiya gaya tha jo in dinon Cherlapally  Jail mein mahruse hain. Un Charon ko pahley Maharashtra ki ATS ney girftar kiya tha jinhein baadazan Transit Warrant par Gujarat muntaqil kiya gaya tha. Fil-waqt who Cherlapally Jail mein mahruse hain.
136.title: Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park dhamakon ke 11 baras

news_detail: Makkah Mukarrama. Saudi Arab ke Mufti e Azam Abdul-Aziz ibn Abdullah Al ash-Sheikh ney wazeh kiya hai ke doosri Shaadi ke liye paheli Biwi ki ijazat lena zaroori nahin hai. Piyar Mohabbat aur aizaz wa karam ke taur par paheli biwi ko muttala kar dena achi baat hai. Woh Alquran Alkareem Radio Channel ke khusoosi programme “Noor alad Darb mukhtalif sawalaat ke jawab dae rahay they. Un se daryaft kya gaya tha ke kya doosri shaadi ke liye pheli biwi ki ijazat lena zaroori hai. Unhon nay is ka jawab nifi main dete hue kaha ke taddud e zaujaat Islami Shariyat ka atal usool hai. Rrasool e akram salle Allah alaihi wasallam aur sahaba karaam razi Allahu anhum ka is par amal raha hai. Islami Shariyat ko manwana Ulama ki zimma daari hai. Sharai uloom haasil kiye baghair fatwa dena gunah kabirah hai.
150.title: Doosri Shaadi ke liye paheli biwi ki ijazat lena zaroori nahin

news_detail: Mumbai: Tennis Star Sania Mirza ka kehna hai ke barah meharbani mere liye betay ki nahi balkay beti ki dua karen. Bharati Tennis Star aur Pakistani Cricketer Shoaib Malik ki ahliya Sania Mirza un dinon umeed se hain unhon ney aur Shoaib Malik ney yeh khabar –apne tamam chahanay walon ke sath social media par bohat mohabbat se share ki thi, yahi wajah hai ke yeh khabar sun kar Pakistani aur Bharti awam mein khushy ki laher daud gayi thi aur ab un ke chahanay walay be cheeni se intzaar kar rahay hain ke un ke pasandeeda khilari betay ke walidain bantay hain ya beti ke, taham Sania Mirza chahti hain ke un ke ghar beti ki paidaiesh ho aur unhon ney tamam logon se kaha hai ke un ke liye beti ki dua karen. media ke mutabiq Sania Mirza ney guzashta roz Mumbai mein aqwam mutahidda ke zair e ihtimaam ”Mujhe haq hai muhim” mein shirkat ki. is mauqa par unhon ney bataya ke inhen bachpan mein logon ki janib se kis terhan Tennis khailnay par tanqeed ka nishana banaya gaya tha. Sania ney kaha ke mein ney 6 saal ki Umar mein Tennis khelna shuru kar di thi aur Hyderabad Deccan  mein larkiyon ke itni chhoote Umar mein khailnay ko bohat harangi se dekha jata tha. jab mein Tennis khelti thi us waqt bohat se log mere walidain ko kehte thay ”haan theek hai khailnay jarahi hai lekin kaali hojaye gi dekhna, koi shadi nahi kere ga”. Sania Mirza ney kaha mere waalid mere hero hain unhon ney tanqeed karne walon ki parwah nah karte hue har mauqa par mera sath diya.

Tennis Star ney mazeed kaha hum do bahenen hain aur hamein kabhi bhai ki khwahish nahi hui aaj mein aik kamyaab khatoon hon avrapni zindagi mein bohat si kamiyabiyan haasil kar chuki hon lekin log aaj bhi jab mujh se mlitay hain to kehte hain ke aap ka koi bhai nahi hai aur afsos ka izhaar karte hain avrmjhe dua dete hain aap ka larka hojaye jis par mera jawab hota hai, ”barah meharbani yeh dua mat karo balkay larki hojaye yeh dua karo, kyun aap larke ki dua kar rahay ho.” Sania ney kaha yeh hamaray muashra ki zehniat hai jis se hamein bahar niklana hai. wazeh rahay ke Sania Mirza aur Shoaib Malik October mein walidain ban jayen ge
7.title: Barah meharbani mere liye betay ki nahi beti ki dua karen, Sania Mirza

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein “blue whale” video game se mutasir aik 12 sala ladke ne gilaay mein phanda daal kar khud kashi kar li. yeh waqea jumaraat ke roz Abha shehar mein paish aaya. mazkoorah ladke ke cosuon abdulah Fahid ne Al Arabiaia dot net ko bataya ke aas ke mamu ka beta blue whale game ke chungal mein phas kar apni jaan ganwaa betha jo bachon ko khail ke douran aglay marhala mein muntaqil honay ka challenge deta hai. Saudi sikoriti hakkaam maamla ki tehqiqaat kar rahay hain. wazeh rahay ke internet par blue whale Nami game Sarif ko 50 roz ke douran challenge karta rehta hai aur hatmi challenge mein woh khailnay walay se khud kashi ka mutalba karta hai. yeh game Sarif se is ki zaati maloomat ke ilawa aisi tasweer ya video bhi talabb karta hai jo challenge ko qubool kar ke mission poora karne ka saboot day sakay. abdulah Fahid ki janib se apne mamu ke betay ki khud kashi se mutaliq tweet social media par wasee pemanay par phail gayi. mukhtalif halqon ki janib se mutalba kiya gaya hai ke bachon ko is game ke khatray se bachanay ke liye mutaliqa idaray fori mudakhlat kar ke aagahi aur kari nigrani ko yakeeni banayen
19.title: Saudi Arabia mein “blue whale” game ke shikaar 12 sala ladke ki khud kashi

news_detail: Thailand: Shumali Thailand ke suba mein tang ghaar mein phansay 12 nau umar footbaal khiladion aur un ke 25 sala coach ko bahar nikaalte ki sar tod koshish ki jarahi hai. mahireen ney khabardaar kya hai ke coach sameit tamam bachay bohat kamzor aur laghar ho chukay hain aur inhen tera kar bahar nikalna namumkin hai. Aalmi media ke mutabiq bachon ki umrein 11 se 15 baras ke darmain hain aur woh apne coach ke sath ghaar mein puhanche they ke barish hogayi aur kayi kilometer taweel is ghaar mein barish ka pani bharna shuru hogaya tha. tamam afraad ko ghaar ke aakhri kinare par aik qadray onche jagah par panah leni padi thi aur woh wapas anay se qassar they. aik hafta se zayed waqt ki talaash ke baad jab wahan chand ghouta Khor puhanche to unhon ney bachon ko bhook ki haalat mein dekha. is ke baad inhen ghiza aur duwaein pohanchanay ka kaam shuru sun-hwa. is ghaar ka naam Tham Laung hai. Ab tak gharoon mein ghouta khori ke darjanon mahireen ney un bachon tak pounchanay ki koshish ki hai jis ke liye inhen kayi kilometer tairna parta hai jis mein 10 se 12 ghantay lag jatay hain. taham ghaar mein phansay afraad ki bahafazat wapsi ke liye Thailand ki behria, America o Bartania aur deegar mumalik ke maahir ghouta khoron bachao o raahat kaari ke mahireen, garoon mein bachao ka tajurbah rakhnay walay mahireen aur deegar afraad ney bachon ko bachanay ke liye kayi aapshnz par ghhor shuru kardiya hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke aindah chand dinon baad baarisho ka silsila shuru hojaye ga aur ghaar mein pani bharnay se aakhri panah gaah bhi doob sakti hai. isi liye pipes ke zareya fi ghanta hazaron letter pani bahar nikala ja raha hai taakay usay bachon tak pounchanay se roka jasakay. mehakma mosmiyat ney is hafta ilaqa mein shadeed baarisho ki paish goi kar di hai. yahi wajah hai ke bachao mahireen ki tashweesh waqt ke sath sath barhti jarahi hai. ghouta khoron ke mutabiq surang numa ghaar ke domqamat intahi tang hain aur bachon ko wahan se nikaalte ke liye inhen teraaki seekhna laazmi hai lekin un bachon ki aksariyat tairna nahi janti. doosri soorat mein yeh bachay mazeed kayi mah tak wahan phansay rahen ge aur manson khatam honay ke baad ghaar sokhne par hi wapas nikal saken ge. ghaar mein tareqi hai aur pani intahi gadla bhi hai jo phansay hue logon tak rasai mein mazeed mushkilaat ki wajah ban raha hai. taham aik ghouta Khor ney wahan poanch kar video banai hai jis mein tamam bachon ko behtar haalat mein dekha ja sakta hai aur woh apna taaruf karate nazar atay hain. is ke baad Thailand behria ke fouji wahan tak puhanche aur bachon ko tibbi imdaad aur khana pohanchaya aur un ke zakhamo par marham patti bhi ki. tamam bachay kamzoree mehsoos kar rahay lekin koi jani khatray se dochar nahi. doosri janib pani ki barri miqdaar ko ghaar se nikala ja raha hai lekin ghaar ke dhanay se dobarah pani andar daakhil ho raha hai. bachon ko teraaki sikahnay ki koshish bhi ki jarahi hai. riskyo amlah fibre aaptk line ko bachon tak pohanchanay ki koshish kar raha hai taakay woh apne walidain se baat kar saken aur mahireen nafsiat ney kaha hai ke yeh un ke liye bohat hosla afzaa amal hoga. doosri janib bachon ki panah gaah ke qareeb surang khodnay ki koshish bhi ki jarahi hai jis ke liye 20 se 30 temen kaam kar rahi hain. mahireen aik aik inch jagah ko dekh rahay hain taakay wahan koi qudrati darz ya rasta nikal aeye aur usay khoud kar raah nikaali jasakay. is ke bawajood barish se ghaar mein mazeed pani bhar jaane ka challenge ab bhi sab se bara khatrah bana sun-hwa hai.
37.title: Thailand ke ghaar mein phansay Junior Footballers ko bachanay ke liye sar tod koshishen jari

news_detail: Iran mein police ney social media bilkhushoos ‘Instagram’ par dance ki video post karne ke ilzaam mein mutadid khawateen ko hirasat mein liya hai. un mein aik 18 sala do Sheza bhi shaamil hai. insta gram par mutanazia video post karne ke ilzaam mein ghair pesha war rqasaon ki grftaryon par awaami halqon mein sakht gham vghse ki lehar daud gayi hai. doosri janib hakkaam ka kehna hai ke khawateen ki giraftari’ inqalabi eqdaar’ ki tauheen ke jurm mein amal mein layi gayi hai. Micro Bloging Website ‘Twitter’ par samaji kaarkunon ney “Maida . hadbadi hash tag’ aur ‘برقص تا برقصیم’ ( tum raqs karo taakay mein bhi raqs karoon ) ke unwanat se muhim shuru ki hai jis mein shehrion ney barh charh kar hissa liya hai. police ney dance ki tarbiyat dainey wali mutadid khawateen ko bhi girftar kya hai. hakkaam ka kehna hai ke yeh grftaryan adalat ke hukum par amal mein layi gayi hain. girftar khawateen ko sarkari TV par ‘aitraaf jurm’ karne par majboor kya gaya hai. girftar ki gayi khawateen mein do ki shanakht Maida aur binaa ke naamon se ki gayi hai aur un ke mobayyana itrafi bayanaat bhi TV channel prnshr kiye gaye hain. Maida ko yeh kehte suna ja sakta ke is ney –apne dance ki video is liye insta gram par post ki taakay usay ziyada se ziyada followers milein taham usay muqami moseeqi ke muqaabla mein aur maghribi moseeqi ko Iran mein pasand kiye jane ki ziyada tawaqqa nahi. sarkari TV par dukhaay gaye bayan mein Maedeh ko rotay hue yeh kehte dekha ja sakta hai ke is ney ghirakhlaqi iradah se –apne dance ki footage insta gram par post nahi ki. mein sirf yeh janna chahti thi ke log usay kitna pasand karen ge
53.title: ‘Instagram’ par dance ki video post karne par dosheeza girftar

news_detail: Thailand mein guzashta do hafton se ghaar mein phansay mazeed4 bachon aur un ke coach ko aaj bahafazat bahar nikaal liya gaya jabke is se qabal 8 bachon ko bahar nikaal liya gaya tha. Is ke sath hi rescue operation mukammal hogaya. Operation mangal ki shaam mukammal huwa. yeh operation intehai khatarnaak tha jisay Thailand behria ke kmandoz naay bakhoobi paya takmeel taq pohanchaya. bachay ghaar se nikalay jane ke baad hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain taham un ki haalat khatrah se bahar hai. tamam bachon aur coach ki zehni haalat bhi behtar btai jarahi hai. Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ki aik report mein bataya gaya hai ke bachon ka blood test aur x-ray kiye gaye hain. sirf do bachon mein phephray ki soozish ka shuba zahir kya gaya hai jin ka aalaj jari hai. bachay abhi mazeed kuch roz hospital mein zair e ilaaj rahen ge. kuch bachon ka talluq junior foot baal team se hai jabkay aik un ka coach hai. rescue operation pichlle kayi din se waqfay waqfay se jari raha. 12 bachay aur un ke coach 23 June ko ghaar mein pani bhar jane ke sabab phas gaye they
64.title: Ghaar mein phansay tamam bachon konkal liya gaya

news_detail: Rusia ke darul-hakoomat Moscow ke Luzhniki Stadium mein khailay gaye FIFA aalmi Cup Football Tournament ke Final Match mein France , Croatia ko 4:2 Goals se shikast day kar naya aalmi Champion ban gaya hai. is terhan France guzashta 20 barson mein doosri martaba football Champion ban gaya hai. France aaj teesri martaba final match khail raha tha. France ki team aalami aizaz ke husool ke liye shuru se hi achay khail ka muzahira karti rahi hai. pehlay half mein France ko do aik bartari haasil hai. France ki team ne Croatia ke khilaaf pehlay Goals karkay bartari haasil karli lekin yeh Goals is ke khilari guraiz mann ki barah e raast kick par nahi sun-hwa tha balkay Croatia ke khilari mndo zöe catch ke head se baal un ke –apne hi net mein chali gayi. is ke thori der ke baad Croatia peeri ke sich ne France ko Goals karkay match aik aik se barabar kardiya magar francesi frwd guraiz mann ne pinlti par shandaar Goals karkay apni team ko aik martaba phir bartari dila di. unhon ne apni baayen taraf Football ko kick lagai jabkay Croatia ke Goals keeper ne mukhalif simt mein dayyo lagai aur yun woh Goals bachanay mein nakaam rahay. dosray half mein bhi France ki team Croatia bhi Sabqat barqarar rakhi. Croatia ne aik ghanta tak France ka zabardast difaa kya taham batadreej woh peechay hoti gayi. France aur Croatia ne Simi final match khailnay wali teamon mein koi tabdeeli nahi ki hai. wazeh rahay ke France ki Football team ne is Tournament ke naak out marhaly ke tenu matchon mein muqarara 90 minute mein kamyabi haasil ki thi jabkay Croatia ki team izafi waqt mein apne match jeetnay mein kamyaab hui thi
85.title: FIFA aalmi Football Cup: France naya Champion

news_detail: Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State Mr. Allipuram Venkateshwar Reddy ne Indra Gandhi Stadium New Delhi mein Womens National Boxing Camp ka daura kya aur Chief Coach Mr. Shiv Singh aur International Boxer Mary Kom ke ilawa Telangana ki boxer Nikhat Zareen se mulaqaat ki aur anay walay asian aur world chmpyn ship ke liye tayario par tabadlah khayaal kiya jo bil-tarteeb August aur November mein munaqqid honay walay hain. Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State ne Chief Coach se un muqablon ki tayario ke baray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya aur Chief Coach ne kaha ke Nikhat Zareen ka mustaqbil roshan hai aur woh apne 51 kilgoram wet Zumra ki khiladion mein aik talented Boxer hai. Coach ne yeh bhi kaha ke hum tamam seniors ko un ke wazan ke zumra mein jaanch kar rahay hain aur woh yaqeenan acha muzahira karen gi. Mary Kom bhi Nikhat Zareen ko bharpoor taawun kar rahi hain aur un ka hosla brhharhi hain. Manipur hukumat ne Mary Kom ko Fakhr e Manipur riyasat qarar diya hai. Is mauqa par Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State ne Nikhat Zareen ko mubarakbaad dete hue kaha ke woh fakhr Telangana banin gi.
101.title: sadarnashin Telangana Sports Authority ki Nikhat Zareen se naik tawaquaat

news_detail: Kathmandu. South Asian Olympic Committee (SAOC) ne Cricket ke khail ko 13

South Asian Games mein shaamil karliya hai jis ki guzashta roz manzoori di gayi. Yeh Games 9 se 18 March 2019 tak Kathmandu mein khailay jayen ge. Is se qabal 2011 mein Bangladesh mein khele gaye South Asian Games mein Cricket ko shaamil kya gaya tha taham 2016 mein Bharat mein khailay gaye 12

Asian Games mein Cricket ko shaamil nahi kya gaya tha. Pakistan Olympic Association ke mutabiq South Asian Olympic Committee ne Cricket sameit 25 khelon ki bazabta manzoori daydi hai. Aglay saal munaqqid honay walay South Asian Games mein mardon aur khawateen dono ke Cricket muqablay karaye jayen ge. Agarchay in games mein kaunsa tareeqa e kaar ikhtiyar kya jaye ga hanoz taye nahi kya gaya hai taham quawwi imkaan hai ke T20 ko ikhtiyar kya jaye ga. Yeh bhi bataya ja raha hai ke mardon ke Zumra mein teen senior khiladion ke sath under 23 Cricketers rakhay jayen ge jabkay khawateen ke Zumra mein sirf senior khiladi hi hissa le payen ge. Hindustan mein munaqidah pichlle muqablon mein 8 mumalik ne hissa liya tha aur yeh 23 khelon ko shaamil kya gaya tha. Bangladesh ne un khelon ke iftitahi muqablon ki 1984 mein maizbani ki thi is martaba South Asian Olympic Committee se Afghanistan ki dast bardari ke baais hissa lainay mumalik ki tadaad ghatt gayi magar un muqablon mein 27 discipline rakhay gaye hain.
115.title: South Asian Games mein Cricket bhi shaamil

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein films ki numayesh par lagi 35 sala pabandi ki barkhastgi ke baad Bollywood ki paheli film numayesh ke liye paish kar di gayi hai. Bollywood ke namwaar adakaar Akshey Kumar ki film’Gold’ Saudi Arab mein guzashta roz numayesh ke liye paish ki gayi. Hidayat karah Reema Kagti ki film ‘Gold’ mein Akshey Kumar aur Mouni Roy ney markazi kirdaar ada kiya hai. Is film ki kahani Bharat ki 1984 ki Hockey Team ke pas e manzar ki akkaasi kar rahi hai, jab England mein honey walay Olympics muqablon mein Hockey Team ney pahela Gold Medal haasil kiya tha. Is film mein Akshey Kumar ney India  Hockey Team ke Coach ka kirdar nibaya hai. Saudi Arab ke Cinema ghar mein film Gold ki numayesh par apne khayalat ka izhar karte huwe Akshey Kumar ney Social Media par tweet kiya jis mein kaha ke film Gold paheli Bollywood film hai jo Saudi Arab mein release ki jarahi hai jis par woh nihayat hi khush hain.
127.title: ‘Gold’ Saudi Arab mein release honay wali paheli Bollywood Film

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukomat, Telangana mein School children mein khel kood ke farogh ke liye mandal sateh par bhi iqdamaat kar rahi hai. Khel Kood ko farogh dainay ki policy ke hissa ke taur par ibtida mein mandal sateh par Inter School muqablay munaqqid kiye jarahay hain. Is programme ke hissa ke taur par Bahadurpura mandal mein khelon ke muqaabla ke ineqad ke liye aaj Deputy Education Officer Mr. Ravi Kumar ki sadarat mein aik ijlaas munaqqid huwa jis mein senior Physical Director Janaab S. I. K. Zabiuddin ko Organizing Secretary muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Bahadurpura mandal mein 10 taa 12 September Kho-Kho, Kabbadi aur Volleyball stream mein muqablay munaqqid honge jis mein mandal ke tamam sarkari aur ghair sarkari recognised Schools ke tulba hissa le satke hain. Janab l Zabiuddin ney school intizamia se khwahish ki ke woh un muqablon mein hissa lainay ke liye apne idaron ka registration 6 taa 8 September Umdah Bazaar School mein karwaen. Unhon ney bataya ke mandal sateh par muqablon ke baad zilai sateh ke muqablay aur phir reyasti sateh ke muqablay bhi munaqqid kiye jayenge taakey school mein zair e taaleem tulba mein nisabi taleem ke sath sath khel kud ka bhi shauq parwan chadhe. Is mauqa par Bahadurpura mandal ke Senior Physical Directors Mrs. Sajid Hussain Junaidi, K Mahesh, Raju, Salahuddin, Khadeer Baswa aur mohtarma G Venkat Laxmi bhi maujood thay.
161.title: Zabiuddin School Games ke Organising Secretary muqarrar

news_detail: China ney pehli martaba androon malik tayyar kardah der pa kargar jism mein inject ki janay wali HIV dawa alburvirtide ko manzoori day di hai jo malik ke lakhoon HIV/aids mareezon ke liye aik Musda hoga. sarkari media ney ittila di ke Chinaa food and drug admnstrishn ney is dawa ke istemaal ki manzoori day di hai. yeh dawa hamza HIV ke life cycle ko ibtidayi marhala mein virus aur maizban khalion ke khilaaf ke phelao ko rokti hai. mumlikat ke akhbar’ globle times’ ney science and technology daily ke hawala se yeh baat batayi hai. globle times ko Nanjing mein waqay fronteir bio tiknalojiz almarof zhu ke aik mulazim ney bataya ke Albuvirtide ko hafta mein aik martaba jism mein inject kya jaye gajo mehfooz hai. daraamad shuda anti HIV adwiyaat ke maqabil Albuvirtide ke zeli asraat khafeef hain. khaas kar jigar par is ke asraat bohat hi khafeef parte hain
4.title: China ney pehli desi anti aids  drug ku manzuri dey di

news_detail: ”Mareez mein Khoon ki kami hai” yeh aik aisa jumla hai jo aksar wo beshtar aap doctoron ke mun se suntay rehtay hain. kamzoree, chakkar aana, peelapan ya thakawat honay praap ka mualij jo sabab grdanta hai woh Khoon ki kami hi hai. Khoon ki kami (anemia) aik aisi kefiyat hai jo kisi bhi Umar ke afraad (khaas taur par khawateen) ko ziyada la-haq hosakti hai. is kefiyat mein Khoon mein surkh khalion (Red Cells) ke ban’nay ki raftaar kam hojati hai, haemoglobin surkh khalion ka sab se ahem hissa qaraar diya jata hai aur yeh hissa pehphron se oxygen le kar jism ke baqi hisson taq pohanchata hai. is liye agar ensaan ke jism mein red sales ya haemoglobin ki kami waqay hojaye to pehphron se li gayi oxygen jism ke baqi hisson taq nahi poanch paati, jis ke baais kaam karne mein dushwari, thakawat, kamzoree ka hona, saans lainay mein takleef avrhath paon thanday padjaana jaisay masail ka saamna rehta hai. ”iron surkh khaliyaat ke liye ahem kirdaar ada karne wala juz hai” agar iron se bharpoor ghizaon ka istemaal kya jaye to anemia ki kami poori ki ja sakti hai. to aayiyae zikar karte hain un ghizaon cajun ke zariye ba aasani jism mein Khoon ki kami ko poora kya ja sakta hai .

Kaleji mein iron ki bharpoor miqdaar payi jati hai jo insani jism ke liye be hadd mufeed hai. Kaleji ghizaiyat se bharpoor hoti hai, agransan usay apni khoraak mein shaamil rakhay to bohat si daimi bimarion se bacha ja sakta hai. Kaleji jism mein Khoon ki kami ko Ahsen tareeqa se poora kar ney ka zareya bhi ban sakti hai. Hafta mein agar aik baar is ka istimaal kya jaye to sood mand saabit ho sakta hai. mahireen ke mutabiq Kaleji hayateen, madniyaat aur fats ( fats ) se bharpoor hoti hai. tamam hewani bafton mein qaleel miqdaar mein tanba mojood hota hai, isi terhan Kaleji mein tanbay ki mojoodgi insani jism mein metabolism ko support karti hai. aap apni roz marrah ki ghiza se 0. 9mg tanba haasil karte hain aur agar aap 13 oons Kaleji ka istemaal karlen to aa p 12mg tak tanbay ki zaroriat poori kar saktay hain. Kaleji hamesha taaza aur sehat mand janwar ki istemaal karni chahiye .

Khoon ki qillat door karne ka ek behtareen zareya Anaar hai. is mein chiknai, corbohydrate, potassium, calcium, mignishim, tanba, iron, slfr, phosphorus aur mukhtalif vitamins khasosan vitamin si barri miqdaar mein paaya jata hai. itni khususiyaat ke sath sath Anaar ko haemoglobin ki satah badhaane ka ahem zareya kaha jata hai. vitamin si ki mojoodgi insani jism mein iron ki miqdaar barhati hai. 100 gram Anaar mein sirf 83 calories hoti hain, jis ki wajah se ensaan din bhar chust o tawana raheta hai .

sehat ke liye mufeed Tarbooz ka beshtar hissa pani par mushtamil hota hai jabkay is mein hayateen aur maadni ajzaa bhi paye jatay hain. mahireen Tarbooz ki ghizaiyat se mutaliq kehte hain ke is qudrati phal mein 90 fisad paai aur 10 fisad faulaad, potassium, sodium, calcium, phosphorus, nashasta aur roghni ajzaa shaamil hain. jism mein mojood pani ki kami ko door karne ke liye Tarbooz aik behtareen phal tasleem kya jata hai. yeh jism mein pani ki kami door karne ke sath sath surkh khalion ya haemoglobin ka level badhaane mein bhi madadgaar saabit hota hai .

Chukhandar ke un ginat fawaid se kisi tor inkaar mumkin nahi. is mein fibre, iron, folic acid aur potassium ki bhaari miqdaar payi jati hai, isi liye mahireen, Chukhandar ko haemoglobin ki satah badhaane ke liye behtareen qarar dete hain. Chukhandar ka juice piinaa bohat faida mand hai. yeh sehat bakhash aur mufeed sabzi kayi bimarion se nijaat dilanay mein bhi madadgaar saabit hoti hai. Chukhandar jism mein iron ki kami ko door karta hai jis se jism ke surkh khalion ki murammat hoti hai. mahireen usay kisi bhi shakal mein apni khoraak ka hissa bananay ka mahswara dete hain .

hari bhari sabzian jahan dekhnay mein aankhon ko tarawat aur taazgee bakhshti hain wahein un ka istemaal jism mein Khoon ki kami poori karne ka baais bntahe. mahireen palaak kofori Khoon bananay wali sabzion mein shaamil karte hain. aap usay apni khoraak ka hissa bananay ke liye salad mein shaamil kar saktay hain, rozana aik plate hari sabzion ka salad khanay se Khoon ki kami ko door kya ja sakta hai. is ke ilawa palaak ka juice bhi sehat ke liye kaafi mufeed hota hai .

dalain ghizaiyat se bharpoor hoti hain, un mein fibre, vitamin, madniyaat, mignishim aur iron ki waafar miqdaar payi jati hai. ghizaiyat se bharpoor is ghiza mein mojood fibre Khoon mein cholesterol ka level kam karne ka baais ban sakta hai. agar Khoon mein cholesterol ka level badh jaye toh khoon ki nalion ki dewaron mein charbi jama hokar un nalion ko bock kar sakti hai. agar dil kokhon ki supply band hojaye to heart attack ka khatrah barh jata hai. daalon mein mojood fibre jism mein nuqsaan da cholesterol ki satah mein kami lakar dil ko tahaffuz faraham karta hai
13.title: Khoon ki kami dorkrin ghizaon se

news_detail: Hyderabad. Fehmi Care Hospital Yousufguda ke zair e ihtimaam tibbi qanoon umoor par 8 July burrows itwaar aik roza conference’ ‘ fehmi kaan. 2018’ ‘ National Institute of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises ( NISIET ) waqay Yousufgudu ke auditorium munaqqid hogi. Dr. L. Fahmida Banu Director Fehmi Care Hospital Hospital ney aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke is conference se sprim court aur high court ke wukla, senior medical fiklti, qanoon nafiz karne wali agencio ke ohdedar aur sahafi hissa le rahay hain jin mein qabil zikar janab Justice V. Ramasubramanian Hon’ble Judge High Court Andhra Pradesh o Telangana, Hyderabad, Prof. Dr. Sripada Venkat Joga Rao visiting professor NLSUI, Dr Neeraj Nagpal sabiq sadar Indian Medical Association, janab Shafeeq ur Rahman Muhajir Legal Expert, Dr. Syed Mohammed Ghouse , D Chaparala Surendranath Secretary IMA, Dr. S. Manikya Rao sadar APOGS, Dr. Rohit Raj Mathur eminent Journalist, Prof. Dr. Gangadhar Sahoo Dean I.M.S. & SUM Hospital Bhubaneshwar, Dr. E. Ravinder Reddy sadarnasheen Telangana State Medical Council, Dr.  Durga Rao Director OASIS- Center for Reproductive Medicine, Dr Geetendra Sharma maahir Medico Legal Cases, Dr. Bipin Pandit Committee Member Indian Education Society aur Dr. Ashwini Kumar Setya  Senior Consultant ke alawa deegar hain. Dr. Fahmida Banu ney kaha ke is aik roza Conference mein pesha Tib se marboot mukhtalif qanooni pehluo ka ihata kya jaye ga jaise medical emergency cases mein la-haq qanooni khatraat, qanoon tahaffuz e Sarif , Medico Legal Cases aur zaraye Ablaagh, Doctors ke khilaaf Warrants, Doctors aur Medical idaron ke khilaaf tashadud aur Qanooni Muqadmaat ke Imtiazi Faislon par is conference ke douran ghhor o khoz kya jaye ga. unhon ney bataya ke conference ke aakhir mein aik awaami mobahisa ”Kahan gaye woh achay din” hoga jis mein tibbi nighdasht ke roshan pehluo aur un ke ahya ke zimn mein kiye jaaney walay iqdamaat par roshni daali jaye gi
30.title: Tibbi Qanooni umoor par aik roza conference FEHMICON-2018.

news_detail: Rozana Multivitamins ki dawai khoraak, dil ke amraaz ke khatraat ko ghatanay ka jo ta-assur paaya jata hai woh durust nahi hai. Dauran e khoon ke aik tehleeli tabdeeli se pata chalta hai ke Multivitamins ke Suppliments se dil ki sahet par koi assar nahi parta jaissa ke aam ta-assur paaya jata hai. aik nai tehqeeq mein inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke Multivitamins dil ki sahet ke liye kuch nahi karte aur Nahi dil ke doroon se bachatey hain. Birmingham mein alabama university ke mohqiqeen ney 12 saal taq 2 hazaar logon ke data ka jaiza liya to inhen pata chala ke Suppliments ney dil ki sahet par koi assar nahi dala. aisay afraad jo Multivitamins letay hain woh samaghtay hain ke woh apni sahet ke liye kuch acha kar rahay hain jabkay doosri janib woh cigrette noshi aur junk food bhi letay rehtay hain. tehqeeq ke mutabiq log dil ke amraaz se bachaoo ke liye fauri aur aaasaaan hal dhoondtay hain jaisay ke koi goli waghera ka lena jabkay inhen mazeed jad-o-jehad karkay dil ke amraaz se bachney ke tareeqay apnane chahiye. tehqeeq se pata chala ke dil ke amraaz se bachney ke liye Multivitamins aur minerals ke istemaal ka koi faida nahi hota. mohqiqeen ney Multivitamins Suppliments ( kam az kam teen vitamins aur Minerals par mushtamil ) ke istemaal aur qalbi sahet ka jaiza liya. mohqiqeen ney kaha ke Multivitamins Suppliments se qalbi arooqi khatraat se amwaat, qalbi amraaz, qalb par hamla waghera se hifazat nahi hosakti, Albata dilon ke sharianon ki bemari mein 20 feesad kami askati hai.
50.title: Multivitamins dil ki sahet ke liye kaar amad nahi, nai tehqeeq

news_detail: Jakarta : Indonesia mein do cheharon walay bacha ki tasaveer viral horahee hain jo haal hi mein paida huwa hai. Yeh bacha Indonesia ke aik shehar Batam mein peda huwa hai jis ke baray mein doctoron ka kehna hai ke yeh pyost judwaan (conjoined twins) ki aik misaal hai jis mein do mah ke Gilang Andika ke sath dosray judwaan ka jism poori terha nah ban saka aur yun aik sar par aik ki bajaye do chehray ban gaye. Taham is kefiyat se maloom hota hai ke dosra bacha mukammal taur par namoo nah huwa aur is ka sar aur dimagh aik bachay ke jism ka hissa ban gaya hai. is lehaaz se Andika ke do chehre aur do dimagh hain. Is kefiyat se bachay ke dimagh mein maya bhar raha hai jo is ke liye jaan lewa saabit ho sakta hai. Yeh kefiyat bachay ke walidain ke liye be basi ki wajah bani hui hai kyunkay woh is ka ilaaj karanay se qaasir hain. Bachay ki walida Ernilasari aur waalid Mustafa apne bacha ko bachana chahtay hain. Muqami doctoron ney keh diya hai ke woh is bacha ka operation nahin kar saktay kyunkay yeh aik paicheeda maamla hai. Yeh bacha maa ka doodh peenay se qaasir hai aur usay nalki se dabbay ka doodh diya ja raha hai. Doosri janib mahireen ney kaha hai ke yeh bacha is kefiyat mein bohat arsa tak zindah nahi reh sakta. Tibbi istelha mein is marz ko hydrocephalus kehte hain jis mein sar ke andar maya jama hona shuru hojata hai. yeh marz bacha mein seekhnay, dekhnay, samajhney aur normal nashonuma mein rukawat bantaa hai aur mirgi jaisi kefiyat bhi peda karsaktha hai .
69.title: Indonesia mein do chehray walay bacha ki paidaiesh

news_detail: Aik nai tehqeeq se yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke aisi khawateen jo baqaidagi se Aspirin leti hain, woh HIV se khalion ke mutasir honay se badi had tak bach sakti hai chunkay is ke baqaida istemaal se khalion ki soozish ghatt jati hai jis se HIV virus ke asraat bhi kam parte hain. Rozana aik Aspirin se HIV virus ka shikaar honay ka khatrah 35 feesad tak tall sakta hai. Iss waqt khusosan Africa sameit duniya ka ghalib hissa HIV Aids ke chungal mein girftar hai taham 100 saal se bhi purani aik dawa Aspirin is marz ko bhi muassir andaaz mein rok sakti hai. Canada ki university of Manitoba ke mahireen ney kaha hai ke kam miqdaar mein Aspirin khanay se HIV (Aids virus) ke phelao ko kam kya ja sakta hai. Africi khawateen HIV infection ki ziyada shikaar hoti hain aur isi bina par mahireen ney tehqeeq ke liye Africa ka intikhab kya hai. Jamia Manitoba, University of Waterlu, Canada mein sahet ki agency aur Kenya ke deegar idaron ney Kenya ki bohat si khawateen ko Aspirin di jis ka keemiyai naam ‘Acetoxybenzoic acid’ ya ‘ASA’ hai. Yeh tehqeeq bain ul aqwami Aids Society ke journal mein shaya hui hai jis mein Aspirin jaisi aam dawa ke HIV par asraat ka jaiza liya gaya hai jis ke bohat hairatangaiz musbit natayij baraamad hue hain. Virus ko phelnay keliye ensaan ke andar ek hassas khaliya (cell) darkaar hota hai. Is zimn mein aam khaliyaat ke muqaabla mein ziyada tar sargaram khaliyaat Manyee (Immune Cells) hi HIV ka shikar bantay hain. Mahireen ke khayaal mein khawateen ke tauleedi nizaam (Reproductive Trract) mein androoni soozish hi HIV ke phaelao ki wajah banti hai. Tajarbaat se saabit huwa hai ke Aspirin ney khawateen ke rahem aur tauleedi nizaam mein HIV se mutasir honay walay khaliyaat ki tadaad mein 35 feesad tak kami kar di. Iss ke alawa HIV ke khatrah se dochar khawateen kayi baras tak infection se mehfooz rahin. Mahireen ney is kamyabi ke baad Aspirin par mazeed tehqeeq par zor diya hai. Mahireen ab yeh janna chahtay hain ke Aspirin jaisi saada dawa kis terha khalwi satah par sozish ko rok rahi hai. Agar yeh baat achi terha saabit hojati hai to Aspirin ke zareya kam kharch par ghareeb mumalik ki khawateen mein HIV ke phaelao ko roka ja sakta hai taham usay ilaaj ke bajaye ehtiyati tadbeer hi kaha jaye ga. Aspirin agarchay dard kash dawa ke taur par jani jati hai lekin is ka baqaida istemaal dil ko sahet mand rakhtay hue amraazِ e qalb se bhi bachata hai. Tibbi mahireen ka kehna hai ke dil ke dauray ki soorat mein agar fauri taur par koi dawa dastyab na ho to Aspirin ke istemaal se dauray ki shiddat mein kami layi ja sakti hai aur mareez ko Hospital pahonchanay ka waqt mil sakta hai .

Dr. Fowke ney kaha ke yeh intahi baeed az qiyaas hai ke Aspirin apne taur par hifz-e-mataqddum ke taur par istemaal ki khoobi rakhti hai. Iss ke liye aalami satah par market mein drugs dastyab hain. Mrz ke la-haq honay se qabal ehthyat ke taur par istemaal ki janey wali adwiyaat se inflamation/infection  ke khatraat badi had tak ghatt jatay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke study yeh zahir karti hai ke jinsi taur par mutharrik log khaas kar jinhein HIV la-haq honay ka khatrah ziyada rehta hai woh condoms aur pre-Exposure Prophylaxix (pr EP) ke sath sath Aspirin ka bhi istemaal kiya jay. Unhon ney kaha ke Aspirin ke is tanazur mein istemaal par is ke daira aur nuqsanaat par mazeed tehqiqaat ki jani chahiye.
99.title: Rozana aik Aspirin khawateen ko HIV se door rakh sakti hai!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aanjhani Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee lazzat kaam o dahan ke baday dildada they. Woh pakodoon ke shuqeen to thae hi magar unhen Hyderabadi Biryani aur Haleem bhi bohat Aziz thi aur lkhno ke Galoti Kebab bhi inhen bohat bhatay they. Meethay ke to woh dushman hi they. Un ke qareebi dost o ahbaab ki yeh koshish huwa karti thi ke unhen khanay peenay se door rakha jaye. Aik martaba to un ka dheyaan gulab jamun se hataane ke liye Madhuri Dixit ki janib un ki tawajah mabzool karna pada tha. Un ke sathiyon ko unhen beja khanay se roknay ke liye mukhtalif bahanay banane padte thay. Atal Bihari Vajpayee ke guzar jaanay ke baad un ke qareebi sathiyon aur sahafion ne un ki yaaden taaza keen aur un ki khanay se raghbat ke qisse yaad kiye. Un ke doston ke mutabiq Vajpayee meethay aur samundari ghiza ke be intehaa shauqeen thay. Aik senior sahafi Rasheed Qadwai ne is waqt ko yaad karte hue bataya ke aik dafaa sarkari daura ke douran dopaher ke khanay par Vajpayee, food counter pahonch gaye jahan meethay mein gulab jamun bhi maujood thay, Vajpayee ko un dinon doctors ne parhaiz bataya tha. Is se pehlay ke Vajpayee ki nazar gulab jamunoon par jati aur un ka dil lalchaata, un ke sathiyon neh un ka dheyaan batane ke liye aik mansoobah banaya. Unhon ne jhat se wahein maujood Bollywood ki maaroof adakara Madhuri Dixit se un ki mulaqaat karadi. Phir kya tha donon filmon se mutaliq baton mein lag gaye aur isi dauran un ke sathiyon ne barri mahaarat se samnay rakhay woh gulab jamun gayab kardiye. Jin Bureaucrats ne Vajpayee ke sath kaam kya, un ka kehna hai ke woh jahan jatay they wahan ke muqami pakawanon ko chakhnay ki arzoo zahir kya karte thay. Chahay woh Calcutta ke Puchkas hon ya Hyderabad ki Haleem ya Biryani ho ya phir Lucknow ka Gulawati Kebaab hon, Vajpayee aksar un par haath saaf karte nazar aatay thay, woh pakodoon par be thaasha chaat masalha chinak kar khatay they aur sath chai ki chaskyaan letay thay. Vajpayee ke aik qareebi saathi ne bataya ke Vajpayee aksar o beshtar Cabinet ke ijlaas ke dauraan namak wali moong phalian khatay rehtay thay. Aik sahafi ne jo aksar Vajpayee ke saath safar karta tha, Vajpayee ko sab se aaramdah Wazeer e Azam qarar diya, Vajpayee ka kehna tha ke mein sirf kaam ke liye safar par nahin jata balkay jahan jata hon wahan ke khaano se bhi lutf andaaz ho taa hon.’ Aik aur Senior Sahafi ne bataya ke kayi mauqon par unki aur sathiy sahafion ki tawazav un dishes se ki gayi jinhein khud Vajpayee neh apne hathon se tayyar kya tha. Un ke khidmat guzar lal jee Tandon ki zimma daari huwa karti thi ke woh Vajpayee ke liye Lucknow ke chowk se kebab le aaye. Un ke aik saathi ka kehna hai ke markazi wazeer Vijay Goel purani Delhi se bedni aalo aur chaat laaya karte thay jabkay Naib Sadar e jamhooria Hind Venkaiah Naidu Andhra Pradesh se jheenghay laya karte thay.
133.title: Vajpayee ko Pakodoon ke sath Biryani aur Haleem bhi Aziz thay!

news_detail: Saudi Arab jaanewale tamaam Aazmeen e Hajj aur Umra 2030 tak ayse Ihram odh kar manasik ada kar sakenge jin par bacteria asar-andaaz nahin ho sakega. Ayise Ihram jald hi Pakistan ke shaher Faisalabad mein taiyaar huwa karenge. Nanotechnology ke istemaal ke zariye Ihram ke taiyaari aik Saudi buisinessman Hamad Al-Yami ka idea hai. Unhen ye idea akhabaar mein aik khabar padh kar aaya jis mein bataya gaya tha ke Umm Al-Qura University kee aik teem Nanotechnology ke istimaal ke zareeya Masjid ul-Haraam mein bichhe qaaleeno par chaandi ke Nano ajzaa ki tahe chadha rahi hai jis ki vajah se Bacteria ke afzayish nahin ho sakti. Jaraseem kushee ke liye chaandi ka istimaal qadeem tareeqa hai. Har saal lakhon Umre aur Hajj ke liye lakhon Aazameen Saudi Arab aate hain aur ayse mein mukhtalif bimaariyaan phailne ka khatara rahta hai.Ye Khabar pad kar Hamad Al-Yami ko Nanotechnology ke zarieye Ihram ke taiyaaree ka khyaal aaya, unhon ne malumat hasil karana shuro kiyn aur Dubai mein aik German Faishon Desinger se unaka raabita hua jisane unhen jaraaseemakush Ihram bana kar diya, 2017 mein Hajj ke dauraan paheli bar ayse Ihramon ki farooqhat ka aagaaz huwa.Unhen mazeed sasta banaane ke liye Hamad Al-Yami ne Pakistan ke shaher Faisalabad ka rukh kiya jahaan aik manufacturer unhen munaasib qeemat par matalooba miyaar ke Ihram banakar dene par razamand ho gaya. Governor Makkah ki manzuri ke baad is mansube par amal daraamad shuro ho ga aur 2030 tak tamaam Aazemeen ko jaraaseemakush Ihram dastiyaab honge.
149.title: Nanotechnology se tayiyar karda jarasimkush Ihram.

news_detail: Aqwama mutahidda (United Nations) ney khabardaar kiya hai ke Yemen mein Diarrhea ki waba aik baar phir be qaboo hokar khatarnaak hudood ko chone lagi hai. Aalmi idaara UN ney khabardaar kiya hai ke agar Yemen mein Diarrhea ki rok thaam ke liye mo-asar iqdamaat na kiye gaye toh is ke nateeja mein be panah insani jaanun ka nuksaan ho sakta hai. UN ke Secretary General ke muawin baraye insani umoor Mark Lowcock ney New York mein aik Press Conference mein kaha ke Yemen mein Diarrhea apni khatarnaak huduoon ko choo raha hai. Unhon ney kaha ke hum Yemen mein drought ko shikast dainey ke liye koshan hain magar hamein is par qaboo paney mein mushkilaat ka saamna hai. ‘UN’ ohdedar ka kahna tha keh tamam tar koshisho ke bawajood Yemen mein insani soorat e haal mein koi behtari nahi layi jaski hai. UN jung se mutasirah ilaaqon mein 8 lakh afraad ko khoraak muhayya karne ki koshish kar raha hai. Unhon ney Yemeni awam ke liye imdaad dainey walay Mulkon bilkhushoos Saudi Arab aur dosray khaleeji Mumalik ke maali taawun ka khusoosi shukriya ada kya. Lowocock ka kahna tha ke Yemen mein imdaadi operation mein darpesh mushkilaat mein aik ahem masla muqami Currency ki qadar mein giravat bhi hai. United Nations Yemeni awam ki maali mushkilaat ke hal ki koshisho mein nakaam hai.
163.title: Yemen mein ‘Diarrhea’ ki wabaa phoot padi: UN

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein Iqtidaar haasil karne BJP kisi bhi had tak ja sakti hai. tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar 112 arkaan assembly ki taied haasil nah honay ke bawajood BJP naay Governor ki madad se ‫Yediurappa ko Chief Minister ki haisiyat se halaf dladya. agarchay sprim court naay hafta ko 4 : 00 bajey shaam ko hi aiwaan mein khat aetmaad haasil karne ki hadaayat di hai is ke bawajood BJP purazm hai ke usay darkaar taied haasil hojaye gi. Congress aur Janata Dal Secular ke qaideen naay ilzaam aed kya ke is ke arkaan assembly ko wizarat aur doulat ka lalach dainay ki bhi koshishen ki gayeen aur ab yeh ilzaam aed kya ja raha hai ke Congress ke aik aur Janata Dal Secular ke do arkaan assembly ka aghwaa kya gaya hai aur un ke khilaaf Enforcement Directorate aur Income Tax Department ki janib se karwaiya ki jarahi hain. Mr. H.D.  Kumaraswamy ney kaha’ ‘ Janata Dal Secular ke do arkaan assembly ko hamaray BJP doston naay aghwaa karliya hai, lekin mujhe yaqeen hai ke woh hamaray paas wapas ajayeen ge.’ ‘ isi terhan aik aur Congress rukan assembly ko Delhi mein Enforcement Directorate ki janib se rokay rakhnay ka ilzaam aed kyajarha hai. Congress ke senior quied Mr. ghulam Nabi Azad ney kaha’ ‘ MLAs hamaray sath hain, ikhtiyarat ka jo kuch ghalat istemaal karna tha unhon naay kya. sprim court naay inhen aik ahcha pachada sirf zabani nahi balkay iqdaam ke tor par. yeh aur baat hai ke BJP ke log mouti chamri ke hain.’ ‘ Karnataka Congress naay ilzaam aed kya ke BJP naay Congress am ail ae aanand singh ka aghwaa kya aur Enforcement Directorate aur Income TaxDepartment ko istemaal karte hue inhen ghair qanooni tor par Mahruse rakha hai. Governor Karnataka Mr. wuju bhai wala ke khilaaf muzahira mein hissa lainay ke baad akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue sabiq Chief MinisterMr. Sidda Ramaiah ney kaha ke tamam 78 Congress arkaan assembly aur do azad MLAs hamaray sath they magar singh ka aghwaa karliya gaya hai.
