Mr. Siddaramaya ney kaha ke Congress am ail ae aanand singh ka aghwaa karliya gaya aur BJP naay Enforcement Directorate aur Income Tax Department ko istemaal karte hue BJP ke logon naay inhen ghair qanooni hirasat mein rakha hai. BJP ke log waisa hi be sharmi se kar rahay hain jaissa ke BJP ke qaumi saddar amit Shah naay tamam reyaston mein kya. woh dastoor aur qanoon ko nahi jantay. woh jhutay propgnd_h ke siwa kuch nahi jantay. Mr. Gulam Nabi Azad ney kaha ke Mr. Singh Delhi mein they aur woh jon hi azad ho jaien ge hamaray sath hon ge. unhon naay kaha ke inhen yarghamal bana kar rakha gaya magar woh hum se rabita mein hain. Mr. prtap gorha ke baray mein jin ke gayab hojane ki it-tila-aat theen Mr. Sidda Ramaiah naay kaha ke woh un ke sath hain. unhon naay kaha ke Mr. prtap gorha paatil aeye aur in kaghzat par dastakhat kiye jo Governor ko daakhil kardah fehrist se mutaliq hain. Congress aur Janata DalSecular ke arkaan assembly mein phoot ke baray mein pouchye jaanay par Mr. Sidda Ramaiah naay kaha ke hum sab aik sath hain. sabiq Chief Minister naay kaha ke BJP ko sirf 104 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui hai, inhen 112 arkaan assembly ki taied haasil nahi hai balkay inhen 104 se zayed aik bhi am ail ae ki taied haasil nahi hai. is ke barkhilaf Congress ko 78 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui jabkay Janata Dal ko 37 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui aur bi SP aur ke PJPK aik aik arkaan assembly ke ilawa aik azad rukan assembly bhi hamaray sath hain, chunkay Mr. Kumaraswamydo halqon se kamyaab hue hain is liye aiwaan mein Congress ittehaad ko 117 arkaan ki taied haasil hai
21.title: Wizarat aur doulat se kaam nahi chala to ab khaufzadah karne ki koshish ?

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karntaka mein tashkeel hukoomat ke baray mein paaya janey wala tajassus, Mr. ‫Yediurappa hukoomat ke ewaan assembly mein adadi qowat ke muzahira mein hazeemat ke sath khatam hogaya. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne mein nakaam ho chukay hain. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney khat aetmaad haasil karne ki bajaye ewaan mein istifa dete hue apni shikast ko qubool karliya. cheif mnstr Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan mein raye dahi ka saamna karne ki bajaye apna istifa dainay ka elaan kardiya. is terhan adadi qowat ke muzahira ki nobat hi nahi aayi. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan mein istifa dainay ka elaan karne se qabal mukhtasar si taqreer ki. woh ewaan se nikal kar seedhay governor haoz ke liye rawana hogaye aur governor ko apna istifa saump diya hai. yaad rahay ke Karntaka assembly intikhabaat mein BJPagarchay sab se barri party ke tor par ubhri hai magar usay tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar aqaltareen 112 vote haasil nahi hopaye. woh sirf 104 nashiston par hi kamyabi haasil krpayi thi jabkay Congress ko 78 aur Janata Dal s ko 37 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui thi jabkay Congress. Janata Dal ittehaad ko mabaqi teen umeedwaron ki bhi taied haasil thi. governor Karntaka Mr. Vajubhai Vala ney BJPko khatir khuwa tadaad mein arkaan assembly ki taied nah milnay ke bawajood sab sabay barri party honay ki binaa tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hue inhen androon 15 yom ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ki hadaayat di thi taham sprim court ney governor ke faisla ko radd karte hue ‫Yediurappahukoomat ko kal hadaayat di thi ke woh hafta ke din 4 : 00 bujey shaam ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhay. ‫Yediurappa ke istifa ke baad Congress aur Janata Dal S ke campus mein jashnn dekha gaya
32.title: Yediurappa ney istifa dey diya

news_detail: Naamzad wazeer aala Karnataka Mr. each d Kumaraswaminy Congress ke sath wazraye aala ki tabdeeli se inkaar kardiya

Bengaluru. Aiwaan kabeena mein tehreek aetmaad ka saamna kiye baghair hi Chief Minister Mr. ‫di europa ke istifa ke dosray din wizarat aala ke liye rasta hamwar panay walay reyasti sarbarah Janata Dal  Secular Mr. each d Kumaraswaminy kaha ke woh halaf lainay ke androon 24 ghantay ewaan assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit krdkhayin ge. unhon ny kaha’ ‘ halaf bardari ke androon 24 ghantay mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhaoonga.’ ‘ Mr. Kumaraswami peer ko Delhi ka dora kar rahay hain taakay riyasat mein mustahkam hukoomat ki farahmi aur kabini qlmdanon ki taqseem ke barey mein mrs Sonia Gandhi aur Congress sadar Mr. Rahul Gandhi se tabadlah khayaal krpayin. unhon ny kaha’ ‘ kal mein Delhi rawana ho raha hon jahan mein Sonia jee aur Rahul jee se mulaqaat karoon ga. hum kabeena mein tosee par tabadlah khayaal karen ge. mein un se riyasat mein aindah paanch barson ke liye mustahkam hukoomat ki farahmi par har umoor par tabadlah khayaal karoon g. naamzad Chief Minister ko un ki makhloot hukoomat mein kabini qlmdanon ki taqseem mein tawazun barqarar rakhna hoga. senior Congress quied Mr. Malikarjun Kharge ny aaj kaha ke woh aik qaumi siyasi party ke tor par aik ilaqai party ki taied kar rahay hain is liye le aur day ke tanasub ka khayaal rakha jaye ga. taham naamzad Chief Minister ny Congress ke sath wizarat aala ki tabdeeli ke imkanaat ko mustard kardiya. Mr. Kumaraswami ny is khsos mein poochnay par ke aaya un ki party Congress ke sath Chief Minister ka ohda waqfa waqfa se badalny par mafahmat ki hai, unhon ny nifi mein jawab diya. Congress aur Janata Dal  Secular ke darmain ma qabl intikhabaat mafahmat nahi thi taham bi jay pi ke sab se barri party ke tor par ubharnay ke baad Congress ny dosray number par anay ke bawajood aakhralzkr party ko Iqtidaar se daur rakhnay teesray number par rehne wali Janata Dal  ko tashkeel hukoomat mein taied karne ka faisla kya hai
48.title: Kumaraswami tashkeel kabeena ke silsila mein Sonia aur Rahul se kal baat karen ge

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. ke Chandarshekar Rao jinhon neyBJP aur Congress se pak siyasi ittehaad ke qiyam ke liye pehal ki thi aur Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein Janata Dal Secular ki taied o himayat ki thi, Karnataka ke Chief Minister Mr. H.D.  Kumara Swami ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se guraiz karne walay hain. shaed is ki aik ahem wajah yeh hosakti hai ke woh taqreeb halaf bardari mein Congress party ke qaumi saddar Rahul Gandhi ka saamna karna nahi chahtay. Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein hareef ke tor par muqaabla karne wali do siyasi partiyon Janata Dal aur Congress mein ma baad anthabat mafahmat hui hai aur Congress party ney BJP ko Iqtidaar se daur rakhnay ziyada nashistain rakhnay ke bawajood –apne se choti party Janata Dal Secular ko tashkeel hukoomat mein taied karne ka elaan kya hai. yaad rahay ke Chief Minister Karnataka o sarbarah Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ney Karnataka assembly intikhabaat se qabal mulk bhar mein Congress aur BJP se pak aik siyasi ittehaad ke qiyam ki pehal ki thi aur is khsos mein woh Janata Dal Secular ke qaideen se bhi mulaqaat karte hue inhen amaada karne ki koshish ki thi .

Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao aaj shaam Bengaluru puhanche aur naamzad Chief Minister Mr. H.D.  Kumara Swami aur Janata Dal Secular ke sarbarah o sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mr. H.D.  Deveguda se shehar ke junoob maghribi muzafaat mein waqay Padmanabha Nagar mein un ki rahaish gaah mein mulaqaat ki. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha ke woh paishgi masrofiyat ke baais kal munaqqid shudni taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se qassar hain. unhon ney Bengaluru mein kaha ke woh Janata Dal S ke qaideen ko mubarakbaad aur naik tamannaye paish karte hain. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha ke Janata Dal Secular jaisi aik ilaqai party ke aik quied ka Chief Minister ban-na ilaqai partiyon ki taaqat ka Mazhar hai. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao apne chand deegar party qaideen ke hamrah aik khusoosi tayyarah ke zareya Hyderabad se Bengaluru aaj shaam puhanche they. Chief Minister aaj raat hi Hyderabad wapas lout gaye hain chunkay inhen kal apni paishgi masrofiyat mein hissa lena hai. Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ko bhi kal 4 : 30 bujey shaam munaqqid shudni taqreeb halaf bardari mein madoo kya gaya tha .

Mr. Kumara Swamiko kal shaam riyasti secretriat Vidhan Sudha ke rubaroo Governor Mr. Vajubhai Vala Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf delainge jis mein kayi qaumi qaideen jaisay Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, Chief Minister Delhi Mr. Aravind Kejriwal, Chief Minister Kerala Mr. Pinarayi Vijayan  ke ilawa taqreeban aik laakh awam shirkat karen ge. is taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu, Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Benerji  Bahujan Samaj Party party sarbarah Ms. Mayavati ko Mr. Kumara Swaminey ne madoo kya tha.
62.title: Chief Minister Karnataka ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se Chandrashekar Rao ka guraiz

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein intikhabaat ke baad 8 dinon ke siyasi athl pthl ke baad aaj shaam jntadl Karnataka ke sarbarah Mr. each d Kumaraswamy ny Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya. governor Karnataka Mr. wuju bhai wla ny Karnataka skritrit’ ‘ Vidhan Soudha’ ki seerihoon par 4 : 30 bujey shaam munaqidah aik پْر asar taqreeb mein Mr. each d Kumaraswamy ko ohda aur raazdari ka halaf dilaya. taqreeb halaf bardari mein qaumi siyasi qaideen ki kehkashan theen jinhon ny Karnataka mein aik mutahidda ghair BJPhukoomat ki tashkeel mein kaleedi rule ada kya tha. 58 sala Mr. Kumaraswamy  ny doosri martaba Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya hai. is se qabal woh 2006-07 ke douran jntadl. BJPmakhloot hukoomat mein 20 mah ke liye Chief Minister they. Congress party ke Mr. G. Prameshwara  ny bhi deputy Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya. is mauqa par mrs Sonia Gandhi, saddar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi, Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu, Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Benerji, sadar Bhajujan Samaj Party Ms. Mayavati, sabiq Chief Minister o qaiyed Samaaj Wadi Party Mr. Akhilesh Yadav, CPI (M) ke Mr. sitaram Yachuri, NCP ke Mr. Sharad Pawar, RJD ke Tejaswhi Yadav bhi mojood they. taqreeb halaf bardari se chand ghantay qabal bangloru mein taiz barish aur saalah baari bhi hui thi aur aisa lag raha tha ke Vidhan Soudha ki seerihoon par taqreeb munaqqid karna mumkin nahi rahay ga. BJP ney aaj ki taqreeb halaf bardari ko yom mukhalif awaami khat aatmadke tor par manaya hai
78.title: Kumaraswamy ney Chief Minister Karnataka ki hesiyat se halaf liya

news_detail: Vijayawada. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naidu ne Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke woh ishtihar baz wazeer e azam hain jo –apne wadon ko wafa karne mein nakaam reh gay. BJP yakeeni tor par 2019 mein Iqtidaar mein nahi aeye gi. Telugu Desam party ke Mahanadu  ka aaghaz karte hue Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ne kaha ke Telugu Desam party ne maazi mein hukoomaton ki tashkeel mein kaleedi kirdaar ada kya tha aur malik mein siyasi hekiyaat tabdeel karne ki taaqat rakhti hai. unhon ne 2019 mein BJP ki peshraft ko roknay woh hum khayaal partiyon se mafahmat karen ge. Congress opposition mein hai, woh kuch ziyada nahi kar sakti, lekin BJP yakeeni taur par 2019 mein dubara iqtedaar mein nahi askati. Mr. Naidu ne kaha ke 2019 mein BJP ka iqtidaar mein aana aik khawab baeed hai aur wazeer e azam Narendra Modi sirf aik ishtihari wazeer e azam hain jinhon ne sirf naaray diye aur apne kiye hue wadon ko wafa karne mein nakaam reh chuke hain. unhon ne kaha ke Telugu Desam 1996 mein united front hukoomat ki tashkeel mein kaleedi rule ada kya tha. Telugu Desam ne maazi mein hukoomaton ki tashkeel mein ahem rule ada kya tha woh malik mein siyasi bisaat badalny ki taaqat rakhti hai. hum qadam peechay nahi len ge. unhon ne kaha ke Telugu Desam ne an d ae hukoomat ki taied se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karli kyunkay markazi hukoomat ne Andhra Pradeshko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne aur qanoon Andhra Pradesh tashkeel nav par amal daraamad karne ke apne wada se makr gayi thi. Mr. Naidu ne BJP par aandhraprdish ke ke awam ko dhoka day rahi hai aur y s are si pi ke sath mili bhagat karte hue riyasat mein law and aard ke masail peda kar rahi hai .

Mahanadu  mein Telugu Desam Party Mahanadu  ke douran markazi hukoomat ke munasib tor par soochey baghair kiye gay iqtisadi faislon, un ki na munasib amal aawri, jee s tea ki nakami aur note bandi aur nizaam bank par se awam ke uthte hue aetmaad par qarar dadin Manzoor karen gi. Chief Minister ke officer aan special duty Mr. Srinivas ne bataya ke party, Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne aur qanoon aandhraprdish tashkeel noki daf-aat par amal aawri se mutaliq Rajia sabha mein kiye gay apne waday se markazi hukoomat ke inhiraf ke khilaaf qarar daad Manzoor kere gi.
93.title: BJP ki 2019 mein tashkeel hukoomat aik khawab e bayeed

news_detail: New Delhi. Aakhir-kaar Lok Sabha Speaker ney YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ka istifa Manzoor karliya jinhon ney Andhra Pradesh ko khususi mauqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte hue apna istifa paish kardiya tha. inhen Speaker Lok Sabha  Smitra Mahajan ney mutala kya ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen ge. chaharshanba ko YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament  Y V Subba Reddy, Mekapati Raj Mohan Reddy, Varaprasad, P. Mithun Reddy aur Y. S. Avinash Reddy ney mrs Smitra Mahajan se mulaqaat ki aur appeal ki ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen. Speaker ney inhen jawab dete hue kaha ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen ge, baad azan paanch arkaan Parliament ney kaha ke isifon se dast bardari ka sawal hi peda nahi hota. unhon ney kaha ke chaharshanba ki shaam taq un ke isifon ki manzoori ka sarkari elaan kardiya jaye ga. YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ney yeh bhi mutalba kya ke Speaker ko arkaan Parliament Mrs. S P Y Reddy, Kothapally Gita aur Butta Renuka ke inhiraf kabhi faisla kar dein.
116.title: YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ke isteefay Manzoor!

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein 15 dinon qadeem H. D. Kumaraswami hukoomat ki Cabinet mein aaj tausi ki gayi haiChief Minister Mr. H. D.  Kumaraswami ne apni Cabinet mein tausi karte hue 25 arkaan ko shaamil kya hai jin mein Congress se talluq rakhnay walay 14 wuzraa shaamil hain jabkay Janata Dal Secular ke 9 aur BSP aur KPJP ke wahid arkaan ko bhi Cabinet mein shaamil kya gaya hai. goar nar Mr. wuju bhai wla ne raaj bhuvan mein munaqidah aik taqreeb mein naye wuzraa ko ohda aur raazdari ka halaf dilaya. halaf lainay walon mein sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mr. H. D.  Deve Gowda ke farzand Mr. H. D.  Revanna aur riyasti Congress ke senior qayed Mr. D. K. Shivkumar bhi shaamil hain. Janata Dal S ke Mr. G. T. Deve Gowda ku jinhon ne sabiq Chief Minister Mr. Sidda Ramaiah  ko Mysoru ki Chimandeshwari  halqa assembly se shikast di thi bhi shaamil kya gaya hai. Congress ki rukan qanoon saaz council mrs jiye mila wahid khatoon wazeer hon gi. ma baad mafahmat ke tehat makhloot hukoomat mein Congress ke 22 aur Janata Dal ke 12 wuzraa hon ge. Cabinet mein aaj ki tausi ke sath wuzraa ki tadaad 27 hogayi hai. mazeed wuzraa ko Cabinet mein shaamil karne ki gunjaish baqi hai. Mr. Kumaraswami ne bah hesiyat Chief Minister aur Congress quied Mr. G. Parameshwara ne bah hesiyat deputy mnstr 23 May ko halaf liya tha. aaj halaf lainay walon mein Congress party se talluq rakhnay walay do muslim arkaan assembly Mrs U. T. Khadar aur B. Z. Zameer Ahmed Khan shaamil hain.
129.title: Kumaraswami Cabinet mein 25 wuzraa ki shumuliat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein parking ke masail ka hal talaash karne cheif secretary Telangana Mr. S.K. Joshi ney baldi nazam o nasq ke ohdedaron ke sath aik ijlaas munaqqid kya taakay awaami. khangi shiraakat daari se Multi-Level parking Complexes ki taamer ke liye androon aik mah ishtiraaq kya jasakay. cheif secretary ney tajaweez ke qabil amal honay ka mutalea karne ki hadaayat dete hue kaha ke developers se tajaweez talabb karne se qabal daryaft talabb masla mein package ki tafseelaat aur deegar umoor ka ihata kya jaye. myir Hyderabad Mr. Bontu Ram Mohan ney ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kaha ke New York jaisay shehron mein parking fees se khateer aamdani hoti hai. unhon ney kaha ke riyasat mein duniya mein mojood behtar tareeqa car ko ikhtiyar kya jaye. unhon ney kaha ke parking yards ka ilaqa 100 murabba gaz se 500 murabba gaz par muheet hona chahiye. Principal Secretary Mr. Aravind Kumar ney kaha ke parking ke masail par mehakma police ney aik surway kar rakha hai. shehar mein Multi-Level parking ki taamer ke liye Hyderabad metro rail limited hogi. metro rail ke Managing Director Mr. N.V.S Reddy ney kaha ke Germaney , Japan , china aur South Korea jaisay mumalik taamer aur aisay Complexes ki dekh bhaal ke liye jadeed cutting-edge technology ka istemaal kar rahay hain. unhon ney bataya ke Multi-Level parking Complexes awaami. khangi ishtiraaq se shehar bhar mein 42 muqamat par taamer kiye jayen ge
148.title: Telangana mein Multi-Level car parking ki tajweez

news_detail: Board of intermediate ny Telangana mein 404 sarkari jone yr collegeon ke talba ke liye muft uniforms ki farahmi ki tajweez rakhi hai taham reyasti hukoomat is ahem tajweez ko manzoori dena baqi hai. is se maali taur par kamzoor khandano ke bachon ko barri raahat miley gi. hukoomat pehlay hi se karporit jone yr collegeon ke khutoot par muft taleem faraham kar rahi hai. jis mein mushtarqa ahliti amthanat ke liye msabqti amthanat, qaumi ahliti o dakhla tst neet, engineering and agreeculture and medical common interance tst ki coaching ke ilawa sarkari jone yr college ke talba ke liye darsi kutub ki farahmi shaamil hai. Jaria saal Telangana hukoomat muft bas paas scheme aur taghzia bakhash dopehar ke khanay ki scheme par amal aawri kere gi. secretary Board of intermediate  Education dr ae ashok ny kaha ke Intermediatetalba ke liye muft bas paas ki scheme se sarkari khazana par salana 10 crore rupay ka boojh aed hogaavr dopehar ke khanay ki scheme par 100 crore rupay salana kharch aeye ga. unhon ny kaha ke tajaweez hukoomat ko paish kar di gayi hai aur is ki manzoori ki soorat mein schemes par Jaria taleemi saal se hi amal daraamad kya jaye ga.
164.title: Sarkari Intermediate college talba ko muft bus paas aur dopehar ka khana

news_detail: Afghanistan ke dar-al-hakoomat kabul mein Afghan antli jins agency ki imarat ke qareeb do khudkush dhmakon mein 21 afraad halaak aur 30 zakhmi hogaye. Afghan media ke mutabiq dosray dhamaka mein halaak honay walay afraad mein aik ghair mulki khabar-rasan agency ka Chief photographer bhi shaamil hai. is ke ilawa mutadid sahafion ke bhi zakhmi honay ki it-tila-aat hain. Afghan hukkaam ke mutabiq aaj subah kabul ke ilaqay Shashdark mein NDS ke daftar ke nazdeek pehla khudkush dhamaka kya gaya, logon ke jama honay par dosray khudkush bambaar ne dosra dhamaka kar diya. zaraye ka kehna hai ke dosra khudkush jaye haadsa par mojood sahafion ke majmaa mein shaamil tha, jis ke baais dosray dhamaka mein mutadid sahafi zakhmi hue hain. francesi khabar rasan agency ka cheif photo grapher jaan bahaq honay walon mein shaamil hai. Afghan wizarat sahet ne dono dhmakon mein 21 afraad ke jaan bahaq aur 30 ke zakhmi honay ki tasdeeq ki hai .
8.title: Kabul mein 2 khudkush dhamakay, sahafi sameit 21 afraad halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nehru Zoological park mein peer ke din Moheeb atishzadgi ke baais do acre khuli araazi par waqay darakht jal kar khakstar hogaye. aatish faro mehakma ke ohdedaron ke bamawajjib chndo laal baara darri fire station ke ohdedaron ne Zoo se 10:45 bajey mausula hungami ittila par aag bujhanay ke operation par lag gay they. aag ke shulon par qaboo panay ke liye amlah ko do ghantay darkaar hue. atishzadgi ke baais taqreeban do acre ilaqa par muheet darakht aur ghaas jal kar khakstar hogaye. district fire officer Hyderabad Mr. Srinivas Reddy ne bataya ke jaisay hi hamein Zoo mein aa g lag jaane ki ittila masool hui aatish faro amlah fori harkat mein agaya aur aag bujhanay ki koshisho mein jit gaya. aag par qaboo panay mein hamein is liye dushwari aa rahi thi ke taiz hawaon ke baais aag khulay ilaqa mein daur taq phelti chali jarahi thi. agarchay Fire Officers ko shuba hai ke be-tawajhi se cigrette pheink dyie jaane ke baais aag lagi hogi magar ibtidayi reports mein bataya gaya ke ho sakta hai ke Zoo ke ihata mein mojood sookhi ghaas aur deegar nakara ashya ke dhair mein aag lag jaane ke baais yeh haadsa paish aaya ho. is haadsa ke baais koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa hai .
27.title: Hyderabad Zoo ke ihata mein Moheeb atishzadgi. koi jani nuqsaan nahi

news_detail: America mein istighasa ke numaindon ne mangal ke roz bataya ke columbia se talluq rakhnay walay janwaron ke aik Doctor par manshiat ki America smuggling karne ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai. mazkoorah Doctor ne maya heroen ke pikton ko ktte ke palon ki anton mein chupaya tha. New York ke mashriqi hissa mein istighasa ke daftar ke mutabiq mulzim Andres Lopez ko mangal ke roz broklin ki wifaqi adalat mein talabb kya gaya jahan is par heroen America laane aur taqseem karne ke hawala se ilzamaat aed kiye gay. akhbaari reporton ke mutabiq 38 sala lopiz ka kehna hai ke woh be qasoor hai. istighasa ke zaraye ke mutabiq qasoor waar thehraye jaane ki soorat mein columbia ke Doctor ko Umar qaid ki saza ka saamna ho ga. zaraye ka kehna hai ke is baat ka bhi shuba hai ke lopiz 10 baras se ziyada arsa se America manshiat laane ki saazish mein shareek hai. istighasa ke mutabiq lopiz huspania mein girftar sun-hwa tha jis ke baad usay malik badar kar ke America bheja gaya
40.title: America : Coumbian Doctor par kutton ki antadiyon mein manshiat smuggle karne ka ilzaam

news_detail: Angrezi news channel ripblikn TV editor Arnab Goswami ka tanazuath ke sath choli daman ka sath raha hai. ab aik martaba phir woh charchay mein aeye hain. is martaba police ne khudkushi case mein un ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya hai. Maharashtra ke Raigarh mein Ali Bagh mein muqadma darj kya gaya hai jis mein teen afraad Bashmole Arnab Goswami shaamil hain. Interior DesignerAnwy Naik ki khudkushi ke baad dastyab hone walay khudkushi note ki bunyaad par, police ne IPC ki dafaa 306 ke tehat muqadma darj kya hai. police case ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq, Interior Designer Anwy Naik ( 53 ) ne hafta ke roz Ali baagh mein –apne ghar mein khudkushi karli thi. un ki laash ke paas un ki maa kamood Nair ((78  ki laash bhi bar aamad hui thi. Interior Designerki laash ke qareeb aik khudkush note mil gaya. is ke baad, Anwy ki biwi ne police mein Arnabsameit teen mulzimaan ko shikayat ki. shikayat kanandah ka ilzaam hai ke is ke shohar ki interior designing company hai. woh is company ke zareya architect designer aur engineering ka is company ke zareya kya karte they. unhon ne Arnab Goswami ke liye bhi kaam kya. moahida ke mutabiq, woh raqam jo inhen haasil hona chahiye thi woh ada nahi ki gayi. jab inhen pesha nahi mila tou maa aur betay depration mein aagaye.

yeh ilzaam lagaya gaya hai ke is wajah se dono ne khudkushi karli. Additional Suprintendent of police ( raye garh ) snje patel ne bataya ke Ali Bagh ke KabeerJung ilaqa se un dono ki lashain bar aamad hui theen. khudkushi note mein jin teen logon ke naam hain un ke khilaaf case darj karliya gaya hai. Naik ko un ke kaam ka paisa nahi milnay ka ilzaam hai .
61.title: Interior Designer Anwy Naik ki khudkushi. Arnab Goswami ke khilaaf muqadma darj

news_detail: Dimashq . Iran ke sath nyoklyir moahida ki tanseekh ke Amrici saddar trmp ke elaan ke chand ghanton ke andar hi Israel neh Dimashq ke junoob mein waqay aik fouji adda par hamla kardiya jis ko Irani afwaj istemaal kya karti thi. is hamla ke nateeja mein 9 Irani fouji halaak hogaye aur Irani afwaj ko bhaari nuqsaan pouncha. reports ke mutabiq Israeli Fighterr Jets Shaam ki fazai hudood mein daakhil hotay hue Irani Missiles ko tabah kardiya jis ke barey mein Israel ka daawa hai ke woh Israel par daage jaanay walay they. Israeli afwaj ka kehna hai ke is neh mehsoos kya ke Shaam mein Irani afwaj ghair mamooli harkat kar rahi hai aur se yaqeen tha ke Irani afwaj fori Israeli afwaj ke khilaaf intiqami karwai karne wali hai. Shaam ke sarkari media ka kehna hai ke Israel neh dar-al-hakoomat Dimashq mein aik fouji adda par fazai hamla kardiya. saddar bsharalasd ki haami afwaj mein Shaamil aik commander neh Bartanwi khabar Rasan agency Riter ko bataya ke un hamlon mein Shami fouj ke aik markaz ko nishana banaya gaya. Bartania mein qaim haqooq insani tanzeem Syrian Observatory Group ka kehna hai ke is hamla mein fouji dpo ko nishana banaya gaya hai jis mein kam azkam 15 log halaak hogaye hain jin mein 9 Irani fouji bhi hain. Shaam ki sarkari khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq marnay walon mein do shehri bhi Shaamil hain. Bartanwi akhbar daily mil ka kehna hai ke Dimashq mein Irani fazai adda par kiye gaye hamla mein 9 Irani fouji halaak hue hain
80.title: Dimashq mein Irani fouji adda par Israel ka fazai hamla. 15 halaak

news_detail: New Delhi. Anti Corruption Bureau( ACB ) ny aaj cheif mnstr Delhi mister Arvind Kejriwalke mutwafi brother nisbati Surendra Kumar wo Bansall ke farzand Vinay Bansal ko public works department ( pi w d ) ke road and severe works mein mobayyana be qaadgyon ke silsila mein girftar karliya hai. Vinay Bansal –apne waalid ki company’ Renu Construction’ mein partners they, jo mobayyana scam mein mulawis thi. ACB ki janib se Kejriwalaur deegar ke khilaaf 8 May 2017 ko darj kardah teen FIRs ke mutabiq road and severe construction project ke liye Surendra Kumar Bansal ki company’ Renu Construction’ ko aik tender ataa karne mein aqarba parwari ka muzahira kiya gaya. shikayat kanandah baani NGO Roads Anticorruption Organization ( RACO ) Rahul sharma ny ilzaam aed kya ke takhmini laagat 4, 90, 000 se 46 feesad kam sharah par tender hawala kya gaya hai. yeh bhi ilzaam aed kya gaya ke injaam day ye gaye kaam ka miyaar naaqis tha. Delhi Police ny bayan kya ke mahadev company se mutaliq jis se un ki company ny khaam maal kharidne ka dawa kya hai, pooch taach ke douran mulzim ki janib se ghair itminan bakhash jawabaat ki bunyaad par giraftari amal mein layi gayi. tahaqeeq ke douran yeh pata chala hai ke mahadev Nami company ka wujood hi nahi hai, taham Delhi hukoomat ny is girftari ko siyasi intiqam ka nateeja qarar diya aur id-daa kya ke Bansal ki firm ki janib se injaam dyie gaye kaam ko Sri Ram Labs ny clean chit di thi. ACB ny hi is lab ko kaam ke miyaar ka pata chalanay ki hadaayat di thi. tameeri kaam ki teesray fareeq ki janib se jaanch Indian Institute of Technology Rurki ney ki thi.
95.title: Arvind Kejriwal ka bhatija girftar

news_detail: Nairobi. Kenyan town mein hafton shadeed barish ke baais aik Dam ke toot janay se zabardast tabahi mach gayi aur darjanon hlaktin hogyin. muqami tally vision ny bataya ke ta haal 20 lashain bar aamad ki gayeen. Nairobi ke shumal maghrib mein 190 kilomitr ke faasla par Nakuru county mein Solai mein waqay Dam chaharshanba ko beh gaya. governor Nakuru Mr. lee Kin Yajui ny aik bayan mein kaha ke Dam toot janay se beh janay walay pani se jaan o maal ko zabardast nuqsaan pouncha hai. nuqsanaat ka hunooz takhmeenah nahi kya gaya hai. aik khangi tally vision channel ke tea an news ny kaha ke maqam haadsa se ta haal 20 lashain bar aamad ki gayi hain. kenya red cross ny –apne twitter payam mein kaha ke is ny abhi taq 39 logon ko bachaaya hai. Kenya mein mashriqi Africa mein deegar mumalik ki terhan guzashta do mah se shadeed barish horahee hai. Kenya hukoomat ny chaharshanba ko bataya ke barish se March se ab taq 32 mumalik mein 132 afraad ki amwaat hogayi aur 2, 22, 456 log be ghar hogaye
108.title: Kenyan Dam toot gaya, zabardast tabahi

news_detail: Nigeria ki hukoomat aur Sudan ki police ke aalanat ke mutabiq sodani dar-al-hakoomat Khartoum mein Nigeria ke aik sifaratkaaar ke ghar se aas ki laash bar aamad hui hai. muqami media ka kehna hai ke mazkoorah sifaratkaar ko gala kaat kar mout ke ghaat utaara gaya. sodani police ney jumaraat ke roz jari bayan mein kaha hai ke ibtidayi tehqiqaat se zahir hota hai ke yeh aik mujremana karwai ka nateeja hai aur is waqea ki koi siyasi wajah nahi hai. police ney dehshat grdanh karwai ke imkanaat ko mustard kardiya. Nigeria ki umoor kharja ki wizarat ney sifaratkaar Habibu Almu ki mout ki tasdeeq ki hai. sodani police ney qatal ke pas parda muharikaat ka pata chalanay tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Almu, Khartoum mein Nigerian Mission mein emigration atachi they. doosri janib khabron se mutaliq web siton ka kehna hai ke nayjirin sifaratkaar ko chure se hamla ka nishana banaya gaya taham sodani police aur Nigeria ki hukoomat ney is ki tasdeeq nahi ki. Nigeria ki wifaqi hukoomat ney is qatal ki sakht muzammat ki. Sudan ney usay badbakhtana waqea qarar diya. yaad rahay ke aik baras ke andar Sudan mein murda paaya jaany wala yeh dosra sifaratkaar hai. is se qabal augst 2017 hamza mein Sudan mein roosi safeer Mirgayas Shrinisky bhi apni rahaish gaah ke swimming pol mein murda paye gaye they. moscow ka kehna tha ke safeer ki mout dil ka dora parney se hui. security zaraye ney bataya ke Khartoum mein Nigeria ke consul general ko qatal kar diya gaya hai
128.title: Khartoum mein Nigeria ke sifaratkaar ki laash baraamad

news_detail: Aurangabad. Aurangabad mein jummay ki shab pani ke connection par do firqoun ke darmyaann hue tassadum mein 2 afraad halaak hogaye hain. police ney kaha ke hajhoom ke tashadud mein 50 dukanaat aur gariyon ko Nazar aatish kardiya gaya. police ney tashadud par qaboo panay fayrng ka hukum day diya hai avrmtasrh ilaqon mein curfew naafiz kardiya gaya hai. Aurangabadpolice commissionaire ney Mr. Milind Bharambay ney kaha ke halaat ko qaboo mein karliya gaya hai. hum ney shehar mein fouj daari qaida ki dafaa 144 ko nafiz kardiya gaya hai. unhon ney awam se bahaali aman mein police ka taawun karne ki appeal ki hai. unhon ney kaha ke awam se unhon ney kaha ke be qaboo nah ho chunkay aman o zabt ko bigaarnay walon se police nmte gi. gzri shab mein hue tashadud mein kayi police walay bhi zakhmi hogaye hain. police ney bataya ke shehar ke Moti karanjaiah ilaqa mein tashadud is waqt bharak utha jab baldia ney ghair majaz null connection ke khilaaf muhim shuru ki. baldi ohdedar aik mazhabi maqam ke ghair majaz null connection ko masdood kar rahay they tab muzahireen ney un se mutalba kya ke woh isi terhan dosray mazhab ke muqaddas maqam ke ghair majaz null connection ko bhi barkhast kardey. hakkaam ney un ki shikayat par pehal karte hue dosray maqam ki simt barh gaye, jis ke baais dono garohoon mein tassadum hogaya. dono garohoon mein raat 10 : 00 ke waqt par pehla tassadum sun-hwa, kuch hi der mein shehar ke deegar maqamat taq phail gaya. mmlkti wazeer e dakhla Mr. Deepak Kasarkar ney tashadud mein 2 afraad ki halakat ki toseeq kar di hai. hajhoom ney jab dukanaat ko aag lgani shuru ki thi is ki zad mein aakar aik mazoor shakhs halaak hogaya jabkay dosra police fayrng mein halaak hogaya. unhon ney bataya ke Jalna aur deegar maqamat se izafi police force Aurangabadko rawana kar di gayi hai. tashadud saaray shehar mein phail janey ki wajah se awaami amlaak ko bhi nuqsaan pouncha hai .

siyasi halaat par nazar rakhnay walon ko shuba hai ke Karnataka mein raye dahi ke paish e nazar Aurangabadmein aik mamooli waqea par tashadud ko bhadkaay janey ke imkanaat ko nazar andaaz nahi kiya ja sakta kyunkay aksar yeh dekha gaya hai ke malik ke kisi bhi hissa mein firqa warana noiyat ki gur barr hoti hai to is soorat mein intikhabi amal par bhi aik hadd taq asar padsakta hai.
155.title: Aurangabadmein firqa warana tassadum, do halaak. kahin Karnataka intikhabaat ke paish e nazar tashadud ko to bhadhkaya nahi gaya?

news_detail: Berlin . Germany ki aik sharaab saaz company nay bil akhir Beerki botalon ke is stock ko markt se wapas le lainay ka elaan kardiya jin ke dhakanon par Kalima Tayyaba print kya gaya tha. Germany ki sharaab saazi company ki janib se aalmi football Tournament ke paish e nazar beer ki botalon ke dhakanon par Tournament mein hissa lainay wali 32 aalmi teamon ke qaumi prchmon ko print karte hue apni marketing ka elaan karte hue markt mein naya stock bhaij diya tha. un 32 teamon mein Saudi Arabia ki team bhi shaamil hai jis ke qaumi parcham par Kalima Tayyaba hai. junoob maghribi Germany ke shehar mean hem mein waqay aik sharaab ki company’ Eichbaum Brewery’ nay aalmi football Tournament ko mananay Tournament mein hissa lainay walay 32 mumalik ke prchmon ko beer ki botalon ke dhakanon par print kya hai. Beerki botalon ke dhakkan par Saudi Arabia ke parcham ko shaamil karne se soshil media par shadeed aitraaz kya gaya hai aur company ke is amal ki purzor muzammat ki gayi hai. soshil media sarfeen nay yeh bayan kya ke aik alcohalic sharaab ki bottle par islami kalma ko jo Saudi Arabia ke qaumi parcham ka jazo bhi chapna munasib nahi hai. islam mein sharaab haraam hai jis ki wajah se Saudi Arabia mein is par amtnaa aed hai aur duniya ke mukhtalif hisson mein rehne walay musalman, sharaab peenay se parhaiz karte hain. muqami police aur athartiz se mushawarat ke baad Eichbaum company nay Facebook par jari kardah –apne aik post mein kaha ke company nay World Cup Bottle Caps ki tayari rokkk di hai aur stores se Saudi Arabia ke parcham wali botelain wapas talabb kar lanay par kaam kar rahi hai. yeh iqdaam mazeed tauheen se ijtinab ke tor par kya ja raha hai. Eichbaum nay ibtida mein tanaza ki yaksoi ke liye –apne Facebook page par musalmanoon ke liye aik payam bhi post kya tha jis mein kaha gaya tha ke company yaqeenan –apne brands par mazhabi o siyasi tbsron mein dilchaspi nahi rakhti. agar hum nay ghair danista tor par aap ki dil shikni ki hai to hum sanjeedgi ke sath moazrat khuwa hain. company nay yeh bhi kaha tha ke usay pata nahi tha ke Saudi Arabia ke parcham mein islami kalma darj hai. is post par jab bohat ziyada comments anay lagen to is post ko barkhast kardiya gyatahm is mauzo par mubahis shuru hogaye aur is sharaab ki company ke Facebook page ki maqboliat ghatney lagi. kayi logon nay apni aaraa mein kaha ke mehez sharaab baichnay Eichbaum company ka’ tauheen islam’ ka yeh oocha harba hai. Germany ke dar-al-hakoomat Berlin mein Saudi Arabia ke sifarat khanah nay bhi Germany ki is company ki muzammat ki hai.
167.title: Beer ki botalon ke caps par’ Kalima Tayyaba ‘. stock wapas le lainay company ka elaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ibrahimpatnam town mein peer ki subah aik school Bus ney daidh sala ladki ko mobayyana taur par rond dala. Ladki ki shanakht Prabhika ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Yeh sheer-khawar bachi apni maa ke sath apne bhai ko school chodne aayi hui thi. Maa jab apne bachay ko school Bus mein sawaar karne mein masroof thi ke bachi Bus ke neechay chali gayi aur driver ney yeh mehsoos kiye baghair ke bachi Bus ke neechay hai gaadi is par chada di. Mutawafiah ke rishta daaron ney ilzaam aed kya ke school Bus, baghair muawin amlah ke chalayee jarahi thi. Laash ko autopsy ke liye sarkari hospital muntaqil kya gaya. Police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya.
1.title: Bus ney daidh sala bachi ko rond dala

news_detail: Hyderabad. Akhirkaar sarkari mulazimaton mein taqrrurat aur taleem mein 95 feesad tahaffuzaat muqami umeedwaron ke liye aur 5 feesad khulay zumra mein rakhney Riyasati Hukumat ki tajweez bahut jald haqeeqat mein tabdeel honay wali hai. Ghair munqasim Andhra Pradesh mein 43 baras tak laagu rehne walay qadeem Presidential Order ki jagah naya Presidential Order androon do yaum le le ga. Chief Minister  Telangana Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao, Wazeer e Azam Mr.  Narendra Modi ko zonal system ki ifadiyat ke baaray mein qaayel krwane mein kamyaab hogaye jis par tamam sathon par mubahis ke baad nazar e saani ki gayi hai. Naya zonal system, Sadar Jamhooria Hind ki manzoori ke baad laagu hojaye ga. Iss se sarkari Jobs aur sarkari mulazmeen ke tabadlon mein shfafit ko yaqni banaya jasakay ga. Alahda Telangana riyasat ki tehreek mein muqami logon ko Jobs ki farahmi aik kalidi mauzou tha. Naye zonal system ka maqsad ghair munqasim riyasat mein zair e tameel nizaam ki tamam khamion ko daur karna hai. Telangana mein azlaa ki tadaad ko 11 se badha kar 31 karte hue revenue admnstrishn ki tanzeem jadeed ke baad is ki zaroorat mehsoos ki gayi. mujawaza naye zonal system ko Sadar e Jamhooria Hind ki manzoori ke liye markaz ko rawana karne se qabl Cabinet ne manzoori di thi. is saaray amal ki shakhsi nigrani Chief Minister ne khud ki thi aur Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se mulaqaat ke mauqa par unhen muqami logon ko 95 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi ki zaroorat ke baaray mein samjha ya tha. Naye zonal system ke mutabiq Telangana mein 31 naye azlaa par mushtamil 7 Zones aur 2 Multi Zones waza kiye gay hain.
18.title: Jobs aur Education ke liye naya Telangana Zonal System

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kerala main sailaab ke mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye Jamat e Islami Telangana & Odisha ki janib se Relief Fund qaayim karte hue Crore ha rupay ki imdaad rawana karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Ameer Jamat Islami halqa Telangana o Odisha Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke Jamat ke headquarters waqay lakadkot main imdaad ki vasuli ka aik camp qaayim kiya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Kerala ka haliya sailaab sadi ka bad tareen sailaab tha jis ney Kerala ki mayeeshat ko tabah karkay rakh diya. Sailaab ke baayis taqreeban 20 hazaar Crore rupay ke nuqsanaat ka andaza lagaya gaya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Peoples Foundation, Jamat e Islami Hind halqa Telangana o Odisha aur is ki zaili tanzeemen jaisay ARW, SIO, GIO, IYM, MPJ waghera raahat kaari ke kamon mein apne hazaron volunteers e sath din raat masroof hain. Doctors ki tanzeem DARE se wabasta Doctors ki aik team Kerala pahonch chuki hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Kerala mein fauri raahat ke taur par khaney ke packet, peeney ka saaf pani, bartan, kapdey aur chadaren, bistar, School Kits aur adwiyaat waghera ki sakht zaroorat hai jabkay dosray marhala mein makanaat ki marammat, Shelters ki taamer karna hoga. Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney bataya ke Kerala aik taksiri  riyasat hai jahan mukhtalif aqaayed ke log sheer o shakar ki terha mil jul kar rehtay hain, aaj wahan sailaab o tughyani ke baayis zabardast tabahi machi hui hai. Museebat ki inn ghadion mein hum sab ka fareeza hai ke un ki madad ke liye agay ayen aur be ghar hojane walon ko sahara faraham karen. Unhon ney kaha ke Jamat e Islami isi jazba insani ke tahet Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ke liye fund jama karne ka mansoobah baneya hai. Jamat e Islami apne kaarkunon aur aam logon se imdaad haasil keregi aur jo kuch bhi yahan jama kiya jaye ga Jamat e  Islami ke ohdedar, Kerala pahonch kar apne hathon se bah nafs e nafees taqseem karenge. Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney baaz firqa parast taqaton ki janib se Kerala ki imdaad na karne ki tajweez ko nafrat par mabni qarar dete hue usay mustarad kar diya aur kaha ke yeh kehna ke Kerala ke log chunkay gosht-khor hain is liye un par yeh museebat aan padi hai tohmat parasti hai. Agar aysa hi hota to Uttaranchal  mein jo sailaab aaya tha is mein woh log kyun bahe gaye jo yatri thae aur sabzi Khor thae janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney sab se appeal ki ke woh frakhdilanh atiyaat den. Jamat e  Islami ke sadar daftar waqay lakadkot ya apne apne ilaaqon mein waqay Jamat ke dafatir par ruqomat ataa kar saktay thae. Iss mouqe par Janab Mohammad Azhar aur Janab M. N.Baog  aur dosray maujood thae.
38.title: Kerala ke mutasireen sailaab ke liye Jamat e Islami fund jama karey gi

news_detail: Srinagar: Indian Army ney Mejor Leetul Gogoi ka Court Marshal General karney ki tayyari karli hai jo Srinagar ki aik hotel mein aik kam umar Kasmiri ladki ke sath qabil e aitraaz haalat mein paye gaye thae jinhein muqami logon ney hotel ke kamrah mein aik ladki ke sath pakad liya tha. Brigadier  ke zair qayadat Court of Inquiry ney inhen baadi-un-nazar mein hotel mein aik kam umar ladki ke sath paye janey ka qusoorwaar paaya hai. Fouji Court of Inquiry ney Srinagar ke aik hotel se naujawan ladki ke sath girftar honay walay Bharati Major Leetul Gogoi  qusoorwaar qarar dae kar is ke khilaaf karwai ka hukum diya hai. Media ke mutabiq Army Court of Inquiry ney Major Leetul Gogoi ko Srinagar Hotel case mein mujrim qarar dae diya hai. Fouji adalat ney Major Gogoi ki fouji nazam o zabt ki khilaaf warzi par Army Act ke tahet karwaayi ka hukum diya hai. Fouji Adalat ney apney faisla mein kaha ke Major Gogoi ney muqami afraad ke sath kisi bhi qisam ka rishta qaayim karney se mutaliq hidayat ki khilaaf warzi ki aur woh hirasat ke waqt apni Duty ke muqam se door paye gaye thae jab ke ilaqa mein fouji operation bhi jari tha. Yeh nazam o zabt ki sangeen khilaaf warzi hai. Mahireen ka kahena hai ke Adalat ke hukum par Fouj ke hukkaam Major Leetul Gogoi ke khilaaf saza ka taayun kar saktay hain jis mein inhen mulazimat se jabri retire bhi kiya ja sakta hai ya phir Court Marshal bhi kiya ja sakta hai. Rawan saal 30

May ko Major Gogoi Srinagar ki aik Hotel mein naujawan ladki ke hamrah paye gaye thae jis par muqami afraad ney hotel ka gherao kar liya tha taham SP shumali Srinagar ney mudakhilat karte hue muzahireen ko muntashir kar ke major Gogoi aur ladki ko hirasat mein le liya tha. Baad-azan Major Gogi ko un ke unit ke hawale kardiya gaya tha jahan un ka trial kiya gaya. Wazeh rahay ke Major Leetul Gogoi Kashmir mein Bharati Fouj ke dasta Rashtrya Rifle ki 53

Battalion (Punjab Regiment) ke mutanazia tareen fouji afsar hain. Major Gogoi ney guzashta baras April mein aik Kasmiri naujawan ko apni jeep se bandh kar insani dhaal banaya tha. Is qabeeh feal ki aalami satah par muzammat ki gayi thi taham Fouj ney un ke is feal par kisi qisam ki tadeebi karwai nahi ki thi. Tadeebi action lainay ke bajaye Major Gogi ko fouji aizaz se nawaza tha. Fouji zaraye ney aaj bataya ke Mejor Gogoi ke khilaaf tadeebi karwai ke ahkaam jari kiye ja chukay hain.
52.title: Srinagar hotel case, Gogoi baadi un nazar mein qasoor waar

news_detail: Hyderabad- Maharashtra, Chattisgarh aur Telangana ki khususi Police teams ne aaj mushtraka taur par maaroof Huqooq e Insaani Jahedkar wo APCLP leader Prof. Vara Vara Rao aur un ki dukhtar aur deegar ki rihayeshgahon par chaape mare- Yeh chaape Pune Police ki jaanib se darj kardah ek muqadama ke silsile mein kiye gaye hain jis mein Pune Police ne id-dia kiya tha ke uss ne Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ko halak karne Dalit qayedeen aur Maoist ki ek saazish ko benaqaab kiya hai- Pune Police ne muqaami Adalat ko guzishta June mein waaqif karwaya tha ke usae Bhimakore Gaon tashadud muqadama k eek mulzim Delhi ke ek jahedkaar Rona Jacob Wilson ki Computer mein ek maktoob dastyaab huva tha, Comrade Prakash ke mausuma is maktoob Modi ki zair e qayadat BJP ki 15 riyasaton mein kamyaabi par tashweesh ka izhaar kiya gaya tha aur 8 crores maaliyat ke aslaha wo gola barood ke husool ka zikar kiya gaya tha, Police ne id-dia kiya ke iss maktoob mein is baat ka izhaar kiya gaya ke “hum Rajiv Gandhi nauwiat k eek aur waaqia ke khutoot par gaur kar rahe hain.’’ Maktoob mein mazeed kaha gaya ke “ un ke (Modi) Road Show ko nishana banana maussir hikmat e amali ho sakti hai.’’ Bataya Jata hai ke Pune Police ke tafteeshi ohdedaaron ne Jacob Wilson ke zabt shuda laptop se ikattha kardah data se mazeed ahem maalumaat jama ki hain aur iss saazish mein maali muawinat karne walon ke naamon ka bhi pata chalaya hai. Pune aur Chattisgarh ki Police ne Telangana ki Task Force Police ke hamrah Search Warrant ke saath Prof. Vara Vara Rao ke Gandhi Nagar apartment mein tlashi li hai- Aisi hi talashi karrawaai bayak waqt Prof. Vara Vara Rao ki dukhtar ki rihayeshgah, IEFL k eek Professor ki rihayeshgah waqae Nagole aur do sihaafion ki rihayeshgah aur APCLC ke do hamdardon ki rihayeshgahon par bhi ki gai. Samjha jata hai ke Pune aur Chattisgarh ki Police ne Prof. Vara Vara Rao par Maoist ke liye maalia ikattaha karne ka shuba kar rahi hai take Modi ko halak karne ki saazish ko amali jaama pahenaya jaasake. Bataya jata hai ke chapa maarte huve Police ne unn ke gahr ki tamaam telephones ko apne qabze mein leliya take wo bahar kisi se raabita qaayim na kar saken. Yeh bhi maaloom huva hai ke Prof Vara Vara Rao ko naamaaloom muqaam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai jabke un ki rihayeshgah par Police ki taftishi karrawai jaari hai. Samjha jata hai ke Porf Vara Vara Rao ko Pune ki Adalat mein paish kiya jaayega jahan yeh muqamma zair e dauraan hai. Maaloom huva hai ke Chattisgarh Police ne bhi Maoists ke khilaaf darj muqadammat mein Prof Vara Vara Rao ko maakhooz ki hai. Prof Vara Vara Rao ke khilaf karrawai par Huqooq e Insaani ke Jahedkaaron ne sakht tashweesh ka izhaar karte huve is ki muzammat ki hai.
67.title: Prof Vara Vara Rao giraftar? Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish ka shaaksaana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Huqooq e Insani ke maaroof Jahedkaar wo inquilabi shaier wo qaayed Andhra Paradesh Civil Liberties Committee Parof Varavara Rao, un ke damaad Mr. K. V. Kurmanath Staff Reporter the Hindu aur Mr. Karanti Tekula Staff Reporter Namaste Telangana ko Pune muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Pune Police ne Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Mr. Devendra Fadnavis ke qatal ki saazish ke aik muqadama mein aaj subah Parof Varavara Rao ko giraftar kiya tha. Pune Police ke saath Chattisgarh aur Hyderabad Police ne bhi subha ke dhaavon mein hissa liya tha. In teenon ko hirasat mein lene ke baad unhen dawakeana le jaya gaya aur un ki sahet ki janch karney kae baad Nampally Criminal Court men pesh krtay hoe’ay anhen tranzt warrantt par Pune lay jaea jarha hai. bataya jata hai ke Professor Varavara Raoke aek aor damad Professor ke steh narae’nh Professor anglsh aend farn lengoejs yoneorste (aeflo) ke ghr par bhe chhaph mara gea tha. aaj sbh Professor Varavara Raoke rhae’sh gah oaqa gandhe ngr، aarte se choraha ، msheraabad par mharashtraaor chhtes grrh ke Police ne tlnganh Police ke taaon say dhaoa krtay hoe’ay anhen hrast men lay lea tha. ase trh Mr. krma nath aor Mr. krante ke ghron par bhe dhaoay krtay hoe’ay anhen hrast men lay lea gea tha. Pune Police ne aaj sham anhen nample Criminal Court men pesh krtay hoe’ay tranzit warrantt par Pune le kar chale ge’e. Bataya jata hai ke Pune Police ne unhen Wazir e Azam Narendra Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish ke muqadama men giraftar kiya hai. Yad rahe ke Pune Police ne mah June men Pune ki muqami adalt ko bataya tha ke Bhima Kore Gaon tasahdud muqadama ke aek mulzim Delhi ke aik jahedkaar Rona Jacob Wilson ke Computer mein aik maktoob dastyaab huva tha .Police ke mutabiq Comrade Prakash ke mausumah iss maktoob mein Modi ke zair e qayadat  BJP ke 15 riyasaton men kaamyaabi par tashwish ka izhaar kiya gaya tha aur 8 crore rupay maliyat ka aslah o gola barood ke husool ka zikar kiya gaya tha. Police ne Id-diya kiya ke iss maktoob mein iss baat ka izhaar kiya gaya ke hum Rajiv Gandhi nauwiat ke aek aur waqia ke khutoot par ghaur kar rahe hain. Mktoob mein mazeed kaha gaya ke Modi ke road show ko nishanah bnana muassir hikmat e amli ho sakti hai. Bataya jata hai ke Pune Police ne iss muqadama mein Professor Varavara Rao ko giraftar kiya hai. Samjha jata hai ke Pune Police ne yeh ilzam aayed kiya ke woh iss saazish ko amali jamah pahnane maalia ki farahami mein role ada kiya hai. Professor Varavara Rao ke wakeel Mr. Raghunath ne bataya ke Pune Police ne Nampally Criminal Court men un ke moukkil ko pesh kartay hoe’ay unhen Pune muntaqil karne ki ijazat haasil ki hai. Unhon ne kaha ke muqami adalat koProfessor Varavara Rao par ilzamaat ke baray mein ziyada nahin bataya balke sirf yeh bataya gaya ke Professor aek muqadama mein Maharashtra Police ko matloob hai.
84.title: Varavara Rao sameit do sihafi Pune muntaqil

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh N.T. Rama Rao ke farzand adakaar wo sabiq Rukn e Rajya Sabha Mr. Hari Krishna ki aaj subha ek indohnaak sadak haadisa mein maut waqai hogai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu ke brother nisbati Hari Krishna Kavali Zilla Nellore mein shaadi ki ek taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye jaa rahe thae ke aaj subha Nalgonda shahrah par un ki car haadisa ka shikaar hogai. Police ke ek ohdedaar ne bataya ke 62 saala sabiq Rukn Parliament ek gaadi ko overtake karne ki koshish ki jis ke baayes yeh haadisha pesh aaya, un ki gaadi Road Divider se takrakar hawa mein ghota khaai aur sadak ke dusri simt jaa giri, gaadi ne unhen hawam mein uchaal diya tha. Wo sadak ke kinare khoon mein lut put pade paaye gai. Wo gaadi khud chala rahe thae. Unehn Kamineni Hospital Narkatpally muntaqil kiya gaya jahan unhon ne aakhri saans li- Duty Meidical Officer Ameer Khan ne bataya ke un ki sar par gaheri chooten lagi thein, hamein shuba hai ke unhen internal bleeding bhi huvi hai, taham abhi maut ki asal wajah ka pata chalana hai. Hari Krsihna ke do farzan Kalyan Ram aur Tarak Rama Rao @ Junior NTR bhi Telugu films ke maarof adakaar hain. Woh apne waalid se be inteha lagaoo rakhte thae. NTR ki Rath Yatra mein woh khud gaadi chalate thae. Taham unhon ne apne waalid ke Laxmi Paravati se dusri shaadi kar lene par naakhush thae aur jab N. Chandra Babu Naidu ne apne khusar ke khilaaf baghawat ki to Hari Krishna ne apne waalid ke khilaf apne bahenwayi ka saath diya. Wo Chandra Babu Naidu ki cabinet mein Wazeer bhi rah chuke thae. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar ne is haadisa par apne gahere taasuf ka izhaar kiya.
102.title: NTR ke farzand Hari Krishna ki sadak haadisa meein maut

news_detail: Bengaluru mein aik afasoosnaak vaqiya mein aik Bete ne apne baap ki aankh hee noch daali. Behen ko jaayedaad mein hissa na dene ke masale par baap bete mein bahes ke dauraan 40 saala naujawaan ne tayesh mein aakar waalid ki aankh nikaal liye. Mulzim Abhishek Chetan chahata tha ke waalid Parameshvar shaher ke JP Nagar ilaaqa mein taameer makaan us ke naam kar dein jabke Parameshvar ki khawhish thi ki makaan donon bachchon mein taqaseem kar diya jaaye lekin beta is par taiyaar nahin huwa. Ye jaayedaad Parameshvar aur unki ahliya ke naam par hai. Parameshvar ki ahaliya aik maah qabal hi guzar gayi thi. Police ke mutaabiq makaan ki taqseem ke masle par baap bete ke maabain takaraar shuroo ho gayi aur isi dauraan Abhishek ne jhapat kar waalid ki aankh nikaal dali aur unhen zakhmi haalat mein chhodakar faraar ho gaya. Ahil-e-khaana ne Parameshvar ko zakhami haalat mein Hospital mein daakhil karaya jahaan un ki haalat tasalli bakhsh hai. Taaham Doctor Parameshvar ki aankh bachaane mein naakaam rahe aur baap apni aankh se maharoom ho gaya. Police ne bataaya ki jaayedaad ke masle par baap bete mein aksar tanaaza hua karata tha. Abhishek ne na sirf baap ki aankh nikaal dali balke woh jaan se maarane ki dhamkhiyaan bhi diya karata tha. Police ne vaaqiya ki report darj kar ke mulzim ki giraftari ki karwayi shuro kar di. Police ke mutaabiq Abhishek nashe ka aadi hai aur uss ke paas amadani ka koyi khaas zariya nahi hai.
144.title: Bete ne Baap ki aankh noch daali

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk bhar ke 5 huqooq e insa ani jahed kaaron aur danishavaron bashamool Proffesor Varavara  Rao ki Pune Police ki janib se sangeen ilzamaat ke tahet giraftari ke khilaaf ehatejaaj ke liye aaj Tankbund par mujassima Ambedakar ke paas jama hone vale mukhtalif samaji tanzeemon wo sayasi partyoon ke qayedeen aur jahed kaaron ko Police ne hirasat mein le liya tha. In ehitejajiyon ko mukhtalif Police Stations mein rakha gaya tha taham shaam 5:00 baje unhen riha kar diya gaya. Yaad rahe ki kal Pune Police ne shaher Hyderabad mein chape marate huwe namavar inqilabi shayar o mufakkir Proffesor Varavara Rao aur do sshafiyon ko jin mein un ke ek damaad bhi shamil hain, giraftar kar liya tha aur Nampally Cirminal Court mein pesh karate huwe unhen transit warrant par Pune lekar chalee gayi thi. In jahed kaaron ko agarche jariya saal 1

January ko Kore Bhima Gaoun mein dalits aur aala zaat ke afarad ke mabain tasadum ke ek case mein maskhoz kiya gaya magar Pune Police ka id-dia hai ke yeh jahedakaar Wazeer e Aazam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Devendra Fadnavis ko qatal karane ki sazish rach rahe theh jiske liye who mukhtalif Colloges se karakunon ko bharti kar rahe theh. Proffesar Varavara Rao aur digar 2 sahafiyon samet Mulk ke digar 4 jahed kaaron ki giraftari ke khilaaf Communist Parties aur unki mulhiqa tanzimon se vabasta qayideen, mukhtalif samaji tanzimon se wabasta qaiydeen aur mufakkireen aaj ehatijaaj karane Tankbund par mujassima Ambedakar ke pass jama huwe theh taham 200-250 muzahireen ko Police ne giraftar karte huwe mukhtalif Police Stations jaise Abids, Nampally, Begam Bazar, Bolaram, Gandhi Nagar, Mushirabad vagaira ko muntaqil kiya. Giraftar shudagaan mein Mrs. Moulana Naseeruddin, Janab Nizamuddin aur Khalida Praveen, Sabiha Praveen, Gulam Yazdani, Lalita, Tanveer Fatima, Achuta Rama Rao, Geeta, Swapna, Madhu, Shweta , Kaneez Fatima aur digar shamil hain. In tamaam ko shaam 5:00 baje riha kar diya gaya. Darsgah Jihaad-o-shahadat ke qaiydin Masaraz Salahuddin Affan sectary, Mohamnmed Bin Omer, Muhammad Shahab aur Abdulrazak ne giraftar shudagaan se Police stations mein mulaqaat karate hue unse izahar yagaanagat kiya.
160.title: Jahed kaaron ki giraftari ke khilaaf ehtejaaj, samaji karkun giraftar orihaa

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ne aaj ye kahte huwe ki ikhatelaf e raay, jamuhriyat ke liye ‘Safety Valve’ hai, hidayat di ki Bhima Koregaoun case mein giraftar tamaam 5 karkunon ko 6
September tak ghar par nazarband rakha jaaye. Ab ye panch jahed kaar shayar o mufakkir Proffesar Varavara Rao Jahadakar Sudha Bhardwaj, Arun phareria, Gautam Nablakha aur Varun Gonzalveez 6

September tak jail nahi bheje jainge balki Police ki nigrani mein ghar par nazaraband rahenge. Adalat e Uzama ne Maharashtra Police se un jahed kaaron ko Bhima Koregaoun vaqiya ke 9 mah baad giraftar kiye jane par istefasar kiya. Chief Justice of India Mr. Justice Deepak Misra par mushtamil Bench ne kaha ikhetilaaf raay, jamuhoriyat ka Security Value hai aur agar aap in security valves ko nahi rakhenge to ye phat padegi. Supreme Court ne Maharashtra hukomat ko hidayat di ki dahashtgardi ke ilzaam mein Pune Police ki janib se huqooq e insaani jahed kaaron ki giraftari ko challenge karate huwe paanch daanishavaron bashamool Historian Romela Thaper, Economist Prabhat Patnayak aur Devika jain ki janib se daakhil karada darakhast par jawab dakhil kare. Maharashtra ki taraf se pesh hone wale wakeel ne darakhast ke javaz par yeh kahate hue ke aik ajanabi in jahed kaaron ke liye rahat talab nahi karsakata jo phale hi Highcourt se rujoo ho chuke hain etaraz kiya. Pune Police ne id-dia kiya ki ye jahedakar aik badi sazish se jude hain aur 35 colleges se arakaan ko bharti karane aur hamle karane ke mansube bana rahe the. In jahed kaaron ke khilaaf mutanaze qanoon insidaad gairqanuni sargarmiyaan ke tahat ilzaamat aayed kiye gaye. Police ka khena hai ki jariya saal June mein digar panch kaarkunon ki giraftariyon ke baad ki gayi tafateesh-o-tahaqeeq karte huve in jahed kaaron ki giraftari amal mein aaee hai aur giraftar shudagan ke pass se bhari miqadaar mein data wapis nikala hai.
169.title: Giraftar shuda 5 jahed kaaron ko Sept 6 tak ghar par nazarband rakha jaye: Supereme Court

news_detail: Junoobi aur Shumali Koreas ke darmain mangal ke roz askari nauyat ki baat cheet hui hai. Yeh baat cheet America ke is inkishaaf ke baad kasheedgi mein izafah ke beech ho rahi hai jis mein Washington ka kahna hai ke Pyongyang ke qareeb Missile Factory mein aik baar phir sargarmion ka ilm huwa hai. Junoobi Korea ki sarhad ke nazdeek waqay Shumali Korea ke gaon Panmunjom mein honay wala yeh ijlaas June ke baad se fariqain ke darmain doosri mulaqaat hai. mulaqaat ka maqsad kasheedgi ke khtama aur tamam muandana karwaiyon par rok laganay ke hawalay se is muaqqaf par kaam jari rakhna hai jis par rawan baras April mein dono Koreas ke srbrahan ney amaadgi ka zahir ki thi. Junoobi Korea ke senior mazakraatkar aur wizarat difaa mein Shumali Korea se mutaliq policy ke zimmaydaar Kim DoJuen  ney sahafion ko aagah kiya ke woh kasheedgi ko khatam karne aur aetmaad saazi ke liye “markazi” noiyat ke iqdamaat yakeeni bananay ki poori koshish karen ge. Junoobi Korea ki wizarat difaa ney guzashta hafta bataya tha ke woh samjhotay ki simt pehlay qadam ke taur par shadeed tareeqa se qilah band sarhad par phailay pehray daari ke thikanon aur saaz o samaan mein kami karne ka iradah rakhti hai. idhar aik senior Amrici zimma daar naay paiir ke roz Bartanwi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke Amrici intelli jins agencio naay Shumali Korea ki aik factory mein aik baar phir sar garmion ka pata chalaya hai jis mein bain albar aazmi bilstk missile tayyar kar lia tha. yeh missile America taq pounchanay ki salahiyat rakhta hai. Amrici wazeer kharja Mike Pompeo ney guzashta hafta Senate mein kharja taluqaat ki Committee ko bataya ke Shumali Korea naay johri bomb se mutaliq eendhan ki tayari ka silsila jari rakha sun-hwa hai. yeh paish Raft guzashta mah singapore mein Shumali Korea ke sarbarah kam jong aan ki Amrici saddar donald trmp se mulaqaat ke bawajood samnay aayi hai. kِm naay is mulaqaat mein ehad kya tha ke woh johri hathyaaron ki talfi par kaam karen ge. doosri janib Shumali Korea ke media naay guzashta chand roz mein Junoobi Korea ko kari nuqta cheeni ka nishana banaya hai. Shumali Korea mein hkmran jamaat ke sarkari akhbar’ ‘ rodongja sinmun” ka kehna hai ke Civil hukoomat khud se koi aik qadam uthae baghair, ,, johari hathyaaron ki mukammal talfi ke baad pabandiyan uthae janay ke intzaar mein”waqt zaya” kar rahi hai.
12.title: Shumali Korea ki Missile Factory mein dobarah sargarmian, America ka id-daa

news_detail: America ki janib se Falasteeni panah gzinon ki maali imdaad band kiye jane ke baad ab naam nihaad qawaneen ke zareya Falasteenion ki apne ilaqon mein wapsi aur abad kaari ke haq ko khatam karne ki nai saazish shuru ki gayi hai.’Al Arabia dot net’ ke mutabiq Amrici Congress mein aik naya Bill paish kya gaya hai jis mein Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad kam se kam zahir karne ki sifarish ki gayi hai. Naqideen nay is Bill ko Falasteenion ke ‘haq wapsi’ ku naaqabil e talaafi nuqsaan pohanchanay ki aik nayee saazish se tabeer kya hai. Amrici Congress mein yeh naya Bill Republican Party ke rukn Doug Lamborn ney paish kya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke aqwam mutahidda nay jung ke baad chay laakh Falasteenion ki wapas un ke ilaqon mein abadkari aur muhajreen ki maali kifalat ke liye ‘UNRWA’ Agency qayim ki. 70 saal guzarnay ke baad duniya bhar mein Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad 53 laakh se tajawaz kar gayi hai. Falasteeni panah gzinon ki doosri aur teesri nasal bhi panah gazeen qarar di ja rahi hai. Un par bhaari budget sarf ho raha hai. Unhi ki wajah se panah gzinon ka na khatam honay wala masla paida huwa. Lehaza doosri aur teesri nasal mein shaamil Falasteenion ko panah gazeen shumaar nah kya jaye. Unhon ney tasleem kya ke Falasteeni panah gazeenon ki behbood ke le qaim kardah ‘Relief and Works Agency’ UNRWA ko siyasi aur iqtisadi taur par is liye kamzor kya ja raha hai taakay woh kam se kam Falasteeni panah gzinon ka bojh uthaye. Un ke naye mussavida qanoon ka maqsad yeh hai ke panah gazeenon ka ‘status’ sirf un Falasteenion ko diya jaye jo 1948 ki jung mein Palestine se nikalay gaye. Un ki aulaad aur doosri aur teesri nasal ko un mein shaamil na kya jaye. Isi terha un Falasteenion ko bhi panah gazeen qarar na diya jaye jo dosray Mulkon ki shehriat haasil kar chukay hain. Aisi soorat mein Falasteeni panah gazeenon ke liye 50 lakh dollars ki raqam hi kaafi rahay gi. Washington mein Middle East Peace Institute ki khatoon Director Lara Friedman ka kehna hai ke Americi Congress mein paish kardah Bill ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gzinon ki maali imdaad roknay ke liye qanoon saazi nahi balkay is ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad kam se kam karne ki koshish hai. Jab ‘UNRWAا’ Agency par Falasteeni panah gzeenon ki doosri aur teesri nasal ka bojh nahi rahay ga to un ke maslay ko aasani ke sath hal kya ja sakta hai. Aik dosray tajzia nigaar David Boulak ka kehna hai ke 70 saal guzarnay ke baad Falasteenion ki badi tadaad ab Israel ke zair e intizaam Yahoodi muashra mein wapas jane ke khwaahan nahi hain. Raye aama ke jaizon se pata chalta hai ke Falasteeni panah gzinon ko Israel mein abaad honay mein koi dilchaspi nahi.
31.title: Falasteeni panah gzinon ke ‘haq e wapsi’ ko khatam karne Amrici saazish

news_detail: America aur Turkey ke darmain Americi shehri aik Easaai Paadri ke khilaaf dehshat gardi aur jasoosi ke ilzamaat aayed karte hue muqadma chalanay aur us ko zair hirasat rakhnay ke maamla par sifarti kasheedgi mein shiddat aagai hai aur Americi mehakma khazana ney Turkey ke wazeer insaaf aur wazeer e dakhla par pabandiyan aayed kar di hain. Moahida shumali oqiyanus ki tanzeem Nato ke dono rukn mumalik ke darmain wajah nazaa Americi Paadri Andrew Krig Brunson is waqt Turkey ke shehar Izmir mein apne ghar par nazar-band hain. Un ke khilaaf dehshat gardi ki himayat aur jasoosi ke ilzamaat mein muqadma chalaya ja raha hai aur yeh ilzamaat saabit honay par unhein 35 saal taq qaid ki saza sunai ja sakti hai. Yeh bhi maloom huva hai ke Americi wizarat khazana ney Turkey ke dono wuzraa ke America mein asasa jaat munjamad kardainay ka bhi elaan kya hai. Yeh pabandiyan Global Magnitsky Act of 2016 ke tehat aayed ki gayi hain jo Americi Hukoomat ko bdunwanyon aur huqooq insani ki khilaaf wazion par afraad, companiyon aur deegar idaron ko nishana bananay ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh qanoon asasa jaat ke injmaad, androon America safri tahedidaat aur Americi idaron ke sath tijarat par pabandiyan aayed karne ki ijazat deta hai. Turkey ney Americi iqdaam ka sakht note letay hue intibah diya ke woh bhi waisay hi intiqami karwai kere ga. Ankara ney kaha ke woh Paadri ke masla par qadam peechay nahi le ga. Wizarat kharja ney intibah diya ke America mehakma khazana ke jarehana faisla ka jawab waisay hi day ga .

White House ki khatoon tarjuman Sarah Sanders ney Washington mein budh ko sahafion se guftagu karte hue kaha hai : ”hum is baat mein yaqeen rakhtay hain ke woh (Paadri) Turk hukoomat ki ghair munsifana aur bilajawaz tawajah ka shikaar hain”. tarjuman ney kaha ke Turkey ke wazeer insaaf AbdulhamitGul aur wazeer e dakhla Suleyman Soylu ko pachaas sala Paadri Brunson ko zair hirasat rakhnay mein kirdaar par pabandion ka hadaf banaya ja raha hai. Americi wazeer khazana stone Noshin ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”Paadri Brunson ki ghair munsifana hirasat aur tark hakkaam ki janib se un ke khilaaf musalsal sitam saada lafzon mein bilkul bhi qabil qubool nahi hai. Sadar Donald Trump yeh baat kayi martaba wazeh kar chukay hain aur America yeh tawaqqa karta hai ke Turkey Paadri ko fauri taur par reha kardey ga”. Paadri Brunson Aegean sea ke kinare waqay shehar Izmir mein esaion ke protstnt firqa ke aik charch ke nigran they. woh Americi riyasat shumali kairo lena se talluq rakhtay hain. Turk hukkaam ney unhein do saal tak jail mein qaid rakhnay ke baad guzashta haftay hi Izmir mein un ke ghar muntaqil karkay nazar-band kardiya tha lekin un ki malik se bahar jaaane ki darkhwast ko mustard kardiya tha. Americi Paadri ko october 2016 hamza mein Turkey mein girftar kya gaya tha. Us waqt Sadar Rcep Tayyip Erdogan ki hukoomat ka takhta ulatnay ki nakaam saazish mein mulawis sarkari mulazmeen aur afraad ke khilaaf sakht crack drown kya ja raha tha. tark hakkaam ney Paadri par kaladam kurdistan workers party ( pi ke ke ) aur khodsakhtah jilaa-watan aalim Fatahullah Golan ki himayat ka ilzaam ayad kya tha. Turkey aur baaz Europi mumalik ney PKK ko aik dehshat gard tanzeem qarar day rakha hai. America ka yeh muaqqaf hai ke Turkey ke paas Paadri ke khilaaf aayed kardah ilzamaat ke koi thos saboot nahi hain jabkay tark saddar Racep Tayyip Erdogan yeh wazeh kar chukay hain ke unhein pabandion se daraya dhmkaya ja sakta hai aur na zair e asr laya ja sakta hai. Taham woh is baat ka ishara day chuke hain ke Easaai Paadri ka Americi riyasat Pennsylvania mein muqeem Fatahullah Golan se tabadlah kya ja sakta hai.
51.title: Paadri ko zair e hirasat rakhnay par America ney Turkey ke do wuzraa par pabandiyan aayed kar dein

news_detail: Shumali Korea ne jang Korea mein halaak honay walay Amrici faujion ki baqyaat 65 saal baad Amrici hukoomat ke hawalay kar dein. Bain u aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq jang e Korea ke 65 saal baad shumali Korea se Amrici faujion ki baqyaat taboton mein band karkay America muntaqil kar di gayi hain. Amrici Sadar Donald Trump aur shumali Korea ke sarbarah Kim Jong Un ke darmiyan honay wali mulaqaat mein Amrici faujion ki baqyaat wapas karne ka moahida huwa tha. Halaak faujion ke taboton ko Aqwam e Mutahidda ke jhanday mein lapeta gaya hai. Yeh baqyaat America rawana karne se qabal Junoobi Korea ke shehar Ausaan mein taqreeb munaqqid hui jis mein America , Aqwam e Mutahidda aur Junoobi Korea ke 500 arakeen ne shirkat ki. Koriyai jang mein halaak honay walay Amrikyon ki baqyaat 55 taboton mein Amrici riyasat Hawai pahunchain jahan Naib Sadar Mike Pence ne inhen qubool kya. Is mauqa par taqreeb bhi munaqqid hui. 1950 se 1953 tak Shumali Korea aur Junoobi Korea ke darmiyan jang hui thi. Ss jang mein Shumal ko China  aur Soviet Union jabkay Junoob ko America ki himayat haasil thi. Pahelay Korea aik hi mulk tha jis par 1910 se 1945 tak Japan ne hukoomat ki. Doosri jang azeem mein Japan ki shikast ke baad 1948 mein usay do hisson Shumal aur Junoob mein taqseem kardiya gaya. Shumali Korea Soviet Union ke hissa mein aur Junoobi Korea America ko mila. Is ke nateeja mein Shumali Korea par Communist nazriaat ka ghalba raha. Un dinov aalmi taqaton ke darmiyan cheqlish shuru hui jis ka nateeja jang ki soorat mein nikla jis mein 12 lakh afraad halaak hue jin mein 35 hazaar se ziyada Amrici fouji bhi shaamil thay. iI jang ke nateeja mein Korea ki dono riyastain mukammal taur par tabah o barbaad hogyin. Aik maahir forensic ne kaha ke ibtidayi jaanch se zahir hota hai ke baqyaat Amrrikyon ke hi hain. Yeh Sadar America Donald Trump aur Shumali Korea ke Kim Jong Un ki June mein hui choti mulaqaat ke mushtarka elamia ke chaar nukaat mein se aik nukta yeh bhi tha ke Amrici faujion ki baqyaat auta di jaye gi. Sadar America Donald Trump ne baqyaat lautanay par Shumali Korea ke qayed Kim Jong Un ka shukriya ada karte hue tawaqqa zahir ki ke un se dobarah mulaqaat hogi.
72.title: Shumali Korea ne 65 saal baad Amrici faujion ki lashen wapas kar dein

news_detail: September 2001 ko America ke World Trade Center aur Pentagon ki imaarton par hamlon ke baad pehli baar Al Qaeda ke baani maqtool Osama bin Laden ki walida Alia Ganam ke tasuraat manzar-e-aam par aeye hain. Un ka kehna hai ke awail umri mein mere betay ko Islam pasandon ne zehni taur par yarghamal bana liya tha aur inhen brainwash kya gaya. Bartanwi akhbar ‘Guardian’ mein shaya honay walay Alia Ganam ke taaza tasurat mein un ka kehna hai ke un ke betay Osama ban Laden ki Jeddah mein douran taalib ilmi Ikhwan ul Muslimoon ke Rohani musheer kehelwanay walay Dr. Abdullah  Azam ke sath mulaqaat huyi. Bin Laden Shah Abdulaziz University mein is waqt muashiaat ke taalib ilm thay. Napasandeedah sar garmion ki wajah se Saudi Hukoomat ne Abdullah Azam ko malik se be dakhal kar diya tha. baad azan woh Ikhwan ul Musilmoon ke Rohani peshwa ban gaye. Alia Ganam ka kehna hai ke Osama bin Laden ko is waqt zehni tor par yarghamal banaya gaya jab is ki umar bees saal ke lag bhag thi. usay brain wash kya gaya. bees saal tak umar mein hamein Osama bin Laden aik aur shakhsiyat jab ke is ke baad aik naya shakhs dikhayi deta hai. Bin Laden ki Shami nazaad walida ka kehna hai ke unhon ne bachpan Shaam ke shehar Allazqia mein basar kya. Sanh 1950 ke wast mein un ka khandan Saudi Arab muntaqil ho gaya. Un ka kehna hai ke Osama bin Laden ne khandan ki mukhalfat ke bawajood apne sarmaya ka aik bara hissa Afghanistan jung par sirf kya. Un ka mazeed kehna tha ke jihadi sargarmion mein hissa lainay ki wajah se Osama bin Laden ko khandan ke dosray afraad ki mukhalfat ka saamna tha. un ki apne khandan ke sath aakhri mulaqaat 1999 mein Afghanistan ke shehar qndhar ke qareeb hui jahan ban Laden muqeem thay. khayaal rahay ke Alia Ganam ne sunah 1960 mein apne shohar aur bin Laden ke waalid se Talaq le li thi. Yeh Talaq bin Laden ki paidaiesh ke teen saal ke baad hui. is ke baad unhon ne Mohammad Alattas nami aik karobari shakhs ke sath shadi ki. ‘Guardian’ ke mutabiq bohat pehlay se bin Laden poori duniya mein insidaad e dehshat gardi ka pehla hadaf ban gaye thay. Unhon ne Saudi Arab ke shehrion ko mashriq aur maghrib ke darmain deewar bananay ki koshish ki. Akhbar ne Bartanwi intellignce ke aik Officer ke hawala se bataya hai ke bin Laden ne 9/11 ke hamlon ke liye qasdan Saudi jungjuon ka istemaal kya. Unhen yaqeen tha ke Saudion ke zareya America par hamla karanay se maghrib Saudi arab ka nizaam tall pitt kardey ga. Woh amlan aik nai jung shuru karne mein to kamyaab hogaya magar woh jung jis ki Osama bin Laden ko tawaqqa thi shuru nahi hui.
87.title: Osama bin Laden ko awail umri mein hi zehan saazi ki gayi : Walida ka bayan

news_detail: Denmark mein hukkaam ne aam muqamat par naqaab pahannay par pabandi ke naye qanoon ki khilaaf warzi karne par jummay ke din aik 28 sala naujawan ladki par jurmana aayed kya. Police ahalkaar David Borchersen ne aik khabar rasaan agency ko bataya ke jummay ke roz Norchalan ilaqa ke shumal mashriq mein aik shopping center par Police ko talab kya gaya jahan aik naujawan ladki ka us aurat ke sath jhagda ho raha tha jis ne ladki ke chehra se naqaab noch dala tha. Borchersen ke mutabiq “jhagday ke douran ladki ka naqaab gir gaya tha taham hamaray pounchanay tak woh usay dobarah laga chuki thi”. Police ne mazkoorah ladki ki naqaab pehnay hue tasweer le li aur phir shopping center ke aik camera se jhagday ki video bhi haasil kar li. Baad azan naujawan ladki ko aagah kar diya gaya ke is par aik 1,000 Kroner (156 dollar) jurmana aayed kya gaya hai jis ka chalaan usay ba zareye daak mausool ho jaye ga. Police ne ladki se mutalba kya ke ya to woh naqaab utaar day ya phir is muqam aammah se Koch kar jaye. Borchersen ke mutabiq ladki ne koch karne ka ikhtiyar istemaal kya. 1

August 2018 se Denmark mein mutanazia qanoon naafiz ul amal ho gaya hai jis ke mutabiq muqamat aama par burqa ya naqaab pahannay par pabandi hai. Aam muqamat par burqa ya naqaab (jis mein sirf ankhen zahir hoti hain) pahannay par 1,000 Krone jurmana ho ga. Is khilaaf warzi ku dohraane par jurmana 10,0000 Krone tak ho sakta hai. Pabandi ke qanoon mein chehra chhupanay ke deegar zaraye bhi shaamil hain maslan masnoyee  daarhi ya phir aisa mask jis mein sirf ankhen nazar aati hon. insani haqooq ke karkunaan ne is pabandi ko khawateen ke haqooq ki khilaaf warzi qarar diya hai jab ke qanoon ka difaa karne walay halqon ka kehna hai ke is se musalman muhajreen ziyada behtar soorat mein Denmark ke muashray mein zam ho saken ge. khawateen ka naqaab Europe mein aik hssas mauzo ban chuka hai aur Belgium, France aur Germany pehlay hi naqaab pahannay par pabandi aed kar chuke hain
118.title: Denmark mein qanoon e naqaab ki khilaaf warzi par paihla jurmana

news_detail: Americi riyasat California ke shumali ilaqa mein do hafta qabal lagi aag mumlikat jadeed ki tareekh ki sab se badi aag banti jarahi hai. Un janglaat mein lagi aag tareekh ki bhayanak tareen aag ban gayi, taqreeban 2 laakh 83 hazaar se zayed aekar par phaily aag bujhanay ke liye tayyaron ki madad le li gayi. California ke jungle mein lagi aag ke sholay aur dhowen ke baadal meilon door se dekhe jasaktay hain. Bhadakti aag ne 80 se zayed ghar tabah kardiye aur 7 log halaak ho chukay hain jabkay hazaron afraad ko ghar choadnay par majaboor kardiya. Aag par qaboo panay din raat 3, 900 ka amlah tag o dou kar raha hai. Yeh aag sab se pehlay 27 July ko lagi thi. Yeh tareekh ki panchwin bad tareen aag hai.Is aag ko 2017 mein lagnay wali aag se bhi khatarnaak qarar diya ja raha hai jis ne Santa Barbra aur Ventura Counties mein 2 laakh 81 hazaar se zayed acres arazi jala kar khaak kar di thi. Shulon ki yeh lapait New York shehar se bhi badi hai aur ab Los Angeles ke size ki hoti jarahi hai. Is aag ko Mendocino Complex Fire se mousoom kya jata hai jo darasal ‘Clear Lake’ ke dono janib lagi do aag hain. Garam hawaon ka mausam aur sookhi ghaas aag par tail ka kaam kar rahay hain. Un do fires ke darmain ka faasla ab baa-mushkil 3 kilometer hi rah gaya hai. Is aag ne 443. 4 murabba miles ko apni lapait mein le liya hai .

Amrici riyasat California ke governor Jerry Brown ne janglati aag ki shiddat dekhte hue wifaqi hukoomat se imdaad talab kar li hai. Brown ne kaha hai ke be-qaboo aag ko control karna aik intahi mushkil amal hai aur reyasti wasail na kafi hain. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke aag se mutasirah ilaqa ki public health aur tahaffuz ko barah e raast shadeed khatraat ka saamna hai aur un mein kami laane ke liye markazi hukoomat ki izaafi imdaad zaroori hai. Sadar Trump ne bhi samaji rabita Website par pegham jari karte hue usay riyasat ki tareekh ki badi aafaat qarar diya hai. Tarjuman White House ka kehna hai ke mutasirah ilaqa ke logon ko aarzi rehayish aur gharon ki marammat ki sahoolat faraham ki jaye gi. Aag se ab tak 7 afraad ki mout waqay hochuki hai. Junoobi Spain ke janglaat mein bhi aag lagi hui hai senkdon firefighters aur tayyaron ki madad se aag par qaboo panay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Spain ka dar-ul-hukoomat Madrid,in dinon shadeed garmi ki lapait mein hai jahan guzashta roz darja hararat 40 degree centigrade record kya gaya. Portugal ke sayahati maqam forest hills mein lagi aag ko bujhanay ke liye aik hazaar se zayed firefighters koshish kar rahay hain, France ke dar-ul-hukoomat Paris ke muzafati ilaqa mein bhi aag lagi hui hai, jis par abhi tak qaboo nahi paaya jaska hai.
135.title: California mein lagi aag tareekh ki bad tareen aag banti ja rahi hai

news_detail: Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar Amado Boudou ko badunwanion aur rishwat khori ke jurm mein 5 saal 10 mah qaid ki saza sunadi gayi hai. Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar Amado Boudouko mangal ke roz badunwanion ke ilzamaat saabit honay par 5 saal 10 mah qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. Un par rishwat lainay aur sarkari mamlaat mein be zabtagyon ka ilzaam hai. Amado ko wifaqi foujdaari adalat se ” Ciccone case” ke silsila mein saza sunai gayi hai, un par ilzaam tha ke unhon nay apni mann pasand ”Ciccone Printing Company” ko sarkari thaika dlwaya jis ke badlay is Company se Commission wusool kya. Ciccone Printing Company Argentina ki wahid niji company hai jo sarkari currency note chaapti hai. Amado par 90 hazaar Pesos  (3,214US$) jurmana kya gaya hai. Is ke alawa Amado par zindagi bhar keliye kisi bhi qisam ka sarkari ohda rakhnay par bhi pabandi aayed kar di gayi hai. Amado Boudou ney 2011 se 2015 tak Argentina ki Sadar Christina Fernandez ke sath khidmaat anjaam di theen. Amado par bud unwani ka muqadma 2012 se chal rhatha, is case mein ”Ciccone Printers ke sabiq maalik Nicholas Ciccone ko bhi mujrim qaraar diya gaya tha. Amado Boudou ney khud par lagaye gaye tamam ilzamaat ki tardeed karte hue kaha hai ke sayasatdan jo taaqatwar rastay par chaltay hain, inhen pehlay to media baad azan adalti nizaam ka saamna karna parta hai. Argentina ki Anti Corruption Agency ki sarbarah Laura Alonso ney is muqadmay ki samaat ki aur kaha ke Argentina ki tareekh mein pehli baar Naayeb Sadar ko saza huvi hai, Argentina ki Adalat ab badunwaan logon ko saza dainay ke liye khud mukhtaar hai jis ke umoor mein mudakhilat ki sarbrahِ e Mumlikat ko bhi ijazat nahi. Wazeh rahay ke Amado Boudou ney apni saza ke khilaaf appeal daayer karne ka elaan bhi kya hai.
151.title: Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar ko badunwanion ke ilzaam mein 5 saal 10 mah qaid

news_detail: Aap ko yeh jaan kar bada hi taajjub hoga ke duniya ke sab se badi aaabadi walay Mulk Cheen, aabadi mein khatir khuwa izafah na honey se pareshan hai. Jee haan yeh sach hai ke Cheen jahan aabadi par qaboo paney taqreeban 50 baras qabal sirf aik hi bacha paida karne ki ijazat di gayi thi, ab woh naujawanon ki tadaad mein kami se pareshan hai chunkay is Mulk ki aabadi mein nojawanon aur kam umar bachon ki tadaad ghatti hui hai. Yahi wajah hai ke Cheen ney apni aik bacha ki paidaiesh ki policy ko khatam karte hue do bachay paida karne walidain ko targheeb di hai magar is ke bhi mutawaqqa nataayij baraamad na honey par ab aisa lagta hai ke teen bachay paida karne walidain ko targheeb dainey ki koshish ki jaye gi. Duniya ke sab se gunjaan aabad Mulk Cheen mein ” One Child Policy” khatam karkay do bachon ki ijazat dainey ke bawajood aabadi mein kami dekhi ja rahi hai aur ab yeh qaumi masla bhi bantaa ja raha hai. Cheeni sarkar ney naujawanon se jaldi shadi kar ke khandan shuru karne ka mutaliba kar diya. Guzashta dinon Cheen ke aik sarkari akhbar mein surkhi lagai gayi ke ‘bachay ki paidaiesh khandani maamla hai aur qaumi masla bhi.’ Hukoomat awam ko ziyada bachay paida karne ke liye hauslaafzai karti nazar aa rahi hai. Aik aur Cheeni akhbar mein aik safha ka column chaapa gaya jis mein intibah jari kya gaya ke Cheen mein paidaiesh ki kam sharah mayeeshat aur muashra par asar andaaz hona shuru ho gayi hai. Column ke is tukde ney lakhoon mubasireen ki tawajah apni taraf mabzool karli. Cheen ki muqami samaji rabita Website Vibo par bhi is unwan se beshumaar post aur un par comments dekhe jarahay hain. Aisay comments ya hashtag jo hukoomat ke khilaaf jatay hain woh fauri gayab kar diye jatay hain taakay un se awam ki hausla shikni na ho. Yeh tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke Cheen Jaria saal ke avaakhr mein bachon ki paidaiesh par tahdeed ko mukammal tor par barkhast kardey ga .

Alawa azeen Cheen mein aik sarkari dak ticket bhi jari kya gaya hai jis mein bachon ki tadaad mein izafay ki hauslaafzai ki gayi hai. Aisa hi aik dak ticket 2016 mein jari kya gaya tha jis mein art work ke zariye walidain ko aik bachay ke bajaye do bachay paida karne ki hauslaafzai ki gayi thi. Cheeni Hukoomat ney aik aur dak ticket jari kya hai jis mein khinzeer ke aik jode ko is ke teen bachon ke sath dikhaya gaya hai. Cheen mein har saal aik naam se mansoob hota hai is terha 12 sala cheeni bruji (zodiac) alamati daira ka 12 waan saal ‘saal khinzeer’ kehlata hai jo is martaba 2018-19 mein waqay ho raha hai. Is ‘saal e khinzeer’ ki munasibat se Cheeni Hukoomat ney aik dak ticket jari kya hai jis mein khinzeer ke aik jode ko teen bachon ke sath dikha gaya. Isi terha 2016 mein jo ‘saal e bandar’ tha bandaron ke do bachon ko dikhaya gaya tha. Is dak ticket se yeh andaaza kya jaaney laga hai ke Cheen ab do bachay nahi balkay teen bachay paida karne ki hauslaafzai kere ga. Cheen ke qaumi idaara shumariyat ke mutabiq 2017 mein Cheen mein aik crore 72 lakh se zayed bachay paida hue jo ke 2016 ke muqaabla mein kam hain. Idaare ke mutabiq 2016 mein Mulk mein aik crore 78 lakh bachon ki paidaiesh hui thi. Cheen ki aabadi 1 arab 37 crore ke lag bhag hai aur woh aabadi ke aitbaar se ab bhi duniya ka sab se basa Mulk hai. Aabadi par qaboo paney ke liye Cheen ki hukoomat kayi dahaiyon se ‘One Child Policy’ ka sakhti se nifaaz karti chali aa rahi thi jisay 2015 mein marhala waar khatam karne ka faisla kiya gaya tha. Cheen ki Communist Hukoomat ney 1970 ki dahai ke aakhri barson mein badhti hui aabadi par qaboo paney ke liye ‘One Child Policy’ naafiz ki thi jis ki khilaaf warzi karne walay walidain ko bhaari jurmanon aur baaz auqaat mutawaqqa maaon ko zabardasti isqat e hamal ka saamna karna padta tha. Cheeni hukkaam ke mutabiq ‘One Child Policy’ ke khatima ka faisla Mulk mein umar raseedah afraad ki tadaad mein izafah aur qabil e kaar aabadi ki tadaad mein kami ke khatrah ke paishِ e nazar kya gaya tha. ‘Aik Bacha Policy’ ke khatima ke aaghaz ke aglay hi baras 2016 mein Cheen mein sharahِ paidaiesh mein numaya izafah record kya gaya tha lekin nai adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq 2017  mein yeh sharah dobarah kam hui hai taham mehakuma shumariyat ke adaad o shumaar ke bawajood Cheen ke sahet aur khandani mansoobah bandi ke qaumi commission ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke guzashta saal bhi Cheen mein shrhِ paidaiesh ‘mamool se khasi buland’ rahi hai.
162.title: Cheen sharah paidaiesh mein kami se pareshan !

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rajya Sabha mein aaj TRS ke tamam 6 arkaan ney Parliament ke aiwaan baala ke Nayeb Sadarnashin ke bawaqar ohda ke liye jntadl (U) ke umeedwaar Harivansh Narayana Singh ke haq mein vote dete hue UPA ke haami Congressi umeedwaar B.K.
