Hari Prasad NDA ke tayeedi umeedwaar ki kamyaabi ki raah hamwar ki. Harivansh ney 20 votes ki aksariyat se kamyaabi haasil ki. Janata Dal umeedwaar ko 125 aur Congressi umeedwaar ko 105 votes haasil hue. Tawaqqe ke mutabiq Telugu Desam Party jis ney Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne mein nakaami par BJP se apne taluqaat munqita karliye, NDA umeedwaar ke khilaaf vote dete hue apni barhami ka izhaar kya. Telugu Desam ke arkaan Rajya Sabha ney Congressi umeedwaar ke haq mein vote diya. YSR Congress Party ney pehlay hi yeh elaan kardiya tha ke woh raye dahi mein hissa lainey se ijtinaab karegi. Nayeb Sadarnashin Rajya Sabha ka intikhab 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein barsar e iqtedaar BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA aur Congress ki zair r qiyadat UPA ke liye jaanch ka paimana tasawwur kya ja raha tha. Rahul Gandhi ke Congress ki qiyadat sanbhaalne ke baad aik ahem tabdeeli yeh aayi ke kay wo partiyan jo Congress ka sath dainey amaada nahi theen woh Congress ke sath mafahimat karti nazar aa rahi hain. Agarchay TRS ney Rajya Sabha ke Nayeb Saddarnashin ke liye ki jaane wali raye dahi mein kis ki taayeed kere gi wazeh nahi ki thi. Intikhabaat se qabal Chief Minister Bihar Mr. Nitish Kumar ney KCR se rabita karte hue un ki Party ke umeedwaar ko kamyaab bananey mein taawun karne ki khwahish ki thi. Yeh poochney par ke aaya BJP, TRS ko NDA ke naey haleef ke taur par dekhtii hai? Telangana BJP ke tarjuman Krishna Sagar Rao ney kaha ke hum TRS ko an d ae ke imkani Haleef ke tor prnhin dekhte, lekin hum nahi jantay ke 2019 aam intikhabaat ke kya hoga. BJP se TRS ki qurbat ko kuch arsa se mehsoos kya ja raha tha aur yeh baat wazeh hoti jarahi thi ke BJP ke teyin TRS naram gosha rakhti hai. Talaq e salasa par bill ke masla par ho ya Modi Hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam etemaad ka masla TRS ney raye dahi se ijtinaab kya tha magar is martaba BJP ke tayeedi umeedwaar ke haq mein vote dete hue yeh wazeh ishara dey diya hai ke woh BJP ke sath chahay intikhabi mafahmat kere ya na kere magar woh aiwaan mein BJP ki hamnawa bani rahay gi.
170.title: BJP ko TRS ki shakal mein aik neya dost mil gaya?!

news_detail: American riyasat Hawaii ke aatish fishan se lava aglne ka amal phir se shuru ho gaya hai jis ke baad muqami abadi ko bhi warning jari kar di gayi. Hawaii ke Kilauea Nami aatish fishan kayi hafton se poori shiddat se lava ugal raha hai jis se kayi makaan, gariyaan, sarkain aur darakht safha hasti se mit gaye jabkay log –apne ghar bahar chore kar Mahzooz maqam par panah liye hue hain. haliya footage mein dekha ja sakta hai ke aasman par tees hazaar foot bulandi taq raakh aur dhuwen ke siyah baadal dera jamaye hue hain jabkay hakkaam mein logon ko warning di hai ke fiza mein mohlik slfr die oxide gas phail chuki hai aur log is ilaqa se daur rahen. social media par lave ki dil dhula dainay wali videos ny dekhnay walon ku khaufzada kya huwa hai. taaza tareen ittila ke mutabiq Kilauea aatish fishan mein taaza dhamaka ke baad lava Hawaii ke ahem shahrah ki simt beh raha hai, jis se sahili makeeno ko bachney ki jo raah faraham hai woh bhi masdood hojaye gi. raqeeq madah se mazeed chaar ghar tabah hogaye hain. do barri daraaron se pghlti chattaan aik wahid bahao mein tabdeel hogyaavr tawaqqa hai ke sahili shahrah 137 se androon chand ghanton mein takra jaye ga
10.title: Hawaii mein aatish fishan se dubarah lava nikalna shuru

news_detail: Hyderabad. ain waqt par mudakhlat karte hue police ney kam az kam 5 kam Umar larke aur larkiyon ki shadion ko rukwadiya. Cyberabad ke qareeb Jagatgeer Gutta mein 14 jodon ki ijtimai shadion ki taqreeb munaqqid ki jarahi thi ke ain waqt par police wahan poanch gayi aur jodon ke sadaqatnama e paidaiesh paish karne ka mutalba kya. jodon ke naamon aur tasaveer ke sath ruqey taba kar diye gaye they aur dulhy ghoree par sawaar hogaye bhi hogaye they taakay baarat ki shakal mein grodwarh poanch sakay they ke muqami chayild line ki team aur police wahan poanch gayeen. jaanch partaal par pata chala ke shadi karne walay chaar dulhy aur aik dulhan ki umrein, qanoon mein shadi ke liye muqarrar kardah aqaltareen umar se kam hai. kam umar Dulhon aur dulhan ko baazabadkari marakaz muntaqil kardiya gya jabkeh mabaqi  9 jodon ko shadi karne ki ijazat day di gayi. police ney bataya ke jin Dulhon aur dulhan ko baazabadkari markaz muntaqil kardiya gaya tha inhen counseling ke liye laa liya gaya hai. police ney haqooq atfaal ke aik jahedkar Achutya Rao ki shikayat par police harkat mein aayi jinhon ney bataya ke un khandano ney kam Umar ki shadion ko yakeeni bananay aur hukoomat tlnganh ki kalyaan laxmi scheme ke tehat mara-aat panay ke liye dastawizaat par umrein barha kar darj karwai theen. kalyaan laxmi aur shadi mubarak schemes ke tehat hukoomat tlnganh khat gurbat se neechay zindagi busr karne walay khandano ko larki ki shadi par 75, 000 rupay ki eaanat karti hai. police inspector Mr. Srinivas ney bataya ke tehqiqaat shuru ki gayi hai taham koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya. Hyderabad mein do hafton qabal aik case mein aik pandrah sala larki ko bchalya gaya tha jis ki zabardasti shadi aik 38 sala mazoor aadmi se kar di jarahi thi. larki ney dasvin jamaat imthehaan kamyaab kya tha aur is ki shadi mehez is liye kar di jarahi thi ke is ke walidain kayi mah se ghar ka kiraya ada nahi karpaye they.
24.title: kam Umar 4 Dulhon aur aik Dulhan ki shadion ko police ney rokkk diya

news_detail: Germany ke shehar Dresden mein bomb ko nakara bananay wali aik team ne bil akhir doosri jung azeem ke douran istemaal shuda bomb ko jo phatt nahi saka tha nakara bananay mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. bomb ko nakara bananay se qabal bhaari tadaad mein awam ka takhlia karna pada. bomb ko nakara bananay ki awail koshish mein aag bhi bharak uthi thi. Germany ke shehar Dresden ke wast mein tameeri kaam ke douran yeh bomb Bazyab sun-hwa tha. zaraye ka kehna hai ke bomb 250 klov gram wazni hai jisay nakara bananay ki pehli koshish guzashta roz ki gayi jo nakaam saabit hui aur nateejay mein aik chhota dhamaka sun-hwa aur ilaqay mein aag lag gayi. hakkaam ka kehna hai ke 9 hazaar afraad ko ilaqay se bahar nikaal liya gaya hai jin mein ziyada tar buzurag afraad shaamil hain. tamam afraad ne 2 raatain gharon se bahar guzaraian jabkay bomb phatnay ke khadshaat par Dresden airport par tamam flights mansookh kar di gayi hain .

bomb ko nakara bananay ke mahireen ne jab bomb ke fuse ko uraya to aag bharak uthi jis ke baais bomb ko nakara bananay ka amal paicheeda hogaya. mahireen ko aag ki lapeto par qaboo panay taq ghanton intzaar karna pada. jumaraat ki dopehar taq aik baktar band khdayi machine, jalay hue malba ko saaf krpayi aur toseeq kar di gayi ke nahi phatt parre 250 kilo gram wazni bomb ko nakara banadiya gaya. bomb ko nakara bana diye jany ki toseeq ke baad hi police ne wasti Dresden railway station ke qareebi zila mein takhlia karaye gaye taqreeban 9, 000 logon ko –apne –apne gharon ko wapas lotney ki ijazat di hai. bomb ko nakara bananay ka amal shuru karne se qabal do oldage care homes aur aik hasptl ka bhi takhlia kara diya gaya tha. hakkaam ne mazeed bataya ke bomb jung azeem doyam mein Bartanwi aur Amrici itihadiyon ne fazai hamlay mein bombari ke douran german shehar par barsaye they. police ka kehna hai ke dhamaka ke khadshaat ke baais site ke ird gird sakht security barqarar rakhi gayi thi jabkay aik fire faytr robot ki madad se bomb par thanda pani dala jaata raha hai taakay bomb disposel hakkaam bomb ko aasani se nakara bana saken. wazeh rahay ke feb 1945 mein Dresden mein Bartania aur America ki bombari mein 25 hazaar afraad maaray gaye they jis se 33 klov meter ke ilaqay mein aag bharak uthi thi aur shehar tabah hokar khandhar mein tabdeel hogaya tha. Nazi Germany ke khilaaf is ittihadi fazai muhim mein hazaron bomb giraye gaye jis mein se matdd bomb phatay hi nahi aur abhi bhi jrmi ke kayi shehron mein taraqiyati kamon ke douran aisay bmon ka pata chalta rhtahe. haal hi mein markazi Berlin mein Bartanwi jungi zamana ke bomb ko nakara bananay ke liye 10 hazaar afraad ko nikaal kar mehfooz maqam par muntaqil kya gaya thajs ke baais bomb ko nakara bananay ka operation kamyaab ho paaya tha
34.title: Doosri junge azeem ka ‘bomb’ atishzadgi aur takhlia ke baad nakara banadiya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rachakonda Commissionerate mein Chaitanyapuri police station se wabsta sab inspector of police G.  Eroji ko Srinagar colony, L.B.  Nagar Hyderabad par shaam 5:15 bajay charge sheet jald paish karne ke liye shikayat kunindah B. Karthik advocate se 20, 000 rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon pkrhlya gaya. shikayat kunindah crime number 75/2018 mein tazeerat hind ki dif-aat 363, 354 ( d ) aur POSCO Act ki difaa 12 ke tehat police station Chaitanyapuri mein aik muqadma darj hai. Anti Corruption Bureau ke press release mein bataya gaya ke is muqadma mein charge sheet jald paish karne ke liye rishwat qubool karne par girftar karte hue khusoosi judge baraye SPE aur ACB muqadmaat ke rubaroo paish kya ja raha hai. press release mein yeh bhi appeal ki gayi ke kisi sab inspector ya mehakma police ke kisi bhi ohdedar ki janib se rishwat karne par awam ae si bi ke tool free number 1064 par rabita peda kya jaye taakay qanoon ke mutabiq karwai ki jasakay.
59.title: Sub Inspector rushwat letay hue rangay hathon girftar

news_detail: karimnagar. Telangana ke zila Karimnagarmein mana Kundoor mandal ke Chanjerla ke qareeb aaj dopehar are tea si bas aur laree mein khofnaak tassadum ke nateeja mein 7 afraad halaak aur 20 zakhmi hogaye. mahlukeen mein commerce ke aik lecturer bhi shaamil hain. mutwafi jee hari prasad imtihani prchon ki jaanch ke liye Karimnagarjarahay they. is haadsa mein teen contract lecturers bhi zakhmi hogaye. wazeer tansport Mr. mhen_heendra ready ny bataya ke aik laree ke are tea si bas se takra jaane ke baayes yeh haadsa paish aaya. bataya jata hai ke are tea si bas Karimnagar se  Warangal jarahi thi ke taiz raftaar laree ny aqab se takkar day di. zakhmi afraad ko Karimnagar ke sarkari hospital muntaqil kya gaya. zakhmion mein 7 ki haalat tashweesh na k batayi jati hai. haadsa ke waqt bas mein 30 musafireen sawaar they. laree driver aur klinr bhi zakhmion mein shaamil hain. is haadsa ke baais Karimnagar-Warangal  reyasti shahrah par kuch der ke liye trafik mein khlal para. yeh dosra mauqa hai ke are tea si bas ko haadsa paish aaya. guzashta hafta ko paish aeye aik haadsa mein 10 afraad halaak aur 20 zakhmi hogaye they. wazeer Finance Mr. Etala Rajendar ittila mlitay hi fori maqam haadsa poanch gaye aur haadsa ke shikaar afraad ke bachao aur raahat kaari kamon ki nigrani karte hue zakhmion ko fori tibbi imdaad ki farahmi ko yakeeni banaya. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekhar Rao ney haadsa par gehray dukh ka izhaar kya aur haadsa ke mahlukeen ke afraad khandan se izhaar taaziyat kya. cheif mnstr ny mutaliqa hakkaam ko hadaayat di ke zakhmion ko munasib tibbi nighdasht faraham ki jaye. Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Kadiam Sri Hari ney kaha ke hukoomat, haadsa ke mahlukeen aur zakhmion ke liye exgratia ka elaan kere gi.
83.title: Karimnagar mein sadak haadsa 7 afraad halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. senior aayi ae s officer o Principal secretary mehakma labour o aymplaymnt Dr. Shashank Goel ke jawaa saal Farzand Shubham  Goel ko turkey ke dar-al-hakoomat istanbul mein luteron ny halaak kardiya. laash ko hndstan wapas laya gaya aur guzashta itwaar ko Uttarkhand mein aakhri rasomaat ada ki gayeen. yeh saneha 24 May ko paish aaya. skritrit mein sarkari zaraye ke bamawajjib Shashank Goel Delhi ke liye rawana hue they. bataya jata hai ke inhen jaisay hi –apne Farzand ki halakat ki ittila mili woh fori Delhi puhanche aur wizarat umoor kharja ki madad se –apne Farzand ki laash hndstan wapas layi. 27 May ko Uttarkhand ke Rurki mein ada ki gayi. 24 sala Shubham  Goel aik soft veer engineer they aur America ke California mein federal bank of America mein mulazmat kar rahay they. woh –apne aik rishta daar ki shadi mein hndstan aeye hue they. Shubham  ny California wapas lottay hue turkey ki sayahat ka mansoobah banaya tha. maloom sun-hwa hai ke Shubham  aik sayahati maqam ka aik group ke sath mushahida kar rahay they ke un ka saamna luteron ki aik touli se sun-hwa. luteron ny inhen –apne paas mojood saari ashya un ke hawala kardainay ki dhamki di thi taham woh luteron se muzahmat karte rahay. un par pehlay chaako se hamla kiya gaya aur phir un par goli chladi gayi. un ke daftar ke ohdedaron se rabt peda kya gyato unhon ny sirf Dr. Shashank Goel ke Delhi rawana ki ittila di taham un ke Farzand ki mout ke baray mein toseeq nahi ki, Albata utar khand ke muqami zaraye ablaagh ny is waqea ki khabar di hai
103.title: Principal secretary labour Dr. Shashank Goel ke Farzand ka istanbul mein qatal

news_detail: Gaza. Palestine ka chhota behri jahaaz ( Flotilla ) Israel ki janib se kayi saloon se aed pabandion ko toar kar Gaza ki sahili patti se bahar khulay samandar mein nikal gaya taham Israeli behria ney usay beech pani mein rokkk diya. jahaaz mein 25 mareez. taalib ilm aur kuch samaji rehnuma sawaar hain. tfsila t- ke mutabiq Palestine ke is jahaaz ki manzil qabras ki bandargaah Limassol hai jo ke Gaza ke shumal mein waqay hai, yeh jahaaz aaj subah apni manzil ki janib rawana sun-hwa tha aur is ki himayat mein mutadid kashtiyan sath chali theen. Israel sunah 2006 se 20 laakh flstinyon ko Gaza ki patti mein mahsor kya sun-hwa hai aur un ke baahiri duniya se rabita par pabandiyan aed krrkhi hain. Flotilla ney jab 16 behri mil ka faasla tey kya to usay Israel ke chaar behri jungi jahazoo ney apne ghairay mein le liya tha. jahaaz se ek activist ney Aljazira nami Arab khabar-rasan idaara ko bataya ke’ ‘ hamaray charon taraf Israeli jahaaz hain aur hum beech mein phansay hue hain. fi al haal hum sab, sahih salamat hain aur aap se duaun ki darkhwast karte hain’ ‘. yaad rahay ke sunah 1993 mein honay walay oslo muahiday ke tehat Israel flstinyon ko 20 behri mil ke andar fishing ki ijazat dainay ka paband hai taham is par kabhi bhi amal daraamad mumkin nahi ho saka. mangal ke roz rawana honay walay is jahaaz par mareez, talba aur guzashta dinon honay walay muzahiron mein zakhmi honay walay afraad shaamil hain. jahaaz ke muntazmeen ke mutabiq is par mojood tamam afraad ke paas passport aur deegar safri dastaweez mojood hain aur zakhmion ko ilaaj ki gharz se turkey muntaqil kya ja raha hai jahan un ke ilaaj ke intizamaa mukammal hain. is Flotilla ki himayat mein senkron Falasteeni 30 se zayed kashtiyon mein sawaar hokar sath chalay hain taham un ka kehna hai ke hum ijazat Yafta hudood se bahar nahi jayen ge, khulay samandar mein bas yahi aik jahaaz jaye ga. yaad rahay ke maazi mein Israel Falasteeni kashtiyon ko mehez das se 12 behri mil taq kashti rani ki ijazat deta raha hai aur guzashta dinon yeh hadd ghata kar mehez 1 Kilometer taq kar di gayi thi. Palestine ki kashtiyan waisay bhi 6 nautical miles ki hadd mein rehti hain aur Israel ki janib se un par musalsal fayrng ka silsila jari rehta hai. intizamia ka kehna hai ke un ka yeh safar wapsi March ka hissa hai jis mein woh Israel ki taraf se aed jabri pabandi ko toar kar khud Israel aur duniya ko yeh pegham den ge ke woh azaadi chahtay hain. inhen yeh bhi andesha hai ke Israel ki janib se un ki kashtiyon ko laazmi nishana banaya jaye ga lekin woh is khatray ka saamna karne ke liye tayyar hain. Israeli behria ney yeh elaan kar diya hai ke is ney kashti kakntrol haasil karliya hai. International Freedom Flotilla Coalition ney –apne aik bayan mein Israeli iqdaam ki muzammat ki aur kaha ke ‘Hurya’ se mosoom azad y kashti par hamla badbakhtana hai. anjuman ney kaha ke Gaza ke ghair qanooni muhasra ko khatam karne ki koshish thi
122.title: Israel ney Cyprus janay walay Flotilla’  Hurya ‘ ko rokkk diya

news_detail: Mumbai. sahafi o jahedkaar Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ki tahaqeeq karne wali special investy gation team ney aaj muqadma mein pehli charge sheet paish kar di hai. 650 safhaat par mushtamil charge sheet aik session court mein paish kar di gayi jis mein SIT  ney 131 bayanaat qalamband hai, jin mein foreinsic science laboratory ( f s ail ) ohdedar vn aur mulzimeen ke tea Navin kumar aur Pravin ke bayanaat shaamil hain. Navin kumar ke ilawa SIT  ney 8 mah qadeem muqadma mein deegar chaar afraad ko bhi grfta rkya tha. tehqiqati ohdedar Mr. M. N. Anucheth ney kaha ke go k SIT  hunooz Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ke chaar mulzimeen se pooch gach kar rahi hai, unhon ney Mysore ke maqoliat pasand qalam car professor ke s bhagwan ku jaan se maardenay ki dhamki ka maktoob 9 September 2015 mein bheja tha. Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ke silsila mein girftar pehlay mulzim Navin Kumar urf Hotte Manja ki faraham kardah maloomat ki asaas par SIT  ney Sujit Kumar urf Pravin saakin Shikaripura ko 20 May ko giraftar kya tha. Sujit ki tafteesh par is ney apne sathiyon Amul Kale, Amit alias Degwekar, Pradip Mahajan sakineen Maharashtra aur Manohar Dundappa Yadav saakin Vijyapuri ko girftar kya gaya. Sujit ney police ko bataya ke is ke tenu saathi Dawangre mein chupay hue hain jahan se inhen girftar karliya gaya. darin asna SIT  ney charon mulzimeen ko panchwin additional cheif metro politn magistrate ( ae si am am ) court mein paish karte hue 10 din ki police tehweel haasil karli. 55 sala Gauri Lankesh ko 5 September 2017 ko is waqt desi sakhta 7. 65 am am pistol se is waqt maghribi bangloru mein goli maar di gayi jab woh apne ghar se bahar jarahi thi.
143.title: SIT ney Gauri Lankesh qatal muqadma mein pehli charge sheet paish ki

news_detail: Afghanistan ke janoobi soobah Hilmand mein toup khanah se rocket hamla mein Taliban ke 50 se ziyada senior commanders maaray gaye hain jabkay malik ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein Taliban aur Afghan security forces ke darmain jharpen jari hain. Amrici fouj ney wednesday ko Hilmand mein Taliban ki un halakaton ki ittila di hai aur bataya hai ke soobah ke zila moose qilah mein 24 May ko Taliban kamandron ke aik ijlaas par rocket barsaye gaye they. is ijlaas mein hamsaaya soobah Farah sameit mukhtalif sobon se talluq rakhnay walay Taliban commander shareek they. Afghanistan mein Amrici forces ke tarjuman colonel Martin O Doneal ney kaha hai ke’ ‘ hamaray khayaal mein is ijlaas mein aindah ki mansoobah bandi ki jarahi thi. un par aartlri ke aik rocket nizaam ke zariye hamla kiya gaya hai’ ‘. un ke bah qoul yeh aik barr ahem hamla hai aur is se muzahmat karon ko numaya dhachka laga hai. tarjuman ney mazeed kaha ke is mah is das roza karwai ke douran mein Taliban ke kayi aur bhi aala aur nichli satah ke commander maaray gaye hain. Afghan Taliban ney is report ko propeganda qarar day kar mustard kardiya hai aur kaha hai ke moose qilah mein do aam makanon ko hamla mein nishana banaya gaya tha jis ke nateeja mein paanch shehri halaak aur teen zakhmi hogaye they. Taliban ke tarjuman qaari Yousuf Ahmed y ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke’ ‘ yeh aik shehri Iqamti ilaqa tha aur is ka Taliban se koi talluq nahi tha’ ‘. idhar Afghanistan ke shumali soobah Takhar mein Taliban ney zila dasht qilah ke markaz, governor ke compound aur police head quarters par qabza kar liya hai. soobay ke aik police tarjuman khalil aseer ka kehna hai ke is zila mein Taliban jangju on aur Afghan security forces ke darmain larai jari hai. soobah logar mein Taliban ney sobai dar-al-hakoomat pal-e aalam mein aik police station par hamla kya hai. is hamlay mein teen police ahelkaar halaak aur aath zakhmi hogaye hain. sobai governor ke tarjuman Shah poor Ahmed zai ney kaha hai ke Taliban ney aaj Ali alsbah police station par dhawa bol diya tha, is ke baad un ki police ehalkaron ke sath teen ghantay taq jharap hoti rahi thi aur is mein yeh tenu hamla aawar maaray gaye hain. janoobi shehar qndhar mein aik bomb dhamakay mein teen shehri halaak aur terah zakhmi hogaye hain. bzahir is bomb hamlay mein aik mechanic ki workshop ko nishana banaya gaya tha jahan Afghan fouj ki gariyon ki murammat ka kaam hota tha
159.title: Afghan soobah Hilmand mein rocket hamlay mein 50 Taliban commandars maray gaye : Amrici fouj ka daawa

news_detail: Mutahidda Arab Amarat UAE ke dar-al-hukoomat Abu Dhabi mein aik fouj daari adalat neh paanch mumalik se talluq rakhnay walay 28 afraad ko 17 crore 40 laakh dollars ke sarmaya kaari scandal mein qasoor waar qarar day diya hai aur unhein majmoi tor par 284 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. unhon neh fraud, dhoka dahi aur money laundering se UAE ke bankon se mazkoorah raqum ainth li theen. un 28 mudda alihan ka talluq America , Bharat , Pakistan , roos aur canada se hai. adalat ke faislay ke mutabiq un mein se aath mdaaalihan ko 15, 15 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. 10 ko 10, 10 saal, no ko –apne bank khaton mein raqum muntaqil karne ke jurm mein saat, saat saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. adalat neh aik mujrim ko aik saal qaid ki saza ka hukum diya hai. qaid ki muddat poori honay ke baad unhein UAE se bedakhal kardiya jaye ga. adalat mein un mulzimon ke khilaaf UAE ke daftar baraye umomi istighasa ke do Afsar paish hue they aur unhon neh shawahid paish kiye they. Abu Dhabi ke mehakma tafteesh juraim neh un ke khilaaf malik ke bankon se –apne bank khaton mein raqum muntaqil karne ki tehqiqaat ki thi. unhon neh barqi tarseelat ke zariye mukhtalif bankon mein paanch companiyon ke bank khaton mein yeh raqum muntaqil ki theen. yeh raqum baad mein UAE hi mein mukhtalif bank khaton mein muntaqil ki jana thi lekin is se pehlay hi un ka yeh scandal pakra gaya tha
171.title: Abu Dhabi: adalat neh fraud case ke 28 mujrimon ko 284 saal qaid ki saza suna di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Delhi ke laal qilah ki dekh bhaal ka thaika Dalmia group ko mil gaya hai jabkay ITC Hotels ney hyderabad ke tareekhi yadgar’ Charminar’ ki dekh bhaal ki zimma daari lainay se apni dilchaspi ka izhaar kya hai aur maktoob izhaar dilchaspi daakhil kya hai. ITC agency hi wahid hai jis ney Charminar ki dekh bhaal karne ka iradah zahir ki hai aur wizarat sayahat o aasarqdimh ki yadgar Project ko ikhtiyar karne qaim kardah oversite and vision committee ki janib se is darkhwast ko qatiat dena baqi hai. GMR sports private limited jo Dehli Daredevils IPL team ko promote kar rahi hai, ko qilah Golcondaki dekh bhaal ke liye is ke maktoob izhaar dilchaspi ko mukhtasir fehrist mein shaamil karne ke baad markazi hukoomat ki janib se maktoob amaadgi bheja gaya hai. GMR sports ke zaraye ke bamawajjib company ney malik ke 7 tareekhi yadgar Bashmool laal qilah ki dekh bhaal ke liye مکتوبات izhaar dilchaspi daakhil kiye they aur hamein maktoob amaadgi masool sun-hwa hai, ab hamein vision bid paish karna hai. Committee, vision bid ka Project qawaid ke mutabiq jaiza le gi, agar hamari boli ko qatiat di jati hai aur muntakhib kyajata hai to hamein hukoomat hind ke sath aik yaddasht e mafahmat par dastakhat karna hoga.
39.title: Charminar ku ITC aur Quillah Golconda ko GMR goad lainay tayyar

news_detail: Hyderabad. commissionaire hyderabad city police mister Anjani kumar hyderabad city police ki jadeed kaari par aaj jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya. hyderabad shehar mein police force ki jadeed kaari par yahan tamam d si piz, joint commissionaire of police, additional commissioners of police aur intizami ohdedaron ke sath jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya. Hyderabad city police ney police amlah ki pesha warana salahiyaton ko parwan charhanay aur kaam ke kaaj ke tareeqon ko pesha warana satah par ouncha uthany ka faisla kya. polisng mein community ki shiraakat daari aur community ke aetmaad ke sath awam dost policing hanoz shehar ki police ke aala eqdaar mein barqarar hai. commissionaire ney kaha ke hyderabad ko mazeed mehfooz, salamat aur mawafiz sarmaya kaari bananay mazeed iqdamaat kiye jayen ge
54.title: City Police ki jadeed kaari par commissionaire police ney jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. shehar Hyderabad mein atishzadgi ke waqeat mein rozafzon izafah ho raha hai. sarkari record ke mutabiq mah May ke sirf pehlay hafta mein atishzadgi ke 52 waqeat runuma ho chukay hain. un waqeat mein shehar ke muzafaat mein report kardah atishzadgi ke waqeat shaamil nahi hain. ahdidaro n ne kaha ke gharon mein aag lagnay ke ziyadatar waqiyaat bijli ke istemaal ke baais avorlod se honay walay shat circuit se hue hain jabkay kachre ko na munasib andaaz jalanay aur jalay cigrette pheink dainay ke baais khulay ilaqon mein aatishzadgi ke waqeat runuma hue hain. mausam garma mein deegar mousamoo ke maqabil bijli ka istemaal ziyada hojata hai. bijli ke istemaal mein izafah ke baais over load ki wajah se shat circuit ke waqeat runuma hamza hotay hain. regional fire officer ( sntrl regain ) Mr. V. Papaiah ne kaha ke darja hararat aik makhsoos satah par poanch jany se hiddat mein izafah ke baais sookhi ghaas aur kachre ko aag lag jati hai. aag pkrhline ka darja hararat jis par koi cheez aag pakad leti hai, mukhtalif ashya ke liye mukhtalif hota hai, jaisay lakri, tail aur ghaas ke liye yeh satah mukhtalif hoti hai. aksar khulay ilaqon mein atishzadgi, insani ghaltion ka nateeja hoti hai. aksar log be ahteyati mein kachre ko aag lgadite hain aur jali hui cigrette pheink dete hain, jis ki wajah se khaas kar mausam garma mein aag lag jati hai. kachre ko aag laganay ke baad agar usay munasib andaaz mein bujhaaya nahi jata hai to phir kuch hi der mein is mein chhupi chngaryan taizi se aag pakadleti hain. control room ke aik fire mean ne misaal dete hue bataya ke haal hi mein lakri ke pal par aag lag gayi thi, jahan khuli araazi par phainky gaye kachre mein aag pakar li thi jis ki wajah se wahan se guzarnay walay rahroon mein khauf o hraas phail gaya tha. fire tenders ne aag par qaboo pa liya.
76.title: Mausam e garma mein aag lagnay ke waqeat mein izafah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah baraye Israel ke qiyam ke khilaaf American consul khanah se numaindagi karne walay afraad ko muqami police ne hirasat mein le lyahe. Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke qiyam ke khilaaf mslmanan hyderabad ke ehsasat se waaqif krwane chand Ghayoor musalmanoon ki janib se aik mimorndm dainay ka faisla kiya gaya thatahm police ko mossola khufia it-tila-aat par aaj bhaari tadaad mein police jamiat, lkrh coat mein waqay jamaat islami ke dafatir par jama chaar logon ko police ne hirasat mein le liya jo begum pait mein waqay American sifarat khanah poanch kar aik ehtajaji Mahzar paish karna chahtay they. bataya jata hai ke Ameer jamaat islami Telangana wa Odhisa janab Hamid Mohammad Khan , secretary janab Mohammed Azharuddin aur molana Naseeruddin aur un ke aik saathi ko police ne hirasat mein le liya hai. muqami logon ne bataya ke chaar logon ki giraftari ke liye police ki bhaari jamiat poanch gayi thi jin mein khatoon police ohdedar bhi shaamil they, aisa lag raha tha ke police, dehshat gardon ke aik baday Racket ko pakarney lagi hai ya phir encounter honay wala hai. jab muqami logon ne jamaat islami ke ahbaab se pata kya to inhen maloom sun-hwa ke Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke qiyam ke khilaaf mslmanan hyderabad ke jazbaat o ehsasat se American hukoomat ko waaqif krwane sirf chaar afraad par mushtamil aik wafad American sifarat khanah poanch kar Mahzar paish karna chahta tha. sawal yeh peda hota hai ke aaya hindustaan mein Hindustanion ko –apne jamhoori haq ka istimaal karte hue ehtijaj karne ka bhi haq haasil nahi hai? is ke barkhilaf aik malik ka sifarat khanah azadana tor par Hindustanion ke sath mukhtalif ijlaas munaqqid karta hai, un ke liye tarbiati programmes munaqqid karta hai magar is par rokkk toak nahi lagai jati. bataya jata hai ke hirasat mein liye gaye un chaar afraad ko Dabir poora police station muntaqil kya gaya hai
90.title: Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke khilaaf ehtijaj ke paish e nazar ahteyati grftaryan

news_detail: Hyderabad. puranay shehar ke Mughalpura ilaqa mein Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat neh American sifarat khanah baraye Israel ki tall abib se Jerusalem muntaqili aur wahan se kaam kaaj ke aaghaz par aaj ehtijaj karte hue Israeli parcham Nazar aatish kya. Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat se wabsta nojawanon neh is iqdaam par apni barhami ka izhaar karte hue America aur Israel ke khilaaf naaray lagaye aur kaha ke Jerusalem par kisi bhi mumlikat ka haq nahi hai aur yeh bain al aqwami rjim mein shaamil hai. Jerusalem ko corpus separatum ka muaqqaf ataa kya gaya hai chunkay yeh shehar yahudion, esaion aur musalmanoon ke liye yaksaa tor par mutbarrik hai. Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat ke Mohammad usmaan aur Mohammad ban Umar neh bataya ke America neh tall abib se –apne sifarat khanah ko Jerusalem muntaqil karte hue jabir o ghasib mumlikat ki pusht panahi karte hue aalmi raye aama ki khilaaf warzi ki hai. un qaideen neh American consul khanah mein mahzar daakhil karne ka iradah rakhnay walay muslim qaideen ki giraftari ki bhi muzammat karte hue kaha ke yeh qaideen jo millat islamia hyderabad ke imaideen mein shumaar kiye jatay hain aur jo chahtay they ke mslmanan hyderabad ke ehsasat se waaqif karwaya jaye magar hidraabadi police neh inhen girftar karte hue ehtijaj ke jamhoori haq se mahroom kardiya
105.title: Jerusalem mein American sifarat khanah ke aaghaz par puranay shehar mein muzahira

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer baldi nazam o nasq o shehri trqyat mister ke tea rama rau ney kaha ke Hyderabad ko’ aloodgi se pak shehar’ bananay hukoomat, bijli se chalne wali 500 baseen khareeday gi. yeh gariyaan ibtida mein jee each am si hudood mein roshnaas karwai jayen gi. wazeer ney bataya ke riwayati diesel basoon ko marhala waar flat se htadya jaye ga.’ Mana Nagarma’ aik tabadlah khayaal ka programme mein jis mein wazeer, awam se un ke darina masail ki yaksoi ke liye tabadlah khayaal karte hain. unhon ney kaha ke jee each am si ney kachre ki nikasi ke liye battery se chalne wali gariyon ko istemaal karna pehlay hi se shuru kardiya hai. unhon ney Hyderabad ko aalmi shehar mein tabdeel karne awam ki shiraakat daari ki khwahish ki. wazeer ney haal hi mein Ameer pait mein barsati naalon se safai amlah ki janib se blankets aur carpets ko nikaalte ka hawala dete hue awam se khwahish ki ke woh thos aur maya nakara ashya ki nikasi alahda alahda karen .
121.title: Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay 500 bijli se chalne wali baseen

news_detail: Hyderabad. Makkah Masjid bomb dhamaka ke muqadma mein tamam mulzimeen ki bra_ea_iat ke baad jaissa tawaqqa ki jarahi thi waisa hi huwa. NIA ney bil akhir zairi‫n adalat ke faisla ke khilaaf appeal nah karne ka faisla karliya hai. national investy gation agency ( NIA ) ke zaraye ney CNN- News 18 ko bataya ke faisla ke 18 nukaat ke minjumlh 3 nukaat ‘tough to contest’ hai, jis ke baais agency Hyderabad ki adalat ke faisla ko challenge nahi kere gi. zairin adalat ka faisle mein quwwat hai aur mulzim afraad ke khilaaf koi shahadat nahi hai. Asimnanand ke wakeel jay sharmaa ny Television Channel  ko bataya ke mujhe yaqeen hai ke mutaliqa ohdedaron ny faisla ka mutalea kya hoga aur phir is faisla ko chlallenge nah karne ka faisla kya hoga. guzashta mah khusoosi adalat ny raast shahadat ke fuqdaan ke baayes 2007 mein Makkah Masjid mein hue bomb dhamaka ke tamam 5 mulzimeen ko buri kardiya tha. is waqt NIA ny kaha ke tha ke woh adalat ke faisla ki naqal haasil honay ke baad is ka jaiza le gi aur phir mustaqbil ki karwai ke baray mein tye kya jaye ga, lekin isi waqt se naqideen yeh kehte arhay they ke NIA zaireen adalat ke faisla par khamoshi ikhtiyar karle gi. NIA par is baat par bhi tanqeed ki jarahi thi ke mulzimeen ke khilaaf scienci andaaz mein tehqiqaat karte hue shawahid akhatta karne ki bajaye, markaz mein hukoomat ki tabdeeli ke sath hi mulzimeen ke tain naram rawayya ikhtiyar karli thi. hatta ke adalat ka faisla anay se qabal hi NIA ohdedar yeh bawar krwane ki koshish kar rahay they ke mulzimeen ke khilaaf thos shawahid nahi hain. yahi nahi balkay NIA ny Asimna nand ki zamanat par rihayi ke khilaaf bhi khamoshi ikhtiyar kar rakhi thi. yaad rahay ke Asimna nand ny raza karana tor par magistrate ke rubaroo Iqbal jurm karliya tha, halaank inhen yeh mauqa bhi diya gaya tha ke woh mukarrar goro khoz karne ke baad apna bayan qalamband karwaen magar woh –apne bayan par qaim rahay lekin markaz mein jon hi nrindr moodi ki zair qayadat bi jay pi ki hukoomat tashkeel payi, nah sirf Asimnanand ney –apne Iqbal bayan se munharif hogaye balkay tehqiqati agency ka muaqqaf bhi badal gaya. is muqadma ki aik khaas baat yeh bhi rahi ke muqadma Faisal karne ke sath hi Muaziz judge ny apna maktoob istifa, cheif justice high court ko paish kardiya tha. yeh aur baat hai ke un ka istifa na manzoor kardiya gaya. Makkah Masjid mein hue bomb dhamaka mein 9  musalli shaheed aur 58 afraad zakhmi hogaye they jabkay police fayrng mein 5 muslim nojawan shaheed hogaye they. is muqadma mein dayen baazu ki tanzeem ke 10 afraad ke khilaaf fard jurm aed kya gaya tha jis mein se aik ki mout hogayi thi aur 9 ke mnjmlh sirf 5 mulzimeen  Devendar Gupta,, Lokesh Sharmaa, -Swami Asimn nand urf Naba Kumar Sarkar, Bharat Mohanlaal Rateshwar urf Bharat bhai aur Rajendar Choudhri ko hi girftar kya jaska tha. deegar do mulzimeen Sandip V Dange aur Ramchandar Kalsangar mafroor hain. mazeed 2 afraad ke khilaaf tehqiqaat jari theen.
134.title: Makkah Masjid dhamaka muqadma : Asimnanand ke faisla ke khilaaf NIA ka appeal karne se Ihtiraz

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat Telangana naay yaum e Tasees Telangana ke mauqa par ‘Telangana state level awards  201’ ke liye 27 zumron mein 48 award yaftgan ka elaan kya hai jin mein sirf 4 Muslim hain. Awards ke liye mukhtalif shoba hayaat se talluq rakhnay wali mumtaz shakhsiyation ke intikhab ke silsila mein aik committee tashkeel di thi. dayrktr ( f ae si ) mehakma Saqafat o rukan knoynr committee naay mukhtalif shoba haae hayaat se talluq rakhnay wali 48 mumtaz shakhsiyation ki aik fehrist tayyar ki. / 2 June ko prayed ground par munaqqid shudni yaum e Tasees Telangana 2018 tqarib mein un awardyaftagaan ko cheif mnstr ke hathon aizaz se nawaza jaye ga. har award 1, 00116 rupay naqad inaam, shaal aur tauseef nama par mushtamil hoga. is award ke liye Urdu adab mein professor Mohammad Ali asar, urdu sahaafat mein janab Mohammad Abdul Muqeet Farooqi nama nigaar Etemaad Nizamabad, khail kood mein janab Mohammad Hussamudin aur behtareen sarkari khidmaat mein janab Khwaja Moinuddin assistant executive Kaleswharam project ko muntakhib kya gaya hai. Muslim award yaftgan mein do ka talluq Nizamabad se hai jahan ki rukan parliment mrs ke koyta Dukhtar cheif mnstr hain. behtareen baldia ke liye Nizamabad municiple karporasion ka intikhab amal mein aaya hai.
156.title: Yaum e Tasees Telangana ke mauqa par riyasati satah ke awards ka elaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. yun to aqliaton se mutaliq jitne bhi idaara jaat kaam karte hain un ki karkardagi nihayat hi naaqis aur mayoos kin hoti hai magar aisa lagta hai ke is par qaboo paate hue karkardagi ko muasar bananay ke iqdamaat karne ki bajaye is ko mazeed badter banadiya ja raha hai. karkardagi ko muasar bananay aur islahat laane ke to bohat daaway kiye jatay hain magar amli iqdamaat kuch nahi kiye jatay. aisa lagta hai ke Telangana state Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay ki jitni koshish ki jati hai itna hi is ki karkardagi bgrhti jati hai. haal hi mein Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab Shahnawaz Qasim ney Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay bohat se islahat laane ki koshish ki hai aur unhon ney E-filing tareeqa car ko muta-arif krwane ka beda uthaya hai magar ab to Waqf Board ka website hi down hogaya hai. is se qabal sabiq Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab asdallh ney Board ke umoor mein shfafit peda karne ke liye CEO ke jari kardah mimoz aur ehkaam ko Waqf Board ki Website  http://waqf.telangana.gov.in/ par paish karna shuru kya tha magar un ke tabadlah ke sath hi yeh silsila band hogaya tha magar ab to yeh haalat hogayi hai ke Waqf Board ki mazkoorah Website down hochuki hai aur yeh kayi dinon se band hai magar Board ney Waqf Board ki Website ke ahya ke liye koi koshish nahi ki gayi. hona to yeh chahiye ke Waqf Board ki Website ko aik jame Website banaya jaye taakay is ke zareya zaroorat mandoon ko darkaar maloomat, Waqf Board ke daftar puhanche baghair hi Website taq rasai haasil karte hue haasil karle satke hain. umeed ke is janib Chairman Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem aur CEO janab Shahnawaz Qasim fori tavajja den ge aur website par Board se mutaliq tamam maloomat faraham karen ge.
165.title: Telangana Waqf Board ka website down

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao 2

June ko wizarat aala ke chaar saal ki takmeel karen ge. un ki party ‘Telangana Rashtra Samiti’ Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ke maqbool aam schemes ki asaas par 2019 ke intikhabaat mein dobarah Iqtidaar haasil karne ka iradah rakhti hai. guzashta chaar barson mein hukoomat ney bijli, aab paashi, peenay ka pani aur zaraat ke shobo par ziyada tavajja di gayi thi aur intikhabi baras be rozgaar nojawanon aur farahmi rozgaar par tavajja markooz ki jaye gi. TRS hukoomat, 2014 intikhabaat mein Telangana ke aik laakh nojawanon ko rozgaar ki farahmi ke wada ko wafa karne mukhtalif mehakma jaat mein mukhtalif zumron par taqarruraat ke ailamiye jari kiye jayen ge. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao jo hafta ko Parade Grounds par munaqqid shudni jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge, nojawanon ko mlazmton ki farahmi par kiye gaye kaleedi faislon ka elaan karen ge.

TRS zaraye ka to yahan taq kehna hai ke Chief Minister 50, 000 mlazmton par androon 6 mah taqarrurat ka elaan karen ge. yahi nahi balkay samaaj ke pasmandah aur mahroom tabqaat ki Falah o behbood ke liye bhi mukhtalif akhtraay programon ka elaan karen ge. taham Telangana ke musalmanoon mein aik qisam ki mayoosi payi jati hai ke un ke sath kiye gaye aksar ahem waday wafa nahi kiye gaye hain aur in ke tain Mr. Chandrashekar Rao koi dilchaspi nahi rakhtay. un ahem wadon mein musalmanoon ko 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi aur auqaafi jayidadon ki Sayanat khaas kar dargaah hazrat Hussain Shah walii ke tehat waqay auqaafi jayidadon ki wapsi shaamil hai. yahi wajah hai ke soshil media par yeh remarks kiye jarahay hain ke hamein dawat iftaar ya Ramazan gifts nahi chahiye, bas 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi ka wada poora kardo. ilawa azeen samaaj ka aik tabqa ka yeh bhi ehsas hai ke aqliton khaas kar musalmanoon ki behbood ke buland bangh daaway karne walay Mr. KCR aqliaton ke liye thos iqdamaat nahi kar rahay hain aur inhen haqeer jantay hue un ko di janey wali imdaad ki rqomat ko qaleel rakhtay hain, jaissa ke kisanon ko fi aekar 4 hazaar rupay ki farahmi avrmslmanon ke liye 500 rupay se bhi kam maliyat ka ramadaan gift. mandaroon ke pujarion aur deegar mulazmeen ko sarkari mulazmeen ke mumasil tankhwahon ki farahmi aur is ke barkhilaf masajid ke Aima o mauzineen ko mahana sirf aik hazaar rupay ki farahmi
173.title: Telangana Formation Day: Hukumat 25,000 jayidadon ko pur kere gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. / 27 March ( press note ) Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke aik numainda vafd ne janab Ather Moueen riyasti saddar ki qayadat mein Telangana riyasat ke Director General of police Mr. Mahender Reddy se mulaqaat ki aur Nirmal Town mein Raam Noami ke mauqa par paish aeye firqa waranah fasadaat ke baad police ki janib se ki jarahi karwai ka coverage karne walay roznama Munsif ke staff reporter o Telangana urdu working journalists union Nirmal zila sadr Mr. Mohammad Fahim Ahmed Khan par police amlah ne andha dhund lathyan bursaate hue unhein shadeed zad o kob kiye janey ke waqea se DG pi ko waaqif karwaya. DGP ko tafseelaat se waaqif kerwatay hue union ke zimma daraan ne bataya ke Mr. Fahim Ahmed Khan apne gilaay mein press ka shanakhti card daaley hue they aur woh police amlah ko apni shanakht karwnay ke bawajood un par be dardi se hamla karte hue unhein zakhmi kiya gaya. zimma daraan ne urdu sahafi par hamla karne walay khaati ohdedaron ke khilaaf fori karwai karne ka mutalibah kya, jis par DGP  ne radd-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha kay SP Nirmal zila ko waqea ki mukammal tehqiqaat kerwatay hue khusoorwar ohdedaron ke khilaaf karwai karne ki hadaayat day di gayi hai aur tehqiqati report anay ke baad khaati ohdedaron ke khilaaf tadeebi karrawai karne ka tayaqqun diya. DG pi ne sahafion ke sath taawun karte hue jamhoriat ke tahaffuz ko yakeeni bananay aur mustaqbil mein is terhan ke waqeat ka iada nah hawas zimn mein mosraqdamat karne ka yaqeen dilaya. . DGP se mulaqaat karnay wale wafad mein Mrs Ather Moin riyasti sadr, Mohd Sajid Meraj sarparast, Layeequddin Secretary General, Rawoof Aazmi, Mohammad abdul Hakeem naib Sudoor , Syed Wajid Hussaini riyasati Khazen , Mohammad Aleemuddin Secretary General Kamareddy, janab Mohammad Abid sadar Asifabad o Manchriyal zialyee Unit, Mohammad Hussamuddin anchor Munsif TV, Abdul Rahim news anchor Munsif, Mohammad Mohsin  TV Associate Editor, Sheikh Farhaad khaleel T Tv news reader, Mohammad Akram, Mohammad jilani T TV aur deegar bhi mojodthe .
11.title: Nirmal mein sahafi par police hamla ke khilaaf DGP se TUWJU ki numaindagi

news_detail: Amravathi. Cheif Minster Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chndrababu Naidu ney markaz ke munqisama riyasat Andhra Pradesh riyasat ke sath muandana rawayya aur khusoosi moaqqaf ataa karne se ihtiraz se naraaz hokar aaj –apne yom paidaiesh ko ehtijaj ke liye muntakhib kya aur aik roza bhook hartaal par baith gaye. Mr. Naidu ny bhook hartaal se qabal babaye dastoor dr bi are ambidkr aur baani tlgo dishm party an tea rama rau ko kharaaj aqeedat paish kya. indra gandhi stadium mein jari yeh bhook hartaal shaam 7 : 00 bujey taq jari rahay gi. Mr. Naidu ki tlgo dishm party ny markaz mein brsraqtdar bi jay pi ke sath apni darina rafaqat ko khatam karliya. yaad rahay ke tlgo dishm party, an d ae ka hissa thi aur guzashta intikhabaat mein bi jay pi se mafahmat ke sath muqaabla kya tha. agarchay bi jay pi ny guzashta aam intikhabaat mein tanha qatee aksariyat haasil ki thi magar markazi kabeena mein apni Haleef jamaaton ke numaindon ko shaamil kya tha. tlgo dishm party ko bhi kabeena mein numaindagi ka mauqa ataa kya gaya tha taham aandhra pradesh ko khsos moaqqaf ataa karne ke masla par bi jay pi aur tlgo dishm party ke darmain dooria barhti gayi aur nateeja mein Mr. chand ra baabo Naidu ny –apne rufaqa ko markazi kabeena se alhd_h krwadya aur bil akhir bi jay pi se apni mafahmat ko bhi khatam kardiya. Mr. Naidu ki hukoomat, riyasat ki taqseem ke baad aandhra pradesh ko khusoosi moaqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte arhay they. cheif mnstr se izhaar ygangt ke tor par riyasat ke mukhtalif maqamat par bhi aik roza bhook hartaal ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai. reyasti assembly ke wazeer dr Kodela prasad jo hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain aur doctoron ny inhen 15 dinon taq bistar par hi aaraam karne ka mahswara kya tha aaj hospital chore diya taakay woh bhi bhook hartaal camp poanch saken. woh guzashta 7 dinon se bukhaar mein mubtala hain. cycle Rally ke douran bhi inhen mamooli chout aayi thi. tlgo film Director Timma Reddy ny Mr. Naidu se izhaar ygangt karte hue tlgo awam se khwahish ki ke woh Mr. Chandra baabo Naidu ka sath den .
23.title: Markaz ke rawayya ke khilaaf Chandrababu Naidu ki aik roza bhook hartaal

news_detail: Vijayawada- Payakaraopetta rukn Assembly mohtarma Vangalapudi Anitha ny jinhein Trumala Tirupati Devasthanam board ka rukan naamzad kya gaya tha, un ke isaai mazhab ke tain ansiyat o lagao ke baais peda shuda tanaza par khud ko board se alhd_h kar lanay ka faisla kya hai. yaad rahay ke mrs Anitha ki namzadgi ke baad un ka aik video soshil media par gasht karne laga jis mein inhen yeh kehte hue dikha ya gaya ke hamesha un ke sath bible hoti hai. Anitha ny Chief Minister mister Chandra baabo nayido ke mosooma aik maktoob mein un se khwahish ki ke Trumala Tirupati Devasthanam Board ke liye un ki namzadgi ko mansookh kardiya jaye. Telugu Channel ko 2014 mein Telugu Desam Party ki rukan Assembly ke dyie gaye aik interview ki clip mein inhen yeh kehte hue dekhaya gaya tha ke hamesha merebag aur car mein Bible hoti hai, Bible ke baghair mein kahin bahar nahi jati, jis ki binaa un ke isaai honay ka daawa kya ja raha hai. kayi Hindu groups ney un ki namzadgi ki mukhalfat karte hue Chief Minister se mutalba kya ke inhen board se nikaal diya jaye. mrs Anitha ny Chief Minister ke mosooma –apne itwaar ke maktoob mein kaha ke woh aik pedaishi hindu hai jo s si tabqa se talluq rakhti hain aur lord Venkateshwara par un ka aqeedah hai. maktoob mein Anitha ny kaha ke unhon ny faisla kya hai ke woh board mein baqi rehtay hue koi tanaza khara karna nahi chahti. unhon ny board ke liye inhen naamzad karne par Chief Minister ka shukriya ada kya. mrs Anitha ny kaha ke inhen bara dukh sun-hwa ke kuch mafadaat haslh rakhnay walay groups ny yeh tanaza khara kya hai. mein yeh kehna chahti hon ke mein aik hindu hon aur darj fehrist aqwam se talluq rakhti hon. mein lard Venkateshwara ki aik bhakt hon aur kayi martaba is mandir ki ziyarat kar chuki hon. bataya jata hai ke Chief Minister un ki is pehal par mutasir hue hain aur samgha jata hai ke un ki bajaye kisi dosray ko board ka rukan naamzad kardiya jaye ga. Telugu Desam zaraye ka kehna hai ke un ki jagah darj fehrist aqwam se hi talluq rakhnay wali kisi khatoon ko naamzad kya jaye ga .
42.title: Tirupati board tanaza : main aik hindu hoon, isaai nahi. TDP MLA

news_detail: Hyderabad. krnatk mein payi janay wali qabil lehaaz tlgo abadi ko Raghib karneJanta Dal ( s ) naay elaan kia keh agar woh Iqtidaar mein aeye gi to Bengaluru mein’ Telangana Bhavan’ taamer kere gi. Kanada Rashtra Telangana Association ke press release ke bamawajib Janta Dal ( s ) ki manshoor saaz committee ke sadrnasheen  PGR Sandhya nay Bidar ki Basvakalyan halqa assembly mein munaqidah aik ijlaas mein yeh tayaqun diya. sabiqChief Minister oJanta Dal ( s ) quayed Mr. kumaraswami 2 May ko Basvakalyan mein munaqadshudni aik intikhabi jalsa mein is ka bazabta elaan karen ge. Mr. sandhya is halqa assembly seJanta Dal ( s ) ke umeed waar hain. Kanada Rashtra Telangana Association ke baani sadrnasheen Mr. Sandip Kumar Maktala ke bamawajib Bengaluru mein aik Telangana Bhavan ki zaroorat hai chunkay shehar ki 15 feesad se zayed abadi do tlgo reyaston se talluq rakhti hai. Mr. sandhya naay kaha ke party ke intikhabi manshoor mein Bengaluru mein Telangana Bhavan ki taamer ke wada ko shaamil kya jaye ga aur party ke Iqtidaar mein anay ke fori baad is ki tameel ki jaye gi. unhon naay halqa assembly mein Telangana ke raye dahindon se Janta Dal ( s ) ki taied karne ki khwahish ki.
57.title: Bengaluru mein Telangana Bhavan taamer karne janata dil ka waada

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh mein aaj dopehar tofani hawaon aur taiz barish ke nateeja mein 10 hlaktin hui hain. Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh se ta haal 5, 5 halakaton ki it-tila-aat hain. dono tlgo reyaston mein aaj tofani hawaon, saalah baari aur barish ke baais kayi jaghon par darakht aur bijli khambay jarr se akhar gay. nashebi ilaqon mein barish ka pani daakhil hogaya jis ki wajah se kayi ghanton taq trafik mein khlal raha. taiz hawaon aur barish ke baais barqi sarbarahi par bhi bura assar para. raat der gay taq bhi kayi ilaqon mein bijli ki sarbarahi bahaal nahi hosaki thi. do janoobi reastain Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh guzashta chand dinon se shadeed garmi ki lapait mein the aaj dhuwan daar barish aur tofani hawaon ke baais mausam achanak tabdeel hogaya aur darja hararat mein zabardast gravt aagai. ghair mousmi barish ke baais mamool ki zindagi mein khlal peda hogyaavr faslun ko bhaari nuqsaan pouncha. Telangana ke dar-al-hakoomat Hyderabad aur muzafaat mein tofani hawaon, saalah baari aur taiz barish ke baais kayi ilaqay kuch der ke liye zair aabb aagaye, darakhton aur khmbon ke akhar jaane ke baais kayi jaghon par kayi dirtk rasta masdood reh gaya magar jee each am si ke emergency amlah ne pani ki nikasi aur jaroon se ukhad gay darakhton aur khmbon ko fori htadya. kayi maqamat par darakhten grjane se gariyon ko nuqsaan pouncha. shehar ke muzafaat Karman Ghat mein barish ke douran darakht ke neechay khail raha aik bacha bijli ki zad mein aakar halaak hogaya. Telangana ke wazeer abkari mister Padma rau jinhon ne Hyderabad ke kuch mutasirah maqamat ka dora kiya aur akhbari numaindon ko bataya ke jee each am si ko 45 darakhton ke ukhad jaane ki it-tila-aat masool hui hain. shehar ke 25 maqamat par barish ka pani jama hojane ki bhi shikayaat masool hui hain. wazeer tawanai mister jagadish ready ne bataya ke taiz hawaon ke baais 1, 250 bijli khmbon ko nuqsaan pounchanay ki it-tila-aat masool huien. hakkaam ne Hyderabad aur Warangal mein do emergency control rooms bhi qaim kiye hain. unhon ne kaha ke hum bijli sarbarahi ko bahaal karne koshan hain. aandhraprdish ke vshakha ptnm, Vizyanagaram aur Srikakulam azlaa mein bhi tofani hawae aur barish ka zor raha hai. janoobi sahili Andhra aur Rayalseema khitton mein bhi zabardast barish hui. Andhra Pradesh ke Guntoor aur Prakasam azlaa mein bijli girnay se 3 afraad halaak hogaye. gntor town mein 1 shakhs is par hoardings grjane ke baais halaak hogaya. zila Kurnool mein 1 shakhs darakht ke grjane par neechay dab kar halaak hogaya. taiz barish ke baais, aam, dhaan, makayi aur deegar faslun ko zabardast nuqsaan pouncha hai .
70.title: Telangana aur Andhra mein tofani hawaon ke sath taiz barish. 10 hlakaten

news_detail: Bellary. BJP ke ahem tareen umeedwaron mein shumaar kiye janay walay rukn Parliament Bellary Mr. B. Sri Ramulu ney apne haq e rayedahi ka istemaal karne ghar se bahar qadam rakhnay se qabal ‘gaaye’ ki pooja ki. aik tasweer bhi jari ki gayi jis mein dekha ja sakta hai ke Mr. B. Ramulu geirway rang ke kapron mein malbos, haldi ka laip lagi hui gaaye ki pooja kar rahay hain. Bellary ke 46 sala parlimntrin B. Ramulu, bdami halqa assembly se congress party ke umeed waar Chief Minister Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf BJPke umeed waar hain. woh Bellary ke qareeb halqa Assembly Mulakalmuru se bhi muqaabla kar rahay hain. jummay ke din congress ny election commission se mutalba kya tha ke inhen 2010 ke aik video ki asaas par na ahal qarar diya jaye jis mein inhen jnardhn ready ke mulawis honay walay Kaankuni case ke faisla par asar andaaz honay ke liye saB.q Chief justice ke aik rishta daar ko rishwat dainay ki koshish karte hue dekhaya gaya hai. Mr. Ramulu, ready bradrs ke intahi qareeB. hain. apni doulat o taaqat aur intikhabaat mein kamyaB. ke record ke sath Mr. Ramulu Karnataka mein BJPke ahem qaideen mein shumaar honay lagey hain. Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein woh aur Mr. B. s ‫d europa dono hi aisay arkaan Parliament hain jinhein assembly intikhabaat mein maidan mein utaara gaya hai. Mr. Ramulu un chand umeedwaron mein se aik hain jinhein intikhaB. muhim ke douran –apne intikhaB. halqon ka dora karne helly copter diya gaya hai. qiyaas kya jata hai ke Karnataka mein BJPke Iqtidaar mein anay ki soorat mein woh deputy Chief Minister hon ge aur party ke qaumi sarbarah Mr. amit Shah ny un qiyaas araiyo ki shiddat se tardeed nahi ki hai
98.title: Vote daalnay se qabal BJPumeedwaar ney Gaaye ki pooja ki

news_detail: Karnataka Assembly ke intikhabi nataij naay sab ko shashdar kardiya, hukoomat saazi ke liye darkaar saada si aksariyat ke baarey mein din bhar tajassus barqarar raha. BJPko Iqtidaar taq rasai se roknay ke liye Congressr naay Janata Dal S se taied talabb karne ki bajaye Janata Dal S ki taied ka peshkash kardiya. BJP agarchay sab se barri party ke tor par ubhri hai magar woh hukoomat tashkeel dainay ke muaqqaf mein nahi hai chunkay Congressr party naay 78 nashistain haasil karne ke bawajood 37 nashistain hi haasil karne wali janata dil sikolr ki taied karte hue each d kamaraa -swami ko cheif mnstr bananay ki himayat ki hai. BJP104 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki aur woh hukoomat tashkeel dainay sirf 9 nashiston se peechay reh gayi hai. 224 rukni Assembly ke liye 222 nashiston par intikhabaat hue they. aik halqa Assembly mein bhaari tadaad mein votr shanakhti kards ki dasteyabi ke baais aur aik halqa Assembly mein umeed waar ke intqaal ke baais intikhabaat ko mansookh kardiya gaya tha. agarchay BJPaur Janata Dal S naay Governor se khwahish ki ke usay Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ka mauqa diya jaye. ab tamam ki nazrain Governor par markooz hogayi hain ke woh kis ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hain. yeh Governor ki swabdid par hai ke woh sab se barri party ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hain ya ittehaad ko jis ke paas adadi qowat ziyada hai aur jo hukoomat tashkeel dainay ki soorat mein ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karsaktha hai. agar BJPko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat di jati hai to arkaan Assembly ki barray pemana par khareed o farokht ke imkanaat ko mustard nahi kiya ja sakta aur muntakhib arkaan Assembly apni wafadaariyan tabdeel kar saktay hain. Karnataka ke nataij, awam ki tawaquaat aur ghalib exit poll nataij ke barkhilaf aeye hain jis se aik tabqa ke shubhat ko taqwiyat haasil hoti hai ke Electronic Voting Machines ko programme ke zareya control karte hue mann maani nataij haasil kiye janey lagey hain. intikhabi nataij ko dekhen to BJPjisay 104 nashistain haasil hui hain guzashta ke maqabil 64 nashiston ka faida haasil sun-hwa hai, guzashta intikhabaat mein BJPsirf 40 nashiston taq hi mehdood thi, Congressr jis ko is martaba sirf 78 nashistain haasil hui theen usay guzashta intikhabaat mein 122 nashistain haasil hui theen is terhan usay 44 nashiston ka nuqsaan sun-hwa hai. is martaba bi SP aur aik muqami party ke aik aik umeed waar aur aik azad umeed waar ko bhi kamyabi haasil hui hai. BJPnaay 104 nashistain haasil ki hai magar voton ke tanasub mein woh Congressr se peechay hai. Congressr ko 38 % vote haasil hue jabkay BJPko 36. 2 % vote hi haasil hue hain, Janata Dal S ko 18. 3 % vote haasil hue hain. Karnataka Assembly intikhabaat mein s d pi aayi aur All India Mahila Empowerment Paarty ke tamam hi umeedwaron ki zamanaten zabt hogayi hain. Karnataka Assembly ke liye is martaba sirf 7 umeed waar hi kamyaab ho paye hain. Karnataka mein is se qabal 11 Muslim arkaan Assembly they. Karnataka mein musalmanoon ka tanasub 13 feesad hai. Karnataka mein 2008 mein 9 Muslim arkaan Assembly muntakhib hue they. Karnataka ki tareekh mein sab se ziyada Muslim umeed waar 1978 mein muntakhib hue they is waqt 16 Muslim arkaan Assembly they. is martaba muntakhib Muslim umeedwaron mein halqa Assembly Chambrajpait se Congressr ke umeedwaar Zameer Ahmed Khan , halqa Assembly Gubarga shumal se Congressr umeedwaar Kaneez Fatima, Mangaluru se Congressr umeedwaar U T Qadir , Narsimharaja se Congressr umeedwaar Tanveer Saith, Shantinagar se Congressr umeedwaar N A Haris , Shivajinagar (Bengaluru) se Roshan Baig aur Bidar se Congressr umeedwaar Mohammad Raheem Khan kamyaab rahay. un tamam umeedwaron naay BJP umeedwaron ko shikast dete hue Assembly taq puhanche hain. kaneez fatima jo janab Qamar al – islam marhoom ki bewa hai, Guberga se muntakhib honay wali pehli khatoon umeed waar ban gayi hain. Qamar ul Islam  6 martaba Assembly ke liye muntakhib hue they
112.title: Karnataka mein muallaq Assembly. Governor ke faisla par sab ki nazrain markooz

news_detail: Bengaluru. Hardware shop ke maalik aur government clerk ke tor par mamooli zindagi guzarnay walay 75 sala RSS Swayam Sewak Mr. B S Yediyurappane siyasat mein qadam rakhnay ke baad bulandiyon par yahan taq poanch gaye ke aksariyat ke baghair bhi aaj teesri martaba Karnataka ke Chief Ministerki hesiyat se jaiza le liya. Governor Karnataka Mr. Vijubhaiwala ne jo khud bhi aik RSS Swayam Sewak hain, Mr. ‫Yediyurappa ko Chief Ministerki hesiyat se halaf bhi dila diya halaanke BJP ko sirf 104 hi nashistain haasil huien aur kisi doosri party ne BJP ki taied ka elaan bhi nahi kya. BJP ne jin do azad umeedwaron ki taied haasil honay ka daawa kya woh bhi congress ke camp mein nazar arhay hain. is ke barkhilaf congress party ne jis ko 78 nashistain haasil huien, Janata Dal S ki tayeed ka elaan kya jis ke paas 37 nashistain hain. is terhan dono partiyon ki adadi qowat 115 hojati hai jo tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar 112 nashiston se zayed hai. yahi nahi balkay bi SP aur deegar do am ail as bhi congress camp mein hi nazar arhay hain. Mr. B S Yediyurappane Chief Ministerki hesiyat se jaiza letay hi waqt zaya kiye baghair nazam o nasq mein barri tabdeelian kar dein aur kai aayi ae s aur aayi pi s ohdedaron ke tabadlay kar diye, un mein advocate general, senior police ohdedaar shaamil hain. unhon ne additional cheif secretary baraye Chief Ministerko bhi tabdeel kardiya hai. shaam mein Governor haoz se jari elamia mein bataya gaya ke fori asar ke sath Mr. Madhusudan Naik ki jagah Mr. Prabhuling Navadagi ko riyasat ka Advocate General muqarrar kya gaya hai. hukoomat ne Mr. M. Laxminarayana ko jo Additional Chief Secretary public works ki hesiyat se faraiz injaam day rahay they, Additional Chief Secretary baraye Chief Minister muqarrar kya gaya hai. Elamia mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke un ka moaqqaf mehakma dakhla mein additional cheif secretary ke rutba ke mumasil hoga. sarkari aalamia ke mutabiq senior aayi pi s officer Mr. Amar Kumar Pande ko jo Additional Director General of Police Railway ke taur par khidmaat injaam day rahay they, Additional DGP  intelligence muqarrar kardiya gaya hai. Deputy Inspector General of Police Karnataka State Reserve Police Mr. Sandip Patil DIG Intelligence hon ge. Suprintendent of police Bidar Mr. D. Deveraja ka tabadlah Deputy Commissioner of Police Bengaluru Central Divsion ke tor par kya gaya. Suprintendent of Police Anticorruption Bureau Mr. s grace ka tabadlah bah hesiyat d si pi Bengaluru north east Divsion kya gaya hai. Supreme Court ne Mr. ‫Yediyurappa ki halaf bardari roknay se inkaar karte hue yeh kaha tha ke darkhwast par jummay ko kiye jany walay faisla par halaf bardari moqoof hogi. Supreme Court ne raat mein un darkhwaston ki samaat ki thi. Governor ne Chief Ministerko ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ke liye 15 din ka waqt diya hai. Governor ke is iqdaam par mukhtalif gooshon se tnqidin ki jarahi hain aur yeh kaha ja raha hai ke 15 din ki mohlat is liye di gayi ke is douran BJP ko arkaan ki khareed vo frokht ka mauqa faraham kya jaye
137.title: B S Yediyurappane Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ny aaj hukum diya ke hafta ko 4 : 00 bajay shaam ko Karnataka Assembly mein flour test kya jaye. Justice AK Sikiri, Justice S A Bobde aur Justice Ashok Bhushan par mushtamil aik bench, Congress aur Janata Dal (S) ki janib se governor Vajubhai Vala ke Karnataka mein tashkeel hukoomat ke liye BJPko madoo karne se mutaliq dair kardah darkhwaston ki samaat kar rahi thi. bench ny douran samaat kaha ke Mr. bi s ‫d europa ko hukoomat saazi ke liye madoo karne governor ke faisla ke qanooni juwaz par uljhnay se behtar hai ke hafta mein ewaan mein adadi qowat ka test karliya jaye aur kisi ko bhi koi mohlat nah di jaye. Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf lainay walay ‫d europa ki taraf se paish hotay hue senior advocate Mukul Rohtgi ny adalat ki janib se muqarara din ki mukhalfat karte hue ‘Floor Test’ ke liye koi munasib tareekh muqarrar ki jaye. Supreme Court ny floor test ke liye is terhan ki mohlat muqarrar karne ki maazi ki naziren paish kee. aaj din mein 10 : 30 bajay din mein jon hi adalti karwai ka aaghaz sun-hwa, Rohtgi ny do maktubaat hawala kiye jo governor ko paish kiye gaye they, jin mein se aik Mr. Yediurappa ke BJP ka qayed aiwaan muntakhib karliye jaanay se mutaliq hai jabkay dosray maktoob mein yeh id-daa kya gaya ke inhen darkaar tadaad mein arkaan Assembly ki taied haasil hai. Rohtgi ny kaha ke ‫d europa ke liye zurori nahi hai ke woh governor ko un tamam arkaan Assembly ke naam paish kere chunkay woh ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne tayyar hain. unhon ny inkishaaf kya ke BJPko Congress aur Jantadal-S ke arkaan Assembly ki tayeed haasil hogi avrih ke Congress aur Janata Dal s ki janib se likhe gaye maktubaat mein yeh ishara nahi hai ke ma baad intikhabaat mafahmat ko har rukan Assembly ki taied o himayat haasil hai. Rohtgi ny kaha ke’ ‘ doosri janib ke kayi arkaan Assembly ny mujhe bataya ke unhon ny Congress. Janata Dal S ittehaad ki tehreeri tayeed nahi ki hai. Aur main is moud par mazeed kuch nahi keh sakta.’ ‘ Congress ki taraf se paish hotay hue senior wakeel abhishk manu Singhvi ny Adalat Uzma se istadua ki ke woh faisla kere ke konsi party ko apni aksariyat saabit karne ka mauqa diya jana chahiye. unhon ny id-daa kya ke Congress. Janata Dal S baghair kisi takheer ke hafta ko ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne amaada hain. unhon ny yhan tak keh diya ke videography honi chahiye aur arkaan e Assembly ko munasib security faraham ki jani chahiye taakay woh be khauf vote day sakay. Supreme Court ny kaha ke woh DGP ko hukum day gi ke hafta ke din floor test ke liye munasib intizamaa kiye jayen. adalat Uzma ny Congress. Janata Dal S ko adadi qowat haasil honay ke bawajood governor Vajubhai Vala ki janib se BJP ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dainay ki maqoliat se mutaliq istafsaar kya. bench ny kaha ke’ ‘ kis bunyaad par governor ny faisla kya ke kon mustahkam faraham karsaktha hai, mehez is bunyaad par ke wahid barri party ny aksariyat haasil honay ka id-daa kya jabkay doosri janib Congress. Janata Dal s ko aksariyat haasil honay ko tehreeri taied haasil hai? bulaa shuba yeh aakhir-kaar adaad ka khail hai aur governor ko dekhnaa chahiye ke kis party ko aksariyat ki taied haasil hai.’ ‘ Supreme Court ny governor ko anglo indian baradri se kisi ko am ail ae naamzad karne se baz rakha hai. adalat ny ‫d europa hukoomat se kaha ke woh koi bara policy faisla karne se is waqt taq baz rahay tavqtik_h ewaan mein aksariyat saabit nahi hojati. Janata Dal s Karnataka unit ke sarbarah Mr. H.D. Kumaraswamy ke wakeel senior advocate Mr. Kapil Sibbal ny Assembly mein benchon ki taqseem aur aik Protem Speaker ke taqarrur ki maang ki.
152.title: Supreme Court ny hafta ko Karnataka Assembly mein khat e aetemaad haasil karne ka hukum jari kya

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka Assembly intikhabaat ke nataij mein kisi bhi siyasi party ko qatee aksariyat haasil nah honay ke baad se roz Afzun siyaCDrama honay laga hai. tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar arkaan Assembly ki taied ke baare mein ibham ke bawajood Governor Karnataka ney BJP qayed e muqanana MR. ‫Yediurappako tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat day di. cheif mnstr ke ohda ka jaiza letay hue ‫Yediurappaney nazam o nasq mein tabdeelian kar dein aur aaj sprim court ney ‫Yediurappahukoomat ko aiwaan mein aksariyat saabit karne ke liye Governor ki janib se di gayi 15 dinon ki mohlat ko ghata kar yeh hukum day diya ke woh hafta ke din 4 : 00 bujey shaam aiwaan mein aksariyat saabit kere. Governor ney RSS se talluq rakhnay walay senior rukan Assembly MR. KG Bopaiah ko pro-tem Speaker muqarrar kya hai aur ab Karnataka Congress ney aik audio clip jari karte hue yeh ilzaam aed kya ke BJP se wabsta Janardhan Reddyney is ke aik rukan Assembly ko rishwat dainay ki koshish ki hai. Karnataka Congress ney aik audio clip jari ki hai jis mein BJP quied Janardhan Reddy ney Raichur rural se muntakhib Rukn e Assembly ko doulat aur ohda ki peshkash ki hai. is audio clip mein Janardhan Reddykhulay tor par keh rahay hain ke inhen arkaan Assembly ko khareedney mein BJP ke qaumi saddar amit Shah ki pusht panahi haasil hai. press conference mein audio clip sunanay ke baad Congress leader ney twit mein ilzaam aed kya. is ilzaam par markazi wazeer o BJP quied MR. Prkash Javedkar ney kaha ke yeh audio CD Congress dirty trks department ki karstani hai. yeh aik jhooti CD hai. Congress aur Janata Dal Secular jis ke paas majmoi tor par 116 arkaan Assembly they, –apne arkaan Assembly ko bachanay koshan hain chunkay inhen dar hai ke un ki party ke arkaan Assembly ko doulat aur ohday ka lalach day kravr fouj daari karwaiyon ki dhmkyan day kar BJP 112 arkaan taied haasil karne ke darpay hai. Congress aur Janata Dal S ney ibtida mein –apne arkaan Assembly ko Bengaluru ki hotlon mein thehraya tha magar baad hyderabad muntaqil kardiya gaya. isi asna BJP ab bhi prazm hai ke woh kal aiwaan mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhaigi. kaha jata hai ke is ko Congress aur Janata Dal S ke kuch arkaan ney taied karne ka tayaqqun diya hai
175.title: Janardhan Reddy ney Congress MLA ko khareedney ki koshish ki, Karnataka Congress ka id-daa. Audio Clip ka ijra

news_detail: Misar ki aik fouj daari adalat ney Maroof aalam deen Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi sadarnasheen International Union of Muslim Scholars ki Sahebzadi aur un ke shohar Engineer Hussam Khalf ko dehshat gardi ke ilzaam mein daidh mah ke liye hirasat mein rakhnay aur in se poochgach karne ka hukum diya hai. Misri nazaad qatri aalam deen Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki beti aur un ke shohar ko Misri police ney chand mah qabal misar ke aik sayahati maqam se hirasat mein liya tha. Allama Yousuf Qardawi Qatar mein panah liye hue hain. Al-Wast party se talluq rakhnay walay Hussam Khalf aur un ki ahliya par khilaaf qanoon jamaat se talluq, hukoomat ka takhtah ulatnay par uksaane, dehshat gard tanzeem ke liye fndz jama karne aur dehshat gardon ko asleha ki kharidari mein muawnat faraham karne jaisay ilzamaat Ayad kiye gaye hain. khayaal rahay ke Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki sahbzdi Ula hamza Al Qardawi aur un ke shohar engineer Hussam Khalf ko Misri fouj ney guzashta baras 23 June ko shumali sahili ilaqa se is waqt hirasat mein liya thajb woh eid ul fittar ki tateel guzar rahay they. misar ke aik sikoriti zareya ney bataya ke Ula hamza Qardawi Qatar aur misar dono ki shehriat rakhti hain aur woh kayi saal taq qahira mein qatri sifarat khanah mein khidmaat injaam day chuki hain. Allama Qardawi ke wakeel Ahmed abbu aala maazi ney –apne aik Sabiqa bayan mein kaha tha ke un ki moklh Ula hamza aur un ke shohar par khilaaf qanoon qaim kardah jamaat se talluq aur Ikhwan almuslimoon ki maali muawnat ke ilzamaat Ayad kiye gaye hain. aik sawal ke jawab mein wakeel ney kaha ke tafteesh ke douran dono miyan biwi ney –apne oopar Ayad ilzamaat ki nifi ki hai ke un ka hizab ul wast ya Ikhwan almuslimoon se koi talluq hai. shadi ke baad se Ula hamza Qardawi ziyada arsa misar hi mein muqeem rahi hain taham woh Qatar bhi aati jati hain. Albata un ke bhai aur waalid bohat kam misar mein qiyam kar sakay. Ula Meh Qardawi ke teen betay aur do betiyan hain. aik beta misar mein engineer hai jab ke barri beti shadi ke baad America mein muqeem hai aur deegar bachay America mein zair e taleem hain. misar ke sath Saudi Arbia , bahrain aur mutahidda arab amarat ney dehshat gardon ki himayat ka ilzaam aed karte hue 5 June 2017 ko Qatar se apne taluqaat munqita karliye they. charon mumalik ney apne daawa ki tayed mein ta haal shawahid o saboot paish nahi kiye jabkay Doha mutawatar un ilzamaat ki tardeed karta araha hai. Saudi Arbia ki zair qayadat group ney Qatar mein 9 afraad aur 12 Khairati idaron prd_hsht gurdon se talluq rakhnay ka ilzaam aed karte hain jis ko Qatar be bunyaad aur tohmat par mabni qarar deta hai. is fehrist mein Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ka bhi naam shaamil hai jo Ikhwan almuslimoon ke bohat bade himayati samjhay jatay hain. yaad rahay ke Misar mein Ikhwan almuslimoon ki muntkhiba hukoomat ko general seesi ney 2012 mein be dakhal karte hue misar ka nazam o nasq –apne control mein karliya hai aur muntkhiba Wazeer e Azam Mohammad Mursi sameit hazaron Ikhwani qaideen ko uqobat khaanoon mein thoons diya gaya hai. Saudi Arbia ney Egypt mein baghaawat ki khul kar tayed o himayat ki hai aur Mohammad Mursi ko be dakhal karne mein ahem kirdaar ada kya hai.
17.title: Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki dukhtar wo damaad tafteesh ke liye police ke hawalay

news_detail: Hyderabad. Dukhtar Chief Minister wo Rukn Lok Sabha Nizamabad K Kavitha ne bil akhir Rukn Rajya sabha o musheer hukoomat Telangana  D Srinivas ko un ki mukhalif party sar garmion ki Padaash mein party se kharij karne ka mutalba kardiya hai. aaj bazabta tor par K Kavitha ne apni Nizamabad rahaish gaah par aik press conference mein D Srinivas ki mukhalif party sar garmion ki nishandahi karte hue inhen party se bar tarf karne ke mutalba par mabni Chief Minister o party sarbarah  ke Chandar shikhr rau ke mosooma maktoob ki naqal paish ki. is mauqa par party se talluq rakhnay walay chand arkaan assembly aur party ke senior qaideen bhi mojood thay. yeh maktoob saddar zila TRS ke zareya rawana kya gaya hai. D Srinivas se rabt peda karne par unhon ne fori koi rad-e-amal zahir nahi kya .

Guzashta chand dinon se party halqon mein D Srinivas ke mustaqbil ke baarey mein mukhtalif qiyaas aarayyan ki jarahi theen. jab se D Srinivas ke farzan D Arvind ne BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar ki tab hi se D Srinivas kute are s mein nazar andaz kiye jaaney ko wazeh tor par mehsoos kya ja raha tha. party programon mein bhi D Srinivas ko faramosh kya jaaney laga tha. inhen programon mein stage par madoo karna bhi gavaaraa nahi kya ja raha tha jis ko D Srinivas khud mehsoos karne lagey thay. guzashta chand dinon se yeh it-tila-aat masool horahee theen ke D Srinivas Delhi mein Congress party ke senior qaideen se rabita qaim kiye hue hain aur woh Congress party mein shumuliat ka zehan bnarhe hain. yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke party halqon mein yeh baat mashhoor hochuki thi K Kavitha aindah intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha ki bajaye assembly ke liye muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhti hain. yeh kaha jaaney laga tha K Kavitha halqa assembly Jagityal se muqaabla karne ka zehan bnalya hai. isi liye woh Jagityal par ziyada tawajah dainay lagi hain magar d Arvind ke BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karne ke baad inhen aindah intikhabaat mein Nizamabad Lok Sabha ke liye BJP ke aik taaqatwar umeed waar ke tor par ubhara jaaney laga jis ki wajah se Nizamabad halqa mein TRS ko sakht muqaabla darpaish ho sakta hai. bataya jata hai ke un halaat ke paish e nazar Chief Minister ne apni Dukhtar se kaha ke woh assembly ki bajaye Lok Sabha ke liye apni tawajah markooz kere. doosri janib D Srinivas apne farzand ke BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar kar lanay ke baais aik ajeeb sorat e haal se dochar thay. Androon TRS inhen mushtaba nazron se dekha jaaney laga tha .

Telangana ki siyasat par gehri nazar rakhnay walon ka khayaal hai ke D Srinivas ko darasal –apne siyasi mustaqbil se ziyada apne dono frzndon ke siyasi mustaqbil ki fikar la-haq hogayi hai. inhen bhi yeh yaqeen hai ke un ke farzand ke Nizamabad Lok Sabha se muqaabla karne ki soorat mein TRS mein un ki waqat baqi nahi rahay gi aur agar TRS se K Kavitha hi muqaabla karti hain to un ke farzand ki kamyabi ke imkanaat mohom ho jatay hain. Nizamabad mein chunkay Congress party hunooz taaqatwar nahi ban payi hai is liye agar woh Congress mein dobarah shumuliat ikhtiyar kar lete hain to Congress mein aik nai jaan askati hai. is terhan Nizamabad Lok Sabha ke liye muqaabla dorkhi ki bajaye sah rukhi hojaye ga aur voton ki taqseem ki soorat mein BJP ki kamyabi ke imkanaat barh jatay hain. isi liye woh TRS se alhdgi ki soorat mein BJP ki bajaye Congress mein shumuliat ko tarjeeh day rahay hain .

D Srinivas ko party se be dakhal karne ke mutalba par androon TRS party yeh behas shuru hogayi ke aakhir kin bunyadon par shikastkhorda D Srinivas ko party mein shaamil kya gaya aur inhen ohdon aur rutbon se nawaza gaya aur aaj phir un ki wafadaari par shak karte hue inhen bar tarf karne ka mutalba kya ja raha hai. party ke senior qayedeen ka yeh kehna hai ke TRS party ne apni hareef siyasi partiyon ko kamzor karne doosri partiyon ke tamam ahem qaideen ko targheeb dete hue TRS mein shaamil karliya aur inhen rijhaane ke liye ohdon se bhi nawaza jabke Telangana jad-o-jehad se hi party ka parcham thaamnay walay qaideen ko yaksar nazar andaz kardiya gaya hai. party ke senior qaideen ne naam zahir nah karne ki shart par bataya ke guzashta chaar baras taq party ke wazraa, muntkhiba awaami numainday aur ohday panay walay qaideen ne inhen nazar andaz kar rakha tha, hatta ke un qaideen ke paas un se baat karne ki bhi fursat nahi thi magar ab intikhabaat ke paish e nazar un qaideen ko ab telephones bhi anay lagey hain aur un se shkaytan yeh bhi kaha ja raha hai ke woh party sar garmion se kyun kinara kashi ikhtiyar kar rahay hain. un qaideen ka kehna hai ke yeh sab intikhabaat ke paish nazar kiya ja raha hai aur jon hi intikhabaat khatam ho jaien ge woh phir se apni party mein ajnabi ho jaienge
44.title: D Srinivas aur TRS

news_detail: Insaaniyat ko sharmsaar kardainay walay aik waqea mein qarz ke bojh taley dabey 1 shakhs ne 3. 50 lakh rupay mein apne do frzndon ko farokht krdyaavr apni biwi ko bhi farokht karne ki koshish ki. –apne shohar ke napak mansoobah se aagah hotay hi khatoon ne –apne maiyka bhaag kar khud ko bchalya. jab yeh khatoon police se rujoo hui to muqadma darj karne se inkaar kardiya gaya. be bas khatoon bil akhir aayi si d s ke ohdedaron se madad ke liye rujoo hui. yeh waqea Nandyal ke qareeb Koilkuntala mauza mein paish aaya. bataya jata hai ke Buddga Jangamma  Muddileti buri aadato ka shikaar hokar bulaa noshi karne laga hai, woh deegar buri aadato mein bhi mubtala hogaya thajs ke baais woh bhaari maqrooz hogaya tha. qarz ki adai se majaboor hokar is ne apni do na baligh bachiyon ko 3. 5 lakh rupay mein farokht kardiya. is ne kharidaran ke sath aik moahida bhi tehreer kya tha jis ki ruu se is ki betiyan baaligh honay par kharidar ke hawala kardiya jaye hamza ga jabkay is ki biwi ku 5lakh rupay ke aiwz is ke cosuon ko farokht karne par amaada hogaya tha. baad azan is ne apni biwi Venkateshwaramma ko bhi farokht karne ki koshish ki taham aurat ko is ke mansoobah ka ilm hogyaavr woh –apne mabaqi do bachon ko le kar faraar hogayi aur –apne maikay ja pohanchi. is ne nindiya l- police mein shikayat bhi darj karwai, lekin police ne shikayat par koi karwai nahi ki, jis ke baais woh aayi si d s se rujoo hui. is ne darkhwast ki ke police, moahida ko zabt karlay aur is ke shohar ko girftar karlay. bataya jata hai ke woh 15 lakh rupay taq ka maqrooz hogaya tha
65.title: Sharaabii shakhs ne do baityon aur biwi ko farokht karne ki koshish ki

news_detail: Kurnool-Wazir Panchayat Raj hukoomat Andhra Pradesh Nara Lokesh ke Kurnool ke daura ke mauqa par Anjuman Taraqi Urdu Kurnool ki janib se Urduzban ki taraqqi wo deegar masayal ke silsila mein numayindagi ki gayi. Numaindagi mein bataya gaya ke riyasat Andhra Pradesh se shaya honay walay Urdu akhbaraat ke liye mehakma it-tila-aat o taaluqaat e aamma se talluq ke bagair raast salana kam se kam 10 crores rupey Manzoor karkay ishtiharaat jari karen, Kurnool mein qaim Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University mein Sheikh ul jamia ki haisiyat se khidmaat injaam dainay walay Dr. Muzafar Ali ku Urdu se la-taluqi aur Ahle Urdu se dushmani ki buniyad par Urdu University ku zawal par lane ke nateeja mein bar tarf karte hue kisi behtar Sheikh ul Jamia  aljamah kar taqarrur amal mein layajaye, shehar Kurnool mein qayim Government Minority Junior College mein khidmaat anjam dainay walay gair Urdu daan Principal ke bajaye kisi Urdudan Principal ka taqarrur karte hue Regular tadrisi wo gair tadrisi amlah ka taqarrur amal mein layajaye, Government Minority Pre-metric Girls Hostel mein khidmaat injaam dainay wali Muazzif ST khatoon ke bajaye kisi Urdudan aur harkiyati khatoon ka taqarrur karte hue Muslim ladkiyon ki taleemi taraqqi mein haath bataya jaaye . Minorities Finance Corporation, mein khidmaat injaam dainay walay gair Urdu daan Executive Director Hemachandra ki  karkardagyon par tahqiqaat karte hue kisi Urdudan Executive Director ka taqarrur amal mein layajaye, isi daftar mein  aarzi khidmaat injaam dete hue darkhwast guzaron ke sath badtameezi karne walay Mukaram Khan ko bartarf kiya jaye, berozgaar Muslim naujawanon ku rozgaar se marboot karne ke liye Minorities Fianance Corporation ki janib se jari kiye janey walay bank link qarza jaat ke bajaye raast qarza jaat jari kiye jayen, Dolhn scheme ku Chandranapally Kanuka mein tabdeel karne ke bajaye dulhan scheme hi ku barqarar rakha jaaye aur Minorities Welfare Department se munsalik rakhen, Roshni package par pur tarha amal karte hue riyasat ke har sarkari daftar par Urdu zaban mein Boards lkhwayin aur aqliati dafatir mein khidmaat injaam dainay walay tamam mulazmeen ke liye Urduzban lazim qarar dein, Wazeer e Azam pandrah nukati programme ke silsila mein har maah pabandi se nashist muqarrar karen, tamam afsaraan ki shirkat kolazmi banayen aur is puri tarha amal karen. is wafad mein sadar Kareemullah Khan sahib ke alawa, Afsar Pasha, khaleel Ahmed , Rasheed Ahmed aur Azmatullah Khan shareek rahay
79.title: Wazir Panchayat Raj ke dora ke mauqa par Anjuman Taraqi Urdu ki numayindagi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naidu apni party ke do Arkaan Assembly B. Rama Rao aur Pandurthi Venkatesh par ohdedaron ke sath ghair mohazib rawayya ikhtiyar karne par barhami ka izhaar kya. Telugu Desam Party ke Rukn Assembly ne Reniganta Airport par amlah ke sath nazebah rawayya ikhtiyar kya tha. Chief Minister ki mudakhlat par rukan assembly neh amlah se moazrat khawahi karli. Rajahmundry Sub-Collector Office mein Venkatesh ke tursh rawayya par sakht tanqeed ki jarahi hai. Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ne Arkaan Assembly ko intibah diya ke jab woh ohdedaron se mulaqaat karen to woh apni hudood ko na phalangen. Telugu Desam sarbarah ne kaha ke woh koi bhi qaayed un ki hukoomat ki badnami ka sabab banay ga to woh bardasht nahi karen ge.
92.title: Chandrababu Naidu apne Arkaan Assembly ke tursh rawayya par barham

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney aaj Gajwel mein ‘Telangana ko Haritha Haram’ programme ke chouthay marhala ka aaghaz kya. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney indra chowk par ‘kadam’ (cadamba) ka pauda lagaya. Town mein logon ney record 1,00,116 pauday lagaye. Wuzraa, Arkaan e Parliament, Arkaan Assembly aur deegar muntakhiba awaami numaindon ney riyasat bhar mein aaj ‘Haritha Haram’ programme mein hissa lete hue shajarkari ki. Chief Minister ney Praganapur, Mulg  aur Turkapally  villages mein Kora Nagaraju ki rihaishgaahon par nariyal ke bhi darakht lagaye. Chief Minister ney Gajwel jatay hue Forests Research Station Mulug ka bhi daura kya jahan unhon ney Singarapally jungle ka tahaffuz karne par mehakma ke ohdedaron ki kawishon ki sataish ki aur majmui taur par 5 lakhs rupay inaam ka elaan kya aur izafi amlah aur funds ki farahmi ka tayaqqun diya. Chief Minister ney mahireen ke mahswara par kadamb ka pauda laganay ka faisla kya. Yeh pauda tibbi khususiyaat ke sath sath mazhabi ahmiyat ka bhi haamil hai.
113.title: Haritha Haram ke chouthay marhala ka Gajwel mein aaghaz

news_detail: Nizamabad. Telangana Jana Samithi (TJS) ke sarbarah Professor Kodandaram ko peer ke din yahan Bhiknoor Toll Gate par Police ne is waqt hirasat mein le liya jab woh police ki janib se hirasat mein liye jarahay kisanon se mulaqaat karna chahtay they. Police ne unhen mutala kya ke zila mein qanoon zaabta e foujdaari ki dafaa 144 ko nafiz kardiya gaya hai aur unhen kisanon se mulaqaat karne ki ijazat nahi hai. Yahan yeh zikar karna zaroori hai ke aabpaashi ke liye SRPS ke pani ki ijrayi ke liye kisanon ka mutalba shadeed ehtijaj mein tabdeel hogaya. Armoor Sub division ke apne mawaziaat mein kisanon ke ehtijaj ke baayis Police ne dafaa 144 nafiz kar diya hai. Police jamiat ko saaray zila mein taiynaat kardiya gaya hai. Subah mein Professor Kodandaram ne Gun Park Hyderabad mein alahdah Telangana riyasat ke muhim jo Professor Jai Shankar ko un ki barsi ke mauqa par khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya.Is mauqa par khitaab karte hue Prof.Kodandaram ne ProfJai Shankar ke alfaaz duhraey ke ‘awam ko alhadah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ke baad bhi muhim chalana padega.’ Unhon ne kaha ke Tehreek Telangana ke samraat sab tak pohanchanay professor jiye Shankar ke maqsad ko poora karne ke liye har aik ko Tahrikaat chalana padega. Unhon ne kaha ke professor Jai Shankar ne Tehreek Telangana mein sanjeedgi aur jazba ke tehat hissa liya. Is se qabal TJS ke daftar mein Professor Jai Shankar ke portrait ko phoolmaala paish karkay khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya
138.title: Prof Kodandaram ki Bhiknoor Toll Gate par giraftari

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahekuma sahet o tababat mazeed 6′ Wellness Centers’ Jaria mah shuru karne ke moaqqaf  mein hai.
