Mahekuma Siddipet, Kukatpally, Nalgonda, Adilabad, Nizamabad aur Mahboob Nagar mein naye Wellness Center shuru kar raha hai. Mahekuma ke ohdedaron ney bataya ke Siddpet, Kukatpally aur Nalgonda ke Wellness Center ke liye amlah ke taqarruraat ka amal pahelay hi mukammal hochuka hai. Unhon ney bataya ke maabaaqi Wellness Center ke liye amlah ke taqarrurat ka amal androon do yaum mukammal karliya jaye ga. Riyasti Hukoomat ney haal hi mein faisla kya ke Hyderabad mein waqay maujooda Wellness Center ke alawa Gandhi Government Hospital aur Osmania General Hospital mein bhi Wellness Center qaayim kiye jayen.
154.title: Jaria mah mazeed 6 ‘Wellness Center’ ka aaghaz

news_detail: Warangal Zila Collector Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney aik Video Channel ko video interview mein yeh tasleem kya ke unhen hukumat ki janib se allot kardah 133 sala qadeem Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ke is iqraar par aik tanaza paida hogaya hai. Zila Collector ney haal hi mein muqami Web Channel ko dyie gaye aik interview mein kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke zila intizamia ki janib se inhen allot kardah sarkari Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ka yeh video Social Media par Viral hogaya hai. Zila Collector ke is daaway ki kisi maahir e mafooq ul fitrat waqhiyat ke zareya tauseeq to nahi karwai gayi taham un ke is iqraar se aik tanaza paida hogaya hai ke woh zaeef ul-etqadi (Superstition) par yaqeen rakhti hain. Is video mein IAS ohdedar, Bungalow ke barey mein dilchusp maloomat ka tabadlah karte hue nazar aati hain sath hi unhon ney yeh id-daa kya ke is qadeem imarat mein un ke hamrah aik bhoot bhi deera jamaye hue hai. Is Bangalow ka sang e buniyaad 133 saal qabal yahan mamoor suprident superintendent Engineer ki ahliya Mrs George Palmer ney rakha tha. Yaad rahay ke Asif jahi daur mein george Palmer hi sarkain bichenay ke umoor ke nigran they. Woh mukhtalif muqamat bashamool Karimnagar, Warangal aur Khamam waghera mein sarkari Bunglow taamir karne ke bhi nigran they. Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney is interview mein yeh bhi kaha ke 130 saal se ziyada qadeem is imarat mein shagaaf parney shuru hogaye hain. Unhon ney bataya ke imarat ke aik kamrah ki chhat 20 fit buland hai. Bangalow mein koonay hain jis ki wajah se barish ka pani imarat mein andar daakhil ho raha hai. Imarat ki Tazaeen ka kaam fi al-waqt chal raha hai. Zila Collector ney bataya ke un ka jaiza lainay se qabal Ohdedaron ney shayed taantrikon ko talabb kya tha aur pehli manzil par kuch jhaad phoonk ki thi. Unhon ney mujhe aagah kiya tha ke mein pehli manzil par shab bisri nah karoon jo store room ke tor par istemaal hota hai chunkay vha n aik bhoot hai. Zila Collector ney kaha ke unhon ney saaray ilaqa ki safai karwai hai magar Bangalow ki pehli manzil par raat guzarnay ki kabhi jurrat nahi ki chunkay wahan aik bhoot 133 saal se intzaar kar raha hai.
168.title: Warangal zila collector ke Bungalow mein bhoot rehta hai, Collector ka id-daa.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat e Telangana ne sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ke dehaant aur kal un ki aakhri rusumaat ke paish e nazar buzurg rehnuma ke ehteraam mein jumma 17

August ko aam taateel ka elaan kya hai. Tamaam sarkari dafaatir, neem sarkari idaray, awaami shoba ke idaray, Corporations Boards, taleemi idaray waghera band rahen ge. Markazi Hukoomat ne pehlay hi 7 roza qaumi soug ka elaan kya hai. Iss dauran Qaumi Parcham nisf bulandi par lehrata rahay ga aur tamam tafrihi programmes mansookh kar diye gaye hain. Ibtida mein Telangana mein taateel ke talluq se uljhan payi jati thi chunkay sabiq Wazeer e Azam ke dehaant par Chief Secretary ki janib se Zila Collectors aur Commissioners of Police and Superintendents of Police ke liye jari kardah crash message mein sirf markazi hukoomat ki janib se elaan kardah qaumi soug ka hi tazkara kya gaya tha. Taham baad azan taateel ka elaan kya gaya jis ki ittila barsar e iqtedaar TRS ke tarjuman angrezi akhbar “Telangana Today’ aur Telugu News Channel ‘T News’ ke zareya tateel ke elaan ki khabar aam hui.
177.title: Telangana Hukumat ka Juma ko taateel ka elaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Gulbarga (Kalaburagi) Riyasat Karnataka se talluq rakhnay walay aik aazim e Hajj Janab Abdussattar umar 69 saal ka gurday fail hojane ke baayis jumeraat ki subah Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein inteqaal hogaya. Woh cover number KAF-15503-2-0 ke tahet apni ahliya ke hamrah 10

August ko Hyderabad se ba azm Hajj rawana hue they. Special Officer Telangana State Hajj Committee Prof. SA Shukoor ney Hajj Mission aur khadim  ul Hujjaj ko un ki namaz e janaza aur tadfeen ke liye fauri karwaiyan karne ki hidayat di. Namaz e janaza Haram Shareef mein ada ki gayi aur tadfeen Makkah Mukarrama ke qabrastan Shaaryeen mein amal mein aayi. Sadarnasheen Telegana State Hajj Committee Janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan aur Special Officer Prof. SA Shukoor ney izhaar taaziyat karte hue marhoom ke ayizza ke liye saber Jameel ki talqeen ki. Iss dauraan Hyderabad embarkation point se talluq rakhnay walay tamam Hujjaj karaam Makkah Muazzama mein apni apni rehayish gaahon mein muqeem hain aur kheriyat se hain. Hajj Mission aur khadim ul Hujjaj se musalsal rabt rakha gaya hai aur Hujjaj karaam ki sehat o wo salamati ke talluq se maloomat haasil ki jarahi hain.
22.title: Gulbarga ke aazim e Hajj ka Makkah Muazzama mein intqaal

news_detail: Kurnool. Sabiq wazeer aanjhani Bhuma Nagi Reddy aur Shobha Nagi Reddy ki Dukhtar o aandhraprdish ki wazeer sayahat Bhuma Akhila Priya ney shadi ke bandhan mein bndh jaaney ka faisla karliya hai. Shadi ki is taqreeb ko aik bahut baday ijtima mein tabdeel karne ki mansoobah bandi ki jarahi hai. Zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq shadi ki taqreeb mein logon ko madoo karne ke liye lorry bhar ruqqey print kurwaye gaye hain, aur unhen 30, 000 logon mein khaas kar Allagadda aur Nandyal Assembly halqon ke Telugu Desam Party kaarkunon mein taqseem kiya jaye ga. Bhuma Akhila Priya ki shadi sanatkar Madhur Bhargava Ram Naidu se 29
August ko shobha Nagi Reddy Engineering College Allagadda mein anjaam paye gi. Shadi ke intizamaa ke liye Goa ki aik Event Management Company ki khidmaat se istifada kya gaya hai.
47.title: Andhrayee Wazir ki shadi. 30,000 logon ki dawat

news_detail: Nalgonda- Miryalaguda ke saakin janab Mohammad Khan (70) ka baad adayee e Hajj Makkah Mukramah mein qalb par hamla ke baayis inteqaal hogaya. Yahan mausula it-tila-aat ke mutabiq woh manasik  Hajj  ki adayee ke baad Makkah Mukramah wapas lout gai thae ke un ke qalb par hamla huwa. Unhen qareebi Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya tab tak un ki rooh qafas e unsari se parwaaz kar gayi. Un ke psmandagan mein 7 betay aur 4 betyan hain. Un ka khandan Sitaram Puram, Miryalaguda mein muqeem hai.
60.title: Miryalaguda ke Haaji ka Makkah Mukramah mein intqaal

news_detail: Peddapalli. Zila Peddapalli ke mauza Hanumantupet mein hafta ki subah aik bada haadsa tal gaya. Bachon se ladi aik School Bus barqi Transformer se takra gayi taham Bus mein sawaar bachay mehfooz rahay. Bus ke Transformer se takaraane ke baad woh Transformer se judey taaron par jhoolti rahay, aur yahi taar Bus ko khait mein ulat janey se bachaaye rakhay. Jis waqt yeh haadsa paish aaya is waqt barqi sarbarahi masdood thi jis ki wajah se koi bada sadesa paish nahi aaya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq qareeb 8:45 bajey subah driver ney Sukhmaya kamaan ke qareeb gadi modte hue Bus par qaboo khoodia aur Bus be qaboo hokar Transformer se takra gayi. Transformer se takaraane ke baad Bus ulat hi padtee thi ke Transformer se judey taron ney Bus ko palti khanay se rokay rakha. Yeh Bus Crescent High School ki thi aur haadsa ke waqt 50 bachon ko school le jarahi thi. Jis waqt yeh haadsa paish aaya Bus mauza Vennampalli mandal Kalvasri Rampoor se bachon ko sawaar kar leney ke baad wapas Peddapalli lout rahi thi. Is haads se 8 bachon ko mamooli chouten ayen jinhein fori firstadd diya gaya.
82.title: Peddapalli mein 50 Schooli bachay karishmati taur par bach gaye.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Akhirkaar sarkari mulazimaton mein taqrrurat aur taleem mein 95 feesad tahaffuzaat muqami umeedwaron ke liye aur 5 feesad khulay zumra mein rakhney Riyasati Hukumat ki tajweez bahut jald haqeeqat mein tabdeel honay wali hai. Ghair munqasim Andhra Pradesh mein 43 baras tak laagu rehne walay qadeem Presidential Order ki jagah naya Presidential Order androon do yaum le le ga. Chief Minister  Telangana Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao, Wazeer e Azam Mr.  Narendra Modi ko zonal system ki ifadiyat ke baaray mein qaayel krwane mein kamyaab hogaye jis par tamam sathon par mubahis ke baad nazar e saani ki gayi hai. Naya zonal system, Sadar Jamhooria Hind ki manzoori ke baad laagu hojaye ga. Iss se sarkari Jobs aur sarkari mulazmeen ke tabadlon mein shfafit ko yaqni banaya jasakay ga. Alahda Telangana riyasat ki tehreek mein muqami logon ko Jobs ki farahmi aik kalidi mauzou tha. Naye zonal system ka maqsad ghair munqasim riyasat mein zair e tameel nizaam ki tamam khamion ko daur karna hai. Telangana mein azlaa ki tadaad ko 11 se badha kar 31 karte hue revenue admnstrishn ki tanzeem jadeed ke baad is ki zaroorat mehsoos ki gayi. mujawaza naye zonal system ko Sadar e Jamhooria Hind ki manzoori ke liye markaz ko rawana karne se qabl Cabinet ne manzoori di thi. is saaray amal ki shakhsi nigrani Chief Minister ne khud ki thi aur Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se mulaqaat ke mauqa par unhen muqami logon ko 95 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi ki zaroorat ke baaray mein samjha ya tha. Naye zonal system ke mutabiq Telangana mein 31 naye azlaa par mushtamil 7 Zones aur 2 Multi Zones waza kiye gay hain.
104.title: Jobs aur Education ke liye naya Telangana Zonal System

news_detail: Palakollu ke Telugu Desam Party  (TDP) ke Rukn Assembly Rama Naidu ke khilaaf sarkari aab paashi schemes ko anjaam dainay walay aik Contractor ney yeh kehte hue Police mein shikayat darj karwai ke aakhir uz zikr ney MLA ko commission na dainay par unhen dhmkaya aur harasan kya ja raha hai. Contractor Prudhuvi Raj ney Dist. Suprintendent of Police se rujoo hotay hue Rukn Assembly ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai. Unhon ney muqami Circle Inspector Krishna Kumar ki bhi shikayat ki ke Police ohdedar, Rukn e Assembly ki madad kar rahay hain. Unhon ney yeh bhi kaha ke Police ohdedar ney un ke waalid ko raat mein talab karte hue dhmkaya.
124.title: Telugu Desam Party ke MLA ke khilaaf Contractor ki Police mein shikayat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Zila Khamam mein Aswarapurpet Assembly halqa se talluq rakhnay walay Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke Senior qayed Kondalkandla  Venkat Reddy ney chand qaideen ke sath party ko khairbad keh diya. Woh zila ke Chandrugonda aur Annapureddypalle Mandals ke maqbool aam qayed hain. Venkat Reddy jo sabiq wazeer Jalgam Prasad Rao ke pairokaar thae apne siyasi career ka aaghaz uss waqt kiya tha jab Anjhani Chief Minister Y S Rajshekhar Reddy Congress ke qayed thae. Venkat Reddy ney congress party mein apni khidmat anjaam di thi aur Kothagudem halqa Assembly mein Party ki kamyabi mein kaledi role ada kya tha. Baad azan woh YSR Congress party mein shaamil hogaye thea. Woh chand saal qabal Congress party ke aik aur kalidi qayed Thati Venkateshwarulu ke hamrah TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiyar ki thi. Maloom huwa hai ke sabiq wazeer Jalgam Prasad Rao ney Venkat Reddy se riyasat mein siyasi tabdeelion par tabadlah khayaal tha aur yeh elaan kya tha ke woh mutahidda Khamam Zila ke kisi aik halqa assembly se muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhtay hain. Venkat Reddy ke is faisla se ab yeh wazeh hochuka hai ke woh Congress Party mein bahut jald shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge.
141.title: Khamam  ke Senior qayed TRS ko khairbad keh diya

news_detail: Amravati. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu ke farzand o General Secretary Telugu Desam Party Mr. Nara Lokesh ney kaha ke karguzaar Chief Minister Telangana o Sadar TRS Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke sath hi umeedwaron ka elaan karte huwe badi ghalti ki hai. Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao faisla saazi mein ujlat baz saabit huwe hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Mr. Chandhrashekhar Rao ki janib se jari kardah umeedwaron mein kayi umeedwaron ko aawam ki narazgi ka saamna hai. Intekhabaat mein nisf se zayed umeedwaron ko nakami ka monh dekhnaa pade ga. Telangana riyasat mein intekhabaat mein Telugu Desham Party ke hissa lainay se mutaliq kiye gaye istefsaar par Wazeer Information Tecnology Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke is khusoos mein Party munasib faisla kere gi. Unhon ney yeh ishara bhi diya ke un ki Party zaroor Telangana Assembly intekhabaat mein hissa le gi. Samjha jata hai ke Telugu Desham Party, Telangana ki tamam Assembly nashiston par apne umeed waar khada kar ney ki bajaye makhsoos nashiston par hi apne umeedwaar maidan mein utaarey gi. Mutahidda Andhra Pradesh ki taqseem ke baad Telangana mein Telugu Desam Party ka dhancha kaafi kamzor hogaya hai. Party se wabsta kayi ahem qaideen ney party ko khirbad kehte huwe Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ya phir doosri siyasi partiyon jaisay Congress aur BJP mein shamouliyat ikhtiyar karli hai. Party mein ab aisa koi chehra nahi hai jo Telangana mein maqbool aam ho. Telugu Desam Party sarbarah Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ko itni fursat nahi hai ke woh apni riyasat ke umoor ki anjaam dahi ko chod kar Telangana mein intekhabi muhim chalaye. Hatta ke Mr. Lokesh bhi Telangana mein ziyada maqbool nahi hain. Agar Telangana mein Telugu Desam Party kuch karna chahti hai to usay anjahani N.T Rama Rao ke pote film adakar Jr.NTR par hi takiya karna pade ga aur shayed woh bhi Telangana mein intekhabi muhim chalanay se ziyada dilchaspi nahi rakhtay.
153.title: KCR ney badi ghalti karli: Nara Lokesh

news_detail: Warangal. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke sath hi kaarguzar Chief Minister o sarbarah Telangana Rashtriya Samiti K Chandrashekhar Rao rao ney party ke 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kar di hai. party ki jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein sirf do maujuda Arkaan e Assembly ke naam shaamil nahi hain taham 5 Assembly halqon ke umeedwaron ke naam jari nahi kiye gaye hain iss se yeh ishara milta hai ke yeh 5 maujooda Arkaan e Assembly bhi Party ka dobarah ticket haasil karne se mehroom reh jayen ge jin mein M Sudhir Reddy (halqa Assembly Medchal ), C Kanaka Reddy (Malkajgiri), B Shooba (Chopadandi), B Sanjiv Rao(Vikarabad) aur Konda Surekha(East Warangal) shaamil hain. Jahan tak mohtarma Konda Sulekha ka talluq hai un ke khandan ki Warangal aur uss ke atraaf o aknaaf zabardast siyasi dhak hai. Mohtarma Konda Sulekha ke shohar Mr. Konda Murlidhar Rao TRS Party ke Rukn Legislative Council hain. Siyasi tajzia nigaron ka kehna hai ke Narsimhampet, Parkal, Bhopalpally,Palakurti, Warangal East aur Warangal West Assembly halqon mein yeh khandan raaye dahindon par apna asar rakhta hai. Haliya dinon mein Konda Sulekha aur un ke shohar Konda Murlidhar Rao ka naam siyasi halqon mein garmaya huwa tha. Yeh siyasi joda apne halqa asar mein apni munfarid shanakhat rakhta hai. Yeh kisi bhi siyasi party se wabasta rahen magar un ki maqboliat mein kami nahi aati. Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein 2014 mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karne se qabl yeh joda 2013 tak YSR Congress Party se juda huwa tha. TRS Party mein inhen nazar andaz kiya jata raha hai. Mohtarma Konda Sulekha Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki cabinet mein jagah paney se qassir rahi thein. Yahi nahi balkay un ke halqa intekhab mein bhi party unhen nazar andaaz karti rahi. Paalakurti ke Rukn Assembly Mr. E. Dayakar Rao aur un ke bhai Errabali Pradeep Rao Warangal East mein apne taur par party programes karte huwe un ke liye mushkilaat khadi karte rahay. Alawa azeen Mayor Mr. N Narendar aur sabiq wazeer Baswa Raju Saraiah bhi is joday ke mukhalif hogaye thay. Konda Sulekha ke khandan ki siyasi taaqat ko mehsoos karte huwe mumkin hai ke Congress Party inhen dobarah Party mein shaamil karte huwe siyasi faida haasil karne ki koshish kere gi aur agar aisa hota hai to Warangal aur uss ke atraaf o aknaaf ka siyasi mahol badi had tak tabdeel hojaye ga aur candidates ke intekhabi imkanaat par bhi asar padsakta hai. Maloom huwa hai ke Party ticket se mehroomi ke sath hi Congress ke chand sarkardah qaayedeen, Konda Murlidhar Rao aur Konda Sulekha se rabita qaayim karne mein jut gaye hain aur inhen Party Ticket dainey ka wada karte huwe Congress mein dobarah wapas aajane ki targheeb day rahay hain.
166.title: Konda Murlidhar aur Konda Surekha ki Congress mein wapsi?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik badi tabdili mein Hukoomat e Andhra Pradesh ney peer ko Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein 2 rupay ki kami kar di hai. Naayi qeematon ka itlaq mangal se hoga. Chief Miniter Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney aaj dopehar eendhan ki qeematon par nazar e saani ka elaan kiya. Mulk bhar mein aaj Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein izafah ke khilaaf aaj manaye gay Bharat Band ke dauran Andhra Pradesh ke awam ko qeematon mein thodi si raahat mili hai. Hukoomat Rajasthan ney bhi itwaar ko eendhan par Vat mein 4% takhfeef kar di thi aur is par nisf shab se amalaawri bhi hogayi thi, jis ke baais Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein 2.5 feesad ki kami aayi thi. Mr. Chandra Babau Naidu ney aik aala sathi ijlaas ke baad Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein takhfeef ka elaan kiya. Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney kaha ke Markazi Hukoomat, Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ko khaam tail ki qeematon par mahmool karte huwe awam ko gumraah kar rahi hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 2013-14 ke douran khaam tail ki qeematein fi Barail 105. 52 barrel dollar thi lekin jab khaam tail ki qeematein gir kar 46 dollar tak pahonch gayi theen tab bhi markaz ne Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein takhfeef nahi ki. Ab khaam tail ki qeemat fi barrel 70 dollar hai lekin markazi hukoomat rozana Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein man maani izafah kar rahi hai. Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney kaha ke un ki Hukoomat ney qeematon mein izafah se awam ko honay wali dushwardariyon ko mehsoos karte huwe Petrol aur Diesel par VAT ki sharah mein kami karte huwe apni riyasat ke awam ko juzwi raahat dainay ka faisla kiya hai, jis se reyasti khazana par 1,120 crore rupay ka izafi boojh ayed hoga.
178.title: AP mein Petrol aur Diesel mein 2 rupay ki kami

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party ki zair e qayadat 22 mukhtalif partiyon ki janib se Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke khilaaf aaj maneye gaye Bharat band Telangana mein koi assar nahi raha albatta sirf oppostion partiyon ka ehtijaj dekhney ko mila jabke Andhra mein band ka asar juzwi raha hai. Telangana riyasat mein band ka kaarobar ke ibtidayi auqaat mein mila jula raad-e-amal raha aur din mein 12 bajey ke baad to tamam karobari idaray khulay dekhe gaye. Ta haal koi nagzhani waqea paish nahi aaya hai taham shehar ke mukhtalif muqhamat aur Telangana bhar mein Congress aur Oppostion Partiyon ney ehtajaji muzahirey kiye aur jagah jagah Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke putlaay Nazar e aatish kiye. Communist Party Of India ke qaideen ney Narendra Modi hukoomat ke iqdamaat ko mustarad karte huwe bator ehtijaj sadak par kabadi khela. Congress Party, Left partiies aur Telugu Desham Party ke qaayideen ney RTC Bus Depots ke rubaroo dharna diya taakay Busoon ko bahar nikal ney se roka jaye. Police ney darjanon ahtejajyon ko hirasat mein le liya aur inhen mukhtalif Police Stationon mein mahruse rakha gaya hai. Telangana mein barsara-e-iqtedar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti aur is ki haleef Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ney band ki tayeed nahi ki hai. Agarchay Andhra Pradesh mein barsara e iqtedar Telugu Desham Party ney bhi band ki tayeed ka bazabta elaan nahi kiya taham is ke kaarkunon ney Andhra Pradesh aur Telangana Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein izafah ke khilaaf kiye jane walay ehtejaj mein hissa liya. Bharat Band ehtejaj ke baais din mein kuch der ke liye RTC Bus Service mutasir rahi taham phir mamool ke mutabiq baseen chalaye gayeen. Telangana RTC ke aik oudedar ney bataya ke riyasat ke kisi bhi hissa mein Bus Service mutasir nahi huwi hai aur hum mamool ke mutabiq baseen chalarhe hain. Vice Chancellor Osmania University Professor S Chandar ney bataya ke Pre Phd imthehaan jo peer ko munaqqid honey walay tha multawi karte huwe mangal ko rakha gaya hai. Un ke mutabiq University se mulhiqa tamam Collages khulay hain.
36.title: ‘Bharat Band’ Telangana mein be asar

news_detail: Hyderabad. national Crime Record Bureau (CRB) ke mutabiq Telangana Mulk ki paanch riyasaton mein shaamil hai jahan logon ke jaan dae dainay ke iqdamaat ke waaqiaat ziyada runuma hotay hain. NCRB Telangana riyasat mein 2014 ke dauran khudkushi karne ke waaqiaat fi lakh 26. 5 hai. Pondicherry khudkushi ke waaqiaat ke lehaaz se Mulk ki sar e fehrist riyasat hai jahan khudkushi karne walon ki tadaad fi lakh 40.4 hai. Kull Hind ausat sharah isi muddat ke dauran 10.6 waaqiaat fi lakh hai. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ke tahet Hyderabad ki maujooda abadi ke hisaab se Hyderabad mein takhmeenan har saal 2,650 afraad khudkushi karte hue apni jaan dae dete hain. Haliya World Health Organization ki aik report mein kaha gaya ke Hindustan mein 15-29 baras ki Umar ke naujawanon mein fi lakh abadi khud kushi ka rujhan ziyada paaya jata hai. khud kashi karne ke pas parda muharikaat kya hain. Iss khusoos mein NCRB ney bhi 2004 aur 2014 ke darmiyan khud kushi ke waaqiaat ka tajzia kya hai aur yeh nishandahi ki hai ke Hindustan mein khudkushi ke waaqiaat ki badi wajah khandani tanazeaath hain. Khudkushi ke 28% waaqiaat khandani aur rishta daari ke umoor se judey hue thae. Doosri badi wajah bemari hai jis ke baayis 18% log khudkushi karte hain. Mahireen ke mutabiq umooman is tarha ke sangeen iqdamaat karne ke peechay kayi wajuhaat karfarma hoti hain. Doctors ka kahena hai ke Hindustan ke naujawan un naakamiyoo par qaboo panay se qaasir rehtay hain jis ke baayis mayoosi pahelti hai. Mayoosi ka ilaaj na honay ke baayis khwahish ki adam takmeel par badhtay dabao, mutawatir be izzati, rishton ka toot jaana wagaira khudkushi karne ki taraf mael karte hain.
56.title: Khudkushi waaqiaat mein Telangana ka panchawan muqaam

news_detail: Nalgonda. Mahatma Gandhi University (MJU) Nalgonda ki Executive Council ney 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ko barkhast karne ki qarardaad manzoor ki hai chunkay tehqiqati Committee ney un taqqururat mein be irregularities ko paaya hai. Special Chief Secretary (Education) Mr. Ranjeev R Acharya ney bhi Executive Council ke ijlaas mein shirkat ki aur ijlaas ke ayendah mein 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ke taqqururat ke masle ko shaamil karne khusoosi pahel ki. Maloom huwa hai ke Executive Council ke ijlaas mein MGU ke sabiq Vice Chancellor Katta Narsimha Reddy aur Registrar Pochanna ko memos jari karne ka faisla kiya hai jin ke zamana mein yeh taqqururat amal mein aaye thae. September 2011 mein elamia jari karte huwe University mein zayed az 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ke taqqururat amal mein aaye thae jabkay aik Assistant Professor ke post ko elamia number 1/2011 ke sath fill kiya gaya tha. 32 psots mein 6 Associate Professor ke posts thae. Jab chand be rozgaar umeedwaron ney Education Minister aur Higher Education Department ke ohdedaron ko aik memorandum paish karte huwe University mein Associate Professrors aur Assistant Professors ki jayidadon par taqqururat mein be irregularities ka ilzaam aayed kiya to Hukoomat ney Ooctober 2016 mein sabiq Vice Chancellor Osmania University ki zair e qayadat aik 3 members Committee tashkeel dete huwe tehqiqaat ka hukum diya tha aur Committee ko hidayat di thi ke androon aik mah report daakhil kare taham Inquiry Committee ki tashkeel ke androon aik hafta Executive Council ney rules ki khilaaf warzi karte huwe 31 Associate Professorors aur Assistant Professors ke probation period ko manzoori dae di thi. Ilzaam hai ke maujuda Vice Chancellor University Khwaja Altaf Hussain ney is maamle mein kalidi rule ada kiya. Inquiry Committee ney October 2016 mein hi apni report Hukoomat ko paish kar di thi. Agarchay Special Chief Secretary ney University Vice Chancellor ko April 2018 mein hi hidayat dey di thi ke faculty ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye jo ney invaild Certificates  rakhte hain aur darkaar ahliat ke haamil nahin hain lekin is par koi karwai nahi ki gayi. Jis ke baad Special Chief Secretary ney peer ko Executive Council ka ijlaas 32 Associate Professors  aur Assistant Professors ke khilaaf karwai ke wahid agenda par talab kiya. Zaraye ke mutabiq tehqiqati committee ney paaya ke aik fard ney University mein Italy ki University ki asaas par Associate Professor ka post haasil kiya jo UGC ke guidelines ke mutabiq durust nahi hai. Un 32 faculty ki aksariyat deegar riyaston ki Universition ke asnaad rakhnay wali hai jo ghair maaroof hain. Associate Professor ki jayedad ke liye aik umeedwaar jo Phd mukammal karliya hai ahal hota hai lekin jin 6 Associate Professors ka taqarrur kiya gaya hai un mein koi bhi UGC ki sharait par poora nahi utarrta. UGC ke mutabiq Assistant Professor ke liye 200 Acadamic Performance Score ka haamil hona hoga magar 2016 mein taqarrur kiye gaye 24 Assistant Professor mein koi bhi umeedwaar 50 ke score se ziyada ka haamil nahi tha.
74.title: MGU 32 Asst Professors ko barkhast kardey gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chennur halqa e Assembly se maujooda rukn Nallela Odelu ko ticket se mahroom na karne ka Chief Minister o sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao se mutaleba karte huwe un ke aik kattar haami ney Rukn e Parliament Peddapally Mr. Balka Suman ki maujoodgi mein khud suzi ki koshish ki. Mr. Suman zila Mancherial mein Jaipur mandal ke Indaram mein taqreeb sang e buniyaad mein shirkat ke liye aaye huwe thay. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke baad apni Party ke 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist jari ki thi jin mein taqreeban tamam maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi ticket diya gaya tha taham jin maujooda MLAs ko ticket se mahroom kiya gaya un mein Nallela Odelu bhi shaamil hain. Taqreeb mein Rukn e Parliament ki shirkat ka pata chalne par Gattia wahan pahoncha aur kerosene chidak kar khud ko aag lagali. Is naujawan ko lagi aag bujhanay ki koshish karne walay teen logon  ko bhi aag pakad li jis ke baayis yeh charon shadeed taur par jhulas gaye. Wahan maujood logon ney aag bujhai aur unhen Hospital mein shareek karwaya. Nallela Odelu mutawatir teen meqaat se kamiyaab hotay rahay hain aur woh aayindah intekhabaat mein TRS Party ke ticket se mahroom honay walon mein shaamil hain.
100.title: Maujuda MLA ki ticket se mehroomi,naujawan ka iqdaam e khudsozi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein tashkeel e Telangana ke baad sailaab ki manind leaders aur Workers shaamil hotay chalay jarahay thae, hatta ke guzishta dinon tak bhi yeh silsila jari tha. Guzishta intekhabaat mein TRS ki zabardast lehar ke bawajood doosri partiyon ke Ticket par muntakhib honay walay aksar awaami numaindey bhi TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karliye thae magar ab aisa lagta hai ke barsar e iqtedar TRS se qaayideen ki kinara kashi ka aaghaz honay laga hai. Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke Rukn Qanoon Saaz Council Mr. Bhuphathi Reddy ney aaj Telugu Producer Bandla Ganesh ke hamrah Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi se mulaqaat karte huwe Congress Party mein bazabta shamoliat ikhtiyar karli hai. Mr. Bhupathi Reddy ney guzishta budh ko yeh elaan kiya tha ke woh Congress Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge chunkay TRS ke andaaz karkardagi se aajiz aachukay thay. Unhon ney kaha ke TRS Party qiyadat ney Telangana tehreek ke dauran kaleedi rule ada karne walay qaayideen ko nazar andaaz kardiya hai. Congress Party mein shumoliat ke baad akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mr. Bhupathi Reddy ney kaha ke woh Nizamabad Rural halqe Assembly se TRS ke umeedwaar maujooda Rukn e Assembly Mr. Baji Reddy Gorverdhan ke khilaaf muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhtay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Baji Reddy Goverdhan un ki qurbanion ke baayis pichle 10 baras se Nizamabad se Assembly mein noumaindagi kar rah hain. Unhon ney yeh kahete huwe  ke TRS Party par narazgi ka izhaar kiya ke un tamam usoolon ko faramosh kardiya gaya jin par Party ki buniyaad rakhi gayi thi. Baaz zaraye ka kahena hai ke zila Nizamabd ke hi aik Senior Leader o Rukn Rajiya Sabha Mr. D Srinivas jin hein party ney buri terha nazar andaz kardiya hai woh bhi TRS ko khairbad kahete huwe Congress Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar kar lenay walay hain.
114.title: TRS MLC Bhupathi Congress mein shaamil

news_detail: Wazeer Information Technology Andhra Pradesh Mr. Nara Lokesh ney Andhra Pradesh mein bhi qabal az waqt intekhabaat se mataleq zaraye ablaagh ki ittelaaat ko mazhaka khaiz qarar diya. Andhra Pradesh mein bhi paishgi intekhabaat se mutaliq Republic Channel par qiyaas par mabni nashar kardah aik khabar par wazeer ney wazahat ki ke un ki party, intekhabaat ke liye ujlat mein nahi hai aur riyasat mein intekhabaat schedule ke mutabiq hi hon ge. Mr. Nara Lokesh ney kaha ke Telugu Desham hukoomat apni paanch sala meyaad mukammal kere gi. Unhon ney Telangana Assembly ki miyad se 9 mah qabal tahleel par afsos ka izhaar kya.
131.title: Andhra Pradesh mein paishgi intekhabaat nahin: Nara Lokesh

news_detail: Mahbunagar. Khazana ke mutlashion ney Murthi ke neechay khazana chhupa honey ki aas mein aik tareekhi Mandir mein Bashweshvara ke mujasma ko dynamite lagaakar dhamaka se uda diya. Yeh waqia Nawabpet mandal mein Marikal village ke qareeb itwaar ki subah awwaleen sa-aton mein paish aaya. Village mein bomb dhamaka ki aawaz sun kar dehati jaag uthhe aur dhamaka ke muqam par pahonch kar dekha ke Mandir mein Murthi ko dhamaka se uda diya gaya hai. Dehation ney police ko is waqea ki ittila di. Muqam e waqia par pahonchney par Police ney paaya ke badmashon ney jo muqam waqia se faraar honey mein kamyaab hogaye Basweshwara ke mujasma ko dynamite laga kar uda diya. Police ko shuba hai ke un badmashon ney mujasma ke neechay khazana chhupa huwa honae ki aas mein Mandir ko nishana baneya hoga chunkay yeh Mandir bahuat qadeem aur tareekhi hai. Police, khazana ke mutlashion ki talaash mein hai.
146.title: Mahbunagar mein khazana ke lalach mein Mandir mein dhamaka

news_detail: Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke qad aawar leader wo Irrigation Minister Mr. Hrish Rao ney jummay ke din Siddipet ke Ibrahimpur mein aik jalsa aam mein yeh iradah zahir karte huwe ke woh siyasat se subukdosh hojana chahta hain, sab ko hairat mein daal diya. Mr. Harish Rao ney kaha ke siyasat se kinara kashi ikhtiyar kar lenay ke bawajood maein awam ki khidmat anjaam deta rahon ga. Siyasat se khushyun ke sath subukdosh honay ki khawahish ka izhaar karte huwe Mr. Harish Rao ney kaha ke aap tamam se mujhe be panah pyar o mohabbat mila hai. Yahi meri zindagi ke liye kaafi hai. Ijlaas se khitaab karte huwe Mr. Harish Rao ney awam se kaha ke Congress Party ko vote na dein. Agar Congress ko vote dey kar Iqtedaar sonpa gaya to woh tamam industries Andhra Pradesh muntaqil kar dein ge jis se hamari riyasat ke awam ka bada nuqsaan hoga. Mr. Harish Rao jinhon ne Ibrahimpur ko adopt kiya hai pichle intekhabaat mein un ki taied o himayat karne par dehation se izhaar tashakor kiya.
158.title: Siyasat se subukdosh hona chahta hoon: Hrish Rao

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ki Caretaker Government mein wazeer aab paashi Mr. Harish Rao aaj aatishbazi haadesa mein uss waqt bach gaye jab woh Sangareddy zila mein intikhabi muhim ke hissa ke taur par nikaali gayi aik bike Rally mein hissa le rahay thae. Wazeer ke istaqbaal ke liye ki jarahi aatishbazi ke baayis ilaqa mein phail gaye kaseef dhuwen ki wajah se Rally mein bhagdad much gayi. Ptakhon ki wajah se ilaqa mein badi door tak dhuwan phail gaya tha. Rally mein shaamil chand gadiyon ko ptakhon se nikalney wali aag bhi pakad li jis ki wajah se afra tafri phail gayi. Iss haadsa se honay wali bhagdad ke baayis kayi gaadi ranon ney apni gadiyaan chod kar bhaag khaday hue. Ptakhon se nikalney walay kaseef dhuwen mein Wazeer bhi phas gaye thae taham un ke gunmen ney unhen mehfooz taur par bahar nikaal liya .
174.title: Harish Rao aatishbazi haadsa mein bach gaye

news_detail: Amravathi- Wazeer Information Technology Mr. Nara Lokesh ney naujawanon ke liye be Unemployment pension ki bawaqar scheme ‘Mukhyamantry Yuvanistam’ par jaiza ijlaas liya. Iss mauqa par Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke ahal be rozgaar naujawanon apni darkhwasten bhaij satke hain aur har mah ki 25 tareekh tak un ko process karliya jaye ga. unhon nay kaha ke zayed az 2 lakh naujawan ‘Unemployment Pension’ ke liye ahal qarar paaye gaye hain. Unhon ney kaha ke hukoomat har account mein 3
Octobar ko  1,000 rupay deposit karwaye jayen ge chunkay 2
October ko aam tateel hoti hai .
184.title: Andhra mein be Unemployemnet Pension 3rd  October ko

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer baldi nazam o nasq o shehri taraqyaat Mr. K. T. Ramarao aur Under Secretary General aqwam mutahidda o Executive Directoraqwam mutahidda maholiyaat Mr. Herrick Soleheim ney aaj yha n peoples plaza, nikls road par munaqidah aik takreeb mein barqi gariyon ko jhandi dikhayi. wazeer ney Mr. Herrick Soleheim ka khermaqdam kya aur Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay ki aik pehal mein hissa lainay par shukriya ada kya. Mr. K. T. Ramarao rau ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue kaha ke reyasti hukoomat bohat jald barqi gariyon par aik policy faisla kere gi. unhon ney kaha ke maholiyati tawazun ki bahaali ke liye kayi iqdamaat kiye gaye hain.’ Telangana Hartihaharm’ programme ke tehat 5 saal ke arsa mein 230 crore se zayed pouday lagaye jarahay hain taakay Green Cover ko 22 feesad se badha kar 23 feesad kya jaye. yeh prajkt sirf shajar kaari tak mehdood nahi hai balkay un poudoun ko geotag lagaya ja raha hai aur un ki hifazat ki jarahi hai. unhon ney kaha ke isi terhan riyasat bhar mein takreeban 46, 000 jheelon aur talabon ka tahaffuz kya ja raha hai. unhon ney kaha ke Hyderabad 2022 tak plastic se pak shehar ban jaye ga. jee each am si 4. 20 laakh LED bulbs ke sath LED street lights laganay ka beda uthaya hai. ail bi nagar mein each am are prajkt ko bhi July mein awam ke liye khol diya jaye gaavr anqareeb aik am are projects se mutaliq kaam bohat jald shuru kiye jayen ge. Herrick Soleheim ney ‘swacch Namaskaram’ karte hue awam ka istakbaal kya aur Gandhi ji ka qoul duhraya ke ‘paki, parhaiz gari se badhkar hai’. unhon ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke Swach Bharat muhim ki bhi sataish ki. unhon ney mustakbil qareeb mein aloodgi se pak mahol ko yakeeni bananay kiye jaaney walay iqdamaat mein aqwam mutahidda aur aqwam mutahidda maholiyaat ki janib se bharpoor taawun ka tayaqqun diya. is mauqa par 20 Electric gariyon ka iftitah kya gaya jis ko municiple karporasion ke ohdedar kirayon par haasil karen ge.
49.title: Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay Telangana hukoomat paband ehad: KTR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke zair e ihtimaam itwaar ko Media Plus Auditorim mein aik pur-asar dawat aftaar ka ihtimaam kya gaya jis mein imaideen shehar, sayasatdan aur sarkari ohdedaron ney shirkat ki. is mauqa par khitaab karte hue musheer baraye Chief Minister hukoomat Telangana baraye aqliati umoor janab A. K. Khan retired IPS ney khitaab karte hue kaha ke nai Telangana riyasat mein hukoomat ney samaaj ke tamam tabqaat ki Falah o behbood aur riyasat ki taraqqi ke liye kayi akhtraay schemes ko roshnaas karwaya hai aur hukoomat ke iqdamaat ke smrat bhi mehsoos kiye jaaney lagey hain. jahan taq aqliton ki taraqqi o behbood ke programon ka talluq hai hukoomat ney taleem ke shoba ko foqiat di hai aur aala miyaar ke Iqamti schools ka aik jaal phela diya hai jahan khat gurbat se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ke bachon ko aalmi miyaar ke taleemi idaron mein muft taleem o qiyam ki saholaten baham pohanchai jarahi hain. unhon ney bataya ke un taleemi idaron mein zair tarbiyat bachon ney apni ghair mamooli salahiyaton ka muzahira kar rahay hain. unhon ney bataya ke aik din qblhٴ mein aqliati Iqamti schools ke talba ki Los Angeles mein international space development conference mein shirkat karkay lautay hain. unhon ney kaha ke cheif Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao bhi chahtay hain ke woh awam ko darpaish masail ki aajilaana yaksoi ho. unhon ney bataya ke media darasal hukoomat aur awam ke darmain ahem rabita hotay hain. media ke zareya jahan hukoomat ke iqdamaat se awam waaqif hotay hain wahein awaami masail se hukoomat ko waaqif krwane ka yeh behtareen zareya hotay hain. unhon ney kaha ke woh chahtay hain ke media ke sath aik muzakrah rakha jaye taakay woh sahafion ko aqliaton ke liye kiye jaaney walay hukoomat ke iqdamaat se waaqif karwaen aur aqliton ke masail ke baray mein sahafion ki aaraa haasil karen. Sadarnasheen Telangana waqf board o ruknn Qanoonsaaz Council janab Mohammad Saleem aur sadarnasheen Telangana Aqliati Maliyati Corporation janab Syed Akbar Hussain ney bhi is mauqa par guftagu ki aur apni taraf se sahafion ko mumkina taawun ka tayaqqun diya. janab Mohammad Ali Shabir qayed oppostion Telangana Qanoonsaaz Council o sabiq wazeer ney kaha ke sahafi jo haqayiq ko manzar aam par laatay hain woh bhi kayi masail se dochar hotay hain magar un ke masail ki samaat karne wala koi nahi hota hai. hukoomat ko chahiye ke woh sahafion ko behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohnchaye. unhon bataya ke shehron mein kaam karne walay sahafion ko to maqool muawza mil jata hai magar dehi ilaaqon mein kaam karne walay sahafion ko khaterkhah muawza nahi mil paata. yahi wajah hai ke jab woh wazeer it-tila-aat o taluqaat aama they, sahafion ke liye Health Insurance ki scheme roshnaas karwai thi. unhon ney bataya ke kayi sahafi hain jin ka apna zaati makaan taq nahi hai. isi liye congress hukoomaton mein waqfa waqfa se sahafion ke liye arzaan qeemat par zameen faraham ki jati rahi taakay Housing Society ke zareya plats ki taqseem amal mein layi jaye aur phir hukoomat ke zareya makaan ki taamer par bankon ke tavassut se qarza jaat bhi faraham kiye jayen magar tea are s hukoomat mein sahafti baradri ko yaksar nazar andaaz kardiya gaya.

Dawat aftaar mein shirkat karne walon mein qabil zikar Mrs. Aziz Ahmed joint editor roznama Etemaad, Qayum Anwar Urdu Editor T News, Fazil Hussain Parvez editor Gawah weakly, Mustafa Ali sarwari Associate Professor Maulana Azad National Urdu university, Mohammad Shujaudding Ifteqari Acting Bureau Chief roznama Etemaad, Rehman Khan Bureau Chief roznama Munsif, Syed Shahabudding Hashmi sabiq Bureau Chief roznama Siasat, Khwaja Abdul Hameed Shaukat senior Journalist, Mohammad Abdul Naeem Managing Director Y This News, Habibudin Ahmed Editor Saaz e Deccan, Moulana Ahsan al Hamoomi imam o khateeb Shahi masjid, moulana Syed Ahmed al Hussaini Sayeed al-qadri sadar Qadria International, janab syed Abdul Qadar Qadri baani o General Secretary Human Life Awkening Society, janab Ahmed Arshad Hussain Noble Enterprises, Mohammad Ilyas Shamsi sadar Reformers front of India, Mohammad Mansoor Ali Ishaq Convenor  Direct Zakat Moment, Mohammad Farooq Maroof milli jehedkar, Mohammad Affan Quadri General Secretary Mehar Organization, aur deegar shaamil hain. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke qaideen Mrs. Mohammad Sajid Meraj sarparast, Ather Moin sadar, Syed Ahmed Jilani, Mohammad Abdul Hakeem naib Sadoor, Mohammad Rafeeq Ahmed patel, Mirza Ghani Baig secretaries, syed Wajid Hussaini Khazin, Mohammad Sohail, Mohammad Sadiq Ahmed, Mohammad Yousuf, Mohammad Jaleel, Mohammad Afzal arkaan Amila , Sayeed Mohiuddin sadar Warangal mutahidda zila, Mohammad Aleemuddin Secretary General Kamareddy zila, Irfanuddin Jaffer saddar Jagatial zila, Inkisar Ahmed naib sadar karimnagar, Peddapally o Sirsila azlaa unit, Mohammad Ilyas secretary general Siddipet ney mehmanon ka kher muqaddam kya.
71.title: Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ki dawat iftaar

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer information technology Mr. ke tea rama rau ney Hyderabad mein hafta ko ‘Telangana Diagnostics’ ka iftitah kya. programme ka aaghaz karte hue wazeer ney kaha ke zaroorat is baat ki hai ke hukoomat ko chahiye ke sarkari haspatalon par riyasat ke awam ka aetmaad bahaal kya jaye. Mr. ke tea rama rau ney mayaari tibbi nighdasht ki farahmi par mehakma sahet ki sataish karte hue wazeer e sahet Mr. Laxma Reddy se khwahish ki ke mehakma mein jayidadon par taqarurat ki peshraft ka jaiza lein. Telangana Diagnostics par unhon ney kaha ke tibbi taskhis awam ke liye dard e sar ban gaye hain is liye reyasti hukoomat ney apna khusoosi Diagnostic center ney qaim kya hai jahan mukhtalif amraaz ke tibbi tashkis Bashmool dingo, maleria, tayifayid, diabities, khoon, x-ray aur scanning bilaa muawza kiye jayen ge taham yeh muft tashkis sirf zila mein qaim primaray Health Centres, community Health Centres aur sarkari hospital ki janib se beje janay walay nmonon ke liye hogi. wazeer ney kaha ke hukoomat ka Mansha ghurba ke liye behtar tibbi khidmaat faraham kiye jayen. cheif mnstr ney sahet ke shoba mein inqilab bapaa kardiya hai. riyasat bhar mein 40 Dialysis Centres qaim kiye gaye hain. hukoomat is programme ke pehlay marhala mein 20 azlaa mein 20 Diagnostics qaim kere gi
88.title: KTR ney riyasat ke khusoosi Diagnostic Center. Telangana Diagnostics ka iftitah kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahboobia Government Junior College Hyderabad ki Taliba Reshman Jahan Begum ney inter midit imtehanaat mein 1000 ke munjmala 962 nishanaat haasil karte hue riyasat ke tamam sarkari Collegeon mein awwal maqam haasil kya hai. Sadar kal hind Majlis ittehaad almslmin o rukan parliment janab Asad Aldeen avisi ney party Headquarters ‘Darussalam’ mein Taliba ko mubarakbaad dete hue Darussalam Education and Relief Charitable Trust ka 15, 000 rupay ka check paish kya. Reshman Jahan Begum ney University College for Women Kothi mein bachelor of commerce mein dakhla lainay ki khwaahan hain. rukan parliment ney Reshman Jahan Begum ke zabardast muzahira ki sataish ki. Reshman Jahan ney janab Asad Aldeen avisi ko bataya ke woh grijoyshn ki takmeel ke baad woh chartrd accountant ban-na chahti hain. woh Mohammad Javed chemical supplier ki Dukhtar hain. Un ki behan ney bhi jo isi College ki Taliba theen 1000 ke munjmala 924 nishanaat haasil karte hue kamyabi haasil ki hai.
111.title: Sadar Majlis ney Intermediate ki topper Taliba ko check paish kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. jumaraat ko Halal shawaal ki Adam Rwait ki toseeq ke baais Hyderabad mein Eid al Fitar hafta 16 June ko hogi. Shaher Hyderabad ki mukhtalif Eidgahoon aur Masajid mein salaat Eid al Fitar ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai. Eidgah Meer Alam mein salaat Eid al Fitar 10:00 bajey din hogi. Isi terhan Eidgah Amber Shah Baba Amberpet mein 10:00 bajay din, Eidgah Sanatnagar mein 9:00 bajay, qadeem Eidgah maidan First Lancer mein 9:15 bajay, Eidgah Ahl-e-Sunnat waljamaat Chilkalguda mein 8:15 bajay, Eidgah Bilali Hockey Ground Masabtank mein 8:30 bajay, Eidgah Pensionpura Langarhoz mein10:00 bajay, Eidgah Ujalay Shah mein 9:00 bajay, Eidgah Sanatnagar mein 9:00 bajay Eidgah Cantonment Secunderabad mein 9:30 bajay, Makkah Masjid Charminar mein 10:00 bajay, Jamia Masjid Muazzampura almaroof badi Masjid Mallepally mein 9:00 bajay, Masjid Bughdadi take Nampally mein 9:00 bajay aur Masjid Quba Nampally goods shade mein 6:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Jamiat Ahl-al-hadith ki janib se mukhtalif muqamat par salaat Eid al Fitar ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai, jis ke mutabiq Eidgah Kothhapet Barkas mein 7:15 bajay, NTR Stadium lower tankbund, Indra Park mein 7:00 bajay, Quli Qutub Shah stadium mein 7:15 bajay, Eidgah Ahl-al-hadith Qutub Shahi Yellampet, Medchal mein 8:00 bajay, Hockey Ground Aizah High School Chanchalguda mein 7:00 bajay Eidgah Ahl-al-hadith Chilkalguda mein 10:00 bajay, Owaisi Playground Golkonda mein 7:15 bajay ada ki jaye gi
123.title: Hyderabad mein salaat Eid al Fitar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao July ke aakhri hafta ya August ke pehlay hafta mein LB Nagar. Ameerpet Metro Rail Corridor ka dosray marhala ke tor par iftitah injaam den ge jis ka taweel arsa se intzaar kya ja raha tha. is rote ke aaghaz se awam ko trafik masail se barri hadd taq raahat mil jaye gi. Metro Rail ke tickets ke narkh mein kami ke koi imkanaat nahi hain jin ke baray mein awam kaya ta-assur hai ke woh kuch mehngay hain. wazeer Information Technology o Baldi nazam o nasq o shehri taraqyat Mr. K. T. Rma Rao ne aaj LB Nagar Metro Station par aik press conference mein kaha ke Hyderabad Metro ke tickets ke narkh Dehli , Mumbai , bangloru aur deegar shehron ke Metro trinon ke narkhon ke maqabil mehngay nahi hain jaissa ke awam ka aik tabqa ka yeh ehsas hai. qabal azeen wazeer ne wazeer tansport Mr. Mahindar Reddy, Mayor GHMC Mr. Bonthu Ram Mohan, Maanaging Director Metro Rail Mr. N.V.S. Reddy aur deegar ke hamrah Ameerpet taa LB Nagar Metro Train mein safar kya. unhon ne wazahat ki ke Metro Rail chunkay khangi. awaami shiraakat daari ke tareeqa car par shuru kya gaya hai is liye company ki janib se uthaye gay masarif is mein mulawis companiyon ko bardasht karna parta hai is liye fi alfoor tickets ke narkh mein kami ke koi assaar nahi hain. jab dosray marhala mein mahatma gandhi bas station, fallak numa aur deegar roots par Metro Rail mukammal taurr par Kargard hojaye gi tab ticket ke narkhon mein kami par ghhor kya ja sakta hai. unhon ne kaha ke tijarti sar garmion ki muawnat karte hue 42 maqamat par Multi Level parking sahulaten baham pohanchai jayen gi. ilawa azeen bijli se chalne wali gadiyon ke liye Charging Points bhi shuru kiye jayen ge. Mr. K. T. Rma Rao ne bataya ke aloodgi se bachney ke liye RTC bahut jald 500 Electric Buses shuru kere ga.
142.title: Chief Minister KCR July ke awakhir mein LB Nagar. Ameerpet Metro Rail ka aaghaz karenge

news_detail: Hyderabad. Greater Hyderabad municiple karporishn ny pehli martaba hyderabad mein talba aur barsarekaar peshawar afraad ke liye Internship ki peshkash ki hai. jari Swach Bharat programme ke khutoot par is programme ka maqsad shurka ko apni salahiyaton ke izhaar ka haqeeqi mauqa faraham karna aur GHMC mein naye aayidyaz aur tawanai ko lana hai. shurka ko GHMC mein kaam karne ka tajurbah haasil hogaavr karporishn se jurey bohat se logon shehrion, tijarti idaron, makeeno waghera se tabadlah khayaal karne ka mauqa haasil hoga. tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke shurka GHMC ke aik ya zayed ilaqon ka daura karen ge aur hyderabad mein behtar safai suthrayee ke maqsad mein apna hissa ada karen ge aur khusk aur tar kachre ki alhayedgi ke wasail par awam mein shaoor beedar karen ge. yeh programme tawaqqa hai ke nah sirf shurka ko seekhnay ka aik azeem mauqa faraham kere ga balkay hyderabad shahar ko saaf suthra shahar bananay GHMC ki janib se kiye jaaney walay jari iqdamaat mein mazeed behtari aeye gi. is programme ka maqsad Naujawanon ki salahiyaton ko mazeed ujagar karna hai aur inhen hyderabad ki inqalabi safai o suthrayee mein qabil lehaaz hissa ada karne ka mauqa faraham karna hai. GHMC ko yaqeen hai ke ziyada tadaad mein Naujawanon ko jorhte hue hyderabad ko saaf suthra shahar bananay mein shehrion ki mashghooliat mein izafah hoga.
157.title: GHMC ki janib se Internship

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress party ke senior quied mister danm Nagender nay aaj jummay ko party se istifa day diya. unhon nay apna maktoob istifa party saddar mister Rahul gandhi ko rawana kardiya jis mein unhon nay party se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karne ki wajohaat paish ki hain. samjha jata hai ke woh kal media ko Congress party se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karne ki wajohaat se aagah karen ge. un ke qareebi zaraye ka kehna hai ke woh aik ya do din mein Barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge. pradesh Congress committee ke leaders inhen mananay aur istifa se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne ki targheeb day rahay hain. mister danm Nagender jo reyasti assembly ke rukan bhi reh chuke hain aur Hyderabad city Congress ke sdrki hesiyat se bhi khidmaat injaam day chuke hain, guzashta chand mahino se party sar garmion se doori ikhtiyar kiye hue thay. inhen yeh shikayat thi party leaders inhen ahmiyat nahi day rahay hain. haal hi mein Congress high kamaan nay sabiq rukan parliment mister engine kumar yado ko Hyderabad city Congress ki sadarat sonpi thi. mister engine kumar yado aur mister danm Nagender mein aik arsa se dooria hain. mister engine kumar yado ke taqarrur se mister Nagender naraaz thay.
172.title: Senior Leader Danam Nagender Congress se mustafi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke sarbarah o cheif minister mister ke Chandar shikhr rao ney aaj id-daa kya ke un ki party aindah intikhabaat mein 100 nashiston par kamyabi haasil karte hue Iqtidaar par apna qabza barqarar rakhay gi. Party Headquarters Telangana Bhavan mein sabiq wazeer o congress quied aur un ke kaarkunon ka party mein khermaqdam karne ke baad khitab karte hue mister chndrshikhr rao ney kaha ke aik neye surway ke mutabiq TRS ke liye aindah intikhabaat bohat aassan hon ge aur woh 100 se zayed nashistain haasil kere gi. cheif minister ney kaha ke intikhabaat honey den aur dekhen ke tamam siyasi partiyan hamaray khilaaf muttahid bhi ho jaien to TRS kamyaab hogi. unhon ney kaha’ ‘ tashkeel Telangana aik tareekh hai aur soonahre Telangana ki taamer o no o taraqqi aik aur tareekh hai. haliya surway ke mutabiq TRS hukoomat ki ghareeb aur mahroom tabqaat ke liye falahi schemes aur taraqiyati programon se khush hain. hamari party ko awam ki taied haasil hai aur hum baghair kisi mushkil dobarah Iqtidaar par wapas ayen ge.’ ‘ unhon ney kaha ke kalyaan laxmi scheme ka maqsad zaroorat mand tabqaat ki madad karna hai aur ab usay riyasat mein aala zaat ke ghurba taq wusat di jarahi hai. hum ney Iqtidaar par aney ke baad awam ki mushkilaat, takaleef aur zaroorat ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue schemes waza kiye. TRS hukoomat ney guzashta chaar barson mein rait se 1, 675 crore rupay ki aamdani haasil ki jabkay maazi ki congress hukoomat ney apne das sala daur Iqtidaar mein sirf 39 crore rupay mujtma krpayi thi
182.title: TRS ku 100 nashiston ke sath dobarah Iqtidaar : KCR

news_detail: Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao ney Wazeer e Kharaja aur Bain ul Aqwami Tawwun United Arab Emirates His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan ke sath Hyderabad mein mulaqaat ke mauqa par Hyderabad mein United Arab Emirates ke Consulate keqiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Chief Minister daftar ke zaraye ke mutabiq United Arab Emirates ke Wazeer e Kharaja kal prgti bhon mein 5? : 30 bujey shaam Chief Minister Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao se mulaqaat karen ge. dono qaideen deegar umoor ke ilawa Hyderabad mein amarati Consulate ke qiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge aur Telangana mein sarmaya kaari ke baray mein bhi baat cheet karen ge. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan hndstan ke aik hafta ke dora par 24 June ko Dehli puhanche hain. un ke programme mein Mumbai , ahmdaabad, chinayi aur bingloru ka bhi dora shaamil hain.
193.title: Hyderabad mein Emirates ka Consulate

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahkuma Barqi ke aarzi mulazmeen ne, un ki mulaazmaten mustaqil karne Chief Minster ke wada ki adam takmeel par aaj saari riyasat Telangana mein ehtejaji muzahira kiya. Apne derina mutalibaat ki adam yeksuwi ke khilaaf aaj Hyderabad mein bhi mukhtalif muqamat par Mahkuma barqi ke dafatir par ehtejaji muzahira kiya. aarzi mulazmeen ki mukhtalif Unions ki mushtarika Majlis amal ke qaideen ne bataya ke un ke derina mutalibaat ki yeksuwi se TRS hukoomat gorezan hai, jis ki wajah se aarzi mulazmeen kayi mushkilaat se dochar hain. Chief Minster Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ke aarzi mulazmeen ki mulazimaton ko mustaqil karne ka wada kiye aik arsa beeet chuka hai magar is janib hanoz koi misbet paish Raft nahi ki jaski. Union qaideen ne bataya ke Telangana riyasat mein jumla 23, 667 aarzi mulazmeen hain. is ke ilawa Outsourcing par 6-8 hazaar afraad bil collection par mamoor hain. Unhon ne bataya ke Labour Act ke mutabiq aarzi mulazmeen ke Provident Fund aur ESI mein aajir ko bhi apna hissa ada karna hota hai magar aajir ki janib se jo hissa hota hai woh raqam bhi mulazmeen ki tankhwahon se mnha karli jarahi hai, jabkay oot sorsng par kaam karne walay Bil Collectors ko aik bil ki vasuli par sirf aik rupiya diya jata hai. Inhen bhiESI aur PF ki saholaten faraham nahi hain. union qaideen ne mutalibaat ki Adam yeksuwi par ehtijaj mein shiddat peda karne ki bhi dhamki di hai.
180.title: Mahkuma Barqi ke aarzi mulazmeen ka ehtejaji muzahira

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein aaj mukhtalif jismani mazoori ke shikaar 7481 afraad mein 7. 82 crores rupay ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Telangana Disabled Welfare Society aur Telangana Old Age Welfare Society ki janib se aaj numayesh maidan par aik taqreeb munaqqid ki gayi. Is taqreeb mein mukhtalif nauiyat ke Mazureen jaisay jismani mazureen, andhon, behroon aur zaheni mazureen ko un ki zaroorat ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mohammad Mahmood Ali, Finance Minister Mr. Etala Rajendar aur Home Minister Mr.  N. Narrsimha Reddy, wazeer afzaish moyshyan aur Mr. Srinivas Yadav wazeer Excise Mr. T. Padma Rao Gaud ney maheman khusoosi ki hesiyat se shirkat ki aur mustahqeen mein yeh ashya taqseem kee. Commissioner for Persons with Disability Mrs. B. Shailaja ney bataya ke pehlay marhala mein jismani mazoor 465 afraad mein 3.48 crores rupay maliyat ki motor bikes, 247 afraad mein trycycles, calpers aur artificial limbs, aur 50 afraad mein 25 laakh rupay maliati Battery operated Wheelchairs, Basarat se mahroom afraad mein 86.80 lakhs rupay maliyat ke laptops (JAWS software ke sath ) ke alawa mp3 palyers, Daisy players, walking sticks aur Braille Books taqseem kiye gaye. Samaat se mahroom 1712 afraad mein 60 lakhs rupay maliyat ke aala e samaat aur 1712 afraad mein 1.96 crores rupay maliyat ke 4G smart phones aur zehni mazureen mein 9.8 lakhs rupay maliyat ke 300 teaching and learning materials aur 54. 86 lakhs rupay maliyat ki wheelchairs taqseem kiye gaye. Is mauqa par Mr. M Jagadeshwar Secretary Women, Child and Disables Welfare bhi maujood they.
187.title: Mazureen mein 7.82 crores rupay maliyat ki imdadi ashya ki taqseem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Alhadah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ki tehreek ke douran Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke sarbarah o Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao, Asif jahi hukmraanon ki taareef o tauseef karte hue nahi thakte thay aur TRS qaideen har baras un ki mazaar par pahonch kar inhen kharaaj aqeedat paish kya karte thay magar nai riyasat ki tashkeel aur Iqtidaar par aajane ke baad TRS qaideen ne Asif jahs ko faramosh hi kardiya tha magar aik arsa baad TRS qaideen ko Huzoor Nizam Mir Osman Ali Khan yaad aaye hi gai aur aaj un ki 54 ween barsi ke mauqa par inhen khiraaj e aqeedat paish karne un ki mazaar par puhanche. Shaed is liye bhi inhen Huzoor Nizam yaad aaye ke phir se intikhabaat qareeb arahay hain. Nizam Saltanat ke saatwen o aakhri farmaa rava Huzoor Nizam Mir Osman Ali Khan Bahadur ku un ki 54 win barsi ke mauqa par zabardast khiraaj aqeedat paish kya gaya. Riyasti wuzraa Mrs. Mohammad Mahmood Ali Deputy Chief Minister, wazeer e dakhla N. Narsihmha Reddy ke alawa Mir Osman Ali Khan ke arkaan khandan ne aaj Masjid e Judhi King Kothi mein maujood Mir Osman Ali Khan ki mazaar par pohanch kar Gul afshani ki aur chadar chadhai. Is mauqa par khitaab karte hue janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ne kaha ke Mir Osman Ali Khan ka daur e Sultaani mein riyaya mil jul kar raha karti thi unhon ne Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ko parwan chadhanay mein ahem kirdaar ada kya. Unhon ne kaha ke awam ki behbood ke liye Asif Jahi farmaanrava ne kaar haaye numayaan anjaam dyie. Taleem ke farogh ke liye un ke iqdamaat misali hain. Osmania University is ki zindah misaal hai. Nizam ke daur mein riyasat mein koi firqa waranah danga fasaad nahi huwa. Hyderabad riyasat ke Indian Union mein inzimaam ke bawajood woh apni riyasat, mulk aur apne mulk ki awam se be intahaa mohabbat rakhtay they. China se Hindustan ki jung ke mauqa par unhon ne 5 tan sona indian union hukoomat ko atiyah diya tha. unhon ne bataya ke jab Aligarh Muslim University ke aik wafd un se maali imdaad ke liye rujoo huwa to unhon ne Muslim University ke sath hindu university madras ke arbab ko bhi talab karte hue inhen bhi imdaad di. kisanon ki behbood aur zaraat ke farogh ke liye Huzoor Nizam ne kayi Dams taamer karwaye hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamaray Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao bhi Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ko parwan chadha rahay hain aur samaaj ke har tabqa ki Falah o behbood ke liye numayaan iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Wazeer e dakhla Mr, N Narsihma Reddy ne kaha ke Nizam ka daur Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ka aaynahdaar tha. Is daur mein Hindus aur Muslims ko taraqqi ke masawi mawaqay faraham kiye gay they bilkul isi tarz par hamaray Chief Minister Mr. Chandrashekar Rao iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Mr. Narsimha Reddy ne kaha ke hamaray Chief Minister ne musalmanoon ki falah o behbood ke liye woh kuch kya jo Huzoor Nizam ne bhi nahi kya. Ramadhan mein Musalmanoon ko dawat e iftaar ka ihtimaam kya ja raha hai aur ghareeb Musalmanoon mein kapde taqseem kiye jarahay hain. Azadi ke 70 barson mein Musalmanoon ke liye jo kuch nahi kya gaya woh Chandrashekar Rao kar rahay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke TRS hukoomat mein musalmanon ke liye kayi iqdamaat kiye jarahay hain. Mutahidda riyasat Andhra Pradesh mein jab hamaray Chandrashekar Rao ji markaz mein wazeer they to unhon ne Manmohan Singh hukoomat par dabaoo daaltay hue Sachar Committee tashkeel dainay lagai thi, yeh aur baat hai ke Congress Hukoomat ne Sachar committee ki sifarshaat par amal aawri nahi ki. s says, s tiz, bi says aur aqliaton ke liye angrezi medium ke Iqamti Schools qayaim kiye gay. Yaad rahay ke mister ke Chandrashekar Rao ne ke bi are park ko Asif Jahs se mansoob karne ka wada kya tha magar abhi taq is park ka naam tabdeel nahi kya jaska.
198.title: TRS ko Huzoor Nizam phir yaad aaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Haj Committee ke maazi mein kiye gaye maali tasarrufaat par shubhat ka saya badhta ja raha hai, chunkay guzishta baras jo umoor anjaam dyie gaye they wohi is baras taqreeban do tahai kam masarif par injaam panay lagey hain. Yaad rahay ke guzishta barson mein Riyasti Haj Committee, Special Officer ki nigrani mein kaam injaam diya karti thi. is martaba hukoomat ny reyasti Haj Committee tashkeel di hai jis ki nigrani mein aazmeen Hajj ki safar muqaddas par rawaangi ke intezemaat kiye jarahay hain. Jab supplying samaan ki farahmi ke liye order dainay ka maamla paish aaya to Committee ney faisla kya ke is martaba namzadgi ki asaas par yeh umoor allot karne ki bajaye open tender ka tareeqa ikhtiyar kya jaye. Is faisla ka yeh nateeja nikla ke lakhoon rupay ki bachat hogayi. Dilchasp baat yeh hai ke guzishta baras jis company ney 22.40 lakhs rupay ke aiwaz apni khidmaat paish ki theen usi company ney waisay hi sahulaton ki farahmi ke liye sirf 6.40 laakh rupay mein yeh umoor anjaam dainay par aamadah hogayi. Is terha afraat zar aur qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke bawajood taqreeban do tahai raqam ki bachat hui. Isi terha guzishta baras Hajj Camp ke liye aarzi bait ul khala ki sarbarahi ke liye 20 lakhs rupay kharch kiye gaye thay magar is martaba Haj Committee ney kiraya par aarzi bait ul khala Units haasil karne ki bajaye inhen kharid lene ka faisla karliya jis par sirf 16 laakh rupay ke hi masarif aaye. Sadarnashin Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney kaha ke hum ney yeh taye kya ke namzadgi ki asaas par kaam allot karne ki bajaye open tender rakhay jayen aur hum ney Media ke samnay khulay mein tenders khole thay. Unhon ney yeh bhi bataya ke hum aazmeen ko behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohanchanay koshaan hain. Unhon ney bataya ke jo aarzi bait ul khala khareeday gaye hain woh deeni ijtemaat mein muft faraham kiye jayen ge. Sawal yeh paida hota hai ke Company aik baras baad taqreeban do tahai kam damon par tender haasil karne par amaada kyun hogayi. umooman hota yeh hai ke waqt guzarnay ke sath qeematon mein izafah ke paish e nazar tenders ki ijrayi ya kamon ki namzadgi mein aik makhsoos had tak izafah ko tasleem bhi kya jata hai magar is martaba ulti Ganga behnay lagi. Namzadgi ki bajaye open tender ke zareya kaam tafweez karne ka faisla karne par wohi company jis ney guzashta baras 22.40 laakh rupay wusool kiye thay is martaba sirf 6.40 laakh rupay ki kam qeemat par amaada kaisay hogayi? Is liye zaroorat is baat ki hai ke Haj Committee ke hisabaat ki fori audit karwai jaye aur Central Vigilance ya kisi aur tehqiqati idaara ke zareya tehqiqaat karwai jayen taakay is scandal mein Haj Committee ke ohdedaron ke rule ka pata chal sakay.
209.title: Telangana Haj Committee ke maazi ke maali tasarrufaat par shubhat ka saya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Hajj committee ke ishtiraaq se chishtia foundetion ke zair e ihtimaam aaj mehboob function hall, Misri ganj, Hyderabad mein aakhri tarbiati camp munaqqid sun-hwa. Telangana, aandhra pradesh aur hyderabad krnatk ilaqa se talluq rakhnay walay zayed az  7,000 aazmeen Hajj 1
August se Hajj House Hyderabad se rawana hon ge. Hajj House mein  28

July se aazmeen Hajj ki aamad shuru hojaye gi jahan inhen safar Hajj se mutaliq tamam dastawizaat hawala kiye jayen ge aur un ki zareya tayyarah rawaangi ke tamam umoor injaam diye jayen ge. aazmeen Hajj ke aakhri tarbiati camp mein ulama mshaykhin ke ilawa Hajj committee ke ohdedaron nay is mauqa par khitaab karte hue mnask Hajj par tafseeli roshni daali aur safar muqaddas ke douran aazmeen Hajj ki janib se umooman ki jaany wali ghaltion aur be ehtiaton ki nishandahi ki. sadarnashin Telangana Hajj committee mister Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue bataya ke Hajj haoz mein qaim camp se hi aazmeen Hajj ki 1
Augst taa 15

August tak rawaangi amal mein aeye gi. reyasti Hajj committee nay naqais se pak intizamaa mukammal karliye hain. Hajj Camp mein hi hawai safar ke tamam umoor injaam diye diye jayen ge. Shams abad ayrport ke khusoosi trmnl se aazmeen Hajj ki rawaangi amal mein aeye gi jahan aazmeen ki muawnat aur rahnumai ke liye Hajj committee ke ohdedar mojood rahen ge. Hajj tarbiati camp ke knoynr molana Mohammad Khwaja Shah Shujauddin Ifteqari Haqqani Pasha ney aazmeen Hajj ka khaairmaqdam kya aur Hajj camp ke ineqad ke aghraaz o maqasid par roshni daali.
220.title: Aazmeen Hajj ke aakhri tarbiati camp ka ineqad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Alhaidah riyasat Telangana ki tashkeel ke baad pehli martaba tashkeel panay wali Bar Council of Telangana State mein kam az kam do Muslim arkaan shaamil honay ke imkanaat hain. Council ke intikhabaat mein 9 muslim umeedwaar maidan mein they, taham sirf do umeedwaar Mrs. Z. H. Javed aur M. A. K. Mukeet ki kamyabi ke imkanaat roshan hain. council ke liye 29
June ko raye dahi hui thi jis mein 86 umeed waar maidan mein they. Aur 23

July se raye shumari ka aaghaz huwa. Paheli tarjeeh ke votes ke natayej ki rou se Mr. Z. H. Javed ney 548 vote haasil karte hue choutha maqam haasil kya jabkay Mr. M. A. K. Mukeet ko 370 vote haasil huve aur inhen 16
muqam haasil huwa hai. Dosray tarjeehi votes ko shumaar karne ke baad umeedwaron ke maqam mein tabdeeli runuma hosakti hai. Qatayi natayej ka elaan 31
July ko kardiya jaye ga. Mr. Z. H. Javed mutahidda Andhra Pradesh ki aakhri Bar council mein woh waahed Muslim rukn ki haisiyat se shaamil they.
239.title: Bar Council of Telangana State mein do Muslim umeedwaron ki kamyabi ke imkanaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. John Abraham ki aanay wali film “Satyamev jayate”  mein Moharam ke maatam ke manazair ko intahi ghatiya andaaz mein paish karne aur Musalmanoun ke Mazhabi jazbaat ko bhadkane par Hyderabad Police ne filmsaaz company  Emmy Entertainment  aur Milap Milan Zaveri  aur deegar ke khilaaf  taazeerat e Hind ki defeat  295-A, 153A r/w 34 aur Cinimatography  Act ki dafaat  7(1) (a) ke tahet muqaddma darj karliya. Is khusoos mein Shia Biradari ke zaakreen o ulama o amayedeen par mushtamil ek  wafad ne Deputy Commissioner of Police Hyderabad Mr.V Satyanarayana se mulaqaat karte hue film mein paish kardah maatam ke manazair ko oochay aur ghatiya andaaz mein pesh karne par Shia Biradari ke jazbaat se waaqif karwatay hue kaha ke film ki Peshkash se Musalman khaas kar Ke Shia  Baradari ke Mazhabi jazbaat  majrooh hotey hain is liye woh chahtey hain ke film mein se Maatam ke manazir ko nikaal diya jaye chunkay un manazair ke baghair bhi film ko pesh kya ja sakta hai aur is se film ki asal kahani par koi farq nahi padta. DCP South Zone ne kaha ke aaj un se Shia Biradari ke mazhabi rehnuma mulaqaat kiye aur film se mutaliq un se shikayat kiye hain. unhon nay kaha ke purane shehar mein abadi ka bada hissa Shia  Biradari ka hai aur un ka ehsaas hai ke is film mein maatam se mutaliq pesh kiye gaye manazair se Shia Biradri ke mazhabi jazbaat ko theis pohunchi hai. Unhon nay kaha ke tehreeri shikayat ki mosuli par Dabirpura Police Station mein ek muqaddama darj karliya gaya hai. Syed Ali Jafferi Advocate ney is khusoos mein Police Station mein ek shikayat darj karwatay hue maatam ke manazair ke pas e manzar mein adakaar John Abraham ki janib se ek baheemana qatal karne ke manazir rakhay gaye hain aur is douraan ek mashhoor qawwali ” Tajdar e Haram” ka bhi wird kiya ja raha hai. Yeh qawwali  Paighambar e Islam pbuh. ki midhat mein hai. Is douran ek qatal ka manzer rakhna intehae na munasib hai. Unhon ney bataya ke yeh qawwali Paighambar e Islam Hazrat Mohammad pbuh. ki Shaan o Riffat bayaan karti hai jis ke pase manzar mein qatal jaise ghinauna jurm dikhaya gaya hai. Unhon ney apni shikayat mein yeh bhi kaha ke maloom huwa hai ke film ki shooting ke douran Mumbai ke muqami Shia logoun ney aiteraaz kya tha aur film ke producer aur director  ki janib se yeh tayakhun  diya tha ke film se aisay manazir nikaal diye jayen ge magar  trailer  se aisa lagta hai ke woh manazir film mein shaamil rakhay gaye hain. Unhon ney kaha ke yeh manazir Musalmanoun ki dili aazari aur un ke mazhab ki tauheen karte hue danista tor par shaamil kiye gaye hain jo Cinimatography Act. 1952 ki dafaa 5 B ke bhi khilaaf hai. Shikayet mein Supreme Court ki ruling ka bhi hawala diya gaya hai.
258.title: Film “Satyamev jayate” ke khilaaf Shia biradari ka ehtejaj

news_detail: Hyderabad. Riyasat ke 300 aazmin par mushtamil aazmin Hajj ke teesray qaafla ko aaj shaam Deputy Chief Minister janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ‘ wazeer e dakhla janab N Narsimha Reddy’ Musheer Aqliati Behbood janab A K Khan ney Hajj House se rooh parwar manzar aur Labbaik ki sadaaon ki goonj mein suye Haram vidaa kya. Is mauqa par Sadarnashin Telangana Stat Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan Sadarnashin Telangana Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC’ Secretary mahkuma Aqliati Behbood janab M.Dana Kishore,  Telangana stat Hajj committee professor S. A. Shukur’ arkaan Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed ” janab M.A. Shafi,  janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Mohammad Imtiaz Khan, Mohammad Arifuddin rukn Waqf Board janab M.A. Waheed Khan waqf aur  dosray maujood thay. janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney aazmin e Hajj ko vidaa karte hue un se Mulk o Qoum aur riyasat ki taraqqi o khushhali aur Chief Minster ki sahet o darazi umar ki dua karne ki khwahish ki aur kaha ke hukoomat Telangana samaaj ke deegar tabqaat ke sath sath Aqliton khusosan Musalmanoon ki taraqqi ke liye koshan hain. Shadi Mubarak, Scholarship aur Urdu zabaan ki taraqqi o tarweej aur Hujjaj ki falah o behbood se un ko gehri dilchaspi hai aur woh is talluq se khusoosi iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Janab NNarsimha Reddy ney Hujjaj karaam ko un ke azm safar par mubarakbaad paish ki aur kaha ke woh aik muqaddas safar par jarahay hain aur Allah un ki duayen qubool karta hai is liye woh watan ki khushhali aur aman o amaan ke liye dua karen. Sadarnashin Hajj committee janab Mohammad Mashullah Khan ney kaha ke Hajj committee Hajion ki khidmat mein masroof hai agar koi kotahi hai to is ko door kya jayega. . Khushii ki baat hai ke Hyderabad Embarcation Pointe number one hai. Janab Mohammad Saleem ney dua ki ke aazmin, Allah ki hifazat mein jayen aur Allah ki hifazat mein kheriyat ke sath wapas ayen. Whatsapp,  selfie aur photos mein dil na lagayen balkay Allah se lau lagayen. Secretary mhkuma aqliati bahbood janab M Dana Kishore ney kaha ke unhon ney Makkah Mukramah aur Madinah Munawwara ke baarey mein bohat kuch suna hai aur woh Hajion se khwahish karte hain ke woh qoum aur riyasat ke liye duayen karen. Special Officer Prof. S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke Hajj Committee ki janib se aazmin ki bhalai aur un ki dekh bhaal ke liye munasib iqdamaat kiye jatay hain, aur is kaam mein mukhtalif mahkumon ka taawun haasil rehta hai. Maulana Inaam ur Rehman Jameel ney dosray qaafla ke aazmin se khitaab karte hue kaha ke Rasool Allah pbuh ney Maidan Arfat mein ummation ki mughfirat ki dua farmai hai yeh duaon ka safar hai is liye jitni hosakay duayen karte rahen. Maulana Dr. Sheikh Mohammad Abdul Ghafoor ney teesray qaafla ke aazmin ko mukhatib karte hue un ko mufeed mashwaron aur duaon se nawaza. Safaid Ahram mein malboos aazmin insani masawaat ka aisa mutasir kin muzahira kar rahay they jo aam halaat mein dekhnay mein nahi aata. Rishtadaa ray aur ahbaab aankhon mein ansoo aur lab par duaon ke sath un ko vidaa karne ke liye Hajj House mein jama hue they. Kal shab 10:30 bajey se Hujjaj karaam ki Airport muntaqili shuru hui raat 2:00 bajey doosri fllight ney udaan bhari. Kal shab Hajj House mein pehli bus ko Sadarnashin Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan, Sadarnashin Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC Sadarnashin Telangana State Aqliati Commission janab Mohammad Qamaruddin,  Special Officer Hajj committee Prof.S. A. Shukoor,  arkaan Hajj committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed , janab M.A. Shafi , janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Mohammad imtiaz Khan ‘ janab Mohammad Arifuddin ke alawa janab Mohammad Jahangir Janab Arshad Khan aur dosaron ney jhandi dikha kar vidaa kya. aaj tak teen flights ke zareya jumla 900 aazmin Makkah Mukramah ke liye rawana ho chukay hain. Do flights  ke aazmin Jeddah mein utar kar busoon ke zareya Makkah Mukramah mein apni rahaish gaahon ko pounchanay ke baad Umrah ki saadat se sarfraz bhi ho chukay hain.
274.title: Aazmin e Hajj ka teesra qaafla rawana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mehakma Baldi Nazm o Nasq o Shehri Taraqiyat, Hukumat Telangana ney Falaknuma mey Secunderabad-Falaknuma Broadguage Line par maujooda Road-over-Bridge ke mutawazi 47.1 crores rupay ki laagat se ek aur Road over Bridge ki taamer ke liye G.O Jari kardiya hai. Commissioner Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ney Standing Committee ko tajaweez rawana ki thi. Standing Committee ney is ki tauseeq karte hue Hukumat se intizami manzoori ke liye tajaweez ko Hukumat Telangana ko rawana karne ki sifarish ki thi. Hukumat Telangana ney 47.1 crores rupay ki laagat se Falaknuma mein Secunderabad-Falaknuma Broadguage Line par maujooda Road over Bridge ke mutawazi ek aur Road over Bridge ki taamer ke liye intizami manzoori day di hai.
288.title: Falaknuma mein ek aur Roadover Bridge

news_detail: Hyderabad. All India Small Scale Industries Minorities Committee ki janib se berozgaar naujawanon aur khawateen ko ‘khud kamao khud khao’ programme ke tehat mukhtasir sarmaya se sanati o karobari unit shuru karne ke talluq se shaoor beydaari aur guidance ke liye itwaar 5

August ko 10:30 bajey se 1:00 bajey din tak Madinah Education center Nampally rubaroo Public Garden mein aik free workshop munaqqid kya ja raha hai. Committee ke sadar janab s Z. Saeed ne kaha ke hukoomat Hind ke sanati tarbiati idaara NIMSMSME / Nisiat Hyderabad ke sabiq Faculty Mr. CHVS Murthy mukhtalif aisi scheme ki jaankaari aur rahnumai faraham karen ge jin ke liye hukoomat Hind ke alawa riyasti hukoomat ki janib se subsidy bhi faraham ki jati hai. Naib Sadar Mr. Samson Prakash ne kaha ke jin afraad ne Facebook aur email mil par apne naam register kurwaye hain woh waqt ki pabandi ke sath shirkat karen. Committee ka maqsad ghareeb’ be sahara aur berozgaar afraad ko maloomat faraham karna aur un ko rozgaar ki taraf raghib karna hai.
300.title: Khud kamao khud khao programme ka aaj free Workshop

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen o Rukn Parliamnent Hyderabad Mr. Asaduddin Owaisi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Sadar BJP Mr. Amit Shah par yeh challenge karte hue baras parre ke agar un mein juraat hai to woh Hyderabad parlimani halqa se muqaabla krdkhayin. woh aaj yahan aik zabardast rally ke baad khitaab karte hue kaha ke har koi Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen se Hyderabad ki nashist chean lainay koshan hai. unhon ney kaha ”mein inhen challenge karta hoon ke agar un mein juraat hai to woh Hyderabad se Majlis ke khilaaf muqaabla karkay dikhain. hatta ke mein Sadar congress Rahul gandhi ko challenge karta hon ke Hyderabad se intikhabaat mein muqaabla karen, yahi nahi balkay BJP aur congress dono mil kar bhi Majlis ko Hyderabad se shikast nahi day satke.’ ‘ Mr.Asaduddin Owaisi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko jadugar P C  Sarkar qarar dete hue markazi hukoomat par Aqliaton aur Daliton par kiye jaaney walay hamlon ko roknay mein nakami par sakht tanqeed ki. Modi, awam se keh rahay hain ke 25 June ko yom siyah manayeen. unhon ney yeh wazeh kiya ke awam ney gandhi jee ka qatal, babri masjid ka inhedam, gujrat ke fasadaat aur azad hindustaan mein paish anay walay deegar pur-tashaddud waqeat ko faramosh nahi kiye hain. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke hkmran BJP, RSS ke agenda ko is andaaz mein rubay amal laa rahi hai ke aqltyon ke sath imtiaz barta ja raha hai.
176.title: Modi, Amit Shah aur Rahul Gandhi ko Hyderabad se muqaabla karne Asad Owaisi ka challenge

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Secretary Dr. S. K. Joshi ney ohdedaron ko idayat di ke rud e Musi River nadi ke farogh aur greater Hyderabad municiple karporasion ke hudood mein double bedroom makanaat ki taamer se mutaliq kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye. Secretriat mein senior ohdedaron ke sath jaiza ijlaas mein kaha ke Musi River ke farogh ke kamon ke ziman mein Zila Collector aur deegar mutaliqa mehakma jaat ke mabain rabita o irtebaat ke liye aik khusoosi ohdedar ka taqarrur kya jaye ga. Director Enforcement Vigilance and Disaster Management Mr. Vishwajit ki zair e qayadat khusoosi team ko jo malba ki safai ke kamon ki nigrani karti hai munasib amlah aur saaz o samaan faraham kiye jany chahiye. malba ko daalnay ke liye aik earzi dmpng yard ki nishandahi ki jaye. unhon ney kaha ke malba ke mazeed ambaar ke tadaruk ke liye tamam imkani maqamat par blue sheets daal diye jayen. unhon ney kaha ke rod Musi River aur buffer zone par qabzon ki nishandahi ke Survey ka kaam androon aik mah mukammal karliya jaye. Survey mein qabzin ke samaji o muashi haalat aur un ki abadi ko bhi shaamil kya jaye. mehakma aab paashi ke ohdedaron ko idayat di gayi ke godavri se taaza pani chorra jaye. isi terhan mushtarqa muaina kya jaye, takhmeenah tayyar kya jaye aur master plan tayyar kya jaye. Principal Secretary mehakuma Baldi Nazam o Nasq o Shehri Taraqqiat Mr. Aravind Kumar ney kaha ke aik International Design muqaabla munaqqid kya gaya jis mein 10 teamon ney apna registration karwaya aur 9 agencio ney apne design daakhil kiye hain. qabza jaat ki barkhastgi ke liye khusoosi hikmat e amli waza ki gayi hai. Musi River ke farogh ke pehlay marhala mein teen kilometer ki patti par shajar kaari ki jaye gi aur dosray marhala mein s tea piz taamer kiye jayen. tatheer shuda pani baghbani aur ziraat ke liye istemaal kya jaye ga. Survey aur qabzon ki barkhastgi ke kamon ke baad taraqiyati kaam shuru kiye jayen ge. unhon ney kaha ke bapu ghaat ke qareeb Musi River aur eesa nadiyon ke sngm se mut-tasil 61 aekar araazi par aik khusoosi sayahati prajkt farogh diya jaye ga .

Chief Secretary Mr. s ke joshi ney GHMC ohdedaron ko hidayat di ke GHMC hudood mein 109 muqamat par double bedroom, hall kitcehn ki taamer ke kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye. mahana asaas par darkaar funds ki tajaweez hukoomat ko rawana ki jayen. Police Outposts, Fire Stations, CC TV cameras ki tanseeb, External & Internal Infrastructure ki tajaweez mutaliqa mehakumay tayyar karen. Police aur mutaliqa Zonal Commissioners GHMC ki janib se tafseeli muaina ke baad tamam Zones mein Traffic Islands ki nishandahi ki jaye. Chief Secretary ney kaha ke pedastrians ki sahoolat ke liye zebra crossings, junctions ke farogh aur sarkon ki tosee ke kaam bhi agay bherhaye jayen
185.title: Musi River ke farogh aur double bedroom makanaat ke kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye: Chief Secretary

news_detail: Hyderabad shehar mein Metro rail Stations jadeed o asri Smart Parking saholaten baham pohanchaney wazeer Baldi nazm o nasq o shehri taraqyat Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ki hadaayat par Hyderabad Metro Rail Limited ( HMRL ) ney Miyanpur-Ameerpet-Nagole ki karkard  30 kilometer patti par waqay 24 Metro Rail Stations par awaami-khangi shiraakat daari ki asaas par ISPMS (Integrated Smart Parking Managment Systme) ke farogh ka mansoobah tayyar kya hai aur bolyon ko qatiat day di hai. Managing Director HMRL Mr. N. V. S. Reddy ney bataya ke teen companiyon ney boli mein hissa liya tha M/s Zruti Solutions ko licencee ke taur par muntakhib karliya gaya hai jo M/s Egile Parking Solutions Private Limited ke sath technical collaborations haasil kere gi, aakhir uz zikr Company Smart Parking ka bain-ul aqwami tajurbah rakhti hai. M/s Zaruti Solutions  8 crores rupay ka sarmaya lagaye gi aur un 24 Metro railway Stations par aalmi miyaar ka ”on street smart parking facilities” baneye gi aur un ki dekh bhaal kere gi aur chalaye gi. Yahi nahi balkay 20 barson ki muddat mein HMRL ko 7 crores rupay ki raqam bhi ada kere gi. ”Park Hyderabad” ke brand naam ke tahet HMRL ka marboot smart parking system aik jame digital solutions asasi hogajo saaray parking umoor ke ihata kozyad_h insani mudakhlat ke baghair chalaye ga. yeh aik stizn mobile App bhi rakhay ga jo Metro Stations par tamam on street smart parking lots se bar waqat maloomat faraham kere ga. Two wheelers aur four wheelers ke malkin apne GPS ko istemaal karte hue kisi bhi Metro Station ka safar karne se qabal apni matlooba parking ki farahmi digital jaanch kar saktay hain. Yeh log apne smart phone par apni location service ko istemaal kar saktay hain aur system un 24 Metro Stations par taqreeban 4, 000 two wheelers parking bays aur 400 four wheelers parking bays mein apni gaari ko park karne dastyab bays ko display kere ga. parking shrhin two wheelers ke liye fi ghanta 3 rupay aur four wheelers ke liye 8 rupay fi ghanta honge
197.title: Hyderabad Metro Stations par jadeed parking saholaten

news_detail: Sabiq captain Indian Cricket Team o sabiq Rukn Parliament Muradabad Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne Secunderabad Lok Sabha aindah aam intikhabaat 2019 mein muqaabla karne ke apne iraadon ka inkeshaf kiya hai. Captain ne yeh bhi wazahat kar di ke 2019 aam intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha Secunderabad se un ke muqaabla karne ka qatee faisla party high kamaan kere gi. yaad rahay ke Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne 2009 ke intikhabaat mein halqa parliment morad abad riyasat Uttarpradesh se congress party ke ticket par muqaabla karte hue kamyabi haasil ki thi taham 2014 ke intikhabaat mein inhen halqa Lok Sabha Tonk Saway, Rajasthan se shikast ka saamna karna para tha. Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne kaha ke Secunderabad ki awam chahati hain ke woh un ke halqa se muqaabla karen. Unhon ne kaha ke jab unhon ne Secunderabad halqa ka dora kya to awam ne un se khwahish ki ke woh Secunderabad se muqaabla karen. captain ne bataya ke unhon ne party High Command aur ae aayi si si ke tlnganh umoor ke nigran ko is baat se aagah kardiya hai. yaad rahay ke congress party ke baaz senior qaideen ne Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ko Hyderabad Lok Sabha se muqaabla karne ki khwahish ki thi jahan se saddar majlis ittehaad almslmin Barrister Asadudin Owaisi guzashta do miaadon se bhaari aksariyat se muntakhib hotay arhay hain. Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne aik sawal ka jawab dete hue kaha ke woh kamyabi ya shikast ke barey mein nahi sochte lekin awam chahati hai ke woh Secunderabad halqa Parliman se muqaabla kere
210.title: Captain Azharuddin Secunderabad se muqaabla ke khwahan!
