news_detail: Inquilabi gulukar Gaddar ne kaha kay woh Iqtidaar chahtay hain jis ke liye woh 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ke khwahan hain. Aaj yahan Sundarya Vignan Kendr mein Bahujan Left Front (BLF) ke zair e ihtimaam seminar se khitaab karte hue Gaddar ne kmyonst partiyon par zor diya ke woh muttahid ho jaien. unhon ne kaha ke ‘Laal-Neelay Parcham’ ke naara ke sath aik nai parliment le anay ki zaroorat hai. unhon ne ilzaam aed kya ke bi jay pi, awam kodaktr B. R. Ambedkar policy ke naam par gumraah kar rahi hai. unhon ne kaha ke Bahujan Rajya adheekar sirf isi soorat mein mumkin hai ke laal aur neel parcham muttahid ho jaien. Unhon ne kaha ke laal aur neelay prchmon ke ittehaad ke liye mubahis jari hain. unhon ne kaha ke laal aur neelay prchmon ke ittehaad ko dekhte hue mujh mein intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ki khwahish paida horahee hai. Unhon ne bataya ke un ka naam fehrist raye dahindgaan mein shaamil nahi hai lekin ab haq raye dahi ke liye mein apna naam fehrist raye dahindgaan mein darj karwaun ga.
219.title: Gaddar intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ke khwahan

news_detail: Hyderabad- Deputy Chief Minister Telangana janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney kaha hai ke hukoomat khusosan Chief Minister janab K. Chandarshekhar Rao aazmin hajj ki Falah o behbood se gehri dilchaspi rakhtay hain aur un ki khidmat ke liye funds ki koi qillat nahi rahay gi. is saal hukoomat ney Haj Committee ke liye chaar crore rupiye Manzoor kiye hain aur agar zaroorat ho to mazeed funds faraham kiye jayen ge. aaj subah Haj House mein Telangana State Haj Committee ke zair e ihtimaam muntakhib aazmin hajj ke liye teen roza teeka andazi camp ka iftitah karte hue unhon ney un khayalat ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke aazmin hajj ko bimarion se mehfooz rakhnay ke liye teeka andazi be had zurori hai agar koi teekay nah le to is ku Jeddah Airport par pareshani hosakti hai. unhon ney kaha ke Haj House mein Hyderabad aur ranga ready ke teen hazaar aazmin ki teeka andazi ka intizam kya gaya hai. Deputy Chief Minister ney aazmin hajj ki khidmat ke liye saddar nasheen janab Mohammad Masehullah Khan Special Officer Professor S.A. Shukoor aur arkaan hajj committee ki dilchaspi aur lagan ki sataish ki. janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney kaha ke Telangana malik bhar mein qaumi yakjahti aur firqa waranah hum ahangi ki misaal hai. janab Bandaru Dattatria M.P. ney kaha ke aazmin hajj ki khidmat ke liye bulaa lehaaz mazhab o millat log atay hain. aaj kal khawateen ki khud ikhtiyari mein izafah hota ja raha hai’ safar hajj mein bhi khawateen Mehram ke baghair ja sakti hain. saddar nasheen riyasti Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney kaha ke Haj Committee aazmin ki behtar se behtar khidmat ka azm rakhti hai. Aazmin ko vidaa karne ke liye anay walay rishta daaron ki sahoolat ke liye woh Haj Camp ke douran Haj House ke qareeb waqay function hall –apne zaati srfh par haasil kar rahay hain taakay aazmin ke rishta daar wahan t_hr saken. is ke ilawa hajj camp ke douran Haj House mein free y fai ki sahoolat bhi faraham ki jaye gi. Janab Mohammad Saleem MLC o sadarnasheen Telangana Waqf Board ney kaha ke aazmin ko is saal mazeed behtar khidmaat faraham ki jayen gi. Special Officer Professor S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke vaccination camp Institute of Preventive Medicines,  District Medical& Health Officer aur Princes Esra Hospital ke taawun o ishtiraaq se kya ja raha hai jo teen din jari rahay ga. Is mauqa par Haj Committee ke arkaan janab Mohammad Farooq Hussain MLC, janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed,  janab Mohammad Shafi, janab Arifuddin, Dr. Aqeel Hashmi aur janab Abu Talah Amjad ke alawa mohtarma Mamta Gupta Corporator aur janab Irfan Shareef Assistant Secretary Haj Committee bhi maujood they .

* kal mangal 17 July ko 10:30 bajay din taa 4:00 bajay shaam Haj House mein cover number 3001 taa cover number 6000 ke aazmin ki teeka andazi hogi. Aazmin se khwahish ki gayi hai ke woh bank chalaan’ ya cover number ki slip zaroor apne sath layein
238.title: Haj House mein seh roza teeka andazi programme ka iftitah

news_detail: Swami Paripurnanda ke riyasat mein dakhla par imtina ke khilaaf BJPney aaj mobayyana tor par Chief Minister ke camp office par dharna dainay ka mansoobah banaya tha taham Police ney BJPke arkaan qanoon saaz Assembly o arkaan Qanoon Saaz Council aur ahem qaideen ko ahteyati tor par girftar karte hue nakaam banadiya. Swami Paripurnanda ko reyasti Police ney Telangana se kharij karte hue un par riyasat mein dakhla par imtina aed kardiya hai. un par mnafrt phelanay aur awam ko tashadud ke liye uksanay ka ilzaam hai .

qayed Aiwaan Telangana Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ko aaj Police ney Himayatnagar mein girftar karliya aur inhen Kanchan Bagh Police station ko muntaqil kardiya. Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ney apni giraftari ke baad twitter par arkaan Assembly ko girftar karne ki hidaayat dainay par Chief Minister Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao ko un ki aamranah zehniat ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya. unhon ney –apne bayan mein kaha ke ke si are ki jabirana o aamiranah zehniat se riyasat ke jamhoori tane banay ko sangeen nuqsaan pahonch raha hai. Sarbarah mumlikat ke tor par Chief Minister, arkaan Assembly o arkaan Qanoon-saaz Council se mulaqaat ke paband hain, yahan si am, arkaan Assembly ki giraftari ka hukum dete hue jamhoriat ka mazaq uda rahe hain. BJPke arkaan Assembly Swami Paripurnanda ke riyasat se ikhraj ke masla par tabadlah khayaal karne CM ke appointment ke liye darkhwast ki thi. Mujhe Assembly mein BJPLegislature ke daftar jatay hue rasta mein girftar karliya gaya. BJP arkaan Assembly o arkaan Qanoon-saaz Council ki rehaish gaahon aur dafatir par subah se hi bhaari Police tainaat kar di gayi. yeh tea are s mein khauf o hraas ko zahir karta hai. Police ney beya noon kya ke yeh iqdaam BJPqaideen ko Chief Minister ke camp office par jama honay se baaz rakhnay kya gaya hai. am ail si Mr. Ramchandra Rao ko ghar par nazar band kardiya gaya jabkay Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ko Police commissionaire Office Basheer Bagh ke qareeb hirasat mein le liya gaya, isi terha sadar riyasti BJP Dr. K. Laxman ko MLA Quarters par hirasat mein le kar Ramgopalpet Police station muntaqil kya gaya. Khairatabad MLA Mr. Ch. Ramchandra Rao aur senior qayied Mr. Baddam Bal Reddy ko Police ney Assembly ke baab ud dakhila ke qareeb girftar karte hue Bolaram Police station muntaqil kardiya. rukan Assembly gosha mehal Mr. Raja Singh ko bhi Police ney ghar par hi nazar band rakha
261.title: BJP Qaideen ki ahteyati giraftari

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad, Nampally mein Haj House mein aazmeen Haj ko mehfooz qiyam ki saholaten faraham karne aaj Camp mein aatish faro alaat ki karkardagi ka jaiza liya gaya aur aag lag janey ki soorat mein is par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira kiya gaya. fire brigead mehakma ke amlah ney aaj Haj House poanch kar aatish fer alaat ki sahet ka jaiza liya aur aag par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira bhi kya. fayrbrigid ke ohdedaron ney bataya ke Haj House mein chunkay back waqt aik hazaar se zayed afraad muqeem hotay hain, is liye un ki salamti ko yakeeni bananay nagehani waqeat se nimatnay ke liye tamam tar ahteyati iqdamaat kiye gaye hain. Camp ke bahar aik fire tender maujood rahay ga aur do Bullet vehicles bhi honge jabkay amlah ke 15 arkaan tainaat rahenge. Sadarnasheen Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masih Allah Khan ney bataya ke Hyderabad Embarcation pointe se riyasat tlnganh ke ilawa aandhra pradesh aur Hyderabad krnatk ilaqa ke taqreeban 8, 000 aazmeen Haj, muqaddas maqamat ke liye rawana hon ge. Unhon ney bataya ke Haj House mein qaim Haj Camp mein yakam augst taa 15 augst 25 qaafley rawana hon ge. un aazmeen ka Haj Camp mein do din qiyam rahay ga. aazmeen ko Camp mein qiyam ke douran arram da saholaten baham pohanchanay ki tamam tar tayyariyan mukammal karli jarahi hain. aazmeen ki khidmat ke liye mukhtalif mehakma jaat ke ohdedar mojood rahen ge. Volunteers ki bhi aik badi tadaad aazmeen ki hama waqt khidmat par mamoor rahay gi.
278.title: Haj Camp mein aag par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira

news_detail: Lions Club. Mehr Organization ne Lions Club of Charminar Centennial ke ishtiraaq se ”Tiranga hai meri jaan” munsarim kardah Rally ko Lion Vijay Kumar Sethi ne jhandi dikhayi.Is mauqa par, Lion Affan Quadri qadri saddar Charminar Centennial, Lion Aleem bag, Lion kamal, Lion dinesh, Lion Javed Khan aur Lion Amoodi bhi maujood they. Youm e azaadi ki munasibat se Qaumi Parcham ki Azmat ke izhaar ke taur par is Rally ka ihtimaam kya gaya tha jo tareekhi Charminar se rawana hokar mughal poora pohanchi jis mein o s am college ke taqreeban 250 talba ne 125 bikes ke sath hissa liya. Yeh talba apne hathon mein qaumi parcham thaamay hue they aur ‘Tiranga hai meri jaan’ naaray lga rahe they. Yeh Rally Charminar se bar-aamad hokar chowk, Puranapul, Bahadurpura, Tadban, Shamsheer Ganj, Falaknuma,Chandrayan Gutta Phisal Banda, Santosh Nagar aur Eidi Bazar se hotay hue mughal poora pohanchi. Rally ka ekhtataam qaumi taranah par huwa. Lion Affan Quadri aur Lion Amoodi ne Rally ki nigrani ki.
293.title: Tiranga hai meri jaan’ Rally ka ihtemaam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadarnashin Telangana State Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko hidaayat di hai ke woh farz shanasi aur lagan o mehnat ke sath khidmaat injaam den aur jin Hujjaj karaam ko un ke supurd kya gaya hai un ki bar waqat madad o rahnumai karte rahen. unhon ney aaj seh pehar Haj House mein riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kaha ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko Hajion aur Haj Committee o hukoomat ke darmiyan ahem kari samgha jata hai’ un ki behtareen aur itminan bakhash khidmaat ka aitraaf kya jaye ga aur un ko toseefi sanad aur award se nawaza jaye ga. Woh zimma darion se mun nah morhin aur zaroorat ke waqt Hujjaj karaam ko dastyab rahen’ aazmeen Hajj ki rawaangi se le kar un ki watan wapsi tak un ki behtar se behtar tareeqa par madad o rahnumai karte rahen aur mehnat o justojoo ke sath khidmaat injaam den taakay kisi ko kisi qisam ki shikayat ka moqa nah miley. Agar woh itminan bakhash karkardagi ka muzahira nah karen to un ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. Is ijlaas se khitaab karte hue special officer Telangana State Haj Committee Prof  S. A. Shukur ney Khadim ul Hujjaj ki zimma darion aur faraiz ke ilawa Hujjaj karaam ke masail aur un ko darpaish anay wali mushkilaat se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke aazmeen hajj ko Khadim ul Hujjaj se kaafi umeeden wabsta hoti hain aur woh Saudi Arbia mein hukoomat aur Haj Committee ke numainday samjhay jatay hain. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj apne faraiz aur zimma darion se ghaflat karen aur waqt par’ khasosan kisi haji ke intqaal yaksi aur nagehani soorat e haal mein dastyab nah rahen to is se kaafi dushwari aur uljan peda hoti hai aur Haj Committee aur hukoomat ki karkardagi par harf aata hai. Haj Committee kaafi paisa kharch karkay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko rawana karti hai. unhon ney kaha tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj ko jacket day ye jayen ge aur woh hamesha usay pehnay rahen. jacket istemaal nah karne walon ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. anho n ney intibah diya ke Hadayat aur usoolon ki khilaaf warzi karne walay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko wapas talabb karliya jaye ga. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj munasib andaaz mein khidmaat injaam nah den to Haj Committee un ke khilaaf karwai karne par majaboor hojaye gi. un ko nah sirf black list kya jaye ga balkay un par jo masarif aed hue hain woh un se wusool karliye jayen ge. professor s ae shkor ney mazeed kaha ke aazmeen hajj jin imaarton mein qiyam karen ge is imarat mein muqeem tamam aazmeen hajj ko un ke phone number day diye jayen ge aur building ke office ke paas un ke naam aur phone number ke astikrz bhi laga day ye jayen. Unhon ney kaha ke aazmeen hajj jab bhi phone karen to un ka jawab diya jaye aur un ki jo bhi madad karna ho woh ki jayen. Counsel General ya mualim ya Hukoomat Saudi arab ki janib se vqtan fawaqtan di jaany wali Hadayat aur notson se bhi aazmeen ko waaqif kerwatay rahen’ is ke ilawa tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj rozana apni karkardagi aur Hujjaj karaam ki naqal o harkat aur un ke qaym ke talluq se reyasti Haj Committee ko waaqif kerwatay rahen. Saudi Arab mein qiyam ke dauran qurbani ke token aur train aur bas ke bres late Hajion tak pahonchayin. Bemari’ haadsa’ raqam ya samaan khojane’ kisi aazim e Hajj ke bhichar jaany aur amwaat ki soorat mein Khadim ul Hujjaj aazmeen ki madad karen. Khadim ul Hujjaj Saudi arab mein qiyam ke douran aik register rakhen jis mein un ki karkardagi ka ka record rakhen aur wapsi ke baad usay Haj Committee mein daakhil karen. Is mauqa par assistant secretary janab Urfan shareef bhi mojood they.
307.title: Khadim ul Hujjaj faraiz se kotahiyon par karwai ka intibah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke agar hamaray galay bhi kaat dyie jayen tab bhi hum Musalmaan hi banay rahen ge. Haryana mein aik Musalmaan ki Daadhi jabran mundhwa diye jany ki it-tila-aat ke tanazur mein Barrister Owaisi ka yeh bayan samnay aaya hai. Barrister Owaisi ne itwaar ku markaz mein barsar iqtedaar BJP ko challenge kya ke agar jurraat ho to Mizoram aur Jammu and Kashmir mein National Register of Citizen (NRC) ke tehat survey karwaye. Sabiq Sadar Majlis janab Abdul Wahid  Owaisi ki barsi ke mauqa par Ahmed Nagar mein aik jalsa aam se khitaab karte hue Assam mein NRC ke musavvida fehrist se 40 lakhs afraad ko madakhilatkaar qarar dete hue kharij kardainay par Sadar BJP Amit Shah par zabardast tanqeed ki aur BJP hukoomat ko challenge kya ke deegar riyaston mein bhi aisa hi kar dikhaay. Unhon ne media reports ke hawala se kaha ke Tripura ko maujooda Chief Minister 1971 mein Bangladesh mein paida hue they. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke jab oppostion parties, Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke khilaaf tehreek ada etemaad paish ki theen us waqt Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ne Narendra Modi ke galay lag kar BJP par etemaad ka izhaar kya. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne tanzia andaaz mein kaha ke do mard aik dosray se galay miley chunkay un ke gharon mein koi aur nahi hai. Sadar Majlis ne ilzaam aayed kya ke 2014 mein BJP ke Iqtidaar mein anay ke baad hujumi tashaddud mein 86 feesad izafah huwa hai aur mutasireen mein 96 feesad Musalmaan hain jinhein gaau kashi ke naam par qatal kya gaya. Gaaye ki raksha ke naam par Musalmanoon ko nishana banaya ja raha hai aur Wazeer e Azam khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye hue hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamaray galay bhi kaat dyie jayen bhi to hum Daadhi badhana nahi chodenge. Yeh Musalmanoon ka dastoori haq hai. Unhon ne kaha ke dobarah Iqtidaar panay ke liye BJP, 2019 ke intikhabaat ka saamna nafrat aur firqa parasti ke maahol mein karna chahti hain. Jalsa se Majlis Ittehaad ul Muslimeen ke Arkaan Assembly aur mazhabi rehnumaoon ne bhi khitaab kya.
179.title: Hamaray galay kaat dyie bhi jayen to hum Daadhi badhayain ge : Barrister Asad Owaisi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandar Shekar Rao ki bahen Leelamma ka aaj yahan aik khangi Hospital mein dehaant hogaya, jis ke baayes woh apne daura Dehli ko mukhtasir karte hue zareya tayyarah 1:00 bajay din ghar lout gaye. Leelamma jo kuch arsa se Yashoda Hospital mein zair e ilaaj theen jahan unhon nay aakhri saans len. Un ki laash un ki rehaishgaah muntaqil kar di gayeen. Mr. K Chandar Shekar Rao ki ahliya Shoba, Wazeer Aabpaashi Mr. Harish Rao aur khandan ke deegar afraad Hospital pahonch kar khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya. Wazeer Information Technology wo Baldi Nazam o Nasq Mr. K. T. Rama Rao jo Rajanna Sircila  zila ke daura par they apna programme multawi karte hue ghar pahonch gaye. Zila Sircila  mein Yellareddypait mandal ke mauza Padira ki Leelamma ke pasmaandgaan mein shohar Shankar Rao aur do farzand Kantha Rao aur Madhusudan Rao hain. Chief Minister ki aik aur bahen ka guzashta February mein dehaant hogaya tha.
186.title: Chief Minister Telangana ki bahen chal baseen

news_detail: Hyderabad. (press note) Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union  (TUWJU) ki riyasati committee ka aik ahem ijlaas itwaar ko Noble Hall, Mustafa Towers, Lakdi ka pul mein munaqqid huwa jis mein Union ki Hyderabad Unit ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi. Tanzeem ke ohdedaron aur arkaan ki mutafiqa raaye se Senior sihafi janab Sajjad ul Hasnain ko Hyderabad unit ka Sadar muntakhib kya gaya jabkay janab Mohammad Shujauddin Ifteqari ka moutemad e Umoomi (Secretary General) ke taur par intikhab amal mein aaya. Isi terha Sayyad Yahya Pasha Quadri, Mohammad Saghiruddin, Mohammad Asif Ali aur Mohammad Hussamuddin ko Nayeb Sudoor muntakhib kya gaya. Organising  Secretaries ke taur par Khaleel Farhad, Anees ur Rahman, Syed Baqar Hussain, Mohammad Subhan, Nawab Abrar aur Mohammad Wajidullah Khan ko muntakhib kya gaya. Mohammad Abdul Mohsin, Mustafa Mohsin, Mohammad Manzoor aur Mohsin Sheikh ka Secretaries ki hesiyat se intikhab kya gaya. Mohammad Muttabe Ali Khan ko Khazin muqarrar kya gaya jabkay Mohammad Rafi , Mohammad Abdul Azeem, Mohammad Abdul Zameer, Mohammad Abdul Akram, Syed Abrar aur Mohammad Akram ko ba-haisyiat Arkaan e Amila muntakhib kya gaya. Qabal azeen ijlaas se khitaab karte hue Union ke sarparast Mohammad Sajid Meraj ne kaha kay jab tak Urdu sihafion mein ittehaad o ittafaq qayim nahi hota aur Urdu sihafi apni salahiyaton o taaqat ka muzahira nahi karte, unhen insaaf milnay wala nahi hai. Unhon ne Telugu sahafion ke masawi Urdu sahafion ko bhi sarkari mara-aat aur sahulaton ke liye jad-o-jehad jari rakhnay ka elaan kya aur Union ke tamam arkaan ko mahswara diya ke woh Tanzeem ko mazboot bananay ke liye apna apna rule sargarmi ke sath ada karen. Unhon ne kaha kay Union ki Hyderabad unit ki tashkeel ke sath hi tanzeem ki taaqat mein mazeed izafah hojagaya hai. Ab yeh Tanzeem mazeed sargarmi ke sath Urdu sihafion ko un ka haq dilanay ke liye apni jad-o-jehad ko agay badhayegi. Unhon ne aayindah mah Union ka Generalbody ijlaas munaqqid karte hue Urdu sihafion ke huqooq ke liye mukhtalif mhazon par taizi ke sath iqdamaat roba e amal laane ka bhi elaan kya. Union ke riyasti Sadar Ather Moin ne apne khitaab mein kaha ke hamein mil jul kar agay badhna hai. Union mein is ke har aik rukn ki ahmiyat hai. Kisi bhi rukn ke sath kahin bhi koi na-insafi hoti hai to Union na sirf is ke khilaaf aawaz uthaayegi balkay apne rukn ko insaaf dilanay ke liye har mumkin qadam bhi uthaayegi. Riyasti Sadar ne bhi tamam Urdu sihafion ke mabain ittehaad o ittefaq ko laazmi qarar diya aur kaha ke ittehaad ke baghair koi bhi maqsad haasil nahi kiya ja sakta. Union ke riyasati Secretary General Mohammad Layeeq , Naib Sudoor Mohammad Abdul Hakeem, Mohammad Abdur Rawoof Aazmi aur Secretary Mohammad Rafeeq Patel ne bhi khitaab kya. Ijlaas mein tanzeem ko har satah par mustahkam bananay ke liye iqdamaat par ghaur o khouz kya gaya. Arkaan ne apni raye se ohdedaron ko waaqif karaya aur mukhtalif masayel se aagah bhi kya. Un masayel ki yaksoi ke liye jald iqdamaat ka faisla bhi kya gaya. Ijlaas mein riyasti Khazin Syed Wajid Hussaini, Arkaan Amila aur Union ke deegar ohdedaaron ne shirkat ki. Aakhir mein Hyderabad unit ke nau muntakhib ohdedaron ko mubarkbad paish ki gayi.
195.title: TUWJU Hyderabad Unit ki tashkeel

news_detail: Hyderabad- Commissioner Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha hai ke Aazmin e Hajj, Makkah Muazzama mein riyasat Telangana bilkhushoos Hyderabad ki Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ki barqarari aur yahan rehne walay awam ke khushhali ke liye’ aur khaas taur par nai nasal ki munasib tarbiyat’ rahnumai aur Falah o behbood ke liye khusoosi dua karen. Unhon ney kaha ke Aazmin ko vidaa karna un ki khush naseebi hai’ Aazmin e Hajj khush naseeb hain ke unhen Allah taala ney apne darbaar mein haazri ke liye talab kya hai. Aaj Haj House mein Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko jhandi dikha kar vidaa karte hue unhon ney in khayalat ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke aazmin ki madad aur khidmat karne walay bhi khush naseeb hain. Commissioner Police ney Aazmin e Hajj ko mahswara diya ke woh tamam shanakhti dastawizaat hamesha apne sath rakhen. unhon ney kaha ke woh muqamat Muqaddisa mein apne Mulk aur Shaher ke safeer hain is liye wahan discipline aur safai ka khaas khayaal rakhen. Unhon ney Aazmin e Hajj se khwahish ki ke woh Makkah Muazzama mein jitna bhi waqt guzray woh duaon aur ebadaat karte rahen kyunkay dua mein aisi taaqat hai jis se insaan ki zindagi mein aik tabdeeli aati hai. Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha ke adai Hajj ke baad insaan mein aik numayaan tabdeeli aati hai lehaza Hajj se wapsi ke baad woh aisa kuch Karen ke hamaray muashra mein aik musbit tabdeeli aeye aur hamari nai nasal mein achi aadaten aur salahiyaten parwaan chadhein. Commissioner ney kaha ke agar aik fard hi kisi ke haq mein dua kardey to badi baat hoti hai aaj yahan itney saaray log hain aur un ki duayen lena un ki khush qismati hai. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC ney Aazmin se kaha woh Harmain Sharifain mein Facebook’ Whatsapp waghera ke istemaal se guraiz karen aur selfie lainey par tavajja nah den’ jo waqt mil raha hai usay ibadton ke zareya Allah aur Allah ke rasool ko raazi karne ki koshish karte rahen. Sadarnasheen Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Maseehullah Khan ney kaha ke Aazmin e Hajj Allah ke maheman hain aur un ki khidmat har musalman ka farz aur baayis khush naseebi hai, unhon ney Aazmin se khwahish ki ke woh aik farz ki takmeel ke liye jarahay hain is liye woh apna tamam waqt ibadaat mein sarf karen. Special Officer Prof. S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke Telangana State Hajj Committee Aazmin e Hajj ki rawaangi ke alawa un ki wapsi aur Saudi Arab mein un ke qiyam ke douran un ki har terha se madad aur rahnumai ke intizamaat karti hai. Maulana hafiz Mohammad Osman Naqshbandi Imam Makkah Masjid ne Hujjaj karaam ko baaz zaroori ahteyati baton se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke woh tavajja aur inhimak ke sath manasik Hajj ada karen. Hyderabad se ab tak Hujjaj karaam ke jumla 12 qaafilon ke zareye 3, 600 Aazmin, Makkah Mukramah pahonch gaye. Aaj 12 wein qaafila ke zareye 300 Aazmin rawana hue, jin ki flayit ney theek 4:00 bajay udaan bhari. Is mauqa par Director mehakuma Aqliati Bahbood janab Shahnawaz Qasim,  arkaan Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed,  janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Imtiyaz Khan, janab Arifuddin ke alawa DCP Central Zone Mr. Vishwa Prasad DCP Traffic Mr. Babo Rau, Additional DCp Mr. Mohammad Taajuddin,  Assistant Secretary Hajj Committee janab Irfan Shareef aur dosray maujood thaiy. Budh 8
August ko do qaafilon ke zareye 600 Aazmin barahJeddah, Makkah Muazzama rawana honge. Pahela qaafila 6:00 bajay shaam aur dosra qaafila 10:00 bajay shab parwaaz kerega.

Aaj ke band ke paish e nazar shehar mein RTC buses bhi band rahin, taham RTC ki janib se Aazmin ki buses ki rawaangi ka khusoosi intizam kya gaya. Hajj Camp, Nampally se Rajiv Gandhi International Airport ke Hajj Terminal tak jo special buses chalaye gayeen. Har do basoon ke sath Police scart rakha gaya aur is terhan Police Scort ki nigrani mein Aazmin ki rawaangi amal mein aayi. Telangana State RTC ki janib se aala ohdedar camp ke aaghaz se hi shaksi taur par buses ki rawaangi ki nigrani kar rahay hain. Un mein Mr. C Vinod Kumar Regional Manager Hyderabad Region, Smt. Sudha Parimala Divisional Manager Charminar, Smt. Samira Afreen Dpot Manager Fallaknuma aur Mr. K V V Reddy Depot Manager Mehdipatnam shaamil hain jo har qaafiley ki rawaangi ke mauqa par Hajj House mein maujood rehtay hain. Janab Sheikh Basha Retd. Divisional Manager APSRTC Hajj Committee ki taraf se buses ke intizamaat ki nigrani karte hain.
213.title: Commissioner Police Hyderabad ney Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko vidaa kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein Transport ki hadtaal ka asar juzwi raha hai. Hadtaal ke baayis RTC ney mehdood paimana par apni services chalaye jabkay shehar mein nisf se zayed Autos sadkon se gayab rahay. Cabs bhi sadkon par kam hi dikhayi dyie. RTC basoon aur autos ki kami ko awam ney Metro Train ki khidmaat se istifada karte hue poora karliya. Mangal ke din subah se hi Metro Trains khucha khuch bhari hui rahen. TSRTC Drivers Unions, Auto Drivers Unions  aur Taxi Drivers ney Motor Vehicles Act mein tarmeem ke khilaaf shehar Hyderabad mein hadtaal ka elaan kya tha. Metro hukkaam ney dareen asna din bhar izafi Trains chalayein. Din bhar main har 6 minute mein aik train rakhi gayi thi jabkay raat mein aik ghanta ziyada trains chalanay ka faisla kiya gaya. Aaj raat 11:00 bajey Nagole aur Miyapur se aakhri train chalaye jayegi jo neem shab ko apni aakhri manzil par pohunche gi.
231.title: Hyderabad mein Transport hadtaal ka juzwi asar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Osmania University ne tawaqqe ke mutabiq security wajohaat ka bahana banatay hue Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura Campus ki ijazat dainay se inkaar karte hue Congress Party ko jhatka dey diya hai. Joint Director University Estate Cell ne tlgo department ke pi each d reserch askalr Mr. K. Manvatha Roy ki janib se daakhil kardah darkhwast ka jawab dete hue kaha ke talba tanzeemon ki janib se Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura se mutaliq ki gayi darkhwast ko security wajohaat ki binaa par mustard kya jata hai chunkay woh special security courage ke tehat hain. unhon ne is jawab ki naqool University wise chancellor ke secretary aur registrar aur o s d ko bhi rawana ki hai. tea pi si si ke tarjuman Mr. Manvatha Roy ne is mauqa par khitaab karte hue ilzaam aed kya ke hukoomat Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura University ki ijazat dainay se rad kardiya hai chunkay is University mein cheif minister Mr. ke Chandar shikhr rao qadam rakhnay ke muaqqaf mein nahi hain. unhon ne kaha ke Mr. ke si are ke dabao mein aakar joint Director University Estate Cell ne security wajohaat ka bahana banatay hue Tagore Auditorium mein Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke jalsa ki ijazat dainay se inkaar kardiya. Talba tanzeemon ne 14
August ko Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura University ki ijazat ke liye 4

August ko darkhwast di thi. TRS se mulhiqa talba tanzeem TRSV ne Mr. Rahul Gandhi ko intibah diya tha ke woh is waqt tak University mein qadam na rakhay jab tak ke woh Telangana awam se maffi mangay aur shaheedan e Telangana ki yadgar par apni naak rgde. Is tanzeem ke qayedeen ne Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura e University mein rakhne daalnay ka bhi intibah diya tha.
247.title: Rahul Gandhi ko Osmania University ka daura karne ki ijazat dainay se inkaar

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer e dakhla Mr. Naini Narsimha Reddy ne Eid uz Zoha ke mauqa par safai suthrayi ke liye ‘Team Bakrid’ ki janib se guzishta do barson se jari muhim ki satayish ki aur kaha ke aayindah Baqr Eid ko hum Musalman aur Hindu bhai mil kar pur-aman aur shandaar andaaz mein manayeen ge aur apne apne ilaaqon mein safai suthrayi ka khaas khayaal rakhen ge. Baqr Eid ke mauqa par safai suthrayi ke liye mahkuma Police aur mehakma baldia ki janib se bhi bharpoor taawun kya jaye ga. Unhon ne is khusoos mein ‘Team Bakrid’ ki janib se chalaye jaane wali Tehreek ki satayish ki. Moulana Ilyas Shamsi khateeb Masjid Osmania Sultan Bazar o Sadar Reformers Front of India ne teen saal qabal Baqr Eid ke mauqa par zabihah janwaron ke ghair mustamla ajzaa (unused parts) ko phaink dyie jaane se phaelnay walay taffun aur is ke sehat aama par honay walay asraat ko mehsoos karte hue aik tehreek shuru ki thi aur awam se khwahish ki thi ke woh zabihah janwaron ke ghair mustamila aaza ko sadkon par phaink dainay ki bajaye inhen kachrah kundyon mein hi dalain. Unhon ne is khusoos mein Police aur GHMC ohdedaron se bhi rabita qayim karte hue Baqr Eid ke teen dinon ke douran safai ke liye khusoosi muhim chalanay par razamand karliya. Is khusoos mein moulana Ilyas Shamsi ne naujawan samaji kaarkunon ki aik team hi tashkeel dey di jo raza karana taur par Eid e Qurbaan ke mauqa par sargaram rehtay hain aur Police aur GHMC ohdedaron se taawun o ishtiraaq karte hue qurbani ke janwaron ki nakara ashya ki aajilaana nikasi ko yakeeni banatay hain. yeh team badhtay badhtay ab taqriban 500 samaji jahedkaaron ki aik mazboot team ban gayi hai jo shehar ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Baqr Eid ke mauqa par sargaram hotay hain. molana Ilyas shamsi ka kehna hai ke islam mein taharat/paaki ko badi ahmiyat di gayi hai. Isi terha aik Musalman kisi ke liye takleef dah nahi ho sakta, lekin hum ne jab yeh mehsoos kya ke hamari thodi si be ahteyati ki wajah se na sirf dosaron ko takleef pohanchti hai balkay hamari apni sahet par bhi is ke muzir asraat muratab hotay hain is liye hum ne Baqr Eid ke mauqa par yeh tehreek shuru karne ka faisla kya tha jis ke bohat hi musbit nataij bar aamad hue hain. Hamein sarkari mehakmon ki janib se bharpoor taawun haasil ho raha hai.
260.title: Eid uz Zoha ke mauqa par paki ko yakeeni bananay ‘‘Team Bakrid’’ mutharik

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hindustan ki jad-o-jehad aazadi mein deegar aqwam ke muqaable Musalmanoon ka bhi barabar ka role raha hai. Aazadi ke 71 baras guzar jaaney ke baad Musalmanoon se hubb ul-watni ki sanad maangna jahalat aur be waqoofi hai. Ab waqt agaya hai ke tamam Hindustani is terha ki jahalat ke khilaaf uth khaday hon. Naamwar moarriq o maahir e taleem Captain L Pandu Ranga Reddy ney aaj Salaar e Millat Auditorium Urdu Maskan Khilwat mein Razakarana tanzeemon Seva aur Chishti Foundation Hyderabad ke zair e ihtimaam ”jad-o-jehad Aazadi hind mein Musalmanoon ka role” unwan par munaqidah Seminar se maheman khusoosi khitaab karte hue un khayalat ka izhaar kya. Seminar ki sadarat janab syed Haider Ali Engineer Sadar Seva ney ki. Captain L. Pandu Ranga Reddy ney kaha ke Hindustan ki Aazadi mein Hyderabadion ka bhi bohat bada role hai. 1857 mein Bartania ki Residency par hamla karne walay aalim e deen Moulvi Alaauddin aur Pathan Turrebaaz Khan thaiy, jis par unhen kala pani ki saza di gayi thi. Kothi College ke rubaroo sadak ko Turrebaaz  Khan se mausoom kya gaya lekin aaj koi bhi un ka naam nahi laita. ‘Jai Hind’ ka naara Subhash Chandra Bose ke saathi Hasan Safrani ney diya tha. Tirange ki tayyari ka sehra P. Venkaiah ko diya jata hai jo ke sara sar ghalat hai. Tiranga jhanday ka design Surayya Tayyab Jee ney tayyar kya tha yeh tamam Hyderabadi thaiy. Sardar Nanak Singh Nashtar Sadar International Sikh Center for Interfaith Relations ney apne khitaab mein kaha ke Hindustan mein Islam talwar ki bunyaad par nahi phela balkay buzurgon ke pyar o mohabbat ki bunyaad par deen ko farogh haasil huwa, yahan tak ke Golden Temple Amritsar ki jagah aur Nanded ke Grudwarah ki jagah bhi Musalmanoon ney atiyah di thi, Grudwarah ke liye araazi ki qeemat bhi lena Musalman malkin ney gawara nahi kya tha. Hyderabad riyasat par taqreeban 500 saal tak Musalman hukumaran rahay, unhon ney awaam ke dilon par hukoomat ki. Taqseem e Hind ke zimma daar Mohammad Ali Jinah nahi thay woh sirf Aazadi mein Musalmanoon ko barabar ka haq chahtay thay un ki daleel yeh thi ke woh aqliat ko aksariyat ka ghulam nahi banana chahtay, ab Dalai Lama ney khud kaha ke Nehru taqseem e Hind ke zimma daar thay, is se yeh baat saabit hoti hai ke Jinah Mulk ki taqseem ke zimma daar thay. Janab Syed Ahmed Pasha Quadri Motammad e Umomi Majlis o Rukn Assembly Charminar ney kaha ke Aazadi ki jad-o-jehad mein Musalmanoon ki qurbanion se nai nasal ko waaqif karwana zarori hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Urdu zabaan ney Aazadi ki tehreek mein aik jaan daal di thi, ‘Inquilab Zindabad’ ke naara se Angrezon ko sakht pareshani thi. Ulma karaam Tehreek Aazadi ke moujjid thaiy. Hindustan tamam mazahab ke maanne walon ka aik guldasta hai jahan tamam pyar wo mohabbat se rehtay hain lekin baaz firqa parast taqaten hamein aapas mein taqseem karna chahti hain, hamein apne Hindustani honey par fakhr hai. Unhon ney kaha ke zulm ke sath hukmarani nahi ki ja sakti. malik mein tamam ke sath masawi insaaf hoga to Mulk mazeed taraqqi kere ga. Dig Vijay Jain advocate (Jain Singh Hyderabad) ney kaha ke Hindustan, Sri Ram, Gautam Budh aur Khwaja Ghareeb Nawaz

ki sarzamen hai lekin bad qismati se yahan firqa parast taqaten janam le kar baaz sawal utha rahi hain. Jad-o-jehad Aazadi mein Musalmanoon ke role ko janney ke liye firqa paraston ki sanad ki zaroorat nahi hai. Dig Vijay Jain ney kaha ke Gandhi ji ki satiya girah tehreek ke zimmadaar Battak Miyan Ansari thaiy. Angrezon ke khilaaf Gandhi Ji ki tehreek adam taawun par Kerala se 2337 Musalmanoon ney apni jaanun ka nazrana paish kiya tha. Sarhadi Gandhi Khan Abdul Gaffar Khan ki aawaz par Peshawar ke qissa khawani bazaar mein taqreeban 200 Pathanon ney apni jaanen watan ke liye qurbaan kar di theen. Kakuri train waqea mein teen mujahideen ko kaala paani ki saza di gayi thi jin mein Ashfaqullah Khan Shaheed shaamil thay. Mulk ki kayi riyaston ke rajaaon Rani Laxmi Bai, Nana Bhai Peshwa aur Maha Rana Partab ke sipah salaar Musalman thaiy. Aazadi ki pehli jung Palasi mein Siraj ud Dowla ney Angrezon se muqaabla kya. Digvijay Jain ney kaha ke naiy Bharat ki taamer ke liye tamam Hindustanyon ko mil kar jad-o-jehad karne ki zaroorat hai. Mohtarama Sudha Jain Miss India Asia Pacific 2017-18 ney kaha ke Aazadi ki ladai mein khawateen bilkhushoos Muslim khawateen bhi shaamil theen. Begum Hazrat Mahel ki qurbanion ko faramosh nahi kiya ja sakta. Unhon ney apne amal, kirdaar aur shairi ke zareya Aazadi ke matwalon mein hararat jagayee. Abadi Bano Begum jinhein B amma ke naam se bhi jana jata hai inhen apne bachon ke sath Aazadi ka naara laganey par pakad liya gaya tha, woh bapardah khatoon honey ke bawajood jad-o-jehad Aazadi mein shareek theen. Moulana Syed Mohammad Ali Quadri Al-Hashmi  Mumshad Pasha Sadar markazi Majlis Qadriah ney kaha ke Delhi ki Jamia Masjid se allama Fazl Haq Khairabadi ney sab se pehlay Angrezon ke khilaaf jehaad ka Fatwa jari kya jis ke baad 1857 ki paheli Jung e Aazadi ka waqea paish aaya. Is ke baad jitni bhi tahriken bapaa huien un mein ulama aur mashaiykh paish paish thay. Convenor seminar janab Shujauddin Ifteqari Haqqani Pasha Sadar Chishti Foundation wo Naib Sadar Seva ney khair maqdami khitaab kya aur karwai chalaye. Aakhir mein janab Mohammad Mastan Secretary Seva ney shukriya ada kya. Nawab Abrarullah Khazin Seva wo General Secretary Chishti Foundation, janab Mohammad Makhdum Ali Khan secretary M K Education Society aur Siraj Mohiuddin Ifteqari Aadil Pasha Secretary Chishti Foundation ney intizamaat ki nigrani ki aur mehmanon ka khair maqddam kya. Saint Sulaiman School ki talibaat ney ibtida mein qaumi geet aur aakhir mein qaumi taranah paish kya.
275.title: Musalmanoon se hubb ul-watni ki sanad maangna jahalat aur be waqoofi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner Hyderabad City Police ney 15 augst ko yom azaadi ke mauqa par Qilah Golconda prayed ground par ‘Yaum e Aazadi Parade’ ke liye intizamaat ke zimn mein awam ko mahswara dya ke woh Qilah Golconda, Prade Grounds ki simt jatay hue apne sath koi hand bag, briefcase, camera, tiffin careers ya kisi qisam ke containers sath na le jayen. Agar koi fard 15

August ko aisi ashya le jatay hue paaya jaye to is ki Police jama talashi le gi aur jaanch kere gi. Iss liye awam se khwahish ki jati hai ke iss khusoos mein Police ka taawun kere chunkay yeh security ka takaza hai. Hyderabad City Police ney Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par traffic ke rukh mein tabdeeli aur Qilah Golconda mein mukhtalif zumron mein gaadiyon ki parking ke liye alaheda elamia jari kya hai.
309.title: Golconda mein Yaum e Azzadi taqreeb. Police tahdidaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qilah Golconda mein 15

August ko Yaum e Aazaadi ke mauqa par 10:00 bajey din Parcham kushai aur Parade ki munasibat se Golconda ke atraaf traffic ke munasib nazam ko yakeeni banaaney Hyderabad police ne traffic tahdidaat aayed ki hai jis ke mutabiq 15

August ko 7:00 bajey subah se 12:00 din tak Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda aaney wali traffic aam gadiyon ki aamad o raft band rahay gi. Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda mein dakhla ko Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par takreeb parcham kushai ke liye madoo kiye gay afraad ke liye 7:30 bajey subah taa 11:00 bajey din tak istemaal ki jayen gi jo A, B aur C Car Passes ke haamil hon ge. Secunderabad, Banjara Hills, Masab Tank, Mahdi Patnam ki taraf se A, B aur C car passes ke sath aaney walay tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Reti Bowli aur Nanal Nagar Junction se aagey badain aur baayen moud letay hue Balika Bhavan,Langar Houz Bridge, Tipu Khan Bridge, Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza aur Qilah Golconda Gaate ki taraf badhne daayen janib moud len. Neechay utrney ke baad ‘A Car Pass’ holders ko chahiye ke woh apni gadiyaan Fort Gate ke samnay main road par yani Fatah Darwaza Road par park karen. Jabkay ‘B Car Pass’ ke haamil mehmanon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh apni gadiyaan Golconda Bus Stop par park karen jo Gate se 25 meter ke faasla par hai aur ‘C Car Pass’ ke haamil maduyeen Golconda Bus Stop ke qareeb right turn letay hue Football/Boys Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Tamam maduyeen jo D, E aur F Car Pass ke sath atay hain woh Qilah Golconda ko Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi (Banjara Darwaza) ki taraf se barah Sheikhpet Naala aur Toli Chowki ayen chunkay unhen Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza se daakhil honay nahi diya jaye ga. ‘D Car Pass’ ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh Priya Darshini School Golconda ke paas utar jayen aur apni gadiyon ko parking ke liye Indira Priya Darshini School ke andar bhaij den. ‘E Car Pass’  ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi agay badh kar Golf Club ki simt baen moud len aur Jammali Darwaza ki taraf dayen janib moud kar aur apni gadiyaan Owaisi/GHMC Play Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Jo Qilah Golconda ke Main Gate se sirf 600 meter ke faasla par hai. ‘F Car Pass’ ke sath muqam takreeb aaney wali gadiyaan yani aam logon ki gadiyon walon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Langar Houz flayover ke neechay se aayen aur ‘U’ turn lein aur Fatah Darwaza ki simt jaany daayen janib moud le lein aur Fatah Darwaza ke qareeb HUDA Park par apni gadiyaan park karen. Sheikhpait aur Toli Chowki se aaney walay aam log apni gadiyaan Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi mein park karen. Un do muqamat se takreeb  ke muqam tak pahonchaaney ke liye muft RTC buses par sawaar ho saktay hain. Wapasi mein bhi inhen yeh sahoolat muyassar rahay gi.

Taqreeb ke ekhtetaam par A, B aur C Car Passes ki haamil gadiyaan Makai Darwaza, Ramdev Guda Langar Houz waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘D Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Banjara Darwaza, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘E Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Bada Bazaar Fatah Darwaza ya Jamali Darwaza, Golf Club, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera aur Langar Houz waghera se bahar nikleen gi. ‘G Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan yani aam log sirf apni parking ki jaghon se hi wapas lautenge. Tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi hai ke aasaan shanakht ke liye woh apne mutaliqa Car Passes gaadiyon ke wind screen ke baayen janib numayan taur par chiaspaan karen. Mazeed bran un se khwahish ki gayi hai ke woh dawat nama par ki gayi sarahat ke mutabiq bar waqat pahonch jayen. Alawa azeen un se yeh khwahish ki gayi ke woh route par, gadiyon se utrney ke muqamat aur gadiyon ki parking ki jaghon par taayinaat Traffic Police amlah ke sath taawun karen. Secunderabad Parade Ground par bhi Yaum e Aazadi ki munasibat se traffic tahdidaat aayed ki gayi hain. Tyoli Junction par traffic ko Broke Bound aur NCC Junction ki simt mod di gayi aur Tyoli se Plaza aaney wali gadiyon par 8:00 bajey subah taa 10:00 bajey din tak tahdidaat aayed rahengi. Golconda ke Main Gate par Boarding ke liye maduyeen ke drivers ku talab karne public address system ki sahulat rahegi.
321.title: Golconda par Yaum e Aazadi taqreeb. Gaadiyon ka rukh aur traffic tahdidaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ki High Court se aaj Hindus ke mazhabi rehnuma Swami Paripoornanand ko badi raahat mili hai. Unhen shaher badar kiye jaanay ke ehkaam ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwast par muazziz High Court ney un ke shaher badar kiye jaanay ke ehkaam par hukum iltiwa jari kardiya hai. It-tila-aat ke mutabiq Swami Paripoornanand Hyderabad pohnchain ge aur mazeed bayanaat ke liye qiyam karen ge. Guzishta maah High Court mein Swami Paripoornanand ney teen alhadah Petitions mein Hyderabad, Cyberabad aur Rachakonda ke Commissioners aur Telangana ke Principal Secretary (dakhla) ki janib se un ke khilaaf jari kardah ehkaam ikhraj ko challenge kya tha. Unhen deegar bradarion aur un ke qayedeen ko nishana banatay huve isthiaal angaiz bayanaat dainay ka ilzaam aayed karte hue qanoon insidaad ghair samaji o khatarnaak sargarmian 1980 ke tehat unhen 6 mah ke liye 11

July ko Hyderabad se shaher badar kardiya gaya tha. Adalat ney qabal azeen is darkhwast ko samaat ke liye qubool karliya tha jis mein yeh id-daa kya gaya tha ke mazkoorah qanoon ke tehat shaher badar karne ke liye fard ka ghunda hona zaroori hai. Yaad rahay ke Telugu filmon ke naaqid o adakar Kathi Mahesh ney aik Television show mein HIndus ke bhagwaan Ram ke talluq se remark kya tha jis par Hindu bradri mein gham o gussa paaya jata tha. Swami Paripoornanand ney is bayan ke khilaaf sakht rad-e-amal zahir karte hue elaan kya tha ke woh Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko thais pohanchanay walay bayanaat ke khilaaf Shiva Temple Bod Uppal se Yadadri tak Dharmika Chaitnya Yatra’ nikalenge.Swami Paripoornanand se qabal Kathi ko bhi 6 mah ke liye shaher badar kya ja chuka hai. Kathi ney Hindus ke bhagwaan Ram ko dhoka baaz qarar dainay ke sath sath kayi naazaiba remarks bhi kiye thay aur yeh tak kahe diya tha ke Sita Devi ko Rawan ke sath hi rehna chahiye tha chunkay woh Lanka mein behtar zindagi guzar sakti thi.
183.title: Swami Paripoornanand ko shaher badar karne ke ehkaam par High Court ka hukum iltiwa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ney aaj inteqhabaat ka saamna karne Congress Party ki tayarion ka jaiza liya. Yaad rahay ke Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K.Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha tha ke woh Telangana Riyasat mein Reyasti Assembly ke inteqhabaat shumal ki chaar riyaston ke sath kar wane ke haq mein hain jahan Jaria saal mah Decemeber mein inteqhabat munaqqidshudni hain. Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke iss bayan ke baad siyaasi halqon mein yeh charchay honey lagey hain ke Telangana Assembly ke inteqhabaat waqt se paheley munaqqid ho saktay hain. Rahul Gandhi ney apne daura e Telangana ke dosray din aaj lecture dainey ki bajaye party qaideen ke sath dubado baat cheet ki aur un ke khayalat ki samaat ki. Unhon ney party ke kayi ahem qaideen ke sath shakhsi taur par waqt guzarah aur un ki hausla afzai ki ke woh bilaa khauf aur ghair janibdari ke party ki kamzoriyon ki nishandahi karen. Zaraye ke mutabiq Rahul Gandhi ney intehai inkisari aur apni makhsoos muskurahat ke saath har qayed se alahda alahda baat cheet ki. Congress qayideen un ke liye apne sadar ka waqt nikaalna aur un ki baat sunna gavaaraa karne par bahot hi masroor nazar arahay thay. Rahul Gandhi ney party qaideen ki baat cheet bohat hi tahammul se suntay rahey aur darmain mudakhlat nahi ki. Woh androon party, jari aapsi rassa kashi ko daur karne koshan hain. Samjha jata hai ke unhon yeh taasur diya ke un ki daanist mein Party mein jari dakhli kashakash, Telangana mein ayendah inteqhabaat mein mehngi pad sakti hai. Unhon ney dakhli ikhtelafat ko door karne ke liye party qaideen par zor diya ke aapas mein ek dosray ke khilaaf ulhajtay rehne se ziyada ahem party ko dobarah Iqtidaar mein lana hai. Agar Party qaideen aur karkun yun hi ek dosray ke khilaaf rahenge toh hum asal maqsad se door ho jaien ge. Ijlaas ke baad Sabiq wazir Sarweypally Satanarayana ney kaha ke tamam qaideen khushi mehsoos kar rahay hain ke Rahul Gandhi ney un ke sath waqt guzara. Umooman is qad ke qayideen, apni party ke kaarkunon se khitaab karkay chalta bantaa hai magar Rahul Gandhi ney party kaarkunon ko Sunna gavaaraa kiya. Is mauqa par mojud ahem qayideen mein Saddar Pradesh Congress Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy, Sabiq wuzraa Mohammad Ali Shabir, K Jana Reddy, Sabiq markazi wazir S Jaipal Reddy aur sabiq Rukn e Parliament K. Renuka Choudary shaamil hain.
191.title: Rahul Gandhi ne taqreer karne ki bajaye kaarkunon ko sunna pasand kya.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar All India Congress Party Mr. Rahul Gandhi ne apne do roza daura e Hyderabad ke dosray din Gun Park waqay rubaroo Assembly imaraat pahonch kar “Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana” par Telangana Riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye shaheed honay walay jahedkaron ko qhiraaj paish kya aur un ki rawaangi ke fauri baad TRS ke qayideen ne yadgar ka doodh se abhishek kya. Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke ‘Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana’ pahonchney par barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki talba tanzeem ke qayideen ne intibah diya tha jis ke paish e nazar Police ne security ke wasee tar intizamaat kiye thaiy. Mr. Rahul Gandhi aaj seh pahar Telangana ke party qaideen aur kaarkunon ki bhaari tadaad ke sath Gun Park pahonche aur Yadgar par phool malaayen paish ki aur Shaheedan e Telangana ko qhiraaj paish kya. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ne dosray din Hyderabad mein masroof tareen din guzara. Unhon ne talba ke sath bhi tabadlah khayaal kiya aur party ke qaideen ke sath dubado baat cheet ki aur un ke khayalat ki samaat ki. Sadar Congress ba zarea tayyarah Dehli wapsi se qabal Saroornagar Stadium mein Ek jalsa se bhi khitaab kiya. Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana ka daura karne ke baad barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke qaayideen aur party se mulhiqa talba tanzeem ke qaayideen ne Yadgar ko doodh se dhoya. TRS qaayideen Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke wahan se rawana honay ke kuch dair baad Gun Park puhanche aur ‘Yadgar Shaheedan e Telangana’ ka doodh se abhishek kya. TRS qaideen ne aysa karte hue yeh taassur diya ke Sadar Congress Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke yahan pounchanay se ‘Yadgar Shaheedan e Telangana’ ki naqadri hui hai, is liye is ko pak karne ke liye doodh ka abhishek diya gaya. Rukn Parliament Mr. Balka Saman, Deputy Mayor Mr. Baba Fasiuddin, sargaram quied Mr. Muqeet Chanda aur kayi sargaram qaideen ne is abhishek mein hissa liya aur Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke yahan pounchanay par apni barhami ka izhaar kya. TRS qaideen ka yeh istadlaal tha ke Telangana ke sath sab se ziyada na insafi Congress ke hi daur mein hui hai. Alahda Telangana Riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye chalaye gayi dono tahrikaat ko Congress hi ne kuchalnay ki koshish ki thi jis ke nateeja mein sainkddon Telangana awam ko apni jaanun ka nazrana paish karna pada. TRS qaayideen ka kehna hai ke ab jabkay itni qurbanion ke baad Telangana haasil huwa, Congress Party, Telangana awam ki taayeed haasil karne Shaheedan e Telangana se apni hamdardi jatanay ki koshish kar rahi hai jo sirf aur sirf vote batorne ka Ek harba hai.
203.title: Rahul Gandhi ka Shaheedan e Telangana ko qhiraaj. TRS ne doodh se abhishek kardiya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ney kaha ke aaj wazeh kardiya ke who ‘Hindutva’ ke qaail nahi hai. Nah hi mautadil Hindutva par aur nah hi jarehana Hindutva par un ka aiqaan hai. Mudeer hazraat aur Senior Sahafion ke sath tabadlah khayaal karte hue Rahul Gandhi ney is baat se ittafaq nahi kya ke woh aksariati tabqa ko rijhaane aitdaal pasand Hindutva se maghloob hue hain. Unhon ney kaha ”woh kisi bhi noiyat ke Hindutva chahay woh naram Hindutva ho ya phir sakht geer Hindutva eeqaan nahi rakhtay.” Unhon ney kaha ke mazhabi rehnumaon se mulaqaat karna aur mazhabi muqamat ka daura karne mein koi qabahat nahi hai. Unhon ney  kaha ke Wazir e Azam Narendra Modi ke sath un ke ikhtelafat nazriyati hain, shakhsi nahi. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney  id-diaa kya ke BJP aayenda Intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha ki 230 nashistain haasil nahi kar payin gi, is terha Narendra Modi ke dobarah Wazir e Azam ban’nay ka sawal hi paida nahi hota. Unhon ney  kaha ke Uttar Pradesh aur Bihar mein ghair BJP Partiyon ke maabain intekhabi mafahmat ke baayis to awwal BJP ki taaqat mein kami aajay gi, alawaazeen BJP ki kayi haami partiyan bashmole Shiv Sena Modi ke doosri miyad ke liye Wazir e Azam ban’nay ke haami nahi hain. Sadar Congress ney  kaha keBJP ko shikast dainay un ki party azeem tar ittehaad tashkeel dainay koshan hai. Woh purazm hain ke Congress ki zair e qayadat azeem tar ittehaad aayendha Hukumat tashkeel daigi. Unhon ney  is sawal ka raast jawab dainay se ehteraaz kya ke Congress aur deegar ghair BJP partiyon ke aksariyat haasil karne ki soorat mein Wazir e Azam kaun hoga? Unhon ney  sirf itna kaha ke is par gaur wo khouz kya jaye ga. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney  aisa koi ahed bhi nahi kya ke Karnataka tarz par markaz mein Congress ko hatmi aksariyat haasil na honay ki soorat mein BJP ko iqtidaar se door rakhnay sab se badi party honay ke bawajood doosri partiyon ko tashkeel e Hukumat ki dawat denge? Parliament mein Wazir e Azam se un ke baghalgeer honay se mutaliq poochnay par unhon ney  kaha ke is ka maqsad yeh jatana tha ke woh fard se nafrat nahi karte. Unhon ney  kaha ke Wazir e Azam magar rad-e-amal mein sard thay. Unhon ney  ilzaam aed kiya ke Modi apne siyasi harifon ka ehtram nahi karte. Rahul Gandhi ney  Mulk mein badhti adam rawadari par tashweesh ka izhaar kya. unhon ney  kaha ke Aqliaten Adam tahaffuz ka shikaar mehsoos kar rahay hain. Unhon ney  kaha ke party ki reyasti units, Ilaqaayi satah par hum khayaal partiyon se ittehaad karne ke liye azad hain. Unhon ney  is yaqeen ka izhaar kiya ke Telangana mein Congress Iqtidaar mein aeyegi. Andhra Pradesh mein party ke muaqqaf se mutaliq istefsaar par kaha ke un ki party wahan apna muaqqaf behtar bana rahi hai. Unhon ney  kaha ke do crore nojawanon ko mulaazimaten faraham karne ke wada ko Modi ney  faramosh kardiya. Unhon ney  kaha ke China 24 ghanton mein 50,000 logon ko mulazmat faraham karta hai jabkay Hindustan mein is muddat mein sirf 458 mulaazmaten faraham hoti hain. Shadi se mutaliq istafsaar par Rahul Gandhi ney  kaha ke Congress ke sath un ki Shaadi kab hi ke hochuki hai.
214.title: Mujhe na hi mautadil aur na hi Jaareh Hindutwa par yaqeen hai: Rahul Gandhi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher Hyderabad mein 72

yaum e jashnn azaadi badey hi tuzk wo Ehtesham se manaaya gaya. Shaher ke mukhtalif mohalla jaat aur colonies mein rehaishi Unitd ki janib se bhi taqreeb parcham kushai anjaam di gayi. Dilshad Nagar, Reti Bowli, Mehdipatnam mein Dilshad Nagar Youth & Welfare Association ki janib se bhi josh o khurosh ke sath yaumw e azaadi taqreeb ka ihtimaam kya gya aur parcham kushai anjaam di gayi. Janab Mohammad Bande Ali sahib retired judge ne mahemaan e khusoosi ki haisiyat se shirkat ki aur parcham kushai anjaam di aur Mulk ki azaadi ke liye qurbaniyan dainay walay mujahideen azaadi ko khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya. Iss mauqa par janab Syed Akbar Hussain Chairman Telangana State Minorities Corporation, janab Mohammad Raheemullah Khan Niyazi Incharge Nampally Assembly Constituency tlnganh Rashtra Samiti, janab Swami Sub Inspector Asifnagar Police Station, janab Mohammad Farooq Sadar Association, janab Mohammad Salah secretary, janab Ali Seddiq rukn, janab Mohammad Anwar aur Association ke deegar arkaan bhi maujood thaiy. Iss mauqa par colony ke bachon ne nazmein bhi paish keen.
226.title: Dilshad Nagar Mehdipatnam mein parcham kushai

news_detail: Hyderabad. Tennis Star Sania Mirza ne Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par pauda lagaya. Sania Mirza ne Harita Haram Programme ke hissa ke taur par 72 wein jashnn azaadi ke mauqa par pauda lagaya. Unhon ne kaha ‘mein ne Sania Mirza Tennis Academy  mein parcham kushai aur Yum e Aazadi taqreeb ke baad Harita  Haram Programme ke hissa ke taur par pauda lagaya hai.” Sania Mirza ne Wazir e sanat o hirfat, baldi nazam o nasq, Information Technology Minister ke T Rama Rao aur American Consul General Hyderabad Cathrine Hadda ka is Chanlange aur pehal par shukriya ada kya. Unhon ne apne tweet paiyaam mein kaha ke woh apne tamam Social Media family ko sabz mustaqbil ke liye naamzad karti hain.
242.title: Sania Mirza ne pauda lagaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Duniya bhar ke taleemi idaray aur asateza meyaari tadrees ke paband ahed hain taakay inhen ikeeswein sadi mein aalami shehri ke taur par tayyar kya jasakay. Inn khayalat ka izhaar mohtarma Katherine Hadda, Amrici Counsel General mutayinah Hyderabad ne aaj ”asateza angrezi zabaan, deeni madaris ke do roza tarbiyati programme” ke iftitahi ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kya. Dr Mohammad Aslam Parvez, Vice Chancellor ne sadarat ki. Mohtarma Hadda ne workshop ke shurka ka hawala dete hue kaha ke ”geographiyai aitebaar se mukhtalif ilaaqon se talluq rakhnay ke bawajood badi had tak Muslim bradri ki khidmaat se wabista idaron mein naujawanon ko zewar taleem se aarasta karna aap sab ka mushtarka wasf hai. ”Unhon ne kaha ke junoobi Hind ki 3 riyasaton Telangana, Karnataka aur Kerala ke alawa markazi zair e intizam ilaqa Paduchery se 90 asateza na muwafiq mausmi halaat se nimat te hue iss programme mein hissa le rahay hain. America, bunyadi khawandgi se le kar sanati aur aala taleemi mawaqay ki farahmi tak wasee tar taleemi masayel se nimatnay ki pehal ka hissa raha hai. Taham aisay tabqaat mein jinhein tareekhi taur par meyaari taleem tak rasai mein zabardast mushkilon ka saamna karna pada hai, un mein Amrici sifarat khana ke angrezi zabaan mein tarbiyati programme sab se ziyada maqbool aur asar angaiz rahay hain. molana azad national urdu university mein ilaqai daftar angrezi zabaan, Amrici sifarat khana, nai Dehli aur Amrici Counsel General, Hyderabad ke zair e ihtimaam is programme ka ineqaad amal mein aaya hai. Washington ke bain ul aqwami taleemi idaara World Learning, ke taawun se honay walay programme ke ineqad mein Urdu University ke markaz Peshawarana Farogh baraye Asateza e Urdu Zariya Taleem aur Tarbiyat wo Taayinaati Cell taawun kar rahay hain. Dr. Mohammad Aslam Parvez ne apni sadaarati taqreer mein MANUU ko bar e sagheer ki sab se badi University qarar diya jahan Urdu zariye se aala taaleem faraham ki jarahi hai. Unhon ne deeni madarson ke talba ke liye mukhtalif rabita (bridge) courses ke mutaliq bataya aur kaha ke MANUU mein pehli martaba samaji uloom, arts aur science ke alawa aur deegar asri mazameen bashmole computer science, poly technique aur commerce waghera mein dakhlay ke liye yeh course chalaye jarahay hain. Unhon ne deeni madaris ke sath Urdu University ke rishte ko ”khusoosi” qarar diya. Dr Luis Scott, Trainer World Learning ne programme ke mutaliq mukhtasir maloomat faraham kee aur bataya ke is ka pehla marhala MANUU hi mein January mein munaqqid huwa tha. Professor H. Khadija Begum, Coordinator ne khair muqaddam kya. Janab Misbah Anzer , Asst. Professor CPDUMT ne karwai chalaye. Dr Mohammad Yousuf Khan, Incharge Tarbiyat wo Tayinaati Cell ne shukriya ada kya. Yahan yeh waazeh karna Zaroori hai ke jahan chand deeni idaron aur un ke muntazmeen mein Americi sifarat khanah ki janib se chalaye jany walay programon ke talluq se khusoosi dilchaspi payi jaati hai balkay kuch to aisay bhi hain jo Amrici sifarat khanah ki qurbat panay ke liye kuch bhi karne amaada nazar atay hain wahein aam musalmanoon mein America ki musalmanoon ke tain itni dilchaspi ko shak ki nazron se dekha jata hai aur yeh sawal kiya jata hain ke aakhir Americi sifarat khanah ko musalmanoon ke deeni madaris se itni dilchaspi kyun hai aur America deeni madaris ke zareya apne kaun se maqasid poooray karna chahta hai?
255.title: Asateza, talba ko aalami shehri bananay ke liye paband ahed: Katherine Hadda

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem ney aaj Eidgha Mir Aalm ka daura karte hue Eid uz Zuha ki tayariyon ka jaayiza liya. Un ke hamrah Rukn Assembly Bahadurpura Mr. Mouzam Khan , CEO Waqf Board Mr. Shahnawaz Qasim , DCP South Zone Mr. V Satiyanarayana ke alawa Waqf Board, GHMC aur water Board ke  ohderaan bhi maujood thay. Mr. Saleem ney bataya ke har saal ki terha is saal bhi Eidgha Mir Aalm mein Eid uz Zuha ki namaz ke intizamaa kiye jarahay hain. Mausam e barish ke paish e nazar Eidgha ke androoni ihata mein Teen Shade dala gaya hai. Sadarnasheen Waqf Board ney bataya ke tamaam mehakuma jaat ke sath taawun o ishteraak aur behtar rabita ke sath Waqf Board intizamaat kar raha hai. Unhon nay awam se appeal ki ke woh intizamia ke sath taawun o ishteraaq karen aur safai suthrayi ka khaas khayaal rakhen. Zabiha janwaron ke ghair mustamila  aaza ki ko sadkon aur galiyouon mein pheenk dainay ki bajaye un ki behtar nikasi ko yakeeni banayen aur is khusoos mein GHMC amlah ke sath taawun karen. Har saal ki terha is saal bhi Eidgha Mir Aalm mein Eid ki namaz 9:30 bajey ada ki jaye gi. Imam o khateeb Mecca Masjid Moulana Mohammad Rizwan Qureshi imamat karenge aur khutba denge. Namaz se qabal Moulana Hussamuddin Sani Jaffer Pasah AMir e Millat e Islamia Telangana aur Moulana Saifuddin (Jamia Nizamia) ka bhi khitaab hoga.
280.title: Sadarnasheen Waqf Board ka Eidgha Mir Alam ka daura

news_detail: Hyderabad. Selaab se dochar Kerala ke awam ki madad mein Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen bhi shaamil hogayi hai. saddar kal hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeeno rukan parliment barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi nay aik tweet kya jis mein unhon nay kaha ke un ki party nay faisla kya hai ke –apne trust’ Majlis Charitble Trust’ ke zareya Kerala flood relief ke liye 16 lakh rupay ka atiya diya jaye. Yeh raqam kal Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief0 Fund mein jama krwadi jaye gi. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke is ke alawa hum 10 lakh rupay maliyat ki adwiyaat bhi Kerala rawana karen ge. unhon nay awam se khwahish ki ke woh agay badhen aur Kerala ki madad karen.
302.title: Selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke liye Majlis ki imdaad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K.Chandrashekar Rao ki janib se deegar riyaston ke sath Telangana mein bhi Assembly intekhabaat karwney Election Commission se darkhwast aur mah September mein hi umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kardainay ke elaan ke baayis na sirf TRS qaiydeen balkay deegar Partiyon ke qayideen ko bhi yeh lagnay laga hai ke riyasat mein qabal az waqt intekhabaat munaqqid ho saktay hain. Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke shana ba shana jad-o-jehad karne walay Professor Kodandaram ki zair qayadat nai tanzeem Telangana Jana Samiti (TJS) bhi intekhabi maidan mein qismat aazmai ke liye par tol rahi hai. Professor Kodandaram Sadar ney pehlay hi is azm ka izhaar kya tha ke un ki Party Telangana ki tamam 119 Assembly nashiston par apne umeed waar khada kere gi, aik baar phir apne is azm ka izhaar kya hai. Phir ke din akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Professor Kodandaram ney kaha ke TJS aayindah intekhabaat 2019 mein tanha 119 nashiston par muqaabla keregi taham unhon ney waqt se qabal intekhabaat ke ineqad ke liye jo wajuhaat batai jarahi hain un se ittafaq nahi kya.
322.title: TJS 2019 intekhabaat mein tanha muqaabla keregi: Professor Kodandaram

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samithi Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao tawaqqu hai ke kal ke jalsa aam ” Pragathi Nivedaana” mein Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar dein ge. Yun to Telangana Assembly ki miyaad May 2019 tak hai taham Mr Chandrashekhar Rao schedule ke mutabiq aam intekhabaat ke sath riyasti Assembly ke intekhabaat se bachney ke liye kal munaqqid shudni jalsa aam ”Pragathi Nivedana” mein riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar dein ge taakay Election Commission mulk ki deegar chaar riyasaton Mizorm, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh aur Chhattisgarh ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat ka bhi elaan kar sakay. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai KCR apne umeedwaron ka bhi kal hi elaan kar dein ge. Muzkoorah chaar riyasaton ki Assembly ki miyad December aur January mein khatam ho rahi hai. Kal ke programme ko Mulk ki tareekh ke sab se badey siyasi jalsa se tabeer kiya ja raha hai jis mein TRS apni siyasi taaqat ka muzahira karne jarahi hai. Is jalsa aam se qabal Telangana riyasati Cabinet ka ijlaas munaqqid hoga jis mein Assembly ki tahleel ki sifarish manzoor ki ja sakti hai. Chief Minister ke farzand aur un ke siyasi janasheen Mr. KT Rama Rao ney jo KCR Cabinet mein ahem qalamdaan rakhtay hain id-daa kya ke aap hamaray party qaayed se kal ahem siyasi elanaat ki tawaqqu kar saktay hain jis se riyasat mein siyasi mahol yaqeenan garma jaye ga. Taham abhi tak na hi Chief Minister aur na hi Party ke kisi ahem qaayed ney ta haal Assembly ki tahleel ke baray mein koi wazeh ishara diya hai. TRS Party ki sar garmion aur Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki janib se kiye jaaney walay ealanat ko dekh kar har koi yeh qiyaas kar raha hai ke KCR kal ke ijlaas mein Assembly ko tahleel karte huwe awaam se khat etemaad haasil karne ka elaan kar dein ge. Telangana Rashtriya Samithi ki hukoomat ki miyaad May 2019 tako hai aur Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat schedule ke mutabiq Lok Sabha ke intekhabaat ke sath hi hon ge. Tashkeel e Telangana ki chauthi saalgirah 2

September ko hai aur TRS Hukoomat isi din apni chaar sala karkardagi ko awaam ke samnay paish kere gi. Doosri janib bataya jata hai ke saddar BJP Mr. Amit Sha ney party qaideen ko yeh ishara diya hai ke saal ke avaakhr mein intekhabaat ka saamna karna hoga jis ke liye abhi se tayario ka aaghaz kardiya jaye.
192.title: Kiya KCR Assembly tahleel kar deinge ?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ney aaj Janaab Mohammad Rahimuddin Ansari ko Sadanashin Urdu Acadamy naamzad kiya hai. Chief Minister ney is khusoos mein file par dastakhat kar diye hain aur tawaqqu hai ke shaam tak is khusos mein GO jari kardiya jaye ga. Urdu Acadamy ke Board Of Directors ka hanooz elaan nahi kya jayega. Janaab Rahimuddin Ansari is se qabl bhi Congress ke daur e hukoomat mein Urdu Acadamy ke Sadar ki haisiyat se khidmaat anjaam dey chuke hain. Janab Mohammad Rahimuddin Aansari Telangana ki Muslim tanzimon ke Wifaaq ‘United Muslim Forum’ ke Sadar aur Jamia Islamia Dar-ul-Uloom Hyderabad muatamed hain. Woh All India Muslim Personal Law board ke rukan bhi hain. Janab Mohammad Rahimuddin Ansari, Moulana Mohammad Hammeeduddin Aqil Hussami RH ke damad aur  Moulana Hussamuddin Sani Jaffer Pasha ke brother-inlaw hotay hain.
201.title: Rahimuddin Ansari Sadanashin Urdu Acadamy naamzad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Senior Siyasatdan Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed ka 88 baras ki umar mein aaj inteqaal hogaya. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed 15

August 1930 ko Warangal mein paida hue thae. Woh Lok Sabha ke liye chaar martaba muntakhib huwe aur markazi wazeer bhi rahe chuke. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed 2000 tak Congress Party se wabista rahey aur Congress se istefa dainey ke baad BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Vajpai Hukumat ne unhen Saudi Arab ke liye Bharat ka safeer bhi naamzad kiya tha. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed ne mutahidda Andhra Pradesh mein Congress Party ke sadar ki haisiyat se bhi khidmaat anjaam di thi aur RTC ke bhi Sadarnashin rahe chuke thae.
217.title: Veteran Politician Kamaluddin Ahmed ka intqaal

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ne hafte ko riyasat ke tamam bijli idaron ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ne sarkari mulazimeen ke khutoot par bijli ke shouba ke mulazimeen ke liye Jame Health Scheme ka bhi elaan kya. Pragati Bhavan mein bijli ke mukhtalif shoubon se talluq rakhney walay mulazmeen ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue mulazimeen ki khidmaat ki satayish ki ke un ki kaawishon ke baayis nau tashkil shuda riyasat Telangana mein bijli ke bohraan par khabu paney mein paheli kamyabi haasil hui hai. Unhon ne kaha ke qaleel muddat mein hum ne tamaam shoubon ke liye 24 ghantay bijli ki farahmi ko yakeeni banaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ne kaha ke hum ne Pay Revision Commission se tankhwahon par nazr e saani ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya jis par 22 taa 24 feesad izafah ki tajweez saamne aayi. MR. KCR ne bataya ”mein ne Prabhakar Rao (Sadarnashin o Managing Director Genco & Transco) se poocha ke pichli martaba Pay Revesion kitna kya gaya tha to unhon ne bataya ke 30 feesad, mera khayaal hai ke pichli martaba jitna diya gaya tha is se kam nahi ho sakta. Phir mujh se 32% izafah ki sifarish ki gayi. Mein 35% izafah ka elaan kar raha hon.” Unhon ne kaha ke maujooda Health Scheme jo 3 lakh tak tibbi ikhrajaat bardashat karti hai aur khidmaat ke douran mazeed adayigyon ka imkaan nahi rehta hai is par nazar e saani ki zaroorat hai. Unhon ne kaha ke woh Prabhakar Rao aur deegar ohdedaron se kahe hain ke woh aik azadana Health Scheme waza karen jis mein masarif par kisi qisam ki tahdeed na ho. Yeh scheme aap aur aap ke arkaan e khandan ke liye tamaniat bakhash hogi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke bijli ke idaron ka intezamia bill collectors ki khidmaat ko baqaida bananay ke masla ka bhi jayeza le ga jo is waqt contract asaas par kaam kar rahay hain. Is mouqe par Chief Minister ki dukhtar wo Rukn Parliament Nizamabad Mrs. K Kavita aur bijli shoubon ke aala ohdedar bhi maujood thae.
236.title: Bijli ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision: KCR

news_detail: Hyderabad. SETWIN Mini Buses ki challan aur Moiyan auqaat par nazar rakhnay Mehkuma Transport ney faisla kya hai ke shehar mein chalaye jaany wali is ki tamam Buses mein Radio Frequency Identification ( RFID ) Tags nasb kiye jayen. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporaqtion zone mein kaam karne walay Telangana State Road Transport Corporation (TSRTC) mein kaam karne walay Drivers ki shikayat par ke SETWIN Mini Buses un Routs par chalaye jarahi hain jo un ke liye nahi muqarrar ki gayi hain, Mehkuma Transport ney yeh iqdaam karne ka faisla kya hai. RIFD Devices, Electromagnetic Fields ko istemaal karte hue cheezon se judey Tags ki khudkaar shanakht aur un ko track karte hain. Un Tags ki tanseeb se SETWIN ki gaadiyon ki nigrani karen ge aur agar yeh un ke liye mukhtas Routs ko chod kar kisi dosray Routs par chalaye jati hain to yeh device gaadiyon ki naqal o harkat ke talluq se Mehkuma Transport ko aagah karde ga. SETWIN Transport Services ke tehat 100 Mini Buses hain aur 57 mukhtalif Routs bashmool Secunderabad, Dilsuknagar, Mehdipatnam, Langar Houz aur Ameerpet par chalayi jaati hain aur rozana 50,000 musafireen ko aik muqam se dosray muqam par muntaqil karti hain. TSRTC ke ohdedaron ke mutabiq chunkay Mini Buses mobayyana taur par TSRTC Routs par chalaye jarahi hain, coopration ki aamdani mutasir horahee hain. RIFD Tags se SETWIN Buses ki nigrani mein madad miley gi is liye Buses ko deegar Routs par le jaany ka koi imkaan nahi rahay ga. Executive Director (GHZ) TSRTC Proshatam Naik ney kaha ke Mehkuma Transport ka yeh aik bada iqdaam hai jis se Mini Buses ki naqal o harkat par nigrani rakhi jaye gi. Unhon ney kaha ke RIFD Tags ki tanseeb ke baad agar koi Bus deegar Routs par chalaye jati hain to mutaliqa hakkaam jurmana aed karen ge chunkay inhen bas ke location ke baarey mein aagah karde ga. yahi nahi balkay SETWIN Mini Buses mobayyana tor parbas biz par musafireen ko bas bharnay ke liye are tea si Buses ke liye mushkilaat peda karte hain.
252.title: SETWIN Buses par nazar rakhnay RFID Tags

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat Telangana ney peer ko tamam sarkari mulazmeen ko Dearness Allownce ki aik qist Manzoor ki hai. TRS ke tarjuman Telangana Today ki report mein kaha gaya ke Chief Minister daftar se jari kardah press release ke mutabiq Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ke faisla ke nateeja mein mulazmeen ko 1

January 2018 se itlaq ke sath 1. 572% ki aik qist ke sath majmoyi taur par 27.248 D.A. haasil hoga. Sarkari mulazimeen taqreeban 9 mah se is izafah ke muntazir thae. Mulazimeen ke D.A. ki hanooz aik aur qist ki manzoori dena baqi hai.
266.title: Mulazmeen ke liye D.A. ki manzoori

news_detail: Hyderabad. Driver Empowerment Programe ke tahet aaj Minorities Finance Corporation ki janib se drivers mein gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi hai. Is programe ke tahet Uber, Maruti Motors aur State Bank of India ke ishtiraak ke sath 342 istefada kunindgaan mein cars taqseem ki gayeen. Yeh Cars 60% subsidy par di jaati hain. Aaj 15.20 Crores rupay maaliat ki gaadiyan taqseem ki gain. Taqreeb se khitaab karte hue Sadar Majlis wo  Rukn e Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat ka yeh iqdaam khush aayind hai. Hukoomat ko chahiye ke is khussos mein jo darkhwasten zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajilana yaksoi kardein. Kisi bhi hukoomat ki karkardagi ka paimana yeh ho sakta hai ke un ke daur e hukoomat mein aqliaton ke sath insaaf huwa hai ya nahi. Kya un ki jaan o maal ya ibadat gaahon ko khatrah to nahi hai. Aqliaton ke liye jo bhi iqdamaat kiye jatay hain unko kis tarha paish kiya jata hai. Aaya un iqdamaat ko ehsanaat par mahmool kiya jata hai ya phir yeh bawar karwaya jata hai ke aqliaton ko un ka haq diya ja raha hai. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney kaha ke hum ney TRS hukoomat ki taayeed ki hai aur guzashta 4 barson mein yahan koi firqa warana fasaad nahi huwa hai.Telangana hukoomat ney Minorities ke liye Jaria saal 2025 crore kiya hai, kiya yeh hum par ahsaan kar rahay hain ya un ka haq day rahay hain. Dastoor mein article 30 mein kiya gaya hai. Ayein ki tamheed mein hik_h gurbat ke khatima, masawaat, adal aur azaadi ka zikar kiya gaya hai jo tamam hindustaniyo ke liye yaksaa honey chahiye. Telangana ke Minorities ko TRS hukoomat ney haq diya hai aur hamein apna haq mil raha hai aur Musalmanoon ke liye aik baat badi ahem hai ke aaj Telangana mein musalmanoon ki pasmandagi, kamzori ko door karne talim ko farogh de rahi hai. Telangana mein 206 Aqamti Schools mein pachaas hazaar se zayed bachay aur bachiyan taleem parahe hain aur un par fi kas aik lakh rupay salana kharch kiye jarahay hain. Barrister Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat mein baironi mumalik aala taleem ke liye 800 tulba ke liye fi kis 20 lakh rupay faraham kiye jarahay hain. Hamare  bachay aala taleem haasil karne ka khawab poora kar rahay hain. Sadar Majlis ney wuzraa aur ohdedaron se khuwahish ki ke woh gadiyon ki farahmi ke liye jo 130 darkhwasten hanoz zair e tasfia hain un ki bhi ajjlana yaksoi kar di jaye. Unhon ney TRS qayideen ko mukhatib karte huwe kaha ke aap ki party ka imtiazi nishaan bhi gaadi hai is liye jitna hosakay ziyada se ziyada gaadiyaan dijiye. Unho ney az-rahe mizah kaha ke aap gadiyaan dijiye hum aap ki gaadi ke engine hain usay agay bedhate rahen ge. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney 50 hazaar rupay ke loans ki farahmi ki scheme ki bhi darkhwasten saal ded saal se zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajlana yaksoi karne par zor diya. Aaj 342 gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi. Taqreeb se Mrs Mahmood Ali Deputy Chief Minister, Naini Narsimha Reddy, Bandaru Datatriya  sabiq wazeer aur Syed Akbar Hussain Sadarnasheen Minorities Finance Corporation, A.K .Khan Advisor to CM on Minorities Affaris Minister aur deegar ney bhi khitaab kiya. Is mauqa par Sadarnasheen Telangana Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem , Sadarnasheen Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masiullah Khan ,Sadarsheen SETWIN Mr. Syed Inayat Ali Baqri aur MLC Mr. Farooq Hussain bhi maujood thae.
286.title: Minority Drivers mein 342 Cars ki taqseem

news_detail: Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul muslimeen wo Rukn e Parliment Hyderabad Barrister AsaduddinOwaisi ney qabal aaz waqt intekhabaat ka yendia dae diya hai. Unhon ney bhi aaj ishara diya hai ke 6

September ko munaqqid shudni cabinet meeting mein riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla kiya ja sakta hai. Barsar  eqtedaar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah o Chief Minister Mr.K Chandrashekhar Rao ney un ki Party ki hukoomat ke 4 saal ki takmeel par munaqqid kardah jalsa aam ‘Pragathi Nivedana’ se qabl kuch aisay isharay dae rahae thae jis se yeh samjha ja raha tha ke woh Assembly tahleel karte hue meyaad se qabl intekhabaat munaqqid karwney ke khwaahan hain magar unhon ney Pragathi Ninvedana mein aisa koi elaan nahi kya hai al-batta uss din munaqidah Cabinet meeting ke baad reyasti wuzraa ney yeh bataya tha ke Cabinet ka aik aur ahem ijlaas 6

September ko munaqqid honey wala hai. Bataya jata hai ke do din baad munaqqid shudni Cabinet Meeting mein Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla kiya ja sakta hai ya phir riyasati  hukoomat ki zamaam mein tabdeeli layi ja sakti hai. Monorities Finance Corporation ki janib se Drivers mein cars ki taqseem ki aik taqreeb se khitaab karte hue Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney bhi kuch aisay isharay dyie hain jin se un qiyaas araiyon ko taqwiyat millti hai ke Assembly tahleel karte hue jaria saal Decemeber mein hi Mulk ki deegar chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana Assembly ke liye bhi intekhabaat ko yaqhini baneya jayega. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke Cabinet ka 6
September ko munaqqid shudni ijlaas tareekhi hoga. Yahi nahi balkay unhon ney TRS party qaayedeen se khuwahish ki ke woh Dargaah hazrat Barhana Shah ke ihata mein kampliks ki taamer ka kaam bhi 6

September se qabal shuru kar dein aur gaadiyon ke liye dyie jaane wale  qarza jaat ki maabaqi darkhwaston ki bhi yaksoi kar dein. Unhon ney ishaaron ishaaron mein kaha ke gadiyon ki taqseem se TRS ko intekhabi faida puhanchega chunke ittafaq se TRS ka nishaan bhi car hi hai.
304.title: Barrister Owaisi ne bhi qabal az-waqat intekhabaat ka yendia dae diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtriya Samiti hukoomat  ki chaar sala karkardagi se aawam ko waaqif karwane munaqidah jalsa aam ” Praghathi Nivedhan” ki kamyabi ke baad TRS party teen din baad aik aur jalsa aam munaqqid karne ka iradah rakhti hai. Tawaqqu to yeh ki jarahi thi ke ” Praghati Nivedhan” mein hi Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar deinge magar aisa kuch bhi nahi huwa. Baaz logon ka yeh maanna hai ke Praghathi Nivedhan se aik din qabl huwi barshami taiz hawaon ke baayis Chief Minister ke qad e azam cutout ke ukhad kar zameen par girjane ko badshugoon mante huwe qabl az-waqat intekhabaat ke liye Assembly ki tahleel ke elaan ko moakhar kardiya gaya tha. Praghati Nivedana ke din hi munaqidah Cabinet Meeting mein yeh tye karliya gaya tha ke 6 September ko Cabinet ka aik aur ijlaas munaqqid kiya jaye ga. Ab maloom huwa hai ke 6

September ko Cabinet Meeting mein riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla karliya jaye ga aur dosray din zila Siddipet ke Husnabad mein aik aur jalsa aam munaqqid karte huwe is mein intekhabaat ka bagal baja diya jaye ga.
319.title: Qabl az waqt intekhabaat: Elaan ke liye aik aur jalsa!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Madina Education and Welfare Society 6

September barooz jumeraat Lateefuddin Hall, Madina Public School, Himayat Nagar mein 10:30 am ko Madina Degree College and PG College ki Silver Jubilee taqreeb munaqqid kar rahi hai. Secretary Society janaab K.M Arifuddin ney bataya ke jumeraat ki yeh taqreeb saal bhar munaqeed  ki janay wali taqarib ka aaghaz hai. General Secretary Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Dr. K Kesahv Rao mehmaan e khusoosi hon ge, unhi ke hathon 1994 mein Degree College ki imarat ka iftetah amal mein aaya tha. Taqreeb ki sadarat Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mahmood Ali karen ge. Mudeer roznama Siasat janab Zahid Ali Khan aizazi maheman hon ge.
329.title: Madina College ki Silver Jubilee

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ke tameeri kaam aakhir kaar takmeel ke marhala mein daakhil ho chukay hain aur ab Waqf Board ke arbaab ko yeh umeed ho chuki hai ke jaria mah ke awakhir tak taameeri kaam mukammal ho jaiyen ge. Yaad rahay ke mehakuma Road And Building ki nigrani mein yeh taamiraat anjaam di jarahi hain, jis ke liye hukoomat Telangana ki grant in aid Waqf Board ke tavassut se jari ki jarahi hai. Sadaarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem aur Chief Executive Officer Mr. Shahnawaz Qasim ne aaj Jamia Nizamia pahonch kar Auditorium ke taameeri kaamon ka mushahida kya. Yaad rahay ke do saal qabal Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ki taameer ka mansoobah banayagya tha. Is khusos mein MIM ne TRS hukoomat se khwahish ki thi ke Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ki taamer sarkari kharch par ki jaye, jis par Chief Minister K. Chandarshekar Rao ne amaadgi zahir ki aur is ziman mein pehlay 10 Crores Rupay ibtida mein jari karne ki manzoori di gayi thi jis ko baad azan badha kar 14.65 Crore rupay kardiya gaya. Chief Minister ke hi haathon March 2015 mein is Auditorium ka sang e bunyaad rakha gaya tha. Aaj daura karne ke baad Mr. Mohammad Saleem ne kaha ke agarchay tameeri kamon mein kuch takheer hui hai magar ab yeh aakhri marhala mein daakhil hochuki hain aur tawaqqa hai ke August ke awakhir tak tameeri kaam  mukammil hojaye ga aur bahut jald is ka iftetah Chief Minister K.Chandrashekar Rao ke hathon amal mein aayega. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh apni nauiyat ka aik munfarid Auditorium hoga. Is mauqe par Sheikh ul Jamia Jamia Nizamia Maulana Mufti Khaleel Ahmed ne bhi tawaqqa zahir ki ke Auditorium ki taameer ke kaam is mah ke ekhtataam tak mukammal karliye jayen ge. Unhon ne kaha ke dua hai ke kaam jald se jald mukammal ho jaien ge. Unhon ne kaha ke Sadaarnasheen aur CEO ne aaj daura kya aur woh bhi yaqeen dilarahe hain ke yeh kaam August ke ekhtetaam tak mukammal ho jayenge.
181.title: Jamia Nizamia Auditorium ke tameeri kaam ki awakhir August tak takmeel: Mohammad Saleem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ameer Millat e Islamia Telangana o Andhra Pradesh Maulana Hussamuddin Saani Jaffer Pasha ney kaha ke Eid uz Zuha ke mauqa par janwarion ki qurbani karna aik deeni fareeza hai. Qurbani ki bajaye zarooratmandon ki madad karne se qurbani ke farz ki adayi nahi hosakti is liye is ka koi mutabadil nahi hai. aajkl yeh afwahen chal rahi hain ke qurbani ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ko dey dainey se qurbani hojaye gi. Qurbani aur khairaat o dast giry allag maamla hai. Maulana Jaffer Pasha ne aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke yeh soch ghalat hai ke khandan ki taraf se aik janwar zubah kardiya jaye aur baaqi afraad khandan ke naam ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke mutasireen selaab ki madad ke liye dey di jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke Islam mein is baat ki gunjayish nahi hai ke jin par qurbani farz ho woh janwar ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam khairaat kardey, chahay halaat kuch bhi kyun nah hon. Unhon ney baaz gooshon ki janib se is martaba janwaron ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke selaab se mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye day dainey ki baabat kaha ke qurbani mouqoof nahi hosakti. Haan albatta aap chahain to qurbani ka fareeza anjaam dainey ke baad jitni chahay, Kerala ke mutasireen ki imdaad kar saktay hain. Eid uz Zuha ke mauqa par janwaron ki qurbanion mein jahan apne ghar walon ka khayaal rakha jata hai wahein ghareebon ka bhi khayaal rakhen. hamaray amal se kisi ko bhi takleef nah honey paye, jo bhi janwar zibah karte hain is ki video graphi nah karen, tamasha nah baneyen chunkay yeh qurb e Ilahi ka maamla hai, numayesh ke liye nahi hai balkay Allah se aap ki mohabbat ka imthehaan hai, is imthehaan ko mazaq ka zareya nah baneyen. Aap janwar jo zubah karen is ki nakara ashya raastoon mein daal kar dosaron ke liye takleef ka mojab nah baneyen. Qurbani ke mauqa par un logon ko bhi nah bhulain jo pani mein mahsor hain. ahlyan Kerala apne aap ko selaab ke pani mein mahsor mehsoos kar rahay hain. qurbani ka koi badal nahi hai. Unhon ney bataya ke aaj Jamia Masjid Dar us Shifa mein baad isha jalsa yaad ibrahim khalil Allah alaihi salam rakha gaya hai is jalsa mein Kerala aur deegar ilaaqon ke mutasireen e selaab ke liye dua bhi ki jaye gi. Unhon ney musalmanoon se yeh bhi khwahish ki ke woh qanoon ki paasdari karen aur aisi koi harkat nah kere jis se aap qanoon ki girift mein asaktay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke aisa koi mauqa faraham na karen jis se aman dushmanon ko hamari riyasat ki ganga jamni tahazeeb ko darham barham karne ka mauqa faraham nah karen.
188.title: Kerala ke mutasireen ki imdaad se qurbani ada nahi hojati. Maulana Jaffer Pasha

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ki mukhtalif Eidgahon aur ahem Masajid mein 22
August Wednessday salaat Eid ul Azhha ke auqaat paish hain.

Eidgah Mir Alam mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha theek 9:30 bajay hogi. Maulana Hafiz Mohammad Rizwan Qureshi imam o khateeb Makkah Masjid imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge. namaz se Qabl Ameer Millat e Islamia Telangana wo Andhra Pradesh Maulana Hussamuddin Sani Jafer Pasha aur Sheikh-ul-adb Jamia Nizamia Maulana Saifuddin ka urdu mein khitaab hoga.
Masjid o Eidgah Ujaley Shah sahib mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Khalid Saifullah Rahmani khutba deinge aur Hafiz o qaari Imran Taqiuddin Sharfi namaz ki imamat farmaen ge.
