Eidgah hazrat Amber Shah Baba Amberpet mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 9:30 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Dr. Syed Mohammad Hamiduddin Sharfi Director IHARC fazayal e Eid ul Azhha bayan karen ge.

Eidgah Paanch Khanah Langar Houz mein Namaz e Eid 9:30 bajay hogi. Qablaz Namaz Maulana Syed Shah Zahiruddin Ali Sufi sjjadahnasheen Dargah hazrat Sufi  Azam ka khitaab hoga. Maulana Hafiz o qaari Hasan Khan kaamil ul Hadis Jamia Nizamia khutba deinge aur imamat karen ge.
Eidgah Sanatnagar mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay hogi. Dr. Mohammad Siraj ur Rehman Farooqi Professor Osmania Dental College imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge.
Eidgah ahal sunnat wa-aljamaat Chilkalguda Secunderabad mein Namaz e Eid 8:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Namaz se Qabl Maulana Syed Khwaja Ziauddin Sabri bayan karen ge aur imamat karen ge.

Eidgah Bilali Hockey Ground mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 8:15 bajay ada ki jaye gi Maulana Shah Jamal ur Rehman ka Qabl namaz bayan hoga. Maulana Hafiz o Qaari Asad imamat karen ge. Barish ki soorat mein Jamia Masjid A C Guards mein namaz ada ki jaye gi.
Eidgah Gumbadan e Qutub Shahi , Golconda mein Namaz e Eid 8:45 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Imamat o Khitabat ke faraiz Maulana qaari syed Mateen Ali Shah Quadri anjaam deinge .
Eidgah hazrat Salaar Auwlia Hafizpait : Eidgah hazrat Salaar Aiwloa New Hafizpait mein Namaz e Eid 8:30 bajay hogi.
Eidgah Pahadi Shareef mein Namaz e Eid 9:00 bajay subah ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Mohammad Abdur Rahman imamat karen ge aur khutba deinge.

Eidgah Jilania mut-tasil Dargah hazrat Mohammad Jilani Quadri Kalimi nazd Lohay ka Charminar Hitec City mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha 9:00 bajay hogi. Maulana syed Abdul Quadri Jilani fazayal e qurbani bayan farmaen ge aur imamat o khatabat ke faraiz anjaam deinge.

Eidgah Waadi e Mustafa Jal Pally ke paas Eid ul Azhha ki namaz theek 9:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Sadar Committee janab Mohammad Abdur Rauf ka bayan hoga aur eid ka namaz Hafiz o Qaari Riyaz Ahmed Ashrafi padhhayenge.
Qadeem Eidgah Mohalla Karkhana Cantonment Secunderabad mein Namaz e Eid 9:00 bajay hogi. Hafiz Mohammad Nazeer Ahmed namaz padhhayenge.
Tareekhi Makkah Masjid mein Namaz e Eid ul Azhha theek 9:30 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Maulana Hafiz o Qaari Mohammad Lateef Ahmed molvi kaamil Jamia Nizamia imamat karenge aur khutba deinge.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen Party ke Social Media ke Head Mr. Syed Abdahu Quadri @ Kashaf ko jaan se maar daine ki dhamkiyaan di jarahi hain. Mr. Kashaf ne aaj Deputy Commissioner of Police East Zone Mr. M Ramesh se mulaqaat karte hue unhen aik tehreeri mahzar paish kya jis mein unhon ne shikayat ki ke guzashta chand dinon se raat dair gaiy unhen koi call karta hai aur dhamkian deta hai aur badtameezi karta hai. Unhon ne shikayat ki ke woh unhen yeh kahte hue musalsal dhamkian daiy raha ha  ”Tu aja Volta Moghalpura ke paas teku chaurrastey pe goli martey”, ”tu kaha thata baithta sab malum nai bachta ab tu”. Mr. Kashaf ko yeh calls, un ke cell phone number par internet numbers i.e.+ 6373785 aur + 501 se kiye jarahay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke woh is amar se aajiz aachukay hain khaas kar jab woh bahar hotay hain ya kaam par hotay hain. Woh mehsoos karte hain ke koi un ka taaqub kar raha hai aur un ki naqal o harkat par nazar rakh raha hai. Mr. Kashaf ne Police se darkhwast ki ke is ko roka jaye qabal is ke ke un par koi asar pade. Unhon ne is maamla ki tehqeeq karne aur qusoor waar ke khilaaf sakht karwai karne ki appeal ki hai. Bataya jata hai ke DCP ne unhen tayaqqun diya ke woh is ki tehqeeq karenge. DCP ne Station House Officer Chadarghat ko is khusoos mein muqadma darj karne aur tehqeeq karne ki hidaayat di hai. Mr. kashaf ne apne twitter payam mein kaha ke woh in cheezon se ghabranay walay  nahin hain. Aisay waaqiaat un ki zindagi ke roz marrah mamlaat ka hissa ban gay hain, un kath putliyoun se nimatnay ke aadi ban gaiy hain. Unhon ne apne ann dekhe dushmanon ko mukhatib karte hue kaha ke puranay din ja chukay hain, apni ankhen kholeen. AIMIM Party mazboot hathon chalayee jarahi hai. Mr. Kashaf ko di jane wali dhamkion aur un ki police mein shikayat se mukhtalif qisam ki chaymegoyaan ho rahee hain aur bahut se logon ke zahnon mein yeh sawal uth raha hai ke woh kaun hain jo is terha ki dhamkian de raha hai aur is ke pas e parda kya muharikaat ho saktay hain? kya yeh niji maamla hai ya phir Party umoor se is ka koi talluq hai? Shikayat mein yeh bataya gaya ke koi unhen Volta Hotel ke paas anay ka challenge kar raha hai aur wahein chaurasta par golian maardenay ki dhamkian de raha hai jis se kuch log yeh soch rahay hain ke kahin yeh Party ka dakhli maamla to nahi hai?
212.title: AIMIM ke Social Media Head ko dhamkiyaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. High Court ney aaj Super Speciality Medical Post Graduation Courses mein dakhla ke liye managment quota ke tahet nashiston ke liye fees ko 5 lakh rupay se badha kar 25 lakh rupay kardainay se mutaliq sarkari ehkaam par amal aawri par hokum e iltiwa jari kardiya hai. Health Care Reforms Association ney GO ki mukhalifat karte hue High Court mein aik Writ Petition dair ki thi. Muqadma ki samaat karte hue Adalat ney fees mein be tahasha izafah ko na munasib paaya aur GO par amal aawri ko kaladam qarar day diya. Darkhwast guzar Association ney majhool GO par High Court ke hokum e iltiwa ki sataish ki.
230.title: Medical PG Courses mein fees mein izafah par High Court ka hokum e iltiwa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen (AIMIM) aur Owaisi Group of Hospitals ki janib se selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke awam ke liye 25 lakh rupay maliati mukhtalif nauiyat ki adwiyaat aaj Darussalam se gaadiyon ke zareya Kerala rawana ki ja rahi hain. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen wo Rukn e Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ki nigrani mein yeh adwiyaat aaj shaam Darussalam se rawana ki ja rahi hain. Yaad rahay ke Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ne ‘Majlis Charitable Trust’ ke zareya 16 lakh rupay ki maali imdaad karne ka bhi faisla kya hai jo Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief Fund mein jama karwai jayen gi. Trucks ke sath Doctors aur tibbi amlah ki bhi aik team rawana ki jarahi hai. is mauqa par Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ke farzand master Sultan Salahuddin Owaisi aur Joint Editor Roznama Etemaad janab Aziz Ahmed ke alawa Owaisi Hospital and Reserch Center aur Princess Esra Hospital ke Doctors aur amlah maujood thae. Adwiyaat ke intikhab aur un ki khareedi mein Qayed Majlis Muqannanah Party wo Managing Dirctor Owaisi Group of Hospitals janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ke alawa mazkoorah dono Hospitals ke Doctors aur amlah ki muawinat rahi hai.
248.title: AIMIM ki 25 lakh rupay ki adwiyaat Kerala rawana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Maroof Social Media application ‘Whatsapp’ ke Chief Executive Officer Mr. Chris Daniels, jinhon ne wazeer Information Technology o Sanat Mr. K T Rama Rao se jumaraat ko mulaqaat ki, Hyderabad mein ‘Whatsapp’ ka aik Customer Service Operations Center qaayim karne se kaafi dilchaspi ka izhaar kya hai. Qabal azeen mulaqaat ke dauran Mr. K T Rama Rao ne Daniels se khwahish ki thi ke Hyderabad mein Customer Service Operations Center qaayim kere aur riyasat mein Information Technology se mutaliq umoor par tabadlah khayaal kiya. Wazeer ne unhen bataya ke woh kis terha mukhtalif sarkari pahel ke liye ‘Whatsapp’ ka extensive istemaal kar rahay hain aur Hukoomat mein communication ko baqayeda bananay mein madad kar rahay hain. Mr. K T Rama Rao ne kaha ke woh khud 100 Whatsapp groups ka hissa hain aur unhon ne bataya ke woh kis terha Whatsapp ka kaisay kaisay istemaal karte hain. Wazeer ne Whatsapp ke CEO se khwahish ki ke woh mann ghadat khabron ke maamla ka jaiza lein aur kaha ke Whatsapp ke zareya jhooti khabron ke phelnay par control karne policy ki zaroorat hai. Whatsapp ke CEO ne Wazeer se wada kya ke jaraayim se nimatnay aur khoj laganay mein Whatsapp ka kaisay istemaal kya jaye uss par Police ke sath workshops munaqqid karen ge.

Facebook India , ke Public Divsion ke sarbarah Shivnath Thakral ne bhi Wazeer Information Technology se mulaqaat ki aur Hyderabad mein business ke imkani wusat par tabadlah khayaal kiya. Aik aur ijlaas mein CEO Novartis Mr. Vas Narsimhan  ne bhi Mr. K T Rama Rao se mulaqaat ki aur dono ne riyasat mein LifeSciences Echo System par tabadlah khayaal kiya.
282.title: KTR se Whatsapp CEO ki mulaqaat

August 6:00 subah tak rahay ga jis ke baayis 29

August ko O&M Division number VIke tehat 11, 000 connections ka ihata karne walay ilaqon Rajiv Nagar, Kalaya Nagar venture 3, Sri Ram Nagar, Jayaanti  Nagar, Fatima Nagar, Nataraj Nagar, Netaji Nagar, Sanjay Nagar, Sultan Nagar, Hemavati Nagar, Shastri Nagar, Janapriya Apartments, Gautam Puri Colony waghera aur O&M Division number IX ke tehat 300 connections ka ihata karne walay ilaqon BSP Colony, Moti Nagar East mein pani ki sarbarahi nahi hogi.
297.title: Hyderabad ke kuch ilaqon mein 29th  August ko pani ki sarbarahi masdood

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr.r K. Chandrashekar Rao ney Masjid ke Imams and Mauzzans ko Waqf Board ke tavassut se dyie jany walay remuneration (remuneration) ki raqam ko 1, 500 rupay se badha kar 5,000 rupay mahana kardainay ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke izafi shuda remuneration ki adai 1

September se amal mein aeye gi. Chief Minister ke daftar se jari kardah press release mein bataya gaya ke Mulk bhar mein pehli martaba Telangana riyasat mein Aimma wo Mauzineen ko mahana remuneration ada karne ka silsila shuru kya gaya tha. Pehlay unhen mahana aik hazaar rupay dyie jatay thae jis mein izafah karte hue 1, 500 rupay kardiya gaya tha. Chief Minister ney kaha kay is raqam mein izafah karte hue 1
September se itlaq ke sath 5,000 rupay kardiya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke is faisla se Masajid ke 9,000 Imams aur Mauzzans ko faida puhanche ga.
318.title: Imams & Mauzzans ka remuneration 5,000 kardiya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein Kongara Kalan mein 2

September ko munaqqid shudni Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting ke muqam par jari taiyarion ka Chief Minister Telangana wo Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ne aaj mushahida kiya hai. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki janib se 2

September ko zabardast jalsa aam karne ka faisla kya hai jis mein zayed az  25 lakh logon ki shirkat ki tawaqqa ki jarahi hai. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke is jalsa e aam se Telangana Rashtra Samiti apne intikhabi muhim ka aaghaz kardey gi. Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ne party qaideen aur ohdedaron ko hidayat di ke jalsa aam mein shirkat ke liye anay walay logon ko kisi qisam ki koi takleef nahi pahonchni chahiye. Unhon ne Police Commissioner Rachakonda Mr. Mahesh Bhagwat ke hamrah intizamaat ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya. Telangana Rashtra Samiti (TRS) ne Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting mein 2014 ke aam intikhabaat ke baad Telangana mein qaayim un ki hukoomat ki chaar sala karkardagi ka muzahira paish kere gi aur is ki yeh koshish hai ke is public meeting mein lakhon awam ki shirkat ko yakeeni banatay hue yeh payam diya jaye ke riyasat ke awam, uss ke sath hain. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao isi ijlaas mein aayindah aam intikhabaat mein Party ke Lok Sabha aur Assembly ke liye Party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar dein ge taakay woh abhi se intikhabaat ki taiyarion mein jut jaayen.
330.title: KCR ne ” Pragathi Nivedana” ki taiyarion ka mushahida kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Janaab Mohammad Raheemuddin Ansari ney aaj ba haisiyat Sadar Urdu Academy apne ohda ka jaiza haasil karliya. Aik saada si taqreeb mein Janaab Mohammad Raheemuddin Ansari ke jaiza lainay ke umoor anjaam diye gaye. Secretary Urdu Academy Professor S.A Shukoor ney nau naamzad Sadar Acadamey ka isteqbaal kiya aur unhen ohda ka jayeza paish kya. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney iss mauqa par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh apne sabiq tajrubaat ko barooaykar laatay huwe Urdu Academy ko uphar se yak fa-aal idaara mein tabdeel karne ki koshish karen ge. Unhon ney kaha ke maazi mein jab woh Urdu Academy ke sadar thae usss waqt bhi Urdu zabaan o adab ke farogh ke liye akhtraay Programme shuru kiye gaye thay jin mein ITO ke ishteraaq se ‘Aoo Urdu Seekheen’ Programme chalaya gaya jis se Mulk bhar mein ghair Urdu daan afraad ko ghar baithy urdu seekhnay ka mauqa mila tha. Unhon ney bataya ke un ke daur mein Urdu ki kayi ahem kitaaben shaya karne ka mauqa mila tha jin mein ‘muraqa Chuqtayee’ ki dobarah ashaat thi jis ke rasam ajra anjaam dete huwe is waqt ke Nayeb Sadar Jamhooria Hind janab Hamid Ansari ney kaha tha ke agar iss kitaab ki rehnomayi ke liye inhen kisi beroni mulk bhi madoo kiya jata to woh is mein shirkat karte. Janaab Raheemuddin Ansari ke hi daur sadarat mein ‘daftari eslehaath’ ki bhi pheli martaba taba-at amal mein aayi thi. Yahi nayi balkay 40 naye Urdu Computers qayim kiye gaye thay. Unhon ney bataya ke Urdu Academy ki scheme ko Ahsan andaaz mein ruba amal laya gaya tha. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney kaha ke un ki yeh khush qismati hai ke apni maadri zabaan ki khidmat ke liye inhen Telangana Riyasat mein Urdu Academy ke pahelay sadar ki haisiyat se naamzad kiya gaya hai. Un ki koshish hogi ke tamam Asnaaf mein Urdu zabaan ki taraqqi o tarweej ke liye kuch akhtraay iqdamaat kiye jayen. Unhon ney kaha ke maazi mein bhi unhen Urdu Adab se wabasta kayi ahem shakhsiyation aur Urdu Academy ke amlah ka bharpur taawun haasil tha aur tawaqqu karte hain ke aayindah bhi yeh jari rahay ga. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney inhen Sadar naamzad karne par Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao aur Sadar Majlis o Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi  se bhi izhaar tashakkur kiya. Is mauqa par janab Ziyauddin Nayyar Nayeb Sadar Kul Hind Taair millat, Janab Syed Ahmed ul Husaini Sayeeed al-Quadri, janab Muneeruddin Mukhtaar aur dosray maujood thae.
190.title: Raheemuddin Ansari ne Urdu Academy ke sadar ki haisiyat se jaiza haasil karliya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ka aik ahem ijlaas aaj Sadarnasheen Waqf Board Janaab Mohammad Saleem ki sadarat mein munaqqid huwa jis mein Mahboobnagar aur Sangareddy azlaa mein Waqf Board ki janib se Haj House aur Toopran mein shadi khanah taamer karne ka faislah kiya gaya hai. Mohammad Saleem ney akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe bataya ke Waqf Board ke masaarif par Bhubaneshwar University ke mukhtalif courses mein Telangana riyasat ke 100 Muslim bachon ko dakhla dilanay ka faisla kiya gaya jahan behtareen courses chalaye jarahay hain. Unhon ney bataya ke hamaray ilm mein yeh baat aayi hai ke darjah chaharum ke mulazmeen ki had umar 65 baras hai aur woh 60-70 hazaar rupay mahana taankhuwa haasil kar rahay hain jabkay woh yahan khidmaat anjaam dainay ke muaqqaf mein bhi nahi rehtay hain. Hum ney faisla kiya hai ki is khusoos mein riyasti hukoomat se murasilat karte huwe Waqf Board mein kaam karne walay mulazmeen ki had Umar ko 60 baras tak mehdood kardiya jaye. Is khusoos mein aindah faisla kiya jaye ga. Isi terhan aayindah ijlaas mein Board ke ohdedaron ko Assistant Secretary ke ohdon par taraqqi ke masla ka bhi jayeza liya jaye ga jis ke liye aayindah hafta Zila Committee ka ijlaas munaqqid hoga. Janaab Mohammad Saleem ney bataya ke Auqafi jayidadon par najayiz qabzon ki barkhastgi ke liye aik khusoosi ijlaas wukla ke sath munaqqid kiya jaye ga. Unhon ney bataya ke Bandalaguda mein Noori Shah se mutaliq auqafi jayedad par ki gayi Registries ki barkhastgi ke qanooni pahlu ka bhi jaiza liyajaye ga chunkay is khusoos mein aik fareeq ki janib se Waqf Board ke khilaaf Urdu akhbarat mein aik notice jari ki gayi hai. ijlaas mein auqafi idaron ke liye 11 intezami Commision ki tashkeel aur teen marhale ki namzadgi ki manzoori ke ilawa do auqafi jayidadon par tamirat ke liye tamirati commission ki tashkeel ki bhi manzoori di gayi hai.
206.title: Sangareddy aur Mahboobnagar mein Haj House aur Toopran mein function hall ki taamer

news_detail: Hyderabad- Makkah Masjid aur Shahi Masjid Public Garden yaqeenan Hyderabad ka fakharya hissa hain magar un do Masjidoon ke minbar o maharab ki khidmaat anjaam dainay walay jayyad Ulama ki badi hi naqadri horahi hai. Un donun Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam mouzeneen ki Salaries intehai haqeer hain. Aap yeh jaan kar taajjub o herat mein phad jayinge ke un dono Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam, Khateeb aur Mouzeneenki salaries, un Masjidoon mein barsar e paikaar Homeguards ki tankhwahon se bhi kam hain. Makka Masjid ke aik Homeguard ko takribaan 22,000 rupay mahana mushahra diya jata hai jabkay Makka Masjid ke Aaima karaam, Khateeb aur Mouzeneen ke sath sath Shahi Masjid ke Imam o khateeb aur mouzzin ki salary sirf 17,500 rupay mahana hain. Shahi Masjid mein sirf aik hi Imam hain jo khitabat ke bhi farayiz anjaam dete hain jabkay Makka Masjid mein Khateeb aur Imam alag alag hain. Jahan tak Khateeb, Imam aur Mouzzin ka maamla hai un ki tankhwahon mein bhi koi imtiyaz nahi hai. Sabhi ko yakmusht 17,500 rupay mahana diye jatay hain. Yahan yeh zikar zurori hai ke un dono Masjidoon ke Imam o Khateeb ke mansab par maamoori ke liye behtareen se behtareen fard ka intekhab kiya jata hai aur yaqeenan ab tak un dono Masjidoon mein un manasab par jo log bhi Faiz huwe hain woh yaktaaye zamana rahay hain. Shahi Masjid Public Garden ke Imam o Khateeb Phd Scholar aur kaamil ul Hadees  hain jabkay Makka Masjid ke khateeb aur Imam dono hi Kaamil ul Hadees aur M.A. hain. Afsoos ke sath kahena padta hai ke hamaray shaher ki yeh do ahem Masjidoon jin ka intizam mehakuma Aqliati Bahbood ki raast nigrani mein hai, un ke Aima Mouzzineen aur Khateeb ki salary aik Homeguard se bhi kam hai. Sabiq Secretary Mahkuma Aqliati Bahbood Mr. Umar Jaleel ne un do Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam o Khateeb ki tankhwahon mein munasib izafah ke liye file tayyar karkay maliyati manzoori ke liye tajweez mahkuma fiance  ko rawana ki thi magar mahkuma Finance ne kin bunyadon par is tajweez ko mustarad kardiya maloom nahi. Hamari Ibadaat mein Khushoo o Khuzoo ke liye hamari yeh koshish hoti hai ke un do Masjjdoon mein hamari namazain ada hon. Shshrr ki kayi badi shaksiyatoon un do Masjidoon mein namazain ada karte hain magar ab tak shayed hi kisi ne yeh jan ney ki koshish ki hai ke un ka mushahra itna haqeer kyun hai aur un mein izafah ke liye abhi tak kisi ne koi koshish nahi ki hai.
221.title: Makkah Masjid-Shahi Masjid : Aaimma karaam ki Salaries Homeguard se bhi kam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ney Telangana Assembly ko tahleel kardiya. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ki sadarat mein Pragathi Bhavan mein munaqidah Cabinet ke aik ahem ijlaas mein Telangana Assembly ko tahleel karne ki qarardad manzoor ki gayi jis ke baad Chief Minister kuch wuzraa ke humrah Raj Bhavan pahonch kar Governor Mr. E.S. L. Narsimhan se mulaqaat ki aur Cabinet ki qarar daad paish karte hue reyasti Assembly tahleel karne ki sifarish ki hai. Chief Minister Mr. ke chndrshikhr rao ney election commission of India ko mah decemeber mein malik ki deegar chaar reyaston mein honey walay Assembly intikhabaat ke sath hi Telangana Assembly ke intikhabaat ke liye iqdamaat karne ki raah hamwar karne ke liye Telangana Assembly ko tahleel kardainey ka faisla kya hai. Woh nahi chahtay thay ke aam intikhabaat ke sath hi riyasti Assembly ke intikhabaat munaqqid hon. Agarchay Telangana Assembly ki miyad May 2019 tak hai magar woh abhi Assembly tahleel nahi karte to election commission of India ko aam intikhabaat se ain qabal Telangana Assembly ke intikhabaat ke liye amaada kana mushkil tha. isi liye Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ney September mein hi Assembly tahleel kardainey ka faisla kya hai. woh darasal reyasti hukoomat ke chaar saal ki takmeel par munaqidah Pragathi Nivedana mein hi riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ke faisla ka elaan karne walay thay magar namaloom wajohaat ki binaa unhon ney is faisla ko aaj tak ke liye moakhar kardiya hai. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao kal Sangareddy ke Husnabad mein aik jalsa aam mein party umeedwaaron ki pehli fehrist bhi jari kardainey walay hain.
234.title: KCR ne Assembly tahleel kardi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ke baad aaj dopehar Pragathi Bhavan mein munaqidah aik Press Conference mein riyasat ke 105 Assembly halqon ke liye party umeedwaaroon ki fehrist jari karte huwe tajassus ko khatam kardiya. 109 Assembly halqon ke minjumla Party ki jari kardah 105 ki fehrist mein sirf 2 Muslim umeedwaar Aamir Shakeel Ahmed (Bhodhan) aur Inayat Ali Baqri (Bahadurpura) hi shaamil hain. TRS ki jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein masiwaye Hyderabad riyasat bhar mein sirf do naye chehray hain. Maabaqhi tamam maujooda Arkaan Assembly ko hi dobarah azmaane ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney maujooda Assembly ki miyaad ke khatam honey se qabl hi Assembly tahleel karte huwe aawam ka dobarah khat etemaad haasil karne ka faisla kiya taakay riyasat mein asal Oppostion Party Congress ko intekhabi tayaarion ka ziyada mauqa nah mil sakay. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Assembly ki miyaad May 2019 tak hai magar Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly tahleel karte huwe mah November/Decemeber mein hi intekhabaat munaqqid karne ke liye Election Commission ki raah hamwar kar di hai chunkay Decemeber aur January mein Mulk ki chaar riyaston ki Assembly ki miyaad khatam honey jarahi hai. Abhi se Assembly ki tahleel ke baayis Election Commission of India ko un chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat ka elamia jari kar ney mai aasani hojaye gi. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki qabl az waqt Assembly ki tahleel ke iqdam ko kuch log siyasi door andeshi par mahmol kar rahay hain to kuch logon ka yeh maanna hai ke is faisle ke pas parda un ki zaeef ul-eteqaadi karfarma hai.
254.title: TRS umeedwaron ki fehrist, sirf 2 Muslims

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ke nigraan Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ne kaha ke tawaqqu hai ke riyasti Assembly ke intekhabaat mah e November mein munaqqid hon ge jabkay natayij ka Decemeber ke phelay hafta mein elaan kardiya jaye ga. Chief Minister Mr K Chandrashekhar Rao ne Praghati Bhavan mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke Mulk ki deegar riyaston Madhya pradesh, Rajasthan aur Chittisgarh ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat November mein munaqqid hon ge. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney aawam se khwahish ki ke woh TRS ko dobarah Iqtedaar sounpe chunkay woh achi tarha jantay hain ke Party ne aawam ki behbood ke liye kaam kiya hai. Unhon ney is etemaad ka izhaar kiya ke unhon ney ne tamam waday bashmool intekhabi manshoor mein kiye gay wadon ko poora kiya hai. Hum ne Kisaanon ke liye Rythu Bandhu Scheme aur Rythu Bheema Scheme ko bhi roba amal laya jo hamaray intekhabi manshoor mein shaamil nahi thay.
267.title: November mein Assembly intekhabaat: KCR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kaarguzar Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney aaj Assembly ki tahleel ke baad Pragathi Bhavan mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet ke douran sahafion ke sawalaat ke jawabaat dete hue Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen aur Bharatiya Janata Party se TRS ke taluqaat ke barey mein wazahat ki aur Party ka moaqqaf zahir kya. jahan unhon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ke sath Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki dosti ka khil kar izhaar kya wahein unhon ney yeh wazeh kardiya ke BJP ke sath TRS ki koi mafahmat nahi hai. unhon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ke sath Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke dostana taluqaat ka bermila izhaar karte hue kaha kay Majlis ke sath un ki Party ke dostana taluqaat hain. Unhon ney bataya ke yaqeenan Majlis ke sath hamaray dostana taluqaat istewaar hain aur intikhabaat mein agarchay hum ney koi mafahmat nahi ki taham dono partiyon ke darmiyaan dostana muqaabla hoga. Unhon ney kaha ke hum mil jul kar kaam kar rahay hain. Iqtidaar sambhalnay ke baad hamari yeh koshish thi ke Hukumat chalaney mein kisi qisam ka koi khalal na ho. Unhon ney bataya ke kis tarha Telangana ki tashkeel ke baad TRS Hukoomat ke qiyaam ke baad Majlis se qurbat badhi. Unhon ney bataya ke intikhabaat ke baad Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney unhen Delhi se phone kya aur kaha ke Telangana riyasat nahi ban’ney tak nahi bani magar aaj riyasat ban gayi, kya Telangana riyasat ko jeeney nahi dete, mein aap ke sath hoon. Unhon ney bataya ke un ki darkhwast ke baghair riyasat ke mafaad mein aur paidaar istehkaam ke liye raza karana taur par TRS Hukoomat ki taayied karne wali Party ka naam MIM hai. Yaqeenan ab woh hamari Haleef Party hai aur hamaray darmiyan muqaabla bhi dostana hai. BJP se taluqaat ke barey mein istefsarat ka jawab dete hue Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se apni mulaqaat ki bhi tauzih paish karte hue kaha ke unhon ney Wazeer e Azam se khufia mulakaatein nahi ki balkay elania taur par un se mulakaatein ki. Unhon ney yeh wazeh kardiya ke TRS aik secular Party hai, sad feesad secular hai taham kuch log yeh bawar karwney ki koshish kar rahay hain ke TRS ka jhukao BJP ki taraf badhta ja raha hai. Jahan tak Wazeer e Azam se un ki mulakaton ka talluq hai woh aik Chief Minister aur aik Wazeer e Azam ki mulaqat hai. Unhon ney kaha ”mein aik riyasat ka Chief Minister hoon aur woh Mulk ke Wazeer e Azam hain. Wazeer e Azam se mulaqaat ke mujhe 64 mawaqay haasil hotay hain. Kal hi mein ney Wazeer e Azam se baat cheet ki hai. Markazi hukoomat aur riyasti hukoomat ke darmiyan taluqaat dastoori noiyat ke hotay hain. Har Chief Minister ko Wazeer e Azam se baat karni padti. Wazeer e Azam ijlaas talabb kere to Chief Minister ko shirkat karni padti. Yeh sarkari taluqaat hain, shakhsi taluqaat nahi. aik taraf Majlis se hamari dosti hai aur phir doosri taraf BJP se mafahmat kis tarha hosakti hai.”
285.title: MIM-TRS-BJP: KCR ki wazahat

news_detail: Hyderabad. State Election Commission ney riyasat mein qabl az-waqat intekhabaat ke ziman mein zila District Collector ke sath aik ijlaas munaqqid kiya. Yeh ijlaas Chief Electoral Officer Telangana Mr. Rajat Kumar ki sadarat mein munaqqid huwa. Rajat Kumar ney kaha ke riyasat mein qabl az-waqt intekhabaat ka ilm honay par Central Election Commission ki janib se yeh ijlaas talabb kiya gaya tha. Chief Electoral Officer ney kaha ke riyasat mein Assembly tahleel karne se Governor ke ittefaq ke baad hum ney Central Election Commission ko aagah kiya tha. Unhon ney kaha ke woh Mulk geer Election Schedule rakhtay hain. Ijlaas mein Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) aur Voter Verified Paper Audit Trail (VVPT) par shaoor beedar kiya gaya. Unhon ney yeh bhi kaha keElectoral List ko finalise karne ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tawareekh ka elaan kiya jaye ga. Telangana mein intekhabaat ke zimn mein Mr. Rajat Kumar peer ko Delhi rawana ho rahay hain taakay markazi Election Commission ke ohdedaron se tabadlah khayaal kar saken.
308.title: Electoral List ko finalise karney ke baad Elections: CEO

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party se ahem qaideen ka inkhilah hanooz jari hai. Caretaker Chief Minister o sarbarah Telangana Rashtriya samiti Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ki janib se Telangana Assembly tahleel aur umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kardete huwe intekhabi bagal bajade ney ke bawajood bhi Telangana Rashtriya Samiti mein deegar partiyon ke qaayideen ki shumouliyat ka silsila thama nahi hai. Doosri partiyon se TRS mein taaza shumouliyat par amaada honay wali aik ahem shakhsiyat sabiq Speaker Andhra Pradesh Assembly Mr. K. Suresh Reddy hain. Mr. Suresh Reddy guzishta Assembly intekhabaat mein apni shikast ke baad se sargaram siyasat se doori ikhtiyar kiye huwe thae. TRS sarbarah ke farzand Mr. KT Rama Rao wazeer Information Technology and Municipal Administration & Urban Development  ney aaj Party ke rufaqa ke hamrah jummay ki subha Mr. K. Suresh Reddy ki rihayish gaah pahonch gaye aur unhen TRS mein shumuliat aqtiyar kar lenay ki targheeb di. Mr. Suresh Reddy ney bhi TRS mein shumuliyat se ittefaq karliya aur kaha ke androon do yaum bazabta taur par TRS mein shumuliyat ikhtiyar karlen ge. Party sarbarah o kaarguzar Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ki hidaayat par Government Advisor wo sabiq Rukn e Parliment Mr. Vivek aur sabiq wuzraa Mr. Purshunath Reddy aur Mr. Jeevan Reddy ney bhi Mr. Suresh Reddy ki rehayish gaah pahonch kar party mein un ka istaqbaal kiya. Mr. Suresh Reddy tashkeel Telangana ke baad se khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye huwe thae. Woh 2004-09 mein mutahidda Andhra Pradesh mein riyasti Assembly ke Speaker rah chuke hain. Woh sabiq Chief Minister Y.S Raj Shekar Reddy ke qareebi rafeeq thae. Mr. Suresh Reddy halqa Assembly Balkonda se do martaba muntakhib ho chukay. Unhon ney 2009 mein Armoor halqa Assembly se muqaabla kiya tha taham woh shikast se dochar hogaye thay. Intekhabaat mein shikast aur Dr. YS Raj Shekar Reddy ki mout ke baad woh party sargarmion se door hotay chalay gaye thae.
323.title: Suresh Reddy TRS mein shaamil honay aamada

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel karte huwe Telangana Rashtirya Sameti ke sarbarah o Kaarguzar Chief Minister K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney riyasat mein intekhabi mahol ko garma diya hai. Telangana Rashtriya Sameti ney amlan intekhabi muhim ka aaghaz karte huwe aaj zila Sangareddy ke Husnabad mein apna phela intekhabi jalsa munaqqid kiya hai. Deegar siyasi partiyan bhi inteqhabat ke liye apni apni tayario mein lagi huwi hain. Mukhtalif siyasi partiyon ke qaayideen ke Telangana mein programmes ko qatiat di jarahi hai. Sadar Telugu Desham Party o Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu Telangana mein intekhabaat ka jaiza lainey 8

September ko Hyderabad pahonch rahay hain. Samjha jata hai ke woh Hyderabad mein party ke senior qaayideen se intekhabaat ki mansoobah bandi ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Isi tarha saddar Bharatiya Janata Party Mr. Amit Shah bhi Telangana ka dora karne walay hain. Bataya jata hai ke woh 15

September ko Mahboob Nagar mein aik badey jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge. Telangana mein BJP ki nashiston mein izafah karne ke liye Mr. Amit Sha aik hafta se zayed Telangana mein qiyam karne ka bhi iradah rakhtay hain taakay woh raast apni nigrani mein intekhabi muhim chala saken. Sabiq Sadar Congress Party Mrs. Sonia Gandhi bhi 16

September ko Hyderabad ka daura kar sakti hain. Mrs. Sonia Gandhi ke alawa Congress ki intekhabi muhim ke liye Party Sadar Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke aik se zayed tours ka programme baneya ja raha hai. Maloom huwa hai ke Congress Party ke ahem qaideen Delhi pahonch chuke hain taakay intekhabaat ke silsila mein Party ka laiha amal tayyar karne markazi qaayideen se guft o shaneed ki jasakay. Telangana mein Congress Party ki intekhabi muhim ki nigrani ke liye Party ke Senior qaayed Mr. Gulam Nabi Azad bhi kuch dinon ke liye Hyderabad mein Camp karen ge.
334.title: Badi siyasi shakhsiyation ki Telangana mein aamad

news_detail: Turkey ke sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan neh kaha hai ke Ankara ke ladaka tayyaron neh iraqi pahadi silsilay Qandil mein kurdistan workers party ke ijlaas ko nishana banaya. Turkey ka daawa hai ke ijlaas mein ghair qanooni Kurd party ke sarkardah askari rehnuma shareek they. Turkey neh Iran aur Iraq ki sarhad se milnay walay shumali Iraq mein kurdistan workers party ke Qandil pahadi silsila mein thikanon ko nishana bananay ki karwaiya taiz kar di hain. Ankara ka khayaal hai ke Qandil pahadi silsila mein kurdistan party ke sarKurdah askari rehnuma qiyam Pazeer hain. Turkish hukoomat ka mazeed kehna hai ke shumali Iraq se taqreeban tees kilometer ke faasla par Qandil pahadiyoon ke qareeb Turkish fouji dastay Iraq ke andar tainaat hain. channel 7 ko diye gaye aik interview mein ardgan ka kehna tha ke un ke ladaka tayyaron neh Qandil pahadi silsila mein kurdistan workers party ke ahem ijlaas jis mein sarKurdah askari rehnuma bhi shareek they ko nishana banaya hai. unhon neh kaha ke Turkish fouj is fazai hamlay mein honay walay jani aur maali nuqsaan se mutaliq tafseelaat chand ghanton baad jari kere gi. unhon neh mazeed kaha ke taaza tareen karwai mein hum neh kurdistan party ke ahem ijlaas ko nishana banaya hai. abhi hamein karwai ke nataij se mutaliq maloomat nahi milein, taham yeh baat yakeeni hai ke hum neh inhen nishana banaya hai. Turkey neh haal hi mein shumali Iraq mein Qandil pahadi silsila mein Kurdoon ke khilaaf zameeni karwaiyon mein izafah ka Andia zahir kya tha. ardgan ke bakol unhon neh haliya paish Raft se mutaliq irani sadar husn Rohani se tabadlah khayaal kiya tha jis mein dono rhnmaon neh ilaqai security ke tahaffuz ke liye bahami razamandi zahir ki thi. shumali Iraq mein Qandil pahadi silsila Iran aur Iraq ki sarhad ke qareeb waqay hai. Iraq ki markazi hukoomat un dinon kaafi had taq Iran ke zair asr hai. Turkey neh Kurd intahaa pasandon ke khilaaf Iraq mein mumkina karwai se mutaliq bghdad hukoomat se mazakraat ka silsila shuru kar rakha hai, taham un mazakraat ko May mein honay walay intikhab ke nateeja mein ban’nay wali nai hukoomat ke jari rakhnay se mutaliq faisla abhi nahi kya gaya. kurdistan workers party ke khilaaf Iraq mein ki jaaney wali taaza karwai do hazaar solah ke baad ki jaaney wali teesri sarhad paar karwai hai. Kurd malaysia jungjuon ke khilaaf pehli do karwaiya Turkey neh shumali shaam ke ilaqon mein ki theen. shaam mein karwai ke zariye Turkey neh apni junoob mashriqi sarhad ka bara ilaqa azad karaya tha.
204.title: Turkish ladaka tayyaron ki Kurd askriat pasandon ke thikanon par Iraq mein bombari

news_detail: Junoobi America ke mulk Venezuela ke dar-al-hukumat Caracas mein gas dhamaka ke nateeja mein 17 afraad Bashmole 8 bachay halaak hogaye jabkay paanch zakhmi hue hain, khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq dhamaka aik club mein aansogis device phatnay se sun-hwa. do groupon mein jhagrre mein 1 shakhs ney ansoo gas ka slender ko dhamaka se arhadya jis ke nateeja mein bhagdar mach gayi. national police ki ibtidayi report ke mutabiq 11 afraad dam ghatney se faut hogaye .

dhamaka ke o qat club mein 500 se zayed talaba mojood they jo pari grijoyshn party mein shareek they, aansogis device 2 groupon mein jhagrre ke douran phataa. police ney 7 afraad bashamool 2 minors kogrftarkrke tafteesh shuru kar di hai. tafteesh car ney bataya ke Aini shahideen ke mutabiq do na baligh talba mein se aik ney ansoo gas ke slender ko khol diya tha. ohdedaron ney tahaqeeq ka aaghaz kardiya hai aur club ko band kardainay ka hukum diya hai. club ke maalik ko bhi girftar karliya gaya hai. un par club mein hathyaar o golah barood ko club ke andar le janay se roknay ke qawaid par amal aawri mein nakami ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai
216.title: Venezuela: Caracas mein Nightclub mein gas dhamaka, 17 afrad halak

news_detail: Gaadi mein maujood rocket dhamaka se phatt pada. sakht geer jangju group ISIL ney is khudkush bomb hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar li hai .

Afghanistan ke soobah Nangarhar mein Taliban aur sikoriti forces ki mulaqaat ke douran dhamaka ke nateeja mein kam az kam 20 afraad halaak hogaye. bain al aqwami media reports ke mutabiq Afghan hukoomat aur Taliban ki janib se Eid ul fittar ke mauqa par jung bandi ke elaan ke baad Taliban askriat pasandon ney Kabul sameit malik ke deegar shehron mein daakhil hokar awaami maqamat par shehrion aur sikoriti forces se baghal geer hokar inhen Eid ki mubarakbaad di. sikoriti forces se mulakaton ke douran Taliban askriat pasand ghair musallah they taham Nangarharmein Eid milnay ke douran zor daar dhamaka huwa jis ke nateeja mein kam az kam 20 afraad halaak aur mutadid zakhmi hogaye. police zaraye ka kehna hai ke dhamaka is waqt huwa jab Taliban ke muqami ohdedar Afghan security ehalkaron se Eid mil rahay they ke gaadi mein maujood rocket phatnay se dhamaka hogaya, jis gaadi mein dhamaka huwa woh Taliban ki thi jo mulaqaat ke douran hujoom mein khadi thi.

Al Arabia dot com ke mutabiq Afghanistan ke mashriqi soobay Nangarhar mein haftay ko Eid ke dosray roz jung bandi ke douran mein Taliban aur musallah afwaj ke aik ijtima mein car bomb dhamakay mein 26 afraad halaak aur 54 zakhmi hogaye hain. sakht geer jangju group ISIL ney is khudkush bomb hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar li hai. ISIL ke bomber ney apni barood se bhari car ko aisay waqt mein dhamakay se uraya hai jab Afghan security forces aur Taliban jngjoon ke darmain Eid ulfittar ke mauqa par pehli martaba jung bandi jari thi. woh dar-ul-hukoomat Kabul sameit mukhtalif shehron mein aapas mein ghul mil rahay they aur apne apne smart phones mein yeh khush gawaar manazair selfie ki shakal mein mehfooz kar rahay they. Nangarhar ke governor ke tarjuman ataa hamza Allah khojyani ney torkhm aur Jalalabad ke darmain shahrah par waqay qasbay Ghazi Aminullah Khan mein is car bomb dhamaka ki tasdeeq ki hai. unhon ney pehlay yeh kaha tha ke dhamaka rocket grenade ke phatnay se huwa hai. unhon ney bataya hai ke mahlukeen aur zakhmion mein Taliban, security forces ke ahelkaar aur aam shehri shaamil hain. woh Nangarhar ke zila Rudat mein waqay is qasbay mein mil jal kar jung bandi ka jashnn Minar hai they. ISIL ney is hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar ney ka daawa kya hai. is jangju group ki online khabar-rasan agency Amaq ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke is car bomb hamlay ka hadaf Afghan forces ka ijtima tha lekin is ney mazeed koi tafseel nahi batayi. Afghan Taliban ney Eid ke pehlay teen ayyaam ke douran mein afgha noon forces ke khilaaf jung bandi ka a ellan kya tha aur october 2001 mein America ki Afghanistan par fouji charhai ke baad pehli martaba Afghan Security forces par hamlay nah karne ka wada kya tha. Albata unhon ney kaha tha ke woh America ki qayadat mein Nato fojion par hamlay jari rakhen ge. un se qabal Afghan sadar Ashraf Ghani ney ramadaan al mubarak ki 27 tareekh se Taliban ke khilaaf police aur fouj ki karwaiya aath roz ke liye roknay ka elaan kya tha. is jung bandi ka guzashta mangal se aaghaz huwa tha. Albata unhon ney wazeh kya tha ke ISIL aur dosray jangju groupon ke khilaaf karwai jari rakhi jaye gi. Nangarharmein is khudkush car bomb dhamaka ki ittila se qabal saddar Ashraf ghanni ney Taliban ke sath jari jung bandi mein tosee ka elaan kya tha. unhon ney aik nashri taqreer mein Taliban se bhi kaha tha ke woh apni teen roza jung bandi mein mazeed tosee karen aur hukoomat se aman mazakraat ka aaghaz karen. Taliban ki jung bandi ka jummay ko Eid ke pehlay roz aaghaz huwa tha aur is ki muddat itwaar ko khatam horahee hai. Eid ke pehlay doroz mein Taliban jngjoon, Afghan security forces aur shehrion ney jung bandi par bharpoor andaaz mein achay jazbaat ka izhaar kya hai. unhon ney dar-al-hakoomat Kabul aur dosray shehron mein mushtarqa ijitmaat munaqqid kiye aur aik dosray se khush gawaar mood mein muanqa kya aur baahum mil kar selfie banai hain. check points par bhi Afghan security forces ke ehalkaron ney karon aur motor cyclon par shehron ka rukh karne walay Taliban ka khirmqdm kya hai aur unhein Eid ki mubarak baad paish ki hai
235.title: Afghanistan ke soobah Nangarhar mein dhamaka, 26 afraad halaak

news_detail: Israeli ladaaka tayyaron ney peer ke roz Gaza patti ke shumal mein Hammas tanzeem ke askari ahdaaf par 9 hamlay kiye. Israeli fouj ke bayan ke mutabiq yeh karwai Israel ki janib aatish geer kaghazi tayyaray daaghe janay ke jawab mein samnay aayi hai. bayan mein yeh wazeh nahi kya gaya ke aaya fazai hamlon mein koi jani nuqsaan huwa ya nahi. yaad rahay ke patharon ke baad aatish geez kaghazi tayyaray 30 March ko shuru honay walay Palestenians ke ehtajaji silsilay ki alamat ban gaye hain. Gaza patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par honay walay un muzahiron ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gazinon aur be ghar afraad ki wapsi ke haq ka mutalba karna tha. Israeli fouj ney hafta ke roz do Palestenians ko zakhmi kar diya tha jo aatish geer ghubaare bhejnay ki tayari kar rahay they. Al Arabia ke numainda ney peer ki subah bataya ke Gaza patti ke nazdeek yahodi bustiyon mein khatray ke syren bajaye gaye .

Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Gaza patti se daaghe janay walay teen rakton ka pata chalaya jin mein aik Gaza patti ke andar hi gir gaya. deegar do rakton ke girnay ki jagah nahi batee gayi. yaad rahay ke 30 March se Gaza patti ki sarhad par honay walay ehtajaji silsila ke douran Falasteeni nojawanon ney muzahmat ka aik naya tareeqa apnaya hai. is ke tehat kaghazi tayyaray aatish geer mawaad le kar jatay hain. un ki madad se petrol bomb bandh kar Israeli yahodi bustiyon mein phainky jatay hain. Israeli fouj is naye tareeqa car se nimatnay mein nakaam nazar aati hai. 30 March se Gaza patti par shuru honay walay awaami muzahiron mein kam azkam 120 Falasteeni maaray gaye. Israel ney jis par halakat khaiz hathiyar istemaal karne par aalmi satah par muzammat ki jarahi hai, kaha ke awaami muzahiron ke douran Israeli fojion ke hathon mein halaak honay walon mein ziyada tar Hammas ke arkaan they, jinhein woh dehshat gard qarar deta hai. Palestenians ka kehna hai ke sho-hada aur hazaron zakhmion mein beshtar ghair musallah aam shehri they jin ke khilaaf Israeli ney jarehana karwai ki hai. tang sahili mahsor patti mein zayed az  20lakhs Falasteeni aqal tareen zaroriat zindagi ke baghair zindagi guzarnay par majaboor hain jinhein aalmi imdaad bhi nahi poanch paati hai.
253.title: Hammas ke 9 ahdaaf par Israeli fazai hamlay

news_detail: Syria mein Iraq ki sarhad ke nazdeek waqay qasba Al-Hari mein itwaar ki shab honay walay hamla mein halakaton ki tadaad 52 ho gayi hai. insani haqooq ke sab se barray nigaran group Al Marsad al souri ke mutabiq maaray jaany walay afraad Bashar hukoomat ke humnawa hain jin mein ziyada tadaad araqyon ki hai. Al Marsad ke Director Rami Abdul Rahman ne bataya ke Shami hukoomat ke humnawa 52 jungjuon mein 30 ka talluq Iraq se aur 16 ka shaam se hai. hamla ke baare mein kaha ja raha hai ke mashriqi soobay der alzor ke qasbay Al-Hari mein aik fouji qaafley ko nishana banaya gaya. Dimashq hukoomat ne America ke zair qayadat bain al aqwami ittehaad par is karwai ka ilzaam ayed kya. taham Amrici markazi kamaan ke tarjuman ne is ki tardeed ki hai. is se qabal Shami sarkari tally vision ne elaan kya tha ke America ke zair qayadat bain al aqwami ittehaad ne malik ke mashriq mein Shami fouj ke aik thikana par hamla kya. is ke nateeja mein mutadid afraad halaak aur zakhmi ho gaye. yaad rahay ke bain al aqwami ittehaad Daaish ke khilaaf Syrian democratic forces ke maarka mein taawun ke liye fazai hamlay karta hai .

Al Marsad ne bavsoq zaraye ke hawala se bataya hai ke der alzor soobay ke dehi ilaqa mein aik wasee fouji operation ki tayyariyan ki ja rahi hain. Al Marsad ko masool honay wali maloomat ke mutabiq Daaish tanzeem Albu Kamal se le kar Al-Miyadeen tak ke ilaqa mein dareaye furaat ke maghribi kinare ki janib apne anasir aur gaadiyon ko akhatta kar rahi hai. Tanzeem ab Shami hukoomati forces, Irani forces, Lebanese Hizbullah aur un sab ke humnawa musallah anasir ke khilaaf aik bharpoor hamla ki tayari kar rahi hai. musallah anasir mein Shami aur ghair Shami jangju shaamil hain. ab yeh kaha ja raha hai ke yeh pur asraar hamla Israel ne kya hai. aik Amrici ohdedar ne shanakht khufia rakhnay ki shart par kaha kay yeh yaqeen karne ke liye yeh hamla Israel ne kya hai hamaray paas wajohaat hain. Israel ne is par koi tabsarah karne se inkaar kardiya hai. hamla ke liye Israel ki janib is liye bhi gumaan kya ja raha hai ke yeh hamla Shia Iraqi militia ke khilaaf kya gaya hai
269.title: Syria: Fazai hamla mein Bashar ki humnawa forces ke 52 arkaan halaak

news_detail: Taaza tareen mutalea se zahir hota hai ke khangi logon ke hathon mein hathyaaron ki tadaad mein izafah sun-hwa hai. taraqqi Pazeer aur jung se dochar mumalik ke maqabil mutamawwil mumalik ke shehrion ke paas ziyada hathyaar hain. Chotey hathyaaron par nigrani rakhnay wali Switzerland ki aik tanzeem ney 230 mumalik mein chote hathyaaron ki tadaad par tehqeeqi mutalea ki tafseeli report mein bataya gaya ke aaj duniya mein taqreeban aik billion chote hathyaar hain jin mein 857 million hathyaar American shehrion ke hathon mein hain. is terhan American mard wo khawateen ke paas duniya mein paye janay walay niji hathyaaron ka 46 feesad se hai. asmal arms surway ka kehna hai ke 393 shehri hathyaar rakhtay hain. yeh tedaad digar sarkardah 25 mumalik ke khangi shehrion ke paas mojood hathyaaron ki majmoi tadaad se ziyada hai. American shehri awsatan14 million naye hathyaar har saal khridte hain. report mein kaha gaya ke shehrion ke paas mojood hathyaaron ki is tadaad mein qanooni aur ghair qanooni hathyaar shaamil hain. shehrion ke paas jo hathyaar hain un mein hthyaro n mein Improvised Craft  Weapons, factory mein tayyar kardah hathyaar, Rifles, Shot Guns aur chand mumalik mein to Machine Guns bhi hain. 2017 ke ekhtataam taq duniya bhar mein paye janay walay taqreeban aik billion hathyaaron mein aisay 133 million hathyaar sarkari Military Forces ke paas hain aur 22. 7 million hathyaar qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke paas hain. agency ke mutabiq guzashta martaba 2007 mein surway kya gaya tha is waqt 875 million hathyaar they jin mein 650 million syoylin ke paas they. America ke baad sab se ziyada hathyaar Rusia, China, North Korea aur Ukrain ke paas hain. report ke mutabiq duniya mein mojood chote hathyaaron mein 85 feesad 875 million hathyar civilians ke paas hain jin mein shehri, khangi sikoriti firms, ghair sarkari musallah groups aur toliyan shaamil hain, jabkay qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke paas 2 feesad 23 million avrmltri ke paas 13 feesad 133 million hathyaar hain
283.title: Duniya mein maujood aik billion hathyaaron mein 857 million hathyaar American ke paas

news_detail: Israeli ladaka tayyaron ny mangal aur budh ki darmiyani shab Gaza patti par fazai hamlay kiye taham kisi ke zakhmi honay ki ittila nahi mili. Falasteeni zaraye ke mutabiq is ke jawab mein Falasteeni musallah groupon ny janoobi Israel ki janib rocket daaghe. Israeli fouj ke elaan ke mutabiq is ny Gaza patti se daaghe janay walay rakton ke jawab mein Gaza patti mein 25 ahdaaf ko nishana banaya. fouji bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke raat ke douran Israel par missilon sameit 45 rocket daaghe gaye .

doosri janib Falasteeni security zaraye ny wazeh kya hai ke Israeli jungi tayyaron ny Gaza patti ke janoobi shehar Rafah mein Hamas ke askari wing Alqassam Brigades ke tarbiati thikana ke nazdeek khaali araazi par kayi missile daaghe. aik dosray hamla mein Gaza patti ke shumal mein Hamas ke thikanon ko nishana banaya gaya. Gaza patti mein wizarat sahet ka kehna hai ke hamlon mein koi zakhmi nahi huwa. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq fazai yalgaron ke baad Falasteeni musallah groupon ny janoobi Israel par mutadid rocket aur granides daaghe. kisi Falasteeni group ny is karwai ki zimmay daari qubool nahi ki. wazeh rahay ke rawan baras 30 March se shuru honay wali” haq wapsi” ehtajaji rilyon ke douran Israeli fayrng se kam az kam 132 Falasteeni shaheed ho chuke hain jab ke is douran koi Israeli halaak nahi huwa
298.title: Gaza mein 25 ahdaaf par Israel ki fazai bomb baari

news_detail: Afghanistan ke soobah Badghis mein Taliban ke hamla mein Afghan Forces ke 30 ahelkaar halaak ho gaye. eid ke liye ki gayi jung bandi khatam hojane ke baad Taliban jangjuon aur Afghan Forces ke darmain ghmsan tassadum shuru hogaya hai. Afghan hakkaam ke mutabiq jung bandi ke baad Taliban ki janib se ki gayi yeh aik barri karwai hai. sobai governor Abdul Ghafoor malik zai ka kehna hai ke Taliban ney Badghis soobah mein Afghan security Forces ki do checkposts par hamla kya. Taliban jangjuon ney mukhtalif simtao se dhawa bol diya, kayi ghantay tak jari rehne wali larai mein Afghan Forces ke 30 ahelkaar maaray gaye. is tassadum mein Taliban ko bhi jani nuqsaan uthana para. sobai council ke rukan Mohammad Nasir Naziri ney toseeq ki ke Taliban jangjuon ney mangal ki raat der gaye Bala Murghab aur aabb kumar azlaa mein sikoriti posts par marboot hamlay kiye. unhon ney kaha ke Afghan Forces ney muasar jawabi karwai ki jis mein kayi hamla aawar halaak hogaye. darin asna sobai sikoriti ke sarbarah Ahmed Fahim Qayem ney kaha ke Aab Kamari zila mein tassadum ke nateeja mein kam az kam 15 militants maaray gaye hain aur zayed az 20 zakhmi hogaye. unhon ney kaha ke Bala Murghab zila mein tassadum ke nateeja mein kam az kam 12 militants halaak aur kam az kam 8 zakhmi hogaye hain. wizarat difaa ke zaraye ke mutabiq kam az kam 13 fouji shaheed aur 8 zakhmi hue hain.
314.title: Afghanistan: Badghis mein Taliban ka Forces par hamla, 30 ahelkaar halaak

news_detail: Hhyderabad. Telangana Akhila Bharati Vidhyarthi Parishad ke kaarkunon ney aaj riyasat geer school band ehtijaj ke douran Dehli public school, Nadirgul, Saroornagaar par tashadud ka muzahira kiya. riyasat ke schoolon ki fees par haden muqarrar karne ka mutalba karte hue ABVP ney riyasat geer satah par schoolon ke band mananay ka elaan kya tha jis ke paish e nazar chand Schools ney tateel ka elaan kardiya tha. Dehli public school, Hyderabad Public School, Chaitanya, Pallavi School aur Michael School ke intizamia ney avlyaye talba ko paighamaat arsaal karte hue mutala kardiya tha ke budh ke din school ko tateel rahay gi taham Dehli public school ki Nadirgul shaakh aaj band nahi thi. ABVP kaarkunon ney school ke khula rehne ki ittila paker wahan puhanche aur kimps ke baher tahehri hui basoon par sangbaari karna shuru kar di. reyasti secretary ABVP lipa ney kaha ke band barri hadd taq pramn aur kamyaab rhaavr beshtar school intizamia ney band manaya
327.title: ABVP ka School band ke douran pur tashaddud muzahira

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik nagehani waqea mein aik Doctor ney ilaaj karne ke douran aik teen sala bachchi ki taang tod di. Dr. Kiran Kumar ney Government Homeopathy Hospital Ramanthapur mein mamooli chout lagnay par aik teen sala ldki ka ilaaj karte hue ittafaq se is ki taang ko zor se maror diya. ldki ke rishta daaron ney Doctor par la parwahi ka ilzaam aed karte hue Hospital ke ihata mein ehtijaj kya. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke ldki ki taang tod dene ke baad Doctors ab hum se keh rahay hain ke bachi ko ilaaj ke liye khangi Hospital muntaqil kya jaye. rishta daaron ney shikayat ki ke medical officer se shikayat ke bawajood qasoor waar Doctor ke khilaaf koi karwai hanooz nahi ki gayi. Doctor ke khilaaf police mein bhi shikayat darj karwai gayi hai. rishta daaron ney bataya ke Doctor ney ldki ki taang ki haddi tod kar wahan se faraar hogaya. jab bachi ko malik pait ke aik Hospital ko muntaqil kya gaya to wahan doctors ney bataya ke taang ki haddi toot gayi hai.
337.title: Doctor ney ilaaj ke douran sher khawar ki taang tod di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein senior IAS ohdedaron ke tabadlay amal mein aeye. Mehakuma Municipal Administration ke senior IAS ohdedaron ke tabadlay karte hue Commissioner Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) Mr. B. Janardhan Reddy ka tabadlah karte hue Commissioner Hyderabad Metro Politan Development Authority (HMDA ) muqarrar kya gaya hai. Managing Director Hyderabad Metro Politan Water Supply and Sewerage Board Mr. Dana Kishore ko Commissioner GHMC muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Mr. Dana Kishore mazeed ehkaam ki ijrayi tak Hyderabad Metro Water Supply & Sewerage Board ka full additional charge ( FAC ) rakhnay ke sath sath Secretary mehkuma Aqliati Behbood bhi hon ge. Commissioner HMDA Mr. T. Chiranjeevulu  ka tabadlah karte hue Commissioner and Inspector General Rsegistrations and Stamps muqarrar kya gaya hai. Vakati Karuna ko Commissioner Registrations and Stamps ki izafi zimma daari se subukdosh kardiya gaya hai. Commissioner GHMC Mr. B. Janardhan Reddy Swacch Bharat muhim ke tehat Nav Bharat Times Best Commissioner Award haasil karne is waqt Mumbai mein hain.
189.title: Dana Kishore Commissioner GHMC muqarrar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana mein qabal az-waqat intikhabaat ki paish qiyasion ke darmyaann Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandershekar Rao ne aaj TRS  ke MPs aur MLAs se kaha ke intikhabaat ke ineqad ke talluq se woh munasib waqt par munasib faisla karen ge aur is khusoos mein paish qiyasian karne ki qatayee zaroorat nahi hai. Unhon ne id-daa kya ke aayindah intikhabaat mein Party 100 se zayed nashiston par kamyabi haasil kere gi intikhabaat jab kabhi hon, taham unhon ne awaami numaindon par zor diya ke woh intikhabaat ke liye Party Cadre ko mutharrak kar dein. Chief Minister ne jummay ko yahan Telangana bhavan mein Party ke MLAs, MLCs aur MPs ke aik ijlaas ki sadarat ki jis mein mukhtalif umoor bashamool intikhabaat, sarkari Schemes ke farogh aur Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein Outer Ring Road ke qareeb Kongara Kalan mein 2

September ko munaqqid shudni ‘Pragathi Nivedana’ jalsa aam ka ihata kya gaya. Qabal azeen unhon ne Kongara Kalan ka daura karte hue jalsa ki tayarion ka mushahida kya. Zaraye ne kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ne nishandahi ki ke TRS intikhabaat ka kabhi bhi saamna karne tayyar hai aur who is ziman mein munasib waqt par munasib faisla karen ge magar woh chahtay hain ke Party Cadre abhi se tayyar rahay. Muntakhiba numayindon ne Party sarbarah ko tayaqqun diya ke woh intikhabaat ke silsila mein un ke faisla ki pabandi karen ge. Aik senior Rukn e Assembly ne kaha ”Chief Minister ne hamein Pragathi Nivedata se  Party Cadre ko mutharrik karne ke ziman mein zaroori Hidayat dein. Hum pur etemaad hain ke un ke ehkaam ki tameel hogi aur sarkari schemes ko awam tak pahonchayen ge. Aik Senior Wazeer ke mutabiq Mr. K. Chandershekar Rao ‘Pragathi NIvedata’ ke stage se hi aayindah intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne walay umeedwaron ki fehrist jari karen ge. Yeh jalsa e aam, mamool ka siyasi jalsa nahi hoga balkes is mein Telangana riyasat ki guzishta chaar barson mein taraqqi aur paishraft ka jaayeza paish kya jaye ga jabke Chief Minister 20 nukaati karkardagi report paish karen ge. Iss jalsa e aam ko ghair mamooli taur par kamyaab bananay har aik Legislatures par yeh zimma daari aayed ki gayi ke woh is jalsa mein apne apne Halqa e Assembly se 20 taa 30 hazaar logon ki shirkat ko yakeeni banaye. Yeh jalsa e aam Mulk ka sab se bada siyasi jalsa hoga. Iss jalsa e aam ko kamyaab bananay zilayee satah par Party kaarkunon ke ijlaas munaqqid kiye jayen ge. Jalsa e aam ko kamyaab bananay Mr. Chandershekar Rao Orgamozing Committee aur deegar Committees ka bhi elaan karen ge.
199.title: Intekhabaat ka munasib waqt par faisla: KCR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaayed Muqannana Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ney aaj puranay shaher mein Metro Rail Project ke aaghaz ke imkanaat ka jaayeza liya aur ohdedaron ko hidaayat di ke Project ke aaghaz ke baad kisi qisam ki takheer nah ki jaye. janab Akbar Owaisi ne party ke Arkaan e Assembly Mrs. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan , Ahmed Pasha Quadri aur Ahmed Balal aur Hyderabad Metro Rail Limited ke aala ohdedaron ke hamrah puranay shaher ka daura kya. Unhon ney Project ki route ka bhi jaayeza liya chunkay iss route ke aaghaz mein sab se badi rukawat, iss ki raah mein haail mazhabi muqamaat hain jin ki wajah se route ko design karne mein badi takheer hui hai. Tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke aik martaba kamon ka aaghaz hojaye to androon teen baras is ki takmeel karli jaye gi. Yeh kaam Darusshifa taa Falaknuma shuru kya jaye ga. Iss Project ke baayis sadak ki tausee ke nateeja mein zayed az 1,000  jayidadon par assar padega. Isss Project ke liye sadak ki tausee mein jaayeedad se mahroom hojane walon aur taajireen ke liye package bhi dainay par hukoomat ghaur kar rahi hai. Iss route par sadak mein tausee ko bohut mehdood rakha gaya taakay ziyada jayidadon ko nuqsaan na pahunche. Puranay shaher mein Metro Rail Project Jubilee Bus Station taa Falaknuma raahdaari par mushtamil hoga jo 15 kilometer ki musafat rakhay ga jis par 15 station hon ge. Yeh raahdaari puranay shaher mein 5.5 kilometer taweel hogi aur Darusshifa, Purani Haveli, Mir Alam Manndi, Moghalpura, Hari Bowli, Shah Ali Banda se hotay hue Falaknuma par khatam hogi. Taa haal iss route par Jubilee Bus Station taa Mahatma Gandhi Bus station Imliban tak kaam chal raha hai jo bahut jald mukammal hojaye ga aur puranay shaher ke kamon ki takmeel tak Imliban tak hi train chalanay ka mansoobah hai, Jisay baad azan Darusshifa se jood diya jaye ga. Janab Akbar Owaisi ney Darusshifa tak Falaknuma Metro Rai line ke kamon ke baarey mein tafseelaat haasil keen aur Metro Rail ke mujawaza Stations ke muqamat ka bhi mushahida kya. Janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ney ohdedaron se Project ke aaghaz aur iss ke zimn mein haayel dushwaryon ke baarey mein bhi tabadlah khayaal kiya aur unhen tayaqqun diya ke Majlis ki janib se is khsoos mein bharpoor taawun kya jaye ga. Tawaqqa hai ke aayindah mah se hi puranay shaher mein Metro Rail ke taameeri kaamon ka amali aaghaz kardiya jaye ga.
225.title: Akbar Owaisi ney puranay shaher mein Metro Rail ke kaamon ka jaayeza liya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Telangana Jana Samithi Professor Kodandaram tawaqqa hai ke Telangana Assembly ke chand halqon ke liye Party umeedwaron ka elaan mah September mein kar deinge. Barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samithi aur badi oppostion party Congress ney bhi pehlay hi yeh elaan kardiya hai ke woh September mein Party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar deingi. zaraye ke mutabiq Telangana Jana Samithi (TJS) ke sarbarah par zabardast dabao hai ke mukhalif TRS votes ki taqseem ko roknay doosri hum khayaal partiyon se intikhabi mafahmat ki jaye. Party zaraye ney inkishaaf kya hai ke chand qaayedeen, intikhabi mafahmat ke haq mein hain aur unhen yeh mahswara bhi dae rahay hain ke woh Telangana Riyasat mein mukhalif TRS partiyon ka aik riyasti satah ka wifaq tayyar kere taham is soorat mein Telangana Jana Samithi ko baa-mushkil 20-25 nashiston par hi iktafa karna padega aur yeh pehal doosri partiyon ki janib se umeedwaron ke elaan se qabal hi karna padegi jis ke imkanaat mohom nazar arahey hain chunkay Congress Party bhi Telangana mein tanha muqaabla karne ke darpay hai. Telangana mein Lef Parties aur Telugu Desam Party ka bhi muaqqaf koi behtar nahi hai.
244.title: Prof. Kodandaram bhi Sep mein kuch umeedwaron ka elaan karenge

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kerala main sailaab ke mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye Jamat e Islami Telangana & Odisha ki janib se Relief Fund qaayim karte hue Crore ha rupay ki imdaad rawana karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Ameer Jamat Islami halqa Telangana o Odisha Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke Jamat ke headquarters waqay lakadkot main imdaad ki vasuli ka aik camp qaayim kiya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Kerala ka haliya sailaab sadi ka bad tareen sailaab tha jis ney Kerala ki mayeeshat ko tabah karkay rakh diya. Sailaab ke baayis taqreeban 20 hazaar Crore rupay ke nuqsanaat ka andaza lagaya gaya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Peoples Foundation, Jamat e Islami Hind halqa Telangana o Odisha aur is ki zaili tanzeemen jaisay ARW, SIO, GIO, IYM, MPJ waghera raahat kaari ke kamon mein apne hazaron volunteers e sath din raat masroof hain. Doctors ki tanzeem DARE se wabasta Doctors ki aik team Kerala pahonch chuki hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Kerala mein fauri raahat ke taur par khaney ke packet, peeney ka saaf pani, bartan, kapdey aur chadaren, bistar, School Kits aur adwiyaat waghera ki sakht zaroorat hai jabkay dosray marhala mein makanaat ki marammat, Shelters ki taamer karna hoga. Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney bataya ke Kerala aik taksiri  riyasat hai jahan mukhtalif aqaayed ke log sheer o shakar ki terha mil jul kar rehtay hain, aaj wahan sailaab o tughyani ke baayis zabardast tabahi machi hui hai. Museebat ki inn ghadion mein hum sab ka fareeza hai ke un ki madad ke liye agay ayen aur be ghar hojane walon ko sahara faraham karen. Unhon ney kaha ke Jamat e Islami isi jazba insani ke tahet Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ke liye fund jama karne ka mansoobah baneya hai. Jamat e Islami apne kaarkunon aur aam logon se imdaad haasil keregi aur jo kuch bhi yahan jama kiya jaye ga Jamat e  Islami ke ohdedar, Kerala pahonch kar apne hathon se bah nafs e nafees taqseem karenge. Janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney baaz firqa parast taqaton ki janib se Kerala ki imdaad na karne ki tajweez ko nafrat par mabni qarar dete hue usay mustarad kar diya aur kaha ke yeh kehna ke Kerala ke log chunkay gosht-khor hain is liye un par yeh museebat aan padi hai tohmat parasti hai. Agar aysa hi hota to Uttaranchal  mein jo sailaab aaya tha is mein woh log kyun bahe gaye jo yatri thae aur sabzi Khor thae janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney sab se appeal ki ke woh frakhdilanh atiyaat den. Jamat e  Islami ke sadar daftar waqay lakadkot ya apne apne ilaaqon mein waqay Jamat ke dafatir par ruqomat ataa kar saktay thae. Iss mouqe par Janab Mohammad Azhar aur Janab M. N.Baog  aur dosray maujood thae.
264.title: Kerala ke mutasireen sailaab ke liye Jamat e Islami fund jama karey gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk bhar ke 5 huqooq e insa ani jahed kaaron aur danishavaron bashamool Proffesor Varavara  Rao ki Pune Police ki janib se sangeen ilzamaat ke tahet giraftari ke khilaaf ehatejaaj ke liye aaj Tankbund par mujassima Ambedakar ke paas jama hone vale mukhtalif samaji tanzeemon wo sayasi partyoon ke qayedeen aur jahed kaaron ko Police ne hirasat mein le liya tha. In ehitejajiyon ko mukhtalif Police Stations mein rakha gaya tha taham shaam 5:00 baje unhen riha kar diya gaya. Yaad rahe ki kal Pune Police ne shaher Hyderabad mein chape marate huwe namavar inqilabi shayar o mufakkir Proffesor Varavara Rao aur do sshafiyon ko jin mein un ke ek damaad bhi shamil hain, giraftar kar liya tha aur Nampally Cirminal Court mein pesh karate huwe unhen transit warrant par Pune lekar chalee gayi thi. In jahed kaaron ko agarche jariya saal 1

January ko Kore Bhima Gaoun mein dalits aur aala zaat ke afarad ke mabain tasadum ke ek case mein maskhoz kiya gaya magar Pune Police ka id-dia hai ke yeh jahedakaar Wazeer e Aazam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Devendra Fadnavis ko qatal karane ki sazish rach rahe theh jiske liye who mukhtalif Colloges se karakunon ko bharti kar rahe theh. Proffesar Varavara Rao aur digar 2 sahafiyon samet Mulk ke digar 4 jahed kaaron ki giraftari ke khilaaf Communist Parties aur unki mulhiqa tanzimon se vabasta qayideen, mukhtalif samaji tanzimon se wabasta qaiydeen aur mufakkireen aaj ehatijaaj karane Tankbund par mujassima Ambedakar ke pass jama huwe theh taham 200-250 muzahireen ko Police ne giraftar karte huwe mukhtalif Police Stations jaise Abids, Nampally, Begam Bazar, Bolaram, Gandhi Nagar, Mushirabad vagaira ko muntaqil kiya. Giraftar shudagaan mein Mrs. Moulana Naseeruddin, Janab Nizamuddin aur Khalida Praveen, Sabiha Praveen, Gulam Yazdani, Lalita, Tanveer Fatima, Achuta Rama Rao, Geeta, Swapna, Madhu, Shweta , Kaneez Fatima aur digar shamil hain. In tamaam ko shaam 5:00 baje riha kar diya gaya. Darsgah Jihaad-o-shahadat ke qaiydin Masaraz Salahuddin Affan sectary, Mohamnmed Bin Omer, Muhammad Shahab aur Abdulrazak ne giraftar shudagaan se Police stations mein mulaqaat karate hue unse izahar yagaanagat kiya.
277.title: Jahed kaaron ki giraftari ke khilaaf ehtejaaj, samaji karkun giraftar orihaa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Barsar Iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke siyasi taaqat ke muzahira ke liye 2

September ko munaqqid shudni Pragathi Nivedana ki tayyariyan shor wo zor se jari hain. Jalsa gaah ke muqam aur is ko janay walay tamam raastoon ko gulaabii parchamon, banners,hoardings aur cut-outs se nahla diya gaya hai magar banners waghera par Urdu nadarad aur Muslim qayedeen nazar andaz kar diye gaye hain. Hatta ke Deputy Chief Minister Mr.Mahmood Ali ki bhi tasweer kahin dikhayi nahi par rahi hai. Pragati Nivedana ki taiyarion se Muslim qayedeen ko badi had tak daur hi rakha gaya tha sirf Deputy Mayor Mr. baba Fasihuddin hi kisi had tak un taiyarion se judey rahay, shayed is ki aik wajah yeh bhi hosakti hai ke woh GHMC se wabasta hain. Muslim qayedeen is jalsa aam ke baray mein is waqt harkat mein aeye jab akhbarat aur television ke zareya inhen is programme ka pata chala. Agarchay aaj kuch Corporations aur Boards ke Sudoor ne akhbaari numayindon ke hamrah jalsa gaah ka mushahida kya hai magar aisa lag raha tha ke woh muntazmeen mein se nahi hain balkay woh khud mushahida karne aeye hain. Yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke Pragati Nivedana se khitaab ke liye sirf aik Muslim qayed ko mauqa diya jaye ga. Yaad rahay ke TRS Mulk ki tareekh ke sab se baday siyasi muzahira ke liye Outer Ring Road ke qareeb Kongara Kalan mein ,1600 acres arazi ka intikhab kya gaya hai. Gadiyon ki parking ke liye 1000 acres araazi ka raqba mukhtas kya gaya hai. Chief Minister wo sadar TRS Mr. ke Chandarshekar is jalsa mein taqreeban 4 ghantay khitaab karte hue TRS hukumat ki chaar sala karkardagi ka jayeza paish karenge. Samjha jata hai ke TRS is jalsa aam se riyasat mein apna intikhabi bagal baja degi aur Mr. Chandrashekar Rao tawaqqa hai ke Party umeedwaron ka bhi elaan kar deinge taakay woh abhi se intikhabi tayarion mein jut jaayein. Chief Mnister ne ab tak jo isharay dyie hain is se aik siyasi gosha mein yeh qiyaas aarayyan ki jarahi hain ke Mr. Chandarshekar Rao is jalsa aam mein hukumat tahleel karte hue naya khat e etemaad haasil karne ka elaan kar saktay hain. Party sargarmion se Muslims ko door rakhnay aur Urdu zabaan ko yaklakht nazar andaaz kar diye janay par Muslim halqon mein yeh chay-megoyaan honay lagi hain ke kahin yeh sab BJP se TRS ki khurbat aur khufia mafahmat ka nateeja to nahi hai?
291.title: Pragathi NIvedana: Urdu nadarad, Muslim qayedeen nazar andaz

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad High Court ney barasar-e-ektadaar Telangana Rashtriya samiti ke siayasi taaqat ke muzayhere ke taur par 2

Septembar ko munaqid kiye jane wale jalsa-e-aam Pragathi Nivedana ke khilaaf wakeel wo Sadar Environment Protection Committee Mr Pujari Siridar ki daakhil karada arzi ko kharij kar diya. Mr. Pujari ney Pragathi Nivedana se Evironment ko pahunchne wale nuqsanaat ki duhaee dete hue ye istedlaal pesh kiya tha ki agar woh apani chaar saala karkardagi ko awaam ke robaru pesh karana chahate hain to awaam ko takaleef mein mubtela karne ki bajaay unhen Techonology ko istimaal karte hue Social Media ke zariya farog dena chahiye. High Court ne darakhast ko kharij karane se qabl Hukumat se vazahat talab ki thi jisne waada kiya ke Evironment ko kisi  qisam ka nuqsaan pahunchaye bagair programme ko munsarim kiya jayega. Advocate Ganaral ne Adaalat ko waaqif karavaya ke Hukumat ney jalsa-e-aam ke liye tamaam taiyariyaan mukammal karli hai aur waada kiya ki mahauliyat ko kisi qisam ka nuqsaan pahunchaye bagair Public Meeting munaqid ki jayegi.
313.title: Pragathi Nivedana ke khilaf darakhast kharij

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority HMDA ney LRS darkhast guzaron ko badi raahat dete huye ibtedayi adayigyon ki adam adai ke baayis ruki huwi LRS darkhaston ki processing ke liye di gayi mohlat mein tausee ki hai. LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ki aakhri tareekh ko 31
October tak tausee di gayi hai. Qabl azeen HMDA ne LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ke liye 31

August tak mohlat di thi. Ibtedayi adayigyon mein taakhir ke baayis kayi darkhaston ki yaksoi nahi ho payi is liye Commissioner ney is ziman mein di gayi mohlat mein tausee karne ka faisla kiya hai. HMDA ke ohdedaron ko hidayat di gayi ke woh aisay darkhwast guzaron ko aagah karen jinhon  ney ibtedayi adaigi nahi ki hai aur unhen batayen ke 30
September tak 10,000 rupay bataur e ibtedayi adai ki jaye aur 15

October tak LRS puri processing dey diye jayen. Principal Secretary Baldi nazam o nasq wo shehri taraqhiyat Mr. Aravind Kumar ney bhi ohdedaron ko hidayat di thi ke zair e iltiwa darkhwaston ki yaksoi 30

october tak kar dein. HMDA zariye ke bamawajib  1. 76 lakh se zayed darkhaston ki yaksoi kar di gayi hai aur 61,000 darkhasten mustard ki gayeen jabkay 54 darkhasten dastawizaat ki kami ke baayis zair e tasfia hain. 1,694 darkhaston par karwai jari hai. No Objection Certificate paish na kiye jane par 2,237 darkhasten radd kar di gayeen.
325.title: LRS applications ki processing ki tareekh mein tausee

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ney Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah kardiya hai. Marriage/Talaq, Qhula ke Certificates  ki fees ko 200 rupay se badha kar 300 rupay kardiya  hai jabkay yahi Certificate Tatkal ke tehat jari karne ki fees ko 300 rupay se badha kar 400 rupay kardi gayi hai. Sadar Nasheen Waqf Board Janaab Mohammad Saleem ney aaj Hajj House Nampally mein waqay Waqf Board ke headquarters mein Quzath Section ka muayina kiya jis ka baad tazaeen e nau aaj iftetah amal mein aaya. Unhon nay bataya ke Passport Office ki tarha yahan bhi Tatkal ke tehat darkhwaston ke adkhal aur ijrayi ke liye alahda counters rakhay gaye hain. Awaam ki sahoolat ke liye na sirf printes ka izafah kiya gaya hai balkay amlah bhi badhaya gaya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Tatkal scheme ke tehat daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par Certificate usi din jari kar diye jayen ge jis se khaas kar azlaa se anay walay logon ko faida hoga. Isi tarha aam zumra ke tahet daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par bhi dosray din hi Certificates jari kardey ye jayen ge. Telangana Waqf Board ney tabdeeli mazhab ke Certificates ki ijraayi masdood kar di thi taham ab is ki bhi ijrayi amal mein layi jarahi hai.
340.title: Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah

news_detail: Pathankot : Kathua zila ke Rasana mouza ki 8 sala khanah badosh ladki ki January mein alamnaak asmat raizi o qatal ke case mein crime branch ne jummay ko Pathankot District and Session Court mein 17 gawahoon mein aik ko bhi paish karne se qassir raha hai. mulzimeen ke aik wakeel safai ne bataya ke adalat ne gawahoon ki Adam haazri ka sakht note liya aur SSP crime branch ko hadaayat di ke paiir ko shakhsi tor par adalat mein haazir hon. Crime Branch ne apne 500 safhaati charge sheet mein 226 gawahoon ki nishandahi ki thi. muqadma ke 8 mulzimeen ke mnjmlh 7 ke khilaaf jumaraat ko adalat ne ilzamaat waza kiye jis ke nateeja mein samaat aur jirah ke liye 17 mulzimeen ko haazir adalat honay ka Saman jari kya gaya tha. aik wakeel safai ne bataya ke aaj ki karwai baa-mushkil aik ghanta jari rahi chunkay aik bhi gawah haazir adalat nahi ho saka tha. adalat ne 17 gawahoon ki adalat mein peshkashi tak deegar gawahoon ko talab karna mouqoof kardiya hai. zaraye ne kaha ke adalat mein haazir honay se ijtinab karne ki koi raah nahi hai. adalat ke Saman jari karne par crime branch ko case ke tamam gawahoon ko adalat mein paish karna hoga. wakeel safai ne adalat se darkhwast ke aik mulzim Pravesh Kumar urf Mannu ko jo na baligh hai, is ki arzi par bhi paiir ko samaat ki jaye. 8 sala qbayili ladki ki jarehana asmat raizi aur qatal par duniya bhar mein muzammat ki gayi thi. mutasirah khandan ki appeal par adalat Uzma ne muqadma ki samaat Kathua se pathan coat muntakil kar di thi jo Kathua se 30 kilometer ke faasla par hai. mutasirah ke liye aajilaana adal ko yakeeni bananay Supreme Court ne muqadma par yomiya samaat karne ki bhi hadaayat di thi. muqadma ki samaat band kamrah mein ki jarahi hai jahan media ka dakhla mamnoo hai
208.title: Kathua asmat raizi case : Aik gawah bhi haazir e adalat nahi ho saka

news_detail: America ki riyasat Virginia mein Fort Pickett National Guard base se aik baktar band gaadi chura kar bhagnay walay fouji ko girftar kar liya gaya hai. Amrici fouji adday se yeh bktrbnd gaadi nikaalte ke baad do ghantay taq sarkon par chalata raha tha, halaank is ki ziyada se ziyada raftaar 65 kilometer fi ghanta thi. is ke bawajood bhi police neh barri tug vdo ke baad is par qaboo paaya hai. fouji baktar band gaadi ko sarkon par bhaganay ke baad reyasti dar-al-hakoomat richmond mein town hall ke samnay aa kar ruk gaya tha. wahan police neh is ka gherao kar liya aur is ko mauqa par girftar kar liya hai. baaz it-tila-aat ke mutabiq woh nashay ki haalat mein tha o ray giraftari ke baad is ka tibbi muaina kya gaya hai. Virginia national guard neh aik bayan mein mulzim ka naam Joshua philip Yabut bataya hai. is ki Umar 29 saal hai. is par ghair majaz fouji baktar band gaadi chalanay aur police ko –apne peechay bhaganay ke ilzaam mein muqadma darj kya gaya hai. bayan ke mutabiq is neh mangal ki shaam mamool ki tarbiati mashq ke douran mein fouji baktar band gaadi churaie thi aur woh ab wapas adday par pahuncha chuki hai. police tarjuman sarjnt kili hِl neh bataya hai ke is baktar band gaadi mein koi hathyaar nahi they. chori ki is anokhi waardaat mein kisi ke zakhmi honay ya kisi haadsa ki koi ittila nahi. is waqeye ke baad social media par mukhtalif rad-e-amal ka izhaar kya ja raha hai aur baaz logon neh fouji ki harkat ko pagal pan qarar diya hai
222.title: Riyasat Virginia mein baktar band gaadi chura bhagnay wala Amrici fouji girftar

news_detail: Vijayawada. Vijayawada ki aik khatoon ney 14 sala ladke ko jinsi taur par harasan kya. khatoon ke khilaaf jinsi aeza rasani se bachon ke tahaffuz se mutaliq qanoon POCOSO Act ke tehat muqadma darj karliya gaya hai aur na baligh bacha ko tibbi jaanch ke liye sarkari hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Nunna ki rehne wali 45 sala khatoon naay jummay ki shaam aik 14 sala ladke ke sath jinsi zayad-ti ka irtikaab kya. ladke ki walida naay khatoon ke khilaaf police mein shikayat darj karwai jis par waqea ka ilm honay par ladke ke khandan walon naay hamla kardiya. na baligh bachon ko jinsi badtamizion aur jinsi istehsal se muaser andaaz mein mehfooz rakhnay mazkoorah qanoon 2012 mein Manzoor kya gyatahm is qanoon ke tehat aik khatoon ki giraftari aik nadir waqea hai.
237.title: Vijayawada mein khatoon ki 14 sala bacha ko jinsi aeza rasani

news_detail: China ke sarkari Hackers ne Amrici behria ki raaz ki maloomat churali hain. Amrici media ki report mein daawa kya gaya hai ke Cheeni Hackers ne behria se mutaliq hassas noiyat ka data Hack karliya hai, jin mein nai noiyat ke aabdoz se daaghe jaane walay anti ship missile ki tayari ke khufia mansoobay bhi shaamil hain. report ke mutabiq Cheeni Hackers  ne Amrici behria ke kntriktr ka data Hack kya hai, jis mein intahi hassas noiyat ki maloomat shaamil hain. Amrici media kay mutabiq Hackrz ne new port road aayi land mein kaam karne walay Amrici behria ke kntriktr konshanh banaya aur data ke sath supersonic missile ke mansoobay se mutaliq maloomat bhi chori karli gayi. Hack kiye gay 614 giga bytes mawaad mein si drign Nami project aur aabdozon ke liye makhsoos unit ki electronic waar fear library se mutaliq maloomat shaamil hain. Amrici hakkaam ke mutabiq yeh Hackng January aur feb mein ki gayi, jabkay f bi aayi hassas data chori kiye jaane ke muamlay ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai. contractor ne jis ka naam zahir nahi kya gaya, Rohd Island ke Newport mein qaim behria ke zair samandar jungi markaz ke liye kaam karta hai. is ne aabdozon aur zair samandar ke jungi hathyar nizaam ki tahaqeeq aur furogh ka kaam kya tha. Pentagon ne si dragn ke barey mein ziyada jankari nahi di hai jisay 2012 mein lanch kya gaya tha
251.title: Amrici behria ka data chura liya gaya

news_detail: Jayashankar-Bhupally. Speaker Telangana assembly Mr. Madhusudan Chary khush qismati se sarrak haadsa mein bach gay. aaj zila mein Gannavaram moza ke qareeb un ke qaafla ki aik car ko laree ney takkar day di. police ney bataya ke Speaker Gannavaram mein raat mein qiyam ke baad Bhupally wapas lout rahay they ke yeh haadsa paish aaya. lohay ke pipes se ldi ke takaraane jaane se haadsa ke baais qaafla mein shaamil aik car sarrak ke aik kinare chali gayi aur car ka samnay ka hissa tabah hogaya. police ney kaha ke is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya gaya.
268.title: Speaker Assembly Telangana baal baal bach gay

news_detail: New Delhi. Junubi Delhi ke Chhatarpur ilaqa mein paish aeye aik Encounter mein Police ko matloob chaar Gangster Bashmole gang ka sarganah Rajesh Bharti halaak hogaye jabkay Delhi Police ke 8 mulazmeen bhi zakhmi hogaye. yeh gang aik form haoz mein panah li hui thi. Police ko is gang ke ilaqa mein naqal o harkat ke barey mein pata chala tha aur aaj subah operation shuru kya gaya tha jis mein gang ka sarganah Rajesh Bharti aur deegar teen arkaan ko goli markr halaak kardiya gya jabkay gang ka panchawan rukan shadeed zakhmi hogaya jisay hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Rajesh Bharti jis ke sir par aik laakh rupay ka inaam tha Haryana mein Police hirasat se faraar hogaya tha. is ke khilaaf sangeen juraim ke kayi muqadmaat darj they aur is ki kuch arsa se talaash jari thi. tassadum mein maaray jaany walay deegar teen ki shanakht Virdhu, Umesh Don aur Bheeku ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Police naay bataya ke gang ke un tamam arkaan ke khilaaf Delhi bhar mein qatal aur jabri raqmi vasuli ke kayi muqadmaat darj they. Police aur gang ke darmiyaan taqreeban adhay ghanta taq firing ka tabadlah hota raha
284.title: Delhi Police se tassadum mein 4 Gangsters halaak

news_detail: New Delhi. JNU student leader Umar Khalid ne Delhi Police mein shikayat darj karwai ke woh aur gujrat ke azad rukan assembly Jignesh miwani ko jaan se maardenay ki ek shakhs ne dhamki di hai jis ne khud ko gingstr Ravi Pujari ki hesiyat se muta-arif huva. Khalid ne tweet kya ke unhon ne Police tahaffuz talabb kya hai. unhon ne tweet kya ke ‘Jignesh aur un ko Ravi Pujari ki jaan se maardenay ki dhamki ke ziman mein Delhi Police se shikayat ki gayi. is ne kaha ke mein is ki hatt list mein hon! mein ne Police tahaffuz talab kya hai. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh wohi shakhs hai jis ne maazi mein feb 2016 mein aisi hi dhamki di thi’ aik Police ohdedar ne bataya ke kal Khalid dhamki par shikayat ke sath Police se rujoo hue aur aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai aur woh maamla ki tahaqeeq kar rahay hain. student- leader ne bataya” dhamkion ke talluq se inhen miwani ne bataya tha aur ab tak inhen koi cal masool nahi huva. Miwani ko guzashta do teen dinon se dhmkyan masool horahee hain. inhen masool aik cal mein caller ne mera naam bhi liya. is ne kaha ke agar hum tqririn karna band nah karen to maar diye jayen ge. miwani ne mujhe bataya aur mein Police se rujoo huva. Police ne muqadma darj karliya hai aur kaha hai ke woh dhamki ke jaiza len ge. miwani ne bhi kal kaha ke inhen Pujari se dhamkiyaan masool horahee hain. haliya dinon mein malik ke sarkardah aur dianatdar sahafion ko bhi dhmkyan di gayeen jin mein qabil zikar Ravish Kumar, Barkha Dutt, Rana Ayub qabil zikar hain.
295.title: Ab Jignesh aur Umar Khalid ko bhi jaan se maardenay ki dhamki

news_detail: Chennai. Chennai Airport par Dubai se anay wali aik khatoon musafir ko mobayyana tor par 13 kilogram sona maliati 4 crore rupay ghair qanooni tor par sath laane par girftar karliya gaya. customs ohdedaron neh bataya ke suit case mein chhupa kar rakhay gaye sonay ko zabt karliya gaya. tehqiqaat jari hain. ohdedaron neh bataya ke musafir ka talluq Karntaka se hai jo Dubai se ba zarea Air India flight Anna International Airport, Chennai pohanchi thi aur scanning mein qeemti dhaat ka pata chalne par musafir ko 9 : 00 bujey din girftar karliya gaya. commissionaire customs ke press release ke mutabiq hindustani passport ki haamil musafir Padma Ambe Venkat Ramaiah(52) saakin Chikmaglur Karntaka ko shuba ki bunyad par exit gate par rok diya gaya. musafir ko uljan mein dekh kar jo mushtaba andaaz mein chal rahi thi pooch gach ke liye rokkk diya gaya.
316.title: Chennai Airport par khatoon musafir se 13 kilogram sona zabt

news_detail: Makkah Mukrama se masool it-tila-aat ke mutabiq jummay ki shab aik ghair mulki Masjid Haram ki aik manzil se neechay kood kar jaan ki baazi haar gaya. Saudi Arab ki sarkari khabar rasan agency “Vas” ney Makkah region police ke tarjuman ke hawalay se bataya hai ke jummay ki shab taraveeh ke waqt hakkaam ko ittila mili ke aik namaloom ghair mulki shakhs Masjid al Haram ki balai manzil se Mataaf ke sehan mein kood gaya. zameen par girtay hi is ki wafaat ho gayi. mutwafi ka jsd khaki hospital muntaqil kar diya gaya hai jahan is ki shanakht aur balai manzil se koodnay ke asbaab jan-nay ke liye tehqiqaat jari hain. hakkaam is baat par herat ka izhaar kar rahay hain ke mutwafi ney balai manzil par aahinii jangla honay ke bawajood kyonkr chhalang lagai.
