Mutwafi ki umar 26 saal batayi jati hai jo aik nav muslim hai. is ney Masjid al Haram ki teesri manzil se kood kar apni jaan day di. is se qabal bhi feb 2017 mein aik Saudi shakhs ney khanah kaaba ke samnay khud par gasoleen chidak kar khud ko aag laga kar khud Suzi ki koshish ki thi taham sikoriti hakkaam ney is par qaboo pa liya tha aur se intahi iqdaam karne se baz rakha tha. isi terhan 17 feb 2015 ko bhi aik Asiankhatoon ney isi muqam se kood kar khud kashi ki thi.
335.title: Masjid e Haram mein khudkushi karne wala French navjawan jaan ki baazi hargya

news_detail: Shaam ke Deir ez-Zorshehar mein shiddat pasand tanzeem ‘ISIS’ ke aik hamla mein bsharalasd ki fouj ke brigid 11 ke sarbarah major general Ali alhsin aur tees deegar fojion ko halaak kardiya gaya hai. Shami hukoomat ke haami social media safhaat par hafata ke roz post ki gayi khabar mein kaha gaya ke insani haqooq observatory ny tasdeeq ki hai aur kaha hai ke Deir ez-Zor Governaorate ke shehar Abu Kamal mein ISIS aur Asad Nawaz malaysia jis mein hizab Allah aur dosray asiayi aur irani jangju shaamil hain ke darmain ghmsan ki jung jari hai. Observatory ke mutabiq fariqain ke darmain taaza larai mein brigid commander sameit 30 sarkari fouji halaak hogaye hain. khayaal rahay ke shaam mein kisi bhi brigid ke sarbarah ka taqarrur bsharalasd barah e raast karte hain aur field mein yeh fouj ka aala tareen ohda tasawwur kya jata hai. social media par anay wali khabron mein bataya gaya hai ke maqtool Shami fouji Afsar Ali alhsin Tartus Governorate ke Aldarikash shehar se talluq rakhtay hain
344.title: ISIS ke hamlay mein asdi fouj ka Brigade Commander aur 30 sipahi halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Deputy Chief Commissioner, Election Commission Of India Mr. Umesh Sinha ney aaj kaha ke Telangana mein intekhabaat ki tayyariyan sahih khutoot par jari hain aur aayndah intekhabaat mein har ahal voter ko Vote ka haq haasil honay ko yakeeni bananey ohdedar har ghar pohnchain ge. Chief Electoral Officer aur Telangana mein District Election Officers, Election ke liye achi tarha tayyar hain aur Election Commission Schedule jari kere ga. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke baad Mulk ki chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana mein bhi intekhabaat ke ineqad ka jaayiza lainay Election Commission of India ney Telangana ko aik Team Deputy Election Commissioner Mr. Umesh Sinha ki qayadat mein rawana kiya tha jis ney recognized political parties ke leaders aur District Collector aur Superintendent of Police ke alawa Election Commission ke ohdedaron se mulakaatein ki aur intekhabat ki tayarion ka mukhtalif paheloun se jaayiza liya. Apne do roza daura ke baad Secretriat mein apni team aur Chief Electoral Officer Telangana Mr Arjit Kumar ke sath akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mr. Umesh Sinha ney kaha ke voters ke naamon ki shumoliat se mutaliq siyasi partiyon ki janib se uthaye gaye tamam umoor ki yaksovi karne ki hidaayat di gayi hai. Unhon ney bataya ke riyasati Assembly 6

September ko tahleel kar di gayi thi aur Election Commission se aajilana intekhabaat ki khwahish ki gayi thi is liye hum soorat e haal ka jaiza lainay aur intekhabaat ki taiyarion ke baray mein aagahi haasil karne Telangana ka daura kiya. Unhon ney bataya ke team ke Delhi pahonchnay ke baad report Election Commission of India ko paish kar di jaye gi. Election Commission hi Telangana mein intekhabat ka faisla kere ga aur taareekh ka elaan kere ga. Unhon ney kaha ke siyasi partiyon ki janib se paish kardah khayalat aur khadshaat ko note kiya gaya hai aur intekhabi schedule ke baaray mein faisla karne hum apni report paish karen ge. Zilayi ohdedaron ko hidayat di gayi hai ke androon do haftay har eligible voter ko mauqa faraham kiya jaye aur ghaltion ki islaah ki jaye aur jin ahal raye dahinde ke naam hazaf kar diye gaye hain un ke naamon ki shumoliat ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Election Commission ki team ney pahelay din siyasi partiyon ke numayindon ke sath mulaqaat ki aur un ki aaraa haasil ki. Beshtar siyasi partiyon ney paishgi intekhabaat ki mukhalifat ki. Team ney azlaa mein intekhabaat ki taiyarion ka bhi jaiza liya. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai ke team ki report daakhil kardainay ke baad mukhtalif paheloun ka jayiza letay huwe Election Commission of India October ke dosray haftay mein elamia jari karsaktha hai aur November ke avaakhir mein polling hosakti hai jaissa ke karguzaar Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney tawaqqu zahir ki thi. Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Ajit Kumar ney kaha ke markazi team ney Chief Secretary Dr. S.K Joshi aur Secretary mehakuma dakhila aur intekhabaat ki taiyarion se munsalik deegar aala ohdedaron se mulaqaat ki. Unhon ney kaha ke riyasat mein Election Machinery, Eelection Commission ki hidaayat par schedule ke mutabiq intekhabaat karwanay tayyar hai.
196.title: Telangana mein intekhabat – Election Machinery tayyar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Riyasati Wazeer Information Technology & Municipal Administration & Urban Development Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ne Nizams Institute of Medical Sciences (NIMS) mein aaj10 crore rupay ki laagat se qaayim kardah apni noiyat ke munfarid Cancer Center ka iftitah kya. 50 beds par mushtamil iss Anchololgy Unit ko Megha Engineering Infrastructures Limited (MEIL) ne farogh diya hai jo Corporate Hospitals ke khutoot par tamam ultra modern sahulatoun se lais hai. Iss Center mein Intensive Care Unit mein 5 bistar hain jabkay mardon ke liye 12, khawateen ke liye 10 aur bachon ke liye 11 bistar rakhay gaye hain aur 12 bistaron par mushtamil Speciality Liekumiea ward bhi hai. 18,000 sft par muheet mukammal Airconditioned cancer center mein aik khusoosi Ancology Critical Care Unit (ACCU ) bhi hai. Cancer Center ki imarat ka kaam June 2017 mein shuru kya gaya tha jisay sirf aik saal ki muddat mein mukammal karliya gaya hai. MEIL hukkaam ke mutabiq saari imarat falls ceiling, LED lights se muzayyan aur, CC Cameras, Electrical Room aur aik bed lift se lais hai. ICU you mein Oxygen aur Vaccum Pressure sahoolat faraham ki gayi aur wards mein har dosray bistar ko Oxygen aur Vaccum saholaten faraham ki gayi hain. Iss imarat mein Doctors Room, Faculty Room, Store Room, Processing Room aur Staff Rooms ki bhi gunjaish rakhi gayi hai jo is Center ko kisi Cancer ke mareezon ko darpaish kisi bhi nagehani surat e haal se nimatnay ka ahal banata hai. Iss mauqa par wazeer e sehat Mr. C. Laxma Reddy, Chairman MEIL Mr. Pippi Reddy aur Co-founder & Managing Director MEIL Mr. Krishna Reddy bhi maujood thae.
211.title: NIMS mein ultra modern cancer center ka iftitah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Bharatiya Janata Party Mr. Amit Shah ne aaj  Telangana  mein Assembly ke liye party ki intekhabi muhim ka amlan aaghaz kardiya. BJP sarbarah Begumpet Airport se khusoosi Helicopter ke zariye Mehboob Nagar ke liye rawana hon ge jahan who ek jalsa se khitab karenge. Mr. Amit Shah ney Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao par sakht hamley karte huwe intekhabi muhim ka aaghaz kiya hai. Unhon ney Mr. Chandrashekar Rao par khushamdi siyasat karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Mehboob Nagar rawaangi se qabal Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe Mr. Amit Shah ney Mr. Chandarshekar Rao par All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen aur Left Parites ki imaa par kaam karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Unhon ney kaha ke agar TRS dobarah Iqtedaar par wapas aati hai to woh Vote Bank siyasat kere gi. Unhon ney istefsaar kiya ke aqliaton ke liye 12% tahaffuzaat ki tajweez paish karna  ‘khushamdi siyasat’ nahi hai? Woh jantay hain ke hamara dastoor mazhab ki asaas par tahaffuzaat ki ijazat nahi deta. Agar yahi hukoomat dobarah aaye gi to riyasat mein Vote Bank siyasat jari rahay gi. Sadar BJP ney KCR se ‘Aik Mulk aik intekhabaat’ par apna muaqqaf zahir karne ka mutaleba kiya aur kaha ke party jis ney ibtida mein bayak waqt intekhabaat ki himayat ki thi bad qismati se agay badh gayi aur iss ko bigaad diya aur Assembly ko tahleel kardiya. Unhon ney kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney aik choti riyasat ko do alhdah intekhabaat (Assembly aur Lok Sabha ) ke ikhrajat  bardasht karne par majaboor kardiya. Mr. KCR ney apne buland bangh waadon ko wafa nahi kiya hai. Mr. Shah ney Chief Minister par aam aadmi par maali boojh aayed karne aur tauham parasti mein mubtala honay ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke party Telangana mein tamam nashiston par muqaabla kere gi aur riyasat mein aik mazboot aur faisla kun taaqat ban kar ubhrey gi. Mr. Amist Shah aik roza daura par aaj subah yahan pahhonche hain aur woh Telangana mein Party ki intekhabi hikmat e amli aur intekhabi manshoor ke baaray mein reyasti qaayideen ko hidayat den ge. Sadar Telangana BJP Dr. K Laxman ke mutabiq BJP sadar mukhtalif groups ke hamrah ijlaas mein shirkat karen ge aur woh puranay shaher ki aik mandir ka bhi daura karen ge. Unhon ney bataya ke Mr. Amit Shah 10 din baad dobarah Telangana ka daura karen ge aur Karimnagar mein aik jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge.
228.title: KCR par hamlon ke sath Amit Shah ki intekhabi muhim

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukn e Parliament Hyderabad wo Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin  Owaisi ney Azaan International School mein aik masoom ladki ke sath jinsi zayadati ke case mein aaj Commissioner of Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar aur Dist. Collector Hyderabad Mr. M Raghunandan Rao se mulaqaat karte huwe School intezamia ke khilaaf District Education Officer ki tehqiqati report ki roshni mein sakht karwai karne aur aajilana  tehqiqaat karne ka mutaleba kiya. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Commissioner Police se khwahish ki ke maamla ki hsasasiat ko dekhte huwe case ki tehqiqaat CCS ke hawale ki jaye aur School mein tanseeb tamam Electronic devices zabt karliye jayen. Unhon ney School intezamia ke khilaaf bhi muqadma darj karne aur School ki kushadgi ki ijazat na dainey ka bhi mutaleba kiya hai. Barrister Asaduddin ke hamrah sabiq Rukn e Assembly Karwan wo Majlisi umeedwaar Mr. Kausar Mohiuddin ke alawa mutasirah ladki ke waalid aur dosray rishte daar bhi maujood thae. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Dist. Collector se bhi mulaqaat ki aur un se khwahish ki ke DEO ki report ki roshni mein School intezamia ke khilaaf sakht karwai ki jaye aur is baat ko yakeeni banaya jaye ke School ki dobarah kushadgi na hosaki. Ladki ke waalid ney baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh Sadar Majlis ke shukarguzar hain ke unhon ney shakhsi dilchuspi letay huwe na sirf Commissioner Police Hyderabad se numaindagi ki hai balkay Dist. Collector ke paas bhi pahonch kar numaindagi ki hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney teyqun diya ke khaati ko kaifar e kirdaar tak pahonchaya jayega aur School intezamia ke khilaaf bhi sakht se sakht karwai ko yakeeni banaya jaye ga. Yaad rahay ke kal School ke rubaru kiye jaaney walay muzahira ke dauran ehtejajyon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ki qayadat par School intezamia ki pusht panahi ka ilzaam aayed karte huwe naaray bhi lagaye thae. Ladki ke waalid ney bhi Majlis ke khilaaf barhami ka izhaar kiya tha taham raat mein Majlis ke sabiq Rukn e Assembly Mr. Kausar Mohiuddin ney mutasirah ladki ke ghar pahonch kar ahal e khandan se mulaqaat karte huwe is ghalat fahmi ka azaala kiya tha ke Majlis kisi bhi mulzim hatta ke School intizamia ki pusht panahi nahi kar rahi hai balkay Majalsi qiadat, mutasirah khandan ke sath hai jis par raat mein hi ladki ke waalid ney apni ghalti ka ehsas karte huwe majalsi qayadat se moazarat khawahi karli thi.
250.title: Azaan School case, Barrister Owaisi mutharrik

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress ke senior leader Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney aaj Rafale Deal par Modi hukoomat ko zabardast tanqeed ka nishana banatay huwe kaha ke Rafale Deal ko manzar e aam par laane se hukoomat guraiz kar rahi hai. Gandhi Bhavan Hyderabad mein Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe kaha ke Modi hukoomat aiwaan e Parliament mein Rafale Deal par kuch bstaney se qasir hai aur Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney khamoshi ikhtiyar kar rakhi hai is liye hum majaboor hain ke har riyasat pahonch kar Rafale Deal ke baarey mein awam se rujoo ho rahay hain. Unhon ney bataya ke 2007 mein hamari afwaaj ney mehsoos kiya ke Hindustan par aik taraf se China aur doosri taraf se Pakistan taaqatwar ho rahay hain. Is liye hamari UPA hukoomat ney hamari afwaaj ki difai salahiyaton ka jaiza letay hue Air Force aur wizarat difaa ki sifarshaat par 126 fighter planes kharidney ka faisla kiya hai. Hukoomat ney 12

Decemeber 2012 ko bainul aqwami tender ki kushadgi amal mein aayi thi. 6 Mumalik mein se aqal tareen qeematon ki peshkash karne wali Company Rafale ki thi. Is tender mein yeh shart bhi thi ke 18 fighters tayyar shuda sarbarah kiye jayen aur 108 fighters hamaray desh mein tayyar kiye jayen ge. Uss waqt yeh taye kiya gaya tha ke French Company mai yeh tayyaray difaa ke idaara Hindustan Aeronautic Limited (HAL) mein tayyar kiye jayen ge. Iss ka faydah yeh hoga ke hum jadeed tareen tayyaray apne taur par tayyar kar saken ge taakay dosray Mumalik se kharidney ki naubat nahi aaaye gi aur hamaray Engineers ko rozgaar faraham hoga. Unhon ney bataya ke 2013 mein mazakiraat ka aaghaz huwa aur 2014 mein HAL aur French Company Rafale ke darmiyan moahida bhi hogaya. Iss dauran hamari hukoomat chali gayi. Bharat yeh umeed kar raha tha ke iss Deal mein paishraft hogi. Unhon ney bataya ke April 2015 mein Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi France ka daura karte hain. Do din qabal jab Secretary Foreign Affairs se media ney poocha ke kiya Wazeer e Azam Rafale Deals par bhi tabadlah e khayaal karen ge to unhon ney kaha ke iss mauzo par guftagu nahi hogi aur un mamlaat mein pahelay jo kuch hochuka hai usi par amal hoga, lekin Wazeer e Azam baironi Mulk hi thae ke media mein yeh khabar aagai ke Wazeer e Azam ney is Deals  ko khatam kardiya aur 126 fighters ke bajaye sirf 36 fighters hi khareede jayen ge. Unhon ney 90 tayyaray kam kar diye. Is ki ittela kisi ko bhi nahi di gayi. Yahi nahi jab qeematon ki baat aati hai to sab ko hairat hogi ke is mein ghair mamooli izafah hogaya. Jis waqt hum ney Deal taye ki thi uss waqt un ki Currency ki qader ke mutabiq Hindustani rupay mein IL1 tayyarah 533 Crore rupay qeemat mein tha aur Modi Ji ney jis waqt yeh Deal ki tab isi tayyarah ki qeemat 1670 crore rupay hogayi. Qeematon mein teen guna izafah hogaya. Unhon ney difaa ki Company HAL mein tayyaron ki tayari ka thaika dainey ke bajaye aik khangi company ko dey diya. Yeh Hindustani awam ke liye tashweesh ka baayis hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 2007 mein jab Mulk ke liye 126 fighters ki zaroorat thi jab ke uss waqt China aur Pakistan se jung ke khatraat kam thae aur ab jabkay yeh khatrah badh gaya hai magar Modi hukoomat ney fighters ki tadaad ghatadi. Wazeer e Azam ney baironi Mulk ke daura se wapsi ke baad Committee ki dastakhat haasil kiye. Unhon ney istefsaar kiya ke khangi company ka kiya record hai. Kiya iss company ney pahelay koi iss maidan mein kaam kiya hai jabkay sarkari company ney ab tak 4060 tayyaray tayyar karchuki hai.
273.title: Rafale Deal, Mulk ki salamti se khilwaad: Ghulam Nabi Azad

news_detail: Hyderabad. City Commissioner of Police Mr. Anjani Kumar Hyderabad ney aaj kaha ke shaher mein Moohram aur Ganesh aik saath waqay honay ki wajah se is martaba hamein bahut ziyada tayyariyan karni padi hain taham un do Programon ke bhi pur aman insram ko yaqini bananay na sirf bhaari Police jamiat ko tainaat kiya gaya hai. Dono shaharon mein iss martaba Hyderabad aur bairon e Hyderabad ki 14,000 Police jamiat tainaat hai. Mr. Anjani Kumar kumar ney aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke mehakuma Police, GHMC deegar mahkuma jaat ke saath ishteraak karte huwe nuqaayes se pak intizamaat ko yakeeni bana raha hai. Unhon ne bataya ke mahkuma Police ke aala ohdedaron ne GHMC ke aala ohdedaron ke hamrah Ganesh juloos ke mabada Balapur taa visrarjan ke muqaam Hussainsagar jheel tak juloos guzarney ke tamam raaston ka muaayina o mushahida kiya. Mr. Anjani Kumar ney bataya ke is martaba Ganesh aur Moohram ek saath waqay honey ki wajah se South mein mukammal aur East Zone juzwi taur par Mohram ki sargarmian rahen gi iss liye hamari yeh koshish hai ke yeh dono juloos gudmud na honey paaye. Unhon ney bataya ke Murtiyon ke visarjan mein waqt ke zayan ke bachaney ke liye hum ne aik device ikhtiyar kiya hai jis ki madad se mortiyon ki visarjan mein sahoolat hogi aur waqt ki bachat hogi. Shehar ki sab se badi Ganesh moorti ‘Khairtabad Ganesh’ ke jald se jald visarjan ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Iss se pahlay visarjan ke dosray din raat ke waqt virsarjan huwa karta tha magar iss martaba hum iss ka visarjan jald karwana chahtay hain. Commissioner Police ney bataya ke har moorti ke sath Geo Tagging ki gayi hai jis se is moorti aur mandali se mutaliq tamam tafseelaat se aagahi haasil hojaye gi. Unhon ney bataya ke is technology ke zariye jo QR Code generate kiya gaya hai is ki scanning karte huwe hamaray officers apne cell phones par bhi tamaam tafseelaat haasil karlay saken ge.
289.title: Moohram aur Ganesh bandobast ki tayyariyan mukammal: CP

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union (TUWJU) ney wast October mein Urdu sahafion aur Union ke arkaan ka aik jalsa e aam munaqqid karne ka faisla kiya hai taakay Urdu sahafion ke saath jari lagataar na insafyon ke khilaaf aawaz uthatay hue hal talab masayil ki janib Hukoomat ki tawajah mabzool karai jasakay. Iss silsilay mein Union ke riyasti aur zilai zimma daraan ka aik ijlaas aaj Nobel Hall, Mustafa Tower, Lakdi ka pul mein munaqqid huwa jis mein jalsa e aam ki tayarion aur is ke kamyaab ineqaad ke liye istaqbalia committee ke saath deegar mukhtalif committees ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi. Jalsa e aam mein Urdu ki mashhoor o Maroof shakhsiyation ke alawa brsar iqtedaar wo oppostion partiies ke aala qaideen ko madoo karne ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein GO 239 par dubarah ghaor o khouz kya gaya. Yeh GO bilkhushoos Urdu sahafion ke mafadaat par zarb lagaata hai is liye Union ney hukoomat par is GO se dast bardari ke liye dabaau daalnay ka faisla kya hai. Iss silsilay mein masaayee ke liye mukhtalif iqdamaat uthaye jaayen ge aur aala ohdedaron se dubarah numayindagi ki jaye gi. Urdu sahafion ko double bedroom makanaat ki farahmi ko yakeeni bananay ke liye bhi iqdamaat par ghaor kya gaya aur accreditation card se mahroom sahafion ko bhi health card ki ijrayi ke liye mo-asir koshishon ke aaghaz ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein Union ke zilai sudoor aur deegar ohdedaron ney mukhtalif sathon par Urdu sahafion ke sath na-insafi aur sarkari ohdedaron ke taasub ki shikayat ki aur kaha ke iss rujhan ke sidd-e-baab ke liye mo-asar koshishon ki zaroorat hai. Bilkhusuoos sarkari idaron mein Urdu sahafion ke sath mutasub rawayya ikhtiyar kya jata hai jis ke khilaaf aawaz uthany ki zaroorat par zor diya gaya. Union ke ohdedaron ney Union ke aik Mujalla ki ishaat ka bhi faisla kya hai aur is silsilay mein bhi aik committee ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi hai. Sarparast Union janab Mohammad Sajid Meraj ney khitaab karte hue jalsa aam ke silsilay mein tashkeel di gayi mukhtalif committees ke zimma daraan se khwahish ki ke woh aik kamyaab jalsa aam ke ineqad ke liye tayarion ka fauri aaghaz kar dein. Unhon ney kaha ke Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke qiyam ka maqsad Urdu aur Urdu sahafion ki taraqqi aur falah o bahbood ko yakeeni banana hai aur Union iss mission mein musalsil sargaram hai. Pas e parda aur paish parda dono taraf Union ki sargarmian jari hain. Unhon ney Union ke zilai ohdedaran se khwahish ki ke woh Union ko mazboot se mazboot tar bananay ke liye anthik jad-o-jahad karen taakay mustaqbil mein iss ke samraat se na sirf maujooda Urdu Sahafi balkay Urdu sahafion ki aanay wali naslen bhi mustafeed hosakin. Union ke riyasati saddar janab Ather Moin ney apne khitaab mein phir aik baar tamam ohdedaran aur arkaan se appeal ki ke woh hamesha muttahid rahen kayunkay ittehaad hi hamein insaaf dilasakta hai. Unhon ney yaqeen dilaya ke Union, Urdu sahafion bilkhusoos apne arkaan ki falah o bahbood ke liye har mahaaz par sargarmi ke saath kaam kar rahi hai. Riyasati naayeb sadoor janab Mohammad Abdulhakeem aur janab Rawoof Aazmi, riyasati General Secretary janab Laeequddin aur riyasati Secretary Mirza Ghani Baig ney bhi ijlaas se khitaab kya. Union ke riyasati Secretary janab Rafeeq patel ki qiraat kalaam e pak se ijlaas ka aghaz amal mein aaya. Ijlaas mein Nayeb Sadar Mohammed Akbar Mohiuddin, Secretaries Mufti Mohammed Rayees Qasmi, Zubair Ahmed Khan , Khazin Syed Wajid Hussaini, arkaan e aamila Mohammad Riyazuddin, Mohammed Fazal Pasha, Mohammad Siraj Masood, Mohammad Yousuf , Syed Chand Pasha, Mohammad Siddiq , Mohammad Abdulazeem, Sheikh Jameel , Mohammad Ishaq Sohail, azlaa ke sudoor wo muatamadeen Syed Sajjad ul Hasnain, Syed Baqar, Syed yahya Pasha Quadri, Mohammad Muttabi Ali Khan , Mohammed Mohsin, Sheikh Mohsin, Sheikh Farhaad Khalil, Mohammed Abdul Azeem (Greater Hyderabad), Mohammad Irfan, Jafar Rasheed, Mohammad khaliluddin(Jagtial), Mohammad Sayeed Mohiuddin, Aleem Danish ( United Warangal), Mohammad Imtiazuddin (Medak) ), Sahkir Samad (Karimnagar), Mohammad Abid Ahmed (Asifabad), Mohammad Aleemuddin (Kamareddy),  Shahid Ahmed Tawakkal (Adilabad), Mohammad Usman (Nizamabad), Ashfaq Ahmed, Syed Amjad (United Nalgonda), Mohammad Ghaus (Nagar Kurnool), Mohammad Ilyasuddin (Siddipet) aur deegar azlaa ke zimma daraan ney shirkat ki .
301.title: TUWJU ka October mein jalsa e aam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rajya Sabha mein Leader of Opposition Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney kaha ke Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel sirf aur sirf Congress ki dain hai iss mein Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ka koi role nahi hai. Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney Hyderabad mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke alhaidah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel sirf aur sirf Congress Party ki wajah se huwi hai. TRS Party ka iss mein koi role nahi raha hai. Unhon ney kaha ke alhaidah riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye Telagana se talluq rakhney walay Party ke arkaan e Assembly, arkaan Qanoon Saaz Council aur Party ke ohdedaron ney Party qiyadat par zor diya tha ke alhaidah riyasat tashkeel di jaye jis par Congress Working Committee ke ijlaas mein ghaor o khoz kiya gaya. Congress Working Committee ke ijlaas mein iss khusoos mein qarar daad manzoor ki gayi aur phir Dr, Manmohan Singh ki hukoomat ney aik qanoon ki tadween karte huwe Praliament ke dono aiwanon mein is ko Manzoor kerwatay huwe naayi riyasat ki tashkeel ko yakeeni banaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke TRS chahtay huwe bhi Telagana riyasat tashkeel nahi dey sakti hai. Yeh sirf Congress hi hai jis ney alhaidah Telagana riyasat ko tashkeel diya hai. TRS ka yeh daawa ke Telagana is ki wajah se tashkeel paaya hai ghalat hai. Yeh poochney par ke chaar saal baad ab aap yeh daawa kyun kar rahay hain twanhon ney kaha ke Media ney is khosos mein chaar saal baad sawal kiya hai is liye woh ab haqeeqat bata rahay hain.
320.title: Telangana riyasat Congress ki dain: Azad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Islam mein Yaum e Ashora ki badi ahmiyat o ifadiyat hai. Isi din kayi anbiya-e karaam par Rabb e kaayenaat ka fazl wa karam huwa hai. Mohram ki 10 tareekh ko Yaum e Ashora ki munasibat se Sunni hazraat roza rakhtay hain jabkay ahal e tashayo wo tafzilee hazraat nawasa e Rasool sale Allah alaihi wasallam hazrat Syedna Hussain ibn Ali aur un ke khanwadah aur Ansar ki shahadat ka maatam karte hain. Isi munasibat se agarchay shaher ke mukhtalif muqamat par shiyayee aqayed ke mutabiq Alam aur Taziye nikalay jatay hain taham puranay shaher mein markazi maatami juloos nikala jata hai. Sadiiyon se chali aa rahi riwayaat ke mutabiq iss markazi maatami juloos ka markaz e nigah ”Bibi ka Alam” hota hai jo haathi par baraamad hota hai. Yeh Alam din mein Dabirpura mein waqay Alawa Bibi se baraamad hota hai aur mukhtalif aashorkhaanoon se guzarta huwa barah Charminar, Chadarghat par ekhtataam pazeer hota hai. Yeh Bibi ka Alawa pahelay Qutub Shahi daur mein Qila Golconda mein waqay tha jisay baad azan Asif Jahi daur e hukoomat mein maujooda muqam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Iss Alam ke baaray mein yeh kaha jata hai ke iss Alam mein lakdi ka aik tukda hai jis ke baaray mein yeh daawa kya jata hai ke woh Khatoon e Jannat, Batool e Rasool sale Allahu alaihi wasallam hazrat Bibi Fatima ko ghusal maiyat diya gaya tha. Iss Alam ko kayi Shahoon ney qeemti nazraane paish kiye hain. Nasir ud Dowla ney heere Nazar kiye they. Nizaam haftum Mir Osman Ali Khan Bahadur ney apni waalida mohtrama ki yaad mein iss Alam ko 6 Adad qeemti heere aur jawahraat nazar kiye thae. Agarchay yeh Alam ahal e tashayyo ki janib se unhi ki riwayaat ke mutabiq nikala jata hai magar is ke mutwalli aik Sunni hain.

Iss markazi maatami juloos ke hamrah ahal tashayyo nange paiir chaltay hue shuhda e Karbala se apni aqeedat ka izhaar karte hain. Maatami giroh juloos ke sath sath chaltay hue noha padhte hain jabkay azaa daaron ki toliyan neem barhena hokar zanjeeri wo khooni maatam karte hue apne jism ko gazind pahonchate hue shuhda e Karba e ahal Baiyt athaar se apni waraaftgi wo aqeedat ka izhaar karte hain. Juloos ke Charminar par pahonchanay par Deputy Commissioner of police South Zone Police Mr. M. V. Satyanarayana ney dhatti chadhai. Shaher mein aaj ke din ki munasibat se jagah jagah sabilein lagai gayi theen aur logon mein sharbat taqseem kya gaya. Kayi Masajid mein waqea Karbalaa par khusoosi programmes ka ehtimaam karte hue falsafah e shahadat ko paish kya gaya hai. Yaum e Ashora ki fazeelat ki munasbat se aaj nafil roza bhi rakha gaya. Mahkuma Police ki janib se naqayis se pak bandobast kya tha jabke GHMC aur Water Board ki janib se bhi julusion ki sahoolat ke liye khusoosi intizamaa kiye gaye thae. Maatam karne walon ki marham patti ke liye mukhtalif Hospitals ki janib se Medical Team tainaat ki gayi theen.
333.title: Yaum e Ashora, tareekhi Bibi ka Alam ka juloos

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher ki aik muqami adalat ney jumaraat ke din ohdidaro n ko hadaayat di ke Paradise Group se talluq na rakhnay wali un tamam Hotels ke Boards nikaal dein jo Paradise ke naam se hain jis ki taameel mein kal aur aaj Paradise ke naam se chalaye janey wali un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie jo Secunderabad mein waqay Paradise Hotel ke malikeen ke group ”Paradise Group” se talluq nahi rakhtay. Adalati ehkaam par un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie gaye jinhon ney ghair qanooni taur par apni Hotels ke naam ‘Paradise’ ke naam par khe thae. Paradise group of Hotels ki janib se aik darkhwast dair karte hue ilzaam aayed kya gaya tha ke shaher mein kayi Hotels un ki Hotel ka naam istemaal karte hue chalaye jarahi hain jin mein food courts se le kar Hotels tak shaamil hain. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya tha ke aisi Hotels ki jaanib se un ke brand ka ghalat istemaal kya ja raha hai jis se Paradise Group ka waqar mutasir ho raha hai. Adalati ehkaam par ghair majaz naam istemaal karne wali un Hotels se signboards ko na sirf nikaal diya balkay is naam ke labels aur food items ko bhi zabt karliya. Paradise Group shaher mein Paradise ke naam se Hotels ka aik chain chalata hai, is ki Biryani duniya bhar mein mashhoor hai. Iss Group ney Hotels chalanay ke liye Paradise ke naam ka copy right aur logo ka registration haasil karliya hai jis ke baais dosray Paradise ke naam aur iss se mushabihat rakhnay walay andaaz bhi ikhtiyar nahi kar saktay.
346.title: Paradise naam ka ghair majaz istemaal, Hotels ke signboard hata diye gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Azaan International School ke aik mulazim par kamsin bachi ke sath ziyadati ke ilzam ke tanazur mein mahkuma e taleem ki janib se ta hukm e saani idaare ki kushadgi par rok lagadene se pareshan talba ke Parents ney mustaqbil ka laiha amal tayyar karne aaj yahan aik mushawarti ijlaas munaqqid kya jis mein aik hazaar se zayed Parents ney shirkat ki. Ijlaas mein Azaan International School mein zair e taleem deegar bachon ke mustaqbil ke baaray mein aik mabsoot hikmat e amli tayyar karne Parents ki Association qaayim karte hue iqdamaat karne ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein shirkat karne walay auwliyaye talba ney ittefaq raaye se arkaan aamila par mushtamil aik Adhoc Committee tashkeel di hai. Iss Executive Committee ney ijlaas mein mazkoorah waqea ke tanazur mein ghalib halaat ka jaayiza liya. Ijlaas mein Azaan School ki ladki ke saath 14

September ko paish aaye waaqea ki muzammat ki gayi aur tamaam Parents ney kamsin ladki aur is ke arkaan e khandan ke sath izhaar e hamdardi kya. Association ko walidain aur auwlia e talba ney bashmole intizami khamion ke School Administration ke talluq se kayi shikayaat keen aur intizamia ke mutkabbirana rawayya ki shikayat ki. Adhoc Committee ney Parents  ko yaqeen dilaya ke bachon ke sarpraston ki tamam shikayaat ki yaksoi ke liye thos iqdamaat kiye jayen ge. Ijlaas ka yeh ehsaas tha ke School ki ghair muayana muddat ke liye School ki masdoodi se School mein zair e taleem bachon ki na sirf taleem mutasir ho rahee hai balkay un ke azhaan par manfi asraat bhi pad rahe hain. Ijlaas mein Executive Committee ko yeh ikhtiyar diya gaya hai ke masla ki yaksoi ke liye tamam mutaliqa Authorities bashmool District Education Officer, District Collector aur mahkuma taaleem ke aala ohdedaron se rujoo hotay hue aajilaana taur par qaabil e qubool hal talaash kya jaye aur zaroorat padney par qanooni charah joyi bhi ki jaye taakay munazzam aur mehfooz mahol mein bachon ki taleem ka silsila jari reh sakay. Prents ki tanzeem ney maamla ki tehqeeq karne walay Police ohdedaron ki satayish ki aur un se izhaar tashakkur kya aur umeed zahir ki ke haqayiq ka pata chalate hue khaati ko qarar e waqai saza dilae jaye gi.
202.title: Azaan International School ki adam kushadgi, Parents pareshan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Governor Telangana & Andhra Pradesh Mr. E. S. L. Narsimhan ne Ameerpet interchange station se Ameerpet. L B Nagar route par Metro Services  ko jhandi dikhayi. Passengers aaj shaam 6:00 bajey se iss route par Metro Train mein safar kar saken ge. Governor Mr. Narsimhan ne Train ko jhandi dikhaane ke baad Minister Municipal Administration & Urban Development Mr. K. T. Rama Rao, Rukn e Parliament wo sabiq markazi Wazeer Mr. Bandaru Dattariya aur deegar ke hamrah L. B. Nagar Station tak Metro Train ke safar se mahzooz hue. Iss mauqa par khitaab karte hue Governor ne shahrion se appeal ki ke woh ziyada se ziyada Metro Train ka istemaal karen is se na sirf aloodgi mein kami aeye gi balkay eendhan ki bhi bachat hogi aur waqt ki bhi bachat hogi. Mr. Narsimhan ne kaha ke mein ne Hitect City route ke liye 15

December ki tareekh muqarrar ki thi. Wazeer baldi nazm o nasq wo shahri taraqiat Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ne kaha ke Hyderabad Metro, Mulk mein sab se behtar hai. Unhon ne kaha ke darasal iss route par Metro Train ka aaghaz guzashta mah hi hona chahiye tha taham commissionaire Metro Rail safety clearance mein takheer ki wajah se ab iss route par Train ka aaghaz kya ja raha hai. Baad azaan Governor ne Wazeer aur deegar senior ohdedaron ke hamrah Khairatabad Station se cycle istemaal karte hue Raj Bhavan wapas lautay.
218.title: Ameerpet-L B Nagar route par Metro Rail ka aaghaz

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn e Lok Sabha Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne aaj kaha ke hukoomat yeh ta-assur dainay ki koshish kar rahi hai ke Talaq Biddah(bayak waqt teen Talaq) Muslim khawateen ko adal dilaata hai jabkay haqeeqat is ke khilaaf hai. Iss Ordinance ke nifaaz ke baad se Muslim khawateen ki zindagi ajeeran ban jaye gi. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne aaj daralslam mein aik press conference se khitaab karte hue kaha ke is Ordinance ki ru se shawahid ki farahmi shikayat kunindah khatoon ke supurd ki gayi hai jo iss ke liye nihayat hi mushkil hai. Isi tarha iss Ordinance ke mutabiq Talaq dainay wala shohar, apni mutalqa biwi aur bachon ke liye Maintenance ada karne ka paband hoga. Unhon ne istegfsaar kya ke jab kisi fard ko teen baras ke liye jail ki saza suna di jati hai to woh kaisay jail mein rehtay hue mutalqa biwi aur bachon ke masarif ada karne ka mukallif hoga? Aur jab woh shakhs teen saal ki saza bhugat kar jail se bahar aaye ga to kya yeh khatoon iss ka istaqbaal kar paye gi aur woh kya usay qubool karle ga? Jail ki saza khatam honay ke baad kya yeh dono aik khushaal zindagi basar kar paeinge? Unhon ne kaha ke agar hukoomat ko waqai aisi Muslim khawateen se hamdardi hai to usay chahiye ke aisi khawateen ke roz marrah ke akhrajaat ki pabajayee sarkari khazana se kare aur iss ke liye ibtida mein 500 crore rupay ka fund manzoor kare. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke 2011 ki mardum shumari ke adaad wo shumaar ke mutabiq Mulk mein 24 lakh khawateen aisi hain jin ke shohar ne nah hi Talaq di aur nah hi un ki kifalat ki zimma daari bardasht ki hai. Un khawateen mein 22 lakh khawateen ghair Muslim hain. Hukoomat itni kaseer khawateen ke saath hamdardi ka muzahira kyun nahi kar rahi hai? Un ke liye kuch kayun nahi karti? Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke ghair fitri jinsi af-aal aur badkaari jo ab tak taazeeri juraim thae, Supreme Court ne inhen ghair taazeeri qarar dete hue jaayez qarar dae diya hai aur Nikah jo islam mein aik moahida hai jo deewaani noiyat ka haamil hota hai iss maamla mein taazeeri saza tajweez ki jarahi hai. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke yeh ajeeb baat hai ke agar koi ghair Muslim apni biwi ko chod deta hai to iss ko aik saal ki saza hai aur ab wohi fayel koi Muslim karta hai to uss ke liye teen saal ki saza muqarrar ki gayi hai. Unhon ne istefsaar kya ke aik jaisay jurm ke liye saza mein imtiyaaz kayun barta gaya hai. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein yeh wazahat ki ke Talaq e Biddah par Muslim khawateen Adalat e Uzma se rujoo nahi hui balkay Adalat e Uzma ke sabiq judges ne jo aik Hindu ladki ke apne walidain ki jayidadon mein uss ke hissa ke liye daayer kardah darkhwast par faisla sunaate hue yeh kaha tha ke Muslim khawateen ke sath bhi na-insafi horahee hai aur hum iss ko mafaad e aamma ki darkhwast mutasswur karte hue is ki samaat karen ge aur phir kuch NGOs aur kuch Muslim khawateen adalat se rujoo hue. Yeh wohi judge sahiban thae jinhon ne SC, ST ke khilaaf mazalim ki rok thaam ke qanoon par faisla diya tha. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke darasal Modi hukoomat sangeen awaami masayel jaisay corruption, mehengai waghera se awam ki tawajjuh hataane Talaq salasa ke masla ko istemaal kar rahi hai. Maulana Khalid Saifullah Rahmani ne kaha ke dastoor mein yeh wazahat ki gayi hai ke aisay qawaneen jo pehlay se mojood hain aur dastoor ke khilaaf nahi hon ge woh barqarar rahen ge. Shariat Application Act 1937 ko bhi isi liye barqarar rakha gaya tha aur qanoon ke tehat yeh tamaniat di gayi ke musalmanoon ke aayli 10 masail ki jin mein Nikah aur Talaq bhi shaamil hain, yaksoi sharai ehkaam ke mutabiq hogi. anho n ne kaha ke chor darwaaza ke zareya yeh Ordinance manzoor kya gaya hai. Jab is khsoos mein bil parliment mein paish kya gaya to oppostion partiyon ne is par aitraaz kya tha aur is ka jaiza lainay ke liye Slect committee se rujoo karne ki sifarish ki thi. unhon ne kaha kay Slect Committee se rujoo karne ki soorat mein bill ke barey mein aaraa paish karne ki Musalmanoon ko sahoolat haasil hoti thi magar Ordinance ki manzoori se qabl Modi hukoomat ne Musalmanoon ke ulama wo danishwaron se mushawarat karna munasib nahi samgha hatta ke Muslim khawateen ki kisi anjuman se bhi hukoomat ne mushawarat nahi ki. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari rukan Muslim Personal Law Board ne bataya ke Board ne Ordinance ke khilaaf kal shaam aik jalsa aam Darussalam Ground par rakha hai jis se Muslim personal law board ke zimma daar, ulama, mshaykhin aur Ikaber khitaab karen ge.
229.title: Talaq Ordinance se Muslim khawateen ki pareshaniyan badhengi: Asad Owaisi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress ki zair e qayadat siyasi mahaz se naakhush Professor Kodandaram ki Telangana Jana Samithi Party ab doosri raahein talaash kar rahe hain. TJS sarbarah ab BJP ki nazrain bichaya huwe hain. Congress ki zair qayadat siyasi mahaaz ney jise azeemtar ittehaad par mahmol kiya ja raha hai, TJS ko 3 nashiston se ziyada chodney par amaada nahi hai. Zaraye ke mutabiq Professor Kondandaram ab zafrani party ki janib nazrain bichaya huwe hain. Yeh afwaah bhi gasht kar rahi hai ke Professor Kodandaram ney Bharatiya Janata Party ke senior quied Mr. Bandaru Dattatreya se khufia mulaqaat kar chukay hain. Nau tashkil shuda Telangana Jana Samithi jo paheli martaba intekhabi siyasat mein hissa lainey jarahi hai ibtida mein yeh daawa kiya tha ke Telangana ki tamam nashiston par apne umeedwaar khada kere gi magar yeh dekha ja raha hai ke TJS ke banner par muqaabla karne ke liye koi taaqatwar umeedwaar agay nahi aaraha hai. Surathaal ko bhaanp letay huwe Professor Kodandaram ney siyasi ittehaad karne ki koshish ki magar un ki partiyon ko mukhalif TRS Parties ziyada ahmiyat nahi dey rahi hain. Unhon ne haal hi mein yeh bayan diya tha ke TJS tanha TRS ko shikast dainey ke mauqqaf nahi hai taham kayi Assembly halqon mein woh tawazun par asar andza ho sakti hai, isi liye woh TRS hukoomt saazi se rokney ke liye deegar parties ke sath intekhabi mafahmat karna chahti hai. Ab deikhna yeh hai ke BJP, TJS ke sath mafahmat ke liye amaada hoti hai ya nahi aur hoti hai to woh kitni nashiston ki peshkash karti hai.
249.title: Prof Kodandaram ki ab BJP par nazrain

news_detail: Hyderabad. Charminar par safai aur sthrayi ko yakeeni bananay Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) ke iqdamaat ke samraat haasil honay shuru hogaye hain. Markazi hukoomat ney tareekhi imarat’ Charminar’ ko soch Bharat mission ke tehat ‘Special Swach Iconic  Places’ qarar diya hai. Peenay ke pani aur safai ki wizarat 2

October ko New Delhi mein Commissioner GHMC Mr. M. Dana Kishore ko Swach Bharat Mission ke chaar sala tqarib mein yeh award paish kere gi. Charminar ko dosray marhala mein Swach Iconic Places mein shaamil kya gaya hai. Aik arsa se nazar andaaz kiye janay ke baad Charminar Pedastrian Project ko maujooda Telangana hukoomat ney shuru kya tha aur iss par khusoosi tavajjhu di thi. Iss Project ke kaam aik waqt taizi se shuru hue thae magar aik baar phir yeh sust rawi ka shikaar hogaya hai .
281.title: Charminar ko qaumi award

news_detail: Hyderabad. Azaan International School Tolichowki mein na baaligh ladkiyon ke jinsi istehsal ke 2 waqeaat se nakhush High Court ne hafta ke din Commissioner School Education ko hidayat di ke imkanaat talaash kare ke School intizamia ko kis tarha mehkuma ki raast nigrani mein laya ja sakta hai. Adalat ul Aalia ne Commissioner School Education se kaha ke adalat ko peer tak iss baaray mein aagah kiya jaye. Azaan School ke aik taalib e ilm ke waalid Mir Yousuf Ali ki dair kardah aik darkhwast par Mr. Justice A Rajshekar Reddy ne yeh hidayat di. Darkhwast mein bayan kya gaya ke AP Educational Institutes Rules 1993 aur GO MS No. 1 of 1994 ki khilaaf warzi karte hue School chalanay par School ke Chairman aur Principal ke khilaaf koi karwai nahi ki gayi. Darkhwast guzar ki janib se paish hotay hue wakeel janab abdalmtin Qureshi ne bataya ke kisi qisam ke ahteyati iqdamaat kiye baghair taqreeban 2, 000 talba ke saath School chalaya ja raha hai. Unhon ne adalat ko aik na baaligh Taliba ke sath jinsi ziyadati ke waqea se Adalat ko waaqif kerwatay hue kaha ke phlay case mein FIR ke indraaj ke baad dosray din aisa hi aik aur waqea report huwa hai. Yeh do waqeaat zahir karte hain ke intizamia, idaara chalanay ka ahal nahi hai. Justice Rajshekar ne darkhwast mein bayan kardah nukaat par rad-e-amal zahir karte hue sharamnaak waqeat par naagawari ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke bachon ki salamati ke paish e nazar iss maamla ko aajilaana taur par nimtany ki zaroorat hai. Judge ne aayindah samaat peer ko muqarrar karte huve Commissioner se kaha ke School ko mehkuma ke raast nigrani mein laanay ke iqdamaat ki tajweez ke sath adalat se rujoo hoon.
299.title: Azaan School ko raast nigrani mein lainay ka Laiha amal paish kya jaye: HC

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq sadar JNU Students Union Dr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke Mulk ko aik aur ghulami ki taraf dhakelnay ki mansoobah band koshishen ki jarahi hain jis ke hissa ke taur par hamare azhaan par qabza kya ja raha hai. Hamari sochon ko firqa parast banaya ja raha hai. Jhooti baatein phailai jarahi hain aur aisa maahol tayyar kya ja raha hai ke hum khud hi qusoor waar samajh batayein. Dr. Kanhaiya Kumar yahan Sundarayya Vignan Kendra mein ”Safeguarding the Constitution” par extension lecture dey rahay thae jis ka ihtimaam roznama Siasat ney kya tha. Janab Zahid Ali Khan Editor Siasat ney taqreeb ki sadarat ki. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke hamaray zahnon ko ghair haqeeqi baaton ko qubool kar lenay ke liye amaada karne mutwatir ghalat baaton ko phailaya ja raha hai. Pahlay entertainment industry ko istemaal kya gaya. Sachin Tendulkar ke zareya invertor baichnay ki koshish ki gayi to kabhi yeh daawa kya gaya ke Fair and Lovely laganay se chahrhay ka rang gora hota hai to kabhi ghee ko khalis desi gaaye ke ghee ke naam se Patanjali ka ghee baicha jata hai. Unhon ney kaha ke ab apne maqasid ko panay ke liye zaraye ablaagh ko istemaal kya jany laga hai. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke Mulk ko Parliamani jamhoriat ki bajaye sadaarati jamhoriat ki taraf dhakela ja raha hai. Iss ka asal maqsad Corporate shoba mein maujood apne chand doston ko faida pahunchana hai. Iss tarha iss Mulk ko khamoshi se dictatorship ki taraf dhkela ja raha hai. Yeh sawal khada kya ja raha hai ke Modi nahi to kaun? Unhon ney kaha ke yeh Congress ke muntakhib arkaan e Parliament par inhisaar karta hai ke Wizarat e Uzma ke ohda ke liye woh apnon mein se kis ka intikhab karte hain. Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke Modi se qabal aisa sawal kya kabhi poocha gaya? Unhon ney kaha ke Telivision Channel par teen hazaar rupay ada karte hue aik aisay fard ko laya jata hai jis ke sar par topi aur chehra par daadhi saji hoti hai, jis ko Musalmanoon ka numayinda banaya jata hai aur iss ke muqabil aik aisay shakhs ko laya jata hai jis ki peshani par aik lamba sa tilak hota hai jo Hindus ka numainda ban kar baithta hai aur darmyaan mein anchor hota hai aur yeh tenun bahes karte hain ke Mulk ka Wazeer e Azam kaun hona chahiye aur un do kiraye ke tatton ki raaye ko do firqoun ki raaye par mahmool kya jata hai. Unhon ney kaha ke aik saazish ke tahet jis mein media ka ahem rule hai, awam ko darpaish asal masayel ki taraf se tavajjoh hataane ke liye ghair ahem mauzuaat ko cheda jata hai aur be faiz mubahis kiye jatay hain. Jabkay asal masayel yeh hain ke iss Mulk ka naujawan be rozgaar hai, kisanon ko un ki fasal ki aqal tareen qeematein nahi mil parhi hain aur woh khud kashi kar rahay hain, awam ke crore ha rupay bankon se karzzzz le kar log Mulk se faraar ho rahay hain. note bandi aur jee s tea ki aarr mein ameer ghranon ko fayida pahonchaya ja raha hai. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke hamein mantaqi baheson mein uljhaya ja raha hai taakay asal masayel ki janib hamari tavajjoh mabzol na honay paye jis ke liye hamaray zahnon ko firqa parast banaya ja raha hai. Mahol kuch aisa paida kya jarha hai ke hum be rozgari, badunwanyon aur Mulk ki salamti jaisay ahem masayel ki taraf tavajjoh dainay ki bajaye, firqa parasti ka shikaar ban kar nafrat ka muzahira karne lagen. Unhon ney kaha ke Modi hukoomat mein guzishta saadhe chaar barson mein aisay aisay siyah karname anjaam diye gaye hain ke un ka ihata karna mushkil hogaya hai. Unhon ney kaha kay Britishers ney Mulk par hukmarani karne ke liye phoot daalo aur hukoomat karo ka harba ikhtiyar kia tha aur aaj unhin ki policy ko agay badhate hue tavajjoh hatao aur hukoomat karo ki policy ko ikhtiyar kya gaya hai. Inn dinon yeh koshishen ki jarahi hain ke Dastoor ki rooh ko khatam kardiya jaaye jis ke zariye chand makhsoos gharanon ko fayeda pahonchaya jaaye. Students leader ney kaha ke aaj zaroorat iss baat ki hai ke hum un saazishon ka shikaar ban’nay ki bajaye hum mein ittehaad paida karen aur Mulk ko nuqsaan pahoanchanay wali taqaton ke khilaaf uth khaday hon. Nafrat ka jawab nafrat se nahi diya ja sakta zahanat se dena hoga aur aapasi mohabbat ke zareya hamein yeh saabit karna hoga ke hum jazbati naaron ka shikaar nahi banin ge. Lecture ke baad samayeen ke sawalaat ke jawabaat dete hue kaha ke Mulk mein nafrat ka jo mahol peda kya ja raha hai is ke pas e parda saazish ko samjhna hoga. Ab yeh waqt munasib nahi hai ke Rahul ya Owaisi ji se sawal kya jaye balkay yeh waqt Modi se sawal karne ka hai, unn se aik aik paayi ka hisaab poochnay ka hai. Editor Siasat janab Zahid Ali Khan ney sadarat ki aur kaha ke Hyderabad Ganga Jamuni tahzeeb ka aik qadeem shaher hai. Yahan ke log aapas mein mil jul kar aisay rehtay aaye hain jaisay chaar so barson se Charminar, apne haath uthaye yeh dua kar rahay hon ke ae parwardigaar Hindu, Muslim, Sikh aur Eisaai ko yahan phalnay phoolnay ka mauqa faraham kere. Jabkay sabiq Rukn e Parliament Mr. Aziz Pasha aur riyasati Secretary CPI Mr. Chada Venkat Reddy ney bhi mukhatib kya.
312.title: Hamaray azhaan par qabza ki koshishen: Kanhaiya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Caretaker Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ney un se numayindagi karne walay Jamat e Islami ke wafad ko yeh tayaqun diya ke Telangana Rashtra Samithi apne intikhabi manshoor mein Aqliaton ke liye Sub Plan ka elaan kere gi aur Aqliaton ki behbood ke liye mawazna mein khatir khuwa gunjaish faraham ki jaye gi.
328.title: Aqliaton ke liye Sub Plan rakhney KCR ka Jamat e Islami se wada

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jamat e Islami ke wafad ki Caretaker Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao se mulaqaat ke chouthay din hi Congress leaders ka aik wafad captain Uttam Kumar ki qayadat mein Jamat e Islami ke daftar pahonch gaya aur aayindah intikhabaat ke ziman mein Jamaat ki taayid talab ki. Congress Leaders ney taqreeban teen ghanton tak tabadlah khayaal kiya. Jamat e Islami ke ohdedaron ke sath malik ke siyasi halaat aur muslim masail par tafseeli guftagu ki. bataya jata hai ke Jamat e Islami ke leaders ney Congress leaders par yeh wazeh kardiya ke Congress, badhti firqa parasti ke paish e nazar Hindutwa ke taiyen naram gosha ikhtiyar kya aur soft Hindutwa ka muzahirah karne lagi hai. Alawa azeen Shariat mein mudakhlat ki koshisho ko hum bardasht nahi kar saktay. Baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Captain Uttam Kumar ney kaha ke Jamat e Islami aik badi tanzeem hai aur Nusalim par is ka aaccha asar hai. Hum ney jamaat ke leaders se kaha ke Telangana mein aayindah intikhabaat se qabal yeh baat malhooz rakhen ke moodi ki hukoomat tashkeel paney ke baad malik ke halaat kya rukh ikhtiyar kiye hain. malik mein musalmanoon par hamlon mein izafah huwa hai. Agar aayindah intikhabaat mein bhi woh Iqtidaar par aajay gi to Constitution mein hi tarmeem kar dein ge. captain Uttam Kumar ney kaha ke hum ney jamaat ke leaders se kaha ke inhen yeh faisla karna hai ke Telangana Assembly riyasat mein konsi party ko Iqtidaar tafweez karna chahiye chunkay is ke asraat aam intikhabaat par bhi parney walay hain. Ameer Jamat e Islami Hind halqa Telangana & Odhisa janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney kaha ke ijlaas mein Congress leaders ke sath awam ko darpaish masail aur Muslimske masayil par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya aur hum ney hamari jamaat katayyar kardah demand of charter paish kiye aur iss ke ahem nukaat par tabadlah khayaal kiya jin mein qaabile zikar Minorities ke liye sub-plan, tahaffuzaat ki farahmi aur taleemi farogh ke sath sath iqtesaadi taraqqi ke iqdamaat shaamil hain. unhon ney bataya ke hum mukhtalif partiyon se tabadlah khayaal ki rudaad aur partiyon ke intikhabi manshoor ko malhooz rakhtay hue apni report markazi aur qayadat ko rawana kar dein ge aur markaz ki Hadayat ki roshni mein hum yahan apna muaqqaf paish karen ge. is mauqa par Mr. Mohammad Ali Shabir aur Abid Rasool Khan bhi maujood thay
345.title: Jamat e Islami ke daftar Congress leaders pahonch gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizam Hyderabad ke mashhoor Khilwat (Chowmahalla Palace) ki tazaeen e nau ka kam taiz raftari ke sath jari hai. Yeh Palace jis mein 4 chhootay chhootay mahal hain, sayyahon ke liye nihayat hi purkashish hai. Iss ki azmat e rafta ki bahaali ke liye haal hi mein Belgium ke 19 fanoos dobarah latakaye gaye hain. Mahal ki taameer taqreeban 200 saal pahelay huwi thi. Yeh Mahal apne anokhay andaaz ke tarz e taameer ke liye mashhoor hai. Iss mein tamam sarkari taqarib bashmool Nizam ki takht nasheeni ki taqarib bhi huwa karti theen. Is ke tahaffuz aur tazaeen e nau ka kaam taqreeban mukammal hogaya hai. Ziyada tar kaam rang  wo roghan aur imaarton ki marammat se mutaliq hain. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai ke November tak yeh kaam mukammal karliye jayen ge. Rozana hazaron afraad Chowmahalla Palace dekhen ke liye purana shahar aatay hain. Palace mein Nizam Deccan ki janib se Shahi mehmanon aur sarkari mehmanon ko tahraya bhi jata tha. Yeh apne Darbar Hall ke liye bhi mashhoor hai. Iss mein Mughlia tarz ki ghumbaden, kamanain aur Irani tarz ki aster kaari, paicheeda naqqashi ka kaam bhi kiya gaya hai. Iss mein baagaat bhi lagaye gaye hain jo pur kashish hain. Islaah o marammat aur tazaeen nau ke zariye uski azmat  barqarar rakhne ki koshishen jari hain. Iss silsilay mein 35 lakh rupiye kharch kiye jayen ge. Iss kaam ke liye pesha waranah salahiyaton ke haamil karigron ki khidmaat haasil ki gayi hain jo riwayati tarz ki taknik ka istemaal kar rahay hain taakay is ke Waqar aur miyaar ko barqarar raka jasakay.
356.title: Khilwat Palace ki tazaeen wo aarayish

news_detail: Agra. vshwa hindu prishd ke sabiq bain al aqwami saddar Pravin Bhai Togadia ki nai tanzeem’ Hindu Hi Aagay’ ki Agra unit ke sadar Govind Parashaar ne Bollywood adakar Salman Khan ko barsar e aam pitaayi karne walay ko do laakh rupay inaam ka elaan kya hai. unhon ney ilzaam ayed kya ke un ke production House ki film ‘Loveyatri’ rakhtay hue Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh kya gaya hai. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke yeh film danista tor par hindu tehwar ‘Navratri’ ko release ki jarahi hai. Parashar aur tanzeem ke deegar karkunon n ney Bhagwan Talkies puhanche aur Salman Khan ki filmon ke postrs ko Nazar aatish kya. ehtajaji kaarkunon ney film adakar Salman Khan aur film ‘Loveyatri’ ke khilaaf naara baazi ki. yeh film october mein release ki janay wali hai jis mein un ki mun boli behan Arpita Khan ke shohar Ayush Sharma ko roshnaas karwaya ja raha hai. is film ko Salman Khan produce kar rahay hain
207.title: Salman Khan ki barsar e aam pitaayi karne par 2 lakh rupay inaam ka elaan

news_detail: Afghanistan ke dar-ul-hukumat Kabul mein do dhmakon mein 14 afraad jaan bahaq aur mutadid zakhmi hogaye, pehlay khudkush dhamaka mein mazhabi ulama ki aik taqreeb ko nishana banaya gaya, jabkay dosray dhamaka mein police ehalkaron ki gaari ko nishana banaya gaya. Afghan hakkaam ke mutabiq pehla khudkush dhamaka Kabul mein palle tiknk university ke nazdeek kya gaya, university mein mazhabi ulama ka ijlaas jari tha, dhamaka is waqt kya gaya jab mazhabi scholars bahar nikal rahay they. ijlaas mein mazhabi ulama ne Afghanistan mein jung ke khilaaf mushtarqa fatwa jari kya tha aur khud kash hamlon ko gunah qarar diya tha. dosra dhamaka police district 5 mein kya gaya jis mein 3 afraad zakhmi hain.
215.title: Kabul mein 2 dhamakay, 14 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein aik navzaida bachi lawaris pari mili. do nojawanon ne Nacharacm mein masjid noor ke qareeb sadak ke kinare do nojawanon ko yeh bachi subah ki awleen sa-aton mein dastyab hui. police ke bamawajjib bachi ko fori prasad hasptl muntaqil kya gyaj_han se baad azan behtar ilaaj ke liye Nilofer hasptl muntaqil kardiya gaya. Nilofer hasptl mein bachi ki dekh bhaal ki jarahi hai.
233.title: Hyderabad mein sadak ke kinare navzaida bachi dastyab

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke markazi tijarti ilaqa Abids  ki aik paanch manzila imarat se aik 18 sala ladki ney mobayyana tor par chhalang lagaakar khud kashi karli. ladki ki barket poora ki Jaslin Kaur ki hesiyat se shanakht ki gayi hai. it-tila-aat ke bamawajib ladki mayuri kampliks Abids  ki panchwin manzil pohanchi aur wahan se chhalang lagadi. CC Tv cameras mein ladki seedhiyan charhtay hue panchwin manzil par pounchanay ke manazair record kiye gaye hain. yeh waqea aaj subah ki awleen sa-aton mein paish aaya. police ney bataya ke ladki barsar e mauqa halaak hogayi. muqami logon ki shikayat par police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue laash ko post martm ke liye usmaniya hasptl bhaij diya.
257.title: Navjawan ladki ney Abids ki imarat se chhalang lagadi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein mangal ki subah Osmania University ke degree imthehaan ke prchon ki jaanch ke markaz mein aag lag gayi. Police ke mutabiq maqam haadsa ko dekhnay se lagta hai ke hall mein atishzadgi short circuit ke baais hui hai. aag ko dekhte hi university amlah aur muqami log maqam haadsa puhanche muqami fire station aur police ko aagah kardiya. Tarnaka fire department ka amlah fire engine ke sath university poanch gaye aur fori harkat mein atay hue aag par qaboo pa liya qabal is ke ke aag mazeed phail jati. Vice Chancellor Osmania University Mr. Ramchandram ne police ohdedaron ke hamrah maqam haadsa ka dora kya aur sorat e haal ka jaiza liya. university kimps mein degree aspat valuation center mein haal hi mein munaqidah degree ke splmntri imtehanaat ki jaanch ki jarahi thi. mehakma fire ke ohdedaron ne bhi kaha ke aag lagnay ki wajah imarat ke andar short circuit hosakti hai. chand muqami zaraye ablaagh ke numaindon ke bamawajib aag ke baais kam az kam do mazameen ke kayi jawabi biyazaat jal kar khakstar hogaye. Vice Chancellor  Mr. Ramchandram ne kaha ke subah 5-6 bajey ke darmain aag bharak uthi. ittila mlitay hi mehakma fire ka amlah fori wahan poanch gyaavr fori aag par qaboo pa liya jis ki wajah se ziyada nuqsanaat nahi hopaye. hamara andaza hai ke shaed jawabi biyazaat ke 20 sets juzwi taur par jal gaye aur hum un ki baazyabi ki koshish kar rahay hain. University ne atishzadgi ke waqea ki jaanch ke liye aik Committee tashkeel di hai. Committee jo androon do yom apni report paish kardey gi aag ke baais hue nuqsanaat ka bhi jaiza le gi
272.title: Osmania University mein short circuit, answersheets jal kar khakstar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Anti Corruption Bureau ( ACB) ney sports deputy director Mr. Venkat Ramna ki Ramantapur mein waqay rahaish gaah par dhawa kya. ACBohdedar chaharshanba ki subah se paanch maqamat par dhave kar rahay hain. yeh dhave mobayyana taur par jaali wasayeq  ke sath sports quota ke tehat am bi bi s nashiston ke allotment mein be qaadgyon ke ilzamaat ke tanazur mein kiye gaye hain. cheif mnstr tlnganh mister ke Chandar shikhr rau ney jaali Wasiqa ke sath sports quota ke tehat medical nashiston ke ilzamaat ki ACB ke zareya tehqiqaat ka 17 May ko hidayat jari ki thi. reyasti hukoomat ko bataya gaya tha ke am bi bi s nashistain panay ke liye sports quota ka ghalat istemaal kya ja raha hai, jis par cheif mnstr ney is ka jaiza lainay aik jame tehqiqaat ka hukum diya taakay is mein mulawis afraad ke khilaaf karwai ki jasakay
292.title: Sports ke aala ohdedar ki rahaish gaah par ACB dhawa

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi ki hzari adalat ney aaj Gangster Abu Salem ko Delhi ke aik tajir ko 2002 mein raqam tahaffuz ke taur par 5 crores rupay ka mutalba karne aur raqam ki adam adai par arkaan khandan ko maardenay ki dhamki dainay par 7 saal ki qaid bamushaqqat ki saza sunai hai. Adalat ney saza ke taayun par istighasa aur vuklaaye safai ke dalail ki samaat ke baad yeh faisla sunaya. adalat ney 26 May ko muqadma mein saza sunai thi. Delhi mein darj kardah jabri vasuli ki shikayat mein yeh ilzaam aaydkya gaya ke Abu Salem ney 2002 mein junoobi Delhi ke greater Kailash ke saakin Ashok Gupta se tahaffuz ki raqam ke taur par 5 crore rupay ka mutalba kia tha. Abu Salem ko is muqadma mein tazeerat hind ki dafaa 387 (jabri vasuli karne kisi fard ko mout ya sangeen nuqsaan ke liye khauf mein mubtala karna) aur dafaa 506 (mujremana takhweef) ke tehat saza sunai gayi. taham usay sakht geer qanoon maharashra insidaad munazzam juraim ke tehat ilzamaat se bari kardiya gaya. adalat ney Abu Salem ke mutawazi mulzimeen Pawan Kumar Mittal @ Raja Bhai, Ashraf Bhai, Mohammad Ashraf @ Bablu, Majeed Khan @ Raju Bhai aur Chanchal Mehta ko bhi bari kardiya. Abu Salem ko is se qabal Mumbai bomb dhamakay 1993 case mein bhi saza sunai jachki hai.
310.title: Gangster Abu Salem ko 7 saal ki saza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Police force mein bdanwanyon ke khtama ke liye aik be nazeer iqdaam karte hue dayrktr general of Police mister mhen_heendr ready ne tamam Suprintendents of Police aur Commisioners of Police ko hadaayat di ke Telangana bhar mein Police ki khusoosi teamon ( special Police teams ) ko barkhast kardiya jaye. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq azlaa aur sh_hrke hudood mein tashkeel kardah Police ki khusoosi Teams hi tijarti idaron aur dosaron se hafta aur mahana asaas par rqomat ( mamool ) ki vasuli mein mulawis paye gay hain. bud unwani ke khilaaf iqdaam ke tor par zayed az  350 Police mulazmeen ke tabadlay kar diye jayen ge aur Special Police Teams ko tahleel kardiya jaye ga. DGP ne bayan kya ke tamam sathon par munazzam andaaz mein mamool ki vasuli ki laanat ko khatam kardiya jaye ga jis ke liye s piz aur si piz se kaha gaya hai ke khusoosi teamon se wabsta mulazmeen ko fori assar ke sath armed rizro Headquarters se rujoo kardiya jaye. unhon ne kaha ke kisi bhi shakal mein is terhan ka tareeqa car jari rehne ki soorat mein mutaliqa Unit Officers aur sab unit Officers ke khilaaf manfi karwai hogi. bataya jata hai ke DG pi ko mossola report ke mutabiq jumla 391 Police mulazmeen mamool ya jabri vasuli mein mobayyana tor par mulawis hain. Report ke mutabiq list kuch is taraha hai.Hyderabad 11, Suryapet 40, Bhadradri Kothagudem 35, Karimnagar 34, Nizamabad 29, Sangareddy 25, Cyberabad 13, Rachakonda 24, Mahbubnagar, 13, Wanaparthy 2, Nagarkurnool 13, Vikarabad 27, Yadadri-Bhuvanagiri 5, Nalgonda 2, Khammam 17, Mahabubabad 10, Kamareddy 16, Medak 17, Siddipet 21, Adilabad 6, Nirmal 2, Warangal urban and rural 5, Rajanna Sircilla 4, Peddapalli 9, Kumarambheem-Asifabad 3, Mancherial 8.DGP ke paas mojood report ke mutabiq Hyderabad mein mahana mamool wusool karne walon ki fehrist mein  K Alexander PC, Asifnagar, P Nagesh PC, Golconda, B Srikanth PC, Tappachaputra, Mahesh PC, & Brahman, ASI, of Shainathgunj, Y Sambaiah PC and A Bala Narsimha PC of Mangalhat, Venu Home guard of Kulsumpura, Shankar Naik, Home guard of Panjagutta, Ram Singh, home guard of Chilkalguda shamil hain.
338.title: Telangana mein Police mulazmeen ki jabri vasuli ko khatam karne DGP ka intibah

news_detail: Hyderabad. ladkiyon ko nasha aawar paan khlakr un ka istehsal karne ke ghnaone jurm mein police ny aik mutasirah larki ki shikayat par paan ki mashhoor dukaan’ Mayur Pan House’ ke maalik mhndr verma ko grfta ray karliya gaya hai. police ke bamawajib mulzim, Facebook ke zareya ladkiyon koshadi karne ka jhansa deta tha aur jab koi larki is ke daam fraib ka shikaar hojati tab usay meethay paan mein nasha aawar shye mila kar khilatha tha aur inhen apna shikaar banata tha, woh un ki video rerecording bhi karliya karta tha aur phir inhen apni khwahish poori nah karne par you tube par video up load kardainay ki dhmkyan diya karta tha. haliya waqea mein Upendra  verma ny Facebook ke zareya aik soft engineer khatoon se qurbat ikhtiyar kyaavr jab is khatoon ki verma ki harkato ka pata chala to is ny mulzim ke khilaaf Kachiguda police station mein shikayat darj karwai. shikayat par verma ko girftar karliya gaya hai jabkay is ki muawnat karne walay saathi mafroor betaye jatay hain. police ny is ke paas se kayi ladkiyon ki tasaveer bhi zabt ki hai. police ny is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karliya hai aur is ke teen mafroor sathiyon ki talaash shuru kar di hai. mulzim ki’ Mayur Pan House’ ke naam se shehar mein kayi jagah kaarobar hai.
350.title: Ladkiyon ka istehsal karne wala Mayur Pan House ka maalik girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rani Gunj, Secunderabad ilaqa mein Bombay Hotel ke qareeb Asian Paints ke godaam mein aag lag gayi. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Mahankali police station ke hudood mein waqay is godaam mein aaj 5:45 bajay aag bhadak uthi, khush qismati se koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa hai. barri der taq aag bharkii rehne ki wajah se atraaf o aknaaf sarasamigi payi gayi. Aag ke baayes paint ke dabbay phatt padney se anay wali awazon ke baais muqami log khaufzadah hogaye. police ittila mlitay hi fouri wahan pahonch gayi aur hifz e mataqadum ke tour par muqami logon ka taqlia krwadya. kaafi tug o do ke baad fire tenders ney aag par qaboo pa liya. samgha jata hai ke short circuit ke baayes atishzadgi ka yeh waqea paish aaya. Commisioner GHMC ko bhi is waardaat ki ittila di gayi aur woh bhi maqam haadsa pahonch kar sorat e haal ka jaiza liya. Railway hukkaam ney aag par qaboo panay tak qareeb se guzarnay wali rout par trains ki aamad o raft ko rokay rakha tha
357.title: Rani Gunj mein Asian Paints ke godown mein atishzadgi

news_detail: Indonesian jazeera bali par koh Augung ka aatish fishan jumaraat se phatt parna shuru sun-hwa, zaireen ilaqa mein rehne walay aik laakh dehation ko ghar chore dainay ka intebah

bali : Indonesia ke jazeere bali mein aatish fishan phatnay ki wajah se airport mein hazaron sayah phas gaye hain. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq bali mein aatish fishan phatnay se dhowen ke baadal aasmaanon ko chone lagey, chngaryan hawaon ke sath Fiza mein bikhar gayeen jab ke fiza mein hiddat ka izafah ho gaya. do hazaar meter oonchai taq dhowen ke kalm pahonch gaye hain. shehri intizamia ne red alert jari kardiya alawa azeen Anaguarah rai Airport ki 280 prwazon ko moattal kardiya gaya jis se 15 hazaar 7 so musafir hawai adday par hi phas gaye. muqami intizamia ke mutabiq aatish fishan phatnay se ird gird ilaqay mein abad aik laakh afraad abad hain jinhein ghar chorney ki hadaayat kar di gayi thi taham hakoomati intibah ke bawajood ilaqa mein ab bhi hazaron afraad –apne gharron mein mojood hain. mahireen arazyat ka kehna hai ke aatish fishan ke poori shiddat se kisi bhi waqt phatt sakta hai jis se barray pemanay par lave ke phelnay ke imkanaat numaya hain jab ke yeh khadsha bhi hai ke yeh aatish fishan kayi hafton taq mutharrak reh sakta hai. wazeh rahay ke Augung ka aatish fishan aakhri baar 1963 mein phataa tha jis se 1100 se zayed afraad halaak hue they.
232.title: Indonesia mein aatish fishan phat para, hazaron afraad phas gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik Engineering Taliba apne teen Seniors par is ki asmat raizi karne aur blackmail karne is ghanaoone feal ki filmbandi karne ka ilzaam aed kya hai. asmat raizi ki mutasirah Taliba ko is ke Seniors aik saal se is video ki bunyaad par blackmail kar rahay they. Andhra pradesh ke zila krishna mein police ney shikayat ki mosoli par tenu pralzam meem aed kya hai. do mulzim Siva Reddy aur Krishna Vamsi ney February  2017 mein hotel mein munaqidah aik birth d party mein lladki ke mashroob mein kuch mladya aur phir is ki mobayyana tor par asmat raizi ki. police ney kaha ke mulzim ney is feal ki film bandi bhi ki aur is se jinsi khwahish ki takmeel karne video ke zareya blackmail bhi kya. harasani ko bardasht nah karte hue 22 sala Engineering Taliba ney zila krishna mein agri peli mein college intizamia se shikayat ki’ lekin intizamia ney poli ce se shikayat nahi ki. mutasirah lladki ney kaha ke is ki bajaye intizamia ney ladkon se video zaya kardainay aur lladki se maffi mangnay ke liye kaha. police ke bamawajib teesray mulzim ney guzashta do mah se lladki ko blackmail karna shuru kyaavr 10 laakh rupay ada karne ka mutalba kya basorat deegar video ko awam mein phailadene ki dhamki di, jis par lladki ney sorat e haal ke baarey mein apne walidain se tabadlah khayaal kiya aur is ke waalid ney jummay ko police mein bazabta shikayat darj karwai. lladki ney chand mah qabal hi apna course mukammal karliya thatahm aik aur classe meet d parveen usay yeh kehte hue lladki ko apni jinsi khwahish poori karne ka mutalba kar raha tha ke is ke paas video ki copy mojood hai aur is ki jinsi taskeen ke mutalba ko poora nah karne ki soorat mein Website par video up load kardainay ki dhamki di. police ney ladkon par ijtimai asmat raizi aur jurm ki filmbandi karne aur usay black karne ke liye istemaal karne par aayi tea act ke tehat ilzamaat aed kiye. mutasirah ko medical tst ke liye bhaij diya gaya aur police ney kaha ke mazeed tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain.
245.title: Seniors ney Andhra ki Engineering Taliba ki asmat raizi ki

news_detail: Shumali Japan mein aik Japani starts up company ki janib se tayarkarda rocket, nakaam taur par daaghe janay ke chand seconds mein hi aag ke golah mein tabdeel hogaya aur zameen par gir kar tabah hogaya. Japan ke shumal bayeed mein waqay jazeera Hokkaido ke Taiki town mein interstellarTechnologies ne ‘MOMO-2’ rocket tayyar kya tha. Yeh rocket 100 kilomitr bulandi par khala pounchanay wala tha. Baghair aadmi ka khalaa hamza mein chorra janay wala 2. 7 million dollar laagat ka yeh rocket daaghe janay ke baad baa-mushkil 60 fate ki bulandi par pouncha hi tha ke achanak woh zameen par aana shuru sun-hwa aur zameen par girtay hi aag ki lapeto mein agaya aur saaray ilaqa mein dhuwan phail gaya. Is haadsa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi huwa hai.
263.title: Japani rocket daaghe janay ke sath hi gir kar tabah

news_detail: Thailand ke purisraar gharon mein gum honay wali bachon ki football team aur in ke coach ka tahaal kuch pata na chal saka aur un ke zindah rehne ke imkanaat waqt guzarnay ke sath sath maand padte jarahay hain. Aik hafta se zayed waqt guzarnay ke baad bhi Thai janglaat ke darmiyan mojood un garoon mein gumshudaa bachon ka koi suraagh nai mil saka. doosri janib bachao o operation ke liye America aur Bartania ke baad Australia ney bhi mahireen ka aik dasta Thai land bhaij diya hai. muqami hakkaam ka kehna hai ke garoon mein pani ki satah kam honay ke baad talash ka kaam mazeed taiz kardiya gaya hai. wazeh rahay Thai land mein under 16 football team ke 12 khiladi apne coach ke hamrah sair o tafreeh ki gharz se aik ghaar mein gaye they, jis ka dahana shadeed barish ke baad pani ney band kar diya. ittila mlitay hi imdadi teamon ney karwai shuru kar di thi, rescue hakkaam ka kehna hai ke ghaar taq pounchanay ke liye kisi aur rasta ki talaash mein hain taham khiladion ke zaati istemaal ka kuch samaan ghaar ke dhanay se mil gaya hai. Suba Chiang Rai  mein jahan Luang ghaar waqay hain wahan ke Governor Narongsak Osottanakorn ney aaj akhbaari numaindon ko bataya ke Thai Navy ki Rescue Team ke arkaan aik dahana ke bilkul qareeb pahonch gaye hain jahan samjha jata hai ke gumshudaa khiladion ney pana le rakhi hai. pani mein phansay hue un khiladion taq pounchanay ke liye ghouta Khor musalsal koshisho mein lagey hue hain. unhon ney kaha ke ghaar se inhen nikaal lainay ke baad un ke takhlia aur qareebi hospital muntaqil karne aur tibbi imdaad baham pohanchanay ka mukammal mansoobah tayyar rakha gaya hai. jadou garon ki aik team bhi ghaar mein phansay khiladion ka pata laganay hakkaam ki madad ko pahonch chuke hain magar woh bhi kuch kehnay ke muaqqaf mein nai hain.
279.title: Thailand, gharon mein gum bachon ka hafta baad bhi kuch pata na chal saka

news_detail: Uttarakhand mein musafir bus barsati naala mein ja giri jis ke nateeja mein 48 musafir halaak aur mutadid afraad zakhmi ho gaye. media ke mutabiq haadsa Uttarakhand ke Paudi Garhwal  zila mein paish aaya, haadsa ka shikaar bus mein 60 se zayed afraad safar kar rahay thay ke bad qismat musafir bus haadsa ka shikaar ho gayi. 45 musafireen brsr mauqa hi halaak hogaye jabkay mazeed teen musafireen hospital pohnchaye janay par murda qarar diye gaye. ittila mlitay hi police aur imdadi temen haadsa ke maqam par pohnchain aur bus mein phansay musafiron ko bahar nikaalte ki koshishen shuru kar dein. 8 zakhmion ko fauran Dhomkot hospital ke emergency ward mein pohanchaya. Aini shahideen naay bataya ke bus tizrftari ke baais driver ke qabose bahar hokar 100 meter gehray barsati naalay mein ja giri jis ke baad bus 2 hisson mein toot gayi. police aur imdadi teamon ke sath muqami afraad bhi bus ke musafiron ko imdaad pohanchanay mein masroof hain. Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat naay haadsa par –apne gehray ranj o dukh ka izhaar kya aur mahlukeen ke afraad khandan ke liye do laakh rupay aur zakhmion ke liye pachaas hazaar rupay muawza ka elaan kya
290.title: Uttarakhand mein musafir bus naala mein ja giri, 48 musafir halaak

news_detail: Aik alamnaak waqea mein Delhi ke mauza Barari mein waqay aik ghar ki chat se 7 khawateen aur 4 mardon sameit 11 afraad ki lashen mushtaba haalat mein bar aamad hui hain. halaak shdgan mein teen na baligh bhi shaamil hain. yeh waqea Barari ke sunnat nagar gali number 2 mein paish aaya. waqea ki ittila milnay ke baad police jab pohanchi to inhen mushtaba haalat mein 10 lashen jaal se lataki hui milein un ke mun aur ankhoo par lungi ke kapday ko phaar kar pattiyan baandhi gayi theen jabkay aik sun Raseedah khatoon ki laash zameen par pari thi. bataya ja raha hai ke woh khatoon un bachon ki maa hai. is baat ka andesha zahir kya ja raha hai ke un ka gala dabaya gaya hoga. parosion ke mutabiq kuch hi din qabal khatoon ki nawasi prinka ki mangni hui thi. khatoon ka teesra beta Chitturgarh mein rehta hai, jis ka naam dinesh hai. dinesh civil contractor hai aur woh abhi Chitturgarh mein hi hai. bataya ja raha hai ke mahlook kunba ki karanna ki dukaan thi. raat taqreeban pauney baara bajay unhon ney apni dukaan band ki thi. yeh dukaan rozana Ali alsbh hi khil jaya karti thi, lekin aaj subah jab aik aadmi doodh lainay gaya aur dukaan band dekhi, to is ki wajah jan-nay ke liye jab woh is ke ghar gaya to ghar ka darwaaza khula sun-hwa tha. woh seerihoon se oopar pouncha to dekha ke ghar ke log chat par lagi jaal se latkay hue hain. baad mein is ney dosray parosion ko is ki ittila di aur phir police ko bulaya gaya. mohalla ke logon ka kehna hai ke bhatih kunba rajsthan se yahan aaya tha. ghar mein sun Raseedah khatoon ke ilawa un ki aik beti, do betay, do bahuen, do potyaan, do potay aur aik nawasi thi. Poton ki Umar 16. 17 saal ke darmain bataaye jarahi hai. sun Raseedah khatoon ki nawasi Priyanka ki guzashta mah hi mangni hui thi, is ki bhi laash ladkhadte hui payi gayi. police ney is khsoos mein qatal ka aik muqadma darj karliya hai chunkay 77 sala khatoon ki mout dam ghatney se waqay hui. cheif minister Delhi Mr. Arvind Kejriwal ney maqam haadsa ka mushahida kya. Delhi police ki crime branch ko tehqiqaat tafweez kar di gayi hain. ghar ki talashi ke douran police ko kuch dasti tehreer par mabni notice miley hain jo khandan ke mazhabi umoor ki injaam dahi ki taraf ishara karte hain. police ney bataya ke notice isi andaaz mein paye gaye jis andaaz mein mutasireen ke moun aur aankh bandhay hue thay.
311.title: Delhi mein aik hi khandan ke 11 afraad ki lashen chat par dastyab

news_detail: Jalalabad: Afghanistan ke shehar Jalalabad mein Sikhs ki abadi prkhodksh hamla mein 10 Sikh bashindon samait kam az kam 20 afraad halaak aur 20 se zayed zakhmi hogaye. saddar Afghan Ashraf ghanni ke Jalalabad mein aik hospital ke iftitah karne ghanton baad dhamaka sun-hwa jis ke nateeja mein shehar mein Maqabirat square ke atraaf imaarton aur shops ko nuqsaan pouncha. Afghan media ke mutabiq Jalalabad mein honey walay khudkush hamla mein Sikhs ko nishana baneya gaya, hamla hotay hi sikoriti idaron ney jaye waqooa ko ghairay mein le liya jab jabke bachau o raahat kaari idaron ney zakhmion aur laashon ko hospital muntaqil kya. ghair musadeqa it-tila-aat ke mutabiq hamla governor house ke nazdeek sun-hwa. Sobai Governor Ataa Allah Khogyani ney waqea aur halakaton ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke hamla khudkush tha, taham unhon ney hamla se mutaliq mazeed tafseelaat se aagah nahi kya. it-tila-aat hain ke Sikhs ka aik group Afghan saddar Ashraf ghanni se mulaqaat ke liye ja raha tha jo is waqt soobay ke dora par they. khayaal rahay ke Afghanistan mein rehne walay Sikhs par honey wala yeh hamla guzashta kayi dahaiyo ka sab se bara hamla hai. is hamla mein Sikh baradri ke aik sayasatdan otaar singh khaalisa bhi halaak hogaye jo october mein munaqqid shudni parlimani intikhabaat mein muqaabla ke khwahan they. Afghanistan mein aik nashist Sikh aqliton ke liye mukhtas hai. bataya jata hai ke khud kash bambaar ney khud ko is gaari se takradiya jis mein Sikh sawaar they.
331.title: Afghanistan mein Sikhs par khudkush hamla, 20 afraad halaak

news_detail: Paris: France ka matloob tareen gangster filmi scene ki terhan jail toud kar helicopter ke zareya faraar hogaya. Badnaam zamana gangster ne action se bharpur filmon mein honay walay scene ko haqeeqi zindagi mein karkay dikha diya, France ke dar-al-hakoomat Paris mein gangster ‘Redoine Faid’ ne jail se faraar ka aisa tareeqa apnaya ke sab dang reh gaye. Gangster ke sathiyon ne apne sarghanah ko faraar karanay ke liye bada mansoobah tayyar kya, Paris ke muzafati ilaqa mein qaid Redoine ko faraar karanay ke liye thoday faasla par jhadion mein aik helicopter utaara gaya aur phir musallah afraad jail mein daakhil hogaye. jail ke maheman khanah mein pehlay se maujood sarghanah apne sathiyon ke sath jail se nikal kar Helicopter tak chala aya, musallah afraad ne helicopter ke pilot ko pehlay hi mughwi bana kar rakha tha jis ke zareya makhsoos faasla taiy karne ke baad gangster aur is ke saathi helicopter se utar kar gaafi mein sawaar hogaye aur har thofay faasla par gadiyaan tabdeel karte rahay. Police ka kehna hai ke gang ko aakhri baar aik safaid gaadi mein dekha gaya aur un ki talaash ke liye search operation shuru kardiya gaya hai. 46 sala gangster ‘Redoine Faid’ ko 2010 mein dacoity aur is waardaat mein Police ahelkaar ke qatal par 25 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. is se qabal bhi badnaam zamana gangster jail toud kar faraar hochuka tha. is gangster ne jail mein aik daha guzarnay ke baad –apne pirol officer ko yeh qaail kerwatay hue ke woh badal chuka hai 2009 mein mashroot to rapar raha sun-hwa tha. is ke baad se is ki maqboliat mein izafah hota gaya tha chunkay woh apne maazi ki yaado aur Paris mein aik mujrim ke tor par apne ubharnay ki dastanoon ko bayan karte hue mukhtalif tally vision shows mein namodaar hota raha aur kitaaben likhna shuru ki theen
343.title: France ka badnaam zamana gangster jail se helicopter ke zareya faraar

news_detail: Amrici riyasat Arizona mein police ke mutabiq aik 92 sala khatoon ne care home mein jaaney se bachney ke liye apne 72 sala betay ko goli maar kar halaak kar diya. adalti dastawizaat ke mutabiq Anna Mae Blessings Nami khatoon ko unhen ‘care home’ mein bhejnay betay ke iraadon ka pata chal gaya tha. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq mazkoorah khatoon ne Arizona mein waqay –apne ghar se jis mein woh aur un ka beta apni dost ke sath rehta tha bahar nikaltay hue kaha ‘tum ne meri zindagi li is liye mein tumhari le rahi hon.’ Anna Mae Blessings ne police ko bataya ke woh khud ko bhi maarna chahti theen. muqami media ka kehna hai ke yeh waqea do July ki subah meri koupa county mein fountains hills ke qasba mein paish aaya. mrs blesings jin ke betay ka naam zahir nahi kya gaya chahtay they ke un ki walida care home muntaqil ho jayen kyunkay un ka apni walida ke sath’ rehna mushkil tha. ‘Anna Mae Blessings ne apne betay ke sath behas ke douran sunah 1970 ki dahai mein khareeda gaya revolver nikaal kar apne betay par goli chala di, un ke paas dosra revolver bhi mojood tha. police ne Anna Mae Blessings ke maray hue betay ko talaash kar liya jis ki gardan aur jabray mein golion ke nishaan they. is ke baad Anna Mae Blessings ne apne betay ki 57 sala dost ki janib revolver ka rukh kya jinhon ne un se revolver chean kar kamray ke aik konay mein pheink diya jis par woh dosray revolver se waar karna chahti theen magar woh nakaam rahen. mazkoorah khatoon ke betay ki dost ne wahan se bhaag kar police ko bulaya. police ne mrs blessings ko un ke bad room mein talaash kar liya. unhon ne baad mein police ko bataya ke inhen un ke aamal ke liye hamesha ki neend sulaa diya jana chahiye
351.title: America: ‘old home’ bheejwane ki koshish pa maa ne betay ka qatal kar diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke Gowliguda mein waqay qadeem sntrl Bus station (CBS) Hanger jo Mississippi Hanger aaj  subah ki awleen sa-aton mein munhadim hogaya. yeh Bus shelter jo zayed az  85 saal tak zair istemaal thalikn inhedam ke baais koi jani nuqsaan nahi pouncha chunkay hakkaam ne Bus station ki boseedgi ko malhooz rakhtay hue 5 din qabal hi usay band kardiya tha. yeh hanger Nizaam hukmaran ki janib se un ke tansport flat ki parking ke liye taamer kya gaya tha, baad azan usay aik arsa tak shehar ke mean Bus Stand ke tor par istemaal kya jata raha hai. mahatma gandhi Bus station ki taamer ke baad usay city Busoon ke liye istemaal kya jata raha. greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ke hukkaam ne usay munhadim kardainay ka faisla kya tha taham muqami awam ki mukhalfat ki wajah se is mansoobah ko tark kardiya gaya tha. Muqami awam chahti thi ke is maqam ko aik tareekhi yadgar ke tor par mehfooz kya jaye. Principal Secretary Tansport o Incharge Managing Dirctor  Telangana state road tansport corporation mister snil sharmaa aaj subah is maqam ka dora karne walay thay taham jumaraat ki subah 7:00 bujey hi yeh shade az khud munhadim hogaya. mister snil sharmaa ne is zimn mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke yeh structure bohat qadeem tha aur bohat boseedah hochuka tha. Unhon ne bataya ke shade ki haalat ko dekhte hue guzashta paanch din qabal hi usay band kardiya gaya tha.
359.title: Gowliguda ka qadeem Bus Stand Mississippi  hanger munhadim

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ko challenge  karte hue High Court ke aik wakeel Rapolu Bhaskar ney High Court mein aik writ darkhwast dair ki hai. Schedule se 9 mah qabl Assembly ko tahleel kardainay par darkhwast guzar ney aitraaz kya hai. Unhon ney istadlaal paish kya ke qabl az waqat Assembly tahleel kardainay ke baayis taraqqiati kaam inhitaat ka shikaar ho jaien ge. Unhon ney kaha ke qabl az waqt intikhabaat se crore ha rupay awaami fund ka beja kharch hoga. Unhon ney High Court se istedua ki ke Election Commission ko hidayat di jaye ke maujooda Assembly ki 5 sala meyaad ki takmeel ke bad hi intikhabaat munaqqid kiye jayen. Iss writ darkhwast par samaat mangal ko hogi.
200.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf high court mein darkhwast

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukn Assembly Warangal East Mrs. Konda Surekha ney Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao se yeh wazahat karney ka mutalba kiya ke TRS ki janib se jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein un ka naam shaamil kyun nahi kiya gaya. Hafta ko Somajiguda mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mrs. Konda Surekha ney usay Telangana ke pasmandah tabqaat aur khawateen ki badi beizzati par mahmool karte huwe Kaarguzar Chief Minister aur TRS sarbarah se mutaliba kiya ke un ke naam ko rokay rakhne ke pas e parda muharikaat kiya hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Telangana wahid riyasat hai jahan kisi khatoon ko cabinet mein shaamil nahi rakha gaya. Unhon ney yeh istefsaar kiya ke khatoon Arkaan Assembly (B Shooba aur K Surekha) ke naamon ko pheli fehrist mein shaamil na karney ki wazahat karen. Unhon ney kaha ke woh mazeed 3 din tak intezaar karengi aur uss ke baad party ke naam khula maktoob rawana karengi aur apney mustaqbil ke mansoobah se media ko aagah karengi. Unhon ney bataya ke woh guzishta intekhabaat mein 55 hazaar ki bhaari aksariyat se kamyaab huwi theen. Mrs. Konda Surekha ney bataya ke unhon ney Mr. KT Rama Rao se baat cheet ki thi jinhon ney un se poocha tha ke Party Ticket unhen diya jaye ya phir un ki dukhtar ko, jis par unhon ney Mr. KT Rama Rao se wazeh taur par keh diya tha ke Party Ticket unhen diya jaye aur un ki dukhtar Shamita ko nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke un ke talluq se Warangal Party halqon mein yeh ghalat bawar karwaya gaya ke woh apney khandan ke liye do ticket talab kar rahi hain.
223.title: KCR Ticket na dainay ki wazahat karen: Konda Surekha

news_detail: Hyderabad.
