Wazeer Information Technology o Baldi nazm o nasq o shahri Taraqiyat Mr. KT Rama Rao ney Sadar Pradesh Congress Captain Uttam Kumar par palat kar waar kiya jinhon ney yeh kaha tha ke Mr. KT Rama Rao siyasat mein dakhila se qabl America mein bartan dhoya karte thae. Mr. KT Rama Rao ney Congress qaayed ke remarks par apne twitter payam mein tabserah karte huwe kaha ke unhon ney waisay hi bartan dhuain hain jaisay har Hindustani, America mein apne bartan dhota hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Congress sarbarah Mr. Ruhal Gandhi ke barkhilaf jinhein unhon ney ‘Pappu’ qarar diya, iss Mulk mein apni kamaai khud kiye hain. Wazeer Information Technology ney yeh nishandahi karte huwe ke 2014 ke intekhabaat ke dauran Telangana Pradesh Congress ke sarbarah ki car se 2.5 crore rupay bar aamad huwe thae, Uttam Kumar par awam ki raqam lootney ka ilzaam ayed kiya. Mr. KTR ney suboot ke tour par car mein muntaqil ki jane wali raqam ki tasweer bhi munsalik ki hai. Unhon ney Twitte kiya ke ”Dear Uttam Garu mein ney America mein apne ghar mein bartan dhuai honge (Jaisa ke America mein har Hindustani apne ghar mein dhota hai). Mujhe faqar hai ke mein ney kaam kiya aur aap ke Pappu ke barkhilaf apne bal par aik bawiqar zindagi guzari. Aap ke jaisa mein ney awam ki raqam loot kar apni car mein nahi jalaya”. MR KT Rama Rao ney isi par iktafa nahi kiya balkay AICC State Incharge Kuntaiah par bhi zarb lagai jinhon ney ilzaam aayed kiya tha ‘Apple’ aur ‘Sumsung’ Companies ney KTR ki bad unwaan siyasat ke baayis Telangana mein apne shops ke qiyam ke baarey mein apna zahen badal diya hai. Unhon ney jawabi waar karte huwe Kuntaiah ko ‘Delhi Sultanete’ aur Scamgress joker se mauosoom kiya. Unhon ney kaha ke Apple ney 3500 mulazmeen ke sath apna kaam shuru kardiya hai.
246.title: Mein ‘Pappu’ ki terha nahi hon: KTR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Osmania General Hospital ke Doctors ney Hospital ke liye nai imarat ki taamer ke apne motalebe mein shiddat paida karte huwe bataur ehtijaj aaj helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj kiya. Doctors aik arse se Osmania General Hospital ki qadeem imarat ki khasta haali par kayi martaba shikayaat darj karwachke hain magar qadeem imarat ki jagah naayi imarat taamer karne par hukoomat taraddud ka shikaar rahi hai chunkay Hospital ki qadeem imarat ke inhedam par aik gosha mukhalfat kar raha hai. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ney bhi imarat ki boseedgi ko dekhte huwe usay munhadim kardainay ki Notice dey rakhi hai. Naayi imarat ki taamer ke mutalebe ko hukoomat ke nazar andaz kardainay par Doctors ney munfarid andaaz mein apna ehtijaj darj karwane aaj helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj kiya. Yaad rahay ke guzishta mah mareezon par chhat ka palaster ukhad kar girjane ke teen waqhiyat runuma ho chukay hain. Doctors ney kaha ke woh masla ki yaksoi tak apna ehtijaj jari rakhain ge. Aik Dr ney kaha ke kisi bhi waqt hamaray suron par chhat gir sakti hai is liye hum apne aap ko bachaaye rakhnay Duty par helmet pahannay ka faisla kiya hai. Doctors ney jumaraat ko Regular Wards  ki bajaye Hospital Campus par Nurses aur Junior Doctors Association ke ishteraak se Outpatient Stalls qaim kiye.
262.title: Osmania Hospital ke Doctors ka helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq Wazeer Mr. Danam Nagender ney jinhon ney haal hi mein Telangana Rashtriya Samiti mein shumuliat ikhtiyar ki thi, Party Ticket se mehroomi ke khadshaat ke paish e nazar TRS ko khairbad keh dainay ki afwahon ki muzammat karte huwe kaha ke nahi ticket nah dey ye jaaney ki soorat mein woh TRS ki fatah ke liye kaam karen ge. Mr. Nagender ney kaha ke unhon ney ghair mashroot taur par TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiar ki thi aur agar unhen ticket na bhi diya jaye to woh Party ki kamyabi ke liye koshaan rahen ge. Unhon ney id-daa kiya ke intekhabaat ke baad Mr. Chandra Shekhar Rao dobarah Chief Miniter banein ge. Apni rehaish gaah par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe  unhon ne ilzaam ayed kiya ke Congress Party ke qaideen yeh afwaah philarhe hain ke woh TRS chode rahay hain. Mr. Danam Nagender ke barey mein yeh mashhoor hai ke woh ujlat mein faislay karte hain. Iss se qabal bhi Dr Y S Rajshekhar Reddy ke zamana mein jab unhen halqa Assembly Nampally se ticket na dete huwe halqa Lok Sabha Secunderabad se muqaabla karne ki peshkash ki gayi to unhon ney usay qubool na karte huwe Telugu Desam Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karli thi aur Telugu Desam ke ticket par Nampally halqa Assembly se kamyabi haasil karli thi taham unhon ney Dr. Rajshekhar Reddy ki kabeena mein jagah panay ke liye Telugu Desam Party aur Assembly ki rukniat se istefa dete huwe dobarah muqaabla kiya tha jis par unhen nakami ka saamna karna pada tha. Unhon ney Assembly halqon ki darjah bandi ke baad Khairtabad halqa Assembly se Congress ke ticket par muqaabla kiya tha magar bad qismati se woh 2014 ke Assembly intekhabaat mein aik baar phir shikast se dochar hogaye thar. Ab ayen intekhabaat se qabal unhon ney Congress ko aik baar phir kherbad kehte huwe barsareqhtedar TRS mein shamoliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Un ki shamoliat ke 2 hafton baad hi Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly tahleel kardiya aur 105 umeedwaron ki pheli fehrist bhi jari kar di jis mein un ka naam shaamil nahi kiya gaya. Agarchay TRS ney hanooz Khairtabad se Party Ticket kisi ko nahi diya hai magar siyasi halqon mein yeh baat mashhoor hogayi ke Mr. Danam Nagender ko iss martaba Assembly ka Ticket nahi diya jaye ga balkay unhen Lok Sabha intekhabaat ke liye tayyar kiya ja raha hai jis se woh nakhush hain. Ab yeh chay megoyiaan bhi shuru hogayi theen ke woh TRS ko bhi chod dainay walay hain.
276.title: Danam ne party chod deney ki tardeed kar di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kul Hindd Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ney apne tamam Arkaan e Assembly ko dobarah party ticket dete hue tajassus ko khatam kardiya. Iss martaba bhi shaher ke 7 Assembly halqon se jis ki numaindagi Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen karti hai maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi ticket diya gaya hai aur sirf itni tabdeeli ki gayi hai ke janab mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko jo halqa Assembly Yakutpura ki numaindagi karte arhay they unhen Charminar halqa Assembly se umeedwaar naamzad kiya gaya hai aur Charminar halqa Assembly ki numaindagi karne walay janab Syed Ahmed Pasha Quadri ko Yakutpura se umeedwaar banaya gaya hai. Assembly ki tahleel ke baad se baaz halqon mein yeh chaymegoyaan ho rahi theen ke is martaba kam az kam do maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko drop karte hue do naye umeedwaron ko maidan mein utaara jaye ga. Yahi wajah thi ke Majlis ke ticket ke husool ke liye kayi naujawan qaayideen intikhabaat ke liye zehni taurr par tayar ho gai thae. Maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi dobarah ticket dyie janay ke bawajood ta haal aisa koi ishara nahi milta ke ticket se mahroom qaayideen baghaawat par amaada hain. Agarchay ticket ke khwaahan qaayideen kuch mayoos hue hain magar unhon ney party qiyadat ke faislay ko qubool karliya hai. Saddar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ki jari kardah pehli fehrist ke mutabiq qaayed Muqannana Majlis janab Akbaruddin Owaisi (Chandrayangutta ), janab Mumtaz Ahmed Khan (Charminar), janab Ahmed Pasha Quadri (Yakutpura), janab Mohammad Muazzam Khan (Bhadurpura), janab Ahmed bin Abdullah Balala (Malakpet ), janab Jaffer Hussain Meraj (Nampally) aur Janab Kausar Mohiuddin (Karvan) umeedwaar hon ge. Bataya jata hai ke party aik aur fehrist jari kere gi jis mein shaher aur azlaa ke chand halqay shaamil hon ge, taham doosri fehrist bhi bamushkil 3 taa 5 umeedwaron par mushtamil hogi.
296.title: Majlis ki pehli fehrist. koi naya chahera nahi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Leader Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney halqa Assembly Charminar se Majlis ki janib se Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko umeedwaar naamzad kiye jaanay par tabsarah karte huwe kaha ke Majlis ki qiyadat un se khaufzadah hai, yahi wajah hai ke un se muqaabla ke liye 5 meqaat se Assembly ke rukn rehne walay Senior Leader ko un ke maqabil khada kiya gaya hai. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh Congress Party ke ticket par Charminar Constituency se muqaabla karne walay hain. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney kaha ke Majlis ki qiyadat ney kisi bhi halqa mein apne maujooda umeedwaar ko tabdeel nahi kiya hai magar sirf Charminar halqa ke umeedwaar ko Yakutpura ke Rukn e Assembly se tabdeel kardiya hai. Unhon ney Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko Charminar se umeedwaar bananay par kaha ke darasal Majlis ko yeh dar paida hogaya hai ke Charminar ki nashist se Majlis ke maujooda MLa ki kamyabi ke imkanaat mohom hain isi liye guzishta 25 barson se Yakutpura ki numaindagi karne walay Leader ko Charminar se umeedwaar banaya gaya hai. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse jinhein guzishta baldi intekhabaat mein Majlis ke muqabil shikast ka saamna bhi huwa tha aur jinhein polling ke din zad o kob bhi kiya gaya tha yeh daawa kar rahay hain ke Charminar se aik sher ka muqaabla sher se hoga. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney yeh zahir karne ke liye ke Majlis ke umeedwaar Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko apni shikast ka khauf lahaq hai, kaha ke woh abhi se dargahon ki ziyarten karne lagey hain jinhon ney is se pahelay kabhi dargaah nahi gay thae Mr. Mohammed Ghouse jin ke ticket ko party ney abhi qatiat nahi di hai, khud ko Charminar se Congress ke umeedwaar ke taur par paish kar rahay hain. Iss istefsaar par ke Congress aur Telugu Desam Party ke darmiyan intekhabi mafahmat ki soorat mein halqa Assembly Charminar se kon muqaabla karen ge unhon ney kaha ke Congress aur Telugu Desham Party mein mafahmat ki soorat mein inhen poora yaqeen hai ke Telugu Desham Party Leader Mr. Ali Masqati bhi unhi ka naam paish karen ge chunkay Mr. Ali Masqati ney 2009 mein muqaabla kiya tha jabkay unhon ney 2015-16 mein intekhabaat ka saamna kiya ha. Mr. Ghouse ney kaha ke Majlis ko apni shikast ka khauf hai is liye aaj paheli martaba 5 meqaat se Assembly mein numaindagi karne walay dargahon ke doray karne lagey hain.
315.title: Congress Leader Mohammed Ghouse ke buland bangh daaway

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party, Telugu Desham Party aur Communist Party Of India ney Telangana mein intekhabi ittehaad ka elaan kardiya hai aur mutaleba kiya ke intekhabi nataij tak Telangana riyasat mein Sadar Raj nafiz kiya jaye. Saddar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti o Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly tahleel karte huwe qabl az waqt intekhabaat ki raah hamwar ki hai. Governor Telangana & Andhra Pradesh Mr ESL Narsimhan ney Assembly tahleel karne Cabinet ki sifarish ko qubool karte huwe Mr. Chandrashekar Rao aur un ki Council of Ministers se riyasat ke umoor ki nigrani karne ki khwahish ki hai. Congress, Telugu Desham Party, Communist Party aur Telangana Jana Samiti ke qaideen ney aaj shaam Governor Mr. ESL Narsimhan se Raj Bhavan mein mulaqaat ki aur mutaleba kiya ke Telangana mein jahan Assembly tahleel kar di gayi hai intekhabaat ke ineqad tak Sadar Raj nafiz kardiya jaye. Party leaders ney kaha ke Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke Chief Minister barqarar rehtay huwe saaf o shafaaf intekhabaat ka ineqaad na mumkin hai. Telangana mein qabl az waqt intekhabaat thopne ki soorat mein hum Suprem Court se Rooju hon ge. Yaad rahay ke saal ke avaakhir mein Assembly intekhabaat ko yakeeni bananay Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ko tahleel kardiya tha. Unhen intekhabaat ke elaan tak kaarguzar Chief Minister muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huee Sadar Telangana Pradesh Congress Committee Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy ney kaha ke Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly tahleel kardainay ke baad Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe na sirf yeh kaha ke unhon ney Election Commission ke ohdedaron se baat cheet ki balkay yeh tak elaan kardiya ke November ke aakhir mein intekhabaat munaqqid honge aur Decemeber mein natayij ka elaan kardiya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke Election Commission ki janib se intekhabi Schedule ko raazdari mein rakhna chahiye tha magar unhon ney sab kuch aashkaar kardiya. Congress ney Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ko BJP aur Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ka pittoo qarar dete huwe kaha ke Jaria saal intekhabaat munaqqid nahi kiye jasakte chunkay Electoral List par nazarsani ka kaam jari hai. Governor ko paish kardah mahezar mein Oppostion Partiyon ke leaders ney ilzaam aayed kiya ke Mr Chandrashekar Rao Iqtedaar ka ghalat faida utha rahe hain aur Assembly ki tahleel ke baad ghair qanooni aur ghair dastoori iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Mahezar mein kaarguzar hukoomat ki janib se teen mhazon par ki gayi mudakhilat ki nishandahi ki gai ke 12 musheeron ka taqarrur kiya gaya hai jis ki koi zaroorat nahi hai, nazam o nasq unhen ab bhi tankhwahin aur bhatta ada kar raha hai. Isi tarha mansoobeh bandi bordke arkaan bhi hukoomat ke ikhtiyarat ka istemaal kar rahay hain, Chand Arkaan e Assembly aur mukhtalif Corporations ke Sudoor ko Cabinet Rank diya gaya hai aur un mein se chand TRS ke ticket par muqaabla karne walay hain jo ghair qanooni aur ghair dastoori hai. Congress Party, intekhabi mafahmat ke liye Telugu Desham Party aur baen baazu party ke ilawa Telangana Jana Samiti se baat cheet kar rahi hai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh o Sadar Telugu Desham Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu aur General Secretary CPI Mr. Sudhakar Reddy ke intekhabi mafahmat ka khairmaqdam karne ke baad hikmat e amli tayyar karne paanch rukni Monitoring Committee tashkeel di hai. Governor se mulaqaat karne walon mein Congress Party ke Captain Uttam Kumar, K Jana Reddy, DK Aruna, Sadar Telangana Jana Samiti Professor Kodandaram, Mr. Ravala Chandra Shekhar Rao aur deegar shaamil hain.
339.title: Telangana mein Sadar Raj nafiz karne oppostion ka mutaliba

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad High Court baraye Telangana o Andhra Pradesh ney aaj Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ki janib se riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf daayir kardah darkhwast ko kharij kardiya hai. Yeh darkhwast Nalgonda ke Advocate Mr. Rapolu Bhaskar ney Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke dosray din High Court mein darkhwast daayir karte huwe istedua ki thi ke Election Commission of India ko hidayat di jaye ke riyasati Assembly ki 5 sala miyaad ki takmeel se qabl intekhabaat na karwanay ki hidayat di jaye. Advocate ney apni darkhwast mein bayan kiya tha ke paishgi intekhabaat se awaami khazana par bhaari maali bojh aayed hoga aur TRS ney riyasat mein qabl az waqt intekhabaat ke liye koi mouzoon wajah nahi batay hai. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke riyasati Assembly ke intekhabaat, aayindah saal munaqqid shudni Lok Sabha ke intekhabaat ke saath karwaye jaaney ki soorat mein 200 crore rupay ki awaami raqam ki bachat hogi. Yaad rahay ke riyasati Assembly ki miyaad aayindah saal May tak thi taham Sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti o Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney aayindah baras Lok Sabha intekhabaat ke sath riyasati Assembly ke bayak waqt intekhabaat se guraiz karne ke liye riyasati Assembly ko Jaria mah ke awayil mein tahleel kardiya tha takey Election Commission ko saal ke avaakhir mein Mulk ki deegar chaar ryastaon ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat karwanay mein aasani hojaye.
349.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf darkhast HC mein kharij

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ayodhya mein Babri Masjid ki jagah par Ram Mandir taameer karne ke apne wada ko wafa na karne ka Bharatiya Janata Party par ilzaam aayed karte huwe Antararashriya Hindu Parishad (AHP) ke Sadar Praveen Togadia ney aaj kaha ke Mandir ki taameer ka mutaleba karte huwe 21

October ko Lucknow taa Ayodhya ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Rally nikaali jaye gi. Yahan akhbaari numayindon se baat cheet karte huwe Praveen Togadia ney kaha ke BJP hukoomat ney Ayodhya mein Ram Mandir ki taameer ke apne wada ko faramosh kardiya hai, is liye AHP ney faisla kiya hai ke hukoomat ki janib se Mandir ki taameer mein takheer ke khilaaf bator ehtejaj 21

October ko ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Really munazzam ki jaye. Unhon ne kaha ke BJP ney Talaq e salasa par imtena ke liye Parliament mein qanoon paish kiya hai magar Ram Mandir ki taameer ke liye koi iqdaam nahi kiya. Praveen Bhai Togadia jinhon ne Vishwa Hindu Parishad se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karte huwe Anatarashtriya Hindu Parishad ke naam se aik nai tanzeem qaayim ki hai phir se sargaram dikhayi dey rahay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke agar Hukumat is masla par ahadband hai to usay chahiye ke Parliament mein aik qanoon manzoor karte huwe Mandir ki taameer kare. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP ko yeh wazeh karna hoga ke aaya woh Hindon ki taayeed chahti hai ya nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP, Hindon par inhisaar karti hai aur Hindu, BJP par inhisaar nahi karte. Unhon ney yeh bhi ilzaam aayed kiya ke BJP hukoomat ghair qanooni Bangladeshiyon ko Mulk se nikaal bahar karne mein nakaam rahi hai. AHP leader ney kaha ke Telangana Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao kisanon ke liye achha kaam kar rahay hain aur un jaisa kaam Mulk ki kisi riyasat mein nahi ho raha hai taham ilzaam aayed kiya ke Bhagyanagar (Hyderabad) mein Hindu mehfooz nahi hain.
360.title: Praveen Togadia ki Chalo Ayodhya rally

news_detail: Lucknow mein Hindu aur Muslim mazhab se talluq rakhnay walay joday ko Passport mil gaya, jabkay un ki arzi kharij karne, inhen mobayyana tor par be izzat aur mazhab tabdeeli ka mutalba karne walay Passport Officer ka tabadlah karkay maamla ki tehqeeq ka hukum day diya gaya. wizarat kharja ke secretary D M Mulay ney waqea ka notice letay hue jald hi munasib karwai ki yaqeen dehani karai hai. Jabkay mutasirah joday ko budh ko Passport office bulaya gaya aur aaj inhen Passport bana kar day diya gaya. wazeh rahay ke Passport Officer ki janib se joday ko Passport ke ajra ki darkhwast kharij karte hue wajah batayi ke woh allag allag mazhab se hain aur shohar se kaha gaya tha ke agar woh chahtay hain ke Passport jari kya jaye to woh Hindu mazhab ko ikhtiyar karlen. waqea ke baad media se baat cheet karte hue ans aur Tanvi ney ilzaam lagaya ke Passport Officer ney bain mazahab shadi ki wajah se inhen sharminda karte hue un ki darkhwast kharij kar di thi. ans ney bataya ke is Officer ney inhen apna mazhab tabdeel karkay Hindu ban’nay ki bhi naseehat ki jis ke baad joday ney wazeer kharja Sushma Swaraj aur daftar wazeer e azam ku tweet karkay is ki maloomat di aur is maamla mein mudakhlat ki appeal ki. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Mohammad ans Siddiqui ney saal 2007 mein Lucknow mein Tanvi sith ke sath shadi ki thi jinhein aik beti bhi hai. is joday ney apne Sabiqa naamon ko hi barqarar rakha aur apni ahliya ke Passport ke liye darkhwast di thi. 20 June ko Lucknow ke Passport office mein un ka appointment thajs mein joday ney interview stage ae aur bi clear karliya tha, magar si stage mein poochay gay salawon ko le kar kuch masla sun-hwa tha. ans ney bataya ke mujh se pehlay meri ahliya ki baari aayi. woh si 5? kavntr par gayi to vikas mishra naam ka aik Officer is ke dastaweez check karne laga. jab is ney shohar / biwi ke naam ke colum mein Mohammad ans Siddiqui likha dekha to meri ahliya par cheekhnay laga aur Officer ney meri ahliya se kaha ke usay mujh se shadi nahi karni chahiye thi. meri ahliya ro rahi thi jis ke baad Officer ney is se kaha ke woh sabhi dastaweez mein islaah karkay dobarah le aeye aur apne shohar ka naam tabdeel kardey jis ke liye inhen phairay lena hoga. ans ney bataya ke meri ahliya Tanvi ney Officer se kaha ke woh apna naam tabdeel karwana nahi chahti, kyunkay hamaray kunba ko is se koi pareshani nahi hai. yeh suntay hi Passport Officer ney is se kaha ke woh ae pi o office chali jaye kyunkay is ki fayil ae pi o office bhaije jarahi hai. ans Siddiqui ke mutabiq is ke baad Passport Officer vikas mishra ney mujhe bulaya aur be izzat karne laga. is ney kaha ke mein Hindu mazhab ikhtiyar karloon warna meri shadi tasleem nahi ki jaye gi. is ney kaha ke hamein phairay le kar shadi karni chahiye aur mazhab tabdeel karlena chahiye
224.title: Hindu Muslim joday ko Passport mil gaya

news_detail: Malaysian Venture Capital Fund Company’ cradle fund s d an. bi each d ke CEO 45 sala Nazrin Hussain raat ko kamray mein Mobile Phone phatnay se jaan bahaq hogaye. ghair mulki media ke mutabiq Nazrin Hussain raat ko apne kamray mein so rahay they ke achanak un ka Mobile phone phat gaya jis ki wajah se un ke sir par shadeed chout aayi aur kamrah mein aur un ke gaday mein aag bharak uthi jis se woh jaan bahaq hogaye. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq un ke paas do Mobile phones they jo un ke bed ke paas charging par lagey hue they. Nazrin Hussain ke psmandgan mein biwi aur teen bachay hain. police tehqiqaat kar rahi hai ke Nazrin Hussain ki mout sir par chout lagnay se hui ya kamray mein aag lagnay se peda honay walay dhuwen se yeh abhi taq maloom nahi ho saka hai. post martm report se mout ki asal wajah samnay aeye gi
243.title: Malaysian company ke CEO Mobile phatnay se jaan- bahaq

news_detail: Hyderabqad. Hyderabqad ki fouj daari adalat nay bachon ki smuggling aur inhen bacha mazdoori par jhonknay ke jurm mein 2 afraad ko 14 baras qaid bamushaqqat ki saza sunai gayi hai. deputy commissionaire of police south zone Mr. V Satyanarayana ke press release ke mutabiq Mohammad imtiaz mutawatin Nalanda ( Bihar ) aur Munna Chudi Saaz ko Bhavaninagar ni nagar police station ke hudood mein 2016 mein na baligh bachon ko Bihar se laakar Chudi Saazi ke kaam mein mashgool kardainay par girftar karliya gaya tha. commissionaire ki task force ( south zone ) team nay chhapa maartay hue 16 bachon ko bachaya tha jinhein Bihar se laakar yahan par chudion ki tayari ke kaam mein jhonk diya gaya tha. police nay is waqt kayi muqadmaat darj karte hue chand logon ko girftar kya tha. police ke mutabiq imtiaz aur Munna ke khilaaf do alhaidah muqadmaat darj kiye gaye they baad azan police nay un do muqadmaat mein charge shits daakhil ki thi. dono muqadmaat mein Munna ko mujrim paaya gaya aur usay do juraim ke liye 14 baras ki jail ki saza sunai gayi. Special Judge cum VIII Additional Metropolitan Sessions Judge Mr. M V Emanuel nay muqadmaat ki samaat ke baad mlzmin ko saza sunai
265.title: Child Trafficking par 14 saal jail

news_detail: Mukhalif simt se anay wali aik scooter se bachney ki koshish mein Tractor driver ke tawazun khodene se trali qareebi canal mein ja giri. zila Yadadari ke moza Laxmapuram ke qareeb moose nadi canal mein Tractor trali girjane se 17 halaak hogaye jin mein 14 khawateen aur aik kamsin shaamil hain. yeh waqea aaj din mein 10 : 00 bujey din paish aaya. mukhalif simt se anay wali aik scooter se bachney ki koshish ke douran Tractor ka driver apna tawazun kho betha. is haadsa mein deegar 7 log zakhmi hogaye. assistant commissionaire of police mister rmish jinhon naay bachao kamon ki nigrani ki bataya ke zakhmion ko qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya
287.title: Tractor Trolly canal mein girjane se 17 halaak

news_detail: Muzaffar Nagar. Yahan aaj aik bhangaar ki dukaan mein hue aik dhamaka mein 4 afraad bashamool do rahgir halaak hogaye aur teen log zakhmi hogaye. Police ney bataya ke shehar ke Servant Road ilaqa mein waqay aik scrapshop mein dhamaka se wahan puranay samaan ko ulat palat karne walay 50 sala Tazeem aur 55 sala Shahzad barsar mauqa halaak hogaye. Superintendent of Police (city) Umbir Singh ney kaha ke deegar do mahlukeen mein do rahgir hain jin ki shanakht hanooz nahi hosaki. Dhamaka ke baais do rahgir zakhmi hogaye thay jo hospital mein jaanbar na hosakay. Mazeed teen log jo dhamaka ke waqt wahan se guzar rahay thay zakhmi hogaye jinhein hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Circle Officer Harish Bhadoria ney kaha ke dhamaka us waqt huwa jab chand log dukaan mein puranay samaan ko tod rahe thay. Police aur fire brigade ke ohdedar muqam e haadisa pahonch gay aur bachao kaam ka aaghaz kardiya. Police ohdedaron ney bataya ke muqam haadisa ko mohar band kardiya gaya hai aur us maaddah ka pata laganay ke liye jaanch shuru kar di gayi jis ke baayes dhamaka huwa. Police ke sarbarah Anant Dev ka kehna hai ke dhamaka Uttar Pradesh ke maghribi hissay mein waqay muzaffar Muzaffarnagar mein huwa, dhamaka ka sabab aur is ki noiyat ke baarey mein mukhtalif pehloun se tehqiqaat jaari hain, dhamaka time device se kya gaya ya is ki wajah kuch aur thi abhi is ki tasdeeq nahi kar satke taa hum dhamaka shadeed noiyat ka tha jis ki awazz kai kilometer tak suni gayi. Anant Dev ka kehna hai ke dhamaka ke maqam se khoon alood hathora aur iskaro driver mila hai jis ki bunyaad par gumaa noon hai ke dhamaka kisi cheez ko tornay ke douran huwa.
303.title: Uttar Pradesh ki scrap shop mein dhamaka, 4 halaak

news_detail: Saudi Arbia ki Police ne un it-tila-aat ki tardeed kar di hai ke Saudi hukoomat ki khawateen ko gaari khud chalanay ki ijazat ke baad pehlay hi roz khatoon driver se pehla hadasa hogaya. Social Media par is khsoos mein aik video vayrl hogaya jis mein yeh daawa kya gaya ke hadasa paish anay wali gaari aik khatoon chala rahi thi taham khush qismati se is hadasa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa. Saudi khawateen ko driving ki ijazat 28 saal baad mili hai. Social Media mein yeh khabar phailai gayi ke ijazat ke pehlay hi roz Abdul Aziz road par khatoon driver ki gaari hadasa ka shikaar ho gayi. hadasa mein khatoon driver mehfooz rahen, is khsoos mein aik video bhi jari ki gayi jis mein yeh dekha ja sakta hai ke gaari ka agla hissa zameen ki janib jabkay gaari ka pichla hissa sun-hwa mein muallaq hai. tabook ke red krisnt ke aik ohdedar ne kaha ke yeh afwaah hai. unhon ne bataya ke operations room ko yeh ittila di gayi thi ke tabook ilaqa mein 30 sala mard ko hadasa paish aaya. inhen king Khalid hasptl ko muntaqil kya gaya jahan un ki haalat mustahkam hai
317.title: Saudi Arab mein khatoon driver se pehlay hadasa ki afwaah

news_detail: Paris : France mein musalmanoon par hamla karne ki mansoobah bandi karne walay dayen baazu se talluq rakhnay walay 10 shiddat pasand esaion ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq France aur bahera room ke jazeera Corsica mein dayen baazu se talluq rakhnay walay 10 intahaa pasandon ko girftar kya gaya hai, yeh afraad mukhtalif maqamat par musalmanoon ki abadi aur msajd par hamla karne ke liye mansoobah bandi kar rahay thay. girftar muliman mein aik aisa 65 sala French shehri bhi shaamil hai, jo maazi mein police ahelkaar raha hai. hirasat mein liye gaye shiddat pasandon ko namaloom maqam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai jahan un se tafteesh ke douran ahem maloomat ke husool ki tawaqqa ki ja rahi hai. France ke wazeer e dakhla Gerard Collomb  ne shiddat pasandon ki giraftari ki tasdeeq karte hue director general intelli jins ka shukriya ada kya. media se guftagu karte hue unhon ne dgsi ki dehshat gardi ke khilaaf karwaiyon ki tareef ki aur dehshat gardi aur shiddat pasandi ko jarr se ukhaar phainknay ke azm ka iada kya hai. wazeh rahay ke France mein shiddat pasandon ki janib se aqlityon ki ibadat gaahon ko nishana bananay aur tarkin watan ke khilaaf nafrat amaiz muhim chalanay ke waqeat mein izafah dekhnay mein aaya hai jis ke sad-e-baab ke liye France ki hukoomat ne malik ki intelli jins idaray ke sarbarah ko ahem zimma dariyan tafweez ki theen.
332.title: France mein musalmanoon par hamlon ke mansoobay nakaam, 10 intahaa pasand girftar

news_detail: Thailand mein bachon ki Football Team coach sameit sailaabi pani se bharay Gaar mein phans gayi, navy ke tairaak aur under water drones ne talashi muhim shuru ki thi taham pani ki satah barh janey aur taiz barish ke baais bachao ke kamon ko earzi tor par rokkk diya. khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq bachon ki Team hafta ki shumali Thailand mein soobah Chiang Rai mein Tham Luang Nang Non gaar mein Naujawan Khiladi pani mein phans gaye hon ge .

Yeh Team hafta ki shab lapata hui thi, Team mein giyarah se solah baras ke baara bachay aur un ka pachees sala coach shaamil hai, shadeed baarisho ke baais pani se bharay Gaar ke bahar bachon ki cyclen aur un ke jootay bhi mil gaye hain. chay se das kilometer lambay Gaar ke pani mein navy ke tairaak, under water drones aur imdadi kaarkunon ki temen bachon ki talaash kar rahi hain. soobah Chiang Rai ke deputy governor Passakorn Boonyalak ne kaha ke hunooz hamein umeed hai ke Gaar mein phansay hue Khiladi zinda hon ge
347.title: Thailand: Bachon ki Football Team sailaabi pani se bharay Gaar mein phans gayi

news_detail: Riyadh mein khusoosi fouj daari adalat ney aik Saudi shehri ko 9 saal jail ki saza sunai hai. Saudi shehri par ilzaam tha ke is ney Security hakkaam ko matloob apni behan ko chupaya aur woh Security ahal karon par fayrng mein bhi mulawis raha hai. mulzim ki saza ki muddat ke barabar arsa taq is par malik se bahar safar karne par bhi pabandi ho gi. adalti karwai mein mazkoorah ilzamaat ke ilawa mulzim ke hungama aarai karne walay majmaa ke sath shirkat aur is ke liye support paish karne ko bhi zair ghhor laya gaya. Saudi roznama “Okaz” ke mutabiq mulzim ke khilaaf yeh amar bhi saabit sun-hwa hai ke is ney manshiat ki tijarat ki gharz se 2 afraad se mulaqaat ki aur Security forces ko aan ke baray mein aagah nahi kya. woh Hasheesh aur mamnuaa” captagone” capsule ki khareed aur phelao mein shareek raha. is ney manshiat ki tijarat ke zareya raqam haasil ki.
355.title: Security Hukkaam ko matloob behan ko chupane ka ilzaam, Saudi shehri ko 9 saal ki jail

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mutasib logon ke aik group ney ek shakhs ko mehez is liye chaaqo ghonp kar shadeed kardiya ke is ney aik Muslim Ladki ko goad liya tha. hamla awaron ney is par chaaqo ke 16 zarbaat lagaye. is shakhs ki shanakht Papalal Ravikanth ki hesiyat se ki gayi jo karishmati tor par shadeed chouten lagnay ke bawajood jaanbar hogaya aur usmaniya hasptl mein zair e ilaaj hai. yeh waqea yakam June ko paish aaya, tafseelaat ke bamawajib hndon ki aik touli ney jin mein ziyada tar isi mohalla ke thay jahan Papalal rehtay hain, un ke ghar puhanche aur is par chaaqo ke 16 waar kiye aur inhen khoon mein luth puth chodh kar chalay gaye. is waqt Ravikanth ki biwi aur bachay peenay ka pani laane ghar ke bahar gaye hue thay, baad azan unhon ney Ravikanth ko usmaniya general hasptl pohanchaya. papa laal ney bataya ke hamla ke teen din baad inhen hosh aaya. paanch hamla awaron ko grftarkya gaya tha magar sirf do ko hi hirasat mein liya gaya. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke Police ney rishwat le kar case ko kamzor kardiya hai. dakkan hirald ke mutabiq Sania ney kaha’ ‘ mere waalid har waqt meri hifazat karte hain, lekin mere school ney jahan hum parhte hain hamein yeh kehte hue nikaal dya ke hum bayes takleef hain chunkay mujhe hamesha ladke chairtay hain. Ladki ney kaha ke woh aik Police officer ban-na chahti hain aur corruption ke khilaaf larray gi. hum sirf insaaf chahtay hain aur kuch nahi. jin logon ney mere waalid ko maar daalna chaha woh galiyo mein azad ghoom rahay hain magar mein mere waalid ke liye lardte rahon gi .

Rajpot gharana se talluq rakhnay walay Papalal aur un ki ahliya jeya shree ney apni baradri ki khwahish ke barkhilaf Sania Fatima ko goad liya. yeh Ladki 2007 hamza ke Hyderabad bomb dhmakon mein apne walidain se mahroom hogayi thi. yeh Ladki Gokul Chat ke qareeb dastyab hui thi jahan augst 2007 hamza mein aik zor daar dhamaka sun-hwa tha. is jorey ney Ladki ko apne ghar laya tha taham musalmanoon aur hndon dono baradrion ney aik Muslim Ladki ki parwarish aik ghair Muslim khandan mein parwarish par aitraaz kya tha. is qatilana hamla ke bawajood is jorey ney is azm ka iradah kya ke woh kisi bhi haalat mein Ladki ki parwarish se dastbardaar nahi hon ge. unhon ney yeh id-daa kya ke Ladki ki nighdasht aur parwarish aik Muslim ke tor par ki jarahi hai aur usay apne Hindu mazhab par amal karne ke liye majboor nahi kya ja raha hai. Papalal jo mandaroon ke liye mortiyon ki paintings banatay hain, news 18 ko bataya ke Sania Fatima ney 2007 bomb dhamaka mein –apne khandan ko khoodia aur jab kisi ney Ladki par apna daawa paish nahi kya to hum usay apne ghar le aaye, is ney hamaray ghar mein khusihyan bhar deen. hum Hindu. Muslim ke farq par yaqeen nahi rakhtay. hum insaaniyat par yaqeen rakhtay hain. woh meri barri beti hai mein kisi qeemat par bhi usay nahi choroon ga. is jorey ney ilzaam aed kya ke nah hi Police aur nah hi hukoomat inhen tahaffuz faraham kar rahi hai. yeh kayi barson se chal raha hai, hum se kaha gaya ke usay talak nah lagaya jaye. is ke baad kuch logon ney kaha ke is ka naam anjali ya Sonia rakh diya jaye. agroh islam par amal pera hona chahti hai to hamein koi masla nahi hai. hum ittehaad par, hum ahangi yaqeen rakhtay hain aur har aik se appeal karte hain ke aman se rahen. yeh jora Sania ko achi taleem dila raha hai taakay woh –apne peeron par khud khari hosakay. jeya shree ney bataya ke muqami Hindu ladke, Sania ko harasan wo pareshan kar rahay hain aur. woh bhi naveen jamaat mein hai. mere shohar ney inhen kayi martaba mutnabba kya tha. inhen is baat ki raqabat hai ke hum ney aik Muslim Ladki ki parwarish ki hai. Sania ko goad lainay ke baad hi is jorey ko teen bachay Ekta, Umanand aur Prarthana hue
365.title: Muslim Ladki ko Goad lene walay shakhs par jaan lewa hamza hamla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi khandan ney wazeer umoor kharja mohtarma Swshma Swaraj se mutalba kya ke Damam, Saudi Arbia mein mushtaba haalat mein faut hojane wali tehseen Sultana ki mout ki tehqiqaat ki jaye. mutawaffia ki behan Parveen Sultana ney id-daa kya ke un ko shuba hai ke un ki behan gharelo tashadud ka shikaar hui hogi aur shohar ney hi usay qatal kardiya ho. unhon ney bataya ke chaar saal qabal un ki behan ki shadi Mohammad Umar se hui thi. shadi ke fori baad hi un ki behan ko ssrali rishta daar harasan karna shuru kardiya tha aur jahez talabb karne lagey they. aziat rasani se aajiz aakar un ki behan –apne shohar ke paas chali gayi thi lekin wahan bhi woh zehni o jismani aziat kashkar banti gayi. un ke shohar inhen zado kob bhi karta tha. Parveen ney bataya ke un ki behan se aakhri martaba woh 3 June ko baat hui thi aur un ki behan ney phone par shohar ki harasani ki shikayat ki thi. is ke baad se behan se rabita qaim nahi ho saka jis se woh ghabra kar apni behan ke parosi ko phone kyajs par inhen pata chala ke tehseen Sultana ki mushtaba haalat mein mout hochuki hai. Parveen ney bataya ke inhen shuba hai ke shohar Mohammed Umar ney hi qatal kya hoga. unhon ney bataya ke hum ney Saudi Arbia mein hindustani sifarat khanah aur wazeer kharja mohtarma Swshma Swaraj ko maktubaat rawana karte hue un ki behan ki mout ki tehqiqaat krwane ka mutalba kiya hai. Saudi Arbia mein hindustani sifarat khanah ke ahdidaro n ney inhen is maamla ki jaanch karne aur insaaf dilanay ka wada kya hai. Parveen ney mutalba kiya hai ke un ki behan ko insaaf dilaya jaye aur laash ko Hyderabad wapas laane mein madad ki jaye.
205.title: Saudi Arbia mein faut Hyderabadi khatoon ki mout ki tahaqeeq karne sshma se mutalba

news_detail: Srikakulam. zila Srikakulam  ke summa pait mandal ke moza Yerramukam mein itwaar ko jungli reechh ke hamla mein aik 50 sala khatoon halaak aur deegar 7 zakhmi hogaye. zakhmi 7 afraad mein 4 ki haalat naazuk batee jati hai. barham dehation ne reechh ka taqub karte hue usay maar Dala . Mandasa mandal ke moza Patli ke qareeb reechh ko ghair kar mardeya gaya. mtofih ki shanakht bayi peli armila saakin Yerramukam ki hesiyat se ki gayi. yeh saneha itwaar ko subah ki awleen sa-aton mein muzafaat mein paish aaya. zaraye ke bamwajjib reechh ne armila par is waqt hamla kardiya jab woh kachra gaon ke bahar phainknay jarahi thi. reechh ke hamla ko dekhte hue mtofih ke shohar aur deegar dehati usay bachanay wahan puhanche aur reechh ku bhagane ki koshish ki taham un mein 7 log hamla mein zakhmi hogaye jinhein Palasa Government Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. armila ilaaj ke douran jaanbar nah hosaki. shadeed zakhmi 4 afraad ko baad azan king george Hospitals Visakapatnammuntaqil kardiya gaya. police ne aik muqadma darj karkay tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai
227.title: Reechh ke hamla mein khatoon halaak, 7 zakhmi

news_detail: New Delhi. Mukhtalif Social Networking sites par ” Keypad dehshat gardon” ki janib se post kiye jany walay keena parwar mawaad ke nikaalne par gaur karne wizarat dakhala mein peer ko aik aala satahih ijlaas munaqqid hoga, yeh nafrat ke sodagar afwahen pheilatay hue aur kisi waqea ko firqa waranah rang dete hue law and order masla paida karne internet par zeher ugalte hain. Ijlaas ki sadarat Secretary wizarat dakhila Mr. Rajiv Gauba  karen ge aur wizarat Electronics and Information Tecnology ke sarkardah ohdedar, mehakuma Telecommunications aur Security Agencies ke sath sath Jammu & Kashmir ke ohdedar bhi shirkat karen ge. Ohdedaron ke mutabiq ijlaas mein SEcurity Agencies ko is laanat se nimatnay qanoon information tecnology ki daf-aat par amal daraamad par gaur vkhoz hogajs mein f aayi are ka indraaj, Service Providers ke ishtiraak se ibtidayi marhala mein hi nafrat angaiz mawaad ko nikaal dainay aur aajilaana qanooni karwaiyon ko yakeeni banana shaamil hai taakay yeh dosaron ke liye aik sabaq ho.”Keypad dehshat gardon” par qaboo panay ke khayaal ke pas parda maqsad yeh hai ke SEcurity ayjnsiz haqeeqi bandoqon ko istemaal karne walay dehshat gardon ko pakarney aur un ka khatima karne se ziyada un par tavajja markooz kere jo Keypad istemaal karte hue sarkari macinary ke khilaaf jung chairr rakhi hai. aik ohdedar ne khayaal zahir kya ke internet majazi maidan jung hai, jahan aik khonriz jung ladi jati hai magar alfaaz se, jis ke asraat navjawan ke Izhan par parte hain. ohdedaron ne kaha ke yeh naya maidan jung riwayati hathyaaron se daur hai aur naye daur ke ladake waadi ya beron malik kahin se kmpotr ya Smart Phones istemaal karte hue apne gharon ke andar morcha band hokar ya kisi qareebi kife ya sarrak ke kinare se galiyo mein nikal kar jung shuru kardete hain. samgha jata hai ke is ijlaas mein Social Media par ki janey wali posts par kari nazrain rakhnay ke naye tareeqa car ikhtiyar karne balkay murawaja qawaneen mein tarameem ya phir naye qanoon ki tadween ki tajaweez paish ki jayen gi
241.title: Keypad dehshat gardi par qaboo panay wizarat dakhla ka aala satahih ijlaas

news_detail: Lucknow. Gorakhpur ke BRD  Medical College mein qillat oxygen ke saneha mein makhoz Dr. kafeel Khan ke chhootey bhai par itwaar ki shab namaloom hamla awaron ney golian chalayein. 34 sala Jameel Khan ko is waqt star parivate hasptl mein shareek karwaya gaya hai. un ke mondhe, gardan aur thorhee par golian lagen. Dr. kafeel Khan ney kaha ke un ke bhai par golian chalaye gayeen. mein jaanta tha ke woh hamein maar daalnay ki koshish karen ge. hum nahi jantay ke kis ney mere bhai ko qatal karne ki koshish ki hai. un ki haalat is waqt bohat naazuk hai. bataya jata hai ke kotwali police station ilaqa mein Dargah abadi ilaqa mein do namaloom motorcycle sawaron ney yeh hamla kya. un ke brother nisbati Samer Khan ney kaha ke fi al-waqt hamaray baray mein hamaray paas bohat kam maloomat hain. jis waqt un par golian chalaye gayeen woh apni motor bike scooty par they. Dr. kafeel ney BRD  Medical College mein oxygen ki qillat par bar waqat mutharrak hotay hue bahar se gas cylenders ki farahmi ka intizam karte hue kayi bachon ki zindaganian bachaai theen taham yogi aadtih nath sarkar ney inhen hi mulzim qarar daitay hue guzashta saal September mein jail bhaij diya tha. woh aath mah jail mein guzarnay ke baad chand din qabal hi zamanat par raha hue they. is saneha 30 sher khawar bachon ki jaanen gayi theen. Dr. kafeel ney haal hi mein kerrala mein apni khidmaat injaam dainay ki peshkash ki thi jahan Nepha virus ki wabaa phaily hui hai. Chief Ministerutar pardesh yogi aadtih nath itwaar ke din gorkh poor mein hi they. police ney namaloom hamla awaron ke khilaaf muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. kotwali police station ke SHO Ghanshyam Tiwari ney bta ya ke Jameel ney hamein bataya ke raat 10 : 30 bujey Durgavahani crossing ke qareeb do motorcycle sawaron ney inhen roka aur un par teen golian chladin. muqami logon ney inhen khangi hospital muntaqil kya. circle officer ( city ) Atul Kumar Chubey ney kaha ke police ko waqea ke taqreeban adhay ghanta baad mutala kya gaya. unhon ney kaha ke jab police ko pata chala is waqt Jameel ka ilaaj chal raha tha aur ab un ki haalat mustahkam hai aur woh khatrah se bahar hain. tibbi jaanch ke liye Jameel ko paiir ke din sarkari hospital muntaqil kardiya jaye ga
256.title: Dr. kafeel Khan ke bhai par namaalom bandooq bardaroon ka hamla

news_detail: New Delhi. Aik khud sakhta Godman Daati Maharaj ke khilaaf new Delhi mein aik khatoon mutaqid ki mobayyana asmat raizi karne ke ilzaam mein muqadma darj kya gaya. police zaraye ke bamawajib itwaar ko Fatahpur Berry mein aik muqadma darj kya gaya aur baad azan district investy gation unit DIU ) ko muntaqil kardiya gaya. Daati Maharajke khilaaf qanoon tazirat hind ki daf-aat 376, 377, 354 & 34 ke tehat muqadma darj kya gaya hai. khatoon ny ilzaam aed kya ke do saal qabal shani dhaam ke andar is ki asmat raizi ki gayi. khatoon ny bataya ke khud sakhta Maharaj ke khauf se is ny waqea ke fori baad shikayat darj karwa nah saki thi
270.title: Khud sakhta Godman par asmat raizi ka ilzaam

news_detail: Andhra Pradesh ke aarzi mulazmeen ke liye aik haqeeqi khushkhabri hai. Andhra Pradesh kabina ki zeli committee ne 25 November 1993 se qabal mulazmat mein shamoliat akhtyarkrne walay aarzi mulazmeen ko dasvin Pay Commission ki sharah par tnkhwahin aisaal karne ka faisla kya hai. reyasti wazeer Kalva Srinivasulu ne aaj is ka elaan kya. unhon ne kaha ke is faisla se taqreeban 5, 000 aarzi mulazmeen ko faida puhanche ga .
305.title: Paanch hazaar contract mulazmeen ko dasvin Pay Commission ke mutabiq tnkhwahin

news_detail: Brazil mein aik navzaidah bachi ko 7 ghanton baad bchalyagya jisay is ke afraad khandan ney zindah dfnadya tha. barazili police ney Mato Grasso State mein Xingo National Park mein desi bachi ko dafan kiye janay ke 7 ghanton baad qabar khoud kar bchalya. Canarana town mein matti ke neechay 7 ghanton taq be kafan dafan rehne ke bawajood bachi ki sansen chal rahi theen. muqami khabar rasa idaron ke mutabiq police ko aik anjaan shakhs ney ittila di thi jis par fori karwai karte hue 50 snti meter garhay mein dafan bachi ko nikaal liya gaya hai. maan ki nani ko girftar karte hue is par qatal ka muqadma dair kya gaya hai. state prosecutor Paulo Robertu do Prado ney ae f pi ko bataya ke hum tahaqeeq kar rahay hain ke aaya yeh shirkhwar ko maarny ki mobayyana koshish thi ya phir woh samjhi ke bachi mar chuki hai. Kamayura tribe se talluq rakhnay walay khandan ney police ko bataya ke bachi ki 15 sala maa ke mangal ko bachi ke janam dainay ke baad woh farsh se takra gayi thi aur woh kuch halchal nahi kar rahi thi is liye yeh samgha gaya ke woh mar chuki hai aur usay muqami rasomaat ke mutabiq dafan kardiya gaya. taham bachi ko janam dainay wali maan ki umar aur navzaidah ke baap ki janib se bachi ko apni aulaad tasleem se inkaar karne par police ka shuba barh gaya. bachi ko bacha lene ke baad Boa Agua Hospital ke intensive care muntaqil kardiya gaya. police ney bachi ki maa aur is ki nani ko hirasat mein le liya tha aur phir baad azan inhen raha kardiya gaya
326.title: Zindah dafnayi gayi navzaidah bachi ko 7 ghanton baad bchalya gaya

news_detail: Lo aap apne daam mein sayyad aagya hai ke misdaaq qanoon nafiz karne walay hi aaj qanoon ki zad mein aagaye. Humayunnagar Police Station ke Sub Inspector C.H Srikant aur Police Constable Mohammad Raheem Pasha ko Anti Corruption Bureau ney bees hazaar rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon giraftar karliya. tafseelaat ke bamawajib chand Jaria saal mah January mein captain claim par jaan lewa hamla ke silsila mein giraftar Saood amoodi ke bhai Mahmood amoodi ko yeh kehte hue harasan kya ja raha tha keh inhen bhi iqdaam qatal ke is muqadma mein makhoz kardiya jaye ga. shikayat kanandah Mahmood amoodi ka kehna hai ke inhen musalsal harasan kya ja raha tha aur 12 dinon taq ghair qanooni tor par hirasat mein bhi rakha gaya tha. un se ta haal 2 laakh rupay bhi wusool karliye gaye aur mazeed 50 hazaar rupay dainay par muqadma se kharij kardainay ki peshkash ki thi. Mahmood Ali amoodi ney police ki musalsal harasani aur rishwat talabi se aajiz aakar woh anti corruption Bureau se rujoo hue aur ohdedaron ke mahswara par dono police ohdedaron ko Mansahab Tank bridge ke neechay raqam dainay ke liye talabb kya. ae si bi ke ohdedaron ney dono ko raqam wusool karte hue rangay hathon giraftar karliya aur un ke qabza se rishwat mein di gayi raqam bhi bar aamad karli. ae si bi ney is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karliya aur inhen ae si bi ki khusoosi adalat mein paish kya ja raha hai.
336.title: Humayun Nagar Police Station ke Sub Inspector aur Constable rishwat letay hue giraftar

news_detail: Junoobi Africa ke darul-hukumat Cape Town ki Masjid mein chaako bardaar shakhs ke hamla mein 2 afraad jaan bahaq aur mutadid zakhmi ho gaye taham hamla aawar ko police ney goli maar kar halaak kardiya hai. police zaraye ke mutabiq chaako bardaar shakhs ney Cape Town ke qareebi qasbay Malmesbury mein Masjid mein logon par hamla kya, chaako ke waar se 2 afraad jaan bahaq, mutadid zakhmi hogaye jinhein tibbi imdaad faraham karne ke liye hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. waardaat ke waqt Masjid mein mojood afraad subah ki namaz ada karne mein masroof they taham police ney is waqea ki tafteesh shuru kar di hai. jis shakhs ney Cape Town Masjid mein qatal kya tha woh ajnabi tha aur panah ka taalib tha. Imran muqaddam jinhon ney bataya ke aik mahlook un ki cosuon ke shohar they, ittila di ke chaako bardaar chaharshanba ki shab Masjid pouncha jahan mahlook aitekaf mein they, un se aitekaf mein shaamil honay ki darkhwast ki. jab qaatil ney un ke behnoi ka gilah kaata tha is waqt mehv khawab they. police ney bataya ke Officers ke wahan pounchanay aur usay goli maardenay taq qaatil ney aik aur mutakif ko qatal aur kayi logon ko zakhmi kardiya.
348.title: Cape Town Masjid mein hamla, 2 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: Funds ke ghalat istemaal par Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya Sara Netaneyahu par jaria hafta fard jurm aayed honay ka imkaan hai. Wazeer e Azam Israel aur un ki ahliya ke khilaaf  badunwaniyon ke kayi ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat jari hain. Sara Netaneyahu par ilzaam hai ke unhon ney bawarchi ki maujoodgi ko khufia rakh kar baher se khana mangawaya tha. unhon ne sawwa crore rupay ke khaane wazeer e azam house mein jealsaazi se mangwaye they. Ghair mulki Media ke mutabiq Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya aur wazeer e azam house ke mouattal Deputy Director General ko dhoka dahi ka yeh ilzaam saabit hojane par 5 baras qaid ki saza hosakti hai. Attorney General Avicahi Mandelbit aur State Prosecutor Shai Nitzen tawaqqa hai ke apne faisla ka elaan karenge ke mulk ki ahem shakhsiyat ki ahliya ke khilaaf qanooni karwai ki jaye gi ya nahi. Agarchay sarkari taur par is ziman mein koi faisla hunooz nahi kya gaya hai magar it-tila-aat yeh ishara deti hain ke Netinyahu ke wukla ke sath moahida ki nakami ki soorat mein Wazeer e Azam ki ahliya ko maakhoz kiya jaye ga. Mrs Netinyahu par jo aik child psychologist theen, Wazeer e Azam ki sarkari rehaish gaah par khaano ki adai mein tax dahindgaan ke funds ka ghalat istemaal karne ka ilzaam hai. Balfort Street ke ghar par bawarchion ki adam mojoodgi ka ta-assur dete hue yeh bawar karwaya ke qawaid ki khilaaf warzi mein bahar se khana mngwaya jata raha hai. ilzaam hai ke jealsaazi ke zareya Chefs aur Restaurants ko 359, 000 shackle ( 102, 000 Amrici $ ) ke orders dyie gaye. Reports ke mutabiq Netinyahu ke wukla ke sath mafahmat ki soorat mein fard jurm ka aayed kyajana moqoof hosktahe jis ke tehat inhen hukoomat ko istemaal shuda raqam wapas lotana hoga. bataya jata hai ke sara Netinyahu se kaha gaya ke maamlat darkhwast mein woh ibtida mein nis 200, 000 ( 56, 128 Amrici dollar ) ada karen jis ko unhon ney yeh kehte hue yklkht mustard kardiya ke raqam baazadai ki bajaye jail jana gawara karen gi. mrs Netinyahu ke wukla ney id-daa kya ke sara ney un ke akhrajaat ki tafseelaat ki nigrani ke liye Wazeer e Azam ke daftar aur Wazeer e Azam ki rahaish gaah ki maaliyati waa intezaami teamon par aetmaad kya aur woh is waqt la ilm theen ke woh aik jurm ka irtikaab kar rahi hain. unhon ney istadlaal paish kya ke is terhan woh jaan boojh kar jurm ka irtikaab nahi kya hai
367.title: Funds ka galat istemaal, Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya ku makhoz kiye janay ka imkaan

news_detail: Aik chaukas musafir ney 26 nav-umar ladkiyon ko smuggle honey se bacha liya. Media ke mutabiq riyasat utar pradesh mein 1 shakhs train mein safar kar raha tha ke is ney mehsoos kya ke yeh larkiyan pareshani mein hain aur ru bhi rahi hain. is tweet par sikoriti ohdedaron ney Muzaffarpur. Bandra Awadh Express Train se ladkiyon ko bchalya jin mein ziyada tar no umar theen. is ney apne tweet par Railway ko tweet kya tha. Is ney tweet kya ke woh train ke S-5 coach mein safar kar raha hai yeh mehsoos kya ke taqreeban 25 ladkiyan rorhi hain aur ghair mehfooz mehsoos kar rahi hain. Musafir ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi, wazeer railway Pyosh Goel, Junior Minister Manoj Sinha, Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh yogi aadtih nath ko apne tweet mein tag kya tha. Tweet intibah ke ghanton andar Varanasi aur Lucknow mein ohdedar, Railway Police aur Railway Protection Force ke ohdedar vn ke sath harkat mein aagaye aur ladkiyon ko bchalya. Gorakhpur mein railway police ney child line ke sath police ke Antitrafficking Squad ko taawun faraham kya, baad azan kuch police ohdedar saada libaas mein captain ganj mein train mein daakhil hue aur inhen Gorakhpur taq scart faraham kya. yeh larkiyan do mard admion ke sath payi gayi theen jin ki umrein 22 aur 55 baras ki theen. Ladkiyon ke walidain ko aagah kardiya gaya.
240.title: Musafir ke aik tweet ney 26 ladkiyon ki jaan bchali

news_detail: Bangkok: Thailand mein rescue ahelkaar zair e aab ghaar mein phansay 13 mein se 6 bachon ko bahafazat nikaalte mein kamyaab hogaye hain. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq imdadi team ke ehalkaron ne kamyaab rescue operation ke douran ziraab ghaar mein phansay school football team ke 12 kam sun khiladion aur coach mein se 6 bachon ko bahar nikaalte mein kamyaab ho gay hain. rescue team ne 6 bachon ko do waqfon mein ghaar se bahar nikala. Ghaar se nikalay jane walay pehlay 4 bachon ko ambulance ke zareya field hospital le jaya gaya jahan un ka jismani muaina kya gaya jab ke deegar dobchon ko ghaar ke dhanay par qaim camp mein ibtidayi tibbi imdaad di gayi baad azan un do bachon ko bhi hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. rescue team, Thailand behria aur Amrican Navy ke aala hukkaam ne aik aala satah ke ijlaas mein ghaar mein phansay bachon ko nikaalte ke liye inhen teraaki sikahnay, pani nikal jane ka intzaar karne aur bachon tak pounchanay ke liye dosray rastay ke a? pshn par ghhor kya jis ke baad a? j subah dramayi andaaz mein imdadi kaam ka aaghaz kya gaya. wazeh rahay ke school football team ke 12 nau umar khilari aur coach 30
June ko picnic manatey hue aik ghaar mein daakhil hue jahan achanak pani bharnay ke baais yeh log zair aabb ghaar ke ikhtitami hissa mein phas gay they. rescue team ne 2
July ko un bachon ka suraagh laga liya tha jis ke baad operation mein taizi aagai thi.
259.title: Thailand ke ghaar mein phansay 13 mein se 6 bachon ko bahafazat nikaal liya gaya

news_detail: Tehran: Iran ne Parliament aur Ayatullah Khamini ke mazaar par hamlon ke ilzaam mein 8 afraad ko phansi day di. irani adliya ke sarkari khabar rasan idaara maizaan news agency ke mutabiq Daulat Islamia Iraq o Shaam ( ISIS ) se talluq rakhnay walay 8 afraad ko szaye mout day di gayi. phansi panay walon mein Sulaiman Muzafari, Ismael Sufi, Rehman Behrose , Majeed Murtuzai, Sarosh Azeezi, Ayub Ismayli, Khusru Ramazani aur Usmaan Behrose shaamil hain. 7 June 2017 ko Tehran mein Parliament aur Ayatullah Khamini ke mazaar par hamlon mein 18 afraad halaak aur 50 se zayed zakhmi ho gaye thay. ISIS ne is hamla ki zimma daari qubool ki thi .

Is hamla mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein barray pemanay par pakar dhkrh hui jin mein se 20 afraad par muqadma chalaya gaya. un mein se 8 ko phansi day di gayi hai jab ke baqi 12 se zayed mulzimaan ke khilaaf adalti karwai ab bhi jari hai. Parliament aur mazaar par hamla ke rad-e-amal mein irani force pasdaran inqilab ne shaam mein ISIS ke thikanon par missile hamlay bhi kiye thay
271.title: Iran ne Parliament par hamla ke ilzaam mein 8 afraad ko phansi daydi

news_detail: Hyderabad. zila Prakasm ke Aarthavedu mandal mein intermediate mein zair taleem aik taalib ilm ne apni hi class mein parhnay wali aik larki ko is ki taraf se diye gaye mohabbat nama ko hawala karne se inkaar karne par satwen jamaat ke aik taalib ilm Rajesh ko aag lagadi. Police ne bataya ke Ranjit is baat par barham tha ke Rajesh ne is ke diye gaye mohabbat nama ko is ki mehbooba ke hawala karne ki bajaye usay phaar diya tha. is ne ladke par petrol chhrhk kar aag lagadi. buri terhan jhulas jaaney walay Rajesh ko qareebi hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya hai, is ki haalat tashweesh naak hai. police ne Ranjit ko girftar karte hue jail bhaij diya hai.
294.title: Mehbooba ko Love Letter dainay se inkaar par ladke ne kamsin ko aag lagadi

news_detail: Aik aur Saudi ladki online video game ‘Blue Whale’ ka shikaar ban gayi hai. Madinah Munawwara ki aik 13 sala ladki ney yeh game ka hissa ban’nay ke baad –apne ghar mein phansi le kar khudkushi karli. is se qabal bhi Saudi Arbia mein aik 12 sala larka Abdul Rahman al ahmari ney June ke avaakhr mein yeh khail khailtay hue aisa hi iqdaam karte hue khud ko halaak kardiya tha. is jaan lewa khail ney ab taq 100 se zayed jaanen le li hain. bataya jata hai ke is khail ka hissa ban’nay walon ko 50 dinon mein online diye jaaney walay 50 challenges ko poora karna hota hai. ibtida hi se is game mein diye jaaney walay challenges khatarnaak hotay hain aur jon jon khailnay wala un challenges ko poora karte hue agay barhta jata hai, challenges khatarnaak se khatarnaak tareen aur jaan lewa ban jatay hain. Saudi Arbia mein haliya hafton mein yeh dosra waqea hai. yaad rahay ke is khail ke maujjid Philipp Budeikin  ko roosi hakkaam ney guzashta hafta girftar karte hue usay jail bhaij diya hai. is ney aik interview mein yeh qubool kya tha ke is ka maqsad no Umar logon ko khudkushi ki taraf dhakelna hai. Saudi arab mein Madinah Munawwara ki police ney aik bayan mein sarkari tor par is baat ki tasdeeq ki hai ke khudkushi karne wali ladki ke iqdaam ke peechay asal muharrak video game hai. is hawala se media tarjuman Hussain Al Khathany ney bataya ke jummay ki subah 8:00 baje Security hukkaam ko yeh ittila mousool hui ke aik bachi ko murda haalat mein hospital pohanchaya gaya hai. bachi ke ahal khanah ney bataya ke aan ki beti ney Madinah Munawwara ke junoob mein waqay aik gaon mein –apne ghar ke andar gilaay mein phanda daal kar khudkushi kar li aur yeh aik video game ke assar ka nateeja hai
306.title: Blue Whale game ney Saudi Arbia mein aik aur jaan le li

news_detail: Riyadh: Fitness club mein khawateen ke liye mukhtas jagah mein na munasib libaas ke sath daakhil honay walay ghair mulki shakhs ko Mulk badar kardiya gaya. Arab Media ke mutabiq Social Media par viral honay wali aik tasweer par Saudi hukkaam ney notice letay hue nah sirf ghair mulki ko mumlikat se bahar nikaal diya balkay mazkoorah club ko earzi tor par band kardiya. twitter par share honay wali tasweer mein dekha ja sakta hai ke short pehnay aik ghair mulki shakhs fitness club mein khawateen ki intzaar gaah mein daakhil hogaya aur wahan mojood bahijaab khawateen usay dekh kar dang reh gayeen. aik khatoon ney is manzar ko camera ki madad se mobile mein mehfooz karliya aur baad azan is ki shikayat social media ke zareya hakkaam taq pohanchai, Saudi wizarat labour and social development ney muamlay ka notice letay hue tehqiqaat ke baad ghair mulki shakhs ko Mulk badar kardiya jab ke fitness jim ko earzi tor par band kardiya.
324.title: Short pehan kar Saudi khatoon ke samnay anay wala shakhs Mulk badar

news_detail: Indore. City Police ne budh ko aik 27 sala gungay o behray nojawan ko burhenapa namodaar hokar do khawateen ko video call karne ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya. mulzim ki tarha khawateen jinhon ne shikayat darj karwai samaat o goyai se mahroom hain. Superintendent of Police Indore Cyber Cell Mr. Jitendra Singh ne bataya ke Amul Gaikwad ko jo aik hotel mein kaam karta hai, Maharashtra ke zila Ahmednagar se girftar karliya gaya. Do goongi o behri khawateen ne guzashta mah shikayat darj karwai thi ke aik namaloom shakhs inhen Whatsapp aur Emoji Applications ke zareya chehra par mask laga kar barhena haalat mein inhen video calls kar raha hai. SP ne bataya ke hum ne amol gayikwad ko girftar karkay ishaaron ki zabaan ke mahireen ki madad se pooch gach ki hai. Mr. singh ne bataya ke mulzim ne iqraar kya ke goongon o behroon ke wats up group se shikayat kunindah khawateen ke phone numbers haasil karte hue inhen fehash video callls kiye hain
341.title: Khawateen ku fahush video calls karne par goonga o behra nojawan girftar

news_detail: Kabul. Afghanistan ke shumal mashriqi subah Panjsher ke zila Khenj ke aik dehaat Peshghor mein kal raat zameen khiskane se kam az kam 10 afraad halaak aur 300 makanaat tabah hogaye. ohdedaron ne bataya ke do Helicopters bachao teamon aur raahat kaari saaz o samaan ke sath mutasirah moza ko rawana kiye gaye. kal raat zameen khiskane ke baais yeh dehaat beh gaya tha. National Disaster Managment Authority ke tarjuman Umar Muhammadi ne bataya ke zameen khiskane ke baad malba ke neechay dab jane walay afraad ko bachanay tarjeeh di jarahi hai. Afghanistan mein kayi khitun mein barish ke mausam mein waqfa waqfa se zameen khiskane ke waqeat paish atay hain, janglaat ke katao ki wajah se un waqeat mein izafah hwa hai. Sadar Afghanistan Ashraf Ghani jo Nato Conference mein shirkat ke liye Brussels mein hain hakkaam ko Hadayat di ke mutasireen ko darkaar saholaten baham pohanchai jayen.
354.title: Afghanistan mein zameen khiskane se kam az kam 10 halaak 300 makanaat tabah

news_detail: Aurangabad. Maharashtra ke zila Hingoli mein aik Zilla Parishad School ke bawarchi khanah mein 60 nihayat hi zahreeley dahari daar naag saanp paye gaye. mehakma taleem ke aik ohdedar ney bataya ke Marhatwada khitta mein aurang abad se 225 kilomitr ke faasla par Pangra Bhokare mauza mein Zilla Parishad ki janib se chalaye jaany walay aik school mein itni bhaari tedaad mein saanpon ko dekh kar talba aur amla mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. unhon ney bataya ke khatoon bawarchi ney kal raat dekha ke pakwaan ke liye istemaal honay wali lakrion ke dhair ke paas do dahari daar naag saanp hain baad azan is ney mazeed 58 saanp bhi dekh liye. school ke head master Tirymbak Bhusle  ney kaha ”itni bhaari tedaad mein saanp dekh kar hum khaufzadah hogaye. Kayi dehati lathyon aur patharon ke sath yahan poanch gaye magar hum ney inhen saanpon ko maardenay se baz rakha. aik saanp pakarney walay wiki dalaal ko talabb kya gaya aur do ghanton ki tug o do ke baad is ney tamam saanpon ko pkrhlya aur inhen sheeshon mein band kardiya. School Administrator Bhim Rao Bhokare ney bataya ke baad azan saanpon ko Forest Officer J D Kachway ke hawala kardiya gaya
363.title: School ke bawarchi khanah se 60 saanp dastyaab

news_detail: Bidar- Karnataka mein zila Bidar ke taalluqa Aurad ke mauza Murki mein hujoom ke hamla mein aik Hyderabadi naujawan halaak hogaya jabkay do shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Barham hujoom ne jummay ko bacha aghwaa karne ka shuba zaher karte hue Hyderabadi naujawanon ko buri tarah zad o koub kya jis ke nateeja mein Mohammad Azam Nami naujawan halaak hogaya jabkay Talha Ismayeel aur Mohammad Salman buri tarah zakhmi hogaye. Yeh sab apne dost Mohammad Basheer ke sath taalluqa Aurad ke Hundikera mauza ke liye car mein jarahay thay. Mohammad Basheer jo hyderabad mein kaam karte hain, doston ko apne aayee mauza ko madou kya tha. Hundikera jatay hue un logon ne snacks khanay Balkot Tandah ke paas apni car roki thi. un logon ne Mohammad Ismayeel ke laaye hue chocolates askole bachon mein taqseem kiye. Ismayeel haal hi mein qutar se lautay thay, jis par muqami log samjhay ke yeh log bachay aghwaa karne walay hain aur inhen zad o koub karna shuru kar diya halaanke Basheer inhen muqami zabaan mein sorat e haal se aagah karne ki koshish karte rahay. Joon hi Basheer aur un ke dost, hamla awaron se bachney ke liye car mein sawaar hokar rawana hogaye, muqami logon ne mauza Murki mein rehne walay apne doston ko phone karte hue un se khwahish ki ke car ko rokain, jis par Murki walon ne sarrak par darakht kaat kar daal diya aur rasta rokkk diya. jon hi car Murki ke qareeb pohanchi car is se tkrakr phisal gayi, jis ke baad hujoom ne Azam ko gaari mein se ghaseet kar bahar nikala aur lathyon aur patharon se maarna shuru kardiya. hujoom ko roknay teen police kanstbl bhi wahan puhanche taham Azam jisay sir par chout lagi barsar mauqa halaak hogaye. Police ne deegar teen naujawanon ko bchalya aur inhen Bidar ke hospital mein shareek karwaya. mazeed ilaaj ke liye inhen aaj hyderabad muntaqil kya gaya. Aurad police ne kayi daf-aat ke tehat namaloom logon ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya taham ta haal koi giraftari amal mein nahi aayi. aayi jee pi Mr. Murugan aur SP Mr. Dev Raj aaj mauza ka daura karne walay thay. Police is khsoos mein community meetings munaqqid karte hue shaoor Beda karna chahti hai. Mr. Dev Raj ne kaha ke soshil media ke rule ki bhi hum tehqeeq karen ge. hum jantay hain ke dehation ne phone calls kiye thay
372.title: Bidar mein hujoom ke hamla mein Hyderabadi halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Itwaar ki shaam Secunderabad Railway Station par Telangana Express train mein safar karne walay 8 kam umar Muslim bachon ko rok liya gaya jin ke baaray mein yeh samgha gaya ke inhen zabardasti kahin le jaya ja raha hai. Secunderabad Railway Police ne mehsoos kya ke yeh bachay mushtaba haalat mein safar kar rahay hain jin ke sath aik aadmi safar kar raha tha. Police ne un bachon ko rok kar mazeed tahaqeeq ke liye mehakma behbood atfaal ke hawala kardiya. Police ne bataya ke yeh bachay Uttarpradesh ke Rampur se yahan laaye gay thay jin ke sath aik aadmi safar kar raha thajs ka naam Ahmed hai. is shakhs ne police ko bataya ke woh un bachon ko Gulshan colony, Hyderabad mein waqay aik deeni madrassa mein shareek karwanay un ke walidain ki marzi se yahan laya tha. Police ne is shakhs ke bayan par yaqeen na karte hue mazeed tahaqeeq ke liye mehakma bahbodi e atfaal ke ohdedaron ke hawala kardiya. yahan yeh baat qabil e ghaur hai ke Telangana khaas kar Hyderabad mein qaim dainee madaris mein muqami bachon ki adam dasteyabi ke baayis shumali hind ki reyaston se talluq rakhnay walay bachon ko yahan lakar madarson mein parhaya ja raha hai.
342.title: Telangana Express mein safar karne walay 8 Muslim bachay rok liye gay

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jhirrah, Asifnagar mein aik 24 sala tarkari farosh ko mamooli si takraar par is ke doston ney chaaku ghonp kar qatal kardiya. Mutwafi Eisa Mohammad , New Kishan Nagar Jhirrah, Asifnagar ka rehne wala tha. Eisa hafta ki shab 11:45 bajey apne teen doston ke hamrah Ganga Bowli, Jhirrah mein waqay aik hotel mein khana khanay gaya tha. yeh charon aapas mein aik dosray se guftagu kar rahay thay ke Eisa Mohammad aur deegar mein Bahes o takraar shuru hogayi, un logon ney is ke seenah aur jism ke deegar hisson par waar karte hue buri terhan zakhmi kardiya. Mangalhat Police Inspector Mr. R. Srinivas Reddy ke mutabiq Eisa Mohammad shadeed zakhmi hokar gir pada, muqami logon ki ittila par Mangalhat Police maqam waardaat pahonch krase Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kiya jahan woh itwaar ke din ilaaj ke douran zakhamo se jaanbar nah ho saka. Eisa Mohammad ke khandan ki shikayat par Mangalhat Police ney tazirat hind ki dafaa 302 ke tehat qatal ka muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya. police ney teen mlzmin mein se do ki shanakht mustafa aur Mahmood ki hesiyat se ki, yeh dono Autodrivers hain aur Ganga Bowli ke rehne walay hain. mlzmin ki talaash shuru kar di gayi hai.
352.title: Bahes o takraar par doston ke hathon naujawan ka qatal

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik Additional Public Prosecutor Hyderabad mein aik case mein paishgi zamanat ke husool mein muawnat ke liye rishwat letay hue rangay hathon pakda gaya. Anti Corruption Bureau (ACB) ke ohdedaron ney peer ko Sri Ram Reddy ko 10, 000 rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon pakad liya. Sri Raam Reddy Rangareddy District Court mein Additional Public Prosecutor ki hesiyat se khidmaat injaam day raha tha. jahez harasani ke muqadma mein mulzim number 1 ko zamanat haasil hogayi thi jabkay mulzim number 2 ko zamanat haasil nahi horahee thi. mulzim public prasikotr ke paas se rishwat ke tor par di gayi raqam bar aamad karli gayi.
362.title: Additional Public Prosecutor rishwat letay hue girftar

news_detail: Telugu filmon ke Naqid Kathi Mahesh ko jin ke Hindoon ke Devta, Ram ji ke khilaaf kiye gaye remarks par Hindu barham aur naraaz hain, aik baar phir Chittoor Police ne peer ko giraftar karte hue Bengaluru ko wapas bhaij diya. Kathi Mahesh jinhein Telangana Police ne riyasat se kharij karte hue dakhla par amtnaa aed kardiya hai, Police ko bataya ke woh Chittoor mein apne aabadi mauza Yalamanda ko jarahay hain, taham Police ne kaha ke un ke aabadi dehaat mein inhen Hindu tanzeemon se khatrah la-haq ho sakta hai, aur un se kaha ke woh apne dehaat ko na jayen, lekin Kathi ne wapas lotney se inkaar kardiya. jab unhon ne apne dehaat ke liye rawana honay ki koshish ki to Police ne inhen giraftar karte hue Bengaluru le kar chali gayi. aik aur ittila ke mutabiq Kathi Mahesh ne Chittoor ke pails mein press conference karna chahtay they taham Police ne inhen aisa karne se rokkk diya. yaad rahay ke aik muqami Telugu Channel par mubahis mein hissa letay hue Telugu filmon ke Naqid Kathi rmish ne Hindoon ke Devta Ram ji aur un ki ahliya sita ji ke khilaaf kuch qabil aitraaz jumlay ada kiye they jis par un ke khilaaf mazhabi jazbaat ko rujhanaat ko thais pohanchanay ke ilzamaat ke tehat Banjara  Hills Police station mein Hindu tanzeemon ne shikayaat darj ki theen jis par un ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya tha aur Telangana Police ne inhen 6 mah ke liye hyderabad mein dakhla par amtnaa aed kardiya tha. Police ne inhen giraftar karte hue Chittoor mein un ke aabadi muqam par chod diya tha jahan se unhon ne Social Media par apne tabsaray post kar rahay they.
374.title: Filmon ke Naqid Kathi Mahesh dubara giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ne Rainbow Hospitals ke baaray mein yeh pata chalne par ke Hospital anay walay mareezon aur un ke afraad khandan se parking fee wusool ki jarahi hai. shehar ke aik samaji jehed car ki janib se Hospital ke khilaaf Banjara Hills Police Station mein shikayat ke indraaj ke baad yeh karwai ki gayi hai. yaad rahay ke tijarati idaron ke amarat mein muft parking ki saholaten baham pohanchanay se mutaliq jari kardah sarkari ehkaam se mutaliq yeh Sarahat kar diye jane ke bawajood ke stand-alone Theaters, Hospitals aur deegar tijarati idaron par is ka itlaq hoga aur yeh ke Hospitals ki bills aur Out Patient Department ki receipts ki peshkashi par muft parking faraham ki jani chahiye, Hospitals ki janib se parking fees wusool ki jarahi thi. Banjara Hills Police Station mein Hospital ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya gaya hai. Hospital ki janib se two wheelers ke liye 20 rupay aur four wheelers ke liye 50 rupay parking fees wusool kar raha tha aur ghanta ki asaas par izafi raqam wusool kar raha tha. shehar ke deegar hospital jaisay comes, apolo, kir bhi parking fees wusool kar rahay hain. Hyderabad ke insidaad rishwat satani jahedkaar mister Vijaya gopal ne 11 July ko Rainbow Hospitals ke khilaaf Banjara Hills Police station mein shikayat darj karwai thi. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh deegar haspatalon ke liye bhi taizana hai jo GO se mutaliq Sarahat kar diye jane ke bawajood parking fees wusool kar rahe hain. jahekaar ka kehna hai ke Banjara Hills Police ne baday hi behas o takraar ke baad muqadma darj kya hai. Police ko shikayat ke indraaj ke baad muqadma darj karne aik hafta darkaar huwa. Unhon ne kaha kay awam ne twitter ke zareya Police ko is janib mutwajjah kya tha. qanoon greater Hyderabad municiple karporishn 1955 ki daf-aat ke tehat khilaaf warzi karne walon ke khilaaf tazeeri karwai ki ja sakti hai. yeh GO jis ka itlaaq 1

April 2018 se ho raha hai, ibtidayi 30 mints ke liye muft parking ki sahoolat faraham karta hai, is ke baad bhi agar Sarif tijarti idaara se khridi ka saboot paish karta hai to is se parking fees wusool nahi ki jaye gi. GHMC ne 24 April ko yeh wazahat kardiya tha ke muft parking ke khawayed ka itlaq Stand-alone Theaters, Hospitals aur deegar tijarti idaron par bhi hoga. Is wazahat mein yeh bhi Sarahat kar di gayi thi ke Hospital bil ya Out Patient Department ki raseed paish karte hue muft parking ki sahoolat haasil ki ja sakti hai. Vijaya ne kaha ke parking fees ki vasuli par tijarti idaron ka vaqtan fouqtan muaina karne ka GHMC ku ikhtiyar haasil hai. Parking Fee Rules ki khilaaf warzi hota dekhnay walay bhi un se shikayat darj krwaskte hain, lekin shikayaat ki yaksoi ka nizaam ghair karkard hai. Is liye awam ke liye yeh behtar hai ke agar woh dekhen ke tijarti idaron ki janib se parking fees qawaid ki khilaaf warzi ki jarahi hai to woh muqami Police station se rujoo hon.
400.title: Parking fee ki vasuli par Rainbow Hospitals ke khilaaf muqadma darj

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Ishrat Jahan ki maa ney 2004 muqadma ke mulzimeen do Muazzif Police ohdedaron ki darkhwast bra_aat ke khilaaf aaj adalat mein apna aitraaz daakhil kardiya hai. Ishrat Jahan ko deegar teen ke sath aik farzi Encounter mein qatal kardiya gaya tha. Mohtarma Shamima Kausar ney yahan CBI ki khusoosi adalat mein Gujarat ke retired Police Officers D G Vanzara aur N K Amin ki janib se daakhil kardah darkhwast bra_aat ki yeh kehte hue mukhalfat ki ke dono mulzimeen ke khilaaf thos shawahid mojood hain. khusoosi CBI court ke judge mister J K Pandia jinhon ney dono mulzimeen aur CBI ke dalail ki samaat ke baad aaj apna hkmnamh mehfooz rakha tha, kaha ke woh mutasirah ki taraf se uthae gaye aitrazaat ki roshni mein is maamla par mazeed samaat karen ge. mohtarma Shamima Kausar ney apne wakeel P I Parvez ke tavassut se daakhil kardah apni darkhwast azrdari mein kaha ke dono mulzimeen ko bra_aat nahi di jani chahiye chunkay un ke khilaaf thos shawahid o saboot mojood hain. unhon ney kaha ke record mein maujood shawahid zahir karte hain ke yeh dono Ahmedabad ke muzafaat mein is muqam par maujood they Jahan Ishrat Jahan aur deegar 4 ko 2004 mein goli mardi gayi thi. Mohtarma Kausar ney

ka hawala dete huvey kaha ke case mein maakhoz deegar mulzimeen ke sath yeh dono mustaqil tor par rabt mein they. Adalat ney un dono mulzimeen ki muqadma se kharij karne ki darkhwast par dono mulzimeen aur is case ki tehqeeq karne wali tehqiqati agency CBI ke wukla ki samaat 30

June ko khatam kar di thi. Vanzara ney sabiq incharge DGP Gujarat Police P P Pande ki muwafiqat mein darkhwast bra_aat daakhil ki thi. pi pi pande ko na kafi shawahid ki binaa February mein is muqadma se kharij kardiya gaya tha. Vanzara ney apni darkhwast mein ye bhi id-daa kya ke Central Agency ki janib se daakhil kardah charge sheet ”mann ghadat” thi aur un ke khilaf koi Laiq mazawalat (prosecutable) mawaad maujood nahi hai. Sabiq sarbarah Gujarat ATS ne kaha kegawahoon ke bayanaa t”intehai mashkook” hain.

Adalat ney pehlay hi Amin ki darkhwast par samaat ko mukammal karliya tha. Mumbra, Mumbai se talluq rakhney wali 19 sala Ishrat Jahan aur deegar teen Javed Sheikh @ Pranesh Pilayi, Amjad Ali Akbar Ali Rana aur Zeeshan Johar ko Ahmedabad ke muzafaat mein 15 June 2004 ko aik farzi Encounter mein golian mardi gayi theen. Us waqt Police ney yeh id-daa kya tha ke un charon ka dehshat gardon se talluq hai aur woh us waqt ke Chief Minister Gujarat Narendra Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish rachi thi. Taham Gujarat high High Court ki janib se tashkeel kardah special investy gation team ney yeh nateeja agz kiya tha ke yeh Encounter ‘farzi’ tha jis par Adalat ney muqadma ko riyasti Police se wapas lekar CBI ke hawala kardiya tha. CBI ney 2013 mein daakhil kardah pehli charge sheet mein 7 Police ohdedaron Bashmool aayi pi s Officers pande, Vanzara aur jee ail singh ke naam mulzimeen ke tor par shaamil kiye they. Un tamam par deegar ilzamaat ke ilawa aghwaa, qatal aur saazish ke ilzamaat aed kiye gaye they. Vanzara ka naam mushtaba gangster Shahabuddin aur us ke Muawin Tulsi Ram ke mobayyana farzi Encounter ke muqadma mein bhi shaamil hai. Inhen guzashta baras Mumbai ki adalat ney bari kardiya.
416.title: Ishrat Jahan case: Gujarat ke sabiq Police ohdedaron ki darkhwast bra_aat ke khilaaf maa ka aitraaz daakhil

news_detail: Dhaka: Bangladesh mein manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf shuru kiye gaye crackdown operation mein halakaton ki tadaad ab 200 se tajawaz kar gayi hai, sainkdon mushtaba dealers ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. wazeer sanat Aamir Hussain Imu ney bataya ke 18

May se Mulk-geer satah par shuru kardah insidaad manshiat muhim ke douran qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ney mushtaba manshiat farosh aur manshiat ke aadi 37, 225 afraad ko girftar kya gaya hai. unhon ney bataya ke 25, 575 cases mein mushtaba afraad ko padra gaya hai. unhon ney bataya ke Mulk ki jailon mein jumla 89, 589 qaidi hain jin mein 42 feesad manshiat se mutaliq muqadmaat ke mulzim hain .

Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Bangladesh mein do mah se jari manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf Operation mein taizi aagai hai. Police ke hathon marwaye adalat tarz ki karwai mein ab tak 200 se zayed afraad maaray ja chuke hain. Bangladeshi hukkaam ney Philipine ki tarz par manshiat ke kaarobar aur smuglers ke khilaaf karwai ko jari rakhney ka Endyia diya hai. Dusri janib insani huqooq ke liye kaam karne wali tanzeemon ney is soorat e haal par tashweesh ka izhaar karte hue kaha hai ke maamla kitna hi sangeen kyun nah ho marwaye adalat qatal ki ijazat nahi di ja sakti. qanoon aur adaltin honey ke bawajood Police ka bandooq se faisla karna durust amal nahi. hukoomat ko apne tareeqakar mein tabdeeli lana hogi. Wazeh rahay ke Bangladesh mein aasabi nizaam par asar andaaz honey wali adwiyaat Caffeine aur  Methamphetamine ke ajzaa par mushtamil tablet ‘Yaba’ ka be daregh istemaal kya jata hai is nasha aawar goli ki khareed o farokht ghair qanooni hai jis ke khilaaf hukoomat ney Crackdown Operation ka aaghaz kya hai.
429.title: Bangladesh mein manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf Crackdown mein 200 se zayed mulzimeen halaak

news_detail: Istanbul ki aik adalat ney bazam khud aik islami firqa ke rehnuma aur Tv par tableegh karne wali shakhsiyat Adnan Oktar ku jo Harun Yahya se bhi janey jatay hain, 160 deegar pairokaron sameit mukhtalif ilzamaat ki mazeed tafteesh ke liye police ke hawalay kar diya hai. Un ke kayi pairokaar pehlay se hi zair hirasat hain aur un ki tafteesh ki jarahi hai. Adnan Oktar par juraim pesha gang qaim karne, dhoka dahi aur jinsi istehsal ke ilzamaat hain. tark khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq police ney paanch mukhtalif sobon mein kayi jayidadon par karwai ki taakay maali juraim ke hawala se shawahid haasil kiye ja saken. Istanbul Police ney mukhtalif logon ki janib se fouj daari shikayaat darj krwane par is firqa ke khilaaf karwai karte hue 120 rehaishgaahon aur dafatir par  chaape maaray. Shikayat kunindgan mein 11 sala ladkiyon ke walidain se le kar 40 sala Umar ki khawateen hain .

Adnan Oktar ney adalat mein paish kardah charge sheet ki sahet se inkaar karte hue apni rihayi ka mutalba kya aur kaha ke un ke beron mulk rawabit Turk mumlikat ko kamzor karne ke bajaye is ki quvvat badhaane ka bayis hain. Unhon ney id-daa kya ke woh aik saazish ka shikaar baneye gaye hain aur yeh ke woh aik qoum parast aur Ataturkish hain. unhon ney kaha “mujh par aayed jinsi istehsal ke ilzamaat be bunyaad hain. Main awaami aankh mein rehta hon. Har koi mujhe jaanta hai chunkay main awam aur Tv par rehta hoon. Main jin muqamat par rehta hon woh tamam janey pehchane hain” Adnan Oktar ney bataya ke un ki mahana aamdani 3500 Turkish Liras hain jo 730 dollars ke mumasil hoti hai. Inhen 11 July ki awleen sa-aton mein hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. Un ke firqa jaisay group par aik mujremana tanzeem qaim karne, kamsin bachon ke jinsi istehsal, na balighon ke sath mubashrat, aghwaa, qanoon tax ki khilaaf warzi aur qanoon insidaad e dehshat gardi ki khilaaf warzi karne jaisay ilzamaat aayed kiye gaye hain. Harun Yahya ke ihata ki talashi ke douran police ney 6 truckload Historical artifacts aur qadeem nawadiraat ke alawa 400 se zayed yadgar tughre, 7 hathyaar aur 3, 000 se zayed bulltes, luxury cars aur qabil lehaaz naqad raqam ko bar aamad kya hai.

Adnan Oktar ney 1982 mein Istanbul mein apni Islami tanzeem ki bunyaad rakhi thi. Is waqt se Adnan Oktar ney bohat doulat jama ki aur asar o rusookh badhaya. Agarchay mahireen ke mutabiq yeh janna ya maloom karna mushkil hai ke un ki aamdani ka zareya kya hai. haal hi mein Adnan ney aik Tv channel shuru kya hai jis ko woh apne aqayed ki tableegh jis mein bilkhushoos Islam ki tashreeh ke liye istemaal karte hain. Turkey ke sahafion ke mutabiq Adnan ke kuch pairokaar din mein kaam karte hain jab ke deegar un ke firqa ke hawalay se kitaaben tehreer karte hain, media par tashheer karte hain ya tanzeem ke liye karkun bharti karte hain. Harun Yahya ke naam se kitabon mein ‘nazriya irtiqa ke jhoot’ ke baaray mein bataya gaya hai aur yeh kitaaben sarkari hakkaam, ghair mulki sifarat karon aur sahafion ko irsaal ki jati hain. Woh 300 se zayed kitabon ke musannif hain jinhein 73 zabanon mein tarjuma kya gaya hai. Aik naye firqa ke mubalagh Adnan Oktar ka sab se mutanazia pehlu un ki ‘khatoon pairokaron ki fouj’ hai jo bohat ziyada banaou singaar karti hain aur bohat kam kapdon mein malbos hoti hain aur un khawateen ko aksar Adnan ka chulbuli ladkiyon ka haram kaha jata hai. Woh un ke sath raqs o suroor ki mahfilen sajaate hain aur un sab harkato ko mazhabi pairaye mein paish karte hain. Adnan ki tanzeem ko tark karne walay arkaan daawa karte hain ke Adnan –apne pairokaron ki brain washing karte hain, unhein black mail kya jata hai aur jinsi ghulam banaya jata hai aur un mein aksariyat khawateen ki hai. yaad rahay Adnan aur un ki tanzeem ke mutadid arkaan kayi baar mukhtalif mawaqay par Israel ja chuke hain aur wahan un ki aala mazhabi aur siyasi shaksiaat se mulaqaat ho chuki hain jabkay baaz senior Israeli hakkaam Adnan se milney turkey bhi aa chuke hain. aik baras pehlay Adnan ki sarbarahi mein aik wafad ney Israeli parliman ka dora kya tha jahan aala hakkaam se mulaqaat ka mauqa mila aur Israeli wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu se khusoosi taur par taaruf karaya gaya tha. Maazi mein bhi Adnan un ilzamaat ko mustard kar chuke hain aur apni zaat par un hamlon ko Bartanwi khufia services ki nigrani mein honey wali bain ul aqwami saazish qarar day chuke hain. Turkey zaraye ablaagh mein inhen nihayat hi badnaam zamana firqa ke sarbarah se mausoom kya jata hai
449.title: Adnan Oktar @ Harun Yahya girftar

news_detail: Gaza: Palestine ki mahsoor patti Gaza par Israeli fazaiya ki bombari aur zameeni fouj ki firing se 4 Falasteeni shaheed hogaye. wizarat sahet ke mutabiq Gaza ki mahsoor patti ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Israeli fazaiya ney mutadid hamlay kiye jab ke sarhad ke qareeb ehtijaj karne walay afraad par qaabiz fouj ney raast nishana banakar golian barsain. Junoobi Gaza ke ilaqa Khan Younis mein Israeli jungi tayyaron ki bombari ke nateeja mein do Falasteeni shaheed hue jab ke rafa ke ilaqa mein golian lagney se aik nojawan shaheed sun-hwa. Gaza ki sarhad par ehtijaj ke douran qaabiz fouj ki goli lagney se 27 sala Badwaan shaheed hwa, muzahireen par aansoo gas ki shelling ki gayi aur seedha nishana taak kar golian barsayi gayeen jis se 120 afraad zakhmi hue. Muzahmati tehreek Hamas ka kehna hai ke fazai bombari mein shaheed honey walon ka talluq un ki jamaat se tha. Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Hamas ke mutadid thikanon ko tabah kardiya hai. Ghasib yahodi mumlikat ney sarhad ke qareeb jummay ko aik fouji ki halakat ka bahana karte hue yeh wehshiana karwai ki hai, Israel ka kehna hai ke faujion ke aik qaafla par ki gayi firing mein aik fouji shadeed zakhmi hogaya jo baad azan jaanbar nahi ho saka.
