Gaza sarhad par mahino se jari muzahmat mein mara jaaney wala yeh pehla Israeli fauji hai. Israel ki fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Hamas ke 25 thikanon ko nishana baneya hai. Fauj ney kaha ke Gaza patti par Hamas ke military nishaanon ko barray pemana par nishana baneya gaya hai
466.title: Gaza par Israel ke wehshiana hamlay, 4 Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: American mehkuma Insaaf ney jummay ko elaan kya ke Texas ki aik Adalat ney hind asasi aik farzi Call Centre aur money laundering scam ke 21 arkaan ko mukhtalif noiyat ki sazayen tajweez ki hain, deegar teen ko Jaria saal ke awail mein saza di ja chuki hai. Un shehrion ko 20 baras tak jail ki saza sunai gayi hai. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq American adalat ney scandal mein mulawwis 21 Bharati naujawanon ko 4 se 20 saal ki saza sunai hai, Call Centre agent museebat mein phansay Americans ko value cards khareedne par dabaau daaltay thay jabkay inkaar ki soorat mein unhen giraftari ki dhamki dete thay. jaali Call Centre ka hadaf umar raseedah American shehri aur ghairqanooni taarkin watan the jabke saza mukammal honay ke baad mutadid zair e hirasat mujrimon ko Mulk badar kardiya jaye ga. Mehakma Insaaf ney bataya ke mulzimeen ney Bharat mein Call Centre qayim kiye thay, jin ke zareya American zaeef shehrion aur ghair qanooni taarikeen ko American tax ya Emigration Department se zahir karte hue jurmane ada karne ya phir giraftari ya malik se ikhraj ka saamna karne ki dhamkiyan diya karte thay. Mehakuma ney 56 afraad aur  5 Bharati Companiyon par shanakhti chori, American ohdedar ka talbees shakhsi karne, barqi dhoka dahi aur money laundering ki saazish karne ke ilzamaat waza kiye thay. Maharashra ke Thane zila mein Police ney October 2016 mein taqreeban 500 Call Centre mulazuimeen ko hirasat mein liya tha. Ohdedaron ney kaha tha ke yeh racket rozana taqreeban aik crore rupay ainth raha tha. American Federal Bureau ney 15 october 2016 ko Bharat ki qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke sath mil kar tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kya tha. baadazaan un mulzimeen par ilzamaat waza kiye gaye aur saabit honay par inhen saza sunai gayi. saza ki takmeel ke baad un mulzimeen ko malik badar kardiya jaye g.
485.title: Call Centre scandal mein 21 Hindustanion ko 20 saal tak ki saza

news_detail: Lashkar e Toiba ke mushtaba Operative Habib ur Rehman ki Delhi Airport par giraftari ke dosray din qaumi tehqiqati agency ‘National Investigation Agency (NIA)’ ney aaj Hyderabad ke puranay shehar mein saat maqamat par tosiyee dhave kiye. Un dhaavon ke talluq se mutazaad daawe kiye jatay rahay hain. Khabar rasan idaron ke mutabiq yeh dhaave subah 5:00 bajey se shaam 5:00 bajey tak jari rahay. Bataya jata hai ke yeh dhaave ISIS se talluq ke silsila mein 2016 ke aik muqadma mein kiye gay hain. ND Tv ke mutabiq Agency ke tarjuman ney kaha ke Hyderabad mein Hyderabad Police Commissionerate aur Rachakonda Police Commissionerate mein mushtaba afraad ke makanaat par dhaavon ke douran Agency ney digital alaat aur ishtial angaiz mawaad zabt kya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke mazeed tehqiqaat jari hain aur woh mazeed kuch batanay se inkaar kardiya. NIA ney 2016 case mein apni tehqiqaat mukammal karli hai aur 11 afraad ke khilaaf chargesheet paish kar di hai jin mein teen mafroor hain. Is muqadma mein ilzaam hai ke kuch naujawanon ney Mulk ke khilaaf saazish karte hue dehshatgard sargarmion ko anjaam dainay mein mulawis rahay hain. Mumbai Mirror ke mutabiq yaum e Azadi se qabal un dhaavon ko kaafi ahmiyat di jarahi hai. Un chapon mein bataya jata hai ke Dehli aur Gujarat ki NIA teams ney hissa liya. Ghair musadeqa it-tila-aat ke mutabiq NIA ney 6 afraad ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Aik aur zaraye ke bamawajib NIA ney 2016 mein Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) naami tanzeem se talluq rakhnay wali aik touli ke 9 afraad ko girftar kya tha jabkay teen ko mafroor bataya gaya tha. NIA ki teames do din qabl hi Hyderabad pahonch gayi then, 2016 ke case ke silsila mein do mushtaba afraad ka pata chalanay Telangana Police ka taawun haasil kya tha. Telangana Police ke ohdedaron ney kaha ke hum ko bataya gaya ke yeh 2 afraad mazhab se mutaliq shiddat pasand rawish ikhtiyar karliye they. NIA ohdedaron ney un se tafteesh ki taham bazabta taur par hanooz nahi bataya gaya ke aaya baadi un nazr mein un ke khilaaf koi muqadama banta hai ya nahi.

Rachakonda Police Commissionerate ke Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar Ranga Reddy District ke aik makaan par bhi aaj NIA ke ohdedaron ney dhawa kya aur Abdul Quddus (54) aur un ke farzand Abdul Qadeer (19) se khandan ke deegar afraad ke sath pooch gach ki. NIA ki team subah 5:00 bajey se shaam 5:00 bajey tak tafteesh karti rahi aur aik Laptop aur khandan ke afraad khandan ke cell phones zabt karliye aur un se kaha ke mazeed tafteesh ke liye woh kal yani 7

August ko subah NIA ke daftar waqay Begumpet mein haazir hon. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ney makhsoos IP address aur Cell Phone numbers ke sath mutawatir Pakistan se rabita ki bunyaad par nazar rakhna shuru ki thi aur aaj NIA ki aik team yahan pahonch gayi. Tafteesh ke douran pata chala ke Abdul Quddus ke rishtedaar Pakistan ke Hyderabad aur Sindh ke Saqar zila mein rehtay hain. Abdul Quddus apne farzand ke sath apne rishtaedaaron se musalsal baat cheet kya karte they. Taweel tafteesh ke baad NIA ke ohdedaron ney Abdul Quddus aur in ke farzand ko yeh hidaayat dete hue chhodh diya ke woh kal Agency ke daftar puhanche. Aik ittila yeh bhi mil rahi hai ke ta haal kisi ki girftari amal mein nahi aayi hai. Abdul Qadeer ney bataya ke un se poocha gaya ke aaya woh un ke betay ki sar garmion se waaqif hain to unhon ney bataya ke un ka beta deen ki tableegh karta hai, woh nahi jantay ke woh kin se milta hai aur kya kuch karta hai. Unhon ney bataya ke deen ki tableegh se mutaliq kuch pamphlets ko bhi zabt kya gaya hai.
369.title: Hyderabad mein NIA ke chaapay

news_detail: Film Nagar, Banjara Hills mein peer ki shab aik khatoon ney apne shohar ka mobayyana qatal kardiya. Mahlook ki shanakht Jagan khangi mulazim ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Woh haalat nasha mein apne ghar pahonch kar biwi se jhagdnay laga. khatoon ney gussa mein aakar gala ghoontnay se qabal machar kash spray ko apne shohar ke mun mein undail diya jis ki wajah se woh saans nahi le paaya. Postmartem ke liye laash ko Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Khatoon ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. Khatoon ke khilaaf qatal ka muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Police mazeed tehqiqaat kar rahi hai.
381.title: Khatoon ney shohar ke mun mein machar kash spray undailkar halaak kardiya Hyderabad.

news_detail: Hyderabad. National Investigation Agency (NIA) ke ohdedaron ne aaj Hyderabad ke Begumpet mein waqay apne ilaqayi daftar mein mangal ko din bhar ISIS se talluq ke silsila mein 2016 mein darj aik muqadma ke silsila mein taqreeban 6 naujawanon se tafteesh ki hai jin mein kuch naujawanon se is se qabal bhi pooch gach ki gayi thi. NIA ne 2016 mein ISIS se taluqaat qaim karne aur Mulk ke khilaaf saazish ke ilzaam mein aik muqadma darj kya tha aur Mulk bhar se 9 afraad ko girftar kya tha. Is case mein chargesheet ki peshkashi ke ziman mein tafteesh ko wusat dete hue hyderabad mein maujood chand mushtaba naujawanon se pooch gach ki jarahi hai taakay un ke mulawis honay ke imkanaat ka jaiza liya jaye. Is case mein maazi mein bhi chand Hyderabadi naujawanon se pooch gach ki thi. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency ki janib se Hyderabad mein kiye gaye dhaavoun aur mushtaba naujawanon se mutaliq jari tafteesh ke baray mein kisi qisam ka bayan sarkaari taur par jari na kiye jane ke baayis zaraye ablaagh mein mutazaad daaway kiye jarahay hain aur ghair musaddiqa khabron ke hawala se atkal pacho lagaye jarahay hain. Yaad rahay ke peer ke din NIA ki mukhtalif teamon ne shehar ke mukhtalif muqamat par mushtaba naujawanon ke gharron par chaapay maartay hue un naujawanon se pooch gach ki thi aur un ke zair istemaal Laptop, Computers and Cell Phones waghera zabt karliye thay. Un naujawanon mein kuch ko yeh Hidayat dete hue hirasat mein nahi liya gaya tha ke woh mangal ke din Agency ke daftar waqay Begumpet report karen. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon ko din bhar pooch gach ke baad raat 9:00 bajey ke qareeb budh ke din bhi daftar aanay ki hidayat dete hue gharon ko jane ki ijazat daiy di. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon se tafteesh alahda alahda mukhtalif sessions mein ki gayi aur aik dosray ko samnay paish karte hue un ke baray mein daryaft kya gaya. Tafteeshi ohdedaron ne un naujawanon ki roz marrah ki masrofiyaat ke baray mein istefsaraat kiye gai aur online raabton se mutaliq bhi jaanch ki gayi. Un naujawanon mein Mehdipatnam aur shaheen Nagar ilaqa ke aik aik naujawan bhi shaamil hain. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ki teams Hyderabad mein teen din qabal hi pahonch gayi theen jin ke taawun ke liye Karnataka aur Maharashtra se talluq rakhnay wale Intelligence ohdedaron ki teams bhi hain.
390.title: Mushtaba naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh jari

news_detail: Hyderabad 8. Sultan Shahi, Mughalpura, Hyderabad se talluq rakhnay wali aik Azim Hajj mohtarma Hafiza bi zauja Mirza Qutubuddin Baig umar 70 saal ka aaj subah Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein intqaal hogaya. Woh cover number TSR-7172-2-0 ke tehat apne betay Amjaduddin Baig ke hamrah 1

Augst ko ba-azm Hajj rawana hui then, un ko tannafus ki shikayat ke baayis kal Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Special Officer Telangana Stat Haj Committee professor S.A. Shukoor ney Khadim ul Hujjaj ko un ki namaz e janaza aur tadfeen ke liye fauri karwaiya karne ki hidayat di. Baad maghrib namaz e janaza Haram Shareef mein ada ki gayi aur tadfeen Makkah Mukaramah ke qabrastaan ‘Sharyeen’ mein amal mein aayi.

Hajj se qabal yeh riyasat e Telangana ki paheli Azim Hajj hain jin ka intqaal huwa hai. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masiullah Khan aur Special Officer Prof. S.A. Shukoor ney marhoom ke lawahiqeen se baat ki aur un se izhaar taaziyat karte hue sabar Jameel ki talqeen ki. Hyderabad Emabrcation pointe se talluq rakhnay walay tamam Hujjaj karaam Makkah Muazzama mein apni apni rehayesh gaahon mein muqeem hain aur kheriyat se hain. Hajj Mission aur khadim ul Hujjaj se musalsal rabt rakha gaya hai aur Hujjaj karaam ki sehat wo slamati ke talluq se maloomat haasil ki jarahi hain. Un se qabal 20 Hindustani Aazmin e Hajj, Makkah Mukramah aur Madinah Munawwara mein intqaal kar gaye hain.
403.title: Sultan Shahi, Hyderabad ki aik Azim Hajj ka Makkah Muazzama mein intqaal

news_detail: Hyderabad. University of Hyderabad ke M.A. saal awwal ke taalib ilm ne aaj University Campus mein mobayyana taur par khudkushi karli. Rajinish jo Utharkhand se talluq rkhtahe, ‘I’ Hostel ke apne kamrah mein latakta huwa paaya gaya. Talba ke mutabiq 20 sala Rajinish ne M.A. English Course mein dakhla liya tha taham do din qabal apna dakhla mobayyana taur par mansookh karliya aur jumeraat ko ghar wapas lotney wala tha. Is ne apne doston se kaha tha ke woh Campus mein apne aap ko dhaal nahi parha hai. Woh Hostel mein muqeem wahid taalib ilm tha aur kisi ko bhi room allot nahi kya gaya tha. Aik Taalib e Ilm ne bataya ke jab is ke dost kamrah mein puhanche to woh latakta huwa paaya gaya. Gachi Bowli Police ne post mortem ke liye laash ko Osmania General Hospital ko muntaqil kya. Police ne bataya ke usay koi khudkushi note dastyab nahi huwa, khudkushi ki wajohaat ka hanooz pata nahi chal saka. Aik muqadma darj karte hue tahqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya gaya. Androon aik mah University of Hyderabad mein Taalib e Ilm ki doosri khudkushi hai.
419.title: University of Hyderabad mein Taalib e Ilm apne room mein latakta huwa paaya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. National Investion Agency NIA ney Hyderabad ke 8 naujawanon se aaj mutawatir dosray din bhi apne daftar waqay Begumpet mein tafteesh jari rakhi aur samjha jata hai ke kal yani jumeraat ko bhi mazeed tehqeeq ki jaye gi. Bataya jata hai ke un 8 mushtaba naujawanon ke alawa mazeed 4 naujawanon se bhi mobayyana pooch gach ki. Jin naujawanon se tafteesh ki gayi woh Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shaheen Nagar aur Pahadi Shareef se talluq rakhtay hain. Hyderabadi naujawanon se pooch gach se aghz kardah natayij aur un naujawanon ke baarey mein abhi tak kuch bhi nahi kaha hai taham maloom huwa hai ke yeh jaanch hanoz paya takmeel ko nahi pohanchi hai chunkay un naujawanon ko jumaraat ke din bhi agency ke daftar pounchanay ki hadaayat di gayi hai. Zaraye ke bamawajib Agency ke ohdedar un naujawanon ke aik dosray ke saath rawabit ke sath sath Abu Dhabi ke ISIS Module ke sath un naujawanon ke taluqaat par tavajjuh markooz ki hai aur is silsila mein January 2016 mein aik muqadma darj kya gaya tha. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon ke gharon par kiye gaye dhaavon mein zabt kardah ashya ke baarey mein istefsaraat kiye gaye.
428.title: Hyderabadi naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh teesray din bhi jari rahay gi

news_detail: Munnar. Mutawatar do dinon se jari barish ke baayis Kerala ke Idukki zila mein chaay ke baagaat ke liye mashhoor Munnar mein zameen khisakne ki wajah se aik Resort ko jaanay wali sadak ke masdood hojane se wahan kam az kam 60 sayyah phans gay. Resort mein jo log phans gay un mein 20 bairooni sayyah hain. Ohdedaron ney kaha ke bairooni sayyaho ka talluq Rusia, Saudi Arabia aur Oman mumalik se hai. Kerala ke wazeer sayahat Mr. Kadakampally Surendaran ney kaha ke Munnar ke Pallivasal mein Plum Judi Resort mein maujood tamam sayyah mehfooz hain. Resort mein sayyahon ke phans jaanay ka ilm us waqt huwa jab aik sayyah ney apni pareshaniyon par aik video post ki jisay aik Telivsion Channel par telecast kya gaya. Riyasat mein guzishta do dinon se shadeed barish horahee hai. Sayyahon ko bahifazat nikaalne ke liye fouj ko talab karliya gaya. Darin asna America ney Americion shahrion ko safri intibah diya ke un ilaaqon ka daura na karen jahan zameen khisakne aur sailaab ka khadsha hai. Kerala mein ab tak 26 log halaak hogaye jin mein Idukki mein zameen khiskane se marnay walon mein 11 log bhi shaamil hain, taham jummay ke din barish se judi halakat ki report nahi hai aur na hi kahin zameen khiskane ka waqea paish aaya hai. jumaraat se hi Idukki mein Cheruthoni ke dam ke 5 darwazay khol dyie gay hain. Cheruthoni town ke zaireen ilaaqon ke logon ka takhlia krwadya gaya tha.
445.title: Zameen khisakne ke baad Munnar ke Resort mein 60 sayyah phans gaiy

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad “She Teams” ne aaj awaami nizaam hamal o naqal (Public Transport) mein harasani ke khilaaf muhim ke hissa ke taur par Metro Trains mein shaoor baydaari muhim chalaye. Mohtarma Shikha Goel Additional Commissioner  of Police Crimes o Incharge She Teams ne aaj Metro Trains mein Ladkiyon aur khawateen ke sath chaid chhad aur harasani ke insidaad ke liye chalaye jaany wali muhim mein hissa liya. Unhon ne bataya ke ‘Hyderabad She Teams’ ne July ke maheena mein public tansport mein harasani ke khilaaf muhim ka aaghaz kya tha. Guzishta hafta ‘Radio Mirchi’ ne bhi is muhim mein ishtiraaq shuru kardiya. Mohtarma Shikha Goel ne kaha ke is muhim ke hissa ke taur par MMTS, RTC basoon aur Autos mein She Teams ke ohdedaron ne safar kya aur un mein safar karne wali khawateen aur Ladkiyon se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke woh bilaa khauf safar karen aur zaroorat padney par Police ki madad haasil karen. Unhon ne bataya ke She Teams ki is muhim ka maqsad yeh hai ke kisi bhi ladki ko kisi bhi qisam ki harasani na ho aur woh aazadana taur par jab chahay jahan chahay bilaa khauf safar karen. Inhen kisi se darnay ya khaufzadah honay ki zaroorat nahi. Agar aisi ko yi nagehani baat hojaye to 100 Dial karen, Police aap ki madad ke liye 5-10 minute mein pahonch jaye gi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke khawateen ke liye Hyderabad duniya ke mehfooz tareen shehron mein se aik hai aur hamara maqsad hai ke Hyderabad ko sare fehrist muqam par pohanchaye. Unhon ne Hyderabadi naujawanon ki satayish karte hue kaha ke beshtar ladke shareef hotay hain aur woh Ladkiyon se chaid chhaad nahi karte. Unhon ne kaha ke woh doosron ko bhi Ladkiyon ko harasan karne se rokain aur apnay doston ki bhi hausla afzai karen.
461.title: Ladkiyon ko harasani ke khilaaf Metro Trains mein ‘She Teams” ki muhim

news_detail: Hyderabad. Yaum e Azadi tqarib ke paish e nazar aaj ilaqa Golconda mein Police ne ghar ghar talashi muhim shuru ki. Yaad rahay ke Golconda ke daman mein hi Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao 15

August ke mauqa par rasam parcham kushai anjaam dete hain. Is khusoos mein DCP West Zone ki nigraani mein aaj raat Golconda Police Station hudood mein ghar ghar talashi muhim chalaye gayi. Taqreeban 210 Police ki do teams ne Cordon and Search mein hissa liya. Is muhim mein 400 makanaat ki talashi li gayi. Police ne 22 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein le liya jin ke mujrim anaasir ke sath taluqaat they jabkay aik Rowdisheeter ko bhi hirasat mein liya gaya hai aur munasib dastawizaat na honay ki binaa par 44 gadiyon ko bhi zabt karliya. Additional DCP Mr. Venkateshwar ne Media se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke aman o amaan ki barqarari aur ghair samaji anasir ki sarkoobi ke liye ghar ghar talashi li gayi. Unhon ne kaha ke is muhim ke dsuraan Police ko muqami awaam ka bharpoor taawun haasil raha hai. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh muhim muqami awam ki khwahish aur rowdii anaasir ki srgarmyon se mutaliq shikayaat ki asaas par chalayi gayi.
481.title: Jashnn e Azadi taqreeb ke paish e nazar Golconda mein ghar ghar talashi

news_detail: Americi shahar Seattle ke Sea-Tac Airport se baghair ijazat uraya jaany wala Commercial tayyarah Katron island mein gir kar tabah ho gaya. media reports ke mutabiq tayyaray ki ‘chori’ ki report raat 8:30 bajey ke qareeb mili jabkay 15 minute baad hi Katron island ke qareeb se dhuwen ke baadal uthaty hue dekhe gaye. Do Americi ladaka tayyaray F15 ney bhi baghair ijazat udne walay tayyarah ka taqub shuru kya, taham is se qabal hi woh gir kar tabah ho gaya. Seen hawalay se Sea-Tac Airport ney apne twitter paighaam mein likha, ‘aik Airline ke mulazim ney baghair ijazat Sea-Tac airport se aik tayyarah udaya, jis mein koi musafir nahi tha, jo girkar tabah ho gaya hai jabkay Airport par mamool ka operation bahaal kar diya gaya hai.’ Fizaya Company ney apne twitter pegham mein likha, ‘hum Horizan Air Q 400 tayyarah ke baghair ijazat udaaye jaany ke waqeye se aagah hain, lekin is mein koi musafir nahi tha.’ Zaraye ke mutabiq hijacker ney Katron jazeeray par kayi chakkar lagaye aur mukhtalif kartab dekhata raha. Is douran tayyarah kabhi oopar kabhi neechay aata rhaa aur kabhi qalabazyan bhi lein jis ke baad woh Katron jazeeray mein hi gir kar tabah hogaya. Piaris County Police ke hukkaam ke mutabiq tayyarah ko aghwa karne wala Airlines ka mechanic tha jis ki umar 29 baras thi,Jo fiza mein tayyarah ke sath stunts karte hue ya phir jahaaz udane ke tareeqon se la ilmi ki bana par, jahaz ko crash kargaya. Ibtidayi tehqiqaat ke mutabiq tayyarah girnay ki wajah pilot ki jahaaz udaane ke tareeqon se la ilmi aur fiza mein kartab dikhnana ho sakti hai.
A 29-year-old airline mechanic stole the Horizon Air Q400 from Sea-Tac International Airport and crashed it near Ketron Island. There were no passengers aboard.
— Brendan Grainger (@Highflyermel)
500.title: America mein hijack kya gaya tayyarah gir kar tabah

news_detail: Nellore:  Ek muthayurkun waqea mein aik naujawan khatoon  Nellore police se rujoo hotay hue shikayat ki ke RTC  ke aik driver ne usay dhamki di hai ke agar woh usay mubashrat karne na dey to woh is ke bhai ko jaan se maar daaley ga. Ladki jo  Nellore town ke  Pallemkondia  ilaqa mein rehti hai kaha ke RTC  bus driver Sheikh Hussain ne is ke ghar ke bahar park ki gayi bike ko bhi jala diya tha. Ladki ke mutabiq jab woh intermediate ki taleem parahi thi us ki dosti bus Driver se hogayi, taham is ke walidain ko is ki bhanak lag gayi aur unhon ne is se doori Ekhtiyar karne ka intibah diya tab se ladki apne ghar par hi rah rahi hai, taham driver is ko tang kar raha hai ke is ke sath jismani taluqaat qaim kere basorat deegar woh is ke bhai ka qatal karde ga. Ladki ki shikayat par Police ne aik muqadma darj karliya.
358.title: Jismani taluqaat qaim karne sabiq girlfriend ko  RTC driver ki dhamki

375.title: Jismani taluqaat qaim karne sabiq girlfriend ko  RTC driver ki dhamki

news_detail: Rusia mein Police teen naujawan ladkiyon par jo aapas mein saggy behnain batayi jati hain apne Mafia Boss waalid par jinsi, jazbaati aur jismaani ziyadtion ke baad usay chaqu se waar karkay halaak karne ka iqraar karne par Kristina (19), Angelina (18) aur Maria (17) ke khilaaf qatal ke ilzamaat aayed kiye hain. Maqtool ki shanakht Mikhail Khachaturyan ki hesiyat se ki gayi hai. Rusian zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq ‘sang dil’ baap ki teeno baityon ney apne waalid ki sakhtiyon aur beja tasahddud se tang aakar bil akhir usay mout ke ghaat utaar diya. Maqtool ke jism par chaaqo ke waar ke kayi nishaanat thay aur us ki laash flats ke Mosco block ke lift ke paas pafi mili. Teeno baityon ney iqraar kya ke unhon ney mil kar apne waalid ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya hai aur Police ke samney id-daa kya ke woh heroin ka nasha karne ka aadi tha aur kayi martaba un ki asmat raizi karne aur jaan se maardeney ki dhamkian di theen. teeno baityon ka kehna hai ke un ke waalid ney un ki zindagi ajeeran bana rakhi thi. Woh rozana un ki marpeet karta, ghar mein band rakhta aur terha terha ke tashadud ke harbe istemaal karta, nashay ka aadi tha. Tang aakar bil-aakhir unhon ney sang-dil waalid se gulu khulasi ke liye usay chaaqo aur kulhadhe ke waar karkay mout ki neend sulaa diya. Roos mein qanoon nafiz karne waley idaron ke zaraye ka kehna hai ke apne waalid ki qaatil teen ladkiyon ko hirasat mein liya gaya hai.

Mikhail Khachaturyan ke baray mein mukhtalif aaraa samney aayi hain. Aik taraf woh sakht mazhabi shakhs tha aur baityon ko ghar ke andar bhi mazhabi libaas istemaal karne par sakhti se Kaarband karne ki koshish karta magar doosri taraf woh manshiat mafia ka bhi sarghana tha. Khud bhi manshiat istemaal karta. Police ka kehna hai ke jab unhon ne maqtool ki gaadi ki talashi li to is mein inhen aatsheen asleha aur do kilogram heroin bhi mili. Hirasat mein li gayi teeno ladkiyon ney apne waalid ko qatal karne ka aitraaf kya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke baap ney un ki zindagi azaab bana rakhi thi jis ke baayis unhon ney usay hamesha ke liye khatam karne faisla kya. Kristina ney kaha ke hum is se nafrat karti theen, hum chahti theen ke aisa kuch hojaye ke ya to woh gayab hojaye ya hum is ko kabhi na jaanen. Teeno ney id-daa kya ke waardaat ke din bhi un ke baap ney un par chaaqo se hamla karne ki koshish ki magar is martaba un teeno ney us par qaboo paate hue par pay darpay waar karna shuru kar diye. Ahal e mohalla aur Khachaturyan ke jan-ney walay bhi usay aik sakht-geer aur sang-dil shakhs ke taur par jantay hain. 57 sala Khachaturyan ney teeno baityon ko school bhejney ke bajaye inhen ghar mein band kar rakha tha aur un ki naqal wo harkat par nazar rakhney ke liye khufia cameras laga rakhtay thay. Us ney aik beti par jinsi tashadud bhi kya magar woh unhen jismani aur zehni taur par har waqt tashadud ka nishana banata rehta. Padosion ka kehna hai ke Mikhail aik baar apne pooray khandan ko jungle mein le gaya aur unhen qatal karne ki dhamkian den. Us mauqa par is ki biwi faraar hogayi. Us ney bachon ko sakhti ke sath mana kardiya ke woh apni walida se rabita na karen. Aik muqami TV Channel 112 ke mutabiq Khachaturyan ney aik beti par jinsi tashadud kya jis par is ney khud kashi ke liye badi miqdaar mein golian kha li theen taham doctors ney usay maut se bchalya. Aik baar Khachaturyan ka beta apne aik dost ko le kar ghr aaya to Khachaturyan ney shor machana shuru kardiya ke us ajnabi ke sath us ki baityon ke najaayez taluqaat hain. Rusia mein sarkari satah par is waqea ki tafseelaat samney nahi ayen taham zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq girftar ki gayi teeno ladkiyon ko apne waalid ke qatal ke jurm mein muqadma ka saamna hai aur unhen 15 saal tak qaid ki saza hosakti hai.
383.title: Teen baityon ney ‘Mafia Boss’ baap ko qatal kardiya

news_detail: Israeli adalat ney mangal ke roz aik faisla mein Falasteeni Shaeyrah Dareen Tatour ko paanch mah qaid ki saza suna di. woh do barson se ghar mein nazar-band hai. Dareen ney adalti faisla par apna rad-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha ke yeh ghasib mumlikat ki adalat hai. Yeh aik fastai mumlikat hai aur Yahoodi Qaumi Mamlikati Qanoon sirf yeh zahir karta hai ke yahan nasli asbiyat payi jati hai. Yeh saza mujhe rok nahi paye gi. Mein koi pehli qaidi hoon? aur na hi mein aakhri qaidi hosakti hoon? Dareen par ilzaam hai ke unhon ney Social Media par apne aik Qasida aur bayan ke zareye logon ko dehshatgardi par ubhaara. Dareen ney Facebook aur Youtube par aik record shuda video post ki thi jis mein woh pas manzar mein apna arabi Qasida ” قاوم يا شعبي قاومهم (mere logon ka difaa karo, un ka difaa karo. ..)” parh rahi hain jab ke video mein naqaab posh Falasteeni Israeli fojion par pathrao karte nazar aa rahay hain. khatoon Shaeyrah ney apna yeh Qasida october 2015 mein nashar kya jab Falastinyon ki janib se Israelion ke khilaaf churay se hamlon, firing aur gaadi se kuchalnay ki karwaiyon ki aik lehar ney sir uthaya tha. Is ke chand roz baad Israeli fouj ney 36 sala Dareen ko girftar kar liya. Israeli istighasa ke numaindon ke mutabiq Falasteeni Shaeyrah ney Social Media par jo kuch nashar kya woh tashadud ke liye ishtial angazi ke zumray mein aata hai. Dareen ney is muaqqaf ko mustard kar diya. Israeli istighasa ke mutabiq Dareen Tatour par aik Falasteeni muzahmati tanzeem “Islami Jehaad” ki himayat ka bhi ilzaam hai. Israel mazkoorah jamaat ko dehshat gard shumaar karta hai. Nasra shehar mein adalat ke andar sahafion se guftagu karte hue Dareen ney kaha ke inhen jail ki saza ki tawaqqa thi. Is faislay mein koi hairat ki baat nahi kyun ke jab Israeli Adalat mein koi Falasteeni mulzim hota hai to usay insaaf nahi milta. Bilkhushoos jab ke bunyadi taur par muqadma siyasi nauiyat ka ho jaissa ke Falasteeni Shaeyrah ke muamlay mein tha. Dareen Tatour ka talluq un Falastinyon ki nasal se hai jo Arabs aur Jews ke darmain 1948 ki jung ke baad apni araazi mein maujood rahay aur wahan Israeli riyasat qaim kar di gayi. Is dauran asleha ke zor par qatal aam ke zareya lakhoon Falastinyon ko apne gharron ko choarnay par majboor kar diya gaya.
393.title: Social Media par Qasida post karne wali Falasteeni Shaeyrah ko jail ki saza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Drake ke geet ”In My Feelings” par bardhtay ‘Kiki Challenge’ par stunt karne ki koshisho mein kayi naujawan duniya bhar mein haadsa ka shikaar ho chukay hain. a. is challenge mein chalti gaadi se bahar kood kar ya nikal kar ‘kiki, do you love me’ ki geet ke dhun par raqs karna hota hai, magar aisa karte hue duniya bhar mein kayi log haadsa ka shikaar ho chukay hain. Chalti gaadi se kood kar raqs karne ki koshish aik ahcha tajurbah hargiz nahi ho sakta hai. Yeh pagal pan ab Hindustan mein bhi phialta ja raha hai. is terhan ki harkat karte hue mukhtalif soshil media par ki janey wali posts par comments aur tbsron se nojawanon mein aik ajeeb se junoon peda hogaya hai ke woh bhi aisa kar saktay hain. Is online junoon ke baais walidain ko apne bachon ki fikar la-haq hogayi hai ke kahin un ke ladle bhi aisa karte hue kisi haadsa ka shikaar nah ho jaien. Bataya jata hai ke instagram par sirf mangal ke din #inmyfeelingschallenge ka hashtag  4 lakh martaba istemaal hochuka hai. sorat e haal ki sangeen noiyat ko bhaanp letay hue. Hindustani Police ney awam ko mutnabba kya hai ke woh is challenge ko injaam nah den. jiye poor, bangloru, aur Mumbai mein police ney pehlay hi is khsos mein warnings dey chuki haiHyderabad Traffic Police ney aik qadam agay barhatay hue hyderabad trafik police ney aik press note jari karte hue intibah diya ke chalti gaadi se atrkr ya kood kar raqs karne walon ke khilaaf awaami ke liye takleef ka baais ban’ney aur dosray raharaun ki jaan ke liye khatrah ban’ney ki binaa par Tazirat Hind ki dafaa 268 aur Hyderabad City Police Act ki dafaa 70(b) ke tehat muqadma darj kya jaye ga. Additional Commissioner of Police Traffic ke press note mein kaha gaya ke Hyderabad Traffic Police ney mehsoos kya ke kayi naujawan drivers ‘Kiki Challenge’ ke zair asar chalti gadiyon se kood kar sadkon par raqs kar rahay hain. Chalti gaadi se koodney aur sarrak ke darmiyan mein raqs karne se jaan ka khatrah kayi gina barh jata hai. is terhan ki harkato se nah sirf driver ki jaan ko khatrah kahq rehta hai balkay doosron ki jaan ko bhi khatrah peda hojata hai. Is terha ki harkato se fouj daari karwaiya la-haq hoti hain. Sadkon par is terha ki be-tuki harkatein karne se koi bhi nagehani waqea runuma ho sakta hai. Traffic Police ney naujawanon se khwahish ki ke woh is terha ki harkatein karne se guraiz karen. Police ney press note mein kaha ke mehfooz taur par gaadi chalaate hue salamat rahen. Zindagi mein kaaramad challenge ko qubool karen, chunkay aap malik ka mustaqbil hain.
409.title: “Kiki Chlallenge” aap ko jail ki Hawa khila sakta hai !

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Police ne mujrimeen ki shanakht mein tafteesh kunindgaan ohdedaron ki sahoolat ke liye apne Mobile Application TSCOP ke liye aik aur tool ka izafah kya hai. Director General of Police Telangana Mr. M. Mahindra Reddy ne aaj Hyderabad mein aik press conference se khitaab karte hue bataya ke ‘chehra ki shanakht ka nizaam’ tafteesh kunindgaan ko kisi fard ke chehra ka CCTNS ke database mein mehfooz mujrimeen ki digital photos se taqabul karte hue mushtaba mujrimeen ka pata chalanay mein madad mil sakti hai. Database mein matloob afraad, gumshudaa afraad, qanoon shikan afraad aur media mein pehlay hi se shaya girftar shuda afraad ki tasaveer mehfooz hain. Unhon ne wazeh kiya ke adalaton mein soorat shanasi ki taknik ko adalaton mein bataur shahadat istemaal nahi kya jata. Unhon ne bataya ke is tool se mushtaba afraad ke baaray mein yeh pata chalanay mein madad miley gi ke aaya woh maazi mein kisi jurm mein mulawis to nahi hai. Unhon ne bataya ke is se gumshudaa afraad, ghair shanakht shuda laashon ki shanakht karne mein bhi madad miley gi aur CC TV cameras mein qaid kisi waardaat ke footage ka taqabul hamaray database mein mojood tasaveer se taqabul karte hue qanoon shikan afraad ka pata chalanay mein barri madad miley gi. Unhon ne bataya ke hum androon aur bairon riyasat akhbarat mein shaya girftar afraad ki tasaveer ko bhi database mein shaamil kya ja raha hai. yahi nahi balkay is database ko mazeed muaser bananay ke liye hum qadeem records ko bhi upload kar rahay hain. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein bataya ke is system ke zareya hamaray database mein maujood 10-15 baras qabal li gayi tasaveer se mushtaba fard ka taqabul kya ja sakta hai. Mr. Mahindra Reddy ne bataya ke hum Mulk ki deegar reyaston se bhi mujrimeen ki tasaveer aur in ke baaray mein maloomat aur dastyab data haasil kar rahay hain taakay deegar riyaston se hamari riyasat mein daakhil honay walay qanoon shikan afraad par kari nazar rakhi jasakay. Unhon ne bataya ke is system se tehqeeq o tafteesh karne walay Police ohdedaron ko is nai sahoolat se juraim ka pata laganay mein barri madad miley gi.
422.title: Telangana Police ne aik aur tool ka izafah kya. Mobile App ke liye soorat shanasi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner ki Task Torce Central Zone aur West Zone teams ne moatbar ittila milnay par 8 afraad par mushtamil do tolion ko pakad liya jo Markazi o Riyasti hukoomaton ke mukhtalif mukhtalif mahukma jaat jaisay Railway, Revenue, Education waghera mein mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue masoom be rozgaar nojawanon ko dhoka dainay mein mulawis hain. un do tolyon neh 100-150 nojawanon ko mehakma railway mein ‘Ticket Collector’, ‘Commercial Clerk’ aur ‘Point Man’ mahkuma maal mein ‘Junior Assistant’ Mahkuma Taleem mein Junior Assistant’ aur ‘Attender’ ki mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue un se bhaari ruqomat battor len aur inhen farzi ehkaam taqarruraat, maktoob tarbiyat rawana kiye. Un ke qabza se naqad 24. 1 lakhs rupay aur jaali ehkaam taqarruraat, farzi shanakhti cards waghera zabt karliye gai, mulizimeen ke naam Vardhanapu Gangadhar  (35) saakin Kakinada, Pitla Dattadhari (28) Pait Basheerabad, M shiva Reddy (27) Uppal, K. Rajesh (31) Uppal, Aerokanda Swami (32) Vanasthalipuram, Makira Kranti Kumar (30) Zamistanpura, (Yamsani  Viresham (49) Huzoorabad, Kareemnagar, Mekanda Srikant (35) Ramnagar Secunderabad aur  P. Padma Reddy Vanasthalipuram hain. Un mulzimeen ka tareeqakar yeh tha ke woh mulazimton ke khawahish-mand naujawanon ko un ke doston aur rishta daaron ke tavassut se mulaqaat karte hue unhen mukhtalif sarkari mehakumon mein mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue inhen 10-25 lakhs rupay talab karte aur bataur paishgi 1-10 laahd rupay fi umeed waar wusool kar lete. Umeedwaron se paishgi raqam haasil kar lenay ke baad woh inhen farzi SMSes, Emails aur Appointment Letters bheja karte they aur inhen aik maqam par talab karte hue un se ruqumaat bator lete. Waqt taalne ke liye yeh toliyan aisay umeedwaron ku Durgapur,  Asansol (Maghribi Bengal) aur Khurdah (Asam) training ke liye talabb karte. Is ke baad inhen ticket collector ka uniform pehnakar inhen Secundrabad Railway Station par khada karte aur apni taraf se aik mah ki thankhowa bhi ada karte they. Jab umeedwaar, un se rujoo hotay to woh khud ko muqami siyasatdaan zahir karte aur yeh bawar karwaate ke un ke mukhtalif sarkari mahkuma jaat mein zabardast asar o rasookh hai. Hatta ke woh khusoosi mahakuma jati Quota/Ministers Quota/Deceased Quota waghera ke tehat imtehanaat mein shirkat ke baghair bhi mulaazmaten dila saknay. Is terha woh un se aik taa das laakh rupay bator paishgi aur asli Certificates waghera haasil kar lete.

Un mulazmeen ke khilaaf mukhtalif police stationon mein 10 muqadmaat darj kiye ja chukay they. police neh awam se appeal ki ke woh sarkari mehakmon aur multi national companiyon mein mukhtalif jayidadon par taqarrur ke liye kisi darmiyani shakhs ki baton mein na ayen.
451.title: Mulazimton ka jhansa dainay wali do toliyan aur srghanh giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner Hyderabad City Police Mr. Anjani Kumar ney Mohammad Saleem @ Sunil Shetty @ Ibrahim @ Setty Saleem Kanchan Bagh saariq ke khilaaf 26 July ko PD act p d act laago kya. Auto driver Mohammad Saleem Errakunta zila Ranga Reddy, pur- tayyush zindagi basr karne hyderabad aur Rachakunda Police Commissionerate hudood mein mqfl gharron ko nishana banatay hue sarqa kya karta tha. Woh is se qabal Hyderabad o Rachakonda kanda police kmshnrit ke hudood mein sarqa aur naqb zani ki 14 wardaton mein mulawis tha aur awaami muqamat- par is noiyat ke juraim karte hue khauf o hraas paida kar raha tha. Awaami sukoon aur qanoon o zabt ki barqarai ko yakeeni bananay Police ney usay crime number 20/2018 mein tazeerat Hind ki daf-aat 454 aur 380 ke tehat adalti tehweel mein day diya.
467.title: Saariq ke khilaaf PD Act laago

news_detail: Hyderabad. New Century School Kukatpally, Hyderabad mein aaj aik alamnaak haadisa mein chauthi jamaat ki do Taalibaat stage ki chhat aur deewar gir jaane se barsar e  mauqa halaak hogai jabkay deegar Talaba zakhmi hogaye jin mein 2 ki haalat naazuk btai jati hai. Mahlook donon Taalibaat Mahi Kirtana aur Chndana deegar Talaba ke sath Krate ki mashq kar rahay thay. Yeh haadisa dopehar 2:30 bajey ke qareeb paish aaya. Haadisa ke waqt wahan maujood logon ney malba mein dabey 5 Talaba ko bachaaya aur baad azan ambulance talab karli gayi. Assistant Commissioner of Police Kukatpally, Cyberabad Commissionerate Mr. Bhujanga Rao ney bataya ke donon Taalibaat barsar e mauqa halaak hogain jabkay deegar zakhmi paanch Talaba ko fauri qaribi Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. Anupma Hospital ke aik Doctor ney bataya ke jumla 6 Talaba ko Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya. Baad azan aik aur ladki ko Hospital laya gaya. Do ladkyon  ko murda qarar diya gaya jabkay aik taalib e ilm ke paiyr ki haddi mein fracture agaya aur us ke hathon aur pait mein chouten aayi hain. Do Talaba ko ibtidayi tibbi imdaad faraham karne ke baad inhen dosray hosspital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Kukatpally MLA Mr.  Madhavaram Krishna Rao ney School aur Hospital ka daura kya aur kaha ke hum ney School ka daura kya aur yeh dekha ke woh aik qadeem taamer thi. School intizamia ki laparwahi ke baayis do masoom bachon ki jaanen talaf hogai. Sarkari ohdedar bhi is ke barabar zimma daar hain jo ney aisay Schools ki ijazat dete hain. hum tahaqeeq karen ge aur pata chalayein ge ke is haadsa ke liye kaun zimma daar hain. Unhon ney bataya ke School intizamia ke 2 afraad ko Police ney hirasat mein le liya hai jabkay aik mafroor hai. unhon ney mahlook Taalibaat ke khandan ko tayaqqun diya ke hukoomat zaroor  exgratia jari kere gi. Unhon ney kaha ke hamari yeh koshish hogi ke is School ka ijazat nama mansookh kardiya jaye, hamein school mein pehlay se hi taleem par hai hain bachon ke baaray mein bhi sochna hoga, inhen fori kisi dosray school mein shareek karwana mushkil hoga. Walidain ki shikayat par police ney School intizamia ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya hai.
483.title: Stage ki chhat o deewar gir jane se do Taalibaat halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Police ney jummay ke din Chaitanya school DD colony, Hyderabad ke aik teacher ko taalibat ke sath nazaibah rawayya ikhtiyar karne aur unhen jinsi taur par harasan karne ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya hai. Ladkiyon ki shikayat par un ke walidain ney students Union ke qayedeen ke sath school pahunche aur teacher ke sath marpeet ki aur school ke furniture ko nuqsaan pohanchaya. School intizamia ney Police ko soorat e haal se waaqif karwaya. Barham walidain, Police se bhi ulajh gay aur us ki mojoodgi mein bhi usay marpeet karne ki koshish ki. walidain ke ehtijaj ke baayis school ke ihata mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. police nay Ramesh nami teacher ko hirasat mein le liya. police ke mutabiq mulzim ki shanakht Ramesh ki hesiyat se ki gayi jo ladkiyon ko heajaan angaiz videos dikha kar unhen rijhaane ki koshish kar raha tha. Police ney teacher ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya. Walidain nay Police se mutaleba kya ke taalibat ke sath oochhi harkatein karne walay is teacher ko sakht se sakht saza dilae jaye. ladkiyon ney bataya ke woh inhen lunch ke waqfa mein fehash videos aur tasaveer dikha kar un se waisa hi karne ke liye kaha karta tha aur woh inhen galaay laganay ki bhi koshish karta tha. Bataya jata hai ke jab barham walidain, school puhanche to Ramish wahan se faraar honay ki koshish ki taham woh pkrhlya gaya aur usay buri terhan petta gaya
501.title: Jinsi harasani par Chaitanya School ka teacher giraftar

news_detail: Ek ghair mamooli waqia mein driver ney Telugu Desham Party ke rukan Assembly mida Malikarjuna Reddy ke waalid ke paas se jab un ki car Kurnool Zila mein ek hotel ke paas thahri hui thi 50 lakh rupay le kar chala gaya. Rukn Assembly ke waalid Rama Krishna Reddy jo Tirumala Trupathi Devasthanam Board ke rukn bhi hain kaha ke un ke waalid jab lunch karne hotel mein daakhil hue to driver car le kar faraar hogaya jis mein 50 laakh rupay rakhay hue they. MLA ney muqami Police mein shikayat darj karwai. Mulzim ko pakad ney Police sargaram hochuki hai. Rama Krishna Reddy Hyderabad se Kadapa jarahay they ke Kurnool mein Raj Vihar Hotel mein dopehar ka Khana khane ke liye ruke they. Unhon ney car mein bag rakh kar is ki nigrani karne ke liye driver ko chohod rakha tha jis mein 50 lakh rupay rakhay hue they, lekin jab woh wapas lautay to driver mobayyana taur par raqam le kar gayab hochuka tha. Police CCTV footage aur deegar tafseelaat ka jaiza letay hue driver ko pakadney ki koshisho mein lagi hui hai.
368.title: MLA ke waalid ke 50 lakh rupay le kar driver faraar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shehar Hyderabad mein aik Travels Agency ‘Al-Burraq Umrah aur Hajj’ waqay lakdi ka pull ke khilaaf Saifabad Police Station mein shikayat darj karwai gayi ke takhriban 52 afraad se Hajj par bhejney ka wada karkay dhoka diya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Hajj par rawana honey ke khawhishmand hazraat se Travels Agency ne fikis 2.5 lakh rupay wusool kiye thay. Is terha Agency ney 1.30 crore rupay se zayed wusool karliye thay. Mutasireen ney Hajj ko rawaangi ki umeeden khatam hojane par Agency ke khilaaf Saifabad Police Station pahonch kar shikayat darj karwai. Mutasireen ney bataya ke kuch logon ney to teen mah qabal adai kar di thi jabkay kuch logon ney aik daidh mah qabal ruqomat ada kar diye thay. Aik mutasirah shakhs ney Police Station mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha kay hamein dhoka diya gaya hai. Hum se Passport aur deegar ahem dastawizaat ruqomat sameit le liye gaye thay aur hamari teeka andazi bhi kar di gayi thi aur Asif nagar ke aik function hall mein hamari tahiati taqreeb bhi munaqqid ki gayi thi. Aik mutasira shaks ney bataya ke hamein aakhri martaba yeh bataya gaya tha ke hamari 13

August ko rawangi hogi magar uss din hamein bataya gaya ke Visa Endorsment nahi ho paaya hai is liye woh Hajj Visa ke bajaye Visit par Makkah Mukarama ko bhejney ki koshish kar rahay hain jis ko hum ney yeh kehte hue mustarad kardiya ke aisa karna ghair qanooni hai. Agency ney akhirkaar hamein hamaray Passports aur ruqumaat wapas lauta dene ka wada kya aur aaj Agency ke daftar pahunchney ke liye kaha gaya. Din bhar hamein yeh kehte hue taala jata raha hai ke abhi raqam nahi aayi hai. Aik aur mutasir ney bataya ke un ke chaar logon ka group tha jin se 10 lakh rupay wusool kiye gaye thay. Unhon ney bataya ke First Lancer ke Relief Hospital ke Dr. Afzal aur dosray bhi is Scandal mein mulawis hain, jinhon ney hamein na sirf iss Travels Agency ke zareya Hajj adaa karne ki targheeb di thi balkay wohi tamam umoor ki njaam dahi karte rahay thay, hatta ke ruqumaat bhi unhon ney wusool kiye thay magar aaj yeh keh rahay hain ke Travels Agency walay un ke sirf dost hain aur un ka is agency se koi talluq nahi hai. Mutasireen ney bataya ke Police ohdedaron ney kaha ke woh tahaqeeq karen ge. Police ney tahaal is khysoos mein koi muqadma darj nahi kya hai.
380.title: Ek aur Travels Agency ki dhoka dahi. 52 afraad Hajj karne se mehroom

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik nagehani haadsa mein Police ki gaadi ne GHMC ki jaroob kash (sweeper) khatoon ko kuchal diya. Reinbazar Police Station ke hudood mein Bada Bazar y Junction ke paas GHMC ki khatoon jaroob kash, barish ke pani ki safai kar rahi thi ke Police ki aik patroling jeep ne moud lainay ke baad sadak par safai ka kaam karne wali khatoon Sai Amma (52) ko rond diya jis ke nateeja mein woh buri terha zakhmi hogayi. Zakhmi khatoon ko fauri Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan unhen murda qarar day diya gaya. Police gaadi chalanay walay Head Constable Ashok ne joon hi Junction ke paas gaadi ko moda, unhon gaadi par qaboo khodya aur sadak par safai karne wali GHMC karamchari ko rond dala, halaanke moudd letay waqt un ki gaadi ki raftaar intahi sust thi taham jon hi unhon ne moudd liya achanak un ki gaadi ki raftaar badh gayi aur khatoon ko kuchal diya. Is khusoos mein Ashok ke khilaaf crime number 124 of 2018 ke tehat aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Iss waqea ki ittila milnay par Commissioner Police ne Head Constable ki muattali ke ehkaam jaari kar diye. Unhen girftar karliya gaya hai.
388.title: Police gaadi ne GHMC jaroob kash ko rond daala

news_detail: Hyderabad. Banjara Hills Police Station ke hudood mein waqay Brindavan Colony, Tolichowkhi mein muqami makeeno ki salamti ko behtar bananay ke maqsad se nasab kardah Closed Circuit Television (CC Tv) Cameras ki tanseeb ke do din baad hi teen naujawanon ney chori karli taham Cameras ney disconnect kiye jaany tak chori ke manazair ko nah sirf qaid kya balkay recorders mein un ko mehfooz bhi kardiya. Banjara Hills Police ney aisay 8 Camera chori karne walay teen naujawanon ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Muqami logon ney shikayat darj karwai ke 10

August ki shab 8 Cameras aur connecting wires ka sarqa karliya gaya hai. Brindavan Colony Wellfare Association ke ohdedaron ney apni shikayat mein bataya ke Park Area aur Masjid e Fatima ke atraaf lagaye gaye CC Tv Camera sarqa karliye gaye hain. Park aur Masjid ke ilaqa ki behtar nigrani aur ghair samaji sargarmion ki sarkubi ke liye yeh camera sirf do din qabal yani 8

August ko hi nasab kiye gaye thay. Sareqeen ney un Cameron ka sarqa to karliya magar unhen kya maloom tha ke jin Cameron ka woh sarqa kar rahay hain wohi Camare un ki harkaton ko apne record mein mehfooz bhi kar rahay hain. Banjara Hills Police ney bataya ke Masjid mein rakhay gaye Digital Video Recoder (DVR) aur monitoring systems ney chori ke manazair ko bhi mehfooz karliya. Tehqeeq ke dauran Police ney DVR mein mehfooz footages ka mushahidah kya aur is dauran muqami ilaqa ke hi teen qusoorwaar naujawanon ki nishandahi karli gayi. Inspector Banjarahills Mr K Srinivas ney bataya ke un footage ki madad se hum ney khation ki nishandahi karli aur unhen girftar karliya hai. Aisay hi noiyat ke waqiyat shehar ke deegar maqamat par bhi paish aaye hain. Teen naujawanon ney Police ko bataya ke woh CCTv Cameras ki tanseeb se nakhush thay, chunkay woh raat ke auqaat is ilaqa mein ghuma phira karte thay. Woh nahi chahtay thay ke un ki naqal o harkat par nigrani rakhi jaye. Karkhana Secunderabad ke aik taajir ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya gaya jis ney apne mulazim ko community CCTv tod daine ki mobayyana hidayat dey raha hai. Woh nahi chahta tha ke deegar makeeno ko is ki naqal o harkat ka pata chalay. Taham yeh tod phod dosray CCTv Camera mein qaid hogayi.
401.title: CC Tv Cameras ki tanseeb ke do din baad hi chori. Teen girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukan Assembly Gosha Mahal Raja Singh Lodha ko mangal ke din Police ney giraftar karliya. Gau Raksha ke naam par qanoon ko hathon mein lainay par un ke khilaaf darj muqadmaat ke khilaaf ba taurr ehtijaj Hyderabad Police Commisionerate ke rubaroo dharna dainay ki dhamki par unhen girftar karliya gaya hai. Peer ki shab se Rukn Assembly ki rihayish gaah par Police ko taiynaat kardiya gaya tha aur jab woh Mangal ki subah apne ghar se bahar nikalney ki koshish ki to unhen girftar karliya gaya. Iss mauqa par Raja Singh ney baat cheet karte hue kaha ke Police, un Hindus ke khilaaf muqadmaat darj kar rahi hai jo gaaye ki rakhsa karne ki koshish kar rahay hain. Unhon ney Gau Rakshakon ke khilaaf darj muqadmaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne ka mutaliba kya aur woh chahtay hain ke jo gaayein zabt ki gayeen unhen Gaushalah muntaqil kya jaye, halaanke ab tak Eid ul Azhha ke silsila mein kisi gaaye ko zabt nahi kya gaya hai. Unhon ney intikhabaat ke paish e nazar kattar pasand Hindus ke vote batorne ki niyat se is saal Gau Raksha ke naam par na sirf BJP Party se istifa dey diya hai balkay kuch Hindu naujawanon ko ikhatta karte hue un ke Gau Raksha dal qaayim kiye hain aur unhen shaher ke muzafaat mein tolyon ki shakal mein bhaijtay hue Eid ul Azhha ke silsila mein janwaron ko muntaqil karne wali gadiyon ko zabardasti rok kar unhen apne qabza mein karne ki koshish kar rahay hain. Yahan yeh baat qabil e zikar hai ke khud Musalmanoon ney razakarana taur par kayi barson se gaaye ki qurbani na dainay ka faisla kya hai. Yeh sirf apne aap ko kattar Hindu saabit karne ke liye har saal Gau Raksha ke naam par uddham machate hain magar is martaba kuch ziyada hi kar rahay hain. Un ki inhi harkaton ki wajah se khud BJP Party ki riyasti unit ke qaayideen aajiz aachukay hain aur unhen party programmes se kayee dinon se door rakha gaya hai. Aisa lagta hai ke unhen khud yeh yaqeen hochla hai ke woh is martaba dubarah Gosha Mahal halqa Assembly se muntakhib nahi ho payinge is liye woh Gau Raksha ke naam par yeh sab drama baazi kar rahay hain.
426.title: Raja Singh giraftar. Gau Raksha ke naam par Police Commisionerate par dharna dainay ki dhamki ka shaksana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ghairat ke naam par mushtaba qatal  (suspect Honor Killing) ke aik waqea mein Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein jumaraat ko aik baap ne apni beti ka gala (throat) kaat diya chunke iss ne uss shakhs se shadi karli thi jis se woh pyar karti thi. Mutafiyah ki shanakht Jaya Amma ki hesiyat se ki gayi jis ne apne padosi Suresh se paanch saal qabal shadi karli thi. Shadi ke baad yeh joda basti chod kar chala gaya tha. Unhen aik do sala larka bhi hai. taham yeh khandan abdullah poor wapas lota tha taakay Suresh ki maa ki aakhri mazhabi rasomaat mein shirkat kar sakay, jin ka haal hi mein dehaant huwa tha. Jaya Amma ke waalid ko apni beti ke wapas lout anay ka ilm hogaya, Iss ke waalid Narsimha ne gussa mein biphar kar apni beti ka gala kaat diya jis ke nateeja mein bar sar e mauqa halaak hogayi.
439.title: Honor Killing- Baap ne beti ka gala kaat diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Tappa Chabotra Police Station hudood mein waqay Sharda Nagar, Gudimalkapur ilaqa mein aik qaata e araazi se jis ke bichon beech aik qabar waqay hai, kal shaam namaloom afraad ne Ganesh ki tooti phooty Moorti rakh di thi, Police ko is ki khabar milnay par fauri harkat mein atay hue Moorti ko wahan se hata diya gaya aur Police Station muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Police ne isteqdami karwai karte hue khamoshi ke sath is Moorti ko htadya hai. Police ohdedaron ne bataya ke mumkin hai ke tooti phooty iss Moorti ko kisi ne yahan khuli zameen dekh kar chod gaya hoga taham hum is baat ka pata laganay ki koshish kar rahay hain ke aaya yeh na danista amal tha ya kisi ki shararat. Iss ilaqa ke CC TV footages ke zareya iss ka pata laganay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Sharda Nagar colony mein taqreeban 200-250 murabba gaz ki aik khuli araazi hai jis ke beechon beech aik khuli qabar hai. Yeh qabar kis ki hai is ke baaray mein qareebi ilaqa ke Musalman bhi kuch bataney se qassir hain. Logon ne bataya ke aik arsa se yahan aik qadeem qabar hai jis par ab kuch logon ne chadar chadha rakhi hai taakay is qabar ki nishani baqi rahay. Iss qabar ke atraaf koi aur qabar na honey ki wajah se yeh ehtemaal nahi rehta hai ke yeh qabrastan hai taham yeh kisi walii ya buzurg ki qabar hosakti hai. Chunkay is ilaqa ki abadi ziyada tar ghair Muslims par mushtamil hai is liye sahib e qabar ke baaray mein kuch ziyada maloomat nahi hosaki. Waqf Board mein bhi is ka koi record shaed maujood nahi hai chunkay kuch baras qabal is qabar ke atraaf kachra phenka ja raha tha jis ki safai muqami naujawanon ne ki thi aur uss waqt Waqf Board ke arbab se rabita qaayim karte hue iss qabar aur iss ke tehat araazi ki Sayanat karne ka mutalba kiya gaya tha.
459.title: Gudimalkapur mein aik qabar ke paas rakhi gayi Ganesh Moorti hatadi gayi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Haalat e nasha mein gaadi challan jaan lewa aur qanoonan jurm hai magar jis ney zindagi mein kabhi sharaab ko chuwa tak nahi uss ko haalat e nasha mein zahir karna bhi kisi jurm se kam nahi. aisay hi aik case mein aik gaadi raan Syed Zaheeruddin Quadri ko Drunken Drive ke mauqa par rok kar breath analyzer ke zareya yeh pata challany ki koshish ki gayi ke aaya woh haalat e nasha mein to nahi hai. Breath Analyzer ney nasha ke 43 am jee points zahir kiye. Traffic Police ney is ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya. Zahirudin jnhon ney zindagi mein kabhi nasha nahi kya woh Breath Analyzer ke nateeja se hairan thae aur Police ohdedaron par zor dae rahe thae ke yeh nateeja ghalat hai chunkay woh nasha karte hi nahi. Unhon ney Police se israar kya ke un ke khoon ka muaina kya jaye aur haqeeqat ka pata chalaya jaye. Woh wahan maujood Police ohdedaron se ulajh pade. Un ki baat suni un suni kardainay par woh Traffic Police station pahunche aur wahan maujood ohdedaron se baat cheet ki jis par unhen Osmania General Hospital le jaya gaya aur un ki jaanch ki gayi jis par yeh pata chala ke waqai woh nasha kiye hue nahi hain, jis se Traffic Police ko khiffat uthani padi. Police ohdedar khud bhi hairat zada hai ke machine ney kaisay ghalat report di hai. Unhon ney mutalba kya ke un Police ohdedaron ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye jinhon ney machine ke ghalat tajzia ki bunyaad par un ke khilaaf haalat nasha mein gaadi challany ka challan kya aur aayindah se ghalat tajziye paish karne walay machinon ka istemaal tark kardiya jaye.
472.title: Drunken Drive. Traffic Police ko khiffat uthani padi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke Amusement Park ‘Lumbini Park’ aur talan ki maroof dukaan ‘Gokul Chat Bhandar’ mein 11 saal qabal hue bomb dhmakon ka faisla jo aaj sunaya janey wala tha wo   4
September tak moakhar kardiya gaya hai. Yaad rahay ke 25

August 2007 ko shaher ke do muqamat Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park mein dhamakay hue thae jin mai majmoi taur par 42 log halaak hogaye thae jabkay 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thae. Shaher ke deegar muqamat par mazeed do bombs ko nakara banadiya gaya. Shaher ke tafrehi muqam ”Lumbini Park” mein 25

August 2007 ki shaam 7:45 bajey aik zor daar dhamaka huwa jis ke 5 minute baad hi qalb e shahar masroof tareen muqam Koti par Chat ki mashhoor dukaan ” Gokul Chat Bhandar” ke paas aik aur dhamaka huwa. Baadazan shaher ke do maqamat se do bombs ko bar-aamad kiya gaya aur unhen phatt padney se qabal hi nakara banadiya gaya tha. Un dhamakon mein marnay walay mukhtalif tabqaat se talluq rakhtay thae jin mein bachay, tulba aur khawateen bhi shaamil thae. Un judwan bomb dhmakon ka muqadma 27

August peer ko Faisal honay wala tha. is khusoos mein Hyderabad Police ki Counter Intelligence wing ney aik muqadma darj kiya tha aur Mohammad Sadiq , Ansar Ahmed Badshah Shaikh, Akbar Ismail choudhry aur Syed Anique Shafeeq ko girftar karte hue adalat mein paish kiya gaya tha jo un dinon Cherlapallay Jail mein mahruse hain. Un charon ko pehlay Maharashtra ki ATS ney girftar kya tha jinhein baad-azan Transit Warrant par Gujrat muntakil kiya gaya tha. Fil-waqt woh  Cherlapallay Jail mein mahroos hain. Mulzimeen ke Wakeel Janab Shaikh Khalid ne bataya ke is muqadma ka aaj faisla sadir kiya janey wala tha taham faisla tehreeri taur par tayyar na hone ki wajah se moakhar kardiya gaya aur ab 4
September ko yeh muqadma faisal kiya jaye ga.
490.title: Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park Bomb Blasts ka faisla 4th  September tak moakhar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ibrahimpatnam town mein peer ki subah aik school Bus ney daidh sala ladki ko mobayyana taur par rond dala. Ladki ki shanakht Prabhika ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Yeh sheer-khawar bachi apni maa ke sath apne bhai ko school chodne aayi hui thi. Maa jab apne bachay ko school Bus mein sawaar karne mein masroof thi ke bachi Bus ke neechay chali gayi aur driver ney yeh mehsoos kiye baghair ke bachi Bus ke neechay hai gaadi is par chada di. Mutawafiah ke rishta daaron ney ilzaam aed kya ke school Bus, baghair muawin amlah ke chalayee jarahi thi. Laash ko autopsy ke liye sarkari hospital muntaqil kya gaya. Police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya.
504.title: Bus ney daidh sala bachi ko rond dala

news_detail: New Delhi. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny apni team se kaha ke un ke chaar sala daur Iqtidaar mein faraham kardah mulazimaton se mutaliq adaad o shumaar akhatta kiye jayen. aindah aam intikhabaat 2019 ke ahem intikhabi mozuaat mein aik ahem intikhabi mauzo mulazimaton ki farahmi bhi hoga. wizaraton ko hadaayat di gayi hai ke un ki taraf se chalaye gaye projects aur programmes par aik mufasil note tayyar kere aur un ke zareya faraham kardah mulazimaton ki tadaad jama kere. naam nah zahir karne ki shart par un logon ny qawaid ka hawala dete hue bataya ke wizaraton se yeh bhi kaha gaya ke mukhtalif programon ka qaumi majmoi pedawar par parney walay asraat ka bhi ihata kya jaye. sarkari report card mein mulazimaton par is liye tavajja di jarahi hai ke Narendra Modi ko un tnqidon ka jawab dainay ka mauqa mil sakay jis mein un par ilzaam aed kya ja raha hai ke woh har saal aik crore mulaazmaten faraham karne ke –apne intikhabi wada ko wafa karne mein nakaam ho chukay hain. woh aik kuleed hai agar woh chahtay hain ke –apne 2014 ke intikhabi muzahira ko dohrayen. Narendra Modi ny guzashta teen dahon mein sab se behtareen muzahira karte hue awam ka qatee khat aetmaad haasil kya tha. Narendra Modi jinhon ny 26 May ko –apne ohda ke chaar baras mukammal karte hain, is douran reyasti assemblion ke intikhabaat mein bi jay pi ko mila jal rad-e-amal haasil sun-hwa hai. bi jay pi 12 May ko janoobi riyasat krnatk mein aik barray imthehaan ka saamna karne jarahi hai. chand ilaqon mein Narendra Modi ki maqboliat mutasir hui hai taham woh sarmaya karon ke liye hunooz pasandeeda hain. yeh bawar krwane ki koshish ki jarahi hai ke 2019 mein toota phoota awaami khat aetmaad haasil hota hai to malik mein sarmaya kaari par asar pade ga. Modi hukoomat ny’ make un India ‘ jaisay programme ko shuru karte hue yeh bawar krwane ki koshish kar rahi hai ke malik mein bairooni sarmaya kaari ka bahao barha hai magar is se muqami logon ko haasil mulazimaton ke barey mein koi sarkari data mojood nahi hai. November 2016 mein naqdi bohraan ny sorat e haal ko mazeed ab-tar banadiya aur kayi log apni mulazimaton se mahroom hogaye they. iqtisadi farogh 2017-18 maali saal mein skrh kar 6. 6 feesad taq poanch gaya. un barson mein be rozgari ghalib rahi. isi liye Modi ke naqideen kehte hain ke 2. 3 million trilion dollar ki mayshit mein be rozgari mein izafah sun-hwa hai
379.title: Mulazimaton ki farahmi par data tayyar karne wizaraton ko Modi ki hadaayat

news_detail: Bengaluru. riyasat Karnataka mein assembly intikhabaat ko sirf teen din bach reh gay hain, aisay mein Bengaluru se aik bara inkishaaf sun-hwa hai, jahan taqreeban 10, 000 Voter shanakhti cards mangal ki shab aik apartment se bar aamad kiye gay. election commission naay Voter shanakhti cards ki dasteyabi ki tehqiqaat ka hukum jari kardiya hai. yeh ilzaam aed karte hue ke jis apartment se bar aamad kiye gay woh Congress ke qanoon saaz ka hai, BJPnaay halqa assembly Raja Rajeshwari Nagar ke intikhabaat multawi karne ka mutalba kiya hai. Congress naay jawabi waar karte hue BJPpar ilzaam aed kya ke muqami BJPquied ki malkiat ke apartment par dhave ka yeh’ drama’ rachte hue’ banawati shawahid’ ko thoons rahi hai .

reyasti election harkat mein atay hue taqriban nisf shab aik press conference talabb ki. Karnataka ke Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Sanjiv Kumar naay kaha ke cards, chhootey packets mein lapete hue they. Mr. Sanjiv Kumarnaay bataya ke beron malik rehne walay raye dahinda ki janib se fehrist raye dahindgaan mein –apne naam ki shamoliat ki darkhwast ka form number 6a makhsoos numbraat ke sath counterfoil bhi dastyab hue hain. counterfoil ka rang mamool ka nahi hai. commission naay yeh bhi bataya ke apartment se 5 laptops aur printers bhi zabt kiye gay hain. Mr. Sanjiv Kumarnaay kaha ke aindah 24 ghanton mein mazeed haqayiq ka hamein pata chal jaye ga jis ki asaas par aik sakht faisla kya jaye ga. Chief Electoral Officer ke press note mein bataya gaya ke mazkoorah apartment Manjula Nanjameri shakhs ki malkiat hai jo Raakesh Nami shakhs ko kiraya par diya gaya tha. hamein pata nahi ke aaya woh money rtna se kisi terhan ka talluq rakhta hai. Congress ke Randeep Singh Surjewala naay Bengaluru mein bhaari tadaad mein Voter shanakhti cards ki zabti ki aala sathi tehqiqaat ka mutalba karte hue kaha ke BJPke jhoot ka parda faash hoga
387.title: Karnataka intikhabaat : Bengaluru ke apartment se election commission naay das hazaar Voter cards zabt kiye

news_detail: Riyasat Bihar ke sabiq wazeer aala aur Rashtrya Janata Dal( RJD ) ke sadar Lalu Prasad Yadav aur Rabri Devi ke barray betay Tej Pratap ki aaj honay wali shadi par 7 hazaar mehmanon ko madoo kya gaya hai jin ke liye 100 terhan ke pakwaan ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai, baarat le janike liye 50 ghoron ka bhi intizam kya gaya hai. Bihar ke sabiq wazeer e sahet Tej Pratap Yadav aaj Rashtrya Janata Dalke senior rehnuma Chndrika Rai ki beti Aishwariya Rai ko dulhan bana kar layn ge. ghar par subah se hi g_hma g_hmi hai aur shadi ki tayario aur rusumaat ka aaghaz hochuka hai. rawan saal 18 April ko dono ki mangni injaam payi thi. media ke mutabiq is azeem wo shaan Bihari shadi par mehmanon ko tehranay ke liye ptnh ke sab se barray hotlon ke 85 kamron ki booking karwai gayi hai. Tej Partab ki shadi ka card bohat hi saada tha jis par baraat ki rawaangi ka waqt shaam saat bujey ka darj hai. jay malaa aur dinner ka maqam Vetinerary College ke khail ka maidan darj kya gaya hai. is ke ilawa shadi ki baqi rasomaat ki adaigi Chandrika Rai ke sarkari makaan par honay ki baat bhi card mein darj hai. do roz qabal un ki rasam hina ki taqreeb munaqqid ki gayi. Aishwariya neh rasam hina ki taqreeb mein sabz rang ka lehenga pehna tha jab ke Tej Partap safaid karte aur peelay rang ki bindi mein nazar aeye. wazeh rahay ke Lalu Yadav mukhtalif cases mein mujrim qarar diye jaany ke baad ranchi ki jail mein qaid kaat rahay hain aur inhen betay ki shadi ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye paanch roz ke pirol par choda gaya hai
398.title: Lalu ke Farzand ki shadi : 50 ghoday, 7 hazaar maheman, 100 pakwaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk ki das riyasaton mein aaj Lok Sabha ki chaar nashiston aur das riyasaton mein das Assembly nashiston ke liye aaj raye dahi muqarrar hai, jin mein siyasi aitbaar se ahmiyat ki haamil Kairana ki lok sabha nashist bhi shaamil hai. maghribi utar pardesh mein Kairana ke ilawa jin deegar Lok Sabha halqon mein aaj chnao hain un mein maharashra ke do halqon Palghar aur Bhandra . Gondia ke ilawa Nagaland ki wahid nashist bhi shaamil hai. Kairana mein Samaajwaadi Party, Bahujan Samaj Party aur Congress partiyon ney Rashtrya Lok Dal ke umeedwaar Ajit Singh ki tayeed kar rahay hain. BJP ney Hukum singh ki Dukhtar Mriganka Singh ko maidan mein utaara hai. yeh nashist Hukum Singh ki mout ke baais khaali hui thi. Lok Sabha ke ilawa riyasti Assemblion ki makhlua nashiston ke liye zimni intikhabaat ho rahay hain jin mein Maharashtra (Palus Kadegaon halqa ), Uttar Pardesh ( Noorpur ), Bihar ( Jokihat ), Jharkhand ( Gomia aur Silly halqay ), Kerala ( Chengannur ), Meghalia (Ampati), Punjab ( ShahKot ), Uttarkhand  ( Thrali ) aur West Bengal (Maheshtala) hain. is ke ilawa krnatk ke do Assembly halqon Raja Rajewshwari nagar aur jayanagar mein bhi raye dahi muqarrar hai jahan 12 May ko raye dahi nahi rakhi gayi thi. voton ki ginti 31 May ko hogi.
427.title: Das riyasaton mein Lok Sabha  ki 4 aur Assembly ki 10 nashiston par zimni intikhabaat

news_detail: New Delhi . Hindustaan ke sab se ziyada qaidyoun wali Tihar jail mein 59 hindu qaidi –apne saathi 2, 299 Muslim qaidyoun ke sath Ramazan ke rozon ka ihtimaam kar rahay hain. un qaidyoun ka mazhab judaghana hai magar un ka yeh kehna hai ke un ke rozay rehne ka zaati sabab hai. Aik 45 sala khatoon qaidi naay jail hakkaam ko bataya ke woh jail se bahar apne betay ki salamti ke liye roza rakh rahi hain. khatoon ko aghwaa karne ke ilzaam mein muqeed kya gaya hai. woh aik zair daryaft qaidi hai. aik aur qaidi naay jail hakkaam ko bataya ke woh jail se aajilana rihayi ki aas mein roza rakh raha hai. aik 21 sala qaidi jo chand din mah qabal hi jail muntaqil kya gaya hai woh bhi roza rakhnay walon mein shaamil hai. is naay jail hakkaam se kaha ke woh is liye roza reh raha hai ke is ke muslim saathi roza rehtay hain aur woh un ka sath dena chahta hai. malik ki mukhtalif jailon mein qaid 97 ghair muslim khawateen Ramazan mein roza reh rahi hain. Dehli mein itwaar ka darjah hararat 45 degree celsius taq ja pouncha tha. har jail ke sprntndnts se kaha gaya ke woh aftaar mein shirkat karen. Direcrtor General Mahabis  Mr. Ajay Keshap ney kaha ke mah Sayam se qabal bain mahabis rabita ijlaas munaqqid sun-hwa tha. har jail mein boards chaspan kiye gay hain jis par sehar o aftaar ke auqaat darj kiye gay hain. tamam roza daar qaidyoun ke liye khajoor aur Rooh Afza ka bhi intizam kya gaya hai aur namazi qaidyoun ke namaz ka khusoosi intizam kya gaya hai. unhon naay bataya ke roza rakhnay walay qaidyoun ke liye jail auqaat mein bhi riayat di gayi hai.
441.title: Tihar jail mein 59 Hiindu qaidyoun ka musalmanoon ke sath roza

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq sadar jamhooria hind Mr. Pranab Mukherji ke Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh ki janib se is ke headquarters waqay Nagpur mein 7 June ko munaqqid shudni taqreeb ki dawat ko qubool karne par Congress ke aik senior qayed ki janib se secularism ke mafaad mein apne faisla par nazar sani karne ke mutalba se Congress Party ko aik ajeeb sorat e haal ka saamna hai. Congress Party ab tak is masla par khamoshi banaye rakhi hui thi, taham Party ke aik senior quied sabiq wazeer railway Mr. C. K. Jafar Sharif ney sabiq sadar jamhooria hind ko maktoob rawana karte hue Party ko makhmasa mein daal diya hai. Mr. Jafar Sharif ney aik khabar rasan agency se kaha’ ‘ RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat karne ka un kafislh heran kin aur taajjub khaiz hai. zindagi bhar kangrisi rehtay hue is terhan achanak RSS ke paas jana. .. . woh apne pas manzar ko faramosh nahi kar saktay. unhon ney kisi ko bhi aetmaad mein nahi liya aur woh achanak jarahay hain.”Mr. Sharif ney Mr. Pranab Mukherji ke mosooma maktoob mein istafsaar kya ke aaya RSS ney woh sab kuch tasleem karliya jo sabiq sadar jamhooria ney aik wazeer aur aik Congress quied ke tor par singh ke barey mein kaha tha ke yeh’ bad tareen’ tanzeem hai jo ‘firqa parast’,’qoum dushman’ aur ‘ghair Muhibbe watan’ hai’’. RSS ney dawat nama qubool kiye jaaney ki sataish karte hue kaha ke un logon ke liye koi taajjub ki baat nahi hai jo singh ko jantay aur samajte hain chunkay RSS ney hamesha –apne programon mein samaaj ke mumtaz afraad ko madoo kya hai. is martaba hum ney dr Pranab Mukherji ko madoo kya hai aur yeh budiya baat hai ke unhon ney hamari dawat ko qubool karliya. sabiq jamhooria hind teesray baras ki sangh shiksha varga se khitaab karen ge jo Nagpur mein har saal RSS ke headquarters par munaqqid hoti hai .

Mr. Jafar Sharif ney sabiq sadar jamhooria ke iqdaam par taajjub ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke woh deegar secular awam ki terhan un ke RSS programme mein shirkat ke barey mein sun kar shashdar reh gaye. Mr. Jafar Sharif ney –apne maktoob mein jis par sabiq rukan parliment Mr. H. Hanumanthappa ke bhi dastakhat hain kaha’ ‘ mein shakhsi tor par sochta hon ke aap jaisay martaba walay, aik secular aur dahon siyasat mein rehtay hue, mukhtalif Muratib o ohdon Bashmool sadar jamhooria ke aala mansab par Faiz rehne walay ka parlimaani intikhabaat se ain qabal singh parivaar ka dora karna munasib nahi hai. Congress ke sath sath secular awam yeh khabar sun kar shashdar rah gaye aur sorat e haal prnaraz hain aur tawaqqa karte hain ke aap –apne faisla par nazar sani karen ge. mein aap se aik baar phir istada karta hon ke –apne faisla par mukarrar ghhor karen aur secularism aur malik ke mafaad mein singh ka dora karne se ijtinab karen. Congress Party ney ta haal is par koi tabsarah nahi kya hai, shaed usay dar hai ke agar woh Mr. Pranab Mukherji se shirkat nah karne ki khwahish bhi kere to woh waisa nahi karen ge aur aisa karne ki soorat mein usay RSS ke tain hamdardi rakhnay walon ke voton se mehroomi ka khadsha hai
458.title: RSS ke ijlaas mein Pranab Mukherji ki shirkat ney secular logon ko herat zada kardiya : Jafar Sharif

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk ki gayarah reyaston mein 4 Lok Sabha nashiston aur 10 Assembly halqon ke intikhabaat mein bhartia janata party ko qarari shikast hui hai. BJP ko do Lok Sabha nashiston aur aik Assembly nashist par kamyabi haasil hui hai. utar pardesh mein jahan BJP ki hukoomat hai, is baar bhi zimni intikhabaat mein shikast ka saamna karna para. congress aur ilaqai partiyon ney BJP ko peechay dhakel diya hai. qaumi partiyon ney 4 aur ilaqai partiyon ney 6 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki jabkay BJP ney utar khand ki aik nashist bachanay mein kamyaab hopayi hai. utar pardesh ki ahmiyat ki haamil Kairana Lok Sabha nashist se wifaqi mahaaz ki umeed waar Tabassum Begum (Rashtriya Lok Dal) ney BJP umidwarah  Mriganka Singh  ko shikast day di. yeh nashist Mriganka ke waalid hukum singh ke foat hojane ke baais khaali hogayi thi. maharashra ke Palgarh se BJP umeed waar Rajindra Goit aur Gondia  Bhandra Lok Sabha nashist se an si pi ke mdhokr Kukde ney BJP ke Hemant Patel ko shikast di. zimni intikhabaat mein BJP ki paspaai se yeh qiyaas kya ja raha hai ke 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein BJP ko oppostion partiyon ke wifaqi mahaaz se khatrah peda ho sakta hai, lekin yeh bhi dekha gaya hai ke zimni intikhabaat mein awam ka jo rujhan rehta hai woh aam intikhabaat taq barqarar nahi rehta hai. aik gosha ka yeh bhi maanna hai ke zimni intikhabaat mein brsraqtdar party ko shikast se is liye bhi dochar kya ja sakta hai ke log electronic voting machinon mein garbar ki baton ko faramosh karjayen taakay aindah phir yeh masla zor pakarney lagey to yeh misalein di ja sakti hain ke zimni intikhabaat mein to brsraqtdar party ko shikast ka saamna karna para tha
474.title: Zimni intikhabaat mein BJP ka naaqis muzahira

news_detail: New Delhi. Aindah saal intikhabaat mein awaami taied ke husool ke liye BJP ki qaumi muhim ‘Samarthan ke liye Sampark’ ke hissa ke taur par qaumi sadar BJP Amit Shah ne kal sabiq cricket captain Kapil Dev ke ghar pohunch kar un ke arkaan khandan se mulaqaat karte hue Modi hukoomat ki karkardagi ki asaas par BJP ke liye taied talabb ki. is mulaqaat ke baad Amit Shah tweet kya ke ”Hindustani Cricket Team ke sabiq captain Kapil Dev aur un ki ahliya se Delhi mein un ki rihayeshgaah par mulaqaat umdah rahi.’tayeed ke liye rabita’ mulkgeer muhim ke hissa ke tor par inhen Wazeer e Azam @ Narendra Modi ki hukoomat ke guzashta chaar barson mein haasil kamyabion se waaqif karwaya. ”BJP ke sarbarah is mulkgeer muhim ka aaghaz sabiq Army Chief, General Dalbir Singh Suhag (retired) o sabiq Secretary General Lok Sabha Mr. Subhash Kayshap ki rihahishgaah se shuru ki thi. is muhim ke tehat Mr. Amit Shah raye aama hamwar karne walay 50 logon se mulaqaat karen ge jabkay 4, 000 deegar party qaideen bashmool wuzraa, arkaan Parliament o arkaan Assembly mulk bhar mein aik laakh se zayed mumtaz shakhsiyation se mulaqaat karen ge.
487.title: Tayeed ke liye Rabita muhim : Amit Shah ki Kapil Dev ke arkaan khandan se mulaqaat

news_detail: Srinagar. shehar khaas ke Nohata ilaqa mein Security Forces ki gaadi ney 3 nojawanon ko takkar maar kar kuchal diya, jin mein se 2 ko chouten ayen aur un mein aik ki haalat naazuk batayi jaati hai. Kashmir Uzma ki report ke mutabiq name fouji dasta ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke 600 nojawanon par mushtamil muzahireen ney gaadi mein safar kar rahay aik Afsar ko pakarney ki koshish ki jis par wahan jharpen huien. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq jame masjid sringr mein namaz jummay ke baad nojawanon aur police ke darmain jharpon ka silsila shuru sun-hwa.”namaz jummay ke baad nojawanon ney Nohata chowk mein puraman tor par ehtijaj kya, aur is douran CRPF ki aik gaadi wahan se guzri aur muzahireen ney is par shadeed pathrao kya jis ke babyes gaadi muzahireen mein ghus gayi jis ke babyes teen nojawan uski zad mein aagaye taham gaadi 2 nojawanon ko roundti hui nikal gayi. nojawanon ko fouri taur par hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan aik ki haalat tashweesh-naak hai. wazeh rahay ke chand roz qabal Safa kdl ilaqa mein isi terhan ke aik waqea mein aik nojawan ko kuchal dala gaya tha. Nohata mein jummay ko zakhmi honay walay nojawanon ki shanakht Younis Ahmed wald Nisar Ahmed saakin delgate aur qaisar Ahmed saakin fatah kdl ke bator hui hai. hospital zaraye ke mutabiq Younis Ahmed ki sorat e haal tashweesh-naak hai. zaraye ka kehna hai ”is ke jism mein androoni chouten lagi hain”. is hawalay se CRPF tarjuman snje sharmaa ney bataya ke qareeb 600 ehtajaji muzahireen CRPF ki gaadi ke ird gird jama hue, jabkay gaadi mein CRPF ka aik senior Afsar safar kar raha tha, jo ke ilaqa mein Forces ki taenati ki jaanch kar rahay they. unhon ney bataya ”mushtael hajhoom ney gaadi ka uqbi darwaza kholnay ki koshish ki, taham woh andar se band tha, magar unhon ney gaadi ke sheeshon ko chikna chor kya”. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke gaadi ke driver ney gaadi ki raftaar kam karne ki koshish ki, aur nojawanon ko unhon ney nahi kachla. jab nojawanon ke Forces gaadi se kuchalnay ki khabar ilaqa mein phail gayi to barray pemanay par ehtajaji muzahirey hue, jis ke sath hi Forces aur police ki nojawanon ke sath jharpen huien, jo ke shaam taq jari rahen. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq ehtajaji muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye police ney tear gas aur pilt ka istemaal kya, jis mein 5 nojawan zakhmi hue
507.title: Srinagar mein muzahireen pursi are pi f ki gaadi chadha dene ke ilzaam ki tardeed

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein jummay ki shab ‘haalat nasha mein gaadi chalanay ke khilaaf muhim’ ke douran ek shakhs ko haalat nasha mein gaadi challatay hue pakad lene par us ne masroof tareen sadak ke bichon beech lait kar khud kashi kar lenay ki koshish karte hue kaafi hungama aarai ki. Police ohdedaron aur wahan maujood sahafion ne usay wahan se mehfooz jagah par muntaqil kya. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue is shakhs neh bataya ke woh khandani masayel se aajiz aakar sharaab noshi ki aur woh chahta tha ke apni jaan day day. Mulzim ne kaha ke woh is se qabl bhi haalat nasha mein gaadi chalanay ke ilzamaat ka saamna karchuka hai. Muhim ke douran police neh zayed az 126 gadiyon ko zabt karliya aur khaation ki Begumpet Police Station par counselling ki jaye gi
353.title: Haalat nasha mein gaadi challatay hue pakdae jaaney walay shakhs ka iqdaam khudkushi

news_detail: Timber Depot. Chandrayangutta mein aaj subah ki awaleen sa-aton mein aik Timber Depot mein zabardast aag lag gayi. Aag lagnay ki wajah ka hanooz pata nahi chal paaya hai. Fre Brigade ke ohdedaron ney tehqiqaat Police ke hawala kardainay ka faisla kya hai. Ohdedaron ney bataya ke Depot mein aag par qaboo panay ke liye koi hifazati iqdamaat nahi kiye gaye they. Hatta ke aag par qaboo panay ke liye aatish faro aalaat aur water sump bhi maujood nahi tha. Depot mein koi watchman bhi nahi tha. Yeh aag subah 6:30 bajey lagi. Ittila milnay par Mogulpura Fire Station se aik fire tender pahuncha aur aag par qaboo panay 4 water tankers istemaal kiye gaye. Do ghanton ki kawishon ke baad aag par qaboo pa liya gaya. Is haadsa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi pouncha.
364.title: Timber Depot mein aatishzadgi

news_detail: Chittoor. Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne ke masla par aik naujawan ney khudkushi karli. Mutawafi jo aik paarcha bafinda tha, aik khudkushi note choda jis mein is ki khudkushi ki asal wajah yeh batayi gai hai ke Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne se inkaar kardiya gaya. Yeh waqya Madanpally, Chittoor mein paish aaya. Police ko laash ke paas se aik khudkushi note aur aik yateem khanah ki paanch hazaar rupay ki raseed mili hai. Shaed mutawafi ney ye yeh chandah yateem khanah ko diya hoga. Mutawafi ney raseed ke peechay note likha. kayi siyasi partiyan, Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte hue aik arsa se ehtajaji muzahira kar rahi hain.
377.title: Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ke masla par naujawan ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Government Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein judwaan bachiyon ko janam dainay wali maa aur aik bachi ke intqaal par la parwahi ka ilzaam aayed karte hue marhooma ke rishte daaron naay Hospital mein zabardast ehtijaj kiya aur Hospital ke amlah par das hazaar rupay ki rishwat talabb karne ka ilzaam aayed kya. Shamsabad ki saakin Rizwana Begum zauja Jahangir Pasha ko zachgi ke liye Government Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Marhooma ke rishtedaaron ney bataya ke Hospital mein shareek karne par pehlay yeh btayagya ke normal delivery hogi magar kuch dair bad un se kaha gaya ke Cesarean ke zareya zachgi karna padegi, phir un se yeh kaha gaya ke zachgi mein paichidgyan paida hogayi hain aur inhen judwaan bachay hain. Un se aakhir mein yeh kaha gaya ke ya to bachon ko bachaya ja sakta hai ya phir maa ko jis par khandan walon naay maa ko bacha lene ki isteduaa ki aur phir thodi dair baad inhen bataya gaya ke do judwaan bachiyan paida hui hain aur aik bachi faut hochuki hai jabkay doosri bachi ki bhi haalat nihayat hi naazuk hai aur se Nilofer Hospital muntaqil karna padega. Kuch der baad inhen yeh bataya gaya ke maa bhi faut hochuki hai. Rishtedaaron ney ilzaam aayed kya ke is douran un se das hazaar rupay rishwat talab ki gayi. Waqea ki ittila milnay par Majlis Ittehaad ul lMuslimeen ke Corporator Mr. Mustafa Ali Muzaffar Hospital puhanche aur mutawafiah ke rishta daaron se baat cheet ki aur unhen mahswara diya ke woh ehtijaj karne ki bajaye Police mein shikayat darj kurwaye. Mr. Mustafa Ali Muzaffar ney bataya ke Hospital mein dakhla ke sath hi har marhala par un se rishwat talab ki gayi. Unhon ney kaha ke is Hospital mein daakhil honay se le kar Hospital se discharge honey tak rishwat talab ki jati hai. Hospital mein ehtijaj mein shiddat par ACP Charminar Mr. B Anjaiah aur Inspector Charminar Mr. K Chandarshekar Reddy wahan bhaari jamiat ke sath poanch gaye aur surathaal par qaboo paaya. mister bi Anjaiah ney bataya ke is khsoos mein mossola aik shikayat par muqadma darj karliya gaya aur baad postmortem mazeed karwai ki jayegi.
399.title: Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein zacha aur nauzaida faut, Rishte daaron ka ehtijaj

news_detail: Unan ke dar-ul-hukoomat Athens ke sahili ilaqon mein lagnay wali khauf naak aag naay wasee ilaqa ko apni lapait mein le rakha aur aag bujhanay koshishen bhi jari hain. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq aatish zadgi ke nateeja mein ab tak kam se kam 88 afraad halaak hogaye hain. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq guzashta roz aag mein jhulse do jurwan bachon sameit mazeed teen bachay jaan bahaq hogaye. aatish zadgi ke baais honay wali halakaton ke baad Mulk mein sakht sadma ki kefiyat hai. Unani wizarat sahet ke mutabiq hafta ke roz hospital layi gayi aik jhlsi khatoon dam toar gayi jab ke aag mein jhulse bisyon afraad ki haalat khatray mein hai. Juma ke roz Unani Wazeer e Azam Alexis Tsipras ney aik bayan mein Mulk mein lagnay wali khauf naak aatish zadgi mein hukoomat ki nakami ka aitraaf kya aur tasleem kya tha ke reyasti idaray aag par qaboo panay mein nakaam rahay hain. Unan ki tareekh mein yeh apni noiyat ki khatarnaak aatish zadgi hai jis naay wasee abadi ko apni lapait mein le rakha hai. aag par qaboo panay ke liye kayi riskyo temen din raat kaam kar rahi hain.
413.title: Unan mein khauf naak aatish zadgi, halakatain 88 tak pahonch gayeen

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi khandan ke liye tafreeh, saneha mein tabdeel hogayi. aik hi khandan ke 6 afraad sadak haadsa mein halaak hogaye. zila Nalgonda mein hue aik bhayanak sadak haadsa mein hyderabad, Jhirrah se talluq rakhnay walay aik hi khandan ke 6 afraad Bashmole do khawateen aur aik sher halaak aur 4 zakhmi hogaye. yeh haadsa Nagarjuna Sagar State Highway par Nasrapally, mandal Nabdrapalli ke qareeb paish aaya. touli chocky se talluq rakhnay walay is khandan ke log tafreeh ke liye Nagarjuna Sagr gaye hue thay wapsi par subah ki awleen sa-aton mein yeh haadsa paish aaya jis mein 4 afraad barsar e mauqa halaak hogaye jabkay do log hospital muntaqil karne ke douran jaanbar nah hosakay. muqami logon ke mutabiq yeh gaadi tizrftari se jarahi thi ke driver nay gaadi par qaboo khodya jis ke nateeja mein gaadi jis mein 10 afraad sawaar thay, aik compound wall se takra gayi. haadsa itna bhayanak tha ke mahlukeen ko gaadi ka aqbi sheesha toar kar bahar nikalna para. mahlukeen ki shanakht Mohammad Moin , Thammu, Mustafa, Saddam , Akhtar , Aisha ki hasiyat se ki gayi.
438.title: Nalgonda mein sadak haadsa, Hyderabadi khandan ke 6 log halaak

news_detail: Dahod. Gujarat ke Dahod zila mein dakait honey ke shuba mein zado ko bay karkay halaak kardiya jabkay is ka saathi zakhmi hogaya. Ajmal Ajmal Vahoniya mulk mein hujumi tashadud ka taaza shikaar bana hai. police ney aaj bataya ke aik darjan se zayed afraad ka aik group hafta ki shab daaka daalney ki gharz se Jahold  Administrative Division mein kaali Mahodi mauza gaye hue thay. Inspector Limidi police station Mr. P.M Jadal ney kaha ke jab dehation ko un ki naqal o harkat ke baarey mein pata chala to woh aik maqam par akhatta hogaye. Joon hi unhon ney ‘dakuon’ ko dekha hujoom ney un ka takub kya aur un mein se dono ko pakad liya deegar faraar honey mein kamyaab hogaye.
