Barham hujumion ney mobayyana taur par un ko zado kob karna shuru kardiya aur Police ke pounchaney tak inhen shadeed zakhmi kardiya. Police wahan pahonch kar shadeed zakhmion ko Dahod government hasptl muntakil kya jahan Ajmal ko murda qarar diya gaya. zakhmi Bharu  Mathur Palas ziralaj hai. Yeh dono hi Dahod Sub-Jail se haal hi mein mukhtalif fouj daari muqadmaat mein jail ki saza bhugatney ke baad reha hue thay. police ko dyie gaye bayan mein plas ney kaha ke is ki mulaqaat Ajmal Vahoniya is jail mein hui jahan dono qaid thay. Dono hi taye kya tha ke is gaon mein mulaqaat karen ge jahan 100 se zayed dehation ney taiz dhaar hathyaaron se un par hamla kardiya. police ney takreeban 100 dehation ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya. Jaria mah ke avyl mein akbar Khan ko rajsthan ke alor zila mein gaaye ki muntakili ke shuba mein hamla karkay halaak kardiya tha. maharashra ke mauza Dhole mein bacha chori karne ka shuba karte hue 5 khanah bdoshon ko hujumion ney mardeya tha. Pandrah din qabal mdhih pradesh mein aik khatoon ko bhi barham hajhoom ney bacha chor honey ka shuba karte hue halaak kardiya tha. hyderabad mein bhi mah e Ramzan mein bhi aik mukhanns ko bacha chor honey ka shuba karte hue halaak kardiya gaya tha.
454.title: Gujarat mein Dacoit ke shuba mein aik fard hujumi tashadud mein halaak

news_detail: Indonesia ke mashhoor sayyahati jazeera Lombok mein 6.4 shiddat ke zalzala ney tabahi mchadi, zalzala ke natije mein 5 bachon samait 14 afraad halaak aur 162 zakhmi hogaye jabkay hazaron makanaat ko bhi nuqsaan pouncha hai. Indonesia ke sayahati jazeera Lombok mein subah saweray zameen larazne se log ghabra kar gharon se bahar nikal aaye, zalzala se mutadid makanaat girgye, imaarton ko nuqsaan pouncha jabkay malbay taley dabney se mutadid afraad zakhmi hogaye hain. mutasirah ilaaqon mein bijli aur muwasilat ka nizaam bhi mutasir hai jabke rahatkaari o bachao ahelkaaron ki ilaqa mein imdadi karwaiya jari hain taham hakkaam ney halakaton mein izafah ka khadsha zahir kya hai. aik ittila mein bataya gaya ke zalzala ke baais zayed az  1,000 makanaat ko nuqsaan pouncha hai. Bali ke qareeb makanaat ko taham koi nuqsaan nahi pouncha. mashriqi Lombok zila mein ziyada nuqsaan pouncha hai jahan 10 afraad halaak ho chukay hain.
473.title: Indonesia mein taaqatwar zalzala, 14 afraad halaak, 162 zakhmi

news_detail: Patna. Patna mein do dinon se jari taiz barish ney na sirf nashebi ilaaqon mein rehney walay makeeno ki mushkilaat ko sangeen banadiya hai balkay Nalanda Medical College and Hospital (NMCH) mein shareek mareezon ke la-haq khatrah ko bhi badha diya hai. Barish ka Paani hafta ki shaam Hospital ke ICU aur General wards mein dar aaya hai. Itwaar ke din ICU mein ghutnon barabar Paani tha jis mein tairti machhliyan aur hashrat ul arz bhi dikhayi dey rahay thay, jis ke baayes mareezon ke timardaaron aur nurses ke liye badi uljhanain paida hogyin. Hospital ke nurses aur neem-tibbi amlah ko mareezon ki nighdasht ke liye Paani se guzar kar jana pad raha tha. Kayi mareez ghair muthar halaat ke paish e nazar infection ke dar se Hospital chod kar chalay gay. Hospital ke hukkam ney id-daa kya ke woh be bas hain chunkay barish ke mauqa par Hospital mein barsati Paani ka daakhil hojana daayemi masla hai. Suprintendent NMCH Dr.  Andand Prasad Singh ney kaha ”hum Paani ko pump karte hue kharij karney ki koshish kar rahay hain jis ke liye teen ghantay darkaar hon ge. Nashebi ilaqa mein honay ki wajah se hamein har saal mutasir hona parta hai.” Dr. singh ney kaha ke beshtar mareezon aur un ke timaar-daaron ki janib se ihata mein dar aaye barsati Paani se badboo aane ki shikayat karney par ICU ke mareezon ko din mein dosray surgical ICU mein muntaqil kardiya gaya. ICU mein shareek aik mareez ke Timar daar ney kaha ”dekhen yeh jagah kis terha jahannum mein tabdeel hogayi. ICU jatay hue machhliyan aur keeday dikhayi dete hain. yahan saanp bhi ho saktay hain. aisi napak sorat e haal se mareez mazeed bemaar ho ja sakte hain.”
484.title: Paani mein mahsor Nalanda Hospital ke ICU mein mareez aur machhliyan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik alamnaak sadak haadsa mein Tank bund par do talba halaak hogaye. Bike sawaar aik paidal rahrau ko jo sadak uboor kar raha tha bachanay ki koshish mein gaadi par qaboo khodya. Yeh saneha itwaar ki raat mein paish aaya. Teen talba aik Pulsar gaadi par sawar they. Teesra taalib e ilm zakhmi hogaya. Mutwafi talba ki shanakht 19 sala Vijay, intermediate taalib ilm saakin Chintal Jedimetlaaur 19 sala Sai Manoj Polytechnic student saakin Kukatpally ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Chintal ka saakin 19 sala Rajesh Yadav zakhmi hogaya jo Balanagar ke hospital mein zair e ilaaj hai. Yeh bhi Polytechnic ka taalib e ilm hai. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Tank bund par Kandukuri Vireshalingam ke mujassima ke qareeb itwaar ki shab 12 : 45 bujey paish aaya. Vijay jo gaadi chlarha tha is waqt apni gaadi par qaboo khodya jab sadak uboor karne wala aik rahrau achanak un ki gaadi ke samnay agayaa. Rahrau ko takaraane se bachney ki koshish mein Vijay ney achanak Breaks lagadiye jis ke baayes gaadi phisal gayi aur teenon sadak par girgaye. Gandhi Nagar Police Inspector Mr. R Srinivas ney kaha ke Vijay 3:00 bajey shab jaanbar na  hosaka jabke Mnoj ney aaj subah 5:30 bajey aakhri saans li. Vijay ney apne ghar walon ko bataya tha ke woh apne aik dost ki birthday party mein ja raha hai.
509.title: Tank bund par rahrau ko bachanay ki koshish mein do talba halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Gachibowli X Roads, Hyderabad mein aaj subah aik taiz raftaar Bus ney teen Rahroon ko kuchal dala. Yeh waqea peer ki subah 7:00 bajay paish aaya. Bus number 87 Lingampally se Koti jane wali Telangana State Road Transport Corporation ki bus ney jo raftaar ki had se taiz daud rahi thi daftar jane waloon ko roond dala. Bataya jata hai ke yeh teen log sadak uboor kar rahay thae ke aik taiz raftaar Bus ki zad mein aagaye. Woh Bus Stop ke paas thahre huwe thae aur phir sadak uboor karna hi chahtay thae ke taiz raftaar Bus aa pohanchi aur inhen kuchal dala. Haadse ke fauri baad Driver, Bus chod kar faraar hogaya. Inspector Raidurgam Police Station Mr. Ram Babu ney bataya ke tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain. Bus Driver ke khilaaf tazirat e Hind ki dafaa 304 (a) aur 279 ke tehat laaparwayi ke nateeja mein mout ka sabab ban’nay ka muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Unhon ne bataya ke aayini shahideen se baat cheet karne par patachala ke Driver be-ehteyati se gaadi chala raha tha aur uss ki raftaar bhi bahut taiz thi. Ayini shahideen ke mutabiq gaadi bahut taiz thi aur junction ke paas bhi driver ne gaadi ki raftaar kam nahi ki thi. Teen mahalukeen ki shanakht Janardhan mutawatin Banglore, Dashrath saakin Nanakramguda aur Hamid ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Haadsa ke baad kuch der ke liye is masroof tareen sadak par Trafic jaam rahi. Mahaukeen ki laashon ko postmortem ke liye Omania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Yeh pata chalanay ke liye haadese kis tarha paish aaya Aini shahideen ke bayanaat bhi qalamband kar rahi hai aur CCTV Footage bhi haasil kar rahi hai. June mein aisay hi aik haadese mein Shamirpet par Bus ki takkar se do bike sawaar halaak hogaye thae.
370.title: Bus ney teen logon ko kuchal dala

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein August 2007 mein Lumbini Park aur Gokul Chat Bhandar mein huwe twin Bomb blasts mein maakhoz 2 mulzimeen Anique Shafeeq Sayeed aur Ismail Choudhry ko Hyderabad ki khusoosi adalat ney phansi ki saza sunadi hai jabkay do mulzimeen Farooq Sharfuddin Turkash aur Mohammad Sadiq Asrar Sheikh ko 4

September ko ilzamaat mansuba se bari kardiya gaya tha. Aik aur mulzim Tariq Anjum ko Cherlapally Jail mein qaim aik khusoosi adalat ney muqadma ke 7 ahem mulzimin ko panah dainay aur un ki madad karne ka qusoorwaar paaya hai aur usay umar qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. Is mulzim ke khilaaf deegar mulzimin ke sath fard e jurm aayed nahi kiya gaya tha balkay Adalat mein mutawazi muqadma mein samaat ki jarahi thi. Yaad rahay ke Khusoosi Adalat ne 4
September ko is muqadma mein 2 mulzimeen Anique Shafeeq Sayeed aur Ismail Choudhry par fard e jurm aayed kardiya tha aur un ki saza ke liye aaj ka din muqarrar kiya tha. 25
August 2007 mein shaam ke waqt Lumbini Park aur Gokul chat Bhandar mein huwe Bomb dhamako mein 42 afraad halaak aur 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thay.
382.title: Twin Bomb Blasts. 2 mulzimin ko phansi aur aik ko umar qaid ki saza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Zaraye se maloom huwa hai ke Nizam’s Museum se sarqa karli gayi naadir ashya ko bar aamad karne mein Hyderabad Police kamyaab hogayi hai. Iss khusoos mein ta haal Police ne kisi qisam ki maloomat ka tabadlah nahi kya hai. Saariqon ne 2
September Itwaar ki shab Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayeen qeemti ashya ka sarqa karliya tha jin mein 7

Nizaam ke zair istemaal Golden Tiffin Box, Cup & Saucer aur aik Golden Spoon shaamil hain. Hyderabad Police ne masrooqa nawadiraat ko baraamad karne aur mulzimeen ko pakadney ke liye 10 khusoosi Teams tashkeel di theen. Un teamd ne mauqa waardaat ka jaiza lainay aur Museum ke mulazmeen ke talluq se maloomat ikhatta karne ke baad chand afraad ko mushtaba fehrist mein rakhtay hue un ka pata chalanay ki koshish ki thi aur un ke cell phones ki tracking shuru kar di gayi thi. Maloom huwa hai ke Police ko ibtida mein yeh ittila mili thi ke saariq Bidar mein maujood hain magar jab tak Police wahan pahonch paati woh Mumbai ke liye rawana hogaye thae. Maloom huwa hai ke theek aik hafta ke andar Police ne un saariqon ko bil-aakhir Mumbai mein daboch hi liya. Bataya jata hai ke Police ne is khusoos mein teen mulzimeen ko hirasat mein le liya hai aur unhen tayyarah ke zareya Hyderabad muntaqil bhi kardiya gaya hai. Police ne masrooqa nawadiraat ko bhi baraamad karliya hai. Yaad rahay ke yeh wardaat Itwaar ki raat mein paish aayi thi aur Nizam’s Museum ke Administrative Officer Mr. Shaukat Hussain ne Police mein yeh shikayat darj karwai thi ke jab peer ke din Museum ko khoola gaya tha to yeh paaya gaya ke aik showcase ke locks tootay hue hain aur aik Tiffin Box, aik piyali aur tashtari aur Golden Spoon gayab hain. Unhon ne bataya tha ke sarqa karne walay ventilation ke zareya andar daakhil hue aur jis gallery mein yeh nawadiraat rakhay hue thae uss ke CC TV camera ko nuqsaan pahonchaya aur aik showcase mein rakhi hui yeh ashya sarqa karli. Bataya jata hai ke Tiffin Box do kg wazni hai jis par Diamonds aur Ruby jadey hue hain. Iss Museum mein Nizaam ke zair e istemaal kayi qeemti ashya maujood hain. Aik andaza ke mutabiq iss Museum mein 700- 800 kg tak wazan ki besh baha ashya mauood hain jin ki bain ul aqwami markt mein qadar ek mehdood andaza ke mutabiq  Rs. 2,000 crore se bhi zayed hai. Yahan yeh baat qabil e zikar hai ke maazi mein bhi Asif jahs ki zair e istemaal kayi naadir ashya sarqa karli gayi theen magar un ko baraamad nahi kya jaska tha. Yeh paheli martaba hai ke Police ne androon aik hafta masroqa nawadiraat ko bar aamad karliya hai.
395.title: Nizam’s Museum ke masrooqa nawadiraat baraamad?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ney Congress leader o sabiq Rukn e Assembly T Jaya Prakash Reddy @ Jagga Reddy ko peer ke din dhoka dahi karte hue Passport haasil karne ke ziman mein darj aik muqadama mein giraftar kar liya. Police zaraye ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ko hirasat mein le liya gaya aur un se pooch gach ki jarahi hai. Iss case ki tehqeeq se juday aik Police ohdedar ney bataya ke hamein it-tila-aat mili hain ke Jagga Reddy ney apni ahliya, beti aur betay ke naam par haasil kardah Passports par teen logon ko America bheja hai. Police ohdedaar ne yaad dilaya ke 14 baras qabal uss waqt ke Arkaan e Assembly Soyam Bapu Rao aur Kasipetta Lingaiah ko aisay hi ilzamaat mein girftar karliya tha. Police zaraye ke bamawajib  Amrici hukoomat ke ohdedaron ke paas ghair majaz taur par Hindustan se emigration ka data maujood hai. Data ka tajzia karne par woh mutajub hogaye ke teen afraad farzi dastawizaat ki asaas par America mein daakhil honay mein kamyaab hogaye thae. Iss baat ka pata chalne par Hyderabad Commissioner ki Task Force ke ohdedaron ney Jagga Reddy ko hirasat mein letay hue kayi ghanton tak un se pooch gach ki. Maloom huwa ke Task Force ke ohdedaron ney chand dastawizaat miley jin se is baat ka ishara milta hai ke farzi dastawizaat paish karte hue Jagga Reddy ke arkaan khandan ke naamon par chand Passports haasil kiye gai. Tafteesh kunindgaan musaddiqa reports ki tauseeq kar rahay hain ke Jagga Reddy ke hamrah 2004 mein Jagga Reddy ke hamrah aik mard aur do khawateen ney America ka safar kya tha, taham yeh teen afraad America mein hi ruk gai aur Jagga Reddy Hyderabad wapas laut gay. Zaraye ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ko un par aayed ilzamaat par North Zone Police Hyderabad ke hawala kardiya jaye ga. Rabt paida karne par DCP North Zone Ms. B. Sumati ney tauseeq ki ke sabiq Congress Government Whip ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Congress leader ney Passports ke husool aur America ka Visa haasil karne apne ohda ka najaayez faida uthaya. Ms Sumati ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ke kisi bhi rukn e khandan ney Passport haasil nahi kya. Darin asnaa Sadar Telangana Pradesh Congress Committee Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy ney kaha ke woh aaj raat Director General of Police Mr. M. Mahinder Reddy se mulaqaat karen ge.
406.title: Former MLA Jagga Reddy giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizam’s Museum se besh baha nawadiraat ke sansani khaiz sarqa mein mulawis 2 mulzimeen ki giraftari aur maal e masroqa baraamad kar lenay ki aaj Police ney tauseeq kar di hai. Yaad rahay ke ‘Y This News’ ney hi sab se phelay mulzimeen ki giraftari ki ittila di thi. Jaria mah ki 2 tareekh ko Nizam’s Museum se Heere aur Rubi jadey 2 kg Gold Tiffin Box,Cup & Saucer aur aik Golden Spoon sarqa karliye gaye thae jin ki international market mein qeemat Crores rupay hai, un mulzimeen ke qabza se masroqa nawadiraat ko baraamad karliya gaya hai. Giraftar shudgan 2 mulzimeen ki shanakht Mohammad Ghouse Pasha urf Khooni Ghouse (23) Centering Worker Rajendranagar aur Mohammad Mubeen (24) Welding Worker saakin Rajendranagar ko Police ney peer ki shab giraftar karliya tha. Commissioner Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar ney aaj un mulzimeen ki giraftari ki tauseeq karte huwe bataya ke dono ney jurm ke irtikaab karne se 45 din qabal Museum pahonch kar mukammal jaiza letay huwe sarqa ka mansoobah banaya tha. Un mulzimeen ney 45 din baad jurm ka iss liye irtikaab kiya ke CCTV Footage mein bhi un ka ihata na hosakay chunkay umooman CC Tv Footage Recorder ki memory aik mah baad aaz khud delete hojati hai. Yeh dono bachpan ke dost aur door ke rishtedaar hain aur sarqa ki waardat mein mulawis hain. Mulzimeen ke bayan ke mutabiq un dono ney roshan daan se andar daakhil huwe jis ki unhon ney 45 din qabal hi nishandahi karli thi. Is ka sara mansoobah Mubeen ney tayyar kiya tha jis ney 45 din qabl Visitor ke taur par Museum ka daura kiya tha aur naaqis security intezamaa ka pata chalaya. Is ney apne mansoobah ko anjaam dainay ke liye Ghouse se baat ki aur dono ney is ko anjaam dainay ka faisla karliya. Yeh dono naadir ashya ka sarqa karne mein taqreeban kamyaab hogaye. Un dono ney ventilator se neechay utarney aur oopar chadhne ke liye aik rassi par das gaanth bandhay thae. Mubeen ney oopar rah kar rassi ko thaame rakha aur Ghouse rassi ke zariye neechay uttra aur showcase ka lock tod kar is mein rakhi huwi naadir ashiya ko thaam kar rassi ke zariye hi oopar chadh gaya. Yeh logon ney Museum mein apna koi suraagh nahi choda tha albatta ventilator ke atraaf un dono nay jo nishanaat chodey thae is ki buniyaad par hi un ki shanakhat ki gayi. Un dono ney jurm ke irtikaab ke baad apne kapday tabdeel karliye aur Police ko gumraah karne ilaqa mein ghoomnay lagey. Umooman mujrimeen jurm ke irtikaab ke sath hi maqam waardaat ko fauri chod detain hain. Is ke baad un dono ney Zaheerabad simt Mutangi par Highway ka rukh kiya aur chupkay se service road se wapas aagaye taakay Highway par nasb CCTV cameras mein yeh nazar aeye ke woh shaher chod kar chalay gaye hain. Is ke baad woh bas ke zariye masruqa Golden Spoon sath Mumbai ke liye rawana huwe taakay imkani kharidaron ko bataur namoona dikha sakhen. Jab inhen achi peshkash nahi mili to woh wapas lout aeye aur achi peshkash ka intzaar karne lagey. Hyderabad Police ke aik ohdedar ney kaha ke Tiffin Box ko King Nizaam istemaal kere ya nah kere maloom nahi magar un choron mein se aik ney rozana is mein khana khaya hai. Un do mulzimeen ney mazkoorah masroqa ashya ke sath Museum mein rakhi aik muqaddas kitaab bhi churanay ka iradah kiya tha. Jab woh is kitaab ko churanay walay hi thae ke qareebi Masjid se ki maghrib ki azaan ki aawaz sunai di jis ki wajah se woh kitaab churanay se daargaye aur apna iradah tark kardiya. Police ney bataya ke aadi sarqeen ki naqal o harkat ki chhaan been ke dauran yeh pata chalne par ke Mubeen gayab hai, Police is case ko hal karpayi hai.
423.title: Nizam’s Museum ke masroqa nawadiraat bar aamad’ 2 mulizmeen giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ke Jagtial zila mein paahadi ki aik ghaat Road par se Telangana RTC ki aik Bus ke khayi mein girjane se kam az kam 52 afraad bashmool 4 bachay halaak hogaye jabkay deegar 10 zakhmi hogaye. superintendent of Police Jagtial Mr. Snidhu Sharma ney hadisa ke fauri baad bataya tha ke ab tak 45 Musafireen halaak ho chukay hain aur zakhmion ko qareebi sarkari Hospitalon mein muntaqil kiya gaya hai, baad mein mausoola ittela ke mutabiq shaded 7 zakhmi bhi jaanbar nahin ho sake. Jagtial Bus Depot ki yeh Bus jis mein 60 se zayed musafireen safar kar rahay thae, Shaniwaarpet moza se barah kondaghatu Road aur Mutiampet villages Jagtial jarahi thi ke 11:45 bajey din khayi mein girgaee jis ke baayis yeh haadsa paish aaya. 2 darjan se zayed musafireen barsar e mauqa halaak hogaye thae jabkay Bus se 7 zakhmi bachon ko nikala gaya tha jin mein 4 halak hogay. Marne walon mein 32 khawateen bhi shaamil hain. Shadeed zakhmion ko Karimnagar aur Hyderabad ke Hospitalon ko muntaqil kiya jaraha tha magar yeh jaanbar na ho sake, mahlukeen ki laashon ko postmortem ke liye Jagtial ke sarkari Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Yeh haadisa uss waqt paish aaya jab ghaat road ke aakhri mod par driver ney Bus par qaboo khodiya jis ke nateeja mein Bus khayi mein ja giri. Sadak se guzarnay walon aur muqami dehation ney bachao ka kaam kiya. District Collector Jagtial Mr Sharat ne bachao kamon ki nigrani ki. Kaarguzar Chief Minister Mr.K Chandrashekar Rao ney is haadisa par gahray dukh ka izhaar karte huwe muhalekeen ke pasmandgan se izhaar taaziyat kiya. Unhon ney hukkaam ko hidayat di ke zakhmion ko fauri tibbi imdaad baham pohanchai jaye. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney Bus haadisa ke mahlukeen ke wirsa ko 5 lakh rupay ex-gratia dainay ka elaan kiya. Wazeer Tansport Mr. Mahender Reddy ney kaha ke Kondaghato ghaat road par yeh phela andohnak haadsa hai.
435.title: Jagtial mein Bus khayi mein girpadi 52 halaak

news_detail: Amrici riyasat Massachusetts ke shehar Boston mein Gas pipe line ke leakage se mutadid gharon mein Gas dhamakon ke baad aag bhadak uthi, hadsaat mein 1 shakhs halaak, jabkay mutadid zakhmi ho gaye. Boston ke nazdeek teen ilaqon mein Gas dhamakon aur aag lagnay ke 70 hadsaat runuma huwe, jis ke baad tenon ilaqon ke pareshan haal log sadkon par nikal aaye. Logon ke sakdon par bad hawas ho kar nikal padney se ird gird ki sadkon par Traffic jaam hogaya. Hukkaam ney logon se appeal ki hai ke woh apna ghar chodtay waqt gas ko band kar den, mutasirah ilaqon mein bijli bhi band kar di gayi hai. Muqami Gas Company ney kaha hai ke un ilaqon mein Gas ko mukammal taur par band karne mein kuch waqt lag sakta hai. Massachusetts Emergency Managment Agency ka kehna hai ke ziyada pressure ki wajah se Gas Line mein aag bhadak uthi hai taham taheqeeq kunindgan aag lagnay ki wajuhaat ka pata chalarhe hain. Is haadse mein aik report ke mutabiq shumali Boston ki teen Communities ke 39 makanaat mein aag lag gayi. Hukkaam ney bataya ke Larence ka aik 18 sala nojawan L Rabson ki car par dhamaka ke baais aik ghar ki chimni girjane se buri tarha zakhmi hogaya tha jisay dawakhana muntaqil kiya gaya jahan shaam mein woh jaanbar nahi ho saka. Monchester State Police ney un makeeno se appeal ki hai jin ke gharon ko Columbia Gas Company ke zariye gas sarbarah ki jati hai woh apne makanaat ka takhlia kar dein. Jumeraat tak aag par qaboo pa liya gaya hai magar hunooz kayi ilaqay khamosh aur andhere mein hain chunkay makeen ghar chode kar chalay gaye aur barqi Companiyon ney barqi sarbarahi masdood kar di hai taakay is terha ke waqhiyat se bacha jasakay. Tenoon counties mein jummay ko Schools ko band kardiya gaya hai. Aik makeen Razin ney kaha ke woh tasawwur bhi nahi kar saktay ke dhamaka mein tabah hojane wala un hi ka ghar hai jisay woh do saal qabal hi khareeda tha. Unhon ney kaha ke un ka ghar mukammal tabah hogaya aur roh barbaad.
452.title: Boston mein gas dhamakay, 70 hadsaat

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi Police ke aik Sub Inspector ke betay ke khilaaf ismat raizi aur ziyad-ti ka muqadma darj karliya gaya jis ko aik Video mein aik ladki ko buri tarha zad o kob karte huwe dikhaya gaya tha. Yeh Video Social Media par bahot ziyada viral huwa. Yeh video ghaliban Delhi ke Uttam Nagar mein waqay aik khangi daftar mein 2

September ko li gayi thi. Iss video mein aik naujawan ko kohniyoon aur latoon se aik ladki ko zad o kob karte huwe dikha ya gaya jis ki shanakhat Rohit Tomar ke taur par ki gayi hai. Iss video mein woh ladki ko zameen par pataka huwa, Thapaden ghoonse aur lateen maarta huwa dikhayi diya aur ladki baar baar uss se maffi chaah rahi thi aur bakhash dainay ki ilteja kar rahi thi. Social Media par is video ke viral honay ke baad mukhtalif gooshon se is ki muzammat ki jane lagi aur uss ko kiafer e kirdaar tak pahonchaney ka mutaleba zor pakadney laga tha taham is ke khilaaf kisi qisam ki karwai nahi ki gayi. Wazeer e Dakhila Hind Mr. Rajnath Singh ki mudakhilat ke baad hi iss ki giraftari amal mein aayi hai. Unhon ney twitter par Commissioner Police Delhi ko hidayat di ke woh munasib tehqiqaat kere. Wazeer e Dakhila ne apne tweet mein kaha ”Aik ladki ko aik naujawan ki janib se buri terha zado kob karne ke video ke baaray mein mujhe ilm huwa hai. Mein ney Delhi Police Commissioner (Amuliya Patnaik) se phone par baat ki hai aur un se kaha hai ke munasib karwai ki jaye.” Ladki ko zad o kob kiye jane ki rerecording karne walay naujawan ki bhi aawaz record huwi jis mein woh keh raha tha ke Rohit, Ladki ko chod dey lekin is ka koi asar nahi huwa. Iss naujawan ko zad o kob karne se baz rakhney kisi ne mudakhilat nahi ki. Iss waqeye ke khilaaf jumeraat tak koi shikayat mauusool nahi huwi thi taham jab is be rahem naujawan Rohit ne apni sabiqa girlfriend ko yeh video bhaij kar dhamki di ke agar woh shadi se inkaar kardey gi to is ka bhi yeh hashar hoga. Jis par iss Ladki ney Police mein Rohit ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai. Yeh naujawan Delhi Police ke aik Sub Inspector ka beta bataya jata hai.
478.title: Ladki ko zad o kob karne wala naujawan girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Golconda Police Station hudood mein Toli Chowki ilaqa mein waqay aik maroof School ki aik saadhay chaar sala ladki ki ismat raizi ki ittila par mutasirah ladki ke khandan walon aur sainkdon logon ne raat mein pur-tashaddud ehtijaj kya. Tafsilaat ke bamawajib PP II mein zair e taleem aik ladki ke waalid ne Golconda Police Station mein shikayat darj karwai ke Azaan International School” ke security incharge Jeelani nami naujawan ne un ki ladki ki ismat raizi ki hai. Ladki ke waalid ne bataya ke jab woh daidh bajey apni bachi ko school se ghar le jany pahonche to ladki ne unhen bataya ke is ke naazuk hisson mein dard ho raha hai. Jab ghar pahonch kar bachi ki jaanch ki gayi toh pata chala ke makhsoos hissa se khoon ris raha hai jis par woh school pahonch kar intizamia se shikayat kiye aur school ke aik teacher ke hamrah aik khangi hospital mein ladki ka muayina karwaya jahan doctoron ne bataya ke ladki ke sath jinsi zayadati ki gayi hai jis par unhon ne Golconda Police Station pahonch kar school intizamia ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai hai. Police ne ladki ke tibbi jaanch ke liye usay Nilofer Hospital muntaqil kya hai. Ladki ke waalid ne bataya ke yahan doctoron ne bataya ke ladki ke naazuk hisson se khoon ke ikhraj ko roknay ke liye cesarean karna padega. Unhon ne bataya ke ladki ne khud unhen bataya ke school mein garden ilaqa mein exhibition chal rahi thi jahan unhen security par mamoor Jeelani nami naujawan ne usay chocolate dainay ka bahana karte hue school imarat ke aik kone mein le kar gaya aur uss ki ismat raizi karne ki koshish ki. Iss waqea ki ittila milnay ke baad log sainkdon ki tadaad mein school ke bahar jama hogaye aur school ki imlaak ko nuqsaan pahonchaya. Ehtejajyon ke sath huqooq insani karkun bhi jama hogaye aur khaati ke khilaaf sakht karwai ka mutalba kya. Aik ehtajaji khatoon ne jo kaafi barham thi kaha ke school intizamia ko jab is sharamnaak waqea ke baray mein bataya gaya to khaati ke khilaaf karwai karne mein taawun ki bajaye yeh taweel paish karne lagey ke aisa waqea ho hi nahi sakta balkay ladki girgaee hogi jis ki wajah se usay chott aayi hogi. Barham ehtejajyon ne school ke kanch phod diye aur pathrao kya. Barham ehtejajyon ko muntashir karne ke liye Police ko halki si taaqat ka istimaal karna para. school intizamia ki janib se bhi Police mein shikayat karwai gayi jis mein bataya gaya ke school ki aik Taliba ke walidain se Jeelani saakin Nadeem colony ke baray shikayat mousool hui ke is ne ladki ke sath school ke ground mein jinsi zayad-ti ki hai. Ladki ne Jeelani ki shanakht karli hai. School intizamia ki shikayat mein bataya gaya ke jaanch karne par is ke zaireen jama par khoon ke dhabbay paye gaye. Mulzim tafteesh mein taawun nahi kar raha hai. School intizamia ne is maamla ki jaanch karne aur sakht karwai karne ki darkhwast ki hai. school ke paas Police ki bhaari jamiat ko tainaat kardiya gaya hai. Golconda Police ne aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Police ne mulzim ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Iss waqea ki ittila paker rukan assembly karwaan mister Kausar Mohiuddin bhi muqam e waqea par pahnch gaye aur ehtejajyon se baat cheet ki aur tayaqun diya ke mulzim ke khilaaf sakht se sakht karwai ke liye Police se numaindagi ki jaye gi
492.title: Kamsin Taliba ki ismat raizi ka ilzaam. Azaan School par ehtijaj

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ne Azaan International School mein aik masoom ladki ke sath jinsi ziyadati ke case ki Fast Track Court mein aajilana samaat ko yakeeni banaye gi. Police ne mulzim Mohammad Jelani Security Supervisor ki giraftari ki tauseeq karte hue kaha ke aaj usay Adalat mein paish kya ja raha hai. Deputy Commissioner of Police West Zone Mr. A. R. Srinivas ne aaj aik press conference mein mulzim ki giraftari aur Police tehqiqaat par roshni daali. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein kaha ke is waqea ke ziman mein School intizamia ke khilaaf ta haal koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya chunkay is jurm ka irtikaab infiradi taur parr kya gaya hai aur shikayat kunindah ne bhi School intizamia ke khilaaf koi shikayat nahi ki hai, albatta walidain se baat cheet karne par unhon ne bataya ke ibtida mein School intizamia ne do ghanton tak taawun nahi kya. Tehqiqaat mein is baat ka pata chalaya jaye ga. Mr. Srinivas ne kaha ke Police ki tamam tar tawajah asmat raizi ke muqadma par markooz hai. Taham DCP ne bataya ke unhon ne zila collector se baat ki hai aur unn se khwahish ki hai ke woh tehqiqaat karwaen ke aaya School chalanay se mutaliq murawwija qawayid ki khilaaf warzi to nahi ki gai hai. Iss khusoos mein DEO ko tehqiqaat karne ki hidayat di gayi hai. Yeh poochnay par ke School mein maazi mein bhi isi tarha ke waqeat runuma ho chukay thae? DCP ne kaha ke hamein abhi tak aisi koi shikayat mausool nahi hui hai. Unhon ne kaha ke agar walidain aisa koi waqea hota hai aur woh Police se rujoo nahi hue thae toh Police kya kar sakti hai? Police ke press note mein ab tak ki gayi tahaqeeq ki roshni mein bataya gaya ke 14

September ko mutasirah ladki apne walidain ke sath School pahonchi aur wahan se Headmistress ke hamrah woh Jaya Bhushan Hospitl Mehdipatnam pahonche. Ibtidayi tibbi imdaad ke baad Doctor ne inhen mutasirah ladki ko dosray hospital ko le jaany ka mashwara diya. Woh dobarah School pahonche aur School mein mutasirah ladki ne Headmistress aur deegar amlah ki maujoodgi mein mulzim ki shanakht ki. Mutasirah ko fauri Nilofer Hospital rujoo kya gaya jahan usay shareek dawakhana karliya gaya. Ladki ki surgery ki gayi aur is ka ilaaj jari hai. Hyderabad City Police ki Clues Team ne muqam waardaat ka daura kya aur muaayina kya. Waldain, Headmistress, Class Teacher aur aaya aur deegar ke tafseeli bayanaat record kiye gaye. Mutasirah ladki ki ashya, Director Telangana Forensic Sciences Laboratory ko tajzia aur report ke liye bhej di gayeen. Press note mein bataya gaya ke iss case mein na baligh ladki par jabran dakhuli jinsi ziyadati saabit hoti hai. Yeh bhi kaha gaya hai ke mutasirah ladki ka ilaaj jari hai aur Crpc ki dafaa 164 ke tahet mutasirah ladki ka tafseeli bayan Magistrate ki janib se record kya jaye ga aur medical report ka intzaar hai. Iss case ki tahqiqaat ACP Asifnagar Mr. K. Ashok Chkravarti ki nigrani mein Mr. Mohammad Munawar Deputy SP incharge Golconda Police Station kar rahey hain jabkay Additional DCP West Zone Mr. Venkateshwarlu case ki paishraft par nigrani rakhay hue hain.
510.title: Azaan School jinsi ziyadati case: Mulzim ki giraftari ki tauseeq

news_detail: Hyderabad- Maharashtra, Chattisgarh aur Telangana ki khususi Police teams ne aaj mushtraka taur par maaroof Huqooq e Insaani Jahedkar wo APCLP leader Prof. Vara Vara Rao aur un ki dukhtar aur deegar ki rihayeshgahon par chaape mare- Yeh chaape Pune Police ki jaanib se darj kardah ek muqadama ke silsile mein kiye gaye hain jis mein Pune Police ne id-dia kiya tha ke uss ne Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ko halak karne Dalit qayedeen aur Maoist ki ek saazish ko benaqaab kiya hai- Pune Police ne muqaami Adalat ko guzishta June mein waaqif karwaya tha ke usae Bhimakore Gaon tashadud muqadama k eek mulzim Delhi ke ek jahedkaar Rona Jacob Wilson ki Computer mein ek maktoob dastyaab huva tha, Comrade Prakash ke mausuma is maktoob Modi ki zair e qayadat BJP ki 15 riyasaton mein kamyaabi par tashweesh ka izhaar kiya gaya tha aur 8 crores maaliyat ke aslaha wo gola barood ke husool ka zikar kiya gaya tha, Police ne id-dia kiya ke iss maktoob mein is baat ka izhaar kiya gaya ke “hum Rajiv Gandhi nauwiat k eek aur waaqia ke khutoot par gaur kar rahe hain.’’ Maktoob mein mazeed kaha gaya ke “ un ke (Modi) Road Show ko nishana banana maussir hikmat e amali ho sakti hai.’’ Bataya Jata hai ke Pune Police ke tafteeshi ohdedaaron ne Jacob Wilson ke zabt shuda laptop se ikattha kardah data se mazeed ahem maalumaat jama ki hain aur iss saazish mein maali muawinat karne walon ke naamon ka bhi pata chalaya hai. Pune aur Chattisgarh ki Police ne Telangana ki Task Force Police ke hamrah Search Warrant ke saath Prof. Vara Vara Rao ke Gandhi Nagar apartment mein tlashi li hai- Aisi hi talashi karrawaai bayak waqt Prof. Vara Vara Rao ki dukhtar ki rihayeshgah, IEFL k eek Professor ki rihayeshgah waqae Nagole aur do sihaafion ki rihayeshgah aur APCLC ke do hamdardon ki rihayeshgahon par bhi ki gai. Samjha jata hai ke Pune aur Chattisgarh ki Police ne Prof. Vara Vara Rao par Maoist ke liye maalia ikattaha karne ka shuba kar rahi hai take Modi ko halak karne ki saazish ko amali jaama pahenaya jaasake. Bataya jata hai ke chapa maarte huve Police ne unn ke gahr ki tamaam telephones ko apne qabze mein leliya take wo bahar kisi se raabita qaayim na kar saken. Yeh bhi maaloom huva hai ke Prof Vara Vara Rao ko naamaaloom muqaam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai jabke un ki rihayeshgah par Police ki taftishi karrawai jaari hai. Samjha jata hai ke Porf Vara Vara Rao ko Pune ki Adalat mein paish kiya jaayega jahan yeh muqamma zair e dauraan hai. Maaloom huva hai ke Chattisgarh Police ne bhi Maoists ke khilaaf darj muqadammat mein Prof Vara Vara Rao ko maakhooz ki hai. Prof Vara Vara Rao ke khilaf karrawai par Huqooq e Insaani ke Jahedkaaron ne sakht tashweesh ka izhaar karte huve is ki muzammat ki hai.
366.title: Prof Vara Vara Rao giraftar? Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish ka shaaksaana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Huqooq e Insani ke maaroof Jahedkaar wo inquilabi shaier wo qaayed Andhra Paradesh Civil Liberties Committee Parof Varavara Rao, un ke damaad Mr. K. V. Kurmanath Staff Reporter the Hindu aur Mr. Karanti Tekula Staff Reporter Namaste Telangana ko Pune muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Pune Police ne Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Mr. Devendra Fadnavis ke qatal ki saazish ke aik muqadama mein aaj subah Parof Varavara Rao ko giraftar kiya tha. Pune Police ke saath Chattisgarh aur Hyderabad Police ne bhi subha ke dhaavon mein hissa liya tha. In teenon ko hirasat mein lene ke baad unhen dawakeana le jaya gaya aur un ki sahet ki janch karney kae baad Nampally Criminal Court men pesh krtay hoe’ay anhen tranzt warrantt par Pune lay jaea jarha hai. bataya jata hai ke Professor Varavara Raoke aek aor damad Professor ke steh narae’nh Professor anglsh aend farn lengoejs yoneorste (aeflo) ke ghr par bhe chhaph mara gea tha. aaj sbh Professor Varavara Raoke rhae’sh gah oaqa gandhe ngr، aarte se choraha ، msheraabad par mharashtraaor chhtes grrh ke Police ne tlnganh Police ke taaon say dhaoa krtay hoe’ay anhen hrast men lay lea tha. ase trh Mr. krma nath aor Mr. krante ke ghron par bhe dhaoay krtay hoe’ay anhen hrast men lay lea gea tha. Pune Police ne aaj sham anhen nample Criminal Court men pesh krtay hoe’ay tranzit warrantt par Pune le kar chale ge’e. Bataya jata hai ke Pune Police ne unhen Wazir e Azam Narendra Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish ke muqadama men giraftar kiya hai. Yad rahe ke Pune Police ne mah June men Pune ki muqami adalt ko bataya tha ke Bhima Kore Gaon tasahdud muqadama ke aek mulzim Delhi ke aik jahedkaar Rona Jacob Wilson ke Computer mein aik maktoob dastyaab huva tha .Police ke mutabiq Comrade Prakash ke mausumah iss maktoob mein Modi ke zair e qayadat  BJP ke 15 riyasaton men kaamyaabi par tashwish ka izhaar kiya gaya tha aur 8 crore rupay maliyat ka aslah o gola barood ke husool ka zikar kiya gaya tha. Police ne Id-diya kiya ke iss maktoob mein iss baat ka izhaar kiya gaya ke hum Rajiv Gandhi nauwiat ke aek aur waqia ke khutoot par ghaur kar rahe hain. Mktoob mein mazeed kaha gaya ke Modi ke road show ko nishanah bnana muassir hikmat e amli ho sakti hai. Bataya jata hai ke Pune Police ne iss muqadama mein Professor Varavara Rao ko giraftar kiya hai. Samjha jata hai ke Pune Police ne yeh ilzam aayed kiya ke woh iss saazish ko amali jamah pahnane maalia ki farahami mein role ada kiya hai. Professor Varavara Rao ke wakeel Mr. Raghunath ne bataya ke Pune Police ne Nampally Criminal Court men un ke moukkil ko pesh kartay hoe’ay unhen Pune muntaqil karne ki ijazat haasil ki hai. Unhon ne kaha ke muqami adalat koProfessor Varavara Rao par ilzamaat ke baray mein ziyada nahin bataya balke sirf yeh bataya gaya ke Professor aek muqadama mein Maharashtra Police ko matloob hai.
376.title: Varavara Rao sameit do sihafi Pune muntaqil

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh N.T. Rama Rao ke farzand adakaar wo sabiq Rukn e Rajya Sabha Mr. Hari Krishna ki aaj subha ek indohnaak sadak haadisa mein maut waqai hogai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu ke brother nisbati Hari Krishna Kavali Zilla Nellore mein shaadi ki ek taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye jaa rahe thae ke aaj subha Nalgonda shahrah par un ki car haadisa ka shikaar hogai. Police ke ek ohdedaar ne bataya ke 62 saala sabiq Rukn Parliament ek gaadi ko overtake karne ki koshish ki jis ke baayes yeh haadisha pesh aaya, un ki gaadi Road Divider se takrakar hawa mein ghota khaai aur sadak ke dusri simt jaa giri, gaadi ne unhen hawam mein uchaal diya tha. Wo sadak ke kinare khoon mein lut put pade paaye gai. Wo gaadi khud chala rahe thae. Unehn Kamineni Hospital Narkatpally muntaqil kiya gaya jahan unhon ne aakhri saans li- Duty Meidical Officer Ameer Khan ne bataya ke un ki sar par gaheri chooten lagi thein, hamein shuba hai ke unhen internal bleeding bhi huvi hai, taham abhi maut ki asal wajah ka pata chalana hai. Hari Krsihna ke do farzan Kalyan Ram aur Tarak Rama Rao @ Junior NTR bhi Telugu films ke maarof adakaar hain. Woh apne waalid se be inteha lagaoo rakhte thae. NTR ki Rath Yatra mein woh khud gaadi chalate thae. Taham unhon ne apne waalid ke Laxmi Paravati se dusri shaadi kar lene par naakhush thae aur jab N. Chandra Babu Naidu ne apne khusar ke khilaaf baghawat ki to Hari Krishna ne apne waalid ke khilaf apne bahenwayi ka saath diya. Wo Chandra Babu Naidu ki cabinet mein Wazeer bhi rah chuke thae. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar ne is haadisa par apne gahere taasuf ka izhaar kiya.
385.title: NTR ke farzand Hari Krishna ki sadak haadisa meein maut

news_detail: Bengaluru mein aik afasoosnaak vaqiya mein aik Bete ne apne baap ki aankh hee noch daali. Behen ko jaayedaad mein hissa na dene ke masale par baap bete mein bahes ke dauraan 40 saala naujawaan ne tayesh mein aakar waalid ki aankh nikaal liye. Mulzim Abhishek Chetan chahata tha ke waalid Parameshvar shaher ke JP Nagar ilaaqa mein taameer makaan us ke naam kar dein jabke Parameshvar ki khawhish thi ki makaan donon bachchon mein taqaseem kar diya jaaye lekin beta is par taiyaar nahin huwa. Ye jaayedaad Parameshvar aur unki ahliya ke naam par hai. Parameshvar ki ahaliya aik maah qabal hi guzar gayi thi. Police ke mutaabiq makaan ki taqseem ke masle par baap bete ke maabain takaraar shuroo ho gayi aur isi dauraan Abhishek ne jhapat kar waalid ki aankh nikaal dali aur unhen zakhmi haalat mein chhodakar faraar ho gaya. Ahil-e-khaana ne Parameshvar ko zakhami haalat mein Hospital mein daakhil karaya jahaan un ki haalat tasalli bakhsh hai. Taaham Doctor Parameshvar ki aankh bachaane mein naakaam rahe aur baap apni aankh se maharoom ho gaya. Police ne bataaya ki jaayedaad ke masle par baap bete mein aksar tanaaza hua karata tha. Abhishek ne na sirf baap ki aankh nikaal dali balke woh jaan se maarane ki dhamkhiyaan bhi diya karata tha. Police ne vaaqiya ki report darj kar ke mulzim ki giraftari ki karwayi shuro kar di. Police ke mutaabiq Abhishek nashe ka aadi hai aur uss ke paas amadani ka koyi khaas zariya nahi hai.
396.title: Bete ne Baap ki aankh noch daali

news_detail: Hyderabad. Reliance Jio mein kaam karne walay aik aadmi ko itwaar ke din Ramanthapur mein bijli ke aik khambay par chadhtay hue cable laganay ki koshish karne par aag pakad li. Police ke mutabiq 30 sala Venkanna cables laganay ki koshishon ke dauran bijli ke taron mein ulajh gaya. Jjab is ney bijli ke taron se khud ko chhudanay ki koshish ki to usay taron mein daudnay wali bijli se photnay wali chingariyon ney pakad liya aur us ko aag lag gayi. Raah guzarnay walon nay yeh manzar dekh kar usay neechay utaara aur Gandhi Hospital muntaqil kya. Woh 60 feesad tak jhulas gaya aur us ki haalat bahut hi naazuk hai. Police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai.
412.title: Uppal mein Cable taar laganay walay ko aag pakad li

news_detail: HEH The Nizam’s Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhay gaye nawadiraat do kg wazni  Heere aur Ruby jade Tiffin Box, Cup Saucer aur golden spoon ka sarqa. Sarqe ka pata chalanay Police ki 10 Teams tashkeel. Commissioner Police aur deegar aala ohdedaron ka daura. Administrative Officer Nizam’s Museum ki shikayat par muqadma darj

Hyderabad. Nizam’s Museum se naadir ashiya ka sarqa karliya gaya hai. Sarqa karne walon ne Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayeen qeemti ashya ka sarqa karliya jin mein HEH Nizam ke zair e istemaal tilai (golden) tiffin box, aik cup aur aik saucer aur aik tilai chamcha shaamil hain. Bata ya jaata hai ke International Market mein in antique pieces ki qeemat 1-2 crore ho sakti hai. Yeh Museum jahan waqay hain uss se ½ km ke faasle par Police Station, ACP aur DCP ke dafaatir maujood hain. Yeh waardaat itwaar ki raat mein paish aayi aur Nizam’s Museum ke Administrative Officer Shaukat Hussain mein Police yeh shikayat darj karwai ki jab peer ke din Museum ko khola gaya tha to yeh paaya gaya ke aik showcase ka locks tootay hue hain aur aik tiffin box, aik tea set aur chamcha gayab hain. Unhon ne bataya ke sarqa karne walay ventilation ke zareya andar daakhil hue aur jis gallery mein yeh nawadiraat rakhay hue thae is ke CC Tv camera ko nuqsaan pohanchaya aur aik showcase mein rakhi hui yeh ashya sarqa karli. Unhon ne bataya ke Museum mein chaar galleries hain aur yahan ki qeemti ashya ki nigrani ke liye 10 CC Tv camera nasb hain. Museum ki nigrani ke liye din mein 5 aur raat mein 3 security personals maamoor hain. Unhon ne bataya ke Police ki mukhtalif teamon ne muqam e waardaat se shawahid akhatta kiye hain, figner prints waghera haasil karli gayi hain aur sniffer dogs ki bhi khidmaat se istifada kiya gaya hai. Shikayat ki mausooli par Mir Chowk Police ne aik muqadma darj karte hue mulzimeen ka pata chalanay 10 teams tashkeel di hai. Commissioner Police Hyderabad  Mr. Anjani Kumar ne Museum ka daura kya. Bataya jata hai ke saariq/sariqeen ne Museum ki pehli manzil par aahani grill khol kar andar daakhil hue aur mazkurah ashya ki chori karkay faraar hogaye. Police ko shuba hai ke yeh jaankaar afraad ki hi karstani ho sakti hai. Bataya jata hai ke tiffin box do kg wazni hai jis par heere aur ruby jaday hue hain. Iss Museum mein Nizam ke zair e istemaal kayi qeemti ashya maujood hain. Bataya jata hai ke iss Museum mein 700-800 kg wazan ki besh baha ashya maujood hain jin ki bain ul aqwami market mein qadar aik mehdood andaza ke mutabiq 2,000 crore rupiya se bhi zayed hai. Pahele yeh Museum ground floor par tha jis ko baad azan first floor par muntaqil kya gaya hai. yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke jis imarat mein yeh Museum waqay hai woh Prince Mukaram Jah Bahadur Trust ke tahet hai aur Museum Prince Mufakham Jah Bahadur ke Trust ke tahet hai. Guzishta kayi dinon se is imarat se Museum ke takhlia ke liye Prince Mukaram Jah Bahadur Trust ki janib se prince Mufakham Jah Bahadur ke Trust ko notices jari ki jarahi theen. Founder and Managing Trustee  Deccan Heritage Trust Dr. Mohammad Safiullah ne bataya ke Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayi ashya agarchay Prince ki zaati milkiat mein hain lekin yeh aik qaumi asasa bhi hai jis ki hifazat sirf Trust par hi nahi balkay hukoomat par bhi aayed hoti hai. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh qeemti ashya jis imarat mein rakhi gayi hain woh Museums ke liye International miyaraat par khari nahi utarti hai. Hukoomat ko chahiye ke woh is Museum mein rakhi gayi nawadiraat aur qeemti ashya ki hifazat aur un ki munasib display ke intizamaa kiye jayen aur is ke liye salana grant manzoor ki jaye.
437.title: Nizam’s Museum se nawadiraat ka sarqa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Lumbini Park aur Gokul Chat Bhandar mein August 2007 ko hue bomb dhamakon ka muqadma aaj faisal kardiya gaya hai. Iss case mein makhoz 5 mulzimeemn mein 2 mulzimeemn Anique Shafeeq Saeed aur Ismayeel Choudhri ko qusoorwaar paaya gaya hai jabkay deegar 3 mulzimeemn ko na kafi saboton ke baayis bari kya gaya hai. 25

August 2007 ko shaher ke do muqamat Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park mein dhamakay hue thae jin mein majmoi taur par 42 log halaak hogaye thay jabkay 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thae. shaher ke deegar muqamat par mazeed do bombs ko nakara banadiya gaya. shehar ke tafrehi maqam ”Lumbini Park” mein 25

August 2007 ko shaam 7:45 bajey  aik zordaar dhamaka huwa jis ke 5 minutes baad hi qalb shaher mein masroof tareen muqam Koti par Chat ki mashhoor dukaan ”Gokul Chat Bhandar” ke paas aik aur dhamaka huwa. Baad azan shaher ke do muqamat se do bombs ko bar aamad kya gaya aur unhen phatt padney se qabl hi nakara banadiya gaya tha. Un dhmakon mein marnay walay mukhtalif tabqaat se talluq rakhtay thae jin mein bachay, talba aur khawateen bhi shaamil thay. Un judwaa bomb dhmakon ka muqadma 27
August ko faisal honay wala tha jis ko Second Additional Metropolitan Sessions Judge Mr. T. Srinivas Rao ney 4

September tak moakhar kardiya tha aur aaj 11 saal baad muqami adalat ney Anique shafeeq Saeed aur Ismayeel Choudhri ko qusoorwaar qarar diya gaya jabkay Mohammad Sadiq Nisar Ahmed Badshah Sheikh , Farooq Sharfuddin Turkish aur Mohammad Tariq Anjum Ahsen ko bari kardiya gaya hai. Adalat qusoorwaar paye gaye mulzimeemn ki saza ka peer ko elaan kere gi. Yeh mulzimeemn in dinon Chiralapally Jail mein mahruse hain. Un charon mulzimeen ko pahley Maharashtra ki ATS ney girftar kya tha jinhein baad azan transit warrant par Gujarat muntaqil kya gaya tha. fi al-waqt woh Chirlapally Jail mein mahruse hain.
453.title: Gokul Chat. Lumbini Park Bomb Blasts: 2 qusoorwaar 2 bari

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf aik naujawan ney aaj Raj Bhavan ke rubaroo iqdaam khudsozi ki. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ki Raj Bhavan aamad se kuch dair qabl aik naujawan ne Raj Bhavan ke rubaroo –apne aap par petrol chhidak kar aag laga lene ki koshish ki taham wahan maujood Media ke numayindon aur Security ohdedaron ney usay aisa karne se baaz rakha. Cabinet mein riyassti Assembly ki tahleel ki qarar daad manzoor karne ke baad Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao, Cabinet ke faisla se Governor ko waaqif krwane aur Assembly ki tahleel ki sifarish paish karne ke liye Raj Bhavan pounchanay walay thay. Akhbaari numainday Raj Bhavan ke baab ud dakhila  ke rubaroo Chief Minister ki aamad ke muntazir thay ke aik naujawan wahan pouncha jis ke haath mein aik plastic ka can tha jis mein petrol bhara huwa tha aur is ney Jai Telangana ke naaray lagatay hue aanan faanan khud par petrol chhidak liya aur jaib mein haath daal kar diya silai nikaalne wala hi tha ke is ke qareeb mauood media ke numaindon ney is ke haath pakad liye aur usay khud ko aag laga lene se baaz rakha. Wahan maujood security ohdedar bhi pahonch gay aur uss par qaboo pa liya. Media ke numaindon ke poochnay par is ney apna naam Eshwar bataya aur kaha ke woh Nizaam College ka taalib ilm hai. Uss ney bataya ke Chief Minister Mr. Chandarshekar ney bahut se wada karte hue nayi Telangana riyasat ki annan hukoomat sambhlaa magar apni meyaad ki takmeel se bahut pahelay hi Assembly tahleel karne ka faisla karliya taakay woh phir se Telangana mein Iqtidaar haasil kar sake. Iss naujawan ney kaha ke wadon ki takmeel ke baghair hi Assembly tahleel kardainay se woh mayoos hogaya hai.
475.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf naujawan ka iqdaam khudsozi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Meerpet Police Station ke hudood mein Gayitiri  Nagar ka saakin Police Constable Upender ney jummay ko apne makaan mein khudkushi karli. Woh Chief Minister Camp Office par Constable ke taur par faraiz anjaam dae raha tha. Mutawafi ney jaraseem kush dawa pi kar khudkashi karli. Qabal azeen woh Santosh Nagar Police Station mein Constable ki hesiyat se faraiz anjaam dae raha tha. Chunkay woh apni Duty ko baqaidagi se anjaam nahi day parha tha is liye is ko haal hi mein Chief Minister ke Camp Office par taiynaat kiya gaya tha. Woh wahan rujoo ba kaar hogaya magar wahan par bhi duty se ghair haazir rehne laga tha. Police ohdedaron ka kehna hai ke woh khandani masayel mein uljha huwa tha iss liye duty pabandi se anjaam nahi dae parha tha. Khudkushi ki ittela par muqami Police, fauri wahan pohanchi aur laash ko  postmortem ke liye dawakhana Osmania muntaqil kardiya.
493.title: Chief Minister Camp Office par taiynaat constable ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mohram, ganesh tehwaron aur intikhabaat ke paish e nazar Hyderabad City Police, South Zone ki janib se hafta ko 6:00 bajey taa 8:30 bajey Railway Track ke atraaf nihayat hassas ilaqay jaisay Al-Jubail colony (Chandrayangutta Police Station), Farooq Nagar (Falaknuma Police Station) mein DCP Mr. V. Satyanarayan ki qiyadat mein Cordon and Search Operation anjaam diya gaya, jis mein 250 Police ohdedaron ney hissa liya. Iss dauran 42 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. Police ki janib se Mobile Electronic Finger Print devices istemaal karte hue barsar e mauqa jaanch padtaal karne par 12 rowdysheeters ki nishandahi ho payi hai. Mazeed bran 148 wheelers, 9 Autos, 2 fourwheelers ko munasib documents na honey ki binaa zabt karliye gai hain. Isss muhim ke dauuran 2 ghair qanooni slaughters aur shahed aur adrak mein milawat ke do units ka pata chalaya gaya hai. Iss khusoos mein Falaknuma Police Station ney Mohammad Muzaffaruddin ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karte hue 30 kg adrak ka paste zabt karliya jabkay Syed Zaheer Ahmed ke khilaaf muqadma darj karte hue 90 kg shahed zabt karliya. Chandrayangutta Police ney do ghair qanooni slaughters ke khilaaf bhi muqadma darj karliya.
513.title: Al-Jubail colony aur Farooq Nagar mein Cordon & Search

news_detail: Delhi High Court ney budh ke din qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein yeh kehte hue ke bheek mangney ko na qabil taazeer qarar diya ke bheek mangney ke amal par jurmana aayed karne ki gunjayeshen ghair dastoori hai aur khatam kardainey ki mutaqazi hain. Kaarguzar Chief Justice Gita Mittal aur Justice C Hari Shankar par mushtamil ek bench ney kaha ke is faisla ka hatmi nateeja yeh hoga ke bheek mangney ka mobayyana irtekaab karne walay afraad ke khilaaf ‘Qanoon Bombay Insdaad Gadagari’ ke tehat qanooni karwai ke khtama ki mutaqazi hogi. Adalat ney kaha ke Dehli Hukoomat, maamla ke samaji o iqtisadi pahelu par tajruabaati tajzia ke baad jabri gadagari ke kisi racket ka khatema karne mutabadil qanoon saazi kar sakti hai. Bench ney kaha ke qanooni gunjaish jo gadagari ko aik jurm tasawwur karti hai aur zimni umoor jaisay is jurm se nimatney mein ohdedaron ke ikhtiyarat ki Dehli tak wusat ghair dastoori hai aur khtama ki mutaqazi hai. High Court ney 16

May ko istafsaar kya tha ke aaya kis terha us Mulk mein bheek maangna jurm ho sakta hai jahan hukoomat, giza aur mulazimat faraham karne se qassar ho. High Court mafaad aama ki do darkhwaston se nimat rahi thi jis mein istedua ki gait hi ke gadagari ko na qabil taazeer qarar diya jaye. Markazi Hukoomat ney kaha tha ke agar gurbat ki wajah se bheek mangi jaye to woh jurm nahi hona chahiye. Mumtaz samaji jahedkaar Harsh Mandar aur Karnika Suhwani ney mafaad e aamma ki darkhwast mein istedua ki thi ke gadagari ko na qabil istighasa qarara dainey ke ilawa qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein bheek maangne ke liye bunyaadi insani aur asaasi hauooq dyie jayen. Unhon ney shaher mein bhikaryon ke liye maujood tamam homes mein munasib giza aur tibbi saholaten faraham kiye jayen. Markazi hukoomat aur AAP Hukoomat ney 2016 mein Adalat ko bataya tha ke wizarat samaji insaaf gadagari ko na qabil taazeer qarar daine aur gadagron aur be gharon ki baazabadkaari ke liye aik mussavvida bill tayyar kia tha lekin qanoon mein tarmeem ki tajweez ko baad azan tark kardiya gaya. Mazkoorah qanoon ke mutabiq gadagari par pehli saza ki soorat mein 3 baras se zayed ki saza e qaid aur aiaada par 10 saal qaid ki saza ka hukum dainey ki gunjaish faraham karta hai. Fi al-waqt gadagari par koi markazi qanoon nahi hai aur beshtar riyaston ney Bombay Insdaad Gadagari Qanoon 1959 ko ikhtiyar kya hai ya phir is ki tarz par apna qanoon waza kya hai jo gadagari ko jurm grdanta hai.
391.title: Qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein bheek maangna jurm nahi: High Court

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jaria saal ka aakhri Suraj Gahen (Solar Eclips) 11 August ko waqay hoga taham Hindustan se is ka mushahida nahi kya jasakey ga. Chand khabar rasan idaron aur News Portals ke zareya Hindustan mein bhi Suraj Gahen ka nzarah kiye jane se mutaliq kiye gaye id-daa ke baayis aik uljhan paida hogayi hai magar haqeeqat yeh hai ke 11
August ko wuqoo pazeer honay wala juzwi Suraj Gahen, Hindustan mein qabil  e deed nahi hai. Is juzwi Suraj Gahen sirf mehdood ilaaqon mein hi mushahida kya ja sakta hai. 11

August ko waqay honay walay Suraj Gahen ka mushahida duniya ke chand hisson mein hi kya ja sakta hai jaisay Shumali o Mashriqi Asia, Europe mein Scandinavian region( Norway , Swedan Denmark aur Finland, Iceland aur Feurio jazair ) Greenland, Nunavat ke atraaf Canada ke barfani khitton aur Shumal Maghribi Hissa. Suraj Gahen is waqt runuma hota hai jab Suraj aur zameen ke darmain chaand haail hojata hai. Suraj Gahen umooman amavas ko aur chaand Gahen, punam ko waqay hota hai. 11

August ko waqay honay wala Suraj Gahen pehlay muqam par aalmi miyaari waqt ke mutabiq 08:02:08 bajey( Hyderabadi waqt ke mutabiq 13:32:08 yani daidh bajey din) ko shuru hoga, azam tareen Gahen 09:46:24 bajey(Hyderabad ke waqt ke mutabiq 15:16:24 yani sawa teen bajey seh pahar) hoga aur aakhri muqam par juzwi Suraj Gahen ka mushahida11:30:40 ( Hyderabad ke waqt ke lehaaz se 17:00:40 yani 05:00 bajey shaam) tak dekha jasakay ga. Aik baat qabil e zikar hai ke kabhi bhi Suraj Gahen tanha wuqoo pazeer nahi hota hai. Yeh hamesha Chaand Gahen ke do hafton qabal ya baad runuma hota hai. Umooman mutawatar do Gahen hotay hain aur kabhi kabhar aik hi Gahen mausam mein teen bhi waqay hotay hain. 11

August ke Suraj Gahen ke baad 5-6 January 2019 ko juzwi Suraj Gahen waqay hoga jo Asia aur Pacific khitta mein dekha jasakay ga jabkay 20-21 January ko kaamil Chaand Gahen hoga jo Europ, Asia, Africa , North America , Pacific, Indian Ocean aur Antartic mein dekha jasakay ga.
405.title: Hafta ko Suraj Gahen magar Hindustan mein nzarah nahi kya jasakey ga

news_detail: New Delhi. Markazi kaabeena ney apni biwion ko bayak waqt teen Talaq dainay ke qusoor-waar paye jane walay mardon ko zamanat ki farahmi ki gunjaish shaamil karne ki manzoori dey di hai. Sarkari zaraye ke bamawajib is jurm ko na qabil zamanat baqi rakhnay ke bawajood mulzim ko zamanat ataa karne ki Magistrate ko ijazat ki gunjayesh faraham ki gayi hai. Talaq salasa Bill ka maqsad Mardon ki janib se yaklakht Talaq e Salasa dainay sadiiyon puranay fayl ko kalaadam qarar dena hai. Yaad rahay ke Talaq e Salasa par Supreme Court ki Hidayat par guzishta baras Lok Sabha ney Nikah par Muslim khawateen ke huqooq ke tahaffuz ke bill ko manzoori dey di thi taham Modi Hukoomat ke liye uos waqt Rajia Sabha mein is Bill ko Manzoor karwana kuch dushwaar tha chunkay BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA Hukoomat ko Rajya Sabha mein khatir khawha aksariyat haasil nahi thi. Opposition ki janib se is bill mein tarameem ke liye kiye jane walay mutalibaat mein aik zamanat ki gunjayish ki farahmi bhi tha. Aaj manzoori di gayi tarameem mein yeh hai ke Magistrate ko zamanat manzoor karne ke ikhtiyaraat haasil ho jaienge. Mujawwiza Qanoon ka itlaaq sirf Talaq salasa jisay ”Talaq bidat” bhi kaha jata hai par hi hoga aur yeh mutasirah khatoon yeh haq bhi ataa kere ga ke woh apne aur apne zair e parwarish bachon ke liye munasib naan o nafqah talab karte hue Magistrate se rujoo ho. Alawa azeen khatoon apne na baaligh bachon ke haq hizanat bhi Magistrate se talab kar sakti hai. Is mujawwiza Qanoon ke mutabiq Talaq salasa dainay ki soorat mein mulzim shohar ko teen saal ki saza hogi. Dabaoo ko door karte hue markazi wazeer qanoon Mr. Ravi Shankar Prasad ney aaj kaha ‘kaabeena ney Talaq se mutaliq mujawaza qanoon mein tarameem ko manzoori di hai. Agar koi shaohar apni biwi ko yaklakht teen Talaq dey deta hai to waisi soorat mein FIR isi soorat mein qabil dast andazi (Police ko baghair parwana giraftari ke girftar karne ka haq ) jurm hoga jab mutasirah khatoon ya is ke khooni rishta daar ya un ke nikah se judey huwa koi shakhs shikayat darj karta hai .

Guzishta baras Supreme Court ney aik darkhwast ko darkhwast e aama ke taur par qubool karte hue aik tareekh saaz faisla sunaate hue bayak waqt di jane wali Talaq ko na sirf ghair Islami balkay ghair dastoori qarar dete hue kaladam qarar diya tha aur markazi hukoomat ko hidayat di thi ke is ziman mein munasib qanoon saazi ki jaye. Guzishta maah sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko aik maktoob rawana karte hue mutaliba kya tha ke Parliament ke manson ijlaas mein khawateen ko tahaffuz ke bil ki manzoori ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Aik din baad markazi wazeer qanoon mister rawi Shankar prasad naay maktoob ka jawab dete hue kaha tha ke khawateen ko tahaffuz, Talaq e salasa aur Nikah Halal se mutaliq bills ki manzoori ke liye aik dosray se haath milatay hue naye mamlaat kiye jayen.
418.title: Talaq e Salasa: Magistrate ke zareya zamanat ki gunjayesh ko kaabeena ki manzoori

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nafrat ke maahol mein aman ke payam ko aam karne Mulk ki khawateen uth khadi hui hain. Yeh pehal khawateen ne shaed is liye bhi ki hogi ke nafrat aur tashadud ka sab se ziyada khumyaza inhen hi bhugahtna padega. Qaumi satah par huqooq insani ke liye sargaram khawateen ne is khusoos mein beda uthaya aur 22
September taa 13

october 2018 Mulk bhar se khawateen ki paanch riyaalian nikaalne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Yeh riyaalian Kerala, Tamlinadu, Jammu and Kashmir , Shumal Mashriqi Hindustan aur Delhi se Delhi tak nikaali jayen gi. Har riyaalian mein kam az kam 25 khawateen hissa lengi. Is dauraan 200 Shehron aur Gaon ka ihata kya jaye ga. Mumtaz samaji jahedkaar mohtarma Shabnam Hashmi bataya ke adam tashadud Hindsutan ke liye Hindustan ki khawateen ki janib se ihtimaam kiye jane walay is March ”Battain Aman Ki” ka maqsad nafrat aur tashadud ke mahol mein pyar, mohabbat aur aman ke payam ko aam karna hai aur logon tak yeh payam pahunchana hai ke nafrat aur tashaddud se kuch haasil nahi hoga balkay pyar aur aman ke zareya hi hum is Mulk ko taraqqi ki raah par gamzan kar saktay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamara asal maqsad Dastoor par jo hamla kya jarha hai is ko rokna aur jamhuriat ko bachana hai. Unhon ne bataya ke yun to is Mulkgeer tehreek se hazaron tanzeemen jari rahen gi magar har rally mein kam az kam 25 khawateen hamesha rahen gi, yeh rallyian october mein Dehli poanch kar aik jalsa mein tabdeel hogi. un tamam rallyon ke liye malia muqami taur par hi tanzeemen apne taur par kar rahi hain. Is khusoos mein aaj yahan ‘Lamakaan’ Banjara Hills par khawateen ki mukhtalif tanzeemon ka aik ijlaas munaqqid huwa jis se mohtarma Shabnam Hashmi aur deegar khawateen ne khitaab kya aur rally ke inseraam ke silsila mein Laiha amal ko qatiyat di.
431.title: Nafrat o tashadud ke khilaaf khawateen ki Mulkgeer muhim

news_detail: Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi, markazi hukoomat ke 50 lakh mulazmeen ke cheharon par muskurahat le ayen ge jo is baat ke muntazir hain ke 7

Pay Revision Commission ki sifarishaat se paray un ke mutalibaat puray kiye jayen ge. Zee news mein zaraye ke hawala se aik report paish ki gayi jis mein bayan kya gaya ke Wazeer e Azam nrindr moodi markazi hukoomat ke mulazmeen ko ail tea si ke tehat bairon Mulk safar karne ka ikhtiyar haasil karne ki ijazat dey sakte hain taham woh kis Mulk ka daura karenge is ka faisla hukoomat apne taur par kere gi. Report mein yeh bhi id-daa kya gaya ke ibtida mein mulazimeen ko kam az kam 10 Mumulik ka safar karne ki ijazat di jaye gi. fi al-waqt markazi hukoomat ke mulazmeen androon Mulk safar ke liye rukhsat aur bilasoodi paishgi le satke hain.
444.title: Markazi sarkari mulazimeen ko bairon Mulk ke safar ki ijazat diye jaane ka imkaan

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib Sadar e Jamhooria Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ne aaj kaha ke yaklakht teen Talaq dainay ko tazeeri jurm qarar dainay walay mujawaza qanoon ka Bill parliment ke aindah ijlaas mein rakha jaye ga chunkay Rajya Sabha mein partiyan kisi moahida par pounchanay se qassar rahay. zaraye ne kaha ke parliment ke aindah ijlaas se qabal is musevida qanoon ke nifaz ke liye Hukoomat is khusoos mein aik Ordinance ya Emergency Executive Order manzoor kar sakti hai. Parliament ka ijlaas jari na rehne ki soorat mein Hukoomat hangami iqdamaat ke taur par Ordinence ya Hangami Aamilana Hukum jari karne ka ikhtiyar rakhti hai. Sadarnashin Rajya Sabha Mr. Venkaiah Naidu ne kaha ke partiyon mein ittafaq raye qayim na honay ki wajah se aaj Talaq salasa Bill ko aiwaan mein nahi rakha jaye ga. kabeena ki janib se mujawwiza qanoon mein tarameem ki manzoori ke dosray din hi Hukoomat aaj is Bill ko parliament ke manson ijlaas ke aakhri din Rajya Sabha mein paish karne ka iradah rakhti thi. Paheli tarmeem yeh ki gayi thi ke bayak waqt teen Talaq day dainay par jisay Talaq Bidaa se bhi mausoom kya jata hai sirf khatoon ya is ke khooni rishta daar ya phir Aqab Nikah se judey koi fard ki janib se hi Police mein shikayat ki jasakay gi. Doosri tarmeem yeh ki gayi ke shohar ke Talaq Bidaa ko wapas le lainay aur dobarah mil jul kar rahne par bahami amaadgi ki soorat mein mutlaqa darkhwast guzar ko apni darkhwast wapas lainay ki ijazat haasil rahay gi. Teesri tarmeem yeh ki gayi ke sirf magistrate hi zamanat ke majaz hon ge. Is tarmeem ki ru se shikayat kunindah khatoon ke bayan ki samaat ke baad hi Magistrate mulzim shohar ko zamanat par rihaa karne ka faislah kar saktay hain. Siyasi partiyon ka yeh mutaliba tha ke teen saal qaid ki saza ko wapas liya jaye aur shikayat ke indraaj ke baad sirf Magistrate ki bajaye Police ohdedar ko bhi zamanat par rihaa karne ka ikhtiyar diya jaye jisay Hukoomat ne qubool nahi kya. asal Bill ko guzashta baras hi lok sabha mein manzoori haasil hogayi thi taham Rajya Sabha mein yeh Bill ruka huwa tha jahan BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA is waqt aqliat mein hai.
463.title: Rajya Sabha mein Talaq Bill ki peshkashi tal gayi

news_detail: Pakistani jail mein 6 saal se qaid Bharati Engineer qaid ki muddat jald poori honay par watan lout jaye ga. Pakistani adalat ne is ki jald rihayi ki tasdeeq kar di. Hamid  Ansari nami Software Engineer ghair qanooni tareeqa se Pakistan mein November 2012 mein daakhil huwa tha, is ne do din Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein apne aik dost ke paas rehayish ikhtiyar ki thi jis ke baad woh aik hotel muntaqil ho gaya. Intelligence ko khabar hone par usay hotel se hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. 15

December 2015 ko jasoosi ke ilzaam mein usay fouji adalat ki janib se teen saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. Hamid  Ansari ne tafteesh ke douran is baat ka aitraaf kiya hai ke woh ghair qanooni tor par Afghanistan se Torkham ke rastay Pakistan mein daakhil huwa. Hamid ki walida ka daawa hai ke un ke betay ki internet par aik Pakistani khatoon se bhi dosti hogayi thi jis se milnay ke liye Hamid Nihaal Pakistan gaya tha. Douran qaid Hamid Nihaal  Ansari ke wakeel qaazi Mohammad Anwar advocate ne Peshawar High Court ke aik bench ko bataya tha ke un ke Bharati maukkil par teen martaba jail ke andar hamla kiya gaya hai. Unhon ne adalat se yeh bhi kaha tha ke un maukkil ko is jagah rakha gaya hai jahan szaye mout panay walay qaidyoun ko rakha jata hai. Hamid ki walida ki taraf se Supreme Court ki insani huqooq ki cell mein aik darkhwast dayer ki gayi thi jis mein un ke betay ki baazyabi ki istedua ki gayi thi. Unhon ne umeed zahir ki hai ke December mein is ki qaid ki muddt poori honay ke baad usay jald reha kar diya jaye ga, unhon neh betay ki jald rihayi ke liye Imran Khan ko bhi khat likh kar darkhwast ki hai .

Varsuwa Mumbai se talluq rakhnay wali Hamid  Ansari ki walida Fouzia ko umeed hai ke un ka beta December mein joon hi qaid ki muddat poori hojaye gi woh wapas apne Mulk aajay ga. Fouzia ne jumaraat ko sabiq MLA Mr. Krishna Hegde se mulaqaat karte hue un se darkhwast ki ke woh Hindustani Cricketers Sunil Gawaskr aur Kapil Dev se khwahish karen ke Imran Khan ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat ke mauqa par woh Pakistani Wazeer e Azam se  Ansari ki aajilana rihayi ke baarey mein baat karen. Fouzia jo haal hi mein Andheri ke aik maroof college se professor ki haisiyat se retire hui hain, apne betay ki aajilana rihayi ke liye wazeer kharja mohtaram sshma soraj se mulaqaat karne Dehli gayi hui theen jahan woh aik haadsa ka shikaar hogayi theen jis ki wajah se un ki mltipl surgery hui hai. haqooq insani ke jahedkaar Jatin Desai ne bataya ke Pakistani adalat neh  Ansari ki aajilana rihayi ki darkhwast ko is liye mustard kardiya ke Pakistani hukoomat ne qaid ki saza mukammal hotay hi inhen Hindustan bhej dainay ka wada kya hai.
476.title: Mumbai ka Engineer Hamid Ansari, Pakistani jail se kab rihaa hoga?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik baar phir Mulk bhar mein Zul Hijjah ke chaand ki Ruyat ke masla par mutazaad it-tila-aat aati rahen jis ki wajah se awam mein uljhan payi gayi. Hyderabad mein bhi Ruyat Hilal Committee ney ibtida mein adam Ruyat ka elaan kardiya tha taham baad azan faisla par nazarsani ki gayi. Sadar Majlis Ulema e Deccan ney bil akhir Zul Hijjah ka chaand nazar aane ka elaan kardiya. Markazi Ruyat Hilal Committee Sadar Majlis Ulema e Deccan ney qabal azeen chaand nazar anay ka elaan kardiya tha taham baad azan wazahat ki ke Madurai mein chaand nazar aaney ki ittila mausool hui jis par Chennai ke Qaazi Salahudding sahib se rabt paida karkay is ki tasdeeq haasil ki gayi aur sharai shahadat ki takmeel ke baad ruyat ki tasdeeq ki jati hai. Mausam barish ke baayis Mulk ke beshtar hisson mein matlaa abr-aalood rehne ki wajah se Ruyat Hilal mein dushwari paish aayi chunancha Mulk ke beshtar hisson mein ibtida mein adam Ruyat ka elaan kardiya gaya aur phir baad azan Ruyat ki tauseeq ke baad faisla par nazar e sani ki gayi. Ruyat Hilal ki tauseeq ke baad Hyderabad mein ab Eid uz Zuha 23
August ki bajaye 22
August ko hogi,taham Delhi mein Ruyat Hilal ke masla par raat dair gaye tak bhi uljhan baqi rahi.
495.title: Zul Hijjah ka chaand nazar agaya, Hyderabad mein 22nd August ko Eid uz Zuha

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki tabiyat aaj aik baar achanak biggad gayi jo ilaaj ke liye All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) mein shareek hain. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney AIIMS pahonchkar sabiq Wazeer e Azam ki sahet ke baray mein jankari haasil ki, woh taqreeban 50 minute tak Hospital mein rahay. Guzishta do dino se Vajpayee ko life support system par rakha gaya hai. woh is waqt bawiqaar Institute mein zair e ilaaj hain. Vajpayee ko gurde ki naali mein infection, pishaab ki naali mein infection, pishaab ki kami aur seenah ki sukad ke baayis 11

June ko All India Institute of Medical Sciences mein shareek karwaya gaya tha, Diabities ke aarzah mein mubtala  93 sala qaayed ka aik hi gurda kaarkard hai aur unhen 2009 mein stroke bhi aaya jis ki wajah se un ki quwat e idraak congnitive abilities mein kami aagai thi. AIIMS ki janib se raat der gaye jari kardah Health Bulletin ke mutabiq guzashta 24 ghanton se un ki sahet naazuk hai aur unhen life support system par rakha gaya hai. Vajpayee ke arkaan khandan ko bhi mutala kardiya gaya hai. Markazi Wazeer Science and Tecnologi Harsh Vardhan, Wazeer Finance Arun Jetly, Wazeer Railway Pyush Goel, Wazeer Textile Smriti Irani aur deegar ney Hospital pahonch kar buzurag qaayed ki sahet ke baray mein jankari haasil ki.
506.title: Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki haalat naazuk

news_detail: New Delhi- Teen waqton ke Wazeer e Azam wo  Mulk ke senior siyasatdan Atal Bihari Vajpayee ka aaj shaam dehaant hogaya. All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) ne un ki maut ka elaan kya jahan woh 9 hafton se zair e ilaaj thay. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ne 24 ghanton mein do martaba Hospital ka daura kya. Mulk bhar ke sarkardah siyasatdan Hospital pahonchh kar un ki sehat ke baray mein jankari haasil karte rahay thay. BJP ke 93 sala qad aawar siyasatdan ko 11
June ko gurday ki naali aur pishaab ki naali mein soozish par Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Un ka aik hi gurda hi karkard tha.

Atal Bihari Vajpayee 25 December 1924 ko aik school teacher ke gharana mein Gawaliarr Madhya Pradesh mein paida hue. Unhon ne 1942 mein ‘Hindustan Chod do Tehreek’ mein hissa letay hue siyasat mein daakhil hue. Unhon ne Victoria College Gawaliarr se Political Science mein Post Graduate kya. Vajpayee Bhartya Jan Sangh, Janata Party aur Bharatya Janata Party ke baani rukan rahay hain. Woh 1957 mein pehli martaba dosray Lok Sabha ke liye muntakhib hue jis ke baad woh 1967, 1971, 1977, 1980, 1991, 1996, 1998, 1999 aur 2004 mein Lok Sabha ke liye muntakhib hotay rahay, jabkay 1986 mein woh Rajya Sabha ke rukn muntakhib hue. 1977 taa 1979 Mulk ke wazeer kharja bhi rahay. Woh pehli martaba 16

May 1996 ko Wazir e Azam banay jab us waqt ke Sadar e Jamhuria Hind Dr. Shankar Dayal Sharma ne BJP ko sab se badi party ke taur par ubharnay par tashkeel e hukoomat ki dawat di thi taham woh 13 din tak hi is ohda par barqarar reh sakay chunkay unhen koi doosri party taayeed karne par amaada nahi hui thi. Vajpayee ne 19
March 1998 ko dobarah Wazeer e Azam ke ohda ka halaf liya, 13 mah baad 17

April 1999 ko woh tehreek etemaad mein aik vote ki shikast ke baayis un ki hukoomat zawaal pazeer hogayi. Yeh wahid hukoomat rahi hai jo tehreek adam etemaad mein shikast se dochar hui. Vajpayee ne teesri martaba 13

October 1999 ko Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf liya. Un hi ke daur mein Dehli- Lahore Bus Service ka aaghaz huwa. Vajpayee ke hi daur mein jab woh 13 din ki hukoomat ke baad namzad Wazeer e Azam thay Kargil ki jung paish aayi thi jo BJP ki bhaari aksariyat se kamyaabi yakeeni hui thi. Isi terha Vajpayee ke hi daur mein Decemeber 1999 mein Indian Airlines ke tayyarah ka aghwaa karkay Kabul le jayagya tha. Aghwaa kunindon ne Hafiz Sayeed ki rihayi par mughawiah musafireen ko riha kya tha. Un hi ke daur mein 13

December 2001 ko Parliament par hamla huwa tha. Isi terha 2002 mein jab woh Wazeer e Azam thay, Gujarat ka khonraiz tashadud bhadka tha, jis mein aik hazaar se zaayed Musalman shaheed hogaye thay. Vajpayee ko 2015 mein Mulk ke aala tareen Civil Award ‘Bharat Ratan’ se sarfraz kya gaya. Vajpayee jo aik shayar aur musannif bhi thay, aik darjan se zayed kitaaben likhi hain.
520.title: Atal Bihari Vajpayee chal base

news_detail: Usoolon aur aqdaar ko baalaye taaq rakhtay hue iqtidaar ki khatir bejod siyasi mafahmat karne walon ko aik nah aik din apni khata ka khumyaza bhughtna hi parta hai, Iqtidaar se mehroomi muqaddar to ban hi jati hai sath hi ruswai ka taqub shuru hojata hai. aisa hi kuch aaj Mahbooba Mufti ke sath huwa jin ki Jammu & Kashmir hukoomat ki tayeed se BJP ney achanak dast bardari ikhtiyar karli. Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP- PDP ittehaad ka khtama hogaya jab BJP ke qaumi Sadar ney riyasat ke qanoon sazoon se mulaqaat ke baad apni tayeed se dast bardari ka faisla kya. Chief Minister Mahbooba Mufti ney apna maktoob istifa governor ko paish kardiya hai. Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP ke 25 aur PDP ke 28 arkaan hain jabkay 87 rukni ewaan mein aksariyat ke liye 45 arkaan darkaar hotay hain. riyasat mein party position kuch is terhan hai, BJP 25, PDP 28, national conference 15, congress 12 aur mabaqi chhoti partiyon ke MLAs aur azad arkaan hain. Sadar BJP Mr. Amit Shah ke party ke arkaan assembly se Delhii mein mulaqaat ke baad Mahbooba Mufti ki zair qayadat hukoomat ki tayeed se dast bardari ka faisla kiya gaya. dono partiyon mein ikhtilafat is waqt ubhar kar aagaye jab markazi hukoomat ney mah Sayam ke baad riyasat mein mukhalif dehshat gardi operation ki bahaali ka faisla karliya. BJP ney tayeed wapas letay hue kaha ke un ke liye reyasti hukoomat mein barqarar rehna na qabil bardasht hogaya tha. BJP quied Mr. raam maadhu ney kaha ke hamein awam ke khat aetmaad ka ehtram karna tha. agar hum is waqt hukoomat tashkeel nahi dyie hotay to waadi mein governor raaj ya Sadar Raaj nafiz hogaya hota. Hindustan  ki salamti aur salmiyat ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue, aur yeh ke Jammu & Kashmir Hindustan  ka atot hissa hai, riyasat mein ghalib sorat e haal ko control mein laane ke liye hum ney faisla kya ke riyasat mein Zimam hukoomat governor ko hawala kardiya jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke waadi ke liye markaz kuch bhi kere ga. hum ney Pakistan ki janib se jung bandi ki khilaaf warzi par full stop laganay ki koshish ki. PDP apne waday aifaa karne mein nakaam rahi. unhon ney kaha ke jammu aur ladah mein taraqiyati kamon mein hamaray qaideen ko PDP se kayi mushkilaat ka saamna karna prhrha tha. PDP aur BJP ney 2015 mein qiyam hukoomat ke liye ma baad intikhabaat mafahmat ki thi. ab dono partiyon mein darar ke baad governor raaj ka nifaz na guzeer hogaya hai. raat der gaye governor Mr. N N Vohra ney wizarat dakhla ko Jammu & Kashmir mein governor raaj ke nifaz ki sifarish paish rawana kar di hai. riyasat mein governor raaj ke nifaz ke liye usooli tor par Sadar jamhooria hind ki manzoori zurori hai. Sadar jamhooria Hind Mr. Ramnath Kovind Europe aur lateeni America ke dora par hain aur woh mangal ki shab Greece se Serinam ke liye parwaaz kar rahay they. wizarat dakhla ke aik ohdedar ney governor ki report ke masool hojane ki toseeq kar di hai. Mahbooba Mufti ney kaha ke hum ney Iqtidaar ke liye yeh ittehaad nahi kya tha. unhon ney apna maktoob istifa governor ko rawana kardiya aur un se kaha ke hum dosray kisi ittehaad ke liye koshan nahi hain. unhon ney kaha ke koi bhi Jammu & Kashmir ko dushman ka ilaqa nahi samajh sakta. yahan taaqat ki policy kamyaab nahi hosakti. Jammu & Kashmir hukoomat se achanak dast bardari par siyasi halqon mein usay saakh bachanay ki koshisho ke tor par dekha ja raha hai aur yeh bawar kya ja raha hai ke 2019 mein BJP ko apne difaa ke liye aik accha mauzo haath agaya hai. governor Mr. N N Vohra ke hathon mein aik baar phir Jammu & Kashmir ki Zimam hukoomat aa rahi hai. 81 sala governor 2008 mein apni taqarruri ke badse ab chouthi martaba riyasat chalayein ge. woh 25 June ko Jammu & Kashmir ke governor ki hesiyat se aik daha mukammal karen ge. woh 1959 se mukhtalif positions par rehtay hue 55 barson se malik ki khidmat karte chalay arhay hain. Jammu & Kashmir ke halaat se woh bakhoobi waaqif hain. Mr. vohra 2003 taa 2008 Kashmir mein hukoomat ke mazakraat car rahay hain aur tamam siyasi nuqta nazar ke haamil logon Bashmole kuch haami hurriyaat qaideen se bhi mulaqaat aur baat cheet ki
389.title: Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP ney PDP hukoomat ki tayeed se achanak dast bardari ikhtiyar karli

news_detail: Lucknow. Bain mazhabi shadi karne walay aik Couple ko jis ney Lucknowو mein passport ki darkhwast dair ki thi darkhwast ke istirdaad se qabal inhen aik Passport Officer ki taraf se tauheen aur be izzati ka saamna karna para. Couple ney baad azan mutawatar tweet paighamaat ke zareya markazi wazeer Sushma Swaraj aur daftar Wazeer e Azam ko apni ibtela se waaqif karwaya. Mohammad Anas Siddiqui jinhon ney Tanvi Saith se 2007 mein Lucknow mein shadi ki thi jinhein aik 6 sala ladki bhi hai, 19 jo noon ko dono ke passports ke liye darkhwasten dair ki theen aur Lucknowو mein 20 June ko Passport Office mein appointment haasil kya. appointment ke din Couple ney counter ae aur bi par ibtidayi do marhalon ki interviews ko paar karliye lekin counter si par mushkilaat paish aana shuru hogyin jahan darkhwast guzar ko officer se baat cheet karna parta hai. Anas ney baad azan sahafion ko bataya ”un ki ahliya ka number un se pehlay aayaavr jo n hi woh counter number c5 par pohnchain Vikas Mishra Nami ohdedar ney un ki dastawizaat ki jaanch partaal shuru kar di. jab unhon ney shareek hayaat ka naam Mohammad Anas Siddiqui padha woh un par cheekh para aur kaha ke inhen mujh se shadi nahi karna chahiye tha. meri biwi ro pari jis ke baad Mishra ney kaha ke inhen naam ki tabdeeli ke sath dastawizaat ko durust karlena chahiye.’ ‘ barham Anas Siddiqui ney jo Noida mein apni ahliya ke hamrah aik multi national companey mein kaam karte hain.” Meri biwi Tanvi ney kaha ke hum naam tabdeel karna nahi chahtay aur hamaray khandan ko hamaray naamon se koi takleef nahi hai, tab Passport Officer ney un se APO office jaaney ke liye kaha aur yeh ke woh fayil APO ko bhaij raha hai. Mishra ney is ke baad mujhe talabb kya aur meri tauheen karne laga. is ney kaha ke mujhe Hindu mat ikhtiyar karna hoga warna meri shadi tasleem nahi ki jaye gi. unhon ney mujhe se kaha’ aap ko phairay lainay hon ge aur hamara mazhab ikhtiyar karna hoga kiya tum aisa karogay?”’

Tanvi ney Sushma Swaraj ke mausooma apne tweet mein likha ”Hello Madam, mein yeh tweet Adal aur aap par be intahaa Aiqan aur sitam zarefana taur par apne dil mein gussa/gam aur karb ke sath type kar rahi hon is liye ke jis andaaz mein mujhe Ratan Square par Lucknow Passport Office par Mr. Vikas Mishra ki janib se sulooq kya gaya hai, mehez is liye ke mein ney aik musalman se shadi ki hai aur kabhi mera naam tabdeel nahi kya. is ney mujh se mere case par tabadlah karte hue intahi ukkhadpan se baat ki aur itna zor se cheekh rahay they ke dosray sun paye. mein ney is se qabal kabhi is terhan harasan nahi hui. office ke deegar workers un ke buray bhonday pan ki toseeq karte hain’’(manqool). is Couple ney Wazeer e Azam aur wazeer kharja mohtarma Sushma Swaraj se mudakhlat karte hue inhen passport faraham karne aur khaati ohdedar ke khilaaf karwai karne ka mutaliba kiya hai.
397.title: Passport Officer ney Hindu Muslim Couple ki darkhast mustarad kar di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Governor Madhya Pradesh Anandi Ben Patel ke mobayyana remarks par ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi mujarad hain, Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki bay-gana biwi Jashoda Ben ney numaya sarznish karte hue inhen Anandi Ben ke bayan par inhen taajjub sun-hwa. Jashoda Ben ney kaha ”Unhon ney Wazeer e Azam Hind ki Shabeeh ko majrooh kya hai. Woh mere liye nihayat qabil ehtram hain. woh mere liye Ram hain. yeh un ki tauheen hai.” Jashoda Ben aur Narendra Modi ki us waqt shadi hui thi jab woh dono nav umar they, lekin chand mah baad hi dono alahda rehne lagey. Is hafta Governor Madhya Pradesh Anandi Ben Patel aik virel video mein kehti nazar aa rahi hain ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi mujarad hain. Anandi Ben Patel jinhon ney Narendra Modi ke Wazeer e Azam Hind ban jaany par cheif minister gujrat ki hesiyat se janasheen bani theen, Madhya Pradesh ke Timarni mein aangan wari center par khitaab karte hue kaha ”aap jantay hain, nerinder bhai ghair shadi shuda hain, is ke bawajood woh zichgi ke baad aurat aur bacha ko honey wali takaleef se aagah hain, isi liye unhon ney khawateen ke liye kayi schemes roshnaas karwaen.” Jab woh khitaab kar rahi theen is waqt sahafi wahan mojood they. is ke jawab mein Wazeer e Azam ki alahda shuda biwi Jashoda Ben ney gujrate zabaan mein diye –apne bayan mein kaha ”Mujhe hairat hai ke Anandi Ben ney sahafion se kaha ke nerinder bhai mujara hain. unhon ney khud lock sabha intikhabaat 2014 mein lock sabha ke liye parcha namzadgi daakhil karte hue yeh halaf nama diya tha ke woh shadi shuda hain aur mera naam zikar kya tha. yeh aik aala taleem Yafta khatoon ( Anandi Ben ) ka aik teacher ( Jashoda Ben ) ke baray mein is terhan kehna Zaib nahi deta. yahi nahi un ke tarz amal ney Wazeer e Azam Hind ki Shabeeh ka majrooh kya. mein un ka bohat ehtram karti hain. woh mere liye Ram hain. Narendra Modi ke baradre nisbati Ashok Modi ney Telegraph akhbar se kaha ke ‘’Narendra Modi hanooz barsar e aamJashoda Ben ki himayat mein nahi aeye hain. Unhon ney kaha Video par abhi tak koi rad-e-amal nahi aaya hai. Na hi Wazeer e Azam aur na hi Anandi Ben ney meri behan se rabita kya hai. .. Jashoda Ben se Wazeer e Azam ney haliya arsa mein koi rabita nahi kya hai.” Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney 2014 intikhabaat ke halaf nama mein Jashoda Ben ko apni biwi qarar diya tha. interviews mein Jashoda Ben ney kaha ke hum ney 1960 mein shadi ki thi aur teen mah sath gzare they
433.title: Ben ba muqabla Ben. Ram hanooz khamosh
