news_detail: Wizarat e dakhla ney intibah jari kya hai ke Wazeer e Azam nerinder Modi ki jaan ko khatrah hai. un ki jaan ko ab taq se bara khatrah hai. wizarat dakhla ney tamam reyaston ke police sarbarahon ko maktoob likh kar aagah kiya hai ke Wazeer e Azam nerinder Modi ko na maloom khatrah la-haq ho gaya hai. qaumi salamti council ney Wazeer e Azam ki hifazat se mutaliq mukhtalif idaron ko bataya hai ke malik ki sab se barri siyasi jamaat ki qayadat chunkay Modi ke hathon mein hai isi liye 2019 ke aam intikhabaat ke liye woh sab se ahem hadaf hain, lehaza inhen ghair zurori naqal vhrkt, logon mein ghul mil jaany aur hujoom se door rehne ka mahswara diya gaya hai. wizarat dakhla ney Modi ki Security ke hawalay se naye zabita e ikhlaq jari kiye hain jin ke tehat kisi ko bhi Modi ke qareeb anay ki ijazat nahi hogi hatta ke special protikshn group (SPG) ki paishgi ijazat ke baghair ghair mutaliqa wazeer aur afsaraan bhi Modi ke intehai qareeb nahi aapayenge. samgha jata hai ke SPG ney Modi kojo hkmran BJP ke asal muhim chalanay walay hain, mahswara diya ke woh road shows mein kami kar dein jis se bara khatrah la-haq rehta hai. aik ohdedar ney bataya ke Wazeer e Azam se kaha gaya hai ke woh 2019 intikhabaat ki muhim mein rallies mein hissa lainay ki bajaye jalson se khitaab karen chunkay is mein hifazati intizamaa karna sahal hota hai. close protikshn team ( si pi tea ) ko Wazeer e Azam ki salamti ke naye qawaid se aagah kardiya gaya hai aur inhen la-haq khatrah ke baray mein aagah kardiya gaya. si pi tea se kaha gaya ke zaroorat parney par Wazeer e Azam ke qareeb anay walay wuzraa aur ohdedaron ki bhi jama talashi li jaye. Modi ki qareebi hifazati team ko bhi un ke aas paas ghair zurori insaan ki mojoodgi ka khayaal rakhnay ke liye khaas hadaayat jari kar di gayeen hain. guzashta mah sakht Security ke bawajood 1 shakhs Modi ke peeron ko chone mein kamyaab ho gaya tha, wizarat dakhla ka kehna hai ke Modi se awaami raabtey ko bhi mazeed kam karne ki zaroorat hai. Modi ke sath chalne wali kmandoz ki hifazati team ke arkaan ki tadaad mein izafah kya jaye ga. police ka kehna hai ke hum Wazeer e Azam ko hadaayat to nahi kar satke magar un se awaami masrofiyat ke baray mein thora mohtaat honay ki darkhwast zaroor ki hai. pauney police ki janib se Wazeer e Azam ko jaan se maardenay ki saazish se mutaliq adalat ko 7 June ko aagah kiye jaany ke baad Modi ki Security ka azsare nau jaiza liya gaya.
443.title: Modi ki jaan ko khatrah la-haq

news_detail: United Arab Emirates ke wazeer kharja Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed all nhyan ny dar-al-hakoomat nai Delhi mein Hindus ki Mandir Akshardham ki yatra ki hai. woh Bharat ke hafta taweel sarkari doray par hain. Mandir ki yatra ke douran mein Sheikh Abdullah ko is mein rakhay tareekhi assaar, Mandir ke fnِ taamer, riwayati Saqafat , munfarid art, Bharat ke tareekhi assaar aur kunda pathar se taamer kardah imarat ke khadd-o-khaal ke baray mein bataya gaya. UAE ki sarkari khabar-rasan agency vam ke mutabiq  wazeer kharja ney apne Mulk ki janib se doosri aqwam ke fanoon, tareekhi assaar aur tahzibon mein dilchaspi aur mukhtalif saqafaton aur mazahib ke darmyann rawadari aur pur aman baqaye bahami ke tasawwur ke farogh dainay ke azm ka izhaar kya. Hindus ke is tareekhi Mandir ke dora ke mauqa par nai Delhi mein tainaat United Arab Emirates ke safeer Dr. Ahmed Albanna bhi Sheikh Abdullah ke hamrah they.
460.title: Amarati wazeer kharja Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed ki nai Delhi mein Akshardham Mandir ki yatra

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Chief Ministerr Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ne Law Commission of India se aaj wazahat ki ke TRS, 2019 se mulk mein tamam reyaston ke liye bayak waqt assembly intikhabaat ke ineqad ke liye amaada hai. TRS Rukn Parliament Mr. B. Vinod Kumar ne aaj is mauaqqaf se Law Commission ko waaqif karwaya  ne is masla par Dehli mein tamam siyasi partiyon se un ki aaraa haasil karne aik ijlaas talabb kya tha. Baadazan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke TRS, mulk mein parlimani intikhabaat ke sath Riyasati Assemblion ke bayak waqt intikhabaat ke liye tayyar hai. unhon ne bataya ke is khsos mein Chief Ministerr Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ka aik maktoob election commission ke hawala kya hai. unhon ne kaha ke yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke riyasat mein qabal az waqt intikhabaat munaqqid ho saktay hain aur TRS kisi bhi waqt intikhabaat ka saamna karne tayyar hai jis se election commission ko bhi waaqif karwaya gaya hai. Mr. Vinod Kumar ne kaha ke mulk mein Parliament aur tamam Riyasati Assemblion ke liye bayak waqt intikhabaat munaqqid karne ke masla par mabahes kayi dahon se jari hai aur moodi hukoomat ya bi jay pi ne is masla ko abhi nahi cherra hai. Law Commission 1986 se is masla par tabadlah khayaal kar raha hai aur chand siyasi partiyan aur reastain yaksaa noiyat ke intikhabaat ke liye amaada nahi hain is liye ke un ki hukomatain mukhtalif waqton par muntakhib hoti rehti hain. unhon ne kaha ke Parliament aur Assemblion ke liye bayak waqt mushtarqa intikhabaat ka ineqad mufeed hoga markaz aur reyaston mein kaamil hukmarani yakeeni hogi aur waqt aur paison ki bachat hogi. do tlgo reyaston mein 2019 mein intikhabaat honay jarahay hain aur hamara khayaal hai ke doosri reastain bhi aisa hi karen. hatta ke moodi hukoomat ke daur mein bhi har saal kisi nah kisi riyasat mein intikhabaat hotay rahay. unhon ne kaha ke raqam aur waqt ki bachat ki barbadi se bachney tamam reyaston mein bayak waqt intikhabaat ki tajweez behtar hai
479.title: TRS, Parlimani o Riyasti Assemblion ke bayak waqt intikhabaat ke haq mein

news_detail: New Delhi: Bihar mein 2019 Lok Sabha aur Assembly intikhabaat mein BJP aur JDU ke darmiyan rassa kashi ki khabron ke darmiyan BJP ke Qaumi Sadar Amit Shah jumeraat ko Patna puhanche hain, jahan unhon ne wazeer aala Nitish ke sath nashta kya aur raat ko ashayih par bhi dobarah mulaqaat karen ge .

. Bihar mein BJP. JDU hukoomat ki tashkeel ke baad Amit Shah ki Nitish Kumar se yeh pehli mulaqaat ki hai. samjha jata hai ke is mulaqaat mein 2019 ke Lok Sabha wo Assembly intikhabaat mein nashiston ki taqseem par baat cheet karenge yani baday bhai aur chhotey bhai ke kirdaar ka faisla hoga. Nistish ne pehlay hi saaf kiya hai ke agar woh nashiston ke btware se mutmaen nahi hotay to agay sochen ge. Raat ka khana Nitish Kumar ki mojooda rahaish gaah 7 circular road par hoga. yahan bhi Bihar BJP ke kuch makhsoos qaideen maduo hain, lekin jahan tak nashiston ki taqseem par baat cheet ka maamla hai BJP aur JDU ke qaideen ka yeh maanna hai ke koi qatee faisla aik do nashiston mein karlena mumkin nahi hai. mulaqaat ke sath dono partiyon ke darmiyan nashiston ki taqseem par ghhor vkhoz shuru hojaye galikn kab taq Nitish Kumar ko un ki marzi mawafiq nashistain di jayen gi yeh sab kuch Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Amit Shah par inhisaar karta hai. BJP qaideen ka kehna hai ke qaumi Sadar pehlay apne party kaarkunon aur qaideen ke sath tabadlah khayaal karte hue party ki haqeeqi surathaal aur Nitish Kumar ke sath mafahmat ke baad ki surathaal ka jaiza len ge aur phir is baat ka intzaar kiya jaye ga ke JDU kitni nashiston par apna daawa paish karti hai. is waqt, Bihar ke bohat se rehnumao ka maanna hai ke Nitish ke saath mufahimat karna behtar hai. Agar Nitish NDA se alehadgi ikhtyar karte hain to azeem ittehaad ko is ka faida uthae ga.
499.title: Bihar mein hukoomat ke qiyam ke baad, Nitish Kumar. Amit Shah ki paheli mulaqat

news_detail: Panaji. Congress party ki Goa Unit ne kal Guinness World Records se mutalba kya ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke naam barri tadaad mein beron Mulk ke asfaar karne ka record darj kya jaye. maktoob mein kaha gaya ” hum Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ka naam tajweez karte hue khushi o musarrat mehsoos karte hain jinhon ne apni chaar sala meyaad ke douran 52 Mumalik ke 41 asfaar karte hue aalami record qaim kya hai.” Goa Congress ke tarjuman Sankalp Amonkar ki janib se likhe gaye maktoob ki naqal media ke hawala ki gayi. maktoob mein id-daa kya gaya ke Wazeer e Azam Modi ne –apne bairooni asfaar par 355, 30, 38, 465 rupay kharch kiye hain. maktoob mein kaha gaya ”Wazeer e Azam, Hindustan ki nai nasal ke liye Role Model ban chuke hain chunkay, duniya bhar ke Mumalik mein kisi bhi Mulk ke Wazeer e Azam ne bairooni Mumalik ka (is qader ziyada) daura nahi kya hai.” Maktoob mein bataya gaya ”hum aap ko aagah karna chahtay hain ke un ke daur mein Hindustani rupiya ki qader US dollar ke muqaabla ghat kar 69. 03 tak pahonch kar Hindustani Currency ko nihayat hi kamzoor aur Asia mein badtareen muzahira karne wali Currency banadiya hai. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Amonkar ne id-daa kya ke Wazeer e Azam ne Hindustan se ziyada waqt bairoon Mulk guzara hai.
514.title: Guinness World Records mein Modi ka naam register karne Goa Congress ka mutalba

news_detail: Dukhtran e  Millat ki sarbarah Asiya Andrabi aur deegar do ke khilaaf darj baghaawat ke muqadma mein pooch gach ke liye National Investigation Agency (NIA) ne jummay ke din Srinagar ke aik sahafi Auquib Javed ko Dehli talab kya hai. Agency ne sahafi ko hidayat di ke woh 15

July ko Dehli mein agency ke Headquarters mein haazir rahen. Auquib Javed aik accreditated jrnlst hain aur woh Kashmir aabzror ke liye kaam karte hain. NIA ne wizarat dakhla ki hiadaayat par Andrabi aur un ki tanzeem ke khilaaf jis par qanoon (insidaad) ghair qanooni sargarmian ke tehat imtina ayed kya gaya hai, Jaria saal April mein aik muqadma darj kya tha. f aayi are ke mutabiq markazi hukoomat ko yeh it-tila-aat masool huien ke Asiya Andrabi aur un ke saathi sufi Fahmida aur Nahida Nasrin ‘Dukhtran e  Millat’ ke naam par aik dehshat gard tanzeem chala rahi hain, jis ko qanoon (insidaad) ghair qanooni sargarmian ke pehlay schedule mein shaamil kya gaya hai. f aayi are mein ilzaam aed kya gaya ke woh mukhtalif media plate farms istemaal karte hue baghiana ithaam aur nafrat angaiz tqririn philarhe hain jo hndstan ki salmiyat, salamti aur Iqtidaar e aala ke liye khatrah hai. Dukhtran e  Millat, Asiya Andrabi ke zareya union of India se jammu vkshmir ki alhdgi ki khulay tor par waqalat karti hai aur jehaad karne aur hndstan ke khilaaf tashadud ka istemaal karne ki targheeb deti hai. is ke ilawa Andrabi aur un ki tanzeem par kayi ilzamaat aed kiye gaye hain. Jaria saal April mein jammu o Kashmir police ne barray pemana par muzahira karne aur ilaqa mein sangbaari karne ka mansoobah bananay ke ilzaam mein Asiya Andrabi ko annt naag se grftarkya tha. inhen adalat ki janib se zamanat Manzoor kardainay ke bawajood bhi raha nah karte hue inhen mukhtalif muqadmaat mein maakhoz kardiya gaya.
522.title: Asiya Andrabi baghaawat case: NIA ne Srinagar ke Reporter ko Dehli talab kya

news_detail: Ajmer: Pakistan mein intekhabat 2018 mein hissa lainay walay mukhtalif jamaaton ke umeed waar apni kamyabi ke liye dua karne Ajmer Khwaja Gareeb Nawaz ki Dargaah pahonch gaye. sabiq wazeer e azam Pakistan aur haliya intikhabaat mein Pakistan peoples party ke umeed waar Raja Parvez Ashraf samait muslim league (noon) aur deegar siyasi jamaaton ke umeed waar Ajmer shareef mein waqay Maroof sufi buzurag hazrat khwaja ghareeb nawaz ki dargaah puhanche, chadar charhai aur intikhabaat mein kamyabi ke liye dua ki. dargaah khwaja ghareeb Nawaz ke khadim syed bilal Chishti ka kehna tha ke sabiq wazeer e azam Raja Parvez Ashraf , Muslim League (noon) ke umeed waar syed Imran Shah walii aur deegar jamaaton ke umeed waar dargaah par haazri day chuke hain jab ke rozana ki bunyaad par darjanon umeedwaron ki mobile calls bhi masool horahee hain jin mein intikhab mein kamyabi ke liye dua karne aur chadaway chadhanay ki istada ki jati hai. Pakistan mein siyasat daano ka apni intikhabi muhim ka aaghaz sufi buzurgon ki drgahon par haazri ke sath karne ka rivaaj aam hai jab ke wazeer e azam aur saddar ke kaleedi aur ahem ohdon ke liye umeedwaron ko kisi sufi buzurag ka mutaqid hotay bhi dekha gaya hai. haal hi mein Pakistan mein tehreek insaaf ke sarbarah Imran Khan ne bhi apni ahliya bashri bi bi ke hamrah Punjab mein waqay sufi buzurag ki dargaah par haazri di thi jab ke maazi mein be nazeer bhto, Asif Ali Zardari aur Nawaz shareef ko bhi sufi buzurgon se dua karate dekha gaya hai.
531.title: Pakistani siyasatdaanon ki Dargah Ajmer Shareef par haazri

news_detail:
Hyderabad. Markazi Cabinet ney budh ko Ordinance manzoor karte huwe yaklakhth Triple Talaq (Talaq Biddah) ko mustawajib sazaye qaid kharar dete huwe Ordinance ko manzori dey di hai. Yaad rahay ke guzishta baras August mein Supreme Court ki aik paanch rukni bench ney Triple Talaq ko ghair dastoori qarar dete huwe markazi hukoomat ko hidayat di thi ke is ke tadaruk ke liye munasib qanoon saazi ki jaye, jis ke baad Modi hukoomat ney Lok Sabha mein iss khusoos mein bill ”Muslim khawateen (tahaffuz huqooq zojiat) 2017” paish karte huwe manzoori haasil karli thi taham Rajya Sabha mein khatir khawah aksariyat na honey ke baayis Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Marriage) Bill ko paish nahi kiya jaska tha. Bad azaan Union Cabinet ney is bill mein chand tarameem ko manzoor di thi. Iss Ordinance ke ahem khad o khhaal yeh hain ke agar koi bayak waqt Teen Talaq dey ga jis ke liye Adalat e Uzma ney Talaq  Bidda ki istelaah bhi istemaal ki hai to woh teen saal sazaye qaid ka mustawajib hoga. Triple Talaq ke khilaaf shikayat karne ka haq iss khatoon ko hoga jis ko Talaq di gayi hai ya phir iss ke khooni rishta daar ya phir woh afraad jo iss ke Nikah ke umoor se munsalik rahay thae. Isi tarha sirf khatoon ki imaa par hi masalihat wo mafahmat ki gunjaish rahay gi, iss ka matlab yeh hoga ke agar koi khatoon yeh shikayat kere ke usay Talaq Bidda dey di gayi hai magar shohar usay apnana bhi chahay to yeh isi waqt mumkin hoga agar shikayat kunindah khatoon bhi is par amaada ho. Isi tarha is Ordinance ki ru se Talaq Bidda ki shikayat par mulzim ko Police Station se zamanat nahi mil sakay gi. Magistrate ko hi zamanat dainey ka ikhtiyar hoga. Magistrate ke liye bhi yeh laazim ho ga ke zamanat manzoor karne se qabl shikayat kunindah khatoon ka moaqqaf bhi jaaney aur is ke istedlaal ki samaat kare. Triple Talaq se alahda honey walay jooday ki na baligh aulaad par Haq e Hisanat khatoon ka hoga yani na baaligh aulaad khatoon ki zair e parwarish diye jayen ge aur mulzim par iss khatoon aur is ke bachon ko naan wo nufqa ada karna hoga. Is Ordinance ka itlaaq Jammu & Kashmir par nahi hoga.
Wazeer e Qanoon Mr. Ravi Shankar Prasad ney aaj Delhi mein aik Press Conference mein iss Ordinance ki manzoori se waaqif karwatay huwe kaha ke Triple Talaq ke waqhiyat ki rok tham ke liye Ordinence ki manzoori aik dastoori ujlat thi chunkay January 2017 se September 2018 tak Triple Talaq ke 430 waqhiyat runuma ho chukay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke hum ney badi koshish ki thi ke is maslae par Congress ka sath le sakay magar Congress Party ney Vote Bank ke dabaaoo mein aakar is Bill ko Parliament mein ittefaq raaye se manzoori dilaney mein hukoomat ka sath nahi diya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke woh aur Mr. Anant Kumar ney is khusos mein Congress ke leader Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad se mutadid martaba baat karne ki koshish ki magar koi musbit radd-e-amal nahi aaya. Ordinance ki manzoori par Congress Party ney apne awaleen radd-e-amal par kaha ke Amnded Bill ney hamari tashweesh ko door nahi kiya hai ke kis tarha mutasirah khatoon ko naan wo nafqa ada kiya jaye ga jab Talaq dainey wala shohar jail bhaij diya jaye ga. Congress Leader Mr. Randeep Surjewala ney kaha ke hum ney tajweez paish ki thi ke shohar ki jayedad ko qurq (seize) karliya jaye lekin Modi hukoomat, Muslim khawateen ko insaaf dilaney mein dilchaspi nahi rakhti hai. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn e Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Ordinence par apna radd-e-amal zahir karte huwe kaha ke Narendra Modi hukoomat, Musalmanoon ko nishana banana chahti hai. Triple Talaq Ordinence ka masawaat se koi lena dena nahi hai. Yeh mughalita dainey hukoomat ka harba hai.
408.title: Triple Talaq ke khilaaf Ordinance manzoor

news_detail: Dr. Kafeel Khan ko aik baar phir giraftar karliya gaya hai. Kafeel Khan jinhein guzishta baras Gorakhpur ke sarkari Hospital mein Oxygen ki kami ke baayis sherkhawr bachon ki halakaton par giraftar kar liya tha Jaria saal zamanat par riha hue thay. Teen mah qabl un ke bhai par bhi jaan lewa hamla huwa tha. Police ne kaha ke Kafeel Khan ko District Hospital mein Doctors ke sath ulajhney aur mareezon ke ilaaj mein khalal paida karne ke ilzaam mein hafta ko giraftar karliya gaya hai. Kafeel ke bhai Adil Khan ne kaha ke un ke bhai riyasat mein dimaghi soozish ki alamaat se honay wali amwaat par Media Conference ko mukhatib karne ja rahay thay ke unhen giraftar karliya gaya hai. Suprintendent of Police Sabhraj Singh ne kaha ”Police ko it-tila-aat mausool hoyin ke aik fard Hospital mein daakhil huwa aur Hospital mein shareek mareezon ke ilaaj mein khalal daal raha hai. Woh Doctors ke saath ulajhney laga. Iss fard ko giraftar karliya gaya jis ne khud ki shanakht Kafeel Khan ke taur par kaarwaayi. Kafeel un 9 mulzimeen mein se aik hain jinhein August 2017 mein Baba Raghu Das Medical college mein Oxygen ki sarbarahi mein khlal ke baais chaar din mein 63 bachon ki amwaat ke silsila mein giraftar karliya gaya tha. Unhen November 2017 mein Uttar Pradesh Police ne giraftar kya tha aur April 2018 mein Allahabad High Court ne unhen zamanat par riha krdyatha. Dr. Kafeel Khan ke bhai Kashif Jameel par June mein naamaaloom hamla awaron ne golian chalaye theen taham woh is hamla mein baal baal bach gaye thay.
424.title: Dr. Kafeel Khan aik baar phir giraftar

news_detail: New Delhi. Duniya ki sab se badi jamhoriat mein siyasat ki tajreem ko ”Pareshan kun” qarar dete huwe Supreme Court ney Parliament se kaha ke iss laanat se nimatney iqdamaat waza kare. Supreme Court ney Parliament par chod diya ke mujremana ilzamaat ka saamna karne walay umeedwaron ko intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se baz rakha jaye ya phir unhen sirf isi soorat mein na ahel qarar diya jab unhen saza hojati hai. Adalat e Uzma mafaad aama ki darkhwaston ki samaat kar rahi thi jis mein yeh istedua ki gayi ke kisi fard ke khilaaf adalat ki janib se fard e jurm aayed kiye janey ke baad usay intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se na ahel qarar diya jaye. Chief Justice Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qiadat 5 rukni bench ney umeedwaron ko hidaayat di ke intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se qabal Election Commission ko apne mujremana pas e manzar se aagah kare. Chief Justice ney faisla sunaate huwe badunwani ko ”Qaumi iqtesadi daheshatgardi” qarar diya. Adalat ney siyasi partiyon aur umeedwaron se kaha ke hamaray jamhoori nizaam mein badhtay mujrimaana waqhiyat par rok laganey parcha namzadgi daakhil karne ke baad kam az kam teen martaba apne mujremana records ke baarey mein akhbarat aur Television Channels ke zariya aagah kare. Adalat ney kaha hai ke  shahrion ka yeh haq hai ke woh apne umeedwaron ke maazi ke baarey mein aagah rahay. Supreme Court ney siyasi partiyon ke liye yeh laazim kardiya ke apni Website par apne umeedwaron ke baarey mein tamam tafseelaat faraham kere. Iss ney yeh bhi hidaayat di ke siyasi umeedwaron ke baarey mein Print aur Electronic Media mein wasee tar tashheer ki jaye. Fi al-waqt sangeen juraim jaisay qatal, asmat raizi aur aghwaa ke ilzamaat mein saza paney walon ko intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se baaz rakha gaya hai. Mubahis ke douran Attorny General Mr. K.K Venugopal ney markazi hukoomat ki numaindagi karte huwe kaha ke qasoorwaar saabit honey aik fard ko masoom samgha janay ke nazriya ka hawala diya aur kaha ke aik fard ko aik party ticket par intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se mahroom karna iss ke haq e raaye dahi se inkaar hai jis mein muqaabla karne ka haq bhi shaamil hai. Darkhwaston par markazi hukoomat ki janib se mukhalifat karte huwe bayan diya ke yeh adalat ke dairakaar mein nahi hai ke woh na ahliat ke liye naye paimaney muqarrar kere.
436.title: Mujrimon ko siyasat se door rakhnay Parliament iqdaam kare: SC

news_detail: Dehli. Supreme Court ne aaj markazi hukoomat ke Aadhaar qanoon ke fawaid ki bohat sataish ki aur is ke dastoori juwaz ko bahaal rakha. Adalat e Uzma ne darkhwast guzaron ki tashweesh ko door kya ke Aadhaar card fard ki niji maloomat sab par ayaan ho jatay hain aur markaz se kaha ke jitna jald mumkin hosakay data ke tahaffuz ke liye sakht qanoon waza kare. Supreme Court ne ruling di ke khangi idaray Aadhaar ke liye israar nahi kar saktay aur yeh bhi kaha ke school mein dakhlon ke liye qaumi shanakhti number yakeeni taur par laazmi nahi hai. Chief Justice Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qayadat paanch rukni dastoori bench ke Justice Mr.  A K Sikri ne kaha ke samaaj ke nazar andaaz kardah tabqa ko Aadhaar card ba-ikhtiar banata hai aur  nhen shanakht dilaata hai. Aadhaar, deegar shanakhti sadaqatnaama se mukhtalif hai chunkay is ki naqal nahi ki ja sakti. unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke Aadhaar card aur shanakht ke darmiyan aik bunyadi farq hai. unhon ne kaha ke aik martaba biometric maloomat mehfooz karli jati hain to woh system mein hamesha mehfooz rehti hain. Justice Sikri ne yeh bhi kaha ke behtar honay se behtar munfarid hona achchca hai. Unhon ne kaha ke Aadhaar indraaj ke liye you aayi d ae aayi ki janib se khafeef aabadyati aur shehrion ka biometric data ekhatta kya jata hai aur kisi dosray fard ko muntaqil nahi hota. insani Waqar ka nazriya ko faisla mein tosiay andaaz mein bayan kya gaya. Chief Justice Misra, Justice A k Sikri, Justice A M Khanwelkar, D Y Chandarchod  aur Ashok Bhushan ne Aadhaar qanoon ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwaston ki samaat ki thi aur 38 dinon taq samaat ke baad 10
May ko apna faisla mehfooz kardiya tha .
455.title: Qanoon Aadhaar durust magar Mobile aur Bank se marboot karne ki zaroorat nahi

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Courtne aaj apne 1994 ki apni ruling par nazar sani karne se inkaar kardiya ke hukoomat woh zameen haasil kar sakti hai jis par Masjid taamer ki gayi. Apex Court ne iss waqt yeh ruling di thi ke namazain ya ibadaten kahin bhi ada ki ja sakti hain aur is ke liye aik Masjid zaroori nahi hai. Supreme Court ne is ruling ko wasee tar bench se rujoo karne se inkaar kardiya. Adalat e Uzma ne kaha ke agar yeh faisla kya jata hai ke faisla par nazarsani ki jaye to iss se Ayodhya tanaza muqadma ki samaat mein takheer ka shikaar hojaye gi jis ki samaat 29

October ko hogi. Supreme Courtne 1994 mein yeh kaha tha ke namaz kahin bhi ada ki ja sakti hai aur yeh ke aik Masjid iss ke liye zaroori nahi hai. Muslim fariqain ne kaha ke yeh faisla un ke liye ghair wajibi hai aur yeh ke yeh decades qadeem faisla Ayodhya mein mutanazia zameen mein kaleedi rule ada kare ga jise  2010 mein Alahabad High Court ki jaanib se teen hisson mein taqseem kardiya gaya tha. Adalat ul Aaliya ne is qaata e araazi ko jis par Babri Masjid khadi thi Hindu aur Muslim fareeqon mein baant diya tha aur asal hissa hndon ko day diya gaya. chay sadiiyon qadeem Babri Masjid ko 6 decemeber 1992 mein hndon ki mtshdd tanzeemon se talluq rakhnay walay hazaron Kaarsewak ne munhadim kardiya tha. Zameen ko teen hisson mein taqseem karne Alahabad High Court ke faisla ko Hindus aur Muslims ki janib se Supreme Courtmein challenge kiya gaya. Agar Adalat Uzma apni 1994 ki ruling par wasee tar bench par nazar sani ka faisla karti to Ayodhya mein Babri Masjid ki malkiat ke muqadma ki yaksoi mein takheer hojati aur brsraqtdar bi jay pi ko apne aik ahem intikhabi wada ki Adam takmeel par Hindus ke mtshdd groupon ke ataab ka saamna karna parta.
469.title: Supreme Court ka 1994 ki ruling par nazr e sani se inkaar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) ke sarbarah Mr. Sharad Pawar ke Rafale fighter aircrafts ki maamalat mein Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki himayat karne ke dosray din Party ke General Secretary Mr. Tariq Anwar ney party ki rukiniyat aur Kathiar Lok Sabha nashist se jummay ko istefa dey diya hai. Kathiar mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe aaj Mr. Tariq Anwar ney kaha ke Rafale ladaka tayyaron ki maamalat par National Democratic Analysis ( NDA) ke ikhtiyar kardah mouaqqaf ki taayeed mein Mr. Sharad Pawar ke bayan se unhen takleef pohanchi hai. Mr. Tariq Anwar ney kaha ”Mr. Sharad Pawar ney aik Marathi news Channel ko diye gaye interview mein kaha tha ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par Rafale maamalat par shuba nahi kiya ja sakta. mein bayan se ittefaq nahi karta. NCP ko deegar oppostion partiyon ke un ilzamaat ka saamna hai ke maazi mein is ney BJP ki madad karne ki koshish ki thi. Aik aisay waqt mein jab saari oppostion partiyan Rafale maamalat par aik Joint Parliamentary Committee ka mutalba kar rahi hain aur yeh aam ta assur paaya jata hai ke kuch na kuch badunwaniyan huwi hain aur NDA apne tajir doston ko madad karne ki koshish kar rahi hain, mein NCP ke moaqqaf ki himayat nahi karta. Iss liye mein ney party ke tamam ohdon ke sath sath Lok Sabha nashist se istefa dainey ka faisla kiya hai. Marathi News Channel ko diye gaye aik interview mein Sharad Pawar ney kaha tha ke awam ko Wazeer e Azam ke iraadon par koi shuba nahi hai taham wazeer e difaa Nirmala Sitharaman ki janib se Rafale maamalat mein paish kardah istadlaal ke nateeja mein awam ke zehnon mein uljan peda huwi hai.
482.title: Tariq Anwar ney NCP aur Lok Sbha se istefa dey diya

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ke aik tareekh saaz faisla mein riyasat Kerala ke Sabari Mala Mandir mein tamam Umar ki khawateen ko dakhila ki ijazat dey di gayi. Mulk mein kayi aisay Temples hain jin mein sadiyon se koi aurat daakhil nahi huwi hai. Un Mandiron mein Kerala ka mashhoor Mandir ‘Sabari Mala’ bhi shaamil tha. Supreme Court ney khawateen ke is Mandir mein dakhla par barson se aayed pabandi khatam kar di. Chief Justice of India Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qayadat paanch rukni aaeni bench ney is maamla par samaat ke ekhtetaam par 1

August ko mehfooz kiye gaye adalati faisla ko sunaya, jis mein adalat ney Mandir mein khawateen ke dakhilay par sadiyon se ayed pabandi ko khatam kardiya. Chief Justice ney faisla sunatay huwe kaha ke ibadat karne ka haq tamam aqeedat mandoon ko diya jata hai aur sanaf (gender) ki buniyaad par is mein koi tafreeq nahi ki ja sakti. Paanch jajon mein aik Judge ney faisla se ikhtelaaf kiya. Chief Justice aur Mr. Justice A.M Khanwelkar ney chaar jajon ka faisla tehreer kiya. Qabal azeen aisi aurtain jo 10 taa 50 baras Umar ki hoti hain aur jinhein haiz aata hai un par Mandir ke ihata mein daakhil honey par imtenaa tha. Yeh aqeedah hai ke Mandir mein jin ki Moorti aistaadah hai woh Ayyappa Barhamchari thae. Chief Justice ney faisla padh kar sunatay huwe kaha ke aurtain kisi bhi ayetbar se mardon se haqeer nahi hain. Aik taraf aurton ki deviyon ke taur par pooja ki jati hai lekin doosri taraf un par thedidaat aayed hain. Bhagwan se talluq ki tauzeeh hayatiati o jismani saakht ki buniyaad par nahi ki ja sakti. Chief Justice ney kaha kay muqaddas jagah par aurton par dakhila par pabandi jinsi tafreeq hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 10-50 baras ke group ki khawateen ko dakhila se rokay rakhnay ki riwayat ko laazmi mazhabi riwayat tasleem nahi kiya ja sakta. Aqeedat, tafreeq par mabni nahi hosakti. Bhakti mein masawaat par pidrana tasawwur ko thopa nahi ja sakta. Mazhab bunyadi taur par bhakti se marboot tarz e hayaat hai. Sabarimala ki riwayat Hindu khawateen ke huqooq ke khilaaf hai. Justice Chandrachud ney kaha ke khawateen ko rokay rakhna aazdi, Waqar aur masawaat ke haq ki khilaaf warzi hai. Khawateen ko mehez is liye mahroom rakhna ke inhen haiz aata hai bilkuliya ghair dastoori hai.
496.title: Sabari Mala mein khawateen daakhil hosaktin: S C

news_detail: New Delhi. Professor Varavara Rao ke khandan ke aik fard ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke qatal ke ilzaam mein paanch Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat se Supreme Court ke inkaar par tabsarah karte huwe usay badbaqtana aur ghair mutawaqqa qarar diya. Yeh paanch Activists inn dinon apne ghar par mahroos hain. Baen baazu ke qalamkaar ko guzishta mah Pune Police ney Hyderabad se girftar karliya tha jabkay Vernon Gonsalves aur Arun Ferreira ko Mumbai se, Trade Union Leader Mrs. Sudha Bhardwaj ko Faridabad, Haryana aur Civil Liberties leader Mr. Gautam Navlakha ko New Delhi se girftar karliya gaya tha, taham Supreme Court ki hidayat par unhen apne apne gharo par mahroos rakha gaya hai. Adalat e Uzma ney aaj Koregaon Bhima tashadud muqadma ke silsila mein paanch Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat karne se inkaar kar diya. Adalat ney kaarkunon ki fauri rihayi ki darkhwast ko bhi mustarad kar diya. Professor Varavara Rao ke nephew Venu Gopal Rao ney kaha ”yeh badbaqtana aur ghair mutawaqqa hai chunkay jis andaaz mein saari karwai chalayi gayi aur Judges ney jo rad-e-amal diya tha iss se hum yeh tawaqqu kar rahay thae ke muqadma kharij kardiya jaye ga. Adalat mein maan ghadat shawahid ke jhoot ka bhanda phoot jane ke bawajood aaj ka faisla hamari tawaquaat aur umidon ke khilaaf aaya hai.”Agarchay adalat ney madakhilat se inkaar kardiya taham is ney ghar par nazar bandi mein chaar hafton ki tausee kar di hai. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Professor Varavara Rao ki ahliya Hema Lata ney kaha ke hum is faisla ki tawaqqu nahi kar rahay thae. Mein aur Varavara Rao maamla ko adalat tak le jane par hamaray wukla ka shukriya ada karte hain. Adalat mein honey wali mubahis ke paish e nazar hum yeh tawaqqu kiye thea ke giraftari ka muqadma kharij kardiya jaye ga. Professor Varavara Rao ko 28
August ko Pune Police ney Hyderabad se girftar kiya tha taham 30

August ko Supreme Court ki Hidayat par inhen ghar par Mahruse rakha gaya hai. Mr. Vinu Gopal ney kaha ke Professor Varavara Rao aur deegar ke khilaaf darj muqadma ko barkhast karne Bombay High Court ya Hyderabad mein High Court se rujoo hon ge.
512.title: Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat nahin: SC

news_detail: New Delhi. Justice Ranjan Gogoi ney 46
Chief Justice of India ki haisiyat se ohda ka halaf liya. Woh Justice Deepak Misra ke janasheen hoon ge jo 1

October ko subukdosh huwe hain. Sadar e jamhooria Ram Nath Singh Koind ney Rashtrapati Bhavan mein Justice Gogoi ko ohda ka halaf dilaya. Wazeer e Azam Hind Narendra Modi, Speaker Lok Sabha Sumitra Mahajan, wazeer e dakhila Rajnath Singh, wazeer finance Arun Jetli, sabiq wuzraye azam Dr. Manmohan Singh aur HD Devegoda aur deegar Rashtrapati Bhavan ke Darbaar Hall mein munaqidah taqreeb mein shareek thay. 63 sala Justice Ranjan Gogoi shumal mashriqi khitta se talluq rakhney walay pahelay Chief justice of India hain. Woh is ohda par sirf 13 mah tak hi fayez rahen ge aur 17

November 2019 ko subukdosh ho jaien ge. Justice Gogoi naram go aur sakht judge ki haisiyat se jane jatay hain. Woh un chaar jajon mein shaamil thay jinhon ney Cheif Justice Misra par aik press conference mein tanqeed ki thi aur Supreme Court ke master of roster ke taur par cases ki Judges ko supurdagi mein apne role ka ghalat istemaal karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha. Justice  Gogoi 18
November 1954 ko paida huwe aur 1978 mein advocate ki haisiyat se apna indraaj karwaya tha. Unhon ney Gowhati High Court mein Constitution, Taxation aur Company Affirs  par practice ki thi. Inhen 28
Feb 2001 ko Gowhati High Court ka mustaqil judge muqarrar kiya tha aur 9
September 2010 ko un ka Punjab & Haryana High Court tabadlah kiya gaya tha. Justice Gogoi 12
Feb 2011 ko Punjab o Haryana High Court ke Chief Justice muqarrar kiye gaye aur 23
April 2012 ko Supreme Court ke judge ki haisiyat se taraqqi paye.
525.title: Justice Ranjan Gogoi 46th Chief Justice of India

news_detail: Lucknow- ” Ayushman Bharat ” scheme khat e iflaas se neechay zindagi busar karne walay khandano (Below Poverty) ke liye hai, iss se istifada karne walon ki fehrist mein Uttar Pardesh ke kaabini wazeer Satish Mahana aur un ke khandan ka naam bhi shaamil hai. Ittela milney par wazeer ney fehrist dekhney ke baad DM ko jaanch aur kaarwai ki hidayat di. Sab se badi sahat Bima Yojana ki shakal mein haal hi mein wazeer e azam Narendra Modi ney Ayushman Bharat Yujana shuru ki hai. Iss mein ghareeb gharanon ko Registered kar ke 5 lakh rupiye tak ke ilaaj ki sahoolat di jani hai. Ahliat ki mutadid sharayet hain. Un ke alawa 2011 ki BPL fehrist se bhi naam liye gaye hain magar mustahiqeen ke naamon ke intekhab mein abhi se jealsaazi shuru hogayi. Iss kaam se munsalik sarkari macinary apni marzi se logon ke naam shaamil kar rahi hai. Is ka khulasa khud wazeer Industrial Development Satish Mahana ney kiya. Darasal inhen ittela mili ke un ka aur un ke ahale khandan ka naam fehrist mein maujood hai. Iss par unhon ney DM Vijay Vishwas Pant ko phone aur khat tehreer kar ke wazeh kiya ke woh issss scheme ke mustahiq nahi, iss liye tarjeehi buniyad par unka naam hazaf karkay hajatmandon ke naam shaamil kiye jayen.
532.title: BPL ki list mein wazeer bhi shaamil

news_detail: Aqliat aur Aksariyat ki istelahaath mein baat na karne aur tamam tabqaat ki bulaa imtiaz taraqqi ka daawa karne wali BJP sarkar ke liye Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen o rukan parliment hyderabad Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ke aqliton aur Musalmanoon ke liye ab taq kiye gay iqdamaat ke baare mein pouchye jaany par nah sirf BJP camp chairag pa hai balkay bohat se Media Houses bhi juz buzz ho rahay hain. Barrister Asad Owaisi ke pouchye gay sawalaat par misbet mubahis karne se guraiz kyajarha hai. Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ny Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par yeh kehte hue tanqeed ki ke guzashta chaar barson mein un ki hukoomat ny aqliton aur Musalmanoon ke liye kuch nahi kya hai. Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ny kaha’ ‘ CRPF, CISF, ATBPs yeh tamam markazi hukoomat ke tehat hain, mein markaz ko challenge karta hon ke chaar barson ka data paish kere ke aqliton ki kitni bhartiya hui hain.”Unhon ny kaha ke Wazeer e Azam ka pandrah nukati programme takeedan bayan karta hai ke markazi hukoomat ki mlazmton mein aqliton ki shiraakat daari barhai jaye gi, is khsoos mein bohat thora hi kya gaya hai. BJP ki zair qayadat an d ae May 2014 hamza mein Iqtidaar mein aayi hai. CRPF, CISF, ATPB yeh sab markaz ke tehat hain. BJP chaar barson se mrkzmin Iqtidaar par hai. Wazeer e Azam barray zor se kehte hain ke woh aik haath mein quran Majeed aur dosray haath mein compooter dena chahtay hain, is liye bitayen ke guzashta chaar barson mein aap ny Musalmanoon ke liye kya kya hai. unhon ny istafsaar kya ke guzashta chaar barson mein markazi shoba ke tehat bankon, railway aur markazi neem fouji forces mein kitney aqliton ke taqarurrat kiye gay hain. Barrister Asad ny kaha ”aap wizarat Aqliati umoor ki Website dekhen jis mein bataya gaya ke kitney aqliton Bashmole musalman aur isaai ko mukhtalif sarkari mehakmon mein mulaazmaten mili hain. Website par 2013 taq ka data hai.’ ‘ unhon ny kaha ke hukoomat ko chahiye ke bankon, railway aur deegar markaz ke zair e intizam awaami shoba ke idaron mein taqarrurat kiye gay hain aur un mein kitney aqlitin hain. BJP ny aqliton ke liye kuch nahi kya aur mujhe hukoomat se sawal karne ka poora poora haq haasil hai
392.title: Mulazimaton mein Musalmanoon ke sath musawaat kyun nahi?

news_detail: NewDelhi . Narendra Modi Hukumat ke khilaaf Telugu Desam party ki paish kardah tehreek adam-etemaad par jummay ko mubahis hon ge. Aaj Parliament ke mansoon ijlaas ke pehlay din lunch waqfa ke baad jon hi lok sabha ke ijlaas ka aaghaz sun-hwa, speaker lok sabha mrs smtra mahajan ney kaha ”tehreek par jumma 20 July ko mubahis kiye jayen ge jis ke baad tehreek par raye dahi hogi.” Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke is din waqfa sawalaat nahi hon ge aur koi aur karwai nahi hogi siwaye tehreek adam-etemaad par mubahis ke. Waqfa sifar ke douran mrs mahajan ney Telugu Desam, Congress aur Nationalist Congress Party ke tamam arkaan aur deegar tamam ka naam liya jinhon ney mumasil tehreek adam-etemaad paish kiye they. speaker ney Parliament ke budget session ke douran aisay hi tehreek ko qubool nahi kya tha jis par Telugu Desam Party, Telangana Rashtra Samithi aur deegar Opposition Parties ney mutawatar shore o ghul bapaa kardiya tha. Tehreek ko is bunyaad par mustard kardiya tha ke mukhtalif mauzuaat par mutawatar ehtejajon ke bayis ewaan ki karwai nahi chalaye ja sakti. oppostion partiyon ney aandhra pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf, haugume tashadud, khawateen o Daliton ke khilaaf mzalm aur darj fehrist aqwam ke liye qanoon ko kamzor karne jaisay mozuaat par hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam-etemaad pesh ki thi. Speaker ney kaha ke 50 se zayed arkaan tehreek ki taied karte hain is liye tehreek Adam-etemaad paish karne ki ijazat di jati hai
414.title: Modi hukoomat ke khilaaf Tehreek adam-etemaad par jummay ko mubahis

news_detail: Narendra Modi naay chaar saal Iqtidaar mein rehne ke baad Telugu Desam Party aur deegar partiyon ki janib se paish kardah tehreek adam etemaad ku arram se shikast dainay mein kamyaab hochuki hai. Din bhar jari mubahis ke baad hui raye dahi mein tehreek adam etemaad ki tayeed mein 126 vote daaley gaye jabkay mukhalfat mein 325 vote daaley gaye. 451 rukni ewaan mein tehreek adam etemaad ko shikast dainay ke liye bar sar e Iqtidaar BJP ko 226 vote darkaar they. Navin Patnaik ki BJD, Telangana ki bar sar e iqteadar TRS aur BJP ki haleef Shiv Sena ney raye dahi mein hissa nahi liya. Tamilnadu ki bar sar e iqtedaar AIADMK ney hukoomat ki tayeed mein vote diya. Raye dahi mein cross voting nahi hui.
Tehreek adam etemaad aik rukn Lok Sabha paish karsaktha hai agr woh samjhta hai ke maujuda Hukumat aiwaan mein aksariyat se mahroom hogayi hai
Yeh tehreek Rajya Sabha mein paish nahi ki ja sakti
tehreek adam etemaad paish karne rukan Lok Sabha ko wajoh paish karne ki zaroorat nahi
Speaker Lok Sabha ki janib se tehreek ko qubool karne ke liye kam az kam 50 arkaan ki tayeed zaroori hai
Hukumat ko aiwaan Lok Sabha mein raye dahi mein apni aksariyat saabit karna padta hai basurat e deegar usay mustafi hona padta hai
Azaadi ke baad se ab tak 27 tahrikaat adam etemaad paish kiye ja chukay hain
India- china jung ke fauri baad Acharia Kriplani ney augst 1963 mein pehli tehreek adam etemaad paish ki thi
indra gandhi ney sab se ziyada 15 Tehreekaat e adam etemaad ka saamna kya
Lal Bahadur Shastri aur Narsimha Rao ney teen martaba, Murarji Desai ney do martaba aur Jawahrlal Nehru, Rajiv Gandhi aur Atal Bihari Vajpayee ney aik aik martaba is tehreek ka musbet saamna kya hai
Vajpayee ney Iqtidaar sanbhalne ke baad ewaan mein tehreek etemaad paish karte hue aik vote se haar gaye thay
tamam tehreekaat adam etemaad ko shikast ka saamna karna pada siwaye Murarji  Desai ke khilaaf paish kardah tehreek ke-Unhon ney July 1979 mein tehreek par mubahis ke douran istifa day diya tha
Is se qabal aakhri martaba tehreek adam etemaad 15 baras qabal Vajpayee hukoomat ke khilaaf paish ki gayi thi
teen tehreekaat adam etemaad ke baayes Hukomatain zawaal Pazeer hui theen .
vajpayee hukoomat ke khilaaf 1999 Sonia gandhi ki Tehreek adam etemaad par Vajpayee hukoomat aik vote ke baayes shikast khagyi
H D Deveguda hukoomat ke khilaaf 1997 mein Congress ki tayeed wapas le lainay ke baayes 10 mah ki hukoomat girgaee thi
V P Singh hukoomat 1990 mein tehreek adam etemaad ki hiddat ka saamna ki thi aur 10 November 1990 ko tehreek adam etemaad mein shikast khagyi
430.title: Modi Hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam etemaad ko shikast

news_detail: Telangana ko Hindustan mein behtareen hukmarani wali riyasaton mein teesra muqaam haasil huwa hai. Think Tank Public Affairs Centre (PAC) ke jari kardah awaami umoor Asharia 2018 mein Kerala ko 2016 se mutawatir teesray baras Mulk ki behtareen nazam o nasq wali riyasat ka muqaam ataa kya hai. paanch sarkardah badi riyasaton mein Tamilnadu, Telangana, Karnataka aur Gujarat riyasaton ka number aata hai jo behtareen nazam o nasq faraham karti hain. Maliyati intizam, iqtisadi azadi, shfafiat aur jawab dahi mein Telangana sarkardah paanch riyasaton mein shaamil hai. Report ke mutabiq Madhya Pradesh, Jharkand aur Bihar fehrist mein sab se neechay hain jahan samaji aur muashi adam-musawaat bahut ziyada paye jatay hain. Asharia, riyasaton mein nazam o nasq ki karkardagi ka data base framework ke zareya tajzia karta hai, samaji o muashi taraqqi woh kis terhan faraham karte hain is ki darjaa bandi karta hai. Riyasaton ki darjaa bandi abadi ke aitbaar se do zumron badi aur chuuti Riyasaton ke taur par ki gayi hai. Jin riyasaton ki abadi do crores se zayed hai inhen badi riyasaton mein shumaar kya gaya hai. Choti Riyasaton ke zumre mein behtareen nazam o nasq faraham karne wali Riyasaton mein Himachal Pradesh sare fehrist hai jis ke baad Goa, Mizoram, Sikkim aur Tripura ka number aata hai jabkay Nagaland, Manipur aur Meghalaya is fehrist mein sab se neechay atay hain.
448.title: Hindustan mein behtareen hukmarani wali riyasaton mein Telangana ko teesra muqaam

news_detail: New Delhi. Mulk mein saal 2017 mein 822 firqa waranah tashadud ke waqeat mein 111 afraad halaak hogaye. Markazi Mamlakati wazeer e Dakhla must Hansraj Gangaram Ahir ney aaj Rajya Sabha ko bataya ke 2016 mein is terha ke 703 waqeat mein 86 aur 2015 mein 751 waqeat mein 97 logon ney apni jaanen ganwayen hain. Mamlakati Wazeer e Dakhla ney tehreeri jawab mein kaha ke law and order, aman o zabt aur firqa waranah hum ahangi ki barqarari aur khation ke khilaaf karwai ki bunyadi zimmadaari reyasti hukoomaton aur markaz ke zair e intizam ilaaqon par aed hoti hai. unhon ny kaha ke Mulk mein firqa waranah hum ahangi ki barqarari ke liye markazi hukoomat mukhtalif tareeqon jaisay antli jins it-tila-aat ki farahmi, intibahi payamaat aur ahem tabdeelion par waqtan foqtan mashwaron ke zareya reyasti hukoomaton ki muawnat karti hai.
468.title: Mulk mein guzashta baras firqa waranah tashadud mein 111 afraad halaak

news_detail: DMK sarbarah o sabiq Chief Minister Tamilnadu mister am Karunanidhi ki haalat ab mustahkam hai. hospital intizamia ne kaha ke un ki haalat mein behtari aayi hai. DMK sarbarah ki haalat bigad jaanie ki khabar aam hotay hi hazaron haami Kauvery hospital ke atraaf jama hogaye thay. raat der gaye jari kardah blitn mein hasptl ne kaha ke un ki haalat mustahkam hai. un ki haalat mein behtari ko hospital intizamia ne ”transient setback” (waqtia bigaad) qarar diya. qabal azeen mossola ittila mein bataya gaya tha ke bemaar DMK sarbarah Karunanidhi ki sorat e haal aaj shaam achanak baggar gayi jis ke baais Chief Minister E.  Palaniswami ne apna daura Koimabtore mukhtasir karkay Chennai ke liye rawana hogaye hain. Karunanidhi ke arkaan khandan is hospital mein maujood hain jahan inhen jummay ke din shareek karwaya gaya tha. un ke haami hospital ke atraaf jama ho chukay hain. Tamilnadu ke 5 martaba Chief Minister rehne walay 95 sala Karunanidhi ko do din qabal shareek hospital karwanay ke baad pehli martaba dekha gaya tha jab un ki party aaj subah tasweer jari ki thi. Karunanidhi ko pishaab ki naali mein infection hochuka tha. Naib Sadar Jamhooria Hind Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ne aaj Kauvery hasptl pahonch kar un ki ayadat ki. hospital ki janib se kal jari kardah bayan mein kaha gaya tha ke un ka blood pressure mustahkam hai aur yeh ke un ki sehat par kari nazar rakhi gayi hai. woh guzashta aik baras se woh manzar aam par nahi arhay thay siwaye is ke ikka daka waqt party daftar pahunchte thay. woh kabhi kabhar apni ghar ke bahar aakar apne hamion ko haath lahrakar apna deedar kara diya karte thay
480.title: DMK sarbarah Karunanidhi ki haalat ab mustahkam

news_detail: New Delhi. Assam ney peer National Register of Citizens ka qatayee mussavidah jari karte hue jumla 3. 29 crore darkhwast gzaron mein 2, 89, 83, 677 afraad ko ahal qarar diya hai. is ka matlab yeh huwa ke 40-41 lakhs Assamyon ko takneeki taur par Hindustani tasleem karna band kardiya jaye ga. Coordinataur Sailesh jinhon ney qatayee mussavidah jari kya is baat par zor diya ke ‘yeh sirf aik mussavidah hai aur qatayee fehrist nahi hai, jin logon ko shaamil nahi kya gaya hai woh apna id-daa aur aitraaz daakhil kar saktay hain.’ Unhon ney kaha ke qatayee mussavidah par id-daa aur aitraaz ka amal 30
augst se shuru kya jaye ga aur 28

September tak jari rahay ga. Awam ko aitrazaat ke liye khatir khuwa aur munasib mauqa faraham kya jaye ga. kisi bhi haqeeqi Hindustani ko kisi qisam ka khauf karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. sarhadi riyasat Assam mein kayi dahun se shehrion ko apni shahriat saabit karne ka masla darpaish hai, chunkay mutawatir hukoomaton ka yeh id-daa raha hai ke riyasat mein padosi Mulk Bangladesh se ghair qanooni taur par dar aney walay Assam mein qiyam karte hue khud ko Hindustani saabit karne koshan rehtay hain jabkay Bangla zabaan bolney walay Assamyon ka yeh id-daa hai ke woh Bangladesh ke nahi balkay Hindustani riyasat maghribi bangal se naqal makani karte hue yahan dahun se muqeem hain. Yaad rahay ke shahriat se mahroom kar diye jaane walon mein aik badi tadaad Musalmanoon ki hai jin ki maadri zabaan Bangla hai. Assam Mulk ki wahid riyasat hai jahan apne shehrion ki Qaumiat ka Register hota hai. Assam mein rehne walay beshtar Musalmanoon ko yeh kehte hue Hindustani shehri tasleem karne se inkaar kardiya jata hai ke woh padosi Mulk Bangladesh se ghair qanooni taur par dar aeye hain. Kuch logon ka yeh khayaal hai ke woh ghair majaz taur par raye dahi mein hissa letay hain aur riyasat ki abadi ki haiyat tabdeel kardete hain. Shehrion ke Qaumi Register mein apne naam ke indraaj ke liye Assamyon ko yeh dastawizi suboot faraham karna padta hai ke un ka khandan Assam mein 24 March 1971 se muqeem hai, is tareekh ke dosray din Bangladesh ki azadi ki jung ka aaghaz huwa tha. Yeh jung 16
December 1971 ko khatam hui jis ke baad Bangladesh ka sarkari taur par wajood amal mein aaya tha. Taham Sheikh Mujeeb ur Rehman ney usi saal 24

March ko Bangladesh ke aik azad Mumlikat honey ka elaan kya tha, tab Bangladesh ilaqa ke jo is waqt Mashriqi Pakistan kehlata tha wahan ke makeeno ney Maghribi Pakistan ke khilaaf guerrilla  jad-o-jehad ka aaghaz kya tha. Isi liye NRC ney 24

March 1971 ki neem shab ki tareekh ko paimana baneya hai. Yeh id-daa kya jata hai ke is guerilla jad-o-jehad ke douran hazaron Bangladeshi naqal makani karte hue ghair qanooni taur par Assam mein daakhil hogaye they. Pahela NRC 1951 mein tayyar kya gaya tha, us saal mardum shumari ke mutabiq Assam ki abadi 80 lakhs hi thi. Riyasti Hukoomat, Markazi Hukoomat aur ba asar all Assam Students Union( AASU) ke mabain 2005 ke aik seh fariqi moahida ki muwafiqat mein 1951 ke NRC ko up date kya ja raha hai. moahida 1985 Assam Moahida par amal daraamad ke amal ka hissa hai. is ke baad NRC ko update kiye jaane ka amal shuru huwa tha taham Riyasat ke kayi maqamat par tashadud phoot padney par rok diya gaya tha. Is ke baad 2009 mein aik NGO Assam Public Works (APW) ney Supreme Court mein aik marafa daakhil karte hue riyasat mein ghair mulkion khaas kar Bangladeshion ki nishandahi ki isttedua ki, nateeja mein Supreme Court is masla mein shaamil hui aur NRC par nazr e sani ka aaghaz huwa. Yeh teen barson ka process raha hai. Process ke aaghaz par zayed az 3.29 crores awam ney apni shahriat saabit karne ke liye dastawizaat daakhil kiye. NRC ke pehlay mussavidah mein jo guzashta baras December mein jari kya gaya tha 1.9 crores logon ko shaamil kya gaya tha. NRC ki qatayee fehrist 30

June ko jari kar di gayi hai jis mein 3.29 crores darkhwast guzaron ke minjumala 2.89 crores logon ko shaamil kya gaya hai jabkay taqriban 41 lakhs logon ki shahriat tasleem nahi ki gayi. Riyasat mein qatayee mussavidah ki ajrayi ke baad peda shuda surathaal se nimatney ke liye Central Forces ki bhaari jamiat ko tainaat kardiya gaya hai.

Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Banerjee ney NRC ke qatayee mussavidah mein takreeban 40 lakhs Bangla zabaan bolney walay shehrion ki shahriat tasleem na karne par shadeed radd-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha kay Markazi hukoomat is mussavidah ki aad mein apne agenda ko agay badhaane mein jutti hui hai. Qatayee mussavidah ki ijrayi par aaj Parliament mein Mamta Banerjee ki Party Trinamul Congress ke arkaan ney zabardast hungama aarai ki hai. Unhon ney kaha ke woh Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se kehna chahti hon ke awam ko bachayen, inhen tanha nah chore den. Ms. Mamata Banerjee ney kaha ke inhen aziat rasani ka dar hai, log apne hi Mulk mein Panah-Gazeen ban kar reh jayen ge. Yeh takseem karo hukoomat karo ki policy hai. Awam ko yaka o tanha kya ja raha hai. .. yeh insaaniyat ko tabah kardey gi. Unhon ney kaha ke woh shakhsi taur par is masla ko Wazeer e Azam se rujoo kere gi. Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke itna bada qadam uthany se qabal hukoomat ko Maghribi Bengal hukoomat se tabadlah khayaal nahi karna chahiye?

Markazi Wazeer e Dakhla Mr. Rajnath Singh ney NRC ke qatayee mussavidah ki ijrayi mein 40 lakhs afraad ke naamon ki adam-shumoliat par honey walay aitrazaat ke radd-e-amal mein kaha ke kisi ko abhi ghabraney ki zaroorat nahi hai chunkay yeh qatayee fehrist nahi hai. Jin afraad ka naam is mussavidah mein shaamil nahi kya gaya hai unhen apna muaqqaf paish karne ka mauqa faraham kya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke is ko siyasi masla banaya ja raha hai. Unhon ney kaha ke kuch log ghair zurori taur par khauf o hraas phelaney ki koshish kar rahay hain.
497.title: Assam ney qatayee NRC mussavidah jari kardiya. 40 lakhs ki shahriat ko khatrah

news_detail: Aamir Khan ne aik niji TV ko interview dete hue bataya ‘woh Pakistan nahi jarahay aur unhen PTI se Imran Khan ki halaf bardari ki taqreeb mein shirkat ka koi dawat nama mausool nahi huwa.’ Guzashta roz Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf ke tarjuman Fawad Chowdry ne kaha tha ke mutawaqqa Wazir e Azam ki halaf bardari ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye un ki jamaat ne Aamir Khan , Kapil Dev, Sunil Gawaskar samait kayi naamwar shaksiaat ko dawat naame bhaij diye hain jabkay Aamir Khan ka kehna hai ke inhen PTI ki taraf se Pakistan aanay ka koi dawat nama ta haal mausool nahi huwa hai. Tawaqqa hai ke Imran Khan 11

August ko Pakistan ke Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf lenge. Aik niji Channel ‘News 18’ ne twitter par aik post share karte hue bataya ke adakar Aamir Khan ko dawat nama nahi mila, Woh Pakistan nahi jarahay. Channel ke mutabiq Aamir Khan ne kaha ke agar is marhala par unhen dawat nama mausool bhi hota hai to woh Pakistan jane se qassar rahen ge chunkay woh in dinon bahut ziyada masroof hain
— I am not going to Pakistan. Haven't received an invitation for
's swearing-in:
tells News18 |
— News18 (@CNNnews18)

Wazeh rahay ke aaj se taqriban 6 saal qabal Imran Khan ne yahan Hindustan mein aik taqreeb mein maheman e khusoosi ki hesiyat se shirkat ki thi jahan Pakistani gulukar Ali Zafar aur Aamir Khan bhi maujood thay, taqreeb ke maizban ne Aamir Khan se Imran Khan ke mutaliq apni raye ka izhaar karne ko kaha to Aamir Khan ne sab se pehlay Imran Khan ki tareef ki aur kaha aap ne tamam salawon ka bohat achay tareeqa se jawab diya. Is ke alawa Aamir Khan ne un ke junoon aur jazbah ki bhi tareef ki aur sath hi dua dete hue kaha tha ke Pakistan mein aisi hukoomat aeye jo waqai Pakistan ke masail hal kar sakay aur jo Pakistan mein khushhali laaye. yeh nah sirf Pakistan ke liye achaa hoga balkay hamaray liye bhi achaa hoga. Aakhir mein Imran Khan ne Aamir Khan ko 2013 ke election se qabal Pakistan aanay ki dawat di jis par Aamir Khan ne kaha kay jab aap election jiiten ge to mein aap ki jeet ka jashnn mananay Pakistan aon ga aur akela nahi balkay bohat saaray Hindustanion ko saath le kar aoanga. Pakistan Tehreek Insaaf ke Chairman aur mutawaqqa Wazeer e Azam Imran Khan 2013 ke election mein kamyaab nah hosakay, unhon ne himmat na harte hue mazeed jad-o-jehad ki aur saal 2018 ke intikhabaat mein jeet un ki hui jis par Pakistani gulukar o  adaakar Ali Zafar ne tweet ke zareya Aamir Khan ko unka wada yaad karaate hue kaha ke aap ke Pakistan aaney ka wada poora karne ka waqt agaya hai.
517.title: Aamir Khan, Pakistan nahi jayenge

news_detail: Chennai. DMK sarguru  94 sala M Karunanidhi m. Karunanidhi ka aaj shaM chinayi ke Kauveri Hospital mein dehant hogaya. Unhon ney 5 martaba Tamilnadu ke Chief Minister ki hesiyat se khidmaat anjaam di aur 6 dahun tak Tamilnadu ki siyasat par chaaye rahay. Woh apne sakht tareen mukhalif M G Ramchandran aur un ke baad Jaya Lalitha se hamesha nabrid aazma rahay. M Karunanidhi ko 18 July ko Trachea Tube  ki tabdeeli ke liye Hospital mein shareek kya gaya. 28

July ko blood pressure mein kami ke baayis dubarah shareek e Hospital kiya gaya tha.Woh guzishta aik baras se kabhi Hospital mein to kabhi bahar rah rahay they. Aik saal se ziyada woh awaMi progrMmes se door hi rehne lagey they. kabhi kabhar woh party ke daftar pahonch jaya karte they ya phir apne ghar ke oopar bahar nikal kar apne hMion ko haath lehra kar apna deedar krwadya karte they. Kal shab hi yeh khabar aagai thi ke un ki haalat bigadney lagi hai tahM aaj subah Karunanidhi ke arkaan e khandan aur Hospital walon ney kaha tha ke un ki haalat mein sudhaar araha hai. un ki sahet bigad jaane ki khabar aM hotay hi un ke hazaron madah Kauvery Hospital ke bahar jMa hona shuru hogaye they. HMion ko muntashir karne Police ko halki si taaqat ka istemaal bhi karna pada.

Karunanidhi siyasat mein qadM rakhnay se qabal M G RMchandran aur Jaya Lalitha ki terha filmi duniya se wabista thaiy aur Periyar EVR ki zair e qayadat Dravidian tehreek ke liye khud ko waqf kardiya tha. DMK nazriya saaz CN Anadurai ke faut hojane ke baad M Karunanidhi 1969 mein Chief Minister banay. Teen saal baad M G Ramchandran se un ki un ban hogayi aur unhon ney aakhir uz zikr qaayed ko Party se nikaal diya, jis par Ramchandran ney All India Anna Dravida Manitra Khazagamur ( AIADMK ) ki binaa daaltay hue zindagi bhar Karunanidhi se siyasi taur par nabrid aazma rahay. Un ke baad Jaya Lalitha bhi Karunanidhi ke khilaaf zindagi bhar ladte rahen. AIADMK 1977 mein Iqtidaar mein aagai aur Ramchandran ney apni hayaat mein DMK ko intikhabi kamyabi haasil honay nahi di. M G R ki mout ke baad Karunanidhi 1989 mein dobarah Iqtidaar haasil kya taham Rajiv Gandhi ki jazbati halakat ke baad inhen Iqtidaar se be dakhal kardiya gaya chunkay yeh ta-assur tha ke Rajiv Gandhi ka qatal karne wali Lankan tanzeem LTTE ke sath un ke qareebi rawabit rahay hainJaya K Lalitha par bdanwanyon ke sangeen ilzamat ke baad woh dubarah 1996 mein Iqtidaar mein lout aeye they. Is terha kabhi woh Iqtidaar mein hotay to kabhi un ki badtareen hareef Jaya Lalitha Iqtidaar mein hoteen. M Karunanidhi ki mout par Sadar Jamhooria Hind Mr. Ram Nath Kovind, Wazeer e Aazam Mr. Narendra Modi, Congress sarbarah Sonia Gandhi aur Sadar Rahul Gandhi ke alawa mukhtalif riyaston ke wuzraye aala ney apne ranj o ghM ka izhaar kya.
524.title: ‘DMK’ ke Sargruh M Karunanidhi ka dehant

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi High Court ne aaj aik darkhwast ko mustard krdyajs mein 2010 mein aik qaumi shahrah ki tausee ke liye National Highway Authority of India ko sarkari arazi ki farokhtgi se Chief Minister Rajasthan Vasundhara Raje aur un ke farzand ko mobayyana taur par 1.97 crores rupay muaweza ke husool ke khilaaf FIR ke indraaj aur CBI ke zareya tehqiqaat ka mutalba kiya gaya tha. Justice R K Gauba neh darkhwast ko mustard kardiya jis mein khusoosi CBI adalat ke 18 April 2015 ke faisla ko bhi challenge kya gaya tha. Zaireen adalat ne Ms Vasundhara Raje aur un ke farzand ke khilaaf ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat ka hukum dainay se yeh kehte hue inkaar kardiya tha ke qanoon insidaad rishwat satani ke tehat paishgi ijazat haasil nahi ki gayi. Rajasthan ke aik vakeel ne yeh muqadma daayer kya tha. Vakeel Srijana Shrestha ki darkhwast ke bamawajib Raje, 2010 mein jab yeh mobayyana maamla paish aayatha us waqt awaami mulazmeen nahi thay aur Rajasthan riyasti assembly mein Qaayed Oppostion thein. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya ke Ms Raje aur un ke farzand ne Dholpur town mein Dholpur Palace se mut-tasil 567 murabba meter qaata arazi ki malkiat ka daawa kya aur National Highway Authority of India ko 1.97 crores rupay mein farokht kardiya jis se sarkari khazana ko khasara huwa.
533.title: Vasundhara Raje ke khilaaf FIR ke liye darkhwast kharij

news_detail: New Delhi- BJP ke qaumi saddar mister Amit Shah 2019 intikhabaat ke zimn mein party ki ‘tayeed ke liye rabita’ muhim ke hissa ke tor par kal Mumbai mein Shiv Sena sarbarah mister Uddhav Thacekray ki rahaish gaah’ ‘ Matoshree’ ‘ poanch kar mulaqaat karen ge. Amit Shah ki is mulaqaat ko sayasi halqon mein BJP ki darina Haleef party magar sakht Naqid party Shiv Sena ke sath kasheeda taluqaat ko Khushgawar taluqaat mein tabdeel karne ki koshish ke tor par dekha ja raha hai. yaad rahay ke dono partiyon ke darmain dooria is qader barh gayi theen ke haliya zimni intikhabaat mein Maharashtra mein dono partiyon ne aik dosray ke khilaaf –apne umeedwaar maidan mein utaarey they aur Shiv Sena ki shikast ke baad party ne BJP ko apni sab se barri siyasi dushman party qarar diya tha. Sanjay Raut ne khabar-rasan agency PTI ko bataya ke Amit Shah ne Uddhav jee se mulaqaat ke liye waqt talabb kya tha jis par inhen kal shaam mulaqaat ka waqt diya gaya. yeh dono qaideen taqreeban aik saal ke waqfa ke baad mulaqaat karen ge. mister Amit Shah ne guzashta saal June mein mister Thacekray se BJP ke sadaarti umeed waar Ramnath Kovind ki tayeed talabb karne mulaqaat ki thi. BJP sarbarah mister Amit Shah ‘Sampark for Smarthan’ muhim ke hissa ke tor par Uddhav Thacekray ki rahaish gaah’ Matoshree’ par shaam 6 : 00 bajey mulaqaat karen ge. 2014 mein Maharashtra mein BJP aur shyosina ki makhloot hukoomat ki tashkeel ke kuch hi arsa baad dono partiyon mein ikhtilafat ubhar kar aagaye they aur mister Uddhav Thacekray BJP aur Wazeer e Azam par khil kar tnqidin karne lagey they. Shiv Sena ne yahan taq elaan kardiya tha ke 2019 aam intikhabaat mein BJP se intikhabi mafahmat nahi ki jaye gi. sawal yeh peda hota hai ke itna sab kuch hojane ke baad Amit Shah , ruthe hue Uddhav Thacekray ko mana payen ge aur kya aindah aam intikhabaat mein BJP aur Shiv Sena mil kar muqaabla karen ge
407.title: Kya ruthe hue Uddhav Thacekray ko Amit Shah mana payen ge?

news_detail: Mumbai. BJP sadar Amit Shah ki party muhim’ Sampark baraye Samarthan’ ke hissa ke tor par Shiv Senasarbarah Uddhav  Thackeray se do ghanton ki mulaqaat ke androon 24 ghantay aakhir uzzikr party ne apne is moaqqaf ka izhaar kiya ke woh aindah intikhabaat Bashmole 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein tanha muqaabla karne apni qarardad par karbnd rahay gi. Shiv Senake senior quied mister Sanjay RAut ne aaj kaha ”hum jantay hain ke Amit Shah jee ka agenda kya hai magar Shiv Senane yeh qarardad Manzoor krchki hai ke woh anay walay tamam intikhabaat mein apne bal par muqaabla kere gi.” yaad rahay ke maharashra mein BJP aur Shiv Sena ki makhloot hukoomat hai taham Shiv Sena sarbarah Uddhav  Thackeray guzashta aik baras se apni Haleef BJP aur markazi hukoomat ki palisy on par sakht nuqta cheeni karte arhay hain. Uddhav Thackeray ki rahaish gaah’ Mato Shri’ mein guzashta din BJP sadar Amit Shah poanch kar Uddhav  Thackeray se mulaqaat ki thi. yeh mulaqaat taqreeban do ghantay taq jari rahi thi. baad azan Amit Shah yeh umeed zahir ki thi ke dono partiyan BJP aur Shiv Senaaindah lok sabha intikhabaat mein mutahidda muqaabla karen ge. taham Shiv Senake apni qarardad ke paband rehne ke elaan se BJP ki umedon par pani phir gaya hai. Amit Shah ne mulaqaat ke baad kaha tha ”yeh mulaqaat musbet rahi hai aur dono partiyan ( BJP. Shiv Sena) nah sirf 2019 ke intikhabaat balkay 2024 ke intikhabaat mein mil jal kar maqa bala karen ge. maharashra mein assembly intikhabaat bhi 2019 mein munaqqid shudni hain jabkay lok sabha ke intikhabaat bhi 2019 mein hi munaqqid hon ge. Sanjay RAut ne bataya ke BJP aur Shiv Senaaindah chand dinon mein dobarah mulaqaat karen gi. Shiv Senake tarjuman’ saamna’ mein guzashta kayi mahino se BJP aur markazi hukoomat par shadeed tnqidin ki jarahi hain, jis ki wajah se dono partiyon mein dooria barhti chali gayeen. Uddhav  Thakur ne Amit Shah se aik saal ke waqfa ke baad mulaqaat ki. dono qaideen ki mulaqaat ke baad yeh ta-assur paaya ja raha tha ke BJP aur Shiv Sena ke darmain paye janey walay ikhtilafat ka khtama hojaye gaavr dono partiyon ke taluqaat aik naya mourr ikhtiyar karen ge magar Sanjay Raut ke taaza bayan se un qiyaas aarayyon ke sach saabit honay par sawalia nishaan lag gaya hai. Amit Shah ne party muhim’ rabita baraye taied’ ke hissa ke tor par Mumbai mein Madhuri Dixit , Maroof snatkar ratan tata se bhi mulaqaat ki thi aur sudhi vnayik mandir ka darshan bhi kya tha.
420.title: Shiv Sena aindah intikhabaat mein tanha muqaabla kere gi

news_detail: Geneva: Khaleej Aden mein Yemen ke qareeb ghair qanooni tarikeen watan ki kashti ghark hojane se 46 afraad halaak jab ke 16 la patah hogaye. aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye tarikeen watan ki janib se jari bayan ke mutabiq khaleej Aden mein Yemen ke saahil ke qareeb ghair qanooni tarikeen watan se bhari kashti onche lehron ki zad mein aakar ulat gayi, kashti mein 100 se zayed afraad they jin mein khawateen aur bachay bhi shaamil they. aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye tarikeen watan nay waqea mein 46 afraad ki halakat jab ke 16 ke la patah honay ki tasdeeq kar di hai. halaak honay walon mein 37 mard aur 9 khawateen shaamil hain jab ke la patah afraad ki bhi halakat ka qiyaas kya ja raha hai. haadsa mein bach jaaney walay afraad ka kehna hai ke kashti mein sawaar tamam logon ka talluq africi malik ethiopia se hai, un ki manzil Yemen aur deegar khaleeji mumalik thi, is maqsad ke liye unhon nay insani asmglron ko khateer raqam di thi, Yemen ke saahil ke qareeb taiz aur onche lehron ke baais kashti be qaboo hogayi, kashti mein pani bherna shuru hogaya to log apni jaan bachanay ke liye samandar mein kood parre taham beshtar log life jackets nah honay aur teraaki se nawaqfit ki bana par doob gaye. Operation and Emergencies (IOM) ke sarbarah Mohammad Abdekar ka kehna hai ke har mah taqreeban 7 hazaar afraad behtar mustaqbil ke liye ghair qanooni tareeqon se khatarnaak halaton mein safar karte hain, jis ke douran barri tadaad mein insani jaanun ka zeyaa hota hai.
446.title: Yemen ke qareeb tarikeen watan ki kashti doobnay se 46 afraad halaak

news_detail: NewDelhi/Nagpur Nagpur. sabiq Sadar Jamhooria Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ne Nagpur mein waqay RSS Headquarters ka dora karte hue siyasi bomb giraya hai. Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ki party kangrs paanch dahon se ziyada RSS ki khulay aam mukhalfat karti aayi hai. RSS sarbarah Mohan Bhagwat ne sabiq Sadar Jamhooria hind ka RSS ke baani ke maqam paidaiesh par kher muqaddam kya. shaam 6 : 00 bujey Mr. Pranab Mukherjee RSS Headquarters par aarays s kaarkunon ke tarbiati ijlaas ”Shiksha Varg” ki ikhtitami taqreeb se khitaab karen ge. Mr. Mukherjee RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat ki dawat qubool karliye jaane ki ittila ke sath hi aik tanaza peda hogaya hai aur Copngress Party ko aik ajeeb sorat e haal ka saamna karna prhrha hai. agarchay ta haal Copngress Party ne khil kar Mr. Pranab Mukherjee RSS ke programme mein shirkat ki mukhalfat nahi ki hai taham malik ke mukhtalif gooshon se talluq rakhnay walay Copngress Party ke senior qaideen ne un par kari tnqidin ki hain. party zaraye ka kehna hai ke party ki sabiq sarbarah mrs Sonia gandhi ki eimaa par hi Mr. Mukherjee par tnqidin ki jarahi hain. zaraye ka kehna hai ke mrs gandhi ke ishara par hi party ke senior qayed Mr. Ahmed Patel ne guzashta raat tweet kya tha ke’ ‘ Pranab da! mujhe aap se yeh tawaqqa nahi thi.’ ‘ is se qabal sabiq wazeer railway Mr. Jafer Shareef aur tlnganh ke senior congress leader Mr. Hanumantha Rao ne bhi sakht tnqidin ki theen. ab to khud Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ki Dukhtar jo Congress Party ki Sharmistha Mukherjee ne bhi guzashta shab tweet kya tha ke un ke dora ka bi jay pi bharpoor najaaiz faida uthaye gi aur yeh ke woh jo taqreer karen ge woh dairpa assar nahi chhorey gi Albata taswerain kabhi nahi dhundlaingi. Mr. Pranab Mukherjee 2012-2017 malik ke Sadar Jamhooria reh chuke hain. woh kal shab hi Nagpur poanch chuke they aur mobayyana tor par RSS sarbarah Mohan Bhagwat ke sath hi ashayih kya. Mr. Mukherjee RSS ki dawat qubool kar lanay ke sath hi un ki Dukhtar aur farzand Abhijeet ke ilawa party ne bhi inhen RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat se baz rakhnay ki koshish ki thi.
456.title: Sonia gandhi ki eimaa par hi Pranab Mukherjee khilaaf tweet!

news_detail: Mumbai. Pune Police ney Adalat ko waaqif karwaya ke aik mushtaba Moist ke paas se zabt kardah aik maktoob se yeh inkishaaf hota hai ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ku Rajiv Gandhi ki tarha qatal karne ki saazish tayyar ki gayi thi. mamnooa CPI Moist ke sath taluqaat rakhnay par Dalit jahedkaar Sudhir Dhavle, wakeel Surendra Gadling, jahedkaar Mahesh Raut aur Soma Sen aur Rona Wilson ku chaharshanba ko girftar kya gaya tha jinhen Police ney shehri Moist ke sarkardah qaideen qarar diya gaya. inhen January mein Bhima Koregaon nasli tashadud ke silsila mein girftar kya gaya tha. Police ney session court mein id-daa kya ke yeh maktoob Dehli ke jahedkaar rona vlsn ke qabza se bar aamad kya gaya hai. rona vlsn, siyasi qaidyoun ki rihayi ke liye qaim kardah committee ke rukan hain. public Prosecutor Ujala Pawar ney Adalat ko bataya ke maktoob mein m-4 rifle aur 4 laakh rounds ki kharidi ke liye 8 crore rupay aur Rajiv Gandhi jaisay aik aur waqea ki zaroorat ka zikar hai. Prosecutor ney kaha ke yeh khudkush hamla hoga aur is baat ka imkaan bhi hai ke hum nakaam ho jaien lekin party ko hamari tajweez par ghhor karna chahiye

BJP ke Nalin Kohli ney kaha ke yeh aik sangeen maamla hai. yeh aik maloom haqeeqat hai ke Moist dabao mein hain, yeh aik khatarnaak amar hai. si pi am quied mister sita raam ychori ney kaha ke sikoriti agencies apna kaam karen gi, Adalat samaat kar rahi hai, Adalat ko faisla karne diya jaye. khabar-rasan agency ae an aayi ki janib se jari kardah maktoob ki naqal jari ki hai, is mein kaha gaya hai ke Bihar aur Maghrabi Bengal jaisi badi shikaston ke bawajood Modi ney 15 se zayed reyaston mein BJP ki hukoomat qaim ki hai. agar yahi raftaar barqarar rahay gi to is ka matlab yeh hoga to tamam mhazon par party ko zabardast mushkil peda hogi. .. colonel Kisan aur deegar chand Commerades ney Modi ke daur ko khatam karne concrete iqdamaat ki raye di hai. mulzim ke wakeel ney id-daa kya ke istighasa ki taraf se paish kiye jaaney wali dastawizaat farzi o jaali hain taakay inhen makhoz kya jaye. Bhima Kore gaon mein jab Daliton ney 1818 ki Bhima Koregaon ki jang ki yaad manayi to hndon ney is ehtijaj kya tha jis ke baais tashadud phoot para tha. yaad rahay ke Bartanwi afwaj ney jin mein ziyada tar muhaar (Dalit) fouji they, Peshwa fouj ko shikast dete hue maratha hukmarani ka khtama kardiya tha. Bhima Kore gaon tashadud ke zimn mein Daliton ke jahedkaaron ko girftar karte hue inhen Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi y qatal ki saazish mein makhoz karne ka Dalit qaideen ilzaam aayed kar rahe hain taakay Daliton par dabao qaim rakha jaye
471.title: Modi ka qatal karne ki saazish ko be naqaab karne ka id-daa

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq wazeer e azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ko All India Insti tute of Medical Sciences mein aaj shareek karwaya gaya. Doctors ke mutabiq yeh mamool ka check up aur investigations hain. Inhen doctors ke mashwaron par shareek dawakhana kya gaya. AIIMS mein woh Pulmonologist and Director AIIMS Dr. Randeep  Gileria ki zair e nigrani mein rahen ge. dr Gileria taqreeban teen decades se shakhsi mualij ke tor par Vajpayee ki tibbi dekh bhaal kar rahay hain. Bharat ratan 93 sala Vajpayee 1924 mein peda hue. woh malik ke pehlay ghair kangrisi Wazeer e Azam they jinhon ne apni 5? sala meyaad mukammal ki. woh lok sabha ke liye 1991, 1996, 1998, 1999 & 2004 mein muntakhib hotay rahay.
488.title: Sabiq wazeer e azam Vajpayee AIIMS mein shareek

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Minister Delhi o sarbarah Aam Aadmi Party Mr. Arvind Kejriwal ney aaj Delhi assembly main aik na qabil tasawwur wada kar baithy magar un ka yeh wada mashroot hai. Chief Minister ney elaan kya ke agar markaz ke zair e intizam ilaqa qaumi dar-al-hakoomat Delhi ko mukammal riyasat ka darjaa day diya jaye to un ki Aam Aadmi Party 2019 ke qaumi intikhabaat main BJP ke liye muhim chalaye gi. Mr. Kejriwal ney kaha ”main BJP se kehna chahta hon ke 2019 intikhabaat se qabal agar Delhi ko riyasat ka darjaa day diya jata hai to hum is baat ko yakeeni banayen ge ke Delhi ka har vote aap ke haq main jaye, hum aap ke liye muhim chalayein ge. agar aap aisa nahi karen ge to Delhi ke maken ”BJP Delhi chode day” kehte hue Boards lagayen ge.” yeh peshkash un paish qiyasion ke douran ki gayi ke Aam Aadmi Party aur Congress Delhi , Haryana aur Punjab main aindah intikhabaat ke liye mafahmat par ghhor kar rahay hain. Aam Aadmi Party ke aik qayed ke haal hi main kiye gaye tweet ke mutabiq dono partiyan rabita main hain taham dono partiyon main kisi aik janib se is ki toseeq ki nahi ki gayi thi. Mr. Kejriwal riyasat ke mutalba par aik khusoosi ijlaas ke douran ewaan se khitaab kar rahay they. yeh ijlaas jummay ko ekhtataam Pazeer hona tha magar paiir taq is main tosee ki gayi thi. Aam Aadmi Party jisay ewaan main ghalba haasil hai, Delhi ke liye kaamil riyasat ka darjaa dainay ka mutalba karte hue aik qarardad Manzoor ki hai. fi al-waqt Delhi ko sirf juzwi riyasat ka darjaa hi haasil hai jis ka matlab yeh hota hai ke ahem umoor jaisay zameen, law and and order police ka nazm o nasq markaz ke paas hi rahay ga. lieutenant governor Delhi main markazi hukumat ki numaindagi karte hain.
508.title: Main BJP ke liye muhim chlaon ga agar. .. . Arvind Kejriwal ka na qabil yaqeen wada

news_detail: Mumbai. Wazeer e azam Narendra Modi ko qatal karne Maoist ki saazish ke baray mein maharashra police ke daawa par BJP ki Haleef Shiv Sena ne sawal uthatay hue kaha ke yeh durust nahi lagta. yaad rahay ke maharashra police ke is daaway aur is zimn mein haqooq insani ke activest ki girftari ke baad markazi wazeer e dakhla Rajnath Singh ne Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki security ko mazeed mustahkam bananay guzashta dinon aik aala sathi ijlaas bhi talabb kya tha jabkay oppostion partiyon ne usay Narendra Modi ki ghatti maqboliat ko dekhte hue awaami hamdardi ke husool ki shobadaa baazi par mhmol kya tha. NCP sarbarah Sharad Pawar ne ilzaam aed kya ke BJP hamdardi haasil karne’ ‘ dhamki ke maktoob’ ‘ ka khail khail rahi hai

Shiv Sena ke tarjuman’ Saamana’ ke idaria mein kaha gaya ke inhen (Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Fadnavis) ko qatal karne ki saazish, pur asraar aur aik Khaufnaak film ki kahani lagti hai. Maoist ke maktoob ke matan ke is mafhuum ka hawala dete hue ke’ Modi ne 15 reyaston mein hakoomaten qaim karne mein kamyaab hogaye, agar yeh yun hi jari rahay ga to tanzeem mushkil mein hogi, aur is terhan Modi ko khatam kar dena chahiye. yeh sab kuch police ne inkishaaf kya hai jo mazhaka khaiz hai. yeh kaha gaya ke maamla ko siyasi maqsad barari ke liye istemaal kya ja raha hai, mahireen ki janib se yeh kaha ja raha hai ke yeh saazish haqeeqi nahi lagti hai. Shiv Sena ne kaha ke Modi ki security, Israeli khufia agency mosad ki terhan mazboot o mustahkam hai aur kisi ke liye is mein daakhil hona haqeeqatan mumkin nahi hai. qabal azeen mister Sharad Pawar ne bhi maktoob ki sachaai par shuba zahir kya tha. congress party ne is masla par tnqidin ki hain aur usay maqboliat haasil karne ki aik nakaam koshish qarar dyaavr bohat se sawalaat uthaye hain.
519.title: Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish, Khaufnaak film ki kahani lagti hai: Shiv Sena

news_detail: Wazeer e azam hind nrindr Modi ney Bharti cricketer Virat Kohli se aik mah qabal liya’ fitness challenge’ poora kar dekhaya aur is ki video social media par share kar i, aaj subah jari honay wali yeh do minute ki video ab taq hazaron log dekh chuke hain.’ hum foot to India foot’ muhim ke silsila mein Sports Minister Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore ney khwahish zahir ki thi ke India ko foot hona chahiye jis ke baad Bharati Cricket ke captain Virat Kohli ney yeh challenge qubool karliya tha aur fitness ki aik video share kardi thi. sath hi Kohli ney likha tha keh’ ‘ mein ney challenge qubool karliya hai aur ab yeh challenge apni ahliya anoshka sharmaa, wazeer e azam nrindrmodi aur am s dhoni ko bhi deta hon’ ‘ ‘. Kohli ke is challenge ka ilm hotay hi Bharti wazeer e azam nrindr Modi bhi maidan mein kood parre aur twitter par likha ke ”challenge qubool kya, Virat! mein bhi apni video jald hi share karoonga”. aaj Modi ney fitness ki video share kar ke Virat ke challenge ko poora kar dekhaya. unhon ney subah saweray ki gayeen mashqon ke lamhaat, yoga, poudoun ke darmain baagh mein chehal qadmi aur saans lainay ki mashqon ko video ka hissa banaya. sath hi unhon ney yeh challenge agay berhate hue karnataka ke naye wazeer aala, tennis khilari monika btra, aur 40 saal se zayed Umar ke bahadur aayi pi s ohdedaron ko day diya. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke’ mein har hindustani se appeal karta hon ke woh roz kuch waqt apni fitness ke liye waqf karte hue kisi bhi aasan mashq ka intikhab karen, aap ko is ka zaroor misbet nateeja miley ga. Chief Minister karnataka mister Kumaraswami ney is challenge ke jawab mein Wazeer e Azam Modi se yeh kehte hue taied talabb ki ke woh karnataka ke’ fitness’ ke barey mein ziyada fikar mand hain. unhon ney tweet kya ke ”deer nrindr Modi jee meri sahet ke barey mein fikar karne par mein fakhr aur nihayat hi shukarguzar hoon, mera aiqaan hai ke jismani tandrusti sab ke liye ahem hai aur mein is maqsad ki taied karta hon. Yoga- trademill mere roz ke mamool ka hissa hai, hnoz mein meri riyasat ke development fitness ke barey mein ziyada fikar mand hon aur is ke liye aap ke taawun ka mutamanni hon.”
528.title: Wazeer e Azam Modi ka Chief Minister karnataka ko fitness ka challenge

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Minister Telangana mister ke Chandra shikhr rau naay yeh bayan karte hue ke umoor kharja, difaa, kabeer iqtisadi aur aalmi umoor jaisay mhazon par malik kayi challenges ka saamna kar raha hai, sahet, taleem, shehri o dehi taraqiyaat aur zarayi shobo mein kaam karne Riyasaton ko azaadi dainay ka mutalba kya. unhon naay markaz se yeh bhi khwahish ki ke markazi sponser kardah schemes sakhtiyon ko daur kya jaye jo reyasti hukoomat ke iqdamaat par rokkk lagati hain. Rashtrapati Bhavan ke  cultural center mein NITI Ayog ki gornng council ke chouthay ijlaas se khitaab karte hue mister Chandrashekar Rao naay kaha ke malik ka farogh is ki Riyasaton ke farogh mein Muzmer hai, is liye taizi se farogh panay wali Riyasaton ki markaz se izafi funds ki muntaqili nah bhi ki jaye to kam az kam tax mara-aat ke zareya hosla afzai ki jani chahiye. unhon naay kaha ”Hamein zarayi aur mulhiqa shobo par marboot shoba ke tor par tavajja markooz karne ki zrorrt hai. Dairy, Poultry, Goat and Sheeps rearing aur fisheries ko income tax se mustasna karne ki zaroorat hai. kisanon ki aamdani ko dugna karne ke hissa ke tor par mgnrega ke fndz ko kisanon ke 50% shiraakat daari ke hissa ziraat se marboot kya jana chahiye taakay un ki sarmaya daari ki laagat ko kam kya jaye.” Chief Minister naay ijlaas mein hukoomat Telangana ki janib se mukhtalif shoba jaat khaas kar ziraat aur aab paashi ke ilawa deegar mulhiqa shobo mein kiye jaaney walay iqdamaat par roshni daali.
543.title: Sahet, taleem, ziraat aur shahri wo dehi taraqiyaat mein Riyasaton ko azaadi dainay Chandrashekar Rao ki wakalat

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Election Commission of India Mr. O.P Rawat ne Telangana Assembly ki 6

September jummeraat ko tahleel ki taraf ishara karte huwe aaj kaha ke nujoomi paish qhiyasioon par riyasat mein intekhabaat ki tareekh taye nahi ki jati. Mr. Rawat ney kaha ke geherayee o geerayee se jaiza lainay ke baad hi hum taye karen ge ke aaya Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Rajasthan aur Mizoram ke sath Telangana Assembly ke bhi intekhabaat karwaye jayen ya nahi. Siyasi halqon mein yeh baat gasht kar rahi hai ke Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke liye 6

September ka intekhab is liye kiya kyunkay 6 ka adad un ke liye naik shagoon hai. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney Siddipet se apni intekhabi muhim ka bhi aaghaz isi liye kiya ke 2014 mein bhi unhon ne yahin se intekhabi muhim shuru ki thi jo un ke liye achi saabit huwi. Mr. Rawat ney kaha ke Telagana mein Assembly intekhabaat Electoral Panel ki janib se mukammal tayari karliye jane ke baad hi munaqqid kiye jayen ge. Unhon ney kaha ke Telagana ke Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Rajat Kumar se report ki mausoli ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tareekh taye ki ja sakti hai. Mr. Rajat Kumar jo peer ke din Delhi ka daura karne walay hain, Central Election Commission ko apni report paish karen ge. Unhon ney bhi aaj yahan yeh ishara diya hai ke Telagana mein Electoral List ko finalise karne ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tareekh ka elaan kiya jaye ga.
404.title: Nujoomi paish qhiyasiyoon par Election ki tareekh taye nahi ki jati: CEC

news_detail: Uttar Pradesh ke shaher Lucknow ke maroof ilaqa Hazratganj Choraha ko sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bahari Vajpayee se mausoom karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Lucknow Municipal Council ney Hazratganj Chorahe ka naam tabdeel kar ke sabiq Wazeer e Azam Anjhani Atal Bihari Vajpayee ke naam par ‘Aatal Chowk’ rakhne ka faisla kiya hai. Muqami media ke mutabiq Lucknow ke bichon beech waqay Hazratganj Chowk ko Atal Chowk naam dainey ka yeh iqdaam sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki maut ke baad un ki Lucknow shaher se be panah wabastagi aur unhen khiraaj e tehseen paish karne ke liye kiya gaya hai. Lucknow ki Mayor ka kahena hai ke ‘Shaher ke councillors ney mutadid baar shaher ki sadkon aur chorahon ko un ke naam se mansoob karne ki darkhwasten di theen aur hum chahtay thae ke kuch achchca aur ahem muqam Vajpayee sahib ke naam karen. Lehaza yeh faisla kiya gaya hai ke Lucknow ke sab se ziyada ahem aur sab se baday Chorahe ko un ke naam se mansoob kar dete hain. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke sirf yahi nahi balkay paanch dafaa Lucknow se Parliamani intekhab jeetney walay Vajpayee ka mujassima bhi chorahe par nasab kiya jaye ga. Is ke sath sath un ki 51nazmein, taqriren aur deegar yadgaar mujassima ke sath lagai jayen gi. Iss se qabl Chhattisgarh ki riyasti hukoomat ney riyasat ki nai Rajdhani naya Raipur ka naam badal kar Chhattisgarh ko State ka darjah dainey walay sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki yaadon ko qaayim rakhney ke liye un ke naam par Atal Nagar rakhney ka faisla kiya tha.
417.title: Lucknow ka Hazratganj ab Atal Chowk Hoga

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi High Court ney peer ko Congress qaayideen Mrs. Sonia Gandhi aur Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ki 2011-12 ke liye un ke Tax Assessments ko kholnay ke faisla ko challenge karte huwe daakhil kardah Writ darkhwast ko kharij kardiya. Justice S Ravindra Bhat aur Justice A K Chawla par mushtamil aik bench ney kaha ke Writ darkhwasten nakaam hogayi hain. Bench ney Congress qaayed Oscar Fernandes ki Writ darkhwast ko kharij kardiya, unhon ney bhi un ke saal 2011-12 ke Tax Assessments ke dubarah khole jany ko Challenge kiya tha. Nakam tax mehkuma ki janib se yeh id-diya kiye jany ke baad ke saal 2011-12 ke liye Rahul Gandhi ka assessment dubarah khoola gaya jis ko challenge karte huwe Writ darkhwast daayir ki gayi thi. Adalat ul aaliya ne apna faisla 16

August ko mehfooz kiya tha. Adalat ne mehkuma Tax se zabani daryaft kiya tha ke Sonia Gandhi, Rahul aur Farnandiz ke khilaaf faisla ke elaan tak koi ahem qadam nah uthae. Senior Advocate P Chidambaram ney Sonia Gandhi ki janib se paish hotay huwe kaha tha ke inhen Additional Solicitor General Tushar Mehta ke zabani bayan par bharosa hai. Mehta ney istadlaal paish kiya tha ke Congress qaideen ne mehkuma Tax par beja ilzaam aayed kiya hai magar is ka koi manfi assar nahi pade ga. Congress qaayideen ke khilaaf Income Tex ke cases uss waqt uth khaday huwe jab BJP qayed Subramaniyam Swami ney National Herald case ke silsila mein aik zaireen adalat ke rubaroo aik khangi faujdaari shikayat daayir ki. Shikayat mein Sonia , Rahul aur deegar par sirf 50 lakh rupay ada karte huwe dhoka dainay aur Fands ka tagalub karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya gaya jis ke zareya Young India (YI) ney 90. 25 crore rupay wasool karne ka haq haasil kiya jo Associated Journals Limited (AJL) Congress party ko ada shudni hai.
