Yeh ilzaam hai ke  AJL November 2010 mein 50 lakh rupay ke sarmaya se shuru kiya gaya, IJL ke taqreeban tamam share holdings haasil karliye jo National herald news paper chalata hai. Is amal mein YI ney AJL ke 90 crores rupay ke baqaya jaat bhi haasil karliye. Tax Department ney kaha ke YI mein Rahul ke assessment se unhen 154 crore rupay ki aamdani haasil hogi na ke 68 lakh rupay ki jaissa ke qabal azeen assessment mein zahir kiya gaya. Mehkuma ney phelay hi YI ko 2011-12 ke assessment ke liye YI ko 249.15 crore rupay ki notice jari kar di hai.
432.title: Tax case mein Delhi High Court mein Sonia aur Rahul ki darkhwast mustarad

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ney budh ko Koregaon. Bhima tashadud muqadma mein maakhoz 5 Activists ki ghar par nazarbandi mein 17

September tak tausee kar di hai. Adalat e Uzma huqooq insani ke Jahedkaron Professor Varavara Rao, Arun Ferieria Varnun Gonsalves, Sudha Bhardwaj aur Gautam Navlakha ki giraftari ke khilaaf daayir kardah darkhwast ki samaat kar rahi thi. Chief Justice Deepak Misra, Justice  A.M Khanvelkar aur D.Y Chandrachod par mushtamil bench ney Historian Romila Thapar aur deegar chaar ki daayir kardah petition par samaat ko is darkhwast par ke petitioners ki numaindagi karne walay Senior Wakeel Mr. Abhishek Manu Singhvi dusri adalat mein masroof hain, 17
September tak multawi kardiya. Maharashtra Police ney guzishita baras 31
Decemeber ko Koregaon Bhima mein munaqidah ”Yalghaar Parished” jalsa ke baad phoot padney walay tashadud ke silsila mein darj aik muqadma mein Jaria saal 28
August ko mazkoorah paanch Jehadkaron ko girftar karte huwe un par wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke qatal ki saazish karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha. Dosray din 29

August ko Adalat e Uzma ne un Jehadkaron ki giraftari par yeh kehte huwe aiteraaz kiya tha ke ikhtelaaf raye, jamhoriat ka Safety Valve hai aur un ko ghar par nazarband rakhnay ki hidaayat di thi jis par un Jehadkaron ko jail se un ke ghar muntaqil kardiya gaya tha.
450.title: Varavara Rao ke House Arrest mein tausee

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Patidar tabqa ke liye tahaffuzaat ke jehedkaar Hardik Patel ney aaj 19 dinon baad apni ghair muayana muddat ki bhook hadtaal ko khatam kar diya halan ke un ke aur Hukoomat e Gujrat ke darmiyan Patidar tabqa ke liye quota aur zirayi qarza jaat ki maafi ke masla par koi baat cheet nahi huwi. Hardik Patel ney Patidar bradari ke leaders Naresh Patel aur CK Patel ke hathon Nimbu ka sharbat pi kar bhook hadtaal khatam karne ke baad kaha ke meri bradri ke liye quota aur zirayi qarza jaat ki maafi ke liye jad-o-jahed jari rahey gi. Hardik Patel ney Patidar tabqe ko deegar pasmandah tabqaat (OBC) Zumra ke tahet tahaffuzaat aur Gujrat ke kisanon ke qarza jaat maaf karne ka mutaleba karte huwe 25

August ko apni rihaish gaah waqay Ahmed Nagar mein ghair muayana muddat ki bhook hadtaal ka aaghaz kiya tha. Baad azan unhon ney apne saathi Alpesh Katheria ki rehaie ka bhi mutaleba shaamil karliya jinhein Mulk se ghaddari ke ilzaam mein girftar kiya gaya tha. 25 sala Hardik ko guzishta jummay ko hadtaal ke 14 wen din sahet bigad jaaney par Hospital mein shareek karwa diya gaya tha. Hospital mein do din guzarnay ke baad woh apne makaan wapas aagaye thae aur bhook hadtaal ko jari rakha tha. Hospital mein woh mashroob le rahey thar aur Glucose chadhaya ja raha tha taham unhon ney solid ghiza ke istemaal se guraiz kiya tha. BJP ki zair qayadat hukoomat ney 4

September ko is ehtejaj par rad-e-amal zahir karte huwe id-daa kiya tha ke Hardik ki quota tehreek siyasi muharikaat par mabni hai jis ko Congress ki pusht panahi haasil hai. Riyasti wazeer e tawanai Saurabh Patel ney tab kaha tha ke mazakiraat ke liye hukoomat ka darwaaza khula hai magar ta haal koi baat cheet nahi huwi.
465.title: Hardik Patel ki bhook hadtaal khatam

news_detail: New Delhi. Sharai Adalat ki tarz par Hindu Court tashkeel dainay ke maamle par Allahabad High Court mein samaat huwi. Iss douran riyasati hukoomat ki janib se jawab daakhil karne ke liye Court se mohlat talabb ki gayi jis par High Court ney riyasati hukoomat ko 17
September tak jawab daakhil karne ka waqt dey diya. Wazeh ho ke Akhil Bhartiya Hindu Mahasabha ke elaan ke khilaaf Kanpur Ankit Kumar Singh ney darkhwast di jis par aayindah samaat ab 17

September ko hogi. Adalat ney Hindu Mahasabha ke Secretary aur Meerut ke zila sadar samiti riyasti hukoomat aur deegar oppostion jamaaton se jawab talab kiya tha. Adalat ney is maamla mein DM Meerut aur Hindu Court mein taiynaat Judge Dr. Pooja Shikan Pande ko fareeq bananey ka hukum dete huwe dono ko notice jari kiya hai. Wazeh ho ke Kanpur ke Ankit Singh ney High Court mein darkhwast daakhil kar ke Hindu Court ki tashkeel ko Challenge karte huwe kaha ke Hindu tanzeemon ney maghribi Uttar Pradesh ke baaz azlaa mein Hindu Court bana rakhi hai. Un ka kahena hai ke adalaton par muqadamaat ka boojh hai aur logon ko bar waqat insaaf nahi mil pa raha. Isi ko dheyaan mein rakhtay huwe shariah Court ki tarz par Hindu Court ki tashkeel ki gayi hai. Adalat ney DM aur Hindu Court mein taiynaat Dr. Pooja Shikan ko iss mein fareeq banatay huwe unhen notice jari kiya hai. Sath hi maamle mein ‫UP hukoomat se mukammal maloomat bhi talab ki gayeen.
486.title: Hindu Court, UP ‬ Hukoomat ko HC ki notice

news_detail: Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Wazeer e Kharija Sushma Swaraj ney sabiq Wazeer e Azam Pakistan Nawaz Sharif ki Ahliya Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal par taaziyat ka izhaar kiya hai. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki taraf se Nawaz Sharif ke naam taziyati khat bheja gaya hai, jis mein unhon ne Sabiq Pakistani Wazeer e Azam ko mukhatib karkay likha hai ke ”mein aap aur sogwaar khandan ki isteqamat ke liye duago hon”. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke’ Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke intqaal ka sun kar gahera sadma pahoncha, mein khuda se daago hon ke woh aap aur aap ke ahal khanah ko is na qabil talaafi nuqsaan ko bardasht karne ka hausla dey aur Begum Sahibaa ki rooh ko sukoon ataa farmaiye. Narendra Modi ney mazeed kaha ke ‘Begum Kulsoom ke sath honay wali mulakaton ki Khushgawar yaden hamesha sath rahen gi. Samaji rabita ki Website twitter par pegham mein Bhartiye Wazeer e Kharija Sushma Sawaraj ney bhi Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke intqaal par gehray dukh aur afsos ka izhaar kiya hai aur kaha ke woh Ghamzadah khandan se dili taaziyat karti hain. Un ki rooh ko sukoon miley.
498.title: Modi aur Sushma Swaraj ne Nawaz Shareef ko pursa diya

news_detail: Amravati. Zila Nanded main Dharmabad ki adalat ki janib se nonbailable arrest warrant se mutaliq dilchasp inkeshaaf karte huwe Chief Minsiter Andhra Pradesh N Chandrababu Naidu ney kaha ke unhen ta haal aisa koi warrant mausool nahi huwa hai. Qanoon tanzeem jadeed Andhra Pradesh par amalaawri par mukhtasir muddati waqfa e sawalaat ke dauran Assembly mein baat karte huwe Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ney kaha ke unhen adalat se kisi qisam ki communication mausool nahi hui hai jaisa ke is barey mein chand dinon qabl khabrain manzar aam par aayi theen. Unhon ney kaha ke woh is masla par mutaliqa ohdedaron se tabadla e  khayaal kiye hain aur is par munasib iqdaam kiya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke unhen Andhra Pradesh ki sarhad par Maharashtra Police ney girftar kiya tha magar riyasat mein nahi. Uss waqt Maharashtra Police ney kaha tha ke Telugu Desam Party leaders ke khilaaf koi case nahi hoga aur unhen khusoosi flight ke zariye Hyderabad bhej diya gaya tha. Lekin ab achanak yeh khabar aayi hai ke adalat ney nonbailable arrest warrant jari kiya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Babli project ki taameer ghair qanooni thi. Unhon ney wazahat ki ke yeh project, Godavari River par SRS project ke hudood ke andar hai. Shumali Telangana ke kisanon ko is project ki takmeel par dariyaee pani parapne haq se mahroom hona pade ga.
515.title: Koi arrest warrant nahi mila: Chandrababu Naidu

news_detail: Guzishta intikhabaat mein Narendra Modi ko Wazeer e Azam ke taur par paish karte hue BJP ko Iqtidaar mein laane mein Mulk geer satah par muhim chalanay walon mein aik bada aur ahem naam Ramdev Baba ka hai jinhon ney mantaqi aur falsfiyana andaaz ikhtiyar karte hue un azhaan ko bhi badalne mein ahem kirdaar ada kya tha jo mazhabi bughz aur firqa parastana afkaar se pak thae. Aam shaherion ki zindagion mein aik inqalabi tabdeeli ka khawab dikha kar Baba Ramdev jaisay logon ney nai nasal ko BJP ka hamnava banadiya tha. Naujawanon ko rozgaar ki farahmi, kalay dhun ki wapsi, ashya e zaroriah ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke sath sath Ayodhya mein Ram Mandir ki taameer, Jammu & Kashmir ke khusoosi mauaqqaf ko khatam karne Dastoor mein tarmeem, Common Civil Code ka nifaaz jaisay waday karte hue Mulk ke voters ko raghib kya gaya tha magar jab bhaari aksariyat se BJP hukoomat mein aayi aur Narendra Modi Wazeer e Azam ban gaye to jo-jo waday kiye gaye to un ke barkhilaf kaam kya gaya. Mulk ki jo sorat e haal thi iss ko mazeed ab-tar kardiya gaya. Guzishta intikhabaat mein Narendra Modi ke gun ganay walay aur un ka purzor difaa karne walay ab un kanam lainay se bhi katraane lagey hain. shaed Ramdev Baba jaise logon ka bhi zameer unhen andar se malamat kar raha hai magar un mein itni jurraat nahi hai ke jis shiddat se woh Modi ki tayeed kiye thae ab itni hi shiddat se un ki mukhalifat kare .

Ramdev Baba ney ND Tv ke Youth Conclave mein aaj hissa letay hue kuch baatein ki hain jis se yeh saaf zaahir hota hai ke woh bhi Narendra Modi se mayoos ho chukay hain. BJP ke kattar haami rahne walay Ramdev Baba ney aisa lagta hai ke woh Modi se doori ikhtiyar karne ka ye rasta nikaal liye hain ke siyasat se hi doori ikhtiyar karli jaye. Un se jab yeh poocha gaya ke aaya woh aayindah Lok Sabha intikhabaat mein BJP ke liye muhim chalayein ge? Toh unhon ney kaha ”mein kayun karoon ga? Mein un ke liye muhim nahi chlaon ga. Mein siyasat se dastbardar ho chuka hon. Mein tamam parties ke sath hon aur mein azad hon.” Ramdev ney kaha ke woh ghair janibdaar hain na hi dayen bazu ke aur na hi bayen baazu ke. Kisi ko bhi un par ungli nahi uthani chahiye chunkay woh kayi ahem umoor mein ”Moun Yoga” ikhtiyar kiye hue hain. Unhon ney kaha ke aajkal woh kisi ko nahi chaid rahay hain magar koi unhen cheday ga to woh unhen choden ge bhi nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par tanqeed karna awam ka buneyadi haq hai. Taham unhon ney kaha ke Wazeer e Azam Modi ney achay kaam kiye hain jaisay Swach Bharat aur koi bada scam honay nahi diya. Iss ke bawajood woh yeh kehnay se chup nahi reh sakay ke Raffal deals par sawalaat uthaye jarahay hain. Ramdev Baba ney kaha ke Modi hukoomat ki policies qabil e tareef hain lekin ab un mein se kuch mein islaah ki zaroorat hai. Qeematon mein izafah bada masla hai aur Modi ji ko jald hi islahi iqdamaat karna hoga, iss mein nakami ki soorat mein ‘mehengai ki aag toh Modi sarkar ko bahut mehngai pade gi’ Yoga guru o baani Patanjali Ayurved ney yeh bhi id-daa kya ke woh petrol aur diesel ko 40-35 rupay per litre farokht kar saktay hain agar hukoomat ijazat dae. Agar hukoomat mujhe ijazat deti hai aur tax mein kuch riayat deti hai to mein Hindustan mein petrol, diesel 40-35 rupay per litre dae sakta hoon. Eendhan ko GST ke tahet khareedna hoga na ke 28% tax laago kiya jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke agar hukoomat chahay to petrol aur diesel ki qeematein itni oonchai tak nahi pahonch sakteen aur un mein kami ki ja sakti hai. Ramdev Baba ney kaha ke mahengai Narendra Modi hukoomat ke liye bahut mahengi saabit hogi .
534.title: Mahengai Modi ko mahengi pade gi: Baba Ramdev

news_detail: New Delhi. Convener Aam Aadmi Party wo Chief Minister Delhi Mr. Arvind Kejriwal, un ke naayib Mr. Manish Sisodia aur party ke deegar 11 arkaan e Assembly ko Chief Secretary par hamla ke muqadme mein Delhi Court ki janib se Summon jari kiya gaya hai. Adalat ney unhen hidayat di ke 25

October ko woh shakhsi taur par haazir hon. Police ney apni 1,300 Pages ki Charge Sheet mein ilzaam aayed kya ke Kejriwal, Sisodia aur deegar ney Delhi Chief Secretary Anshu Prakash ko jaan se mardeney ya shadeed Chout pohanchaney, sarkari farayiz anjaam dainey mein rukawat paida karne aur unhen nuqsaan pahonchaney ki saazish ki hai. Aam Admi Party ke leaders par Chief Secretary ko mahruse rakhney, danista tauheen karne, ishtiaal angezi karne aur ghair qanooni taur par jama honay ka bhi ilzaam aayed kiya gaya hai. Kejriwal aur Sisodia ke aawa jin deegar arkaan e Assembly ke khilaaf fard jurm ayed kiya gaya un mein Amanatullah Khan , Prakash Jarwal, Nitin Tyagi, Ritu Raj Goind, Sanjiv Jha, Ajay Dut, Rajesh Rashi, Rajesh Gupta, Madan lal, Praveen Kumar aur Dinesh Mahania shaamil hain. Anshu Prakash ney ilzaam aayed kiya ke 19
aur 20

Feb ki darmiyani shab Kejriwal ki rehayishgah par jab unhen aik ijlaas ke liye talab kiya gaya tha to uss waqt un ke sath zor zabardasti ki gayi. Apni shikayat mein Prakash ney kaha tha ke ibtida mein unhen dhamkaya gaya aur baad azan Amanatullah Khan aur Prakash Jarwal ney un par hamla kiya. Iss waqhiye ke bad Aam Admi ke arkaan e Assembly Amanatullah Khan aur Jarwal ko girftar karliya gaya tha lekin Delhi Police ko un se pooch gach ke liye hirasat mein dainey se inkaar kardiya gaya tha taham Dehli hukoomat ney ilzaam ko ‘boogs’ aur’ fake’ qarar diya aur kaha ke yeh BJP ki zair e qayadat markazi hukoomat ki inteqami karwai hai. Jo ilzamaat aayed kiye gaye hain woh saabit hojane ki soorat mein Kejriwal aur deegar arkaan e Assembly ko 7 saal ki jail hosakti hai.
546.title: Kejriwal, Manish Sisodia aur 11 MLAs ko Delhi Court ka summon

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi nay Babri Masjid-Ram Mandir milkiyat muqadma mein Supreme Court ka faisla Hindus ke haq mein na anay ki soorat mein Ram Mandir ki taamir ko yakeeni bananay Parliament mein qanoon saaz karne Deputy Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh Keshav Prasad Morya ke bayan ka sakht note letay hue un ke bayan ko behooda qarar diya aur kaha ke is terha ki batein karte hue kis ko daraya ja raha hai? Aam intikhabaat 2019 ko dheyaan mein rakhtay hue Bharatiya Janata Party Babri Masjid milkiyat tanazia ko intikhabi mauzo bananay ke darpay hai, jis ki kadi ke taur par Uttar Pradesh ke Deputy Chief Minister Keshav Prasad Morya ney haal hi mein kaha ke Adalat mein hamaray mawafiq faisla na anay ki soorat mein Babri Masjid ki jagah Ram Mandir ki taamir ke liye Parliament mein qanoon ki manzoori ka ikhtiyar khula huwa hai. Yaad rahay ke Supreme Court mein Babri Masjid muqadma ki qatayi samaat jari hai. Morya ney kaha awam ka aiqan hai ke Supreme Court ka faisla jald aajay ga aur Ram Mandir ki taamir mein haayel rukawaten door ho jaiengi. Ya to faisla jald aayega ya phir mazakraat ke zareya hum koi hal dhondh nikaal leinge ya phir Parliament ke zareya qanoon saazi ka teesra ikhtiyar khula huwa hai. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi nry aik qaumi news channel se baat cheet karte hue istafsaar kya ke Deputy Chief Minister kaisi zabaan istemaal kar rahay hain? Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke aaya woh kisi ko dhamki dey rahay hain ke agar faisla un ke haq mein nahi aaya to qanoon saazi karte hue Mandir taamir ki jaye gi? Unhon nry poocha ke tum Dastoor ki kaunsi difaa ke tahet tum qanoon banasakte ho jab ke maamla Supreme Court mein zair douran hai? Yeh mayoosi ki khuli alamat hai aur woh darasal awam ka dheyaan btane ki koshish kar rahay hain taakay Bharat ke awam un se mulazimton, afraat e zar, ashya ki qeematon mein izafah, Kashmir mein jo kuch ho raha hai, selaab se mutasirah Kerala ki fauri imdaad na karne se mutaliq makhsoos sawalaat na kar saken. Sangh Pariwar aur BJP ke log har dosray din dheyaan hatao technic ko ikhtiyar karte hain.
402.title: Qanoon saazi ke zareya Ram Mandir ki taamir ka eindiya . Uttar Pradesh ke Deputy Chief Minister ke bayan par Barrister Owaisi ki nukta cheeni

news_detail: Hyderabad. Barr e Saghir Hind o Pak ke qalamkaar  sahafi janab Kuldip Nayar ka Dehli mein jumaraat ko mukhtasir si alalat ke baad bah umar 95 baras inteqaal hogaya. Janab Kuldip Nayar Punjabi thae magar un ki paidaiesh 1923 mein Sialkot mein hui thi. Indira Gandhi ney jab emergency nafiz ki thi to uss waqt janab Kuldip Nayar pahelay sahafi thae jinhein jail mein daal diya gaya tha. Woh Hind-Pak pur aman bahami taluqaat ke bohat baday wakeel thay. janab Kuldip Nayar  1947 mein Dehli se shaya honay walay Urdu akhbar ”Anjaam” se apni sahaafat ka aaghaz kiya tha. Sahaafat ke sath siyasat ka bhi woh taweel tajurbah rakhtay thae, aqwam e mutahidda mein Hindostan ke numainda aur Bartania mein High Commissioner of India rehne ke sath Rajya Sabha ke member bhi reh chuke, Hind o Pak ke darmiyan behtar taluqaat bananay ki unhon ney hamesha koshish ki aur isi par woh aksar likhte rahay, woh kayi baras tak pabandi se 14/15 August ko Amritsar mein waqay Hind o Pak ke Attari-Wagha par jaakar shama roshan karte rahay. 1923 mein Sialkot , Punjab Pakistan mein un ki paidaiesh hui wahein unhon ney wakalat tak ki taleem haasil ki, 47 mein hindostan aagaye aur waqalat karne ke bajaye sahaafat se wabista hogaye, phir yahin ki shehriat unhon ney hamesha ke liye ikhtiyar karli. Un ka column “between the lines” (bain as sutoor in Urdu) bahut maqbool huwa. Un ka column 80 se zayed akhbarat mein shaya huwa karta tha.
425.title: Buzurg sahafi Kuldip Nayar ab nahi rahay

news_detail: Srinagar: Indian Army ney Mejor Leetul Gogoi ka Court Marshal General karney ki tayyari karli hai jo Srinagar ki aik hotel mein aik kam umar Kasmiri ladki ke sath qabil e aitraaz haalat mein paye gaye thae jinhein muqami logon ney hotel ke kamrah mein aik ladki ke sath pakad liya tha. Brigadier  ke zair qayadat Court of Inquiry ney inhen baadi-un-nazar mein hotel mein aik kam umar ladki ke sath paye janey ka qusoorwaar paaya hai. Fouji Court of Inquiry ney Srinagar ke aik hotel se naujawan ladki ke sath girftar honay walay Bharati Major Leetul Gogoi  qusoorwaar qarar dae kar is ke khilaaf karwai ka hukum diya hai. Media ke mutabiq Army Court of Inquiry ney Major Leetul Gogoi ko Srinagar Hotel case mein mujrim qarar dae diya hai. Fouji adalat ney Major Gogoi ki fouji nazam o zabt ki khilaaf warzi par Army Act ke tahet karwaayi ka hukum diya hai. Fouji Adalat ney apney faisla mein kaha ke Major Gogoi ney muqami afraad ke sath kisi bhi qisam ka rishta qaayim karney se mutaliq hidayat ki khilaaf warzi ki aur woh hirasat ke waqt apni Duty ke muqam se door paye gaye thae jab ke ilaqa mein fouji operation bhi jari tha. Yeh nazam o zabt ki sangeen khilaaf warzi hai. Mahireen ka kahena hai ke Adalat ke hukum par Fouj ke hukkaam Major Leetul Gogoi ke khilaaf saza ka taayun kar saktay hain jis mein inhen mulazimat se jabri retire bhi kiya ja sakta hai ya phir Court Marshal bhi kiya ja sakta hai. Rawan saal 30

May ko Major Gogoi Srinagar ki aik Hotel mein naujawan ladki ke hamrah paye gaye thae jis par muqami afraad ney hotel ka gherao kar liya tha taham SP shumali Srinagar ney mudakhilat karte hue muzahireen ko muntashir kar ke major Gogoi aur ladki ko hirasat mein le liya tha. Baad-azan Major Gogi ko un ke unit ke hawale kardiya gaya tha jahan un ka trial kiya gaya. Wazeh rahay ke Major Leetul Gogoi Kashmir mein Bharati Fouj ke dasta Rashtrya Rifle ki 53

Battalion (Punjab Regiment) ke mutanazia tareen fouji afsar hain. Major Gogoi ney guzashta baras April mein aik Kasmiri naujawan ko apni jeep se bandh kar insani dhaal banaya tha. Is qabeeh feal ki aalami satah par muzammat ki gayi thi taham Fouj ney un ke is feal par kisi qisam ki tadeebi karwai nahi ki thi. Tadeebi action lainay ke bajaye Major Gogi ko fouji aizaz se nawaza tha. Fouji zaraye ney aaj bataya ke Mejor Gogoi ke khilaaf tadeebi karwai ke ahkaam jari kiye ja chukay hain.
434.title: Srinagar hotel case, Gogoi baadi un nazar mein qasoor waar

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ne aaj ye kahte huwe ki ikhatelaf e raay, jamuhriyat ke liye ‘Safety Valve’ hai, hidayat di ki Bhima Koregaoun case mein giraftar tamaam 5 karkunon ko 6
September tak ghar par nazarband rakha jaaye. Ab ye panch jahed kaar shayar o mufakkir Proffesar Varavara Rao Jahadakar Sudha Bhardwaj, Arun phareria, Gautam Nablakha aur Varun Gonzalveez 6

September tak jail nahi bheje jainge balki Police ki nigrani mein ghar par nazaraband rahenge. Adalat e Uzama ne Maharashtra Police se un jahed kaaron ko Bhima Koregaoun vaqiya ke 9 mah baad giraftar kiye jane par istefasar kiya. Chief Justice of India Mr. Justice Deepak Misra par mushtamil Bench ne kaha ikhetilaaf raay, jamuhoriyat ka Security Value hai aur agar aap in security valves ko nahi rakhenge to ye phat padegi. Supreme Court ne Maharashtra hukomat ko hidayat di ki dahashtgardi ke ilzaam mein Pune Police ki janib se huqooq e insaani jahed kaaron ki giraftari ko challenge karate huwe paanch daanishavaron bashamool Historian Romela Thaper, Economist Prabhat Patnayak aur Devika jain ki janib se daakhil karada darakhast par jawab dakhil kare. Maharashtra ki taraf se pesh hone wale wakeel ne darakhast ke javaz par yeh kahate hue ke aik ajanabi in jahed kaaron ke liye rahat talab nahi karsakata jo phale hi Highcourt se rujoo ho chuke hain etaraz kiya. Pune Police ne id-dia kiya ki ye jahedakar aik badi sazish se jude hain aur 35 colleges se arakaan ko bharti karane aur hamle karane ke mansube bana rahe the. In jahed kaaron ke khilaaf mutanaze qanoon insidaad gairqanuni sargarmiyaan ke tahat ilzaamat aayed kiye gaye. Police ka khena hai ki jariya saal June mein digar panch kaarkunon ki giraftariyon ke baad ki gayi tafateesh-o-tahaqeeq karte huve in jahed kaaron ki giraftari amal mein aaee hai aur giraftar shudagan ke pass se bhari miqadaar mein data wapis nikala hai.
462.title: Giraftar shuda 5 jahed kaaron ko Sept 6 tak ghar par nazarband rakha jaye: Supereme Court

news_detail: Hydairabad. Kuch dair ki taiz barish ney Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke kal munaqqid shudni ”Pragathi Nivedana” ke jalsa gaah ko tahess nahess kardiya. Aaj shaam hui kuch dair ki taiz barish aur toofaani hawaon se jalsa aam ke liye kiye gaye tamaam intizamaat par pani phir gaya hai. Jalsa gaah mein eistaada Chief Miister o Sadar TRS Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ke qad aawar kat oats zameen par dhair hogaye, banners aur hoardings ukhad gaye. jalsa gaah mein bichaya gaye qaleen bhi barish ke baais kharab hogaye aur shahnasheen ke taur par baneya gaya pindal bhi apni raunaq kho baitha. Jagah jagah pani jama hogaya hai. Jalsa gaah ko kal ke liye phir se tayyar rakhney ke liye mazdooron ko raat bhar kaam par maamoor kardiya gaya hai. zameen ko khushk karne ke bhi intizamaat kiye jarahay hain. jalsa ke aaghaz se qabl barish ki tabah karyon par sarkari missionaries bhi pareshan hogayi hai. sarkari afsaraan ko ab yeh dar lagney laga hai ke agar kal jalsa ke mauqa par isi tarha ki barish hogi to bhagdar mach janey ke khadshaat ko mustard nahi kiya ja sakta hai. Iss liye kal jalsa ke dauran barish honey ki soorat mein awam ki wapsi aur gadiyon ke phas janey ke baayis jo afratafri phailay gi iss ke baray mein ohdedar mutafakkir nazar arhay hain. Pragathi Nivedana ke jalsa gaah mein barish ki tabah karyon ki ittila pakar party ke senior qayedeen bashmool awaami numainday aur wuzraa bhi Kongara Kalan pahonchney lagey hain. Telangana Rashtra Samithi ka ye jalsa darasal riyasati hukoomat ka jalsa hai jo TRS ki chaar sala karkardagi ko awam ke samney paish karne ke liye munaqqid kya ja raha hai magar is jalsa ko kuch iss andaaz mein paish kya ja raha hai jaisay yeh TRS ki siyasi taaqat ka mazhar hai. Yeh bhi samgha ja raha hai ke Chief Minister KCR apni chaar sala karkardagi awam ke samney paish karne ke baad awam ka taaza khat e etemaad haasil karne ka elaan karenge aur sath hi woh Telangana Assembly ke liye apni party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar dein ge.
491.title: Pragathi Nivedana ki tayyarion par pani phir gaya.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Delhi High Court ney Qaumi Senior Secondary School ke liye 4000 gaz jagah faraham karne aur behtareen sahulaton se lais asri School taameer karne Hukoomat ko hidaayat di. Adalat ney yeh faisla janab Feroz Bakht Ahmed, Chancellor Molana Azad National Urdu University ki mafaad aama darkhwast par guzashta hafta kya. Adalat ney faisla dete hue kaha ke ghurba aur msakin ke liye tamam agencies, jaisay DDA, MCD, Director of Education, CBSE, Hukoomat e Delhi aur Markazi Hukoomat sabhi mil kar taawun karen aur aik misaali Urdu Medium School ko qaayim karkay yeh saabit kar dein ke Hindustani adliya insaaf pasand hai aur baghair koi farq kiye, barabari se sabhi ke huqooq ki nigehbani karti hai.

janab Feroz Bakht ki qanooni musheer mohtarma Tayyiba Siddiqui ki darkhwast ko hizab mukhalif ke wukla ney bhi himayat ki. Yeh School taqseem e Hind ke baad, un logon ney taameer kya tha keh jinhon ney, Pakistan janay ke bajaye hindostan ka intikhab kya aur purani Delhi mein apne gharron ke qareeb Qaumi School ke naam se yeh darsgaah taameer ki jo us waqt taqreeban 2200 murabba gaz mein bani hui thi aur is mein taqreeban 1200 bachay zair e taleem thae. Is ki bunyaad bataur e Primaray School padi aur 1964 mein yeh Secondary School bana, jab ke 1975 mein yeh Senior Secondary School ban gaya. Taham is School ko Emergency ke dauran 30

June 1976 ko masmaar kardiya gaya tha lekin is ki taameer nau nah hosaki. Iss tarha yeh 42 baras baad Qaumi Senior Secondary School ki imarat ki taameer nau ki umeed bandhi hai. Musheer qanoon janab Ateeb Siddiqui , samaji karkun ney apne bayan mein Delhi High Court ke faisla ka khair muqaddam karte hue usay tareekhi qarar diya. Janab Mohammad Iqbal Malik, General Secretary, Friends for Education ney kaha ke School ki taameer mein kaun haath btate hain, iss ka intzaar rahay ga. Unhon ney adalat ke faisla ka khair muqaddam karte hue janab Feroz Bakht Ahmed ko kamyaab jadd o jahed par mubarakbaad di.
502.title: Qaumi Urdu School Delhi ke haq mein Adalat ka faisla

news_detail: Moulana Mahmood Madani General Secretary Jamiat Ulema e Hind ney Uttarakhand High Court ke zareya mazhabi idaron ke fatwa par aayed kardah pabandi ko Dastoor ke bunyadi huqooq aur Superem Court ke faisla ke khilaaf qaraar diya hai. Moulana Mahmood Madani ki yeh arzi kal Superem Court mein daakhil kar di jaye gi. Unhon ney apni arzi mein kaha ke High Court ka yeh faisla Constitution of India ki dafaa 26 aur Vishwa Lochan Madan case banam Hukoomat e Hind mein Superem Court ke sadir kardah faisla se mutsadam hai. Arzi mein istadlaal kiya gaya hai ke Dastoor e Hind ki dafaa 26 (b) mein har aik ko apne mazhabi masayel mein khud ke intizam ka haq diya gaya hai, lehaza usay koi bhi adalat khatam nahi kar sakti. Iss ke alawa High Court ka mazkoorah faisla Constitution ki dafaa 141 se bhi mutsadim hai jis ke tahet kisi bhi adalat ko Superem Court ke faislay ke khilaaf faislay ka haq haasil nahi hai. Unhon ney kaha ke mazhabi idaron se jari kya jaaney wala fatwa hargiz kisi ko is par amal karne ke liye majboor nahi karta balkay khud petitioner ke jawab mein sharai hukum ki wazahat hoti hai, aisay mein usay kisi tarha insani waqar aur Dastoor ke khilaaf nahi kaha ja sakta. Moulana Madani ney is baat par hairat ka izhaar kiya ke fazil judge ney sirf aik din ke andar wakeel ke zarey paish kardah akhbar ke tarashe ki bunyaad par faisla kardiya aur soorat waqea ki khatirkhuwa tafteesh ki zaroorat tak mehsoos nahi ki. Sach to yeh hai ke jis waqia ke madd e nazar faisla diya gaya hai is waqia ka fatwa se koi talluq nahi hai. Mutaliqa akhbar se bhi zahir hota hai ke woh panchayat ke logo ka faisla tha jis mein kisi aalim ya mufti ka naam tak bhi zikar nahi hai. Wazeh ho ke 3

August ke Amar Ujala mein yeh khabar shaya hui thi ke Lashkar mein asmat dari se mutasirah khatoon aur is ke ahal khanah ko muqami panchayat ney insaaf dilaney ke bajaye gaon se bahar nikal ney ka hukum de diya. Moulana Madani ney is azm ka izhaar kiya ke Jamiat Ulema e Hind Muslim aqliat ke mazhabi huqooq o shanakht ke liye har mumkin jidd o jahed jari rakhegi aur is muqadma ke silsila mein wukla se mashwera karne ke baad Adalat e Uzma mein poori quwat se apna muaqqaf paish kere gi.
518.title: Fatwa par pabandi ka maamla: Jamiat Ulma ki arzi

news_detail: Gujrat ke sabiq IPS Officer Mr. Sanjiv Bhatt ko aaj subah Gujrat Police CID (Crime) ne 1996 ke aik case mein girftar kar liya hai. Yeh wohi Jarry IPS Afsar hain jinhon ne Mulk ki sab se taaqatwar shakhsiyat ke khilaaf watan ko ma baad Godhra fasadaat ke talluq se sachaai batane uth khaday huwe thae. Inhen Banskantha Police ki janib se 1996 mein darj manshiat ke aik muqadma ke silsila mein girftar kiya gaya jis waqt woh wahan Superintendent of Police thae. Gujrat High Court ki January mein di gayi aik hidayat par Gujrat CID ne is muqadma ki tahaqeeq ki hai. Mr. Bhatt ke alawa deegar kayi Police ohdedaron se pooch gach ki jarahi hai. Mr. Bhatt aur deegar ki giraftari ki touseeq ke alawa CID is masla par koi tabserah nahi kar rahi hai. January mein Higch Court ne CID(Crime) ko hidayat di thi ke 1996 mein darj kardah aik FIR ki tayhaqeeq kere jis mein Rajasthan ke aik wakeel ke khilaaf mobayyana taur par 1.5 kg  narcotics rakhnay par aik muqadma darj kiya gaya tha. Iss case mein Gujrat High Court ke sabiq Judge Ramanlal Jain bhi mulawis thae. Case ki tafseelaat ke mutabiq Palanpur mein Lajwanti City Hotel ke aik kamrah se manshiat bar aamad huwe thi aur Police ne Sameer Singh Raj Purohit nami aik wakeel ke khilaaf yeh id-daa karte huwe muqadma darj karliya tha ke un ke qabza mein manshiat payi gayeen. Taham baad azan Rajasthan Police ne yeh id-daa kiya ke Raj Purohit ko mobayyana taur par Rajasthan ke Pali mein un ke ghar se aghwaa kiya gaya aur Banskuntha Police ki janib se manshiat ka parcel rakha gaya.

Taaqatwar siyasatdanon ke khilaaf aawaz uthany ki Sanjiv Bhatt ko badi qeematein chukani padi. Unhen ibteda mein be dast o paa karne ke liye farzi muqadmaat mein phansaya gaya. Unhen kayi Commissions aur courts mein apna bayan darj karwatay rehna pada. Aur phir markazi wizarat e Dakhila ne unhen August 2015 mein yeh kehte huwe mulazimat se barkhast kardiya ke woh duty se ghair haazir rahay hain, halaan ke woh uss douran Nanavati Commission ke rubaru apna bayan qalamband karwa rahay thae. Un ki 27 sala khidmaat ke bawajood badteenat hukoomat ne baghair wazifa ya gratuity ke mulazmat se be dakhal kardiya. Haal hi mein hukoomat ne haqeer security cover se dastbardari ikhtiyar karli jo unhen aur un ki family ko farhaam kiya gaya tha. Yahan tak hi iktafa nahi kya gaya balkay Ahmedabad Muncipal Corporation ne ghair majaz tamirat ke jurmane ke taur par un ki khandani rahaish gaah ka kitchen aur Bathroom munhadim kardiya, halaank un ki darkhwast Superem Court mein zair iltewa hai. Jis waqt Godhra saneha paish aaya tha uss waqt Sanjiv Bhatt State Intelligence Ggandhi Nagar mein Deputy Commissioner Incharge of Internal Security thae. Is saneha ke douran jis mein aik hazaar se zayed musalmanoon ka qatal huwa tha, beshtar police ohdedar khamooshi ikhtiyar karne mein apni aafiat mehsoos ki thi magar Sanjiv Bhatt ne farz shanasi ka behtareen muzahira karte huwe be khauf apne faraiz anjaam diye aur intelligence se imkani fasadaat ke baaray mein apni reports paish karte rahay. Rukn Parliament Ahsan Jaffri ki bewa Zakia Jaffri ki janib se darj karwai gayi shikayat mein Sanjiv Bhatt ki bheji gayeen advisories ko ahem shahadat ke taur par paish kiya tha. Sanjiv Bhatt ne natayej ki parwah kiye baghair na sirf Zakia Jafferi ki darj kardah shikayat ki tehaqeeq karne wali SIT ke rubaroo apna bayan qalamband karwaya balkay 2002 ke qatal e aam mein riyasati nazam o nasq machinery  ke role ko be naqaab karte huwe aur taaqatwar mulzimeen bashmool uss waqt ke Chief Minister Gujrat Narendr Modi ko bachanay SIT ki koshishon ko aashkaar karte huwe Superem Court mein aik mufasil halaf nama bhi daakhil kiya tha. Superem Court mein Sanjiv Bhatt ke daakhil kardah halaf nama mein wazeh taur par uss waqt ke Chief Minister Gujrat Narendra Modi ke role ko be naqaab kiya gaya tha jinhon ne aala Police ohdedaron koh hidayat di thi ke Hindus ko apni barhami ka izhaar karne ka khula mauqa faraham kiya jaye. Bad qismati se Superem Court ki janib se muqarrar kardah khusoosi Special Investigation Team ne un ke ilzamaat ko mustard kardiya aur Narendr Modi aur riyasat ke deegar taaqatwar siyasatdanon ko Clean Chit dete huwe case ko band kardainay ki report daakhil kar di. Is closer report ko Gujrat ki aik adalat mein challenge kiya gaya hai aur Sanjiv Bhatt hanooz aik ahem gawah hain. Sanjiv Bhatt ne Superem Court mein halaf nama daakhil karne ke ilawa justice Nanavati Commission aur qaumi aqliati Commission ke rubaroo halfia bayanaat diye.
526.title: Modi ko benaqaab karne walay sabiq IPS Sanjiv Bhatt girftar

news_detail: New Delhi. Maharashtra Hukoomat ne aaj Supreme Court mein daakhil kardah apne halaf nama mein yeh id-daa kiya ke huqooq e insani ke 5 jahadkaron (Activists) ko banned Organization CPM ( Maoist) se talluq rakhnay ke pukhta saboton ki buniyaad par girftar kiya gaya tha na ke ikhtelaaf raye ki wajah se. Adalat e Uzma ne 29
August ko giraftarshudgan ko 6

September tak ghar par nazarband rakhnay ki hidayat dainay ke sath kaha ke ‘Democracy mein ikhtelaaf raye safety valve’ hai. Maharashtra Police ne mumtaz Historian Romila Thaper aur deegar 4 ki darkhwast par jawabi halaf nama daakhil karte huwe ilzaam aayed kiya ke woh Mulk mein pur-tashaddud karwaiyon ko anjaam dainay aur Security Forces par ghaat lagaakar hamla karne ki mansoobeh bandi kar rahay thay. Huqooq insani ke 5 jahadkaron ko Pune Police ne 28

August ko Bhimakoregaon tashadud muqadma mein Mulk ke mukhtalif maqamat se girftar karliya tha. Riyasti Police ney kaha ke khatirkhah shawahid maujood hain jo un ke is id-daa ko zaayel kardete hain ke unhen ikhtelaaf raye rakhnay par girftar kiya gaya hai. Police ney Thaper Economists Prabhat Patnayak aur Devaki Jain, Socialogist Satish Deshpande aur Legal Expert Maja Duruwala ki janib se daayer kardah darkhwast ke qanooni juwaz ko challenge karte huwe kaha ke woh is maamla mein tehqiqaat ke liye woh ajnabi hain.
537.title: Activists ka Maoist se talluq: Maharashtra Police

news_detail: New Dehli. Tazirat e Hind ki dafaa 377 ke wujoob ko challenge karte huwe daakhil kardah darkhwaston par Supreme Court Budh ko apna faisla sadir kere gi. Supreme Court yeh taye kere gi ke aaya raza karana hum jins parasti ka jurm hona durust hai ya nahi. Adalat Uzma  ney 17

July ko apna faisla mehfooz rakha tha ke aaya dafa 377 ko qabil e taazeer rakha jaye ya nahi. Qabl azeen markazi Hukumat  ney IPC 377 ke mustaqbil ka faisla Supreme Court par chod diya tha aur Adalat e Uzma  ney apne taraf se yeh sakhat ishara diya tha ke woh hum jins parasti ko jurm qarar dainay wali dafaa ko kaladam kardey gi. Mulk ki aala adalat  ney kaha ke hatta ke Tazirat e Hind ki dafa 377 ke qanooni jawaz ka tamam paheloun se chhan phatak  karte huve iss fayl ki taaazirat ko khatam kardiya jaye to bhi raza karana hum jins parasti par iss bradari se juday imtiyaaz aur samaji badnami ka khadsha baqi rehta hai. Dehli High Court  ney 2009 mein dafaa 377 ko qabil e taazeer jurm barkhast karne ke haq mein faisla diya tha taham 2013 mein Suresh Kumar Koushal ba muqabla Naz Foundation Case mein Supreme Court ki do rukni judge ki bench ney is faisla ko kaladam kardiya tha. Adalat Uzma  ney May mein faisla kiya tha ke Indian Institute of Technology ke LGBT Alumni Asosition ki janib se dafaa 377 ki barkhastgi ka mutaliba karte huwe daakhil kardah darkhwast ki samaat kerey gi. Qabal azeen 27

April ko Humsafar Trust ke Ashok Rao Koi aur Arif Jaffer ney bhi dafaa 377 ke khilaaf darkhwasten dayer ki thi. Iss dafaa mein yeh kaha gaya ke koi bhi fard kisi aurat, mard ya janwar ke sath ghair fitri tareeqa se mubashrat karta hai to woh 10 saal ki sazaye qaid ka mustawajib hoga aur is par jurmaana bhi aayed hoga.
551.title: SC: IPC 377 par Budh ko faisla

news_detail: France ke saddar ka tohfatan diya gaya poda White House se gayab hogaya. poda France ke aas ilaqa se laya gaya tha jahan doosri jang-e azeem mein do hazaar Amrici fouji maaray gay they. yeh poda France ke saddar Emmanuel Macron ne Amrici saddar donald trmp ko bator tohfa diya tha aur is pouday ko White House ke baagh mein America aur France ke sudoor ne mil kar lagaya tha. francesi sadar ne kaha tha ke yeh darakht hamein’ un cheezon ki yaad dilay ga, jo hamein jode hue hain, lekin poda laganay ke sirf chaar roz baad poda wahan mojood nahi tha .
440.title: Francesi Sadar ka tohfa White House se gayab

news_detail: Gaza- islami tehreek muzahmat’ Hamas ‘ ke siyasi shoba ke sarbarah Ismail Haniyeh ne garbh Urdan mein sadar Mahmood Abbas ki zair sadarat munaqqidah Palestine National Council ke ijlaas ke tamam faislay mustard kar diye hain. un ka kehna hai hai jis siyasi group ki taraf se Palestine National Council ka ijlaas munaqqid kya gaya hai woh Falasteeni qoum ki numaindagi nahi karta. khayaal rahay ke Palestine National Council ka ijlaas 9 saal ke baad kal 30

April ko Ramla mein sadar Mahmood Abbas ki zire sdart shuru huva. Hamas sameit kayi doosri jamaten pehlay hi is ijlaas ka boycott krchki hain. yeh ijlaas aik aisay waqt mein munaqqid ho raha hai jab doosri taraf Amrici saddar Donald trmp maqboza beeet almuqaddas ko Israel ka dar-al-hakoomat qarar dainay ke baad tall abib se apna sifarat khanah al quds muntaqil karne ki tayari kar rahay hain. Gaza mein –apne ghar par jama aik ijtima se khitaab mein Ismail Haniyeh ne kaha ke’ hum Ramla mein honay walay Palestine national council ke ijlaas aur is ke faislon ko nahi mantay. yeh ijlaas aik makhsoos labi aur group ka iqdaam hai jo Falasteeni qoum ki haqeeqi maino mein numaindagi ka haq nahi rakhta. unhon ne saddar Mahmood abbas par tanqeed karte hue un par ilzaam Aayed kya ke woh national council ke ijlaas ke zareya aaeni tahaffuz haasil karne ke sath –apne Iqtidaar ko tole dainay ki koshish kar rahay hain, magar un ka yeh iqdaam inhen aaeni juwaz faraham nahi karsaktha .

Hamas ke leader ne mulk mein fouri tour par Parlimani aur sadaarti intikhabaat karanay ka bhi mutalba kya. unhon ne kaha ke Hamas naam Nihaad National Council ke ijlaas aur is ke faislon ki paband nahi. hum Falasteeni qoum ke mafaad mein –apne usooli muaqqaf ke mutabiq kaam jari rakhay gi. Hamas tanzeem azaadi Palestine ke baare mein –apne muaqqaf par is taq nazar sani kere gi jab taq ke tamam Falasteeni quwatoon ke liye is ke darwazay khol nahi diye jatay. Ismail Haniyeh ka kehna tha ke Palestine national council aisay hi aik dhrhe ki numaindagi karti hai jaissa ke tanzeem azaadi Palestine ki markazi council aur executive committee jin mein Hamas aur islami jehaad ko shaamil nahi kya gaya. mubasireen ka khayaal hai ke Palestine national council ka ijlaas koi johri tabdeeli to nahi laaye ga taham ujla mein executive committee ke 18 naye arkaan ka intikhab amal mein laya ja sakta .

Palestine national council ke ijlaas ka boycott karne walon mein Hamas , islami jehaad aur awaami mahaaz baraye azaadi Falasteeni jaisi barri Falasteeni tanzeemen shaamil hain. un ke ilawa 740 arkaan mein se 100 arkaan ne bhi shirkat nahi ki. yeh ijlaas aik aisay waqt mein sun-hwa hai jab Gaza ki patti aur Israel ki sarhad par guzashta kayi hafton se flstinyon ki haq wapsi ki tehreek chal rahi hai jis mein ab taq 45 Falasteeni muzahireen shaheed kiye ja chuke hain.
457.title: Hamas ne Palestine National Council ke ijlaas ke elanaat mustard kardiye

news_detail: Iran mein islaah pasand reh numa abdullah nasri ki janib se Iran Iraq jung mein halaak honay walay ahal karon ki bewaon se mutaliq diye gaye bayan ny tanaza peda kar diya hai. nasri ny yeh bayan islaah pasandon ki Website” insaaf news” ko diya tha. Website ny hafta ke din aik report jari ki jis mein bataya gaya ke mazkura bewa khawateen ny hizab e ikhtilaaf ke bohat se afraad ki siyasi zindagi khatam karanay mein Irani security idaron ki madad ki. nasri ke mutabiq security idaron ny Iraq Iran jung ( 1980. 1988 ) mein maaray jaaney walay afraad ki baaz bewaon ko” Khattafaat” yani” aankra khawateen” ke naam se mansoobay mein istemaal kya. is mansoobay ka maqsad mukhtalif Irani hukoomaton ke wazraa aur senior ohdedaron ko jaal mein phaansna tha .

insaaf news ki nama nigaar Masooma Rashidyaan ny apni report mein bataya ke Khattafaat ( aankra ) woh naam hai jo security idaron ke liye jasoosi ke vaastaa jins ko bator hathyaar istemaal karne wali khawateen ko diya jata hai “. report mein mukhtalif Irani hukoomaton mein wazraa aur ohdedaron ke isifon ko Khattafaat ke hathon jinsi jaal mein phas jaaney ke sath marboot kya. is silsila mein Mohammad khatmi ke daur mein sabiq wazeer Saqafat Ata 4 Ataullah Mahajrani aur Mahmood Ahmadi Nazaad ki hukoomat ke kayi wazraa ke ilawa saddar husn Rohani ke maqarrab afraad mein shaamil t_hran ke mayor ka mustafi hona shaamil hai. doosri janib islaah pasand bock mein mushawarti committee ke rukan vird nasri ny intelli jins idaron ki janib se” Khattafaat” ki bharti par roshni daali. unhon ny bataya ke Iraq ke sath 8 baras taq jari jung ny –apne peechay khawateen ki aik barri tadaad ko chorra jo kam Umri mein hi –apne shoharon ko kho bathain. isi wajah se un mein bohat si khawateen hakoomati ya deegar ohday daraan ki doosri biwi ban gayeen ya phir najaaiz azdawaji taluqaat mein marboot ho gayeen. nasri ny mazeed kaha ke security idaron ki janib se khawateen ka istemaal kya jana duniya bhar mein aik Maroof tareeqa car hai aur Iran bhi is se mustasna nahi. jung ke douran bewa hojane wali khawateen ko bator Khattafaat istemaal karne ke hawalay se nasri ke bayan ny sakht geer media ko chairag pa kar diya. is ke nateejay mein” insaaf news” ny moazrat paish karte hue report se is paragraph ko hazf kar diya.
Source: Al-Arabia
470.title: Irani intelli jins ke liye siyasat daano ko jaal mein phansanay wali” Khattafaat” ke hawala par tanaza

news_detail: Marakish nay Iran ke sath safarti taluqaat munqita karne ka elaan kardiya hai. is naay yeh faisla Iran ki janib se sahara ki alahdgi pasand tehreek’ Polisario Front’ ki himayat ke rad-e-amal mein kya hai. Polisario Front marakish se saheraawi awam ke liye azaadi ke naam par goreela jung lardte rahi hai. is waqt aqwam mutahidda ki mudakhlat ke baad is Front aur marakish ke darmain jung bandi hai. mrakshi wazeer kharja Nasir Boritha nay mangal ke roz sahafion se guftagu karte hue kaha ke t_hran mein mrakshi sifarat khanah band kar diya jaye ga aur Rabat mein mtayin irani safeer ko mulk se be dakhal kar diya jaye ga. unhon naay Iran aur Lebanon ki Shiah malaysia hizab Allah par Polisario Front ki himayat aur is ke jngjoon ko askari tarbiyat dainay ka ilzaam Aayed kya hai. irani hukoomat naay marakish ke is elaan aur ilzaam par fori tor par kisi rad-e-amal ka izhaar nahi kya hai .
489.title: Polisario Front ki himayat : Marakish ka Iran se sifarti taluqaat munqita karne ka elaan

news_detail: Turkey ke shehar Azmir mein mukhtalif mumalik ki musallah afwaj ki mushtarqa fouji mashqen shuru hogayi hain. un mashqon mein Saudi arab aur maizban Turkey ke ilawa mutadid mumalik ki tenu musallah afwaj ke dastay aur khusoosi units hissa le rahay hain. Saudi arab ke brri aur behri daston ke ilawa Shahi fazaiya ke pandrah laraka jet bhi un mashqon mein shareek hain. Saudi commander colonel abdulah ban Mohammad Al Zarebi nay bataya hai ke musallah afwaj ke dastay dost mumalik ke sath mukhtalif fouji mashqen kar rahay hain. woh behri mashqon mein talashi aur jungi mahol mein risko ki karwaiyon mein hissa le rahay hain. unhon nay kaha ke yeh jungi mashqen shareek mumalik ki musallah afwaj ke liye barri ahmiyat ki haamil hain aur woh mtnoa fouji teknikon ko apni Herbi salahiyat mein izafay ke liye browe car laa satke hain. yeh dosra mauqa hai ke Saudi arab ki musallah afwaj Turkey mein un EFES mashqon mein shareek hain. is se pehlay unhon nay 2016 mein Turkey mein munaqidah un mashqon mein shirkat ki thi
505.title: Turkey mein Saudi arab sameit mukhtalif mumalik ki fouji mashqen

news_detail: Islami jamhooria Iran , sipahh pasdaran inqilab aur Aira noon ka markazi bank dehshat gardon ke America par tayyarah hamlon mein muawnat ke qasoor waar hain jin ke nateeja mein kam se kam teen hazaar afraad halaak hogaye they. adalat mein muqadma dair karne walay mutasirah khandano ke aik wakeel Robert Hyfeel ny kaha hai ke wifaqi adalat ko Iran ki janib se Al Qaeda ko muhayya ki gayi maali imdaad ke saboot paish kiye gaye hain aur is ki yeh maadi imdaad hi Al Qaeda ke nine eleven hamlon ka aik sabab bani thi jis se hlaktin huien, secron afraad zakhmi hue aur tabahi hui thi. wifaqi judge ny Iran ko hukum diya hai ke woh har mutasirah maa baap ko 85 laakh dollars, har mutasirah khawand ya biwi ko aik crore 25 laakh dollars, baap ya maa mahroom hojane walay har bachay ko 85 laakh dollars aur har mutasirah behan ya bhai ko saarhay 42 laakh dollars ki raqam ada kere. Iran ny America mein –apne khilaaf harjanay ke is muqadmay ki samaat ke aaghaz ke baad se khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye rakhi hai. is liye is baat ka kam hi imkaan hai ke woh un mutasirah khandano ko adalat ke faisla ki paasdari karte hue koi raqam ada kere ga . .
521.title: Americi judge ka Iran ko 9 / 11 ke mutasirah khandano ko 6 arab dollars ada karne ka hukum

news_detail: America mein New Zealand ke sifarat khana se wabsta fouji atashi kmodor Alfred Keating sifarat khana ke ghusal khaanoon mein khufia camera laga kar khawateen ehalkaron ki videos bananay ke ilzaam mein un dinon –apne malik mein muqadma ka saamna kar rahay hain. New Zealand herald Nami muqami akhbar ke mutabiq New Zealand sifaratkhane ke ghusal khaanoon mein khufia cameron ka inkishaaf guzashta baras July mein sun-hwa tha. akhbar ke mutabiq sabiq fouji atashi neh adalat se douran muqadma istada ki thi ke karwai ke douran is ka naam zahir nah kya jaye. jummay ke roz is zimn mein pehli samaat hui. isi akhbar ke mutabiq New Zealand police neh apni noiyat ke anokhay waqea ki tafteesh ke liye America ka dora bhi kya tha. police ki tehqiqaat ke nateeja mein sabiq fouji ahelkaar par ghair qanooni tareeqa se sharamnaak manazair ko khufia cameron ke zariye monitor karne ka ilzaam Aayed kya gaya. athawan sala kmodor Alfred neh ilzamaat sach saabit honay par –apne ohday se istifa day diya tha aur un dinon New zealandmein mojood hain. ahelkaar ke qareebi zaraye ka kehna hai ke fouji atashi jinsi hawas mein mubtala hain. Keating America mein –apne malik ke sifarat khana mein aik aala aur zimma daar ohda par Faiz they. woh Amrici hum mansab ohdedaron se New zealandse mutaliq mutadid ahem mamlaat mein –apne malik ki numaindagi kar chuke they. is baat ka ihtimal hai ke Keating ko sharamnaak iqdaam ki Padaash mein aik se do baras ki qaid ki saza suna di jaye
529.title: New zealand ke fouji atashi neh sifarat khana ke ghusal khanaay mein khufia camera kyun lgwaya ?

news_detail: Saudi Arab ki iqtisadi aur taraqiyati council neh mayarِ zindagi programme 2020 ka aaghaz kar diya hai. is par 34 Arab 60 crore dollars ( 130 Arab Ryal ) laagat aeye gi. miyaar zindagi programme bhi Saudi Arabia ki maeeshat ko mutanau bananay aur tail par maeeshat ka inhisaar kam karne ke liye jari kardah Vision  2030ka hissa hai. mumlikat ki wazarti council neh is ki manzoori di thi. is ka bara maqsad saqafati, tafrehi aur khelon ke shobo mein aisi sar garmion ke naye mawaqay muhayya karna hain jin se shehrion ka miyaar zindagi buland ho, sarmaya kaari ki hosla afzai ho aur iqtisadi sar garmion mein bhi tanawu aeye. is ke ilawa khidmaat ki farahmi aur infrastructure ki taamer ke lehaaz se Saudi Arab ke teen shehron ka miyaar behtar banana hai taakay un ka shumaar duniya ke jadeed taraqqi Yafta aik so shehron mein ho. Saudi walii ehad aur iqtisadi wo taraqiati council ke chirmin shehzada Mohammad ban Salman ki koshisho se miyaar zindagi programme shuru kya gaya hai aur is ki mansoobah bandi mein darasal un hi ka vision karfrma hai. woh khadim alhrmin alshrifin Shah Salman ban abdalaziz ki nigrani mein Saudi maeeshat ko mazeed khush haal aur Saudi muashray ko mazeed tawana aur taraqqi karta sun-hwa banana chahtay hain. miyaar zindagi programme ke tehat mukhtalif mansoobon ki kal laagat ka takhmeenah 130 Arab Ryal lagaya gaya hai. is mein se saarhay 74 Arab Ryal ki barah e raast sarmaya kaari ki jaye gi. is ka aik maqsad mutaliqa shobo mein ghair tail khaam qaumi pedawar mein 2020 hamza taq 20 fi sad salana izafah karna hai. is ke ilawa aayndah do saal mein mutaliqa shobo mein muqami mawaad ka hissa 67 fi sad hoga. is programme ke tehat shehrion ki Falah vb_hbod ke liye mukhtalif naye mansoobay shuru kiye jayen ge jis se unhein jadeed shehri sahulaton ki dasteyabi ke ilawa mlazmton ke naye mawaqay bhi muyassar ayen ge
541.title: Saudi Arabia : 34 Arab 60 crore dollars ki laagat se mayarِ zindagi programme ka aaghaz

news_detail: Bartanwi khabar rasan agency ney aik Aini Shahid ke hawala se bataya hai ke paiir ke roz maqboza Bait ul Maqdismein 3 sign bordz dekhnay mein aeye hain jin par” Amrici sifarat khanah” tehreer hai. yeh paish Raft aindah haftay shehar mein sifarat khanaay ke iftitah se qabal samnay aayi hai. tafseelaat ke mutabiq angrezi, abrani aur arabi zabaan ke yeh bordz Bait ul Maqdiske janoobi hssh mein Amrici consul khanaay ki imarat ke nazdeek lagaye gay hain. yeh imarat 14 May ko sarkari tor par sifarat khanaay ki muntaqili ke baad Amrici safarti mission ka saddar daftar ban jaye gi .

is se qabal Falasteeni saddar Mahmood abbas ney Falasteeni qaumi council ka aik ijlaas talabb kya tha taa ke Amrici saddar Donald trmp ki janib se Bait ul Maqdisko Israeli dar-al-hakoomat tasleem karne aur Amrici sifarat khanaay ko wahan muntaqil karne se mutaliq faislon ke jawab ki hikmat e amli waza ki ja sakay. Tawaqqo hai ke Americi sifarat khanah ki muntaqili ke aik roz baad 15 May ko’ ‘ yom al nakbata’ ‘ ( yani Israel ke qiyam ke 70 baras poooray honay ) ki yaad ke mauqa par Falasteeni ehtijaj ka silsila –apne urooj par poanch jaye ga. yaad rahay ke 1948 mein isi roz lakhoon flstinyon ko jabri tor par hijrat par majaboor kar diya gaya tha.
555.title: Bait ul Maqdis ki sadkon par” American sifarat khanaay” ke sign bords

news_detail: Yemen se daaghe janay wala ballestic missile Saudi fazaiya ny budh ke roz fiza hi mein tabah kar diya jis ke baais darlhkomt Riyadh aik martaba phir barri tabahi se bach gaya. Aini shahideen ny bataya ke budh ke roz darlhkomt Riyadh mein yakke baad deegray chaar zor daar dhmakon ki aawazian sunai den. Houthiوں ke sarkari tally vision’ ‘ Almesrah’ ‘ ny Houthi malaysia ke hawala se daawa kya ke budh ke roz anqlabyon ny Saudi darlhkomt Riyadh mein’ ‘ muashi ahdaaf’ ‘ par missile daaghe.’ ‘ Almesrah ‘ channel ki screen par chalaye gayi breaking news mein daawa kya gaya ke’ ‘ ballestic missilon ki bochhaar ny Riyadh mein muashi ahdaaf ko taaqat se nishana banaya.’ ‘ haliya chand mahino ke douran Yemen ke Houthi baghion ny kayi baar Saudi darlhkomt ko missilon se nishana banaya, taham Saudi fouj ny inhen fiza hi mein nakara bana diya
567.title: Yemen se Riyadh par kia gaya ballestic missile hamla nakaam

news_detail: Rusia ki wizarat difaa neh Israel ke Shaam par fazai hamlay ki tafseel jari ki hai aur kaha hai ke Israel ke 28 ladaka tayyaron neh Shami ilaqon par fazai bombari mein hissa liya hai aur unhon neh Shami ahdaaf par 70 missile daage hain. inter fax khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq roosi wizarat difaa neh jumaraat ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke’ ‘ Israel neh 28 f 15 aur f 16 ladaka tayyaron ko hamlay mein istemaal kya hai. unhon neh fiza se zameen mein maar karne walay 60 missile Shaam ke mukhtalif ilaqon par daage they. un ke Ula woh 10 mazeed zameen se zameen par maar karne walay missile bhi daage gaye hain. roos ka kehna hai ke Shaam ke fazai difai nizaam neh un mein se nisf se ziyada missilon ko maar giraya tha aur baqi missilon se honay walay nuqsanaat ka andaza lagaya ja raha hai. wizarat difaa neh mazeed bataya hai ke Israeli tayyaron neh Dimashq ke nawah mein aur Shaam ke janoobi ilaqay mein Iran ke musallah groupon ke thikanon aur Shami fouj ke fazai difai nizaam ko nishana banaya hai. Israel ka kehna hai ke budh ki raat is ke zair qabza golan ki chotyon par Shaam se qareeban 20 rocket fire kiye gaye they aur is neh un rakton ke rad-e-amal mein yeh fazai hamla kya hai. is neh Iran ki al quds force par yeh rocket fire karne ka ilzaam Aayed kya hai aur kaha hai ke is ke missile shikan nizaam neh un mein se chaar ko nakara bana diya tha aur baqi is ke ilaqay mein nahi giray hain. idhar Israeli fouj ke aik tarjuman lieutenant colonel jonathn konri kis neh kaha hai ke’ ‘ roos ko Shaam mein mukhtalif ahdaaf par hamlon ke baare mein paishgi mutala kardiya gaya tha’ ‘. taham unhon neh is ki mazeed wazahat nahi ki hai .

darin asna roos ke naib wazeer difaa mikhayl Bugadanouf neh tamam fareeqon par zor diya hai ke woh zabt vthml ka muzahira karen. un ka kehna hai ke moscow ko is paish Raft par tashweesh la-haq hai. Shaam par is fazai hamlay se aik roz qabal hi Israeli wazeer e azam Binyamin nitn yahoo neh moscow mein roosi saddar vladi Meer potin se baat cheet ki thi. is mauqa par roosi saddar neh Amrici sadar Donald Trump ke Iran se tey shuda johri smjhote se dastbrdar y ke faislay par gehri tashweesh ka izhaar kya tha jabkay nitn yahoo neh is faislay ki bharpoor himayat ki hai. Israeli wazeer e azam ke daftar neh budh ko jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha ke’ ‘ yeh har mamlikat ka haq aur yakeeni tor par Israel ka bhi haq hai ke woh ( irani ) jarhiyat se bachao ke liye zurori iqdamaat kere’ ‘
442.title: Israel ke 28 ladaka tayyaron neh Shaam par hamlay mein hissa liya, 70 missile daage : Rusia

news_detail: Kuala Lumpur. Malaysia ki hizab e ikhtilaaf ke ittehaad ney sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mahathir Mohamad ki zair sadarat parlimani intikhabaat mein tareekhi kamyabi haasil karte hue hakoomati ittehaad ke 60 sala Iqtidaar ko khatam kardiya hai. Malaysia ke Election Commision ka kehna hai ke Mahathir Mohamad ke hizab mukhalif ittehaad ney 115 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki hai jabkay usay hukoomat bananay ke liye 112 nashiston ki zaroorat thi. 92 sala Mahathir Mohamad ney barsar iqtedaar Barisan National Ittehaad ko shikast di hai jo ke guzashta 60 saloon se Iqtidaar mein hai. agarchay Mahathir Mohamad ney siyasat se retirement le li thi taham unhon ney un intikhabaat mein siyasat mein wapas aa kar –apne mukhalif Najeeb Razaque ko shikast di. Najeeb Razaque par bud unwani aur dost parwari ka ilzaam aed kya jata hai .
najeeb razaque ki janib se shikast tasleem

Malaysia ke sabiq Wazeer e Azam najeeb razaque ney aik press conference karte hue apni shikast ko tasleem kar liya. un ka kehna tha” mein awam ka faisla tasleem karta hon.” un ka mazeed kehna tha ke parliment mein kisi aik party ney aksariyat haasil nahi ki aur Malaysia ke aeen ke mutabiq ab badshah ke paas Wazeer e Azam naamzad karne ka ikhtiyar hai.” Mahathir Mohamad ke itihadiyon ney 121 sitin jeet li hain jabkay Malaysia ke parliman mein 222 sitin mojood hain aur brsr Iqtidaar aane ke liye aksariyat milna zurori hai
464.title: Malaysia : Mahathir Mohamad ki tareekhi fatah, oppostion ittehaad ney election jeet liya

news_detail: iftitahi taqreeb mein Israel mein American safeer David Fridman naay kaha ke” aaj hum Bait ul Muqaddasmein American sifarat khanah ka iftitah kar rahay hain “. taqreeb mein vashngtn se anay walay aik American wafad aur Israeli rehnumao naay bhi shirkat ki. doosri janib qaabiz Israeli fouj naay paiir ke roz Gaza patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par American sifarat khanaay ki tall abib se Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqili ke khilaaf ehtijaj karne walay muzahireen par firing kar ke darjanon flstinyon ko shaheed aur secron ko zakhmi kar diya. Falasteeni wizarat sahet naay 55 flstinyon ke shaheed aur 2 hazaar se ziyada ke zakhmi honay ki tasdeeq kar di hai. shaheed honay walon mein bachay bhi shaamil hain. hazaron Falasteeni Ali alsbah Israel ke sath sarhad ke qareeb jama ho gay they. Falasteeni March se Israel ki Gaza ki patti ki naka bandi aur American sifarat khanaay ki tall abib se Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqili ke khilaaf ehtijaj kar rahay hain. Israeli fouj naay Falasteeni muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye aashk aawar gas golay ddaghe jis se secron Falasteeni buri terhan mutasir hue hain
477.title: American sifarat khanah Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqil, Israeli fouj ki firing se 55 Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ki state security shoba ke tarjuman nay jummay ke roz bataya ke police nay ghair mulki anasir se raabtey aur hukoomat ke khilaaf manfi sar garmion mein mulawis saat afraad ko girftar kya hai. Al Arabia ke mutabiq state security ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke security idaron nay musalsal reki ke baad 7 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein liya hai. girftar afraad Saudi Arabia ki salamti ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ke liye ghair mulki anasir ke sath rabton mein they. is ke ilawa unhon nay Saudi Arabiamein qaumi salamti ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ke liye logon ko bharti karne aur mamnooa sar garmion ke liye fndz jama karne aur inhen dosray anasir taq pohanchanay ki koshishen shuru kar rakhi theen. girftar kiye gaye saat afraad ke beron malik rabton ke baare mein tehqiqaat jari hain. mulzimaan ke khilaaf qanoon ke mutabiq karwai amal mein layi ja rahi hai.
494.title: Saudi Arabia mein ghair mulki anasir se raabtey ke ilzaam mein 7 afraad girftar

news_detail: Yemen ke soobay Saada ke Kataf zila mein azad karai janay wali imaarton par qaumi parcham lehra diya gaya hai. yeh paish Raft yemeni fouj ki paish qadmi ke baad samnay aayi jis mein use Arab ittehaad ki muawnat haasil rahi. yemeni fouj ne Jumma ke roz Kataf zila ke ilaqa Alatfain par control haasil kar liya. is ke ilawa Saada soobah mein pahari silsila aur Alfara Nami gaon ko bhi azad kara liya gaya. sath hi Kataf zila ke wast se baaghi malaysia ke liye anay wali imdaad aur kumak ka rasta bhi kaat diya gaya hai. idhar yemeni zaraye ablaagh ny sarkari fouj mein askari commander ke hawalay se bataya hai ke yemeni fouj albaiza soobah ke zila par control haasil karne ke qareeb poanch chuki hai. tawaqqa hai ke wahan mojood baaghi malaysia ke anasir hathyaar daal den ge. is se qabal yemeni fouj ny paish qadmi karte hue Alqarha aur Albaan ke pahari silsilay par control haasil kar liya tha. mazkoorah commander ny bawar karaya ke yemeni fouj ki Al Malajim ki janib paish qadmi aur Kataf zila ke wast se anay wali kumak ki supply line munqita honay ke sabab Houthi malaysia roz burrows dhair hoti ja rahi hai. zameeni zaraye ke mutabiq major general tarek Saleh ke zair qayadat ripblkn guards brigidz ke units Alhadida soobay ke zila Altahtia mein chaar tzoyrati thikanon par hamla karne mein kamyaab rahay. zaraye ka kehna hai ke yemeni fouj Altahtia zila par mukammal control haasil karne ke qareeb hai
511.title: Kataf mein yemeni parcham lehra diya gaya, sarkari fouj Al Malajim ko wapas lainay ke qareeb

news_detail: Ramala-  Aik Falasteeni ohdedar nay bataya ke Sadar Palestine Mahmoud Abbas ko maqboza maghribi patti ke Ramala mein waqay aik hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya. un ki sehat ke barey mein mazeed tafseelaat baham nahi pohanchai gayeen. 82 sala Mahmoud Abbas ko is hafta teesri martaba hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya hai. Palestine ki sarkari news agency wafa nay bataya ke mangal ke din inhen kaan ki aik chuute si surgery ke liye hospital mein shareek kya gaya tha aur chand ghanton baad inhen dischage kardiya gaya tha aur dobarah jummay ko inhen hospital mein shareek kya gaya tha. Jerosalem mein Amrici sifarat khanah ki muntaqili ke masla par ghhor o khoz karne jummay ke din turkey mein munaqidah organization of aslamk ko operation ( o aayi si ) chouti conference mein shirkat se bhi woh qassar they. abbas jo bulaa ke cigrette nosh hain, mukhtalif tibbi masail ka shikaar hain. woh dil ke aarzah aur prostate cancer mein aik daha qabal hi mubtala hogaye they. unhon nay apna janasheen muqarrar nahi kya hai aur Palestine mein Fatah party aur Hamas mein phoot ke baais 2005 hamza se abhi taq sadaarti intikhabaat nahi hue hain.
523.title: Sadar Palestine shareek hospital

news_detail: Bairut. Agencies

Yemen ke wasti shehar Hama mein aik fouji adda par honay walay pur asraar dhmakon ke nateeja mein halaak honay walay sarkari fojion aur is ki Muawin mlishyaon ke anasir ki tadaad 28 hogayi hai. darjanon afraad zakhmi betaye jatay hain. shaam mein insani haqooq ki soorat e haal par nazar rakhnay walay idaray’ rasad gaah’ baraye insani haqooq ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Hama ke fouji adda par yakke baad deegray mutadid dhamakay hue. dhmakon ke nateejay mein Asad rjim ke 28 fojion ke maaray jaane ki it-tila-aat hain. is ke ilawa Shami nazzad baaz ghair sarkari jangju bhi halaak hue. un ki ghair musadeqa tadaad gayarah bataaye jati hai. dhmakon ke nateejay mein kayi afraad shadeed zakhmi aur mutadid la patah hain .

insani haqooq ke observator Rami Abdul Rehman ne bataya ke Hama ke fouji adda mein dhmakon se halaak honiwalon mein Iran aur hizab Allah ke jangju bhi ho satke hain. Hama ke fouji adda par dhmakon ki wajah maloom nahi hosaki. taham insani haqooq karkun Rami Abdul Rehman ke mutabiq yeh dhamakay kisi fani kharabi ka nateeja bhi ho saktay hain. fouji adda se siyah dhowen ke baadal buland hotay aur zor daar aawazian sunai di gayi hain. khayaal rahay ke guzashta chand hafton se Israel bhi shaam mein irani aur Shami tnsibat ko bombari ka nishana bana raha hai. Shaam mein Israel ki aakhri fouji karwai no aur das May ki darmiyani shab ki gayi thi jis mein shyoni riyasat ne darjanon irani tnsibat ko nishana bananay aur inhen tabah karne ka daawa kya tha
535.title: shaam : Hama ke fouji adday par dhamakay mein 28 sarkari fouji halaak

news_detail: Dhhaka : naamwar bollywood adakara Priyanka chopra ney guzashta roz Bangladesh mein muqeem Rohingya panah Guzeen se mulaqaat ki aur in ke sath waqt guzaraa .

Adakara Priyanka chopra 2016 se bain al aqwami idaara unicef ki safeer hain aur woh guzashta roz UNICEF ki team ke sath Bangladesh mein muqeem mazloom Rohingya musalman muhajreen ke sath izhaar yakjahti ke liye Bangladesh pohnchain jahan unhon ney nah sirf panah gzinon ke sath mulaqaat ki balkay un ke sath ghul mil bhi gayeen .

Rohingya panah gzinon ke sath mulaqaat ki tasaveer Priyanka ney –apne Instagram account par share kee aur jazbati pegham likhte hue ittila di ke woh is waqt Bangladesh ke’ Coxs bazaar’ mein mojood hai jo duniya ke sab se baday muhajreen campon mein se aik hai, 2017 ke wast mein duniya ney myanmar ( barma ) ki dil dahela dene wali tasaveer dekhen. is zulm ke baad taqreeban 7 laakh Rohingya se talluq rakhnay walay afraad ney Bangladesh hijrat ki jin mein 60 feesad bachay shaamil hain. yahan par bohat saari khawateen mahinay guzar janay ke bawajood ab bhi kamzor hain jab ke bohat saaray log mukhtasir campon mein rehne par majaboor hain aur inhen yeh bhi nahi maloom ke inhen agli ghiza kab miley gi. yahan mojood log jaisay hi mehfooz tasawwur karne lagtay hain moon soon ka mausam ajata hai un ki banai hui duniya ko tabah karne ke liye. yahan bachon ki aik poori nasal mojood hai jin ka koi mustaqbil nahi, un ki muskurahat mein un ki aankhon ka khaali pan dekha ja sakta hai. un bachon ko hamari tavajja, hamdardi aur madad ki zaroorat hai. duniya ko chahiye ke un ki madad kere yeh bachay hamara mustaqbil hain
545.title: Priyanka Chopra ki Bangladesh mein muqeem mazloom Rohingya muhajreen se mulaqaat

news_detail: shehzada Mohammad ban Salman naay Iqtisadi wo Taraqiati Umoor Council  ke ijlaas ki sadarat ki, Saudi press agency naay is ijlaas ki taswerain jari ki hain. un tasaveer ke ajra ke sath hi Saudi walii ehad Shahzada Mohammad ban Salman ke manzar-e-aam prnh honay se mutaliq rahi sahi afwahen bhi dam toar gayeen. is se qabal 18 May ko jari ki gayi tsoyrmin walii ehad Shahzada Mohammed bin Salman msrke saddar, bahrain ke Shah aur UAE ke walii ehad ke sath mojood they, Misri sadar Abdalfatah Alsisi  ney tenu rehnumao ko dawat par madoo kya tha .

wazeh rahay ke Saudi walii ehad shehzada Mohammad Bin Salman ke kuch roz qabal manzar aam se gayab honay ki wajah se baaz akhbarat naay un ki sahet se mutaliq khadshaat zahir kiye they. irani media ke mutabiq 21 April ko Riaz ke Shahi mehal ke bahar firing ke waqea ke baad se shehzada Mohammad manzar-e-aam se gayab they. yahi nahi balkay propgnd_h ke liye qaim irani Websites par yeh bhi daawa kya gaya tha ke firing mein shehzada buri terhan zakhmi hogaye hain aur un ke Muhafiz inhen bunkers mein le kar chalay gaye jis ke baad se woh manzar par nahi aeye. soshil media par to un ke maar diye jaaney ke baray mein bhi daaway kiye gaye they.
560.title: Saudi walii ehad ki mazeed tasaveer samnay aa gayeen

news_detail: Denmark ki wazeer baraye emigration ki janib se rozay aur musalmanoon ke khilaaf bayan par un ki siyasi party dinsh lbrl party neh izhaar laa taulqi ka elaan kya hai. Denmark media ke mutabiq dinsh lbrl party neh apni kabeena ki ahem rukan ke musalmanoon se mutaliq mutanazia bayan se latalqi ka izhaar kya hai, bayan latalqi mein kaha gaya hai ke emigration ki wazeer Stogberg  ke mutanazia bayan se party ka koi talluq nahi, un ka yeh bayan un ki zaati raye ho sakti hai lekin party policy nahi, party ki aala qayadat wazeer Mosufa ke nazriaat ki himayat nahi karti. Denmark ki intahi sakht emigration ki palisyon ki wajah se shohrat rakhnay wali emigration ki wazeer Stogberg  neh –apne aik colum mein tehreer kya tha ke kaam ke douran din bhar ka roza rakh kar bhooka rehna jadeed muashra ke liye challenge hai. muqami Musalmanon ko chahiye ke mah Ramadan mein woh chhutti le len kyunkay mazhab aik zaati maamla hai aur iss se muashra mein mumkina bigaar ka khatrah bhi hai. Stogberg  neh misaal paish karte ho ye kaha tha ke khaas tor par bas driveron aur hospital ke amlah ke afraad ke roza rakhne se mumkina khatraat ziyada ho satke hain, taham bas companiyon ki janib se fori tor par radd e amal samnay aaya ke ramadaan mein roza rakh kar kaam karne walon ke sath aisa koi masla nahi
570.title: Denmark ki wazeer ka rozay kay khilaaf bayan, party ka elaan latalqi

news_detail: Dubai : Irani oppostion ki beron malik sargaram’ Irani qaumi muzahmati council’ ny khabardaar kya hai ke Irani rjim technology companiyon’ Google ‘ aur’ Apple ‘ ke soft viyrz ( programat aur Apps ) ko jasoosi ke maqasid ke liye androon aur beron malik istemaal kar sakta hai. Irani qaumi muzahmati council ki taraf se jari kardah aik taaza report mein kaha gaya hai ke Irani hakkaam fori paighamaat ki tarseel ke liye istemaal honay walay’ Mobogram’ programme ko sarfeen ki sargarmia jhanchne ke liye istemaal kar rahay hain .

khayaal rahay ke’ Mobogram’ system America mein wasee pemanay par istemaal kya jata hai. mahireen ka kehna hai yeh software sarfeen ki niji zindagi ke liye mehfooz nahi. akhbar’ daily mil’ mein shaya honay wali report mein kaha gaya hai ke Irani pasdaran inqilab mustaqbil mein kisi awaami ehtajaji tehreek ko roknay, cyber security aur tashadud ke hrbon ke liye software ki madad se shehrion ki nigrani karta hai .

Irani oppostion rehnuma Ali Jaffer zaadah ka kehna hai ke Irani pasdaran inqilab Irani rjim ko bachanay ke liye androon aur beron malik wasee pemanay par technology ke programat ko browe car laa rahay hain. khayaal rahay ke America mein social media net working Website ki fehrist mein’ mobogram’ ka 156 wahn number hai. yeh aik ghair sarkari app hai jo tally gram ke istemaal ki sahoolat deti hai jab ke tally gram par Iran mein pabandi aed ki ja chuki hai. Mobogram ko tally gram hi ke dhanchay par tayyar kya gaya hai. Iran mein Facebook aur twitter jaisi maqbool social Website ziratab rahi hain taham is ke bawajood Irani sarfeen ki aik barri tadaad un se wabsta hai .

Irani oppostion ki report ke mutabiq pasdaran inqilab technology company hanista ko mobile phone ke soft viyrz ki tayari ke liye istemaal karti hai. is ke soft viyrz mein posheeda khufia kodz sarfeen ki jasoosi aur nigrani ke liye madad karte hain
411.title: Google aur’ Apple ‘ ke programat ke zariye Iran jasoosi kar raha hai

news_detail: Brussels : Paris hamlon ke mobayyana rang leader aur dehshat gardi ke dosray waqeat mein mlvos honay ke ilzaam mein girftar Salah abdusalam ne Belguim ke dar-al-hakoomat Brussels mein aik adalat mein dobarah paish honay se inkaar kardiya hai. is ne mangal ke roz adalat mein –apne khilaaf muqadmay ki samaat ke douran mein kisi sawal ka jawab dainay se inkaar kardiya tha. giraftari ke qareeban do saal ke baad is ki kisi adalat mein yeh pehli paishi thi lekin Brussels ki adalat ne mangal ke roz kaha hai ke Salah abdusalam jumaraat ko aaynd_h samaat ke mauqa par paish nahi hona chahta hai. is ke khilaaf is ke aabadi shehar Brussels mein police ke sath muqablay aur police ehalkaron ke qatal ki koshish ke ilzaam mein muqadma chalaya ja raha hai. is ne 15 March 2016 hamza ko khudkaar hathyaar se police ehalkaron par fayrng ki thi aur faraar hogaya tha. is waqea mein teen police ahelkaar zakhmi hogaye they aur is ka aik saathi jangju mara gaya tha. is ko 18 March 2016 hamza ko Brussels ke ilaqa molan back se girftar kar liya gaya tha. isi ilaqa mein Dayeesh ke dosray jangju bhi rehtay rahay they. woh Paris hamlon mein zindah bach jaane wala wahid mulzim hai. yadrhe ke Paris mein November 2015 hamza mein fayrng aur bomb dhmakon mein aik so tees afraad halaak hogaye they. un mein no hamla aawar bhi shaamil they. Salah abdusalam ko jab girftar kya gaya to is waqt Europe mein sab se ziyada matloob mafroor tha. is ki giraftari ke sirf chaar roz ke baad dayeesh ke net work se wabsta jungjuon ne Brussels mein do maqamat prhmle kiye they. un mein batees afraad halaak hogaye they .
447.title: Paris hamlon ke mushtaba mulzim Salah abdusalam ka adalat mein dobarah paish honay se inkaar

news_detail: London . mashriqi London mein waqay Masjid Abbey Mills jo “Masjid Ilyas ” ke naam se bhi jani jati hai, is masjid ko Europe ki sab se barri masjid bananay ki mansoobah bandi ki gayi. taham ab usay inhedam ka saamna hai. mangal ke roz Bartania ki sprim court ne masjid ko munhadim karne ke ehkamaat jari kiye hain. is ki wajah yeh hai ke jis zameen par masjid taamer ki gayi baldia ke mutabiq woh kisi aur maqsad ke liye makhsoos thi. mashriqi London ke ilaqa street ford mein waqay is masjid mein hafta waar nmazyon ki ost tadaad 2000 ke qareeb hai. is ki taamer aik earzi islami markaz ke tor par jis araazi par hui usay 1996 mein tableeghi jamaat se wabsta kaarkunon ne khareeda tha. is se qabal yahan aik chemical factory qaim thi .

mutanazia masjid ke inhedam se mutaliq adalti hukum ki khabar ko mutadid muqami zaraye ablaagh ne shaya kya. un mein “The Times” akhbar ne budh ki ashaat mein bataya ke tableeghi jamaat ne masjid ki taamer ke waqt hi is ki tosee ki mansoobah bandi kar li thi taa ke yahan “hazaron afraad” namaz ada kar saken lehaza muqami media ne apni lalchai nazrain is “azeemusshaan” masjid ke mansoobay par laga den. b_hrkif andeshon aur tashweesh ko kam karne tableeghi jamaat ne masjid ki gunjaish 9310 nmazyon taq kam karne ka faisla kya. idhar new home town council ne 18 hazaar murabba meter ki araazi par masjid ki tosee ki ijazat dainay se inkaar kar diya. is liye ke yeh araazi dar haqeeqat haosng aur tijarti maqasid ke liye mukhtas ki gayi thi .

saal 2015 mein tosee ko mustard karne ke hawalay se sarkari hakoomati taied bhi jari kar di gayi. tableeghi jamaat ko 3 mah ki mohlat di gayi taa ke woh is araazi ko masjid ke vaastaa makhsoos karne se ruk jayen. taham jamaat ne faisla ke khilaaf appeal kar di aur yeh silsila do baras se ziyada arsa taq jari raha. aakhir kaar Bartania ki sprim court ne masjid ke inhedam ka faisla jari kya aur is par amal daraamad ka ikhtiyar baldeati council ko mil gaya’ Albata tableeghi jamaat 16 feb taq faislay ke khilaaf appeal kar sakti hai, basorat deegar inhedam ki karwai ka aaghaz ho jaye ga .
503.title: Adalat e uzma ka Bartania ki Maroof masjid munhadim karne ka hukum

news_detail: Do roz qabal Roosi media neh bataya ke moscow’ Roosi hwabaz رومین faili بوف ki laash wapas lainay koi kasar baqi nahi chhorey ga. mazkoorah hwabaz ka Sukhuvi 25 tayyarah haftay ke roz shaam mein ادلب ki fiza mein gir kar tabah ho gaya tha. Roosi hwabaz ke vahm o gumaan mein bhi nah ho ga ke is ki zindagi ka ekhtataam Shami oppostion ke musallah anasir ke sath jharpon ke baad dasti bomb ke zariye khud kashi ki soorat mein ho ga. taham Romen ki laash jo n hi tehreer alsham tanzeem ke paas mehfooz thi raton raat gayab ho gayi aur kisi maloom bhi nahi yeh kaisay sun-hwa? mangal ki shaam Abaa news agency neh bataya ke Romen ki laash chori ho chuki hai. agency neh aik security zaraye ke hawala se bataya ke Roosi hwabaz ki laash Shami oppostion ke aik group neh gayab ki hai. zaraye ke mutabiq maamla ki tahaqeeq ki ja rahi hai aur is ghanaoni harkat ka irtikaab karne walon ko sharai adalat ke samnay paish kya jaye ga. laash chori ki is waardaat ki tafseelaat samnay nahi aa saken hain taham ghalib gumaan haike Turkey ke maqarrab groupon neh laash ko le kar Adlib se turkey ki janib bhaij diya taa ke turkey –apne tor par usay roos muntaqil kar day. Roosi wizarat difaa neh mangal ke roz elaan kya hai ke major Romen ki laash turkey ke hakkaam ki madad se watan wapas aa chuki hai. taham yahan yeh sawal peda hota hai ke woh kya qeemat hai jo roos neh is laash ke aiwz turkey ki zamanat ke taur chukaai hai? bulaa shuba anay walay dinon mein un khufia umoor par para sun-hwa parda uth jaye ga. roos mein krmln house ke tarjuman dmtri beskof yeh bawar kara chuke hain ke kandhay par rakh kar istemaal kiye jaany walay missile jo Shami oppostion ke haath aeye hain woh shaam mein karwai karne walay tamam tayyaron ke liye khatrah hain. taham yeh janna qabal az waqt ho ga ke oppostion jngjoon ko hathyaaron ka yeh nizaam kis neh faraham kya jo Roosi tayyarah ko giranay ke liye istemaal mein aaya .
516.title: Roosi hwabaz ki laash raton raat “chori”. barah Turkey Roos muntaqil

news_detail: Paris . France mein aik bahijaab muslim khatoon ko musafah se Ihtiraz karne ki Padaash mein malik ki shehriat dainay se inkaar kar diya gaya. al-jaizair se talluq rakhnay wali aik musalman khatoon ny francesi shehriat milnay ki taqreeb ke douran ohdedar se musafah karne se inkaar kar diya tha. France ki hukoomat ny is rawayya par khatoon ko shehriat nah dainay ka faisla kya tha jisay France ki aala intizami adalat ny barqarar rakha. June 2016ء mein France ke junoob mashriqi ilaqay easier mein aik taqreeb ke duwaan muslim khatoon ko malik ki shehriat di ja rahi thi. is mauqa par taqreeb ke saddar aur aik muqami siyasi rehnuma ny khatoon se haath milana chaha to aas ny yeh keh kar inkaar kar diya ke mere mazhabi aqaed is baat ki ijazat nahi dete. hukoomat ny is waqea par rad-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha ke khatoon ka rawayya zahir karta hai ke woh’ francesi muashra mein zam hona nahi chahti ‘, aisa amal soul code ke tehat kisi bhi francesi shehri ke shareek hayaat ko malik ki shehriat dainay se rokta hai. muslim khatoon ny francesi shehri se 2010 hamza mein shadi ke baad April 2017 mein shehriat ke liye darkhwast di thi. khatoon ny faisla ko’ ikhtiyarat ka ghalat istemaal’ qarar diya hai. taham aisay mamlaat ki hatmi samaat karne wali adalat council of state ka muaqqaf hai ke hukoomat ny’ ‘ qanoon ka ghalat istemaal’ ‘ nahi kya .
527.title: Musafah se guraiz ki padaash mein muslim khatoon francesi shehriat se mahroom

news_detail: Damuscus. shaam ki musallah afwaj ny dar-al-hakoomat Dimashq ke qurb wa-jawar mein waqay Dayeesh aur Alnasrah mahaaz ke zair qabza ilaqon par itwaar ke roz laraka tayyaron, helly coptron aur toup khanaay se tabah kin bomb baari ki hai. Dayeesh ke jngjoon ny jummay ko Dimashq ke junoob mein waqay ilaqa hijr alaswad se inkhala par ittafaq kya tha lekin do roz baad bhi unhon ny ilaqa ka takhlia shuru nahi kya to Shami fouj ny laraka tayyaron aur helly coptron se un par tabah kin bombari kar di hai. un fazai hamlon ka maqsad Dayeesh ke jngjoon ko jhukana aur inkhala ke samjhota ko tasleem karne par majaboor karna hai .

Dayeesh aur dosray groupon ke senkron jangju alhaj al aswad aur is ke nazdeek waqay Falasteeni muhajreen ke camp alyarmok mein mojood hain. shaam ke sarkari TV alakhbarih ny hijr aswad par fazai hamlon ke baad dhuwan buland hotay dekhaya hai. Shami fouj ke laraka tayyaray fiza mein urrtey nazar arhay they. Dimashq ke makeeno ny raat bhar aur itwaar ki subah tayyaron ke urrnay ki goonj daar aawazian suneney ki ittila di hai. Shami saddar bsharalasd ny –apne itihadiyon roos aur Iran ki madad se mashriqi Algaudta mein jngjoon ke khilaaf larai mein fatah ke baad ab Dimashq ke dosray ilaqon ko mftoh bananay ke liye bhi muhim taiz kar rakhi hai. Shami fouj ny mashriqi Algota mein waqay shehron aur dehaat par tabah kin bambaar y ki thi aur Doma shehar par 7 April ko keemiyai hathyaaron se hamla kya tha jis ke baad baaghi group Shami hukoomat aur roos se inkhala ke samjhoton par majaboor hogaye they aur woh un ilaqon se –apne khandano sameit uth kar shumal maghribi soobay adlib aur soobah Halb mein turkey ki sarhad ke nazdeek wa qa shehar jerabils ki janib chalay gaye hain. darin Isna hamza Dimashq ke shumal mashriq mein waqay ilaqa Qalmoon se baghion aur un ke khandano ka inkhala jari hai aur woh bhi roos aur Shami hukoomat se samjhotay ke tehat apna ghar-baar chore kar Adlib aur jarabils ki janib jarahay hain. alakhbarih Tally Witson ki report ke mutabiq haftay ke roz paintees basoon par secron baaghi aur un ke khandan rawana hue they. Qalmoon mein waqay barray qasbay Alrahibia se das basoon par mushtamil pehla qaafla rawana sun-hwa tha aur is ki malik ke shumal ki janib safar par rawana honay se qabal Shami security forces ny talashi li thi. is ke ilawa Qalmoon hi mein waqay do aur qasbon j? rod aur Alnaseria se bhi baaghi aur un ke khandan sarkari basoon par Adlib aur Jarabils ki janib jarahay hain. un ke inkhala ka yeh silsila somwaar ko teesray roz bhi jari rahay ga .
536.title: Shami fouj ki Dayeesh ke thikanon par tabah kun bomb baari

news_detail: Dubai-bar-e-azam Africa ki abadi 1. 2 arab nafoos par mushtamil hai, Africa ki nisf abadi musalmanoon par hai. un mein aksariyat Shumali Africa mein misar se Moritania tak phaily hui hai. yeh tamam mumalik inqalabi nazriaat ki bar aamad aur androoni mamlaat mein mudakhlat ke hawalay se Iran ke tareeqa car ko jaan gay hain. Africa ke janoobi sehra mein karorron log rehtay hain jin ko taleem sameit bunyadi khidmaat ki shadeed zaroorat hai. aisay mein almstfi university Aima ki tarbiyat aur deegar fikri aur mazhabi sar garmion ke tehat Iran ke taleemi baazu ka kirdaar ada kar rahi hai. is university ka saddar daftar Iran ke shehar Khum  mein hai aur usay barah e raast rehbar aala Ali Khamna ki nigrani mein chalaya ja raha hai. duniya ke mukhtalif braazmon ke kam az kam 60 mumalik mein is university ki shaakhen hain jahan 40 hazaar Aima ki tarbiyat ki jarahi hai. is ke ilawa aakhri das barson mein university ke Iran mein markaz aur beron mumalik shaakhon se taqreeban 45 hazaar talba farigh althsil hue. Africa ke 17 mumalik mein university ki markazi shaakhen hain. un ko 30 mumalik ki zeli shaakhon ki support haasil hai. un ke tehat majmoi tor par 100 islami madaris aur marakaz ka intizam o insaram chal raha hai. is waqt almstfi university ki Iran aur Iran se bahar shaakhon mein 6 hazaar africi mazhabi shaksiaat asbaq aur korsz mein shareek hain. Africa ka kirdaar” falahi aur taleemi” pehloun taq mehdood nahi balkay Iran ke liye is ka ahem tareen kirdaar aik aisay plate form ke tor par hai jahan se jangju tanzeemon ko missile aur hathyaar beje ja saken. yaad rahay ke Israeli laraka tayyaron ne october 2012 hamza mein soudan ke andar Iran se marboot aik ahem karkhana tabah kar diya tha. ilawa azeen Saudi arab aur Yemen ke maghrib mein waqay Africi mulk jebuti  bhi t_hran ka aik ahem Haleef raha. Iran ne is ki bandargahen haasil karne ke maqabil wahan parliment aur aik tijarti markaz bananay par karorron dollar kharch kar daaley. Jebnuti ke misali mehal wuqoo ke sabab Iran Hauthion ko hathyaar pohanchanay ke liye aik misali rasta yakeeni bananay mein kamyaab ho gaya.
