Jebuti abnaye baab Almundab ke nazdeek waqay hai jo behar Ahmar ko khaleej din se milati hai. kuch arsa qabal Jebuti ne Iran se taluqaat khatam kar ke apni bndrgahon ko band kar diya aur arab ittehaad ka paband ho gaya. kayi Africi hukoomaton ne jis mein nigeria numaya tareen hai irani hathyaaron aur golah barood ki khipon ko zabt kya jo Falasteeni aur africi anasir ke wastay ja rahi theen. is douran irani pasdaran inqilab se talluq rakhnay walay garohoon ka bhi inkishaaf kya gaya. Iran –apne dast raast yani labnani malaysia hizab Allah ko bhi istemaal kar raha hai jo Africa aur lateeni America hijrat karne wali labnani Shiah community ke halqon mein asar o rasookh ki haamil hai .

Africi aur lateeni America ki hakoomaten bohat baar hizab Allah ke zair e intizam garohoon ka inkishaaf kar chuki hain jo money laundering ke dhnde ko sambhale hue hain aur hathyaaron aur manshiat ki tijarat aur smuggling mein mulawis hain. Africa ke istehsal ka Iran ke khatarnaak johri programme ki paish Raft mein ahem kirdaar raha. Iran ne Namibia, Mulavi aur bilkhushoos nayijr ki kaanon se nikalay janay walay yoranim par bharpoor tareeqay se haath saaf kya. irani wazeer kharja Jawad zareef ke bar-e-azam Africa ke aakhri doray mein yeh baat wazeh tor par samnay aayi ke t_hran aqwam mutahidda aur is ki zeli cometion mein africi voton ko akhatta karne ke liye koshan hai. saal 2011 hamza se 2013 hamza ke darmain kalay dhun ko safaid bananay ke scandal ke baad Babak  Zanjani aur Raza Zirab ke net works ke khatmay se inkishaaf sun-hwa ke ghanaa sonay ke aik ahem zariye ke tor par Iran ke liye kitni ziyada ahmiyat rakhta hai. aqwam mutahidda aur kayi bain al aqwami halqon aur plate forms mein janoobi Africa ne bohat baar Iran ke haq mein vote diya .
548.title: barr-e-azam Africa mein Iran ka barhta  assar v nufooz

news_detail: Dubai . qaabiz sehyuni fouj naay Palestine ke maqboza maghribi kinare ke shumali shehar janeen mein aik Falasteeni muzahmat kaar Ahmed Qanba ke makaan ko dhamaka khaiz mawaad se ura diya jis ke nateejay mein ghrmin rehne walay afraad makaan ki chhat se mahroom ho gay. Aini shahideen naay bataya ke mangal ko Ali alsbah Israeli fouj ki bhaari nafri naay janeen ki Albastbin, janeen camp aur shahrah hifa par dhawa bola aur aseer Falasteeni Ahmed Khanba ke makaan ka muhasra kar liya. khayaal rahay ke Israeli fouj naay Ahmed Khanba ko rawan saal January mein hirasat mein liya tha. is par ilzaam hai ke is naay 9 January ko aik yahodi rabbi ‘Ryzyyyl syfah’ ko Gilad hauat colony ke qareeb qatal kar diya tha. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq guzashta roz Israeli fouj naay intiqami karwai ke tehat aseer Qanba ke makaan ka muhasra kya. is ka ghar pehlay hi khaali kara liya gaya tha. muhasray ke baad aas paas ke makanaat ko bhi khaali karaya. is ke baad is mein jagah jagah barood nasb kya aur zor daar dhamakay se ura diya. makaan ki msmari ki aik footage zaraye ablaagh par bhi Nashar ki gayi hai jis mein makaan ko malbay ke dhair mein dekha ja sakta hai. khayaal rahay ke qaabiz shyoni fouj ke hatohn kisi Falasteeni khandan ke makaan ki msmari ka yeh pehla mauqa nahi. is terhan ke waqeat ab roz ka mamool ban chuke hain. shyoni fouj mamooli noiyat ke waqeat ki aarr mein flstinyon ke gharon ko dhamaka khaiz mawaad se masmaar kardeti hai. Israeli fouj guzashta kuch arsay se muzahmati karwaiyon mein mulawis qarar diye gay flstinyon ke ahal khanah ko ijtimai saza dainay ke liye un ke gharon ki msmari ka silsila jari rakhtay hue hai. Israel mein insani haqooq ke liye kaam karne wali tanzeem ‘Btslym’ ke mutabiq sunah 1967 ki jung ke baad 2005 tak Israel naay falistinyon ke secron makanaat masmaar kiye hain jis ke nateeja mein hazaron afraad be ghar hue. sunah 2005 ke baad flstinyon kay khilaaf ijtimai intiqami karwai ke tehat un ke makanaat ki msmari ka silsila shuru kya gaya jo aaj taq jari hai .
559.title: qaabiz Israeli fouj ne Falasteeni muzahmat kaar ka makaan dhamakay se ura diya

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti ki mashriqi sarhad par haq wapsi ke liye ehtijaj karne walay falastinon par Israeli fouj ne firing ki jis ke nateeja mein kam se kam mazeed teen Falasteeni shaheed aur secron zakhmi hogaye. Falasteeni wizarat sahet ke tarjuman ne bataya ke mashriqi Gaza mein flstinyon ne’ haq wapsi’ ke liye reliyan nikalen. is mauqa par Israeli fouj ne muzahireen par seedhi golion se fayrng ki, aansogis ka be daregh istemaal kya aur dhaati golion se bhi muzahireen ko nishana banaya. Ashraf Alqarah ke mutabiq Israeli fouj ki fayrng se teen Falasteeni muzahireen shaheed aur kam se kam 600 zakhmi hogaye hain. zakhmion mein se 300 ko aspatalon mein muntaqil kya gaya jin mein se paanch ki haalat khatray mein bayan ki jati hai. Aini shahideen ka kehna hai ke Israeli fouj ki taraf se muzahireen ko khauf zada karne ke liye zor daar aawaz peda karne walay bomb bhi istemaal kiye. sarhad par zor daar dhmakon ki aawazian bhi sunai di gayi hain. khayaal rahay ke Falasteeni 30 March se chay hafton par mushtamil haq wapsi ki tehreek jari rakhay hue hain. is tehreek ke douran ab taq teen darjan Falasteeni shaheed aur hazaron ki tadaad mein zakhmi ho chukay hain. Falasteeni har Juma ko mashriqi sarhad ki taraf March karte hain. is tehreek ka kal panchawan jummay tha. Israeli fouj ke wehshiana tashadud ke nateejay mein paanch hazaar Falasteeni zakhmi ho chuke hain.
572.title: Israeli fouj ki firing se Gaza mein chaar Falasteeni shaheed, 600 zakhmi

news_detail: shiddat pasand tanzeem Dayeesh ki tarjuman news agency” Amaaq” naay jummay ke roz aik video tape jari ki hai. tape mein tanzeem ke jungjuon ko araqi soobah Salah Aldeen ke qasba Tarmia mein 2 afraad ko golian maar kar mout ke ghaat utaartay hue dekhaya gaya hai. yeh dono afraad aindah mah muqarara parlimani intikhabaat mein shirkat ke liye” logon ko dawat day rahay they “. is se qabal Dayeesh tanzeem rawan haftay yeh elaan kar chuki hai ke woh parlimani intikhabaat ke douran polling marakaz par hamlay kere gi. guzashta itwaar ki shaam jari aik sooti pegham mein Dayeesh ke tarjuman abbu Al Hasan Al-mahajir naay araqi hukoomat par ilzaam aed kya ke woh” Iran ki agent hai “. tarjuman naay khabardaar kya ke 12 May ko muqarara araqi intikhabaat mein khud ko naamzad karne walay ya vote daalnay walay har shakhs ko nishana banaya jaye ga. araqi ahdidaran ka kehna hai ke polling marakaz ke atraaf security ke sakht intizamaa hon ge. araqi wazeer e azam Haider alabadi naay decemeber 2017 hamza mein Dayeesh tanzeem par fatah haasil kar lainay ka elaan kya tha jis naay 2014 hamza mein Iraq ke aik tahai hssh par qabza kar liya tha. taham tanzeem naay shikast se dochar honay ke baad goreela jung ke tareeqa car ka sahara le liya hai .
580.title: Dayessh ne iraqi” intikhabaat ke hamion” ko mout ke ghaat utaarna shuru kar diya

news_detail: Bartanwi Shaezadah Alquds ki janib se mashriqi Bait ul Quds ko arz Palestine ka hissa qarar diye jaane par Israel chairag pa hogaya hai. Yahudi ghasib mumlikat ne sakht barhami ka izhaar karte hue un ke muaqqaf ko ‘haqayiq maskh’ karne ke mutradif qarar diya. Shaezadah Alquds 25 June ko Jordan pohnchain ge jahan se woh Palestine aur is ke baad Israel ka bhi daura karen ge. woh maqboza mashriqi Jerusalem ka bhi daura karen ge. abrani akhbar’ ydiavt ahronot’ ke mutabiq Israeli kabeena ke wazeer baraye Alquds umoor’ ‘Ze’ve Elkin’ne Shaezadah ki janib se mashriqi Jerusalem ko Israel ke bajaye Palestine ka hissa qarar diye jaane aur isi muaqqaf ke tehat daura Alquds ke programme prkrhi tanqeed ki hai. tawaqqa hai ke Bartanwi Shaezadah jo Duke of Cambridge bhi kehlate hain 25 June ko urdan pounchanay ke baad mashriqi Jerusalem jayen ge. un ka yeh daura teen din par muheet hoga. aakhir mein woh Israeli qayadat se bhi mulaqaat karen ge. Kingston Shahi mehal ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Shaezadah Alquds puranay Alquds ki tareekh aur geographiya ke baare jaan kaari ke husool ki khatir maqboza Palestine ka daura karen ge. woh Jabal Zaitoon altor se nzarah karen ge. bayan mein qadeem shehar Jerusalem ko Palestine ke hissa ke tor par paish kya gaya hai. Israeli wazeer Ze’ve Elkin ka kehna hai ke’ yeh baat be hadd afsoosnaak hai ke Britania Shaezadah Alquds ke daura ko siyasi rang dainay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. mutahidda Jerusalem Israel ka 3000 saal se dar-al-hakoomat hai jab ke Bartanwi Shaezadah ka muaqqaf’ haqayiq’ ko tabdeel karne ki koshish hai. mujhe umeed hai ke sahebzaade ke maavnin un ke muaqqaf mein payi jaane wali ghalat fehmi ka azaala karen ge. taham Shaezadah Alquds ke hawalay se Israeli wazeer ke bayan par Falasteeni Authority ki janib se kisi qisam ka radd amal samnay nahi aaya. wazeh rahay ke guzashta hafta Shaezadah Alquds ne Bait ul Quds ke daura ka elaan kya tha. un ka kehna tha ke woh Alquds ko Palestine ka hissa samajte hue is ka daura karen ge. woh Jerusalem ke tareekhi muqaddas maqamat par jayen ge taham Bartanwi hukoomat ki janib se Shaezadah ke daura mein shaamil muqaddas maqamat ki tafseel bayan nahi ki gayi. beshtar aalmi baradri mashriqi Jerusalem par Israeli qabza ko tasleem nahi karti hai, jahan qadeem shaher waqai hai.
538.title: Prince Wiliam ke ‘Alquds ko Palestine ka hissa’ qarar dainay par Israel chairag pa

news_detail: America ke baad Britain bhi aqwam mutahidda ki insani huqooq council mein Israel ki himayat mein khil kar samnay agaya hai. is ne council se mutalba kiya hai ke woh shyoni riyasat ke khilaaf mobayyana mutassbana sulooq ka silsila band kardey aur is se maamla kaari mein islaah peda kere. America aur chand Europian mumalik ke baad Bartanwi wazeer kharja bors johnson ne geneva mein aqwam mutahidda ke tehat insani huqooq council ke artiswi ijlaas ke agenda item number saat par tanqeed karte hue usay mutanazia bananay ki koshish ki hai, yaad rahay ke is agenda ke tehat Falasteeni ilaqon mein insani huqooq ki khilaaf varzion par bahess ki jaye gi taham America aur Britain ki mukhalifat ke baayes huqooq insani council ke ijlaas mein is mauzo par bahess honay ke imkanaat mouhoom hain. unhon ne kaha ke ”agenda item number 7 mein sirf Israel aur maqboza Falasteeni ilaqon par tavajjah markooz ki gayi hai. yeh aman ke nasbulayen ke liye zarar rasaan aur ghair mutanasib hai. Jab tak cheeze tabdeel nahi hoti hain, is waqt tak hum aindah saal ke douran mein is item ke tehat muta-arif karai jany wali tamam qarar dadon ki mukhalifat mein o o t den ge’ ‘. taham mister bors johnson ka kehna tha ke council Israel. Palestine tanaza ke hal mein ahem kirdaar ada kar sakti hai. council ke ijlaas mein is item ke tehat sirf Israel ki maqboza Falasteeni ilaqon mein insani huqooq ki khilaaf varzion aur Palestenian ke khilaaf mzalm ke barey mein tabadlah khayaal kiya jaye ga. America ke ilawa baaz Europian countries aur Australia ne bhi qabal azeen is item par tanqeed kar chukay hain aur is ko Israel ke khilaaf mutassbana qarar diya hai. un ka muaqqaf hai ke haliya barson ke douran mein jin dosray mumalik mein insani huqooq ki barray pemanay par khilaaf varziyan ki gayi hain, un ka council ke agenda mein zikar nahi hai. un mein shaam sare fehrist hai. American President  Donald Trump ki intizamia ne maazi mein item number 7 par tanqeed ki thi aur is ko wapas nah lainay ki soorat mein council ko kher baad kehnay ki dhamki day di thi.
550.title: Britain ne Israeli zayadtio par aqwam mutahidda ki insani huqooq council ke agenda ki mukhalifat kar di

news_detail: Egypt mein musallah hamlon ka nishana bin’nay walay mutadid afraad ke khandano ney Qatar ke Ameer Tamim bin Hamad Alsaani ke khilaaf 15 crore dollar harjana ka muqadma dair kya hai. yeh 1 arab malik mein apni noiyat ka pehla muqadma hai jo kisi dosray arab malik ke khilaaf dair kya gaya hai. mazkoorah khandano ney shumali Seina mein shiddat pasandon ke hamlon ke douran chaar afsaraan ki halakat aur aik shehri ke zakhmi honay ka zmmh daar Qatar ko thehraya hai. muqadmay mein aan adalti faislon ko buneyaad banaya gaya hai jin se سیناء mein daheshat gard jamaaton ki taied ke sath Qatar ke talluq ki tasdeeq hoti hai. yeh baat mudai khandano ke wakeel advocate Hafiz Abu Sadah ney “BBC” ki website ko batayi. Dusri janib zaraye ney “BBC” ko bataya ke bajod yeh ke Egypt ka qanoon muqadma baazi ka haq deta hai. .. adalat mein muqadma ka indraaj sprim juditional ki aaraa ke surway ke baad hi ho ga. muqadma ki darkhwast mein daheshat gardi ke khilaaf brsrِ jung charon mumalik ki janib se jari fehrist ki janib ishara kya gaya hai aur is mein aan shaksiaat aur idaron ko shaamil kya gaya jin ko Qatar ki janib se panah aur support haasil hai. mudai fareeq ka kehna hai ke Qatar ka Ikhwan ul Muslimoon ke baaz arkaan ko panah dena aur inhen Egypt ke hawala nah karna jab ke un ka Egypt mein irtikaab juraim mein mulawis hona saabit ho chuka hai, yeh Qatar ko qasoor waar thehranay ke liye kaafi hai. Muqadma dair karne walay muddayeen un chaar afsaraan ke walidain hain jo shumali Seina mein musallah afraad ki karwaiyon ke douran halaak ho gaye they. un ke ilawa aik Misri shehri sir mein goli lagnay se zakhmi ho gaya tha jis ke ilaaj ke akhrajaat Misri fouj ney bardasht kiye. advocate Abu Sadah ka kehna hai ke Qatar ki Hukumat is amar ki zmmh daar hai ke woh –apne aan ghair qanooni af-aal ka harjana ada kere jo Egypt ke security idaron ko nishana bananay ke liye daheshat gard karwaiyon ki fndng ki soorat mein they. adalat ney muqadma ki awleen samaat ke liye rawan baras 27 September ki tareekh muqarrar ki hai. adalat ke faisla ke khilaaf’ appeal court’ mein appeal dair ki ja sakti hai. Albata appeal court ki janib se Qatar par harjana ki adaigi ka faisla jari honay ki soorat mein yeh faisla hatmi aur wajib al amal ho ga. agar adalti faislay mein Qatar ko harjana ada karne ka paband banaya gaya to Misri Hukumat harjana ki raqam ke liye Qatar ki baaz imlaak ko zabt kar sakti hai. yaad rahay ke Qatar ke Egypt mein asasa jaat aur araazi maujood hain
562.title: Egypt: Daheshat gardi ki buneyaad par Emir Qatar ke khilaaf muqadma

news_detail: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman se Amrican President Khusoosi Numayeendah aur Musheer baraye Mashriq Wasta ney mulaqaat ki hai jis mein Israel Palestine sorat e haal par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya. White House se jari bayan ke mutabiq President Trump ke damaad Jared Kushner aur  Khusoosi Numayeendah Green Belatt ney Riyadh mein Saudi Crown Prince se mulaqaat ki aur Israel Palestine aman amal aur Gaza ki sorat e haal par guftagu ki. Daura Saudi Arab se pehlay Amrici ohdedaron ney Jordan ke Shah Abdullah se bhi mulaqaat ki thi. Amrici numainday aglay marhala mein Israel, Egypt aur Qatar ka daura karen ge. Al- quds ko Israeli darulhukoomat qarar dainay ke baad Falasteeni rehnumao ney America ka aman amal mein kirdaar qubool karne se inkaar kardiya hai. agarchay White House ney id-daa kya ke ijlaas mein Sabiqa mazakraat ki pishrft mein unhon ney goro khoz kya, Gaza ko insani imdaad pahunchane aur asrayilyon aur flstineyon ke darmain aman qaim karne trmp intizamia ke iqdamaat jaisay mozuaat zair behas rahay hain taham yeh samgha ja raha hai
575.title: Saudi Crown Prince se American President ke Damaad ki mulaqaat

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ke shehar Al-Damam mein waqay Imam Abdul Rehman bin Faisal University ke driving school se ab tak 67 khawateen ko driving licence jaar y kiye ja chukay hain jabkay is school mein driving ki tarbiyat ke liye 13 hazaar khawateen nay –apne naamon ka indraaj karaya hai. is school se Saudi khawateen ko chay marahil mein driving licence jari kiye jarahay hain. Un mein ibtidayi registration, school ki web gaah par registration, tarbiati programme ke liye indraaj, nazri tarbiyat, amli tarbiyat aur mehakma traffic ko car chalanay ka imthehaan dena shaamil hain. is imthehaan mein kamyaab umeed waar vn ko license jari kardiya jata hai. jamea imam Abdul Rehman ban Faisal ke camps ki hudood hi mein khawateen ko driving ki nazri aur amli tarbiyat di ja rahi hai. licence ke husool ke liye darkhwast dainay wali khawateen ki Umar 18 saal ya is se zayd honi chahiye. unhein aik driving school mein apne naamon ke indraaj ke baad tarbiyat ke liye muqarara fees ada karna hogi. is driving school mein jari tarbiati programme ka dorania 27 ghantay ka hai. is mein paanch ghantay nazri tarbiyat, do ghantay traffic tahaffuz aur security qawaid wo zawabit par presentation aur 20 ghantay amli tarbiyat ke liye mukhtas kiye gaye hain. darkhwast guzaar khawateen mein beron malik se licence yaftgan bhi shaamil hain. woh apne ghair mulki license ko Saudi license se tabdeel karna chahti hain. aisi khawateen ko driving test ke marhalay se guzarna hoga. jin khawateen ke ghair mulki licence ki meyaad khatam hochuki hai, unhein chay ghantay ke tarbiati amal se guzarna hoga. agar woh driving ka imthehaan paas karliti hain to unhein fori tor par driving licence jari kardiya jaye ga. imthehaan mein nakaam rehne wali khawateen ko aik aur mauqa diya jaye ga. unhein mazeed chaar ghantay tak tarbiyat di jaye gi aur phir un se test liya jaye ga aur kamyabi ki soorat mein licensee jari kardiya jaye ga.
584.title: Saudi Arabia : 13 hazaar khawateen ka tarbiyat ke liye indraaj

news_detail: Turkey mein Parlimani aur Sadarati intikhabaat itwaar 24 June ko honay ja rahay hain, jin ke zareya mojooda tark Sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan aur un ki justice and development party nay naya khat aetmaad haasil karna chahtay hain. Turkey mein Sadarati aur Parlimani intikhabaat aik sath 24 June ko hon ge, yeh intikhabaat 3 November 2019 ko tay shuda election se 16 mah qabal ho rahay hain. un intikhabaat ke zareya mojooda Sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan aur hukmaran jamaat, awam se naya khat aetmaad haasil karna chahtay hain. Sadarati intikhab do mrhlon mein mukammal hoga. pehla marhala 24 June ko munaqqid hoga. koi bhi umeed waar agar 51 feesad vote haasil nah kar saka to maamla dosray marhala taq jaye ga. jis ka ineqad 8 July ko hoga. Sadarati intikhabaat mein Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ke muqaabla mein deegar 5 umeed waar maidan mein hain, jabkay Parlimani intikhabaat mein 600 nashiston ke liye raye dahi honi hai. Turkey mein July 2016 ki nakaam baghaawat ke baad se hungami haalat nafiz hai. un intikhabaat ke baad mulk mein Sadarati nizaam nafiz kardiya jaye ga jis se Sadar ke ikhtiyar it- mein izafah hoga. mulk bhar mein 18, 00, 65 Ballot Boxes rakhay gaye hain aur 5, 63, 22, 632 registered Voters hain. Raye dahi muqami waqt ke mutabiq 9 : 00 bujey din taa 5 : 00 bujey shaam taq jari rahay gi. raye dahindgaan aik hi lifaafa mein do Ballot Papers par apni pasand ke umeed waar ka intikhab karen ge. raye dahi ke baad pehlay Sadarati intikhab ke liye raye shumari hogi jis ke baad Parlimani umeedwaron ke voton ki ginti ki jaye gi. aik Ballot paper Sadarati umeedwaron ke liye aur dosra Parlimani umeedwaron ka hoga. pehli martaba bistaron par fresh 17 hazaar Voters ke liye Election Officers un ke gharron taq pahonch kar Ballots haasil karen ge. taqreeban 11. 49 laakh beron mulk muqeem raye dahendon nay 7 June taa 19 June ke douran 123 Turkey sifarat khaanoon par apne voton ka istemaal kiye hain. beron mulk muqeem rayedahindon ke votes ko airmail ke zareya Turkey laa ya gaya hai aur un ki ginti doosron voton ke sath isi din shuru hogi. Parlimani intikhabaat mein barsar Iqtidaar justice and development party ke ilawa deegar 7 siyasi partiyan hissa le rahi hain. Sadarati intikhab ke liye Recep Tayyip Erdoğan samait 6 umeed waar maidan mein hain.
593.title: Turkey mein Parlimani aur Sadarati intikhabaat itwaar ko honge

news_detail: Iraq ney mashriqi Shami suba Der Alzor ke qasba Hajen mein teen makanon par mushtamil aik compound par fazai hamla kya hai, jahan ISIL ke qaideen ka ijlaas chal raha tha. Hamla ke nateeja mein sakht geer jangju group ISIL ke 45 arkaan halaak hogaye hain. Iraqi fouj ki mushtarqa operations kamaan ney hafta ke roz aik bayan mein ittila di hai ke ”Iraqi F16 Ladaka Jet ney Iraqi sarhad ke qareeb Sham ke ilaqa Hajen mein ISIL ke senior leadron ke aik ijlaas par kamyaab fazai hamla kya hai. is ke nateeja mein ahdaaf mukammal tor par tabah ho gaye hain aur 45 dehshat gard maaray gaye hain”. Iraqi Ladaka Jet ney aik surang ke zareya miley hue teen makanon par bombari ki thi. bayan mein daawa kya gaya hai ke hamla mein halaak honay walon mein ISIL ka naib wazeer jung, is ka aik media Ameer, Tanzeem ke Ameer abbu baker albghdadi ka zaati pegham rasan aur group ka police sarbarah Shamil hain
609.title: Sham mein aik qasba par Iraq ke fazai hamla mein ISIL ke 45 jangju halaak

news_detail: Aik saal qabal Saudi Arab ki hukoomat ki janib se mulk mein khawateen ko driving ki ijazat se mutaliq elaan par aaj 24 June bah roz itwaar se amal daraamad shuru kardiya gaya hai aur khawateen ki barri tadaad Saudi Arab ki sarkon par gaadi chillate dekhi ja sakti hai. doosri janib muashra ke bohat se tabqaat ki taraf se khawateen ki driving ke faisla ka kher muqaddam kya gaya hai magar aik tabqa hanoz un tabdeelion par fikarmand nazar araha hai magar mutlaq alanani ke Atab se bachney ki khatir apni zubanain band rakha sun-hwa hai. Saudi Arab mein khawateen ki driving par pabandi uthnay ke baad shahrahon par khawateen azadana gadiyaan chala rahi hain jab ke bohat si khawateen driving ki tarbiyat aur licence ke husool ke liye koshan hain. Saudi Arab mein traffic control karne walay idaara naay chand roz qabal aik bayan mein khabardaar kya tha ke khawateen majaz tareekh se qabal gaadi nah chalayein warna inhen pa 500 taa 900 rial tak jurmana aur gaadi zabt kiye jaany ka saamna karna par sakta hai. khawateen ki janib se gaadi chalanay ka behad ishtiyaq ke bawajood qanoon ki pabandi ki gayi .

khawateen ke driving set par bhaithne aur sarkon par niklny ke baad social media par mila jala radd amal samnay aaya hai. baaz shehrion naay usay haqooq naswan ke hawala se ahem paish Raft qarar diya jab ke baaz naay driving ke hawala se khawateen ko sakht ahthyat baratnay ka mahswara diya hai. social media par khawateen naay bhi yaqeen dehani karai hai ke woh traffic qawaneen ki sakhti se pabandi karen gi aur khauf ki rukawat tornay ke liye fori tour par ziyada rush walay maqamat par jaany se guraiz karen gi. social media par samaji karkunaan naay khawateen ki driving mein hosla afzai par bhi zor diya hai aur kaha hai ke mumlikat mein khawateen ki driving ka abhi aaghaz hai aur is hawala se aurton ko musalsal reh namai aur hosla afzai ki zaroorat hogi
622.title: Saudi Arab mein khawateen ki driving ki ijazat aaj se nafiz al amal

news_detail: Iran mein mehengai aur muashi istehsal ke khilaaf aawaz buland karne walay talabah ko naam nihaad inqilab adalaton ki janib se kari sazayen di ja rahi hain aur inhen qaid wo band mein daal kar hukumati nakamiyoo prawam ka mun band karne ki mazmoom koshishen jari hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq haal hi mein Iran ki aik adalat ney mehengai ke khilaaf aawaz uthany walay Jamiyaat aur schoolon ke talba ki barri tadaad ko jailon mein daalney ka hukum diya. un mein se baaz ko aath se das saal qaid ki sazayen sunai gayeen. saza paney walon mein aik 12 sala bacha bhi shaamil hai. irani sadar ki khatoon Musheera baraye shehri huqooq Shahidantaqt Maulawari ney shikayat ki hai ke hukoomat ko ilm hai ke adalat ney Jamiyaat ke talba ko mehengai ke khilaaf aawaz buland karne par kari sazayen dena shuru ki hain. aik bayan mein Shahidantaqt Maulawari ney kaha ke hukoomat talba ko tahaffuz dainey mein nakaam rahi hai. un ka kehna tha ke hukoomat ko talba ko di jaane wali sazaon ka ilm hai aur ab hum un ke kisz ki pairwi kar rahay hain taakay sazaon par nazar sani karai jasakay. khayaal rahay ke Iran mein decemeber 2017 ko malik geer ehtijaj ki aik lehar uth khari hui thi.’ mehengai na Manzoor ‘ ke naara ke sath uthney wali is tehreek ney 100 shehron ko apni lapait mein le liya tha. irani rjim ney awaami ehtijaj kuchalney ke liye taaqat ka andha dhund istemaal kya aur barri tadaad mein shehrion jin mein talba bhi shaamil they ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. un ke khilaaf adalaton mein riyasat ke khilaaf kaam karne ke ilzamaat ke tehat muqadmaat chalaye gaye
636.title: ‘Mehengai’ ke khilaaf aawaz uthany walay irani talba ko kari sazayen

news_detail: Israeli wazeer e azam se Saudi Arab ke walii ehad Mohammad bin Salman se khufia mulaqaat ke baaray mein khabrain manzar aam par aa rahi hain magar ta haal kisi bhi musadeqa zaraye se is ki toseeq nahi hosaki Albata Israeli Netanyahu ki amarati hakkaam se khufia mulakaton aur rawabit ka inkishaaf samnay aaya hai. khabar rasan idaron ke tor par chalaye janey wali baaz Websites par yeh khabrain aam ki jarahi hain ke Netanyahu avrsavdi shehzada Mohammad bin Salman ke darmain jummay ke roz Oman mein khufia mulakaatein huien, dono rehnumao ke darmain Jordon ke dar-al-hakoomat mein waqay Shahi mehal mein mulaqaat hui, yeh mulaqaat Sadar America ke damaad o White House ke musheer khaas Jared Kushnar aur Mashriq wasta ke liye Trump ke qasid Jasen Green Balett ke daura Oman ke mauqa par hui. Israeli akhbar Haaritz ki aik khabar ke mutabiq Wazeer e Azam Israel Netanyahu ney Jordon ke Shah Abdullah II se paiir ke din Oman mein mulaqaat kiye. is mulaqaat se Oman mein 2017 mein Israeli sifarat khanah par aik security guard ko goli markar halaak kardainay ke baad se Israel aur Oman ke darmain safarti bohraan ke baad dono qaideen ke darmain taluqaat ke istehkaam ka ishara milta hai. dono mumalik ke sarbarah ney is se qabal aakhri martaba November 2014 mein brsraam mulaqaat ki thi. Netanyahu ney 2016 hamza mein Aqaba mein is waqt ke Amrici secretary dakhla jaan carry ki sadarat mein munaqidah khufia aman ijlaas mein shirkat ki thi jis mein Shah Abdullah II aur Sadar Egypt Abulfatah Alsesi bhi maujood thay. Oman ke ijlaas mein Mosad ke director Yossi Cohen, MIilitary Secretary baraye Wazeer e Azam Eliezer Toledano, Netanyahu ke Chief of Staff Yoav Horowitz, Cabinet Secretary Tzachi Braverman, National Security Council ke numainda o Qaumi Iqtisadi Council ke sarbarah professor Avi Simhon ney hissa liya .

report mein zarea ke hawala se bataya gaya hai ke Mohammad bin Salman aur sakht geer Israeli wazeer e azam ke darmain mulakaatein Jordon ke Shah Abdullah ki mojoodgi aur un ke baghair bhi huien, doosri janib Israeli wazeer e azam ke amarati hakkaam se khufia mulakaton aur rawabit ka bhi inkishaaf sun-hwa hai, doosri janib aik Amrici akhbar ke mutabiq Iran johri muahiday ke waqt se America aur amarati hakkaam ke darmain khufia rawabit aur mulakaton ka silsila jari hai, report ke mutabiq Israel Iran johri moahida ke khtama aur khitta mein is ke assar vrsokh ke liye Arab mumalik kay sath rawabit barha raha hai. nyoyarkr Nami akhbar ke reporter ke mutabiq Amrici intelli jins agencies ku Amarati ohdedaran aur Israeli hakkaam ke darmain phone calls ke baaray mein maloom sun-hwa hai jabkay un mein se aik phone cal emirate ke aik senior ohdedar aur Netanyahu ke darmain thi, report ke mutabiq Hillary Clinton bator sadaarti umeed waar aur bator wazeer kharja is muamlay se aagah theen ke mutahidda Arab emirate aur Saudi Arab Iran ke asar wo rusukh ko kam karne ke liye Israeli intelli jins agency mosad se rabita mein hain, Amrici sahafi ney intelli jins idaron ke hawala se bataya ke mutahidda Arab emirate aur Israel ke ohdedar vn ke darmain mulaqaat yunan mein hui thi, Amrici hakkaam ka kehna hai ke baadi al nazr mein yeh maloom hota hai ke mazkoorah mulaqaat mein Netanyahu khud bhi mojood thay, wazeh rahay ke emirate aur Saudi Arab ke Israel ke sath safarti taluqaat nahi hain, darin Isna Israel ke wazeer e azam Netanyahu ney Jordon ke badshah se mulaqaat mein wazeh kiya ke woh beeet almuqaddas ki intizami soorat e haal ko barqarar rakhnay ke haami hain. is mulaqaat ki tasdeeq Israeli wazeer e azam ke daftar se jari honay walay aik bayan mein ki gayi hai. Shah Abdullah II ke sath Israeli wazeer e azam ki mulaqaat taqreebin aik saal baad hui hai
651.title: Kya walii-ehad Saudi Arbia Mohammad bin Salman ney Netanyahu se khufia mulaqaat ki?

news_detail: Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Turkey ki tareekh mein pehli martaba Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat aik sath ho rahay hain. Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhab ke liye votng ka amal Turkey ke waqt ke mutabiq aaj subah 8 bujey se shuru hogaya hai jo 5 bujey tak bila ta-attul jari rahay ga. Turkey mein 5,63,22 632 voters apna haq raye dahi istemaal karen ge jin ke liye 1,80,0 65 ballot box banaye gaye hain jab ke saarhay 30 laakh beron malik muqeem shehri pehlay hi apna haq raye dahi istemaal kar chukay hain. votng ke ekhtataam par sab se pehlay Sadarati umeedwaron ki ginti ho gi is ke baad Parliamani intikhab ki baari aeye gi. Sadarati intikhab ki daud mein awaami ittehaad ke Rajab Tayyab ardgan, jamhoriat awam party ke Mehram Enjay, Kurd Siyasi Jamaat Peoples Democratic Party ke Salah Aldeen Damir Teshe, Fazeelat Party ke Temal Kermola Avlo aur Watan Party ke Duwo Peranchik shaamil hain. taham sakht muqaabla dusri baar sadarat ke umeed waar Tayyab Erdogan ka Jamhoriat Awam Party ke Mehram Enjay se hoga .

Parliamani intikhab ke liye Turkey mein 8 siyasi jamaaton ke darmain muqaabla ho raha hai jin mein AAq party, jamhoriat awam party, achi party, Khudapar, Fazeelat party, Peoples Democratic Party aur watan Party shaamil hain. Aaq party aur mili harkat party ne awaami ittehaad se ittehaad karliya hai jisay azeem ittehaad party ki himayat bhi haasil hai. Bain al aqwami surway ke adaad vshmar zahir karte hain ke Rajab Tayyab ardgan doosri baar sadarat ke liye muntakhib ho jayen ge taham hizab e ikhtilaaf ke rehnuma Mehram Enjay kisi bhi qisam ka surprize dainay ki mukammal salahiyat rakhtay hain is liye Tayyab ardgan ke liye yeh intikhab jeetna asan nahi hoga. yun to Sadarati intikhab aglay saal honay thay lekin saddar Tayyab ardgan ne qabal az waqt election ka elaan karkay dono intikhab aik sath karanay ka faisla kya .

wazeh rahay ke Turkey ke intikhabi qawaneen ke tehat Sadarati intikhabaat mein kamyaab umeed waar ko 50% se zayed vote lainay hon ge, agar koi aik umeed waar yeh hadaf haasil nah kar saka to phir ziyada vote haasil karne walay do umeedwaron ke darmain dobarah intikhab hoga jis ke liye 8 July ki tareekh mukhtas ki gayi hai
539.title: Turkey mein pehli martaba aik hi din Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat

news_detail: Misri parliment ney itwaar ke roz saddar Abdul Fatah Al-Sesi ke aas faisla ki manzoori day di hai jis mein Alsesi ney malik bhar mein nafiz hungami haalat mein 14 July se mazeed teen mah ke liye tausee ka elaan kya tha. misar mein pehli martaba hungami haalat ka nifaz April 2017 hamza mein do chrchon par honay walay dhmakon ke baad kya gaya tha jin mein 45 ke qareeb afraad halaak aur darjanon zakhmi ho gaye they. is ke baad se har teen mah ya is se kuch zayed arsa ke liye is haalat mein tausee ki jati rahi. misar is waqt jazeera numa Seina ke shumal mein paon jamaye shiddat pasandon ke khilaaf nbrd aazma hai. un shiddat pasandon ney aakhri chand barson mein mukhtalif hamlon ke douran Misri fouj aur police ke secron ahal karon ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya. misar ke dastoor mjrih 1958 hamza ki dafaa 162 ke tehat saddar ko malik mein hungami haalat ke nifaz aur is mein teen mah ki tausee ke ikhtiyarat tafweez kiye gaye hain
549.title: Misar: Hungami haalat mein teen mah ki tausee

news_detail: Turkey ke Sadar Tayyab Erdogan ne mulk ke Sadarati intikhabaat mein apni kamyabi ka elaan kardiya hai aur kaha hai ke un ki party ne bhi Parliamani intikhabaat mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. itwaar ke din hui dohri raye dahi mein 56 million se zayed raye dahindon ko vote daalnay ka mustahiq qarar diya gaya tha. malik ki tareekh mein pehli martaba sadarat aur parliman ke intikhabaat back waqt hue they. Sadar Tayyab Erdogan ne ne ghair sarkari nataij ka hawala dete hue kaha ke woh intikhabaat jeet chuke hain. unhon ne apni Istanbul ki rihaishgah par kaha ke intikhabaat ke ghair sarkari nataij wazeh ho chukay hain. un nataij ke mutabiq malik ne mujh par sadarat ki zimma daari aur ohda sonpa hai. unhon ne kaha ke un ki party justice and development party ( AK party ) ki zair qayadat mahaaz ne bhi Parliamani intikhabaat mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. Asal oppostion party ne kaha ke is waqt shikast qubool karlena qabal az-waqat hogaavr kaha kay hamein yaqeen hai ke Erdogan ne 8 July ki azmaish se bachney hanooz 50% votes ki had ko paar nahi kya hai. Supreme Election Council ne hanooz qatee nataij ka elaan nahi kya hai. Hukumat Turkey ke aik tarjuman Bekir Bozdag ka kehna hai ke Tayyab Erdogan dobarah muntakhib ho chukay hain. Unhon ne apne twitter par likha ke Turkey ke awam ne Erdogan ku naiy nizaam ke tehat Turkey ke pehlay Sadar/ aamilana ikhtiyarat ka haamil Sadar muntakhib karliya hai. Turkey awam ab se Sadar Erdogan kahey gi.

Qabal azeen mausula ittila ke mutabiq Turkey mein Sadarati intikhabaat ke liye polling ke baad ginti ka amal jari hai aur kal daaley gay voton mein 70. 5 fisad ki ginti mukammal hogayi hai. Sadarati intikhabaat ke ghair hatmi aur juzwi nataij ke mutabiq Sadar Rajab Tayyab Erdogan ko qareeban 56 fisad votes ke sath apne hareef umeedwaron par bartari haasil hai. Sadar Erdogan ke madd e muqabil Secular Republican Party ke umeedwaar Mehram Anech ne 29. 4 fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Agar koi bhi Sadarati umeed waar kal daaley gay voton mein se 50 fi sad se ziyada vote nah le saka to 8 July ko dobarah dosray marhalay mein Sadarati intikhabaat hon ge. si an an tark aur dosray muqami nashriyati idaron ke mutabiq Sadar Erdogan ki hukumran jamaat Insaaf aur Taraqqi Party ( AK Party ) ne Parliamani intikhabaat mein daaley gay 61. 1 fisad votes mein se 45. 18 fisad votes haasil kar liye hain. is ki ittihadi qaumi tehreek party ne 11. 78 fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Is terha un dono jamaaton ko Parliamani intikhabaat mein wazeh bartari haasil honay ki umeed hai. Turkey mein pehli martaba wast mudti Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat ke liye bayakk waqt vote daaley gay hain. Dusray do Sadarati umeedwaron Qaum Parast Good Party ke Miral Aeksaz ne saat fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Kurd Nawaz Peoples Democratic Party ke umeedwaar Salahuddin Demrits ke haq mein 6 fisad se bhi kam vote daaley gay hain. Democratic Party  ko Parliamani intikhabaat mein bhi koi ziyada pazeerai haasil nahi hosaki hai. is ko 10 fi sad se bhi kam vote haasil hue hain. agar woh kul daaley gay voton mein se das fisad se ziyada vote haasil na kar saki to phir is ke hissay mein parliament ki koi nashist bhi nahi aaye gi.
561.title: Sadar Turkey Tayyab Erdogan ne apni kamyabi ka elaan kardiya

news_detail: Myanmar ki Afwaaj ney riyasat Rakhine Operation ki Command ke aik General ko fouj se bar tarf kardiya jis ke nateeja mein zayed az  7 laakh Rohingya musalman malik ki sarhad paar karkay parosi Bangladesh mein panah Guzeen hogaye. Myanmar ki Musallah Afwaaj ney jo Tatmadaw kehlati hai, myanmar ke 7 senior military ohdedar Bashmole bar tarf shuda Major General Maung Maung Soe par European Union ki janib se aayed kardah taaza tahedidaat ke chand ghanton baad hi aik bayan mein bartarfi ka elaan kya hai. European Union Council ney aik bayan mein kaha ke saton par is liye tahedidaat aed kiye gaye hain ke woh 2017 ke dosray wast mein Rakhine riyasat mein Rohingya awam ke khilaaf haqooq insani ki sangeen khilaaf vrzyon aur mazalim mein mulawis rahay hain. un khilaaf vrzyon mein ghair qanooni qatal, jinsi tshddavr munazzam andaaz mein Rohingya awam ke gharon aur amarat ko aag lagana shaamil hai. April mein European Union ney myanmar par aslah tahedidaat ko sakht kardiya tha aur Tatmadaw ko military traning aur taawun par imtenaa aed kardiya thajo myanmar ki naamzad shehri qayadat wali hukoomat ke control se bahar hogayi thi. keneda ney bhi myanmar par taaza tahedidaat aed kar di hai. Tatmadaw ney aaj jari kardah bayan mein kaha ke Major General Maung Maung Soe ko intehapasandon ke hamlon se nimatnay mein naaqis karkardagi par bar tarf kardiya gaya hai. Maung Maung Soe 2017 ke avaakhr mein kiye gaye tabadlah se pehlay western command ke sarbarah they jo Rohingya musalmanoon ke khilaaf kiye gaye operation ki nigran car thi. aik aur military ohdedaar jin par tahedidaat aed kiye gaye hain woh Third Bureau of Operations ke Deputy Major General Aung  Kyaw Zaw hain, inhen istifa dainay ki ijazat di gayi hai. bayan mein un ke talluq se kaha gaya ke un ki karkardagi mein kuch khamiyan theen. writers ke sahafion ki janib se aik ijtimai qabar ke daryaft kiye jane ke baad April mein 7 fojion ko 10 Rohingya Muslims ko qatal karne mein mulawis honay par jail ki saza di gayi
579.title: European Union ki tahedidaat ke baad Myanmar ney General ko barkhast kardiya

news_detail: Khayaal rahay ke Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne Muslim aksariati mumalik Iran , Yemen , shaam, Somalia, Chad aur Libya ke bashindon par America mein dakhla par pabandi aayed ki thi baad azan is fehrist mein shumali Korea aur Venezuela ko bhi shaamil kya gaya tha. America ke cheif justice jaan robrts ne Donald Trump ke sadaarti hukum nama ke khilaaf dair ki jaanay wali darkhwaston ko mustard kardiya jis mein kaha gaya tha ke is faisla se musalmanoon ke khilaaf imtiazi sulook barta gaya ya phir Amrici Sadar ke paas yeh ikhtiyar nahi ke woh yeh faisla le saken. cheif justice ne ahthyat brtte hue Trump ke muhajreen aur bilkhushoos musalmanoon ke khilaaf ishtial angaiz bayanaat ki tayeed nah karte hue kaha ke Trump ki is policy ke muaser honay ke hawala se hum kuch nahi keh satke hain. doosri janib Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne bhi samaji rabita ki Website par apni tweet mein khushy ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke’ Supreme Court ne Trump ki safri pabandi ko barqarar rakha hai ‘. wazeh rahay Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne guzashta saal ibtidayi tor par 6 Muslim mumalik par 90 roz ke liye safari pabandi aayed ki thi jisay baad azan qanooni shakal day di gayi thi lekin is faisla ko Supreme Court ki matehat apilit court ne ghair aaeni qarar dete hue kaladam qarar dyatha. is sadaarti hukum nama ke khilaaf America bhar mein muzahirey kiye gay aur baad azan Trump intizamia ne is adalti faislay ko Supreme Court mein challenge kya tha jis ne ibtidayi tor par safri pabandi ko juzwi tor par bahaal kya tha.
589.title: U S Supreme Court ka Muslim mumalik par safari pabandi barqarar rakhnay ka faisla

news_detail: Holland ke ewaan zaireen ke baad ewaan baala ne bhi naqaab par juzwi pabandi ka bill Manzoor kar liya, jis ke baad kayi awaami muqamat par naqaab par pabandi lagadi gayi hai. bil ki manzoori ke baad public tansport, taleemi idaron, sahet ke idaron aur aspatalon mein naqaab par pabandi hogi. dayen baazu ke leader Geert Wilders ne naqaab par pabandi se mutaliq bil ki manzoori ke baad harzah saraai karte hue kaha hai ke yeh malik mein d aslamayzishn ki janib pehla qadam hai, agla iqdaam Netherlands ki tamam msajd ko band karna hoga. wazeh rahay ke belgium, France , Denmark aur spain sameit 13 Europi malik pehlay hi naqaab par pabandi laga chuke hain. dutch ke 75 rukni chimbr ne is khsoos mein 31 ke muqaabla 44 arkaan ki manzoori se yeh bil Manzoor karliya jo 2016 se ewaan ki manzoori ka muntazir tha. is amtnaa ke haq mein Holland ki chaar ke mnjmlh teen partiyan haq mein theen. darasal dutch kabeena ne is mansoobah ko 2015 mein hi manzoori day thi. is qanoon ki manzoori ke baad amtnaa ki khilaaf warzi par 400 Euro yani taqreeban 31, 927 Hindustani rupay jurmana aed karne ki tajweez hai
603.title: Holland ke awaami muqamat par naqaab par pabandi

news_detail: Canadian Wazeer e Azam Justin Trudeau ko sun glasses ka tohfa lena mehanga par gaya, hakkaam ke samnay zahir nah karne par Trudeau par 100 Canadian dollar ka jurmana kardiya gaya. Justin Trudeau ko guzashta saal Canadian soobay Prince Edward island ke sarbarah ne do besh qeemat branded sun glasses ke tohfay diye thay, jisay zahir nah karne par Wazeer e Azam ko 100 dollar ka jurmana ada karna para hai. Canadian qanoon ke mutabiq mulki Wazeer e Azam ko 200 dollar se zayed maliyat ke tohfe ko 30 dinon ke andar laazmi declare karna hota hai. Trudeau ke press secretary ke mutabiq intizamia ki ghalti ke baais tohfay ko declare nah kya jaska, sun glasses ki qeemat 300 aur 500 dollar hai.
614.title: Canadian Wazeer e Azam ku tohfa lainay par jurmana

news_detail: Duke of Cambridge Shehzada william ne apne pehlay daura Palestine ke aakhri roz maqboza Bait al-Muqaddas mein Alhrm al-Qudsi al-Sharif sameit mutadid muqaddas muqamat ka daura kya. yaad rahay Masjid Aqsa al-Hrm al-Qudsi ki deewar mein waqay tamam ilaqa ko kaha jata hai. yeh istilaah sirf Masjid قبلی ya pahari ke gunbad par muntabiq nahi hoti. is ka itlaq pahari ke gunbad, Masjid Qibla, Musalla al-Marwani aur deegar ahem muqamat par bhi hota hai. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Bartanwi Shehzada william ne budh ke roz maqboza maghribi kinare mein Falasteeni panah gazinon ke camp ka daura kya. Is se qabal unhon ne Falasteeni sadar Mahmud Abbas ke sath mulaqaat mein is umeed ka izhaar kiya ke

mein aman qaim ho jaye ga. Bartanwi Shahi khandan ke kisi bhi fard ke Israel aur Palestine ke pehlay sarkari daura ke mauqa par Shehzada william ne Ramallah shehar ke nazdeek al Jalzune camp mein aqwam mutahidda ke zair e intizam aik tbbi tanseeb ka daura kya. sarkari khabar rasan agency wafa ke mutabiq Falasteeni saddar Mahmood abbas ne is mauqa par kaha ke Falasteeni janib Israel ke sath aman ke liye sanjeeda hai taa ke dono reastain 4 June 1967 hamza ki sarhadoon par aman aur istehkaam ke sath reh saken. raam Allah mein sadaarti head quarter mein Shehzada william ke istaqbaal ke mauqa par Mahmood abbas ne kaha ke” hum mazakraat ke zareya aman taq pohanchna chahtay hain. hamara yeh muaqqaf taweel arsay se tabdeel nahi sun-hwa. hum sjhte hain ke Bartanwi Shehzada ka yeh daura Bartanwi aur Falasteeni dono awam ke darmain dosti ke taluqaat ko mazboot banaye ga. hamein –apne Palestine ke munsifana maslay ke wastay hamesha se Bartanwi awam ki support ki zaroorat rahi hai “. Falasteeni saddar ne bataya ke Bartanwi hukoomat ne haal hi mein” imdadi agency” Onarva” ko support paish ki hai. yeh agency Falasteeni araazi mein panah gzinon ki imdaad ke liye sargaram hai. Bartanwi walii ehad ke sahib zade ne garam joshi ke sath istaqbaal par saddar Mahmood abbas ka shukriya ada kya. Shehzada william ne kaha ke” mein masroor hon ke mera malik aap logon ke sath taleem ke maidan mein kaam kar raha hai. mujhe umeed hai ke yeh taawun khtte mein aman taq pounchanay ke wastay jari rahay ga”
627.title: Shehzada william ka Bait al-Muqaddas ke ahem muqamat ka daura

news_detail: Brussels: European Union ke mumalik ne panah gzinon se mutaliq naye muahiday par ittafaq raye peda kar liya hai jis ke tehat panah Guzeen camp band kardiye jayen ge. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq brslz mein European Union ke srbrahan ka ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein tanao aur raat bhar ke taweel aur mazakraat ke baad panah gzinon ke hawala se aik moahida tey pa gaya hai jis ke tehat tarikeen watan ke campon ko band kar ke earzi camp banaya jaye ga jo muhajreen ki dastawizaat ki jaanch partaal karkay is ka faisla kere ga ke kisay sarhad paar karne ki ijazat di jasakay gi aur kisay wapas kardiya jaye ga. European Union ke darmiyan yeh mafahmati amal Europi mumalik ki sarhadoon par barhatay hue tarikeen watan ki tadaad aur is se peda honay walay masail ke paish e nazar kya gaya hai. taweel ijlaas ke douran srbrahan ne sikoriti rissk, muhajreen ki baaz abad kaari aur zaroori sahulaton ki dasteyabi ke imkanaat par bhi ghhor kiya gaya. kamyaab ijlaas ke baad Europi council ke sarbarah Donald Tusk ne apni tweet mein kaha hai ke Europi bock ke tamam athais arkaan, muhajreen samait deegar mamlaat ke hal par mutfiq ho gaye hain. doosri janib Europi mumalik ke sifarat karon ka kehna hai ke Europi mumalik ke darmiyan panah gzinon se mutaliq moahida mein to ittafaq raye ho gaya hai taham tarikeen watan ke hrasti campon se mutaliq abhi kuch wazeh nahi hai. ilawa azeen moahida se purumeed Germany ki Chancellor Angela Merkel ka kehna hai ke Europi mumalik panah gzinon ki ghair qanooni aur be qaida hijrat ka hal talaash karne ke liye aindah bhi mafahmat se kaam karta rahay ga. ijlaas mein yoropi qaideen ne bock mein anay walay panah gzinon ko raza karana tor par bahar karen ge aur panah ki darkhwaston par karwai ke liye androon yorop ‘Controlled Centres’ ke qiyam par ittafaq kya. ijlaas ne italy ke naye Wazeer e Azam Giuseppe  Conte ke ahem mutalba ko bhi qubool karliya gaya ke ne samandar se bachaliye jaaane walay tarikeen watan ki zimma daari baantane se bhi ittafaq karliya.
640.title: European Union ka muhajreen ke tamam camp band karne ka faisla

news_detail: California : Aqwam e Mutahidda ka kehna hai ke 2017 ke douran dehshat gardi ke mukhtalif waqeat mein 10 hazaar se zayed bachay halaak ya mazoor hue hain jab ke 8 hazaar bachon ko dehshat gardi ke waqeat mein istemaal kya gaya. Qabil zikar baat yeh hai ke aqwam mutahidda ney Israel aur Hammas ko fehrist mein shaamil nahi kya hai halaank mahireen ney un ki shamoliat ki sifarish ki thi. do saal qabal aqwam mutahidda ney Saudi Arbia ko fehrist mein shaamil kya thatahm sakht ehtijaj ke baad is waqt secretary general banki moon ney Saudi Arbia ko fehrist se hatadena tha jis par ghhor zair iltiwa hai. is saal ki fehrist mein Saudi Arbia par ziyada tanqeed nahi ki gayi taham yeh wazeh kardiya ke Yemen mein shiaon ke baaghi group Houties ke khilaaf larney walay arab mumalik ke ittehaad bachon ki halakat ka zimma daar hai. aqwam mutahidda ki Children and Armed Conflict (CAAS) ki salana report ke mutabiq khanah jungi aur dehshat gardi ke waqeat mein bachon ki halakaton aur mazoori ke waqeat mein izafah dekhney mein aaya hai. guzashta baras 2017 mein duniya ke 20 mukhtalif mumalik mein musallah tanazeaat ki zad mein aa kar 10 hazaar se zayed bachay halaak ya mazoori ka shikaar hue. un mein ziyada tar bachay shaam, Yemen aur Afghanistan mein halaak aur mazoor hue. aqwam mutahidda ki report ke mutabiq bachon ki halakaton ki wajah hamla awaron ka tawatar se aspatalon aur schoolon ko nishana banana hai jis mein 2016 ke muqaabla mein izafah dekhney mein aaya hai. ilawa azeen guzashta baras bachon ke bunyadi haqooq ki khilaaf warzi ke 21 hazaar se zayed waqeat record kiye gaye jab ke 8 hazaar se zayed bachon ko intahaa pasand jamaaton ney apni musallah jid-o-jehad ke liye istemaal kya. Report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke soudan, Iraq , shaam, Yemen aur Afghanistan mein bachon ke bunyadi insani haqooq ki surat_e_ haal nihayat takleef da hai. report mein kaha gaya hai ke bachon ke haqooq ke manafi ikees hazaar se zayed khilaaf varziyan record ki gayi hain aur haqeeqat mein yeh iss se kahin ziyada ho sakti hain. saal 2016 mein aisi karwaiyon ki tadaad saarhay pandrah hazaar ke lag bhag theen. is report mein yemeni jung mein bachon ki halakat ko khaas tor par wazeh kya gaya hai. is report mein bataya gaya ke Pakistan asasi banned tanzeem Jaish e Mohammad aur Hizab ul Mujahideen ney guzashta baras jammu o Kashmir mein Security Forces ke sath tassadum mein bachon ko bharti aur istemaal kya. is report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke nkslayts ki janib se bhi khaas kar chhatees garh aur jharkhnd mein bachon ko bharti karne aur inhen istemaal karne ki mutawatar it-tila-aat masool hoti rahi hain. musallah groups ke khilaaf Security Forces ke Operations ke douran bachay halaak aur zakhmi hotay rahay hain. report mein sarkari data ke hawala se bataya gaya ke Naxalites se mutasirah ilaaqon mein 188 shehri halaak hue taham bachon se mutaliq koi makhsoos data dastyab nahi hai
653.title: Aik saal mein 10 hazaar bachay dehshat gardi ke waqiaat mein halaak ya mazoor hue: UNO

news_detail: Saudi Arbia ke farmaa rava Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ney awaami shoba ke mulazmeen ke liye 10 roza Eid ul Fitar taatilat ka elaan kya hai. un tatilat ka aaghaz jummay 15 June se hoga aur tawaqqa hai ke mulazmeen itwaar 24 June ko rujoo bah car hon ge. isi terhan Amman mein bhi awaami o khangi shoba jaat ke liye Eid tatilat ka elaan kardiya gaya hai. Amman ki sarkari khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq awaami shoba ke mulazmeen ke liye tatilat ka agaaz Juma 15 June se hoga jo peer 18 June tak rahen gi aur 19 June se kaam kaaj ka aaghaz hojaye ga. isi asna Saudi Arbia ke mahireen ka kehna hai ke is martaba Saudi Arbia mein mah Ramadhan 29 dinon ka ho sakta hai. Saudi arab ke maahir mosmiyat ney Ramadhan al mubarak 29 dinon ka honay aur Eid ulFitar burrows jummay 15 June ko mananay ka imkaan zahir kya hai. Saudi maahir umoor mosmiyat Abdul Aziz Al Hassaini ka kehna hai ke falkiati adaad vshmar se andaza sun-hwa hai ke is saal mah Ramadhan 29 dinon ka hoga. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke is baat ka inhisaar Rwait ke din mausam aur mutala saaf honay par hai, mutala saaf honay ki soorat mein jumaraat 14 June ko shawaal almkrm ka chaand nazar anay ka quavi imkaan hai
547.title: Saudi Arbia mein awaami shoba ke liye Eid taatilat

news_detail: shaam mein insani huqooq ke idaron ke mutabiq Asad intizamia ki haleef Roosi fouj ney shumali maghribi Governance Adlib mein wehshiana bombari mein darjanon shehrion ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya hai. insani huqooq ki soorat e haal prnzr rakhnay walay idaara ‘Syrian Observatory’ ke mutabiq Adlib ke wasti ilaqa Zaradna mein Roosi fouj ke jungi tayyaron se ki gayi bombari mein kam se kam 38 aam shehri halaak aur darjanon zakhmi hogaye hain jab ke barri tadaad mein shehri malbay taley dabey hue hain .

insani huqooq group ke mutabiq ibtidayi it-tila-aat mein 18 aam shehrion ke maaray janay ki tasdeeq ki gayi thi taham mazeed daidh darjan afraad ki mayyaten nikaali gayi hain. maqtuleen mein bachay aur khawateen bhi shaamil hain jab ke zakhmion ki tadaad 60 taq batayi ja rahi hai. Insani huqooq ke aabzror Rami Abdul Rehman ney bataya ke mumkina tour par Adlib mein bombari Roosi jungi tayyaron ki janib se ki gayi hai. is mein Roosi sakhta bomb istemaal kiye gaye. mutasirah ilaqay ke qareeb imdadi karkun zakhmion ko fori tibbi imdaad pohanchanay ki koshish kar rahay hain. un ke paas do aisay zakhmion ko laya gaya jin mein se aik be hosh tha aur dosray ke chehray ki shanakht nahi ho rahi thi. khayaal rahay Adlibke jis ilaqa ko Roosi jungi tayyaron ki janib se bombari ka nishana banaya gaya hai woh tehreer shaam mahaaz jo maazi mein Al Qaeda ki zeli tanzeem ‘Alnasrah Front’ ke tour par mashhoor thi ke control mein hai. haliya dinon mein seen ilaqay mein Roosi fouj ka yeh bad tareen hamla hai
558.title: Roosi fouj ney Adlib mein qayamat dhaa di, 38 shehri jaan bahaq

news_detail: America naay kaha hai ke woh Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hai, Afghan masla ka hal afghanon ki marzi aur Afghan qayadat ke tehat hona chahiye, aman amal ke liye Pakistan ka taawun na guzeer hai. Afghan media ke mutabiq Afghan hukoomat aur Taliban ke mabain earzi jung bandi elaan ke baad America naay bhi elaan kya hai ke woh Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hai. Amrici saddar Donald Trump ki Muawin aur National Security Council baraye wasta Asia ki senior director Liza Curtis ke mutabiq America mazakraat mein Afghan hukoomat ki numaindagi nahi kere ga, sirf shaamil hoga. unhon naay kaha ke Afghan aman amal mein Pakistan ke khadshaat par tavajja dena intahi ahem hai, aman amal ke hawala se Pakistan se taawun manga hai, kisi bhi aman amal mein Pakistan ke mafadaat ka khayaal rakhna hoga.
569.title: Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hain: America

news_detail: Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq North Korea ke sadar Kim Jong-Un Singapore pahonch gaye. Changi Airport par Un ke pur tapaak istaqbaal ke liye Singapore ke wazeer kharja Vivian Balakrishnan sameit aala hukkaam maujood they. Kim Jong-Un aaj Singapore ke wazeer e azam Lee Hsien Loong se bhi mulaqaat karen ge. mulaqaat mein dotrfh bahami taluqaat aur Amrici sadar Donald Trump se 12 June ko honay wali tareekhi mulaqaat ke hawalay se tabadlah khayaal kiya jaye ga .

Singapore ke khobsorat jazeeray Sentosa ke five star hotel Kapila mein Amrici sadar Donald Trump se North Korea ke sadar Kim Jong-Un ke darmain 12 June ko honay wali tareekhi mulaqaat ke liye intizamaa ko hatmi shakal day di gayi hai. is mulaqaat ke liye guzashta kayi mah se safarti satah par mazakraat jari they aur bahami razamandi se mulaqaat ki tareekh tey karne ke baad bhi ghair yakeeni soorat e haal barqarar rahi jab ke Amrici sadar aik baar mulaqaat mansookh bhi kar chukay they .

Singapore ke Airport par media se guftagu ke douran North Korea ke sarbarah Kim Jong-Un Amrici sadar se mulaqaat ko tareekhi qarar dete hue khittay par is ke misbet asraat ke liye pur azm dikhayi dete hain. idhar Americi sadar Donald Trump mulaqaat ke nataij ke hawalay se ziyada pُramid nahi jis ka izhaar woh jee seven ijlaas ke ekhtataam par media se guftagu ke douran kar chuke hain.
581.title: Kim Jong-Un ki Amrici sadar se tareekhi mulaqaat ke liye Singapore aamad

news_detail: Masjid Haraam ke ulama, aymah karaam, wazeer Haj aur wali ehad shehzada Mohammad bin Salman ney Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz se Makkah Mukrama ke qasr Alsafa mein mulaqaat ki. Alarabia.nett ke mutabiq Shah Salman se mulaqaat karne walon mein Masjid Haraam aur Masjid nabwi ke umoor ke incharge al shaikh dr Abdul Rehman bin Abdul Aziz al Sudais, Aima karaam, Masjid Haraam ke mauzineen aur deegar hukkaam shaamil they. is mauqa par Saudi Arab ke wazeer baraye umoor Hajj Dr. Mohammad bin Saleh Bantan, secrteries Hajj, intizami councils ke srbrahan, Tuwaf ke nigran idaron ar deegar rehnumaoon ney bhi Shah Salman se mulaqaat ki. Mulaqaat namaz maghrib se qabal hui. baad azan tamam mehmanon ney Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ki taraf se diye gaye iftaar dinner mein  bhi shirkat ki. Qasr Alsafa mein anay walon mein shehzada Khalid bin Fahd bin Khalid , shehzada Maqraan bin Abdul Aziz aale Saood , Shehzada Mansoor bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Talal bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Khalid bin Bindar bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Satam bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, Albaha ke Governor shehzada Dr. Hussam bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, Shah Salman ke musheer shehzada Dr. Abdul Aziz bin Sataan bin Abdul Aziz, shumali ilaqon ke Governor shehzada Faisal bin Khalid bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, Shehzada Salman bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, , Jazan ke naib Governor shehzada Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz bin Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz, Riyadh ke Governor shehzada Mohammad bin Abdul Rehman bin Abdul Aziz, mashriqi ilaqon ke Governor shehzada Ahmed bin Fahd bin bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz, Makkah Mukrama ke Governor shehzada Abdullah bin Bindar bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Saood bin Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Salman bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Abdalmjid bin Abdulaala bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Rakaan bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz aur shehzada Faisal bin Ahmed bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz shaamil they.
592.title: Harmain Sharifain ke Ummaal ke liye Shah Saudi Arabia ki dawat iftaar

news_detail: Haspanwi Wazeer e Azam ney samandari hudood mein ghair qanooni tor par daakhil honay walay 629 taarkin e watan ko malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat day di hai. mukhtalif mumalik se talluq rakhnay walay yeh Europe mein daakhil hona chahtay they lekin qareeb tareen malik italy ney inhen –apne malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat nahi di. italy ke baad maalta ki hukoomat ney inhen dakhlay ki ijazat nahi di jis ke baad Haspanwi Wazeer e Azam Pedro Sánchez ney insani hmdri ke izhaar ke tor par inhen malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat day di. Wazeer e Azam ney kaha ke un ka malik zeli sahrayi africi mumalik se talluq rakhnay walon se bhari kashti MS Aquarious ko mehfooz bandargaah faraham karen ge
605.title: 629 taarkin e watan ko Spain mein dakhlay ki ijazat

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ke Prosecutor General neh mulk mein taasub ko sun-hwa dainay aur firqa waranah muhim joi karne walay anasir ke khilaaf sakht qanoon Manzoor kya hai. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq mumlikat mein firqa waranah naara baazi ki tayari, taasub aur mulk dushmani par mabni ltrichr tayyar karne aur usay dosaron taq pohanchanay walay anasir ko paanch saal qaid ya 30 lakh Riyal jurmana ya dono sazayen di ja sakain gi. Saudi hukkaam ka kehna hai ke internet ya social media ke zareya Saudi Arabia mein nizaam aam mein khlal daalnay, firqa wariyat ko farogh dainay, tasbat ko sun-hwa dainay, murawaja dainee aadaab wo aqdaar ke khilaaf kaam karne, shehrion ki privacy mein mudakhlat karne ya is terhan ke deegar juraim mein mulawis afraad ko un ke jurm ki hesiyat ke mutabiq qaid aur jrmane ya dono sazayen di ja sakain gi
623.title: Saudi Arabia mein firqa waranah sar garmion par paanch saal qaid 30 laakh Riyal jurmana

news_detail: Beshtar Muslim mumalik mein jummay ko Eid al Fitar hogi. kayi mumalik mein Halal shawaal ki Rwait saabit hogayi hai. Saudi Arabia mein shawaal ka chaand nazar aagaya hai jis ke baad kal eid hogi. Arab Tv ke mutabiq Saudi Arabia mein kal eid hogi jabkay sarkari elaan jald Nashar kya jaye ga. qutar, mutahidda arab amarat, Saudi Arbia , Indonesia, Turkey aur Malaysia un mumalik mein shaamil hain jahan Eid al Fitar jummay ko hogi. Doosri taraf Bharat aur Paktsan mein shawaal ka chaand nazar nahi aaya jis ke nateeja mein eid hafta 16 June ko hogi. New Zealand aur Australia mein bhi hafta ko hi eid hogi.
635.title: Saudi Arabia aur beshtar mumalik mein jummay ko Eid al Fitar

news_detail: Ghair mulki khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq darjanon Taliban askriat pasandon ney Kabul ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein shehrion aur sikoriti forces ke humrah Eid ul fittar ki namaz ada ki, Taliban ney aydgahon mein dakhla ke waqt –apne hathyaar sikoriti forces ke paas jama karaye aur adaigi namaz ke baad shehrion ke sath sath Afghan sikoriti forces se baghal geer hue aur un ke sath selfi banwaen. Kabul police ke tarjuman Hashmat Astakzai ney bataya ke Taliban askriat pasandon ko jatay hue un ke hathyaar wapas kardiye gaye, social media par zair e gardish tasaveer aur videos mein dekha ja sakta hai ke khushee ke is pur musarrat mauqa par shehri aur security ahelkaar Taliban se garam joshi se Eid mil rahay hain aur wahan mojood shehri un manazair ko –apne mobile phones mein aks band kar rahay hain. wazeh rahay ke Afghan saddar Ashraf ghanni se Eid ulfittar ke mauqa par jung bandi ka elaan kya tha jis ke rad-e-amal mein Taliban ney bhi says fire karte hue Eid ke tenun din hamlay nah karne ka ehad kya tha.
648.title: Taliban ney Kabul mein security ahelkaron ke humrah Eid manayi

news_detail: Israel ke aik sabiq wazeer Gonen Segef ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Aayed kar di gayi hai. unhein guzashta mah maghribi Africa ke malik gani mein dakhla ki ijazat nah milnay par Israel wapsi par girftar kar liya gaya tha. Israel ki dakhli salamti ki zimma daar agency Shin Bet ney somwaar ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke 62 sala Segef ke khilaaf jummay ko jung ke zamana mein dushman ko maloomat faraham karne aur ryastِ Israel ke khilaaf jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Aayed kiya gaya tha. tehqiqaat se yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke unhon ney Iran ki intelli jins ke liye jasoosi ki thi .

Shin Bet ka kehna hai ke sabiq wazeer nigeria mein irani sfar t- khanah se rabita mein rahay they. woh is africi malik mein bhi kuch arsa muqeem rahay they. baad mein unhon ney Iran ka safar kya tha aur –apne sath rabita rakhnay walay irani intelli jins ke agent se mulaqaat ki thi. is ney bayan mein mazeed kaha hai ke Segef ney irani ayjnton ko tawanai ki market, Israel mein security tansibaat, siyasi aur security idaron ki imaarton aur hukkaam ke barey mein maloomat faraham ki theen. doosri janib mister Segef ke wukla ka kehna hai ke un ke mokl par Aayed kardah ilzamaat ki ziyada tar tafseel riyasat ke nafiz kardah black out mein haasil ki gayi hai. is hawala se bohat thori maloomat faraham ki gayi hain aur is terhan aik gum raah kin ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki gayi hai. un ka kehna hai ke fard eِ ilzaam ke mawaad se aik mukhtalif tasweer samnay aati hai jabkay is ki mukammal tafseel ko afsha nahi kya gaya hai aur is ko rokkk liya gaya hai
659.title: Sabiq Israeli wazeer Gonen Segef par Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard e jurm

news_detail: French President Emmanuel Macron ne pirke roz parliment se khitaab mein islam ke hawala se aik pur-israr bayan diya jis par siyasi halqon mein miley jalay tabsaray jari hain. unhon ne yaqeen dilaya ke woh malik mein Muslims mazhabi azadi ke liye qanoon saazi karen ge. French President ne maghribi Paris mein’ Versailles ke maqam par parliment ke ijlaas se khitaab mein kaha ke’ islam aur jamhooria France ke darmiyan paicheedgi ka koi sabab hargiz nahi hai ‘. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke woh khizaa ke parlimani season mein France mein Muslims ke umoor ko mazeed sahal bananay ke liye naye qawaid waza karen ge. un ka kehna tha ke hum Muslims ko –apne malik mein apne mazhab ke mutabiq zindaganian basar karne ke liye mazeed saholaten muhayya karen ge aur inhen har mumkin azadi faraham karen ge taakay woh –apne mazhabi umoor ko kisi rukawat ke baghair ada kar saken. President Emmanuel Macron ke is bayan par ewaan mein taliyan bajai gayeen. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke islam aur jamhooria France ke darmiyan taluqaat mein kisi qisam ki paicheedgi nahi honi chahiye. islam ke baray mein sakht geer soch hamein tashkeek aur riyasti qawaneen ko mazhabi azadi mukhalif qanoon saazi ki taraf nahi le ja satke. un ka kehna tha ke France mein logon ko samaji aur mazhabi azadi hai aur malik ko kisi khaas mazhabi tabqa ki alamat banana insani aur mazhabi azadi ke manafi hai. khayaal rahay ke France mein agarchay abadi ki aksariyat esaiyat par mushtamil hai magar malik mein Muslims ki tadaad saath laakh se zayd aur msajd ki tadaad 2500 batayi jati hai.
544.title: French President ka Muslims ko mukammal mazhabi azadi dainay ka elaan

news_detail: Madina Munawwara ki Development Authority ney Masjid Nabwi ki ziyarat ke liye aney walay zaireen ki sahoolat aur sadkon par traffic ka boojh kam karne ke liye chaar zameen doze surangen (under paas) tayyar kiye hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Madina Munawwara Development Authority ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Masjid Nabwi ke zaireen ke liye yeh nai sahoolat Madina ke governor shehzada Faisal ban Salman bin Abdul Aziz ki masaaye ka nateeja hai. Paidal under paas number 2 aur 3 ki lambai 125 meter hai jin ke dono atraaf mein chaar electric seedhiyan aur mazoor afraad ke liye aamad wo raft ke rastay baneye gaye hain. Majmoi taur par surangoon ke andar 12 barqi seedhiyan aur aam seedhiyan bhi tayyar ki gayi hain jin se guzar kar Masjid Nabwi ke shumali simt tak ba aasani pouncha ja sakta hai. un paidal raastoon ki tayari se jahan zaireen ko Masjid Nabwi taq barah e raast rasai ki sahoolat miley gi wahein Masjid ke gird markazi maqam tak gadiyon ke rush se bhi bacha jasakay ga. Masjid Nabwi taq paidal rasai ke liye tayyar kardah un charon zameen doze raastoon ko jadeed tareen sahulaton se aarasta kya gaya hai. surangoon ko thanda rakhney ke liye ayyrkndishn ka bandobast hai. aag lagney ki soorat mein aag bujhaney ke alaat, roshni, Hidayat ke liye behtareen sound system, shehrion ki mehfooz naqal wo harkat ke liye monitoring camera aur jagah jagah shehrion ki zaroori reh numai ke liye screen nasb hain. yeh charon zameen doze rastay Masjid Nabwi ke qareeb waqay colonies se marboot hain. salam tunnel Masjid Nabwi ke junoob maghrib mein, Al Awali junoob mashriq ki simt aur do nai surangen Masjid ke shumali markazi ilaqay se milaane ke liye tayyar ki gayi hain.
552.title: Zaireen Masjid Nabwi ke liye 4 paidal zameen doze rastay tayyar

news_detail: Je

ddah: Saudi Arab mein honay wali Ulema Conference ney Afghanistan mein jung bandi ki zaroorat par zor dete hue Hukumat aur Taliban se mazakraat shuru karne ka mutalba kya. Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ke mutabiq Saudi shehzada Khalid Al Faisal ki zair sarbarahi Jeddah mein Ulema Conference hui jis mein duniya bhar se 200 se zayed mazhabi rehnumao ney shirkat ki. Conference ke ekhtataam par’ Makkah Declaration’ jari kya gaya jis mein Afghanistan mein fariqain se jung bandi karkay aman mazakraat shuru karne ka mutalba kiya gaya. aalamia mein kaha gaya ke Afghanistan mein mojood fariqain jung bandi karkay tashadud, ikhtilafat aur baghaawat ke khtama ke liye Islami eqdaar par mabni barah e raast aman mazakraat shuru karen. ikhtitami khitaab mein Islami mumulk ki tanzeem o aayi si ke sarbarah Yousuf bin Ahmed Al Usaimeen ney kaha ke Makkah Declaration masla Afghanistan ka pur aman sharai hal paish karta hai. Saudi farman rawa Shah Salman ney kaha ke Makkah Conference se Afghanistan mein salamti aur istehkaam ka naya baab khulay ga. doosri janib Afghan Taliban ney Conference ke ineqad se pehlay hi usay mustard karte hue Saudi Arab ke baarey mein bhi intahi sakht bayan jari kya. Taliban ke bayan mein kaha gaya ke Afghanistan ki jung koi muqami androoni tanaza nahi balkay aik Islami mulk par Kuffaar ki jarhiyat hai jis ke khilaaf Taliban ki muzahmat jehaad farz hai, kisi ko yeh haq haasil nahi ke is jehaad ko fasaad qarar day aur nah hi woh aisa karne den ge. Taliban ney kaha ke Saudi Arab ki Hukumat aur Ulema se yeh umeed nahi ke woh Kuffaar aur Islam ki jung mein Amrici hamla aawar ka sath den ge, balkay woh tawaqqa karte hain Islami Conference pehlay ki terhan un ki jaaiz jad-o-jehad ki himayat kere gi. Taliban ke isi sakht rad-e-amal ki wajah se Makkah Declaration mein Afghan Taliban ke khilaaf koi Fatwa nahi jari kya gaya aur sirf aalamia par hi aktfa karliya gaya. warna is Conference ke dawat nama mein Afghanistan mein jari Taliban ki jid-o-jehad ko dehshat gardi aur Taliban ko ghairqanooni musallah giroh aur juraim pesha afraad keh kar puraka gaya tha. kal Conference mein shareek Islami askalron aur ulama ke aik wafad ney Jeddah mein Shah Salman ban abdalaziz se bhi mulaqaat ki thi. Khadim ul Harmain al Sharifain ney un ka khirmqdm kya aur Conference ke ineqad par o aayi si ko saraha. Unhon ney ulama ke wafad se guftagu karte hue kaha ke ”Aap behtareen log hain jo Islam aur Musalmanoon ke liye khidmaat anjaam day rahay hain, un ki safoon mein ittehaad peda kar rahay hain aur Islami duniya ko jangoon, buhranon aur intahaa pasandi aur dehshat gardi ki lanaton se nikaal rahay hain. Allah taala ney Saudi mumlikat ko Al Hrmain al Sharifain ki khidmat ka Sharf bakhsha hai aur yeh kaam hum apne aaba ke daur se karte chalay arhay hain”. Shah Salman ney kaha ke ”Saudi Arab Afghan awam ko un ke buhranon aur phir is ke nateejay mein khanah jungi ke aaghaz ke baad se insani aur maali imdaad muhayya kar raha hai aur woh Afghan awam ke mukhtalif groupon ke darmain ikhtilafat aur taqseem ke khatmay ke liye musalsal marboot siyasi koshishen bhi kar raha hai”. unhon ney kaha :” Aaj hamein umeed hai ke aap (Ulama) ki koshisho ke nateeja mein Afghanistan mein maazi ka safha band karne aur aik naya safha kholnay mein madad miley gi.
563.title: Afghan Hukumat aur Taliban jung bandi karkay mazakraat shuru karen, Makkah Declaration

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti mein Israeli fouj aur Falasteeni muzahmat karon ke darmiyan guzashta chobees ghanton ke douran jhadpon ke baad fariqain misar ki salisi ke tehat jung bandi par mutfiq ho gaye hain. Palestine ki muzahmati tanzeem islami jehaad ne Gaza mein Falasteeni muzahmat karon aur Israel ke darmiyan jung bandi ki tasdeeq ki hai. islami jehaad ka kehna hai ke fariqain mein jung bandi misar ki koshisho se amal mein aayi hai. islami jehaad ke tarjuman dawod Shahab ne bataya ke hafta ke roz Misri hakkaam ke sath musalsal rabton ke baad Gaza ki patti mein Israeli fouj aur muzahmat karon ke darmiyan kasheedgi kam karne par ittafaq kya gaya hai. misar ne sunah 2014 hamza ke jung bandi moahida ko fa-aal rakhnay ke liye dono fareeqon par dabao dala. neez moahida mein ilaqai aur aalmi quwatoon ne bhi apna kirdaar ada kya hai. Misri Rukn Parliament Mohammad Hamza ne ‘Alhads’ news channel se baat karte hue kaha ke Gaza mein Falasteeni muzahmati groupon ne Israel ke sath jung bandi ke liye misar ki tajaweez qubool karne ka elaan kya hai. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke fariqain mein jung bandi par amal daraamad chand ghanton ke andar andar shuru ho jaye ga. drayn asna islami tehreek muzahmat (Hamas) ne bhi aik bayan mein Israel ke sath jung bandi ki khabron ki tasdeeq ki hai. khayaal rahay ke hafta ke roz Israeli fouj ne Gaza ki patti par kayi maqamat par shadeed bombari ki thi jis ke nateeja mein do bachay shaheed aur aik 25 shehri zakhmi hogaye thay. samjha jata hai ke 2014 ke baad Israel ka Palestine par sab se bara hamla tha. Falasteeni muzahmat karon ki taraf se Israeli bombari ke jawab mein rakton se hamlay kiye gaye.
573.title: Hamas aur Israel mein jung bandi par ittafaq

news_detail: Washington: Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne tauseeq kar di hai ke dobarah sadarati daud mein shaamil hon ge, un ka kehna hai ke un ki danist mein koi sakht muqaabla ki tawaqqa nahi hai, koi nahi hai jo mujhe shikast day sakay. Aik interview mein Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne 2020 ka bhi election ladnay ka elaan karte hue kaha ke har koi mujhe dobarah Sadar dekna chahta hai jab ke hareef jamaat mein koi aisa umeed waar nazar nahi aata jo mera muqaabla kar sakay. social Media ke istemaal ke baarey mein Amrici Sadar ka kehna tha ke jaali khabron ke khilaaf twitter behtareen hathyaar hai aur is se baat barah e raast awam taq pohanchti hai. Sadar Trump ne mazeed kaha kay woh duniya mein aman chahtay hain, shumali Korea aur roos ke sath taluqaat is baat ka saboot hain taham hamein Amrici mafaad ke liye bhi kaam karna hai
587.title: 2020 mein bhi mujhe koi shikast nahi day sakta : Trump

news_detail: Hussam al Sabhi dehshatgrdanh hamla mein apni dono aankhon se mahroom hogaye they .

Shaed aap ko yaad hoga ke aaj se do saal peshtar 29 ramdhan al mubarak ko Masjid Nabawi mein aik dehshat grdanh khud kash hamla huwa tha. Is hamla mein Emergency Services ka aik ahelkaar apne peshawarana faraiz anjaam dete hue apni beenaye kho baitha, androon aur beron Mulk taweel ilaaj ke baad aaj woh watan wapas to agaya hai magar Rouza e Rasool salle Allahau aleh wasallam ki pehray daari par apni aankhon ki beenaye ke khojane ke baais hamesha ke liye mahroom hochuka hai. Saudi Arab ka yeh bahadur siphai ‘Hussam al Sabhi al Harbi’ hai. Masjid Nabawi mein khud kash hamla ke nateeja mean zakhmi honay ke baad inhen alryaz ke aik hospital muntaqil kya gaya aur wahan se Spain le jaya gaya. Ab un ke zakhamo ka ilaaj hochuka hai magar beenaye ki Nemat se woh mahroom hogaye. Agarche is Nemat ki mehroomi nay inhen Rouza e Rasool salle Allahu alehi wasallam ki pasbani ke Sharf se bhi mahroom kardiya hai magar is Nemat ki mehroomi bhi aik Nemat se kam nahi hai ke un ka naam un logon mein shaamil hogaya jinhon nay apni zindagion ki parwah kiye baghair Rouza e Rasool salle Allahu alehi wasallam ki pasbani karte rahay hain. ‘Al Arabia dot net’ nay Hussam al Sabhi al Harbi ke halaat wo khayalat par roshni daaltay hue bataya hai ke alhrbi ko darjah soum ka Shah abdalaziz award se bhi nawaza gaya .

Apne sath paish aeye alamnaak waqea ki rudaad bayan karte hue alhrbi nay bataya ke’ meri aankhon ki beenaye chalay jana koi barri baat nahi. mein nay –apne watan ke liye pesha warana zimma daari ki anjaam dahi mein beenaye khoyi hai aur yeh bhi mere liye kisi dosray security ahelkaar ki terhan baais Sharf hai. Masjid Nabawi mein emergency forces ke ahelkar Haram ki hifazat par maamoor they aur roz maraah ki bunyaad par apni duty ke auqaat mein tabdeeli bhi karte. hamari zimma daryon mein Masjid Nabawi ki hifazat ke sath wahan anay walay zaireen, Hajjaj wo Mutamareen ki har mumkin madad bhi shaamil thi. mujhe Masjid Nabawi ki hifazat par mamoor hue daidh saal guzar gaye they. do baras qabal 29 ramdhan ko hum apne apne makhsoos muqamat par security ki zimma dariyan anjaam day rahay they. mein Haram e Nabawi se chay meter daur tha. aftaari se chand minute qabal hum saat afraad aik jagah jama hue taakay Rouza iftaar kar saken. Abhi hum baithy hi they ke aik ajnabi shakhs hamaray qareeb aaya. is ki harkaat kaafi ajeeb wo gahrib theen aur woh dekhnay se hi mashkook lag raha tha. is ney aik bag utha rakha tha aur Haram ke barey mein pooch raha tha. Is ka yeh sawal ghair fitri tha. Jab hamein is ke barey mein mazeed shak guzra aur hum ney is ke khilaaf karwai ka socha hi tha ke is nay khud ko dhamaka se uda diya. Is ke nateeja mein mere chaar saathi mauqa par shaheed aur mein aur aik dosra saathi ahelkaar zakhmi hogaye. zakhmi honay wala dosra security ahelkaar kayi roz tak Coma mein raha. inhen Allah nay Shifa di aur ab woh tandrost hain’.

Al Harbi ney apne sath aeye waqea ke barey mein mazeed bataya ke jab mujhe hospital muntaqil kya gaya to is waqt mere jism par jagah jagah jalan ho rahi thi magar beenaye mein is waqt kho chuka tha. taweel ilaaj ke baad mein tandrost hogaya. phir mein nay shadi ki aur ab aik beti ‘Turuf’ ka baap hoon. Mere ilaaj ka dorania paanch mah par muheet raha. Zakhmi honay se qabal hamari mangni hochuki thi aur shadi ki tayyariyan ki ja rahi theen. Dehshat gardi ke alamnaak waqea nay meri baen aankh mukammal khatam kar di jab ke dayen aankh ka Adsa bhi nakara hogaya. yun mein beenaye ki Nemat se mukammal tour par mahroom hochuka hon’ .

aik sawal ke jawab mein Hussam alhrbi nay bataya ke jab mein ilaaj ke baad watan wapas lota to awam ke aik jam e gafeer ne mera istaqbaal kya. Mujhe fakhr hai ke mein apne watan aur haram Nabawi ke difaa ke douran apni beenaye se mahroom huwa. mein nay apni Basarat watan ke liye qurbaan ki hai. Hamari hukoomat ney mere ilaaj mein koi kami nahi chodi aur androon wo bairoon Mulk ilaaj ke liye har mumkin taawun kya. Guzashta mangal ko mujhe Shah Abdul Aziz award se bhi nawaza gaya jo mere liye aik aur aizaz hai. hukoomat aur riyasat ki is be payaan tavajja ko hamaray heroes aur bahadur sipahi kabhi faramosh nahi kar saktay
599.title: Rouza e Rasool ki pasbani karte hue beenaye se mahroom sipahi

news_detail: Syria mein insani haqooq ke nigaran group اAl-Marsad ney peer ke roz bataya ke shumali soobah Aleppo mein aik askari thikaane par bomb baari ke nateejay mein Bishar hukoomat ke humnawa 9 musallah afraad halaak ho gay. Shami hukoomat ney itwaar ki shab honey wali is karwai ka ilzaam Israel par aed kya hai. Al-Marsad ke director Rami Abdul Rahman ney francesi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke maaray jane walon mein 6 Shami Shaamil hain taham deegar citizenship ka taayun nahi kiya ja saka. Rami ke mutabiq bombari mein Aleppo ke mashriqi dehi ilaqa mein Alnairab ke fouji hawai adday ke nazdeek irani pasdaran inqilab ke jungjuon ko nishana baneya gaya. yeh markaz larai ke mhazon par khoraak aur deegar logistic support faraham karta hai aur yahan hathyaaron ka godaam nahi paaya jata. is se qabal Shami hukoomat ke media ney aik fouji zareya ke hawala se bataya tha ke itwaar ki shab Israeli missilon ney” hamaray aik askari thikana ko nishana baneya jis ke nateeja mein sirf maadi nuqsaan pouncha “. July ke mahiney mein yeh teesra mauqa hai jab Israel ney Shaam mein askari thikanon ko nishana baneya. is se qabal Shami hukoomat rawan mah ki aath aur baara tareekh ko –apne elanaat mein Israel ko Al-Taifur ke askari hawai adda par bombari ka zumedaar thehra chuki hai. Israel ney aas waqt janoobi Shaam mein teen thikanon par hamlon ka elaan kya tha. Shami hukoomat ka kehna tha ke is ke difai nizaam ney Israeli missilon ka rasta rokkk liya
612.title: Aleppo par Israeli bombing mein Bishar ki forces ke 9 arkaan halaak

news_detail: Prince Charels aur Prince william ney Sadar America Donald Trump se un ke chaar roza daura ke mauqa par mulaqaat karne se inkaar kardiya. reports mein id-daa kya ke shehzadon ney daura mein hissa lainay se inkaar kardiya aur Malika Bartania ko tanha hi Sadar America se mulaqaat karne ke liye chhorhdya. Is ke bajaye Prince of Wales (69) ney Highgrove mein aik Board meeting aur Gloucestershir Police ke saath aik programme mein shirkat ki jabkay Duke of Cambridge (36) ney Charity Polo Match mein hissa liya. sunday times ney mehal ke aik fard ke hawala se bataya ke kaha ke shehzada Charels aur shehzada william ki yeh masrofiyat Trump ke daura ki tehqeer mein nahi hai. Unhon ney saadgi se inkaar kardiya. Malika ke liye akailey jana nihayat hi ghair mamooli baat hai. yeh id-daa kya gaya ke shehzadon ney dora ke liye intizamaa se mutaliq tabadlah khayaal ke douran apne taraddud ko wazeh kya. Prince philip (97) ke guzashta baras augst mein Shahi faraiz se subuk doshi ke baad Prince Charels aksar Malika ke hamrah sun-hwa karte hain. Buckingham Palace ney kaha ke hamesha se hi yeh mansoobah banaya gaya tha ke Mr. Trump aur un ki ahliya Melania ka Malika tanha hi kher muqaddam karen gi chunkay un kaya dora sarkari noiyat ka nahi hai
624.title: Bartanwi shehzadon ney Trump se mulaqaat karne se inkaar kardiya

news_detail: Riyasat Maghribi Bengal ke Midnapur mein Wazeer e Azam nrindr moodi ke jalsa mein aik tent ke grjane se 20 se zayed afraad zakhmi hogaye. Wazeer e Azam ney is haadsa mein zakhmi hojane walon ki Hospital pahonch kar ayadat ki. wazeer e azam ney jalsa se khitaab karne se qabal tent mein umadd anay walay apne hamion se khwahish ki thi ke woh mohtaat rahen. zakhmion ko Midnapur Medical College & Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. khush qismati se koi bhi shadeed zakhmi nahi sun-hwa. bi jay pi kaarkunon aur muqami logon ney bataya ke jab pur josh hamion ney tent ke aahinii salakhon par charh gaye to shamyana gir pada. yeh log sheh nasheen ka nazarah karne shamyana ke aahinii salakhon par charhna shuru hogaye. West Midnapur District police ke sarbarah Mr. Alok Rajurya ne bataya ke shamyana ke gir pad jane par aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat karen ge. shamyana ke gir padnde ke baad logon ki bhaag daud shuru hogayi jis ki wajah se kuch log zameen par grprhe jinhein bhagnay walon ney roond diya.
637.title: Modi ke jalsa mein pndal gir pada. 20 zakhmi

news_detail: Qoum parastana qanoon saazi karte hue Israel ko Yahoodi awam ke liye aik Qaumi watan qarar diya gaya aur sirf Yahoodi qbayil ko tarjeehat par mabni qanoon ko aaj manzoori day di gayi. Yeh Israeli qanoon sazoon ki janib se Jaria hafta manzurah mutanazia billls mein se aik hai jis ki mukhalfat oppostion ne ki aur naqideen ne usay ghair jamhoori aur jabirana qarar diya. ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq Israeli Parliament ne Mulk ko yahudion ki Qaumi riyasat bananay ka mutanazia bill Manzoor karliya. bill ke haq mein 62 jabkay mukhalfat mein 55 vote daaley gaye. is qanoon ke tehat bator sarkari zabaan arabi ke darjay ko ghata diya gaya hai aur Yahoodi abadkari mein izafay ko Qaumi mafaad qarar diya gaya hai. Mutanazia qanoon mein maqboza beeet almuqaddas (Jerusalem) ko Israel ka mukammal aur mutahidda dar-ul-hukumat tasleem kya gaya hai. Israeli Parliament ke arab arkaan ne is qanoon saazi ko shadeed tanqeed ka nishana banatay hue usay jamhoriat ki mout qarar diya. Israel ke wazeer e azam Binyamin Nitin Yahoo ne bill ko srahte hue is ki manzoori ko’ faisla kin lamha’ qarar diya. Wazeh rahay ke Israel ki 90 laakh abadi mein se taqreeban 20 feesad arab hain jab ke Mulk mein un ke sath dosray darjay ke shehrion jaisa bad tareen sulooq kya jata hai. is bill ki manzoori se ghair Yahoodi Israeli aqliaton par door ras nataij muratab honge aur maqboza Maghribi Kinara mein basnay walay Palestenians ke huqooq daba diye jayenge aur Israel mein un ka difaa karne walon ki hesiyat ghat jaye gi. Is bill ki tadween karne walon ka id-daa hai ke is ka maqsad yeh hai ke Israel ke Yahoodi kirdaar ko brhhawa diya jaye. Israel Arab sector ke parliamentrian jo Mulk ki 8. 5 million abadi ka taqreeban 21 feesad hotay hain yeh kaha ke yeh qanoon yahudion ki baladasti ka izhaar hai jo inhen dosray darja ka shehri banakar rakh deta hai. Knesset( qanoon saaz committee ) mein Joint List Arab FAction ke quied Aiman Adeh ne kaha ke aaj mere bachon aur Falasteeni Arab shehrion ke bachon ko yeh kehna hoga ke mumlikat ne yeh elaan kardiya ke woh hamein yahan nahi dekhnaa chahti hai.
