Israel mein aik Falasteeni haqooq insani tanzeem ”Adalah” ke Director General Hassan Jabreen ne kaha ke qanoon ke kaleedi nakaat nasli asbiyat par mabni hain jo na sirf ghair ikhlaqi hain balkay bain ul aqwami qanoon ke tehat mamnua hai. unhon ne kaha ke mumlikat ke 1. 5 million Falasteeni shehrion, mashriqi Yaroshallam aur golan pahariyoon ke awam ke bawajood dastoori tor par Israel ko sirf Yahoodi awam ki mumlikat banadiya gaya hai aur Israel ko khusoosi nasli mazhabi kirdaar ko Yahoodi bnadyagya.
661.title: Israel ko Yahoodi Qaumi riyasat qarar dainay ka qanoon manzoor

news_detail: Qaabiz sahyoni fouj aur Police ne mujremana ghunda gardi aur jabar o istibdaad ka bad tareen muzahira karte hue jummay ke roz Masjid e Aqsa mein namaz ke liye anay walay Falastinion ko Masjid mein daakhil honay se rok diya aur Qibla e Awwal ko Nmazyon ke dakhla ke liye band kardiya gaya. Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf aur Francesi khabar rasan agency ke nama nigaar ke mutabiq sahyoni police ki badi tadaad ne mashriqi Bait ul Muqaddas mein daakhil honay ke baad Masjid e Aqsa ke atraaf koapne ghairay mein le liya. Masjid mein namaz Jummay ki adai ke liye anay walay Falasteeni namazyon ko zado kob kya gaya aur inhen ishtial angaiz andaaz mein wahan se nikaal diya. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq Israeli Police ke wehshiana tashadud ke baad Falasteeni namazyon ne shadeed ehtijaj kya. Falasteeni shehrion aur Israeli fouj ke darmain jhadpen bhi huien. Jab Israeli Forcess ne ansoo gas, asleha aur ruber mulamma kaari ki dhaati golian barsaaen to darjanon Falasteeni zakhmi hogaye. Masjid e Aqsa ke ihata mein hue tassadum mein do Israeli fouji bhi zakhmi hogaye. Falasteeni Mehakima Auqaaf ke tarjuman ne bataya ke Israeli police ne Masjid e Aqsa ke tamam darwazay band karne se qabal tamam dakhli darwazon ke bahar khardaar taren laga den. Falasteeni wazeer Umoor d Mazhabi Mohammad Al-Habbash ne yeh kehte hue ke muqaddas maqam par tall abib ki karwai insani Waqar ke magaayer hai, Masjid e Aqsa compound par Israeli thdidat ko Nazi tafteesh ke mutradif qarar diya. unhon ne Masjid e Aqsa mein Falastinion ke dakhla par Tahdeed par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke sadkon ko block kardiya gaya, thdidat aayed kar di gayeen, darwazon ko band kardiya gaya, sarkain masdood kar di gayeen aur Umar ki Tahdeed aed kar di gayeen, 40 baras se kam Umar ke logon ko ibadat karne se rokkk diya gaya. unhon ne istafsaar kya ke hum tareekh ke kis daur mein reh rahay hain? kya Nazi tafteesh ke daur mein? kya woh doosron ke sath wohi kuch karna chahtay hain jo yahodi barhon mein, ehad wasti ki salebi adalaton ya Nazi adalaton mein un ke sath kya jata raha hai? Masjid e Aqsa ke Gates kayi ghanton taq band kardainay par urdan ne Israeli ishtaal angezi par shadeed barhami ka izhaar kya.
556.title: Israeli fouj ka jabar, Masjid e Aqsa mein nmazyon par Tahdeed

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa West Bank mein guzashta roz aik Falasteeni ladke ke fidai hamla mein aik Yahoodi abadkar ki halakat aur do ke zakhmi honay ke waqea ke baad gaasib Sahyoni hukoomat ne intiqami karwai ke tehat West Bank mein Yahoodion ke liye 400 gharron ki taamer ki manzoori di hai. Israel ke shiddat pasand wazeer difaa Avigdor Liebermanne aik Yahoodi abaadkar ke qatal ke jawab mein Falastinion ko 400 Yahoodion ke makanaat ki taamer ki shakal mein qeemat chukane par majboor kiya hai. Micro blogging website ‘twitter’ par post kardah aik bayan mein Israeli wazeer difaa Lieberman ne kaha ke Falastinion ki’ dehshat gardi’ ka behtar jawab Yahoodi abad kaari mein izafah hai. mein West Bank ke ilaqa Ramallah mein ‘Adam’ Yahoodi colony mein mazeed 400 makanaat ki taamer ka elaan karta hon. khayaal rahay ke jumeraat ko West Bank ke wasti shehar Ramallah mein qaim ‘Adam’ Yahoodi colony ke qareeb aik Falasteeni naujawan ne chaaqo ke pay darpay waar karkay kam se kam aik Yahoodi abaadkar halaak aur do zakhmi kardiye thay. Israeli fouj ki jawabi karwai mein satrah sala hamla aawar bhi shaheed hogaya tha. Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke Falasteeni ladke ne Yahoodi abad karon par chaaqo se hamlay kiye jis ke nateejay mein mutadid Yahoodi zakhmi hogaye. Baad azan aik Yahoodi abaadkar zakhamo ki taab na laatay hue dam toad gaya. zakhmi honay walay abad karon ku Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai.
566.title: Falasteeni chaaqo hamla ke jawab mein Yahoodion ke liye 400 gharron ki taamer

news_detail: Australian nashriyati idaara ney apni aik report mein daawa kiya hai ke America aglay mah Iran ki atomic tansibaat par hamlon ki tayari kar raha hai. report ke mutabiq Australia bain ul aqwami Intelligence ittehaad five Is ka rukn hai is liye woh hamla se mutaliq America se intelligence maloomat ka tabadlah bhi kar raha hai. Doosri janib Australvi wazeer e azam Malcolm Turnbull ney report ko mustard karte hue usay afwaah qarar diya aur kaha ke poori duniya Iran se mutaliq Amrici Sadar ke ravayye se aagah hai. Report se mutaliq Iran ki Alquds Force ney Sadar trmp ko khabardaar kya hai ke America ko aisi kisi bhi karwai se guraiz karna chahiye. is report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya tha ke Australvi taawun ke alawa Bartanwi asasejaat bhi istemaal kiye jayen ge.
577.title: ”America ki aglay mah Iran par hamlay ki tayari”? ?

news_detail: Osama bin Laden ke sabiq Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko jummay ke din Tunisia ki jail se raha kardiya gaya. 42 sala Tunisian shehri ko jail se aboori tor par raha kardiya gaya chunkay judge ka yeh ehsas tha ke un par koi bhi ilzaam waza nahi kya jaska. Tunisia ki insidaad e dehshat gardi adalat ney Osama bin Laden ke sabiq zaati Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko raha karne ka hukum diya hai. Tunisia ki insidaad e dehshat gardi police ke tarjuman Sufyan Al Salaiti ney bataya ke haal hi mein Germany se nikalay jaany walay bin Laden ke sabiq Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko raha karne ka hukum diya gaya hai. guzashta roz Al Aiydudi ko adalat mein paish kya gaya. adalat ney mulzim ki mojoodgi mein kaha ke mulzim praayd kardah koi bhi ilzaam saabit nahi ho saka hai. taham rihayi ke bawajood Tunisian hakkaam Al Aiydudi se pooch gach kar saktay hain. Tunisian hakkaam ney kaha ke dehshat gardi ke shuba mein hum Sami ki tafteesh karen ge aur is douran woh malik chore nahi ja sakain ge. yaad rahay ke Germany mein girftar y ke baad wahan ki adalat ney inhen guzashta baras inhen Germany se wapas bhaij dyie jaany se is bunyaad par rokay rakha tha ke watan loatne par is ke sath aziat rasani aur ghair sulooq ka saamna karna parsakta hai.
588.title: Osama bin Laden ka sabiq Muhafiz Tunisia ki jail se raha

news_detail: Pakistan ke intikhabaat mein Imran Khan ki Party ke sab se badi party ke taurr par ubharnay aur un ke Wazeer e Azam ban jane ke imkanaat roshan hojane par Imran Khan ke madahon ko Bollywood adakar Aamir Khan ka woh wada bhi yaad agaya jo unhon naay kabhi Imran Khan se kya tha. Bollywood Mr. Perfectionist Aamir Khan ney maazi mein Imran Khan se wada kya tha ke jab woh intikhabaat jeet jayen ge to woh is ka jashnn Pakistan aakar manayeen ge. Huwa kuch yun tha ke intikhabaat 2013 se qabal daura Bharat ke douran Imran Khan aik taqreeb mein shareek hue jis mein Bollywood sitaron samait kayi naamwar shaksiaat naay shirkat ki. Is mauqa par Imran Khan se sawal o jawab ke douran Bollywood adakar Aamir Khan chairman tehreek insaaf ke jawabaat se be hadd mutasir hue aur unhon naay inhen musalihat pasand aur pukhta nazriye ka maalik qarar diya. un ka kehna tha ke’ mera dil kehta hai ke aap kamyaab hon ge kyun ke aap kayi saloon se mehnat kar rahay hain, jab aap naay apni jad-o-jehad shuru ki thi to kayi challenges ka saamna tha jis par datay rahay’. Doosri janib Imran Khan ney bhi inhen mukhatib karte hue kaha tha ke phir aap ko intikhabaat se qabal Pakistan aana parre ga, jis par Aamir Khan naay wada kya ke’ mein intikhabaat se pehlay nahi balkay jab aap jeet jayen ge tab Pakistan aakar aur apne sath bohat saaray hindustani doston ko lakar aap ki jeet ka jashnn manaaun ga’. Imran Khan aur Aamir Khan ke darmiyan yeh mukalama 2013 ke intikhabaat se qabal sun-hwa lekin 2018 ke intikhabaat mein Imran Khan ki jamaat naay nah sirf barri kamyabi haasil ki balkay Imran Khan malik ke wazeer e azam ban’nay ki position mein hain. un dinon parosi malik mein soshil media par Aamir Khan ko un ka wada yaad dilaya ja raha hai aur umeed ki jarahi hai ke woh apna wada poora karte hue Imran Khan ke Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf lainay ki taqreeb ya phir is khsos mein manaye jane wali kisi taqreeb mein woh zaroor shirkat karen ge.
600.title: kya Imran Khan se kya huwa wada poora karen ge Aamir Khan?

news_detail: Jerusalem. Palestine mein muzahmatkar naujawan ladki Ahed Tamimi ko 8 mah qayed ke baad guzashta shab riha kardiya gaya hai. Bain ul aqwami khabar rasaan idaray ke mutabiq Israeli faujion ke mun par thapad raseed karne wali nidar ladki Ahed Tamimi ko jail mein 8 mah ki qaid o band ki savbtin uthany ke baad guzashta shab rihayi mil gayi hai. 8 mah ki sakht takaleef naazuk, kam sun ladki ke paya istiqlal ko mutazalzal nahi kar saken. Israeli hakkaam ney Ahed Tamimi ki rihayi ki tasdeeq kar di hai. Israel ke mehkuma mahabis ke tarjuman ney media ko bataya ke Ahed Tamimi aur un ki walida Nariman ko riha kardiya gaya hai. Donon qaidyoun ko un ke rehaishi ilaqa maghribi kinare bhaij diya gaya hai. Doosri janib Ahed Tamimi ney jail se azad honey ke baad press conference karne ka elaan kya hai. Ahed Tamimi ka poora gharana samaji karkun aur muzahmatkaar ke taur par shohrat rakhta hai. Wazeh rahay Palestine mein do Israeli sipahiyon ko tamancha raseed karne aur dhakkay dainey ki video manzar e aam par aney ke baad jurrat o bahduri ka isteara ban’ney wali naujawan ladki Ahed Tamimi ko qaabiz Israeli fouj ney December 2017 ko walida ke hamrah ghar se giraftar kya tha.

Ahed Tamimi  16 baras ki ladki hai jo Palestine mein honey walay Israeli mazalim ke khilaaf apni aawaz buland karti hai. Ahed Tamimi ko Israeli fouj ney hirasat mein lainey ke baad is par baara ilzamaat aed kiye thay jo usay das baras taq jail ki salakhon ke peechay rakh satke thay. Ahed Tamimi Palestine ke aik gaon nabi Saleh mein rihaish Pazeer aik solah sala Falestini karkun hai. Ahed ke waalid Basim altmimi ka shumaar Israel ke khilaaf –apne watan ki azadi ki pur aman jad-o-jehad karne walon mein kya jata hai. Ahed Tamimi ka naam do saal qabal bhi is waqt khabron mein aaya tha jab un ki aik Israeli fouji ke haath par katney ki tasweer shaya hui thi jo un ke chhootay bhai ko girftar karne ki koshish kar raha tha. Is waqea se qabal 2012 mein bhi Ahed Tamimi ke Israeli faujion ke sath takraar aur haatha payi ki tasaveer manzar e aam par aayi theen jis ke baad inhen Turkey ke sadar Rajab Tayyab Erdogan ney mulaqaat ke liye bulaya tha aur inhen award se bhi nawaza tha. Ahed Tamimi ko hirasat mein kyun liya gaya hai? Bani Saleh mein kayi barson se har hafta Yahoodi bastiyoun ki taamer ke khilaaf ehtijaj kya jata hai. Aisay hi aik ehtijaj ke douran apne ghar mein daakhil honey walay Israeli faujion ko rokney ke liye Ahed Tamimi ney aik Israeli fauji ke chehray par thapad dey mara jis ki video Falasteeni sociall media par viral ho gayi thi.

Un fojion ney Ahed Tamimi ke 14 sala cousin ke sar par rubber ki goli maari thi aur ansoo gas ke shells Ahed Tamimi ke ghar par phainky thay jin ki wajah se Ahed Tamimi ke ghar ki khidkion ke sheeshay toot gaye thay. Is waqea ke teen din baad Israeli fauj ney raat mein Ahed Tamimi ke ghar mein daakhil ho kar usay hirasat mein le liya tha aur maghribi kinare mein waqay Israel ki aik Jail mein qayim khusoosi fauji adalat mein Ahed Tamimi par fardِ jurm aayed ki gayi thi. Ahed Tamimi par Israeli fouji par hamla karne, fouji ki pesha waranah zimma daryon ki injaam dahi mein rukawat daalney aur fouji ehalkaron par pathrao karne ke ilzamaat aed kiye gaye thay.
611.title: Palestine ki bahedur beti Ahed Tamimi jail se riha

news_detail: Mumlikat Saudi Arab jahan zuyuf ur Rehman (Hajj Pilgrims) ko mumkina taurr par behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohanchanay koshaan rehti hai wahein woh ghair qanooni taur par Hajj karne walon ke khilaaf sakht geer iqdamaat karne par majboor hai, chunkay aisay Aazmeen Hajj ke baais intizamaa mein khalaal parta hai jis ki wajah se un Aazmeen Hajj ko mushkilaat aur takaleef ka saamna karna padta hai jo bazabta taur par Hajj ke liye sarzamen muqaddas pahunchte hain. Saudi Arab ke dayriktorit general baraye passports ne aik bayan mein wazeh kya hai ke Hajj ke mauqa par muqami satah par gahir khanooni tareeqa se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil karne walay afraad ke sahelkaron ko qaid aur jrmanon ki sazaon ka saamna karna parre ga. dayriktorit general baraye passports ne kaha hai ke Hajj season mein gair majaz afraad ko Aazmeen Hajj mein shaamil honay se roknay ke liye intizami committees qaim ki gayi hain. Yeh committees ghairqanooni tareeqon se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil karne mein mulawis afraad ke khilaaf karwai karen gi aur aisay afraad ko qaid aur jurmanon ki sazaon ka saamna karne ke sath kayi doosri thadidat ka bhi saamna hoga. Saudi Arab ki sarkari news agency ‘SPA’ ne apni report mein bataya hai ke field hukkaam ne Makkah Mukrama mein baaz dakhli marakaz se aisay mutadid afraad ko hirasat mein le liya hai jo ghair qanooni tareeqon se logon ko Aazmeen Hajj mein shaamil karne ki koshish kar rahay they. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Hajj ke mauqa par tamam intizami aur qanooni commitees 24 ghanton ki bunyaad par mutharrak rahen gi aur kisi bhi khilaaf warzi ki soorat mein qanoon haath mein lainay walay shakhs ko barsar e mauqa saza di jaiygi gi. Har us shakhs ko jo kisi ghair majaz shakhs ko Hujjaj karaam mein shaamil karne ki koshish kere ga usay kam se kam 15 din qaid aur 10,000 Riyal jurmana aayed kya jaye ga. Agar woh ghair mulki hai to usay saza poori honay ke baad Mulk-badar kardiya jaye ga aur dobarah us ke mumlikat mein Dakhla par pabandi aayed kar di jaye gi. Qanoon ki khilaaf warzi mein madad karne walay sahelkaaron ki gadyaan bhi zabt ki ja sakti hain. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Saudi Arab ka koi bashindah agar ghair qanooni tareeqon se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil kere ga to usay bhi pehlay marhala mein 15 din qaid aur 10,000 Riyal jurmana aur doosri baar aisa karne par 2 mah qaid aur 50,000 Riyal jurmana aayed kya jaye ga. Teesri baar aisa karne par 6 mah qaid aur 50,000 Riyal jurmana hoga.
626.title: Ghair majaz Hajj sahelkaron ko qaid aur jurmana ki sazayen

news_detail: Aisa lagta hai ke Iran apne sakhtgeer mazhabi iqdamaat par amal aawri mein riayat ki simt agay badh raha hai aur mumlikat, awam mein payi jaany wali azad khayaali ke agay surangoon honay par mayel nazar aa rahi hai. Iran mein aik arsa se awam ka aik makhsoos group sakht geer mazhabi thdidat ki khil kar mukhalfat par utar aaya hai jis ke aik hissa ke taur par khawateen ney kaamil hijaab ke luzoom ke khilaaf muzahiron ka aaghaz kardiya tha. Is soorath e haal se nimatnay ke liye Irani Parliament ney apne tehqeeqi markaz ke zareya aik Report tayyar karwai aur is tahaqeeq ke aghaz kardah natayej ko manzar aam par laatay hue aitedaal pasandi ki rawish ikhtiyar karne ki janib mahol tayyar kya ja raha hai.

Iran mein aik Survey Report mein inkishaaf huwa hai ke sirf 35 feesad Irani khawateen ke hijaab par yaqeen rakhti hain. Yeh Report Irani Parliament ke zair e intizam tehqeeqi markaz ki janib se tayyar ki gayi. Report ke mutabiq log ab Mulk mein phailay is mazhar ki parwah nahi kar rahay hain jis ko shiddat pasand anasir ki janib se “juzwi hijaab” qarar diya jata hai. Is hijaab mein ziyada tar khawateen aur ladkiyan trouser aur taweel coat ke sath sirf sar ke balon ka kuch hissah dhaanp layte hain aur burqa nahi pehanti hain. Yeh report 43 safhaat par mushtamil hai. Is mein bawar karaya gaya hai ke hijaab ke maamla mein hukumati mudakhlat ko awam ki taizi se badhti hui mukhalfat ka saamna hai aur mazhabi, sarkari aur security hukkaam Irani muashera mein “kaamil hijaab” ki bajaye “juzwi hijaab” ke phailtay hue rujhan se nimatnay mein nakaam ho chuke hain. Report ke mutabiq juzwi hijaab pahannay wali khawateen ke shana bshanh mukammal hijaab karne wali khawateen theheri nazar aati hain aur un mein bhi hakoomati mudakhlat ke hawalay se mukhalfat mein izafah dekhnay mein aa raha hai. Irani Parliament ke tehqeeqi markaz ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke muashera mein akhlaqiaat ki nigaran khusoosi Police aur Mazhabi Authorities ke kaam jari rakhnay par shadeed mukhalfat payi jati hai. Report mein bataya gaya hai ke Iran mein 70% khawateen laazmi hijaab par yaqeen nahi rakhti hain aur juzwi hijaab ke hawalay se umomi nazar yeh muashra mein phail chkahe. report mein is janib bhi tawajah dilae gayi hai ke 85 % se ziyada khawateen juzwi hijaab ikhtiyar karti hain aur woh jabri hijaab aur hijaab ke maamla mein hukumati mudakhlat ke hawala se manfi muaqqaf rakhti hain. Yaad rahay ke jabri ya laazmi hijaab ki mukhalfat mein muhim ka aaghaz 27

December 2017 ko yani Iran mein hukumraan nizaam ke khilaaf bhadakne walay awaami ehtijaj se aik roz pehlay huwa tha. Vida Mowahed nami aik 31 sala ladki ney dar-ul-hukumat Tehran ke wast mein sadak par khaday ho kar apna hijaab utaara apne scarf ko aik chhadi par muallaq kar ke logon ke samnay fiza mein buland kya. Mazkoorah ladki ko girftar kar liya gaya taham woh Irani khawateen ke mutalba ki alamat ban gayi. Baad azan bohat si Irani khawateen aur ladkiyon ney Tehran mein shara “inqilab” ki is larki ki pairwi ki aur Mulk mein laazmi hijaab ke musallat kiye jaany par ehtijaj ka rasta apnaya. Yeh tehreek ab bhi mukhtalif sooraton mein jari o saari hai aur is ki aawaz aalmi satah par poanch gayi hai. is wajah se Irani hakkaam naay darjanon khawateen ko girftar kar ke jail mein band kya.
638.title: Sirf 35 Irani hijaab karne ke qaayel: Parliamani Report

news_detail: Israeli Bahria ney itwaar ko Gaza ki patti ki samandari nakabandi todney ki koshish karne walay Europi imdadi karkunaan ki aik kashti pakad li hai. Kashti par Norway ka parcham lehra tha. Israeli fouj ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”un (imdadi karkunaan) ki sargarmi kisi ghair mamooli waqea ke baghair hi khatam hogayi hai aur isi waqt is kashti ko Israeli bandargaah Ashdod muntaqil kya ja raha hai”. Al Awda nami is kashti se wabsta imdadi group ney kaha hai ke is par baaes afraad sawaar thay aur iss par adwiyah aur tibbi samaan lada sun-hwa tha. Freedom Flotilla ittehaad ke aik bayan ke mutabiq isi group ki aik doosri kashti ki aindah chand roz mein isi ilaqa mein aamad mutawaqqa hai. is kashti ka naam azad y hai aur is par soydsh parcham lehra raha hoga. Scandinavia ke mumalik se May ke wast mein chaar kashtiyan Gaza mein mahsoor Falastinion ke liye imdadi samaan le kar rawana hui theen. Unhon ney Gaza tak pounchaney mein 28 mukhtalif bandargahon par qiyam kya hai. Is muhim mein shaamil baqi do Kashtian Palermo ki bandargaah par qyaam ke baad apni manzil ki janib rawana hochuki hain. Al Awda ke pakdae jaaney ke baad Flotilla ittehaad ney aik bayan jari kya hai aur is mein yeh kaha hai ke ”Israeli Bahria hamein intibah jari kar rahi hai aur woh yeh daawa kar rahi hai ke hum bain ul aqwami qanoon ki khilaaf warzi ke murtakib ho rahay hain. Is ney imdadi kashtiyon ko rokney ke liye kisi bhi zaroori iqdaam ki dhamki di hai”. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke ”dar haqeeqat wahid zaroori iqdaam yeh ho sakta hai ke Gaza ki naka bandi khatam kar di jaye aur tamam Falastinion ko azadana naqal vhrkt ki azadi di jaye”. Israeli Bahria ne sirf Gaza ki naka bandi todney ki koshish ke liye aney wali maghribi mumalik ki kashtiyan ko pakad leti hai balkay woh Gaza ki bandar gaah se Europe ki taraf jaaney wali kashtiyon par bhi dhawa bol deti hai. Is ney chand haftay qabal Gaza se Europe jaaney wali aik kashti ko rawana honey ke thori der baad hi pakad liya tha. flstinyon ney May mein bhi aik kashti ke zareya Israel ki bahri naka bandi torney ki koshish ki thi lekin is ko bhi Gaza se chand kilometer door pakad liya gaya tha. Israeli fouj Gaza ki patti se flstinyon ki kashtiyon ko chay samandari mil se bahar nahi jaaney deti hai. wazeh rahay ke Israel ney 2008 se Gaza ki patti ki barri, bahri aur fazayi naka bandi kar rakhi hai. Aqwam e Mutahidda ke ohdedar aur insani huqooq ki aalami tanzeemen mutadid martaba Israel se Falasteeni ilaqa ka bgrhti hui insani soorat e haal ke paish e nazar muhasra khatam karne ka mutalba krchki hain.
650.title: Israeli Bahria ney Gaza ki naka bandi torney ki koshish karne wali Norway ki kashti pakad li

news_detail: Saudi Arab ke farmaa rava Shah Salman bin Abdulaziz ne Yemen ki qaumi fouj aur sodani fouj ke sho-hada ke khandano ke 1500 afraad ki Hajj ke douran mein sarkari maizbini ka hukum diya hai. Yemen aur soudan ke yeh fouji jung zada parosi malik mein Houthi Shiah baghion ke khilaaf Saudi Arab ki qayadat mein Arab ittehaad ke operation faisla kin tofaan aur operation umeed ki bahaali mein lartay hue shaheed hue hain. un sho-hada ke khandano ki Shah Salman ke maheman nawazi ke programme baraye Hajj aur omra ke tehat maizbini ki jaye gi. Saudi Arab ki wizarat baraye ‘Islami Umoor aur Dawah wo Irshad’ is programme ki nigran hai. Saudi wazeer baraye Islami Umoor aur Dawah wo Irshad Sheikh Abdullatif bin Abdulaziz ne aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”is programme aur Shah Salman ke hukum se Yemen mein hamaray bhaiyon ki sarzamen aur awam ke difaa ke liye un sho-hada ki dilerana qurbinion ki tehseen zahir hoti hai. Allah taala un sho-hada ki mughfirat farmaen”. Un ka kehna tha ke Saudi Arab ke dosray sarkari mehakmon ke sath rawabit se un sho-hada ke khandano ko saholaten baham pohanchanay ke liye tamam zaroori iqdamaat kiye jayen ge taakay woh baasani Hajj ada kar saken.
663.title: Yemeni aur Sodani sho-hada ke khandano ki Hajj par sarkari maizbini

news_detail: Israel ney kaha hai ke America jald hi Golan ki pahadiyoon par Israeli qabzay ko tasleem kar le ga. Israeli intelli jins wazeer Katz ney kaha ke America ke sath do Tarfah safarti baat cheet mein Golan ki pahadiyoon ka maamla sir fehrist hai. Israeli intelli jins wazeer ney mazeed kaha ke Israel , Trump intizamia par zor day raha hai aur umeed hai ke aindah chand mah ke douran America is par Israeli qabza ko tasleem kar le ga. unhon ney istadlaal kya ke is terhan ke iqdaam se Iran se tassadum ki Amrici koshisho ko sahara miley gajo dekha gaya ke Amrici saddar ney –apne malik ko mushtarqa jame mansoobah amal se dastbrdar krwalya. Iran aur aqwam mutahidda ke paanch mustaqil arkaan America , Bartania , France , chain aur roos ke ilawa Germaney ke darmain ittafaq ke mutabiq Iran , 15 barson ke liye yoranim ki afzodgi ki miqdaar ko mehdood karne par Iran amaada hai, jo reactorke eendhan ke tor par aur nuclear hathyaaron ke liye bhi istemaal hota hai aur yoranim ki afzoodghi ke liye alaat ki tanseeb ko 10 baras taq mehdood rakhnay par bhi amaadgi zahrki thi. America ney musallah proxy groups ko malia ki farahmi par Iran ko saza dainay thdidat bhi aed kiye hain. Katz ney kaha’ ‘ iranio ko nihayat hi takleef da jawab yeh day satke hain ke Golan par Israel ke tasallut ko tasleem kya jaye.’ ‘ Jerosalem post ke mutabiq Israel ke aik qanoon saaz ney Israel ke liye America ke safeer ko aik maktoob mein darkhwast ki ke mutanazia ilaqa par Israel ke daawa ko America tasleem karle .

Israel 51 saal se Golan ki pahadiyoon par qaabiz hai, is ke is qabza ko aalmi satah par tasleem nahi kya gaya hai. Israel ney 1967 hamza ki shaam se honay wali jung se Golan ki pahadiyoon par najaaiz qabza kar rakha hai aur yahan Israeli bastiyan abad karna shuru kar rakhi hain. Israel aur shaam ke darmain yeh 12 so kilometer taweel ilaqa hai. is se qabal yeh ilaqa shaam ke hudood mein tha aur Israel ke is ilaqa par najaaiz aur jabran tasallut ki barkhastgi ke liye aqwam mutahidda ki kayi qarar dadin hain. Jaria saal ke awail mein Golan ki pahadiyoon par is ki posts par rocket hamlon ka ilzaam aed karte hue shaam mein Iran ki chokion par hamlay kiye they. shaam mein jari khanah jungi mein Iran , bsharalasd ki pusht panahi kar raha hai. Trump intizamia, aalmi raye aama ke barkhilaf Israeli mafadaat ki purzor himayat karne laga hai aur duniya bhar ki mukhalfat ke bawajood apna sifarat khanah Jerosalem muntaqil kardiya hai. jis terhan America ke is iqdaam se ilaqai tanao mein izafah sun-hwa hai isi terhan Golan ki pahadiyoon par Israeli tasallut ko tasleem kar lanay se America ke khilaaf padosi mumalik ko bharak satke hain magar yeh bhi aik haqeeqat hai ke un mumalik ka gham o gussa sirf bayanaat taq hi mehdood rehta hai
530.title: America Golan ki pahadiyoon par hamara qabza tasleem karle ga: Israel

news_detail: Japan ko taaqatwar tareen passport ka aizaz mil gaya, Singapore Germany doosri position par poanch gay, Henly and Partners ki janib se Jaria saal ke liye nai fehrist jari kar di gayi, Mutahidda Arab Amarat (UAE) 23 wein muqam par hai jo is fehrist mein taizi se bulandi par karne wala mulk hai jabkay 105 mumalik ki fehrist mein Pakistan 102 wein number par hai. Bharat ka muqam 56 waan hain, Henly passport andiks ki haliya jari kardah report ke mutabiq duniya ke taqatwar tareen passport ka elaan kardiya gaya hai aur Japan ne is fehrist mein pehli position haasil kar li hai jabkay sngaporavr Germany doosri position par aagaye hain. is fehrist ke mutabiq Japani visa rakhnay walay afraad 189 mumalik ke visa free safar ki sahoolat haasil kar satke hain. dosray number par Germany aur Singapore hain jin ke shehri 188 mumalik mein baghair visa liye jasaktay hain. teesray number par janoobi Korea , fun land, italy, France , soyidn ora spin hain, chouthay number par visa free safar ki sahoolat ke sath Bartania aur America mein tie ho gaya hai. amarat bhi visa ranking mein taizi se oopar barh raha hai aur is ranking mein amarat ka number 23 waan hai. Pakistan ka number 102 waan hai jo Ethiopia, Palestine aur Sudan jaisay mumalik ke bhi baad aata hai. wazeh rahay ke is report mein duniya bhar ke mumalik ke pasporton ko safar ki azaadi ke lehaaz se tarteeb di gayi hai, yani passport rakhnay wala shakhs baghair visa liye kitney mumalik ja sakta hai. fehrist ke awaleen 5 numbraat par anay walay mumalik mein Japan , Singapore, Germany , South Korea , Spain, Denmark , Finland, , France , Italy, Swedan, Portugal , Britain , Norway , Austria , Luxumberg, Netherlands, Canada, Switzerland, America aur Ireland hain jabkay fehrist mein sab se neechay rehne walay mumalik mein Afghanistan , Iraq , Syria, Pakistan aur Somalia ka number hai. Afghanistan ka passport rakhnay walay shehrion ko sirf 24 mumalik mein visay ke baghair daakhil ki ijazat haasil hai ya phir aamad par visa jari kya jata hai. roos ne April mein elaan kya ke June aur July mein munaqqid shudni Fifa world cupp ke ticket rakhnay walon ko visa maaf karne ka elaan kya hai. roos ka is fehrist mein muqam 45 wein se ghatt kar 47 wahn hogaya hai.
542.title: Japani passport sab se ziyada taaqat war

news_detail: Washington. wohi -huwa jis ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha tha. America aur shumali Korea ke darmyaan mujawaza mazakraat ko mansookh kardainay ka America ney elaan kardiya. dono mumalik ke darmyaan payi jaaney wali tlkhyon aur srbrahan mumlikat ke sakht geer rawayya ke baais un khadshaat ka izhaar kya ja raha tha ke Trump aur kam jang aan ke darmyaan mazakraat shuru nahi hopayin ge. shumali Korea ki janib se wada ke mutabiq –apne nuclear tajrubati maqam par surangon ko dhamake se uda dene ke bawajood bhi Amrican sadar Donald Trump ney aaj shumali Korea ke sarbarah kِm jang aan ke sath mujawaza chouti mulaqaat ko mansookh karne ka elaan kardiya. Washington se mossola it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Trump ney singapore mein 12 June ko munaqqid shudni mulaqaat ka hawala dete hue shumali koiyai quied ke mosooma maktoob mein kaha’ ‘ afsos ke, aap ke haliya bayanaat mein zahir kardah ghair mamooli gussa aur adawat ki asaas par mein mehsoos karta hon ke is waqt darina mansoobah band ijlaas munaqqid karna munasib nahi hoga.’ ‘ Trump ney usay aik saqt mauqa qarar diya aur kaha ke inhen hunooz umeed hai ke woh kisi nah kisi din kِm se mulaqaat karen ge. white haoz ney Trump ke maktoob ki naqal twitter par shai yr ki hai .

aaj subah shumali Korea ney Trump ke sath nazeer mulaqaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar kar lanay ki dhamki ka iada kya tha aur intibah diya ke zaroorat parney par hum Washington ke sath nuclear taaqat ka muzahira karen ge. North Korian zaraye ablaagh ki janib se jari kardah bayan naib wazeer kharja Choe Son Hui ney nuclear hathyaar wali mumlikat North Korea ka taqabul Libya se karne pra American Vice President Mike Pence ko aik’ ‘ siyasi mohra’ ‘ qarar diya, jahan nuclear development programme ko Muammar Gaddafi ke qatal ke baad hi tark kya gaya tha. shumali Korea ney aaj Punggye-ri site par tunnels ki tabahi ka nzarah chand muntkhiba aalmi sahafion ko bhi karwaya tha
553.title: Trump ney Kim Jong Un ke sath mujawaza mulaqaat mansookh kar di

news_detail: Israel neh apni saffakion aur mazalim ki parda poshi aur nehattay Falestinion ko be bas kardainay ke liye Falestinion ki imdaad par waweela machana shuru kardiya hai taakay is ke ehtijaj ko malhooz rakhtay hue woh mumalik jin ke mafadaat Israel se wabsta hain, Falestinion se kisi qisam ki hamdardi nah rakh paye. Israel neh European Union se mutalba kiya hai ke Falestinion aur Europi shehrion ki aik darjan se zayed ghair sarkari tanzeemon ki madad band ki jaye. Israeli bayan ke mutabiq un tanzeemon ki maali imdaad Europi palisyon ki khilaaf warzi hai. Israel ki astritijk umoor ki wizarat ki janib se jari kardah aik report ke mutabiq mutadid ghair sarkari tanzeemen European Union se maali muawnat haasil kar rahi hain, jabkay un ke iqdamaat Israel ke khilaaf hain. is bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke European Union ka sarmaya un tanzeemon taq bhi poanch raha hai, jo mobayyana tor par askriat pasandon ke sath rawabit ki haamil hain. doosri taraf Israel ke wazeer tawanai Yuval Steinitz European Union par tanqeed karte hue Israeli Arabon par Israeli police ki safakiat ki tahaqeeq karne ke mutalba par kaha ke European hzar ha dozakhon mein ja sakta hai. Gaza ki sarhad par bohat ziyada halakaton ke khilaaf Israeli Arab ahtejajyon ke muzahira ke baad un par Israeli police karwai ki European Union neh muzammat ki thi. European Union neh aik bayan mein kaha ke yeh ahem hoga ke Israeli hukoomat ke taawun se Haifa mein guzashta hafta paish un halaat ki tehqiqaat ki jaye jis ke nateeja mein ghair sarkari tanzeem Mossawa ke director Jaffer Farah shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Israeli wazeer neh kaha ke European Union, Israel ko harasan kar raha hai jabkay Iran ayzarsani, hum jins parasti, haqooq nswan ki khilaaf warzi, dehshat gardi aur Asad ki himayat mein laga sun-hwa hai aur jo apne logon par Chemical Weapons phela raha hai. Steinitz neh kaha ke woh’ European Union ko dozakh bhaij diye jo European mumalik ki haqeeqi numaindagi nahi karti hai.’ yeh aik aisi tanzeem hai jis ka koi sarbarah nahi hai aur European mumalik ke maqabil Israel ka dost kam hai. yaad rahay ke European Union, Israel ke barray tijarti shiraakat daaron mein se aik hai. Israel , European Union ke sath salana 36 billion euro ki tijarat karta hai. European Union ko Israeli baraamdaat mein 2017 hamza mein 20 feesad izafah sun-hwa hai jis ke baais Israeli ki majmoi baraamdaat mein European Union ka hissa 34 feesad hai .

Haifa mein March ke baad police neh zayed az 21 kaarkunon Bashmool Jaffer Farah ko hirasat mein le liya hai jo police ki girftar y ke baad buri terhan zakhmi hogaye hain. Israel ke public security wazeer Gilad Erdan neh European Union ke mutalba par kaha ke’ ‘ mashriq wasti mein wahid jamhoriat Israel ko European Union jaisay aik jaanibdaar aur junooni tanzeem se ikhlaqi intibah ki zaroorat nahi hai
564.title: European Union Falasteeni tanzeemon ki madad band kere: Israel

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein majlis shoora ( parliment ) ney  insidaad harasani ke qanoon se mutaliq qarardad ki manzoori day di hai. qanoon ka mansoobah wizarat dakhla ney  Shahi farmaan par tayyar kya tha. yeh qanoon 8 shaqon par mushtamil hai. is ka maqsad harasani  ke jurm ka insidaad, is ke murtakib afraad par saza ka nifaz, jurm ka shikaar honay walay ka tahaffuz aur is ki izzat o touqeer aur shakhsi azaadi ko yakeeni banana hai. Al Arabiaia.net ke mutabiq qanoon ke tehat harasani  ke jurm ke irtikaab par milnay wali saza do saal jail aur aik laakh rial jurmana ya dono mein koi aik ho sakti hai. qaid ki saza ziyada se ziyada paanch baras taq barhai ja sakti hai aur jurmana ki raqam teen laakh rial se ziyada nahi ho sakti. is ke ilawa harasani  par uksanay, is par mutfiq honay ya kisi bhi soorat mein irtikaab mein madad karne par bhi muqarara saza ka nifaz ho ga. harasani  ke kisi bhi irtikaab se mutaliq maloomat faraham karne walay ki shanakht ko mukammal tor par Sigha raaz mein rakha jaye ga aur is ka shikaar honay walay ki shanakht kisi bhi soorat mein zahir nahi ki jaye gi siwaye aas waqt jab ke tahaqeeq ya adalti karwai mein is ki zaroorat paish aeye. idhar sarkari siktr mein mutaliqa idaron ko paband kya gaya hai ke woh harasani  se tahaffuz ke liye matlooba iqdamaat karen. sath hi is hawala se shikayat wusool karne ka tareeqa car waza karne aur aur shikayat ke mustand aur durust honay ki jaanch ko yakeeni banayen. yaad rahay ke Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ney  wizarat dakhla ko is nizaam ki tayari ke liye khusoosi Hadayat jari ki theen taa ke muashray aur afraad ko is ke manfi asraat se mehfooz rakha ja sakay
582.title: Saudi Arabia : Insidaad e harasani  qanoon ki manzoori

news_detail: Saudi arab ke General Directorate for Passports (Jawazat) ke mutabiq Umra ke liye duniya bhar se anay walay zaireen ko visa ki meyaad se zayed der qiyam ki soorat mein deport honay se qabal 50 hazaar Saudi Riyal jurmana aur chay mah qaid taq saza ka saamna karna par sakta hai. Saudi mehakma ny aik bayan mein tamam ghair mulki Umra zaireen ko Talqeen ki ke woh –apne tye shuda safri schedule ke mutabiq visa ke khatmay se qabal –apne mumalik ko lout jayen. jawazat ney Umra ke liye anay walay zaireen ko Hidayat jari ki ke Umra ke visa par anay walay afraad ko Makkah, Jeddah aur Madina se bahar jaaney ki ijazat nahi hai. Saudi idaara baraye shumariyat ke mutabiq saal 2017 hamza ke douran aik crore 90 laakh 79 hazaar 306 afraad ny Umra ada kya. un afraad mein se 65 laakh 32 hazaar 74 afraad beron mulk se aeye they
591.title: Saudi arab: Umra visa ki muddat se zayed qiyam par 50 hazaar Riyal jurmana, 6 mah qaid

news_detail: Denmark , Europion mumulik mein taaza mulk ban gaya hai jahan aam muqamat mein chehra ke hijaab par imtena ka qanoon Manzoor karliya gaya hai. is imtena ko huqooq insani ke jahedkaron ne usay’ huqooq nswan ki khilaaf warzi’ par mhmol kya hai. Denmark ki parliment ne aaj 30 ke muqabil 75 voton se manzoora qanoon kehta hai’ jo koi bhi awam mein chehra chupaney wala libaas Zaib tan karta hai usay jurmana ki saza hogi.’ Centre Right Goverment ki janib se paish kardah is musevida qanoon ko Social Democrates aur Danish Peoples Party ne bhi tayied ki hai. naye qawaid ka itlaq yakam June se hoga. aisa burqa ka pehnana jo saaray chehra ko chupata hai, ya aisa naqaab jo sirf ankhen dekhata hai, is ka awam mein istemaal karne ki soorat mein 1, 000 Kroner yani takreeban 157. 11 dollar ya 10,594 hindustani rupay ka jurmana aed kya jaye ga. is imtena ke tehat deegar ashya jin se chehra chupaya jata hai un ka bhi ihata kya gaya, jaisay kaan top balaclavas aur farzi darhhyan. mutadid baar khilaaf warzi karne walon ko jurmana 10, 000 Kroner yane 1,05,962 rupees tak kya jaye ga. is baat ka sahih andaza nahi hai ke Denmark mein kitni khawateen naqab ya burqa istemaal karti hain. imtena ki himayat karne walon ka yeh kehna hai ke is se Denmark ke muashra mein Dur anay walay musalmanoon ki tafteesh ko behtar bananay mein madad miley gi, lekin amnesty inter national ne qanoon ki muzammat karte hue usay’ huqooq nswan ki imtiazi khilaaf warzi’ qarar diya aur kaha ke yeh khaas kar muslim khawateen ke sath imtiaz hai jo chehra ko kaamil chupaney wala naqaab istemaal karti hain.
604.title: Denmark mein aam muqamat par chehra ke hijaab par imtena

news_detail: Saudi arab ne Makkah mkrmh mein Ramazan al mubarak ke aakhri ashray ke liye sikoriti ke mazeed sakht aur muasar intizamaa kiye hain aur masjid alhram aur is ki janib jany walay tamam raastoon ki fazai Security aur nigrani barha di hai. Security forces ke helly copter musalsal fiza mein gasht kar rahay hain. Aviation Security ke General Commander Brigedier General Husn al Bisam ne bataya hai ke Ramazan al mubarak ke liye Security ke tye shuda mansoobah par amal daraamad kya ja raha hai. masjid alhram mein anay walay tamam zaireen par nazar rakhi jarahi hai. unhon ne Al Arabia se guftagu karte hue kaha ke Ramazan ke aakhri ashra ke douran mein zaireen ki tadaad mein izafah ke paish e nazar Security intizamaa bhi ziyada muasar banaye jarahay hain. Makkah mkrmh ke fazai hudood mein helly coptron ke zareya nigrani barha di gayi hai aur shehar ke markazi hissa aur is ki janib jany wali shaahrahon ki kari nigrani ki jarahi hai. brigedier general husn ne bataya ke Makkah ki fizaon mein parwaaz karne walay tayyaron aur helly coptron mein nigrani ke jadeed alaat nasb hain. woh Security tnsibat aur trafik par nazar rakhay hue hain. woh Security machinon ke ilawa mukhtalif insani imdadi kaam bhi kar rahay hain aur woh tamam sarkari idaron ko logistical imdaad muhayya kar rahay hain. woh kisi hungami soorat mein imdadi sargarmia injaam dete hain aur unhein waqt e zaroorat fazai ambulance ke tor par bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai.
658.title: Ramazan ke aakhri ashra ke liye Makkah ki fazai Security ke sakht intizamaa

news_detail: Saudi arab mein kisi khatoon ko pahelay driving licence ke ijra ka tareekhi lamha aa hi gaya hai aur Saudi hukkaam ney aik khatoon ko car chalanay ka ijazat nama jari kardiya hai. somwaar ko licence ke ijra ki aik video internet par jari hotay hi vayrl hogayi hai. is ke sath tweet mein kaha gaya hai ke’ ‘ Saudi arab mein pahelay licence ke ijra par madrِ watan ki betiyan hazaron mubarak badin qubool farmaen’ ‘. Saudi khawateen ko driving licence ke ijra ke liye guzashta ma hay tareekh ka elaan kya gaya tha. woh Shahi farmaan ke mutabiq 24 June se azkhud karen chala saken gi. mehakma traffic ke director general Mohammad al Basami ney 8 May ko aik bayan mein kaha tha ke’ ‘ khawateen ke karen chalanay ke liye darkaar tamam taqazoon ko poora kardiya gaya hai aur 18 saal ya is se zayed Umar ki khawateen driving licence ke husool ke liye mutaliqa dafatir mein darkhwasten day sakti hain’ ‘. Saudi arab mein qareeban aath hazaar khawateen beron mumalik se driving licence haasil kar chuki hain. un ke licence kuch arsa ke liye Saudi arab mein bhi kaar amad hon ge aur un ki driving mein mahaarat ki jaanch ke baad unhein muqami driving licence jari kardiye jayen ge. Saudi khawateen ko car chalanay ki tarbiyat dainay ke liye mumlikat ke paanch shehron mein driving school qaim kiye gaye hain. un schoolon mein beron mumalik se driving licence haasil karne wali Saudi khawateen apni hum vtnon ko karen chalanay ki tarbiyat den gi. haal hi mein America , canada aur wheels se talluq rakhnay wali khawateen ko Saudi arab mein khatoon driving instructers ko tarbiyat dainay ke liye muntakhib kar liya gaya hai. yeh khawateen do saal taq sinir muaina car ke tor par kaam karen gi. woh nai Saudi khawateen trainers ko tarbiyat den gi
671.title: Saudi arab mein khatoon ko pahelay driving licence ka ijra

news_detail: Masjid Nabawi ke intizami umoor ke nigaran idaara ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke mah Sayam ke douran Masjid ke 100 dwaze zaireen ki aamad waraft ki sahoolat ke liye din raat khulay rakhay gaye hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Masjid Nabawi ki intizami committee ki taraf se jari bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke ramadaan al mubarak ke douran Masjid Nabawi mein zaireen ki aamad waraft ke liye 10 hungami darwazay bhi qaim kiye gaye taakay Masjid mein anay walay nmazyon aur roza daaron ko kisi qisam ki diqat ka saamna nah karna parre .

Masjid Nabawi mein aamad waraft ke liye aik so darwazon ke khulay rakhnay ke sath sath zaireen ko har qisam ka araam wo rahat pohanchanay ke liye 600 mulazmeen tainaat kiye gaye hain. jahan taq Masjid Nabawi ke tareekhi darwazon ki tareekhi ahmiyat ka sawal hai to morkhin ka kehna hai ke jab Anhazrat sale Allah aleh wasalam ne yeh Masjid apne dast mubarak se Masjid taamer ki to is ke sirf teen dakhli aur kharji darwazay they. aik darwaaza junoob, dosra maghrib aur teesra maghrib ki simt se tha. inhen aaj bhi baab alrahmath, baab Jibreel aur baab Abubaker Siddiq ke naamon se yaad kya jata hai. mutazakirah darwazay aaj bhi unhi naamon ke sath mojood hain magar inhen aamad waraft nahi balkay sirf ziyarat ke liye khoola jata hai. nmazyon ki tadaad mein izafay ke baad khalifa doum syedna Umar ban khitaab razi Allah anho ne Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ka hukum diya. sunah 17 h mein Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ke baad is ke mazeed teen darwazon ka izafah kya gaya. hazrat usmaan ban aafan ke daur mein Masjid Nabawi ke chay darwazay hi rahay taham un mein se aik darwaaza khawateen ke liye mukhtas kya gaya. mukhtalif adwaar mein Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ka amal jari raha. yahan taq ke mojooda Saudi khandan ke hukmaran Shah Saood bin Abdul Aziz Saood ne Masjid Nabawi ke paanch mazeed darwazon ke qiyam ke sath mazeed tosee ki. un ke daur mein Masjid ke 10 aur darwazay bhi banaye gaye. un mein teen dakhli darwazay shaamil hain. inhen baab al-mulk, baab Umar bin Khattaab, baab Osman bin Affan, baab Abdulaziz, baab Almajidi ke naamon se yaad kya jata hai. baad azan khadim alhrmin alshrifin Shah Fahd bin Abdul Aziz ne Masjid Nabawi ki shumali, mashriqi aur maghribi simt mein tausee karai aur mazeed kayi darwazay shaamil kiye.
678.title: Masjid Nabawi ke 100 darwazay khulay’

news_detail: Misar ki sab se badi dainee dars gaah jamea Al-Azhar ne guzashta roz Israeli Knesset (Legislative Committee) mein Manzoor honay walay Yahoodi Qaumiat aur Yahoodi haq khud iradyat se mutaliq mutanazia qanoon ki shadeed alfaaz mein muzammat ki hai. Al-Azhar ka kehna hai ke Israeli parliment se Manzoor honay wala qanoon shyoni riyasat ki nasal parastana policy aur gair Yahoodion ke sath bughz wo unaad ka wazeh saboot hai. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Israel ko ‘Yahoodi Qaumi Mumlikat’ qarar dainay ka qanoon sara sar nasal-parasti aur bughz ka shaksana hai jis ne sehyoni riyasat ke tausee-pasandana aur ghasibana qabzay ki policy ko mazeed be naqaab kardiya hai. Al-Azhar ki taraf se kaha gaya hai ke Israeli riyasat ki taraf se Palestine mein Yahoodi abadkari ke farogh, badnaam zamana’ elaan balfor’ ke baad Falasteeni Qaum ke haqooq ghasab karne ke tamam iqdamaat, Amrici intizamia ki taraf se al Quds ko Israel ka dar-ul-hukumat tasleem karne jaisay iqdamaat baatil aur na qaBill qubool hain. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Palestine ka tareekhi tashakkus Arabi zabaan aur Arab tahazeeb vtmdn ke sath wabasta hai. Palestine mein mukhtalif mazahab aur garohoon ki mojoodgi ke bawajood Arabi zabaan ko hamesha bartar darjah haasil raha hai magar shyoni riyasat aik soochey samjhay mansoobay ke tehat nasal parastana iqdamaat ko farogh day rahi hai. Al-Azhar ne Falasteeni Qaum ki qurbanion, un ke azm istiqlal, apni azad riyasat ke husool ke liye jaddo-jehed aur Al-Quds ko is ke dar-al-hakoomat bananay ke liye qurbanion ko tasleem kya aur kaha ke flstinyon ki qurbaniyan shyoni nasal parasti ko nakaam bana den gi. khayaal rahay ke Israeli parliment ne riyasat mein sirf yahood ko haq khud aradit dainay ke mutanazia qanoon ki manzoori day di hai. shyoni riyasat ki Arab aqliat ne is qanoon ko, nasal parastana qarar day kar mstr daal kar diya hai. wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu ki dayen baazu ki Qaum parast makhloot hukoomat ki janib se parliman mein paish kardah ”qaumi riyasat ke qanoon” ke haq mein 62 arkaan ne vote diya hai jabkay 55 arkaan ne is ki mukhalfat ki hai aur 2 Billl par raye shumari ke waqt ghair haazir rahay they. 120 arkaan par mushtamil Parliament ke baaz Arab arkaan ne is qanoon ke khilaaf sakht naaray baazi ki aur is par voting ke baad kagahzat phaad diye. Intahaa pasand wazeer e azam Binyamin Netanyahu ne Knesset mein voting ke baad kaha ke ”Sehuniat aur Israel ki tareekh mein yeh aik faisla kin marhala hai”. Is mutanazia qanoon ka Bill Israel ke satarhween yom Tasees ke mauqa par pehli martaba parliment mein paish kya gaya tha aur is par do mah se ziyada arsa taq behas hoti rahi hai. is mein kaha gaya hai ke ”Israel yahood ka tareekhi madrِ watan hai aur unhein is mein qaumi khud aradit ka khaas al khaas haq haasil hai”. is Bill ke tehat Arabi ki abrani ke sath Israel ki aik sarkari zabaan ki hesiyat khatam kar di gayi hai. is ka darjah ghata kar ab is ko ”khusoosi hesiyat” day day gayi hai aur is ke tehat yeh Israeli idaron mein murawej rahay gi. Israel mein abad arbo ki abadi athaara laakh ke lag bhag hai. woh kal 90 laakh abadi ka 20 fi sad hain. woh aik taweel arsa se yeh shikayat karte chalay arhay hain ke un se Israel mein dosray darjah ke shehri ka sa sulooq kya ja raha hai.
554.title: Yahoodi Qaumiat ka Israeli qanoon nasal-parastana: Al- Azher

news_detail: Damuscus: Shaam ke junoob maghribi soubay Daraa mein Shami afwaj ki fazai karwai mein 11 bachon samait 26 afraad jaan bahaq ho gay hain. Shaam mein insani huqooq ke nigaran group Al-Marsad ke mutabiq junoobi Shaam ke soubay Daraa mein ISIS tanzeem ke zair-e qabza ilaqay par shadeed fazai bomb-baari ki gayi. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq roos aur Shaam ki ittihadi fouj ke laraka tayyaron nay raat gay junoob maghribi soobah Daraa ke makhsoos ilaaqon mein fazai bombari ki jis ke nateeja mein 26 afraad jaan bahaq ho gay hain jin mein 11 masoom bachay bhi Shaamil hain. Shami hukoomat ka kehna tha ke mazkoorah ilaqa baaghi jamaaton ke zair tasallut thay. Shaam mein fazai hamla is waqt kya gaya jab aqwam mutahidda ke high commissionaire ki janib se Daraa mein phansay 1.40 lakhs shehrion ko pur aman muqam tak muntaqili ke liye mehfooz guzargah aur munasib mauqa faraham karne ki appeal ki thi. Taham Shami hukoomat ka daawa hai ke is ilaqa mein ISIS ke intahaa pasand group Khalid bin Waleed nay 30 hazaar shehrion ko insani dhaal bana rakha hai .

Al-Marsad ke director Rami Abdul Rahman nay francesi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke jummay ke roz roosi aur Shami jungi tayyaron nay Daraa ke junoob maghrib mein dehi ilaqa” Houzz Al yarmouk” ko poooray din hamlon ka nishana banaya. is ilaqa par ISIS tanzeem se talluq rakhnay walay aik group Fusaill Khalid bin Walid” ka control hai. karwai ke nateeja mein 26 Shami shehri apni jaanon se haath dho baithy jin mein 11 bachay bhi hain. un ke ilawa darjanon afraad zakhmi bhi hue jin mein baaz ki haalat naazuk hai. Al-Marsad ka kehna hai ke hamlon mein kayi dehaat aur qasbay fazai hamlon aur barrel bomb ke dhmakon ki lapait mein aeye jin mein Taseel, Hait , Sahm ul Julan aur Al Sahjrah Shaamil hain. Musalsal bomb-baari ke nateeja mein infrastructure ko badi tabahi ka saamna karna para aur baaz ilaqay mukammal tor par barbaad ho gay. askari operation aur tsfie ke muahiday ke zareya Daraa soobah ka 90 fi sad hssh wapas lainay ke baad ab Shami hukoomat ki fouj ke liye sirf ISIS tanzeem ke zair qabza kuch ilaaqon ko control mein lena baqi reh gaya hai. Shaam mein kaam karne walay riskyo tanzeemon ke mutabiq fazai hamlon mein Daraa ke mukhtalif ilaaqon ke anfra astrkchr mukammal tor par tabah ho gay hain. Sainkdon makanaat munhadim ho gay hain aur ilaqa mein khauf o hraas phail gaya hai. Zakhmion ko tibbi imdaad muhayya ki ja rahi hai. shadeed zakhmion ko tibbi saholaten haasil nah honay ke baayes halakaton mein izafah ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha hai. wazeh rahay ke Shaam mein 2011 se shuru honay wali khanah jungi mein ab taq 3 laakh 50 hazaar afraad jaan bahaq ho chukay hain jab ke lakhoon khandano ko darbadar hona para hai.
565.title: Daraa mein Shami fouj ki bombari mein 11 bachon samait 26 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: Saudi Arab ney Israeli Knesset se jumaraat ke roz Manzoor hay” Yahoodi qomiat” ke mutanazia qanoon ki manzoori ki shadeed muzammat karte hue usay dotok andaaz mein mustard kar diya hai. Saudi Wizarat kharja ke senior zaraye ka kehna hai ke Yahoodi qaumiat ka usool bain ul aqwami qanoon aur insani huqooq ke usoolon ke manafi hai. is qanoon ki manzoori se Israel Palestine tanaza ke hal ki bain ul aqwami koshishen mutasir hon gi. zaraye ney bain al aqwami baradri par zor diya ke woh apni zimma dariyan mehsoos karte hue is qanoon ka muqaabla karen. Neez Falasteeni awam ke khilaaf nasli imtiaz par mabni Israeli koshisho ko bhi roknay ki zaroorat hai kyunkay un iqdamaat se flstinyon ki qaumi shanakht aur Musallimah qanooni huqooq ko khatraat la-haq hotay hain. mutanazia Israeli qanoon par shyoni parliment mein jumaraat ke roz aik dhuwan daar mubahisay ke baad votng hui jis mein 120 arkaan Knesset mein se 62 ney is qanoon ke haq mein vote diya. ewaan mein Arab Israelion ki numaindagi karne walay arkaan ney is shyoni qanoon ko malik mein nasal parastana nizaam ki bunyaad qarar diya.
578.title: Saudi Arab ney Israel ka manzurah Yahoodi qomiat ka qanoon mustard kar diya

news_detail: Israeli ladaka tayyaron ne maghribi Sham mein itwaar ko fouji nishanon par hamlay kiye jis ke nateeja mein mutadid fouji halaak hogaye. Syria aur Lebanon se mossola it-tila-aat ke bamawajjib Israeli fazaiya ne junoob maghribi shaam mein Hama ilaqa mein Masyaf ke muzafaat mein chand ahdaaf par hamlay kiye. Lebnani news channel ke mutabiq labnani hawai patti se Israeli jet tayyaron ne Messiles daage hain. shaam ki khabar rasan agency sana ne kaha ke chaar Messiles daage gaye. Libnani it-tila-aat mein bataya gaya ke aik scienci idaara ko hadaf banaya gaya jabkay Bartanwi huqooq insani nigran car group ne kaha ke jis muqaam kohdf bnayagya woh aik Messiles warehouse hai jisay Bishar al asad rjim ki janib se istemaal kya jata hai. mukhalif zaraye ne ittila di ke hadaf  ke muqaam par Iranians ki maujoodgi ki ittila par yeh hamla kiya gaya hai. Is muqaam ko Messiles ke farogh aur chemical hathyaaron ki tayari ke liye istemaal kya ja raha tha. shaam ka kehna hai ke hummus ke qareeb irani ayr bees ko nishana banaya gaya. it-tila-aat mein daawa kya gaya ke is hamla mein 11 halaak hue hain Shami ayrport par hamlon mein irani Messiles nishana banay hain. guzashta baras kaha jata hai ke Israel ne Masyaf ke qareeb ek hadaf par hamla kya tha. Mobayyana Israeli hamla Bashar Asad ke nyoklyir ree ayktr ko Israel ki janib se chean lainay ke theek 10 barson baad is muqaam kohdf banaya gaya hai. Shami army general command ne nishana ko aik military idaara qarar diya aur kaha ke is muqaam ki qareebi jagah ko nishana banaya gaya jahan kam faasla par zameen se zameen par waar karne walay Messiles rakhay jatay thay.
590.title: Syria mein fouji hadaf par Israeli fazaiya ka hamla

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein wizarat insaaf naay khawateen ko adalat se aan ki Talaq ki decree jari honay ki ittila dainay ke liye mobile phone ke tasdeeqi SMS ki Service shuru ki hai. Yeh SMS National Information Center ki janib se bheja jaye ga. yeh iqdaam baaz khawateen ki shikayaat ke paish e nazar kya gaya hai jin ki janib se yeh baat samnay aayi ke inhen Talaq ki decree jari honay ki bar waqat ittila nahi mil saki. Saudi wazeer insaaf aur Supreme Judicial Council ke sarbarah Waleed Al-Samaani ney National Information Center ke sath marboot web link ka iftitah kya tha jis ka maqsad Nikah ki tasdeeq ke baad shadion ka computer mein indraaj hai. Is terha shehrion ke mutaliq maloomat ke data bank mein shohar aur biwi dono ki azdawaji haalat ki tajdeed ho jaye gi. In tamam iqdamaat ka maqsad ghair tasdeeq shuda shadion aur tlaqon ke wujood ko rokna hai. is liye ke adam-tasdeeq ke sabab samaji masayel janam letay hain aur fariqain ke huqooq ke zeyaa ka andesha hota hai.
601.title: Saudi Arab: Khawateen ko Talaq ki decree ki ittila dainay ka naya tareeqa

news_detail: South Korea ke Rukn Parliament Roh Hoe-chan ney bad-unwani ke ilzamaat par dil bardashta hokar khud kashi karli, unhon ney apni zindagi ka khtama apne flat ki 17 win manzil se kood krkya, un ki umar 62 saal thi. ghair mulki khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq qanoon saaz assembly ke teen martaba ke Rukn Roh Hoe-chan par Korea ke Maroof blogger ”Druking” se 44 hazaar dollars zayed ki raqam lainey ka ilzaam tha. Rukn Parliament Roh Hoe-chan ko Social Media par zabardast tanqeed ka saamna tha jis par woh sakht dil bardashta they, unhon ney aik martaba raqam lainey ka aitraaf karte hue kaha tha ke raqam ki lain deen ka maamla allag aur mukhtalif noiyat ka hai mein is raqam ke aiwz inhen kisi qisam ka faida p_hnchnane ka wada nahi kya hai. sabiq Sadar Roh Moo-hyun jinhon ney 2003 taa 2008 tak Mulk ki khidmat injaam di thi, bad-unwani ke scandal ki tehqeeq par 2009 mein aik teela se kood kar khudkushi karli thi.
613.title: Raqam lainey ke ilzaam par South Korea ke Rukn e Parliament ki khud kashi

news_detail: Amrici hukoomat ki janib se intiqami karwai ke tehat Falasteeni panah gzinon ki behbood ke zimma daar idaara Relief and Works Agency ‘UNRWA’ ki imdaad band karne ke baayis Agency mein kaam karne walay 250 Falasteeni mulazmeen ko farigh karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. you an relief and works Agency (UNRWA) ka qiyam sanh 1949 eeswi ko amal mein laya gaya tha. Yeh idaara kul 50 lakhs Falasteeni panah gzinon mein se 30 lakhs panah gzinon ka boojh uthae hue hai. Sanh 1948 eeswi ki jung mein shyoni riyasat ke Palestine par qabza ke douran nikalay gaye Falasteeni androon mulk, Jordan, Lebanon aur Syria mein badi tadaad mein maujood hain. Doosri janib Falasteeni shehrion neh Amrici pabandion aur ‘UNRWA’ ki taraf se mulazmeen ko nikalay jaanay ki shadeed muzammat karte hue is ke khilaaf shadeed ehtijaj shuru kya hai.’UN’ Relief Agency ‘UNRWA’ ke tarjuman Chris Gunness ne aik bayan mein bataya ke Amrici imdaad ki bandish ke baad hamein Palestine ke andar idaara ke sath kaam karne walay 250 mulazmeen ko barkhast karna para hai. un ka kehna tha ke hum garbh Ardun ke 154 aur Gaza ki patti ke 113 mulazmeen ke contract ki tajdeed nahi kar rahay hain. Agency ki janib se farigh kiye gaye mulazmeen ko bta diya gaya hai. Tarjuman ka kehna tha ke Falasteeni mulazmeen ko nikaalte ki wajah America ki taraf se ‘UNRWA’ ki 300 million salana imdaad kam karne ka iqdaam hai. Tarjuman ne bataya ke Agency ke sath kaam karne walay mazeed 500 so Falasteeni mulazmeen ko full time mulazmat ki bajaye part time par rakha jaye ga. Khayaal rahay ke Amrici hukoomat ne chand mah qabal elaan kya tha ke Palestine panah gzinon ko di jaanay wali salana 36 crore dollar ki imdaad kam karkay sirf chay crores tak mehdood kar di gayi. Amrici imdaad ka hajam Falasteeni panah gzinon ko milnay wali kul imdaad ka 30% tha. Katoti ke baad Agency ko ghayr-maa-mooli maali mushkilaat ka saamna karna pada hai. America ki taraf se Falasteeni panah gzinon ki relief Agency ko di jaanay wali imdaad mein kami ke nateeja mein idaray ko taleem, sehat aur hungami imdaad sameit kayi dosray shobo mein apni services ko mehdood karna pada hai. ‘UNRWA’ ki janib se Falasteeni mulazmeen ko nikalay jaanay ke iqdaam par Gaza aur garbh urdan mein ‘Agency’ ke khilaaf Falasteeni muzahirey kar rahay hain. Mulazimat mein tausee na milnay par aik shehri ne khud suzi ki koshish ki jab ke khawateen aur bachon ka ehtijaj ke douran un ro ro kar bura haal hogaya hai.
625.title: Trump intezamia ne 250 Falasteeni khandano ke cholhe bujhadiye

news_detail: Qaabiz Israeli fouj ney Palestine ke ilaqay Gaza ki patti par budh ki shaam wehshiana bombari karkay kam se kam teen Palestenians ko shaheed kar diya. Falasteeni wizarat sahet ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke Israeli fouj ki taraf se ki gayi bombari mein teen Falasteeni shaheed hue hain. muqami zaraye ka kehna hai ke Gaza mein Israeli foujion par firing ke waqea ke baad sahyoni fouj ney Hamas ke thikanon samait kayi deegar askari campon par bombari ki. yeh kasheedgi paanch roz qabal Hamas aur Israel ke darmain misar aur aqwam mutahidda ki taraf se karai gayi jung bandi ke baad samnay aayi hai. Qabal azeen Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par Palestenians ki firing se mutadid Israeli fouji zakhmi hogaye they. Un mein se aik ki haalat khatray mein bayan ki jati hai. Zakhmi Israeli foujion ko hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Gaza par bombari ke baad yahodi kalonyon mein khatray ke siren bhi bajaye gaye hain. Israeli afwaj ney id-daa kya ke Ghazah ke islami hukmraanon Hamas se talluq rakhnay walay 7 fouji thikanon par aartilri bombari ki gayi hai.
642.title: Gaza par Israeli bombari mein teen Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: Aam intikhabaat 2018 mein ghair sarkari o ghair hatmi natayej ke mutabiq Pakistan Tehreek-e- Insaaf pehlay aur Muslim League (N) dosray number par hai, taham (N) League ne intikhabi natayej mustard kardiye hain jabkay Peoples Party, MMA, MQM sameit taqreeban tamam siyasi jamaaton ne election ki shafafit par tahaffuzaat o khadshaat ka izhaar kya hai. Express News ke mutabiq intikhabi amal mein Tehreek-e- Insaaf, Muslim League (N), Peoples Party aur MMA sameit kul 122 siyasi o mazhabi jamaaton ne hissa liya. Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf (PTI) ko 122 nashiston par kamyaab mili hai jabkay Muslim League (N) 53 nashiston ke sath dosray, Peoples Party 38 nashiston ke sath teesray aur Mutahidda Majlis e Amal 8 nashiston par bartari ke sath chouthay number par hai. MQM Pakistan 7 nashiston par jab ke 17 nashiston par azad umeedwaar kamyaab hue hain. malik bhar mein Qaumi Assembly ki 270 nashistain hain jin mein se 141 Punjab mein, 61 Sindh mein, 16 Balochistan mein aur 51 nashistain Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein hain. qaumi assembly ki do nashiston par mukhtalif wajohaat ki bana par election multawi kiye gaye. Intekhabi amal mein Tehreek-e-Insaaf, Muslim League (N) aur Peoples Party sameit kul 122 siyasi o mazhabi jamaaton ne hissa lia hai. Pakistan Tehreek-e- Insaaf ke chairman Imran Khan ne wifaq aur sobon mein hukoomat saazi ke liye Committees tashkeel dainay ka faisla kya hai. Intekhabaat mein wazeh kamyabi haasil kar lanay ke baad Chairman PTI Imran Khan ne wifaq aur sobon mein hukoomat saazi ke liye Committees tashkeel dainay ka faisla kya hai, cometion ki sifarshaat ki roshni mein hukoomat saazi ka amal mukammal kya jaye ga. zaraye ka kehna hai ke cometion ke liye naamon ki namzadgi chair mean PTI aaj Bani gala mein honay walay ijlaas mein karen ge. yeh Committees azad umeedwaron ke sath rabton ki bhi majaz hon gi. Darin asna Pakistan Cricket Team ke sabiq Captain Shahid Khan Afridi ne intekhabaat mein kamyabi par Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf ke Chairman Imran Khan ko mubrakbad di hai.

PTI chairman Imran Khan ki Sabiqa ahliya Jemima Goldsmith ne PTI ki kamyabi par naik khwahisaat ka izhaar kya hai aur Imran Khan ko mubarak baad di hai. Social Media par paigam dete hue Jemima ka kehna hai ke 22 saal ki jadd o jahad aur qurabanion ke baad mere beton ke walid Pakistan ke aglay Wazeer e Azam hain. Unhon ne kaha ke Imran Khan ke liye challenge hai ke woh zehen mein rakhen ke siyasat mein kyun aae. unhon ne aik aur tweet mein kaha ke Imran Khan ka 1997 ka pehla election yaad hai jab woh siyasat mein naye aaye they, Imran Khan 1997 mein ghair azmooda aur nazryaati they. 1997 ke Election ke baad Imran ne phone kiya aur kaha hum ne haar mein clean sweep kya hai. Is se qabal bhi unhon ne tweet karte hue Pakistan ko intikhabaat ki mubarak di aur Imran Khan ko khobsorat, paglay, piyaray aur puranay dost qarar diya tha. Unhon ne mazeed kaha tha ke yahan tumharay vote ginnay walon ko umeed hai, inhen vote ginnay do. Un logon ko woh rehnuma mil ja yega jis par woh yaqeen rakhtay hain. ‘Pakistan zindah baad’.

22 years later, after humiliations, hurdles and sacrifices, my sons’ father is Pakistan’s next PM. It’s an incredible lesson in tenacity, belief  & refusal to accept defeat. The challenge now is to remember why he entered politics in the 1st place. Congratulations
— Jemima Goldsmith (@Jemima_Khan)
657.title: Ab Pakistan par Imran Khan ki Hukoomat hogi

news_detail: Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf, Qaumi Assembly ki 119 nashistain jeetnay ke baad sab se badi jamaat ban gayi lekin hukoomat bananay ke liye usay 137 nashistain darkaar hain. Imran Khan Qaumi Assembly ki 5 nashiston par kamyaab hue aur inhen 4 nashistain chhodna hon gi, isi terha Ghulam Surwar Khan 2 nashiston par jeete hain aur inhen bhi aik nashist chhodna hogi, yun Tehreek e Insaaf ki Qaumi Assembly ki 119 mein se 5 nashistain kam ho kar 114 reh jayen gi. Saada aksariyat aur mazboot hukoomat ke qiyam ke liye Tehreek e Insaaf ko azad umeedwaron aur deegar hum khayaal siyasi jamaaton se ittehaad ki zaroorat hogi jabkay jeetnay walay azad umeedwaron ki tadaad 15 hai taham hum khayaal jamaaton mein Grand Democratic Alliance ke paas 2, Awaami Muslim League aik, Pakistan Muslim League (Q) 4, Balochistan Awaami Party aik aur MQM ke paas 8 nashistain hain. Azad umeedwaar 3 din mein kisi bhi siyasi jamaat mein shaamil honay ka faisla kar sakte hain, is terha Tehreek e Insaaf aur azad umeedwaron samait tamam itihadiyon ki tadaad 145 banti hai jo saada aksariyat se ziyada hai. Doosri janib Pakistan Muslim League (N) ney Qaumi Assembly mein ab tak 63, Pakistan Peoples Party ney 40, mMtahidda Majlis e Amal ney 12, Awaami National Party ney aik aur Balochistan National Party Mengal ney 4 nashistain haasil ki hain, is terha oppostion jamaaton ki majmoi nashiston ki tadaad 120 banti hai.
687.title: Hukoomat saazi ke liye PTI ki mansoobah bandi

news_detail: Makkah Mukramah. Makkah Mukramah mein taiz o tund hawa ne Kabatullah ke Kiswa is terha udney laga ke Kabatullah ki diwaren andar se jhanknay lagen. Social Media par tasaveer aur videos gasht karne lagen jin mein yeh nzarah dikhaya gaya ke taiz o tund hawaon ne Kabatullah ko dhaankne wala ghilaaf udney laga jis ki wajah se andar se Kabatullah ki diwaaren nazar anay lagien. Ghilaaf Kabah jisay ‘Kiswa’ kaha jata hai ke khalis resham se tayyar kya jata hai aur is par talai dhagon se Quran Majeed ki ayaat se sajaya jata hai. har saal Yaum e Arfa ke mauqa par Kiswa ko tabdeel kya jata hai, aur is din Masjid e Haram taqreeban khaali hoti hai chunkay isi din tamam Hujjaj karaam mnasik Hajj ki adai ke hissa ke taur par Maidan e Arfat mein jama ho jatay hain. Kiswa ke apni jagah se hatt jaany ke baad aur hawaon ki raftaar mein jon hi kami aayi workers ne fori Kiswa ko apni jagah par le aaya. Kal ghilaaf e Kabah ko tabdeel kardiya jaye ga. Arfat se mausula it-tila-aat ke mutabiq itwaar ki shaam ko jald pahonch jaany walay Hujjaj karaam ka Arfat mein taiz hawaon aur barish ne istaqbaal kya. Aadhay ghanta tak yeh silsila jari raha aur phir sab kuch jon ka ton waisay hi hogaya.

رياح قوية وأمطار في
— فهد البطي (@fbati91)
574.title: Makkah Mukramah mein taiz o tund hawaayen aur baarish

news_detail: Saudi Arab  ki hukoomat aur niji idaray mil kar sab Allah ke mehmanon ke aaraaam raahat aur manasik Hajj ki adai mein un ki muawnat mein masroof hain. Aik falahi tanzeem ‘Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ne Hujjaj karaam ke liye aik nai sahoolat muta-arif karai hai. Tanzeem ki taraf se Hujjaj aur muatamarin ke liye 18 se 24 ‘Sleeping Capsule’ mobile kamray tayyar karaye hain. Hujjaj karaam manasik Hajj ki adai ke dauran inhen mukhtasir waqt mein sustaane ke liye istemaal kar satke hain.’Al Arabia.net’ ke mutabiq ‘Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ki taraf se muta-arif karaye gaye ‘sleeping Capsule’ ko ‘Hotel Gift’ qarar diya ja raha hai. Is tanzeem ka mousmi daftar mashaar Muqaddisa mein Hai jo Hujjaj aur muatamrin ko deegar kayi Services bhi faraham karti hai. Tanzeem ki sarparasti Wizarat Labour wo Samaji Behbood ke Director General Abdullah Bin Ahmed al-Tawi karte hain.’Sleeping Capsule’ aazmin Hajj ke liye Hajj ke mauqa par yeh apni noiyat ki aik munfarid sahoolat hai.’Hotel Gift’ teen murabba meter par mushtamil chhootey chhootey mobile kamray hain jinhein aik se dosray maqam par ba aasani le jaya ja sakta hai. Sheeshay, Plastic aur Fibre se tayyar kardah un kamron ko ‘Maqnateesi Chaabi’ ki madad se khoola aur band kya ja sakta hai. Un mein aik bistar bichaa hota hai jis ke sath aik takiya bhi hai, jab ke Sleeping Capsule ki androoni gunjaish 2.64 murabba meter aur oonchai 1.2 meter hai. Hujjaj karaam is mein aaraam karne ke sath kayi dosray ahem umoor bhi anjaam dey sakte hain. Is mein mobile phone charge karne, Suraj ki garmi se bachney, apni marzi ke mutabiq daraja hararat set karne aur pasand ki roshni ka ihtemaam karne ki sahoolat hai. In Sleeping Capsule ko aik dosray ke sath sath ya aik dosray ke oopar bhi rakha ja sakta hai. Is mein chadhne ke liye seedhi maujood hai jo balai Sleeping Room tak pahuncha sakti hai. Un kamron mein toilet, haath mun dhonay aur nahanay ki sahoolat bhi maujood hai. Tanzeem ke Director General Mansoor Al-Amr ne bataya ke aalmi sateh par is terhan ke mobile Sleeping Room Japan mein tayyar kiye jatay hain. Baaz dosray mulkon ke shehron mein bhi yeh sahoolat maujood hai.’Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ki taraf se pehli baar Hujjaj karaam ke liye yeh sahoolat haasil ki gayi hai taakay bohat ziyada rush ke auqaat mein aazmin ko kuch dair aaraam ki sahoolat faraham karna hai. Aik sawal ke jawab mein unhon ne kaha Hujjaj karaam ko yeh sahoolat mukammal taur par muft mein faraham ki jati hai, taham Japan se is ki daraamad par aik lakh Euro se zayed ke akhrajaat aaye hain. Al-Amr ka kehna tha ke fil-waqt rozana 60 Hujjaj karaam un Sleeping Rooms se istefada kar saktay hain magar un kamron ki tadaad badhaane ke nateejay mein un se istefada karne walon ki tadaad mein bhi izafah ho sakta hai.
585.title: Hajion ke liye’Sleeping Capsule’ ki nai service

news_detail: Pakistan ke nau muntakhab Wazeer e Kharaja Shah Mahmood Qureshi ney id-daa kya ke Bharat ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney kal khat bheja hai jis mein Imran Khan ko Wazeer e Azam ban’ney ki mubarakbad di hai aur mazakraat ki dawat bhi di hai. Wazeer e Kharja Shah Mahmood Qureshi apne ohda ka halaf lainey ke baad Daftar e Kharja poanch gaye. Wazeer e kharja ka mazeed kehna hai ke inhen Bharat ke sath darina masail ka idraak hai, Bharat ki Wazeer e Kharaja ke liye mera pegham hai ke ‘Kashmir’ Pakistan aur Bharat mein tanazeaat ki bunyadi wajah hai, dono Mumalik hamsaye aur atomici quvvat hain, Bharat se tasalsul ke sath dialogue ki zaroorat hai. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke ayindah mah aqwam e mutahidda ka ijlaas honey wala hai, beroni Mumalik Pakistan ke safeer haakim nahi hain, Mulk ko aalsmi tanhai se nikaalte ke liye iqdamaat karenge, Pakistan ka mafaad sab se muqaddam hai. Shah Mahmood Qureshi ney kaha ke Pakistan aur America mein etemaad ka fuqdaan hai jisay door karna chaahunga, America ke sath maazi mein kaam karne ka bhi mauqa mila hai, tarjeehat samney rakh kar Amrici Wazeer e Kharja se baat karoonga. Wazeer e Kharsja Shah Mahmood Qureshi ka kehna hai ke C-Pack bahut ahem mansoobah aur game changer hai, Chinese safir ko dawat di hai ke woh C-Pack par paishraft se aagah karen. Wazeer e Kharaja ka kehna hai ke Afghanistan aur Pakistan ko aik dosray ki zaroorat hai, Afghanistan Wazeer e Kharaja se rabita karkay dora kabul ki khwahish rakhtay hain.
598.title: Mazakraat ke liye Pakistan ko Modi ki dawat: Pakistani Wazeer e Kharaja

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein manasik e Hajj ki adai ke dauran maidan Arafat mein waqoof ke waqt aik Arduni (Jordanian) khatoon ne bache ko janam diya. Saudi Arab ki sarkari news agency ‘SPA’ ke mutabiq aik Arduni Hajn ko dard e zeh shuru honay ke baad Jabl e Rahma ke Hospital laya gaya jahan is ne bache ko janam diya hai. Hospital intizamia ki taraf se maa aur bacha ko har mumkin tibbi sahoolat muhayya ki gayi hai aur dono ki sahet tasalii bakhash hai. Waalid ne betay ka naam Jabal al Rhmah Hospital ke Director ki nisbat se ‘Wazah’ rakha hai.
616.title: Maidan e Arafat mein Jordanian Hajan ne bache ko janam diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Selaab ki tabah karyon se pareshan haal riyasat Kerala ke liye sab se badi raahat ka samaan huwa hai. United Arab Emirates ney museebat zadgaan e selaab ki raahat o baazaabadkaari ke liye 700 crores rupay ki khateer maali imdaad faraham karne ka wada kya hai. Chief Minister Kerala Pinarayi Vijayan ney yahan aik press conference mein zaraye ablaagh ko is ke baray mein waaqif kerwatay hue United Arab Emirates ka shukriya ada kya. Chief Minister ney bataya ke Abu Dhabi ke Wali Ahad Sheikh Mohammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan ney Lulu group ke Sadarnashin M. A. Yusuf Ali ko is se aagah kiya hai. Kerala ke kayi logon ke liye Khaleeji Mumalik Watan e saani ki hesiyat rakhtay hain. Wahan Keralites sirf workers nahi hain balkay wahan ke har ghar ka kisi na kisi etebaar se Keralites ke sath talluq hota hai. Wahan har cheez mein Malyali touch zaroor millta hai. Chief Minister ney kaha ke hamari maujooda museebat mein Khaleej ke awam hamari terha hi jazbati hain. unhon ney hamaray liye 100 million dollars, approximately 700 crores Indian rupess ki imdaad dainey ka faisla kya hai. mein saddar United Arab Emirates Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Naib Sadar wo Wazir e Azam Sheikh Mohammad bin Rashid ka Malyali awam ki taraf se shukriya ada karna chahta hon. Lulu Group ke Sadarnashin ney jab Abu Dhabi ke Wali Ahad se inhen Eid uz Zuha ki mubarakbaad dainey mulaqaat ki to unhon ney is faisla se aagah kiya. UAE ke 700 crores rupay ki maali imdaad ke barkhilaf markazi hukoomat ney Kerala ke liye sirf 600 crores rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya hai. Qabal azeen Wazeer e Dakhla Mr. Rajnath singh ney 100 crore rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya tha. Wazeer e Azam ney riyasat ke apne daura ke mauqa par 500 crores rupay ki imdaad ka elaan kya, jabkay Chief Minister ney bohraan se nimatney ke liye fori 2000 crores rupay ki imdaad ka mutalba kya tha. Kerala mein shadeed barish aur selaab ke baais 8 taa 20 augst Zayed از 250 afraad halaak hogaye hain jabkay 10, 28, 073 log 3, 274 relief camp mein sahara lainey par majboor hue hain. yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke jahan Khaleeji Mumalik ke sarbarah, Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ki imdaad ke liye barri farakhdili ka muzahira kar rahay hain aur is bohraan mein khud ko shaamil kar rahay hain wahein androon malik Kerala ke awam ke sath kuch reyasti hukoomaton aur awam ka rawayya intehai muandana hai. Relief kamon ko bhi mazhab ki aeinak se dekha ja raha hai aur firqa parast anasir hindustani awam ko Kerala ki awam ko relief pohanchaney se rokney ki koshish kar rahay hain.
629.title: Kerala ke liye UAE ki 700 crores rupay ki imdaad

news_detail: Israa al-Ghomgham pehli khatoon insani huqooq karkun hain jinhein Saudi Arabia mein szaye mout hosakti hai, Un par muzahireen ko ishtial dilanay aur fsadyon ki akhlaqi himayat ka ilzaam hai, Shiah mazhab se talluq rakhney wali Israa ko 2015 mein shohar ke sath girftar kya gaya tha, jabkay adalti karwai 32 mah baad shuru hui. Amnesty International ne Saudi hukoomat se mutalba kiya hai ke woh khatoon rukn ko szaye mout dainay ke iradah ko tark kardey, tanzeem ke mutabiq May se ab tak 9 khawateen sameit 12 kaarkunon ko girftar kya ja chuka hai. Muzahireen ko tashadud par ubhaarne ke liye kam az kam 13 khawateen ko hirasat mein liya gaya tha jin mein se 4 ko rihaa kardiya gaya. Udhar Canada ne bhi un karwaiyon par Saudi Arabia se apni tashweesh ka izhaar kya tha jis ke baad dono Mumalik ke darmyaan taluqaat mein bigaad aagaya hai, tarjuman Canadian wizarat kharja ka kehna hai ke huqooq niswaan, insani huqooq aur azadi izhaar e raaye ke liye khaday rahen ge, Isi muamlay par Canada aur Saudi Arabia mein tanaoo paaya jata hai.

Human Rights Watch ki janib se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Israa al-Ghomgham ko phansi dainay ki sifarish sara sar zulm hai. Wazeh rahay ke Saudi prosecutor ne Israa al-Ghomgham sameit 5 khawateen ko szaye mout ki sifarish ki hai, Israa al-Ghomgham ke khilaaf 32 mah baad adalti karwai hui hai. Paanchon karkunaan ke muqadmaat dehshat gardi ki Secret Trial Court mein zair samaat hain, Prosecutor ne Israa sameit insani huqooq ke 5 karkunaan ko szaye mout ki sifarish ki hai. Siyasi taur par fa-aal Israa al-Ghomgham ko 2015 mein Saudi Arabia se girftar kya gaya tha, al-Ghomgham par muzahireen ko ishtial dilanay aur fsadyon ki ikhlaqi himayat ka ilzaam lagaya gaya hai, 29 sala Israa ne Saudi arab ke tamam shehrion ke liye yaksaa huqooq ka mutalba kya tha. Woh 2015 mein apni giraftari tak Saudi Arbia ke mashriqi soobah mein 2011 se zabardast muzahiray karti aa rahi thi. Saudi Arabia ne Israa sameit deegar huqooq insani kaarkunon ke khilaaf karwaiyon ko tark kardainay ke mutalba ko Mulk ke dakhli umoor mein madakhlat par mahmool karte hue mustard kardiya hai.
641.title: Israa al-Ghomgham ko szaye mout hosakti hai

news_detail: Afghan Taliban ney budh ko toseeq ki ke woh Rusia mein aindah mah munaqqid shudni aman mazakraat mein apne qasid rawana karen ge. Rusian wazeer kharja Sergey Lavrov ney kaha hai ke Afghan Taliban 4 September ko moscow mein honay walay aman mazakraat mein hissa len ge. Idhar Rusian wizarat kharja ki taraf se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke aayindah mah Moscow mein honay walay aman mazakraat mein America samait 12 mumalik ko dawat di gayi hai. Moscow mein Afghan aman mazakraat is ka wazeh saboot hai ke Rusia ka Afghanistan mein kirdaar barh raha hai. Rusian wizarat kharja ney Afghan hukoomat ki taraf se teen mah ki mashroot jung bandi ki himayat ki hai magar Taliban is tajweez ko mustard kar chukay hain. Rusian wizarat kharja ke aik ohdedar Zamier Cabuloof ney kaha ke Moscow ney Taliban jinhein woh dehshat gard qarar day kar pabandiyan bhi laga chuka hai ko mazakraat mein shirkat ki dawat di hai. Rusian khabar rasan agency ‘Interfax’ ney Rusia mein Afghanistan ke safeer Abdul Qayyum Kochai ka aik bayan naqal kya hai jis mein un ka kehna hai ke Taliban ka Moscow mein aman mazakraat mein shirkat ka elaan musbit iqdaam hai aur Kabul is ka khair muqaddam karta hai. Kabul se Reuters ki ittila ke mutabiq Rusia ki janib se pehal kardah aman mazakraat mein Afghan hukoomat shirkat nahi kere gi. Khabar rasan agency ney hukoomat ke do senior ohdedaron ke hawala se kaha gaya ke Afghanistan , mazakraat mein hissa nahi le gajs ke baayis Mulk ke mustaqbil par tabadlah khayaal karne bain mumlikati Conference ke liye Rusia ke mansoobah par pani phirsakta hai. Afghanistan ke aik sarkardah Security ohdedar ki janib se is bayan ke kuch der baad hi hukoomat Afghan ka faisla samnay aaya hai jis mein unhon ney tawaqqa zahir ki thi ke kabul hukoomat ke sath aman mazakraat mein shaamil honay ke liye Rusia Taliban par dabao daaleyga.
652.title: Taliban ki aman mazakraat mein shirkat, Afghan hukoomat ka guraiz

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par ‘Haq e Wapsi’ March ke dauran Israeli Fouj ki puraman Falesteenion par firing ke nateeja mein kam se kam 190 shehri zakhmi hogaye. Gaza ki patti mein Falasteeni wizarat sehat ke tarjuman Dr Ashraf al Qadrah ney bataya ke Falasteeni muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye Israeli Fouj ney jummay ke roz ansoo gas shell fire kiye jis se 189 Falasteeni zakhmi hue. 10 Falasteeni shehri barah e raast golian lagnay se zakhmi hue. Un mein do bachay aur do khawateen bhi shaamil hain. Gaza ki sarhad par lagai gayi Israeli sarhadi baad ke qareeb Juma ko Falesteenion ney Haq e Wapsi ke liye muzahira kiya. Ayini shahideen ke mutabiq Falesteenion ki badi tadaad ney Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par Israeli Fouj ki taraf se khadi ki gayi rukawaten hataane ki koshish ki. khayaal rahay ke Falasteeni shehri 30

March 2018 ke baad se Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par har jummay ko ehtajaji muzahirey karte hain. Falasteeni muzahireen ke puraman honay ke bawajood Israeli Fouj un ke khilaaf taaqat ka istemaal karti hai jis ke nateeja mein ab tak 170 Falasteeni shaheed aur 18 hazaar se zayed zakhmi ho chuke hain. Nama nigaron ke mutabiq jummay ke roz Falesteenion ney Israeli riyasat ke mazalim ke khilaaf ehtijaj kya magar is mauqa par koi aatish geer kaghazi jahaaz ya garam hawa ka ghubarah Israel ki taraf nahi uchala gaya jab ke is se qabal Palestine Israel sarhadi ilaaqon mein gassee ghubaare aur aatish geer jahaaz dropping ke zareya aag laga dete they jis par Israel ko Falesteenion ke khilaaf sakht gham wo ghussah hai. Iss mauqa par Hamas ke muqami rehnuma Khalil al Haiyya ney kaha ke Gaza ki sarhad par Falasteeni muzahireen ka puraman ehtijaj Cairo mein jari jung bandi baat cheet ko kamyaab karne ka mauqa faraham karna hai. Hamas rehnuma ka kehna tha ke jamaat ki qayadat aur deegar Falasteeni dhadon ke zimma daraan kal itwaar aur somwaar ke roz qahira mein Israel ke sath Gaza mein jung bandi aur aapas mein masalihati amal par baat cheet karen ge.
665.title: Gaza ki sarhad par Israeli fouj ke hamle mein 190 Falasteeni zakhmi

news_detail:
Hind wo Pak ke namwar taraqi pasand shayar mumtaaz maahir e  taleem o shayr  nigaar Ahmed Faraz ku dunyae faani se guzray 10 baras beeet gaye lekin un ki shayiri ab bhi un ke madahon ke dil o dimagh par chhai hui hai. Namwar shayar Faraz 12
  January 1931 ku Kohat mein paida hue, unhon ney ibtidayi taleem ki takmeel ke baad shayr o-shayari ka aaghaz kar diya, woh mukhtalif taleemi idaron mein maahir taleem ke taur par bhi apne farayez sar-anjaam dete rahay, unhein General Zia ul Haq ke daur mein paband e salasil bhi rakha gaya. Ahmed Faraz ne hazaron nazmein kahin aur un ke 14 majmoa kalaam shaya hue jin mein Tanha Tanha, Dard Aashoob, Shab Khoon, Mere Khawab Rezah Rezah, Be Aawaz Gali Kochoon Mein, Nabina Shaher Mein Aaina, Pas Andaaz Mausam, Sab Aawazian Meri Hain, Khawab Gul e Pareshaan Hai, Bood Lik, Ghazal Bahana Karoon, Janaan e Janaan aur Ae Ishhq Junoon Pesha shaamil hain. Ahmed Faraz ki tasaneef ke trajim Angrezi, French, Hindi, Yogoslavia ki Serbo-Croatian, Swedish, Rusian, German aur Punjabi mein hue. Ahmed Faraz Urdu, Persian, Punjabi sameit deegar zabanon par bhi mukammal uboor rakthe thae, umar ke aakhri ayyaam mein woh gurdon ke aarzah mein mubtala hogaye, Ahmed Frazne hazaron nazmein aur darjanon majmoa kalaam bhi tehreer kiye, Ahmed Faraz 25
  August 2008 ko wafaat pagye thae. Ahmed Faraz ney apni aadbi zindagi ka aaghaz taalib Ilmi ke daur se kya aur kayi asnaaf e sukhan mein taba aazmai kar chukay hain magar bunyadi taur par yeh ghazal ke shayar hain. Ahmed Faraz ko un ke adabi fun ki wajah se mutadid Awards bhi miley hain. Unhen Hilal e Imtiaz, Sitara e Imtiaz, Nigaar awards aur Hilal e Pakistan jaisay bawaqar Awards se nawaza gaya tha.
Un ki kayi ghazlon ko bahut se gulukaron ney gaaya un ki shayari aur gazalain aaj bhi filmon, dramon aur geeton mein shaamil hoti hain. Ahmed Faraz ki mashhoor ghazlon mein ”ab ke bichhde”, ”suna hai log usay”, ” phir isi raah guzar par”, ”yun they” sameit deegar shaamil hain. Ahmed Faraz ki gazalain ganey walon mein Pakistani gulukar Noor Jehan aur Salma Agha hi nahi balkay Bharati maroof ghazal gayik Jagjit Singh bhi shaamil hain.
672.title: Ahmed Faraz ki dasvin barsi

news_detail: Musalmanoon ke qibla e awwal Masjid Aqsa par ab Yahoodi apna haq jataney ki koshish kar rahay hain. Yaad rahay ke aik arsa daraaz se Yahoodi, Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer ke khawab dekh rahay hain. Yahoodion ke Talmudi aqaayed ke aitbaar se saari kaayenaat par un ke tasallut ke liye Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer bhi aik lahiqa hai aur who chahate hain ke Masjid Aqsa ko bhi Haikal e Sulemani mein shaamil karle. Yaad rahay ke Masjid Aqsa tulu e islam se hi Musalmanoon ke liye aik muqaddas muqam hai jis ki taraf rukh karte hue Musalmanoon ney kayi barson tak salaat ada ki thi. yahin par Allah ke Rasool sale Allahu alaihi wasallam ney Meraaj ke mauqa par anbiaye ki imamat ki thi. Haal hi mein Israel ki Supreme Court ney Benjamin Netayahu ki hukoomat ko hidayat di ke Mashriqi Yaroshallam ki Masjid e Aqsa Complex mein Yahoodi ibadat par derina imtena ka jawaz paish kere. Israeli roznaman ‘Maarive’ ney jummay ko report di ke Israel ki aala Adalati Authority ney hukoomat ko 60 din ki mohlat di ke woh wazahat kere ke maqam Muqaddisa ke nuqta ishtiaal par Yahoodion ko ibadat karne se rokay rakha gaya hai. Adalat ney aik NGO ‘Israeli Center for the  Promtion of Democracy and Human Rights’ ki janib se daakhil kardah aik darkhwast par hukoomat se wazahat talabb ki hai. Iss tanzeem ney usay Masjid ke Complex mein ”ghair Muslim par hukoomat ki tahedidaat” se taabeer kya hai.
