Darkhwast mein kaha gaya ke Israeli Police wazeh taur par imtiyaazi Polices ( Yahoodion ke khilaaf ) ko laago karne apne ikhtiyarat ka istemaal kar rahi hai jo haq e ibadat ki khilaaf warzi hai. NGO ney kaha ke temple mount (yani Masjid al Aqsa Complex ) mein ghair Muslim visitors ke dakhila par imtina kayi dahon se hai. Yaad rahay ke Israeli hukkaam ney 2003 se Yahoodion ko Masjid al Aqsa Complex mein Yahoodi settlers ko izafi tadaad mein dakhla ki ijazat di hai taham hanoz inhen androon e Masjid ibadat karne ki ijazat nahi hai. Israel ney 1967 ki Arab-Israel jung mein mashriqi Yaroshallam par qabza kar liya tha jis ko aaj tak aalmi bradari ney qubool nahi kya hai. Aisa lagta hai ke Masjid Aqsa ko mukammal taur par apne qabza mein kar laney ki aik saazish ke taur par adalat ko istemaal karne ki koshish ki jarahi hai jis ke zareya pehlay Masjid Aqsa ke Islami takaddus ko khatam karte hue usay Musalmanoon aur Yahoodion ke liye mushtarik muqaddas muqam ke taur par taslim krwa liya jaye aur baad azan yahan se Musalmanoon ko mukammal taur par be-dakhal kardainey ke baad usay munhadim karte hue Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer ko yakeeni banaya jaye.

Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf aur Mazhabi Umoor ki taraf se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Qibla e Awwal par Musalmanon ke siwa kisi aur qoam ka koi haq nahi. Qibla e Awwal ko nuqsaan pouncha to is ka zimma daar Israel hoga. Masjid Aqsa ka 144 donam ka Raqba khalis Qibla e Awwal ke liye waqf hai jisay kisi dosray maqsad ke liye istemaal nahi kiya ja sakta aur na hi is par kisi doosri qaum ka koi haq hai. Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf ki taraf se yeh bayan Israeli hukkaam ki taraf se is iqdaam ke radd e amal mein jari kya gaya hai jis mein sehyoni hukkaam ney police se Yahoodi abaadkaron ko Qibla e Awwal par dhaavon se rokney aur Talmudi taalimaat ke mutabiq mazhabi rusomaat ki adayigi se mana karne ki wazahat talabb ki hai. Wizarat e Auqaaf ke bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Masjid Aqsa sehyoni riyasat ke kisi qanoon ki paband nahi aur na hi sehyoni riyasat ko Qibla e Awwal par koi ikhtiyar haasil hai. Qibla e Awwal par sirf qanoon Rabbani nafiz hota hai aur wohi qanoon hai jo Masjid e Aqsa ke Islami tshakhus ki baqaa ka zamin hai. Bayan mein khabardaar kya gaya hai ke Masjid e Aqsa ke barey mein sehyoni riyasat ke tamam qawaneen aur faislay na qabil e qubool hain. Unhon ney khabardaar kya hai ke intahaa pasand Yahoodi abaadkaron ko Qibla e Awwal par dhaavon ki ijazat dena mazhabi jung chhaidney ke mutradif hai.
688.title: ”Masjid e Aqsa” mein Yahoodion ko ibadat ka mauqa faraham karne ki saazish

news_detail: Riaz- Wizarat e Tijarat o Sarmaya kaari ney Hajj 1439H ke dauran Makkah Mukramah, Madina Munawwara, Mashaar e Muqaddisa mein tijarati marakiz wo khaney peeney ki ashya farokht karne wali mukhtalif dukanon par 23 hazaar se ziyada chaapay maaray. 1. 3 million ghair qanooni ashya zabt ki gayeen. 1700 se ziyada tijarati khilaaf varziyan record ki gayeen. Wizarat Tijarat ney sarifeen se appeal ki ke woh kisi bhi tijarati khilaaf warzi ke ilm mein aney par pehli fursat mein 1900 par rabita karen ya ” Balagh Tijari” application ya internet par Wizarat ki Website par mutala karne ki zahmat karen.

Makkah Mukramah. Saudi Wizarat Hajj o Umrah ney imsaal Hujjaj ki 746 gumshudaa ashya wapas kar dein. Hujjaj karaam ke mukhtalif maqamat par chhootey barray bag gum kiye hue thay. Unhon ney reports bhi kardi theen. Wizarat e Hajj ney gumshudaa chhootey badey bag 25
August tak wapas kiye thae.

Makkah Mukramah. Imssal Hajj mausam mein shareek judges ney Canada ke aik Haji ke haq mein faisla didya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Canada ke Haji ka qeemti samaan chori hogaya tha. Woh aik mualim se package haasil karkay Hajj kar raha tha. Khaimay mein wapas aaya to pata chala ke uski belt gayab hai. Jis mein 30 hazaar Riyal se ziyada naqad mehfooz thay. Visa Card, Canada ka shanakhti Card aur niji tasaveer bhi rakhi hui theen. Canada ke Haji ney mualim se shikayat ki. CC cameras ki madad se pata lgaliya gaya ke aik safai karkun ney Canadian ki raqam aur card chori kiye hain. Karkun ney apni karstani ki video dekh kar Iqbal e jurm karliya. Judge ney usay ibrtnak saza sunadi .

Makkah Mukramah- 60 sala Bangladeshi Haji ney Makkah Mukramah ke al Musfilah mohalla ke aik hotel mein khudkushi karli. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Bangladeshi Haji hotel ke taharat khanah ki chhat se latka huwa paaya gaya. Dam ghutney aur oxygen munqita hojane par zindagi se haath dho baitha. Makkah Mukramah ki Police ney jaye waqooa ka muaina karkay ibtidayi report mein bataya ke Bangladeshi Haji ke jism par tashadud ka koi nishaan nazar nahi aaya bazahir khudkushi ka case lagta hai. Mutawafi ki na-ash sard khanaay mein mehfooz kar di gayi. Matlooba karwai mukammal karkay tadfeen amal mein layi jaayegi.
576.title: Hajj aur jarayim : Hajj mein 13 lakh ghair qanooni ashya zabt

news_detail: Catholic Mission ke Ruhani Peshwa Pope Francis ney Ireland mein itwaar ko Church ko hila dene walay bachon ke jinsi istehsal ke scandal par Khuda se maafi maangi hai. Pope ney ”khulay aam khoon” ke liye ”Khuda se maafi ke khawastgaar” hue aur ”sachaai aur adal” ki talaash ke liye sakht iqdamaat karne ka mutalibah kya. Ireland mein Pope ke daura ke mauqa par Padrion ki jinsi ziadation ke khilaaf zabardast muzahira kiya gaya. Pope Francis ney daura Ireland mein Padrion ki janib se ziyadati ke shikaar mutasireen se mulaqaat ki. Dublin mein Pope Francis ke aizaz mein istaqbalia ka ihtemaam kya gaya jis mein Irish Wazeer e Azam aur istehsaal ke shikaar baaz afraad ney bhi shirkat ki. Vatican tarjuman ke mutabiq Pope Francis ki Dublin mein ziadati ke shikaar afraad se mulaqaat taqreeban daidh ghantay taq jari rahi. iss mauqa par Pope ney khitaab karte hue kaha ke girja gharon mein bachon se ziadati ke waqeaat sharam naak hain, yeh makrooh aur nafrat amaiz jurm hai aur Church ki intizamia is jurm ko rokney mein nakaam rahi hai. Unhon ney Saint Mary Cathedral Church mein khitaab mein kaha ke agar social media ko aitdaal aur hosh mandi ke sath istemaal kya jaye to yeh faiday mand ho sakta hai. Pope ke daura ke mauqa par ziadati ke waqeat ke khilaaf Dublin mein baaz muqamat par muzahiray bhi kiye gay, baaz muzahireen ney galay mein bachon ke jootay bhi latka rakhay thae. Muzahireen ney istehsaal ke shikaar afraad se yakjehti ka izhaar kya aur Vatican se mutaliba kya ke ziadati mein mulawis Padrion ke khilaaf sakht karwai ki jaye. Wazeh rahay ke Pope Francis haftay ko Ireland ke tareekhi daura par Dublin pahonche hain aur pichlle 39 saal mein Ireland ka daura karne walay woh pehlay Pope hain.
602.title: Padrion ki jinisi ziadation par Pope Francis khuda se maafi ke khawastgar

news_detail: Washington: Americi Sadar Donald Trump apni Company ki ‘housekeeper’ ke muashaqa mein mubtala thae jis se un ka aik bacha bhi hai. Americi nashriyati idaara CNNA ney apni khusoosi report mein inkishaaf kya hai ke Sadar Trump ka apni Company ki housekeeper ke sath 2015 mein muashaqa raha hai jis ke nateeja mein aik bacha ki paidaiesh bhi hui. Iss ghair azdawaji talluq ke gawah Donald Tower ke aik darbaan Dino Sajudin hain. Trump Tower ke darbaan Sajudin ney Americi Sadar ke apni mulazima se muashaqa aur bacha ki paidaiesh se mutaliq maloomat Americi magazine AMI ko farokht ki theen jis mein muashaqa ki poori kahani bayan ki gayi thi. AMI ney aik moahida ke tehat yeh sotry 30 hazaar Americi dollar ke aiwaz kharidi. Moahida ke tehat Sajudin ko kahani kisi aur ko dainay ya kahin aur bayan karne par 1 million Americi dollar ki raqam ada karna ho gi. Magazine AMI ke sarbarah Trump ke dost hain iss liye unhon ney yeh kahani shaya nahi ki jab ke muahiday ke baayis Sajudin kahani ko kisi aur se bayan nahi kar saktay they. Yun yeh scandal dab gaya. Lekin ab Sajudin ke wakeel ney CNN ko bataya hai ke AMI se moahida khatam kar diya gaya jis ke baad un ke muakkil kisi ko bhi yeh sotry farokht karne ya kisi ke bhi samnay bayan karne ke liye azad hain. Wazeh rahay Americi Sadar Donald Trump ko pahelay hi magazine ‘Play Boy’ ki model Karen McDougal aur Stormy Daniels ke sath najaaiz taluqaat rakhnay aur sadaarti intikhab ke dauran dono models ko khamosh rehne ke liye raqum ki adaigi par tafteesh ka saamna hai. Iss muqadma mein Trump ke wakeel Michael kohn pehlay hi wada maaf gawah ban chuke hain.
615.title: Americi Sadar Trump aik aur jinsi scandal mein

news_detail: Jaan ke lale jab pad jate hain to achay achay surma bhi apni hehkidi bhool jatay hain. Aisa hi kuch Nederland ke badbakht qanoon saaz Geert Wilders ke sath huwa aur is ne qatal ki dhamkion aur dosaron ki zindagion ko la-haq khatraat ke sabab paighambar islam ke cartoon ka muqaabla mansookh karne ka elaan kya hai. Geert Wilders ne apne bayan mein kaha hai ke ‘Islami tashadud ke khatraat ke sabab mayen ney faisla kiya hai ke ab cartoon bananay ka muqaabla nahi ho ga. Unho ne aik tehreeri payam mein kaha ke Islami tashadud ke mutasireen ko la-haq khatrah ke paish e nazar unhon ne faisla kya ke cartoon muqaabla ko jari nah rakha jaye. Inhen la-haq khatrah ke paish e nazar 24 ghantay security ghairay mein rehne lagey hain. Paygambar e Islam ke khakay bananay ka yeh muqaabla rawan saal November mein Nederland ki parliman mein Geert Wilders ki siyasi jamaat ke daftar m karne ka elaan kiya gaya tha. Holland mein aik Pakistani nazaad shehri ko hirasat mein le liya gaya jis ne Social Media ‘Facebook’ par Urdu mein payam diya tha jis mein unhon ne gustakhana cartoo
628.title: Jab jaan ke lale padte hain….. Gustakhana Cartoon muqaabla mansookh

news_detail: Pakistan ney security khadshaat aur Governor Nangarhar ke guards ki amlay se haatha payi ke baad Jalalabad mein Consulate band kar diya. wazeer kharija Pakistan Shah Mahmood Qureshi ka kehna hai ke shehrion ke tahaffuz ke liye Jalalabad Consulate band kya gaya. tafseelaat ke mutabiq, security khadshaat aur Afghan hukkaam ki amlay se hathapayi ke baad Pakistan ney Jalalabad mein apna Consulate band kar diya. Wizarat e kharija ney khat likh kar Afghan hukoomat ko aagah kar diya, khat mein wazeh kya gaya hai ke security wajohaat ke baayis Consulate band kya gaya. Pak wizarat e kharija ke mutabiq Afghan soobah Nangarhar ke Governor, Consulate ke umoor mein mudakhlat kar rahay thae, Governor Nangarhar hayaat Allah hayaat 28

August ko guards ke sath Pakistani Consulate mein daakhil hue jahan guards ney amlay se bad zubani aur haatha payi ki, Kabul mein Pakistani sifarat khana ney waqea ka fori notice letay hue Consulate band kar diya. Kabul mein Pakistani aymbisi ney tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke Afghan wizarat kharija ko waqea ki fauri ittila kar ke Governor Nangarhar ki be ja madakhilat se aagah kiya gaya, Afghan hukoomat se Consulate ki Security badhaane ka mutaliba kiya gaya. Pakistani sifarat khana ney Governor Nangarhar ke iqdaam ko vyana convention ki khilaaf warzi qrarde diya aur Afghan hukoomat par wazeh kya gaya hai ke security ki 28 augst ki position par bahaali taq Consulate band rahay ga.
639.title: Pakistan ney Jalalabad mein apna Consulate band kardiya

news_detail: Pakistan ke aik sobai Rukn e Assembly ko Karachi mein sar-e-aam aik shahri ko thapad maarna mahenga pad gaya. Rukn e Sindh Assembly ke Rukn Dr.Imran Ali Shah ke khilaaf na sirf un ki party Tehreek Insaf ney sakht karwai ki balkay Supreme Court ney bhi un par bhaari jurmana aayed kardiya. Dr. Imran Ali Shah ka aik video social media par viral hogaya tha jis mein unhon ney aik gaadi raan ko mehez is liye thapad maaray thay ke woh apni gaadi ko un ki gaadi se agay le jana chahta tha. Supreme Court ney is waqea ka az khud notice letay hue 30 lakh Pakistani rupay Dams Fund mein jama karwney ka hukum diya. Yahi nahi balkay khud un ki Party ney bhi karwai karte hue unhen aik mah ke liye party ki rukniat se moattal kardiya aur un par 5 lakh rupay Aidhi Foundetion ko atiyah dainey aur edhi trust ke sifarish kardah 20 orthopedic mareezon ka ilaaj karwney ki bhi hidayat di hai.
Apologise to that citizen
, tender written and video apology for your unacceptable violent behaviour
RT
: Full video of PTI MPA beating a citizen.
— وزیراعظم عمران خان (@SjPTI)

Chief Justice Pakistan Justice Saqib Nisar ney tehreek insaaf ke Rukn e Sindh Assembly Imran Ali Shah ki janib se is waqea par maafi mangney par shahri tashadud az khud notice ki yaksoi karte hue inhen dem fund mein 30 lakh rupay jama karaney ka hukum day diya hai. Supreme Court Karachi registary mein Chief Justice Pakistan Justice Saqib Nisar ki sarbarahi mein Imran Ali Shah tashadud az khud notice ki samaat hui. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah ki sarzanish karte hue istefsaar kya ke aap ney kya soch kar shahri ko thapad mara, koi janwar ko bhi is tarha nahi maarta, yeh na qabil e maafi jurm hai, hum nahi choden ge, aap awam ke numainday hain toh iss tarha tashadud karen ge, mein bahar aata hon, mujhe maarkar dikhayen. jis par Imran Ali Shah ney izhaar e nadamat karte hue kaha ke sorry sir, mein sharminda hoon. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah se makalimay ke douran remarks diye ke kya sorry,mein ney bachpan mein mulazim ko belt se mara tha, mere waalid ney bhi mujhe do baar sabaq sikahney ke liye mara tha. Chief Justice ney tashadud ka nishana ban’ney walay Dawood Chauhan se istafsaar kya ke izzat ka koi muawza nahi hota, aap muawza le kar baith gaye, aap ney kyun maaf kya, jis par Dawood Chauhan ney kaha ke naamzad Governor mere ghar par chal kar aaye. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah se istafsaar kya ke aap ney kitney thapad maaray thay, Imran Shah ney bataya ke 4 thapad maaray thay, Chief Justice ney remarks diye ke aap ko bhi sar-e-aam isi tarha 4 thapad maaray jayen ge. Dawood Chauhan ney adalat ke rubaroo kaha ke mujh par paisey lene ka ilzaam lagaya gaya, Imran Shah par aik saal tak badi gaadi par pabandi aayed ki jaye, woh bhi hamari tarha safar karen, Dawood Chauhan ke betay ney jazbati hokar kaha ke PTI ki social media team ney hamaray khilaaf muhim chalayee, 3 social media mimbraan ney hamari tazheek ki, inhen kam az kam awaami numainda nahi rehna chahiye. Chief Justice ney remarks diye ke woh az khud karwai karte hue kisi par ahsaan nahi kar rahay hain, is tarha ke log firaon ban jatay hain, woh un ko sabaq sikhana chahtay hain. yeh barri gaari ke baghair nahi reh payen ge. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah ko mukhatib karte hue remarks diye ke logon ki izzat aur ehtram karna sikho, koi khayaal karo, logon ki tazheek karte ho, sar-e aam maffi mango. Adalti hukum par Imran Shah ney Dawwod Chauhan se maafi mangi aur usay galaay lagaya. Chief Justice ney Imran Ali Shah ki janib se maafi mangney par 30 lakh rupay Dams Fund mein jama karaney ka hukum dete hue maamla nimta diya.
654.title: Shahri ko thapad marna Pakistan ke Rukn e Assembly ko mahenga pad gya

news_detail: Amrici hukoomat ney Falastini panah gazinon ki behbood ke liye qaayim kardah UNO ki ‘Relief and Works Agency’ (UNRWA) ki maali imdaad mukammal taur par khatam kar di hai. Jummay ke roz Amrici hukoomat ke aik zimma daar zariya ney bataya ke Sadar Donald Trump ke hukum par Falasteeni panah gazin agency ‘UNRWA’ ki maali imdaad mukammal taur par band kar di gayi hai. Khayaal rahay ke rawan saal January mein Amrici hukoomat ney Falastini panah gazinon ko di jaany wali salana imdaad mein 65 million dollar ki kami karte hue imdadi raqam 60 million dollar tak mehdood kar di thi. America ki taraf se ‘UNRWA’ ki imdaad khatam kiye jaany ke nateeja mein imdadi agency ko shadeed dhakka puhanche ga kayunkay yeh idaara Jordan, Lebanon, Syria South Jordan aur Gaza ki patti mein lakhoon Falasteeni panah gazinon ki kifalat karta hai. Falasteeni panah gazinon ki imdaad khatam karne ka Amrici iqdaam apni noiyat ka naya elaan nahi. Aik hafta peshtar Amrici hukoomat ney Falasteeni Authority ko Gaza aur garbh Urdan mein shshri galah behbod ke liye di jaany wali 20 crore dollar ki imdaad bhi rok di thi. Amrici intizamia ki taraf se aqwam mutahidda ke idaara ‘UNRWA’ par shadeed tanqeed ki jati rahi hai. Amrici qaumi salamti ke musheer John Bolton is tanqeed mein paish rahay hain. Doosri janib Falasteeni qayadat ney America ki taraf se imdaad band kiye jaany ko inteqami siyasat qarar diya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke flstinyon ki imdaad is liye band ki gayi kyunkay hum ney beet al quds ko Israel ka da-rul-hakoomat tasleem karne ke Amrici elaan ko mustard kardiya tha. Darien asna German wazeer kharja  Heiko Maas ney kaha hai ke un ka Mulk ‘UNRWA’ki maali muawinat mein izafah kere ga. Un ka kehna tha ke maujooda halaat mein Falasteeni panah gazinon ki imdaad rokna khitta ko aik nayi kasheedgi se dochar karna aur ghair yakeeni kaifiyat paida karna hai.
666.title: America ne UNWRA ki imdaad band kar di

news_detail: Saudi wizarat Hajj o Umra ney Jaria saal Umra mausam safar ke bajaye 1

Mohram 1440h se hi shuru karne ka faisla karliya. Umra visa ki ijrayi ki karwai shuru kar di gayi hai. Wizarat Hajj o Umra ne yeh ittela dete huwe wazeh kiya ke Saudi Vision 2030 ke tahet taye kiya gaya tha ke salana 30 million moutamareen arz e muqaddas aaya karen. Is maqsad ki takmeel ke liye moutamareen ko jumla saholaten faraham karne ka bandobast kiya jaye ga. Saudi wizarat Hajj o Umra ka kehna hai ke wizarat e kharija ke taawun o ishterak se Umra Visa ki Ijrayi ka amal shuru kardiya gaya hai. Vision 2030 ke mutabiq khariji moutamareen ki tadaad 2022 tak 15 million aur 2030 tak 30 million tak pahonch jaye gi jabkay 2030 mein Hujjaj ki tadaad 4.5 million tak badha di jaye gi. 1439h ke dauran baironi Mumalik se 70 lakh se ziyada moutamareen arz e muqaddas aeye. Naib wazeer Hajj o Umra abdalftah Mushat ne bataya ke Hajj o Umra karwai ka bunyadi dhancha o moutamareen ko paish ki jaaney wali khidmaat ka silsila az sar e no muratab kiya gaya hai. Iss baat ka ehtemaam kiya ja raha hai ke na sirf Umra khidmaat paish ki jayen balkay khidmaat ki tayari bhi ki jaye. Mushat ne bataya ke hawai adon par moutamareen ki karwai 30 se 40 minute ke bajaye chand lamhoon mein mukammal karli jaye gi. Iss hawala se matlooba iqdamaat karliye gaye hain. Iss ka wada Saudi vision 2030 mein kiya gaya tha. Guzashita baras Hujjaj ki immigration aur Custom ki karwai mehdood peymane par un ke Mulk hi mein anjaam dainay ka tajruba kiya gaya tha. Imsal is ka daira wasee kardiya gaya hai.
676.title: Naye Umra Visa ki ijrayi

news_detail: Brazil ke bartari rakhnay walay sadaarti umeed waar Jaer Bolsonaro ko jin par jaan lewa qatilana hamla hwa tha Sao Paulo ke Albert Einstein Israelite Hospatal muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Muqami media ke mutabiq un par aik rally ke dauran chaako se waar karkay shadeed zakhmi kardiya gaya. Mulk ki junoob mashriqi riyasat Minas Gerais ke Juiz de Fora city mein intikhabi muhim ke dauran chaako ke hamla se right wing ke umeedwaar Bolsonaro shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Hamla se un ke pait aur chhaati par shadeed zakham aeye hain. Sadarati umeedwaar ke betay Flavio Bolsonaro ne apne waalid ke zakhamo ko shadeed tareen qarar daitay hue apne tweet paigham mein kaha hai ke 60 sala sadaarti umeed waar ke jigar aur phephday shadeed zakhmi honay se badi miqdaar mein khoon bahe gaya hai. Surgery karne walay Dr. Luiz Henrique Borsatone bataya ke inhen mukammal sehat yab honay ke liye kam az kam do mah darkaar hon ge. Unhen androoni taur par gaheri chouten aayi hain jis ke baayis un ki jaan ko khatrah la-haq hogaya tha. Woh apni intikhabi muhim ke dauran apne haamion mein ghiray hue thae ke un ke shikam ke nichle hissa par chaako se hamla kiya gaya. Hamla aawar ko fauri giraftar karliya gaya. Latin America ke baday malik Brazil mein sadaarti intikhabaat 7
October ko munaqqid honge.
685.title: Brazil ke Sadarati umeedwaar par jaan lewa hamla

news_detail: Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Pakistan  Nawaz Sharif ki ahliya Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ka London mein inteqaal hogaya. Guzishta raat un ki haalat aik baar phir intehai tashweesh-naak ho gayi thi jis ke baad unhen aik martaba phir ventilator par muntaqil kar diya gaya tha. Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke lungs ney kaam karna chodh diya tha jis ke baad un ki haalat tashweesh naak batayi jati thi aur unhen ventilator par muntaqil kar diya gaya tha. Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Shahbaz Shareef ney Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal ki tasdeeq kar di hai aur kaha hai ke un ki maiyat Pakistan laane ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Hussain Nawaz ney bhi apni walida ke inteqaal ki tasdeeq ki hai taham abhi hatmi tur par yeh nahi kaha ja sakta ke woh un ki maiyat ke sath Pakistan aa saken ge ya nahi. 68 sala Begum Kulsoom Nawaz Cancer ke aarzah mein mubtala theen aur June se London ke Harley Street Cilinic mein zair e ilaaj theen. April 1971 mein un ki Nawaz Shareef se Shaadi huwi thi. Nawaz Shareef, un ki Dukhtar Maryam aur daamaad Captain (Rtd) Mohammad Safdar Adalat e ehatasab ki janib se July mein corruption ke aik case mein di gayi saza par Rawalpindi mein Adiala jail mein qaid ki saza kaat rahay hain. Nawaz Shareef, Maryam aur Mohammad Safdar ko jail mein Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal se aagah kardiya gaya hai. Wazeer e Azam Pakistan Imran Khan ney Begum Kulsoom ke inteqaal par izhaar e  taaziyat kiya hai. Aik bayan mein unhon ney kaha ke qanoon ke mutabiq Kulsoom ke arkaan khandan aur wirsaa ko tamam saholaten faraham ki jayen gi. Wazeer e Azam ney London mein Pakistani High Commission ko hidaayat di ke marhomah ke arkaan e khandan ko tamam darkaar saholaten baham pahonchai jayen. Un ke pasmandgan mein shohar aur do ladke aur do ladkiyan Hasan, Hussain , Maryam aur Asma hain.
699.title: Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ka London mein inteqaal

news_detail: Denmark mein Police ne apni aik khatoon ahelkaar ke khilaaf tahqiqaat shuru kar di hai. Iss khatoon Police ahelkaar ka qusoor yeh hai ke iss ne dar-ul-hukoomat Copenhagenmein guzishta mah chehray ke naqaab par Hukoomat ki janib se aayed kardah pabandi ke khilaaf ehtajaji muzahira ke dauran insani hamdardi ke jazbay se maghloob hokar aik naqaab posh khatoon ko galay se laga liya tha. Bartanwi khabar rasan agency Reuters ke photo grapher ne 1

August ko paish aaye is waqeye ki tasaveer bana li theen. Un mein naqaab posh khatoon Denmark bhar mein awaami muqamat par Muslim khawateen ke chehray ke naqaab odhanay par aayed kardah pabandi ke khilaaf ehtijaj ke dauran mein rooti hui nazar aa rahi theen aur unhein is khatoon ahelkaar ne bazahir dilaasa dainay ki koshish ki thi. Mulk ki hukumraan liberal jamaat Venstre ke aik leader Marks Kenth ka kahna hai ke ”iss tasweer ne Police ko ghair raza karana taur par aik bohat hi hassas noiyat ki siyasi bshes mein ulajhney par majaboor kardiya hai”. Un sahib aur dosray naaqideen ne Police ki tavajjoh Social Media par virel honay wali un tasaveer ki janib dilae thi aur uss khatoon ahelkaar ke khilaaf tahqiqaat ka mutalba kya tha. Unn ka kahna hai ke ”Police ka kaam qanoon ka nifaz hai, yeh nahi ke woh qanoon ki mukhalifat karne walon hi ke galay milna shuru hojaye” .
594.title: Danish khatoon Police ahelkaar ke khilaaf ba-hijab khatoon se galay milnay ki tahqiqaat

news_detail: Riyadh. Saudi Majlis e Shoora ne budh ke ijlaas mein khawateen ko judge bananay aur baghair Mehram unhen safar karne ki ijazat se mutaliqa sifarishaat mustard kar dein. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Rukn e shoora Iqbal Darindari ne sifarish paish karkay mutalba kya tha ke baaligh khawateen ko apne sarparast ki ijazat ke baghair safar ki ijazat di jaye. Kuch arsay qabal iss qisam ki sifarish par kaafi hungama hwa tha. Garma garam bahes hui thi taham voting nahi hui thi. Budh ko ijlaas mein bahas hui. Security Committee ne sifarish mustard kar di. muaqqaf yeh apnaya gaya ke iss sifarish ka asal hadaf iss Shahi farmaan ke ijra ke baad khud bakhud poora hochuka hai jis mein unhon ne tamam sarkari idaroon ko takeed ki hai ke koi bhi khidmat paish karte ya khusoosi karwai mukammal karte waqt sarparast ki manzoori ka khawateen se mutalba na kya jaye. Jahan tak baghair ijazat namay ke khawateen ke safar ki karwai ka maamla hai toh iss ka talluq sirf mahakuma Passport ya wizarat r dakhila se nahi balkay un ke sath wizarat e mehnat o samaji farogh jaisay mutaliqa idaron se bhi hai. agar mehakma passport ko kisi adalat se yeh hidayat mausool hogi ke khatoon safar karne ki majaz nahi ya sarparast ki ijazat ke baghair passport jari karanay ya tausee karanay ki majaz nahi to aisi soorat mein mahakuma passport is hidayat par fauri tameel karega lehaza wizarat dakhila se iss sifarish ka koi lena dena nahi. Security Committee ke samnay baghair Mehram ke khawateen ko safar ki ijazat dainay ki sifarish ka juwaz yeh paish kya gaya ke khawateen par iss qisam ki pabandi mard o zan ke darmiyan barabari aur insaaf par qaayim Islami Shariat ke bunyadi usoolon ke manafi hai. Alawa azeen iss qisam ki pabandi laganay se khawateen ki qanooni ahliat mutasir hoti hai. Kisi ko bhi khawateen par apni marzi thopne ya uskay saath na samajh jaisay insaan wala maamla karne ka ikhtiyar nahi ya tafreeq ki koi bhi shakal apnane ka kisi ko haq nahi jabkay sarparast ki ijazat se khawateen ke safar ko bandhna Saudi nizaam e hukoomat ke manshoor ke bhi manafi hai. Manshoor mein huqooq o faraiz ke hawalay se mard o zan ke darmiyan koi farq nahi kya gaya. Itna hi nahi balkay manshoor ki dafaa 36 mein yeh baat wazeh kar di gayi hai ke ”kisi bhi shakhs ke tasaruffaat par qaid o band lagana ya usay hawalaat ya jail mein band karna kisi ka haq nahi. Aisa bahukum e qanoon hi mumkin hoga. Iss se qabl Saudi khawateen ko Judge ke mansab par faayez karne se mutaliq qarardad ke draft ke haq mein 53 arkaan e shoora ne apna faisla dediya. Draft ki manzoori ke liye kam az kam 76 arkaan ki manzoori laazmi hai. Yeh allag baat hai ke Shoora ke maatahet Islami wo Adalati umoor ki Committee ne sharai aur qanooni ahliat rakhnay wali khawateen ko adalati manasab par sarfraz kiye jaaane ki sifarish mustarad kar rakhi hai. Lateefa al Shalan, Ataa al Sabitee aur Faisal al Fazil ne sifarish paish ki thi. Al Fazil aur al Shalan ne kaha ke sifarish ke haq mein 53 votes ka aana tawaquaat se baala tar hai. Arkaan e Shoora ki voting ka nateeja tawajjuh talab raha. Tawaqqa se kahin ziyada vote aeye. Ab hum kamyaabi ke kaafi qareeb pahonch gaye hain.
608.title: Saudi Majlis e Shoora: Baghair Mehram safar ki sifarishaat mustard

news_detail: Aqwam e Mutahidda mein Insani Huqooq ki Council ney Myanmar ke hawala se aik team tashkeel dainay ki manzoori dae di hai. Yeh team 2011 se Myanmar mein murtakib jarayim ke baarey mein shawahid ikathay kere gi. Un shawahid ko Mulk mein insani huqooq ki paamali karne walay anasir ke taqub mein istemaal kya ja sakta hai. Iss silsila mein jumaraat ke roz 47 arkaan par mushtamil Insani Huqooq ki Council mein raye shumari hui. Council ke 35 arkaan ney aik “khud mukhtaar mechanism” tashkeel dainay ke haq mein aur 3 ney mukhalifat mein vote diya. Iss ka maqsad Council ki janib se haqayiq jan-nay walay Commission ko paya takmeel tak pahunchana hai. Commission ke barkhilaf mazkoorah mechanism ke paas aisay shawahid hon ge jin ko fouj daari noiyat ke ilzamaat ki pairwi mein istemaal kya ja sakay ga. Nai team ki tashkeel ke liye qarar daad Austria ke zair e qayadat Europi union aur Pakistan ke zair e qayadat Islami taawun tanzeem ki janib se mushtarka taur par paish ki gayi. China, Borundii aur Philippines ney qarar daad ki mukhalfat ki jab ke saat mumalik ney voting mein hssh nahi liya. Nai team apne kaam ka aaghaz aindah chand mah mein kar dae gi.Iss douran August 2017 mein Myanmar mein shuru honay walay bharpoor Security Operation ka jaayiza liya jaye ga. Insani huqooq ki jamaaton ka kahna hai ke is operation ke nateeja mein hazaron afraad apni jaanun se haath dho baithy aur lakhoon Rohingya Musalman Bangladesh naqal e makani kar gay. geneva mein Myanmar ke safeer Kyaw Moe Tun ney is qarardad ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya. Unhon ney kaha ke qarardad ke liye guzishta mah haqayiq jan-nay walay Commission ki janib se jari maloomat par inhisaar kya gaya, un mein bahut si baatien aisi theen jin ki tasdeeq nahi ho saki. Nai qarardad ke zareya is baat ke liye raah hamwar ho gi ke United Nations, Myanmar mein jarayim ke baarey mein saboot jama karne ke wastay lakhoon dollar mukhtas kare. UN ke tahqeeq karon ke mutabiq yeh jarayim ijtimai nasal kushi aur deegar jungi jarayim ki satah tak pahonch gay thae. Ghalib gumaan hai ke is faisla ke nateeja mein Myanmar mein askari qayadat par dabaaoo mein izafah ho ga aur woh jungi jarayim ke sabab tehqiqaat ka hisssah ban jayen ge. Lehaza yeh shaksiaat giraftari ke imkaan ke khauf se Myanmar ke bahar safar karne se pahlay sochnay par majboor ho jayen gi. Mahireen ney Myanmar ki hukoomat ke jarayim par bain al aqwami adalat ke nazarsani karne ke imkaan par shukook ka izhaar kya hai. Mahireen ke nazdeek yeh iqdaam aalmi salamati Council ki manzoori ke sath mashroot hai jahan China usay veto karne ka haq mehfooz rakhta hai.
621.title: Myanmar jarayim ke saboot jama karne UN ki Team

news_detail: Iran ki aik Inqilab Adalat ki janib se’ fasaad fi al arz’ ke ilzaam mein teen karobari shaksiaat ko sazae maut aur badunwani ke ilzaam mein 32 ko 10 se 20 saal tak qaid ki sazayen sunai gayi hain. Irani Judicial Council ke tarjuman Ghulam Hussain Mohsini Ayji ne khabar rasan idaray ‘Irna’ se baat karte hue kaha ke inqilab adalat ki taraf se mulzimaan ko di gayi sazaon ki tauseeq ke liye cases Supreme Court ko irsaal kiye gaye hain. khayaal rahay ke Iran mein iqtisadi adalatein Supreme leader ki ijazat se Judicial Council ke Chairman ki taraf se banai gayi hain. yeh adaltin do mah qabal irani currency ki achanak giravt ke baad bana gayi theen. Insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ne Iran mein mulzimaan ko andha dhund phansi aur qaid ki sazaon par Irani iqtedaar ko shadeed tanqeed ka nishana banaya hai. Haal hi mein Irani Prosecutor General Abbas Jaffer Doulatabadi ne kaha tha ke currency ke sath utaarcharhhao ke ilzaam mein 53 afraad ko hirasat mein liya gaya tha .
634.title: Iran mein teen taajiron ko sazae maut, 32 ko qaid

news_detail: Israeli Parliament (Knesset) ki janib se rawan saal manzoor kardah naam nihaad  ‘Yahodi Qoumiyat’ ke qanoon ke khilaaf somwaar ko maqboza maghribi kinare aur androon Palestine mein mukammal hadtaal ki gayi. Hadtaal ke mauqa aur talimi aur karobari idaray band rahay aur sadkon par traffic na honay ke barabar thi. Khayaal rahay ke Israel ney chand mah qabal aik naya qanoon manzoor kiya tha jis ke tahet sehyoni riyasat ko poori duniya ke Yahudion ka ‘Qaumi Watan’ qarar diya gaya tha. Falasteeni awam aur aalami satah par Israel ke is mutanazia qanoon ke khilaaf sakht ehtejaj kiya gaya Jordon River ke maghribi kinare, shumali aur junoobi Falasteeni ilaaqon mein bhi hadtaal ki gayi. Iss mauqa par sadkon par traffic na honey ke barabar thi jab ke karobari tabqa ney bhi hadtaal mein bharpoor sath diya. School, jamiyaat aur deegar aawami idaray band rahay. Naqideen aur insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ka kahna hai ke ‘Yahoodi Qoumiyat’ ka qanoon sehyoni riyasat ko nasal parast bananey ki taraf aik nayi paishraft saabit hoga aur is qanoon par amal daari se Israel mein abad ghair Yahoodi aqwam ke bunyadi haqooq pamaal karne ki raah hamwar hogi. Taham Israeli hukoomat ka muaqqaf hai ke woh mojooda Israeli tshkhs ko bahaal karne ke liye is qanoon ki manzoori tak pohanchi. Albata naqideen usay arab aqliat ke khilaaf nasal parasti aur jamhoori aqdaar ki nafi ka qanoon qarar dete hain.
647.title: Israel ke ‘Qoumiyat ka Qanoon’ ke khilaaf Palestine mein aam hadtaal

news_detail: Sweden ki aik adalat ney Nobel Academy mein jinsi harasani aur asmat raizi ke scandal ke markazi kirdaar French citizen Jean-Claude Arnault ko qusoorwaar qarar dey kar 2 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. Stockholme ki zilai adalat ke judge ney apne faisla mein kaha hai ke ”accused asmat raizi ka qusoorwaar qarar paaya gaya hai. Is ney 5
aur 6

October 2011 ki darmiyani shab is jurm ka irtikaab kiya tha. Iss ko 2 saal qaid ki saza ka hukum diya jata hai. Majrooh fareeq ke nuqsaan ka azaala kardiya gaya hai”. Stockholm ke aik cultural center ke sarbarah Jean-Claude Arnault ke khilaaf 18 aurton ney jinsi hamlon aur harasani ke ilzamaat ayed kiye thea. Yeh sahib aik Maroof saqafati shakhsiyat hain aur Sweden ki Nobel Academy se wabasta thae. Aik qanooni firm ko un sahib ke Academy par asraat ki tehqiqaat ke liye kaha gaya tha. Adalat ney un mein se aik aurat ke ilzaam par mulzim ko mujrim qarar diya hai. Mr. Claud ke khilaaf guzishta saal aurton ko jinsi tor par harasan karne aur un par jinsi hamlon ke ilzamaat manzar-e-aam par aanay ke baad Nobel inaam baraye adab ke teen judge sahibaan apne ohdon se mustafi hogaye thae. Wazeh rahay ke 18 arkaan par mushtamil Nobel Committee mein shaamil judge sahiban ka sharayet ke tahyat taqarrur kiya jata hai aur fanni taur par unhein committee ko khairbaad kehney ki ijazat nahi hoti hai. 1989 mein teen Judges ney Academy se mustafi honey ka elaan kar diya tha aur unhon ney yeh faisla Academy ki janib se Iran ke rehbar e inqilab Ayat Allah rooh Allah khmini ki muzammat mein bayan jari nah karne par kiya tha lekin Academy ney un ka istifa Manzoor nahi kiya tha. Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini ney tab tauheen aamaiz kitaab ” shaytani ayaat” ke musannif Salman Rushdi ke khilaaf qatal ka Fatwa jari kiya tha.
660.title: Nobel Academy mein asmat raizi, mulzim ko 2 saal ki saza

news_detail: Iraqi Parliament ki janib se Barham Saleh ko sadar muntakhib kiye janey ke chand ghantay baad Adel Abdulmahdi ko wazeer e azam muqarrar karte huwe inhen cabinet tashkeel dainey ki dawat di gayi hai. 76 sala Abdul Mahdi Brijwazia khandan se talluq rakhtay hain. Un ka khandan maazi mein siyasat mein sargaram raha hai. Un ke waalid Iraq ke Shah Faisal awwal ke daur mein wazeer aur Parliament ke rukn bhi rah chuke hain. Abdul Mahdi ney France , Syria aur Lebanon mein taleemi safar kya. Apne is safar mein unhon ney mukhtalif nazriaat ka bhi mutaleya kiya. Nationalism, ishtirakiat aur Islami afkaar un ke mutalea mein rahay. Sabiq wazeer e azam Ayaad Alavi ke daur mein woh wazeer khazana ke ohde par fayez rah chuke hain jab ke sadar Jalal Taliban ke sath naib sadar ke ohde par bhi fayez rahay magar kuch arsa baad ikhtelafat ki binaa par istefa dey diya tha. Iraqi dastoor ke mutabiq Adel Abdul Mahdi 30 din tak apni Cabinet tashkeel den ge jisay manzoori ke liye Parliament mein paish kiya jaye ga. Siyasi taur par Abdul Mahdi Iran ke haami Supreme Islami Council se talluq rakhtay hain taham un ke Amrici democrates rehnumaon ke sath bhi achay taluqaat qaim hain.
670.title: Adel Abdul Mahdi Iraq ke Wazeer e Azam muqarrar

news_detail: Madinah Munawwara. Punjab Pakistan ke shahar Gujrat ki khatoon Naseem Akhtar ney duniya bhar mein apni noiyat ka Quran pak ka munfarid nuskha Madinah Munawwara ko tohfa ke taur par paish kar diya. Yeh Quran pak ka aisa nuskha hai jisay na to qalam se likha gaya hai na is ki tayari mein roshnayee istemaal huwi hai aur na hi koi aur tehreeri maadah istemaal kiya gaya hai. Quran e pak ka yeh kaamil nuskha Pakistan ki Naseem Akhtar ney 35 baras mein tayyar kiya. Unhon ney 1987 mein kapdey par kadhai ke zareya ayaat likhna shuru kiya tha aur 2018 mein usay mukammal kiya. Unhon ney Quran pak ka aik aik harf bawazu rah kar raat ke pichlle pehar mein tayyar kiya. Unhon ney Hajj ke mauqa par Quran pak ka yeh nuskha Madinah Munawwara ke al Quran alkarim ajaayeb ghar ko tohfay ke taur par paish kiya. Zimma daraan ney geherai aur geerai se jayiza le kar usay Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakh diya. Qareeb se dekhney par hi pata chalta hai ke Quran kareem haath se nahi balkay kapdey par kadhai ke zariye tayyar kiya gaya hai. Naseem Akhtar ke haath se kapdey par kadhai se likhe gaye Quran Majeed ki 10 volumes hain aur har volume mein Quran e Majeed ke teen sepaare hain. Naseem Akhtar ka kahna hai ke unhen khushi hai ke unhon ney 32 saal qabl jis muqaddas kaam ka beda uthaya tha woh mukammal kar liya. Unhon ney kaha ‘mein ney 32 saal bawazo waqt guzaraa. Jab mein Quran e Majeed haath se kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhna shuru kiya to yahi socha tha ke Quran Majeed ke iss naadir nuskha ko mein Madinah shareef ki library mein le kar jaoongi’. Aur un ka yeh khawab poora hogaya. Naseem Akhtar ney bataya ke woh Quran e Majeed jis kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhtien woh kapda khusoosi taur par Faisalabad se mangwaati theen. Naseem Akhtar ney daawa kiya ke Quran e Majeed ka aisa nuskha duniya bhar mein kahin bhi maujood nahi lehaza un ka yeh karnaama Guinness Book of World Records mein shaamil kiya jaye. Kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhe gaye Quran Majeed ka kal wazan 55 kilo gram hai jabkay is ki har jald ki 22 inch lambai aur 15 inch choraai hai. Quran Majeed ke kal safhaat 724 hain jabkay kadhai ke liye kalay aur gulaabii rang ke dhaagay ke 84 dabbay istemaal kiye gaye hain.
677.title: Kapdey par kadhai ka Quran pak, nuskha ab al- Quran al Karim Museum ki zeenat

news_detail: South Korea ki aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Lee Myung-Bak ko badunwani ke ilzaam mein 15 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. Sabiq hukoomati ohdedaron ko sazayen sunaye jaaney ka yeh naya waqea hai. Maujooda hukoomat ki taraf se security affairs mein ghaflat baratney par sabiq hukkaam ko qaid aur jurmanon ki sazayen sunai jati rahi hain. Central Seol mein qayim aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Lee ko rishwat lainey aur dhoka dahi samait kayi dosray ilzamaat mein qaid ki saza sunai. Inhen qaid ke sath 13 arab von yani 1 crore 15 lakh dollar ka jurmana bhi ayed kiya gaya hai. Sabiq sadar ki adalti karwai barah e raast Tv par nashar ki gayi aur kaha gaya ke mulzim ko sakht tareen saza di jaye gi. Taham kharabi sehat ki binaa par Lee khud wahan mojood nahi thay. South Korea ke sabiq sadar par rawan saal 16

April ko rishwat, dhoka dahi aur ohda ke najaaiz istemaal par fard jurm Ayad ki gayi thi. South Korea ki adalat ka kehna hai ke gariyon ke spear parts tayyar karne wali aik company “Das” sabiq sadar ki malkiyat hai taham Lee ka daawa hai ke woh company un ke bhai ki hai. Adalat ka kehna hai ke sabiq sadar ney dhoka dahi se company ko 24 Arab von ka fayedah pohanchaya tha.
690.title: Sabiq Sadar South Korea ko 15 saal ki saza

news_detail: England mein hakoomati ohdedaron aur aam shehrion ne 1 shakhs ka pata chalaya hai jis ney khud ko musalsal 40 saal se aik jhonpdi mein muqeed kar rakha tha. Bartanwi hakkaam ney mazkoorah shakhs ki shanakht nahi ki taham un ka kahna hai jhonpdi se nikalay jane walay shakhs ne musalsal 40 saal isi jagah zindagi guzari. Iss jhonpdi ki lambai pauney do meter 6 foot aur choraai pauney 2 meter hai. Iss shakhs ki umar 58 saal bataaye jati hai. Jab woh iss jhonpdi mein aaya to uss waqt is ki umar 18 saal thi. Mazkoorah jhonpdi shumal maghribi England mein waqay’ Cambera’ shehar ke nawahi ilaqa’ Carlisle’ mein waqay hai. Wahan se milney walay shakhs ko tibbi muaney ke liye Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya hai. Usay zaroori jismani aur nafsiati muawnat faraham ki ja rahi hai. Muqami akhbarat ke zareya se pata chala hai ke police ney aik 79 sala shakhs ko giraftar kiya hai jis par aik 58 sala shakhs ko ghulam bananey ka shuba zahir kiya gaya hai.
703.title: England mein ek shakhs 40 saal se jhonpdi mein qaid

news_detail: Amrici sadar Donal Trump ke qanooni musheer Rudy Giuliani ke mutabiq” agar hum yeh kahin ke Irani nizaam ka ekhtataam qareeb hai to yeh haqeeqat se baeed ho ga “. unhon neh kaha ke Tehran mein nizaam ka suqoot aik saal ke douran waqay ho jaye ga. Hafta ke roz “Mujahideen Khalq ” ke zair qayadat Irani qaumi council baraye muzahmat ki conference se khitaab karte hue Giuliani ka kehna tha ke “Iran mein muzahireen ke khilaaf crack down aur tashadud aur halakaton ki tadaad yeh bawar karati hai ke azadi bohat qareeb hai aur is nizaam ka suqoot na Guzir hai “.  Giuliani ke mutabiq 2009 hamza mein aisa ho sakta tha taham Amrici hukoomat aas waqt Irani awam ke ehtijaj ke sath nahi khari hui, taham ab Amrici sadar ki janib se Iran mein muzahireen ke liye tayeed ka izhaar kya gaya hai. Trump ke musheer neh Europi mumalik ko bhi tanqeed ka nishana banaya jinhon neh Irani nizaam ke sath tijarti aur iqtisadi taluqaat barqarar rakhay hue hain.  Giuliani ke mutabiq Europi mumalik aisay nizaam ko raqum ki adaigi kar rahay hain jo khawateen aur bachon ko haqooq se mahroom karta hai aur logon ko qatal kar raha hai mehez is vaastaa ke aan ka nazriya ya mazhabi pas manzar mukhtalif hai.  Giuliani neh Irani nizaam ke sath kaam karne wali companiyon ke boycott aur Tehran par aed pabandiyan sakht karne ka mutalba kya. Trump ke musheer neh Amrici sadar ke Irani johri moahida se alahdgi ikhtiyar karne ke faisla ko saraha.  Giuliani neh is moahida ko khatarnaak qarar dete hue kaha ke Trump yeh bawar kara chuke hain ke woh duniya mein dehshat gardi ki sab se barri sarparast riyasat ke sath har gaz mamlaat nahi karen ge.  Giuliani ke nazdeek Iran mein aik ghair johri aur jamhoori riyasat tashkeel dainay ke liye mutabadil mojood hai jo insani haqooq ka ehtram kere aur aqliton ke haqooq ka tahaffuz kere. unhon neh zor diya ke haliya ehtijaj 2009 hamza se mukhtalif hain kyun ke is martaba muzahirey poooray Iran mein ho rahay hain jin mein har tabqa shaamil hai. apni guftagu ke ekhtataam par Trump ke musheer neh kaha ke” Iran mein ab tabdeeli ka waqt aa chuka hai. mein umeed karta hon ke aindah baras yeh conference Tehran mein ho gi”.

Dusri janib Amrici aur arab wafood neh Irani oppostion ki conference ke sath izhaar yak jehti karte hue mutalba kiya hai ke khatta mein Irani nizaam ka muqaabla bain al aqwami tor se kya jaye. Donal Trump ke strategic musheer Newt Gingrich neh –apne khitaab mein kaha ke “Ali Khamenei ka nizaam sabiq Soviet Union se kahin ziyada kamzor hai. haliya ehtajaji silsilay ke ilawa Iran mein shehrion ki muashi haalat neh Irani nizaam ko kamzor karna shuru kar diya hai “. idhar France mein Yemen ke safeer Riaz yasin neh yemeni sadar Abdul Rabba Mansoor Hadi ki janib se Irani awam ko salam paish karte hue kaha hai ke” hum Irani nizaam ki khuli aur dshmnanh mdakhlton par rokkk laganay ke liye mil kar kaam karen ge jis neh tamam hado ko paar kar liya hai”
540.title: Saal bhar ke andar Irani nizaam ka suqoot ho jaye ga: Musheer Trump

news_detail: Agar aap Dubai mein kisi ki harkaat o saknaat ko camera ki aankh mein band karna chahtay hain to aisa mat karen. dosaron ki video ya tasweer kashi karna niji umoor mein mudakhlat karne ke mutradif hai aur nateeja mein 1,50,000 taa 5,00,000 darham yani 28 lakh rupay taa 93 lakh rupay jurmana ada karna hoga, alawa azeen aik saal qaid ki saza hogi. Dubai police ney is jurm mein 1 shakhs ko girftar bhi kar liya hai. Dubai police ney jummay ki shaam roads and tansport athartiz ( are tea ae ) kstmr care center par rotay hue shakhs ki video bananay par 1 shakhs ko girftar karliya, mulzim ney video samaji rabton ki Websites par bhi jari kar di thi jo dekhte hi dekhte vayrl hogayi. are tea ae ney apni tweets mein likha ke video mein nazar anay wala rota sun-hwa shakhs cars taxi ka mulazim nahi aur na hi is ke naam par koi bohat barray jrmane registered hain. mazkoorah shakhs apne rishta daar par honay walay 20 hazaar rupay dirham ke jurmana ki maloomat lainay head quarters aaya thajo cars taxi frnchayz ka driver tha, are tea ae ke mutabiq tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain ke driver par jurmana kyun kya gaya. are tea ae ney kaha ke hum ney mutaliqa hakkaam par zor diya hai ke jis shakhs ney video banakar social media par jari ki is ke khilaaf qanooni karwai ki jaye. Dubai police ney bhi awam ko khabardaar kya hai ke baghair ijazat kisi bhi shakhs ki tasweer ya video nah banayen kyunkay aisa karna qanonan jurm hai. cyber crime ke 2012 ke Federal Decre Law number 5 ke mutabiq jo bhi shakhs kisi aur ke niji maamla mein dakhal andazi kere ga usay aik laakh pachaas hazaar se 5 lakh darham tak ke barray jrmane ka saamna karna parsakta hai jabkay is ke sath aik saal qaid ki saza bhi di ja sakti hai
557.title: Dubai mein baghair ijazat video ya tasweer banana jurm qarar

news_detail: Japan ke shenshah Akihitoki tabiyat baggar gayi, jis ke baad tamam masrofiyat mansookh kar di gayi hain, Shahi hakkaam ke mutabiq Akihitoki sehat ko monitor kya ja raha hai. shenshah ko dimaghi nuqs dam ke bayes ghabrahat aur matli honay lagi. yeh sorat e haal dimagh ko khatir khuwa khoo noon nah pounchanay ke baais paish aati hai. japani Shahi khandan ke sarbarah 84 sala Akihitobemaar ho gay hain, Shahi khandan ke umoor ko dekhnay wali Emperial House hold agency ke mutabiq AkihitoTokyo ke ampril palace mein hain jahan un ki sehat ko monitor kya ja raha hai. shenshah Akihitoaglay saal 30

April ko raza karana taur par apne takhat se dastaberdar ho jaien ge. shenshah Akihitoke baad un ke barray betay aur walii ehad naro hito Japan ke naye shenshah ki zimma dariyan sanbhalain ge. japani news agency ke mutabiq malka Japan Michiko, Akihitoke cousin Prince Takamado ki Dukhtar shehzadi Ayako se mulaqaat karen gi jo aik 32 sala aam shakhs se apni mangni karne ke elaan ke baad Shahi joray se aaj mulaqaat karne wali theen.
568.title: Shenshah Japan bemaar ho gay

news_detail: Israel ke aik sabiq wazeer Gonen Segev ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein muqadma ki samaat shuru hogayi hai. Gonen Segev 1995 aur 1996 hamza mein Israeli kabeena mein tawanai aur infrastructure ke wazeer rahay they. un ke khilaaf guzashta mah jung ke zamana mein dushman ko maloomat faraham karne aur ryastِ Israel ke khilaaf jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard e jurm Ayad kya gaya tha. tehqiqaat se yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke unhon ney Iran ki intelli jins ke liye jasoosi ki thi aur riyasat Israel ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ki koshish ki thi. Israel ki dakhli security ki zimma daar agency Shin beeet ke mutabiq sabiq wazeer nigeria mein irani sfar t- khanah se rabita mein rahay they. woh is africi malik mein bhi kuch arsa muqeem rahay they. baad mein unhon ney Iran ka safar kya tha aur –apne sath rabita rakhnay walay irani intelli jins ke agent se mulaqaat ki thi. 62 sala Gonen Segev ke khilaaf muqadma ki band kamrah mein samaat ki jarahi hai aur sahafion ko adalat mein daakhil honay ki ijazat nahi di gayi. unhein maghribi Africa ke malik gani mein dakhla ki ijazat nah milnay par May mein Israel wapsi par girftar kar liya gaya tha. Segev ney irani agents ko tawanai ki market, Israel mein security tansibaat, siyasi aur security idaron ki imaarton aur hakkaam ke baaray mein maloomat faraham ki theen. doosri janib mister Segev ke wukla ka kehna hai ke un ke mokl par Ayad kardah ilzamaat ki ziyada tar tafseel riyasat ke nafiz kardah black out mein haasil ki gayi hai. is hawala se bohat thori maloomat faraham ki gayi hain aur is terhan aik gum raah kin ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki gayi hai. un ka kehna hai ke frdِ ilzaam ke mawaad se aik mukhtalif tasweer samnay aati hai jabkay is ki mukammal tafseel ko Afsha nahi kya gaya hai aur is ko rokkk liya gaya hai. Gonen Segev sabiq Israeli wazeer e azam Isac Robin ki labour hukoomat mein wazeer rahay they aur unhon ney flstineyon ke sath oslo doum moahida ke haq mein faisla kin vote dainay ke liye apni dayen baazu ki jamaat ko kher baad keh diya tha. woh maazi mein bhi fouj daari ilzamaat mein qaid bhagat chuke hain. un par 2004 hamza mein niether lindz se aik safarti passport par qowat bakhash 30 hazaar golian Israel smuggle karne ki koshish ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad kya gaya tha. unhon ney is passport ki muddat khatam honay ke baad khud hi ja-al saazi se aakhri tareekh barha li thi. 2005 hamza mein unhon ney peli bargin samjhota ke tehat un ilzamaat ka aitraaf kar liya tha. un par cradet card ke fraud ke ilzaam mein bhi fard jurm Ayad ki gayi thi
617.title: Sabiq Israeli wazeer ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein muqadma ki samaat

news_detail: Islamabad ki ehatasab Adalat ne Nawaz Sharif family ke khilaaf dair even field refrences ka faisla snadya hai, Nawaz shareef ko 10 saal qaid aur 8 million pound jurmana aed kya gaya hai. adalti faisla mein Nawaz shareef ki Sahebzadi maryam Nawaz ko 7 saal qaid aur 2 million pound jurmana aed kya gaya hai jabkay un ke shohar captain (Rtd) Safdar ko aik saal ki saza sunai gayi hai. Adalat ne Avenfield apartments ki zabti ke ehkamaat bhi diye hain, NAB Prosecutor ke mutabiq ehatasab Adalat ka faisla Supreme Court ke faisla ki toseeq hai. NAB Prosecutor ne media se guftagu mein bataya ke ehatasab Adalat ke faisla se saabit hogaya ke even field apartmnts corruption ki raqam se banaye gaye hain, NAB Adalat ne even field apartmnts ki wifaq ke tehat zabt karne ka hukum diya hai. NAB Prosecutor ke mutabiq hil metal case aur flag ship refrences apne ikhtitami marahil mein hain, saabit hogaya ke even field apartmnts 1993 se shareef family ki malkiat thay. ehatasab Adalat ke judge Mohammad Basheer ne even field refrences ka faisla band kamrah mein sunanay se qabal fariqain ke wukla ko kamrah Adalat mein talabb kya. is mauqa par NAB Prosecutor sardar muzaffar abbasi aur fariqain ke wukla ko rostrm par bulaya gaya. is moqa par adalti amlah ne bataya ke abhi wukla aur judge sahib mein tabadlah khayaal ho raha hai jab faisla sunaya jaye ga to media ko andar bulaya jaye ga. ehatasab Adalat ne teen din pehlay refrences par faisla mehfooz kya tha, Nawaz shareef ki janib se un ki wapsi taq faisla moakhar karne ki appeal ki gayi thi jabkay peoples party aur tehreek insaaf ne faisla moakhar karne ki mukhalfat ki thi. faisla ke waqt kamrah Adalat khicha khch bhara sun-hwa tha jabkay Adalat ke andar bhi sikoriti ke khusoosi intizamaa kiye gaye thay. ehatasab Adalat ke judge Mohammad Basheer ne Nawaz shareef ki janib se un ki wapsi taq faisla moakhar karne ki darkhwast mustard kar di aur apna faisla suna diya
646.title: Nawaz Sharif ko 10, Maryam Nawaz ko 7 saal qaid ki saza

news_detail: Malaysian Wazeer e Azam dr Mahatir Mohammad ney aaj kaha ke Islamic Scholar o Mubaligh Deen Dr. Zakir Naik ko jo India ko matloob hain, wapas nahi bheja jaye ga. Dr. Zakir Naik is waqt beron mulk ke daura par thay jab 2016 mein Indian hukoomat ney un ke aur un ke idaara Islamic Research Foundation (IRF) ke khilaaf mazhabi mnafrt phelanay aur dehshat gardi ko farogh dainay ke ilzamaat ke tehat karwai ki thi, baad azan Dr. Zakir Naik mulk wapas loutne ki bajaye Malaysia pahonch gay jahan inhen mustaqil sukunat ikhtiyar karne ki ijazat di gayi thi. maazi mein kayi groups ney hukoomat se khwahish ki thi ke Dr. Zakir Naik ko un ke bayanaat aur rujhanaat ko malhooz rakhtay hue mulk se kharij kardiya jaye. Dr. Zakir Naik ke khilaaf national investy gation agency ( an aayi ae ) aur Enforcement Directorate (ED) ney mukhtalif muqadmaat darj kiye hain.

Wazeer e Azam Malaysia ka kehna hai ke jab tak woh yahan kisi qisam ka masla peda nahi karte, inhen wapas nahi bheja jaye ga chunkay inhen mustaqil muqeem ka moaqqaf ataa kya gaya hai. unhon ney kaha ke panah gzinon ko panah dainay Malaysian policy ka jahan tak maamla hai hamara mulk apna insani fareeza injaam deta rahay ga. yoropi mumulk ko is ki taqleed karna chahiye. unhon ney kaha’ ‘ hamaray mulk anay walay panah gzinon ke liye hum hamesha maheman Nawaz rahay hain is haqeeqat ke bawajood ke un ki tadaad bohat ziyada hai. hum ney inhen qubool kya.’ ‘

Do din qabal achanak Bharti media mein yeh khabar phailai gayi ke Malaysian hukoomat ney Dr. Zakir Naik ko India ke hawala karne se ittafaq karliya aur inhen hirasat mein le liya gaya aur woh India laaye jarahay hain, agarchay khud Dr. Zakir Naik aur Indian hakkaam ney un it-tila-aat ki tardeed kar di thi. wizarat umoor kharja ney guzashta January mein Malaysian hukoomat se rasmi tor par Dr. Zakir Naik ko mulk ke hawala karne ki khwahish ki thi taham Malaysian hukoomat ney ta haal is par koi karwai nahi ki hai agarchay dono mumulk ke darmiyan mlzmin ki hawalgi ka moahida hai. inhen mulk wapas laane ki sifarati koshishen ki jarahi hain magar aaj Wazeer e Azam Malaysia Mahatir Mohammad ney aaj wazeh kardiya ke un ki hukoomat, Dr. Zakir Naik ko Bharat ke hawala karne ka koi iradah nahi rakhti. un par yeh ilzaam hai ke Bangladesh mein 2016 mein hue aik hamla ke mlzmin Dr. Zakir Naik ke madah thay is hamla mein 22 log maaray gay thay. un ke idaara aayi are f par imtina aed kardiya gaya hai aur un par 18 crore rupay se zayed raqam beron mulk se haasil karne ke bhi ilzamaat hain .

Dr. Zakir Naik ney bhi un it-tila-aat ki yeh kehte hue tardeed kar di thi ke woh is waqt mulk wapas nahi lotin ge jab tak inhen yeh yaqeen nah hojaye ke un ke khilaaf aadlanh karwai ki jaye gi. Malaysia ke muqami akhbar’ f am tea news’ ney Dr. Zakir Naik ke wakeel shehar Aldeen Ali ke hawala se bataya ke inhen wizarat umoor kharja ke wazeer se un ke ikhraj ki rasmi darkhwast mousool nahi hui hai. Malaysia se ikhraj ki khabar ghalat hai. Ali ney kaha ke abhi tak hum ko yeh hadaayat hai ke hamaray mokl ko Bharat hawalgi ki kisi bhi karwai ko challenge kya jaye. hamein is khsos mein dastawizaat diye jaany hon ge .

Malaysian Wazeer e Azam ki wazahat aur elaan ke baad yeh baat ab wusooq ke sath kahi ja sakti hai ke Dr. Zakir Naik ko mustaqil qareeb mein mulk wapas lana India ke liye nihayat hi mushkil hai. Dr. Zakir Naik ko Malaysia mein mustaqil sukoonat ikhtiyar karne ki ijazat day diye jaany ke bayis un ki tehweel mlzmin moahida ke bawajood ikhraj ko yakeeni banana bohat hi mushkil hoga. awwal to Dr. Zakir Naik ko hawala karne Indian hukoomat ki darkhwast par Malaysian hukoomat koi misbet karwai nahi kere gi aur bil farz India apni safarti koshisho mein kamyaab bhi hojata hai aur aindah dinon mein Malaysian hukoomat is par amaada bhi hojati hai to wahan ke qanoon ke mutabiq un ke ikhraj ko adalat mein challenge kya jaye ga. is soorat mein Malaysian hukoomat ya wahan ki qanoon nafiz karne wali agencio ke liye yeh zurori hojata ke Dr. Zakir Naik ki mojoodgi se Malaysia ko la-haq khatrah se adalat ko qaail karwaya jaye.
662.title: Dr. Zakir Naik ko kharij nahi kya jaye ga : Wazeer e Azam Malaysia

news_detail: Yemen ki hukoomat ne ilzaam ayed kya hai ke Iran Nawaz Houthi militia ki janib se mulk mein musallat ki gayi jung ke nateeja mein bees laakh se zayd bachay mehnat mushaqqat karne par majboor hogaye hain. yemeni khatoon wazeer baraye samaji umoor o mehnat Abtaj Al Kamal ne bataya ke Houthis ki musallat kardah jung ke nateeja mein do million se zayd bachay mehnat mushaqqat par majboor hain. un ka kehna tha ke Houthi militia ki taraf se yemeni bachon ko jung ke eendhan ke tour par istemaal karne ka silsila hanoz jari hai. ab tak Houthi militia 23 hazaar bachon ko jung ke liye bharti karchuki hai. Rawan saal ke douran ab tak 2500 bachon ko jung ke liye bharti kya gaya. khabar rasan idaray ‘Saba’ ke mutabiq wazeer baraye samaji umoor ka kehna hai ke jung ke baais 45 laakh yemeni bachay taleem se mahroom hogaye hain. Houthis ki taraf se jung ke douran schoolon ko danista tour par nishana banaya ja raha hai. Houthis ke hamlon mein mulk bhar mein 2372 school kulli ya juzwi taur par tabah ho chukay hain jab ke 1500 schoolon ko Houthis ne apne campaign mein tabdeel kar rakha hai. Abtaj Al Kamal ka mazeed kehna tha ke Houthi shiddat pasand yemeni bachon ko jung mein jhonknay ka silsila bhi jari rakhay hue hain. bachon ko schoolon se utha kar jungi tarbiyat marakaz muntaqil kardiya jata hai. walidain ko bhi bachon ko jung ke liye bheejwane par majboor kya ja raha hai. unhon ne kaha ke Yemen mein Houthis ki janib se thopi gayi jung ke baais bachpan intehai aziat naak ban gaya hai
674.title: Yemen mein Houthis ki jung ke bayes 2 M bachay mushaqqat par mjboor

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein guzashta chand barson ke douran mukhtalif shahriation ki haamil gharelo khadimaon ki janib se qatal aur dhaawon ki mukhtalif karwaiyon ka irtikaab kya gaya “Al Arabia dot net” ke mutabiq is douran 10 badtareen juraim drjِ zail hain:
683.title: Saudi Arabia: Gharelo khadimaon ke irtikaab kardah 10 bhayanak tareen jarayim

news_detail: Sadar Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan ka apne ohda ka jaiza lainey se qabal hi Mulk mein aik neye farmaan ke tehat hukkaam ney mukhtalif mehakmon se talluq rakhney walay 18500 se ziyada sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf  kardiya hai aur Mulk bhar mein baara tanzeemon, teen akhbarat aur aik Television Channel ke dafatir bhi band kardiye hain. Turkey ke sarkari Gazette mein itwaar ko shaya kiye gay farmaan ke mutabiq bar tarf shuda 18632 mulazmeen mein 8998 police afsar aur ahelkaar hain. Unhein dehshat gard tanzeemon aur groupon se talluq aur qaumi salamti ke manafi sar garmion mein mulawis honey ke ilzaam mein bar tarf kya gaya hai. sarkari hukum ke tehat bartarfion ki talwar musallah afwaj ke ehalkaron par bhi chalaye gayi hai aur army ke 3077 fojion, fazaiya ke 1949 ehalkaron aur behria ke 1126 ehalkaron ku mulazimaton se nikaal diya gaya hai. Wizarat Insaaf aur is se mutaliqa idaron ke 1052 mulazmeen, neem fouji daston Gender Mary ke 649 arkaan aur 192 sahili muhafizon ko bhi farigh kardiya gaya hai. neye farmaan ke tehat 199 asateza ko subukdosh kya gaya hai jabkay fouj aur mukhtalif wazaraton se talluq rakhney walay 148 mulazmeen ko bahaal kardiya gaya hai. Wazeh rahay ke July 2016 mein sadar Rajab Recep Tayyip Erdogan ke khilaaf nakaam fouji baghaawat ke baad se Turkey mein hungami haalat nafiz hai aur is ki muddat mein no martaba tosee ki jachki hai. tark media ke mutabiq sarkari mulazmeen ki bartarfi ka yeh aakhri hukum nama ho sakta hai aur hungami haalat bhi somwaar ko khatam honey ka imkaan hai. mojooda hungami haalat ke hukum ki muddat 19 July ko khatam hogi. qabal azeen July 2016 ke baad se hungami haalat ke hukum naamon ke tehat aik laakh das hazaar se ziyada sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf kya ja chuka hai jabkay mazeed hazaron ko ghair qanooni sar garmion mein hissa lainey ke ilzaam mein moattal kardiya gaya tha. Turkey ney America mein muqeem Fatahullah Golen par sadar Recep Tayyip Erdogan ki hukoomat ka takhta ulatney ke liye musallah fouji baghaawat ke tane baney ban’ney ka ilzaam Ayad kya tha. tark hukoomat ney jin sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf ya moattal kya hai, un ki aksariyat ka talluq Golen tehreek hi se hai. hukoomat is ko ”Fatah Allah Terror Organization” ke naam se pukarti hai aur is ney is saal ke awail mein kaha tha ke is tanzeem se talluq ke ilzaam mein 77 hazaar se ziyada afraad ko girftar kya gaya hai. taham allama fatah Allah Golen ney nakaam baghaawat se latalqi zahir ki thi aur un ka bilisraar kehna hai ke un ki tanzeem puraman hai.
695.title: Turkey mein 18 hazaar se zayed mulazmeen bartarf

news_detail: Israeli parasiciuter general ney zirhrast Turk khatoon sayah par dehshat gard tanzeem se wabastagi aur shyoni riyasat ko khatray mein daalney mein ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad karne ki tayariyaan shuru kar di hain. doosri janib khatoon sayah ki giraftari aur is ke khilaaf muqadma par Turkey aur Israel ke darmain taluqaat mein mazeed tanao samney aaya hai. Turk khatoon shehri Ebru  Ozkan ko Israeli fouj ney 11

June 2018 ko Ben Gurion hawai adda se istanbul jatay hue hirasat mein le liya tha. 27 sala Ozkan ko khufia idaara ‘Shin Bet’ ke ahelkaron ney hirasat mein liya jis ke baad is ke khilaaf mashkook andaaz mein Israeli fouji adalat mein trial shuru kardiya gaya tha aur un par Hamas ko senkron dollars muntaqil karne ka ilzaam aayed kya gaya. Ozkan ke wakeel ka Umara Khamaisi ney ‘Reuters’ ko bataya ke un ki moklh ko hirasat ke arsa mein apne wakeel se milney aur Turkey mein baat cheet karne ki ijazat bhi nahi di gayi. Un ka kehna tha ke Israeli hakkaam Ozkan par be bunyaad muqadma chala rahay hain. is par Ayad ilzaam mein kaha gaya hai ke Ozkan ney qeemti itar ki paanch botelain smuggle ki theen jinhein farokht karkay woh raqam Hamas ko dena chahti thi. un par israeli riyasat ki salamti ko khatray mein daalney aur aik dehshat gard tanzeem se talluq ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad karne ki tayari ki ja rahi hai. wakeel difaa ka mazeed kehna hai ke shyoni hakkaam ney Ozkan par islami tehreek muzahmat ( Hamas ) se talluq ka ilzaam Ayad kya hai taham Ozkan ney tamam ilzamaat mustard kardiye hain. guzashta jummay ko Turk wazeer kharja Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu ney Israel mein girftar apni shehri ke baarey mein poochy gay aik sawal ke jawab mein kaha ke’ Ozkan hamari behan hain aur un ki ba izzat rihayi ke liye har mumkin iqdamaat kiye jayen ge. unhon ney Israel par ilzaam Ayad kya ke woh Turk shehrion ko al quds mein dakhlay se rokney ke liye un ke khilaaf be bunyaad ilzamaat ke tehat muqadmaat qaim karkay inhen khauf zada kar raha hai.
705.title: Itar ki sheeshian “smuggling” ke ilzaam mein Turk sayah Israel mein girftar

news_detail: Taliban ne mashriqi Afghanistan ke aik soobah Ghazni ke dar-al-hakoomat Ghazni par jumah ki subah mukhtalif simton se hamla kardiya hai, Taliban aur Hukoomati Forcess ke darmiyan shadeed jharpen jari hain. Sarkari dafatir par firing karte rahay aur Police Headquarters ka muhasra karliya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Jaria mah ke avaakhr mein mutawaqqa jung bandi se qabal Afghan hukoomat par dabao banaye rakhnay Taliban yeh karwai ki hai. Ghazni shaher par subah ki awleen sa-aton se hi yeh hamlay shuru kar diye gay hain. media reports ke mutabiq Taliban aur Hukoomati Forcess ke darmiyan jhadpon mein darjanon afraad halaak aur so se zayed zakhmi ho chukay hain, jabkay Taliban hamla mein marnay walon mein 14 Security ahlkarbhi shaamil hain. Afghan media ke mutabiq Taliban ke hamla-aawaron ne mukhtalif simton se daakhil ho kar shaher par dhawa bol diya, Taliban ke hamlon ke baad kabul Ghazni Highway traffic ke liye band kardiya gaya hai. Doosri janib Ghazni Police cheif ka daawa hai ke Ghazni shaher par Hukoomati Forcess ka control ab bhi barqarar hai aur Hukoomati Forcess aur Taliban ke darmiyan jhadpen shaher se bahar ho rahi hain. Rukan Wifaqi Council Nasir Faqeeri ne kaha ke shaher ke klidi maqamat ko shorish pasandon ke control mein chalay jaaney se roknay ke liye Afghan military izafi forces ko taiynaat kar rahi hai. Taliban ke tarjuman Zabeehullah Mujahid ne twitter par kaha ke Taliban ne Ghazni mein hukoomat ke beshtar intizami dafatir par control haasil karliya hai jin mein Police Headquarters aur Police Stations bhi shaamil hain. darjanon sarkari Security Forces ke ahelkaar maaray gay hain. is ke barkhilaf aik sobai Security ohdedar ne tardeed ki hai ke Taliban jangju shaher Ghazni mein daakhil hue hain. sorat e haal pur aman hai albatta golion ki bochaaron ki aawazian suni gayeen, jo barri baat nahi hai. sobai governor ke tarjuman arif noori ne kaha ke mortar attack mein shahri makanaat aur army check points ko nishana banaya gaya hai aur Taliban jungjuon ki darjanon lashain galiyo par bikhri padi hain. Aljazeera ke mutabiq is jharap mein kam از kam 39 jangju aur 14 fouji halaak hue hain. yeh bhi it-tila-aat masool horahee hain ke Taliban ke hamla ko paspaa karne ke liye Amrici jungi tayyarah aur Helicopters ne fazai hamlay shuru kar diye hain.
571.title: Taliban ka Afghani shaher Ghazni pur hamla, darjanon afraad halaak

news_detail: Chairman Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf Imran Khan 18
August ko Pakistan ke Wazeer e Azam ke ohday ka halaf leinge. Is baat ka izhaar Tehreek Insaaf ke senator Faisal Javed Khan ney kya hai, unhon ney bataya ke Imran Khan 18
August ko Wazeer e Azam ke ohday ke liye halaf leinge. Ibtida mein kaha ja raha tha ke woh 11
August ko halaf lenge phir baad mein 13
August aur is ke baad 15
August ke hawalay se khabrain garam theen ke is din Imran Khan bataur Wazeer e Azam Pakistan ohda ka halaf lenge. Sadar Mumlikat Mamnoon Hussain ney Qaumi Assembly ka ijlaas 13

August ko talab kya hai, is ijlaas mein nau muntakhib arakeen Qaumi Assembly halaf leing jis ke baad Speaker aur Deputy Speaker Qaumi Assembly ka chunao hoga, Wazeer e Azam ke intikhab ke liye Assembly ijlaas yaum e azaadi ki tateel ke baad talab kya jaye ga. Zaraye ke mutabiq Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ke Chairman Imran Khan 18
August ko vuzaratِ e uzma ka halaf leinge PTI ke rehnuma o Senator Faisal Javed ney bhi 18

August ki tareekh muqarrar honay ki tasdeeq kar di. Doosri janib hizab e ikhtilaaf ke grand alliance ney Imran Khan ke madd e muqabil Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Miyan Shahbaz Sharif ko vuzaratِ uzma ke liye umeedwaar naamzad kya hai, Peoples Party ke Khurshid Shah ko Speaker Qaumi Assembly aur Mutahidda Majlis Amal ke maulana Asad Mahmood ko Deputy Speaker ka umeedwaar naamzad kya hai. Wazeh rahay ke aam intikhabaat 2018 mein Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ney Qaumi Assembly mein bhaari aksariyat haasil ki jis ke baad wifaq mein hukoomat bananay ke liye is ki ittihadi jamaaton mein MQM, BNP (Mengal), BAP aur Muslim League (Q) shaamil hain jabke PTI ko ab taq mutadid azad umeedwaron ki himayat bhi haasil hochuki hai. ilawa azeen election commission of Pakistan ney vote ki raazdari zahir kar ney par azkhud notice case mein Chairman Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf Imran Khan ki maafi qubool karli. Election Commission of Pakistan ney Imran Khan ki maafi qubool karne ke baad un ki NA 53 se kamyabi ka notification jari karne ka hukum bhi dey diya hai.
583.title: Imran Khan ki halaf bardari 18th  August ko hogi

news_detail: Makkah Mukrama ki Police ney bataya hai ke Hajj ke liye aeye ek shakhs ney zaireen ke hujoom se faida uthatay hue chhalang laga kar Baab e Kaaba par chadh dauda, taham Police ney usay wahan se utaar liya aur us ke khilaaf zurori qanooni karwai shuru kar di gayi hai. Police ka kehna hai ke Baab e Kaaba par chadhne wala shakhs nafsyaati mareez hai. Us ke Baab e Kaaba par chhalang laganay ke waqeye ki video ke barey mein baat karte hue Police ney kaha ke sehan Mutaaf mein zaireen ke ghayr-maa’mooli hujoom ke baais raat baara bujey 1 shakhs ney Mutaaf ki mamnooa hudood se agay badh kar Baab e Kaaba par chhalang lagai. Taham mauqa par mojood Security Ahelkaron ney usay neechay utaar liya. Police se baat karte hue is shakhs ney baab kaaba par chhalang laganay par moazrat ki aur kaha ke woh nafsyaati awariz ka shikaar hai.
595.title: Nafsyaati mareez aazim Hajj ne ‘Baab e Kaaba’ par chhalang laga di

news_detail: Lahore: Tehreek Insaaf ke Chairman Imran Khan ki ahliya Bushra Bibi ke sabiq Shaohar Khawar Fareed Maneka ney doosri shadi karli. Pakistani zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq PTI Chairman Imran Khan ki teesri ahliya aur bahot jald Pakistan ki khatoon e awwal ka aizaz haasil karne wali Bushra Bibi ke sabiq Shaohar Khawar Maneka ney Samira Agha naami 40 sala khatoon se doosri shadi karli. Khawar Maneka ke qareebi saathi Lateef Khan ney un ki doosri shadi ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha ke Khawar Maneka ki shadi Lahore mein anjaam payi jis mein un ke doston, qareebi rishta daaron aur un ke bachon ney shirkat ki. Khawar Maneka Bushra Bibi ke sabiq shohar hain un dono ki Talaq ke baad Imran Khan ney 6 mah qabal Bushra Bibi se shadi ki thi. Wazeh rahay ke Bushra Bibi Imran Khan ki teesri biwi hain, is se qabal Imran Khan ney Jemima Gold Smith se paheli shadi ki thi jis se un ke do baite Qasim aur Suleman hain jab ke doosri shadi Reham Khan se ki thi taham yeh shadi sirf 10 mah hi chal saki baadazaan dono ke dramyan alehadgi hogayi.
632.title: Imran Khan ki ahlia ke sabiq Shaohar ney doosri shadi karli

news_detail: Afghanistan mein Taliban Tehreek ke anasir ne Mulk ke shumal mein waqay fauji adda par hamla kar ke qabza karliya aur kam  az kam 17 Afghan faujion ko halaak aur 15 ko zakhmi kar diya. Muqami zimmaydaraan ne mangal ke roz bataya ke guzishta do roz mein ladai ke douran darjanon Afghan faujion ko qaidi bhi bana liya gaya. Afghanistan ke soobay Faryab ki council ke sarbarah Mohammad Tahir Rahmani ka kehna hai ke Taliban ne itwaar ke roz se shuru honay walay hamlon mein Gormach ke ilaqa mein waqay fauji adda mein maujood tanks aur gola barood par qabza kar liya hai. Hum adda mein daakhil nahi ho sakay aur is ka bada hissah abhi tak Taliban ke zair e control hai. Ilaqai ohdaydaaron ke mutabiq Taliban ne 40 Afghan fojion ko qaidi bana liya jab ke ladai mein uss ke apne 30 musallah arkaan halaak hue. Afghanistan ke shumal mein Taliban ka yeh hamla aisay waqt mein huwa jab ke Mulk ke junoobi mashriq mein Ghazni soobah mein jharpon ka silsila jari hai. Guzishta hafta shuru honay wali jhadpon mein ab tak sainkdo afraad halaak aur zakhmi ho chuke hain. Is douran Afghan fauj ko Amrici jungi tayyaron ki muawinat haasil hai. Ghazni se faraar honay walay Afghan shehrion ka kehna hai ke ladai ke nateeja mein shehar mein bijli aur pani ki farahmi ka silsila munqita ho gaya hai aur har taraf tabahi aur barbadi pheli hui hai. Taliban ke tarjuman Zabeehullah Mujahid ne id-daa kya ke 57 faujion ne Taliban ke agay hathyaar daal dyie aur deegar 17 ko fauji qaidi bana liya gaya hai aur 8 Humvee gaadiyan zabt karli gayi hain.
644.title: Taliban ka fauji adda par qabza,Darjanoo Fauji qaid.

news_detail: Gaza aur Israel ke darmiyan taweel jung bandi ke liye Israeli Wazeer e Azam Benjamin Netanyahu aur Misri Sadar Alsisi ne khufia mulaqaat ki hai. Israeli media kay mutabiq Misar mein 22

May ko hui khufia mulaqaat mein Hamas-Israel jung bandi ke maamla par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya hai. Israeli aur Palestenian Authorities ki janib se iss report ke hawalay se tardeed ya tasdeeq ke liye koi bayan samnay nahi aaya hai. Misar aur Aqwam e Mutahidda Israel aur Hamas ke darmiyan taweel jung bandi ke liye saalisi ki koshishen kar rahay hain. Israeli akhbarat ke mutabiq Israeli Wazeer e Azam Netanyahu ne Sadar Misar Abdel Fattah el-Sisi se mulaqaat ke liye mah May mein Misar ka khufia dora kya tha. It-tila-aat mein namaloom Amrici ohdedaron ke hawala se kaha gaya ke is dora ka asal maqsad Gaza patti mein intizamaa aur wahan Palestinian Authority ki wapsi aur Israel aur Gaza ke hukumraan ke darmiyan jung bandi, Gaza patti par israeli aur Misri naka bandi mein narmi par tavajja markooz karna tha. Bataya jata hai ke is mulaqaat mein Hamas ke zair tahweel Israeli faujion aur do fojion ki laashon ki wapsi ko yakeeni bananay par bhi tabadlae khayaal kiya gaya. Alawaazeen Sadar America ke mansoobah aman par bhi ghhor o khoz kya gaya, is mansoobah aman ko abhi aam nahi kya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke mulaqaat mein Abdel Fattah el-Sisi ne is baat par zor diya ke Gaza patti par Palestinian Authority ki wapsi ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Un ka yeh kehna tha ke chahay yeh batadreej kya jaye aur Hamas ki janib se paishgi shart ke taur par hathyaar daalnay se kyun nah inkaar kardiya jaye. Sadar Misar ne kaha ke Israel, Arab mumlikaton aur bain ul aqwami bradri ko chahiye ke woh Palestinian Authority Mahmoud Abbas par dabao daaley ke woh Gaza ka nazam o nasq sambhaal le. Report ke mutabiq Israeli Wazeer e Azam ke hamrah chand musheeron aur security ahelkaron ki mukhtasir si team thi. Woh Cair mein sirf chand ghantay hi tawaquf kiye aur Jerusalem wapas laotne se qabal Sesi ke sath iftaar kya tha. Is ke baad se Hamas aur Israeli ke darmiyan tassadum ke kayi waqeat paish aeye. Israel ne Hamas ki janib se hamlon ka ilzaam aayed karte hue Gaza patti par kayi baar fazai hamlay bhi kiye thay jin mein kayi Palestenian bashmole bachay maaray gaye. Netanyahu ne guzashta itwaar ko bhi Gaza patti mein Hamas ke khilaaf apni karwaiya anjaam dainay ka intibah diya tha. Sisi aur Netanyahu ki khufia mulaqaat ke baaray mein Muslim duniya mein yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke Gaza patti se Hamas ko be dakhal karne ke liye Israel aur Misar aik dosray se taawun kar rahay hain aur unhen kayi Arab Mumalik ki bhi darparda taayeed o himayat haasil hai, Taham aam Musalmanoon mein yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke Hamas ke khilaaf Palestenian Authority ki taayeed karna darasal Israel ki taayeed karne ke mumasil hai. Aisa lagta hai ke Misar aur chand Arab Mumalik ghair mehsoos tareeqa se Gaza patti se Hamas ko be dakhal karne ke aik khufia mansoobah par amal pera hain.
656.title: Israeli Wazeer e Azam aur Misri Sadar ki khufia mulaqaat

news_detail: Mecca Mukarrama mein Hajj season ke dauran kayi jazbati manazair dekhnay ko mlitay hain. Aisay hi aik waqea mein shaam ki jung mein aik dosray se judda hojane walay bhai, Mecca Mukarama mein mil gay. Adayie Hajj ke liye aik bhai Syria se yahan pouncha tha jabkay dosra bhai Jordan se yahan se pouncha tha aur dono aik dosray se mil kar intehayi jazbati hogaye. Social Media par aik jazbati Video Clip gardish kar raha hai. Is Video mein do Shami bhaiyon ko aabdeedah haalat mein aik dosray ke sath galaay mlitay hue dekha ja sakta hai. Yeh dono bhai Shaam mein khanah jungi ke sabab aik dosray ko kho baithy they taham Hajj ke safar ke silsila mai Mecca Mukarama pahonchney par qudrat ney unhey phir se mila diya. Dono bhaiyon mein aik Jordan mein jab ke dosra Syria mein reh raha hai. Video Clip mein ahraam mein malboos dono bhai intahi jazbati andaaz se baghal geer huve hain. Video ko dekhnay wala insaan bhi dono bhaiyon ki kaifiyat ka andaza karte hue khud ko jazbati honay se rok nahi paata.
669.title: Jung ke bichde Hajj mein mil gaye

news_detail: Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf ke Chairman o sabiq Cricket Captain Imran Khan ney aaj Qaumi Aassembly mein wizarat Uzma ka intekhaab jeet liya hai. Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ke liye 172 vote darkaar they jabkay  PTI Chairman Imran Khan ney 176 vote haasil kiye aur un ki mukhalifat mein khaday sabiq Wazeer e Aazam Nawaz Shareef ke bhai Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Shahbaz Shareef ney 96 vote haasil kiye. Parlimani ijlaas Speaker Qaumi Assembly Asad Qaisar ki nigrani mein huwa jabkay voting division ki buniyaad par ki gayi thi. Is se qabal Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ke liye Qaumi Assembly mein raaye shumari ka amal shuru wo mukammal huwa jis ke baad voteon ki ginti shuru kar di gayi thi .

Qaumi Assembly mein Tehreek e Insaaf aur itehadiyon ki tadaad 175 hai jabkay Muslim League (N) ke arakeen ki tadaad 97 hai. Peoples Party ke bhi Qaumi Assembly mein 54 arakeen hain taham unhon ne Muslim League (N) ke umeedwaar ko vote na dainay ka faisla kya hai jabkay 4 azad arakeen bhi Qaumi Assembly ka intekhab jeetay hain. Ijlaas mein Pakistan Peoples Party ke Co-Chairman aur sabiq Sadar Asif Ali Zardari ne shirkat nahi ki jabkay Chairman Bilawal Bhutto ne apne aik bayan mein kaha ke intekhabi amal mein hissa na lena hamara jamhoori haq hai. Ijlaas ke aaghaz mein Speaker ne arakeen ko qaayed aiwaan ke intekhab ke tareeqa e kaar se mutaliq aagah kiya jis ke baad ghantiyan bajanay ka hukum diya. Chairman Tehreek e Insaaf Imran Khan ke Qaumi Assembly pahonchney par mehmaan gallery mein maujood afraad ne khade hokar taliyan bajayen jabkay is mauqa par PTI arkaan ne naaray baazi ki. Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ki karwai dekhney ke liye mehmanon ki badi tadaad gallery mein aagai thi jis mein PTI ke karkunaan ki badi tadaad shaamil thi. Mehmanon ki gallery rush ke baayis band kar di gayi thi. Imran Khan ki Parliament House aamad ke mauqa par sahafion ne un se sawalaat kiye aur aik sawal ke jawab mein unhon ne kaha ke match abhi khatam nahi huwa, match jari hai, khawab abhi poora nahi huwa, aik marhala poora huwa. Imran Khan ke liye lobby ‘A’ aur Shahbaz Sharif ke liye lobby ‘B’ banai gayi thi. Aik lobby se Imran Khan ko vote dainay aur doosri lobby se Shahbaz Shareef ko vote dainay walon ko guzarna tha. Dono lobbies Speaker ke dayen aur baen janib waqay hain. Peoples Party ke arakeen ne intekhabi amal mein hissa nahi liya aur woh apni nashiston par hi baithay rahay jabkay Jamaat e Islami ke rukn Maulana Abdul Akbar Chitrali bhi apni nashist se nahi uthhe. Ijlaas ke dauran Muslim League (N)  ki janib se Peoples Party ko mananay ki aik aur koshish ki gayi. Shahbaz Sharif khud Chairman PPP Bilawal Butto ki nashist par gaye aur un se mulaqaat ki. Is mauqa par Javed Murtuza Abbasi sameit deegar rehnuma bhi un ke hamrah they taham Shahbaz Sharif ki koshish nakaam hui. Shahbaz Sharif ne blavl bhuto Zardari se apne haq mein vote dainay ki darkhwast ki jis par Bilawal Bhutto Zardari ne moazrat karli.
679.title: Imran Khan Pakistan ke 22 wein Wazeer e Aazam muntakhib

news_detail: Saudi Arab ke junoob maghribi ilaqa Jazan mein aik ghar se 35 saal se rassiyon aur zanjeeroon mein jakdey aik zehni mareez shakhs ko baaziyaab  karanay ke baad Hospital muntaqil kya gaya hai. Hukkaam ka kehna hai ke zanjeeroon mein jakda shakhs zehni aur nafsiyati mareez hai aur is ke ahal e khanah ney usay dosaron ko takleef pohanchaye janey ke dar se ghar mein zanjeeroon mein bandh rakha tha. Al-Arabia.net ke mutabiq Saudi wizarat Labour wo samaji behbood ke Jazan mein ohdedar Engineer Ahmed Alqunzi ney bataya ke Huroob Governeri mein deyaar Alsahalil ke maqam par aik ghar mein barson se 1 shakhs ko qaid rakhnay ki ittila mili. Ghar par chhapa maar kar 1 shakhs ko baaziyaab  karaya gaya aur usay Hospital muntaqil kya gaya hai. Is ki haalat kaafi tashweesh-naak hai. Woh zehni aur nafsiyati awarz ka shikaar hai. Taham Hospital mein hukoomat ki nigrani is ka ilaaj mualja jari hai. Al-Qunzi ney kaha ke mazkoorah shakhs ki Umar 35 saal se zayed hai. Is ke ahal e khanah ney usay ghar mein bandh kar rakhnay ka yeh juwaz paish kya hai ke agar woh usay khula chortay to woh ghar mein mojood kisi bachay ya parosion ko nuqsaan pouncha sakta tha. Hukoomati ohdedar ka kehna hai ke nafsiyati mareez ko zanjeeroon mein jakadnay ke maamla ki tehqiqaat ki ja rahi hain magar usay gharelo tashadud mein shaamil nahi kiya ja sakta.
693.title: Saudi Arab mein 35 saal se zanjeeroon mein jakda Shakhs baaziyaab

news_detail: Hyderabad. Seylaab ke qhehar se dochar Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ki madad ke liye Gulf Mumalik aagay aaye hain. Maghribi asiayi mumalik mein guzishta 50 barson se zayed Keralites ki badi tadaad rehti hai. Sharjah ke hukmaraan Sultan Bin Mohammad Alqasmi ne hafta ke din Kerala ki madad ke liye 4 Crores rupey ki maali imdaad ka elaan kya hai. Mutahidda Arab Amaraat (UAE) ne bhi mumkina taawun ka teyqun diya hai. Gulf Mumalik mein Khelaji  awam ki qayim tanzeemen aur afraad ne Kerala mein seylaab ke mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye funds ikhatta karna shuru kardiya hai. Tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke raza karana tanzeemon ki janib se Gulf Mumalik se taqreeban 100 crores rupay ki imdaad faraham ki jaye gi. Ameer UAE Khalifa Bin Zayed Al-Nahayan ne jummay ki shab twitter payam mein kaha ke UAE mein hamari kamyaab kahani ke pas e parda Kerala ke awam hamesha se rahay hain aur hanooz hain. Hum par khusoosi zimmadari hai ke hum khaas kar in muqaddas aur meheraban dinon mein mutasirah awam ki madad karen. Yeh bhi it-tila-aat mausool hui hain ke Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zaid Al-Nahayan ne Kerala mein Seylaab ke mutasireen ko raahat ki farahmi ke liye Shaikh Mohammad ki nigrani mein aik hangami Committee ki tashkeel ka hukum diya hai. Kerala kaaf ki 3 crore aabaadi ke taqreeban 10 feesad log riyasat mein nahi rehtay. Kerala ke har teesray ghar ka fard kisi na kisi Gulf Mulak mein kaam karta hai.
713.title: Kerala Seylaab ke mutasireen ko Gulf mumalik ka dast e taawun

news_detail: Saudi arab mein khawateen ko car chalaney ki ijazat milney ke bad ab Maqbool online Services ki   taxis ko khawateen drivers ney bhi chalana shuru kardiya. Amal Farhat ko pehli khatoon ‘captain’ honey ka aizaz haasil huva hai. Woh sehat aama mein quality assurance ki degree ki haamil hain aur sehat ke shoba mein miyaar ko barqarar rakhney se mutaliq aik mushawarti company chala rahi hain. is masrufiyat ke bawajood unhon ney online taxi serive ke liye driver ke taur par kaam ka intikhab kya hai aur woh yeh saabit karna chahti hain ke Saudi khawateen kisi bhi shoba mein kaam ki bakhoobi salahiyat rakhti hain. Unhon ney apne tajurbah ke baarey mein bataya ke ”khawateen un ke sath safar mein khud ko mehfooz samjhti hain kyunkay unhein mard driveron ke sath safar ki soorat mein jo masail darpaish ho saktay hain, unhein main bakhoobi samjhti hoon. Mujhe mere trainers ney bataya tha ke driveron ko harasan kya ja sakta hai. Mujhe company ki taraf se is zimn mein bohat muawnat haasil hui hai. Agar koi musafir na munasib harkat karta hai to is soorat e haal se nimatney ke liye aik protocol maujood hai”. Aik aur online taxi service ke liye Ikhlaas Albalushi nami aik khatoon ney bataur driver apna naam ka indraaj karaya hai. Unhon ney mangal ko aik musafir khatoon ko is ki jaye manzil par pohanchaya tha aur yun apna pehla safar mukammal kya tha. Unhon ney bataya ke company ney April mein khatoon driveron ko bharti karne ka a ellan kya tha aur unhon ney isi waqt darkhwast dair kar di thi. Un ki taxi company ney 20 saal se zayed Umar aur karaamad driving licence ki haamil Saudi khawateen se darkhwasten talabb ki theen
607.title: Saudi Arabia: khawateen online taxi service chalana shuru kar diya
