news_detail: Surat: Mashhoor sunaar Vishal Agarwal aur Khushbu Agarwal ney 6690 heeron jari 18 qeraat sonay ki aik angothi tayyar ki hai jisay Guiness Book of  World Record mein shaamil karliya hai. Kamal ke khobsorat phool ki shakal wali is angothi mein 6, 690 heere jarray hain jo kat diamonds hain jabkay 58 gram ki is angothi ki qeemat 4, 116, 787 US dollar 28. 17 crore rupay rakhi gayi hai. Guiness Book of World Record ney is angothi ko sab se ziyada heeron wali angothi ka srtifkit bhi diya hai. is se qabal sayoyo jewllery ney more pankh jaisi angothi banai thi jis mein 3, 827 kat diamonds lagaye gaye thay taham ab Kamal angothi ney is record ko aik barray hadaf se toar diya hai. yeh jyolr Bharat ke shehar sourat se talluq rakhtay hain. angothi mein lagey tamam heeron ka mushtarqa wazan kya jaye to woh golf ki aik gaind se bhaari hon ge jinhein bohat Nafasat se phool ki 48 pankhdion par lagaya gaya hai. is angothi ko vishal Agarwal ney design kya hai aur hanuman diamonds ki aik shaakh khushbu ney is project ke liye heere faraham kiye hain. angothi ko Kamal ki soorat dainay ka maqsad logon mein pani ke istemaal mein ahthyat ki aagahi faraham karna hai. Jewellers ney bataya ke Kamal hamara qaumi phool hai aur yeh duneyae aabb ki khoubsurti ko zahir karta hai. usay bananay walon ney –apne aik bayan mein kaha hai ke’ Guiness Book of World Record ki shohrat ke sath hum khayaal afraad ko aik dosray ke qareeb lana hai taakay is khobsorat duniya ko aacha bananay ke liye kaam kya jaye ‘. Guiness Book of World Record ke mahireen ney angothi mein jarray heeron ki bareek beeni se shanakht karkay usay duniya mein sab se ziyada heeron wali angothi ki sanad di hai
620.title: 6690 Diamond se muzayyan Angothi, qeemat 28 crore rupay

news_detail: Andhra Pradesh ko 2016-17 ke douran tijarat ko sahal bananay ke iqdamaat mein 28 reyaston aur 7 markaz ke zair e intizam ilaqon mein sab se behtareen muzahira karne ka aizaz haasil huwa hai jabkay Telangana ko dosra muqam haasil huwa hai. hukoomat hind ki janib se mangal ko jari kardah teesray addition mein bataya gaya ke tijarat karne ke liye Andhra Pradesh sab se behtar hai jis ke baad Telangana aur Haryana ka number aata hai. yeh darja bandi mehakma baraye sanati policy o farogh ki janib se ki jati hai jo wizarat commerce and industry ke tehat aata hai. saal 2015-16 ki ranking mein Andhra Pradesh aur Telangana naay mushtarqa tor par pehla muqam haasil kya tha. reyaston ki ranking karne ka maqsad reyaston ke mabain musabqat peda karna hai. guzashta budget mein an d ae hukoomat naay reyaston ke liye mission ke tor par 372 action points ki nishandahi ki thi .
633.title: Tijarat ko sahal bananay mein Andhra Pradesh ko pehla aur Telangana ko dosra muqam

news_detail: London mein aik single Bedroom flat se bhi kam qeemat par samandar ke beech waqay aik tareekhi Qila farokht ke liye tayyar hai. Pembrokeshire mein mil ford Haven ke saahil par Samand ray ke beech waqay ‘stock raak forte ‘France ke Napoleon III ke Bartania par hamla ka difaa karne ke liye taamer kya gaya tha. ab is qilay ko itni kam qeemat par farokht ke liye paish kya ja raha hai jo ghaliban London mein aik rehaishi apartment ki qeemat se bhi kam ho gi. Bartanwi akhbar “Daily Mail” ke mutabiq teen manzlon par mushtami l “Stack Rock Fort ” mein spiral staircases nazar aata hai. is mein toup khaanoon ke liye kamron ke ilawa sonay aur aaraam karne ke kamray bhi hi. yeh Qila jis jazeeray par waqay hai woh haven ki aabi guzargah par apni poori sehar angazi ke sath mojood hai. mazkoorah Qila ko 2015 hamza mein taqreeban 1. 50 laakh pound mein farokht ke liye paish kya gaya tha. taham aaj is ki qeemat barh kar 4 laakh Pound tak pahonch gayi hai. Is ka matlab yeh hwa ke London mein kisi bhi flat ya apartment ki qeemat is jazeeray ki haliya qeemat se do ya teen guna ziyada ho sakti hai. Bartania land registary ke mutabiq London mein aik makaan ki ost qeemat 471, 944 pound hai jabkay wheels mein 152, 999 pound hai. is samandari Qila ko 1850 hamza se 1852 hamza ke darmain taamer kya gaya aur 1859 mein up grade kya gaya tha. is ki askari gunjaish 1618 tan barood aur 150 musallah fojion taq thi. pehli jung azeem ke douran bhi fojion ki aik chothee si takri ko tainaat kya gaya tha. sales agent Purple Bricks ka kahena hai ke khangi malkiat ka haamil yeh Qila jisay lawaris chhorhdya gaya hai, development ke na qabil yaqeen imkanaat rakhta hai. is ka kehna hai ke sabiq malkin se Qila ku Main land se marboot karte hue aik tijarti rahaish gaah mein tabdeel karne ke liye kaha gaya hai.
649.title: Qalb e Samandar waqai Qila baraye farokht

news_detail: Ireland ki Parliament ne Israeli ashya ki daraamadat par pabandi ka Bill Manzoor kar liya, Ireland ki Seanad (Aiwaan Baala), ne yeh iqdaam Palestine ke maqboza maghribi kinare mein Israel ke ghairqanooni kaarkhanon mein tayyar honay wali masnoaat ke boycott ke liye uthaya. ghair mulki khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq Ireland ki Parliament ne is Bill par rawan saal January mein raye shumari ka faisla kya tha taham Israel ki khawhish par is ko moqoof kardiya gaya tha. is waqt Israel ki wizarat kharja ne jis ki qayadat Wazeer e Azam nitin yahoo karte hain is waqt Ireland ke safeer baraye Israel ko talabb kya tha. is Bill ko qanooni shakal ikhtiyar karne ke liye Seanad votes ke husool ke marhala se guzarna hogaa aur phir Aiwaan Zaireen ki manzoori. Israel ne maghribi kinara ka control 1967 mein Jordan se haasil kar liya tha, jis ilaqa par Falasteeni aik azad mumlikat ke qiyam ki tawaqqa rakhtay they. Taqriban 6 laakh panah Guzeen mashriqi Jerusalem ke maqboza ilaqa, maghribi kinara aur golan ki pahariyoon mein rehtay hain. Ireland ke liye maqboza ilaqa mein tayyar ki jane wali ashya ki maliti qader sirf 5 lakhs ta 10 lakhs Euro salana hai taham Bill ki tajaweez kehti hain ke yeh deegar European mamlikaton ke liye taqleed ki raah hamwar karti hai. Israeli Wazeer e Azam Nitin Binjamin ne is Bill ki muzammat karte hue kaha ke yeh jo Israel ke boycott ke khwaahan hain un ke liye mauqa faraham kere gi aur azadana tijarat aur insaaf ke manafi hai. azad senetor franss black jinhon ne Bill paish kya kaha ke maqboza ilaaqon mein awam ko zabardasti un ke gharon se be dakhal kardiya gaya, zarkhaiz zameen ko zabt karliya gyaavr phal aur tarkariyan ugai jati hain jis ki qeemat ada karne Irish taqon par farokht ke liye rakhi jati hain. yeh bastiyan jungi juraim ka hissa hain aur ab waqt aachkahe ke Ireland kuch qayadat dukhaay aur un ka taawun karne se inkaar kardey. agarchay Bill mein Israel ka zikar nahi kya gaya hai magar ”qaabiz taqaton” aur ”ghair qanooni gaasibeen” se mansoob kya gaya hai.
664.title: Irish Parliament mein Israeli ashya ki daraamadat par pabandi ka Bill manzoor

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein hwabazi ki tarbiyat dainay walay aik idaara ne khawateen ke liye apne darwazay khol dyie hain aur wahan pehli martaba Saudi khatoon Pilots ko tayyaray udane ki tarbiyat di jaye gi. Oxford Aviation Academy ki mashriqi shehar Damam mein waqay shaakh mein senkron khawateen ne hwabazi ki tarbiyat ke liye apni darkhwasten jama kara di hain. tawaqqa hai ke September ke awayel mein is idaara mein un ki tarbiyat ka aaghaz hojaye ga. Aik Civil Pilot ban’nay ki khwaahan khatoon Dalaal Yeshar ka kehna hai ke ”pehlay log beron Mulk shehri hwabazi ki tarbiyat ke liye jaany ke aadi ho chukay they lekin beron Mulk khawateen ke liye shehri hwabazi ki tarbiyat mardon ki bah nisbat bohat mushkil thi”. Unhon ne kaha ke ”hum aik aisay daur mein nahi reh rahay hain jahan khawateen ko sirf mehdood shoubon hi mein kaam karne ki ijazat hai. ab khawateen ke liye tamam Ufaq khulay hain. Agar aap mein koi kaam karne ki tadap aur lagan hai to phir aap mein is kaam ko karne ki salahiyat bhi mojood hai”. Oxford Aviation Academy 30 crores dollars ke aik mansoobah ka hissa hai. Is mein tayyaron ki marammat ke liye aik school bhi shaamil hai. Is ke alawa hawai adda par Tayyaron ko parwaaz mein madad dainay ke liye aik bain ul aqwami markaz bhi qayim kya gaya hai. Is Academy ke Executive Director Usmaan al Mautery ne bataya hai ke un ke yahan talba ko teen sala tdrisi aur amli tarbiyat di jati hai. Saudi Arab mein khawateen ke car chalanay par ashron se aed pabandi ko guzashta mah hi khatam kya gaya hai. Saudi walii ehad shehzada Mohammad ban Salman ki wasee tar jame islahat ke tehat kiye gaye is iqdaam ka maqsad mulki maeeshat ka rukh pherna aur khawateen ki taraqqi ke naye mawaqay peda karna hai.
673.title: Saudi Aviation Academy mein pehli martaba khatoon hawabazon ko tarbiyat

news_detail: European Commission ney American Company Google par is ke Android mobile operating system ki khilaaf varzyon par record chaar arab tees crore euro (paanch arab dollars) jurmana ayad kardiya hai. European Union ki tashweesh yeh hai ke phone tayyar knndgan jaisay huwa hai Samsung aur LG ke sath Google ke muahiday un companiyon ko nuqsaan pohanchana chunkay yeh companian kaamil tor par Android par inhisaar karte hain. yeh muahiday yeh shart rakhtay hain ke Google applications aur search tools aur Google Play Store ko Android devices par paishgi taur par laazmi install kiye jayen, jo Google ko search mein mustahkam aur ghalib banaye rakhtay hain. European Commission ki musabiqati Commissionerr Margrethe  Vestagar ney budh ko is faislay ka elaan kya hai aur kaha hai ke Google ney teen bunyadi shobo mein Android market ki khilaaf warzi ka irtikaab kya hai. Google apne search engine aur liye pehle applications ko aik operating system mein mujtma kar rahi hai aur is ney mobayyana tor par mobile phone bananay wali companiyon ko aisi diwaysz ki tayari se rokkk diya hai jin ke zareya Android ke mukhtalif vrsnz ko chalaya ja sakta hai. is ney phone tayyar karne wali baaz barri companiyon aur mobile net work opreter ko is maqsad ke liye bhaari raqum di hain ke woh sirf Google ki search app ko dasti phone set mein istemaal karen. European Commission ney Google se mutalba kiya hai ke woh is faisla ke 90 roz ke andar –apne is tamam ghair qanooni kaam ko mo-asar andaaz mein khatam kardey. is ka yeh matlab hai ke ab Google ko phone saaz companiyon ko dasti siton mein Google Play Store ki paish kash ke liye liye pehle aur Google search ke pari install par majaboor karne ya dabao daalnay ka silsila band karna hoga. Google ko phone saaz companiyon ko Android ke mukhtalif vrsnz ko istemaal karne se roknay ki rawish bhi khatam karna hogi. European Commission ney –apne faisla mein kaha hai ke Google ney aisa koi qabil aitbaar thos saboot paish nahi kya hai jis se yeh pata chalta ho ke Android fani naqais se mutasir hoga ya applications ki support mein nakaam rahay ga. Google ney European Commission ke is faisla ke khilaaf appeal dair karne ka elaan kya hai. is barray search engine ke tarjuman ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ” Android ab har kisi ke liye ziyada intikhab paish karta hai. Aik mutharrak ayko system, taiz raftaar jiddat aur kam qeematein taizi se barhti hui musabqat ki klasiki nishanain hain”. Wazeh rahay ke market reserch firm strategy analytics ke mutabiq Android se duniya ke 80 fisad smart phones chaltay hain. European Commission guzashta saal se Android ke khilaaf jame tehqiqaat kar raha tha. Is ke hareefon ney Google ke khilaaf soft wear ki market mein bartari ke liye ghalat tor tareeqay istemaal kar ney ki shikayat ki thi. Google ke khilaaf sab se pehlay fyir search ney 2013 hamza mein shikayat ki thi. is ke ilawa Nokia , Microsoft aur Oracle ney bhi shikayat ki thi. Microsoft ke sabiq Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer ney tab kaha tha ke Google apni ajarah daari qaim kar rakhi hai aur hakkaam ko is ko control karna chahiye. European Union ney guzashta saal Google par search ke nataij mein ulat phair par do arab sattar crore dollars jurmana Ayad kya tha. yeh is ki online kharidari khidmaat ke search nataij mein radd vbdl par kya gaya tha. Google ney is ke khilaaf bhi appeal dair ki thi magar is ka abhi faisla nahi sun-hwa aur ab is pras se dugna paanch arab dollars ka bhaari jurmana Ayad kardiya gaya hai. is iqdaam se European Union aur America ke darmain jari tijarti jung mein mazeed shiddat askati hai. European Commission Facebook, Intel, Microsoft par bhi musabiqati zimmay dariyan poori nah karne jrmane Ayad kar chuka hai. Commission ki musabiqati Commissioner Margrethe Vestagar ney un American companiyon par European Union ke rukan baaz mumalik ke tax qawaneen ki khilaaf varzyon par bhi jrmane Ayad kiye hain. Un ka bilisrar kehna hai ke woh sarfeen ke haqooq ke tahaffuz ke liye qawaneen ka nifaz kar rahi hain.
680.title: Google par par European Commission ka 5 arab dollars jurmana

news_detail: Saudi Arab ke soobay Al Bahah mein international honey Festival ka 11

addition jari hai. Prince Mohammad bin Saood Park mein munaqqid Festival mein 30 se ziyada mugs baan shirkat kar rahay hain. Saudi sarkari khabar rasan agency spa ke mutabiq aik Saudi mugs baan Ali ban abdulah alamri ne bataya ke Festival mein berry aur peelu sameit darjan bhar se ziyada aqsam ke shehad rakhay gaye hain. un aqsam ko rangon ki bunyaad par pehchana ja sakta hai jin mein surkhi mayel, siyah mayel aur safaid rang shaamil hai. Festival mein rakhay gaye mukhtalif anwaa ke shehad mukhtalif zaiqay aur khusbhoo rakhtay hain. umomi tor par tamam aqsam ke shehadon mein aik khaas noiyat ki khusbhoo payi jati hai jo un ke khalis honay ka pata dete hain. aik dosray mugs baan Mutaab bin Ahmed alAghamdi ne bataya ke woh Al Bahah mein mugs banon ki anjuman ke tarbiati Insti tute se farigh althsil hain. Alghamdi ne 5 chatton ke sath shehad ki tayari ka silsila shuru kya tha aur is waqt un ke paas 80 chattay hain jin se tamam aqsam ke shehad haasil hotay hain. Nasir bin Saeed Alghamdi Saudi mugs baan hain aur woh mazkoorah International Festival ke pehlay addition se shareek ho rahay hain. Unhon ne shehad ke andar khushk mewa jaat aur deegar mukhtalif ashya ko mila kar mutadid murakabat paish kiye hain. Unhon ne bataya ke mazkoorah cheezon ko shaamil karne se shehad par kisi qisam ke asraat muratab nahi hotay. doosri janib Festival ke intizami nigaran abdulah ban Mohammad alzhrani ne event ki sar garmion aur mukhtalif Pavilions ka jaiza liya. Un mein shehad ki numayesh ka khaima, Theatre ki sargarmia, Honey Friends, Photography ki numayesh, Honey Cafe, Dhairi aur Ziyafat ka Pavilion, Bachon aur Nanhay Sayah ka Pavilion shaamil hain. Festival ke iftitah ke roz se ab taq 3 tan ke qareeb shehad ki tarseel ho chuki hai
696.title: Saudi Arab mein International Honey Festival, rangon aur khushbuon ki bahhar

news_detail: New Delhi. Makhsoos zumron ke Tax dahindgaan ke liye assesment  year 2018-19 ke liye Income Tax Returns ke adkhal ki aakhri tareekh 31

July mein aik mah ki tausee ki hai. Commissioner Income Tax Media and Technical Policy Mr. Surabhi  Ahluwalia ke press note ke bamawajib Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) ne income Tax returns ke adkhal ki aakhri tareekh 31 July ko barha kar 31

August tak tausee di hai. Aakhri assesment year tak taakheer se income Tax Returns ke adkhal par koi jurmana nahi tha, taham assesment year 2018-19 se jurmana laago hoga. Qanoon Income Tax mein hukoomat ne aik nai dafaa 234f ko shaamil kya gaya hai jis ki rou se qanoon ki dafaa 139 (1) mein sarahat kardah tawareekh ke baad agar koyi fard Income Tax Return daakhil karta hai to is par 10, 000 rupay tak jurmana aayed hoga. Tax mahireen ka kehna hai ke Finance Act 2017 mein ki gayi tarmeem ke mutabiq Tax dahindgaan maali saal 2017-18 ke liye Tax return daakhil karne ki aakhri tareekh (yani 31
July 2018 ) ke baad aur 31
Decemeber 2018 se qabal Tax Return daakhil karte to inhen 5,000 rupay jurmana ada karna padta. Agar Tax Return 1

January 2019 ya is ke baad daakhil kiye jaane ki soorat mein jurmana ki raqam badh kar 10,000 rupay hojaye gi. Agar Tax dahinda ki majmoyi aamdani 5 lakhs rupay se kam ho to fees ki raqam aik hazaar rupay se zayed nahi hogi. ab is tareekh mein tausee karte hue 31
Augst tak tausee kar di gayi hai.
706.title: Tax Returns ke adkhal ki tareekh mein tausee

news_detail: Computer programming, Software development aur Cyber security se mutaliq mashriq wasta ka sab se bada event ‘Hackathon Hajj’ unwan se ayindah itwaar ko Saudi Arab ke shehar Jeddah mein munaqqid ho raha hai. Event mein Information Technology ke shoba mein dilchaspi rakhnay walay 18 hazaar mahireen aur Software Develpor shirkat karen ge. Is ghayr-maa’mooli ahmiyat ke haamil event ka ineqad’ Saudi cyber Security, Programming and Drons Federation’ ki janib se kya gaya hai. Is event ke ineqad ka maqsad Saudi Arab mein Cyber Security ko behtar bananay ke sath sath hajj ke azeem mauqa ke liye bhi is se faydah uthana aur Hujjaj karaam ko behtar mawaslati saholaten muhayya karna hai. Hajj se chand haftay qabal is event ke a ineqaad ke zareya Ziyuf ur Rahman (aazmeen Hajj) ko jadeed tareen saholaten muhayya karne ke Saudi mission ko agay badhana, Saudi Arab mein Information Technology ke shuba mein honay wali taraqqi ko ilaqai satah par muta-arif karana, deegar mumalik ke haan tayyar kardah jadeed alaat se Saudi mahireen ko aagah karna aur dosray mulkon ke mahireen ke tajarbaat se istifada karna hai. yeh scienci wo tahqiqi event Saudi Hukoomat ke vision 2030 ke programat ka hissa hai. is mein shirkat ke liye ab taq 18, 000 afraad apni registration krachke hain. aalmi search engine ‘Google’ bhi is ki tarbiati workshop aur sar garmion mein hissa le gi
718.title: Mashriq wasta ke azeem us shan ‘Hackathon’ event ka itwaar ko Jeddah mein ineqad

news_detail: Cheif Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ka kal /17 feb ko yom paidaiesh barray hi josh o kharosh se manaya jaye ga. mukhtalif maqamat par Chief Minister ki yom paidaiesh tqarib munaqqid ki jayen gi. is khsos mein riyasat ke mukhtalif mehakma jaat ki janib se flahi o taraqiyati schemaat ke programmes munaqqid kiye jayen ge. cheif mnstr ki rahaish gaah par poanch kar inhen mubarakbaad dainay ke liye tea are s ke qaideen abhi se tayario mein mashgool hogaye hain. mister ke Chandar shikhr rau se mulaqaat ka yeh nadir mauqa hota hai. awam ke liye woh qabil dustarus nahi rehtay hain. yahi nahi balkay party qaideen ke liye bhi woh aasani se dastyab nahi hotay hain, hatta ke reyasti kabeena ke arkaan aur arkaan assembly ke liye un se mulaqaat asaan nahi hai. wazraa ko bhi cheif mnstr se mulaqaat ke liye un ki paishgi ijazat darkaar hoti hai. woh skritrit ko bhi kam hi atay hain, hatta ke woh camp office par bhi wazraa aur aala ohdedaron ke liye dastyab nahi hotay hain Albata woh jab chahain kisi ko bhi talabb kar lete hain. wazeer afzaish moyshyan Mr. T. Srinivas yadav ne bataya ke Chief Minister ki yaom e paidaiesh tqarib kal / 17 feb ko Jal Vihar, Necklace road par barray pemana par manayi jayen gi. unhon ne bataya ke cheif mnstr ki yom paidaiesh ke mauqa par khoon ke atiyah ka camp, medical camp munaqqid kya jaye ga aur musthaqeen mein try cycles, sadyaan bhi taqseem ki jayen gi. Cheif Minister ki Dukhtar o rukn e Parlimaan mrs K. Kavitha /17 feb ko subah 9:00 bajey din Secunderabad ki mandir mein khusoosi pooja anjaam den gi aur baad azaan Bansalipait mein chacha Nehru nagar mein ghareeb be gharon ke liye double bed Rooms ki 265 units ka iftitah anjaam den gi. yeh makanaat 6 2. 4 crore rupay ki laagat se taamer kiye gay hain .
610.title: K. Chandarshekar Rao ka yom paidaiesh baday paemane par mananay ki tayyariyan

news_detail: Iran ke saddar Hasn Rohani naay Makkah Masjid mein Jummay ki namaz ada karne ke baad Muslamanon se khitaab ke ae haein Mr. Rohani ka yeh dosra daura hai jabkay bah hesiyat saddar un ka yeh pehla daura hai .

Haider abad : Iran ke saddar husn Rohani naay Bharat ke sah roza daura ke aaj dosray din hyderabad ki tareekhi mecca masjid me n jummay ki salaat ada ki aur baad azan Musalmanoon ke aik ijtima se khitaab kya. Mr.  Rohani kal sah roza daura par hyderabad puhanche they. un ke daura hyderabad mein Gumbadaan e Qutub Shahi , Salarjung museum, Qilah golknd_h aur mecca masjid ka daura shaamil tha. mecca masjid mein jummay ki adai ke baad unhon naay musalmanoon ke aik ijtima se bhi khitaab ke a. yeh Mr. Rohani ka dosra daura e Hyderabad hai jabkay saddar Iran ki hesiyat se yeh un ka pehla daura hai. hndstan avrayran ke darmain rasmi muzakrah kal hoga jab woh malik ke dar-al-hakoomat pohnchain ge .
631.title: saddar Iran ka Makkah Masjid mein Musalmanoon se khitaab

news_detail: Hyderabad Telangana state Gazetted Officers Association (TSGOA) ney Chief Minister Mr. K. ChandarShekar Rao ke mosooma aik maktoob mein appeal ki ke alhdah Telangana riyasat tehreek ke douran sarkari mulazmeen ke khilaaf Anti Corruption Bureau ke darj kard hay tamam muqadmaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar ki jaye. union ny id-daa kya ke congress hukoomat ny makhsoos ohdedaron ko is waqt nishana banaya tha. is zimn mein Anti Corruption Bureau ka kehna hai ke mehakma ko mossola shikayaat aur shawahid ki asaas par muqadmaat darj kiye gaye they. cheif minister ko paish kardah maktoob mein 25 muqadmaat ki fehrist paish ki gayi jin se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne ki khwahish ki gayi. zaraye ny inkishaaf kya ke cheif minister ki janib se is zimn mein misbet rad-e-amal zahir kya gaya. ae si bi ny 2013 aur 2014 mein paanch sarkari mulazmeen ke khilaaf ghair mhsob asasa jaat rakhnay ka ilzaam aed karte hue muqadmaat darj kiye they aur rishwat letay hue pakdae jaaney par 21 ohdedaron ke khilaaf muqadmaat darj kiye they. TSGOA ke ohdedaron ka yeh Aiqan hai ke alhdah Telangana riyasat ki taied karne par un ohdedaron ko nishana banaya gaya aur congress hukoomat ny un ke khilaaf intiqami karwai ki hai. jin sarkari ohdedaron ke khilaaf muqadmaat darj kiye gaye un mein tea nrsmha senior assistant Osmania University, S Samba Shaiva Rao district education officer Nizaam abad, mandal education officer jadho Rao’ Gopal Karishna lecturer, jee kamaraa -swami assistant engineer mehakma aab paashi, assistant take officer K. Rajeshwar Rao aur A. Jagadish d EO shaamil hain. Sadar TSGOA mister Padma charee ny kaha ke mutahidda aandhra pradesh riyasat mein alhd_h Telangana riyasat tehreek mein sargaram kirdaar ada karne walay Telangana ke sarkari mulazmeen ko nishana banaya gya aur siyasi mukhasimat mein un ke khilaaf ghair mhsob asasa jaat aur mujremana ikhlaq suzi ke tehat muqadmaat darj kiye gaye. un mein aksar muqadmaat hanooz jari hain chunkay tehqiqaat jari hain. jin ohdedaron ke khilaaf yeh muqadmaat darj kiye gaye hain un mein aksar wazifa par subukdosh bhi ho chukay hain magar un ke khilaaf muqadmaat hanooz zaire tasfia hain. hum cheif minister se darkhwast karte hain ke jin ohdedaron ke khilaaf muqadmaat darj kiye gaye hain un ki jaanch aik rukni commission ke zareya ki jaye aur siyasi mkhasmt ki binaa par ki gayi karwaiyon se dast bardari ikhtiyar ki jaye. taham ae si bi ka is par muaqqaf atal hai ke tamam muqadmaat mabni Bar haqeeqat hain. jame tehqiqaat ke baad akhatta kardah shawahid ki asaas par yeh muqadmaat darj kiye gaye they. rishwat satani ke muqadmaat mein mlzmin ko rishwat letay hue rangay hathon pakra gaya tha. ghair mhsob asasa jaat ke muqadmaat mein dayrktr general Anti Corruption Bureauki manzoori ke baad hi shikayaat ka jaiza liya gyaavr adalat se warrant ke baad hi kiye gaye chapon mein ghair mhsob asasa jaat ka pata chala ya gaya hai. ae si bi ke ohdedaron ka kehna hai ke agar woh dianatdar hain to inhen khaufzadah nahi hona chahiye .
643.title: ACB muqadmaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne Chief Minister se mutalba

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mobile Science Vans jo 200 models aur 500 scienci tajarbaat se lais hon gi ab sadkon par daudnay ke liye tayyar hain. yahan shehar mein aisi do mobile scienci vans ko kal jhandi dikha yi gayi. executive Director United way of Hyderabad raikha Srinivasan ney bataya ke kawal kaam India ke ishtiraaq se United Way of Hyderabad ke shuru kardah Project ‘ Akurti’ ke hissa ke taur par tayyar kardah yeh vans sarkari Schools ke atraaf ghumain gi taakay models aur sciensi tajarbaat ka muzahira kiya jaye jis se science ko behtar tor par samajhney aur seekhnay mein talba komdd miley gi. sarkari Schools ke liye yeh vans’ science lab aan wheels’ ke taur par dastyab rahen gi jis se 16 hazaar talba istifada krpayin ge. aisay hi maqasid ke tehat haal hi mein salana science fair’ Avishkaar’ munaqqid kiya gaya jo mahroom talbat ko apni scienci salahiyaton ka muzahira karne plate form karta hai.’ Avishkaar science fair’ mein mukhtalif sarkari Schools ki 268 bachon ney hissa liya .
655.title: Sarkari Schools ke bachon ke liye mobile science vans

news_detail: Aindah intikhabaat mein brsr r iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke imkani muzahira se mutaliq kurwaye gaye haliya teen survey ke minjumlah do Survey reports mein paish qiyaasi ki gayi ke Telangana riyasat ki 119 Assembly nashiston ke minjumlah brsr e iqtedar TRSko 100 nashistain haasil hon gi. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandar shekhar RAo ney apni hukoomat ki karkardagi ki asaas par aindah intikhabaat mein party muzahira ke baray mein jankari haasil karne teen mukhtalif agencio se namona Survey karwaya tha jis mein lakhoon ki tadaad mein awam se un ki aaraa haasil ki gayi thi. do agencio ke Survey ke nataij bar aamad hogaye hain jin mein hkmran jamaat ko wazeh aksariyat haasil honay ki paish qiyaasi ki gayi hai. un do agencio ke mutabiq TRS ko 119 ke minjumlah taqreeban 100 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hogi jabkay teesray Survey ke nataij hanoz haasil nahi hue hain .
668.title: Teen ke munjmala do Survey mein TRS ki bhaari aksariyat se kamyabi ka ishara

news_detail: Zila Nirmal ke halqa Assembly Mudhole ke moza Basar mein raat der gaye qatal ki sansani khaiz wardaat baab betay ka bahimaana tareeqa par qatal tafseelaat ke mutabiq Mudhole halqa assembly ke moza Basar railway station ke qareeb star un family restaurant ke maalik Ritesh walid Gopinath jo das saal qabal guzarbasar ke liye Basar aeye they kal raat der gaye namaloom afraad ki janib se dohray qatal ki waardaat injaam di gayi qatileen neh pehlay si si TV camera phore kar qatal ki waardaat injaam di gai gala avrhath ki ungelian kaat di gayi is waardaat ke baad ilaqa mean sansani phail gayi zila nirmal ke SP Mr.Vishnu neh media ke numayendon se baat karte hue kaha duhre qatal ka waqia paish aaya har zavia se tehqiqaat ki jarahi he aik hafta ke andar qatileen ko girftar kar lia jayega
689.title: Mudhole ke mouza Basar mein qatal ki sansani khaiz wardaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. / 6 March ( press note ) tlnganh urdu working journalists union ke aik numainda vfdne janab Ather Moueen saddar union ki qayadat mein commissionaire it-tila-aat o taluqaat aama, hukoomat tlnganh Mr. ARavind Kumar se mulaqaat ki aur sahafion ke masail par tafseeli guftagu ki. wafad ne’ tlnganh media Accreditation rolz 2016′ mein payi jaane wali khamion aur urdu sahafion ke sath rava rakhay gay imtiazi sulooq se waaqif kerwatay hue is khsos mein jari jee o am s number 239 morkh_h 2016-07-15 par nazar sani karne ki khwahish ki. inhen bataya gaya ke is jee o mein jo miyaar ikhtiyar kya gaya hai is ki wajah se Mutwast aur chhootey pemana ke akhbarat khaas kar urdu akhbarat ke ilawa urdu news channels ke sath na-insafi honay lagi hai, jis ka hatmi khmyazh sahafi baradri ko uthana prhrha hai. wafad ne bataya ke sahafion ko Accreditation kards ki ajrayi ke liye akhbarat ke circulation ko miyaar banaya gaya hai jis ki wajah se kam tadaad mein shaya honay walay mayaari akhbarat bhi zad mein aagaye hain. hona to yeh chahiye ke circulation ke ilawa aik akhbar aur tally vision channels ko darkaar zaroorat ke mutabiq sahafion ko Accreditation kards jari kiye jayen. inhen bataya gaya ke Accreditation kards ki ajrayi ko akhbarat aur channels ke empanelment se marboot nah kya jaye. circulation aur nazreen ki tadaad ko sirf sarkari ishtiharaat ki ajrayi mein hi malhooz rakha jaye. waza kardah qawaid mein akhbarat aur news channels ki jis andaaz mein darja bandi ki gayi hai is ki wajah se urdu zabaan ke akhbarat aur tally vision channels buri terhan mutasir hue hain aur khaas kar mandal satah par urdu sahafion ko Accreditation kards ka husool namumkin hogaya hai. commissionaire it-tila-aat o taluqaat aama ko jee o ke hawala se bataya gaya ke kis terhan urdu zabaan ke akhbarat aur news channels ke sath imtiazi sulooq kya gaya hai. wafad ne khwahish ki ke jee o mein apane gay mayarat par nazar sani ki jaye aur tamam zabaan ke akhbarat aur tally vision channels ke liye yaksaa policy aur miyaar ikhtiyar kya jaye aur mandal satah par Accreditation kards jari kiye jayen. ilawa azeen khabron ki tarseel karne walay web portals ke liye bhi Accreditation kards ki ajrayi ke liye aik policy Madoon ki jaye. agarchay reyasti satah par hyderabad mein chand makhsoos news portals ke liye Accreditation kards jari kiye jarahay hain taham zilai satah par inhen tasleem nahi kya ja raha hai. wafad ne Mr. ARavind Kumar se khawhish  ki ke reyasti aur zilai sthon par qaim kardah media Accreditation cometion mein urdu ki numaindagi ko yakeeni banaya jaye chunkay reyasti satah ki committee aur beshtar azlaa ki cometion ki miyad khatam hochuki hai is liye nai cometion ki tashkeel ke mauqa par deegar yoninon ke numaindon ke sath tlnganh urdu working journalists union ke numaindon ko bhi shaamil kya jaye. Mr. ARavind kumar ne sahafion ke masail ki tahhaamul se samaat ki aur yaqeen dilaya ke tamam zabanon ke liye yaksaa miyaar ikhtiyar kya jaye ga aur kisi ke sath bhi mehez zabaan ki bunyaad par imtiaz nahi kya jaye ga. unhon ne bataya ke woh is khsos mein bohat jald aik jaiza ijlaas munaqqid karen ge. wafad mein Mrs Mohammad Abdul Sajid Mairaaj sarparast, Ather Moin saddar, Layeequddin secretary general, Mirza Ghanni Baig secretary, Syed Wajd Ali Hussaini Khazen , Syed Chaand Pasha riyasti rukan amila , Mohammad Shafi Saddar zila Waqarabad, Mohammad Naseemuddin Wsim, Mohammad Naseer, Mohammad Akram arkaan bhi mojood they. is mauqa par commissionaire ko aik tehreeri Mahzar bhi paish kya gaya .
704.title: Urdu Sahafion ke sath rava naansafyon par TUWJU ki numaindagi

news_detail: qayadat’ sahaafat aur mohabbat ka junoon kuch aisa hota hai ke is mein ensaan ko –apne lut jan_e_ ka tak ehsas nahi hota. jis kisi ko un mein se koi aik rog lag jaye to woh yato bulandiyon par poanch kar apni manzil palita hai ya phir dar dar ki thokrain khata phirta hai magar –apne junoon se ba’az nahi aata. un mahdanon mein chand hi aisay hotay hain jinhein apni manzil maqsood mil jati hai aur jo log nakaam ho jatay hain woh apna rasta tabdeel nahi karte balkay apni saari zindagi –apne junoon ki Nazar kardete hain. jahan taq mohabbat mein kamyabi ka talluq hai is ka ziyada tar daroo madaar qismat aur mehbooba ki nazar iltifaat par hota hai magar maabaqi do mahdanon yani qayadat aur sahaafat mein kamyabi mein qismat ke sath sath fard ki salahiyat aur is ki mahaarat ka bhi bara dakhal hota hai. sahaafat mein to mawaqay ka sahih istemaal aur apni salahiyaton ko broe car lana parta hai magar siyasat ka maamla kuch aur hi hai. fi zamana siyasat mein ya to woh log bulandiyon par poanch jatay hain jin ke paas be tahasha doulat hoti hai ya phir woh log kamyabi ki seedhiyan tye kar lete hain jinhein –apne siyasi aaqaon ko khush rakhnay ka saleeqa ajatha hai aur aaj kal doulat se mahroom wohi siyasi qaideen parwan charhtay hain jo –apne siyasi aaqaon ki shehwani khwahisaat ki takmeel karte hain ya phir un ki khushamdi ko apna Shewa bnalite hain. deegar siyasi partiyon ke maqabil congress mein yeh culture aam hai magar brsr Iqtidaar TRS mein bhi yeh culture taizi se farogh parha hai. siyasat mein qadam rakhtay hi bohat jald ohday haasil karlena congress aur TRSmein doosri partiyon ke maqabil kuch asaan hai. doulat ke istemaal ya phir siyasat balkay yun kaha jaye to ghalat nahi hoga ke’ congress’ ke taqazoon ko poora karne walay hi taraqqi krpate hain magar jo siyasi qaideen aisay harbe ikhtiyar karne mein aar mehsoos karte hain woh nazar andaaz kar diye jatay hain. brsr Iqtidaar party se talluq rakhnay walon ko party ke ilawa sarkari   Corporations, Boards, Academies aur Commission ke naamzad ohdon par Faiz kiye jan_e_ ki tawaqqa hoti hai aur un dinon TRSparty mein aisay qaideen ki bhi aik taweel fehrist hai jinhein party se wafadaari ka koi sila nahi mila hai chunkay inhen –apne siyasi aaqaon ko khush karne ka saleeqa nahi aata aur nah hi un ke paas doulat ke ambaar hain. yahi wajah hai ke jawani ki dehleez par qadam rakhnay ke sath sath alhd_h tlnganh tehreek ka hissa ban’nay walay aur TRSparty mein shamoliat ikhtiyar karne walay qaideen ke balon mein chandi ki lakerain aagai hain magar un ki shoreedgi mein koi kami nahi aayi. party se wafadaari ka inhen sirf yeh sila diya gaya ke party ke chand tanzeemi ohday ataa kar diye gaye jin ka party mein hi koi maqam nahi hota chunkay yeh ohday aik do qaideen ko nahi balkay darjanon qaideen mein baant dyie jatay hain. is ke barkhilaf aisay qaideen jo Fayazi ka muzahira karte hain ya phir –apne siyasi aaqaon ko khush rakhnay ka saleeqa jantay hain woh barri taizi se taraqqi krjate hain aur barray barray sarkari ohday haasil kar lete hain. aisay qaideen ki party mein koi lambi Umar nahi hoti hai balkay kuch to aisay hotay hain jo ohda panay ke baad party ki rukniat haasil karte hain. yeh bhi dekha gaya hai ke aqliati idaron mein ohda panay deputy cheif mnstr se rishta daari hi kaafi hai. yahi nahi balkay agar woh Fayazi par utar ayen to doosri party se talluq rakhnay walon ko bhi Nawaz dete hain. is ke barkhilaf party ke tain nihayat hi mukhlis avrapni zindagi ka qeemti waqt waqf kardainay walay wafadar qaideen jahan se –apne siyasi career ka aaghaz karte hain wahein lakeer taktey reh jatay hain. TRSparty ko aik terhan se yeh aizaz haasil hai ke is ko aisay sanjeeda aur wafadar karkun miley hain jo kisi bhi soorat mein party ka sath nahi chortay’ chahay un ke sath kitni hi na ansafyan kyun nah ho, chunkay woh thriki mizaaj ke haamil hain. cheif mnstr mister ke Chandar shikhr rau ny nai riyasat ke qiyam ke sath hi Iqtidaar haasil kar lanay ke baad party ko mustahkam karne ke maqsad se oppostion partiyon khaas kar congress aur tlgo dishm party se talluq rakhnay walon ki barri tadaad ko apni wafadaariyan tabdeel karne ki kamyaab targheeb di aur inhen rijhaane aala ohdon par Faiz bhi kardiya. khaas kar muslim qaideen ka aik aisa bhi tabqa raha hai jo museebat ke daur mein party ka sath nahi chorra. yeh qaideen is waqt bhi TRS Headquarters’ Telangana Bhavan’ mein ghanton waqt gzarte they jab is ke khandhar hojane ke assaar peda hogaye they. alhd_h riyasat ki tashkeel se qabal halaat kuch aisay peda hogaye they ke nai riyasat ki tashkeel namumkin nazar aa rahi thi, yahi wajah thi ke kayi qaideen party sar garmion se daur rehne lagey they aur aas waqt ki Bar sir Iqtidaar party se khufia taluqaat qaim karliye they. is ke barkhilaf ghareeb qaideen ny apni wafadaari mein kami anay nahi di aur woh party ke liye hamesha seenah super rahay. aisay wafadar qaideen ko ab apni be mayigi ka ehsas honay laga hai. woh yeh sochnay par majaboor hain ke party mein rehtay hue party ki wafadaari karne ki bajaye kisi aur maidan mein apni qismat aazamaa_e hotay to woh kahan se kahan poanch jatay .
714.title: T R S ke wafadar qaideen na-insafi ka shikaar

news_detail: ” naye Yaroshallam ‘ ‘ tehreek ki nigehain Hasheesh ki pedawar ke garh ke qareeb teen mashriqi riyasaton ko zairnagoon karne par tiki hui hain. manshiat peda karne walay duniya ke sab se barray khitta, hndstan aur fouji annan mumlikat myanmar ke darmain waqay barma ke sunehri masalas ke wast mein aaj Israel ki doosri mumlikat ka baqaida ghair mullana qiyam taqreeban mukammal hochkahe jo insani mustaqbil ka haqeeqi namona hai .

kahin aur nahi balkay hndstan mein doosri Israeli mumlikat ki tashkeel ki paishgi sargarmia azhar mann al-shams hain. taqreeban har kisi ko yaad hoga ke 1948 hamza mein kis terhan pehli Israeli mumlikat wujood mein aayi thi aur tab se –apne parosion aur is ke rasta mein haail mmlkton ka qatal aam jari hai .

hindustani mohibbeen e watan ki janib se barson se yeh mutala kya ja raha hai ke himalaya ke daman mein teen dahon se baqaida siyasi makhfi tahrikaat jari hain aur hndstan ke teen mashriqi sobon ke wasion ko Yahoodi bananay’ ‘ Israel ke rabyon ( mazhabi pishwaon )’ ‘ ki janib se jarehana koshishen jari hain .

dakkan kranikl naay yeh ittila di thi ke kangaal isaai’ muslim aur Mazahir parast ko’ ‘ muqaddas ghusal’ ‘ ke bahanay yahodi rabbi Israel ka dora karwane aur rozgaar ke muaqqaf ki peshkash karte hain aur phir dahqanion ke vote kharidte hain’ muqami Boards par ghalba haasil karte hain aur apni kaarpardazion ko jaaiz thehranay qawaneen Manzoor karte hain. bilkul wohi harba jo har jagah ikhtiyar kya gaya .

yahodi banker o sanatkar Rothschild ki doulat ki saltanat ki is geographiyai siyasi tosee ki yaksaniyat Myanmar ke fouji jurnilon ki janib se chalaye jaaney walay sadiiyon qadeem afiyoon ki pedawar y khitta ke qareeb chain aur hndstan ke ke bilkul qalb mein nai Israeli mumlikat ke qiyam se hai aur junoob mashriqi asia is khitta ke logon ke liye badgumah hai chunkay Sharq wasti mein Israel ke parosion mein Adam istehkaam is ki wazeh Daleel hai. yeh faramosh nahi karna chahiye ke duniya ka sab se qadeem karkard tail ka maidan is ilaqa mein waqay hai aur triporh riyasat ki zameen ke neechay qudrati gas ka zakheera hai. yeh tareekh hai agar Americi jantay hain to yeh un ke liye baais sharam hai .

hmachl pradesh ki himaliyai riyasat ke mohibbeen watan is khitta ku saazish ka duniya ka naya mabda qarar dete hain. hind. tabbet sarhad par har baradri mein Israeli sanat ki rahnumai karte dikhayi dete hain. khobsorat sarhadi ilaqa ki taaza tareen khabrain yeh hai ke chain naay jab se Tibbet ku gasab kar liya hai tab se hi dharam shalh tbti dilae lama ka dar haqeeqat dar-al-hakoomat bana sun-hwa hai. duniya ke chand sarkardah qaideen aur hollywood adakar ( jaisay richard jair ) yahan ka waqatan foqtan dora karte rehtay hain. is pur aman hisson mein 20, 000 se zayed Israeli kya kar rahay hain? manale town aur is ke atraaf waqay mawaziyaat mein kayi log abrani zabaan boltay hain. dharam shalh ke qareeb zayed az10  mawziyaat ko Israyilyon naay –apne zair ngin karliya hai. aik arsa se yeh maloom hai ke si aayi ae se dilae lama khateer salana stipend haasil karte hain aur himalaya ke kinare kinare Kashmir ke ladah se shumal mashriqi hndstan mein aronachl ki patti par aik azad badhai mumlikat tashkeel dainay ka mansoobah bnarhe hain .

barray mashriqi asiayi mndyon ke wast mein naye Israeli haq ki tashkeel Pakistan aur Afghanistan par Amrici fouji hamlon par nai roshni daalti hai jo Sharq wasti mein musalmanoon ke khilaaf is ki jung’ yahodi ghalba walay siyasi jabar aur zulm o sitam se bohat ziyada mamaslat rakhti hai .

mizorm’ money poor aur nagalind yeh teen reastain Myanmar ki sarhad par waqay hain jahan bad-qamash anasir ki yahodi manhoos karpardaziyaan ayaan hogayi hain. mili guzzet online naay is ko ujagar kiya hai. is khitta mein America ke qadam jamanay se mutaliq kayi mshahdin ke is darina shuba ko is waqt taqwiyat pohanchi jab nagalind. aasam dhmakon ke fori baad baghair madoo kiye hukoomat aasam ki madad ke liye America dora chala aya. is ujlat mein America naay nai Dehli ko nazar andaaz karte hue raast tor par cheif mnstr aasam se rabt peda kya tha .

kayi bairooni mumalik Bashmole chain avrbnglh daish se ghira sun-hwa shumal mashriqi khitta is darja mein waqay hai jo uncle Saam ki makhsoos geographiyai siyasi hikmat e amli ke lehaaz se mozoon hai. khitta par ghalib isaai mili tnt groups samgha jata hai ke aik aisa mahol peda kar rahay hain jo is khitta se dilchaspi rakhnay walay fariqain ke liye mawafiq saazgaar hoon. samgha jata hai ke America mein church ki pusht panahi rakhnay wali qayadat is khitta mein ilhaami buliyan lagati rehti hai ya phir kisi nah kisi bahanay raast mulawis hoti rehti hai. kayi logon ka shuba hai ke Christian Missionaries ( jin ki aksariyat America ki hai aur un mein se beshtar esaiyat ke masoom mubalagh nahi hain balkay America ke aalmi nazriya se marboot hain jaissa ke vjye prasad naay front line ke 12-25 feb ke shumara mein –apne mazmoon mein izhaar kya hai ) aur mizorm aur money poor mein kayi qbayilyon ki yahudion ki hesiyat se shanakht ki jari tehreek ke darmain sazshi mafahmat hai ( jis ka qabal azeen mili guzzet mein inkishaaf kya ja chuka hai ). is ke daur ras nataij bar aamad honay walay hain .

Aizal ka aik parcham ke sath 0. 25 million kaarkunon ka haamil Chhinlung Israel peoples convention shumal mashriq mein aik’ ‘ naya Yaroshallam ‘ ‘ qaim karne ki tawaqqa kar raha hai. aalmi yahoodiyat ke liye aik’ ‘ marboot’ ‘ rukan ki hesiyat se no yahudion ( gumshudaa qbayili nasal ke insanon ) ko hatmi tor par qabil bananay ke liye un ki’ ‘ tatheer’ ‘ karne yahodi rbyon ka rela mizorm aur money poor aarhahe. convention ke sadarnasheen ka Towraati peshion goi ke’ ‘ poooray’ ‘ honay ki toseeq karte hue kehna hai’ ‘ torait ( qadeem wasiyat nama ) bayan karta hai ke aik muqaddas zameen maghrib mein aur aik mashriq mein hogi.’ ‘ ( di wake, / 12 September 2004 ). aur yeh naya yeroshalem khitta ke deegar logon ki qeemat par shumal mashriq mein wujood mein aayahe .

Bangladesh ke shumal o mashriq mein yeh hndstan ka daur daraaz khitta un talq yaadon par parda daaley hue hai jisay niilii qatal aam se mosoom kya jata hai’ hindustani rehnuma indra gandhi ko vote dainay ke baad yeh wada kiya gaya tha keh musalman mehfooz rahen ge is ke bawajood is nasal kash fasadaat mein zayed az 1500 musalmanoon ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya gaya. mutadid hukoomaton ki janib se ki gayi tehqiqaat’ saazision aur is ke pas parda muharikaat ka pata chalanay mein nakaam rahen. niilii qatal aam ki saleeqa se ghalat taweel paish kar di gayi is liye ke muslim aur desi Tiyoos  aik dosray ke dushman nahi hain. aisa hi nateeja Mumbai mein paish aaya’ machine ginu se lais 60 kmandoz yahodi Shah abad haoz par charhai kiye. nihayat hi tarbiyat Yafta aur asleha se bhar poor lais chand dehshat gard / 26 November 2008 hamza ko Mumbai mein teen sarkardah mukhalif dehshat gard police ohdedaron ko halaak karne aur aam shehrion par golian barsane ke baad chand ahem imaraat aur hotlon mein daakhil hogaye. aik baar bhi Shah abad haoz ki tahaqeeq kyun nahi ki gayi? musalmanoon ko hirasat mein liya gyalikn khardaar taar khenchnay walay yahudion ko khuli chhuut day di gayi’ Amrici home land sikoriti ki tareekh par nazar rakhnay walay zaar rabbi Michael cheer taf naay 9 / 11 saneha ke fori baad 60 Israeli mushtaba dehshat gardon ki fehrist jari ki thi. globalresearch. ca ke professor Michael chaso Dowski is baat par zor dete hain ke hndstan bhar mein silsila waar dehshat gard hamlon ka maqsad ( alif ) androon hind musalmanoon aur hndon ke darmain samaji khaleej peda karna’ (bay ) Hind aur pak ke darmain tanao barhana’ ( j ) Pakistan ke andar Amrici fouji karwaiyon ke liye sharait peda karna ( jo hnoz jari hain ) aur janoobi o mashriqi asia mein mudakhlat ko wusat dena hai .

hndstan ke mashriq baeed mein yahudion ki rasai ke talluq se dakkan kranikl naay yeh bhi report di ke Churachandpur ke aik church leader Mr. Ail Thingore’ yahoodiyat ikhtiyar karne ki wahid wajah muashi qarar dete hain. Mr. Finai naay kaha kay tabdeeli mazhab ki taqreeb ke masarif bani Israel ke 10 gumshudaa qbayil ko Bazyab karne wali aik tanzeem Shaavi Israel ke tavassut se hukoomat Israel bardasht karti hai .

darin asna is makhfi yahodi mudakhlat ke khilaaf saf aarai karne walay woh hindustani hain jo hatmi idraak ke tor par ma qabl Bartanwi hndstan ki bahaali ko saari duniya ke liye aik misali muashra ki hesiyat se dekhte hain jo Nagaland mein naye Yaroshallam taamer karne yahodi mansoobon ke maqabil aik nihayat hi mozoon rad-e-amal dikhayi ditahe. yahi nahi balkay is sadiiyon qadeem zeher se jo yahodi Khusravi kehlata hai nijaat haasil karne aur aik aisa malik taamer karne ka bhi behtar rasta hoga jis mein aap ki Sayanat ke liye baghair musallah guards ke aik ghar ki taamer mehfooz hogi chunkay aap naay kisi aur ki zameen churali thi .
( makhoz : di mili guzzet )
725.title: Hindustaan mein doosri Yahodi mumlikat ki upach

news_detail: Sadar Majlis Ittehaad ul Muslimeen o rukan Parliament Hyderabad Mr.  Asaduddin Owaisi ney markazi hukoomat se mutalba kya ke aik aisa qanoon nafiz kya jaye jis se Hindustani musalmanoon ko Pakistani mosoom karna mstojb saza jurm qarar paay. saddar jamhooria ke khutba pst tahrik e tashakkur par Lok Sabha mein mubahis mein hissa letay hue hidraabadi rukan parliment ney kaha ke aik aisa qanoon nafiz kya jana chahiye jis ke zareya hindustani musalmanoon ko Pakistani qarar dainay par teen saal qaid ki saza di jaye. unhon ney kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke nrindr moodi ki zair qayadat bi jay pi hukoomat aisa koi qanoon Madoon karne parliment mein koi bil paish nahi kere gi .
735.title: Hindustani Musalmanoon ko Pakistani kehnay walon ko jail bhaij diya jaye : Asad Owaisi

news_detail: Aaj se taqreeban 45 baras qabal 31

decemeber 1973 ko “Zumara” nami aik bahri jahaaz Dubai ke saahil par langar andaaz huwa to is mein aik 17 sala Bharati naujawan Yousuf Ali bhi sawaar tha jo deegar mutadid ghareeb afraad ke sath “rozi roti” ki talaash mein yahan pahoncha tha, os waqt koi nahi jaanta tha ke yeh naujawan anay walay waqt mein Dubai ka aik ahem tareen aur mashhoor tareen taajir ban jaye ga. Yeh wohi hain jinhein aaj duniya ‘Lulu Group’ ke sadarnashin ki haisiyat se jantee hai. Yousuf Ali ki umar is waqt 62 baras hai aur woh “Lulu Hyper Market” ke naam se stores ki aik chain ke maalik hain. Is ka shumaar Mutahidda Arab Emirate UAE ke mashhoor aur qadeem tareen stores mein hota hai. Rawan baras 18
July ko mazkoorah store ne apni 150

shaakh ka iftitah Saudi Arab ke dar-ul-hukoomat Riyadh mein kya. Lulu Stores ka silsila is waqt 21 mumalik tak phail chuka hai jahan 37 mukhtalif Nationality se talluq rakhnay walay 40 hazaar se ziyada mulazmeen kaam kar rahay hain. Yousuf kehte hain ke kisi bhi ghair mulki naujawan ki terha woh bhi behtar mauqa ke khawab dekhte thay. Unhon ne bataya ke woh kisi nai cheez ki talaash mein UAE aeye thaiy. Yousuf ke mutabiq jis zamana mein woh UAE aeye thaiy us waqt aalami satah ki yeh taraqqi aur shaandaar khidmaat maujood nahi theen jo aaj UAE mein dekhi ja rahi hain. Yousuf ne bataya ke un ke ghar, daftar aur kaam ki kisi jagah bhi air-conditions ki sahoolat muyassar nahi thi jo mausam ki garmi ko kam kar sakay. Alawaazeen sadkain kam theen aur aamad o raft aur naqal wo hamal dushwaar tha. Yousuf ne bataya ke “garam tareen mausam mein hum pooray din zameen par musalsil pani giratay rehtay thay taa ke fiza mein kuch thandak paida ho”. Is purmasahqqat zindagi ke sath aaghaz kar ke Yousuf Ali is waqt “Lulu Hyper Market” ke maalik hain. is Store ki duniya ke mukhtalif hisson mein tijarti sar garmion ke zareya honay wali salana aamdani 7. 42 arab dollar ke qareeb hai. Yousuf Ali ka kehna hai ke un ke andar aik cheez thi jo musalsil yeh bawar karati thi ke UAE aik roz taraqqiyafta aur shaan daar riyasat ban jaye gi. Yousuf ke mutabiq UAE ne tail ki bar aamad se apni taraqqi ka safar shuru kya aur phir mukhtalif noiyat ki tijarti sar garmion ka aik ahem tareen aalami markaz ban gaya. Yousuf kehte hain ke “ibtidayi barson ke sakht dinon neh mujhe sanjeedgi ke sath kaam karne, khud ko waqf kar dainay aur maal ki qader sikhayi”. Inhen Middle East ka Retail King bhi kaha jata hai. Forbes magazine ke mutabiq ameer tareen logon mein Yousuf Ali aalmi satah par 338
muqaam par hain jabkay mutamavvil Hindustanion mein un ka number 27 wan hai. Woh 4.1 billion dollars qader ke asasa jaat ke maalik hain.
606.title: “Dubai pahunchnay walay” Hindustani Muslim” jo chand barson mein arabpati ban gaye

news_detail: Scotland ke shehar Aberdeen ke nazdeek waqay aik qasba mein qismat ke dhAni zaeef jode ko phatay hue Lottery ticket se 110 million NZ Dollars (508 Crores rupay) mil gaye. Bartanwi akhbarat ke mutabiq 67 sala Bartanwi shehri Fred Higgins aur un ki ahliya Lesley Higgins apna Lottery ticket check krwane ke liye muqami store pahunche thay. Lottery Machine chalanay walay naujawan operator ne yeh kehte hue un ka ticket phaad kar kachray ki basket mein pheink diya ke is par inaam nahi nikla hai. Taham machine ne aik tehreeri pegham nikala jis mein kaha gaya ke mazkurah ticket ko sambhaal kar rakha jaye. Store ke muawin nigaran ne phatay hue ticket ke tukde kachray ki basket se nikaal kar wapas Higgins ko day diye. Jumeraat ki subah Higgins aur un ki ahliya ko yeh na qabil e yaqeen khush khabri mili ke un ke ticket ne 5 crore 79 lakh 75 hazar 367 pound ki inaami raqam jeet li hai. Higgins ke mutabiq Lottery ticket do hisson mein taqseem tha magar us par tamam number wazeh taur par maujood thay. Mrs. Higgins ne inaam ki raqam paate hi fauri apni mulazimat se istifa day diya. Unhon ne aik nai car pehlay hi khareed rakhi hai aur Barbados mein dosra ghar kharedne aur Hindustan aur China mein tatilaat guzarnay ki soch rahay hain. Mr. Higgins ne kaha ke Lottery ticket phatt jane ke bawajood bhi woh fikarmand nahi thay ke raqam inhen nahi miley gi. Unhon ne kaha ke woh jantay thay ke yeh aik sachhi ghalti thi.
619.title: Phaad diyie gaye Lottery ticket ne Bartanwi jode ko Crores ka maalik bana diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik ahem tabdeeli Telangana ke wazeer Information Technology, Sanat o Umoor Bairooni Mumalik Mr. K T Rama Rao ko aaj Mutahidda Arab Amarat  (UAE) se mulk ka daura karne ka dawat nama mousool huwa hai. Press Release ke mutabiq UAE ki wizarat Umoor e Kharija ne Telangana ke wazeer ko aik khusoosi dawat nama rawana kya hai. UAE ke Wazeer umoor kharja Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan ne Mr. K T Rama Rao ko mulk ka daura karne ki dawat di hai. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed ne khusoosi tazkara kya ke Hukoomat Telangana ne un ke haliya daura  Hyderabad ke mauqa par inhen behtar baazabaadkari ki peshkash ki thi. Unhon ne kaha ke bahami umoor ki yaksoi ke liye Hukoomat Telangana ko Mutahidda Arab Amarat ki Hukoomat tamam noiyat ki madad o taawun faraham kere gi. Shaik Al Nahyan ne kaha ke hukoomat Telangana ke sath un ki Hukoomat mazeed kaam kere gi aur wazeer se khwahish ki ke taleem, sanat aur tijart ke shouba jaat mein bahami taluqaat ko mazeed mustahkam karne ke liye UAE ka daura karen. Mr. K T Rama Rao ne kaha ke unhon ne UAE Hukoomat ko pehlay hi sanat, tijarat aur Gulf Workers ke masaayel ke baaray mein aagah kardiya hai. Unhon ne UAE se daura ki dawat mousool honay par khushy ka izhaar kya.
630.title: K T Rama Rao ko UAE ka daura karne ki dawat

news_detail: Markazi Hukumat ney aaj un daavon ki tardeed kar di ke China ki ek company ko Hindustani Currency noton ki taba-at ka theka diya gaya hai. Secretary Mahkuma Iqtisadi Umoor Subhash Chandra Garg ney is khusoos mein paidashuda tanazia ke fauri baad kaha ke kisi Cheeni Currency Printing Corporation ko Hindustani Currency Notes ki taba-at ka theka dainey se mutaliq ittila-aat yaksar be buniyad hain. Hindustani Currency Notes Hindustani Hukumat  ki taraf se sirf RBI ke chhapa khaanoon mai chaapay jarahay hain aur aayinda bhi wahein chaapay jayen ge. ‫Yaad rahe ke Cheeni akhbar ‘The South China Morning Post’ ney yeh ittila di ke Cheeni mamlekati milkyat ki haamil company ”China Bank Notes Printing  and Minting Corporation” ko baday paimana par mukhtalif mumalik bashamool Hindustaan Currency Notes ki taba-at ka theka mila hai. Is report mai bataya gaya ke 2013 mein Beijing ney iqtisadi farogh ko ubhaarne ‘Belt and Road’ mansoobah shuru kya jis mai Asia, Europe aur Africa ke 60 mumalik shaamil hain Sadar China.  Bank Notes Printing & Minting Corporation Liu Guisheng ke is bayan ka hawala diya gaya hai ke un ki Company tab se kayi mumalik bashamool Thailand, Bangladesh, Srilanka, Malaysia, Hindustaan, Brazil aur Poland mein Currency Products Projects  ke liye contracts  haasil karne mein kamyaab rahi hai. Aam Aadmi Party ney qabal azeen Markazi Hukumat  se mutaliba kya tha ke woh is terha ka daawa par mabni Cheeni akhbar ki ittila par wazahat paish kere. Party ke qaumi tarjuman Mr. C Raghu Chadha ney iss inkishaaf ko ‘Hindustaan ki qaumi salamti’ aur ‘Iqtisadi salamti’ ke liye bada khatrah’ qarar diya tha aur Wazeer e Azam se istafsaar kya ke public domain par yeh it-tila-aat kyun dastyab nahi hain? Mr. Chadha ney istafsaar kya ‘kya wajohaat hain ke kisi ko androon Mulk yeh kaam sonpne ki bajaye ek bairooni firm se rujoo kya gaya? kya Hindustaan is khsoos mai China se rujoo huwa ya phir apni aalmi asarpadiziri  ko badhaane ke tour par un ke dabaaoo ke agay hum jhuk gay hain? ‘ MR. Chadha ney report ka hawala dete hue kaha ke ek khufia zaraye  neyeh bayan kya ke chand hukumaton ney Beijing se kaha ke maamlat ko aam na kere chunkay unhen khauf hai ke is terha ki it-tila-aat se qaumi salamti ko jokham hogaa aur androon Mulk ghair zaroori mubahis shuru ho jayenge.
645.title: Hindustani Currency Notes China mein nahi chaapay jatay:Hukumat ki wazahat

news_detail: Reseve Bank of India (RBI) ne budh ko jari salana report mein bataya ki November 2016 mein chalan khatam kar diye jane wale ₹ 500 aur ₹ 1,000 qadar ki currency notes 99.3% waapis ho chuki hain. Report ke mutabiq tasdeeq aur hisabaat ke baad ₹ 500 aur ₹ 1,000 qadar ki currency notes ki majmuyi qadar 8

November 2016 ko 15,417.93 lakh crore rupay thi, Jis ke dusre din mazakoora qadar ki currency notes ka chalan barqhast kar diya gaya tha. Gardish se wapas aane wali aysi notes ki majmuyi maliyat 15,310.73 lakh crore rupay rahi hai. RBI data ke mutaabiq March 2018 ko ikhtetaam pazeer maali saal mein zair e gardish Bank Notes ki qadar 37.7% yaane 18,037 lakh crore rupay badhi hai. Mazkura donon qadaron ki notes ko barqhast kar dene ke baad RBI ne 2016-17 mein ₹ 500 aur ₹ 2,000 aur digar qadar ki currency notes ki tabaat par 7,965 crore rupay kharch kiye hain jo is se aik saal kharch ki gayi raqam 3,421 crore rupay se dugni se bhi zayeda hai. RBI ne 2017-18 (July 2017 ta June 2018) 4,912 crore rupay notes ki tabaat par kharch kiye hain. Mazkura currency notes ke chalan ko raaton raat khatam kar dene ka ailaan karate huwe Wazeer e Aazam Mr. Narendra Modi ne ye daawa kiya tha ke iss se kaale dhan , corruption aur fake currency notes ko rokne mein badi madad milegi magar 99.3% zair e gardish notes ki waapsi se un ka daawa galat sabit huwa. Sirf 0.7% currency notes ke waapis na hone se ye baat sabit hojati hai ki hukoomat ke andaaze galat thae jis ke natije mein awaam ko naqabil e bayan koft aur pareshaniyon se dochaar hona pada.
681.title: Mulk mein 99.3% matrooka currency note,RBI ko waapas

news_detail: Damam. Gadiyon aur Motorcycle ke Showroom, bachon aur mardon ke malbosaat, gharelo furniture aur bartanon ki dukanain naye saal yani 1
Mohram 1440 h mutabiq 11

September 2018 se Saudization par amal-dar-aamad se qabal hi band hona shuru hogain. Bahut saari dukanain band hoti jarahi hain jin ke malkaan ne intehai riyaati narkhon par samaan farokhut karne ke ishteharaat day diye hain. Wizarat e Mehnat o Samaji Behbood ne 4 tijarati sargarmion mein 70% tak ki Saudization ka faisla nafiz karne ka elaan kar rakha hai. Amal-dar-aamad 11

September se hoga. Mazkoorah dukanon ke malikaan ne samaan sametna shuru kardiya hai. Bohat saari dukanain band hogayi hain. Riyaz , Damam aur Madina Munawwara ke baazaaron mein muzkoorah dukanein  ghair mulki chala rahay thae. Unhen 9 mah qabal Saudization ke faisla se aagah kardiya gaya tha. Achanak dukanain band karna ya mukammal taur par band karne ke liye sara samaan nikalney ka faisla karna saabit kar raha hai ke ziyada tar dukanon ke maalik ghair mulki hi thae. Maahir iqtisadiaat Fahad al Sahrf ne Okaz akhbar se guftagu karte hue kaha ke muzkoorah 4 shobon mein Saudiization ke faisla par amal-dar-aamad se Saudion ke naam se ghair mulkion ka 30 % kaarobar khatam hojaye ga. Al Ashrafi ne berozgari ke masla ke hal se mutaliq aik sawal ke jawab mein kaha ke muzkoorah faislon ki badaolat Saudi khawateen aur mardon ke liye rozgaar ke naye mouqaye paida hunge. Senkdroon Saudion ko rozgaar mil jaye ga. Aik aur maahir iqtisad Abdulaziz Sharufna ne kaha ke baaz paishon ki Saudiization muqami shehrion aur qaumi iqtesadiat ke mafaad mein hogi. Retail ki market 375 arab ryial ki hai. Iss mein kam azkam 10 lakh mulaazimaten milein gi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke yeh mansoobah Saudi Vision 2030 ko madd e nazar rakh kar banaya gaya hai. Mumlikat ke teen badey shehron Riyaz , Damam aur Madina Munawwara mein muzkoorah charon shobon mein Saudiization ke faisla ke nifaz ke liye tafteeshi amal bhi shuru kardiya gaya hai. Muqami naujawanu ne is azm ka izhaar kya hai ke woh un shobo mein khala paida nahi honay den ge. Kayi naujawan Cars, Motorcycle ke Showroom, bachon aur mardon ke malbosaat, khusboyaat, gharelo o daftari furniture aur bartano ki dukanon par kaam karne lagey hain.
694.title: Saudization par amal-dar-aamad se qabal hi dukanain band honay lagen

news_detail: Iran Uboori muahidey ke tahet aik mah mein chaha Bahar port Bharat ke hawalay kar daiga. Irani wazeer baraye Road and Urban Development Abbas Khandhi ka kehna hai ke hum daidh saal paheley huwe moahide ki takmeel ke liye chaha Bahar Bharat ke hawalay karne ke liye bilkul tayyar hain. Abbas Khandhi inn dinon Mobilti Summit mein shirkat ke liye Bharat mein maujood hain. Wazeh rahay ke Chaha Bahar Port ke phelay phase ka iftetah Decemeber 2017 mein Irani sadar Hasan Rohani ney kiya tha.
708.title: Iran ka chaha Bahar Port jald Bharat ke hawala kardiya jaye ga

news_detail: Madina Munawwara. Madina Munawwara ki khajooren duniya e islam ke gooshay gooshay mein pasand ki jati hain. 60 Mumalik Madina Munawwara se khajooren daraamad kar rahay hain. Urdu news ke mutabiq un mein United Arab Emirates sar e fehrist hai. Turkey dosray aur Kuwait Teesray number par hai. Madina Munawwara ke kashtkaar jariya saal Emirates, Turkey aur Kuwait ko 91 hazaar ton se ziyada khajooren baraamad karen ge. Muzkoorah Mumalik ney 2017 mein 700 Million Riyal se ziyada ki 140 hazaar ton se ziyada khajooren daraamad ki theen. Madina Munawwara bayin ul aqwami khajoor Mela se waaqif kaaron ney tawaqqu zahir ki hai ke Mumlikat mein iss saal Madina Munawwara se iss ki paidawar ka 35% baraamad kere ga. Madina Munawwara mein 2018 ke dauraan 260 hazaar ton khajooren paida huwi hain. Aik tajir Sulton Sulehim ney bataya ke duniya ke kisi bhi Shaher ke muqabaley mein sab se ziyada Madina ke khajoor pasand ki jati hai. Madina mein khajoor ke darakht 30 lakh se ziyada hain. Duniya bhar ke Musalman Madina khajoron ko mubarak samajte hain. Saudi Export Board ney report di hai ke 2016 ke muqaable mein 2017 mein khajooren 20%  ziyada baraamad ki gayeen. Saudi Agricultural Development  Fund khajoor ke mansoobon par 800 Million Riyal se ziyada ka sarmaya lagaye huwe hai.
717.title: Madina Munawwara se 140 hazaar ton khajooren baraamad

news_detail: New Delhi. Secretary Financial Services Mr. Rajiv Kumar ney peer ko kaha ke markazi hukoomat ney teen sarkari Banks Dena Bank, Vijaya Bank aur Bank of Baroda ke Inzimam ka faisla kiya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke teen Banks ke Inzimam se yeh Bank Mulk ka teesra bada Bank ban jaye ga. Unhon ney yeh bhi kaha ke Banking sector mein reforms laane ki zaroorat hai aur hukoomat, Banks ki maliyati zaroraton ka khayaal kar rahi hai. Yeh elaan Wazeer Finance Mr. Arun Jaitley ke sath mayshit ke muaqqaf par aik Press Conference ke dauran kiya. Wazeer Finance Mr. Arun Jaitley ney kaha ke hukoomat ney mawazna mein elaan kiya tha ke hamaray ayindah agenda mein Banks ka inzimam bhi hai aur is khosos mein pahelay iqdaam ka elaan kiya gaya hai. Mr. Jaitley ney kaha ke kisi bhi mulazim ko manfi sharayet mulazimat ka saamna nahi karna pade ga. Un ke liye behtareen sharayet mulazimat rakhi jayen gi. Mr. Rajiv Kumar ney yeh bhi kaha ke Banking shoba mein baironi Mulk karwaiyon ko maaqool bananey ka amal mukammal taizi se jari hai aur hukoomat aisay iqdamaat karne koshan hain ke jahan tak NPS (Non Performing Assets) ka talluq hai tareekh ka iadah na ho. Mr. Jaitley ney non performing assets par baat karte huwe ilzaam aayed kiya ke Congress ki zair e qayadat UPI hukoomat ney un ko chupaye rakhnay ki 2014 tak koshish karti rahi. Mr. Jaitley ney kaha ke NPS ki haqeeqi surat e haal 2015 mein saamney aayi. UPI ney NPA ko carpet ke neechay dabay rakhi thi.
727.title: Dena Bank, Vijaya Bank aur Bank of Baroda ka Inzimam

news_detail: Khadim Al Harmain Al Sharifain Shah Salman bin Abdulaziz ney Yemen ke markazi Bank ko maali bohraan se bachanay ke liye 20 Crore Dollar ki fauri imdaad faraham karne ki hidaayat ki hai. Yeh imdaad aik aisay waqt mein jari karne ke liye kaha gaya hai jab doosri janib Saudi Arab Yemen mein jung se mutasirah shehrion ki imdaad aur bahaali ke liye kayi dosray mansoobon aur imdadi karwaiyon mein bhi paish hai. Saudi Arab ki sarkari khabar Rasan Agency ‘SPA’ ke mutabiq Shah Salman ki taraf se Yemen ke markazi Bank ko imdaad faraham karne ka maqsad Yemeni Currency ki qeemat mein kami ko rokna aur Bank ko maali bohraan se bachana hai. Saudi Arab ki taraf se Yemen ke markazi Bank ke liye yeh pheli imdaad nahi balkay Yemeni awam ko darpaish iqtisadi boojh kam karne ke liye Saudi Arab Yemen ke markazi Bank ko 3 Arab Dollar ki imdaad faraham kar chuka hai.
739.title: Shah Salman ki janib se Yemen ke markazi Bank ko 20 Crore Dollar ki imdaad

news_detail: Libya ke dar-al-hakoomat Trablus mein do musallah groupon ke darmain tassadum ke douran Trablus ke hawai adda par golah baari se kam az kam 14 civil hawai jahaaz tabah hogaya. mutasirah tayyaron ki qeemat 2 arab dollar batayi jati hai. musallah anasir ki taraf se Trablus ke Mutiqa bain al aqwami hawai adda par golay aur rocket daaghe gay, jis ke nateejay mein wahan par kharray aik darjan se zayd hawai jahazoo mein aag bharak uthi. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq libya ki sarkari fazai company ki taraf se hafta ke din jari kardah aik report mein bataya gaya hai ke company ko Muatiqa  hawai adda par kharray tayyaron ke tabah honay se ghayr-maa’mooli nuqsaan pouncha hai. jumaraat ke roz kiye gay is hamlay mein baaz tayyaray mukammal tour par tabah hue jab ke baaz ko nuqsaan pouncha hai. company ka kehna hai ke hawai adday ko do musallah groupon ke darmain larai ke douran nishana banaya gaya. larai mein 3 Airbus A320 mukammal tabah hogaye. un ki maliyat 97 million dollar batayi jati hai jab ke 95 million dalrka A318 aur 90 million dollar maliyat ka A319 model ke do tayyaray tabah hogaye. A321 ayyrbs ke do tayyaray jin ki maliyat 11 crore dollar se zayd hai tabah hogaye. neez Airbus300 / 200 ki maliyat, 333 million dollar, Airbus300 / 800 ki maliyat 20 crore 54 laakh, Airbus300 / 330 ki maliyat 20 crore 59 laakh aur Airbus900 / 300 ki maliyat 20 crore 90 laakh dollar banti hai yeh bhi tabah hogaye. guzashta hafta do musallah groupon ke darmain tassadum ke douran Alburaq Airlines ke bowing company ke do hawai jahaaz golah baari se mutasir hue they. khayaal rahay ke Trablus guzashta kayi mah se kasheedgi ki lapait mein hai jahan aik taraf hukoomat aur shiddat pasand aapas mein nbrd aazma hain wahein baaz intahaa pasand tanzeemen aik dosray ke khilaaf bhi lar rahi hain. Trablus ka Muatiqa  hawai adda wizarat dakhla ke zair e intizaam’ special defence force’ ke zirkntrol hai jab ke shehar mein sargaram Tajura  4 Nami aik group bhi hawai adda par hamlay karta rehta hai .
691.title: Libya mein do musalalh groupon mein tassadum 14 hawai jahaaz tabah

news_detail: Jodhpur. Jodhpur ki darj fehrist aqwam o darj fehrist qbayil adalat ne khud sakhta Godman Baba Asaram ku Jodhpur ke qareeb waqay un ke aashrm mein aik na baligh ladki ki saal 2013 mein ismatdari karne ke ilzaam mein mujrim qarar day dete hue Umar qaid ki saza sunai hai jabkay  Asaram ke maavnin, deegar do Mulzimeen Shlipi aur Shard ko 20 saal ki saza tajweez ki hai. sikoriti wajohaat ki binaa judge Mr. Madhusudan Sharma ne Jodhpur jail ke ihata mein kamrah adalat mein aaj is case ka faisla sunaya. Jodhpur ki adalat ne is muqadma mein apni samaat 7
April ko mukammal karli thi. Rajisthan mein darj aik muqadma mein utar pardesh ke Shah Jehan poor ki aik 16 sala larki ne Jodhpur ke qareeb moza manayi mein waqay Baba ke aashrm mein / 15

augst 2013   ki darmiyani shab is ki asmat raizi karne ka ilzaam aed kya tha.  Asaram ko andor mein girftar karliya gaya tha aur inhen yakam September 2013   ko Jodhpur muntaqil kardiya gaya tha, woh 2

September 2013 se Jodhpur ki jail mein adalti tehweel mein they. saza sunaye jany ke baad  Asaram ke tarjuman Neelam Dubey ne kaha ke un ki ligl team se mushawarat ke baad woh mustaqbil ka Laiha amal tayyar karen ge. mutasirah larki ke waalid ne adalti faisla ka khermaqdam karte hue kaha ke khandan ko bil akhir insaaf mil gaya. mein chahta hon ke un tamam ka shukriya ka ada karoon. reyasti si aayi d ne 2009   mein  Asaram ke 7 matqdin ke khilaaf qatal ka aik muqadma darj kya tha. Do cousins ke walidain ne shikayat darj karwai thi ke un ke bachon ko  Asaram ke aashrm mein qatal kardiya gaya tha.  Asaram  2008 mein pehli martaba is waqt mushkilaat mein ghar gaye they jab Motera ilaqa mein  Asaram ke aashrm ke Gurukul mein muqeem bachay Dipish aur Abhishek Vaghela ki nashin mushtaba haalat mein aashrm ke qareeb darya ke kinare dastyab huien .
701.title: Asaram Bapu ko Umar qaid ki saza

news_detail: Dubai-bar-e-azam Africa ki abadi 1. 2 arab nafoos par mushtamil hai, Africa ki nisf abadi musalmanoon par hai. un mein aksariyat Shumali Africa mein misar se Moritania tak phaily hui hai. yeh tamam mumalik inqalabi nazriaat ki bar aamad aur androoni mamlaat mein mudakhlat ke hawalay se Iran ke tareeqa car ko jaan gay hain. Africa ke janoobi sehra mein karorron log rehtay hain jin ko taleem sameit bunyadi khidmaat ki shadeed zaroorat hai. aisay mein almstfi university Aima ki tarbiyat aur deegar fikri aur mazhabi sar garmion ke tehat Iran ke taleemi baazu ka kirdaar ada kar rahi hai. is university ka saddar daftar Iran ke shehar Khum  mein hai aur usay barah e raast rehbar aala Ali Khamna ki nigrani mein chalaya ja raha hai. duniya ke mukhtalif braazmon ke kam az kam 60 mumalik mein is university ki shaakhen hain jahan 40 hazaar Aima ki tarbiyat ki jarahi hai. is ke ilawa aakhri das barson mein university ke Iran mein markaz aur beron mumalik shaakhon se taqreeban 45 hazaar talba farigh althsil hue. Africa ke 17 mumalik mein university ki markazi shaakhen hain. un ko 30 mumalik ki zeli shaakhon ki support haasil hai. un ke tehat majmoi tor par 100 islami madaris aur marakaz ka intizam o insaram chal raha hai. is waqt almstfi university ki Iran aur Iran se bahar shaakhon mein 6 hazaar africi mazhabi shaksiaat asbaq aur korsz mein shareek hain. Africa ka kirdaar” falahi aur taleemi” pehloun taq mehdood nahi balkay Iran ke liye is ka ahem tareen kirdaar aik aisay plate form ke tor par hai jahan se jangju tanzeemon ko missile aur hathyaar beje ja saken. yaad rahay ke Israeli laraka tayyaron ne october 2012 hamza mein soudan ke andar Iran se marboot aik ahem karkhana tabah kar diya tha. ilawa azeen Saudi arab aur Yemen ke maghrib mein waqay Africi mulk jebuti  bhi t_hran ka aik ahem Haleef raha. Iran ne is ki bandargahen haasil karne ke maqabil wahan parliment aur aik tijarti markaz bananay par karorron dollar kharch kar daaley. Jebnuti ke misali mehal wuqoo ke sabab Iran Hauthion ko hathyaar pohanchanay ke liye aik misali rasta yakeeni bananay mein kamyaab ho gaya. Jebuti abnaye baab Almundab ke nazdeek waqay hai jo behar Ahmar ko khaleej din se milati hai. kuch arsa qabal Jebuti ne Iran se taluqaat khatam kar ke apni bndrgahon ko band kar diya aur arab ittehaad ka paband ho gaya. kayi Africi hukoomaton ne jis mein nigeria numaya tareen hai irani hathyaaron aur golah barood ki khipon ko zabt kya jo Falasteeni aur africi anasir ke wastay ja rahi theen. is douran irani pasdaran inqilab se talluq rakhnay walay garohoon ka bhi inkishaaf kya gaya. Iran –apne dast raast yani labnani malaysia hizab Allah ko bhi istemaal kar raha hai jo Africa aur lateeni America hijrat karne wali labnani Shiah community ke halqon mein asar o rasookh ki haamil hai .

Africi aur lateeni America ki hakoomaten bohat baar hizab Allah ke zair e intizam garohoon ka inkishaaf kar chuki hain jo money laundering ke dhnde ko sambhale hue hain aur hathyaaron aur manshiat ki tijarat aur smuggling mein mulawis hain. Africa ke istehsal ka Iran ke khatarnaak johri programme ki paish Raft mein ahem kirdaar raha. Iran ne Namibia, Mulavi aur bilkhushoos nayijr ki kaanon se nikalay janay walay yoranim par bharpoor tareeqay se haath saaf kya. irani wazeer kharja Jawad zareef ke bar-e-azam Africa ke aakhri doray mein yeh baat wazeh tor par samnay aayi ke t_hran aqwam mutahidda aur is ki zeli cometion mein africi voton ko akhatta karne ke liye koshan hai. saal 2011 hamza se 2013 hamza ke darmain kalay dhun ko safaid bananay ke scandal ke baad Babak  Zanjani aur Raza Zirab ke net works ke khatmay se inkishaaf sun-hwa ke ghanaa sonay ke aik ahem zariye ke tor par Iran ke liye kitni ziyada ahmiyat rakhta hai. aqwam mutahidda aur kayi bain al aqwami halqon aur plate forms mein janoobi Africa ne bohat baar Iran ke haq mein vote diya .
711.title: barr-e-azam Africa mein Iran ka barhta  assar v nufooz

news_detail: Dubai . qaabiz sehyuni fouj naay Palestine ke maqboza maghribi kinare ke shumali shehar janeen mein aik Falasteeni muzahmat kaar Ahmed Qanba ke makaan ko dhamaka khaiz mawaad se ura diya jis ke nateejay mein ghrmin rehne walay afraad makaan ki chhat se mahroom ho gay. Aini shahideen naay bataya ke mangal ko Ali alsbah Israeli fouj ki bhaari nafri naay janeen ki Albastbin, janeen camp aur shahrah hifa par dhawa bola aur aseer Falasteeni Ahmed Khanba ke makaan ka muhasra kar liya. khayaal rahay ke Israeli fouj naay Ahmed Khanba ko rawan saal January mein hirasat mein liya tha. is par ilzaam hai ke is naay 9 January ko aik yahodi rabbi ‘Ryzyyyl syfah’ ko Gilad hauat colony ke qareeb qatal kar diya tha. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq guzashta roz Israeli fouj naay intiqami karwai ke tehat aseer Qanba ke makaan ka muhasra kya. is ka ghar pehlay hi khaali kara liya gaya tha. muhasray ke baad aas paas ke makanaat ko bhi khaali karaya. is ke baad is mein jagah jagah barood nasb kya aur zor daar dhamakay se ura diya. makaan ki msmari ki aik footage zaraye ablaagh par bhi Nashar ki gayi hai jis mein makaan ko malbay ke dhair mein dekha ja sakta hai. khayaal rahay ke qaabiz shyoni fouj ke hatohn kisi Falasteeni khandan ke makaan ki msmari ka yeh pehla mauqa nahi. is terhan ke waqeat ab roz ka mamool ban chuke hain. shyoni fouj mamooli noiyat ke waqeat ki aarr mein flstinyon ke gharon ko dhamaka khaiz mawaad se masmaar kardeti hai. Israeli fouj guzashta kuch arsay se muzahmati karwaiyon mein mulawis qarar diye gay flstinyon ke ahal khanah ko ijtimai saza dainay ke liye un ke gharon ki msmari ka silsila jari rakhtay hue hai. Israel mein insani haqooq ke liye kaam karne wali tanzeem ‘Btslym’ ke mutabiq sunah 1967 ki jung ke baad 2005 tak Israel naay falistinyon ke secron makanaat masmaar kiye hain jis ke nateeja mein hazaron afraad be ghar hue. sunah 2005 ke baad flstinyon kay khilaaf ijtimai intiqami karwai ke tehat un ke makanaat ki msmari ka silsila shuru kya gaya jo aaj taq jari hai .
722.title: qaabiz Israeli fouj ne Falasteeni muzahmat kaar ka makaan dhamakay se ura diya

news_detail: Sringar. jammu o Kashmir ke janoobi plwamh mein hurriyaat pasandon ny mobayyana tor par Congress ke senior qayed Ghulam Nabi Patel ko goli maar kar halak kardiya. Police ny kaha ke Pulwama ke muzafaat mein Rajpura ke main square par Congress qayed Ghulam Nabi Patel ko aik bandooq bardaar ny goli mardi jo alhdgi pasand dehshat gard samgha jata hai. is hamla mein un ke do Personal Secutiry Officers bhi zakhmi hogaye. police ny kaha ke Patel hospital muntaqil karne ke douran zakhamo se jaanbar nah hosakay. un ke do personal security officer Imtiyaz Ahmed Zargar aur Bilal Ahmed Meer ko hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq plwamh ke Dangarpura, shadi marg mouza se talluq rakhnay walay Patel SUV gaadi mein jarahay they ke raaj poora chowk ke paas un par galian daagh di gayeen jis mein woh aur un ke do personal sikoriti officers zakhmi hogaye. inhen fori hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya magar patel jaanbar nahi hosakay. Congress quied ke qatal ki zimma daari kisi bhi askriat pasand tanzeem ny ta haal qubool nahi kya .
734.title: Pulwama mein Congress qayed Ghulam Nabi Patel ko goli mardi gayi

news_detail: London- Pakistani nazaad Bartanwi boxer Aamir Khan ke yahan doosri beti ki wiladat hui hai, jis ka naam alina Khan rakha gaya hai. Aamir Khan jinhon nay chand roz qabal Canadian hareef Greco ko 40 second mein hi aik muqaabla mein shikast di aur aaj –apne madahon ko apni beti ki paidaiesh ki khushkhabri bhi snadi hai. Aamir Khan samaji rabita ki Website twitter aur Instagram par apni doosri beti ki tasweer share ki aur bataya ke alina Khan sahet mand hai, a seen ka wazan 8 pound 3 oons hai. Bartanwi boxer ki taraf se khushi ki khabar share kiye janay par un ke madahon nay khoob mubarakbadain di aur naik tmnaon ka izhaar kya. boxer Aamir Khan aur Faryal Makhdum 2013 mein rishta izdiwaj mein munsalik hue they aur un ke haan 2014 mein beti Lamaisa Khan ki paidaiesh hui thi jo ab 4 saal ki ho chuki hai. joray ke darmain kaafi jhagray bhi hue aur mutawaqqa judai ki khabrain bhi media ki zeenat banin lekin phir dono nay sulah karli .
745.title: Boxer Aamir Khan ke yahan doosri beti ki wiladat

news_detail: Aag par bil akhir qaboo pa liya gaya. sulagti cigrette se aag bharak uthnay ka khadsha

Peureulak. indonesia mein aik tail ke kunvey mein bharak uthi aag ki wajah se marnay walon ki tadaad 21 taq ja pohanchi hai jabkay darjanon hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain. kunvey se bharak uthnay walay shulon par qaboo pa liya gaya. hakkaam ke mutabiq yeh haadsa budh ko paish aaya aur ibtedaa mein 10 logon ke halaak honay ki ittila thi taham yeh tadaad dugni hokar 21 taq poanch chuki hai chunkay hospital mein shareek zakhamo se jaanbar nah hosakay. tail ki aik dhaar ko aag pkrhli thi aur dekhte hi dekhte aag ke sholay buland honay lagey. jazeera Smatra ke Aceh soobah mein aik rehaishi ilaqa mein waqay tail ke aik ghair qanooni kunvey se buland honay walay yeh sholay gharon aur darakhton se bohat oopar aasman mein 70 meter oonchai taq poanch gay they. moza Peureulak ke is kunvey mein dhamaka ke baais kayi ghar bhi tabah hogaye taham hakkaam ne bil akhir aag par qaboo pa liya. Aceh ki takhfeef afaat agency ke aik ohdedar Henny Nurmayani ne kaha ke ab aag bjhadi gayi hai taham hum hanoz zakhmion aur maqam haadsa ki nigrani kar rahay hain. unhon ne bataya ke mazeed teen darjan mutasireen hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain. police ne bataya ke jis waqt aag ke sholay bharak utthay they is waqt mutasireen is qadeem ghair qanooni kunvey ke atraaf se tail jama kar rahay they. hakkaam aag lagnay ki wajah ka pata chalanay ki koshish kar rahay hain taham samgha jata hai ke sulge hui cigrette ke phainky jaane ke baais yeh haadsa runuma huwa hai. police ohdedar ne bataya ke is waqt kayi log they jo cigrette noshi kar rahay they. kunvey se tail haasil karne logon ki aik bheer wahan jama thi. soobay Aceh mein be shumaar chhootey pemanay par tail ki nikasi ke kunvey paye jatay hain. Indonesiayee jazair mein aisay hazaar ha kunvey hain. nakara kunvey kabhi kabhar phir se tail aglne lagtay hain aur muqami log un kunvey se tail haasil karte hain. baaz jaghon par to muqami log bhi tail ke knoon ki kandidgi karte hain. jakarta ke muzafaat mein ptakhon ki aik factory mein aag lag jaane se guzashta october mein 47 log jal gay they ..
757.title: Indonesian tail ke kunvey mein aag se 21 afraad halaak

news_detail: Chennai. Madras High Court ney aaj crore ha rupay ke Gutkha  Scam ki si bi aayi ke zareya tehqiqaat ka hukum diya, wazeer e sahet Tamilnadu Mr. C. Vijaya Bhaskar aur chand sarkardah police ohdedaron ke Gutkha ki farokht ke liye mobayyana tor par khateer raqam bator rishwat haasil karne ke ilzamaat hain. cheif justice indra bnrji aur justice abdalqdos par mushtamil high court ki first bench ney DMK quayed

J Anbazhagan  ki e mafaad aama ki darkhwast par yeh faisla diya. yeh Scam is waqt manzar aam par aaya jab July 2017 hamza mein income tax ke ohdedaron ney Tamilnadu mein Gutkha o paan masalha ke tayarkunindgaan ke godamon, rahaish gaahon aur dafatir par chhapa maara jis mein aik diary haath lagi. ohdedaron ney kaha ke is diary mein un logon ke naam they jinhein un ki janib se imtina ke bawajood Gutkha ki farokht ki sahoolat faraham karne ke aiwaz rqomat ada ki gayi theen. bench ney reyasti hukoomat ki janib se is Scam ki si bi aayi ke zareya sakht mukhalfat ki gayi thi jis par bench ney taajjub ka izhaar kya tha is qader purzor mukhalfat kyun ki jarahi hai. jab is Scam ki tahaqeeq mein kayi agencia reastain shaamil hain tab si bi aayi kyun is case se nimat nahi sakti aur riyasat usay taawun faraham kar sakti hai .
771.title: Tamilnadu hukoomat ko jhatkah. Gutkha Scam  ki CBI tehqiqaat karne Madras High Court ka hukum

news_detail: Lucknow-BJPke liye Lok Sabha aur UP Assembly intikhabaat mein be waqat saabit honay walay Uttar Pradesh ke sarkardah qaideen par 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein takiya karne par markazi qayadat amaada nazar nahi aati hai. reyasti tanzeem aur srkarki kasrat ke darmain, Wazeer e Azam nerinder moodi aur party ke qaumi saddar, Amit Shah khud lok sabha intikhabaat se qabal yahan ki zameen naapen ge aur mahol peda karen ge. Amit Shah ka jahan raatain gaon mein busr karne ka programme ban raha hai wahein Wazeer e Azam nerinder moodi bhi taraqiyati programon ke bahanay you pi ke chakkar kaatetay rahen ge. Gorakhpur aur Phoolpur ke zimni intikhabaat mein shikast ke baad, BJPqayadat Uttar Pradesh ke baare mein bohat ziyada fikarmand hai. samaaj waadi party aur b_hojn samaaj party ke darmain intikhabi mafahmat aur dohri mukhalif hukoomat lehar ke khatrah ko bhi BJPmehsoos kar rahi hai. sab se barri pareshani yeh hai ke aindah intikhabaat mein agar Uttar Pradesh se muntakhib honay walay umeedwaron ki tadaad mein zabardast kami aati hai to is ki pabajayee kahin aur se karni mushkil hai. shumali hind mein BJPaik aitbaar se –apne urooj par hai avrjnobi reyaston mein khatir khuwa maqboliat haasil nahi hopayi hai, isi liye party Uttar Pradesh mein har haal mein 2014 hamza mein kiye gaye muzahira ka iada karna chahti hai jis ke liye moodi aur Shah ney yahan ki zimma daari –apne kaandhon par uthany ka faisla kya hai. BJPke aala zaraye ka kehna hai ke party ke qaumi saddar, riyasat ke har zone mein raat busr karna shuru kar dein ge. tanzeemi aitbaar se bi jay pi, Uttar Pradesh mein 6 zones rakhti hai. Amit Shah har zone mein kam az kam do gaon mein shab bisri zaroor karen ge. aisay dehaton ka intikhab kya jaye ga jahan dlt aur pasmandah tabqaat ki abadi ghalib ho. markazi o reyasti hukoomaton ki schemaat par tabadlah khayaal ke ilawa party kaarkunon ke sath ghhor o khoz aur zameeni satah par party ke moaqqaf ka jaiza lena jaisay umoor bhi Amit Shah ke ayjnd_h ka hissa hon ge. deegar qaumi qaideen aur naamwar chehray bhi yahi tareeq car ikhtiyar karen ge. nawway ke diye mein bhi isi terhan ‘Gaon Chalo Abhyan’ jaisay programme party kamyabi se injaam day chuki hai. Shah ki is pehal se party tanzeem aur hukoomat par behtar amal aawri ka dabao bhi bana rahay ga .
786.title: Amit Shah gaon mein shab bisri ka iradah rakhtay hain

news_detail: wrestling ke deewany tayyar ho jayen kyunkay aaj se Saudi arab mein WWE ka akhadah_h sajney wala hai.Saudi arab ke shehar Jeddah mein wrestling ke maidan ke mashhoor o Maroof pehelvaan jaan seena, triple H aur undertaker sameit kayi barray barray naam aaj se rِng mein atrin ge aur aik dosray ko nani yaad delaina ge .
