wrestling ke event Greates Royal Rumble mein khawateen wrestlers shaamil nahi ki gayeen taham das matches munaqqid kiye jayengay jabkay pachaas wrestlers aur saat titles ke liye maidan mein utrenge.wazay rahay ke Saudi arab ne aalmi wrestling entertainment WWE se aindah 10 baras ke liye kushti ke muqablon ka moahida kya tha, muahiday ke tehat WWE aindah 10 saal tak mukhtalif Saudi shehron mein aalmi miyaar ki wrestling ka ineqad kere ga. un muqablon mein mukhtalif categories ke aalmi shohrat Yafta wrestlers shareek hon ge, muahiday ka maqsad khail, tafreeh aur sayahat ko farogh dena hai .
798.title: Saudi arab mein aaj se wrestling ka akharh_h sajay ga

news_detail: Chittoorgarh. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki muallaq ahliya Jashoda ben aaj aik sarrak haadsa mein baal baal bach gayeen. Wazeer e Azam ki ahliya ki car Chittor garh ke qareeb aik truck se takra gayi taham woh is haadsa mein baal baal bach gayeen. Chittorgarh ke aik aala sarkari ohdedaar ne haadsa ki toseeq karte hue kaha ke Wazeer e Azam ki ahliya mehfooz hain. Innova car jis mein Jashodben safar kar rahi theen is mein jumla 7 musafireen they. haadsa mein aik musafir halaak hogaya jabkay deegar teen zakhmi hogaye. Chittor garh ke sab ڈیویژنل magistrate saresh khatak ny bataya ke Wazeer e Azam ki ahliya mehfooz hain aur un ka ibtidayi tibbi muaina kya ja raha hai. Chittor garh ke zila nazam o nasq aur police ke aala ohdedar hospital poanch chuke hain. yeh haadsa kota Chittor high way par Chittorgarh se taqreeban 55 kilomitr ke faasla par paish aaya. car mein 7 musafireen they jin mein aksariyat Jashodaben ke rishta daar betaye jatay hain. bsnt bhai barsar e mauqa halaak hogaye jabkay Jashodaben ki khatoon rishta daar Vimala Modi aur un ke sath mojood aik gun mean ke ilawa aik paanch sala larka bhi halaak hogaya. 45 sala gun mean Yatendar aur Vimala Modi ko ade poor ke hospital muntaqil kya ja raha hai. yeh khandan burn mein uttro se gujrat ke Oonjha ke liye jarahay they. retired teacher Jashodaben kota mein aik taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye jarahi theen .
682.title: Wazeer e azam ki ahliya baal baal bach gayeen

news_detail: Jammu o Kashmir ke dar-al-hakoomat srinagar mein mangal ko mharaja Hari Singh Hospital par hamla karkay dehshat gardon naay mobayyana Pakistani dehshat gard ko bachaaya. dehshat gardi ke ilzaam mein girftar dehshat gard zair e ilaaj tha. zaraye ke mutabiq dehshat gard naay hamlay mein mojood security ahelkaar ki taraf se hamlay mein faraar ho gaye .

jammu o Kashmir ke dar-al-hakoomat sringr mein mangal ko mharaj_h hari singh hospital par hamla karkay dehshat gardon naay mobayyana Pakistani dehshat gard ko bachaaya. dehshat gardi ke ilzaam mein girftar dehshat gard zair e ilaaj tha. zaraye ke mutabiq dehshat gard naay hamlay mein mojood security ahelkaar ki taraf se hamlay mein faraar ho gaye. hamlay mein aik police ahelkaar halaak, jabkay aik zakhmi sun-hwa. waqea subah ke bajaye gayarah bajay hai. hamlay ke dauran ilaaj ke liye hospital le jaanay wala Pakistani dehshat gard faraar hogaya
698.title: Srinagar Hospital par hamla police ahelkaar shaheed

news_detail: Bait- al-muqaddas : Israeli police ki janib se wazeer e azam Binyamin Netanyahu par rishwat aur bad deyanti ke ilzamaat aed kiye jany ke baad Netanyahu ka kehna hai ke aan par siyasi tor par qaboo panay ki koshish ki ja rahi hai. Israeli tajzia karon ke nazdeek Netanyahu ne police aur media ke مْنہ par aik tamancha raseed kya hai jab ke yeh aas jamhoriat ke satonon mein se hain jis jamhoriat ke gun Israeli wazeer e azam maghrib ke samnay gatay hain .
aayiyae dekhte hain ke woh kon se mamlaat hain jin mein Netanyahu ke sath taqreeban 10 martaba tehqiqaat ho chuki hain ?
case 1000

yeh maamla Ahaef se mutaliq hai jis mein Netanyahu aur un ki ahliya sarah ne “khidmaat” ke aiwaz duniya bhar ke doulat mand tareen afraad se nihayat qeemti Ahaef wusool kiye. police ke mutabiq Netanyahu ne hali would ke mashhoor film saaz Arnan Malesian se 2 laakh 8 hazaar dollar se ziyada ke Ahaef haasil kiye. is ke maqabil Arnan ne Israel mein tax ki maffi aur America mein dakhlay ke visay haasil kiye. is ke ilawa Israeli wazeer e azam ne australvi karobari shakhsiyat james beaker se 1 laakh 12 hazaar dollar maliyat se ziyada ke Ahaef liye .
case 2000

yeh maamla abrani zaraye ablaagh ko afsha ki gayi khufia baat cheet se mutaliq hai jo Netanyahu aur aik Israeli akhbar “yadioot ahrnoot” ke maalik ernan Moses ke darmain hui thi. mazkoorah akhbar ki janib se Israeli wazeer e azam ki karkardagi ko sakhti se nuqta cheeni ka nishana banaya jata tha. dono shaksiaat ki baat cheet mein hareef Israeli akhbar “Israel hayom” ki circulation ko qanooni tareeqay se mehdood karne ka maamla zair behas aaya jis ka maalik yahodi arab patti schelden Edilson hai. is ke aiwaz ydiavt ahronot se kaha gaya ke woh Netanyahu ke hawalay se –apne lehjey ki shddt mein kami laaye .

Israeli wazeer e azam ne un tamam ilzamaat ko be bunyaad qarar dete hue kaha ke inhen aur un ki ahliya sarah ko hadaf banaya ja raha hai. un ka ishara wazeer e azam house mein fuzool kharchi aur mulazmeen ke sath naarwa sulooq ke hawalay se sarah ke khilaaf tehqiqaat ki bhi janib tha .
rudood e amal

is hawalay se samnay anay walay rudood amal ne Netanyahu ke siyasi mukhasimeen ko bhi lapait mein le liya. oppostion ki aik jamaat ke sarbarah Bayor Labid ko shadeed nuqta cheeni ka nishana banaya gaya kyun ke unhon ne Netanyahu ke khilaaf tehqiqaat mein aik ahem gawah ke tor par bayan diya. Israeli parliment mein arab rukan Ahmed altibi ka kehna hai ke “Israeli dayen baazu ke halqay aik aisa sarbarah chahtay hain jo yahodi bustiyon ko tahaffuz faraham kere agarchay woh bdanwan hi kyun nah ho. yeh fashst jamaaton ka wataira hai ”. altibi ne bawar karaya ke adalti musheer hi Netanyahu ke mustaqbil ka faisla kere ga. is mein waqt lagey ga taham awam ka harkat mein aana is baat ka taayun kere ga ke Netanyahu rehtay hain ya rukhsat ho jatay hain
709.title: Netanyahoo ko 10 martaba corruption ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat ka saamna

news_detail: Dubai . Al Qaeda ke baani sarbarah maqtool Osama Bin Laden ke hawalay se’ Al Arabia ‘ dot net par tawatar ke sath reports shaya ki jati rahi hain. Bin Laden ke hawala se beshtar tehqiqati reports ka sehra’ Al Arabia dot net’ ki nama nigaar aur sahafia’ Huda al Saleh’ ko jata hai Huda al Saleh’ Bin Laden khandan ke hawalay se kaafi maloomat rakhti hain. haal hi mein Huda al Saleh’ ne Bin Laden khandan ke baray mein dilchasp guftagu ki. Bin Laden ki yad-daashton par mushtamil tafseelaat jin mein un ki tarz zindagi, saadgi, jungi hikmat e amli aur deegar ahem maloomat shaamil hain Al Arabia dot net ke safhaat ka hissa Bin chuke hain .

‘ Al Arabia ‘ se baat karte hue Huda al Saleh’ ne bataya ke Bin Laden ki paanch bigmat mein se un ke 30 bachay bachiyan huien. Bin Laden khandan ke tarz zindagi mein saadgi ka Ansar numaya tha. un ke gharon mein ayyrkndishn nahi they. is ka maqsad Bin Laden ke bachon ko mushkilaat ka aadi karna tha. Saudi arab, soudan, Afghanistan ke tora bora aur Abbotabad mein qiyam ke douran un ke khandan ko shadeed muashi aur tibbi mushkilaat ka saamna karna para. bar waqat ilaaj nah milnay ke baais un ke kayi bachay faut ho gaye aur un ki bigmat bhi bemaar huien. un ki aik ahliya ko beti ko doctor ku dikhane par bhi shak tha jis ki bina par beti ko doctor ko check nahi karaya gaya .

Pakistan ke shehar Abbotabad mein Bin Laden aur un ke khandan ke qiyam se waaqif haal logon ki gwahyon aur sooti paighamaat se pata chalta hai ke aakhri arsay mein Bin Laden ke biwi bachay bohat si bunyadi zaroriat se mahroom they. woh tanha ho kar reh gaye they. bachon ki tanhai daur karne ke liye Osama ne bachon ko youtube par bachon ke mashhoor programme dekhnay ki ijazat day di thi. Bin Laden ke bachon ko un ke ghar mein arabi zabaan ki taleem dainay ke sath qatri nisaab taleem parhaya jata tha. ghar mein mahboos bachon ki tadrees ki zimma daari Bin Laden ki biwi Khairia sabir ki thi .

Huda al Saleh’ ka kehna hai ke Bin Laden –apne bachon ko Pakistan aur Afghanistan ke maashron mein madgham karne ke khwaahan they, yahi wajah hai ke unhon ne bachon ko Pakistan aur Afghanistan mein boli janey wali zubanain sikhane mein dilchaspi rakhi taakay mustaqbil mein woh is muashray mein madgham ho saken
719.title: ‘ Bin Laden apne bachon ko Pakistani aur Afghan zubanain sikhana chahtay thay

news_detail: Bano Saad ke ilaqay mein Governor Makkah mukramah shehzada Khalid alfisal ki hadaayat par mobayyana’ ‘ shajar rasool’ ‘ sameit 4 maqamat khatam kar diye gaye, omra par aeye log mazkoorah darakht ki ziyarat ke liye jatay they jis ke barey mein yeh mashhoor hogaya tha ke is darakht ke saya mein rasool mukaram sale Allah aleh wasallam arram farmaya karte they is liye faisla mushrikana rasoom ke khatmay ke liye kya gaya .

Misaan commissioneri mein bano Saad ka ilaqa Taif shehar se 75 klov meter junoob mein waqay hai jahan aik dio hekal darakht ke hawalay se yeh khayaal kya ja raha tha ke is ka talluq nabi kareem sale Allah aleh wasallam se hai, aa p sale Allah aleh wasallam ke dada Abdulmutallib naay is waqt ke rivaaj ke mutabiq aap sale Allah aleh wasallam ko bachpan mein bi bi Halima alsadih ke hawalay kya tha aur wahan aap sale Allah aleh wasallam naay kayi baras guzaray aur is douran aap sale Allah aleh wasallam naay bakrion ko churanay ke douran is darakht ke neechay istirahat farmaya karte they .

kaha ja raha tha ke is darakht ke neechay nabi kareem sale Allah aleh wasallam ke bachpan ka aik hissa guzra, omra par anay walay log barket haasil karne is darakht ki ziyarat ke liye jatay they aur wahan mushrikana rasoom barray pemanay par injaam di ja rahi theen .

Governor Makkah mkrmh shehzada Khalid alfisl naay mazkoorah darakht sameit deegar 3 maqamat ko khatam kar dainay ka hukum jari kya tha jis par amal karte hue gornrit aur deegar idaron ke ehalkaron par mushtamil team naay mazkoorah maqamat ko khatam kar diya taakay bidat nah phailay .

is hawala se Governor Makkah mkrmh shehzada Khalid alfisl naay kaha ke unhon naay hazrat Umar Farooq razi Allah taala anho ki sunnat par amal karte hue un maqamat ko masmaar kya hai kyunkay hazrat Umar razi Allah taala anho naay bhi is darakht ko ktwane ka hukum diya tha jis ke neechay baet rizwan ka tareekhi waqea sun-hwa tha .

wizarat islami umoor Makkah mkrmh ke director general Sheikh Ali Saleh alabadli naay is par tabsarah karte hue kaha ke is se toheed aur sunnat ki fatah hui aur islami khususiyaat ko tahaffuz mila. islami fiqa academy ke maahir dr husn safar naay kaha ke aisa koi saboot nahi milta jis ke mutabiq aap sale Allah aleh wasallam naay yahan bachpan guzaraa ho ya aisa darakht jahan aap sale Allah aleh wasallam rahay hon ya guzray hon ya is se tabarook ki koi hadaayat ki gayi ho .

wazeh rahay guzashta dinon social media par aik video vayr l- hui thi jis mein mukhtalif mumalik se anay walay mard o khawateen matmrin ko bano Saad ke ilaqa mein is darakht ko choomtay aur –apne kapron ko darakht se ragdte dekhaya gaya tha. social media par phelnay wali video Governor house taq pohanchi jahan se bidat ko roknay ke liye fori ehkamaat jari kiye gaye
729.title: Mushrikana rasoom se bachney Governor Makkah ke hukum par mobayyana shajr e Rasool kaat diya gaya

news_detail: Dubai : Irani oppostion ki beron malik sargaram’ Irani qaumi muzahmati council’ ny khabardaar kya hai ke Irani rjim technology companiyon’ Google ‘ aur’ Apple ‘ ke soft viyrz ( programat aur Apps ) ko jasoosi ke maqasid ke liye androon aur beron malik istemaal kar sakta hai. Irani qaumi muzahmati council ki taraf se jari kardah aik taaza report mein kaha gaya hai ke Irani hakkaam fori paighamaat ki tarseel ke liye istemaal honay walay’ Mobogram’ programme ko sarfeen ki sargarmia jhanchne ke liye istemaal kar rahay hain .

khayaal rahay ke’ Mobogram’ system America mein wasee pemanay par istemaal kya jata hai. mahireen ka kehna hai yeh software sarfeen ki niji zindagi ke liye mehfooz nahi. akhbar’ daily mil’ mein shaya honay wali report mein kaha gaya hai ke Irani pasdaran inqilab mustaqbil mein kisi awaami ehtajaji tehreek ko roknay, cyber security aur tashadud ke hrbon ke liye software ki madad se shehrion ki nigrani karta hai .

Irani oppostion rehnuma Ali Jaffer zaadah ka kehna hai ke Irani pasdaran inqilab Irani rjim ko bachanay ke liye androon aur beron malik wasee pemanay par technology ke programat ko browe car laa rahay hain. khayaal rahay ke America mein social media net working Website ki fehrist mein’ mobogram’ ka 156 wahn number hai. yeh aik ghair sarkari app hai jo tally gram ke istemaal ki sahoolat deti hai jab ke tally gram par Iran mein pabandi aed ki ja chuki hai. Mobogram ko tally gram hi ke dhanchay par tayyar kya gaya hai. Iran mein Facebook aur twitter jaisi maqbool social Website ziratab rahi hain taham is ke bawajood Irani sarfeen ki aik barri tadaad un se wabsta hai .

Irani oppostion ki report ke mutabiq pasdaran inqilab technology company hanista ko mobile phone ke soft viyrz ki tayari ke liye istemaal karti hai. is ke soft viyrz mein posheeda khufia kodz sarfeen ki jasoosi aur nigrani ke liye madad karte hain
741.title: Google aur’ Apple ‘ ke programat ke zariye Iran jasoosi kar raha hai

news_detail: Brussels : Paris hamlon ke mobayyana rang leader aur dehshat gardi ke dosray waqeat mein mlvos honay ke ilzaam mein girftar Salah abdusalam ne Belguim ke dar-al-hakoomat Brussels mein aik adalat mein dobarah paish honay se inkaar kardiya hai. is ne mangal ke roz adalat mein –apne khilaaf muqadmay ki samaat ke douran mein kisi sawal ka jawab dainay se inkaar kardiya tha. giraftari ke qareeban do saal ke baad is ki kisi adalat mein yeh pehli paishi thi lekin Brussels ki adalat ne mangal ke roz kaha hai ke Salah abdusalam jumaraat ko aaynd_h samaat ke mauqa par paish nahi hona chahta hai. is ke khilaaf is ke aabadi shehar Brussels mein police ke sath muqablay aur police ehalkaron ke qatal ki koshish ke ilzaam mein muqadma chalaya ja raha hai. is ne 15 March 2016 hamza ko khudkaar hathyaar se police ehalkaron par fayrng ki thi aur faraar hogaya tha. is waqea mein teen police ahelkaar zakhmi hogaye they aur is ka aik saathi jangju mara gaya tha. is ko 18 March 2016 hamza ko Brussels ke ilaqa molan back se girftar kar liya gaya tha. isi ilaqa mein Dayeesh ke dosray jangju bhi rehtay rahay they. woh Paris hamlon mein zindah bach jaane wala wahid mulzim hai. yadrhe ke Paris mein November 2015 hamza mein fayrng aur bomb dhmakon mein aik so tees afraad halaak hogaye they. un mein no hamla aawar bhi shaamil they. Salah abdusalam ko jab girftar kya gaya to is waqt Europe mein sab se ziyada matloob mafroor tha. is ki giraftari ke sirf chaar roz ke baad dayeesh ke net work se wabsta jungjuon ne Brussels mein do maqamat prhmle kiye they. un mein batees afraad halaak hogaye they .
760.title: Paris hamlon ke mushtaba mulzim Salah abdusalam ka adalat mein dobarah paish honay se inkaar

news_detail: London . mashriqi London mein waqay Masjid Abbey Mills jo “Masjid Ilyas ” ke naam se bhi jani jati hai, is masjid ko Europe ki sab se barri masjid bananay ki mansoobah bandi ki gayi. taham ab usay inhedam ka saamna hai. mangal ke roz Bartania ki sprim court ne masjid ko munhadim karne ke ehkamaat jari kiye hain. is ki wajah yeh hai ke jis zameen par masjid taamer ki gayi baldia ke mutabiq woh kisi aur maqsad ke liye makhsoos thi. mashriqi London ke ilaqa street ford mein waqay is masjid mein hafta waar nmazyon ki ost tadaad 2000 ke qareeb hai. is ki taamer aik earzi islami markaz ke tor par jis araazi par hui usay 1996 mein tableeghi jamaat se wabsta kaarkunon ne khareeda tha. is se qabal yahan aik chemical factory qaim thi .

mutanazia masjid ke inhedam se mutaliq adalti hukum ki khabar ko mutadid muqami zaraye ablaagh ne shaya kya. un mein “The Times” akhbar ne budh ki ashaat mein bataya ke tableeghi jamaat ne masjid ki taamer ke waqt hi is ki tosee ki mansoobah bandi kar li thi taa ke yahan “hazaron afraad” namaz ada kar saken lehaza muqami media ne apni lalchai nazrain is “azeemusshaan” masjid ke mansoobay par laga den. b_hrkif andeshon aur tashweesh ko kam karne tableeghi jamaat ne masjid ki gunjaish 9310 nmazyon taq kam karne ka faisla kya. idhar new home town council ne 18 hazaar murabba meter ki araazi par masjid ki tosee ki ijazat dainay se inkaar kar diya. is liye ke yeh araazi dar haqeeqat haosng aur tijarti maqasid ke liye mukhtas ki gayi thi .

saal 2015 mein tosee ko mustard karne ke hawalay se sarkari hakoomati taied bhi jari kar di gayi. tableeghi jamaat ko 3 mah ki mohlat di gayi taa ke woh is araazi ko masjid ke vaastaa makhsoos karne se ruk jayen. taham jamaat ne faisla ke khilaaf appeal kar di aur yeh silsila do baras se ziyada arsa taq jari raha. aakhir kaar Bartania ki sprim court ne masjid ke inhedam ka faisla jari kya aur is par amal daraamad ka ikhtiyar baldeati council ko mil gaya’ Albata tableeghi jamaat 16 feb taq faislay ke khilaaf appeal kar sakti hai, basorat deegar inhedam ki karwai ka aaghaz ho jaye ga .
775.title: Adalat e uzma ka Bartania ki Maroof masjid munhadim karne ka hukum

news_detail: Do roz qabal Roosi media neh bataya ke moscow’ Roosi hwabaz رومین faili بوف ki laash wapas lainay koi kasar baqi nahi chhorey ga. mazkoorah hwabaz ka Sukhuvi 25 tayyarah haftay ke roz shaam mein ادلب ki fiza mein gir kar tabah ho gaya tha. Roosi hwabaz ke vahm o gumaan mein bhi nah ho ga ke is ki zindagi ka ekhtataam Shami oppostion ke musallah anasir ke sath jharpon ke baad dasti bomb ke zariye khud kashi ki soorat mein ho ga. taham Romen ki laash jo n hi tehreer alsham tanzeem ke paas mehfooz thi raton raat gayab ho gayi aur kisi maloom bhi nahi yeh kaisay sun-hwa? mangal ki shaam Abaa news agency neh bataya ke Romen ki laash chori ho chuki hai. agency neh aik security zaraye ke hawala se bataya ke Roosi hwabaz ki laash Shami oppostion ke aik group neh gayab ki hai. zaraye ke mutabiq maamla ki tahaqeeq ki ja rahi hai aur is ghanaoni harkat ka irtikaab karne walon ko sharai adalat ke samnay paish kya jaye ga. laash chori ki is waardaat ki tafseelaat samnay nahi aa saken hain taham ghalib gumaan haike Turkey ke maqarrab groupon neh laash ko le kar Adlib se turkey ki janib bhaij diya taa ke turkey –apne tor par usay roos muntaqil kar day. Roosi wizarat difaa neh mangal ke roz elaan kya hai ke major Romen ki laash turkey ke hakkaam ki madad se watan wapas aa chuki hai. taham yahan yeh sawal peda hota hai ke woh kya qeemat hai jo roos neh is laash ke aiwz turkey ki zamanat ke taur chukaai hai? bulaa shuba anay walay dinon mein un khufia umoor par para sun-hwa parda uth jaye ga. roos mein krmln house ke tarjuman dmtri beskof yeh bawar kara chuke hain ke kandhay par rakh kar istemaal kiye jaany walay missile jo Shami oppostion ke haath aeye hain woh shaam mein karwai karne walay tamam tayyaron ke liye khatrah hain. taham yeh janna qabal az waqt ho ga ke oppostion jngjoon ko hathyaaron ka yeh nizaam kis neh faraham kya jo Roosi tayyarah ko giranay ke liye istemaal mein aaya .
790.title: Roosi hwabaz ki laash raton raat “chori”. barah Turkey Roos muntaqil

news_detail: AIUDF ke sadar o rukn parliament maulana Badruddin Ajmel ki sarbarahi mein un ki party ke 2 member of parliament, 11 arkaan e assembly aur deegar ohdidaron par mushtamil aik wafad ney 23 March 2018 ko Sadar jamhooria janab Ram Nath Kovind se Rashtrapati Bhavan, Dehli mein mulaqaat ki. wafad ney guzashta maheena mulk ke majooda fouji sarbarah janab General Bipin Rawat ke zareya AIUDF ke talluq se diye gaye aik qabil aitraaz bayan par apna aitraaz o ehtijaj darj kar vaya, aur aik fouji sarbarah ke is siyasi bayan se aik secular aur jamhoori aqdaar ki haamil AIUDF jaisi party ko honay walay nuqsaan se waaqif karaya, aur mutalba kiya ke fouji sarbarah ko –apne bayan par safai dainee chahiye aur afsos ka izhaar karna chahiye. Sadar jamhooria ney wafad ki baten baghore sunen aur munasib karwai ki yaqeen dehani karwai .janab manzar bilal qasmi bhi wafd mein shaamil thay.
806.title: AIDUF ke wafd ki Sadar jamhooria se mulaqaat

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti ki mashriqi sarhad par haq wapsi ke liye ehtijaj karne walay falastinon par Israeli fouj ne firing ki jis ke nateeja mein kam se kam mazeed teen Falasteeni shaheed aur secron zakhmi hogaye. Falasteeni wizarat sahet ke tarjuman ne bataya ke mashriqi Gaza mein flstinyon ne’ haq wapsi’ ke liye reliyan nikalen. is mauqa par Israeli fouj ne muzahireen par seedhi golion se fayrng ki, aansogis ka be daregh istemaal kya aur dhaati golion se bhi muzahireen ko nishana banaya. Ashraf Alqarah ke mutabiq Israeli fouj ki fayrng se teen Falasteeni muzahireen shaheed aur kam se kam 600 zakhmi hogaye hain. zakhmion mein se 300 ko aspatalon mein muntaqil kya gaya jin mein se paanch ki haalat khatray mein bayan ki jati hai. Aini shahideen ka kehna hai ke Israeli fouj ki taraf se muzahireen ko khauf zada karne ke liye zor daar aawaz peda karne walay bomb bhi istemaal kiye. sarhad par zor daar dhmakon ki aawazian bhi sunai di gayi hain. khayaal rahay ke Falasteeni 30 March se chay hafton par mushtamil haq wapsi ki tehreek jari rakhay hue hain. is tehreek ke douran ab taq teen darjan Falasteeni shaheed aur hazaron ki tadaad mein zakhmi ho chukay hain. Falasteeni har Juma ko mashriqi sarhad ki taraf March karte hain. is tehreek ka kal panchawan jummay tha. Israeli fouj ke wehshiana tashadud ke nateejay mein paanch hazaar Falasteeni zakhmi ho chuke hain.
692.title: Israeli fouj ki firing se Gaza mein chaar Falasteeni shaheed, 600 zakhmi

news_detail: shiddat pasand tanzeem Dayeesh ki tarjuman news agency” Amaaq” naay jummay ke roz aik video tape jari ki hai. tape mein tanzeem ke jungjuon ko araqi soobah Salah Aldeen ke qasba Tarmia mein 2 afraad ko golian maar kar mout ke ghaat utaartay hue dekhaya gaya hai. yeh dono afraad aindah mah muqarara parlimani intikhabaat mein shirkat ke liye” logon ko dawat day rahay they “. is se qabal Dayeesh tanzeem rawan haftay yeh elaan kar chuki hai ke woh parlimani intikhabaat ke douran polling marakaz par hamlay kere gi. guzashta itwaar ki shaam jari aik sooti pegham mein Dayeesh ke tarjuman abbu Al Hasan Al-mahajir naay araqi hukoomat par ilzaam aed kya ke woh” Iran ki agent hai “. tarjuman naay khabardaar kya ke 12 May ko muqarara araqi intikhabaat mein khud ko naamzad karne walay ya vote daalnay walay har shakhs ko nishana banaya jaye ga. araqi ahdidaran ka kehna hai ke polling marakaz ke atraaf security ke sakht intizamaa hon ge. araqi wazeer e azam Haider alabadi naay decemeber 2017 hamza mein Dayeesh tanzeem par fatah haasil kar lainay ka elaan kya tha jis naay 2014 hamza mein Iraq ke aik tahai hssh par qabza kar liya tha. taham tanzeem naay shikast se dochar honay ke baad goreela jung ke tareeqa car ka sahara le liya hai .
702.title: Dayessh ne iraqi” intikhabaat ke hamion” ko mout ke ghaat utaarna shuru kar diya

news_detail: New Delhi . hukoomat Delhi naay Delhi aqliati commission ( d am si ) ko aagah kiya hai ke muslim asateza ko school auqaat ke douran jummay ki namaz ada karne ki ijazat nahi di ja sakti. d am si ke chairman mister Zafar ul Islam Khan ka kehna hai ke Delhi hukoomat ke mehakma taleem naay aik darkhwast par tehreeri jawab mein kaha hai asateza jummay ki namaz ke liye’ ‘ apni classen chore kar’ ‘ nahi jasakte kyunkay is se’ ‘ talba ke mafadaat ko nuqsaan puhanche ga.’ ‘ unhon naay mazeed bataya ke mehakma taleem ka kehna hai ke qawaneen mein narmi nahi ki ja sakti, classes aik bujey dopehar shuru hon gi aur asateza ko 12 bjkr 45 minute par school pohanchna hoga. wazeh rahay ke nai Delhi schools ke muslim asateza naay namaz jummay ki adaigi ke liye Delhi aqliati commission se rujoo hotay hue inhen namaz jummay ki adaigi ke liye riayat dainay ki khwahish ki thi jis ke jawab mein commission naay is masla par mehakma taleem aur teen baldiyat se jawab talabb kya tha. mister Zafar Al Islam naay bataya ke baldiyat se jawab masool hona hai. mister Khan naay kaha’ ‘ asateza naay hamein bataya ke markazi wizarat dakhla ka 1954 hamza ka hkmnamh jo yeh kehta hai ke mulazmeen apni thankhowa se kuch minhai karte hue ebadaat ke liye jasakte hain. hum naay wizarat dakhla ko maktoob bheja hai yeh jan-nay ke liye ke aya ye qaida hanoz qabil itlaq hai ?’ ‘ unhon naay bataya ke wizarat dakhla se jawab hanoz wusool nahi sun-hwa hai.
712.title: Jummay namaz ke liye asateza ko waqfa nahi. Dehli hukoomat ka moaqqaf

news_detail: Afghanistan ke dar-al-hakoomat kabul mein Afghan antli jins agency ki imarat ke qareeb do khudkush dhmakon mein 21 afraad halaak aur 30 zakhmi hogaye. Afghan media ke mutabiq dosray dhamaka mein halaak honay walay afraad mein aik ghair mulki khabar-rasan agency ka Chief photographer bhi shaamil hai. is ke ilawa mutadid sahafion ke bhi zakhmi honay ki it-tila-aat hain. Afghan hukkaam ke mutabiq aaj subah kabul ke ilaqay Shashdark mein NDS ke daftar ke nazdeek pehla khudkush dhamaka kya gaya, logon ke jama honay par dosray khudkush bambaar ne dosra dhamaka kar diya. zaraye ka kehna hai ke dosra khudkush jaye haadsa par mojood sahafion ke majmaa mein shaamil tha, jis ke baais dosray dhamaka mein mutadid sahafi zakhmi hue hain. francesi khabar rasan agency ka cheif photo grapher jaan bahaq honay walon mein shaamil hai. Afghan wizarat sahet ne dono dhmakon mein 21 afraad ke jaan bahaq aur 30 ke zakhmi honay ki tasdeeq ki hai .
724.title: Kabul mein 2 khudkush dhamakay, sahafi sameit 21 afraad halaak

news_detail: Gujarat assembly ke speaker Mr. rajndr Trividi ney itwaar ke din dlton ke peshwa Dr.  B. R. Ambedkar ko barhaman qarar daitay hue aik naya tanaza khada kardiya hai. gandhi nagar mein’ megha Barhamin Business Summit’ se khitaab karte hue kaha ke aik qabil hasti ko barhaman qarar dainay mein koi qabahat nahi hai. Dr. B.R. Ambedkar ko barhaman kehnay mein mujhe koi taraddud nahi hai. aik qabil fard ko barhamin kehnay mein koi qabahat nahi hai. is tanazur mein Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko bhi mein barhaman kehta hon .

Mr. Trividi aik aur qadam agay barhatay hue kaha ke lard raama aik Kshatriya they aur karishna aik OBC ( deegar pasmaanda tabqaat mein se ) they. bi jay pi ke rukan parliment Mr. Udit Raj ney Trividi ke remarks par sakht tanqeed ki avr kaha ke un ke remarks qabil aitraaz aur ghair mutawaqqa hai. inhen andaza nahi hai ke is terhan ke remarks karte hue unhon ney party ko na qabil talaafi nuqsaan pohanchaya hai. aik ittila ke mutabiq itwaar ko Gujarat ke anaa se talluq rakhnay walay dlton ke aik group ney budh mat ikhtiyar karliya tha. unhon ney id-daa kya ke yeh faisla is liye kya gaya ke inhen hindu tasleem nahi kya jaata aur manadir mein daakhil honay se roka jata hai. Udit Raj ney ijtimai to ray par dlton ka budh mat ikhtiyar karna aik’ khatarnaak sorat e haal’ hai, jis ki asal wajah samaji Adam masawaat hai. unhon ney kaha ke wajah samaji na-insafi hai, moonchh rakhnay par bhi dlton ko petta ja raha hai. mein nahi jaanta ke un ke paas is ka mutabadil kya hai. qabal azeen aisa hi aik waqea krnatk ke Kulbargi zila mein paish aaya jahan 60 dlt khandano ney budh mat ikhtiyar karliya.
738.title: Gujarat Speaker ney B.R. Ambedkar aur Narendra Modi ko barhamin qarar diya

news_detail: Srinagar. BJP se talluq rakhnay walay jammu o Kashmir ke naye deputy cheif mnstr Kavindar Gupta ny –apne ohda ka jaiza lainay ke din hi kthoah asmat raizi o qatal waqea ko mamooli waqea qarar diya. jammu o Kashmir ki kabeena mein rdo badal ke aik ghanta ke andar hi deputy cheif mnstr Kavindar Gupta ny Kathua mein aik na baligh larki ki mutawatar asmat darri karne ke baad qatal kar diye janay ke waqea ko mamooli qarar diya jabkay is andohnak aur insaaniyat soaz waqea ki muzammat mein saari duniya mein muzahira kiya ja raha hai. Rasana aik choti si baat hai. hamein sochna chahiye ke aindah is ka iada nah honay paye aur larki ko insaaf miley. hukoomat ko is noiyat ke kayi challenges ka saamna hai. mister Gupta ny akhbaari numaindon se kaha ke hamein رسانا ko ziyada bhao ( ahmiyat ) nahi di jani chahiye. Kathua ke moza Rasana mein aik na baligh larki ke aghwaa, nasha aawri, ijtimai asmat raizi aur qatal ke ilzaam mein girftar logon ki taied mein nikaali gayi Rally mein BJPke sabiq wazraa ki shirkat par payi janay wali barhami o narazgi ke baad phir isi masla par naye deputy cheif mnstr ny yeh qabil aitraaz remark heran kun hai. is waqea ki mutasirah aik na baligh muslim larki thi jabkay tamam mlzmin ka talluq hindu tabqa se hai. zaani o qatilon ki taied mein hindu yaktaa munch ki nikaali gayi Rally mein shirkat karne walay Kathua ke rukan assembly Rajiv Jasrotia ki kabeena mein shirkat par aitraaz kya ja raha hai. Hindu yaktaa munch ki Rally mein shirkat par do BJPwazraa laal singh aur Chandra prakash ko istifa dainay par majaboor hona para tha. BJPqayed Ram Madhav ny id-daa kya ke jammu vkshmir ki kabeena mein rdo badal ka talluq Kathua waqea se qatee nahi hai. hamari hukoomat ny Iqtidaar ke teen baras mukammal karliye they is liye hum ny kabeena mein tabdeeli ka faislah kya aur do naye cheharon ko shaamil kya. are s s se talluq rakhnay walay 59 sala Kavindar Gupta ku Nirmal Singh ki jagah mehbooba mufti ke naib ke tor par kabeena mein shaamil kya gaya hai .
749.title: Kathua asmat raizi waqea aik chhota waqea : naye Deputy Chief Minister jammu o Kashmir

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nehru Zoological park mein peer ke din Moheeb atishzadgi ke baais do acre khuli araazi par waqay darakht jal kar khakstar hogaye. aatish faro mehakma ke ohdedaron ke bamawajjib chndo laal baara darri fire station ke ohdedaron ne Zoo se 10:45 bajey mausula hungami ittila par aag bujhanay ke operation par lag gay they. aag ke shulon par qaboo panay ke liye amlah ko do ghantay darkaar hue. atishzadgi ke baais taqreeban do acre ilaqa par muheet darakht aur ghaas jal kar khakstar hogaye. district fire officer Hyderabad Mr. Srinivas Reddy ne bataya ke jaisay hi hamein Zoo mein aa g lag jaane ki ittila masool hui aatish faro amlah fori harkat mein agaya aur aag bujhanay ki koshisho mein jit gaya. aag par qaboo panay mein hamein is liye dushwari aa rahi thi ke taiz hawaon ke baais aag khulay ilaqa mein daur taq phelti chali jarahi thi. agarchay Fire Officers ko shuba hai ke be-tawajhi se cigrette pheink dyie jaane ke baais aag lagi hogi magar ibtidayi reports mein bataya gaya ke ho sakta hai ke Zoo ke ihata mein mojood sookhi ghaas aur deegar nakara ashya ke dhair mein aag lag jaane ke baais yeh haadsa paish aaya ho. is haadsa ke baais koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa hai .
765.title: Hyderabad Zoo ke ihata mein Moheeb atishzadgi. koi jani nuqsaan nahi

news_detail: France ke saddar ka tohfatan diya gaya poda White House se gayab hogaya. poda France ke aas ilaqa se laya gaya tha jahan doosri jang-e azeem mein do hazaar Amrici fouji maaray gay they. yeh poda France ke saddar Emmanuel Macron ne Amrici saddar donald trmp ko bator tohfa diya tha aur is pouday ko White House ke baagh mein America aur France ke sudoor ne mil kar lagaya tha. francesi sadar ne kaha tha ke yeh darakht hamein’ un cheezon ki yaad dilay ga, jo hamein jode hue hain, lekin poda laganay ke sirf chaar roz baad poda wahan mojood nahi tha .
780.title: Francesi Sadar ka tohfa White House se gayab

news_detail: Gaza- islami tehreek muzahmat’ Hamas ‘ ke siyasi shoba ke sarbarah Ismail Haniyeh ne garbh Urdan mein sadar Mahmood Abbas ki zair sadarat munaqqidah Palestine National Council ke ijlaas ke tamam faislay mustard kar diye hain. un ka kehna hai hai jis siyasi group ki taraf se Palestine National Council ka ijlaas munaqqid kya gaya hai woh Falasteeni qoum ki numaindagi nahi karta. khayaal rahay ke Palestine National Council ka ijlaas 9 saal ke baad kal 30

April ko Ramla mein sadar Mahmood Abbas ki zire sdart shuru huva. Hamas sameit kayi doosri jamaten pehlay hi is ijlaas ka boycott krchki hain. yeh ijlaas aik aisay waqt mein munaqqid ho raha hai jab doosri taraf Amrici saddar Donald trmp maqboza beeet almuqaddas ko Israel ka dar-al-hakoomat qarar dainay ke baad tall abib se apna sifarat khanah al quds muntaqil karne ki tayari kar rahay hain. Gaza mein –apne ghar par jama aik ijtima se khitaab mein Ismail Haniyeh ne kaha ke’ hum Ramla mein honay walay Palestine national council ke ijlaas aur is ke faislon ko nahi mantay. yeh ijlaas aik makhsoos labi aur group ka iqdaam hai jo Falasteeni qoum ki haqeeqi maino mein numaindagi ka haq nahi rakhta. unhon ne saddar Mahmood abbas par tanqeed karte hue un par ilzaam Aayed kya ke woh national council ke ijlaas ke zareya aaeni tahaffuz haasil karne ke sath –apne Iqtidaar ko tole dainay ki koshish kar rahay hain, magar un ka yeh iqdaam inhen aaeni juwaz faraham nahi karsaktha .

Hamas ke leader ne mulk mein fouri tour par Parlimani aur sadaarti intikhabaat karanay ka bhi mutalba kya. unhon ne kaha ke Hamas naam Nihaad National Council ke ijlaas aur is ke faislon ki paband nahi. hum Falasteeni qoum ke mafaad mein –apne usooli muaqqaf ke mutabiq kaam jari rakhay gi. Hamas tanzeem azaadi Palestine ke baare mein –apne muaqqaf par is taq nazar sani kere gi jab taq ke tamam Falasteeni quwatoon ke liye is ke darwazay khol nahi diye jatay. Ismail Haniyeh ka kehna tha ke Palestine national council aisay hi aik dhrhe ki numaindagi karti hai jaissa ke tanzeem azaadi Palestine ki markazi council aur executive committee jin mein Hamas aur islami jehaad ko shaamil nahi kya gaya. mubasireen ka khayaal hai ke Palestine national council ka ijlaas koi johri tabdeeli to nahi laaye ga taham ujla mein executive committee ke 18 naye arkaan ka intikhab amal mein laya ja sakta .

Palestine national council ke ijlaas ka boycott karne walon mein Hamas , islami jehaad aur awaami mahaaz baraye azaadi Falasteeni jaisi barri Falasteeni tanzeemen shaamil hain. un ke ilawa 740 arkaan mein se 100 arkaan ne bhi shirkat nahi ki. yeh ijlaas aik aisay waqt mein sun-hwa hai jab Gaza ki patti aur Israel ki sarhad par guzashta kayi hafton se flstinyon ki haq wapsi ki tehreek chal rahi hai jis mein ab taq 45 Falasteeni muzahireen shaheed kiye ja chuke hain.
797.title: Hamas ne Palestine National Council ke ijlaas ke elanaat mustard kardiye

news_detail: Iran mein islaah pasand reh numa abdullah nasri ki janib se Iran Iraq jung mein halaak honay walay ahal karon ki bewaon se mutaliq diye gaye bayan ny tanaza peda kar diya hai. nasri ny yeh bayan islaah pasandon ki Website” insaaf news” ko diya tha. Website ny hafta ke din aik report jari ki jis mein bataya gaya ke mazkura bewa khawateen ny hizab e ikhtilaaf ke bohat se afraad ki siyasi zindagi khatam karanay mein Irani security idaron ki madad ki. nasri ke mutabiq security idaron ny Iraq Iran jung ( 1980. 1988 ) mein maaray jaaney walay afraad ki baaz bewaon ko” Khattafaat” yani” aankra khawateen” ke naam se mansoobay mein istemaal kya. is mansoobay ka maqsad mukhtalif Irani hukoomaton ke wazraa aur senior ohdedaron ko jaal mein phaansna tha .

insaaf news ki nama nigaar Masooma Rashidyaan ny apni report mein bataya ke Khattafaat ( aankra ) woh naam hai jo security idaron ke liye jasoosi ke vaastaa jins ko bator hathyaar istemaal karne wali khawateen ko diya jata hai “. report mein mukhtalif Irani hukoomaton mein wazraa aur ohdedaron ke isifon ko Khattafaat ke hathon jinsi jaal mein phas jaaney ke sath marboot kya. is silsila mein Mohammad khatmi ke daur mein sabiq wazeer Saqafat Ata 4 Ataullah Mahajrani aur Mahmood Ahmadi Nazaad ki hukoomat ke kayi wazraa ke ilawa saddar husn Rohani ke maqarrab afraad mein shaamil t_hran ke mayor ka mustafi hona shaamil hai. doosri janib islaah pasand bock mein mushawarti committee ke rukan vird nasri ny intelli jins idaron ki janib se” Khattafaat” ki bharti par roshni daali. unhon ny bataya ke Iraq ke sath 8 baras taq jari jung ny –apne peechay khawateen ki aik barri tadaad ko chorra jo kam Umri mein hi –apne shoharon ko kho bathain. isi wajah se un mein bohat si khawateen hakoomati ya deegar ohday daraan ki doosri biwi ban gayeen ya phir najaaiz azdawaji taluqaat mein marboot ho gayeen. nasri ny mazeed kaha ke security idaron ki janib se khawateen ka istemaal kya jana duniya bhar mein aik Maroof tareeqa car hai aur Iran bhi is se mustasna nahi. jung ke douran bewa hojane wali khawateen ko bator Khattafaat istemaal karne ke hawalay se nasri ke bayan ny sakht geer media ko chairag pa kar diya. is ke nateejay mein” insaaf news” ny moazrat paish karte hue report se is paragraph ko hazf kar diya.
Source: Al-Arabia
810.title: Irani intelli jins ke liye siyasat daano ko jaal mein phansanay wali” Khattafaat” ke hawala par tanaza

news_detail: Hyderabad. / 27 March ( press note ) Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke aik numainda vafd ne janab Ather Moueen riyasti saddar ki qayadat mein Telangana riyasat ke Director General of police Mr. Mahender Reddy se mulaqaat ki aur Nirmal Town mein Raam Noami ke mauqa par paish aeye firqa waranah fasadaat ke baad police ki janib se ki jarahi karwai ka coverage karne walay roznama Munsif ke staff reporter o Telangana urdu working journalists union Nirmal zila sadr Mr. Mohammad Fahim Ahmed Khan par police amlah ne andha dhund lathyan bursaate hue unhein shadeed zad o kob kiye janey ke waqea se DG pi ko waaqif karwaya. DGP ko tafseelaat se waaqif kerwatay hue union ke zimma daraan ne bataya ke Mr. Fahim Ahmed Khan apne gilaay mein press ka shanakhti card daaley hue they aur woh police amlah ko apni shanakht karwnay ke bawajood un par be dardi se hamla karte hue unhein zakhmi kiya gaya. zimma daraan ne urdu sahafi par hamla karne walay khaati ohdedaron ke khilaaf fori karwai karne ka mutalibah kya, jis par DGP  ne radd-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha kay SP Nirmal zila ko waqea ki mukammal tehqiqaat kerwatay hue khusoorwar ohdedaron ke khilaaf karwai karne ki hadaayat day di gayi hai aur tehqiqati report anay ke baad khaati ohdedaron ke khilaaf tadeebi karrawai karne ka tayaqqun diya. DG pi ne sahafion ke sath taawun karte hue jamhoriat ke tahaffuz ko yakeeni bananay aur mustaqbil mein is terhan ke waqeat ka iada nah hawas zimn mein mosraqdamat karne ka yaqeen dilaya. . DGP se mulaqaat karnay wale wafad mein Mrs Ather Moin riyasti sadr, Mohd Sajid Meraj sarparast, Layeequddin Secretary General, Rawoof Aazmi, Mohammad abdul Hakeem naib Sudoor , Syed Wajid Hussaini riyasati Khazen , Mohammad Aleemuddin Secretary General Kamareddy, janab Mohammad Abid sadar Asifabad o Manchriyal zialyee Unit, Mohammad Hussamuddin anchor Munsif TV, Abdul Rahim news anchor Munsif, Mohammad Mohsin  TV Associate Editor, Sheikh Farhaad khaleel T Tv news reader, Mohammad Akram, Mohammad jilani T TV aur deegar bhi mojodthe .
684.title: Nirmal mein sahafi par police hamla ke khilaaf DGP se TUWJU ki numaindagi

news_detail: Amravathi. Cheif Minster Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chndrababu Naidu ney markaz ke munqisama riyasat Andhra Pradesh riyasat ke sath muandana rawayya aur khusoosi moaqqaf ataa karne se ihtiraz se naraaz hokar aaj –apne yom paidaiesh ko ehtijaj ke liye muntakhib kya aur aik roza bhook hartaal par baith gaye. Mr. Naidu ny bhook hartaal se qabal babaye dastoor dr bi are ambidkr aur baani tlgo dishm party an tea rama rau ko kharaaj aqeedat paish kya. indra gandhi stadium mein jari yeh bhook hartaal shaam 7 : 00 bujey taq jari rahay gi. Mr. Naidu ki tlgo dishm party ny markaz mein brsraqtdar bi jay pi ke sath apni darina rafaqat ko khatam karliya. yaad rahay ke tlgo dishm party, an d ae ka hissa thi aur guzashta intikhabaat mein bi jay pi se mafahmat ke sath muqaabla kya tha. agarchay bi jay pi ny guzashta aam intikhabaat mein tanha qatee aksariyat haasil ki thi magar markazi kabeena mein apni Haleef jamaaton ke numaindon ko shaamil kya tha. tlgo dishm party ko bhi kabeena mein numaindagi ka mauqa ataa kya gaya tha taham aandhra pradesh ko khsos moaqqaf ataa karne ke masla par bi jay pi aur tlgo dishm party ke darmain dooria barhti gayi aur nateeja mein Mr. chand ra baabo Naidu ny –apne rufaqa ko markazi kabeena se alhd_h krwadya aur bil akhir bi jay pi se apni mafahmat ko bhi khatam kardiya. Mr. Naidu ki hukoomat, riyasat ki taqseem ke baad aandhra pradesh ko khusoosi moaqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte arhay they. cheif mnstr se izhaar ygangt ke tor par riyasat ke mukhtalif maqamat par bhi aik roza bhook hartaal ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai. reyasti assembly ke wazeer dr Kodela prasad jo hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain aur doctoron ny inhen 15 dinon taq bistar par hi aaraam karne ka mahswara kya tha aaj hospital chore diya taakay woh bhi bhook hartaal camp poanch saken. woh guzashta 7 dinon se bukhaar mein mubtala hain. cycle Rally ke douran bhi inhen mamooli chout aayi thi. tlgo film Director Timma Reddy ny Mr. Naidu se izhaar ygangt karte hue tlgo awam se khwahish ki ke woh Mr. Chandra baabo Naidu ka sath den .
700.title: Markaz ke rawayya ke khilaaf Chandrababu Naidu ki aik roza bhook hartaal

news_detail: NewDelhi . difai mawazna mein mehdood takhsees ke baais peda shuda funds ki qillat se dochar hindustani afwaj naay makhsoos noiyat ke mehngay asleha aur ozaar ki nishandahi ki hai jis ko woh haasil nahi krparhi hai go k un ka zakheera 10 dinon ki jung ke liye bhi na kafi hai. Indian Express ki ittila ke mutabiq Funds ki bachat ke liye kiye gaye deegar iqdamaat ke bawajood hamari afwaj ahem o zurori asleha mein andazan 15 taa 25 feesad ki kami hai. army Cheif General Bipin Ravat ki zair sadarat jari army commanders conference mein is masla par ghhor o khoz kya gaya. zaraye ke mutabiq tawaqqa hai ke conference is tajweez ko qubool karle gi ke makhsoos noiyat ke asleha Bashmool Smerch Rockets, Koncurs Missile Missiles, tank asleha aur influience mayns ka zakheera itna hi rakha jaye jo 10 dinon se bhi kam waqt ke liye jari rehne wali jung ke liye kaafi ho. Smerch, roosi sakhta mltipl lanch rocket system hai jo naram aur sakht noiyat ke nshanon, aartilri aur Missiles Systmes  ko nakara bananay ke liye design kya gaya hai Konkur, roosi sakhta anti tank gayidd mizayil hai jisay mechanized anfintri istemaal karti hai. dhuwen ke golay, dhuwan chorney istemaal kiye jatay hain. influience mayns, Electro magnetic field ke zareya jungi dababon ki naqal o harkat ko roknay istemaal kiye jatay hain. un asleha ki nishandahi, mehngay asleha ke tor par ki gayi hai. hukoomat naay afwaj ke liye asleha o golah barood ki kam از kam itni miqdaar rakhnay ka lzom rakha hai jo 40 dinon taq jari rehne wali shadeed jung ke liye kaafi ho. 10 dinon ki shadeed jung ke zakheera par sirf intahi naazuk haalat mein hi iktifa kya jata hai. zaraye naay yeh bhi bataya ke afwaj naay kal przon par kharch karne ki bajaye qadeem aur mustamila przon jaisay o s ae ae ke mizayil, Tangushka anti ayr craft weapon system, kraz aur Zil gariyaan se hi kaam chala lene ka faisla kya hai, jin ka kam istemaal hota hai. army wise cheif lftnnt general sard chand naay shoba difaa par parlimani standing committee ke rubaroo bayan dete hue on record bataya ke hamari afwaj ke 68 fisad jangi hathyaar azkar rafta hain. yeh iqdamaat aindah do teen barson taq asleha ke zakheera mein ahem khasara se nimatnay budget ke ziyada se ziyada istemaal ko yakeeni bananay kiye gaye hain. afwaj ke aik senior ohdedar naay bataya ke hamaray masarif ko maqool banatay hue aindah teen maali saloon ke douran hum 600 taa 800 crore rupay ki bachat krpayin ge .
710.title: Budget ki qillat ke baais ahem difai hathyaar kharidne se afwaj ka guraiz

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib saddar jamhooria ko cheif justice sprim court Mr. justice deepak Misra ka ehatasab karne ki notice paish kar di gayi hai. malik ke 7 oppostion partiyon ke 64 arkaan parliment ne aaj naib saddar jamhooria o sadrnasheen ewaan baala ( Rajia sabha ) Mr. vinkya nayido ko cheif justice of India Mr. justice deepak Misra ke khilaaf tehreek ehatasab paish ki hai. yeh pehal sprim court ke kal ke faisla ke paish e nazar ki gayi jis mein Sohrab Aldeen farzi encounter muqadma ki samaat karne walay si bi aayi ke khusoosi judge Mr. bi each lohya ki pur asraar mout ki azadana tehqiqaat karne ke mutalba ko mustard kardiya gaya. saat oppostion partiyon se talluq rakhnay walay 64 arkaan parliment ki dastakhat shuda aik notice Mr. vinkya nayido ko hawala ki gayi jis mein cheif justice of India ka muhasba karne ka mutalba kiya gaya. notice ehatasab par dastakhat karne walon mein congress, an si pi, si pi am, si pi aayi, samaaj waadi, b_hojn samaaj party aur muslim league se talluq rakhnay walay arkaan parliment shaamil hain. senior congress quied Mr. Kapil Sibbal ne kaha ke notice mein muhasba ke liye cheif justice ke manfi rawayya ki 5? wajohaat paish ki gayi hain. yaad rahay ke Rajia Sabha mein tehreek ehatasab paish karne notice ko kam az kam 50 arkaan ki taied zurori hai jabkay lok sabha mein paish karne ke liye 100 arkaan ki taied zurori hai. sadrnasheen Rajia sabha ko jab tehreek ehatasab paish kar di jati hai to woh is ki merritt ka jaiza letay hain ke aaya ewaan baala mein yeh notice paish ki jani chahiye ya nahi. Mr. couple Sibbal ne notice ki hawalgi ke baad baat karte hue kaha ke jab se justice Misra aeye hain tab se un ke rawayya par sawalaat uth rahay hain, jis ki misaal sprim court ke chaar jajon ki / 12 January ki press conference hai. tashweesh ki baat yeh hai ke chaar jajon ki yad dasht tareeqa car ki yaksoi nahi ki gayi. Mr. Sibbal, sprim court ke senior chaar judges ki January mein ki gayi press conference ka hawala day rahay they. unhon ne kaha ke muhasba hi wahid rasta hai. congress quied ne kaha ke notice tehreek ehatasab par dastakhat karne walay arkaan parliment ki fikar mandi yeh hai ke jamhoriat kamzor par jaye gi. hum chahtay hain ke hamaray dastoori nutt work ke dhaaray mein yeh din kabhi nah aeye. notice paish karne se qabal quied oppostion Rajia sabha Mr. ghulam nabi azad ne tamam oppostion partiyon ke numaindon se mulaqaat ki jinhon ne feb mein sadr e jamhuria hind Mr. Ramnath Kovind ku darkhwast paish ki thi jis mein judge lohya ki pur asraar mout ki tahaqeeq karne ka mutalba kya tha. cheif justice Mr. justice Misra ki barkhastgi ki notice ke liye sprim court ke jajon ki press conference ka hawala diya gaya .
721.title: Cheif Justice ke khilaaf tehreek ehatasab ki notice Naib Sadr e Jamhuria ko paish

news_detail: Paris . France mein aik bahijaab muslim khatoon ko musafah se Ihtiraz karne ki Padaash mein malik ki shehriat dainay se inkaar kar diya gaya. al-jaizair se talluq rakhnay wali aik musalman khatoon ny francesi shehriat milnay ki taqreeb ke douran ohdedar se musafah karne se inkaar kar diya tha. France ki hukoomat ny is rawayya par khatoon ko shehriat nah dainay ka faisla kya tha jisay France ki aala intizami adalat ny barqarar rakha. June 2016ء mein France ke junoob mashriqi ilaqay easier mein aik taqreeb ke duwaan muslim khatoon ko malik ki shehriat di ja rahi thi. is mauqa par taqreeb ke saddar aur aik muqami siyasi rehnuma ny khatoon se haath milana chaha to aas ny yeh keh kar inkaar kar diya ke mere mazhabi aqaed is baat ki ijazat nahi dete. hukoomat ny is waqea par rad-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha ke khatoon ka rawayya zahir karta hai ke woh’ francesi muashra mein zam hona nahi chahti ‘, aisa amal soul code ke tehat kisi bhi francesi shehri ke shareek hayaat ko malik ki shehriat dainay se rokta hai. muslim khatoon ny francesi shehri se 2010 hamza mein shadi ke baad April 2017 mein shehriat ke liye darkhwast di thi. khatoon ny faisla ko’ ikhtiyarat ka ghalat istemaal’ qarar diya hai. taham aisay mamlaat ki hatmi samaat karne wali adalat council of state ka muaqqaf hai ke hukoomat ny’ ‘ qanoon ka ghalat istemaal’ ‘ nahi kya .
743.title: Musafah se guraiz ki padaash mein muslim khatoon francesi shehriat se mahroom

news_detail: Vijayawada- Payakaraopetta rukn Assembly mohtarma Vangalapudi Anitha ny jinhein Trumala Tirupati Devasthanam board ka rukan naamzad kya gaya tha, un ke isaai mazhab ke tain ansiyat o lagao ke baais peda shuda tanaza par khud ko board se alhd_h kar lanay ka faisla kya hai. yaad rahay ke mrs Anitha ki namzadgi ke baad un ka aik video soshil media par gasht karne laga jis mein inhen yeh kehte hue dikha ya gaya ke hamesha un ke sath bible hoti hai. Anitha ny Chief Minister mister Chandra baabo nayido ke mosooma aik maktoob mein un se khwahish ki ke Trumala Tirupati Devasthanam Board ke liye un ki namzadgi ko mansookh kardiya jaye. Telugu Channel ko 2014 mein Telugu Desam Party ki rukan Assembly ke dyie gaye aik interview ki clip mein inhen yeh kehte hue dekhaya gaya tha ke hamesha merebag aur car mein Bible hoti hai, Bible ke baghair mein kahin bahar nahi jati, jis ki binaa un ke isaai honay ka daawa kya ja raha hai. kayi Hindu groups ney un ki namzadgi ki mukhalfat karte hue Chief Minister se mutalba kya ke inhen board se nikaal diya jaye. mrs Anitha ny Chief Minister ke mosooma –apne itwaar ke maktoob mein kaha ke woh aik pedaishi hindu hai jo s si tabqa se talluq rakhti hain aur lord Venkateshwara par un ka aqeedah hai. maktoob mein Anitha ny kaha ke unhon ny faisla kya hai ke woh board mein baqi rehtay hue koi tanaza khara karna nahi chahti. unhon ny board ke liye inhen naamzad karne par Chief Minister ka shukriya ada kya. mrs Anitha ny kaha ke inhen bara dukh sun-hwa ke kuch mafadaat haslh rakhnay walay groups ny yeh tanaza khara kya hai. mein yeh kehna chahti hon ke mein aik hindu hon aur darj fehrist aqwam se talluq rakhti hon. mein lard Venkateshwara ki aik bhakt hon aur kayi martaba is mandir ki ziyarat kar chuki hon. bataya jata hai ke Chief Minister un ki is pehal par mutasir hue hain aur samgha jata hai ke un ki bajaye kisi dosray ko board ka rukan naamzad kardiya jaye ga. Telugu Desam zaraye ka kehna hai ke un ki jagah darj fehrist aqwam se hi talluq rakhnay wali kisi khatoon ko naamzad kya jaye ga .
754.title: Tirupati board tanaza : main aik hindu hoon, isaai nahi. TDP MLA

news_detail: Bangalore- Karnataka BJP ke sarbarah Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke agar BJP ke qaumi saddar Mr. Amit Shah inhen ijazat den to woh cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf halqa assembly bdami se muqaabla karne ke liye tayyar hain. Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke party ke qaumi saddar ki swabdid par hai ke bdami se cheif Karnataka ke khilaaf kon muqaabla kere. agar un se kaha jaye to woh Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf apni qismat azmaane tayyar hain aur agar woh kisi aur ko muqaabla karne ke liye kahin ge to woh muqaabla kere ga. Chikmagalur mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke yeh to yakeeni hai ke halqa assembly bdami se hamara umeed waar taaqatwar hoga jo cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ko shikast day ga. sabiq cheif Karnataka ne kaha ke BJPki qaumi qayadat ne is khsoos mein faisla krchki hai. Bagalkot ka halqa assembly dosra halqa intikhab hoga jahan se cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah12

May ko munaqqid shudani intikhabaat mein muqaabla karen ge. woh Mysore ke halqa assembly Chamundeshwari se muqaabla kar rahay hain. dosray halqa intikhab se muqaabla ke baray mein tajassus ko khatam karte hue samgha jata hai ke Mr. Siddaramaiah 24

April ko halqa assembly bdami se bhi apna parcha namzadgi daakhil karen ge. halqa assembly bdami se cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf BJP ke sabiq Chief Minister Yeddyurappa ke muqaabla karne ki paish qayasion ke darmain BJP ke rukan Parliament Mr. B. Sri Ramulu ne kaha ke woh party faisla ki tameel karen ge. unhon ne kaha ke bdami se muqaabla karne ke baray mein hamari party qayadat faisla kere gi aur party ke aik paband discipline fouji ki terhan hum party faisla ka ehtram karen ge aur agar party mujhe kisi aur halqa se muqaabla karne ke liye kahe gi to mein is ki tameel karoon ga. Chief Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ne jinhon ne Chamudeshwari se pehlay hi apna parcha daakhil kar chukay hain akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke un par baghal coat aur vjye poora ke muqami party qaideen ka dabao hai woh bdami halqa assembly se bhi muqaabla karen chunkay is se is regain mein congress ki kamyabi ke imkanaat barh jatay hain. yeh poochnay par ke bdami se un ke khilaaf rukan parliment Mr. Sri Ramulu  ko BJP maidan mein utaarnay ka iradah rakhti hai to cheif Karnataka ne kaha ke inhen faisla karne dijiye, mujhe koi khauf nahi ke mere khilaaf kon umeed waar hai. unhon ne kaha ke Chimandeshwari ke raye dahindon ne pehlay hi yeh un ke haq mein apna vote dainay ka tye kar chukay hain .
774.title: Chief Minister Karnataka ke khilaaf muqaabla karne Yeddyurappa tayyar

news_detail: Mulk mein kayi siyasi partiyan barson se aayi IT se wabasta aur engineering pas e manzar rakhnay walay qaideen rakhti hain jo aala ohdon tak bhi puhanche hain jin mein Chief Minister Goa Mr. ManhoarParikar, Congress ke Mr. Jai Ramesh aur Rashtriya Lok Dal ke Mr. Ajit Singh bhi hain

New Delhi . Indian Institute of Technology ke farigh 50 Engineers ke aik group ny apni apni mlazmton ko tark karte hue darj fehrist aqwam, darj fehrist qbayil aur deegar pasmandah tabqaat ke haqooq ke liye jad-o-jehad karne aik nai siyasi party banam’ ‘ b_hojn azad party’ ‘ qaim ki hai. party ko election commission of India ki manzoori kaantzar hai. Dehli ke cheif mnstr mister aravind Kejriwal ki’ aam aadmi party’ ke qiyam aur Dehli qaumi dar-al-hakoomat par Iqtidaar haasil karne ke kayi barson baad yeh party wujood mein aa rahi hai. mister Kejriwal bhi Indian Institute of Technology Khargapoor ke farigh hain. Election Commission of India ki manzoori mil janay ke baad yeh bahhar se –apne siyasi safar ka aaghaz kere ga. b_hojn azad party aindah Assembly intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhti hai jo saal 2020 mein muqarrar hai. yeh siyasi group 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ka iradah nahi rakhta. IIT Delhi se 2015 ke graduate Mr. Navin Kumar ka kehna hai ke hum ko yi ujlat mein intikhabi amal mein shaamil hotay hue un chand chhootey siyasi group ki terhan nahi ban-na chahtay hain jin ke azaim to barhay hain magar imkanaat mohom hain. 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein hissa lainay ka hamara koi iradah nahi hai Albata hum 2020 hamza mein munaqqid shudni Assembly intikhabaat mein munazzam andaaz mein maidan mein atrin ge. hamari party ka registration hojane ke baad hum hamari party ke zilai aur bock units qaim karen ge jo hamaray matloob groups par maidan mein kaam karna shuru kar dein ge. unhon ny kaha ke hum kisi siyasi party ya nazriya ke khud ko mukhalif ke tor par paish nahi karna chahtay hain balkay hum –apne nazriaat se awam ku waaqif krwayn ge. malik mein kayi siyasi partiyan barson se IIT se wabsta aur engineering pas manzar rakhnay walay qaideen rakhti hain jo aala ohdon taq bhi puhanche hain jin mein Chief Minister Goa Mr. Manohar Parikar, Congress ke Mr. Jayram Ramesh aur Rashtriya Lok Dal ke Mr. Ajeet Singh bhi hain .
792.title: IIT ke Engineers ki siyasi party

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib Sadar jamhooria hind o sadrnasheen Rajya sabha Mr. am Venkaiah Naiduney aaj Chief justice Supreme Court Mr. justice deepak Misra ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza ko mustard kardiya. Naib Sadar jamhooria ney kal itwaar ko mahireen dastoor o qanoon se congress ki zair qayadat 7 oppostion partiyon ki janib se paish kardah tehreek muwakhza ka mukhtalif pehluo se jaiza liya tha aur aaj tehreek muwakhza ko mustard kardainay ka elaan kya tha. bataya jata hai ke Naib Sadar jamhooria ney Attorny General Mr. K. K. Vinugopal, sabiq judge Supreme Court Mr. B. Sudarshan Reddy aur Rajya Sabha Secretriat ke senior ohdedaron se notice par mushawarat ki thi. Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ney –apne daura Hyderabad ko mukhtasir karte hue kal Dehli poanch gaye they. Congress Party sameit 7 oppostion partiyon ney jummay ke din sadrnasheen Rajya Sabha se mulaqaat karte hue 64 arkaan Parliament ki dastakhaton ke sath Chief Justice Supreme Court ke muwakhza ke liye notice paish ki thi jis par un 7 arkaan Rajya Sabha ki bhi dastakhaten shaamil theen jo haal mein apni miyad poori kar chukay hain. tehreek muwakhza par dastakhat karne walay arkaan parliment ka talluq congress, NCP, CPM, CPI, BSP aur Muslim league se hai. Congress ki zair e qayadat oppostion partiyon ney aik be nazeer iqdaam mein Supreme Court of India ke khilaaf ilzamaat aed karte hue un ka muwakhza karne ki appeal ki thi. azad hind stan ki tareekh mein pehli martaba Chief Justice of India ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza paish ki gayi thi. sadrnasheen Rajya sabha ki hesiyat se Mr. Venkaiah Naidu ko yeh ikhtiyar haasil hai ke woh tehreek mawakhiza qubool kere ya mustard kere, taham senior advocate Supreme Court Mr. Prashant Bhushan ney istafsaar kya ke Naib Sadar jamhooria ney kin bunyadon par tehreek muwakhza ki notice ko mustard kya hai ?
805.title: Chief Justice of India ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza ki notice mustard

news_detail: Damuscus. shaam ki musallah afwaj ny dar-al-hakoomat Dimashq ke qurb wa-jawar mein waqay Dayeesh aur Alnasrah mahaaz ke zair qabza ilaqon par itwaar ke roz laraka tayyaron, helly coptron aur toup khanaay se tabah kin bomb baari ki hai. Dayeesh ke jngjoon ny jummay ko Dimashq ke junoob mein waqay ilaqa hijr alaswad se inkhala par ittafaq kya tha lekin do roz baad bhi unhon ny ilaqa ka takhlia shuru nahi kya to Shami fouj ny laraka tayyaron aur helly coptron se un par tabah kin bombari kar di hai. un fazai hamlon ka maqsad Dayeesh ke jngjoon ko jhukana aur inkhala ke samjhota ko tasleem karne par majaboor karna hai .

Dayeesh aur dosray groupon ke senkron jangju alhaj al aswad aur is ke nazdeek waqay Falasteeni muhajreen ke camp alyarmok mein mojood hain. shaam ke sarkari TV alakhbarih ny hijr aswad par fazai hamlon ke baad dhuwan buland hotay dekhaya hai. Shami fouj ke laraka tayyaray fiza mein urrtey nazar arhay they. Dimashq ke makeeno ny raat bhar aur itwaar ki subah tayyaron ke urrnay ki goonj daar aawazian suneney ki ittila di hai. Shami saddar bsharalasd ny –apne itihadiyon roos aur Iran ki madad se mashriqi Algaudta mein jngjoon ke khilaaf larai mein fatah ke baad ab Dimashq ke dosray ilaqon ko mftoh bananay ke liye bhi muhim taiz kar rakhi hai. Shami fouj ny mashriqi Algota mein waqay shehron aur dehaat par tabah kin bambaar y ki thi aur Doma shehar par 7 April ko keemiyai hathyaaron se hamla kya tha jis ke baad baaghi group Shami hukoomat aur roos se inkhala ke samjhoton par majaboor hogaye they aur woh un ilaqon se –apne khandano sameit uth kar shumal maghribi soobay adlib aur soobah Halb mein turkey ki sarhad ke nazdeek wa qa shehar jerabils ki janib chalay gaye hain. darin Isna hamza Dimashq ke shumal mashriq mein waqay ilaqa Qalmoon se baghion aur un ke khandano ka inkhala jari hai aur woh bhi roos aur Shami hukoomat se samjhotay ke tehat apna ghar-baar chore kar Adlib aur jarabils ki janib jarahay hain. alakhbarih Tally Witson ki report ke mutabiq haftay ke roz paintees basoon par secron baaghi aur un ke khandan rawana hue they. Qalmoon mein waqay barray qasbay Alrahibia se das basoon par mushtamil pehla qaafla rawana sun-hwa tha aur is ki malik ke shumal ki janib safar par rawana honay se qabal Shami security forces ny talashi li thi. is ke ilawa Qalmoon hi mein waqay do aur qasbon j? rod aur Alnaseria se bhi baaghi aur un ke khandan sarkari basoon par Adlib aur Jarabils ki janib jarahay hain. un ke inkhala ka yeh silsila somwaar ko teesray roz bhi jari rahay ga .
822.title: Shami fouj ki Dayeesh ke thikanon par tabah kun bomb baari

news_detail: Europi Mulk Belgium ke siyasi akhadhe ki chaar badi jamhoori siyasi jamaaton ney Mulk mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ke liye koshan ‘Islam’ Party par pabandi laganay ki koshishen shuru kar di hain. Belgium ki dayen baazu, aitedaal pasand aur bayen baazu se talluq rakhnay wali chaar siyasi partiyon ney dastoor mein aik tarmeemi bill paish karne ka elaan kiya hai jis mein mazhabi bunyadon par siyasat mein sargaram honay aur Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ka mutalibah karne se roknay ki sifarish ki jaye gi, jis ke liye yeh taweel paish ki jarahi hai ke is mujaweza aaeni tarmeem ka maqsad Mulk ke dastoor ke liye khatrah ban’ney wali jamaaton par pabandi aayed karna hai. Belgium ke Rukn e Parliment Richard Miller ka kehna hai ke ‘Islam’ party ke numaindon ney khulay bundon Mulk ka adalti nizaam tabdeel karkay islami sharai adalti nizaam nafiz karne ki khwahish ka izhaar kiya hai, taham un ke gair jamohori nazriaat par manfi rad-e-amal ke khadshay ke paish nazar unho ney apne programme ke baaz nukaat tabdeel kiye hain. ‘Islam’ party ke sarbarah ney apne  islami sharai qawaneen ke nifaz ki koshisho ka bermila izhaar kiya hai. ‘Islam’ party ke Morocan rukn Abdul Hayi Baqali Tahiri ney kaha ke ‘haan mein pooray wusooq aur wazahat ke sath kehta hon ke hamari jamaat ka manshoor Belgium ke dastoor ko islami sanchay mein dhalna aur Belgium mouashra mein Islami qawaneen ke nifaz ki koshish karna hai’ unhon ney mazeed wazahat ki ke Islami sharai qawaneen duniya ke kayi dosray mulkon mein bhi raayej hain. Hum islami qawaneen ko aik Role Model ke tour par paish karna chahtay hain. ‘Islam’ party ki Belgium mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ki koshishon par Mulk ke siyasi aur samaji halqon ki taraf se shadeed tanqeed ki jarahi hai. Awaami halqon mein bhi Belgium ki Islami jamaat aur uss ki Mulk mein tabdeeli ki koshisho ko mashkook qarar diya hai. Mulk ki chaar badi jamhoori siyasi partiyon Socialist Party, Human Democratic Party, Reformer Movement aur Challenge Party ney ‘Islam’ party ki raah roknay ki koshishen teez kardi hain aur Tahiya kya ke Parliment mein Islam Party ki koshishon ko nakam banaye jaye ga. Yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke Belgium mein Musalman aqliyat mein hain is ke bawajood Islam Party  Mulk mein sharai qawaneen ke nifaz ki batein kar rahi hai.
586.title: Belgium mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ke khilaaf ‘jamhoori’ quwatoon ka gath jod

news_detail: Amrici Sadar ki Security Team mein paheli baar aik Bharati nazaad Sikh ko shaamil kiya gaya hai. Anshdip Singh Bhatia ney guzishta hafta tarbiyat mukammal honey par Sadar Trump ki hifazat ki zimmadariyan sambhaal li hain. Security Team mein shaamil honay se pahelay unhen huliya tabdeel karne ke liye kaha gaya tham Anshdip na maney aur qanooni chara joyi se mukhalifeen ko shikast di. Ludhyana mein paida hue Anshdip Singh Bhatia ko bil akhir Amrici Sadar ki Security Team mein shaamil karliya gaya hai. Woh darasal Uttar Pradesh ke Kanpur se talluq rakhtay hain. Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Indira Gandhi ke Sikh Security amlah ke hathon halakat ke baad phoot padney walay 1984 ke mukhalif Sikh fasadaat mein un ka khandan Ludhyana Punjab muntaqil hogaya tha. Un fasadaat mein Anshdip ke chacha ki jaan chali gayi aur un ke waalid par teen martaba qatilana hamla huwa tha. Anshdip jab 10 baras ke thay un ke waalid Devindar Singh 2000 mein apne khandan samait America muntaqil hogaye thae.
596.title: Trump ki Security mein Sikh ahelkaar shaamil

news_detail: Israeli Faujion ney jummey ke roz Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki sarhad par mukhtalif waqhiyat mein aik 12 sala ladke samait teen Falastinyon ko goli maar kar shaheed kar diya. Falastini wizarat dakhila ney kaha hai ke 12 sala ladke Shadi Abdul Aal ko Gaza ke shumali hissa mein goli maari gayi. Jab ke 21 sala Hani Afna aur Mohammad Shukor ko junoobi Gaza aur Al-Burj ke sahili ilaaqon mein do allag allag waqhiyat mein golian maar kar shaheed kiya gaya. Gaza ki wizarat sahet ke bayan ke mutabiq sarhad ke sath mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Falastinyon ke ehtejaj ke douran Israeli Faujion ki firing se kam az kam 50 afraad zakhmi bhi huwe. Gaza mein security zaraye ney bataya hai ke Gaza shehar ke qareeb Hamas ki aik chowki par aik Israeli tank ney chadhai kar di. Israel ki Fauj ney kaha hai ke Gaza ke mukhtalif hisson mein honey walay hungamon mein andazan 13 hazaar afraad shaamil thae. Un mein se kayi log tyre jala rahay thae aur kayi aatish geer madah phaink rahay thae. Baday paimanay par ehtejaj aur Israeli Security Forces ke sath jhadpon ka yeh naya silsila 30 March se shuru huwa tha aur tab se har jummay ko muzahiray kiye ja rahay hain. Is arsa ke douran Israeli firing se kam azkam 179 Falastini shaheed ho chuke hain. Israel ney Gaza ki patti ka muhasra kar rakha hai aur is ka kehna hai ke Hamas ko allag thalag karne ke liye aisa karna zaroori hai. 2008 se Israel aur Hamas ke darmiyan teen jaangein ho chuki hain. Insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ka kehna hai ke taqreeban 20 lakh abadi ka muhasra aik tarha se ijtemai saza ke mutaradif hai.
667.title: Gaza ki Sarhad par Israeli Fauj ki firing se teen Falastini shaheed

news_detail: Falasteeni Sadar Mahmud Abbas ney khabardaar kya hai ke Israel Masjid e Aqsa ko musalmanoon aur Yahudion ke darmiyan taqseem karne ki saazish kar raha hai. Un ka kahena hai ke Qibla e awwal ki zamani aur makani taqseem ke sangeen natayij samnay ayen ge aur un ka zimma daar Israel hoga. Ramallah mein Tanzeem Azaadi e Falasteen ke aik ijlaas se khitaab mein unhon ney kaha ke ‘aik hassas masla Masjid e Aqsa ka hai jis ke baray mein Israel apni sazishain aur chaalein chal raha hai. Hamaray paas Israeli resha duwanyon ke thos shawahid maujood hain. Israel Musalmanoon ki tarha Yahudion ko bhi Masjid e Aqsa mein ibadat ka haq dilwana chahta hai. Dosray alfaaz mein Israel Masjid e Ibrahimi alsharif ki tarha Masjid e Aqsa ko bhi Yahudion aur Musalmanoon ke darmiyan zamani aur makani aitebaar se taqseem karna chahta hai. Khayaal rahay ke 1994 mein West Jordan ke shaher Al-Khaleel mein qaayim tareekhi Jamia Masjid Ibrahimi mein aik Yahudi daheshatgard ney namaz ada karne walay Falastinion par golian chalayein jis ke nateeja mein 29 namazi shaheed hogaye thae. iss ke baad Masjid e Ibrahimi ko Yahudion aur Musalmanoon ke darmiyan taqseem kardiya gaya tha. Masjid e Aqsa ki tarha Israel aur Yahudi Masjid e Ibrahimi ki malkiat ka bhi daawa karte hain. 1967 ke baad Israel ney Yahudion ko saiyahati maqasid ke liye Masjid e Aqsa mein dakhila ki ijazat dae rakhi hai magar Yahudi abaadkaar Qibla e Awwal mein ghus kar jabran Talmudi talimaat ke mutabiq mazhabi rusumaat bhi ada karte hain. Isi hawala se baat karte hue Sadar Mahmud Abbas ka kahena tha ke Masjid e Aqsa mein jo kuch ho raha hai iss ke baray mein hum Jordanian bhaiyon se salah wo mahswara kar rahay hain taakay hum aik muaqqaf le kar aalami adalat e insaaf se rujoo kar saken. Falasteeni Authority, Israel aur Jordan ke darmiyan taye paye moahida ke tahet Masjid e Aqsa aur Al-Quds mein maujood deegar muqamat e  muqaddisa ki nigrani, hifazat, mulazmeen ki tankhwahon ki adai aur deegar intizami umoor Jordan ke paas hain. Yaad rahay ke Musalmanoon ke Qibla e Awwal Masjid e Aqsa par Yahudion ke apna haq jatanay ki koshish ke talluq se ‘Y This News’ ney bahut pahelay hi aagah kardiya tha aur bataya tha ke kis tarha adalat ke zareya se Masjid e Aqsa mein bhi Yahudion ko ibadat ka haq dilanay ki saazish rachi jarahi hai .
mulahiza karen. .. .. .. . .
675.title: Masjid e Aqsa ko taqseem karne ki sazish: Mahmud Abbas

news_detail: Russia ki defence ministry ke elaan ke mutabiq Russia ka aik fouji tayyarah jis mein 14 askari ahalkal sawaar thae, peer ko raat gaye Syria ke saahil ke nazdeek Mediterranean Sea ke oopar parwaaz ke douran radar ki screen se gayab ho gaya. Yeh waqhiya muqami waqt ke mutabiq raat 11:00 bajey paish aaya jab ke isi douran Syria ke shaher Latakia ko Israel ki janib se missile hamlon ka nishana banaya ja raha tha. Mangal ke roz jari bayan mein Russian ministry of defence ney bataya hai ke ” IL. 20 tayyarah ke amlah se uss waqt rabita munqita huwa jab woh Hmeimim ke fazai adda ki janib wapsi ke douran Syria ke saahil se 35 kilo meter ki doori par Mediterranean Sea ke oopar mehve parwaaz tha”. Bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke fouji tayyarah ke amla ke anjaam ke baaray mein abhi tak koi ilm nahi aur tayyarah ki talaash jari hai. wizarat difaa ke mutabiq tayyarah ke radar screen se gayab honay ke waqt Israel ke chaar F16 tayyaray Syria ke soobay Latakia mein Infrastructure ko nishana bana rahay thea. Latakia Mulk ke shumal maghrib mein Shami sadar Bishar Al Asad ka garh shumaar kiya jata hai. Doosri janib Russian khabar rasan Agency “RIA Novosti ” ney aik askari zaraye ke hawale se bataya hai ke Shami fazai difai nizaam ney Israeli hamlon ke jawab mein firing ki. Russian defence ministry ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke “tayyarah se jis waqt rabita munqita huwa usi douran hamaray radars ney mazkoorah ilaqa mein maujood French Fighter behri jahaaz par se missile daaghe jaany ka pata chalaya”. Idhar Paris ney fauri taur par Russia ke ilzaam ki tardeed kar di hai. Francesi fouj ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke “French afwaj is hamla mein kisi taur bhi mulawis honey ki tardeed karti hin”. Shami hukoomat ney pir ke roz aik behri missile hamla ki tasdeeq ki jis ke douran sahili shehar Latakia mein mutadid thikanon ke ilawa Hmeimim ke fouji adda ko bhi nishana banaya gaya. Shami hukoomat ke zair e intezam media ke mutabiq Latakia mein Technical Industries Corporation ko nishana bananey walay missilon aur drone tayyaron par rok laga di gayi aur is douran missile shikan nizaam ney un mein se kayi ko maar giraya. Syria mein insani haqooq ke nigaran Group Al-Marsid ke mutabiq hamla mein Latakia mein Technical Industries Corporation ke godowns mein golah barood ke depots ko tabah kar diya gaya. Idhar Israeli fouj ney Shami thikanon par Israeli fazai hamlon ke douran tayyarah ke la patah honay se mutaliq Russian ministry of defence ke elaan par tabsarah se inkaar kar diya. Israeli fouj ki tarjuman ney peer ki shab aik bayan mein kaha ke “ham bahar se aney wali khabron par tabsarah nahi karte”. Tarjuman ney apni qayadat ke sath iss maamla par behas ke liye mohlat talab kar li. Doosri janib aik Amrici ohdedar ka kehna hai ke America yeh samjhta hai ke Syrian hukoomat ki tayyarah shikan toup ney ghair danista taur par Russian fighter ko maar giraya, jis ke baaray mein Russian media ka kehna hai ke woh peer ki shab Mediterranean Sea ke oopar “Lapata” ho gaya. Amrici ohdedar ney British khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke America ke nazdeek Shami hukoomat ke difai nizaam ney Israeli missiles ka rasta rokney ke douran ghalti se Russia tayyarah maar giraya.
686.title: Syria par Israeli Missile hamla, Russian fighter la patah

news_detail: Trump intizamia ne China ki fouj par Russian fighter planes aur Missile System kharidne par pabandi lagadi. Russia se fighter planes aur Missile System kharidne par America ne China ke fouji idara par pabandi lagai hai, Amrici mahkuma e kharija ke mutabiq woh fauri taur par Chinese fouj ke aik unit par pabandi ka itlaq karega. Amrici mahkuma e kharija ka kahna hai ke Russia se s U 35 fighter planes aur Missile System s 400 kharidne par China par pabandiyan hain. Amrici mahkuma e kharija ka kahna hai ke America Chinese fouj ki branch Economic Development Department aur mahkuma ke director par fauri pabandi nafiz karega. Khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq Chinese agency aur is ke sarbarah export licence aur American Financial System ke liye block kardiya gaya hai. Chinese agency aur iss ke sarbarah ko is fehrist mein bhi shaamil karliya gaya jis ke zareya woh americion ke sath business nahi kar saken ge. Amrican intizamia ne Russian military aur intelligence se talluq rakhnay wali mazeed 33 afraad aur companiyon ko black list kya hai. Chinese idaara ka Russian hathyaaron ki kharidari ka iqdaam Russia par aayed Amrici pabandion ki khilaaf warzi hai, jis ke tahet Russia ki difai sanat ke sath baday paimanay par lain daen karne walay teesray fareeq par pabandiyan lag sakti hain .
769.title: China par Russian Fighters, kharidne par America ki pabandi

news_detail: Riyadh. Telangana NRI Journalists Association Saudi Arabia (TNJASA) ki janib se Hindustan ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein hukoomat ki janib se azaadi e sahaafat ke khilaaf ki jarahi sazishon aur azaadi sahaafat par shikanja kasnay ki koshisho ki mazammat karte hue Hindustan ki sahafati bradari aur sahafion ke sath izhaar yaganagat kya gaya. Convenor TNJASA janab K.N. Wasif ney Telangana Union of Working Journalists, Hyderabad Union of Working Journalists, Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union, Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Federation aur deegar tanzeemon ki janib se Hyderabad aur Mulk ke deegar shahron mein munaqqid ki gayi ehtajaji rallies aur sahafion ke tamam mutalibaat ki bharpoor taayeed ka elaan kya. Unhon ney hukoomat e Hind se mutaliba kya ke Hindustan mein azaadi e sahaafat ko yakeeni banaya jaye aur hukoomat ki policies ke khilaaf sadaye ehtijaj buland karne walay sahafion ke khilaaf ki jaanay wali karwayyon par rok lagai jaye kayon ke azad sahafat sahatmand jamhoriat ke liye be had zroori hai. TNJASA ke deegar arakeen Mohammad Saifuddin , Ghouse Arsalan , Syed Zia Rahman , Mir Mohsin Ali , Mohammad Tajammul Ali Khan , Mohammad Abdul Basit, Mohammad Ameenuddin Ansari aur Abdur Rahman Mirza Baig ney hukoomat Hind se mutaliba kya ke Mulk mein azaadi e sahaafat ko yakeeni banaya jaye.
783.title: NRI Journalists Saudi Arabia ka Hind ke sahafion se izhaar e yaganagat

news_detail: Misar ki aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Hosaini Mubarak ke dono beyton Alaa aur Gamal Mabarak ki budunwani ke ilzaam mein giraftari ka hukum dainey walay judge ko muqadme ki samaat se door rakhney ke liye dayar kardah darkhwast manzoor kar li hai. Yeh darkhwast wakeel safai ney daayir ki hai aur fauri taur par adalat ke is faisla ki qanooni buniyaad maloom nahi hosaki hai. Cairo ki aik adalat ke judge Ahmed Abul Fatoh ney guzishta hafta ke roz Alaa aur Gamal ko Stock Market mein mobayyana utaar chadhaoo ke ilzaam mein giraftar kar ney ka hukum diya tha. Sarkari istighasa ney un dono bhaiyon sameit paanch afraad par apni Front Companies ke zariya baaz Banks ke shares ki kharidari ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha aur unhon ney is se mutaliq samjhoton se Stock Market ko aagah nahi kiya tha. Yeh paanchon afraad guzishta hafta ke roz qahira mein fouj daari adalat mein muqadma ki samaat ke douran mein haazir thae aur judge ke hukum par wahein unhein hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. Judge ney is muqadma ki mazeed samaat 20

October tak multawi kar di thi. Abhi tak yeh maloom nahi ho saka ke aaya Alaa aur Gamal Mubarak ki rihayi ke liye ab qanooni kaarwai shuru ki jaye gi ya nahi. Wazeh rahey ke Gamal Mubarak apne waalid Hosaini Mubarak ke daur e sadarat mein hukumaran jamaat ki aik ahem committee ke sarbarah rahay thae aur unhein waalid ka siyasi janasheen khayaal kiya jata tha. Un ke badey bhai Alaa Mubarak siyasat se door rahay thay lekin un par waalid ke assar wo rusookh ko baruwekar laatey huwe bhaari doulat kamaney ke ilzamaat aayad kiye gaye thay. Unhein 2011 mein Hosaini Mubarak ke iqtedaar ke khtama ke baad mutadid martaba thoday thoday waqfay ke baad girftar kiya jata raha tha lekin teen saal qabal unhein jail se raha kardiya gaya tha. Un se do saal ke baad 2017 mein un ke waalid Hosaini Mubarak ko bhi jail se riha kardiya gaya tha. Sabiq sadar aur un ke dono beyton ko May 2015 mein bad unwani ke aik muqadma mein teen, teen saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. Un par qaumi khazana se aik Crore Euro (1.15 Crores Dollars) ki raqam sadaarti mehal ki Tazaeen o Araish par urane ke ilzaam mein muqadma chalaya gaya tha. Taham unhein jab yeh saza sunai gayi thi, iss waqt tak woh qaid ki yeh muddat jail mein poori kar chuke thae.
796.title: Misar: Alaa aur Gamal Mubarak ki giraftari, judge ko hataane ki darkhwast Manzoor

news_detail: Aqwama mutahidda ki aik naayi report mein bataya gaya hai ke duniya bhar mein Poverty Line se neechay zindagi guzarney walon 1.3 arab afraad mein nisf tadaad bachon ki hai. Yeh baat Aqwama mutahidda ke taraqiyati Programme aur Oxford Poverty and Human Development ki janib se jumaraat ke roz jari honey walay Multidimentional Poverty Index mai batai gayi. Report ke mutabiq 104 Mumalik mein 1.3 arab aisay afraad hain jin ki darjah bandi Poverty Line se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ki hesiyat se ki gayi hai. Un mein 18 baras se kam Umar ke 66.2 crore kam seen bachay shaamil hain. Report mein kaha gaya hai ke Poverty Line se neechay zindagi guzarney walay afraad ki aksariyat yane 1.1 Arab afraad dehi ilaaqon mein rehtay hain. Dehi ilaaqon mein gurbat ki sharah shehri ilaaqon ke muqaabla mein chaar gunaa ziyada hai. Aqwama mutahidda ki report ke mutabiq duniya bhar ke ghareeb afraad mein se 83% sehraye Azam ke junoob mein Africa ke ilaqa aur junoobi Asia mein rehte hain. Report mein bataya gaya hai ke baaz Mumalik mein hukoomat ke taraqiyati mansoobon ke zariya gurbat ke khatame ke silsila mein misbat nataij ko yakeeni banaya gaya hai. Maslan Bharat mein is noeyat ke mansubon ke baais 2005  se 2016  ke darmain  27.1 crore afraad gurbat ke daire se bahar aaye. Report mein Aqwama mutahidda ke taraqiyati programme ke Director Achun Stainzer ka kehna hai ke agarche gurbat ki sharah bilkhushoos bachon mein intehai buland hai, is ke bawajood gurbat ke khatame ke liye paish Raft mumkin hai. Aqwama mutahidda har aisay shakhs ko gurbat ke daira mein shumaar karti hai jis ki yomiya aamdani 1.9 dollar se ziyada na ho. Gurbat ke khatame mein Bharat ki peshraft inteheae ahem hai. Junoob Asia  Mumalik mein sirf Maldives  hi sharah ke aitebaar se Hindustan se agay hai. 2005 se kabal Bharat mein Poverty Line se neechay zindagi buser karne waloun ki sharah 54.7 feesad thi jo ab ghatt kar 27.5 feesad hogaye hai. Is terha Poverty Line se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ki tadaad junoob Asian Mumalik mein sirf Maldives  mein hi Hindustan se kam hai aur yeh farq bhi sirf 1.9 feesad ka hi hai. Yeh sharah Nepal mein 35.4 feesad, Bangladesh mein 41.1 feesad aur Pakistan mein 43.9 feesad hai.
809.title: Duniya mein 1.3 arab Poverty line se neechay : UN

news_detail: Libya ke dar-ul-hakoomat Tripoli mein 5 lakh bachay mutharab jangju Militias ke darmiyan jari ladai ke nateeja mein khatray se dochar ho chukay hain. United Nations ke tahet huqoqqِ atfaal ke idaara UNICEF ney peer ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke guzishta 48 ghantay ke douran mein Tripoli ke junoob mein ladai mein shiddat ke baad se mazeed 1200 se ziyada khandan be ghar hogaye hain. UNICEF ka kehna hai ke Tripoli aur iss ke nawahi ilaaqon mein August se jari musallah jhadpon ke nateeja mein 25 hazaar se ziyada afraad be ghar ho chukay hain. Un mein nisf tadaad bachon ki hai. United nations ki iss Agency ke Middle East aur shumali Africa mein Director Garrett Kapler ney kaha hai ke ” Mazeed bachon ko jung ke liye bharti kiya ja raha hai jis se woh fauri khatrah se dochar ho chukay hain aur ladai mein shareek aik bacha mara bhi ja chuka hai”. Libya ki wizarat sahet ke hafta ki shab faraham kardah adaad wo shumaar ke mutabiq Tripoli aur iss ke nawahi ilaqa mein guzishta aik mah se mutharab jungju groups ke darmiyan jari ladai ke nateeja mein 115 afraad halaak aur kam se kam 400 zakhmi ho chukay hain. Ladai se mutasirah ilaaqon se be ghar honay walay afraad ko aik Schoolon mein aarzi taur par thehraya ja raha hai jis ke paish e nazar 3

October se naye taleemi saal ka aaghaz mumkin nazar nahi araha hai aur iss mein takheer hojaye gi. UNICEF ke mutabiq ladai se mutasirah ilaaqon ke makeeno ko khoraak, bijli aur pani ki qillat ka saamna hai. Ladai mein shiddat se taarkinِ e watan ki mushkilaat mein bhi izafah hochuka hai. Kapler ka kahna tha ke ”Senkdroon girftar panah gzinon aur taarikeen e watan ko tashadud ki wajah se zabardasti doosri jaghon par muntaqil kiya ja raha hai. Un ke alawa bahut se taarkin e watan aisay marakaz mein phas kar rahe gaye hain, jin ki haalat intehai naguftah bah hai. Wazeh rahay ke Aqwama mutahidda ki masalihati koshisho ke nateejay mein 4

September ko mutharab Militias ke darmiyan jung bandi huwi thi lekin guzishta haftay Tripoli ke junoobi ilaaqon mein Tarbona aur Misrat se talluq rakhne wali Militias aur Tripoli mein Libya ki qaumi hukoomat ke tahet Militias mein dobarah ladai chhid gayi thi.
826.title: Tripoli mein 5 lakh bachay ‘khatray’ se dochar: UNICEF

news_detail: iftitahi taqreeb mein Israel mein American safeer David Fridman naay kaha ke” aaj hum Bait ul Muqaddasmein American sifarat khanah ka iftitah kar rahay hain “. taqreeb mein vashngtn se anay walay aik American wafad aur Israeli rehnumao naay bhi shirkat ki. doosri janib qaabiz Israeli fouj naay paiir ke roz Gaza patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par American sifarat khanaay ki tall abib se Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqili ke khilaaf ehtijaj karne walay muzahireen par firing kar ke darjanon flstinyon ko shaheed aur secron ko zakhmi kar diya.
