Falasteeni wizarat sahet naay 55 flstinyon ke shaheed aur 2 hazaar se ziyada ke zakhmi honay ki tasdeeq kar di hai. shaheed honay walon mein bachay bhi shaamil hain. hazaron Falasteeni Ali alsbah Israel ke sath sarhad ke qareeb jama ho gay they. Falasteeni March se Israel ki Gaza ki patti ki naka bandi aur American sifarat khanaay ki tall abib se Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqili ke khilaaf ehtijaj kar rahay hain. Israeli fouj naay Falasteeni muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye aashk aawar gas golay ddaghe jis se secron Falasteeni buri terhan mutasir hue hain
720.title: American sifarat khanah Bait ul Muqaddasmuntaqil, Israeli fouj ki firing se 55 Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: Karnataka Assembly ke intikhabi nataij naay sab ko shashdar kardiya, hukoomat saazi ke liye darkaar saada si aksariyat ke baarey mein din bhar tajassus barqarar raha. BJPko Iqtidaar taq rasai se roknay ke liye Congressr naay Janata Dal S se taied talabb karne ki bajaye Janata Dal S ki taied ka peshkash kardiya. BJP agarchay sab se barri party ke tor par ubhri hai magar woh hukoomat tashkeel dainay ke muaqqaf mein nahi hai chunkay Congressr party naay 78 nashistain haasil karne ke bawajood 37 nashistain hi haasil karne wali janata dil sikolr ki taied karte hue each d kamaraa -swami ko cheif mnstr bananay ki himayat ki hai. BJP104 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki aur woh hukoomat tashkeel dainay sirf 9 nashiston se peechay reh gayi hai. 224 rukni Assembly ke liye 222 nashiston par intikhabaat hue they. aik halqa Assembly mein bhaari tadaad mein votr shanakhti kards ki dasteyabi ke baais aur aik halqa Assembly mein umeed waar ke intqaal ke baais intikhabaat ko mansookh kardiya gaya tha. agarchay BJPaur Janata Dal S naay Governor se khwahish ki ke usay Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ka mauqa diya jaye. ab tamam ki nazrain Governor par markooz hogayi hain ke woh kis ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hain. yeh Governor ki swabdid par hai ke woh sab se barri party ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hain ya ittehaad ko jis ke paas adadi qowat ziyada hai aur jo hukoomat tashkeel dainay ki soorat mein ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karsaktha hai. agar BJPko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat di jati hai to arkaan Assembly ki barray pemana par khareed o farokht ke imkanaat ko mustard nahi kiya ja sakta aur muntakhib arkaan Assembly apni wafadaariyan tabdeel kar saktay hain. Karnataka ke nataij, awam ki tawaquaat aur ghalib exit poll nataij ke barkhilaf aeye hain jis se aik tabqa ke shubhat ko taqwiyat haasil hoti hai ke Electronic Voting Machines ko programme ke zareya control karte hue mann maani nataij haasil kiye janey lagey hain. intikhabi nataij ko dekhen to BJPjisay 104 nashistain haasil hui hain guzashta ke maqabil 64 nashiston ka faida haasil sun-hwa hai, guzashta intikhabaat mein BJPsirf 40 nashiston taq hi mehdood thi, Congressr jis ko is martaba sirf 78 nashistain haasil hui theen usay guzashta intikhabaat mein 122 nashistain haasil hui theen is terhan usay 44 nashiston ka nuqsaan sun-hwa hai. is martaba bi SP aur aik muqami party ke aik aik umeed waar aur aik azad umeed waar ko bhi kamyabi haasil hui hai. BJPnaay 104 nashistain haasil ki hai magar voton ke tanasub mein woh Congressr se peechay hai. Congressr ko 38 % vote haasil hue jabkay BJPko 36. 2 % vote hi haasil hue hain, Janata Dal S ko 18. 3 % vote haasil hue hain. Karnataka Assembly intikhabaat mein s d pi aayi aur All India Mahila Empowerment Paarty ke tamam hi umeedwaron ki zamanaten zabt hogayi hain. Karnataka Assembly ke liye is martaba sirf 7 umeed waar hi kamyaab ho paye hain. Karnataka mein is se qabal 11 Muslim arkaan Assembly they. Karnataka mein musalmanoon ka tanasub 13 feesad hai. Karnataka mein 2008 mein 9 Muslim arkaan Assembly muntakhib hue they. Karnataka ki tareekh mein sab se ziyada Muslim umeed waar 1978 mein muntakhib hue they is waqt 16 Muslim arkaan Assembly they. is martaba muntakhib Muslim umeedwaron mein halqa Assembly Chambrajpait se Congressr ke umeedwaar Zameer Ahmed Khan , halqa Assembly Gubarga shumal se Congressr umeedwaar Kaneez Fatima, Mangaluru se Congressr umeedwaar U T Qadir , Narsimharaja se Congressr umeedwaar Tanveer Saith, Shantinagar se Congressr umeedwaar N A Haris , Shivajinagar (Bengaluru) se Roshan Baig aur Bidar se Congressr umeedwaar Mohammad Raheem Khan kamyaab rahay. un tamam umeedwaron naay BJP umeedwaron ko shikast dete hue Assembly taq puhanche hain. kaneez fatima jo janab Qamar al – islam marhoom ki bewa hai, Guberga se muntakhib honay wali pehli khatoon umeed waar ban gayi hain. Qamar ul Islam  6 martaba Assembly ke liye muntakhib hue they
730.title: Karnataka mein muallaq Assembly. Governor ke faisla par sab ki nazrain markooz

news_detail: Bengaluru. Hardware shop ke maalik aur government clerk ke tor par mamooli zindagi guzarnay walay 75 sala RSS Swayam Sewak Mr. B S Yediyurappane siyasat mein qadam rakhnay ke baad bulandiyon par yahan taq poanch gaye ke aksariyat ke baghair bhi aaj teesri martaba Karnataka ke Chief Ministerki hesiyat se jaiza le liya. Governor Karnataka Mr. Vijubhaiwala ne jo khud bhi aik RSS Swayam Sewak hain, Mr. ‫Yediyurappa ko Chief Ministerki hesiyat se halaf bhi dila diya halaanke BJP ko sirf 104 hi nashistain haasil huien aur kisi doosri party ne BJP ki taied ka elaan bhi nahi kya. BJP ne jin do azad umeedwaron ki taied haasil honay ka daawa kya woh bhi congress ke camp mein nazar arhay hain. is ke barkhilaf congress party ne jis ko 78 nashistain haasil huien, Janata Dal S ki tayeed ka elaan kya jis ke paas 37 nashistain hain. is terhan dono partiyon ki adadi qowat 115 hojati hai jo tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar 112 nashiston se zayed hai. yahi nahi balkay bi SP aur deegar do am ail as bhi congress camp mein hi nazar arhay hain. Mr. B S Yediyurappane Chief Ministerki hesiyat se jaiza letay hi waqt zaya kiye baghair nazam o nasq mein barri tabdeelian kar dein aur kai aayi ae s aur aayi pi s ohdedaron ke tabadlay kar diye, un mein advocate general, senior police ohdedaar shaamil hain. unhon ne additional cheif secretary baraye Chief Ministerko bhi tabdeel kardiya hai. shaam mein Governor haoz se jari elamia mein bataya gaya ke fori asar ke sath Mr. Madhusudan Naik ki jagah Mr. Prabhuling Navadagi ko riyasat ka Advocate General muqarrar kya gaya hai. hukoomat ne Mr. M. Laxminarayana ko jo Additional Chief Secretary public works ki hesiyat se faraiz injaam day rahay they, Additional Chief Secretary baraye Chief Minister muqarrar kya gaya hai. Elamia mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke un ka moaqqaf mehakma dakhla mein additional cheif secretary ke rutba ke mumasil hoga. sarkari aalamia ke mutabiq senior aayi pi s officer Mr. Amar Kumar Pande ko jo Additional Director General of Police Railway ke taur par khidmaat injaam day rahay they, Additional DGP  intelligence muqarrar kardiya gaya hai. Deputy Inspector General of Police Karnataka State Reserve Police Mr. Sandip Patil DIG Intelligence hon ge. Suprintendent of police Bidar Mr. D. Deveraja ka tabadlah Deputy Commissioner of Police Bengaluru Central Divsion ke tor par kya gaya. Suprintendent of Police Anticorruption Bureau Mr. s grace ka tabadlah bah hesiyat d si pi Bengaluru north east Divsion kya gaya hai. Supreme Court ne Mr. ‫Yediyurappa ki halaf bardari roknay se inkaar karte hue yeh kaha tha ke darkhwast par jummay ko kiye jany walay faisla par halaf bardari moqoof hogi. Supreme Court ne raat mein un darkhwaston ki samaat ki thi. Governor ne Chief Ministerko ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ke liye 15 din ka waqt diya hai. Governor ke is iqdaam par mukhtalif gooshon se tnqidin ki jarahi hain aur yeh kaha ja raha hai ke 15 din ki mohlat is liye di gayi ke is douran BJP ko arkaan ki khareed vo frokht ka mauqa faraham kya jaye
740.title: B S Yediyurappane Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ny aaj hukum diya ke hafta ko 4 : 00 bajay shaam ko Karnataka Assembly mein flour test kya jaye. Justice AK Sikiri, Justice S A Bobde aur Justice Ashok Bhushan par mushtamil aik bench, Congress aur Janata Dal (S) ki janib se governor Vajubhai Vala ke Karnataka mein tashkeel hukoomat ke liye BJPko madoo karne se mutaliq dair kardah darkhwaston ki samaat kar rahi thi. bench ny douran samaat kaha ke Mr. bi s ‫d europa ko hukoomat saazi ke liye madoo karne governor ke faisla ke qanooni juwaz par uljhnay se behtar hai ke hafta mein ewaan mein adadi qowat ka test karliya jaye aur kisi ko bhi koi mohlat nah di jaye. Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf lainay walay ‫d europa ki taraf se paish hotay hue senior advocate Mukul Rohtgi ny adalat ki janib se muqarara din ki mukhalfat karte hue ‘Floor Test’ ke liye koi munasib tareekh muqarrar ki jaye. Supreme Court ny floor test ke liye is terhan ki mohlat muqarrar karne ki maazi ki naziren paish kee. aaj din mein 10 : 30 bajay din mein jon hi adalti karwai ka aaghaz sun-hwa, Rohtgi ny do maktubaat hawala kiye jo governor ko paish kiye gaye they, jin mein se aik Mr. Yediurappa ke BJP ka qayed aiwaan muntakhib karliye jaanay se mutaliq hai jabkay dosray maktoob mein yeh id-daa kya gaya ke inhen darkaar tadaad mein arkaan Assembly ki taied haasil hai. Rohtgi ny kaha ke ‫d europa ke liye zurori nahi hai ke woh governor ko un tamam arkaan Assembly ke naam paish kere chunkay woh ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne tayyar hain. unhon ny inkishaaf kya ke BJPko Congress aur Jantadal-S ke arkaan Assembly ki tayeed haasil hogi avrih ke Congress aur Janata Dal s ki janib se likhe gaye maktubaat mein yeh ishara nahi hai ke ma baad intikhabaat mafahmat ko har rukan Assembly ki taied o himayat haasil hai. Rohtgi ny kaha ke’ ‘ doosri janib ke kayi arkaan Assembly ny mujhe bataya ke unhon ny Congress. Janata Dal S ittehaad ki tehreeri tayeed nahi ki hai. Aur main is moud par mazeed kuch nahi keh sakta.’ ‘ Congress ki taraf se paish hotay hue senior wakeel abhishk manu Singhvi ny Adalat Uzma se istadua ki ke woh faisla kere ke konsi party ko apni aksariyat saabit karne ka mauqa diya jana chahiye. unhon ny id-daa kya ke Congress. Janata Dal S baghair kisi takheer ke hafta ko ewaan Assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne amaada hain. unhon ny yhan tak keh diya ke videography honi chahiye aur arkaan e Assembly ko munasib security faraham ki jani chahiye taakay woh be khauf vote day sakay. Supreme Court ny kaha ke woh DGP ko hukum day gi ke hafta ke din floor test ke liye munasib intizamaa kiye jayen. adalat Uzma ny Congress. Janata Dal S ko adadi qowat haasil honay ke bawajood governor Vajubhai Vala ki janib se BJP ko tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dainay ki maqoliat se mutaliq istafsaar kya. bench ny kaha ke’ ‘ kis bunyaad par governor ny faisla kya ke kon mustahkam faraham karsaktha hai, mehez is bunyaad par ke wahid barri party ny aksariyat haasil honay ka id-daa kya jabkay doosri janib Congress. Janata Dal s ko aksariyat haasil honay ko tehreeri taied haasil hai? bulaa shuba yeh aakhir-kaar adaad ka khail hai aur governor ko dekhnaa chahiye ke kis party ko aksariyat ki taied haasil hai.’ ‘ Supreme Court ny governor ko anglo indian baradri se kisi ko am ail ae naamzad karne se baz rakha hai. adalat ny ‫d europa hukoomat se kaha ke woh koi bara policy faisla karne se is waqt taq baz rahay tavqtik_h ewaan mein aksariyat saabit nahi hojati. Janata Dal s Karnataka unit ke sarbarah Mr. H.D. Kumaraswamy ke wakeel senior advocate Mr. Kapil Sibbal ny Assembly mein benchon ki taqseem aur aik Protem Speaker ke taqarrur ki maang ki.
753.title: Supreme Court ny hafta ko Karnataka Assembly mein khat e aetemaad haasil karne ka hukum jari kya

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka Assembly intikhabaat ke nataij mein kisi bhi siyasi party ko qatee aksariyat haasil nah honay ke baad se roz Afzun siyaCDrama honay laga hai. tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar arkaan Assembly ki taied ke baare mein ibham ke bawajood Governor Karnataka ney BJP qayed e muqanana MR. ‫Yediurappako tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat day di. cheif mnstr ke ohda ka jaiza letay hue ‫Yediurappaney nazam o nasq mein tabdeelian kar dein aur aaj sprim court ney ‫Yediurappahukoomat ko aiwaan mein aksariyat saabit karne ke liye Governor ki janib se di gayi 15 dinon ki mohlat ko ghata kar yeh hukum day diya ke woh hafta ke din 4 : 00 bujey shaam aiwaan mein aksariyat saabit kere. Governor ney RSS se talluq rakhnay walay senior rukan Assembly MR. KG Bopaiah ko pro-tem Speaker muqarrar kya hai aur ab Karnataka Congress ney aik audio clip jari karte hue yeh ilzaam aed kya ke BJP se wabsta Janardhan Reddyney is ke aik rukan Assembly ko rishwat dainay ki koshish ki hai. Karnataka Congress ney aik audio clip jari ki hai jis mein BJP quied Janardhan Reddy ney Raichur rural se muntakhib Rukn e Assembly ko doulat aur ohda ki peshkash ki hai. is audio clip mein Janardhan Reddykhulay tor par keh rahay hain ke inhen arkaan Assembly ko khareedney mein BJP ke qaumi saddar amit Shah ki pusht panahi haasil hai. press conference mein audio clip sunanay ke baad Congress leader ney twit mein ilzaam aed kya. is ilzaam par markazi wazeer o BJP quied MR. Prkash Javedkar ney kaha ke yeh audio CD Congress dirty trks department ki karstani hai. yeh aik jhooti CD hai. Congress aur Janata Dal Secular jis ke paas majmoi tor par 116 arkaan Assembly they, –apne arkaan Assembly ko bachanay koshan hain chunkay inhen dar hai ke un ki party ke arkaan Assembly ko doulat aur ohday ka lalach day kravr fouj daari karwaiyon ki dhmkyan day kar BJP 112 arkaan taied haasil karne ke darpay hai. Congress aur Janata Dal S ney ibtida mein –apne arkaan Assembly ko Bengaluru ki hotlon mein thehraya tha magar baad hyderabad muntaqil kardiya gaya. isi asna BJP ab bhi prazm hai ke woh kal aiwaan mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhaigi. kaha jata hai ke is ko Congress aur Janata Dal S ke kuch arkaan ney taied karne ka tayaqqun diya hai
766.title: Janardhan Reddy ney Congress MLA ko khareedney ki koshish ki, Karnataka Congress ka id-daa. Audio Clip ka ijra

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein Iqtidaar haasil karne BJP kisi bhi had tak ja sakti hai. tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar 112 arkaan assembly ki taied haasil nah honay ke bawajood BJP naay Governor ki madad se ‫Yediurappa ko Chief Minister ki haisiyat se halaf dladya. agarchay sprim court naay hafta ko 4 : 00 bajey shaam ko hi aiwaan mein khat aetmaad haasil karne ki hadaayat di hai is ke bawajood BJP purazm hai ke usay darkaar taied haasil hojaye gi. Congress aur Janata Dal Secular ke qaideen naay ilzaam aed kya ke is ke arkaan assembly ko wizarat aur doulat ka lalach dainay ki bhi koshishen ki gayeen aur ab yeh ilzaam aed kya ja raha hai ke Congress ke aik aur Janata Dal Secular ke do arkaan assembly ka aghwaa kya gaya hai aur un ke khilaaf Enforcement Directorate aur Income Tax Department ki janib se karwaiya ki jarahi hain. Mr. H.D.  Kumaraswamy ney kaha’ ‘ Janata Dal Secular ke do arkaan assembly ko hamaray BJP doston naay aghwaa karliya hai, lekin mujhe yaqeen hai ke woh hamaray paas wapas ajayeen ge.’ ‘ isi terhan aik aur Congress rukan assembly ko Delhi mein Enforcement Directorate ki janib se rokay rakhnay ka ilzaam aed kyajarha hai. Congress ke senior quied Mr. ghulam Nabi Azad ney kaha’ ‘ MLAs hamaray sath hain, ikhtiyarat ka jo kuch ghalat istemaal karna tha unhon naay kya. sprim court naay inhen aik ahcha pachada sirf zabani nahi balkay iqdaam ke tor par. yeh aur baat hai ke BJP ke log mouti chamri ke hain.’ ‘ Karnataka Congress naay ilzaam aed kya ke BJP naay Congress am ail ae aanand singh ka aghwaa kya aur Enforcement Directorate aur Income TaxDepartment ko istemaal karte hue inhen ghair qanooni tor par Mahruse rakha hai. Governor Karnataka Mr. wuju bhai wala ke khilaaf muzahira mein hissa lainay ke baad akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue sabiq Chief MinisterMr. Sidda Ramaiah ney kaha ke tamam 78 Congress arkaan assembly aur do azad MLAs hamaray sath they magar singh ka aghwaa karliya gaya hai. Mr. Siddaramaya ney kaha ke Congress am ail ae aanand singh ka aghwaa karliya gaya aur BJP naay Enforcement Directorate aur Income Tax Department ko istemaal karte hue BJP ke logon naay inhen ghair qanooni hirasat mein rakha hai. BJP ke log waisa hi be sharmi se kar rahay hain jaissa ke BJP ke qaumi saddar amit Shah naay tamam reyaston mein kya. woh dastoor aur qanoon ko nahi jantay. woh jhutay propgnd_h ke siwa kuch nahi jantay. Mr. Gulam Nabi Azad ney kaha ke Mr. Singh Delhi mein they aur woh jon hi azad ho jaien ge hamaray sath hon ge. unhon naay kaha ke inhen yarghamal bana kar rakha gaya magar woh hum se rabita mein hain. Mr. prtap gorha ke baray mein jin ke gayab hojane ki it-tila-aat theen Mr. Sidda Ramaiah naay kaha ke woh un ke sath hain. unhon naay kaha ke Mr. prtap gorha paatil aeye aur in kaghzat par dastakhat kiye jo Governor ko daakhil kardah fehrist se mutaliq hain. Congress aur Janata DalSecular ke arkaan assembly mein phoot ke baray mein pouchye jaanay par Mr. Sidda Ramaiah naay kaha ke hum sab aik sath hain. sabiq Chief Minister naay kaha ke BJP ko sirf 104 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui hai, inhen 112 arkaan assembly ki taied haasil nahi hai balkay inhen 104 se zayed aik bhi am ail ae ki taied haasil nahi hai. is ke barkhilaf Congress ko 78 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui jabkay Janata Dal ko 37 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui aur bi SP aur ke PJPK aik aik arkaan assembly ke ilawa aik azad rukan assembly bhi hamaray sath hain, chunkay Mr. Kumaraswamydo halqon se kamyaab hue hain is liye aiwaan mein Congress ittehaad ko 117 arkaan ki taied haasil hai
779.title: Wizarat aur doulat se kaam nahi chala to ab khaufzadah karne ki koshish ?

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ki state security shoba ke tarjuman nay jummay ke roz bataya ke police nay ghair mulki anasir se raabtey aur hukoomat ke khilaaf manfi sar garmion mein mulawis saat afraad ko girftar kya hai. Al Arabia ke mutabiq state security ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke security idaron nay musalsal reki ke baad 7 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein liya hai. girftar afraad Saudi Arabia ki salamti ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ke liye ghair mulki anasir ke sath rabton mein they. is ke ilawa unhon nay Saudi Arabiamein qaumi salamti ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ke liye logon ko bharti karne aur mamnooa sar garmion ke liye fndz jama karne aur inhen dosray anasir taq pohanchanay ki koshishen shuru kar rakhi theen. girftar kiye gaye saat afraad ke beron malik rabton ke baare mein tehqiqaat jari hain. mulzimaan ke khilaaf qanoon ke mutabiq karwai amal mein layi ja rahi hai.
800.title: Saudi Arabia mein ghair mulki anasir se raabtey ke ilzaam mein 7 afraad girftar

news_detail: Yemen ke soobay Saada ke Kataf zila mein azad karai janay wali imaarton par qaumi parcham lehra diya gaya hai. yeh paish Raft yemeni fouj ki paish qadmi ke baad samnay aayi jis mein use Arab ittehaad ki muawnat haasil rahi. yemeni fouj ne Jumma ke roz Kataf zila ke ilaqa Alatfain par control haasil kar liya. is ke ilawa Saada soobah mein pahari silsila aur Alfara Nami gaon ko bhi azad kara liya gaya. sath hi Kataf zila ke wast se baaghi malaysia ke liye anay wali imdaad aur kumak ka rasta bhi kaat diya gaya hai. idhar yemeni zaraye ablaagh ny sarkari fouj mein askari commander ke hawalay se bataya hai ke yemeni fouj albaiza soobah ke zila par control haasil karne ke qareeb poanch chuki hai. tawaqqa hai ke wahan mojood baaghi malaysia ke anasir hathyaar daal den ge. is se qabal yemeni fouj ny paish qadmi karte hue Alqarha aur Albaan ke pahari silsilay par control haasil kar liya tha. mazkoorah commander ny bawar karaya ke yemeni fouj ki Al Malajim ki janib paish qadmi aur Kataf zila ke wast se anay wali kumak ki supply line munqita honay ke sabab Houthi malaysia roz burrows dhair hoti ja rahi hai. zameeni zaraye ke mutabiq major general tarek Saleh ke zair qayadat ripblkn guards brigidz ke units Alhadida soobay ke zila Altahtia mein chaar tzoyrati thikanon par hamla karne mein kamyaab rahay. zaraye ka kehna hai ke yemeni fouj Altahtia zila par mukammal control haasil karne ke qareeb hai
817.title: Kataf mein yemeni parcham lehra diya gaya, sarkari fouj Al Malajim ko wapas lainay ke qareeb

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karntaka mein tashkeel hukoomat ke baray mein paaya janey wala tajassus, Mr. ‫Yediurappa hukoomat ke ewaan assembly mein adadi qowat ke muzahira mein hazeemat ke sath khatam hogaya. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit karne mein nakaam ho chukay hain. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney khat aetmaad haasil karne ki bajaye ewaan mein istifa dete hue apni shikast ko qubool karliya. cheif mnstr Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan mein raye dahi ka saamna karne ki bajaye apna istifa dainay ka elaan kardiya. is terhan adadi qowat ke muzahira ki nobat hi nahi aayi. Mr. ‫Yediurappaney ewaan mein istifa dainay ka elaan karne se qabal mukhtasar si taqreer ki. woh ewaan se nikal kar seedhay governor haoz ke liye rawana hogaye aur governor ko apna istifa saump diya hai. yaad rahay ke Karntaka assembly intikhabaat mein BJPagarchay sab se barri party ke tor par ubhri hai magar usay tashkeel hukoomat ke liye darkaar aqaltareen 112 vote haasil nahi hopaye. woh sirf 104 nashiston par hi kamyabi haasil krpayi thi jabkay Congress ko 78 aur Janata Dal s ko 37 nashiston par kamyabi haasil hui thi jabkay Congress. Janata Dal ittehaad ko mabaqi teen umeedwaron ki bhi taied haasil thi. governor Karntaka Mr. Vajubhai Vala ney BJPko khatir khuwa tadaad mein arkaan assembly ki taied nah milnay ke bawajood sab sabay barri party honay ki binaa tashkeel hukoomat ki dawat dete hue inhen androon 15 yom ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit karne ki hadaayat di thi taham sprim court ney governor ke faisla ko radd karte hue ‫Yediurappahukoomat ko kal hadaayat di thi ke woh hafta ke din 4 : 00 bujey shaam ewaan mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhay. ‫Yediurappa ke istifa ke baad Congress aur Janata Dal S ke campus mein jashnn dekha gaya
833.title: Yediurappa ney istifa dey diya

news_detail: American riyasat Hawaii ke aatish fishan se lava aglne ka amal phir se shuru ho gaya hai jis ke baad muqami abadi ko bhi warning jari kar di gayi. Hawaii ke Kilauea Nami aatish fishan kayi hafton se poori shiddat se lava ugal raha hai jis se kayi makaan, gariyaan, sarkain aur darakht safha hasti se mit gaye jabkay log –apne ghar bahar chore kar Mahzooz maqam par panah liye hue hain. haliya footage mein dekha ja sakta hai ke aasman par tees hazaar foot bulandi taq raakh aur dhuwen ke siyah baadal dera jamaye hue hain jabkay hakkaam mein logon ko warning di hai ke fiza mein mohlik slfr die oxide gas phail chuki hai aur log is ilaqa se daur rahen. social media par lave ki dil dhula dainay wali videos ny dekhnay walon ku khaufzada kya huwa hai. taaza tareen ittila ke mutabiq Kilauea aatish fishan mein taaza dhamaka ke baad lava Hawaii ke ahem shahrah ki simt beh raha hai, jis se sahili makeeno ko bachney ki jo raah faraham hai woh bhi masdood hojaye gi. raqeeq madah se mazeed chaar ghar tabah hogaye hain. do barri daraaron se pghlti chattaan aik wahid bahao mein tabdeel hogyaavr tawaqqa hai ke sahili shahrah 137 se androon chand ghanton mein takra jaye ga
844.title: Hawaii mein aatish fishan se dubarah lava nikalna shuru

news_detail: Saudi Arab ki iqtisadi aur taraqiyati council neh mayarِ zindagi programme 2020 ka aaghaz kar diya hai. is par 34 Arab 60 crore dollars ( 130 Arab Ryal ) laagat aeye gi. miyaar zindagi programme bhi Saudi Arabia ki maeeshat ko mutanau bananay aur tail par maeeshat ka inhisaar kam karne ke liye jari kardah Vision  2030ka hissa hai. mumlikat ki wazarti council neh is ki manzoori di thi. is ka bara maqsad saqafati, tafrehi aur khelon ke shobo mein aisi sar garmion ke naye mawaqay muhayya karna hain jin se shehrion ka miyaar zindagi buland ho, sarmaya kaari ki hosla afzai ho aur iqtisadi sar garmion mein bhi tanawu aeye. is ke ilawa khidmaat ki farahmi aur infrastructure ki taamer ke lehaaz se Saudi Arab ke teen shehron ka miyaar behtar banana hai taakay un ka shumaar duniya ke jadeed taraqqi Yafta aik so shehron mein ho. Saudi walii ehad aur iqtisadi wo taraqiati council ke chirmin shehzada Mohammad ban Salman ki koshisho se miyaar zindagi programme shuru kya gaya hai aur is ki mansoobah bandi mein darasal un hi ka vision karfrma hai. woh khadim alhrmin alshrifin Shah Salman ban abdalaziz ki nigrani mein Saudi maeeshat ko mazeed khush haal aur Saudi muashray ko mazeed tawana aur taraqqi karta sun-hwa banana chahtay hain. miyaar zindagi programme ke tehat mukhtalif mansoobon ki kal laagat ka takhmeenah 130 Arab Ryal lagaya gaya hai. is mein se saarhay 74 Arab Ryal ki barah e raast sarmaya kaari ki jaye gi. is ka aik maqsad mutaliqa shobo mein ghair tail khaam qaumi pedawar mein 2020 hamza taq 20 fi sad salana izafah karna hai. is ke ilawa aayndah do saal mein mutaliqa shobo mein muqami mawaad ka hissa 67 fi sad hoga. is programme ke tehat shehrion ki Falah vb_hbod ke liye mukhtalif naye mansoobay shuru kiye jayen ge jis se unhein jadeed shehri sahulaton ki dasteyabi ke ilawa mlazmton ke naye mawaqay bhi muyassar ayen ge
715.title: Saudi Arabia : 34 Arab 60 crore dollars ki laagat se mayarِ zindagi programme ka aaghaz

news_detail: Hyderabad. commissionaire hyderabad city police mister Anjani kumar hyderabad city police ki jadeed kaari par aaj jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya. hyderabad shehar mein police force ki jadeed kaari par yahan tamam d si piz, joint commissionaire of police, additional commissioners of police aur intizami ohdedaron ke sath jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya. Hyderabad city police ney police amlah ki pesha warana salahiyaton ko parwan charhanay aur kaam ke kaaj ke tareeqon ko pesha warana satah par ouncha uthany ka faisla kya. polisng mein community ki shiraakat daari aur community ke aetmaad ke sath awam dost policing hanoz shehar ki police ke aala eqdaar mein barqarar hai. commissionaire ney kaha ke hyderabad ko mazeed mehfooz, salamat aur mawafiz sarmaya kaari bananay mazeed iqdamaat kiye jayen ge
726.title: City Police ki jadeed kaari par commissionaire police ney jaiza ijlaas munaqqid kya

news_detail: Bartanwi khabar rasan agency ney aik Aini Shahid ke hawala se bataya hai ke paiir ke roz maqboza Bait ul Maqdismein 3 sign bordz dekhnay mein aeye hain jin par” Amrici sifarat khanah” tehreer hai. yeh paish Raft aindah haftay shehar mein sifarat khanaay ke iftitah se qabal samnay aayi hai. tafseelaat ke mutabiq angrezi, abrani aur arabi zabaan ke yeh bordz Bait ul Maqdiske janoobi hssh mein Amrici consul khanaay ki imarat ke nazdeek lagaye gay hain. yeh imarat 14 May ko sarkari tor par sifarat khanaay ki muntaqili ke baad Amrici safarti mission ka saddar daftar ban jaye gi .

is se qabal Falasteeni saddar Mahmood abbas ney Falasteeni qaumi council ka aik ijlaas talabb kya tha taa ke Amrici saddar Donald trmp ki janib se Bait ul Maqdisko Israeli dar-al-hakoomat tasleem karne aur Amrici sifarat khanaay ko wahan muntaqil karne se mutaliq faislon ke jawab ki hikmat e amli waza ki ja sakay. Tawaqqo hai ke Americi sifarat khanah ki muntaqili ke aik roz baad 15 May ko’ ‘ yom al nakbata’ ‘ ( yani Israel ke qiyam ke 70 baras poooray honay ) ki yaad ke mauqa par Falasteeni ehtijaj ka silsila –apne urooj par poanch jaye ga. yaad rahay ke 1948 mein isi roz lakhoon flstinyon ko jabri tor par hijrat par majaboor kar diya gaya tha.
736.title: Bait ul Maqdis ki sadkon par” American sifarat khanaay” ke sign bords

news_detail: Angrezi news channel ripblikn TV editor Arnab Goswami ka tanazuath ke sath choli daman ka sath raha hai. ab aik martaba phir woh charchay mein aeye hain. is martaba police ne khudkushi case mein un ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya hai. Maharashtra ke Raigarh mein Ali Bagh mein muqadma darj kya gaya hai jis mein teen afraad Bashmole Arnab Goswami shaamil hain. Interior DesignerAnwy Naik ki khudkushi ke baad dastyab hone walay khudkushi note ki bunyaad par, police ne IPC ki dafaa 306 ke tehat muqadma darj kya hai. police case ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq, Interior Designer Anwy Naik ( 53 ) ne hafta ke roz Ali baagh mein –apne ghar mein khudkushi karli thi. un ki laash ke paas un ki maa kamood Nair ((78  ki laash bhi bar aamad hui thi. Interior Designerki laash ke qareeb aik khudkush note mil gaya. is ke baad, Anwy ki biwi ne police mein Arnabsameit teen mulzimaan ko shikayat ki. shikayat kanandah ka ilzaam hai ke is ke shohar ki interior designing company hai. woh is company ke zareya architect designer aur engineering ka is company ke zareya kya karte they. unhon ne Arnab Goswami ke liye bhi kaam kya. moahida ke mutabiq, woh raqam jo inhen haasil hona chahiye thi woh ada nahi ki gayi. jab inhen pesha nahi mila tou maa aur betay depration mein aagaye.

yeh ilzaam lagaya gaya hai ke is wajah se dono ne khudkushi karli. Additional Suprintendent of police ( raye garh ) snje patel ne bataya ke Ali Bagh ke KabeerJung ilaqa se un dono ki lashain bar aamad hui theen. khudkushi note mein jin teen logon ke naam hain un ke khilaaf case darj karliya gaya hai. Naik ko un ke kaam ka paisa nahi milnay ka ilzaam hai .
746.title: Interior Designer Anwy Naik ki khudkushi. Arnab Goswami ke khilaaf muqadma darj

news_detail: New Delhi. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny apni team se kaha ke un ke chaar sala daur Iqtidaar mein faraham kardah mulazimaton se mutaliq adaad o shumaar akhatta kiye jayen. aindah aam intikhabaat 2019 ke ahem intikhabi mozuaat mein aik ahem intikhabi mauzo mulazimaton ki farahmi bhi hoga. wizaraton ko hadaayat di gayi hai ke un ki taraf se chalaye gaye projects aur programmes par aik mufasil note tayyar kere aur un ke zareya faraham kardah mulazimaton ki tadaad jama kere. naam nah zahir karne ki shart par un logon ny qawaid ka hawala dete hue bataya ke wizaraton se yeh bhi kaha gaya ke mukhtalif programon ka qaumi majmoi pedawar par parney walay asraat ka bhi ihata kya jaye. sarkari report card mein mulazimaton par is liye tavajja di jarahi hai ke Narendra Modi ko un tnqidon ka jawab dainay ka mauqa mil sakay jis mein un par ilzaam aed kya ja raha hai ke woh har saal aik crore mulaazmaten faraham karne ke –apne intikhabi wada ko wafa karne mein nakaam ho chukay hain. woh aik kuleed hai agar woh chahtay hain ke –apne 2014 ke intikhabi muzahira ko dohrayen. Narendra Modi ny guzashta teen dahon mein sab se behtareen muzahira karte hue awam ka qatee khat aetmaad haasil kya tha. Narendra Modi jinhon ny 26 May ko –apne ohda ke chaar baras mukammal karte hain, is douran reyasti assemblion ke intikhabaat mein bi jay pi ko mila jal rad-e-amal haasil sun-hwa hai. bi jay pi 12 May ko janoobi riyasat krnatk mein aik barray imthehaan ka saamna karne jarahi hai. chand ilaqon mein Narendra Modi ki maqboliat mutasir hui hai taham woh sarmaya karon ke liye hunooz pasandeeda hain. yeh bawar krwane ki koshish ki jarahi hai ke 2019 mein toota phoota awaami khat aetmaad haasil hota hai to malik mein sarmaya kaari par asar pade ga. Modi hukoomat ny’ make un India ‘ jaisay programme ko shuru karte hue yeh bawar krwane ki koshish kar rahi hai ke malik mein bairooni sarmaya kaari ka bahao barha hai magar is se muqami logon ko haasil mulazimaton ke barey mein koi sarkari data mojood nahi hai. November 2016 mein naqdi bohraan ny sorat e haal ko mazeed ab-tar banadiya aur kayi log apni mulazimaton se mahroom hogaye they. iqtisadi farogh 2017-18 maali saal mein skrh kar 6. 6 feesad taq poanch gaya. un barson mein be rozgari ghalib rahi. isi liye Modi ke naqideen kehte hain ke 2. 3 million trilion dollar ki mayshit mein be rozgari mein izafah sun-hwa hai
758.title: Mulazimaton ki farahmi par data tayyar karne wizaraton ko Modi ki hadaayat

news_detail: Hyderabad. shehar Hyderabad mein atishzadgi ke waqeat mein rozafzon izafah ho raha hai. sarkari record ke mutabiq mah May ke sirf pehlay hafta mein atishzadgi ke 52 waqeat runuma ho chukay hain. un waqeat mein shehar ke muzafaat mein report kardah atishzadgi ke waqeat shaamil nahi hain. ahdidaro n ne kaha ke gharon mein aag lagnay ke ziyadatar waqiyaat bijli ke istemaal ke baais avorlod se honay walay shat circuit se hue hain jabkay kachre ko na munasib andaaz jalanay aur jalay cigrette pheink dainay ke baais khulay ilaqon mein aatishzadgi ke waqeat runuma hue hain. mausam garma mein deegar mousamoo ke maqabil bijli ka istemaal ziyada hojata hai. bijli ke istemaal mein izafah ke baais over load ki wajah se shat circuit ke waqeat runuma hamza hotay hain. regional fire officer ( sntrl regain ) Mr. V. Papaiah ne kaha ke darja hararat aik makhsoos satah par poanch jany se hiddat mein izafah ke baais sookhi ghaas aur kachre ko aag lag jati hai. aag pkrhline ka darja hararat jis par koi cheez aag pakad leti hai, mukhtalif ashya ke liye mukhtalif hota hai, jaisay lakri, tail aur ghaas ke liye yeh satah mukhtalif hoti hai. aksar khulay ilaqon mein atishzadgi, insani ghaltion ka nateeja hoti hai. aksar log be ahteyati mein kachre ko aag lgadite hain aur jali hui cigrette pheink dete hain, jis ki wajah se khaas kar mausam garma mein aag lag jati hai. kachre ko aag laganay ke baad agar usay munasib andaaz mein bujhaaya nahi jata hai to phir kuch hi der mein is mein chhupi chngaryan taizi se aag pakadleti hain. control room ke aik fire mean ne misaal dete hue bataya ke haal hi mein lakri ke pal par aag lag gayi thi, jahan khuli araazi par phainky gaye kachre mein aag pakar li thi jis ki wajah se wahan se guzarnay walay rahroon mein khauf o hraas phail gaya tha. fire tenders ne aag par qaboo pa liya.
784.title: Mausam e garma mein aag lagnay ke waqeat mein izafah

news_detail: Bengaluru. riyasat Karnataka mein assembly intikhabaat ko sirf teen din bach reh gay hain, aisay mein Bengaluru se aik bara inkishaaf sun-hwa hai, jahan taqreeban 10, 000 Voter shanakhti cards mangal ki shab aik apartment se bar aamad kiye gay. election commission naay Voter shanakhti cards ki dasteyabi ki tehqiqaat ka hukum jari kardiya hai. yeh ilzaam aed karte hue ke jis apartment se bar aamad kiye gay woh Congress ke qanoon saaz ka hai, BJPnaay halqa assembly Raja Rajeshwari Nagar ke intikhabaat multawi karne ka mutalba kiya hai. Congress naay jawabi waar karte hue BJPpar ilzaam aed kya ke muqami BJPquied ki malkiat ke apartment par dhave ka yeh’ drama’ rachte hue’ banawati shawahid’ ko thoons rahi hai .

reyasti election harkat mein atay hue taqriban nisf shab aik press conference talabb ki. Karnataka ke Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Sanjiv Kumar naay kaha ke cards, chhootey packets mein lapete hue they. Mr. Sanjiv Kumarnaay bataya ke beron malik rehne walay raye dahinda ki janib se fehrist raye dahindgaan mein –apne naam ki shamoliat ki darkhwast ka form number 6a makhsoos numbraat ke sath counterfoil bhi dastyab hue hain. counterfoil ka rang mamool ka nahi hai. commission naay yeh bhi bataya ke apartment se 5 laptops aur printers bhi zabt kiye gay hain. Mr. Sanjiv Kumarnaay kaha ke aindah 24 ghanton mein mazeed haqayiq ka hamein pata chal jaye ga jis ki asaas par aik sakht faisla kya jaye ga. Chief Electoral Officer ke press note mein bataya gaya ke mazkoorah apartment Manjula Nanjameri shakhs ki malkiat hai jo Raakesh Nami shakhs ko kiraya par diya gaya tha. hamein pata nahi ke aaya woh money rtna se kisi terhan ka talluq rakhta hai. Congress ke Randeep Singh Surjewala naay Bengaluru mein bhaari tadaad mein Voter shanakhti cards ki zabti ki aala sathi tehqiqaat ka mutalba karte hue kaha ke BJPke jhoot ka parda faash hoga
802.title: Karnataka intikhabaat : Bengaluru ke apartment se election commission naay das hazaar Voter cards zabt kiye

news_detail: Yemen se daaghe janay wala ballestic missile Saudi fazaiya ny budh ke roz fiza hi mein tabah kar diya jis ke baais darlhkomt Riyadh aik martaba phir barri tabahi se bach gaya. Aini shahideen ny bataya ke budh ke roz darlhkomt Riyadh mein yakke baad deegray chaar zor daar dhmakon ki aawazian sunai den. Houthiوں ke sarkari tally vision’ ‘ Almesrah’ ‘ ny Houthi malaysia ke hawala se daawa kya ke budh ke roz anqlabyon ny Saudi darlhkomt Riyadh mein’ ‘ muashi ahdaaf’ ‘ par missile daaghe.’ ‘ Almesrah ‘ channel ki screen par chalaye gayi breaking news mein daawa kya gaya ke’ ‘ ballestic missilon ki bochhaar ny Riyadh mein muashi ahdaaf ko taaqat se nishana banaya.’ ‘ haliya chand mahino ke douran Yemen ke Houthi baghion ny kayi baar Saudi darlhkomt ko missilon se nishana banaya, taham Saudi fouj ny inhen fiza hi mein nakara bana diya
813.title: Yemen se Riyadh par kia gaya ballestic missile hamla nakaam

news_detail: Dimashq . Iran ke sath nyoklyir moahida ki tanseekh ke Amrici saddar trmp ke elaan ke chand ghanton ke andar hi Israel neh Dimashq ke junoob mein waqay aik fouji adda par hamla kardiya jis ko Irani afwaj istemaal kya karti thi. is hamla ke nateeja mein 9 Irani fouji halaak hogaye aur Irani afwaj ko bhaari nuqsaan pouncha. reports ke mutabiq Israeli Fighterr Jets Shaam ki fazai hudood mein daakhil hotay hue Irani Missiles ko tabah kardiya jis ke barey mein Israel ka daawa hai ke woh Israel par daage jaanay walay they. Israeli afwaj ka kehna hai ke is neh mehsoos kya ke Shaam mein Irani afwaj ghair mamooli harkat kar rahi hai aur se yaqeen tha ke Irani afwaj fori Israeli afwaj ke khilaaf intiqami karwai karne wali hai. Shaam ke sarkari media ka kehna hai ke Israel neh dar-al-hakoomat Dimashq mein aik fouji adda par fazai hamla kardiya. saddar bsharalasd ki haami afwaj mein Shaamil aik commander neh Bartanwi khabar Rasan agency Riter ko bataya ke un hamlon mein Shami fouj ke aik markaz ko nishana banaya gaya. Bartania mein qaim haqooq insani tanzeem Syrian Observatory Group ka kehna hai ke is hamla mein fouji dpo ko nishana banaya gaya hai jis mein kam azkam 15 log halaak hogaye hain jin mein 9 Irani fouji bhi hain. Shaam ki sarkari khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq marnay walon mein do shehri bhi Shaamil hain. Bartanwi akhbar daily mil ka kehna hai ke Dimashq mein Irani fazai adda par kiye gaye hamla mein 9 Irani fouji halaak hue hain
829.title: Dimashq mein Irani fouji adda par Israel ka fazai hamla. 15 halaak

news_detail: New Delhi. Anti Corruption Bureau( ACB ) ny aaj cheif mnstr Delhi mister Arvind Kejriwalke mutwafi brother nisbati Surendra Kumar wo Bansall ke farzand Vinay Bansal ko public works department ( pi w d ) ke road and severe works mein mobayyana be qaadgyon ke silsila mein girftar karliya hai. Vinay Bansal –apne waalid ki company’ Renu Construction’ mein partners they, jo mobayyana scam mein mulawis thi. ACB ki janib se Kejriwalaur deegar ke khilaaf 8 May 2017 ko darj kardah teen FIRs ke mutabiq road and severe construction project ke liye Surendra Kumar Bansal ki company’ Renu Construction’ ko aik tender ataa karne mein aqarba parwari ka muzahira kiya gaya. shikayat kanandah baani NGO Roads Anticorruption Organization ( RACO ) Rahul sharma ny ilzaam aed kya ke takhmini laagat 4, 90, 000 se 46 feesad kam sharah par tender hawala kya gaya hai. yeh bhi ilzaam aed kya gaya ke injaam day ye gaye kaam ka miyaar naaqis tha. Delhi Police ny bayan kya ke mahadev company se mutaliq jis se un ki company ny khaam maal kharidne ka dawa kya hai, pooch taach ke douran mulzim ki janib se ghair itminan bakhash jawabaat ki bunyaad par giraftari amal mein layi gayi. tahaqeeq ke douran yeh pata chala hai ke mahadev Nami company ka wujood hi nahi hai, taham Delhi hukoomat ny is girftari ko siyasi intiqam ka nateeja qarar diya aur id-daa kya ke Bansal ki firm ki janib se injaam dyie gaye kaam ko Sri Ram Labs ny clean chit di thi. ACB ny hi is lab ko kaam ke miyaar ka pata chalanay ki hadaayat di thi. tameeri kaam ki teesray fareeq ki janib se jaanch Indian Institute of Technology Rurki ney ki thi.
846.title: Arvind Kejriwal ka bhatija girftar

news_detail: Naamzad wazeer aala Karnataka Mr. each d Kumaraswaminy Congress ke sath wazraye aala ki tabdeeli se inkaar kardiya

Bengaluru. Aiwaan kabeena mein tehreek aetmaad ka saamna kiye baghair hi Chief Minister Mr. ‫di europa ke istifa ke dosray din wizarat aala ke liye rasta hamwar panay walay reyasti sarbarah Janata Dal  Secular Mr. each d Kumaraswaminy kaha ke woh halaf lainay ke androon 24 ghantay ewaan assembly mein apni aksariyat saabit krdkhayin ge. unhon ny kaha’ ‘ halaf bardari ke androon 24 ghantay mein apni aksariyat saabit kar dikhaoonga.’ ‘ Mr. Kumaraswami peer ko Delhi ka dora kar rahay hain taakay riyasat mein mustahkam hukoomat ki farahmi aur kabini qlmdanon ki taqseem ke barey mein mrs Sonia Gandhi aur Congress sadar Mr. Rahul Gandhi se tabadlah khayaal krpayin. unhon ny kaha’ ‘ kal mein Delhi rawana ho raha hon jahan mein Sonia jee aur Rahul jee se mulaqaat karoon ga. hum kabeena mein tosee par tabadlah khayaal karen ge. mein un se riyasat mein aindah paanch barson ke liye mustahkam hukoomat ki farahmi par har umoor par tabadlah khayaal karoon g. naamzad Chief Minister ko un ki makhloot hukoomat mein kabini qlmdanon ki taqseem mein tawazun barqarar rakhna hoga. senior Congress quied Mr. Malikarjun Kharge ny aaj kaha ke woh aik qaumi siyasi party ke tor par aik ilaqai party ki taied kar rahay hain is liye le aur day ke tanasub ka khayaal rakha jaye ga. taham naamzad Chief Minister ny Congress ke sath wizarat aala ki tabdeeli ke imkanaat ko mustard kardiya. Mr. Kumaraswami ny is khsos mein poochnay par ke aaya un ki party Congress ke sath Chief Minister ka ohda waqfa waqfa se badalny par mafahmat ki hai, unhon ny nifi mein jawab diya. Congress aur Janata Dal  Secular ke darmain ma qabl intikhabaat mafahmat nahi thi taham bi jay pi ke sab se barri party ke tor par ubharnay ke baad Congress ny dosray number par anay ke bawajood aakhralzkr party ko Iqtidaar se daur rakhnay teesray number par rehne wali Janata Dal  ko tashkeel hukoomat mein taied karne ka faisla kya hai
731.title: Kumaraswami tashkeel kabeena ke silsila mein Sonia aur Rahul se kal baat karen ge

news_detail: Ramala-  Aik Falasteeni ohdedar nay bataya ke Sadar Palestine Mahmoud Abbas ko maqboza maghribi patti ke Ramala mein waqay aik hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya. un ki sehat ke barey mein mazeed tafseelaat baham nahi pohanchai gayeen. 82 sala Mahmoud Abbas ko is hafta teesri martaba hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya hai. Palestine ki sarkari news agency wafa nay bataya ke mangal ke din inhen kaan ki aik chuute si surgery ke liye hospital mein shareek kya gaya tha aur chand ghanton baad inhen dischage kardiya gaya tha aur dobarah jummay ko inhen hospital mein shareek kya gaya tha. Jerosalem mein Amrici sifarat khanah ki muntaqili ke masla par ghhor o khoz karne jummay ke din turkey mein munaqidah organization of aslamk ko operation ( o aayi si ) chouti conference mein shirkat se bhi woh qassar they. abbas jo bulaa ke cigrette nosh hain, mukhtalif tibbi masail ka shikaar hain. woh dil ke aarzah aur prostate cancer mein aik daha qabal hi mubtala hogaye they. unhon nay apna janasheen muqarrar nahi kya hai aur Palestine mein Fatah party aur Hamas mein phoot ke baais 2005 hamza se abhi taq sadaarti intikhabaat nahi hue hain.
742.title: Sadar Palestine shareek hospital

news_detail: Bairut. Agencies

Yemen ke wasti shehar Hama mein aik fouji adda par honay walay pur asraar dhmakon ke nateeja mein halaak honay walay sarkari fojion aur is ki Muawin mlishyaon ke anasir ki tadaad 28 hogayi hai. darjanon afraad zakhmi betaye jatay hain. shaam mein insani haqooq ki soorat e haal par nazar rakhnay walay idaray’ rasad gaah’ baraye insani haqooq ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Hama ke fouji adda par yakke baad deegray mutadid dhamakay hue. dhmakon ke nateejay mein Asad rjim ke 28 fojion ke maaray jaane ki it-tila-aat hain. is ke ilawa Shami nazzad baaz ghair sarkari jangju bhi halaak hue. un ki ghair musadeqa tadaad gayarah bataaye jati hai. dhmakon ke nateejay mein kayi afraad shadeed zakhmi aur mutadid la patah hain .

insani haqooq ke observator Rami Abdul Rehman ne bataya ke Hama ke fouji adda mein dhmakon se halaak honiwalon mein Iran aur hizab Allah ke jangju bhi ho satke hain. Hama ke fouji adda par dhmakon ki wajah maloom nahi hosaki. taham insani haqooq karkun Rami Abdul Rehman ke mutabiq yeh dhamakay kisi fani kharabi ka nateeja bhi ho saktay hain. fouji adda se siyah dhowen ke baadal buland hotay aur zor daar aawazian sunai di gayi hain. khayaal rahay ke guzashta chand hafton se Israel bhi shaam mein irani aur Shami tnsibat ko bombari ka nishana bana raha hai. Shaam mein Israel ki aakhri fouji karwai no aur das May ki darmiyani shab ki gayi thi jis mein shyoni riyasat ne darjanon irani tnsibat ko nishana bananay aur inhen tabah karne ka daawa kya tha
752.title: shaam : Hama ke fouji adday par dhamakay mein 28 sarkari fouji halaak

news_detail: Dhhaka : naamwar bollywood adakara Priyanka chopra ney guzashta roz Bangladesh mein muqeem Rohingya panah Guzeen se mulaqaat ki aur in ke sath waqt guzaraa .

Adakara Priyanka chopra 2016 se bain al aqwami idaara unicef ki safeer hain aur woh guzashta roz UNICEF ki team ke sath Bangladesh mein muqeem mazloom Rohingya musalman muhajreen ke sath izhaar yakjahti ke liye Bangladesh pohnchain jahan unhon ney nah sirf panah gzinon ke sath mulaqaat ki balkay un ke sath ghul mil bhi gayeen .

Rohingya panah gzinon ke sath mulaqaat ki tasaveer Priyanka ney –apne Instagram account par share kee aur jazbati pegham likhte hue ittila di ke woh is waqt Bangladesh ke’ Coxs bazaar’ mein mojood hai jo duniya ke sab se baday muhajreen campon mein se aik hai, 2017 ke wast mein duniya ney myanmar ( barma ) ki dil dahela dene wali tasaveer dekhen. is zulm ke baad taqreeban 7 laakh Rohingya se talluq rakhnay walay afraad ney Bangladesh hijrat ki jin mein 60 feesad bachay shaamil hain. yahan par bohat saari khawateen mahinay guzar janay ke bawajood ab bhi kamzor hain jab ke bohat saaray log mukhtasir campon mein rehne par majaboor hain aur inhen yeh bhi nahi maloom ke inhen agli ghiza kab miley gi. yahan mojood log jaisay hi mehfooz tasawwur karne lagtay hain moon soon ka mausam ajata hai un ki banai hui duniya ko tabah karne ke liye. yahan bachon ki aik poori nasal mojood hai jin ka koi mustaqbil nahi, un ki muskurahat mein un ki aankhon ka khaali pan dekha ja sakta hai. un bachon ko hamari tavajja, hamdardi aur madad ki zaroorat hai. duniya ko chahiye ke un ki madad kere yeh bachay hamara mustaqbil hain
764.title: Priyanka Chopra ki Bangladesh mein muqeem mazloom Rohingya muhajreen se mulaqaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. ke Chandarshekar Rao jinhon neyBJP aur Congress se pak siyasi ittehaad ke qiyam ke liye pehal ki thi aur Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein Janata Dal Secular ki taied o himayat ki thi, Karnataka ke Chief Minister Mr. H.D.  Kumara Swami ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se guraiz karne walay hain. shaed is ki aik ahem wajah yeh hosakti hai ke woh taqreeb halaf bardari mein Congress party ke qaumi saddar Rahul Gandhi ka saamna karna nahi chahtay. Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein hareef ke tor par muqaabla karne wali do siyasi partiyon Janata Dal aur Congress mein ma baad anthabat mafahmat hui hai aur Congress party ney BJP ko Iqtidaar se daur rakhnay ziyada nashistain rakhnay ke bawajood –apne se choti party Janata Dal Secular ko tashkeel hukoomat mein taied karne ka elaan kya hai. yaad rahay ke Chief Minister Karnataka o sarbarah Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ney Karnataka assembly intikhabaat se qabal mulk bhar mein Congress aur BJP se pak aik siyasi ittehaad ke qiyam ki pehal ki thi aur is khsos mein woh Janata Dal Secular ke qaideen se bhi mulaqaat karte hue inhen amaada karne ki koshish ki thi .

Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao aaj shaam Bengaluru puhanche aur naamzad Chief Minister Mr. H.D.  Kumara Swami aur Janata Dal Secular ke sarbarah o sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mr. H.D.  Deveguda se shehar ke junoob maghribi muzafaat mein waqay Padmanabha Nagar mein un ki rahaish gaah mein mulaqaat ki. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha ke woh paishgi masrofiyat ke baais kal munaqqid shudni taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se qassar hain. unhon ney Bengaluru mein kaha ke woh Janata Dal S ke qaideen ko mubarakbaad aur naik tamannaye paish karte hain. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha ke Janata Dal Secular jaisi aik ilaqai party ke aik quied ka Chief Minister ban-na ilaqai partiyon ki taaqat ka Mazhar hai. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao apne chand deegar party qaideen ke hamrah aik khusoosi tayyarah ke zareya Hyderabad se Bengaluru aaj shaam puhanche they. Chief Minister aaj raat hi Hyderabad wapas lout gaye hain chunkay inhen kal apni paishgi masrofiyat mein hissa lena hai. Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ko bhi kal 4 : 30 bujey shaam munaqqid shudni taqreeb halaf bardari mein madoo kya gaya tha .

Mr. Kumara Swamiko kal shaam riyasti secretriat Vidhan Sudha ke rubaroo Governor Mr. Vajubhai Vala Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf delainge jis mein kayi qaumi qaideen jaisay Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, Chief Minister Delhi Mr. Aravind Kejriwal, Chief Minister Kerala Mr. Pinarayi Vijayan  ke ilawa taqreeban aik laakh awam shirkat karen ge. is taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu, Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Benerji  Bahujan Samaj Party party sarbarah Ms. Mayavati ko Mr. Kumara Swaminey ne madoo kya tha.
778.title: Chief Minister Karnataka ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat se Chandrashekar Rao ka guraiz

news_detail: shehzada Mohammad ban Salman naay Iqtisadi wo Taraqiati Umoor Council  ke ijlaas ki sadarat ki, Saudi press agency naay is ijlaas ki taswerain jari ki hain. un tasaveer ke ajra ke sath hi Saudi walii ehad Shahzada Mohammad ban Salman ke manzar-e-aam prnh honay se mutaliq rahi sahi afwahen bhi dam toar gayeen. is se qabal 18 May ko jari ki gayi tsoyrmin walii ehad Shahzada Mohammed bin Salman msrke saddar, bahrain ke Shah aur UAE ke walii ehad ke sath mojood they, Misri sadar Abdalfatah Alsisi  ney tenu rehnumao ko dawat par madoo kya tha .

wazeh rahay ke Saudi walii ehad shehzada Mohammad Bin Salman ke kuch roz qabal manzar aam se gayab honay ki wajah se baaz akhbarat naay un ki sahet se mutaliq khadshaat zahir kiye they. irani media ke mutabiq 21 April ko Riaz ke Shahi mehal ke bahar firing ke waqea ke baad se shehzada Mohammad manzar-e-aam se gayab they. yahi nahi balkay propgnd_h ke liye qaim irani Websites par yeh bhi daawa kya gaya tha ke firing mein shehzada buri terhan zakhmi hogaye hain aur un ke Muhafiz inhen bunkers mein le kar chalay gaye jis ke baad se woh manzar par nahi aeye. soshil media par to un ke maar diye jaaney ke baray mein bhi daaway kiye gaye they.
789.title: Saudi walii ehad ki mazeed tasaveer samnay aa gayeen

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein intikhabaat ke baad 8 dinon ke siyasi athl pthl ke baad aaj shaam jntadl Karnataka ke sarbarah Mr. each d Kumaraswamy ny Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya. governor Karnataka Mr. wuju bhai wla ny Karnataka skritrit’ ‘ Vidhan Soudha’ ki seerihoon par 4 : 30 bujey shaam munaqidah aik پْر asar taqreeb mein Mr. each d Kumaraswamy ko ohda aur raazdari ka halaf dilaya. taqreeb halaf bardari mein qaumi siyasi qaideen ki kehkashan theen jinhon ny Karnataka mein aik mutahidda ghair BJPhukoomat ki tashkeel mein kaleedi rule ada kya tha. 58 sala Mr. Kumaraswamy  ny doosri martaba Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya hai. is se qabal woh 2006-07 ke douran jntadl. BJPmakhloot hukoomat mein 20 mah ke liye Chief Minister they. Congress party ke Mr. G. Prameshwara  ny bhi deputy Chief Minister ki hesiyat se halaf liya. is mauqa par mrs Sonia Gandhi, saddar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi, Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandra Babu Naidu, Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Benerji, sadar Bhajujan Samaj Party Ms. Mayavati, sabiq Chief Minister o qaiyed Samaaj Wadi Party Mr. Akhilesh Yadav, CPI (M) ke Mr. sitaram Yachuri, NCP ke Mr. Sharad Pawar, RJD ke Tejaswhi Yadav bhi mojood they. taqreeb halaf bardari se chand ghantay qabal bangloru mein taiz barish aur saalah baari bhi hui thi aur aisa lag raha tha ke Vidhan Soudha ki seerihoon par taqreeb munaqqid karna mumkin nahi rahay ga. BJP ney aaj ki taqreeb halaf bardari ko yom mukhalif awaami khat aatmadke tor par manaya hai
804.title: Kumaraswamy ney Chief Minister Karnataka ki hesiyat se halaf liya

820.title: Major Gogoi kam Umar ladki ke sath hotel mein pakdae gay

news_detail: Hyderabad. ain waqt par mudakhlat karte hue police ney kam az kam 5 kam Umar larke aur larkiyon ki shadion ko rukwadiya. Cyberabad ke qareeb Jagatgeer Gutta mein 14 jodon ki ijtimai shadion ki taqreeb munaqqid ki jarahi thi ke ain waqt par police wahan poanch gayi aur jodon ke sadaqatnama e paidaiesh paish karne ka mutalba kya. jodon ke naamon aur tasaveer ke sath ruqey taba kar diye gaye they aur dulhy ghoree par sawaar hogaye bhi hogaye they taakay baarat ki shakal mein grodwarh poanch sakay they ke muqami chayild line ki team aur police wahan poanch gayeen. jaanch partaal par pata chala ke shadi karne walay chaar dulhy aur aik dulhan ki umrein, qanoon mein shadi ke liye muqarrar kardah aqaltareen umar se kam hai. kam umar Dulhon aur dulhan ko baazabadkari marakaz muntaqil kardiya gya jabkeh mabaqi  9 jodon ko shadi karne ki ijazat day di gayi. police ney bataya ke jin Dulhon aur dulhan ko baazabadkari markaz muntaqil kardiya gaya tha inhen counseling ke liye laa liya gaya hai. police ney haqooq atfaal ke aik jahedkar Achutya Rao ki shikayat par police harkat mein aayi jinhon ney bataya ke un khandano ney kam Umar ki shadion ko yakeeni bananay aur hukoomat tlnganh ki kalyaan laxmi scheme ke tehat mara-aat panay ke liye dastawizaat par umrein barha kar darj karwai theen. kalyaan laxmi aur shadi mubarak schemes ke tehat hukoomat tlnganh khat gurbat se neechay zindagi busr karne walay khandano ko larki ki shadi par 75, 000 rupay ki eaanat karti hai. police inspector Mr. Srinivas ney bataya ke tehqiqaat shuru ki gayi hai taham koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya. Hyderabad mein do hafton qabal aik case mein aik pandrah sala larki ko bchalya gaya tha jis ki zabardasti shadi aik 38 sala mazoor aadmi se kar di jarahi thi. larki ney dasvin jamaat imthehaan kamyaab kya tha aur is ki shadi mehez is liye kar di jarahi thi ke is ke walidain kayi mah se ghar ka kiraya ada nahi karpaye they.
834.title: kam Umar 4 Dulhon aur aik Dulhan ki shadion ko police ney rokkk diya

news_detail: Denmark ki wazeer baraye emigration ki janib se rozay aur musalmanoon ke khilaaf bayan par un ki siyasi party dinsh lbrl party neh izhaar laa taulqi ka elaan kya hai. Denmark media ke mutabiq dinsh lbrl party neh apni kabeena ki ahem rukan ke musalmanoon se mutaliq mutanazia bayan se latalqi ka izhaar kya hai, bayan latalqi mein kaha gaya hai ke emigration ki wazeer Stogberg  ke mutanazia bayan se party ka koi talluq nahi, un ka yeh bayan un ki zaati raye ho sakti hai lekin party policy nahi, party ki aala qayadat wazeer Mosufa ke nazriaat ki himayat nahi karti. Denmark ki intahi sakht emigration ki palisyon ki wajah se shohrat rakhnay wali emigration ki wazeer Stogberg  neh –apne aik colum mein tehreer kya tha ke kaam ke douran din bhar ka roza rakh kar bhooka rehna jadeed muashra ke liye challenge hai. muqami Musalmanon ko chahiye ke mah Ramadan mein woh chhutti le len kyunkay mazhab aik zaati maamla hai aur iss se muashra mein mumkina bigaar ka khatrah bhi hai. Stogberg  neh misaal paish karte ho ye kaha tha ke khaas tor par bas driveron aur hospital ke amlah ke afraad ke roza rakhne se mumkina khatraat ziyada ho satke hain, taham bas companiyon ki janib se fori tor par radd e amal samnay aaya ke ramadaan mein roza rakh kar kaam karne walon ke sath aisa koi masla nahi
847.title: Denmark ki wazeer ka rozay kay khilaaf bayan, party ka elaan latalqi

news_detail: Nairobi. Kenyan town mein hafton shadeed barish ke baais aik Dam ke toot janay se zabardast tabahi mach gayi aur darjanon hlaktin hogyin. muqami tally vision ny bataya ke ta haal 20 lashain bar aamad ki gayeen. Nairobi ke shumal maghrib mein 190 kilomitr ke faasla par Nakuru county mein Solai mein waqay Dam chaharshanba ko beh gaya. governor Nakuru Mr. lee Kin Yajui ny aik bayan mein kaha ke Dam toot janay se beh janay walay pani se jaan o maal ko zabardast nuqsaan pouncha hai. nuqsanaat ka hunooz takhmeenah nahi kya gaya hai. aik khangi tally vision channel ke tea an news ny kaha ke maqam haadsa se ta haal 20 lashain bar aamad ki gayi hain. kenya red cross ny –apne twitter payam mein kaha ke is ny abhi taq 39 logon ko bachaaya hai. Kenya mein mashriqi Africa mein deegar mumalik ki terhan guzashta do mah se shadeed barish horahee hai. Kenya hukoomat ny chaharshanba ko bataya ke barish se March se ab taq 32 mumalik mein 132 afraad ki amwaat hogayi aur 2, 22, 456 log be ghar hogaye
723.title: Kenyan Dam toot gaya, zabardast tabahi

news_detail: Rusia ki wizarat difaa neh Israel ke Shaam par fazai hamlay ki tafseel jari ki hai aur kaha hai ke Israel ke 28 ladaka tayyaron neh Shami ilaqon par fazai bombari mein hissa liya hai aur unhon neh Shami ahdaaf par 70 missile daage hain. inter fax khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq roosi wizarat difaa neh jumaraat ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke’ ‘ Israel neh 28 f 15 aur f 16 ladaka tayyaron ko hamlay mein istemaal kya hai. unhon neh fiza se zameen mein maar karne walay 60 missile Shaam ke mukhtalif ilaqon par daage they. un ke Ula woh 10 mazeed zameen se zameen par maar karne walay missile bhi daage gaye hain. roos ka kehna hai ke Shaam ke fazai difai nizaam neh un mein se nisf se ziyada missilon ko maar giraya tha aur baqi missilon se honay walay nuqsanaat ka andaza lagaya ja raha hai. wizarat difaa neh mazeed bataya hai ke Israeli tayyaron neh Dimashq ke nawah mein aur Shaam ke janoobi ilaqay mein Iran ke musallah groupon ke thikanon aur Shami fouj ke fazai difai nizaam ko nishana banaya hai. Israel ka kehna hai ke budh ki raat is ke zair qabza golan ki chotyon par Shaam se qareeban 20 rocket fire kiye gaye they aur is neh un rakton ke rad-e-amal mein yeh fazai hamla kya hai. is neh Iran ki al quds force par yeh rocket fire karne ka ilzaam Aayed kya hai aur kaha hai ke is ke missile shikan nizaam neh un mein se chaar ko nakara bana diya tha aur baqi is ke ilaqay mein nahi giray hain. idhar Israeli fouj ke aik tarjuman lieutenant colonel jonathn konri kis neh kaha hai ke’ ‘ roos ko Shaam mein mukhtalif ahdaaf par hamlon ke baare mein paishgi mutala kardiya gaya tha’ ‘. taham unhon neh is ki mazeed wazahat nahi ki hai .

darin asna roos ke naib wazeer difaa mikhayl Bugadanouf neh tamam fareeqon par zor diya hai ke woh zabt vthml ka muzahira karen. un ka kehna hai ke moscow ko is paish Raft par tashweesh la-haq hai. Shaam par is fazai hamlay se aik roz qabal hi Israeli wazeer e azam Binyamin nitn yahoo neh moscow mein roosi saddar vladi Meer potin se baat cheet ki thi. is mauqa par roosi saddar neh Amrici sadar Donald Trump ke Iran se tey shuda johri smjhote se dastbrdar y ke faislay par gehri tashweesh ka izhaar kya tha jabkay nitn yahoo neh is faislay ki bharpoor himayat ki hai. Israeli wazeer e azam ke daftar neh budh ko jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha ke’ ‘ yeh har mamlikat ka haq aur yakeeni tor par Israel ka bhi haq hai ke woh ( irani ) jarhiyat se bachao ke liye zurori iqdamaat kere’ ‘
733.title: Israel ke 28 ladaka tayyaron neh Shaam par hamlay mein hissa liya, 70 missile daage : Rusia

news_detail: Kuala Lumpur. Malaysia ki hizab e ikhtilaaf ke ittehaad ney sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mahathir Mohamad ki zair sadarat parlimani intikhabaat mein tareekhi kamyabi haasil karte hue hakoomati ittehaad ke 60 sala Iqtidaar ko khatam kardiya hai. Malaysia ke Election Commision ka kehna hai ke Mahathir Mohamad ke hizab mukhalif ittehaad ney 115 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki hai jabkay usay hukoomat bananay ke liye 112 nashiston ki zaroorat thi. 92 sala Mahathir Mohamad ney barsar iqtedaar Barisan National Ittehaad ko shikast di hai jo ke guzashta 60 saloon se Iqtidaar mein hai. agarchay Mahathir Mohamad ney siyasat se retirement le li thi taham unhon ney un intikhabaat mein siyasat mein wapas aa kar –apne mukhalif Najeeb Razaque ko shikast di. Najeeb Razaque par bud unwani aur dost parwari ka ilzaam aed kya jata hai .
najeeb razaque ki janib se shikast tasleem

Malaysia ke sabiq Wazeer e Azam najeeb razaque ney aik press conference karte hue apni shikast ko tasleem kar liya. un ka kehna tha” mein awam ka faisla tasleem karta hon.” un ka mazeed kehna tha ke parliment mein kisi aik party ney aksariyat haasil nahi ki aur Malaysia ke aeen ke mutabiq ab badshah ke paas Wazeer e Azam naamzad karne ka ikhtiyar hai.” Mahathir Mohamad ke itihadiyon ney 121 sitin jeet li hain jabkay Malaysia ke parliman mein 222 sitin mojood hain aur brsr Iqtidaar aane ke liye aksariyat milna zurori hai
750.title: Malaysia : Mahathir Mohamad ki tareekhi fatah, oppostion ittehaad ney election jeet liya

news_detail: Nigeria ki hukoomat aur Sudan ki police ke aalanat ke mutabiq sodani dar-al-hakoomat Khartoum mein Nigeria ke aik sifaratkaaar ke ghar se aas ki laash bar aamad hui hai. muqami media ka kehna hai ke mazkoorah sifaratkaar ko gala kaat kar mout ke ghaat utaara gaya. sodani police ney jumaraat ke roz jari bayan mein kaha hai ke ibtidayi tehqiqaat se zahir hota hai ke yeh aik mujremana karwai ka nateeja hai aur is waqea ki koi siyasi wajah nahi hai. police ney dehshat grdanh karwai ke imkanaat ko mustard kardiya. Nigeria ki umoor kharja ki wizarat ney sifaratkaar Habibu Almu ki mout ki tasdeeq ki hai. sodani police ney qatal ke pas parda muharikaat ka pata chalanay tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Almu, Khartoum mein Nigerian Mission mein emigration atachi they. doosri janib khabron se mutaliq web siton ka kehna hai ke nayjirin sifaratkaar ko chure se hamla ka nishana banaya gaya taham sodani police aur Nigeria ki hukoomat ney is ki tasdeeq nahi ki. Nigeria ki wifaqi hukoomat ney is qatal ki sakht muzammat ki. Sudan ney usay badbakhtana waqea qarar diya. yaad rahay ke aik baras ke andar Sudan mein murda paaya jaany wala yeh dosra sifaratkaar hai. is se qabal augst 2017 hamza mein Sudan mein roosi safeer Mirgayas Shrinisky bhi apni rahaish gaah ke swimming pol mein murda paye gaye they. moscow ka kehna tha ke safeer ki mout dil ka dora parney se hui. security zaraye ney bataya ke Khartoum mein Nigeria ke consul general ko qatal kar diya gaya hai
761.title: Khartoum mein Nigeria ke sifaratkaar ki laash baraamad

news_detail: Bellary. BJP ke ahem tareen umeedwaron mein shumaar kiye janay walay rukn Parliament Bellary Mr. B. Sri Ramulu ney apne haq e rayedahi ka istemaal karne ghar se bahar qadam rakhnay se qabal ‘gaaye’ ki pooja ki. aik tasweer bhi jari ki gayi jis mein dekha ja sakta hai ke Mr. B. Ramulu geirway rang ke kapron mein malbos, haldi ka laip lagi hui gaaye ki pooja kar rahay hain. Bellary ke 46 sala parlimntrin B. Ramulu, bdami halqa assembly se congress party ke umeed waar Chief Minister Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf BJPke umeed waar hain. woh Bellary ke qareeb halqa Assembly Mulakalmuru se bhi muqaabla kar rahay hain. jummay ke din congress ny election commission se mutalba kya tha ke inhen 2010 ke aik video ki asaas par na ahal qarar diya jaye jis mein inhen jnardhn ready ke mulawis honay walay Kaankuni case ke faisla par asar andaaz honay ke liye saB.q Chief justice ke aik rishta daar ko rishwat dainay ki koshish karte hue dekhaya gaya hai. Mr. Ramulu, ready bradrs ke intahi qareeB. hain. apni doulat o taaqat aur intikhabaat mein kamyaB. ke record ke sath Mr. Ramulu Karnataka mein BJPke ahem qaideen mein shumaar honay lagey hain. Karnataka assembly intikhabaat mein woh aur Mr. B. s ‫d europa dono hi aisay arkaan Parliament hain jinhein assembly intikhabaat mein maidan mein utaara gaya hai. Mr. Ramulu un chand umeedwaron mein se aik hain jinhein intikhaB. muhim ke douran –apne intikhaB. halqon ka dora karne helly copter diya gaya hai. qiyaas kya jata hai ke Karnataka mein BJPke Iqtidaar mein anay ki soorat mein woh deputy Chief Minister hon ge aur party ke qaumi sarbarah Mr. amit Shah ny un qiyaas araiyo ki shiddat se tardeed nahi ki hai
776.title: Vote daalnay se qabal BJPumeedwaar ney Gaaye ki pooja ki

news_detail: Riyasat Bihar ke sabiq wazeer aala aur Rashtrya Janata Dal( RJD ) ke sadar Lalu Prasad Yadav aur Rabri Devi ke barray betay Tej Pratap ki aaj honay wali shadi par 7 hazaar mehmanon ko madoo kya gaya hai jin ke liye 100 terhan ke pakwaan ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai, baarat le janike liye 50 ghoron ka bhi intizam kya gaya hai. Bihar ke sabiq wazeer e sahet Tej Pratap Yadav aaj Rashtrya Janata Dalke senior rehnuma Chndrika Rai ki beti Aishwariya Rai ko dulhan bana kar layn ge. ghar par subah se hi g_hma g_hmi hai aur shadi ki tayario aur rusumaat ka aaghaz hochuka hai. rawan saal 18 April ko dono ki mangni injaam payi thi. media ke mutabiq is azeem wo shaan Bihari shadi par mehmanon ko tehranay ke liye ptnh ke sab se barray hotlon ke 85 kamron ki booking karwai gayi hai. Tej Partab ki shadi ka card bohat hi saada tha jis par baraat ki rawaangi ka waqt shaam saat bujey ka darj hai. jay malaa aur dinner ka maqam Vetinerary College ke khail ka maidan darj kya gaya hai. is ke ilawa shadi ki baqi rasomaat ki adaigi Chandrika Rai ke sarkari makaan par honay ki baat bhi card mein darj hai. do roz qabal un ki rasam hina ki taqreeb munaqqid ki gayi. Aishwariya neh rasam hina ki taqreeb mein sabz rang ka lehenga pehna tha jab ke Tej Partap safaid karte aur peelay rang ki bindi mein nazar aeye. wazeh rahay ke Lalu Yadav mukhtalif cases mein mujrim qarar diye jaany ke baad ranchi ki jail mein qaid kaat rahay hain aur inhen betay ki shadi ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye paanch roz ke pirol par choda gaya hai
788.title: Lalu ke Farzand ki shadi : 50 ghoday, 7 hazaar maheman, 100 pakwaan

news_detail: Aurangabad. Aurangabad mein jummay ki shab pani ke connection par do firqoun ke darmyaann hue tassadum mein 2 afraad halaak hogaye hain. police ney kaha ke hajhoom ke tashadud mein 50 dukanaat aur gariyon ko Nazar aatish kardiya gaya. police ney tashadud par qaboo panay fayrng ka hukum day diya hai avrmtasrh ilaqon mein curfew naafiz kardiya gaya hai. Aurangabadpolice commissionaire ney Mr. Milind Bharambay ney kaha ke halaat ko qaboo mein karliya gaya hai. hum ney shehar mein fouj daari qaida ki dafaa 144 ko nafiz kardiya gaya hai. unhon ney awam se bahaali aman mein police ka taawun karne ki appeal ki hai. unhon ney kaha ke awam se unhon ney kaha ke be qaboo nah ho chunkay aman o zabt ko bigaarnay walon se police nmte gi. gzri shab mein hue tashadud mein kayi police walay bhi zakhmi hogaye hain. police ney bataya ke shehar ke Moti karanjaiah ilaqa mein tashadud is waqt bharak utha jab baldia ney ghair majaz null connection ke khilaaf muhim shuru ki. baldi ohdedar aik mazhabi maqam ke ghair majaz null connection ko masdood kar rahay they tab muzahireen ney un se mutalba kya ke woh isi terhan dosray mazhab ke muqaddas maqam ke ghair majaz null connection ko bhi barkhast kardey. hakkaam ney un ki shikayat par pehal karte hue dosray maqam ki simt barh gaye, jis ke baais dono garohoon mein tassadum hogaya. dono garohoon mein raat 10 : 00 ke waqt par pehla tassadum sun-hwa, kuch hi der mein shehar ke deegar maqamat taq phail gaya. mmlkti wazeer e dakhla Mr. Deepak Kasarkar ney tashadud mein 2 afraad ki halakat ki toseeq kar di hai. hajhoom ney jab dukanaat ko aag lgani shuru ki thi is ki zad mein aakar aik mazoor shakhs halaak hogaya jabkay dosra police fayrng mein halaak hogaya. unhon ney bataya ke Jalna aur deegar maqamat se izafi police force Aurangabadko rawana kar di gayi hai. tashadud saaray shehar mein phail janey ki wajah se awaami amlaak ko bhi nuqsaan pouncha hai .

siyasi halaat par nazar rakhnay walon ko shuba hai ke Karnataka mein raye dahi ke paish e nazar Aurangabadmein aik mamooli waqea par tashadud ko bhadkaay janey ke imkanaat ko nazar andaaz nahi kiya ja sakta kyunkay aksar yeh dekha gaya hai ke malik ke kisi bhi hissa mein firqa warana noiyat ki gur barr hoti hai to is soorat mein intikhabi amal par bhi aik hadd taq asar padsakta hai.
808.title: Aurangabadmein firqa warana tassadum, do halaak. kahin Karnataka intikhabaat ke paish e nazar tashadud ko to bhadhkaya nahi gaya?

news_detail: Berlin . Germany ki aik sharaab saaz company nay bil akhir Beerki botalon ke is stock ko markt se wapas le lainay ka elaan kardiya jin ke dhakanon par Kalima Tayyaba print kya gaya tha. Germany ki sharaab saazi company ki janib se aalmi football Tournament ke paish e nazar beer ki botalon ke dhakanon par Tournament mein hissa lainay wali 32 aalmi teamon ke qaumi prchmon ko print karte hue apni marketing ka elaan karte hue markt mein naya stock bhaij diya tha. un 32 teamon mein Saudi Arabia ki team bhi shaamil hai jis ke qaumi parcham par Kalima Tayyaba hai. junoob maghribi Germany ke shehar mean hem mein waqay aik sharaab ki company’ Eichbaum Brewery’ nay aalmi football Tournament ko mananay Tournament mein hissa lainay walay 32 mumalik ke prchmon ko beer ki botalon ke dhakanon par print kya hai. Beerki botalon ke dhakkan par Saudi Arabia ke parcham ko shaamil karne se soshil media par shadeed aitraaz kya gaya hai aur company ke is amal ki purzor muzammat ki gayi hai. soshil media sarfeen nay yeh bayan kya ke aik alcohalic sharaab ki bottle par islami kalma ko jo Saudi Arabia ke qaumi parcham ka jazo bhi chapna munasib nahi hai. islam mein sharaab haraam hai jis ki wajah se Saudi Arabia mein is par amtnaa aed hai aur duniya ke mukhtalif hisson mein rehne walay musalman, sharaab peenay se parhaiz karte hain. muqami police aur athartiz se mushawarat ke baad Eichbaum company nay Facebook par jari kardah –apne aik post mein kaha ke company nay World Cup Bottle Caps ki tayari rokkk di hai aur stores se Saudi Arabia ke parcham wali botelain wapas talabb kar lanay par kaam kar rahi hai. yeh iqdaam mazeed tauheen se ijtinab ke tor par kya ja raha hai. Eichbaum nay ibtida mein tanaza ki yaksoi ke liye –apne Facebook page par musalmanoon ke liye aik payam bhi post kya tha jis mein kaha gaya tha ke company yaqeenan –apne brands par mazhabi o siyasi tbsron mein dilchaspi nahi rakhti. agar hum nay ghair danista tor par aap ki dil shikni ki hai to hum sanjeedgi ke sath moazrat khuwa hain. company nay yeh bhi kaha tha ke usay pata nahi tha ke Saudi Arabia ke parcham mein islami kalma darj hai. is post par jab bohat ziyada comments anay lagen to is post ko barkhast kardiya gyatahm is mauzo par mubahis shuru hogaye aur is sharaab ki company ke Facebook page ki maqboliat ghatney lagi. kayi logon nay apni aaraa mein kaha ke mehez sharaab baichnay Eichbaum company ka’ tauheen islam’ ka yeh oocha harba hai. Germany ke dar-al-hakoomat Berlin mein Saudi Arabia ke sifarat khanah nay bhi Germany ki is company ki muzammat ki hai.
823.title: Beer ki botalon ke caps par’ Kalima Tayyaba ‘. stock wapas le lainay company ka elaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah baraye Israel ke qiyam ke khilaaf American consul khanah se numaindagi karne walay afraad ko muqami police ne hirasat mein le lyahe. Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke qiyam ke khilaaf mslmanan hyderabad ke ehsasat se waaqif krwane chand Ghayoor musalmanoon ki janib se aik mimorndm dainay ka faisla kiya gaya thatahm police ko mossola khufia it-tila-aat par aaj bhaari tadaad mein police jamiat, lkrh coat mein waqay jamaat islami ke dafatir par jama chaar logon ko police ne hirasat mein le liya jo begum pait mein waqay American sifarat khanah poanch kar aik ehtajaji Mahzar paish karna chahtay they. bataya jata hai ke Ameer jamaat islami Telangana wa Odhisa janab Hamid Mohammad Khan , secretary janab Mohammed Azharuddin aur molana Naseeruddin aur un ke aik saathi ko police ne hirasat mein le liya hai. muqami logon ne bataya ke chaar logon ki giraftari ke liye police ki bhaari jamiat poanch gayi thi jin mein khatoon police ohdedar bhi shaamil they, aisa lag raha tha ke police, dehshat gardon ke aik baday Racket ko pakarney lagi hai ya phir encounter honay wala hai. jab muqami logon ne jamaat islami ke ahbaab se pata kya to inhen maloom sun-hwa ke Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke qiyam ke khilaaf mslmanan hyderabad ke jazbaat o ehsasat se American hukoomat ko waaqif krwane sirf chaar afraad par mushtamil aik wafad American sifarat khanah poanch kar Mahzar paish karna chahta tha. sawal yeh peda hota hai ke aaya hindustaan mein Hindustanion ko –apne jamhoori haq ka istimaal karte hue ehtijaj karne ka bhi haq haasil nahi hai? is ke barkhilaf aik malik ka sifarat khanah azadana tor par Hindustanion ke sath mukhtalif ijlaas munaqqid karta hai, un ke liye tarbiati programmes munaqqid karta hai magar is par rokkk toak nahi lagai jati. bataya jata hai ke hirasat mein liye gaye un chaar afraad ko Dabir poora police station muntaqil kya gaya hai
840.title: Bait ul Muqadas mein American sifarat khanah ke khilaaf ehtijaj ke paish e nazar ahteyati grftaryan

news_detail: Hyderabad. puranay shehar ke Mughalpura ilaqa mein Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat neh American sifarat khanah baraye Israel ki tall abib se Jerusalem muntaqili aur wahan se kaam kaaj ke aaghaz par aaj ehtijaj karte hue Israeli parcham Nazar aatish kya. Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat se wabsta nojawanon neh is iqdaam par apni barhami ka izhaar karte hue America aur Israel ke khilaaf naaray lagaye aur kaha ke Jerusalem par kisi bhi mumlikat ka haq nahi hai aur yeh bain al aqwami rjim mein shaamil hai. Jerusalem ko corpus separatum ka muaqqaf ataa kya gaya hai chunkay yeh shehar yahudion, esaion aur musalmanoon ke liye yaksaa tor par mutbarrik hai. Darsgah Jihaad o Shadat ke Mohammad usmaan aur Mohammad ban Umar neh bataya ke America neh tall abib se –apne sifarat khanah ko Jerusalem muntaqil karte hue jabir o ghasib mumlikat ki pusht panahi karte hue aalmi raye aama ki khilaaf warzi ki hai. un qaideen neh American consul khanah mein mahzar daakhil karne ka iradah rakhnay walay muslim qaideen ki giraftari ki bhi muzammat karte hue kaha ke yeh qaideen jo millat islamia hyderabad ke imaideen mein shumaar kiye jatay hain aur jo chahtay they ke mslmanan hyderabad ke ehsasat se waaqif karwaya jaye magar hidraabadi police neh inhen girftar karte hue ehtijaj ke jamhoori haq se mahroom kardiya
856.title: Jerusalem mein American sifarat khanah ke aaghaz par puranay shehar mein muzahira

news_detail: Israel ney kaha hai ke America jald hi Golan ki pahadiyoon par Israeli qabzay ko tasleem kar le ga. Israeli intelli jins wazeer Katz ney kaha ke America ke sath do Tarfah safarti baat cheet mein Golan ki pahadiyoon ka maamla sir fehrist hai. Israeli intelli jins wazeer ney mazeed kaha ke Israel , Trump intizamia par zor day raha hai aur umeed hai ke aindah chand mah ke douran America is par Israeli qabza ko tasleem kar le ga. unhon ney istadlaal kya ke is terhan ke iqdaam se Iran se tassadum ki Amrici koshisho ko sahara miley gajo dekha gaya ke Amrici saddar ney –apne malik ko mushtarqa jame mansoobah amal se dastbrdar krwalya. Iran aur aqwam mutahidda ke paanch mustaqil arkaan America , Bartania , France , chain aur roos ke ilawa Germaney ke darmain ittafaq ke mutabiq Iran , 15 barson ke liye yoranim ki afzodgi ki miqdaar ko mehdood karne par Iran amaada hai, jo reactorke eendhan ke tor par aur nuclear hathyaaron ke liye bhi istemaal hota hai aur yoranim ki afzoodghi ke liye alaat ki tanseeb ko 10 baras taq mehdood rakhnay par bhi amaadgi zahrki thi. America ney musallah proxy groups ko malia ki farahmi par Iran ko saza dainay thdidat bhi aed kiye hain. Katz ney kaha’ ‘ iranio ko nihayat hi takleef da jawab yeh day satke hain ke Golan par Israel ke tasallut ko tasleem kya jaye.’ ‘ Jerosalem post ke mutabiq Israel ke aik qanoon saaz ney Israel ke liye America ke safeer ko aik maktoob mein darkhwast ki ke mutanazia ilaqa par Israel ke daawa ko America tasleem karle .

Israel 51 saal se Golan ki pahadiyoon par qaabiz hai, is ke is qabza ko aalmi satah par tasleem nahi kya gaya hai. Israel ney 1967 hamza ki shaam se honay wali jung se Golan ki pahadiyoon par najaaiz qabza kar rakha hai aur yahan Israeli bastiyan abad karna shuru kar rakhi hain. Israel aur shaam ke darmain yeh 12 so kilometer taweel ilaqa hai. is se qabal yeh ilaqa shaam ke hudood mein tha aur Israel ke is ilaqa par najaaiz aur jabran tasallut ki barkhastgi ke liye aqwam mutahidda ki kayi qarar dadin hain. Jaria saal ke awail mein Golan ki pahadiyoon par is ki posts par rocket hamlon ka ilzaam aed karte hue shaam mein Iran ki chokion par hamlay kiye they. shaam mein jari khanah jungi mein Iran , bsharalasd ki pusht panahi kar raha hai. Trump intizamia, aalmi raye aama ke barkhilaf Israeli mafadaat ki purzor himayat karne laga hai aur duniya bhar ki mukhalfat ke bawajood apna sifarat khanah Jerosalem muntaqil kardiya hai. jis terhan America ke is iqdaam se ilaqai tanao mein izafah sun-hwa hai isi terhan Golan ki pahadiyoon par Israeli tasallut ko tasleem kar lanay se America ke khilaaf padosi mumalik ko bharak satke hain magar yeh bhi aik haqeeqat hai ke un mumalik ka gham o gussa sirf bayanaat taq hi mehdood rehta hai
732.title: America Golan ki pahadiyoon par hamara qabza tasleem karle ga: Israel

news_detail: Japan ko taaqatwar tareen passport ka aizaz mil gaya, Singapore Germany doosri position par poanch gay, Henly and Partners ki janib se Jaria saal ke liye nai fehrist jari kar di gayi, Mutahidda Arab Amarat (UAE) 23 wein muqam par hai jo is fehrist mein taizi se bulandi par karne wala mulk hai jabkay 105 mumalik ki fehrist mein Pakistan 102 wein number par hai. Bharat ka muqam 56 waan hain, Henly passport andiks ki haliya jari kardah report ke mutabiq duniya ke taqatwar tareen passport ka elaan kardiya gaya hai aur Japan ne is fehrist mein pehli position haasil kar li hai jabkay sngaporavr Germany doosri position par aagaye hain. is fehrist ke mutabiq Japani visa rakhnay walay afraad 189 mumalik ke visa free safar ki sahoolat haasil kar satke hain. dosray number par Germany aur Singapore hain jin ke shehri 188 mumalik mein baghair visa liye jasaktay hain. teesray number par janoobi Korea , fun land, italy, France , soyidn ora spin hain, chouthay number par visa free safar ki sahoolat ke sath Bartania aur America mein tie ho gaya hai. amarat bhi visa ranking mein taizi se oopar barh raha hai aur is ranking mein amarat ka number 23 waan hai. Pakistan ka number 102 waan hai jo Ethiopia, Palestine aur Sudan jaisay mumalik ke bhi baad aata hai. wazeh rahay ke is report mein duniya bhar ke mumalik ke pasporton ko safar ki azaadi ke lehaaz se tarteeb di gayi hai, yani passport rakhnay wala shakhs baghair visa liye kitney mumalik ja sakta hai. fehrist ke awaleen 5 numbraat par anay walay mumalik mein Japan , Singapore, Germany , South Korea , Spain, Denmark , Finland, , France , Italy, Swedan, Portugal , Britain , Norway , Austria , Luxumberg, Netherlands, Canada, Switzerland, America aur Ireland hain jabkay fehrist mein sab se neechay rehne walay mumalik mein Afghanistan , Iraq , Syria, Pakistan aur Somalia ka number hai. Afghanistan ka passport rakhnay walay shehrion ko sirf 24 mumalik mein visay ke baghair daakhil ki ijazat haasil hai ya phir aamad par visa jari kya jata hai. roos ne April mein elaan kya ke June aur July mein munaqqid shudni Fifa world cupp ke ticket rakhnay walon ko visa maaf karne ka elaan kya hai. roos ka is fehrist mein muqam 45 wein se ghatt kar 47 wahn hogaya hai.
751.title: Japani passport sab se ziyada taaqat war

news_detail: Washington. wohi -huwa jis ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha tha. America aur shumali Korea ke darmyaan mujawaza mazakraat ko mansookh kardainay ka America ney elaan kardiya. dono mumalik ke darmyaan payi jaaney wali tlkhyon aur srbrahan mumlikat ke sakht geer rawayya ke baais un khadshaat ka izhaar kya ja raha tha ke Trump aur kam jang aan ke darmyaan mazakraat shuru nahi hopayin ge. shumali Korea ki janib se wada ke mutabiq –apne nuclear tajrubati maqam par surangon ko dhamake se uda dene ke bawajood bhi Amrican sadar Donald Trump ney aaj shumali Korea ke sarbarah kِm jang aan ke sath mujawaza chouti mulaqaat ko mansookh karne ka elaan kardiya.
