Washington se mossola it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Trump ney singapore mein 12 June ko munaqqid shudni mulaqaat ka hawala dete hue shumali koiyai quied ke mosooma maktoob mein kaha’ ‘ afsos ke, aap ke haliya bayanaat mein zahir kardah ghair mamooli gussa aur adawat ki asaas par mein mehsoos karta hon ke is waqt darina mansoobah band ijlaas munaqqid karna munasib nahi hoga.’ ‘ Trump ney usay aik saqt mauqa qarar diya aur kaha ke inhen hunooz umeed hai ke woh kisi nah kisi din kِm se mulaqaat karen ge. white haoz ney Trump ke maktoob ki naqal twitter par shai yr ki hai .

aaj subah shumali Korea ney Trump ke sath nazeer mulaqaat se dast bardari ikhtiyar kar lanay ki dhamki ka iada kya tha aur intibah diya ke zaroorat parney par hum Washington ke sath nuclear taaqat ka muzahira karen ge. North Korian zaraye ablaagh ki janib se jari kardah bayan naib wazeer kharja Choe Son Hui ney nuclear hathyaar wali mumlikat North Korea ka taqabul Libya se karne pra American Vice President Mike Pence ko aik’ ‘ siyasi mohra’ ‘ qarar diya, jahan nuclear development programme ko Muammar Gaddafi ke qatal ke baad hi tark kya gaya tha. shumali Korea ney aaj Punggye-ri site par tunnels ki tabahi ka nzarah chand muntkhiba aalmi sahafion ko bhi karwaya tha
763.title: Trump ney Kim Jong Un ke sath mujawaza mulaqaat mansookh kar di

news_detail: Germany ke shehar Dresden mein bomb ko nakara bananay wali aik team ne bil akhir doosri jung azeem ke douran istemaal shuda bomb ko jo phatt nahi saka tha nakara bananay mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. bomb ko nakara bananay se qabal bhaari tadaad mein awam ka takhlia karna pada. bomb ko nakara bananay ki awail koshish mein aag bhi bharak uthi thi. Germany ke shehar Dresden ke wast mein tameeri kaam ke douran yeh bomb Bazyab sun-hwa tha. zaraye ka kehna hai ke bomb 250 klov gram wazni hai jisay nakara bananay ki pehli koshish guzashta roz ki gayi jo nakaam saabit hui aur nateejay mein aik chhota dhamaka sun-hwa aur ilaqay mein aag lag gayi. hakkaam ka kehna hai ke 9 hazaar afraad ko ilaqay se bahar nikaal liya gaya hai jin mein ziyada tar buzurag afraad shaamil hain. tamam afraad ne 2 raatain gharon se bahar guzaraian jabkay bomb phatnay ke khadshaat par Dresden airport par tamam flights mansookh kar di gayi hain .

bomb ko nakara bananay ke mahireen ne jab bomb ke fuse ko uraya to aag bharak uthi jis ke baais bomb ko nakara bananay ka amal paicheeda hogaya. mahireen ko aag ki lapeto par qaboo panay taq ghanton intzaar karna pada. jumaraat ki dopehar taq aik baktar band khdayi machine, jalay hue malba ko saaf krpayi aur toseeq kar di gayi ke nahi phatt parre 250 kilo gram wazni bomb ko nakara banadiya gaya. bomb ko nakara bana diye jany ki toseeq ke baad hi police ne wasti Dresden railway station ke qareebi zila mein takhlia karaye gaye taqreeban 9, 000 logon ko –apne –apne gharon ko wapas lotney ki ijazat di hai. bomb ko nakara bananay ka amal shuru karne se qabal do oldage care homes aur aik hasptl ka bhi takhlia kara diya gaya tha. hakkaam ne mazeed bataya ke bomb jung azeem doyam mein Bartanwi aur Amrici itihadiyon ne fazai hamlay mein bombari ke douran german shehar par barsaye they. police ka kehna hai ke dhamaka ke khadshaat ke baais site ke ird gird sakht security barqarar rakhi gayi thi jabkay aik fire faytr robot ki madad se bomb par thanda pani dala jaata raha hai taakay bomb disposel hakkaam bomb ko aasani se nakara bana saken. wazeh rahay ke feb 1945 mein Dresden mein Bartania aur America ki bombari mein 25 hazaar afraad maaray gaye they jis se 33 klov meter ke ilaqay mein aag bharak uthi thi aur shehar tabah hokar khandhar mein tabdeel hogaya tha. Nazi Germany ke khilaaf is ittihadi fazai muhim mein hazaron bomb giraye gaye jis mein se matdd bomb phatay hi nahi aur abhi bhi jrmi ke kayi shehron mein taraqiyati kamon ke douran aisay bmon ka pata chalta rhtahe. haal hi mein markazi Berlin mein Bartanwi jungi zamana ke bomb ko nakara bananay ke liye 10 hazaar afraad ko nikaal kar mehfooz maqam par muntaqil kya gaya thajs ke baais bomb ko nakara bananay ka operation kamyaab ho paaya tha
777.title: Doosri junge azeem ka ‘bomb’ atishzadgi aur takhlia ke baad nakara banadiya gaya

news_detail: Israel neh apni saffakion aur mazalim ki parda poshi aur nehattay Falestinion ko be bas kardainay ke liye Falestinion ki imdaad par waweela machana shuru kardiya hai taakay is ke ehtijaj ko malhooz rakhtay hue woh mumalik jin ke mafadaat Israel se wabsta hain, Falestinion se kisi qisam ki hamdardi nah rakh paye. Israel neh European Union se mutalba kiya hai ke Falestinion aur Europi shehrion ki aik darjan se zayed ghair sarkari tanzeemon ki madad band ki jaye. Israeli bayan ke mutabiq un tanzeemon ki maali imdaad Europi palisyon ki khilaaf warzi hai. Israel ki astritijk umoor ki wizarat ki janib se jari kardah aik report ke mutabiq mutadid ghair sarkari tanzeemen European Union se maali muawnat haasil kar rahi hain, jabkay un ke iqdamaat Israel ke khilaaf hain. is bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke European Union ka sarmaya un tanzeemon taq bhi poanch raha hai, jo mobayyana tor par askriat pasandon ke sath rawabit ki haamil hain. doosri taraf Israel ke wazeer tawanai Yuval Steinitz European Union par tanqeed karte hue Israeli Arabon par Israeli police ki safakiat ki tahaqeeq karne ke mutalba par kaha ke European hzar ha dozakhon mein ja sakta hai. Gaza ki sarhad par bohat ziyada halakaton ke khilaaf Israeli Arab ahtejajyon ke muzahira ke baad un par Israeli police karwai ki European Union neh muzammat ki thi. European Union neh aik bayan mein kaha ke yeh ahem hoga ke Israeli hukoomat ke taawun se Haifa mein guzashta hafta paish un halaat ki tehqiqaat ki jaye jis ke nateeja mein ghair sarkari tanzeem Mossawa ke director Jaffer Farah shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Israeli wazeer neh kaha ke European Union, Israel ko harasan kar raha hai jabkay Iran ayzarsani, hum jins parasti, haqooq nswan ki khilaaf warzi, dehshat gardi aur Asad ki himayat mein laga sun-hwa hai aur jo apne logon par Chemical Weapons phela raha hai. Steinitz neh kaha ke woh’ European Union ko dozakh bhaij diye jo European mumalik ki haqeeqi numaindagi nahi karti hai.’ yeh aik aisi tanzeem hai jis ka koi sarbarah nahi hai aur European mumalik ke maqabil Israel ka dost kam hai. yaad rahay ke European Union, Israel ke barray tijarti shiraakat daaron mein se aik hai. Israel , European Union ke sath salana 36 billion euro ki tijarat karta hai. European Union ko Israeli baraamdaat mein 2017 hamza mein 20 feesad izafah sun-hwa hai jis ke baais Israeli ki majmoi baraamdaat mein European Union ka hissa 34 feesad hai .

Haifa mein March ke baad police neh zayed az 21 kaarkunon Bashmool Jaffer Farah ko hirasat mein le liya hai jo police ki girftar y ke baad buri terhan zakhmi hogaye hain. Israel ke public security wazeer Gilad Erdan neh European Union ke mutalba par kaha ke’ ‘ mashriq wasti mein wahid jamhoriat Israel ko European Union jaisay aik jaanibdaar aur junooni tanzeem se ikhlaqi intibah ki zaroorat nahi hai
791.title: European Union Falasteeni tanzeemon ki madad band kere: Israel

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer baldi nazam o nasq o shehri trqyat mister ke tea rama rau ney kaha ke Hyderabad ko’ aloodgi se pak shehar’ bananay hukoomat, bijli se chalne wali 500 baseen khareeday gi. yeh gariyaan ibtida mein jee each am si hudood mein roshnaas karwai jayen gi. wazeer ney bataya ke riwayati diesel basoon ko marhala waar flat se htadya jaye ga.’ Mana Nagarma’ aik tabadlah khayaal ka programme mein jis mein wazeer, awam se un ke darina masail ki yaksoi ke liye tabadlah khayaal karte hain. unhon ney kaha ke jee each am si ney kachre ki nikasi ke liye battery se chalne wali gariyon ko istemaal karna pehlay hi se shuru kardiya hai. unhon ney Hyderabad ko aalmi shehar mein tabdeel karne awam ki shiraakat daari ki khwahish ki. wazeer ney haal hi mein Ameer pait mein barsati naalon se safai amlah ki janib se blankets aur carpets ko nikaalte ka hawala dete hue awam se khwahish ki ke woh thos aur maya nakara ashya ki nikasi alahda alahda karen .
803.title: Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay 500 bijli se chalne wali baseen

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rachakonda Commissionerate mein Chaitanyapuri police station se wabsta sab inspector of police G.  Eroji ko Srinagar colony, L.B.  Nagar Hyderabad par shaam 5:15 bajay charge sheet jald paish karne ke liye shikayat kunindah B. Karthik advocate se 20, 000 rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon pkrhlya gaya. shikayat kunindah crime number 75/2018 mein tazeerat hind ki dif-aat 363, 354 ( d ) aur POSCO Act ki difaa 12 ke tehat police station Chaitanyapuri mein aik muqadma darj hai. Anti Corruption Bureau ke press release mein bataya gaya ke is muqadma mein charge sheet jald paish karne ke liye rishwat qubool karne par girftar karte hue khusoosi judge baraye SPE aur ACB muqadmaat ke rubaroo paish kya ja raha hai. press release mein yeh bhi appeal ki gayi ke kisi sab inspector ya mehakma police ke kisi bhi ohdedar ki janib se rishwat karne par awam ae si bi ke tool free number 1064 par rabita peda kya jaye taakay qanoon ke mutabiq karwai ki jasakay.
819.title: Sub Inspector rushwat letay hue rangay hathon girftar

news_detail: Vijayawada. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naidu ne Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke woh ishtihar baz wazeer e azam hain jo –apne wadon ko wafa karne mein nakaam reh gay. BJP yakeeni tor par 2019 mein Iqtidaar mein nahi aeye gi. Telugu Desam party ke Mahanadu  ka aaghaz karte hue Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ne kaha ke Telugu Desam party ne maazi mein hukoomaton ki tashkeel mein kaleedi kirdaar ada kya tha aur malik mein siyasi hekiyaat tabdeel karne ki taaqat rakhti hai. unhon ne 2019 mein BJP ki peshraft ko roknay woh hum khayaal partiyon se mafahmat karen ge. Congress opposition mein hai, woh kuch ziyada nahi kar sakti, lekin BJP yakeeni taur par 2019 mein dubara iqtedaar mein nahi askati. Mr. Naidu ne kaha ke 2019 mein BJP ka iqtidaar mein aana aik khawab baeed hai aur wazeer e azam Narendra Modi sirf aik ishtihari wazeer e azam hain jinhon ne sirf naaray diye aur apne kiye hue wadon ko wafa karne mein nakaam reh chuke hain. unhon ne kaha ke Telugu Desam 1996 mein united front hukoomat ki tashkeel mein kaleedi rule ada kya tha. Telugu Desam ne maazi mein hukoomaton ki tashkeel mein ahem rule ada kya tha woh malik mein siyasi bisaat badalny ki taaqat rakhti hai. hum qadam peechay nahi len ge. unhon ne kaha ke Telugu Desam ne an d ae hukoomat ki taied se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karli kyunkay markazi hukoomat ne Andhra Pradeshko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne aur qanoon Andhra Pradesh tashkeel nav par amal daraamad karne ke apne wada se makr gayi thi. Mr. Naidu ne BJP par aandhraprdish ke ke awam ko dhoka day rahi hai aur y s are si pi ke sath mili bhagat karte hue riyasat mein law and aard ke masail peda kar rahi hai .

Mahanadu  mein Telugu Desam Party Mahanadu  ke douran markazi hukoomat ke munasib tor par soochey baghair kiye gay iqtisadi faislon, un ki na munasib amal aawri, jee s tea ki nakami aur note bandi aur nizaam bank par se awam ke uthte hue aetmaad par qarar dadin Manzoor karen gi. Chief Minister ke officer aan special duty Mr. Srinivas ne bataya ke party, Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne aur qanoon aandhraprdish tashkeel noki daf-aat par amal aawri se mutaliq Rajia sabha mein kiye gay apne waday se markazi hukoomat ke inhiraf ke khilaaf qarar daad Manzoor kere gi.
835.title: BJP ki 2019 mein tashkeel hukoomat aik khawab e bayeed

news_detail: Adventure ke shoqeen French janbaaz Music Band Haule Douse ny chain ke shehar zhangjiajie mein  qaim Evatar nami 1400 meter buland pahadi silsilay ka intikhab kya aur saikdon meter bulandi par Tianmen chattaan par tani slacklines par chalne ka khatarnaak muzahira kiya balkay is douran rassion  par chaltay hve jhoolte huve un janbazoon ney mukhtalif musical instruments bajatay hue aisi shandaar music performance di ke dekhnay walon ki jahan sansen tham gayi wahein daad dainay par majaboor hogaye. yeh chatani silsila Central China ke Honan soobah mein Jhangjiajie mein waqay National Forest Park mein hai. Haule Douse ney China mein Asia ka apna pehla muzahira kiya hai. Band ke arkaan ny muzahira karne ke liye do chatanoo ke darmain tanay hue rasson par dorion aur bani hui jaalo ka istemaal kya. Band mein shaamil khawateen ney high heel ki jotiyan pehan kar kartab dikhata hue moseeqi paish ki.
850.title: Aasman ki bulandiyon par Musical Concert

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk ki das riyasaton mein aaj Lok Sabha ki chaar nashiston aur das riyasaton mein das Assembly nashiston ke liye aaj raye dahi muqarrar hai, jin mein siyasi aitbaar se ahmiyat ki haamil Kairana ki lok sabha nashist bhi shaamil hai. maghribi utar pardesh mein Kairana ke ilawa jin deegar Lok Sabha halqon mein aaj chnao hain un mein maharashra ke do halqon Palghar aur Bhandra . Gondia ke ilawa Nagaland ki wahid nashist bhi shaamil hai. Kairana mein Samaajwaadi Party, Bahujan Samaj Party aur Congress partiyon ney Rashtrya Lok Dal ke umeedwaar Ajit Singh ki tayeed kar rahay hain. BJP ney Hukum singh ki Dukhtar Mriganka Singh ko maidan mein utaara hai. yeh nashist Hukum Singh ki mout ke baais khaali hui thi. Lok Sabha ke ilawa riyasti Assemblion ki makhlua nashiston ke liye zimni intikhabaat ho rahay hain jin mein Maharashtra (Palus Kadegaon halqa ), Uttar Pardesh ( Noorpur ), Bihar ( Jokihat ), Jharkhand ( Gomia aur Silly halqay ), Kerala ( Chengannur ), Meghalia (Ampati), Punjab ( ShahKot ), Uttarkhand  ( Thrali ) aur West Bengal (Maheshtala) hain. is ke ilawa krnatk ke do Assembly halqon Raja Rajewshwari nagar aur jayanagar mein bhi raye dahi muqarrar hai jahan 12 May ko raye dahi nahi rakhi gayi thi. voton ki ginti 31 May ko hogi.
866.title: Das riyasaton mein Lok Sabha  ki 4 aur Assembly ki 10 nashiston par zimni intikhabaat

news_detail: New Delhi . Hindustaan ke sab se ziyada qaidyoun wali Tihar jail mein 59 hindu qaidi –apne saathi 2, 299 Muslim qaidyoun ke sath Ramazan ke rozon ka ihtimaam kar rahay hain. un qaidyoun ka mazhab judaghana hai magar un ka yeh kehna hai ke un ke rozay rehne ka zaati sabab hai. Aik 45 sala khatoon qaidi naay jail hakkaam ko bataya ke woh jail se bahar apne betay ki salamti ke liye roza rakh rahi hain. khatoon ko aghwaa karne ke ilzaam mein muqeed kya gaya hai. woh aik zair daryaft qaidi hai. aik aur qaidi naay jail hakkaam ko bataya ke woh jail se aajilana rihayi ki aas mein roza rakh raha hai. aik 21 sala qaidi jo chand din mah qabal hi jail muntaqil kya gaya hai woh bhi roza rakhnay walon mein shaamil hai. is naay jail hakkaam se kaha ke woh is liye roza reh raha hai ke is ke muslim saathi roza rehtay hain aur woh un ka sath dena chahta hai. malik ki mukhtalif jailon mein qaid 97 ghair muslim khawateen Ramazan mein roza reh rahi hain. Dehli mein itwaar ka darjah hararat 45 degree celsius taq ja pouncha tha. har jail ke sprntndnts se kaha gaya ke woh aftaar mein shirkat karen. Direcrtor General Mahabis  Mr. Ajay Keshap ney kaha ke mah Sayam se qabal bain mahabis rabita ijlaas munaqqid sun-hwa tha. har jail mein boards chaspan kiye gay hain jis par sehar o aftaar ke auqaat darj kiye gay hain. tamam roza daar qaidyoun ke liye khajoor aur Rooh Afza ka bhi intizam kya gaya hai aur namazi qaidyoun ke namaz ka khusoosi intizam kya gaya hai. unhon naay bataya ke roza rakhnay walay qaidyoun ke liye jail auqaat mein bhi riayat di gayi hai.
744.title: Tihar jail mein 59 Hiindu qaidyoun ka musalmanoon ke sath roza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Makkah Masjid bomb dhamaka ke muqadma mein tamam mulzimeen ki bra_ea_iat ke baad jaissa tawaqqa ki jarahi thi waisa hi huwa. NIA ney bil akhir zairi‫n adalat ke faisla ke khilaaf appeal nah karne ka faisla karliya hai. national investy gation agency ( NIA ) ke zaraye ney CNN- News 18 ko bataya ke faisla ke 18 nukaat ke minjumlh 3 nukaat ‘tough to contest’ hai, jis ke baais agency Hyderabad ki adalat ke faisla ko challenge nahi kere gi. zairin adalat ka faisle mein quwwat hai aur mulzim afraad ke khilaaf koi shahadat nahi hai. Asimnanand ke wakeel jay sharmaa ny Television Channel  ko bataya ke mujhe yaqeen hai ke mutaliqa ohdedaron ny faisla ka mutalea kya hoga aur phir is faisla ko chlallenge nah karne ka faisla kya hoga. guzashta mah khusoosi adalat ny raast shahadat ke fuqdaan ke baayes 2007 mein Makkah Masjid mein hue bomb dhamaka ke tamam 5 mulzimeen ko buri kardiya tha. is waqt NIA ny kaha ke tha ke woh adalat ke faisla ki naqal haasil honay ke baad is ka jaiza le gi aur phir mustaqbil ki karwai ke baray mein tye kya jaye ga, lekin isi waqt se naqideen yeh kehte arhay they ke NIA zaireen adalat ke faisla par khamoshi ikhtiyar karle gi. NIA par is baat par bhi tanqeed ki jarahi thi ke mulzimeen ke khilaaf scienci andaaz mein tehqiqaat karte hue shawahid akhatta karne ki bajaye, markaz mein hukoomat ki tabdeeli ke sath hi mulzimeen ke tain naram rawayya ikhtiyar karli thi. hatta ke adalat ka faisla anay se qabal hi NIA ohdedar yeh bawar krwane ki koshish kar rahay they ke mulzimeen ke khilaaf thos shawahid nahi hain. yahi nahi balkay NIA ny Asimna nand ki zamanat par rihayi ke khilaaf bhi khamoshi ikhtiyar kar rakhi thi. yaad rahay ke Asimna nand ny raza karana tor par magistrate ke rubaroo Iqbal jurm karliya tha, halaank inhen yeh mauqa bhi diya gaya tha ke woh mukarrar goro khoz karne ke baad apna bayan qalamband karwaen magar woh –apne bayan par qaim rahay lekin markaz mein jon hi nrindr moodi ki zair qayadat bi jay pi ki hukoomat tashkeel payi, nah sirf Asimnanand ney –apne Iqbal bayan se munharif hogaye balkay tehqiqati agency ka muaqqaf bhi badal gaya. is muqadma ki aik khaas baat yeh bhi rahi ke muqadma Faisal karne ke sath hi Muaziz judge ny apna maktoob istifa, cheif justice high court ko paish kardiya tha. yeh aur baat hai ke un ka istifa na manzoor kardiya gaya. Makkah Masjid mein hue bomb dhamaka mein 9  musalli shaheed aur 58 afraad zakhmi hogaye they jabkay police fayrng mein 5 muslim nojawan shaheed hogaye they. is muqadma mein dayen baazu ki tanzeem ke 10 afraad ke khilaaf fard jurm aed kya gaya tha jis mein se aik ki mout hogayi thi aur 9 ke mnjmlh sirf 5 mulzimeen  Devendar Gupta,, Lokesh Sharmaa, -Swami Asimn nand urf Naba Kumar Sarkar, Bharat Mohanlaal Rateshwar urf Bharat bhai aur Rajendar Choudhri ko hi girftar kya jaska tha. deegar do mulzimeen Sandip V Dange aur Ramchandar Kalsangar mafroor hain. mazeed 2 afraad ke khilaaf tehqiqaat jari theen.
755.title: Makkah Masjid dhamaka muqadma : Asimnanand ke faisla ke khilaaf NIA ka appeal karne se Ihtiraz

news_detail: karimnagar. Telangana ke zila Karimnagarmein mana Kundoor mandal ke Chanjerla ke qareeb aaj dopehar are tea si bas aur laree mein khofnaak tassadum ke nateeja mein 7 afraad halaak aur 20 zakhmi hogaye. mahlukeen mein commerce ke aik lecturer bhi shaamil hain. mutwafi jee hari prasad imtihani prchon ki jaanch ke liye Karimnagarjarahay they. is haadsa mein teen contract lecturers bhi zakhmi hogaye. wazeer tansport Mr. mhen_heendra ready ny bataya ke aik laree ke are tea si bas se takra jaane ke baayes yeh haadsa paish aaya. bataya jata hai ke are tea si bas Karimnagar se  Warangal jarahi thi ke taiz raftaar laree ny aqab se takkar day di. zakhmi afraad ko Karimnagar ke sarkari hospital muntaqil kya gaya. zakhmion mein 7 ki haalat tashweesh na k batayi jati hai. haadsa ke waqt bas mein 30 musafireen sawaar they. laree driver aur klinr bhi zakhmion mein shaamil hain. is haadsa ke baais Karimnagar-Warangal  reyasti shahrah par kuch der ke liye trafik mein khlal para. yeh dosra mauqa hai ke are tea si bas ko haadsa paish aaya. guzashta hafta ko paish aeye aik haadsa mein 10 afraad halaak aur 20 zakhmi hogaye they. wazeer Finance Mr. Etala Rajendar ittila mlitay hi fori maqam haadsa poanch gaye aur haadsa ke shikaar afraad ke bachao aur raahat kaari kamon ki nigrani karte hue zakhmion ko fori tibbi imdaad ki farahmi ko yakeeni banaya. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekhar Rao ney haadsa par gehray dukh ka izhaar kya aur haadsa ke mahlukeen ke afraad khandan se izhaar taaziyat kya. cheif mnstr ny mutaliqa hakkaam ko hadaayat di ke zakhmion ko munasib tibbi nighdasht faraham ki jaye. Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Kadiam Sri Hari ney kaha ke hukoomat, haadsa ke mahlukeen aur zakhmion ke liye exgratia ka elaan kere gi.
770.title: Karimnagar mein sadak haadsa 7 afraad halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. senior aayi ae s officer o Principal secretary mehakma labour o aymplaymnt Dr. Shashank Goel ke jawaa saal Farzand Shubham  Goel ko turkey ke dar-al-hakoomat istanbul mein luteron ny halaak kardiya. laash ko hndstan wapas laya gaya aur guzashta itwaar ko Uttarkhand mein aakhri rasomaat ada ki gayeen. yeh saneha 24 May ko paish aaya. skritrit mein sarkari zaraye ke bamawajjib Shashank Goel Delhi ke liye rawana hue they. bataya jata hai ke inhen jaisay hi –apne Farzand ki halakat ki ittila mili woh fori Delhi puhanche aur wizarat umoor kharja ki madad se –apne Farzand ki laash hndstan wapas layi. 27 May ko Uttarkhand ke Rurki mein ada ki gayi. 24 sala Shubham  Goel aik soft veer engineer they aur America ke California mein federal bank of America mein mulazmat kar rahay they. woh –apne aik rishta daar ki shadi mein hndstan aeye hue they. Shubham  ny California wapas lottay hue turkey ki sayahat ka mansoobah banaya tha. maloom sun-hwa hai ke Shubham  aik sayahati maqam ka aik group ke sath mushahida kar rahay they ke un ka saamna luteron ki aik touli se sun-hwa. luteron ny inhen –apne paas mojood saari ashya un ke hawala kardainay ki dhamki di thi taham woh luteron se muzahmat karte rahay. un par pehlay chaako se hamla kiya gaya aur phir un par goli chladi gayi. un ke daftar ke ohdedaron se rabt peda kya gyato unhon ny sirf Dr. Shashank Goel ke Delhi rawana ki ittila di taham un ke Farzand ki mout ke baray mein toseeq nahi ki, Albata utar khand ke muqami zaraye ablaagh ny is waqea ki khabar di hai
787.title: Principal secretary labour Dr. Shashank Goel ke Farzand ka istanbul mein qatal

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein majlis shoora ( parliment ) ney  insidaad harasani ke qanoon se mutaliq qarardad ki manzoori day di hai. qanoon ka mansoobah wizarat dakhla ney  Shahi farmaan par tayyar kya tha. yeh qanoon 8 shaqon par mushtamil hai. is ka maqsad harasani  ke jurm ka insidaad, is ke murtakib afraad par saza ka nifaz, jurm ka shikaar honay walay ka tahaffuz aur is ki izzat o touqeer aur shakhsi azaadi ko yakeeni banana hai. Al Arabiaia.net ke mutabiq qanoon ke tehat harasani  ke jurm ke irtikaab par milnay wali saza do saal jail aur aik laakh rial jurmana ya dono mein koi aik ho sakti hai. qaid ki saza ziyada se ziyada paanch baras taq barhai ja sakti hai aur jurmana ki raqam teen laakh rial se ziyada nahi ho sakti. is ke ilawa harasani  par uksanay, is par mutfiq honay ya kisi bhi soorat mein irtikaab mein madad karne par bhi muqarara saza ka nifaz ho ga. harasani  ke kisi bhi irtikaab se mutaliq maloomat faraham karne walay ki shanakht ko mukammal tor par Sigha raaz mein rakha jaye ga aur is ka shikaar honay walay ki shanakht kisi bhi soorat mein zahir nahi ki jaye gi siwaye aas waqt jab ke tahaqeeq ya adalti karwai mein is ki zaroorat paish aeye. idhar sarkari siktr mein mutaliqa idaron ko paband kya gaya hai ke woh harasani  se tahaffuz ke liye matlooba iqdamaat karen. sath hi is hawala se shikayat wusool karne ka tareeqa car waza karne aur aur shikayat ke mustand aur durust honay ki jaanch ko yakeeni banayen. yaad rahay ke Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ney  wizarat dakhla ko is nizaam ki tayari ke liye khusoosi Hadayat jari ki theen taa ke muashray aur afraad ko is ke manfi asraat se mehfooz rakha ja sakay
799.title: Saudi Arabia : Insidaad e harasani  qanoon ki manzoori

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq sadar jamhooria hind Mr. Pranab Mukherji ke Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh ki janib se is ke headquarters waqay Nagpur mein 7 June ko munaqqid shudni taqreeb ki dawat ko qubool karne par Congress ke aik senior qayed ki janib se secularism ke mafaad mein apne faisla par nazar sani karne ke mutalba se Congress Party ko aik ajeeb sorat e haal ka saamna hai. Congress Party ab tak is masla par khamoshi banaye rakhi hui thi, taham Party ke aik senior quied sabiq wazeer railway Mr. C. K. Jafar Sharif ney sabiq sadar jamhooria hind ko maktoob rawana karte hue Party ko makhmasa mein daal diya hai. Mr. Jafar Sharif ney aik khabar rasan agency se kaha’ ‘ RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat karne ka un kafislh heran kin aur taajjub khaiz hai. zindagi bhar kangrisi rehtay hue is terhan achanak RSS ke paas jana. .. . woh apne pas manzar ko faramosh nahi kar saktay. unhon ney kisi ko bhi aetmaad mein nahi liya aur woh achanak jarahay hain.”Mr. Sharif ney Mr. Pranab Mukherji ke mosooma maktoob mein istafsaar kya ke aaya RSS ney woh sab kuch tasleem karliya jo sabiq sadar jamhooria ney aik wazeer aur aik Congress quied ke tor par singh ke barey mein kaha tha ke yeh’ bad tareen’ tanzeem hai jo ‘firqa parast’,’qoum dushman’ aur ‘ghair Muhibbe watan’ hai’’. RSS ney dawat nama qubool kiye jaaney ki sataish karte hue kaha ke un logon ke liye koi taajjub ki baat nahi hai jo singh ko jantay aur samajte hain chunkay RSS ney hamesha –apne programon mein samaaj ke mumtaz afraad ko madoo kya hai. is martaba hum ney dr Pranab Mukherji ko madoo kya hai aur yeh budiya baat hai ke unhon ney hamari dawat ko qubool karliya. sabiq jamhooria hind teesray baras ki sangh shiksha varga se khitaab karen ge jo Nagpur mein har saal RSS ke headquarters par munaqqid hoti hai .

Mr. Jafar Sharif ney sabiq sadar jamhooria ke iqdaam par taajjub ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke woh deegar secular awam ki terhan un ke RSS programme mein shirkat ke barey mein sun kar shashdar reh gaye. Mr. Jafar Sharif ney –apne maktoob mein jis par sabiq rukan parliment Mr. H. Hanumanthappa ke bhi dastakhat hain kaha’ ‘ mein shakhsi tor par sochta hon ke aap jaisay martaba walay, aik secular aur dahon siyasat mein rehtay hue, mukhtalif Muratib o ohdon Bashmool sadar jamhooria ke aala mansab par Faiz rehne walay ka parlimaani intikhabaat se ain qabal singh parivaar ka dora karna munasib nahi hai. Congress ke sath sath secular awam yeh khabar sun kar shashdar rah gaye aur sorat e haal prnaraz hain aur tawaqqa karte hain ke aap –apne faisla par nazar sani karen ge. mein aap se aik baar phir istada karta hon ke –apne faisla par mukarrar ghhor karen aur secularism aur malik ke mafaad mein singh ka dora karne se ijtinab karen. Congress Party ney ta haal is par koi tabsarah nahi kya hai, shaed usay dar hai ke agar woh Mr. Pranab Mukherji se shirkat nah karne ki khwahish bhi kere to woh waisa nahi karen ge aur aisa karne ki soorat mein usay RSS ke tain hamdardi rakhnay walon ke voton se mehroomi ka khadsha hai
824.title: RSS ke ijlaas mein Pranab Mukherji ki shirkat ney secular logon ko herat zada kardiya : Jafar Sharif

news_detail: Gaza. Palestine ka chhota behri jahaaz ( Flotilla ) Israel ki janib se kayi saloon se aed pabandion ko toar kar Gaza ki sahili patti se bahar khulay samandar mein nikal gaya taham Israeli behria ney usay beech pani mein rokkk diya. jahaaz mein 25 mareez. taalib ilm aur kuch samaji rehnuma sawaar hain. tfsila t- ke mutabiq Palestine ke is jahaaz ki manzil qabras ki bandargaah Limassol hai jo ke Gaza ke shumal mein waqay hai, yeh jahaaz aaj subah apni manzil ki janib rawana sun-hwa tha aur is ki himayat mein mutadid kashtiyan sath chali theen. Israel sunah 2006 se 20 laakh flstinyon ko Gaza ki patti mein mahsor kya sun-hwa hai aur un ke baahiri duniya se rabita par pabandiyan aed krrkhi hain. Flotilla ney jab 16 behri mil ka faasla tey kya to usay Israel ke chaar behri jungi jahazoo ney apne ghairay mein le liya tha. jahaaz se ek activist ney Aljazira nami Arab khabar-rasan idaara ko bataya ke’ ‘ hamaray charon taraf Israeli jahaaz hain aur hum beech mein phansay hue hain. fi al haal hum sab, sahih salamat hain aur aap se duaun ki darkhwast karte hain’ ‘. yaad rahay ke sunah 1993 mein honay walay oslo muahiday ke tehat Israel flstinyon ko 20 behri mil ke andar fishing ki ijazat dainay ka paband hai taham is par kabhi bhi amal daraamad mumkin nahi ho saka. mangal ke roz rawana honay walay is jahaaz par mareez, talba aur guzashta dinon honay walay muzahiron mein zakhmi honay walay afraad shaamil hain. jahaaz ke muntazmeen ke mutabiq is par mojood tamam afraad ke paas passport aur deegar safri dastaweez mojood hain aur zakhmion ko ilaaj ki gharz se turkey muntaqil kya ja raha hai jahan un ke ilaaj ke intizamaa mukammal hain. is Flotilla ki himayat mein senkron Falasteeni 30 se zayed kashtiyon mein sawaar hokar sath chalay hain taham un ka kehna hai ke hum ijazat Yafta hudood se bahar nahi jayen ge, khulay samandar mein bas yahi aik jahaaz jaye ga. yaad rahay ke maazi mein Israel Falasteeni kashtiyon ko mehez das se 12 behri mil taq kashti rani ki ijazat deta raha hai aur guzashta dinon yeh hadd ghata kar mehez 1 Kilometer taq kar di gayi thi. Palestine ki kashtiyan waisay bhi 6 nautical miles ki hadd mein rehti hain aur Israel ki janib se un par musalsal fayrng ka silsila jari rehta hai. intizamia ka kehna hai ke un ka yeh safar wapsi March ka hissa hai jis mein woh Israel ki taraf se aed jabri pabandi ko toar kar khud Israel aur duniya ko yeh pegham den ge ke woh azaadi chahtay hain. inhen yeh bhi andesha hai ke Israel ki janib se un ki kashtiyon ko laazmi nishana banaya jaye ga lekin woh is khatray ka saamna karne ke liye tayyar hain. Israeli behria ney yeh elaan kar diya hai ke is ney kashti kakntrol haasil karliya hai. International Freedom Flotilla Coalition ney –apne aik bayan mein Israeli iqdaam ki muzammat ki aur kaha ke ‘Hurya’ se mosoom azad y kashti par hamla badbakhtana hai. anjuman ney kaha ke Gaza ke ghair qanooni muhasra ko khatam karne ki koshish thi
838.title: Israel ney Cyprus janay walay Flotilla’  Hurya ‘ ko rokkk diya

news_detail: Mumbai. sahafi o jahedkaar Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ki tahaqeeq karne wali special investy gation team ney aaj muqadma mein pehli charge sheet paish kar di hai. 650 safhaat par mushtamil charge sheet aik session court mein paish kar di gayi jis mein SIT  ney 131 bayanaat qalamband hai, jin mein foreinsic science laboratory ( f s ail ) ohdedar vn aur mulzimeen ke tea Navin kumar aur Pravin ke bayanaat shaamil hain. Navin kumar ke ilawa SIT  ney 8 mah qadeem muqadma mein deegar chaar afraad ko bhi grfta rkya tha. tehqiqati ohdedar Mr. M. N. Anucheth ney kaha ke go k SIT  hunooz Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ke chaar mulzimeen se pooch gach kar rahi hai, unhon ney Mysore ke maqoliat pasand qalam car professor ke s bhagwan ku jaan se maardenay ki dhamki ka maktoob 9 September 2015 mein bheja tha. Gauri Lankesh ke qatal ke silsila mein girftar pehlay mulzim Navin Kumar urf Hotte Manja ki faraham kardah maloomat ki asaas par SIT  ney Sujit Kumar urf Pravin saakin Shikaripura ko 20 May ko giraftar kya tha. Sujit ki tafteesh par is ney apne sathiyon Amul Kale, Amit alias Degwekar, Pradip Mahajan sakineen Maharashtra aur Manohar Dundappa Yadav saakin Vijyapuri ko girftar kya gaya. Sujit ney police ko bataya ke is ke tenu saathi Dawangre mein chupay hue hain jahan se inhen girftar karliya gaya. darin asna SIT  ney charon mulzimeen ko panchwin additional cheif metro politn magistrate ( ae si am am ) court mein paish karte hue 10 din ki police tehweel haasil karli. 55 sala Gauri Lankesh ko 5 September 2017 ko is waqt desi sakhta 7. 65 am am pistol se is waqt maghribi bangloru mein goli maar di gayi jab woh apne ghar se bahar jarahi thi.
851.title: SIT ney Gauri Lankesh qatal muqadma mein pehli charge sheet paish ki

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat Telangana naay yaum e Tasees Telangana ke mauqa par ‘Telangana state level awards  201’ ke liye 27 zumron mein 48 award yaftgan ka elaan kya hai jin mein sirf 4 Muslim hain. Awards ke liye mukhtalif shoba hayaat se talluq rakhnay wali mumtaz shakhsiyation ke intikhab ke silsila mein aik committee tashkeel di thi. dayrktr ( f ae si ) mehakma Saqafat o rukan knoynr committee naay mukhtalif shoba haae hayaat se talluq rakhnay wali 48 mumtaz shakhsiyation ki aik fehrist tayyar ki. / 2 June ko prayed ground par munaqqid shudni yaum e Tasees Telangana 2018 tqarib mein un awardyaftagaan ko cheif mnstr ke hathon aizaz se nawaza jaye ga. har award 1, 00116 rupay naqad inaam, shaal aur tauseef nama par mushtamil hoga. is award ke liye Urdu adab mein professor Mohammad Ali asar, urdu sahaafat mein janab Mohammad Abdul Muqeet Farooqi nama nigaar Etemaad Nizamabad, khail kood mein janab Mohammad Hussamudin aur behtareen sarkari khidmaat mein janab Khwaja Moinuddin assistant executive Kaleswharam project ko muntakhib kya gaya hai. Muslim award yaftgan mein do ka talluq Nizamabad se hai jahan ki rukan parliment mrs ke koyta Dukhtar cheif mnstr hain. behtareen baldia ke liye Nizamabad municiple karporasion ka intikhab amal mein aaya hai.
863.title: Yaum e Tasees Telangana ke mauqa par riyasati satah ke awards ka elaan

news_detail: Afghanistan ke janoobi soobah Hilmand mein toup khanah se rocket hamla mein Taliban ke 50 se ziyada senior commanders maaray gaye hain jabkay malik ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein Taliban aur Afghan security forces ke darmain jharpen jari hain. Amrici fouj ney wednesday ko Hilmand mein Taliban ki un halakaton ki ittila di hai aur bataya hai ke soobah ke zila moose qilah mein 24 May ko Taliban kamandron ke aik ijlaas par rocket barsaye gaye they. is ijlaas mein hamsaaya soobah Farah sameit mukhtalif sobon se talluq rakhnay walay Taliban commander shareek they. Afghanistan mein Amrici forces ke tarjuman colonel Martin O Doneal ney kaha hai ke’ ‘ hamaray khayaal mein is ijlaas mein aindah ki mansoobah bandi ki jarahi thi. un par aartlri ke aik rocket nizaam ke zariye hamla kiya gaya hai’ ‘. un ke bah qoul yeh aik barr ahem hamla hai aur is se muzahmat karon ko numaya dhachka laga hai. tarjuman ney mazeed kaha ke is mah is das roza karwai ke douran mein Taliban ke kayi aur bhi aala aur nichli satah ke commander maaray gaye hain. Afghan Taliban ney is report ko propeganda qarar day kar mustard kardiya hai aur kaha hai ke moose qilah mein do aam makanon ko hamla mein nishana banaya gaya tha jis ke nateeja mein paanch shehri halaak aur teen zakhmi hogaye they. Taliban ke tarjuman qaari Yousuf Ahmed y ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke’ ‘ yeh aik shehri Iqamti ilaqa tha aur is ka Taliban se koi talluq nahi tha’ ‘. idhar Afghanistan ke shumali soobah Takhar mein Taliban ney zila dasht qilah ke markaz, governor ke compound aur police head quarters par qabza kar liya hai. soobay ke aik police tarjuman khalil aseer ka kehna hai ke is zila mein Taliban jangju on aur Afghan security forces ke darmain larai jari hai. soobah logar mein Taliban ney sobai dar-al-hakoomat pal-e aalam mein aik police station par hamla kya hai. is hamlay mein teen police ahelkaar halaak aur aath zakhmi hogaye hain. sobai governor ke tarjuman Shah poor Ahmed zai ney kaha hai ke Taliban ney aaj Ali alsbah police station par dhawa bol diya tha, is ke baad un ki police ehalkaron ke sath teen ghantay taq jharap hoti rahi thi aur is mein yeh tenu hamla aawar maaray gaye hain. janoobi shehar qndhar mein aik bomb dhamakay mein teen shehri halaak aur terah zakhmi hogaye hain. bzahir is bomb hamlay mein aik mechanic ki workshop ko nishana banaya gaya tha jahan Afghan fouj ki gariyon ki murammat ka kaam hota tha
874.title: Afghan soobah Hilmand mein rocket hamlay mein 50 Taliban commandars maray gaye : Amrici fouj ka daawa

news_detail: Saudi arab ke General Directorate for Passports (Jawazat) ke mutabiq Umra ke liye duniya bhar se anay walay zaireen ko visa ki meyaad se zayed der qiyam ki soorat mein deport honay se qabal 50 hazaar Saudi Riyal jurmana aur chay mah qaid taq saza ka saamna karna par sakta hai. Saudi mehakma ny aik bayan mein tamam ghair mulki Umra zaireen ko Talqeen ki ke woh –apne tye shuda safri schedule ke mutabiq visa ke khatmay se qabal –apne mumalik ko lout jayen. jawazat ney Umra ke liye anay walay zaireen ko Hidayat jari ki ke Umra ke visa par anay walay afraad ko Makkah, Jeddah aur Madina se bahar jaaney ki ijazat nahi hai. Saudi idaara baraye shumariyat ke mutabiq saal 2017 hamza ke douran aik crore 90 laakh 79 hazaar 306 afraad ny Umra ada kya. un afraad mein se 65 laakh 32 hazaar 74 afraad beron mulk se aeye they
748.title: Saudi arab: Umra visa ki muddat se zayed qiyam par 50 hazaar Riyal jurmana, 6 mah qaid

news_detail: Mutahidda Arab Amarat UAE ke dar-al-hukoomat Abu Dhabi mein aik fouj daari adalat neh paanch mumalik se talluq rakhnay walay 28 afraad ko 17 crore 40 laakh dollars ke sarmaya kaari scandal mein qasoor waar qarar day diya hai aur unhein majmoi tor par 284 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. unhon neh fraud, dhoka dahi aur money laundering se UAE ke bankon se mazkoorah raqum ainth li theen. un 28 mudda alihan ka talluq America , Bharat , Pakistan , roos aur canada se hai. adalat ke faislay ke mutabiq un mein se aath mdaaalihan ko 15, 15 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. 10 ko 10, 10 saal, no ko –apne bank khaton mein raqum muntaqil karne ke jurm mein saat, saat saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. adalat neh aik mujrim ko aik saal qaid ki saza ka hukum diya hai. qaid ki muddat poori honay ke baad unhein UAE se bedakhal kardiya jaye ga. adalat mein un mulzimon ke khilaaf UAE ke daftar baraye umomi istighasa ke do Afsar paish hue they aur unhon neh shawahid paish kiye they. Abu Dhabi ke mehakma tafteesh juraim neh un ke khilaaf malik ke bankon se –apne bank khaton mein raqum muntaqil karne ki tehqiqaat ki thi. unhon neh barqi tarseelat ke zariye mukhtalif bankon mein paanch companiyon ke bank khaton mein yeh raqum muntaqil ki theen. yeh raqum baad mein UAE hi mein mukhtalif bank khaton mein muntaqil ki jana thi lekin is se pehlay hi un ka yeh scandal pakra gaya tha
767.title: Abu Dhabi: adalat neh fraud case ke 28 mujrimon ko 284 saal qaid ki saza suna di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mulk ki gayarah reyaston mein 4 Lok Sabha nashiston aur 10 Assembly halqon ke intikhabaat mein bhartia janata party ko qarari shikast hui hai. BJP ko do Lok Sabha nashiston aur aik Assembly nashist par kamyabi haasil hui hai. utar pardesh mein jahan BJP ki hukoomat hai, is baar bhi zimni intikhabaat mein shikast ka saamna karna para. congress aur ilaqai partiyon ney BJP ko peechay dhakel diya hai. qaumi partiyon ney 4 aur ilaqai partiyon ney 6 nashiston par kamyabi haasil ki jabkay BJP ney utar khand ki aik nashist bachanay mein kamyaab hopayi hai. utar pardesh ki ahmiyat ki haamil Kairana Lok Sabha nashist se wifaqi mahaaz ki umeed waar Tabassum Begum (Rashtriya Lok Dal) ney BJP umidwarah  Mriganka Singh  ko shikast day di. yeh nashist Mriganka ke waalid hukum singh ke foat hojane ke baais khaali hogayi thi. maharashra ke Palgarh se BJP umeed waar Rajindra Goit aur Gondia  Bhandra Lok Sabha nashist se an si pi ke mdhokr Kukde ney BJP ke Hemant Patel ko shikast di. zimni intikhabaat mein BJP ki paspaai se yeh qiyaas kya ja raha hai ke 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein BJP ko oppostion partiyon ke wifaqi mahaaz se khatrah peda ho sakta hai, lekin yeh bhi dekha gaya hai ke zimni intikhabaat mein awam ka jo rujhan rehta hai woh aam intikhabaat taq barqarar nahi rehta hai. aik gosha ka yeh bhi maanna hai ke zimni intikhabaat mein brsraqtdar party ko shikast se is liye bhi dochar kya ja sakta hai ke log electronic voting machinon mein garbar ki baton ko faramosh karjayen taakay aindah phir yeh masla zor pakarney lagey to yeh misalein di ja sakti hain ke zimni intikhabaat mein to brsraqtdar party ko shikast ka saamna karna para tha
785.title: Zimni intikhabaat mein BJP ka naaqis muzahira

news_detail: Agra. vshwa hindu prishd ke sabiq bain al aqwami saddar Pravin Bhai Togadia ki nai tanzeem’ Hindu Hi Aagay’ ki Agra unit ke sadar Govind Parashaar ne Bollywood adakar Salman Khan ko barsar e aam pitaayi karne walay ko do laakh rupay inaam ka elaan kya hai. unhon ney ilzaam ayed kya ke un ke production House ki film ‘Loveyatri’ rakhtay hue Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh kya gaya hai. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke yeh film danista tor par hindu tehwar ‘Navratri’ ko release ki jarahi hai. Parashar aur tanzeem ke deegar karkunon n ney Bhagwan Talkies puhanche aur Salman Khan ki filmon ke postrs ko Nazar aatish kya. ehtajaji kaarkunon ney film adakar Salman Khan aur film ‘Loveyatri’ ke khilaaf naara baazi ki. yeh film october mein release ki janay wali hai jis mein un ki mun boli behan Arpita Khan ke shohar Ayush Sharma ko roshnaas karwaya ja raha hai. is film ko Salman Khan produce kar rahay hain
801.title: Salman Khan ki barsar e aam pitaayi karne par 2 lakh rupay inaam ka elaan

news_detail: Denmark , Europion mumulik mein taaza mulk ban gaya hai jahan aam muqamat mein chehra ke hijaab par imtena ka qanoon Manzoor karliya gaya hai. is imtena ko huqooq insani ke jahedkaron ne usay’ huqooq nswan ki khilaaf warzi’ par mhmol kya hai. Denmark ki parliment ne aaj 30 ke muqabil 75 voton se manzoora qanoon kehta hai’ jo koi bhi awam mein chehra chupaney wala libaas Zaib tan karta hai usay jurmana ki saza hogi.’ Centre Right Goverment ki janib se paish kardah is musevida qanoon ko Social Democrates aur Danish Peoples Party ne bhi tayied ki hai. naye qawaid ka itlaq yakam June se hoga. aisa burqa ka pehnana jo saaray chehra ko chupata hai, ya aisa naqaab jo sirf ankhen dekhata hai, is ka awam mein istemaal karne ki soorat mein 1, 000 Kroner yani takreeban 157. 11 dollar ya 10,594 hindustani rupay ka jurmana aed kya jaye ga. is imtena ke tehat deegar ashya jin se chehra chupaya jata hai un ka bhi ihata kya gaya, jaisay kaan top balaclavas aur farzi darhhyan. mutadid baar khilaaf warzi karne walon ko jurmana 10, 000 Kroner yane 1,05,962 rupees tak kya jaye ga. is baat ka sahih andaza nahi hai ke Denmark mein kitni khawateen naqab ya burqa istemaal karti hain. imtena ki himayat karne walon ka yeh kehna hai ke is se Denmark ke muashra mein Dur anay walay musalmanoon ki tafteesh ko behtar bananay mein madad miley gi, lekin amnesty inter national ne qanoon ki muzammat karte hue usay’ huqooq nswan ki imtiazi khilaaf warzi’ qarar diya aur kaha ke yeh khaas kar muslim khawateen ke sath imtiaz hai jo chehra ko kaamil chupaney wala naqaab istemaal karti hain.
815.title: Denmark mein aam muqamat par chehra ke hijaab par imtena

news_detail: Hyderabad. yun to aqliaton se mutaliq jitne bhi idaara jaat kaam karte hain un ki karkardagi nihayat hi naaqis aur mayoos kin hoti hai magar aisa lagta hai ke is par qaboo paate hue karkardagi ko muasar bananay ke iqdamaat karne ki bajaye is ko mazeed badter banadiya ja raha hai. karkardagi ko muasar bananay aur islahat laane ke to bohat daaway kiye jatay hain magar amli iqdamaat kuch nahi kiye jatay. aisa lagta hai ke Telangana state Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay ki jitni koshish ki jati hai itna hi is ki karkardagi bgrhti jati hai. haal hi mein Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab Shahnawaz Qasim ney Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay bohat se islahat laane ki koshish ki hai aur unhon ney E-filing tareeqa car ko muta-arif krwane ka beda uthaya hai magar ab to Waqf Board ka website hi down hogaya hai. is se qabal sabiq Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab asdallh ney Board ke umoor mein shfafit peda karne ke liye CEO ke jari kardah mimoz aur ehkaam ko Waqf Board ki Website  http://waqf.telangana.gov.in/ par paish karna shuru kya tha magar un ke tabadlah ke sath hi yeh silsila band hogaya tha magar ab to yeh haalat hogayi hai ke Waqf Board ki mazkoorah Website down hochuki hai aur yeh kayi dinon se band hai magar Board ney Waqf Board ki Website ke ahya ke liye koi koshish nahi ki gayi. hona to yeh chahiye ke Waqf Board ki Website ko aik jame Website banaya jaye taakay is ke zareya zaroorat mandoon ko darkaar maloomat, Waqf Board ke daftar puhanche baghair hi Website taq rasai haasil karte hue haasil karle satke hain. umeed ke is janib Chairman Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem aur CEO janab Shahnawaz Qasim fori tavajja den ge aur website par Board se mutaliq tamam maloomat faraham karen ge.
831.title: Telangana Waqf Board ka website down

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao 2

June ko wizarat aala ke chaar saal ki takmeel karen ge. un ki party ‘Telangana Rashtra Samiti’ Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ke maqbool aam schemes ki asaas par 2019 ke intikhabaat mein dobarah Iqtidaar haasil karne ka iradah rakhti hai. guzashta chaar barson mein hukoomat ney bijli, aab paashi, peenay ka pani aur zaraat ke shobo par ziyada tavajja di gayi thi aur intikhabi baras be rozgaar nojawanon aur farahmi rozgaar par tavajja markooz ki jaye gi. TRS hukoomat, 2014 intikhabaat mein Telangana ke aik laakh nojawanon ko rozgaar ki farahmi ke wada ko wafa karne mukhtalif mehakma jaat mein mukhtalif zumron par taqarruraat ke ailamiye jari kiye jayen ge. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao jo hafta ko Parade Grounds par munaqqid shudni jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge, nojawanon ko mlazmton ki farahmi par kiye gaye kaleedi faislon ka elaan karen ge.

TRS zaraye ka to yahan taq kehna hai ke Chief Minister 50, 000 mlazmton par androon 6 mah taqarrurat ka elaan karen ge. yahi nahi balkay samaaj ke pasmandah aur mahroom tabqaat ki Falah o behbood ke liye bhi mukhtalif akhtraay programon ka elaan karen ge. taham Telangana ke musalmanoon mein aik qisam ki mayoosi payi jati hai ke un ke sath kiye gaye aksar ahem waday wafa nahi kiye gaye hain aur in ke tain Mr. Chandrashekar Rao koi dilchaspi nahi rakhtay. un ahem wadon mein musalmanoon ko 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi aur auqaafi jayidadon ki Sayanat khaas kar dargaah hazrat Hussain Shah walii ke tehat waqay auqaafi jayidadon ki wapsi shaamil hai. yahi wajah hai ke soshil media par yeh remarks kiye jarahay hain ke hamein dawat iftaar ya Ramazan gifts nahi chahiye, bas 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi ka wada poora kardo. ilawa azeen samaaj ka aik tabqa ka yeh bhi ehsas hai ke aqliton khaas kar musalmanoon ki behbood ke buland bangh daaway karne walay Mr. KCR aqliaton ke liye thos iqdamaat nahi kar rahay hain aur inhen haqeer jantay hue un ko di janey wali imdaad ki rqomat ko qaleel rakhtay hain, jaissa ke kisanon ko fi aekar 4 hazaar rupay ki farahmi avrmslmanon ke liye 500 rupay se bhi kam maliyat ka ramadaan gift. mandaroon ke pujarion aur deegar mulazmeen ko sarkari mulazmeen ke mumasil tankhwahon ki farahmi aur is ke barkhilaf masajid ke Aima o mauzineen ko mahana sirf aik hazaar rupay ki farahmi
843.title: Telangana Formation Day: Hukumat 25,000 jayidadon ko pur kere gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer baldi nazam o nasq o shehri taraqyaat Mr. K. T. Ramarao aur Under Secretary General aqwam mutahidda o Executive Directoraqwam mutahidda maholiyaat Mr. Herrick Soleheim ney aaj yha n peoples plaza, nikls road par munaqidah aik takreeb mein barqi gariyon ko jhandi dikhayi. wazeer ney Mr. Herrick Soleheim ka khermaqdam kya aur Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay ki aik pehal mein hissa lainay par shukriya ada kya. Mr. K. T. Ramarao rau ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue kaha ke reyasti hukoomat bohat jald barqi gariyon par aik policy faisla kere gi. unhon ney kaha ke maholiyati tawazun ki bahaali ke liye kayi iqdamaat kiye gaye hain.’ Telangana Hartihaharm’ programme ke tehat 5 saal ke arsa mein 230 crore se zayed pouday lagaye jarahay hain taakay Green Cover ko 22 feesad se badha kar 23 feesad kya jaye. yeh prajkt sirf shajar kaari tak mehdood nahi hai balkay un poudoun ko geotag lagaya ja raha hai aur un ki hifazat ki jarahi hai. unhon ney kaha ke isi terhan riyasat bhar mein takreeban 46, 000 jheelon aur talabon ka tahaffuz kya ja raha hai. unhon ney kaha ke Hyderabad 2022 tak plastic se pak shehar ban jaye ga. jee each am si 4. 20 laakh LED bulbs ke sath LED street lights laganay ka beda uthaya hai. ail bi nagar mein each am are prajkt ko bhi July mein awam ke liye khol diya jaye gaavr anqareeb aik am are projects se mutaliq kaam bohat jald shuru kiye jayen ge. Herrick Soleheim ney ‘swacch Namaskaram’ karte hue awam ka istakbaal kya aur Gandhi ji ka qoul duhraya ke ‘paki, parhaiz gari se badhkar hai’. unhon ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke Swach Bharat muhim ki bhi sataish ki. unhon ney mustakbil qareeb mein aloodgi se pak mahol ko yakeeni bananay kiye jaaney walay iqdamaat mein aqwam mutahidda aur aqwam mutahidda maholiyaat ki janib se bharpoor taawun ka tayaqqun diya. is mauqa par 20 Electric gariyon ka iftitah kya gaya jis ko municiple karporasion ke ohdedar kirayon par haasil karen ge.
858.title: Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay Telangana hukoomat paband ehad: KTR

news_detail: New Delhi. Aindah saal intikhabaat mein awaami taied ke husool ke liye BJP ki qaumi muhim ‘Samarthan ke liye Sampark’ ke hissa ke taur par qaumi sadar BJP Amit Shah ne kal sabiq cricket captain Kapil Dev ke ghar pohunch kar un ke arkaan khandan se mulaqaat karte hue Modi hukoomat ki karkardagi ki asaas par BJP ke liye taied talabb ki. is mulaqaat ke baad Amit Shah tweet kya ke ”Hindustani Cricket Team ke sabiq captain Kapil Dev aur un ki ahliya se Delhi mein un ki rihayeshgaah par mulaqaat umdah rahi.’tayeed ke liye rabita’ mulkgeer muhim ke hissa ke tor par inhen Wazeer e Azam @ Narendra Modi ki hukoomat ke guzashta chaar barson mein haasil kamyabion se waaqif karwaya. ”BJP ke sarbarah is mulkgeer muhim ka aaghaz sabiq Army Chief, General Dalbir Singh Suhag (retired) o sabiq Secretary General Lok Sabha Mr. Subhash Kayshap ki rihahishgaah se shuru ki thi. is muhim ke tehat Mr. Amit Shah raye aama hamwar karne walay 50 logon se mulaqaat karen ge jabkay 4, 000 deegar party qaideen bashmool wuzraa, arkaan Parliament o arkaan Assembly mulk bhar mein aik laakh se zayed mumtaz shakhsiyation se mulaqaat karen ge.
871.title: Tayeed ke liye Rabita muhim : Amit Shah ki Kapil Dev ke arkaan khandan se mulaqaat

news_detail: Srinagar. shehar khaas ke Nohata ilaqa mein Security Forces ki gaadi ney 3 nojawanon ko takkar maar kar kuchal diya, jin mein se 2 ko chouten ayen aur un mein aik ki haalat naazuk batayi jaati hai. Kashmir Uzma ki report ke mutabiq name fouji dasta ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke 600 nojawanon par mushtamil muzahireen ney gaadi mein safar kar rahay aik Afsar ko pakarney ki koshish ki jis par wahan jharpen huien. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq jame masjid sringr mein namaz jummay ke baad nojawanon aur police ke darmain jharpon ka silsila shuru sun-hwa.”namaz jummay ke baad nojawanon ney Nohata chowk mein puraman tor par ehtijaj kya, aur is douran CRPF ki aik gaadi wahan se guzri aur muzahireen ney is par shadeed pathrao kya jis ke babyes gaadi muzahireen mein ghus gayi jis ke babyes teen nojawan uski zad mein aagaye taham gaadi 2 nojawanon ko roundti hui nikal gayi. nojawanon ko fouri taur par hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan aik ki haalat tashweesh-naak hai. wazeh rahay ke chand roz qabal Safa kdl ilaqa mein isi terhan ke aik waqea mein aik nojawan ko kuchal dala gaya tha. Nohata mein jummay ko zakhmi honay walay nojawanon ki shanakht Younis Ahmed wald Nisar Ahmed saakin delgate aur qaisar Ahmed saakin fatah kdl ke bator hui hai. hospital zaraye ke mutabiq Younis Ahmed ki sorat e haal tashweesh-naak hai. zaraye ka kehna hai ”is ke jism mein androoni chouten lagi hain”. is hawalay se CRPF tarjuman snje sharmaa ney bataya ke qareeb 600 ehtajaji muzahireen CRPF ki gaadi ke ird gird jama hue, jabkay gaadi mein CRPF ka aik senior Afsar safar kar raha tha, jo ke ilaqa mein Forces ki taenati ki jaanch kar rahay they. unhon ney bataya ”mushtael hajhoom ney gaadi ka uqbi darwaza kholnay ki koshish ki, taham woh andar se band tha, magar unhon ney gaadi ke sheeshon ko chikna chor kya”. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke gaadi ke driver ney gaadi ki raftaar kam karne ki koshish ki, aur nojawanon ko unhon ney nahi kachla. jab nojawanon ke Forces gaadi se kuchalnay ki khabar ilaqa mein phail gayi to barray pemanay par ehtajaji muzahirey hue, jis ke sath hi Forces aur police ki nojawanon ke sath jharpen huien, jo ke shaam taq jari rahen. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq ehtajaji muzahireen ko muntashir karne ke liye police ney tear gas aur pilt ka istemaal kya, jis mein 5 nojawan zakhmi hue
885.title: Srinagar mein muzahireen pursi are pi f ki gaadi chadha dene ke ilzaam ki tardeed

news_detail: Hyderabad. Anti Corruption Bureau ( ACB) ney sports deputy director Mr. Venkat Ramna ki Ramantapur mein waqay rahaish gaah par dhawa kya. ACBohdedar chaharshanba ki subah se paanch maqamat par dhave kar rahay hain. yeh dhave mobayyana taur par jaali wasayeq  ke sath sports quota ke tehat am bi bi s nashiston ke allotment mein be qaadgyon ke ilzamaat ke tanazur mein kiye gaye hain. cheif mnstr tlnganh mister ke Chandar shikhr rau ney jaali Wasiqa ke sath sports quota ke tehat medical nashiston ke ilzamaat ki ACB ke zareya tehqiqaat ka 17 May ko hidayat jari ki thi. reyasti hukoomat ko bataya gaya tha ke am bi bi s nashistain panay ke liye sports quota ka ghalat istemaal kya ja raha hai, jis par cheif mnstr ney is ka jaiza lainay aik jame tehqiqaat ka hukum diya taakay is mein mulawis afraad ke khilaaf karwai ki jasakay
762.title: Sports ke aala ohdedar ki rahaish gaah par ACB dhawa

news_detail: Palestinians se izhaar yakjahti karte hue argentina ney Israel se football match mansookh kardiya hai, pari world cupp match hafta ko maqboza beeet almuqaddas mein hona tha. Israeli akhbar ke mutabiq yeh faisla argentina ki football asosi ation ney kya jis ke baad Israeli Wazeer e Azam nitn yahoo ney argentina ke saddar ko phone karkay is maamla mein madad ki appeal bhi ki. is se qabal 70 Falasteeni bachon ke aik group ney argentina ke footballer Leonel Mess Messi ko aik khat likha tha, jis mein bachon ney Israel ke khilaaf dostana match mein shirkat nah karne ki darkhwast ki thi. match maqboza beeet almuqaddas ke junoob mein tidi stadium mein khela janatha jo 70 saal pehlay arab Israel jung mein tabah ho gaya tha.
782.title: Argentina ney Israel se match mansookh kardiya

news_detail: Bengaluru. Karnataka mein 15 dinon qadeem H. D. Kumaraswami hukoomat ki Cabinet mein aaj tausi ki gayi haiChief Minister Mr. H. D.  Kumaraswami ne apni Cabinet mein tausi karte hue 25 arkaan ko shaamil kya hai jin mein Congress se talluq rakhnay walay 14 wuzraa shaamil hain jabkay Janata Dal Secular ke 9 aur BSP aur KPJP ke wahid arkaan ko bhi Cabinet mein shaamil kya gaya hai. goar nar Mr. wuju bhai wla ne raaj bhuvan mein munaqidah aik taqreeb mein naye wuzraa ko ohda aur raazdari ka halaf dilaya. halaf lainay walon mein sabiq Wazeer e Azam Mr. H. D.  Deve Gowda ke farzand Mr. H. D.  Revanna aur riyasti Congress ke senior qayed Mr. D. K. Shivkumar bhi shaamil hain. Janata Dal S ke Mr. G. T. Deve Gowda ku jinhon ne sabiq Chief Minister Mr. Sidda Ramaiah  ko Mysoru ki Chimandeshwari  halqa assembly se shikast di thi bhi shaamil kya gaya hai. Congress ki rukan qanoon saaz council mrs jiye mila wahid khatoon wazeer hon gi. ma baad mafahmat ke tehat makhloot hukoomat mein Congress ke 22 aur Janata Dal ke 12 wuzraa hon ge. Cabinet mein aaj ki tausi ke sath wuzraa ki tadaad 27 hogayi hai. mazeed wuzraa ko Cabinet mein shaamil karne ki gunjaish baqi hai. Mr. Kumaraswami ne bah hesiyat Chief Minister aur Congress quied Mr. G. Parameshwara ne bah hesiyat deputy mnstr 23 May ko halaf liya tha. aaj halaf lainay walon mein Congress party se talluq rakhnay walay do muslim arkaan assembly Mrs U. T. Khadar aur B. Z. Zameer Ahmed Khan shaamil hain.
795.title: Kumaraswami Cabinet mein 25 wuzraa ki shumuliat

news_detail: Saudi Arbia ke farmaa rava Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ney awaami shoba ke mulazmeen ke liye 10 roza Eid ul Fitar taatilat ka elaan kya hai. un tatilat ka aaghaz jummay 15 June se hoga aur tawaqqa hai ke mulazmeen itwaar 24 June ko rujoo bah car hon ge. isi terhan Amman mein bhi awaami o khangi shoba jaat ke liye Eid tatilat ka elaan kardiya gaya hai. Amman ki sarkari khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq awaami shoba ke mulazmeen ke liye tatilat ka agaaz Juma 15 June se hoga jo peer 18 June tak rahen gi aur 19 June se kaam kaaj ka aaghaz hojaye ga. isi asna Saudi Arbia ke mahireen ka kehna hai ke is martaba Saudi Arbia mein mah Ramadhan 29 dinon ka ho sakta hai. Saudi arab ke maahir mosmiyat ney Ramadhan al mubarak 29 dinon ka honay aur Eid ulFitar burrows jummay 15 June ko mananay ka imkaan zahir kya hai. Saudi maahir umoor mosmiyat Abdul Aziz Al Hassaini ka kehna hai ke falkiati adaad vshmar se andaza sun-hwa hai ke is saal mah Ramadhan 29 dinon ka hoga. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke is baat ka inhisaar Rwait ke din mausam aur mutala saaf honay par hai, mutala saaf honay ki soorat mein jumaraat 14 June ko shawaal almkrm ka chaand nazar anay ka quavi imkaan hai
814.title: Saudi Arbia mein awaami shoba ke liye Eid taatilat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein parking ke masail ka hal talaash karne cheif secretary Telangana Mr. S.K. Joshi ney baldi nazam o nasq ke ohdedaron ke sath aik ijlaas munaqqid kya taakay awaami. khangi shiraakat daari se Multi-Level parking Complexes ki taamer ke liye androon aik mah ishtiraaq kya jasakay. cheif secretary ney tajaweez ke qabil amal honay ka mutalea karne ki hadaayat dete hue kaha ke developers se tajaweez talabb karne se qabal daryaft talabb masla mein package ki tafseelaat aur deegar umoor ka ihata kya jaye. myir Hyderabad Mr. Bontu Ram Mohan ney ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kaha ke New York jaisay shehron mein parking fees se khateer aamdani hoti hai. unhon ney kaha ke riyasat mein duniya mein mojood behtar tareeqa car ko ikhtiyar kya jaye. unhon ney kaha ke parking yards ka ilaqa 100 murabba gaz se 500 murabba gaz par muheet hona chahiye. Principal Secretary Mr. Aravind Kumar ney kaha ke parking ke masail par mehakma police ney aik surway kar rakha hai. shehar mein Multi-Level parking ki taamer ke liye Hyderabad metro rail limited hogi. metro rail ke Managing Director Mr. N.V.S Reddy ney kaha ke Germaney , Japan , china aur South Korea jaisay mumalik taamer aur aisay Complexes ki dekh bhaal ke liye jadeed cutting-edge technology ka istemaal kar rahay hain. unhon ney bataya ke Multi-Level parking Complexes awaami. khangi ishtiraaq se shehar bhar mein 42 muqamat par taamer kiye jayen ge
830.title: Telangana mein Multi-Level car parking ki tajweez

news_detail: Mumbai. BJP sadar Amit Shah ki party muhim’ Sampark baraye Samarthan’ ke hissa ke tor par Shiv Senasarbarah Uddhav  Thackeray se do ghanton ki mulaqaat ke androon 24 ghantay aakhir uzzikr party ne apne is moaqqaf ka izhaar kiya ke woh aindah intikhabaat Bashmole 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein tanha muqaabla karne apni qarardad par karbnd rahay gi. Shiv Senake senior quied mister Sanjay RAut ne aaj kaha ”hum jantay hain ke Amit Shah jee ka agenda kya hai magar Shiv Senane yeh qarardad Manzoor krchki hai ke woh anay walay tamam intikhabaat mein apne bal par muqaabla kere gi.” yaad rahay ke maharashra mein BJP aur Shiv Sena ki makhloot hukoomat hai taham Shiv Sena sarbarah Uddhav  Thackeray guzashta aik baras se apni Haleef BJP aur markazi hukoomat ki palisy on par sakht nuqta cheeni karte arhay hain. Uddhav Thackeray ki rahaish gaah’ Mato Shri’ mein guzashta din BJP sadar Amit Shah poanch kar Uddhav  Thackeray se mulaqaat ki thi. yeh mulaqaat taqreeban do ghantay taq jari rahi thi. baad azan Amit Shah yeh umeed zahir ki thi ke dono partiyan BJP aur Shiv Senaaindah lok sabha intikhabaat mein mutahidda muqaabla karen ge. taham Shiv Senake apni qarardad ke paband rehne ke elaan se BJP ki umedon par pani phir gaya hai. Amit Shah ne mulaqaat ke baad kaha tha ”yeh mulaqaat musbet rahi hai aur dono partiyan ( BJP. Shiv Sena) nah sirf 2019 ke intikhabaat balkay 2024 ke intikhabaat mein mil jal kar maqa bala karen ge. maharashra mein assembly intikhabaat bhi 2019 mein munaqqid shudni hain jabkay lok sabha ke intikhabaat bhi 2019 mein hi munaqqid hon ge. Sanjay RAut ne bataya ke BJP aur Shiv Senaaindah chand dinon mein dobarah mulaqaat karen gi. Shiv Senake tarjuman’ saamna’ mein guzashta kayi mahino se BJP aur markazi hukoomat par shadeed tnqidin ki jarahi hain, jis ki wajah se dono partiyon mein dooria barhti chali gayeen. Uddhav  Thakur ne Amit Shah se aik saal ke waqfa ke baad mulaqaat ki. dono qaideen ki mulaqaat ke baad yeh ta-assur paaya ja raha tha ke BJP aur Shiv Sena ke darmain paye janey walay ikhtilafat ka khtama hojaye gaavr dono partiyon ke taluqaat aik naya mourr ikhtiyar karen ge magar Sanjay Raut ke taaza bayan se un qiyaas aarayyon ke sach saabit honay par sawalia nishaan lag gaya hai. Amit Shah ne party muhim’ rabita baraye taied’ ke hissa ke tor par Mumbai mein Madhuri Dixit , Maroof snatkar ratan tata se bhi mulaqaat ki thi aur sudhi vnayik mandir ka darshan bhi kya tha.
842.title: Shiv Sena aindah intikhabaat mein tanha muqaabla kere gi

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi ki hzari adalat ney aaj Gangster Abu Salem ko Delhi ke aik tajir ko 2002 mein raqam tahaffuz ke taur par 5 crores rupay ka mutalba karne aur raqam ki adam adai par arkaan khandan ko maardenay ki dhamki dainay par 7 saal ki qaid bamushaqqat ki saza sunai hai. Adalat ney saza ke taayun par istighasa aur vuklaaye safai ke dalail ki samaat ke baad yeh faisla sunaya. adalat ney 26 May ko muqadma mein saza sunai thi. Delhi mein darj kardah jabri vasuli ki shikayat mein yeh ilzaam aaydkya gaya ke Abu Salem ney 2002 mein junoobi Delhi ke greater Kailash ke saakin Ashok Gupta se tahaffuz ki raqam ke taur par 5 crore rupay ka mutalba kia tha. Abu Salem ko is muqadma mein tazeerat hind ki dafaa 387 (jabri vasuli karne kisi fard ko mout ya sangeen nuqsaan ke liye khauf mein mubtala karna) aur dafaa 506 (mujremana takhweef) ke tehat saza sunai gayi. taham usay sakht geer qanoon maharashra insidaad munazzam juraim ke tehat ilzamaat se bari kardiya gaya. adalat ney Abu Salem ke mutawazi mulzimeen Pawan Kumar Mittal @ Raja Bhai, Ashraf Bhai, Mohammad Ashraf @ Bablu, Majeed Khan @ Raju Bhai aur Chanchal Mehta ko bhi bari kardiya. Abu Salem ko is se qabal Mumbai bomb dhamakay 1993 case mein bhi saza sunai jachki hai.
854.title: Gangster Abu Salem ko 7 saal ki saza

news_detail: Geneva: Khaleej Aden mein Yemen ke qareeb ghair qanooni tarikeen watan ki kashti ghark hojane se 46 afraad halaak jab ke 16 la patah hogaye. aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye tarikeen watan ki janib se jari bayan ke mutabiq khaleej Aden mein Yemen ke saahil ke qareeb ghair qanooni tarikeen watan se bhari kashti onche lehron ki zad mein aakar ulat gayi, kashti mein 100 se zayed afraad they jin mein khawateen aur bachay bhi shaamil they. aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye tarikeen watan nay waqea mein 46 afraad ki halakat jab ke 16 ke la patah honay ki tasdeeq kar di hai. halaak honay walon mein 37 mard aur 9 khawateen shaamil hain jab ke la patah afraad ki bhi halakat ka qiyaas kya ja raha hai. haadsa mein bach jaaney walay afraad ka kehna hai ke kashti mein sawaar tamam logon ka talluq africi malik ethiopia se hai, un ki manzil Yemen aur deegar khaleeji mumalik thi, is maqsad ke liye unhon nay insani asmglron ko khateer raqam di thi, Yemen ke saahil ke qareeb taiz aur onche lehron ke baais kashti be qaboo hogayi, kashti mein pani bherna shuru hogaya to log apni jaan bachanay ke liye samandar mein kood parre taham beshtar log life jackets nah honay aur teraaki se nawaqfit ki bana par doob gaye. Operation and Emergencies (IOM) ke sarbarah Mohammad Abdekar ka kehna hai ke har mah taqreeban 7 hazaar afraad behtar mustaqbil ke liye ghair qanooni tareeqon se khatarnaak halaton mein safar karte hain, jis ke douran barri tadaad mein insani jaanun ka zeyaa hota hai.
869.title: Yemen ke qareeb tarikeen watan ki kashti doobnay se 46 afraad halaak

news_detail: NewDelhi/Nagpur Nagpur. sabiq Sadar Jamhooria Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ne Nagpur mein waqay RSS Headquarters ka dora karte hue siyasi bomb giraya hai. Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ki party kangrs paanch dahon se ziyada RSS ki khulay aam mukhalfat karti aayi hai. RSS sarbarah Mohan Bhagwat ne sabiq Sadar Jamhooria hind ka RSS ke baani ke maqam paidaiesh par kher muqaddam kya. shaam 6 : 00 bujey Mr. Pranab Mukherjee RSS Headquarters par aarays s kaarkunon ke tarbiati ijlaas ”Shiksha Varg” ki ikhtitami taqreeb se khitaab karen ge. Mr. Mukherjee RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat ki dawat qubool karliye jaane ki ittila ke sath hi aik tanaza peda hogaya hai aur Copngress Party ko aik ajeeb sorat e haal ka saamna karna prhrha hai. agarchay ta haal Copngress Party ne khil kar Mr. Pranab Mukherjee RSS ke programme mein shirkat ki mukhalfat nahi ki hai taham malik ke mukhtalif gooshon se talluq rakhnay walay Copngress Party ke senior qaideen ne un par kari tnqidin ki hain. party zaraye ka kehna hai ke party ki sabiq sarbarah mrs Sonia gandhi ki eimaa par hi Mr. Mukherjee par tnqidin ki jarahi hain. zaraye ka kehna hai ke mrs gandhi ke ishara par hi party ke senior qayed Mr. Ahmed Patel ne guzashta raat tweet kya tha ke’ ‘ Pranab da! mujhe aap se yeh tawaqqa nahi thi.’ ‘ is se qabal sabiq wazeer railway Mr. Jafer Shareef aur tlnganh ke senior congress leader Mr. Hanumantha Rao ne bhi sakht tnqidin ki theen. ab to khud Mr. Pranab Mukherjee ki Dukhtar jo Congress Party ki Sharmistha Mukherjee ne bhi guzashta shab tweet kya tha ke un ke dora ka bi jay pi bharpoor najaaiz faida uthaye gi aur yeh ke woh jo taqreer karen ge woh dairpa assar nahi chhorey gi Albata taswerain kabhi nahi dhundlaingi. Mr. Pranab Mukherjee 2012-2017 malik ke Sadar Jamhooria reh chuke hain. woh kal shab hi Nagpur poanch chuke they aur mobayyana tor par RSS sarbarah Mohan Bhagwat ke sath hi ashayih kya. Mr. Mukherjee RSS ki dawat qubool kar lanay ke sath hi un ki Dukhtar aur farzand Abhijeet ke ilawa party ne bhi inhen RSS ki taqreeb mein shirkat se baz rakhnay ki koshish ki thi.
884.title: Sonia gandhi ki eimaa par hi Pranab Mukherjee khilaaf tweet!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Police force mein bdanwanyon ke khtama ke liye aik be nazeer iqdaam karte hue dayrktr general of Police mister mhen_heendr ready ne tamam Suprintendents of Police aur Commisioners of Police ko hadaayat di ke Telangana bhar mein Police ki khusoosi teamon ( special Police teams ) ko barkhast kardiya jaye. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq azlaa aur sh_hrke hudood mein tashkeel kardah Police ki khusoosi Teams hi tijarti idaron aur dosaron se hafta aur mahana asaas par rqomat ( mamool ) ki vasuli mein mulawis paye gay hain. bud unwani ke khilaaf iqdaam ke tor par zayed az  350 Police mulazmeen ke tabadlay kar diye jayen ge aur Special Police Teams ko tahleel kardiya jaye ga. DGP ne bayan kya ke tamam sathon par munazzam andaaz mein mamool ki vasuli ki laanat ko khatam kardiya jaye ga jis ke liye s piz aur si piz se kaha gaya hai ke khusoosi teamon se wabsta mulazmeen ko fori assar ke sath armed rizro Headquarters se rujoo kardiya jaye. unhon ne kaha ke kisi bhi shakal mein is terhan ka tareeqa car jari rehne ki soorat mein mutaliqa Unit Officers aur sab unit Officers ke khilaaf manfi karwai hogi. bataya jata hai ke DG pi ko mossola report ke mutabiq jumla 391 Police mulazmeen mamool ya jabri vasuli mein mobayyana tor par mulawis hain. Report ke mutabiq list kuch is taraha hai.Hyderabad 11, Suryapet 40, Bhadradri Kothagudem 35, Karimnagar 34, Nizamabad 29, Sangareddy 25, Cyberabad 13, Rachakonda 24, Mahbubnagar, 13, Wanaparthy 2, Nagarkurnool 13, Vikarabad 27, Yadadri-Bhuvanagiri 5, Nalgonda 2, Khammam 17, Mahabubabad 10, Kamareddy 16, Medak 17, Siddipet 21, Adilabad 6, Nirmal 2, Warangal urban and rural 5, Rajanna Sircilla 4, Peddapalli 9, Kumarambheem-Asifabad 3, Mancherial 8.DGP ke paas mojood report ke mutabiq Hyderabad mein mahana mamool wusool karne walon ki fehrist mein  K Alexander PC, Asifnagar, P Nagesh PC, Golconda, B Srikanth PC, Tappachaputra, Mahesh PC, & Brahman, ASI, of Shainathgunj, Y Sambaiah PC and A Bala Narsimha PC of Mangalhat, Venu Home guard of Kulsumpura, Shankar Naik, Home guard of Panjagutta, Ram Singh, home guard of Chilkalguda shamil hain.
900.title: Telangana mein Police mulazmeen ki jabri vasuli ko khatam karne DGP ka intibah

news_detail: Hyderabad. ladkiyon ko nasha aawar paan khlakr un ka istehsal karne ke ghnaone jurm mein police ny aik mutasirah larki ki shikayat par paan ki mashhoor dukaan’ Mayur Pan House’ ke maalik mhndr verma ko grfta ray karliya gaya hai. police ke bamawajib mulzim, Facebook ke zareya ladkiyon koshadi karne ka jhansa deta tha aur jab koi larki is ke daam fraib ka shikaar hojati tab usay meethay paan mein nasha aawar shye mila kar khilatha tha aur inhen apna shikaar banata tha, woh un ki video rerecording bhi karliya karta tha aur phir inhen apni khwahish poori nah karne par you tube par video up load kardainay ki dhmkyan diya karta tha. haliya waqea mein Upendra  verma ny Facebook ke zareya aik soft engineer khatoon se qurbat ikhtiyar kyaavr jab is khatoon ki verma ki harkato ka pata chala to is ny mulzim ke khilaaf Kachiguda police station mein shikayat darj karwai. shikayat par verma ko girftar karliya gaya hai jabkay is ki muawnat karne walay saathi mafroor betaye jatay hain. police ny is ke paas se kayi ladkiyon ki tasaveer bhi zabt ki hai. police ny is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karliya hai aur is ke teen mafroor sathiyon ki talaash shuru kar di hai. mulzim ki’ Mayur Pan House’ ke naam se shehar mein kayi jagah kaarobar hai.
768.title: Ladkiyon ka istehsal karne wala Mayur Pan House ka maalik girftar

news_detail: Mumbai. Pune Police ney Adalat ko waaqif karwaya ke aik mushtaba Moist ke paas se zabt kardah aik maktoob se yeh inkishaaf hota hai ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ku Rajiv Gandhi ki tarha qatal karne ki saazish tayyar ki gayi thi. mamnooa CPI Moist ke sath taluqaat rakhnay par Dalit jahedkaar Sudhir Dhavle, wakeel Surendra Gadling, jahedkaar Mahesh Raut aur Soma Sen aur Rona Wilson ku chaharshanba ko girftar kya gaya tha jinhen Police ney shehri Moist ke sarkardah qaideen qarar diya gaya. inhen January mein Bhima Koregaon nasli tashadud ke silsila mein girftar kya gaya tha. Police ney session court mein id-daa kya ke yeh maktoob Dehli ke jahedkaar rona vlsn ke qabza se bar aamad kya gaya hai. rona vlsn, siyasi qaidyoun ki rihayi ke liye qaim kardah committee ke rukan hain. public Prosecutor Ujala Pawar ney Adalat ko bataya ke maktoob mein m-4 rifle aur 4 laakh rounds ki kharidi ke liye 8 crore rupay aur Rajiv Gandhi jaisay aik aur waqea ki zaroorat ka zikar hai. Prosecutor ney kaha ke yeh khudkush hamla hoga aur is baat ka imkaan bhi hai ke hum nakaam ho jaien lekin party ko hamari tajweez par ghhor karna chahiye

BJP ke Nalin Kohli ney kaha ke yeh aik sangeen maamla hai. yeh aik maloom haqeeqat hai ke Moist dabao mein hain, yeh aik khatarnaak amar hai. si pi am quied mister sita raam ychori ney kaha ke sikoriti agencies apna kaam karen gi, Adalat samaat kar rahi hai, Adalat ko faisla karne diya jaye. khabar-rasan agency ae an aayi ki janib se jari kardah maktoob ki naqal jari ki hai, is mein kaha gaya hai ke Bihar aur Maghrabi Bengal jaisi badi shikaston ke bawajood Modi ney 15 se zayed reyaston mein BJP ki hukoomat qaim ki hai. agar yahi raftaar barqarar rahay gi to is ka matlab yeh hoga to tamam mhazon par party ko zabardast mushkil peda hogi. .. colonel Kisan aur deegar chand Commerades ney Modi ke daur ko khatam karne concrete iqdamaat ki raye di hai. mulzim ke wakeel ney id-daa kya ke istighasa ki taraf se paish kiye jaaney wali dastawizaat farzi o jaali hain taakay inhen makhoz kya jaye. Bhima Kore gaon mein jab Daliton ney 1818 ki Bhima Koregaon ki jang ki yaad manayi to hndon ney is ehtijaj kya tha jis ke baais tashadud phoot para tha. yaad rahay ke Bartanwi afwaj ney jin mein ziyada tar muhaar (Dalit) fouji they, Peshwa fouj ko shikast dete hue maratha hukmarani ka khtama kardiya tha. Bhima Kore gaon tashadud ke zimn mein Daliton ke jahedkaaron ko girftar karte hue inhen Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi y qatal ki saazish mein makhoz karne ka Dalit qaideen ilzaam aayed kar rahe hain taakay Daliton par dabao qaim rakha jaye
781.title: Modi ka qatal karne ki saazish ko be naqaab karne ka id-daa

news_detail: shaam mein insani huqooq ke idaron ke mutabiq Asad intizamia ki haleef Roosi fouj ney shumali maghribi Governance Adlib mein wehshiana bombari mein darjanon shehrion ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya hai. insani huqooq ki soorat e haal prnzr rakhnay walay idaara ‘Syrian Observatory’ ke mutabiq Adlib ke wasti ilaqa Zaradna mein Roosi fouj ke jungi tayyaron se ki gayi bombari mein kam se kam 38 aam shehri halaak aur darjanon zakhmi hogaye hain jab ke barri tadaad mein shehri malbay taley dabey hue hain .

insani huqooq group ke mutabiq ibtidayi it-tila-aat mein 18 aam shehrion ke maaray janay ki tasdeeq ki gayi thi taham mazeed daidh darjan afraad ki mayyaten nikaali gayi hain. maqtuleen mein bachay aur khawateen bhi shaamil hain jab ke zakhmion ki tadaad 60 taq batayi ja rahi hai. Insani huqooq ke aabzror Rami Abdul Rehman ney bataya ke mumkina tour par Adlib mein bombari Roosi jungi tayyaron ki janib se ki gayi hai. is mein Roosi sakhta bomb istemaal kiye gaye. mutasirah ilaqay ke qareeb imdadi karkun zakhmion ko fori tibbi imdaad pohanchanay ki koshish kar rahay hain. un ke paas do aisay zakhmion ko laya gaya jin mein se aik be hosh tha aur dosray ke chehray ki shanakht nahi ho rahi thi. khayaal rahay Adlibke jis ilaqa ko Roosi jungi tayyaron ki janib se bombari ka nishana banaya gaya hai woh tehreer shaam mahaaz jo maazi mein Al Qaeda ki zeli tanzeem ‘Alnasrah Front’ ke tour par mashhoor thi ke control mein hai. haliya dinon mein seen ilaqay mein Roosi fouj ka yeh bad tareen hamla hai
794.title: Roosi fouj ney Adlib mein qayamat dhaa di, 38 shehri jaan bahaq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rani Gunj, Secunderabad ilaqa mein Bombay Hotel ke qareeb Asian Paints ke godaam mein aag lag gayi. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Mahankali police station ke hudood mein waqay is godaam mein aaj 5:45 bajay aag bhadak uthi, khush qismati se koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa hai. barri der taq aag bharkii rehne ki wajah se atraaf o aknaaf sarasamigi payi gayi. Aag ke baayes paint ke dabbay phatt padney se anay wali awazon ke baais muqami log khaufzadah hogaye. police ittila mlitay hi fouri wahan pahonch gayi aur hifz e mataqadum ke tour par muqami logon ka taqlia krwadya. kaafi tug o do ke baad fire tenders ney aag par qaboo pa liya. samgha jata hai ke short circuit ke baayes atishzadgi ka yeh waqea paish aaya. Commisioner GHMC ko bhi is waardaat ki ittila di gayi aur woh bhi maqam haadsa pahonch kar sorat e haal ka jaiza liya. Railway hukkaam ney aag par qaboo panay tak qareeb se guzarnay wali rout par trains ki aamad o raft ko rokay rakha tha
818.title: Rani Gunj mein Asian Paints ke godown mein atishzadgi

news_detail: America naay kaha hai ke woh Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hai, Afghan masla ka hal afghanon ki marzi aur Afghan qayadat ke tehat hona chahiye, aman amal ke liye Pakistan ka taawun na guzeer hai. Afghan media ke mutabiq Afghan hukoomat aur Taliban ke mabain earzi jung bandi elaan ke baad America naay bhi elaan kya hai ke woh Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hai. Amrici saddar Donald Trump ki Muawin aur National Security Council baraye wasta Asia ki senior director Liza Curtis ke mutabiq America mazakraat mein Afghan hukoomat ki numaindagi nahi kere ga, sirf shaamil hoga. unhon naay kaha ke Afghan aman amal mein Pakistan ke khadshaat par tavajja dena intahi ahem hai, aman amal ke hawala se Pakistan se taawun manga hai, kisi bhi aman amal mein Pakistan ke mafadaat ka khayaal rakhna hoga.
832.title: Taliban ke saath mazakraat ke liye tayyar hain: America

news_detail: Pathankot : Kathua zila ke Rasana mouza ki 8 sala khanah badosh ladki ki January mein alamnaak asmat raizi o qatal ke case mein crime branch ne jummay ko Pathankot District and Session Court mein 17 gawahoon mein aik ko bhi paish karne se qassir raha hai. mulzimeen ke aik wakeel safai ne bataya ke adalat ne gawahoon ki Adam haazri ka sakht note liya aur SSP crime branch ko hadaayat di ke paiir ko shakhsi tor par adalat mein haazir hon. Crime Branch ne apne 500 safhaati charge sheet mein 226 gawahoon ki nishandahi ki thi. muqadma ke 8 mulzimeen ke mnjmlh 7 ke khilaaf jumaraat ko adalat ne ilzamaat waza kiye jis ke nateeja mein samaat aur jirah ke liye 17 mulzimeen ko haazir adalat honay ka Saman jari kya gaya tha. aik wakeel safai ne bataya ke aaj ki karwai baa-mushkil aik ghanta jari rahi chunkay aik bhi gawah haazir adalat nahi ho saka tha. adalat ne 17 gawahoon ki adalat mein peshkashi tak deegar gawahoon ko talab karna mouqoof kardiya hai. zaraye ne kaha ke adalat mein haazir honay se ijtinab karne ki koi raah nahi hai. adalat ke Saman jari karne par crime branch ko case ke tamam gawahoon ko adalat mein paish karna hoga. wakeel safai ne adalat se darkhwast ke aik mulzim Pravesh Kumar urf Mannu ko jo na baligh hai, is ki arzi par bhi paiir ko samaat ki jaye. 8 sala qbayili ladki ki jarehana asmat raizi aur qatal par duniya bhar mein muzammat ki gayi thi. mutasirah khandan ki appeal par adalat Uzma ne muqadma ki samaat Kathua se pathan coat muntakil kar di thi jo Kathua se 30 kilometer ke faasla par hai. mutasirah ke liye aajilaana adal ko yakeeni bananay Supreme Court ne muqadma par yomiya samaat karne ki bhi hadaayat di thi. muqadma ki samaat band kamrah mein ki jarahi hai jahan media ka dakhla mamnoo hai
845.title: Kathua asmat raizi case : Aik gawah bhi haazir e adalat nahi ho saka

news_detail: Amrici sadar Donald Trump ne kaha hai ke woh mashhoor aalmi shohrat yafta Boxer Mohammad Ali marhoom ko baaz adalaton ki taraf se di gayi saza ko khatam karte hue inhen maaf karne par ghhor kar rahay hain. doosri janib marhoom Boxer ke baaz kisz ki pairwi karne walay un ke wakeel ne kaha hai ke qanooni tour par ab Trump ko aisa karne ki zaroorat nahi. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq sunah 1964  mein Musharraf bah islam honay walay Mohammad Ali ne 1967 mein Vietnam jung mein shamoliat ke liye fouj mein bharti honay se inkaar kardiya tha. is ke baad Mohammad Ali ke khilaaf baaz adalaton mein muqadmaat dair kiye gaye they jo un ki mout ke baad bhi chal rahay hain. G7 chouti conference mein shirkat ke liye canada rawaangi se qabal White House mein sahafion se baat karte hue sadar Trump ne kaha ke’ mein Boxer Mohammad Ali ko maaf karne prsnjidgi se gaur kar raha hoon. unhon ne kaha ke un ka intizamia ab Ali ke case par sifarshaat tayyar kar raha hai is ke sath un deegar afraad ko bhi maaf karne ko tayyar hon jinhein ghair munsifana muqadmaat mein uljhaya gaya. Trump ne sahafion ko bataya ke Mohammad Ali un 3000 afraad mein aik hain jinhein ghair munsifana trial ka saamna karna para. mein un sab ko maaf karne prghor kar raha hon. sadar America ne kaha ke Ali is waqt ziyada maqbool nahi they taham ab un ki yaden ziyada maqbool hain. doosri janib marhoom Boxer Mohammad Ali ke kisz ki pairwi karne walay wakeel Ron Tweel ne ‘CNN’ se baat karte hue kaha hai ke Mohammad Ali ki saza maaf karne ke hawala se Trump intizamia ki taraf se un se koi rabita nahi kya gaya. un kehna tha ke woh sadar ke tabsaray ki sataish karte hain magar Mohammad Ali ke kisz mein un ke mokl ko maaf karne ki ab zaroorat nahi rahi hai. yaad rahay ke sunah 1967  ko Amrici fouj mein bharti se inkar par aik Amrici adalat ne un ka passport chean liya tha aur baksng aur weight lifting mein milnay wala’ hero’ ka laqab wapas le liya tha. adalat ne inhen paanch saal qaid aur 10 hazaar dollar jurmana ki saza bhi sunai thi. taham 28 June 1971  ko adalat ne inhen di gayi tamam sazayen bilijmaa kaladam qarar di theen
860.title: Boxer Mohammad Ali ko maaf karta hon : Trump, is ki zaroorat nahi: Wakeel

news_detail: America ki riyasat Virginia mein Fort Pickett National Guard base se aik baktar band gaadi chura kar bhagnay walay fouji ko girftar kar liya gaya hai.
