Amrici fouji adday se yeh bktrbnd gaadi nikaalte ke baad do ghantay taq sarkon par chalata raha tha, halaank is ki ziyada se ziyada raftaar 65 kilometer fi ghanta thi. is ke bawajood bhi police neh barri tug vdo ke baad is par qaboo paaya hai. fouji baktar band gaadi ko sarkon par bhaganay ke baad reyasti dar-al-hakoomat richmond mein town hall ke samnay aa kar ruk gaya tha. wahan police neh is ka gherao kar liya aur is ko mauqa par girftar kar liya hai. baaz it-tila-aat ke mutabiq woh nashay ki haalat mein tha o ray giraftari ke baad is ka tibbi muaina kya gaya hai. Virginia national guard neh aik bayan mein mulzim ka naam Joshua philip Yabut bataya hai. is ki Umar 29 saal hai. is par ghair majaz fouji baktar band gaadi chalanay aur police ko –apne peechay bhaganay ke ilzaam mein muqadma darj kya gaya hai. bayan ke mutabiq is neh mangal ki shaam mamool ki tarbiati mashq ke douran mein fouji baktar band gaadi churaie thi aur woh ab wapas adday par pahuncha chuki hai. police tarjuman sarjnt kili hِl neh bataya hai ke is baktar band gaadi mein koi hathyaar nahi they. chori ki is anokhi waardaat mein kisi ke zakhmi honay ya kisi haadsa ki koi ittila nahi. is waqeye ke baad social media par mukhtalif rad-e-amal ka izhaar kya ja raha hai aur baaz logon neh fouji ki harkat ko pagal pan qarar diya hai
873.title: Riyasat Virginia mein baktar band gaadi chura bhagnay wala Amrici fouji girftar

news_detail: Board of intermediate ny Telangana mein 404 sarkari jone yr collegeon ke talba ke liye muft uniforms ki farahmi ki tajweez rakhi hai taham reyasti hukoomat is ahem tajweez ko manzoori dena baqi hai. is se maali taur par kamzoor khandano ke bachon ko barri raahat miley gi. hukoomat pehlay hi se karporit jone yr collegeon ke khutoot par muft taleem faraham kar rahi hai. jis mein mushtarqa ahliti amthanat ke liye msabqti amthanat, qaumi ahliti o dakhla tst neet, engineering and agreeculture and medical common interance tst ki coaching ke ilawa sarkari jone yr college ke talba ke liye darsi kutub ki farahmi shaamil hai. Jaria saal Telangana hukoomat muft bas paas scheme aur taghzia bakhash dopehar ke khanay ki scheme par amal aawri kere gi. secretary Board of intermediate  Education dr ae ashok ny kaha ke Intermediatetalba ke liye muft bas paas ki scheme se sarkari khazana par salana 10 crore rupay ka boojh aed hogaavr dopehar ke khanay ki scheme par 100 crore rupay salana kharch aeye ga. unhon ny kaha ke tajaweez hukoomat ko paish kar di gayi hai aur is ki manzoori ki soorat mein schemes par Jaria taleemi saal se hi amal daraamad kya jaye ga.
889.title: Sarkari Intermediate college talba ko muft bus paas aur dopehar ka khana

news_detail: Vijayawada. Vijayawada ki aik khatoon ney 14 sala ladke ko jinsi taur par harasan kya. khatoon ke khilaaf jinsi aeza rasani se bachon ke tahaffuz se mutaliq qanoon POCOSO Act ke tehat muqadma darj karliya gaya hai aur na baligh bacha ko tibbi jaanch ke liye sarkari hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Nunna ki rehne wali 45 sala khatoon naay jummay ki shaam aik 14 sala ladke ke sath jinsi zayad-ti ka irtikaab kya. ladke ki walida naay khatoon ke khilaaf police mein shikayat darj karwai jis par waqea ka ilm honay par ladke ke khandan walon naay hamla kardiya. na baligh bachon ko jinsi badtamizion aur jinsi istehsal se muaser andaaz mein mehfooz rakhnay mazkoorah qanoon 2012 mein Manzoor kya gyatahm is qanoon ke tehat aik khatoon ki giraftari aik nadir waqea hai.
902.title: Vijayawada mein khatoon ki 14 sala bacha ko jinsi aeza rasani

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke zair e ihtimaam itwaar ko Media Plus Auditorim mein aik pur-asar dawat aftaar ka ihtimaam kya gaya jis mein imaideen shehar, sayasatdan aur sarkari ohdedaron ney shirkat ki. is mauqa par khitaab karte hue musheer baraye Chief Minister hukoomat Telangana baraye aqliati umoor janab A. K. Khan retired IPS ney khitaab karte hue kaha ke nai Telangana riyasat mein hukoomat ney samaaj ke tamam tabqaat ki Falah o behbood aur riyasat ki taraqqi ke liye kayi akhtraay schemes ko roshnaas karwaya hai aur hukoomat ke iqdamaat ke smrat bhi mehsoos kiye jaaney lagey hain. jahan taq aqliton ki taraqqi o behbood ke programon ka talluq hai hukoomat ney taleem ke shoba ko foqiat di hai aur aala miyaar ke Iqamti schools ka aik jaal phela diya hai jahan khat gurbat se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ke bachon ko aalmi miyaar ke taleemi idaron mein muft taleem o qiyam ki saholaten baham pohanchai jarahi hain. unhon ney bataya ke un taleemi idaron mein zair tarbiyat bachon ney apni ghair mamooli salahiyaton ka muzahira kar rahay hain. unhon ney bataya ke aik din qblhٴ mein aqliati Iqamti schools ke talba ki Los Angeles mein international space development conference mein shirkat karkay lautay hain. unhon ney kaha ke cheif Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao bhi chahtay hain ke woh awam ko darpaish masail ki aajilaana yaksoi ho. unhon ney bataya ke media darasal hukoomat aur awam ke darmain ahem rabita hotay hain. media ke zareya jahan hukoomat ke iqdamaat se awam waaqif hotay hain wahein awaami masail se hukoomat ko waaqif krwane ka yeh behtareen zareya hotay hain. unhon ney kaha ke woh chahtay hain ke media ke sath aik muzakrah rakha jaye taakay woh sahafion ko aqliaton ke liye kiye jaaney walay hukoomat ke iqdamaat se waaqif karwaen aur aqliton ke masail ke baray mein sahafion ki aaraa haasil karen. Sadarnasheen Telangana waqf board o ruknn Qanoonsaaz Council janab Mohammad Saleem aur sadarnasheen Telangana Aqliati Maliyati Corporation janab Syed Akbar Hussain ney bhi is mauqa par guftagu ki aur apni taraf se sahafion ko mumkina taawun ka tayaqqun diya. janab Mohammad Ali Shabir qayed oppostion Telangana Qanoonsaaz Council o sabiq wazeer ney kaha ke sahafi jo haqayiq ko manzar aam par laatay hain woh bhi kayi masail se dochar hotay hain magar un ke masail ki samaat karne wala koi nahi hota hai. hukoomat ko chahiye ke woh sahafion ko behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohnchaye. unhon bataya ke shehron mein kaam karne walay sahafion ko to maqool muawza mil jata hai magar dehi ilaaqon mein kaam karne walay sahafion ko khaterkhah muawza nahi mil paata. yahi wajah hai ke jab woh wazeer it-tila-aat o taluqaat aama they, sahafion ke liye Health Insurance ki scheme roshnaas karwai thi. unhon ney bataya ke kayi sahafi hain jin ka apna zaati makaan taq nahi hai. isi liye congress hukoomaton mein waqfa waqfa se sahafion ke liye arzaan qeemat par zameen faraham ki jati rahi taakay Housing Society ke zareya plats ki taqseem amal mein layi jaye aur phir hukoomat ke zareya makaan ki taamer par bankon ke tavassut se qarza jaat bhi faraham kiye jayen magar tea are s hukoomat mein sahafti baradri ko yaksar nazar andaaz kardiya gaya.

Dawat aftaar mein shirkat karne walon mein qabil zikar Mrs. Aziz Ahmed joint editor roznama Etemaad, Qayum Anwar Urdu Editor T News, Fazil Hussain Parvez editor Gawah weakly, Mustafa Ali sarwari Associate Professor Maulana Azad National Urdu university, Mohammad Shujaudding Ifteqari Acting Bureau Chief roznama Etemaad, Rehman Khan Bureau Chief roznama Munsif, Syed Shahabudding Hashmi sabiq Bureau Chief roznama Siasat, Khwaja Abdul Hameed Shaukat senior Journalist, Mohammad Abdul Naeem Managing Director Y This News, Habibudin Ahmed Editor Saaz e Deccan, Moulana Ahsan al Hamoomi imam o khateeb Shahi masjid, moulana Syed Ahmed al Hussaini Sayeed al-qadri sadar Qadria International, janab syed Abdul Qadar Qadri baani o General Secretary Human Life Awkening Society, janab Ahmed Arshad Hussain Noble Enterprises, Mohammad Ilyas Shamsi sadar Reformers front of India, Mohammad Mansoor Ali Ishaq Convenor  Direct Zakat Moment, Mohammad Farooq Maroof milli jehedkar, Mohammad Affan Quadri General Secretary Mehar Organization, aur deegar shaamil hain. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke qaideen Mrs. Mohammad Sajid Meraj sarparast, Ather Moin sadar, Syed Ahmed Jilani, Mohammad Abdul Hakeem naib Sadoor, Mohammad Rafeeq Ahmed patel, Mirza Ghani Baig secretaries, syed Wajid Hussaini Khazin, Mohammad Sohail, Mohammad Sadiq Ahmed, Mohammad Yousuf, Mohammad Jaleel, Mohammad Afzal arkaan Amila , Sayeed Mohiuddin sadar Warangal mutahidda zila, Mohammad Aleemuddin Secretary General Kamareddy zila, Irfanuddin Jaffer saddar Jagatial zila, Inkisar Ahmed naib sadar karimnagar, Peddapally o Sirsila azlaa unit, Mohammad Ilyas secretary general Siddipet ney mehmanon ka kher muqaddam kya.
756.title: Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ki dawat iftaar

news_detail: Saudi arab ne Makkah mkrmh mein Ramazan al mubarak ke aakhri ashray ke liye sikoriti ke mazeed sakht aur muasar intizamaa kiye hain aur masjid alhram aur is ki janib jany walay tamam raastoon ki fazai Security aur nigrani barha di hai. Security forces ke helly copter musalsal fiza mein gasht kar rahay hain. Aviation Security ke General Commander Brigedier General Husn al Bisam ne bataya hai ke Ramazan al mubarak ke liye Security ke tye shuda mansoobah par amal daraamad kya ja raha hai. masjid alhram mein anay walay tamam zaireen par nazar rakhi jarahi hai. unhon ne Al Arabia se guftagu karte hue kaha ke Ramazan ke aakhri ashra ke douran mein zaireen ki tadaad mein izafah ke paish e nazar Security intizamaa bhi ziyada muasar banaye jarahay hain. Makkah mkrmh ke fazai hudood mein helly coptron ke zareya nigrani barha di gayi hai aur shehar ke markazi hissa aur is ki janib jany wali shaahrahon ki kari nigrani ki jarahi hai. brigedier general husn ne bataya ke Makkah ki fizaon mein parwaaz karne walay tayyaron aur helly coptron mein nigrani ke jadeed alaat nasb hain. woh Security tnsibat aur trafik par nazar rakhay hue hain. woh Security machinon ke ilawa mukhtalif insani imdadi kaam bhi kar rahay hain aur woh tamam sarkari idaron ko logistical imdaad muhayya kar rahay hain. woh kisi hungami soorat mein imdadi sargarmia injaam dete hain aur unhein waqt e zaroorat fazai ambulance ke tor par bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai.
773.title: Ramazan ke aakhri ashra ke liye Makkah ki fazai Security ke sakht intizamaa

news_detail: Saudi arab mein kisi khatoon ko pahelay driving licence ke ijra ka tareekhi lamha aa hi gaya hai aur Saudi hukkaam ney aik khatoon ko car chalanay ka ijazat nama jari kardiya hai. somwaar ko licence ke ijra ki aik video internet par jari hotay hi vayrl hogayi hai. is ke sath tweet mein kaha gaya hai ke’ ‘ Saudi arab mein pahelay licence ke ijra par madrِ watan ki betiyan hazaron mubarak badin qubool farmaen’ ‘. Saudi khawateen ko driving licence ke ijra ke liye guzashta ma hay tareekh ka elaan kya gaya tha. woh Shahi farmaan ke mutabiq 24 June se azkhud karen chala saken gi. mehakma traffic ke director general Mohammad al Basami ney 8 May ko aik bayan mein kaha tha ke’ ‘ khawateen ke karen chalanay ke liye darkaar tamam taqazoon ko poora kardiya gaya hai aur 18 saal ya is se zayed Umar ki khawateen driving licence ke husool ke liye mutaliqa dafatir mein darkhwasten day sakti hain’ ‘. Saudi arab mein qareeban aath hazaar khawateen beron mumalik se driving licence haasil kar chuki hain. un ke licence kuch arsa ke liye Saudi arab mein bhi kaar amad hon ge aur un ki driving mein mahaarat ki jaanch ke baad unhein muqami driving licence jari kardiye jayen ge. Saudi khawateen ko car chalanay ki tarbiyat dainay ke liye mumlikat ke paanch shehron mein driving school qaim kiye gaye hain. un schoolon mein beron mumalik se driving licence haasil karne wali Saudi khawateen apni hum vtnon ko karen chalanay ki tarbiyat den gi. haal hi mein America , canada aur wheels se talluq rakhnay wali khawateen ko Saudi arab mein khatoon driving instructers ko tarbiyat dainay ke liye muntakhib kar liya gaya hai. yeh khawateen do saal taq sinir muaina car ke tor par kaam karen gi. woh nai Saudi khawateen trainers ko tarbiyat den gi
793.title: Saudi arab mein khatoon ko pahelay driving licence ka ijra

news_detail: Afghanistan ke dar-ul-hukumat Kabul mein do dhmakon mein 14 afraad jaan bahaq aur mutadid zakhmi hogaye, pehlay khudkush dhamaka mein mazhabi ulama ki aik taqreeb ko nishana banaya gaya, jabkay dosray dhamaka mein police ehalkaron ki gaari ko nishana banaya gaya. Afghan hakkaam ke mutabiq pehla khudkush dhamaka Kabul mein palle tiknk university ke nazdeek kya gaya, university mein mazhabi ulama ka ijlaas jari tha, dhamaka is waqt kya gaya jab mazhabi scholars bahar nikal rahay they. ijlaas mein mazhabi ulama ne Afghanistan mein jung ke khilaaf mushtarqa fatwa jari kya tha aur khud kash hamlon ko gunah qarar diya tha. dosra dhamaka police district 5 mein kya gaya jis mein 3 afraad zakhmi hain.
825.title: Kabul mein 2 dhamakay, 14 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: New Delhi- BJP ke qaumi saddar mister Amit Shah 2019 intikhabaat ke zimn mein party ki ‘tayeed ke liye rabita’ muhim ke hissa ke tor par kal Mumbai mein Shiv Sena sarbarah mister Uddhav Thacekray ki rahaish gaah’ ‘ Matoshree’ ‘ poanch kar mulaqaat karen ge. Amit Shah ki is mulaqaat ko sayasi halqon mein BJP ki darina Haleef party magar sakht Naqid party Shiv Sena ke sath kasheeda taluqaat ko Khushgawar taluqaat mein tabdeel karne ki koshish ke tor par dekha ja raha hai. yaad rahay ke dono partiyon ke darmain dooria is qader barh gayi theen ke haliya zimni intikhabaat mein Maharashtra mein dono partiyon ne aik dosray ke khilaaf –apne umeedwaar maidan mein utaarey they aur Shiv Sena ki shikast ke baad party ne BJP ko apni sab se barri siyasi dushman party qarar diya tha. Sanjay Raut ne khabar-rasan agency PTI ko bataya ke Amit Shah ne Uddhav jee se mulaqaat ke liye waqt talabb kya tha jis par inhen kal shaam mulaqaat ka waqt diya gaya. yeh dono qaideen taqreeban aik saal ke waqfa ke baad mulaqaat karen ge. mister Amit Shah ne guzashta saal June mein mister Thacekray se BJP ke sadaarti umeed waar Ramnath Kovind ki tayeed talabb karne mulaqaat ki thi. BJP sarbarah mister Amit Shah ‘Sampark for Smarthan’ muhim ke hissa ke tor par Uddhav Thacekray ki rahaish gaah’ Matoshree’ par shaam 6 : 00 bajey mulaqaat karen ge. 2014 mein Maharashtra mein BJP aur shyosina ki makhloot hukoomat ki tashkeel ke kuch hi arsa baad dono partiyon mein ikhtilafat ubhar kar aagaye they aur mister Uddhav Thacekray BJP aur Wazeer e Azam par khil kar tnqidin karne lagey they. Shiv Sena ne yahan taq elaan kardiya tha ke 2019 aam intikhabaat mein BJP se intikhabi mafahmat nahi ki jaye gi. sawal yeh peda hota hai ke itna sab kuch hojane ke baad Amit Shah , ruthe hue Uddhav Thacekray ko mana payen ge aur kya aindah aam intikhabaat mein BJP aur Shiv Sena mil kar muqaabla karen ge
839.title: Kya ruthe hue Uddhav Thacekray ko Amit Shah mana payen ge?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein aik navzaida bachi lawaris pari mili. do nojawanon ne Nacharacm mein masjid noor ke qareeb sadak ke kinare do nojawanon ko yeh bachi subah ki awleen sa-aton mein dastyab hui. police ke bamawajjib bachi ko fori prasad hasptl muntaqil kya gyaj_han se baad azan behtar ilaaj ke liye Nilofer hasptl muntaqil kardiya gaya. Nilofer hasptl mein bachi ki dekh bhaal ki jarahi hai.
855.title: Hyderabad mein sadak ke kinare navzaida bachi dastyab

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke markazi tijarti ilaqa Abids  ki aik paanch manzila imarat se aik 18 sala ladki ney mobayyana tor par chhalang lagaakar khud kashi karli. ladki ki barket poora ki Jaslin Kaur ki hesiyat se shanakht ki gayi hai. it-tila-aat ke bamawajib ladki mayuri kampliks Abids  ki panchwin manzil pohanchi aur wahan se chhalang lagadi. CC Tv cameras mein ladki seedhiyan charhtay hue panchwin manzil par pounchanay ke manazair record kiye gaye hain. yeh waqea aaj subah ki awleen sa-aton mein paish aaya. police ney bataya ke ladki barsar e mauqa halaak hogayi. muqami logon ki shikayat par police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue laash ko post martm ke liye usmaniya hasptl bhaij diya.
870.title: Navjawan ladki ney Abids ki imarat se chhalang lagadi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein mangal ki subah Osmania University ke degree imthehaan ke prchon ki jaanch ke markaz mein aag lag gayi. Police ke mutabiq maqam haadsa ko dekhnay se lagta hai ke hall mein atishzadgi short circuit ke baais hui hai. aag ko dekhte hi university amlah aur muqami log maqam haadsa puhanche muqami fire station aur police ko aagah kardiya. Tarnaka fire department ka amlah fire engine ke sath university poanch gaye aur fori harkat mein atay hue aag par qaboo pa liya qabal is ke ke aag mazeed phail jati. Vice Chancellor Osmania University Mr. Ramchandram ne police ohdedaron ke hamrah maqam haadsa ka dora kya aur sorat e haal ka jaiza liya. university kimps mein degree aspat valuation center mein haal hi mein munaqidah degree ke splmntri imtehanaat ki jaanch ki jarahi thi. mehakma fire ke ohdedaron ne bhi kaha ke aag lagnay ki wajah imarat ke andar short circuit hosakti hai. chand muqami zaraye ablaagh ke numaindon ke bamawajib aag ke baais kam az kam do mazameen ke kayi jawabi biyazaat jal kar khakstar hogaye. Vice Chancellor  Mr. Ramchandram ne kaha ke subah 5-6 bajey ke darmain aag bharak uthi. ittila mlitay hi mehakma fire ka amlah fori wahan poanch gyaavr fori aag par qaboo pa liya jis ki wajah se ziyada nuqsanaat nahi hopaye. hamara andaza hai ke shaed jawabi biyazaat ke 20 sets juzwi taur par jal gaye aur hum un ki baazyabi ki koshish kar rahay hain. University ne atishzadgi ke waqea ki jaanch ke liye aik Committee tashkeel di hai. Committee jo androon do yom apni report paish kardey gi aag ke baais hue nuqsanaat ka bhi jaiza le gi
883.title: Osmania University mein short circuit, answersheets jal kar khakstar

news_detail: Masjid Nabawi ke intizami umoor ke nigaran idaara ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke mah Sayam ke douran Masjid ke 100 dwaze zaireen ki aamad waraft ki sahoolat ke liye din raat khulay rakhay gaye hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Masjid Nabawi ki intizami committee ki taraf se jari bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke ramadaan al mubarak ke douran Masjid Nabawi mein zaireen ki aamad waraft ke liye 10 hungami darwazay bhi qaim kiye gaye taakay Masjid mein anay walay nmazyon aur roza daaron ko kisi qisam ki diqat ka saamna nah karna parre .

Masjid Nabawi mein aamad waraft ke liye aik so darwazon ke khulay rakhnay ke sath sath zaireen ko har qisam ka araam wo rahat pohanchanay ke liye 600 mulazmeen tainaat kiye gaye hain. jahan taq Masjid Nabawi ke tareekhi darwazon ki tareekhi ahmiyat ka sawal hai to morkhin ka kehna hai ke jab Anhazrat sale Allah aleh wasalam ne yeh Masjid apne dast mubarak se Masjid taamer ki to is ke sirf teen dakhli aur kharji darwazay they. aik darwaaza junoob, dosra maghrib aur teesra maghrib ki simt se tha. inhen aaj bhi baab alrahmath, baab Jibreel aur baab Abubaker Siddiq ke naamon se yaad kya jata hai. mutazakirah darwazay aaj bhi unhi naamon ke sath mojood hain magar inhen aamad waraft nahi balkay sirf ziyarat ke liye khoola jata hai. nmazyon ki tadaad mein izafay ke baad khalifa doum syedna Umar ban khitaab razi Allah anho ne Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ka hukum diya. sunah 17 h mein Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ke baad is ke mazeed teen darwazon ka izafah kya gaya. hazrat usmaan ban aafan ke daur mein Masjid Nabawi ke chay darwazay hi rahay taham un mein se aik darwaaza khawateen ke liye mukhtas kya gaya. mukhtalif adwaar mein Masjid Nabawi ki tosee ka amal jari raha. yahan taq ke mojooda Saudi khandan ke hukmaran Shah Saood bin Abdul Aziz Saood ne Masjid Nabawi ke paanch mazeed darwazon ke qiyam ke sath mazeed tosee ki. un ke daur mein Masjid ke 10 aur darwazay bhi banaye gaye. un mein teen dakhli darwazay shaamil hain. inhen baab al-mulk, baab Umar bin Khattaab, baab Osman bin Affan, baab Abdulaziz, baab Almajidi ke naamon se yaad kya jata hai. baad azan khadim alhrmin alshrifin Shah Fahd bin Abdul Aziz ne Masjid Nabawi ki shumali, mashriqi aur maghribi simt mein tausee karai aur mazeed kayi darwazay shaamil kiye.
892.title: Masjid Nabawi ke 100 darwazay khulay’

news_detail: New Delhi. Aakhir-kaar Lok Sabha Speaker ney YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ka istifa Manzoor karliya jinhon ney Andhra Pradesh ko khususi mauqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte hue apna istifa paish kardiya tha. inhen Speaker Lok Sabha  Smitra Mahajan ney mutala kya ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen ge. chaharshanba ko YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament  Y V Subba Reddy, Mekapati Raj Mohan Reddy, Varaprasad, P. Mithun Reddy aur Y. S. Avinash Reddy ney mrs Smitra Mahajan se mulaqaat ki aur appeal ki ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen. Speaker ney inhen jawab dete hue kaha ke un ke isteefay Manzoor karliye jayen ge, baad azan paanch arkaan Parliament ney kaha ke isifon se dast bardari ka sawal hi peda nahi hota. unhon ney kaha ke chaharshanba ki shaam taq un ke isifon ki manzoori ka sarkari elaan kardiya jaye ga. YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ney yeh bhi mutalba kya ke Speaker ko arkaan Parliament Mrs. S P Y Reddy, Kothapally Gita aur Butta Renuka ke inhiraf kabhi faisla kar dein.
905.title: YSRCP ke arkaan Parliament ke isteefay Manzoor!

news_detail: China ke sarkari Hackers ne Amrici behria ki raaz ki maloomat churali hain. Amrici media ki report mein daawa kya gaya hai ke Cheeni Hackers ne behria se mutaliq hassas noiyat ka data Hack karliya hai, jin mein nai noiyat ke aabdoz se daaghe jaane walay anti ship missile ki tayari ke khufia mansoobay bhi shaamil hain. report ke mutabiq Cheeni Hackers  ne Amrici behria ke kntriktr ka data Hack kya hai, jis mein intahi hassas noiyat ki maloomat shaamil hain. Amrici media kay mutabiq Hackrz ne new port road aayi land mein kaam karne walay Amrici behria ke kntriktr konshanh banaya aur data ke sath supersonic missile ke mansoobay se mutaliq maloomat bhi chori karli gayi. Hack kiye gay 614 giga bytes mawaad mein si drign Nami project aur aabdozon ke liye makhsoos unit ki electronic waar fear library se mutaliq maloomat shaamil hain. Amrici hakkaam ke mutabiq yeh Hackng January aur feb mein ki gayi, jabkay f bi aayi hassas data chori kiye jaane ke muamlay ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai. contractor ne jis ka naam zahir nahi kya gaya, Rohd Island ke Newport mein qaim behria ke zair samandar jungi markaz ke liye kaam karta hai. is ne aabdozon aur zair samandar ke jungi hathyar nizaam ki tahaqeeq aur furogh ka kaam kya tha. Pentagon ne si dragn ke barey mein ziyada jankari nahi di hai jisay 2012 mein lanch kya gaya tha
772.title: Amrici behria ka data chura liya gaya

news_detail: Jayashankar-Bhupally. Speaker Telangana assembly Mr. Madhusudan Chary khush qismati se sarrak haadsa mein bach gay. aaj zila mein Gannavaram moza ke qareeb un ke qaafla ki aik car ko laree ney takkar day di. police ney bataya ke Speaker Gannavaram mein raat mein qiyam ke baad Bhupally wapas lout rahay they ke yeh haadsa paish aaya. lohay ke pipes se ldi ke takaraane jaane se haadsa ke baais qaafla mein shaamil aik car sarrak ke aik kinare chali gayi aur car ka samnay ka hissa tabah hogaya. police ney kaha ke is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya gaya.
807.title: Speaker Assembly Telangana baal baal bach gay

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer information technology Mr. ke tea rama rau ney Hyderabad mein hafta ko ‘Telangana Diagnostics’ ka iftitah kya. programme ka aaghaz karte hue wazeer ney kaha ke zaroorat is baat ki hai ke hukoomat ko chahiye ke sarkari haspatalon par riyasat ke awam ka aetmaad bahaal kya jaye. Mr. ke tea rama rau ney mayaari tibbi nighdasht ki farahmi par mehakma sahet ki sataish karte hue wazeer e sahet Mr. Laxma Reddy se khwahish ki ke mehakma mein jayidadon par taqarurat ki peshraft ka jaiza lein. Telangana Diagnostics par unhon ney kaha ke tibbi taskhis awam ke liye dard e sar ban gaye hain is liye reyasti hukoomat ney apna khusoosi Diagnostic center ney qaim kya hai jahan mukhtalif amraaz ke tibbi tashkis Bashmool dingo, maleria, tayifayid, diabities, khoon, x-ray aur scanning bilaa muawza kiye jayen ge taham yeh muft tashkis sirf zila mein qaim primaray Health Centres, community Health Centres aur sarkari hospital ki janib se beje janay walay nmonon ke liye hogi. wazeer ney kaha ke hukoomat ka Mansha ghurba ke liye behtar tibbi khidmaat faraham kiye jayen. cheif mnstr ney sahet ke shoba mein inqilab bapaa kardiya hai. riyasat bhar mein 40 Dialysis Centres qaim kiye gaye hain. hukoomat is programme ke pehlay marhala mein 20 azlaa mein 20 Diagnostics qaim kere gi
821.title: KTR ney riyasat ke khusoosi Diagnostic Center. Telangana Diagnostics ka iftitah kya

news_detail: New Delhi. Junubi Delhi ke Chhatarpur ilaqa mein paish aeye aik Encounter mein Police ko matloob chaar Gangster Bashmole gang ka sarganah Rajesh Bharti halaak hogaye jabkay Delhi Police ke 8 mulazmeen bhi zakhmi hogaye. yeh gang aik form haoz mein panah li hui thi. Police ko is gang ke ilaqa mein naqal o harkat ke barey mein pata chala tha aur aaj subah operation shuru kya gaya tha jis mein gang ka sarganah Rajesh Bharti aur deegar teen arkaan ko goli markr halaak kardiya gya jabkay gang ka panchawan rukan shadeed zakhmi hogaya jisay hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Rajesh Bharti jis ke sir par aik laakh rupay ka inaam tha Haryana mein Police hirasat se faraar hogaya tha. is ke khilaaf sangeen juraim ke kayi muqadmaat darj they aur is ki kuch arsa se talaash jari thi. tassadum mein maaray jaany walay deegar teen ki shanakht Virdhu, Umesh Don aur Bheeku ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Police naay bataya ke gang ke un tamam arkaan ke khilaaf Delhi bhar mein qatal aur jabri raqmi vasuli ke kayi muqadmaat darj they. Police aur gang ke darmiyaan taqreeban adhay ghanta taq firing ka tabadlah hota raha
836.title: Delhi Police se tassadum mein 4 Gangsters halaak

news_detail: New Delhi. JNU student leader Umar Khalid ne Delhi Police mein shikayat darj karwai ke woh aur gujrat ke azad rukan assembly Jignesh miwani ko jaan se maardenay ki ek shakhs ne dhamki di hai jis ne khud ko gingstr Ravi Pujari ki hesiyat se muta-arif huva. Khalid ne tweet kya ke unhon ne Police tahaffuz talabb kya hai. unhon ne tweet kya ke ‘Jignesh aur un ko Ravi Pujari ki jaan se maardenay ki dhamki ke ziman mein Delhi Police se shikayat ki gayi. is ne kaha ke mein is ki hatt list mein hon! mein ne Police tahaffuz talab kya hai. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh wohi shakhs hai jis ne maazi mein feb 2016 mein aisi hi dhamki di thi’ aik Police ohdedar ne bataya ke kal Khalid dhamki par shikayat ke sath Police se rujoo hue aur aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai aur woh maamla ki tahaqeeq kar rahay hain. student- leader ne bataya” dhamkion ke talluq se inhen miwani ne bataya tha aur ab tak inhen koi cal masool nahi huva. Miwani ko guzashta do teen dinon se dhmkyan masool horahee hain. inhen masool aik cal mein caller ne mera naam bhi liya. is ne kaha ke agar hum tqririn karna band nah karen to maar diye jayen ge. miwani ne mujhe bataya aur mein Police se rujoo huva. Police ne muqadma darj karliya hai aur kaha hai ke woh dhamki ke jaiza len ge. miwani ne bhi kal kaha ke inhen Pujari se dhamkiyaan masool horahee hain. haliya dinon mein malik ke sarkardah aur dianatdar sahafion ko bhi dhmkyan di gayeen jin mein qabil zikar Ravish Kumar, Barkha Dutt, Rana Ayub qabil zikar hain.
849.title: Ab Jignesh aur Umar Khalid ko bhi jaan se maardenay ki dhamki

news_detail: Chennai. Chennai Airport par Dubai se anay wali aik khatoon musafir ko mobayyana tor par 13 kilogram sona maliati 4 crore rupay ghair qanooni tor par sath laane par girftar karliya gaya. customs ohdedaron neh bataya ke suit case mein chhupa kar rakhay gaye sonay ko zabt karliya gaya. tehqiqaat jari hain. ohdedaron neh bataya ke musafir ka talluq Karntaka se hai jo Dubai se ba zarea Air India flight Anna International Airport, Chennai pohanchi thi aur scanning mein qeemti dhaat ka pata chalne par musafir ko 9 : 00 bujey din girftar karliya gaya. commissionaire customs ke press release ke mutabiq hindustani passport ki haamil musafir Padma Ambe Venkat Ramaiah(52) saakin Chikmaglur Karntaka ko shuba ki bunyad par exit gate par rok diya gaya. musafir ko uljan mein dekh kar jo mushtaba andaaz mein chal rahi thi pooch gach ke liye rokkk diya gaya.
867.title: Chennai Airport par khatoon musafir se 13 kilogram sona zabt

news_detail: Makkah Mukrama se masool it-tila-aat ke mutabiq jummay ki shab aik ghair mulki Masjid Haram ki aik manzil se neechay kood kar jaan ki baazi haar gaya. Saudi Arab ki sarkari khabar rasan agency “Vas” ney Makkah region police ke tarjuman ke hawalay se bataya hai ke jummay ki shab taraveeh ke waqt hakkaam ko ittila mili ke aik namaloom ghair mulki shakhs Masjid al Haram ki balai manzil se Mataaf ke sehan mein kood gaya. zameen par girtay hi is ki wafaat ho gayi. mutwafi ka jsd khaki hospital muntaqil kar diya gaya hai jahan is ki shanakht aur balai manzil se koodnay ke asbaab jan-nay ke liye tehqiqaat jari hain. hakkaam is baat par herat ka izhaar kar rahay hain ke mutwafi ney balai manzil par aahinii jangla honay ke bawajood kyonkr chhalang lagai. Mutwafi ki umar 26 saal batayi jati hai jo aik nav muslim hai. is ney Masjid al Haram ki teesri manzil se kood kar apni jaan day di. is se qabal bhi feb 2017 mein aik Saudi shakhs ney khanah kaaba ke samnay khud par gasoleen chidak kar khud ko aag laga kar khud Suzi ki koshish ki thi taham sikoriti hakkaam ney is par qaboo pa liya tha aur se intahi iqdaam karne se baz rakha tha. isi terhan 17 feb 2015 ko bhi aik Asiankhatoon ney isi muqam se kood kar khud kashi ki thi.
878.title: Masjid e Haram mein khudkushi karne wala French navjawan jaan ki baazi hargya

news_detail: Jammu & Kashmir ke navjawan Farooq Darr ne 50 lakhs rupay ki peshkash thukradi, yeh peshkash’ Colours’ Television Channel par paish kiye janey walay Bollywood adakar Salman Khan ke Reality show ”Bigg Boss” ke Producer ne Farooq Darr ko ki hai. Belgam se talluq rakhnay walay Farooq Darr ko is waqt shohrat mili thi jab Bharti fouj ke aik ohdedar ne maqboza Kashmir mein pathrao se bachney ke liye usay jeep ke bumper se bandh kar usay insani dhaal banaya tha. Farooq Darr kwansani dhaal bananay aur Bharti fouj ki Bar barriat par duniya bhar ki insani haqooq ki tanzeemen cheekh uthi theen aur unhon ne zabardast ehtijaj kya tha. roznama’ hindu’ mein shaya aik khabar ke mutabiq isi navjawan ko Salman Khan ke Reality show Bigg Boss season 11 mein shirkat ke liye programme ke producer ki janib se peshkash ki gayi ke woh is programme ka hissa banin, is peshkash par Farooq Darr ka kehna hik_h Bigg Boss season 11 mein shirkat ke liye inhen guzashta saal July mein 50 lakhs rupay ki peshkash ki gayi thi taham unhon ne yeh peshkash thukradi. Colours TV Channel ke numaindon ne usay’ qiyaas aarai’ qarar diya taham Farooq Darr ke id-daa ki nah hi toseeq ki aur nah hi tardeed. reyasti haqooq insani commission ne Farooq Darr ko is harkat se pohanchi zehni o jismani aziat par 10 lakhs rupay ke muawza ki adai ki sifarish ko hukoomat jammu o Kashmir ne guzashta November mein thukradi thi. yaad rahay ke Farooq Darr ko insani dhaal bananay walay Major Gogoi ko guzashta mah 23 tareekh ko aik muslim larki ke sath hotel mein rangay hathon pkrhlya gaya tha aur un ke khilaaf aik muqadma bhi darj karliya gaya
901.title: Insani dhaal banaye janey walay navjawan ne Bigg Boss mein shirkat ki peshkash thukradi?

news_detail: FIFA  World Cup jitna bada Tournament hai itna hi bada inaam bhi rakha gaya hai, mega event ka final jeetnay wali team ko 3 crore 80 laakh dollars ki raqam bataur inaam di jayi gi. FIFA World Cup khelon ki duniya ka sab se bada muqaabla hai, yeh sirf khail nahi balkay trophy par qabza jamanay ki jung hai jis mein 32 aalmi teamon mein zor ka joor parre ga. Mega event jeetnay wali team par inamaat ki barsaat ho gi jis mein 3 crore 80 laakh dollars ka inaam bhi shaamil hai taham final harnay wali team bhi 2 crore 80 laakh dollars ki haq daar thehray gi. tournament mein majmoi tor par 40 crore dollars ke inamaat taqseem kiye jayen ge .

FIFA  ney France World Cup 1998 mein 103 million dollars kharch kiye they jin mein champions ko di gayi raqam bhi shaamil thi. bees badas baad yeh raqam 791 million dalrtk poanch gayi jo aaj ke lehaaz se 5340. 98 crores Hindustani rupay ke mumasil hai. Rusia mein honay walay muqaabla mein FIFA, Brazil 2014 muqablon mein di gayi raqam se 40 feesad ziyada kharch kar raha hai jahan majmoi inamaat ki rqomat 576 million dollar 3889. 26 crore Hindustani rupay taq poanch gaye they. 2018 ke muqablon mein FIFA qualify honay wali 32 teamon mein jumla 40 crore dollar yani taqriban 2700. 87 crore Hindustani rupay kharch kar raha hai jo 2014 World cup teamon mein taqseem kiye gaye 358 million dollar ke maqabil 12 feesad zayed hai. Rusia mein mabaqi 391 million dollars deegar madaat jaisay team ki tayari, club binft programmes aur deegar shaamil hain. group stage mein hissa lainay wali har team ko kam از kam 8 million dollars yani 54. 01 crore Hindustani rupay milein ge ( har team ko tournament ki tayari ke liye izafi 1. 5 million dollars yani Hindustani 10. 12 crore rupay milein ge. (Team ki tayari ki raqam ko 400 million dollars ke akhrajaat mein shaamil nahi kya gaya hai), agar aik team 16 round mein pishrft karti hai to usay 4 million dollars yani Hindustani 27 crore rupay zayed milein ge. is terhan pehlay naak oot stage taq har team ka hissa 12 million dollars yani Hindustani 81. 02 crore rupay ka hissa hoga. quarter faynls mein naak oot honay wali har team ko izafi 4 million dollars yani Hindustani 27 crore rupay izafi milein ge. yani is marhala mein har team ko 16 million dollars yani108. 03 crore rupay milein ge. Semi final mein shikast se dochar honay wali teamon ka hissa 46 million dollars hoga jis mein teesray number par anay wali team ko 24 million dollars yani Hindustani 162. 05 crore rupay milein ge jabkay chouthay number par anay wali team ko 22 million dollars yani 148. 54 crore rupay milein ge. World Cup chmpyn team ko 38 million dollars yani 256. 58 crore rupay aur runners up team ko 28 million dollars yani Hindustani 189. 06 crore rupay milein ge.

Agarchay World Cup, football muqablon ka sab se bada muqaabla hai taham English Premier League aur UEFA champions league mein di jaaney wali inaami rqomat ke maqabil kuch bhi nahi hai. English Premier League ney 2017-18 session mein apni 20 teamon mein 2. 9 billion dollars yani Hindustani 12765. 79 crore rupay ada kya jabkay UEFA ney guzashta muqablon mein 1.6 billion dollars yani Hindustani 10803. 51 crore rupay taqseem kya.

FIFA  ki aamdani ka sab se bada zareya broad casting haqooq ki hawalgi hai. FIFA  maliyati report 2014 ke mutabiq World Cup 2014 ke douran haasil 4. 8 billion dollars mein sirf TV haqooq se hi 2. 43 billion dollars haasil hue they. FIFA  ki aamdani ka dosra bada zareya marktng haqooq se haasil aamdani hai. jo chaar saal qabal 1. 53 billion dollars thi. brazil mein muqablon ke douran ticketon ki faroqt se 530 million dollars ki aamdani hui thi. FIFA  ney haqooq maheman nawazi se 180 million dollars aur laysnsng rights se 110 million dollar seen ki aamdani haasil ki.
915.title: FIFA World Cup: Hissa lainay wali teamon ke waaray nyaare

news_detail: Shaam ke Deir ez-Zorshehar mein shiddat pasand tanzeem ‘ISIS’ ke aik hamla mein bsharalasd ki fouj ke brigid 11 ke sarbarah major general Ali alhsin aur tees deegar fojion ko halaak kardiya gaya hai. Shami hukoomat ke haami social media safhaat par hafata ke roz post ki gayi khabar mein kaha gaya ke insani haqooq observatory ny tasdeeq ki hai aur kaha hai ke Deir ez-Zor Governaorate ke shehar Abu Kamal mein ISIS aur Asad Nawaz malaysia jis mein hizab Allah aur dosray asiayi aur irani jangju shaamil hain ke darmain ghmsan ki jung jari hai. Observatory ke mutabiq fariqain ke darmain taaza larai mein brigid commander sameit 30 sarkari fouji halaak hogaye hain. khayaal rahay ke shaam mein kisi bhi brigid ke sarbarah ka taqarrur bsharalasd barah e raast karte hain aur field mein yeh fouj ka aala tareen ohda tasawwur kya jata hai. social media par anay wali khabron mein bataya gaya hai ke maqtool Shami fouji Afsar Ali alhsin Tartus Governorate ke Aldarikash shehar se talluq rakhtay hain
929.title: ISIS ke hamlay mein asdi fouj ka Brigade Commander aur 30 sipahi halaak

news_detail: Brazil mein aik navzaidah bachi ko 7 ghanton baad bchalyagya jisay is ke afraad khandan ney zindah dfnadya tha. barazili police ney Mato Grasso State mein Xingo National Park mein desi bachi ko dafan kiye janay ke 7 ghanton baad qabar khoud kar bchalya. Canarana town mein matti ke neechay 7 ghanton taq be kafan dafan rehne ke bawajood bachi ki sansen chal rahi theen. muqami khabar rasa idaron ke mutabiq police ko aik anjaan shakhs ney ittila di thi jis par fori karwai karte hue 50 snti meter garhay mein dafan bachi ko nikaal liya gaya hai. maan ki nani ko girftar karte hue is par qatal ka muqadma dair kya gaya hai. state prosecutor Paulo Robertu do Prado ney ae f pi ko bataya ke hum tahaqeeq kar rahay hain ke aaya yeh shirkhwar ko maarny ki mobayyana koshish thi ya phir woh samjhi ke bachi mar chuki hai. Kamayura tribe se talluq rakhnay walay khandan ney police ko bataya ke bachi ki 15 sala maa ke mangal ko bachi ke janam dainay ke baad woh farsh se takra gayi thi aur woh kuch halchal nahi kar rahi thi is liye yeh samgha gaya ke woh mar chuki hai aur usay muqami rasomaat ke mutabiq dafan kardiya gaya. taham bachi ko janam dainay wali maan ki umar aur navzaidah ke baap ki janib se bachi ko apni aulaad tasleem se inkaar karne par police ka shuba barh gaya. bachi ko bacha lene ke baad Boa Agua Hospital ke intensive care muntaqil kardiya gaya. police ney bachi ki maa aur is ki nani ko hirasat mein le liya tha aur phir baad azan inhen raha kardiya gaya
811.title: Zindah dafnayi gayi navzaidah bachi ko 7 ghanton baad bchalya gaya

news_detail: Mumbai. Wazeer e azam Narendra Modi ko qatal karne Maoist ki saazish ke baray mein maharashra police ke daawa par BJP ki Haleef Shiv Sena ne sawal uthatay hue kaha ke yeh durust nahi lagta. yaad rahay ke maharashra police ke is daaway aur is zimn mein haqooq insani ke activest ki girftari ke baad markazi wazeer e dakhla Rajnath Singh ne Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki security ko mazeed mustahkam bananay guzashta dinon aik aala sathi ijlaas bhi talabb kya tha jabkay oppostion partiyon ne usay Narendra Modi ki ghatti maqboliat ko dekhte hue awaami hamdardi ke husool ki shobadaa baazi par mhmol kya tha. NCP sarbarah Sharad Pawar ne ilzaam aed kya ke BJP hamdardi haasil karne’ ‘ dhamki ke maktoob’ ‘ ka khail khail rahi hai

Shiv Sena ke tarjuman’ Saamana’ ke idaria mein kaha gaya ke inhen (Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Chief Minister Maharashtra Fadnavis) ko qatal karne ki saazish, pur asraar aur aik Khaufnaak film ki kahani lagti hai. Maoist ke maktoob ke matan ke is mafhuum ka hawala dete hue ke’ Modi ne 15 reyaston mein hakoomaten qaim karne mein kamyaab hogaye, agar yeh yun hi jari rahay ga to tanzeem mushkil mein hogi, aur is terhan Modi ko khatam kar dena chahiye. yeh sab kuch police ne inkishaaf kya hai jo mazhaka khaiz hai. yeh kaha gaya ke maamla ko siyasi maqsad barari ke liye istemaal kya ja raha hai, mahireen ki janib se yeh kaha ja raha hai ke yeh saazish haqeeqi nahi lagti hai. Shiv Sena ne kaha ke Modi ki security, Israeli khufia agency mosad ki terhan mazboot o mustahkam hai aur kisi ke liye is mein daakhil hona haqeeqatan mumkin nahi hai. qabal azeen mister Sharad Pawar ne bhi maktoob ki sachaai par shuba zahir kya tha. congress party ne is masla par tnqidin ki hain aur usay maqboliat haasil karne ki aik nakaam koshish qarar dyaavr bohat se sawalaat uthaye hain.
827.title: Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish, Khaufnaak film ki kahani lagti hai: Shiv Sena

news_detail: Misar ki aik fouj daari adalat ney Maroof aalam deen Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi sadarnasheen International Union of Muslim Scholars ki Sahebzadi aur un ke shohar Engineer Hussam Khalf ko dehshat gardi ke ilzaam mein daidh mah ke liye hirasat mein rakhnay aur in se poochgach karne ka hukum diya hai. Misri nazaad qatri aalam deen Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki beti aur un ke shohar ko Misri police ney chand mah qabal misar ke aik sayahati maqam se hirasat mein liya tha. Allama Yousuf Qardawi Qatar mein panah liye hue hain. Al-Wast party se talluq rakhnay walay Hussam Khalf aur un ki ahliya par khilaaf qanoon jamaat se talluq, hukoomat ka takhtah ulatnay par uksaane, dehshat gard tanzeem ke liye fndz jama karne aur dehshat gardon ko asleha ki kharidari mein muawnat faraham karne jaisay ilzamaat Ayad kiye gaye hain. khayaal rahay ke Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki sahbzdi Ula hamza Al Qardawi aur un ke shohar engineer Hussam Khalf ko Misri fouj ney guzashta baras 23 June ko shumali sahili ilaqa se is waqt hirasat mein liya thajb woh eid ul fittar ki tateel guzar rahay they. misar ke aik sikoriti zareya ney bataya ke Ula hamza Qardawi Qatar aur misar dono ki shehriat rakhti hain aur woh kayi saal taq qahira mein qatri sifarat khanah mein khidmaat injaam day chuki hain. Allama Qardawi ke wakeel Ahmed abbu aala maazi ney –apne aik Sabiqa bayan mein kaha tha ke un ki moklh Ula hamza aur un ke shohar par khilaaf qanoon qaim kardah jamaat se talluq aur Ikhwan almuslimoon ki maali muawnat ke ilzamaat Ayad kiye gaye hain. aik sawal ke jawab mein wakeel ney kaha ke tafteesh ke douran dono miyan biwi ney –apne oopar Ayad ilzamaat ki nifi ki hai ke un ka hizab ul wast ya Ikhwan almuslimoon se koi talluq hai. shadi ke baad se Ula hamza Qardawi ziyada arsa misar hi mein muqeem rahi hain taham woh Qatar bhi aati jati hain. Albata un ke bhai aur waalid bohat kam misar mein qiyam kar sakay. Ula Meh Qardawi ke teen betay aur do betiyan hain. aik beta misar mein engineer hai jab ke barri beti shadi ke baad America mein muqeem hai aur deegar bachay America mein zair e taleem hain. misar ke sath Saudi Arbia , bahrain aur mutahidda arab amarat ney dehshat gardon ki himayat ka ilzaam aed karte hue 5 June 2017 ko Qatar se apne taluqaat munqita karliye they. charon mumalik ney apne daawa ki tayed mein ta haal shawahid o saboot paish nahi kiye jabkay Doha mutawatar un ilzamaat ki tardeed karta araha hai. Saudi Arbia ki zair qayadat group ney Qatar mein 9 afraad aur 12 Khairati idaron prd_hsht gurdon se talluq rakhnay ka ilzaam aed karte hain jis ko Qatar be bunyaad aur tohmat par mabni qarar deta hai. is fehrist mein Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ka bhi naam shaamil hai jo Ikhwan almuslimoon ke bohat bade himayati samjhay jatay hain. yaad rahay ke Misar mein Ikhwan almuslimoon ki muntkhiba hukoomat ko general seesi ney 2012 mein be dakhal karte hue misar ka nazam o nasq –apne control mein karliya hai aur muntkhiba Wazeer e Azam Mohammad Mursi sameit hazaron Ikhwani qaideen ko uqobat khaanoon mein thoons diya gaya hai. Saudi Arbia ney Egypt mein baghaawat ki khul kar tayed o himayat ki hai aur Mohammad Mursi ko be dakhal karne mein ahem kirdaar ada kya hai.
841.title: Allama Yousuf Al Qardawi ki dukhtar wo damaad tafteesh ke liye police ke hawalay

news_detail: Wazeer e azam hind nrindr Modi ney Bharti cricketer Virat Kohli se aik mah qabal liya’ fitness challenge’ poora kar dekhaya aur is ki video social media par share kar i, aaj subah jari honay wali yeh do minute ki video ab taq hazaron log dekh chuke hain.’ hum foot to India foot’ muhim ke silsila mein Sports Minister Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore ney khwahish zahir ki thi ke India ko foot hona chahiye jis ke baad Bharati Cricket ke captain Virat Kohli ney yeh challenge qubool karliya tha aur fitness ki aik video share kardi thi. sath hi Kohli ney likha tha keh’ ‘ mein ney challenge qubool karliya hai aur ab yeh challenge apni ahliya anoshka sharmaa, wazeer e azam nrindrmodi aur am s dhoni ko bhi deta hon’ ‘ ‘. Kohli ke is challenge ka ilm hotay hi Bharti wazeer e azam nrindr Modi bhi maidan mein kood parre aur twitter par likha ke ”challenge qubool kya, Virat! mein bhi apni video jald hi share karoonga”. aaj Modi ney fitness ki video share kar ke Virat ke challenge ko poora kar dekhaya. unhon ney subah saweray ki gayeen mashqon ke lamhaat, yoga, poudoun ke darmain baagh mein chehal qadmi aur saans lainay ki mashqon ko video ka hissa banaya. sath hi unhon ney yeh challenge agay berhate hue karnataka ke naye wazeer aala, tennis khilari monika btra, aur 40 saal se zayed Umar ke bahadur aayi pi s ohdedaron ko day diya. unhon ney mazeed kaha ke’ mein har hindustani se appeal karta hon ke woh roz kuch waqt apni fitness ke liye waqf karte hue kisi bhi aasan mashq ka intikhab karen, aap ko is ka zaroor misbet nateeja miley ga. Chief Minister karnataka mister Kumaraswami ney is challenge ke jawab mein Wazeer e Azam Modi se yeh kehte hue taied talabb ki ke woh karnataka ke’ fitness’ ke barey mein ziyada fikar mand hain. unhon ney tweet kya ke ”deer nrindr Modi jee meri sahet ke barey mein fikar karne par mein fakhr aur nihayat hi shukarguzar hoon, mera aiqaan hai ke jismani tandrusti sab ke liye ahem hai aur mein is maqsad ki taied karta hon. Yoga- trademill mere roz ke mamool ka hissa hai, hnoz mein meri riyasat ke development fitness ke barey mein ziyada fikar mand hon aur is ke liye aap ke taawun ka mutamanni hon.”
853.title: Wazeer e Azam Modi ka Chief Minister karnataka ko fitness ka challenge

news_detail: Haspanwi Wazeer e Azam ney samandari hudood mein ghair qanooni tor par daakhil honay walay 629 taarkin e watan ko malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat day di hai. mukhtalif mumalik se talluq rakhnay walay yeh Europe mein daakhil hona chahtay they lekin qareeb tareen malik italy ney inhen –apne malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat nahi di. italy ke baad maalta ki hukoomat ney inhen dakhlay ki ijazat nahi di jis ke baad Haspanwi Wazeer e Azam Pedro Sánchez ney insani hmdri ke izhaar ke tor par inhen malik mein dakhlay ki ijazat day di. Wazeer e Azam ney kaha ke un ka malik zeli sahrayi africi mumalik se talluq rakhnay walon se bhari kashti MS Aquarious ko mehfooz bandargaah faraham karen ge
864.title: 629 taarkin e watan ko Spain mein dakhlay ki ijazat

news_detail: Lo aap apne daam mein sayyad aagya hai ke misdaaq qanoon nafiz karne walay hi aaj qanoon ki zad mein aagaye. Humayunnagar Police Station ke Sub Inspector C.H Srikant aur Police Constable Mohammad Raheem Pasha ko Anti Corruption Bureau ney bees hazaar rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon giraftar karliya. tafseelaat ke bamawajib chand Jaria saal mah January mein captain claim par jaan lewa hamla ke silsila mein giraftar Saood amoodi ke bhai Mahmood amoodi ko yeh kehte hue harasan kya ja raha tha keh inhen bhi iqdaam qatal ke is muqadma mein makhoz kardiya jaye ga. shikayat kanandah Mahmood amoodi ka kehna hai ke inhen musalsal harasan kya ja raha tha aur 12 dinon taq ghair qanooni tor par hirasat mein bhi rakha gaya tha. un se ta haal 2 laakh rupay bhi wusool karliye gaye aur mazeed 50 hazaar rupay dainay par muqadma se kharij kardainay ki peshkash ki thi. Mahmood Ali amoodi ney police ki musalsal harasani aur rishwat talabi se aajiz aakar woh anti corruption Bureau se rujoo hue aur ohdedaron ke mahswara par dono police ohdedaron ko Mansahab Tank bridge ke neechay raqam dainay ke liye talabb kya. ae si bi ke ohdedaron ney dono ko raqam wusool karte hue rangay hathon giraftar karliya aur un ke qabza se rishwat mein di gayi raqam bhi bar aamad karli. ae si bi ney is khsoos mein aik muqadma darj karliya aur inhen ae si bi ki khusoosi adalat mein paish kya ja raha hai.
882.title: Humayun Nagar Police Station ke Sub Inspector aur Constable rishwat letay hue giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahboobia Government Junior College Hyderabad ki Taliba Reshman Jahan Begum ney inter midit imtehanaat mein 1000 ke munjmala 962 nishanaat haasil karte hue riyasat ke tamam sarkari Collegeon mein awwal maqam haasil kya hai. Sadar kal hind Majlis ittehaad almslmin o rukan parliment janab Asad Aldeen avisi ney party Headquarters ‘Darussalam’ mein Taliba ko mubarakbaad dete hue Darussalam Education and Relief Charitable Trust ka 15, 000 rupay ka check paish kya. Reshman Jahan Begum ney University College for Women Kothi mein bachelor of commerce mein dakhla lainay ki khwaahan hain. rukan parliment ney Reshman Jahan Begum ke zabardast muzahira ki sataish ki. Reshman Jahan ney janab Asad Aldeen avisi ko bataya ke woh grijoyshn ki takmeel ke baad woh chartrd accountant ban-na chahti hain. woh Mohammad Javed chemical supplier ki Dukhtar hain. Un ki behan ney bhi jo isi College ki Taliba theen 1000 ke munjmala 924 nishanaat haasil karte hue kamyabi haasil ki hai.
895.title: Sadar Majlis ney Intermediate ki topper Taliba ko check paish kya

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ke Prosecutor General neh mulk mein taasub ko sun-hwa dainay aur firqa waranah muhim joi karne walay anasir ke khilaaf sakht qanoon Manzoor kya hai. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq mumlikat mein firqa waranah naara baazi ki tayari, taasub aur mulk dushmani par mabni ltrichr tayyar karne aur usay dosaron taq pohanchanay walay anasir ko paanch saal qaid ya 30 lakh Riyal jurmana ya dono sazayen di ja sakain gi. Saudi hukkaam ka kehna hai ke internet ya social media ke zareya Saudi Arabia mein nizaam aam mein khlal daalnay, firqa wariyat ko farogh dainay, tasbat ko sun-hwa dainay, murawaja dainee aadaab wo aqdaar ke khilaaf kaam karne, shehrion ki privacy mein mudakhlat karne ya is terhan ke deegar juraim mein mulawis afraad ko un ke jurm ki hesiyat ke mutabiq qaid aur jrmane ya dono sazayen di ja sakain gi
907.title: Saudi Arabia mein firqa waranah sar garmion par paanch saal qaid 30 laakh Riyal jurmana

news_detail: Beshtar Muslim mumalik mein jummay ko Eid al Fitar hogi. kayi mumalik mein Halal shawaal ki Rwait saabit hogayi hai. Saudi Arabia mein shawaal ka chaand nazar aagaya hai jis ke baad kal eid hogi. Arab Tv ke mutabiq Saudi Arabia mein kal eid hogi jabkay sarkari elaan jald Nashar kya jaye ga. qutar, mutahidda arab amarat, Saudi Arbia , Indonesia, Turkey aur Malaysia un mumalik mein shaamil hain jahan Eid al Fitar jummay ko hogi. Doosri taraf Bharat aur Paktsan mein shawaal ka chaand nazar nahi aaya jis ke nateeja mein eid hafta 16 June ko hogi. New Zealand aur Australia mein bhi hafta ko hi eid hogi.
937.title: Saudi Arabia aur beshtar mumalik mein jummay ko Eid al Fitar

news_detail: Junoobi Africa ke darul-hukumat Cape Town ki Masjid mein chaako bardaar shakhs ke hamla mein 2 afraad jaan bahaq aur mutadid zakhmi ho gaye taham hamla aawar ko police ney goli maar kar halaak kardiya hai. police zaraye ke mutabiq chaako bardaar shakhs ney Cape Town ke qareebi qasbay Malmesbury mein Masjid mein logon par hamla kya, chaako ke waar se 2 afraad jaan bahaq, mutadid zakhmi hogaye jinhein tibbi imdaad faraham karne ke liye hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. waardaat ke waqt Masjid mein mojood afraad subah ki namaz ada karne mein masroof they taham police ney is waqea ki tafteesh shuru kar di hai. jis shakhs ney Cape Town Masjid mein qatal kya tha woh ajnabi tha aur panah ka taalib tha. Imran muqaddam jinhon ney bataya ke aik mahlook un ki cosuon ke shohar they, ittila di ke chaako bardaar chaharshanba ki shab Masjid pouncha jahan mahlook aitekaf mein they, un se aitekaf mein shaamil honay ki darkhwast ki. jab qaatil ney un ke behnoi ka gilah kaata tha is waqt mehv khawab they. police ney bataya ke Officers ke wahan pounchanay aur usay goli maardenay taq qaatil ney aik aur mutakif ko qatal aur kayi logon ko zakhmi kardiya.
953.title: Cape Town Masjid mein hamla, 2 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: Hyderabad. jumaraat ko Halal shawaal ki Adam Rwait ki toseeq ke baais Hyderabad mein Eid al Fitar hafta 16 June ko hogi. Shaher Hyderabad ki mukhtalif Eidgahoon aur Masajid mein salaat Eid al Fitar ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai. Eidgah Meer Alam mein salaat Eid al Fitar 10:00 bajey din hogi. Isi terhan Eidgah Amber Shah Baba Amberpet mein 10:00 bajay din, Eidgah Sanatnagar mein 9:00 bajay, qadeem Eidgah maidan First Lancer mein 9:15 bajay, Eidgah Ahl-e-Sunnat waljamaat Chilkalguda mein 8:15 bajay, Eidgah Bilali Hockey Ground Masabtank mein 8:30 bajay, Eidgah Pensionpura Langarhoz mein10:00 bajay, Eidgah Ujalay Shah mein 9:00 bajay, Eidgah Sanatnagar mein 9:00 bajay Eidgah Cantonment Secunderabad mein 9:30 bajay, Makkah Masjid Charminar mein 10:00 bajay, Jamia Masjid Muazzampura almaroof badi Masjid Mallepally mein 9:00 bajay, Masjid Bughdadi take Nampally mein 9:00 bajay aur Masjid Quba Nampally goods shade mein 6:00 bajay ada ki jaye gi. Jamiat Ahl-al-hadith ki janib se mukhtalif muqamat par salaat Eid al Fitar ka ihtimaam kya gaya hai, jis ke mutabiq Eidgah Kothhapet Barkas mein 7:15 bajay, NTR Stadium lower tankbund, Indra Park mein 7:00 bajay, Quli Qutub Shah stadium mein 7:15 bajay, Eidgah Ahl-al-hadith Qutub Shahi Yellampet, Medchal mein 8:00 bajay, Hockey Ground Aizah High School Chanchalguda mein 7:00 bajay Eidgah Ahl-al-hadith Chilkalguda mein 10:00 bajay, Owaisi Playground Golkonda mein 7:15 bajay ada ki jaye gi
816.title: Hyderabad mein salaat Eid al Fitar

news_detail: Funds ke ghalat istemaal par Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya Sara Netaneyahu par jaria hafta fard jurm aayed honay ka imkaan hai. Wazeer e Azam Israel aur un ki ahliya ke khilaaf  badunwaniyon ke kayi ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat jari hain. Sara Netaneyahu par ilzaam hai ke unhon ney bawarchi ki maujoodgi ko khufia rakh kar baher se khana mangawaya tha. unhon ne sawwa crore rupay ke khaane wazeer e azam house mein jealsaazi se mangwaye they. Ghair mulki Media ke mutabiq Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya aur wazeer e azam house ke mouattal Deputy Director General ko dhoka dahi ka yeh ilzaam saabit hojane par 5 baras qaid ki saza hosakti hai. Attorney General Avicahi Mandelbit aur State Prosecutor Shai Nitzen tawaqqa hai ke apne faisla ka elaan karenge ke mulk ki ahem shakhsiyat ki ahliya ke khilaaf qanooni karwai ki jaye gi ya nahi. Agarchay sarkari taur par is ziman mein koi faisla hunooz nahi kya gaya hai magar it-tila-aat yeh ishara deti hain ke Netinyahu ke wukla ke sath moahida ki nakami ki soorat mein Wazeer e Azam ki ahliya ko maakhoz kiya jaye ga. Mrs Netinyahu par jo aik child psychologist theen, Wazeer e Azam ki sarkari rehaish gaah par khaano ki adai mein tax dahindgaan ke funds ka ghalat istemaal karne ka ilzaam hai. Balfort Street ke ghar par bawarchion ki adam mojoodgi ka ta-assur dete hue yeh bawar karwaya ke qawaid ki khilaaf warzi mein bahar se khana mngwaya jata raha hai. ilzaam hai ke jealsaazi ke zareya Chefs aur Restaurants ko 359, 000 shackle ( 102, 000 Amrici $ ) ke orders dyie gaye. Reports ke mutabiq Netinyahu ke wukla ke sath mafahmat ki soorat mein fard jurm ka aayed kyajana moqoof hosktahe jis ke tehat inhen hukoomat ko istemaal shuda raqam wapas lotana hoga. bataya jata hai ke sara Netinyahu se kaha gaya ke maamlat darkhwast mein woh ibtida mein nis 200, 000 ( 56, 128 Amrici dollar ) ada karen jis ko unhon ney yeh kehte hue yklkht mustard kardiya ke raqam baazadai ki bajaye jail jana gawara karen gi. mrs Netinyahu ke wukla ney id-daa kya ke sara ney un ke akhrajaat ki tafseelaat ki nigrani ke liye Wazeer e Azam ke daftar aur Wazeer e Azam ki rahaish gaah ki maaliyati waa intezaami teamon par aetmaad kya aur woh is waqt la ilm theen ke woh aik jurm ka irtikaab kar rahi hain. unhon ney istadlaal paish kya ke is terhan woh jaan boojh kar jurm ka irtikaab nahi kya hai
837.title: Funds ka galat istemaal, Israeli wazeer e azam ki ahliya ku makhoz kiye janay ka imkaan

news_detail: Turkey ke sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan neh kaha hai ke Ankara ke ladaka tayyaron neh iraqi pahadi silsilay Qandil mein kurdistan workers party ke ijlaas ko nishana banaya. Turkey ka daawa hai ke ijlaas mein ghair qanooni Kurd party ke sarkardah askari rehnuma shareek they. Turkey neh Iran aur Iraq ki sarhad se milnay walay shumali Iraq mein kurdistan workers party ke Qandil pahadi silsila mein thikanon ko nishana bananay ki karwaiya taiz kar di hain. Ankara ka khayaal hai ke Qandil pahadi silsila mein kurdistan party ke sarKurdah askari rehnuma qiyam Pazeer hain. Turkish hukoomat ka mazeed kehna hai ke shumali Iraq se taqreeban tees kilometer ke faasla par Qandil pahadiyoon ke qareeb Turkish fouji dastay Iraq ke andar tainaat hain. channel 7 ko diye gaye aik interview mein ardgan ka kehna tha ke un ke ladaka tayyaron neh Qandil pahadi silsila mein kurdistan workers party ke ahem ijlaas jis mein sarKurdah askari rehnuma bhi shareek they ko nishana banaya hai. unhon neh kaha ke Turkish fouj is fazai hamlay mein honay walay jani aur maali nuqsaan se mutaliq tafseelaat chand ghanton baad jari kere gi. unhon neh mazeed kaha ke taaza tareen karwai mein hum neh kurdistan party ke ahem ijlaas ko nishana banaya hai. abhi hamein karwai ke nataij se mutaliq maloomat nahi milein, taham yeh baat yakeeni hai ke hum neh inhen nishana banaya hai. Turkey neh haal hi mein shumali Iraq mein Qandil pahadi silsila mein Kurdoon ke khilaaf zameeni karwaiyon mein izafah ka Andia zahir kya tha. ardgan ke bakol unhon neh haliya paish Raft se mutaliq irani sadar husn Rohani se tabadlah khayaal kiya tha jis mein dono rhnmaon neh ilaqai security ke tahaffuz ke liye bahami razamandi zahir ki thi. shumali Iraq mein Qandil pahadi silsila Iran aur Iraq ki sarhad ke qareeb waqay hai. Iraq ki markazi hukoomat un dinon kaafi had taq Iran ke zair asr hai. Turkey neh Kurd intahaa pasandon ke khilaaf Iraq mein mumkina karwai se mutaliq bghdad hukoomat se mazakraat ka silsila shuru kar rakha hai, taham un mazakraat ko May mein honay walay intikhab ke nateeja mein ban’nay wali nai hukoomat ke jari rakhnay se mutaliq faisla abhi nahi kya gaya. kurdistan workers party ke khilaaf Iraq mein ki jaaney wali taaza karwai do hazaar solah ke baad ki jaaney wali teesri sarhad paar karwai hai. Kurd malaysia jungjuon ke khilaaf pehli do karwaiya Turkey neh shumali shaam ke ilaqon mein ki theen. shaam mein karwai ke zariye Turkey neh apni junoob mashriqi sarhad ka bara ilaqa azad karaya tha.
848.title: Turkish ladaka tayyaron ki Kurd askriat pasandon ke thikanon par Iraq mein bombari

news_detail: Junoobi America ke mulk Venezuela ke dar-al-hukumat Caracas mein gas dhamaka ke nateeja mein 17 afraad Bashmole 8 bachay halaak hogaye jabkay paanch zakhmi hue hain, khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq dhamaka aik club mein aansogis device phatnay se sun-hwa. do groupon mein jhagrre mein 1 shakhs ney ansoo gas ka slender ko dhamaka se arhadya jis ke nateeja mein bhagdar mach gayi. national police ki ibtidayi report ke mutabiq 11 afraad dam ghatney se faut hogaye .

dhamaka ke o qat club mein 500 se zayed talaba mojood they jo pari grijoyshn party mein shareek they, aansogis device 2 groupon mein jhagrre ke douran phataa. police ney 7 afraad bashamool 2 minors kogrftarkrke tafteesh shuru kar di hai. tafteesh car ney bataya ke Aini shahideen ke mutabiq do na baligh talba mein se aik ney ansoo gas ke slender ko khol diya tha. ohdedaron ney tahaqeeq ka aaghaz kardiya hai aur club ko band kardainay ka hukum diya hai. club ke maalik ko bhi girftar karliya gaya hai. un par club mein hathyaar o golah barood ko club ke andar le janay se roknay ke qawaid par amal aawri mein nakami ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai
859.title: Venezuela: Caracas mein Nightclub mein gas dhamaka, 17 afrad halak

news_detail: Ghair mulki khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq darjanon Taliban askriat pasandon ney Kabul ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein shehrion aur sikoriti forces ke humrah Eid ul fittar ki namaz ada ki, Taliban ney aydgahon mein dakhla ke waqt –apne hathyaar sikoriti forces ke paas jama karaye aur adaigi namaz ke baad shehrion ke sath sath Afghan sikoriti forces se baghal geer hue aur un ke sath selfi banwaen. Kabul police ke tarjuman Hashmat Astakzai ney bataya ke Taliban askriat pasandon ko jatay hue un ke hathyaar wapas kardiye gaye, social media par zair e gardish tasaveer aur videos mein dekha ja sakta hai ke khushee ke is pur musarrat mauqa par shehri aur security ahelkaar Taliban se garam joshi se Eid mil rahay hain aur wahan mojood shehri un manazair ko –apne mobile phones mein aks band kar rahay hain. wazeh rahay ke Afghan saddar Ashraf ghanni se Eid ulfittar ke mauqa par jung bandi ka elaan kya tha jis ke rad-e-amal mein Taliban ney bhi says fire karte hue Eid ke tenun din hamlay nah karne ka ehad kya tha.
876.title: Taliban ney Kabul mein security ahelkaron ke humrah Eid manayi

news_detail: Gaadi mein maujood rocket dhamaka se phatt pada. sakht geer jangju group ISIL ney is khudkush bomb hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar li hai .

Afghanistan ke soobah Nangarhar mein Taliban aur sikoriti forces ki mulaqaat ke douran dhamaka ke nateeja mein kam az kam 20 afraad halaak hogaye. bain al aqwami media reports ke mutabiq Afghan hukoomat aur Taliban ki janib se Eid ul fittar ke mauqa par jung bandi ke elaan ke baad Taliban askriat pasandon ney Kabul sameit malik ke deegar shehron mein daakhil hokar awaami maqamat par shehrion aur sikoriti forces se baghal geer hokar inhen Eid ki mubarakbaad di. sikoriti forces se mulakaton ke douran Taliban askriat pasand ghair musallah they taham Nangarharmein Eid milnay ke douran zor daar dhamaka huwa jis ke nateeja mein kam az kam 20 afraad halaak aur mutadid zakhmi hogaye. police zaraye ka kehna hai ke dhamaka is waqt huwa jab Taliban ke muqami ohdedar Afghan security ehalkaron se Eid mil rahay they ke gaadi mein maujood rocket phatnay se dhamaka hogaya, jis gaadi mein dhamaka huwa woh Taliban ki thi jo mulaqaat ke douran hujoom mein khadi thi.

Al Arabia dot com ke mutabiq Afghanistan ke mashriqi soobay Nangarhar mein haftay ko Eid ke dosray roz jung bandi ke douran mein Taliban aur musallah afwaj ke aik ijtima mein car bomb dhamakay mein 26 afraad halaak aur 54 zakhmi hogaye hain. sakht geer jangju group ISIL ney is khudkush bomb hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar li hai. ISIL ke bomber ney apni barood se bhari car ko aisay waqt mein dhamakay se uraya hai jab Afghan security forces aur Taliban jngjoon ke darmain Eid ulfittar ke mauqa par pehli martaba jung bandi jari thi. woh dar-ul-hukoomat Kabul sameit mukhtalif shehron mein aapas mein ghul mil rahay they aur apne apne smart phones mein yeh khush gawaar manazair selfie ki shakal mein mehfooz kar rahay they. Nangarhar ke governor ke tarjuman ataa hamza Allah khojyani ney torkhm aur Jalalabad ke darmain shahrah par waqay qasbay Ghazi Aminullah Khan mein is car bomb dhamaka ki tasdeeq ki hai. unhon ney pehlay yeh kaha tha ke dhamaka rocket grenade ke phatnay se huwa hai. unhon ney bataya hai ke mahlukeen aur zakhmion mein Taliban, security forces ke ahelkaar aur aam shehri shaamil hain. woh Nangarhar ke zila Rudat mein waqay is qasbay mein mil jal kar jung bandi ka jashnn Minar hai they. ISIL ney is hamlay ki zimmay daari qubool kar ney ka daawa kya hai. is jangju group ki online khabar-rasan agency Amaq ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke is car bomb hamlay ka hadaf Afghan forces ka ijtima tha lekin is ney mazeed koi tafseel nahi batayi. Afghan Taliban ney Eid ke pehlay teen ayyaam ke douran mein afgha noon forces ke khilaaf jung bandi ka a ellan kya tha aur october 2001 mein America ki Afghanistan par fouji charhai ke baad pehli martaba Afghan Security forces par hamlay nah karne ka wada kya tha. Albata unhon ney kaha tha ke woh America ki qayadat mein Nato fojion par hamlay jari rakhen ge. un se qabal Afghan sadar Ashraf Ghani ney ramadaan al mubarak ki 27 tareekh se Taliban ke khilaaf police aur fouj ki karwaiya aath roz ke liye roknay ka elaan kya tha. is jung bandi ka guzashta mangal se aaghaz huwa tha. Albata unhon ney wazeh kya tha ke ISIL aur dosray jangju groupon ke khilaaf karwai jari rakhi jaye gi. Nangarharmein is khudkush car bomb dhamaka ki ittila se qabal saddar Ashraf ghanni ney Taliban ke sath jari jung bandi mein tosee ka elaan kya tha. unhon ney aik nashri taqreer mein Taliban se bhi kaha tha ke woh apni teen roza jung bandi mein mazeed tosee karen aur hukoomat se aman mazakraat ka aaghaz karen. Taliban ki jung bandi ka jummay ko Eid ke pehlay roz aaghaz huwa tha aur is ki muddat itwaar ko khatam horahee hai. Eid ke pehlay doroz mein Taliban jngjoon, Afghan security forces aur shehrion ney jung bandi par bharpoor andaaz mein achay jazbaat ka izhaar kya hai. unhon ney dar-al-hakoomat Kabul aur dosray shehron mein mushtarqa ijitmaat munaqqid kiye aur aik dosray se khush gawaar mood mein muanqa kya aur baahum mil kar selfie banai hain. check points par bhi Afghan security forces ke ehalkaron ney karon aur motor cyclon par shehron ka rukh karne walay Taliban ka khirmqdm kya hai aur unhein Eid ki mubarak baad paish ki hai
888.title: Afghanistan ke soobah Nangarhar mein dhamaka, 26 afraad halaak

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Minister Telangana mister ke Chandra shikhr rau naay yeh bayan karte hue ke umoor kharja, difaa, kabeer iqtisadi aur aalmi umoor jaisay mhazon par malik kayi challenges ka saamna kar raha hai, sahet, taleem, shehri o dehi taraqiyaat aur zarayi shobo mein kaam karne Riyasaton ko azaadi dainay ka mutalba kya. unhon naay markaz se yeh bhi khwahish ki ke markazi sponser kardah schemes sakhtiyon ko daur kya jaye jo reyasti hukoomat ke iqdamaat par rokkk lagati hain. Rashtrapati Bhavan ke  cultural center mein NITI Ayog ki gornng council ke chouthay ijlaas se khitaab karte hue mister Chandrashekar Rao naay kaha ke malik ka farogh is ki Riyasaton ke farogh mein Muzmer hai, is liye taizi se farogh panay wali Riyasaton ki markaz se izafi funds ki muntaqili nah bhi ki jaye to kam az kam tax mara-aat ke zareya hosla afzai ki jani chahiye. unhon naay kaha ”Hamein zarayi aur mulhiqa shobo par marboot shoba ke tor par tavajja markooz karne ki zrorrt hai. Dairy, Poultry, Goat and Sheeps rearing aur fisheries ko income tax se mustasna karne ki zaroorat hai. kisanon ki aamdani ko dugna karne ke hissa ke tor par mgnrega ke fndz ko kisanon ke 50% shiraakat daari ke hissa ziraat se marboot kya jana chahiye taakay un ki sarmaya daari ki laagat ko kam kya jaye.” Chief Minister naay ijlaas mein hukoomat Telangana ki janib se mukhtalif shoba jaat khaas kar ziraat aur aab paashi ke ilawa deegar mulhiqa shobo mein kiye jaaney walay iqdamaat par roshni daali.
917.title: Sahet, taleem, ziraat aur shahri wo dehi taraqiyaat mein Riyasaton ko azaadi dainay Chandrashekar Rao ki wakalat

news_detail: Saudi Arbia aur Qatar ke darmyan badhti munafirat ab khail ke maidan mein bhi dekhnay ko mil rahi hai. yun to dono mumalik ke darmain kuch barson se talkhiyon mein izafah hota ja raha tha magar guzashta baras Saudi Arbia ney, UAE, Egypt aur Bahrain ke sath mil kar Qatar se –apne safarati taluqaat munqita karliye hain aur June 2017 mein hi apne sifarat karon ko talab karliya tha .

Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Saudi Arab ki Football Federation ney Qatar ke mlkiati Channel ‘be IN’ sports ke khilaaf Football ki bain al aqwami Federation Association ( FIFA ) ko bazabta taur par shkayti darkhwast dair kar di hai. is channel ko roos mein khailay janay walay aalmi cupp 2018 hamza ke khusoosi haqooq haasil hain aur woh Saudi Arab aur is ki qayadat ke khilaaf siyasi noiyat ke paighamaat Nashar kar raha hai. Saudi Federation ka kehna hai ke yeh channel siyasat ko khail se gudmud kar raha hai aur awam mein munafirat phelanay ke liye siyasi noiyat ke paighamaat ki tashheer kar raha hai. yeh channel maazi mein Aljazeera sports ke naam se kaam kar raha tha .

is ney apni shikayat mein kaha hai ke is qatri channel ney Saudi Arabia aur Rusia ke darmiyan aalmi cup ke iftitahi match mein khail ki tamam aqlaqiaat ki khuli khilaaf warzi ki thi aur is ke paish car aur tajzia car ney FIFA ke qawaneen ko baalaye taaq rakh diya tha. un qawaneen mein khail ko siyasat se allag rakhnay par zor diya gaya hai. shikayat mein FIFA par zor diya gaya hai ke woh qatri channel ke khilaaf pabandiyan Aayed kere, is ko khail ke istehsal se rokay aur khail aur is ki ikhlaqiaat ko siyasi taasub ki nazar honay se bachaaye
931.title: Saudi Football Federation ki ‘be IN’ Sport Channel ke khilaaf FIFA ko shikayat

news_detail: Israel ke aik sabiq wazeer Gonen Segef ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Aayed kar di gayi hai. unhein guzashta mah maghribi Africa ke malik gani mein dakhla ki ijazat nah milnay par Israel wapsi par girftar kar liya gaya tha. Israel ki dakhli salamti ki zimma daar agency Shin Bet ney somwaar ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke 62 sala Segef ke khilaaf jummay ko jung ke zamana mein dushman ko maloomat faraham karne aur ryastِ Israel ke khilaaf jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Aayed kiya gaya tha. tehqiqaat se yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke unhon ney Iran ki intelli jins ke liye jasoosi ki thi .

Shin Bet ka kehna hai ke sabiq wazeer nigeria mein irani sfar t- khanah se rabita mein rahay they. woh is africi malik mein bhi kuch arsa muqeem rahay they. baad mein unhon ney Iran ka safar kya tha aur –apne sath rabita rakhnay walay irani intelli jins ke agent se mulaqaat ki thi. is ney bayan mein mazeed kaha hai ke Segef ney irani ayjnton ko tawanai ki market, Israel mein security tansibaat, siyasi aur security idaron ki imaarton aur hukkaam ke barey mein maloomat faraham ki theen. doosri janib mister Segef ke wukla ka kehna hai ke un ke mokl par Aayed kardah ilzamaat ki ziyada tar tafseel riyasat ke nafiz kardah black out mein haasil ki gayi hai. is hawala se bohat thori maloomat faraham ki gayi hain aur is terhan aik gum raah kin ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki gayi hai. un ka kehna hai ke fard eِ ilzaam ke mawaad se aik mukhtalif tasweer samnay aati hai jabkay is ki mukammal tafseel ko afsha nahi kya gaya hai aur is ko rokkk liya gaya hai
943.title: Sabiq Israeli wazeer Gonen Segef par Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard e jurm

news_detail: Rusia mein jari Football World Cup mein itwaar ke roz Brazil aur Switzerland ka match 1.1 se barabar raha to yeh 1978  ke baad pehla mauqa tha jab Brazil world cupp mein apna iftitahi match nah jeet saka. is se qabal 1978  ke football world cup mein Brazil aur Sweden ney 1.1 Goal kya tha. Itwaar ke roz agarchay Brazil apne aik difai khiladi ki ghalti se jeet ko yakeeni nahi bana saka taham Brazil ka aik aur khiladi Gabriel jiss internet par apni aik purani tasweer ke sabab logon ki tavajja ka markaz ban gaya. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq English Club Manchester City ke liye forward ke taur par khailnay wala yeh khiladi 1997  mein paida huwa. Gabriel ki internet par samnay anay wali tasweer 2014  ki hai. Yeh woh hi saal tha jab un ke mulk ney football ke World Cup ki maizbani ki thi. Dilcehsp baat yeh hai ke Gabriel us waqt Sadkon par bataur painter kaam karta tha. Saal 2016 mein Gabriel Olympic Games mein shirkat karne wali Brazil ki us football team ka hissh tha jis ney sonay ka tamgha haasil kya. Ab woh Rusia mein honay walay Football World Cup ke liye hatmi 23 rukni team mein jagah bananay mein bhi kamyaab raha. Social Media ki mukhtalif web siton par Gabriel ki bohat si tasaveer phail chuki hain. un mein Instagram aur Twitter par post tasaveer sab se ziyada mashhoor hain. May 2017  mein is ki tasaveer ko hazaron ki tadaad mein layik aur share kya gaya,
964.title: Sadkon par kaam karne wala Painter Football World Cup ka khiladi ban gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi khandan ney wazeer umoor kharja mohtarma Swshma Swaraj se mutalba kya ke Damam, Saudi Arbia mein mushtaba haalat mein faut hojane wali tehseen Sultana ki mout ki tehqiqaat ki jaye. mutawaffia ki behan Parveen Sultana ney id-daa kya ke un ko shuba hai ke un ki behan gharelo tashadud ka shikaar hui hogi aur shohar ney hi usay qatal kardiya ho. unhon ney bataya ke chaar saal qabal un ki behan ki shadi Mohammad Umar se hui thi. shadi ke fori baad hi un ki behan ko ssrali rishta daar harasan karna shuru kardiya tha aur jahez talabb karne lagey they. aziat rasani se aajiz aakar un ki behan –apne shohar ke paas chali gayi thi lekin wahan bhi woh zehni o jismani aziat kashkar banti gayi. un ke shohar inhen zado kob bhi karta tha. Parveen ney bataya ke un ki behan se aakhri martaba woh 3 June ko baat hui thi aur un ki behan ney phone par shohar ki harasani ki shikayat ki thi. is ke baad se behan se rabita qaim nahi ho saka jis se woh ghabra kar apni behan ke parosi ko phone kyajs par inhen pata chala ke tehseen Sultana ki mushtaba haalat mein mout hochuki hai. Parveen ney bataya ke inhen shuba hai ke shohar Mohammed Umar ney hi qatal kya hoga. unhon ney bataya ke hum ney Saudi Arbia mein hindustani sifarat khanah aur wazeer kharja mohtarma Swshma Swaraj ko maktubaat rawana karte hue un ki behan ki mout ki tehqiqaat krwane ka mutalba kiya hai. Saudi Arbia mein hindustani sifarat khanah ke ahdidaro n ney inhen is maamla ki jaanch karne aur insaaf dilanay ka wada kya hai. Parveen ney mutalba kiya hai ke un ki behan ko insaaf dilaya jaye aur laash ko Hyderabad wapas laane mein madad ki jaye.
812.title: Saudi Arbia mein faut Hyderabadi khatoon ki mout ki tahaqeeq karne sshma se mutalba

news_detail: Srikakulam. zila Srikakulam  ke summa pait mandal ke moza Yerramukam mein itwaar ko jungli reechh ke hamla mein aik 50 sala khatoon halaak aur deegar 7 zakhmi hogaye. zakhmi 7 afraad mein 4 ki haalat naazuk batee jati hai. barham dehation ne reechh ka taqub karte hue usay maar Dala . Mandasa mandal ke moza Patli ke qareeb reechh ko ghair kar mardeya gaya. mtofih ki shanakht bayi peli armila saakin Yerramukam ki hesiyat se ki gayi. yeh saneha itwaar ko subah ki awleen sa-aton mein muzafaat mein paish aaya. zaraye ke bamwajjib reechh ne armila par is waqt hamla kardiya jab woh kachra gaon ke bahar phainknay jarahi thi. reechh ke hamla ko dekhte hue mtofih ke shohar aur deegar dehati usay bachanay wahan puhanche aur reechh ku bhagane ki koshish ki taham un mein 7 log hamla mein zakhmi hogaye jinhein Palasa Government Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. armila ilaaj ke douran jaanbar nah hosaki. shadeed zakhmi 4 afraad ko baad azan king george Hospitals Visakapatnammuntaqil kardiya gaya. police ne aik muqadma darj karkay tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai
828.title: Reechh ke hamla mein khatoon halaak, 7 zakhmi

news_detail: Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq North Korea ke sadar Kim Jong-Un Singapore pahonch gaye. Changi Airport par Un ke pur tapaak istaqbaal ke liye Singapore ke wazeer kharja Vivian Balakrishnan sameit aala hukkaam maujood they. Kim Jong-Un aaj Singapore ke wazeer e azam Lee Hsien Loong se bhi mulaqaat karen ge. mulaqaat mein dotrfh bahami taluqaat aur Amrici sadar Donald Trump se 12 June ko honay wali tareekhi mulaqaat ke hawalay se tabadlah khayaal kiya jaye ga .

Singapore ke khobsorat jazeeray Sentosa ke five star hotel Kapila mein Amrici sadar Donald Trump se North Korea ke sadar Kim Jong-Un ke darmain 12 June ko honay wali tareekhi mulaqaat ke liye intizamaa ko hatmi shakal day di gayi hai. is mulaqaat ke liye guzashta kayi mah se safarti satah par mazakraat jari they aur bahami razamandi se mulaqaat ki tareekh tey karne ke baad bhi ghair yakeeni soorat e haal barqarar rahi jab ke Amrici sadar aik baar mulaqaat mansookh bhi kar chukay they .

Singapore ke Airport par media se guftagu ke douran North Korea ke sarbarah Kim Jong-Un Amrici sadar se mulaqaat ko tareekhi qarar dete hue khittay par is ke misbet asraat ke liye pur azm dikhayi dete hain. idhar Americi sadar Donald Trump mulaqaat ke nataij ke hawalay se ziyada pُramid nahi jis ka izhaar woh jee seven ijlaas ke ekhtataam par media se guftagu ke douran kar chuke hain.
852.title: Kim Jong-Un ki Amrici sadar se tareekhi mulaqaat ke liye Singapore aamad

news_detail: New Delhi. Mukhtalif Social Networking sites par ” Keypad dehshat gardon” ki janib se post kiye jany walay keena parwar mawaad ke nikaalne par gaur karne wizarat dakhala mein peer ko aik aala satahih ijlaas munaqqid hoga, yeh nafrat ke sodagar afwahen pheilatay hue aur kisi waqea ko firqa waranah rang dete hue law and order masla paida karne internet par zeher ugalte hain. Ijlaas ki sadarat Secretary wizarat dakhila Mr. Rajiv Gauba  karen ge aur wizarat Electronics and Information Tecnology ke sarkardah ohdedar, mehakuma Telecommunications aur Security Agencies ke sath sath Jammu & Kashmir ke ohdedar bhi shirkat karen ge. Ohdedaron ke mutabiq ijlaas mein SEcurity Agencies ko is laanat se nimatnay qanoon information tecnology ki daf-aat par amal daraamad par gaur vkhoz hogajs mein f aayi are ka indraaj, Service Providers ke ishtiraak se ibtidayi marhala mein hi nafrat angaiz mawaad ko nikaal dainay aur aajilaana qanooni karwaiyon ko yakeeni banana shaamil hai taakay yeh dosaron ke liye aik sabaq ho.”Keypad dehshat gardon” par qaboo panay ke khayaal ke pas parda maqsad yeh hai ke SEcurity ayjnsiz haqeeqi bandoqon ko istemaal karne walay dehshat gardon ko pakarney aur un ka khatima karne se ziyada un par tavajja markooz kere jo Keypad istemaal karte hue sarkari macinary ke khilaaf jung chairr rakhi hai. aik ohdedar ne khayaal zahir kya ke internet majazi maidan jung hai, jahan aik khonriz jung ladi jati hai magar alfaaz se, jis ke asraat navjawan ke Izhan par parte hain. ohdedaron ne kaha ke yeh naya maidan jung riwayati hathyaaron se daur hai aur naye daur ke ladake waadi ya beron malik kahin se kmpotr ya Smart Phones istemaal karte hue apne gharon ke andar morcha band hokar ya kisi qareebi kife ya sarrak ke kinare se galiyo mein nikal kar jung shuru kardete hain. samgha jata hai ke is ijlaas mein Social Media par ki janey wali posts par kari nazrain rakhnay ke naye tareeqa car ikhtiyar karne balkay murawaja qawaneen mein tarameem ya phir naye qanoon ki tadween ki tajaweez paish ki jayen gi
865.title: Keypad dehshat gardi par qaboo panay wizarat dakhla ka aala satahih ijlaas

news_detail: Lucknow. Gorakhpur ke BRD  Medical College mein qillat oxygen ke saneha mein makhoz Dr. kafeel Khan ke chhootey bhai par itwaar ki shab namaloom hamla awaron ney golian chalayein. 34 sala Jameel Khan ko is waqt star parivate hasptl mein shareek karwaya gaya hai. un ke mondhe, gardan aur thorhee par golian lagen. Dr. kafeel Khan ney kaha ke un ke bhai par golian chalaye gayeen. mein jaanta tha ke woh hamein maar daalnay ki koshish karen ge. hum nahi jantay ke kis ney mere bhai ko qatal karne ki koshish ki hai. un ki haalat is waqt bohat naazuk hai. bataya jata hai ke kotwali police station ilaqa mein Dargah abadi ilaqa mein do namaloom motorcycle sawaron ney yeh hamla kya. un ke brother nisbati Samer Khan ney kaha ke fi al-waqt hamaray baray mein hamaray paas bohat kam maloomat hain. jis waqt un par golian chalaye gayeen woh apni motor bike scooty par they. Dr. kafeel ney BRD  Medical College mein oxygen ki qillat par bar waqat mutharrak hotay hue bahar se gas cylenders ki farahmi ka intizam karte hue kayi bachon ki zindaganian bachaai theen taham yogi aadtih nath sarkar ney inhen hi mulzim qarar daitay hue guzashta saal September mein jail bhaij diya tha. woh aath mah jail mein guzarnay ke baad chand din qabal hi zamanat par raha hue they. is saneha 30 sher khawar bachon ki jaanen gayi theen. Dr. kafeel ney haal hi mein kerrala mein apni khidmaat injaam dainay ki peshkash ki thi jahan Nepha virus ki wabaa phaily hui hai. Chief Ministerutar pardesh yogi aadtih nath itwaar ke din gorkh poor mein hi they. police ney namaloom hamla awaron ke khilaaf muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. kotwali police station ke SHO Ghanshyam Tiwari ney bta ya ke Jameel ney hamein bataya ke raat 10 : 30 bujey Durgavahani crossing ke qareeb do motorcycle sawaron ney inhen roka aur un par teen golian chladin. muqami logon ney inhen khangi hospital muntaqil kya. circle officer ( city ) Atul Kumar Chubey ney kaha ke police ko waqea ke taqreeban adhay ghanta baad mutala kya gaya. unhon ney kaha ke jab police ko pata chala is waqt Jameel ka ilaaj chal raha tha aur ab un ki haalat mustahkam hai aur woh khatrah se bahar hain. tibbi jaanch ke liye Jameel ko paiir ke din sarkari hospital muntaqil kardiya jaye ga
879.title: Dr. kafeel Khan ke bhai par namaalom bandooq bardaroon ka hamla

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq wazeer e azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ko All India Insti tute of Medical Sciences mein aaj shareek karwaya gaya. Doctors ke mutabiq yeh mamool ka check up aur investigations hain. Inhen doctors ke mashwaron par shareek dawakhana kya gaya.
