AIIMS mein woh Pulmonologist and Director AIIMS Dr. Randeep  Gileria ki zair e nigrani mein rahen ge. dr Gileria taqreeban teen decades se shakhsi mualij ke tor par Vajpayee ki tibbi dekh bhaal kar rahay hain. Bharat ratan 93 sala Vajpayee 1924 mein peda hue. woh malik ke pehlay ghair kangrisi Wazeer e Azam they jinhon ne apni 5? sala meyaad mukammal ki. woh lok sabha ke liye 1991, 1996, 1998, 1999 & 2004 mein muntakhib hotay rahay.
897.title: Sabiq wazeer e azam Vajpayee AIIMS mein shareek

news_detail: Masjid Haraam ke ulama, aymah karaam, wazeer Haj aur wali ehad shehzada Mohammad bin Salman ney Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz se Makkah Mukrama ke qasr Alsafa mein mulaqaat ki. Alarabia.nett ke mutabiq Shah Salman se mulaqaat karne walon mein Masjid Haraam aur Masjid nabwi ke umoor ke incharge al shaikh dr Abdul Rehman bin Abdul Aziz al Sudais, Aima karaam, Masjid Haraam ke mauzineen aur deegar hukkaam shaamil they. is mauqa par Saudi Arab ke wazeer baraye umoor Hajj Dr. Mohammad bin Saleh Bantan, secrteries Hajj, intizami councils ke srbrahan, Tuwaf ke nigran idaron ar deegar rehnumaoon ney bhi Shah Salman se mulaqaat ki. Mulaqaat namaz maghrib se qabal hui. baad azan tamam mehmanon ney Shah Salman bin Abdul Aziz ki taraf se diye gaye iftaar dinner mein  bhi shirkat ki. Qasr Alsafa mein anay walon mein shehzada Khalid bin Fahd bin Khalid , shehzada Maqraan bin Abdul Aziz aale Saood , Shehzada Mansoor bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Talal bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Khalid bin Bindar bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Satam bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, Albaha ke Governor shehzada Dr. Hussam bin Saood bin Abdul Aziz, Shah Salman ke musheer shehzada Dr. Abdul Aziz bin Sataan bin Abdul Aziz, shumali ilaqon ke Governor shehzada Faisal bin Khalid bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, Shehzada Salman bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, , Jazan ke naib Governor shehzada Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz bin Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz, Riyadh ke Governor shehzada Mohammad bin Abdul Rehman bin Abdul Aziz, mashriqi ilaqon ke Governor shehzada Ahmed bin Fahd bin bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz, Makkah Mukrama ke Governor shehzada Abdullah bin Bindar bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Saood bin Mohammad bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Salman bin Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Abdalmjid bin Abdulaala bin Abdul Aziz, shehzada Rakaan bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz aur shehzada Faisal bin Ahmed bin Salman bin Abdul Aziz shaamil they.
908.title: Harmain Sharifain ke Ummaal ke liye Shah Saudi Arabia ki dawat iftaar

news_detail: New Delhi. Aik khud sakhta Godman Daati Maharaj ke khilaaf new Delhi mein aik khatoon mutaqid ki mobayyana asmat raizi karne ke ilzaam mein muqadma darj kya gaya. police zaraye ke bamawajib itwaar ko Fatahpur Berry mein aik muqadma darj kya gaya aur baad azan district investy gation unit DIU ) ko muntaqil kardiya gaya. Daati Maharajke khilaaf qanoon tazirat hind ki daf-aat 376, 377, 354 & 34 ke tehat muqadma darj kya gaya hai. khatoon ny ilzaam aed kya ke do saal qabal shani dhaam ke andar is ki asmat raizi ki gayi. khatoon ny bataya ke khud sakhta Maharaj ke khauf se is ny waqea ke fori baad shikayat darj karwa nah saki thi
934.title: Khud sakhta Godman par asmat raizi ka ilzaam

news_detail: Andhra Pradesh ke aarzi mulazmeen ke liye aik haqeeqi khushkhabri hai. Andhra Pradesh kabina ki zeli committee ne 25 November 1993 se qabal mulazmat mein shamoliat akhtyarkrne walay aarzi mulazmeen ko dasvin Pay Commission ki sharah par tnkhwahin aisaal karne ka faisla kya hai. reyasti wazeer Kalva Srinivasulu ne aaj is ka elaan kya. unhon ne kaha ke is faisla se taqreeban 5, 000 aarzi mulazmeen ko faida puhanche ga .
958.title: Paanch hazaar contract mulazmeen ko dasvin Pay Commission ke mutabiq tnkhwahin

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Minister Delhi o sarbarah Aam Aadmi Party Mr. Arvind Kejriwal ney aaj Delhi assembly main aik na qabil tasawwur wada kar baithy magar un ka yeh wada mashroot hai. Chief Minister ney elaan kya ke agar markaz ke zair e intizam ilaqa qaumi dar-al-hakoomat Delhi ko mukammal riyasat ka darjaa day diya jaye to un ki Aam Aadmi Party 2019 ke qaumi intikhabaat main BJP ke liye muhim chalaye gi. Mr. Kejriwal ney kaha ”main BJP se kehna chahta hon ke 2019 intikhabaat se qabal agar Delhi ko riyasat ka darjaa day diya jata hai to hum is baat ko yakeeni banayen ge ke Delhi ka har vote aap ke haq main jaye, hum aap ke liye muhim chalayein ge. agar aap aisa nahi karen ge to Delhi ke maken ”BJP Delhi chode day” kehte hue Boards lagayen ge.” yeh peshkash un paish qiyasion ke douran ki gayi ke Aam Aadmi Party aur Congress Delhi , Haryana aur Punjab main aindah intikhabaat ke liye mafahmat par ghhor kar rahay hain. Aam Aadmi Party ke aik qayed ke haal hi main kiye gaye tweet ke mutabiq dono partiyan rabita main hain taham dono partiyon main kisi aik janib se is ki toseeq ki nahi ki gayi thi. Mr. Kejriwal riyasat ke mutalba par aik khusoosi ijlaas ke douran ewaan se khitaab kar rahay they. yeh ijlaas jummay ko ekhtataam Pazeer hona tha magar paiir taq is main tosee ki gayi thi. Aam Aadmi Party jisay ewaan main ghalba haasil hai, Delhi ke liye kaamil riyasat ka darjaa dainay ka mutalba karte hue aik qarardad Manzoor ki hai. fi al-waqt Delhi ko sirf juzwi riyasat ka darjaa hi haasil hai jis ka matlab yeh hota hai ke ahem umoor jaisay zameen, law and and order police ka nazm o nasq markaz ke paas hi rahay ga. lieutenant governor Delhi main markazi hukumat ki numaindagi karte hain.
974.title: Main BJP ke liye muhim chlaon ga agar. .. . Arvind Kejriwal ka na qabil yaqeen wada

news_detail: Israeli ladaaka tayyaron ney peer ke roz Gaza patti ke shumal mein Hammas tanzeem ke askari ahdaaf par 9 hamlay kiye. Israeli fouj ke bayan ke mutabiq yeh karwai Israel ki janib aatish geer kaghazi tayyaray daaghe janay ke jawab mein samnay aayi hai. bayan mein yeh wazeh nahi kya gaya ke aaya fazai hamlon mein koi jani nuqsaan huwa ya nahi. yaad rahay ke patharon ke baad aatish geez kaghazi tayyaray 30 March ko shuru honay walay Palestenians ke ehtajaji silsilay ki alamat ban gaye hain. Gaza patti aur Israel ke darmain sarhad par honay walay un muzahiron ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gazinon aur be ghar afraad ki wapsi ke haq ka mutalba karna tha. Israeli fouj ney hafta ke roz do Palestenians ko zakhmi kar diya tha jo aatish geer ghubaare bhejnay ki tayari kar rahay they. Al Arabia ke numainda ney peer ki subah bataya ke Gaza patti ke nazdeek yahodi bustiyon mein khatray ke syren bajaye gaye .

Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Gaza patti se daaghe janay walay teen rakton ka pata chalaya jin mein aik Gaza patti ke andar hi gir gaya. deegar do rakton ke girnay ki jagah nahi batee gayi. yaad rahay ke 30 March se Gaza patti ki sarhad par honay walay ehtajaji silsila ke douran Falasteeni nojawanon ney muzahmat ka aik naya tareeqa apnaya hai. is ke tehat kaghazi tayyaray aatish geer mawaad le kar jatay hain. un ki madad se petrol bomb bandh kar Israeli yahodi bustiyon mein phainky jatay hain. Israeli fouj is naye tareeqa car se nimatnay mein nakaam nazar aati hai. 30 March se Gaza patti par shuru honay walay awaami muzahiron mein kam azkam 120 Falasteeni maaray gaye. Israel ney jis par halakat khaiz hathiyar istemaal karne par aalmi satah par muzammat ki jarahi hai, kaha ke awaami muzahiron ke douran Israeli fojion ke hathon mein halaak honay walon mein ziyada tar Hammas ke arkaan they, jinhein woh dehshat gard qarar deta hai. Palestenians ka kehna hai ke sho-hada aur hazaron zakhmion mein beshtar ghair musallah aam shehri they jin ke khilaaf Israeli ney jarehana karwai ki hai. tang sahili mahsor patti mein zayed az  20lakhs Falasteeni aqal tareen zaroriat zindagi ke baghair zindagi guzarnay par majaboor hain jinhein aalmi imdaad bhi nahi poanch paati hai.
857.title: Hammas ke 9 ahdaaf par Israeli fazai hamlay

news_detail: Bartanwi Shaezadah Alquds ki janib se mashriqi Bait ul Quds ko arz Palestine ka hissa qarar diye jaane par Israel chairag pa hogaya hai. Yahudi ghasib mumlikat ne sakht barhami ka izhaar karte hue un ke muaqqaf ko ‘haqayiq maskh’ karne ke mutradif qarar diya. Shaezadah Alquds 25 June ko Jordan pohnchain ge jahan se woh Palestine aur is ke baad Israel ka bhi daura karen ge. woh maqboza mashriqi Jerusalem ka bhi daura karen ge. abrani akhbar’ ydiavt ahronot’ ke mutabiq Israeli kabeena ke wazeer baraye Alquds umoor’ ‘Ze’ve Elkin’ne Shaezadah ki janib se mashriqi Jerusalem ko Israel ke bajaye Palestine ka hissa qarar diye jaane aur isi muaqqaf ke tehat daura Alquds ke programme prkrhi tanqeed ki hai. tawaqqa hai ke Bartanwi Shaezadah jo Duke of Cambridge bhi kehlate hain 25 June ko urdan pounchanay ke baad mashriqi Jerusalem jayen ge. un ka yeh daura teen din par muheet hoga. aakhir mein woh Israeli qayadat se bhi mulaqaat karen ge. Kingston Shahi mehal ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Shaezadah Alquds puranay Alquds ki tareekh aur geographiya ke baare jaan kaari ke husool ki khatir maqboza Palestine ka daura karen ge. woh Jabal Zaitoon altor se nzarah karen ge. bayan mein qadeem shehar Jerusalem ko Palestine ke hissa ke tor par paish kya gaya hai. Israeli wazeer Ze’ve Elkin ka kehna hai ke’ yeh baat be hadd afsoosnaak hai ke Britania Shaezadah Alquds ke daura ko siyasi rang dainay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. mutahidda Jerusalem Israel ka 3000 saal se dar-al-hakoomat hai jab ke Bartanwi Shaezadah ka muaqqaf’ haqayiq’ ko tabdeel karne ki koshish hai. mujhe umeed hai ke sahebzaade ke maavnin un ke muaqqaf mein payi jaane wali ghalat fehmi ka azaala karen ge. taham Shaezadah Alquds ke hawalay se Israeli wazeer ke bayan par Falasteeni Authority ki janib se kisi qisam ka radd amal samnay nahi aaya. wazeh rahay ke guzashta hafta Shaezadah Alquds ne Bait ul Quds ke daura ka elaan kya tha. un ka kehna tha ke woh Alquds ko Palestine ka hissa samajte hue is ka daura karen ge. woh Jerusalem ke tareekhi muqaddas maqamat par jayen ge taham Bartanwi hukoomat ki janib se Shaezadah ke daura mein shaamil muqaddas maqamat ki tafseel bayan nahi ki gayi. beshtar aalmi baradri mashriqi Jerusalem par Israeli qabza ko tasleem nahi karti hai, jahan qadeem shaher waqai hai.
868.title: Prince Wiliam ke ‘Alquds ko Palestine ka hissa’ qarar dainay par Israel chairag pa

news_detail: America ke baad Britain bhi aqwam mutahidda ki insani huqooq council mein Israel ki himayat mein khil kar samnay agaya hai. is ne council se mutalba kiya hai ke woh shyoni riyasat ke khilaaf mobayyana mutassbana sulooq ka silsila band kardey aur is se maamla kaari mein islaah peda kere. America aur chand Europian mumalik ke baad Bartanwi wazeer kharja bors johnson ne geneva mein aqwam mutahidda ke tehat insani huqooq council ke artiswi ijlaas ke agenda item number saat par tanqeed karte hue usay mutanazia bananay ki koshish ki hai, yaad rahay ke is agenda ke tehat Falasteeni ilaqon mein insani huqooq ki khilaaf varzion par bahess ki jaye gi taham America aur Britain ki mukhalifat ke baayes huqooq insani council ke ijlaas mein is mauzo par bahess honay ke imkanaat mouhoom hain. unhon ne kaha ke ”agenda item number 7 mein sirf Israel aur maqboza Falasteeni ilaqon par tavajjah markooz ki gayi hai. yeh aman ke nasbulayen ke liye zarar rasaan aur ghair mutanasib hai. Jab tak cheeze tabdeel nahi hoti hain, is waqt tak hum aindah saal ke douran mein is item ke tehat muta-arif karai jany wali tamam qarar dadon ki mukhalifat mein o o t den ge’ ‘. taham mister bors johnson ka kehna tha ke council Israel. Palestine tanaza ke hal mein ahem kirdaar ada kar sakti hai. council ke ijlaas mein is item ke tehat sirf Israel ki maqboza Falasteeni ilaqon mein insani huqooq ki khilaaf varzion aur Palestenian ke khilaaf mzalm ke barey mein tabadlah khayaal kiya jaye ga. America ke ilawa baaz Europian countries aur Australia ne bhi qabal azeen is item par tanqeed kar chukay hain aur is ko Israel ke khilaaf mutassbana qarar diya hai. un ka muaqqaf hai ke haliya barson ke douran mein jin dosray mumalik mein insani huqooq ki barray pemanay par khilaaf varziyan ki gayi hain, un ka council ke agenda mein zikar nahi hai. un mein shaam sare fehrist hai. American President  Donald Trump ki intizamia ne maazi mein item number 7 par tanqeed ki thi aur is ko wapas nah lainay ki soorat mein council ko kher baad kehnay ki dhamki day di thi.
881.title: Britain ne Israeli zayadtio par aqwam mutahidda ki insani huqooq council ke agenda ki mukhalifat kar di

news_detail: Syria mein Iraq ki sarhad ke nazdeek waqay qasba Al-Hari mein itwaar ki shab honay walay hamla mein halakaton ki tadaad 52 ho gayi hai. insani haqooq ke sab se barray nigaran group Al Marsad al souri ke mutabiq maaray jaany walay afraad Bashar hukoomat ke humnawa hain jin mein ziyada tadaad araqyon ki hai. Al Marsad ke Director Rami Abdul Rahman ne bataya ke Shami hukoomat ke humnawa 52 jungjuon mein 30 ka talluq Iraq se aur 16 ka shaam se hai. hamla ke baare mein kaha ja raha hai ke mashriqi soobay der alzor ke qasbay Al-Hari mein aik fouji qaafley ko nishana banaya gaya. Dimashq hukoomat ne America ke zair qayadat bain al aqwami ittehaad par is karwai ka ilzaam ayed kya. taham Amrici markazi kamaan ke tarjuman ne is ki tardeed ki hai. is se qabal Shami sarkari tally vision ne elaan kya tha ke America ke zair qayadat bain al aqwami ittehaad ne malik ke mashriq mein Shami fouj ke aik thikana par hamla kya. is ke nateeja mein mutadid afraad halaak aur zakhmi ho gaye. yaad rahay ke bain al aqwami ittehaad Daaish ke khilaaf Syrian democratic forces ke maarka mein taawun ke liye fazai hamlay karta hai .

Al Marsad ne bavsoq zaraye ke hawala se bataya hai ke der alzor soobay ke dehi ilaqa mein aik wasee fouji operation ki tayyariyan ki ja rahi hain. Al Marsad ko masool honay wali maloomat ke mutabiq Daaish tanzeem Albu Kamal se le kar Al-Miyadeen tak ke ilaqa mein dareaye furaat ke maghribi kinare ki janib apne anasir aur gaadiyon ko akhatta kar rahi hai. Tanzeem ab Shami hukoomati forces, Irani forces, Lebanese Hizbullah aur un sab ke humnawa musallah anasir ke khilaaf aik bharpoor hamla ki tayari kar rahi hai. musallah anasir mein Shami aur ghair Shami jangju shaamil hain. ab yeh kaha ja raha hai ke yeh pur asraar hamla Israel ne kya hai. aik Amrici ohdedar ne shanakht khufia rakhnay ki shart par kaha kay yeh yaqeen karne ke liye yeh hamla Israel ne kya hai hamaray paas wajohaat hain. Israel ne is par koi tabsarah karne se inkaar kardiya hai. hamla ke liye Israel ki janib is liye bhi gumaan kya ja raha hai ke yeh hamla Shia Iraqi militia ke khilaaf kya gaya hai
894.title: Syria: Fazai hamla mein Bashar ki humnawa forces ke 52 arkaan halaak

news_detail: Egypt mein musallah hamlon ka nishana bin’nay walay mutadid afraad ke khandano ney Qatar ke Ameer Tamim bin Hamad Alsaani ke khilaaf 15 crore dollar harjana ka muqadma dair kya hai. yeh 1 arab malik mein apni noiyat ka pehla muqadma hai jo kisi dosray arab malik ke khilaaf dair kya gaya hai. mazkoorah khandano ney shumali Seina mein shiddat pasandon ke hamlon ke douran chaar afsaraan ki halakat aur aik shehri ke zakhmi honay ka zmmh daar Qatar ko thehraya hai. muqadmay mein aan adalti faislon ko buneyaad banaya gaya hai jin se سیناء mein daheshat gard jamaaton ki taied ke sath Qatar ke talluq ki tasdeeq hoti hai. yeh baat mudai khandano ke wakeel advocate Hafiz Abu Sadah ney “BBC” ki website ko batayi. Dusri janib zaraye ney “BBC” ko bataya ke bajod yeh ke Egypt ka qanoon muqadma baazi ka haq deta hai. .. adalat mein muqadma ka indraaj sprim juditional ki aaraa ke surway ke baad hi ho ga. muqadma ki darkhwast mein daheshat gardi ke khilaaf brsrِ jung charon mumalik ki janib se jari fehrist ki janib ishara kya gaya hai aur is mein aan shaksiaat aur idaron ko shaamil kya gaya jin ko Qatar ki janib se panah aur support haasil hai. mudai fareeq ka kehna hai ke Qatar ka Ikhwan ul Muslimoon ke baaz arkaan ko panah dena aur inhen Egypt ke hawala nah karna jab ke un ka Egypt mein irtikaab juraim mein mulawis hona saabit ho chuka hai, yeh Qatar ko qasoor waar thehranay ke liye kaafi hai. Muqadma dair karne walay muddayeen un chaar afsaraan ke walidain hain jo shumali Seina mein musallah afraad ki karwaiyon ke douran halaak ho gaye they. un ke ilawa aik Misri shehri sir mein goli lagnay se zakhmi ho gaya tha jis ke ilaaj ke akhrajaat Misri fouj ney bardasht kiye. advocate Abu Sadah ka kehna hai ke Qatar ki Hukumat is amar ki zmmh daar hai ke woh –apne aan ghair qanooni af-aal ka harjana ada kere jo Egypt ke security idaron ko nishana bananay ke liye daheshat gard karwaiyon ki fndng ki soorat mein they. adalat ney muqadma ki awleen samaat ke liye rawan baras 27 September ki tareekh muqarrar ki hai. adalat ke faisla ke khilaaf’ appeal court’ mein appeal dair ki ja sakti hai. Albata appeal court ki janib se Qatar par harjana ki adaigi ka faisla jari honay ki soorat mein yeh faisla hatmi aur wajib al amal ho ga. agar adalti faislay mein Qatar ko harjana ada karne ka paband banaya gaya to Misri Hukumat harjana ki raqam ke liye Qatar ki baaz imlaak ko zabt kar sakti hai. yaad rahay ke Qatar ke Egypt mein asasa jaat aur araazi maujood hain
910.title: Egypt: Daheshat gardi ki buneyaad par Emir Qatar ke khilaaf muqadma

news_detail: Taaza tareen mutalea se zahir hota hai ke khangi logon ke hathon mein hathyaaron ki tadaad mein izafah sun-hwa hai. taraqqi Pazeer aur jung se dochar mumalik ke maqabil mutamawwil mumalik ke shehrion ke paas ziyada hathyaar hain. Chotey hathyaaron par nigrani rakhnay wali Switzerland ki aik tanzeem ney 230 mumalik mein chote hathyaaron ki tadaad par tehqeeqi mutalea ki tafseeli report mein bataya gaya ke aaj duniya mein taqreeban aik billion chote hathyaar hain jin mein 857 million hathyaar American shehrion ke hathon mein hain. is terhan American mard wo khawateen ke paas duniya mein paye janay walay niji hathyaaron ka 46 feesad se hai. asmal arms surway ka kehna hai ke 393 shehri hathyaar rakhtay hain. yeh tedaad digar sarkardah 25 mumalik ke khangi shehrion ke paas mojood hathyaaron ki majmoi tadaad se ziyada hai. American shehri awsatan14 million naye hathyaar har saal khridte hain. report mein kaha gaya ke shehrion ke paas mojood hathyaaron ki is tadaad mein qanooni aur ghair qanooni hathyaar shaamil hain. shehrion ke paas jo hathyaar hain un mein hthyaro n mein Improvised Craft  Weapons, factory mein tayyar kardah hathyaar, Rifles, Shot Guns aur chand mumalik mein to Machine Guns bhi hain. 2017 ke ekhtataam taq duniya bhar mein paye janay walay taqreeban aik billion hathyaaron mein aisay 133 million hathyaar sarkari Military Forces ke paas hain aur 22. 7 million hathyaar qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke paas hain. agency ke mutabiq guzashta martaba 2007 mein surway kya gaya tha is waqt 875 million hathyaar they jin mein 650 million syoylin ke paas they. America ke baad sab se ziyada hathyaar Rusia, China, North Korea aur Ukrain ke paas hain. report ke mutabiq duniya mein mojood chote hathyaaron mein 85 feesad 875 million hathyar civilians ke paas hain jin mein shehri, khangi sikoriti firms, ghair sarkari musallah groups aur toliyan shaamil hain, jabkay qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke paas 2 feesad 23 million avrmltri ke paas 13 feesad 133 million hathyaar hain
925.title: Duniya mein maujood aik billion hathyaaron mein 857 million hathyaar American ke paas

news_detail: Usoolon aur aqdaar ko baalaye taaq rakhtay hue iqtidaar ki khatir bejod siyasi mafahmat karne walon ko aik nah aik din apni khata ka khumyaza bhughtna hi parta hai, Iqtidaar se mehroomi muqaddar to ban hi jati hai sath hi ruswai ka taqub shuru hojata hai. aisa hi kuch aaj Mahbooba Mufti ke sath huwa jin ki Jammu & Kashmir hukoomat ki tayeed se BJP ney achanak dast bardari ikhtiyar karli. Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP- PDP ittehaad ka khtama hogaya jab BJP ke qaumi Sadar ney riyasat ke qanoon sazoon se mulaqaat ke baad apni tayeed se dast bardari ka faisla kya. Chief Minister Mahbooba Mufti ney apna maktoob istifa governor ko paish kardiya hai. Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP ke 25 aur PDP ke 28 arkaan hain jabkay 87 rukni ewaan mein aksariyat ke liye 45 arkaan darkaar hotay hain. riyasat mein party position kuch is terhan hai, BJP 25, PDP 28, national conference 15, congress 12 aur mabaqi chhoti partiyon ke MLAs aur azad arkaan hain. Sadar BJP Mr. Amit Shah ke party ke arkaan assembly se Delhii mein mulaqaat ke baad Mahbooba Mufti ki zair qayadat hukoomat ki tayeed se dast bardari ka faisla kiya gaya. dono partiyon mein ikhtilafat is waqt ubhar kar aagaye jab markazi hukoomat ney mah Sayam ke baad riyasat mein mukhalif dehshat gardi operation ki bahaali ka faisla karliya. BJP ney tayeed wapas letay hue kaha ke un ke liye reyasti hukoomat mein barqarar rehna na qabil bardasht hogaya tha. BJP quied Mr. raam maadhu ney kaha ke hamein awam ke khat aetmaad ka ehtram karna tha. agar hum is waqt hukoomat tashkeel nahi dyie hotay to waadi mein governor raaj ya Sadar Raaj nafiz hogaya hota. Hindustan  ki salamti aur salmiyat ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue, aur yeh ke Jammu & Kashmir Hindustan  ka atot hissa hai, riyasat mein ghalib sorat e haal ko control mein laane ke liye hum ney faisla kya ke riyasat mein Zimam hukoomat governor ko hawala kardiya jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke waadi ke liye markaz kuch bhi kere ga. hum ney Pakistan ki janib se jung bandi ki khilaaf warzi par full stop laganay ki koshish ki. PDP apne waday aifaa karne mein nakaam rahi. unhon ney kaha ke jammu aur ladah mein taraqiyati kamon mein hamaray qaideen ko PDP se kayi mushkilaat ka saamna karna prhrha tha. PDP aur BJP ney 2015 mein qiyam hukoomat ke liye ma baad intikhabaat mafahmat ki thi. ab dono partiyon mein darar ke baad governor raaj ka nifaz na guzeer hogaya hai. raat der gaye governor Mr. N N Vohra ney wizarat dakhla ko Jammu & Kashmir mein governor raaj ke nifaz ki sifarish paish rawana kar di hai. riyasat mein governor raaj ke nifaz ke liye usooli tor par Sadar jamhooria hind ki manzoori zurori hai. Sadar jamhooria Hind Mr. Ramnath Kovind Europe aur lateeni America ke dora par hain aur woh mangal ki shab Greece se Serinam ke liye parwaaz kar rahay they. wizarat dakhla ke aik ohdedar ney governor ki report ke masool hojane ki toseeq kar di hai. Mahbooba Mufti ney kaha ke hum ney Iqtidaar ke liye yeh ittehaad nahi kya tha. unhon ney apna maktoob istifa governor ko rawana kardiya aur un se kaha ke hum dosray kisi ittehaad ke liye koshan nahi hain. unhon ney kaha ke koi bhi Jammu & Kashmir ko dushman ka ilaqa nahi samajh sakta. yahan taaqat ki policy kamyaab nahi hosakti. Jammu & Kashmir hukoomat se achanak dast bardari par siyasi halqon mein usay saakh bachanay ki koshisho ke tor par dekha ja raha hai aur yeh bawar kya ja raha hai ke 2019 mein BJP ko apne difaa ke liye aik accha mauzo haath agaya hai. governor Mr. N N Vohra ke hathon mein aik baar phir Jammu & Kashmir ki Zimam hukoomat aa rahi hai. 81 sala governor 2008 mein apni taqarruri ke badse ab chouthi martaba riyasat chalayein ge. woh 25 June ko Jammu & Kashmir ke governor ki hesiyat se aik daha mukammal karen ge. woh 1959 se mukhtalif positions par rehtay hue 55 barson se malik ki khidmat karte chalay arhay hain. Jammu & Kashmir ke halaat se woh bakhoobi waaqif hain. Mr. vohra 2003 taa 2008 Kashmir mein hukoomat ke mazakraat car rahay hain aur tamam siyasi nuqta nazar ke haamil logon Bashmole kuch haami hurriyaat qaideen se bhi mulaqaat aur baat cheet ki
938.title: Jammu & Kashmir mein BJP ney PDP hukoomat ki tayeed se achanak dast bardari ikhtiyar karli

news_detail: Israeli ladaka tayyaron ny mangal aur budh ki darmiyani shab Gaza patti par fazai hamlay kiye taham kisi ke zakhmi honay ki ittila nahi mili. Falasteeni zaraye ke mutabiq is ke jawab mein Falasteeni musallah groupon ny janoobi Israel ki janib rocket daaghe. Israeli fouj ke elaan ke mutabiq is ny Gaza patti se daaghe janay walay rakton ke jawab mein Gaza patti mein 25 ahdaaf ko nishana banaya. fouji bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke raat ke douran Israel par missilon sameit 45 rocket daaghe gaye .

doosri janib Falasteeni security zaraye ny wazeh kya hai ke Israeli jungi tayyaron ny Gaza patti ke janoobi shehar Rafah mein Hamas ke askari wing Alqassam Brigades ke tarbiati thikana ke nazdeek khaali araazi par kayi missile daaghe. aik dosray hamla mein Gaza patti ke shumal mein Hamas ke thikanon ko nishana banaya gaya. Gaza patti mein wizarat sahet ka kehna hai ke hamlon mein koi zakhmi nahi huwa. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq fazai yalgaron ke baad Falasteeni musallah groupon ny janoobi Israel par mutadid rocket aur granides daaghe. kisi Falasteeni group ny is karwai ki zimmay daari qubool nahi ki. wazeh rahay ke rawan baras 30 March se shuru honay wali” haq wapsi” ehtajaji rilyon ke douran Israeli fayrng se kam az kam 132 Falasteeni shaheed ho chuke hain jab ke is douran koi Israeli halaak nahi huwa
954.title: Gaza mein 25 ahdaaf par Israel ki fazai bomb baari

news_detail: Afghanistan ke soobah Badghis mein Taliban ke hamla mein Afghan Forces ke 30 ahelkaar halaak ho gaye. eid ke liye ki gayi jung bandi khatam hojane ke baad Taliban jangjuon aur Afghan Forces ke darmain ghmsan tassadum shuru hogaya hai. Afghan hakkaam ke mutabiq jung bandi ke baad Taliban ki janib se ki gayi yeh aik barri karwai hai. sobai governor Abdul Ghafoor malik zai ka kehna hai ke Taliban ney Badghis soobah mein Afghan security Forces ki do checkposts par hamla kya. Taliban jangjuon ney mukhtalif simtao se dhawa bol diya, kayi ghantay tak jari rehne wali larai mein Afghan Forces ke 30 ahelkaar maaray gaye. is tassadum mein Taliban ko bhi jani nuqsaan uthana para. sobai council ke rukan Mohammad Nasir Naziri ney toseeq ki ke Taliban jangjuon ney mangal ki raat der gaye Bala Murghab aur aabb kumar azlaa mein sikoriti posts par marboot hamlay kiye. unhon ney kaha ke Afghan Forces ney muasar jawabi karwai ki jis mein kayi hamla aawar halaak hogaye. darin asna sobai sikoriti ke sarbarah Ahmed Fahim Qayem ney kaha ke Aab Kamari zila mein tassadum ke nateeja mein kam az kam 15 militants maaray gaye hain aur zayed az 20 zakhmi hogaye. unhon ney kaha ke Bala Murghab zila mein tassadum ke nateeja mein kam az kam 12 militants halaak aur kam az kam 8 zakhmi hogaye hain. wizarat difaa ke zaraye ke mutabiq kam az kam 13 fouji shaheed aur 8 zakhmi hue hain.
970.title: Afghanistan: Badghis mein Taliban ka Forces par hamla, 30 ahelkaar halaak

news_detail: Hhyderabad. Telangana Akhila Bharati Vidhyarthi Parishad ke kaarkunon ney aaj riyasat geer school band ehtijaj ke douran Dehli public school, Nadirgul, Saroornagaar par tashadud ka muzahira kiya. riyasat ke schoolon ki fees par haden muqarrar karne ka mutalba karte hue ABVP ney riyasat geer satah par schoolon ke band mananay ka elaan kya tha jis ke paish e nazar chand Schools ney tateel ka elaan kardiya tha. Dehli public school, Hyderabad Public School, Chaitanya, Pallavi School aur Michael School ke intizamia ney avlyaye talba ko paighamaat arsaal karte hue mutala kardiya tha ke budh ke din school ko tateel rahay gi taham Dehli public school ki Nadirgul shaakh aaj band nahi thi. ABVP kaarkunon ney school ke khula rehne ki ittila paker wahan puhanche aur kimps ke baher tahehri hui basoon par sangbaari karna shuru kar di. reyasti secretary ABVP lipa ney kaha ke band barri hadd taq pramn aur kamyaab rhaavr beshtar school intizamia ney band manaya
985.title: ABVP ka School band ke douran pur tashaddud muzahira

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao July ke aakhri hafta ya August ke pehlay hafta mein LB Nagar. Ameerpet Metro Rail Corridor ka dosray marhala ke tor par iftitah injaam den ge jis ka taweel arsa se intzaar kya ja raha tha. is rote ke aaghaz se awam ko trafik masail se barri hadd taq raahat mil jaye gi. Metro Rail ke tickets ke narkh mein kami ke koi imkanaat nahi hain jin ke baray mein awam kaya ta-assur hai ke woh kuch mehngay hain. wazeer Information Technology o Baldi nazam o nasq o shehri taraqyat Mr. K. T. Rma Rao ne aaj LB Nagar Metro Station par aik press conference mein kaha ke Hyderabad Metro ke tickets ke narkh Dehli , Mumbai , bangloru aur deegar shehron ke Metro trinon ke narkhon ke maqabil mehngay nahi hain jaissa ke awam ka aik tabqa ka yeh ehsas hai. qabal azeen wazeer ne wazeer tansport Mr. Mahindar Reddy, Mayor GHMC Mr. Bonthu Ram Mohan, Maanaging Director Metro Rail Mr. N.V.S. Reddy aur deegar ke hamrah Ameerpet taa LB Nagar Metro Train mein safar kya. unhon ne wazahat ki ke Metro Rail chunkay khangi. awaami shiraakat daari ke tareeqa car par shuru kya gaya hai is liye company ki janib se uthaye gay masarif is mein mulawis companiyon ko bardasht karna parta hai is liye fi alfoor tickets ke narkh mein kami ke koi assaar nahi hain. jab dosray marhala mein mahatma gandhi bas station, fallak numa aur deegar roots par Metro Rail mukammal taurr par Kargard hojaye gi tab ticket ke narkhon mein kami par ghhor kya ja sakta hai. unhon ne kaha ke tijarti sar garmion ki muawnat karte hue 42 maqamat par Multi Level parking sahulaten baham pohanchai jayen gi. ilawa azeen bijli se chalne wali gadiyon ke liye Charging Points bhi shuru kiye jayen ge. Mr. K. T. Rma Rao ne bataya ke aloodgi se bachney ke liye RTC bahut jald 500 Electric Buses shuru kere ga.
862.title: Chief Minister KCR July ke awakhir mein LB Nagar. Ameerpet Metro Rail ka aaghaz karenge

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik nagehani waqea mein aik Doctor ney ilaaj karne ke douran aik teen sala bachchi ki taang tod di. Dr. Kiran Kumar ney Government Homeopathy Hospital Ramanthapur mein mamooli chout lagnay par aik teen sala ldki ka ilaaj karte hue ittafaq se is ki taang ko zor se maror diya. ldki ke rishta daaron ney Doctor par la parwahi ka ilzaam aed karte hue Hospital ke ihata mein ehtijaj kya. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke ldki ki taang tod dene ke baad Doctors ab hum se keh rahay hain ke bachi ko ilaaj ke liye khangi Hospital muntaqil kya jaye. rishta daaron ney shikayat ki ke medical officer se shikayat ke bawajood qasoor waar Doctor ke khilaaf koi karwai hanooz nahi ki gayi. Doctor ke khilaaf police mein bhi shikayat darj karwai gayi hai. rishta daaron ney bataya ke Doctor ney ldki ki taang ki haddi tod kar wahan se faraar hogaya. jab bachi ko malik pait ke aik Hospital ko muntaqil kya gaya to wahan doctors ney bataya ke taang ki haddi toot gayi hai.
872.title: Doctor ney ilaaj ke douran sher khawar ki taang tod di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Greater Hyderabad municiple karporishn ny pehli martaba hyderabad mein talba aur barsarekaar peshawar afraad ke liye Internship ki peshkash ki hai. jari Swach Bharat programme ke khutoot par is programme ka maqsad shurka ko apni salahiyaton ke izhaar ka haqeeqi mauqa faraham karna aur GHMC mein naye aayidyaz aur tawanai ko lana hai. shurka ko GHMC mein kaam karne ka tajurbah haasil hogaavr karporishn se jurey bohat se logon shehrion, tijarti idaron, makeeno waghera se tabadlah khayaal karne ka mauqa haasil hoga. tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke shurka GHMC ke aik ya zayed ilaqon ka daura karen ge aur hyderabad mein behtar safai suthrayee ke maqsad mein apna hissa ada karen ge aur khusk aur tar kachre ki alhayedgi ke wasail par awam mein shaoor beedar karen ge. yeh programme tawaqqa hai ke nah sirf shurka ko seekhnay ka aik azeem mauqa faraham kere ga balkay hyderabad shahar ko saaf suthra shahar bananay GHMC ki janib se kiye jaaney walay jari iqdamaat mein mazeed behtari aeye gi. is programme ka maqsad Naujawanon ki salahiyaton ko mazeed ujagar karna hai aur inhen hyderabad ki inqalabi safai o suthrayee mein qabil lehaaz hissa ada karne ka mauqa faraham karna hai. GHMC ko yaqeen hai ke ziyada tadaad mein Naujawanon ko jorhte hue hyderabad ko saaf suthra shahar bananay mein shehrion ki mashghooliat mein izafah hoga.
890.title: GHMC ki janib se Internship

news_detail: Lucknow. Bain mazhabi shadi karne walay aik Couple ko jis ney Lucknowو mein passport ki darkhwast dair ki thi darkhwast ke istirdaad se qabal inhen aik Passport Officer ki taraf se tauheen aur be izzati ka saamna karna para. Couple ney baad azan mutawatar tweet paighamaat ke zareya markazi wazeer Sushma Swaraj aur daftar Wazeer e Azam ko apni ibtela se waaqif karwaya. Mohammad Anas Siddiqui jinhon ney Tanvi Saith se 2007 mein Lucknow mein shadi ki thi jinhein aik 6 sala ladki bhi hai, 19 jo noon ko dono ke passports ke liye darkhwasten dair ki theen aur Lucknowو mein 20 June ko Passport Office mein appointment haasil kya. appointment ke din Couple ney counter ae aur bi par ibtidayi do marhalon ki interviews ko paar karliye lekin counter si par mushkilaat paish aana shuru hogyin jahan darkhwast guzar ko officer se baat cheet karna parta hai. Anas ney baad azan sahafion ko bataya ”un ki ahliya ka number un se pehlay aayaavr jo n hi woh counter number c5 par pohnchain Vikas Mishra Nami ohdedar ney un ki dastawizaat ki jaanch partaal shuru kar di. jab unhon ney shareek hayaat ka naam Mohammad Anas Siddiqui padha woh un par cheekh para aur kaha ke inhen mujh se shadi nahi karna chahiye tha. meri biwi ro pari jis ke baad Mishra ney kaha ke inhen naam ki tabdeeli ke sath dastawizaat ko durust karlena chahiye.’ ‘ barham Anas Siddiqui ney jo Noida mein apni ahliya ke hamrah aik multi national companey mein kaam karte hain.” Meri biwi Tanvi ney kaha ke hum naam tabdeel karna nahi chahtay aur hamaray khandan ko hamaray naamon se koi takleef nahi hai, tab Passport Officer ney un se APO office jaaney ke liye kaha aur yeh ke woh fayil APO ko bhaij raha hai. Mishra ney is ke baad mujhe talabb kya aur meri tauheen karne laga. is ney kaha ke mujhe Hindu mat ikhtiyar karna hoga warna meri shadi tasleem nahi ki jaye gi. unhon ney mujhe se kaha’ aap ko phairay lainay hon ge aur hamara mazhab ikhtiyar karna hoga kiya tum aisa karogay?”’

Tanvi ney Sushma Swaraj ke mausooma apne tweet mein likha ”Hello Madam, mein yeh tweet Adal aur aap par be intahaa Aiqan aur sitam zarefana taur par apne dil mein gussa/gam aur karb ke sath type kar rahi hon is liye ke jis andaaz mein mujhe Ratan Square par Lucknow Passport Office par Mr. Vikas Mishra ki janib se sulooq kya gaya hai, mehez is liye ke mein ney aik musalman se shadi ki hai aur kabhi mera naam tabdeel nahi kya. is ney mujh se mere case par tabadlah karte hue intahi ukkhadpan se baat ki aur itna zor se cheekh rahay they ke dosray sun paye. mein ney is se qabal kabhi is terhan harasan nahi hui. office ke deegar workers un ke buray bhonday pan ki toseeq karte hain’’(manqool). is Couple ney Wazeer e Azam aur wazeer kharja mohtarma Sushma Swaraj se mudakhlat karte hue inhen passport faraham karne aur khaati ohdedar ke khilaaf karwai karne ka mutaliba kiya hai.
906.title: Passport Officer ney Hindu Muslim Couple ki darkhast mustarad kar di

news_detail: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman se Amrican President Khusoosi Numayeendah aur Musheer baraye Mashriq Wasta ney mulaqaat ki hai jis mein Israel Palestine sorat e haal par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya. White House se jari bayan ke mutabiq President Trump ke damaad Jared Kushner aur  Khusoosi Numayeendah Green Belatt ney Riyadh mein Saudi Crown Prince se mulaqaat ki aur Israel Palestine aman amal aur Gaza ki sorat e haal par guftagu ki. Daura Saudi Arab se pehlay Amrici ohdedaron ney Jordan ke Shah Abdullah se bhi mulaqaat ki thi. Amrici numainday aglay marhala mein Israel, Egypt aur Qatar ka daura karen ge. Al- quds ko Israeli darulhukoomat qarar dainay ke baad Falasteeni rehnumao ney America ka aman amal mein kirdaar qubool karne se inkaar kardiya hai. agarchay White House ney id-daa kya ke ijlaas mein Sabiqa mazakraat ki pishrft mein unhon ney goro khoz kya, Gaza ko insani imdaad pahunchane aur asrayilyon aur flstineyon ke darmain aman qaim karne trmp intizamia ke iqdamaat jaisay mozuaat zair behas rahay hain taham yeh samgha ja raha hai
919.title: Saudi Crown Prince se American President ke Damaad ki mulaqaat

news_detail: Lucknow mein Hindu aur Muslim mazhab se talluq rakhnay walay joday ko Passport mil gaya, jabkay un ki arzi kharij karne, inhen mobayyana tor par be izzat aur mazhab tabdeeli ka mutalba karne walay Passport Officer ka tabadlah karkay maamla ki tehqeeq ka hukum day diya gaya. wizarat kharja ke secretary D M Mulay ney waqea ka notice letay hue jald hi munasib karwai ki yaqeen dehani karai hai. Jabkay mutasirah joday ko budh ko Passport office bulaya gaya aur aaj inhen Passport bana kar day diya gaya. wazeh rahay ke Passport Officer ki janib se joday ko Passport ke ajra ki darkhwast kharij karte hue wajah batayi ke woh allag allag mazhab se hain aur shohar se kaha gaya tha ke agar woh chahtay hain ke Passport jari kya jaye to woh Hindu mazhab ko ikhtiyar karlen. waqea ke baad media se baat cheet karte hue ans aur Tanvi ney ilzaam lagaya ke Passport Officer ney bain mazahab shadi ki wajah se inhen sharminda karte hue un ki darkhwast kharij kar di thi. ans ney bataya ke is Officer ney inhen apna mazhab tabdeel karkay Hindu ban’nay ki bhi naseehat ki jis ke baad joday ney wazeer kharja Sushma Swaraj aur daftar wazeer e azam ku tweet karkay is ki maloomat di aur is maamla mein mudakhlat ki appeal ki. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Mohammad ans Siddiqui ney saal 2007 mein Lucknow mein Tanvi sith ke sath shadi ki thi jinhein aik beti bhi hai. is joday ney apne Sabiqa naamon ko hi barqarar rakha aur apni ahliya ke Passport ke liye darkhwast di thi. 20 June ko Lucknow ke Passport office mein un ka appointment thajs mein joday ney interview stage ae aur bi clear karliya tha, magar si stage mein poochay gay salawon ko le kar kuch masla sun-hwa tha. ans ney bataya ke mujh se pehlay meri ahliya ki baari aayi. woh si 5? kavntr par gayi to vikas mishra naam ka aik Officer is ke dastaweez check karne laga. jab is ney shohar / biwi ke naam ke colum mein Mohammad ans Siddiqui likha dekha to meri ahliya par cheekhnay laga aur Officer ney meri ahliya se kaha ke usay mujh se shadi nahi karni chahiye thi. meri ahliya ro rahi thi jis ke baad Officer ney is se kaha ke woh sabhi dastaweez mein islaah karkay dobarah le aeye aur apne shohar ka naam tabdeel kardey jis ke liye inhen phairay lena hoga. ans ney bataya ke meri ahliya Tanvi ney Officer se kaha ke woh apna naam tabdeel karwana nahi chahti, kyunkay hamaray kunba ko is se koi pareshani nahi hai. yeh suntay hi Passport Officer ney is se kaha ke woh ae pi o office chali jaye kyunkay is ki fayil ae pi o office bhaije jarahi hai. ans Siddiqui ke mutabiq is ke baad Passport Officer vikas mishra ney mujhe bulaya aur be izzat karne laga. is ney kaha ke mein Hindu mazhab ikhtiyar karloon warna meri shadi tasleem nahi ki jaye gi. is ney kaha ke hamein phairay le kar shadi karni chahiye aur mazhab tabdeel karlena chahiye
932.title: Hindu Muslim joday ko Passport mil gaya

news_detail: Saudi Arabia ke shehar Al-Damam mein waqay Imam Abdul Rehman bin Faisal University ke driving school se ab tak 67 khawateen ko driving licence jaar y kiye ja chukay hain jabkay is school mein driving ki tarbiyat ke liye 13 hazaar khawateen nay –apne naamon ka indraaj karaya hai. is school se Saudi khawateen ko chay marahil mein driving licence jari kiye jarahay hain. Un mein ibtidayi registration, school ki web gaah par registration, tarbiati programme ke liye indraaj, nazri tarbiyat, amli tarbiyat aur mehakma traffic ko car chalanay ka imthehaan dena shaamil hain. is imthehaan mein kamyaab umeed waar vn ko license jari kardiya jata hai. jamea imam Abdul Rehman ban Faisal ke camps ki hudood hi mein khawateen ko driving ki nazri aur amli tarbiyat di ja rahi hai. licence ke husool ke liye darkhwast dainay wali khawateen ki Umar 18 saal ya is se zayd honi chahiye. unhein aik driving school mein apne naamon ke indraaj ke baad tarbiyat ke liye muqarara fees ada karna hogi. is driving school mein jari tarbiati programme ka dorania 27 ghantay ka hai. is mein paanch ghantay nazri tarbiyat, do ghantay traffic tahaffuz aur security qawaid wo zawabit par presentation aur 20 ghantay amli tarbiyat ke liye mukhtas kiye gaye hain. darkhwast guzaar khawateen mein beron malik se licence yaftgan bhi shaamil hain. woh apne ghair mulki license ko Saudi license se tabdeel karna chahti hain. aisi khawateen ko driving test ke marhalay se guzarna hoga. jin khawateen ke ghair mulki licence ki meyaad khatam hochuki hai, unhein chay ghantay ke tarbiati amal se guzarna hoga. agar woh driving ka imthehaan paas karliti hain to unhein fori tor par driving licence jari kardiya jaye ga. imthehaan mein nakaam rehne wali khawateen ko aik aur mauqa diya jaye ga. unhein mazeed chaar ghantay tak tarbiyat di jaye gi aur phir un se test liya jaye ga aur kamyabi ki soorat mein licensee jari kardiya jaye ga.
947.title: Saudi Arabia : 13 hazaar khawateen ka tarbiyat ke liye indraaj

news_detail: Malaysian Venture Capital Fund Company’ cradle fund s d an. bi each d ke CEO 45 sala Nazrin Hussain raat ko kamray mein Mobile Phone phatnay se jaan bahaq hogaye. ghair mulki media ke mutabiq Nazrin Hussain raat ko apne kamray mein so rahay they ke achanak un ka Mobile phone phat gaya jis ki wajah se un ke sir par shadeed chout aayi aur kamrah mein aur un ke gaday mein aag bharak uthi jis se woh jaan bahaq hogaye. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq un ke paas do Mobile phones they jo un ke bed ke paas charging par lagey hue they. Nazrin Hussain ke psmandgan mein biwi aur teen bachay hain. police tehqiqaat kar rahi hai ke Nazrin Hussain ki mout sir par chout lagnay se hui ya kamray mein aag lagnay se peda honay walay dhuwen se yeh abhi taq maloom nahi ho saka hai. post martm report se mout ki asal wajah samnay aeye gi
961.title: Malaysian company ke CEO Mobile phatnay se jaan- bahaq

news_detail: Turkey mein Parlimani aur Sadarati intikhabaat itwaar 24 June ko honay ja rahay hain, jin ke zareya mojooda tark Sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan aur un ki justice and development party nay naya khat aetmaad haasil karna chahtay hain. Turkey mein Sadarati aur Parlimani intikhabaat aik sath 24 June ko hon ge, yeh intikhabaat 3 November 2019 ko tay shuda election se 16 mah qabal ho rahay hain. un intikhabaat ke zareya mojooda Sadar Recep Tayyip Erdoğan aur hukmaran jamaat, awam se naya khat aetmaad haasil karna chahtay hain. Sadarati intikhab do mrhlon mein mukammal hoga. pehla marhala 24 June ko munaqqid hoga. koi bhi umeed waar agar 51 feesad vote haasil nah kar saka to maamla dosray marhala taq jaye ga. jis ka ineqad 8 July ko hoga. Sadarati intikhabaat mein Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ke muqaabla mein deegar 5 umeed waar maidan mein hain, jabkay Parlimani intikhabaat mein 600 nashiston ke liye raye dahi honi hai. Turkey mein July 2016 ki nakaam baghaawat ke baad se hungami haalat nafiz hai. un intikhabaat ke baad mulk mein Sadarati nizaam nafiz kardiya jaye ga jis se Sadar ke ikhtiyar it- mein izafah hoga. mulk bhar mein 18, 00, 65 Ballot Boxes rakhay gaye hain aur 5, 63, 22, 632 registered Voters hain. Raye dahi muqami waqt ke mutabiq 9 : 00 bujey din taa 5 : 00 bujey shaam taq jari rahay gi. raye dahindgaan aik hi lifaafa mein do Ballot Papers par apni pasand ke umeed waar ka intikhab karen ge. raye dahi ke baad pehlay Sadarati intikhab ke liye raye shumari hogi jis ke baad Parlimani umeedwaron ke voton ki ginti ki jaye gi. aik Ballot paper Sadarati umeedwaron ke liye aur dosra Parlimani umeedwaron ka hoga. pehli martaba bistaron par fresh 17 hazaar Voters ke liye Election Officers un ke gharron taq pahonch kar Ballots haasil karen ge. taqreeban 11. 49 laakh beron mulk muqeem raye dahendon nay 7 June taa 19 June ke douran 123 Turkey sifarat khaanoon par apne voton ka istemaal kiye hain. beron mulk muqeem rayedahindon ke votes ko airmail ke zareya Turkey laa ya gaya hai aur un ki ginti doosron voton ke sath isi din shuru hogi. Parlimani intikhabaat mein barsar Iqtidaar justice and development party ke ilawa deegar 7 siyasi partiyan hissa le rahi hain. Sadarati intikhab ke liye Recep Tayyip Erdoğan samait 6 umeed waar maidan mein hain.
979.title: Turkey mein Parlimani aur Sadarati intikhabaat itwaar ko honge

news_detail: Hyderabqad. Hyderabqad ki fouj daari adalat nay bachon ki smuggling aur inhen bacha mazdoori par jhonknay ke jurm mein 2 afraad ko 14 baras qaid bamushaqqat ki saza sunai gayi hai. deputy commissionaire of police south zone Mr. V Satyanarayana ke press release ke mutabiq Mohammad imtiaz mutawatin Nalanda ( Bihar ) aur Munna Chudi Saaz ko Bhavaninagar ni nagar police station ke hudood mein 2016 mein na baligh bachon ko Bihar se laakar Chudi Saazi ke kaam mein mashgool kardainay par girftar karliya gaya tha. commissionaire ki task force ( south zone ) team nay chhapa maartay hue 16 bachon ko bachaya tha jinhein Bihar se laakar yahan par chudion ki tayari ke kaam mein jhonk diya gaya tha. police nay is waqt kayi muqadmaat darj karte hue chand logon ko girftar kya tha. police ke mutabiq imtiaz aur Munna ke khilaaf do alhaidah muqadmaat darj kiye gaye they baad azan police nay un do muqadmaat mein charge shits daakhil ki thi. dono muqadmaat mein Munna ko mujrim paaya gaya aur usay do juraim ke liye 14 baras ki jail ki saza sunai gayi. Special Judge cum VIII Additional Metropolitan Sessions Judge Mr. M V Emanuel nay muqadmaat ki samaat ke baad mlzmin ko saza sunai
997.title: Child Trafficking par 14 saal jail

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress party ke senior quied mister danm Nagender nay aaj jummay ko party se istifa day diya. unhon nay apna maktoob istifa party saddar mister Rahul gandhi ko rawana kardiya jis mein unhon nay party se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karne ki wajohaat paish ki hain. samjha jata hai ke woh kal media ko Congress party se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karne ki wajohaat se aagah karen ge. un ke qareebi zaraye ka kehna hai ke woh aik ya do din mein Barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge. pradesh Congress committee ke leaders inhen mananay aur istifa se dast bardari ikhtiyar karne ki targheeb day rahay hain. mister danm Nagender jo reyasti assembly ke rukan bhi reh chuke hain aur Hyderabad city Congress ke sdrki hesiyat se bhi khidmaat injaam day chuke hain, guzashta chand mahino se party sar garmion se doori ikhtiyar kiye hue thay. inhen yeh shikayat thi party leaders inhen ahmiyat nahi day rahay hain. haal hi mein Congress high kamaan nay sabiq rukan parliment mister engine kumar yado ko Hyderabad city Congress ki sadarat sonpi thi. mister engine kumar yado aur mister danm Nagender mein aik arsa se dooria hain. mister engine kumar yado ke taqarrur se mister Nagender naraaz thay.
861.title: Senior Leader Danam Nagender Congress se mustafi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Governor Madhya Pradesh Anandi Ben Patel ke mobayyana remarks par ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi mujarad hain, Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki bay-gana biwi Jashoda Ben ney numaya sarznish karte hue inhen Anandi Ben ke bayan par inhen taajjub sun-hwa. Jashoda Ben ney kaha ”Unhon ney Wazeer e Azam Hind ki Shabeeh ko majrooh kya hai. Woh mere liye nihayat qabil ehtram hain. woh mere liye Ram hain. yeh un ki tauheen hai.” Jashoda Ben aur Narendra Modi ki us waqt shadi hui thi jab woh dono nav umar they, lekin chand mah baad hi dono alahda rehne lagey. Is hafta Governor Madhya Pradesh Anandi Ben Patel aik virel video mein kehti nazar aa rahi hain ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi mujarad hain. Anandi Ben Patel jinhon ney Narendra Modi ke Wazeer e Azam Hind ban jaany par cheif minister gujrat ki hesiyat se janasheen bani theen, Madhya Pradesh ke Timarni mein aangan wari center par khitaab karte hue kaha ”aap jantay hain, nerinder bhai ghair shadi shuda hain, is ke bawajood woh zichgi ke baad aurat aur bacha ko honey wali takaleef se aagah hain, isi liye unhon ney khawateen ke liye kayi schemes roshnaas karwaen.” Jab woh khitaab kar rahi theen is waqt sahafi wahan mojood they. is ke jawab mein Wazeer e Azam ki alahda shuda biwi Jashoda Ben ney gujrate zabaan mein diye –apne bayan mein kaha ”Mujhe hairat hai ke Anandi Ben ney sahafion se kaha ke nerinder bhai mujara hain. unhon ney khud lock sabha intikhabaat 2014 mein lock sabha ke liye parcha namzadgi daakhil karte hue yeh halaf nama diya tha ke woh shadi shuda hain aur mera naam zikar kya tha. yeh aik aala taleem Yafta khatoon ( Anandi Ben ) ka aik teacher ( Jashoda Ben ) ke baray mein is terhan kehna Zaib nahi deta. yahi nahi un ke tarz amal ney Wazeer e Azam Hind ki Shabeeh ka majrooh kya. mein un ka bohat ehtram karti hain. woh mere liye Ram hain. Narendra Modi ke baradre nisbati Ashok Modi ney Telegraph akhbar se kaha ke ‘’Narendra Modi hanooz barsar e aamJashoda Ben ki himayat mein nahi aeye hain. Unhon ney kaha Video par abhi tak koi rad-e-amal nahi aaya hai. Na hi Wazeer e Azam aur na hi Anandi Ben ney meri behan se rabita kya hai. .. Jashoda Ben se Wazeer e Azam ney haliya arsa mein koi rabita nahi kya hai.” Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney 2014 intikhabaat ke halaf nama mein Jashoda Ben ko apni biwi qarar diya tha. interviews mein Jashoda Ben ney kaha ke hum ney 1960 mein shadi ki thi aur teen mah sath gzare they
875.title: Ben ba muqabla Ben. Ram hanooz khamosh

news_detail: Iraq ney mashriqi Shami suba Der Alzor ke qasba Hajen mein teen makanon par mushtamil aik compound par fazai hamla kya hai, jahan ISIL ke qaideen ka ijlaas chal raha tha. Hamla ke nateeja mein sakht geer jangju group ISIL ke 45 arkaan halaak hogaye hain. Iraqi fouj ki mushtarqa operations kamaan ney hafta ke roz aik bayan mein ittila di hai ke ”Iraqi F16 Ladaka Jet ney Iraqi sarhad ke qareeb Sham ke ilaqa Hajen mein ISIL ke senior leadron ke aik ijlaas par kamyaab fazai hamla kya hai. is ke nateeja mein ahdaaf mukammal tor par tabah ho gaye hain aur 45 dehshat gard maaray gaye hain”. Iraqi Ladaka Jet ney aik surang ke zareya miley hue teen makanon par bombari ki thi. bayan mein daawa kya gaya hai ke hamla mein halaak honay walon mein ISIL ka naib wazeer jung, is ka aik media Ameer, Tanzeem ke Ameer abbu baker albghdadi ka zaati pegham rasan aur group ka police sarbarah Shamil hain
887.title: Sham mein aik qasba par Iraq ke fazai hamla mein ISIL ke 45 jangju halaak

news_detail: Aik saal qabal Saudi Arab ki hukoomat ki janib se mulk mein khawateen ko driving ki ijazat se mutaliq elaan par aaj 24 June bah roz itwaar se amal daraamad shuru kardiya gaya hai aur khawateen ki barri tadaad Saudi Arab ki sarkon par gaadi chillate dekhi ja sakti hai. doosri janib muashra ke bohat se tabqaat ki taraf se khawateen ki driving ke faisla ka kher muqaddam kya gaya hai magar aik tabqa hanoz un tabdeelion par fikarmand nazar araha hai magar mutlaq alanani ke Atab se bachney ki khatir apni zubanain band rakha sun-hwa hai. Saudi Arab mein khawateen ki driving par pabandi uthnay ke baad shahrahon par khawateen azadana gadiyaan chala rahi hain jab ke bohat si khawateen driving ki tarbiyat aur licence ke husool ke liye koshan hain. Saudi Arab mein traffic control karne walay idaara naay chand roz qabal aik bayan mein khabardaar kya tha ke khawateen majaz tareekh se qabal gaadi nah chalayein warna inhen pa 500 taa 900 rial tak jurmana aur gaadi zabt kiye jaany ka saamna karna par sakta hai. khawateen ki janib se gaadi chalanay ka behad ishtiyaq ke bawajood qanoon ki pabandi ki gayi .

khawateen ke driving set par bhaithne aur sarkon par niklny ke baad social media par mila jala radd amal samnay aaya hai. baaz shehrion naay usay haqooq naswan ke hawala se ahem paish Raft qarar diya jab ke baaz naay driving ke hawala se khawateen ko sakht ahthyat baratnay ka mahswara diya hai. social media par khawateen naay bhi yaqeen dehani karai hai ke woh traffic qawaneen ki sakhti se pabandi karen gi aur khauf ki rukawat tornay ke liye fori tour par ziyada rush walay maqamat par jaany se guraiz karen gi. social media par samaji karkunaan naay khawateen ki driving mein hosla afzai par bhi zor diya hai aur kaha hai ke mumlikat mein khawateen ki driving ka abhi aaghaz hai aur is hawala se aurton ko musalsal reh namai aur hosla afzai ki zaroorat hogi
921.title: Saudi Arab mein khawateen ki driving ki ijazat aaj se nafiz al amal

news_detail: Iran mein mehengai aur muashi istehsal ke khilaaf aawaz buland karne walay talabah ko naam nihaad inqilab adalaton ki janib se kari sazayen di ja rahi hain aur inhen qaid wo band mein daal kar hukumati nakamiyoo prawam ka mun band karne ki mazmoom koshishen jari hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq haal hi mein Iran ki aik adalat ney mehengai ke khilaaf aawaz uthany walay Jamiyaat aur schoolon ke talba ki barri tadaad ko jailon mein daalney ka hukum diya. un mein se baaz ko aath se das saal qaid ki sazayen sunai gayeen. saza paney walon mein aik 12 sala bacha bhi shaamil hai. irani sadar ki khatoon Musheera baraye shehri huqooq Shahidantaqt Maulawari ney shikayat ki hai ke hukoomat ko ilm hai ke adalat ney Jamiyaat ke talba ko mehengai ke khilaaf aawaz buland karne par kari sazayen dena shuru ki hain. aik bayan mein Shahidantaqt Maulawari ney kaha ke hukoomat talba ko tahaffuz dainey mein nakaam rahi hai. un ka kehna tha ke hukoomat ko talba ko di jaane wali sazaon ka ilm hai aur ab hum un ke kisz ki pairwi kar rahay hain taakay sazaon par nazar sani karai jasakay. khayaal rahay ke Iran mein decemeber 2017 ko malik geer ehtijaj ki aik lehar uth khari hui thi.’ mehengai na Manzoor ‘ ke naara ke sath uthney wali is tehreek ney 100 shehron ko apni lapait mein le liya tha. irani rjim ney awaami ehtijaj kuchalney ke liye taaqat ka andha dhund istemaal kya aur barri tadaad mein shehrion jin mein talba bhi shaamil they ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. un ke khilaaf adalaton mein riyasat ke khilaaf kaam karne ke ilzamaat ke tehat muqadmaat chalaye gaye
935.title: ‘Mehengai’ ke khilaaf aawaz uthany walay irani talba ko kari sazayen

news_detail: Israeli wazeer e azam se Saudi Arab ke walii ehad Mohammad bin Salman se khufia mulaqaat ke baaray mein khabrain manzar aam par aa rahi hain magar ta haal kisi bhi musadeqa zaraye se is ki toseeq nahi hosaki Albata Israeli Netanyahu ki amarati hakkaam se khufia mulakaton aur rawabit ka inkishaaf samnay aaya hai. khabar rasan idaron ke tor par chalaye janey wali baaz Websites par yeh khabrain aam ki jarahi hain ke Netanyahu avrsavdi shehzada Mohammad bin Salman ke darmain jummay ke roz Oman mein khufia mulakaatein huien, dono rehnumao ke darmain Jordon ke dar-al-hakoomat mein waqay Shahi mehal mein mulaqaat hui, yeh mulaqaat Sadar America ke damaad o White House ke musheer khaas Jared Kushnar aur Mashriq wasta ke liye Trump ke qasid Jasen Green Balett ke daura Oman ke mauqa par hui. Israeli akhbar Haaritz ki aik khabar ke mutabiq Wazeer e Azam Israel Netanyahu ney Jordon ke Shah Abdullah II se paiir ke din Oman mein mulaqaat kiye. is mulaqaat se Oman mein 2017 mein Israeli sifarat khanah par aik security guard ko goli markar halaak kardainay ke baad se Israel aur Oman ke darmain safarti bohraan ke baad dono qaideen ke darmain taluqaat ke istehkaam ka ishara milta hai. dono mumalik ke sarbarah ney is se qabal aakhri martaba November 2014 mein brsraam mulaqaat ki thi. Netanyahu ney 2016 hamza mein Aqaba mein is waqt ke Amrici secretary dakhla jaan carry ki sadarat mein munaqidah khufia aman ijlaas mein shirkat ki thi jis mein Shah Abdullah II aur Sadar Egypt Abulfatah Alsesi bhi maujood thay. Oman ke ijlaas mein Mosad ke director Yossi Cohen, MIilitary Secretary baraye Wazeer e Azam Eliezer Toledano, Netanyahu ke Chief of Staff Yoav Horowitz, Cabinet Secretary Tzachi Braverman, National Security Council ke numainda o Qaumi Iqtisadi Council ke sarbarah professor Avi Simhon ney hissa liya .

report mein zarea ke hawala se bataya gaya hai ke Mohammad bin Salman aur sakht geer Israeli wazeer e azam ke darmain mulakaatein Jordon ke Shah Abdullah ki mojoodgi aur un ke baghair bhi huien, doosri janib Israeli wazeer e azam ke amarati hakkaam se khufia mulakaton aur rawabit ka bhi inkishaaf sun-hwa hai, doosri janib aik Amrici akhbar ke mutabiq Iran johri muahiday ke waqt se America aur amarati hakkaam ke darmain khufia rawabit aur mulakaton ka silsila jari hai, report ke mutabiq Israel Iran johri moahida ke khtama aur khitta mein is ke assar vrsokh ke liye Arab mumalik kay sath rawabit barha raha hai. nyoyarkr Nami akhbar ke reporter ke mutabiq Amrici intelli jins agencies ku Amarati ohdedaran aur Israeli hakkaam ke darmain phone calls ke baaray mein maloom sun-hwa hai jabkay un mein se aik phone cal emirate ke aik senior ohdedar aur Netanyahu ke darmain thi, report ke mutabiq Hillary Clinton bator sadaarti umeed waar aur bator wazeer kharja is muamlay se aagah theen ke mutahidda Arab emirate aur Saudi Arab Iran ke asar wo rusukh ko kam karne ke liye Israeli intelli jins agency mosad se rabita mein hain, Amrici sahafi ney intelli jins idaron ke hawala se bataya ke mutahidda Arab emirate aur Israel ke ohdedar vn ke darmain mulaqaat yunan mein hui thi, Amrici hakkaam ka kehna hai ke baadi al nazr mein yeh maloom hota hai ke mazkoorah mulaqaat mein Netanyahu khud bhi mojood thay, wazeh rahay ke emirate aur Saudi Arab ke Israel ke sath safarti taluqaat nahi hain, darin Isna Israel ke wazeer e azam Netanyahu ney Jordon ke badshah se mulaqaat mein wazeh kiya ke woh beeet almuqaddas ki intizami soorat e haal ko barqarar rakhnay ke haami hain. is mulaqaat ki tasdeeq Israeli wazeer e azam ke daftar se jari honay walay aik bayan mein ki gayi hai. Shah Abdullah II ke sath Israeli wazeer e azam ki mulaqaat taqreebin aik saal baad hui hai
952.title: Kya walii-ehad Saudi Arbia Mohammad bin Salman ney Netanyahu se khufia mulaqaat ki?

news_detail: Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Turkey ki tareekh mein pehli martaba Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat aik sath ho rahay hain. Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhab ke liye votng ka amal Turkey ke waqt ke mutabiq aaj subah 8 bujey se shuru hogaya hai jo 5 bujey tak bila ta-attul jari rahay ga. Turkey mein 5,63,22 632 voters apna haq raye dahi istemaal karen ge jin ke liye 1,80,0 65 ballot box banaye gaye hain jab ke saarhay 30 laakh beron malik muqeem shehri pehlay hi apna haq raye dahi istemaal kar chukay hain. votng ke ekhtataam par sab se pehlay Sadarati umeedwaron ki ginti ho gi is ke baad Parliamani intikhab ki baari aeye gi. Sadarati intikhab ki daud mein awaami ittehaad ke Rajab Tayyab ardgan, jamhoriat awam party ke Mehram Enjay, Kurd Siyasi Jamaat Peoples Democratic Party ke Salah Aldeen Damir Teshe, Fazeelat Party ke Temal Kermola Avlo aur Watan Party ke Duwo Peranchik shaamil hain. taham sakht muqaabla dusri baar sadarat ke umeed waar Tayyab Erdogan ka Jamhoriat Awam Party ke Mehram Enjay se hoga .

Parliamani intikhab ke liye Turkey mein 8 siyasi jamaaton ke darmain muqaabla ho raha hai jin mein AAq party, jamhoriat awam party, achi party, Khudapar, Fazeelat party, Peoples Democratic Party aur watan Party shaamil hain. Aaq party aur mili harkat party ne awaami ittehaad se ittehaad karliya hai jisay azeem ittehaad party ki himayat bhi haasil hai. Bain al aqwami surway ke adaad vshmar zahir karte hain ke Rajab Tayyab ardgan doosri baar sadarat ke liye muntakhib ho jayen ge taham hizab e ikhtilaaf ke rehnuma Mehram Enjay kisi bhi qisam ka surprize dainay ki mukammal salahiyat rakhtay hain is liye Tayyab ardgan ke liye yeh intikhab jeetna asan nahi hoga. yun to Sadarati intikhab aglay saal honay thay lekin saddar Tayyab ardgan ne qabal az waqt election ka elaan karkay dono intikhab aik sath karanay ka faisla kya .

wazeh rahay ke Turkey ke intikhabi qawaneen ke tehat Sadarati intikhabaat mein kamyaab umeed waar ko 50% se zayed vote lainay hon ge, agar koi aik umeed waar yeh hadaf haasil nah kar saka to phir ziyada vote haasil karne walay do umeedwaron ke darmain dobarah intikhab hoga jis ke liye 8 July ki tareekh mukhtas ki gayi hai
966.title: Turkey mein pehli martaba aik hi din Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat

news_detail: Misri parliment ney itwaar ke roz saddar Abdul Fatah Al-Sesi ke aas faisla ki manzoori day di hai jis mein Alsesi ney malik bhar mein nafiz hungami haalat mein 14 July se mazeed teen mah ke liye tausee ka elaan kya tha. misar mein pehli martaba hungami haalat ka nifaz April 2017 hamza mein do chrchon par honay walay dhmakon ke baad kya gaya tha jin mein 45 ke qareeb afraad halaak aur darjanon zakhmi ho gaye they. is ke baad se har teen mah ya is se kuch zayed arsa ke liye is haalat mein tausee ki jati rahi. misar is waqt jazeera numa Seina ke shumal mein paon jamaye shiddat pasandon ke khilaaf nbrd aazma hai. un shiddat pasandon ney aakhri chand barson mein mukhtalif hamlon ke douran Misri fouj aur police ke secron ahal karon ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya. misar ke dastoor mjrih 1958 hamza ki dafaa 162 ke tehat saddar ko malik mein hungami haalat ke nifaz aur is mein teen mah ki tausee ke ikhtiyarat tafweez kiye gaye hain
978.title: Misar: Hungami haalat mein teen mah ki tausee

news_detail: Mukhalif simt se anay wali aik scooter se bachney ki koshish mein Tractor driver ke tawazun khodene se trali qareebi canal mein ja giri. zila Yadadari ke moza Laxmapuram ke qareeb moose nadi canal mein Tractor trali girjane se 17 halaak hogaye jin mein 14 khawateen aur aik kamsin shaamil hain. yeh waqea aaj din mein 10 : 00 bujey din paish aaya. mukhalif simt se anay wali aik scooter se bachney ki koshish ke douran Tractor ka driver apna tawazun kho betha. is haadsa mein deegar 7 log zakhmi hogaye. assistant commissionaire of police mister rmish jinhon naay bachao kamon ki nigrani ki bataya ke zakhmion ko qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya
994.title: Tractor Trolly canal mein girjane se 17 halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke sarbarah o cheif minister mister ke Chandar shikhr rao ney aaj id-daa kya ke un ki party aindah intikhabaat mein 100 nashiston par kamyabi haasil karte hue Iqtidaar par apna qabza barqarar rakhay gi. Party Headquarters Telangana Bhavan mein sabiq wazeer o congress quied aur un ke kaarkunon ka party mein khermaqdam karne ke baad khitab karte hue mister chndrshikhr rao ney kaha ke aik neye surway ke mutabiq TRS ke liye aindah intikhabaat bohat aassan hon ge aur woh 100 se zayed nashistain haasil kere gi. cheif minister ney kaha ke intikhabaat honey den aur dekhen ke tamam siyasi partiyan hamaray khilaaf muttahid bhi ho jaien to TRS kamyaab hogi. unhon ney kaha’ ‘ tashkeel Telangana aik tareekh hai aur soonahre Telangana ki taamer o no o taraqqi aik aur tareekh hai. haliya surway ke mutabiq TRS hukoomat ki ghareeb aur mahroom tabqaat ke liye falahi schemes aur taraqiyati programon se khush hain. hamari party ko awam ki taied haasil hai aur hum baghair kisi mushkil dobarah Iqtidaar par wapas ayen ge.’ ‘ unhon ney kaha ke kalyaan laxmi scheme ka maqsad zaroorat mand tabqaat ki madad karna hai aur ab usay riyasat mein aala zaat ke ghurba taq wusat di jarahi hai. hum ney Iqtidaar par aney ke baad awam ki mushkilaat, takaleef aur zaroorat ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue schemes waza kiye. TRS hukoomat ney guzashta chaar barson mein rait se 1, 675 crore rupay ki aamdani haasil ki jabkay maazi ki congress hukoomat ney apne das sala daur Iqtidaar mein sirf 39 crore rupay mujtma krpayi thi
1005.title: TRS ku 100 nashiston ke sath dobarah Iqtidaar : KCR

news_detail: Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao ney Wazeer e Kharaja aur Bain ul Aqwami Tawwun United Arab Emirates His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan ke sath Hyderabad mein mulaqaat ke mauqa par Hyderabad mein United Arab Emirates ke Consulate keqiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Chief Minister daftar ke zaraye ke mutabiq United Arab Emirates ke Wazeer e Kharaja kal prgti bhon mein 5? : 30 bujey shaam Chief Minister Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao se mulaqaat karen ge. dono qaideen deegar umoor ke ilawa Hyderabad mein amarati Consulate ke qiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge aur Telangana mein sarmaya kaari ke baray mein bhi baat cheet karen ge. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan hndstan ke aik hafta ke dora par 24 June ko Dehli puhanche hain. un ke programme mein Mumbai , ahmdaabad, chinayi aur bingloru ka bhi dora shaamil hain.
880.title: Hyderabad mein Emirates ka Consulate

news_detail: United Arab Emirates ke wazeer kharja Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed all nhyan ny dar-al-hakoomat nai Delhi mein Hindus ki Mandir Akshardham ki yatra ki hai. woh Bharat ke hafta taweel sarkari doray par hain. Mandir ki yatra ke douran mein Sheikh Abdullah ko is mein rakhay tareekhi assaar, Mandir ke fnِ taamer, riwayati Saqafat , munfarid art, Bharat ke tareekhi assaar aur kunda pathar se taamer kardah imarat ke khadd-o-khaal ke baray mein bataya gaya. UAE ki sarkari khabar-rasan agency vam ke mutabiq  wazeer kharja ney apne Mulk ki janib se doosri aqwam ke fanoon, tareekhi assaar aur tahzibon mein dilchaspi aur mukhtalif saqafaton aur mazahib ke darmyann rawadari aur pur aman baqaye bahami ke tasawwur ke farogh dainay ke azm ka izhaar kya. Hindus ke is tareekhi Mandir ke dora ke mauqa par nai Delhi mein tainaat United Arab Emirates ke safeer Dr. Ahmed Albanna bhi Sheikh Abdullah ke hamrah they.
893.title: Amarati wazeer kharja Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed ki nai Delhi mein Akshardham Mandir ki yatra

news_detail: Canadian Wazeer e Azam Justin Trudeau ko sun glasses ka tohfa lena mehanga par gaya, hakkaam ke samnay zahir nah karne par Trudeau par 100 Canadian dollar ka jurmana kardiya gaya. Justin Trudeau ko guzashta saal Canadian soobay Prince Edward island ke sarbarah ne do besh qeemat branded sun glasses ke tohfay diye thay, jisay zahir nah karne par Wazeer e Azam ko 100 dollar ka jurmana ada karna para hai. Canadian qanoon ke mutabiq mulki Wazeer e Azam ko 200 dollar se zayed maliyat ke tohfe ko 30 dinon ke andar laazmi declare karna hota hai. Trudeau ke press secretary ke mutabiq intizamia ki ghalti ke baais tohfay ko declare nah kya jaska, sun glasses ki qeemat 300 aur 500 dollar hai.
911.title: Canadian Wazeer e Azam ku tohfa lainay par jurmana

news_detail: Duke of Cambridge Shehzada william ne apne pehlay daura Palestine ke aakhri roz maqboza Bait al-Muqaddas mein Alhrm al-Qudsi al-Sharif sameit mutadid muqaddas muqamat ka daura kya. yaad rahay Masjid Aqsa al-Hrm al-Qudsi ki deewar mein waqay tamam ilaqa ko kaha jata hai. yeh istilaah sirf Masjid قبلی ya pahari ke gunbad par muntabiq nahi hoti. is ka itlaq pahari ke gunbad, Masjid Qibla, Musalla al-Marwani aur deegar ahem muqamat par bhi hota hai. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Bartanwi Shehzada william ne budh ke roz maqboza maghribi kinare mein Falasteeni panah gazinon ke camp ka daura kya. Is se qabal unhon ne Falasteeni sadar Mahmud Abbas ke sath mulaqaat mein is umeed ka izhaar kiya ke

mein aman qaim ho jaye ga. Bartanwi Shahi khandan ke kisi bhi fard ke Israel aur Palestine ke pehlay sarkari daura ke mauqa par Shehzada william ne Ramallah shehar ke nazdeek al Jalzune camp mein aqwam mutahidda ke zair e intizam aik tbbi tanseeb ka daura kya. sarkari khabar rasan agency wafa ke mutabiq Falasteeni saddar Mahmood abbas ne is mauqa par kaha ke Falasteeni janib Israel ke sath aman ke liye sanjeeda hai taa ke dono reastain 4 June 1967 hamza ki sarhadoon par aman aur istehkaam ke sath reh saken. raam Allah mein sadaarti head quarter mein Shehzada william ke istaqbaal ke mauqa par Mahmood abbas ne kaha ke” hum mazakraat ke zareya aman taq pohanchna chahtay hain. hamara yeh muaqqaf taweel arsay se tabdeel nahi sun-hwa. hum sjhte hain ke Bartanwi Shehzada ka yeh daura Bartanwi aur Falasteeni dono awam ke darmain dosti ke taluqaat ko mazboot banaye ga. hamein –apne Palestine ke munsifana maslay ke wastay hamesha se Bartanwi awam ki support ki zaroorat rahi hai “. Falasteeni saddar ne bataya ke Bartanwi hukoomat ne haal hi mein” imdadi agency” Onarva” ko support paish ki hai. yeh agency Falasteeni araazi mein panah gzinon ki imdaad ke liye sargaram hai. Bartanwi walii ehad ke sahib zade ne garam joshi ke sath istaqbaal par saddar Mahmood abbas ka shukriya ada kya. Shehzada william ne kaha ke” mein masroor hon ke mera malik aap logon ke sath taleem ke maidan mein kaam kar raha hai. mujhe umeed hai ke yeh taawun khtte mein aman taq pounchanay ke wastay jari rahay ga”
922.title: Shehzada william ka Bait al-Muqaddas ke ahem muqamat ka daura

news_detail: Insaaniyat ko sharmsaar kardainay walay aik waqea mein qarz ke bojh taley dabey 1 shakhs ne 3. 50 lakh rupay mein apne do frzndon ko farokht krdyaavr apni biwi ko bhi farokht karne ki koshish ki. –apne shohar ke napak mansoobah se aagah hotay hi khatoon ne –apne maiyka bhaag kar khud ko bchalya. jab yeh khatoon police se rujoo hui to muqadma darj karne se inkaar kardiya gaya. be bas khatoon bil akhir aayi si d s ke ohdedaron se madad ke liye rujoo hui. yeh waqea Nandyal ke qareeb Koilkuntala mauza mein paish aaya. bataya jata hai ke Buddga Jangamma  Muddileti buri aadato ka shikaar hokar bulaa noshi karne laga hai, woh deegar buri aadato mein bhi mubtala hogaya thajs ke baais woh bhaari maqrooz hogaya tha. qarz ki adai se majaboor hokar is ne apni do na baligh bachiyon ko 3. 5 lakh rupay mein farokht kardiya. is ne kharidaran ke sath aik moahida bhi tehreer kya tha jis ki ruu se is ki betiyan baaligh honay par kharidar ke hawala kardiya jaye hamza ga jabkay is ki biwi ku 5lakh rupay ke aiwz is ke cosuon ko farokht karne par amaada hogaya tha. baad azan is ne apni biwi Venkateshwaramma ko bhi farokht karne ki koshish ki taham aurat ko is ke mansoobah ka ilm hogyaavr woh –apne mabaqi do bachon ko le kar faraar hogayi aur –apne maikay ja pohanchi. is ne nindiya l- police mein shikayat bhi darj karwai, lekin police ne shikayat par koi karwai nahi ki, jis ke baais woh aayi si d s se rujoo hui. is ne darkhwast ki ke police, moahida ko zabt karlay aur is ke shohar ko girftar karlay. bataya jata hai ke woh 15 lakh rupay taq ka maqrooz hogaya tha
950.title: Sharaabii shakhs ne do baityon aur biwi ko farokht karne ki koshish ki

news_detail: Riyadh mein khusoosi fouj daari adalat ney aik Saudi shehri ko 9 saal jail ki saza sunai hai. Saudi shehri par ilzaam tha ke is ney Security hakkaam ko matloob apni behan ko chupaya aur woh Security ahal karon par fayrng mein bhi mulawis raha hai. mulzim ki saza ki muddat ke barabar arsa taq is par malik se bahar safar karne par bhi pabandi ho gi. adalti karwai mein mazkoorah ilzamaat ke ilawa mulzim ke hungama aarai karne walay majmaa ke sath shirkat aur is ke liye support paish karne ko bhi zair ghhor laya gaya. Saudi roznama “Okaz” ke mutabiq mulzim ke khilaaf yeh amar bhi saabit sun-hwa hai ke is ney manshiat ki tijarat ki gharz se 2 afraad se mulaqaat ki aur Security forces ko aan ke baray mein aagah nahi kya. woh Hasheesh aur mamnuaa” captagone” capsule ki khareed aur phelao mein shareek raha. is ney manshiat ki tijarat ke zareya raqam haasil ki.
962.title: Security Hukkaam ko matloob behan ko chupane ka ilzaam, Saudi shehri ko 9 saal ki jail

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mutasib logon ke aik group ney ek shakhs ko mehez is liye chaaqo ghonp kar shadeed kardiya ke is ney aik Muslim Ladki ko goad liya tha. hamla awaron ney is par chaaqo ke 16 zarbaat lagaye. is shakhs ki shanakht Papalal Ravikanth ki hesiyat se ki gayi jo karishmati tor par shadeed chouten lagnay ke bawajood jaanbar hogaya aur usmaniya hasptl mein zair e ilaaj hai. yeh waqea yakam June ko paish aaya, tafseelaat ke bamawajib hndon ki aik touli ney jin mein ziyada tar isi mohalla ke thay jahan Papalal rehtay hain, un ke ghar puhanche aur is par chaaqo ke 16 waar kiye aur inhen khoon mein luth puth chodh kar chalay gaye. is waqt Ravikanth ki biwi aur bachay peenay ka pani laane ghar ke bahar gaye hue thay, baad azan unhon ney Ravikanth ko usmaniya general hasptl pohanchaya. papa laal ney bataya ke hamla ke teen din baad inhen hosh aaya. paanch hamla awaron ko grftarkya gaya tha magar sirf do ko hi hirasat mein liya gaya. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke Police ney rishwat le kar case ko kamzor kardiya hai. dakkan hirald ke mutabiq Sania ney kaha’ ‘ mere waalid har waqt meri hifazat karte hain, lekin mere school ney jahan hum parhte hain hamein yeh kehte hue nikaal dya ke hum bayes takleef hain chunkay mujhe hamesha ladke chairtay hain. Ladki ney kaha ke woh aik Police officer ban-na chahti hain aur corruption ke khilaaf larray gi. hum sirf insaaf chahtay hain aur kuch nahi. jin logon ney mere waalid ko maar daalna chaha woh galiyo mein azad ghoom rahay hain magar mein mere waalid ke liye lardte rahon gi .

Rajpot gharana se talluq rakhnay walay Papalal aur un ki ahliya jeya shree ney apni baradri ki khwahish ke barkhilaf Sania Fatima ko goad liya. yeh Ladki 2007 hamza ke Hyderabad bomb dhmakon mein apne walidain se mahroom hogayi thi. yeh Ladki Gokul Chat ke qareeb dastyab hui thi jahan augst 2007 hamza mein aik zor daar dhamaka sun-hwa tha. is jorey ney Ladki ko apne ghar laya tha taham musalmanoon aur hndon dono baradrion ney aik Muslim Ladki ki parwarish aik ghair Muslim khandan mein parwarish par aitraaz kya tha. is qatilana hamla ke bawajood is jorey ney is azm ka iradah kya ke woh kisi bhi haalat mein Ladki ki parwarish se dastbardaar nahi hon ge. unhon ney yeh id-daa kya ke Ladki ki nighdasht aur parwarish aik Muslim ke tor par ki jarahi hai aur usay apne Hindu mazhab par amal karne ke liye majboor nahi kya ja raha hai. Papalal jo mandaroon ke liye mortiyon ki paintings banatay hain, news 18 ko bataya ke Sania Fatima ney 2007 bomb dhamaka mein –apne khandan ko khoodia aur jab kisi ney Ladki par apna daawa paish nahi kya to hum usay apne ghar le aaye, is ney hamaray ghar mein khusihyan bhar deen. hum Hindu. Muslim ke farq par yaqeen nahi rakhtay. hum insaaniyat par yaqeen rakhtay hain. woh meri barri beti hai mein kisi qeemat par bhi usay nahi choroon ga. is jorey ney ilzaam aed kya ke nah hi Police aur nah hi hukoomat inhen tahaffuz faraham kar rahi hai. yeh kayi barson se chal raha hai, hum se kaha gaya ke usay talak nah lagaya jaye. is ke baad kuch logon ney kaha ke is ka naam anjali ya Sonia rakh diya jaye. agroh islam par amal pera hona chahti hai to hamein koi masla nahi hai. hum ittehaad par, hum ahangi yaqeen rakhtay hain aur har aik se appeal karte hain ke aman se rahen. yeh jora Sania ko achi taleem dila raha hai taakay woh –apne peeron par khud khari hosakay. jeya shree ney bataya ke muqami Hindu ladke, Sania ko harasan wo pareshan kar rahay hain aur. woh bhi naveen jamaat mein hai. mere shohar ney inhen kayi martaba mutnabba kya tha. inhen is baat ki raqabat hai ke hum ney aik Muslim Ladki ki parwarish ki hai. Sania ko goad lainay ke baad hi is jorey ko teen bachay Ekta, Umanand aur Prarthana hue
977.title: Muslim Ladki ko Goad lene walay shakhs par jaan lewa hamza hamla

news_detail: Mumbai: Tennis Star Sania Mirza ka kehna hai ke barah meharbani mere liye betay ki nahi balkay beti ki dua karen. Bharati Tennis Star aur Pakistani Cricketer Shoaib Malik ki ahliya Sania Mirza un dinon umeed se hain unhon ney aur Shoaib Malik ney yeh khabar –apne tamam chahanay walon ke sath social media par bohat mohabbat se share ki thi, yahi wajah hai ke yeh khabar sun kar Pakistani aur Bharti awam mein khushy ki laher daud gayi thi aur ab un ke chahanay walay be cheeni se intzaar kar rahay hain ke un ke pasandeeda khilari betay ke walidain bantay hain ya beti ke, taham Sania Mirza chahti hain ke un ke ghar beti ki paidaiesh ho aur unhon ney tamam logon se kaha hai ke un ke liye beti ki dua karen. media ke mutabiq Sania Mirza ney guzashta roz Mumbai mein aqwam mutahidda ke zair e ihtimaam ”Mujhe haq hai muhim” mein shirkat ki. is mauqa par unhon ney bataya ke inhen bachpan mein logon ki janib se kis terhan Tennis khailnay par tanqeed ka nishana banaya gaya tha. Sania ney kaha ke mein ney 6 saal ki Umar mein Tennis khelna shuru kar di thi aur Hyderabad Deccan  mein larkiyon ke itni chhoote Umar mein khailnay ko bohat harangi se dekha jata tha. jab mein Tennis khelti thi us waqt bohat se log mere walidain ko kehte thay ”haan theek hai khailnay jarahi hai lekin kaali hojaye gi dekhna, koi shadi nahi kere ga”. Sania Mirza ney kaha mere waalid mere hero hain unhon ney tanqeed karne walon ki parwah nah karte hue har mauqa par mera sath diya.

Tennis Star ney mazeed kaha hum do bahenen hain aur hamein kabhi bhai ki khwahish nahi hui aaj mein aik kamyaab khatoon hon avrapni zindagi mein bohat si kamiyabiyan haasil kar chuki hon lekin log aaj bhi jab mujh se mlitay hain to kehte hain ke aap ka koi bhai nahi hai aur afsos ka izhaar karte hain avrmjhe dua dete hain aap ka larka hojaye jis par mera jawab hota hai, ”barah meharbani yeh dua mat karo balkay larki hojaye yeh dua karo, kyun aap larke ki dua kar rahay ho.” Sania ney kaha yeh hamaray muashra ki zehniat hai jis se hamein bahar niklana hai. wazeh rahay ke Sania Mirza aur Shoaib Malik October mein walidain ban jayen ge
991.title: Barah meharbani mere liye betay ki nahi beti ki dua karen, Sania Mirza

news_detail: Brussels: European Union ke mumalik ne panah gzinon se mutaliq naye muahiday par ittafaq raye peda kar liya hai jis ke tehat panah Guzeen camp band kardiye jayen ge. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq brslz mein European Union ke srbrahan ka ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein tanao aur raat bhar ke taweel aur mazakraat ke baad panah gzinon ke hawala se aik moahida tey pa gaya hai jis ke tehat tarikeen watan ke campon ko band kar ke earzi camp banaya jaye ga jo muhajreen ki dastawizaat ki jaanch partaal karkay is ka faisla kere ga ke kisay sarhad paar karne ki ijazat di jasakay gi aur kisay wapas kardiya jaye ga. European Union ke darmiyan yeh mafahmati amal Europi mumalik ki sarhadoon par barhatay hue tarikeen watan ki tadaad aur is se peda honay walay masail ke paish e nazar kya gaya hai. taweel ijlaas ke douran srbrahan ne sikoriti rissk, muhajreen ki baaz abad kaari aur zaroori sahulaton ki dasteyabi ke imkanaat par bhi ghhor kiya gaya. kamyaab ijlaas ke baad Europi council ke sarbarah Donald Tusk ne apni tweet mein kaha hai ke Europi bock ke tamam athais arkaan, muhajreen samait deegar mamlaat ke hal par mutfiq ho gaye hain. doosri janib Europi mumalik ke sifarat karon ka kehna hai ke Europi mumalik ke darmiyan panah gzinon se mutaliq moahida mein to ittafaq raye ho gaya hai taham tarikeen watan ke hrasti campon se mutaliq abhi kuch wazeh nahi hai. ilawa azeen moahida se purumeed Germany ki Chancellor Angela Merkel ka kehna hai ke Europi mumalik panah gzinon ki ghair qanooni aur be qaida hijrat ka hal talaash karne ke liye aindah bhi mafahmat se kaam karta rahay ga. ijlaas mein yoropi qaideen ne bock mein anay walay panah gzinon ko raza karana tor par bahar karen ge aur panah ki darkhwaston par karwai ke liye androon yorop ‘Controlled Centres’ ke qiyam par ittafaq kya. ijlaas ne italy ke naye Wazeer e Azam Giuseppe  Conte ke ahem mutalba ko bhi qubool karliya gaya ke ne samandar se bachaliye jaaane walay tarikeen watan ki zimma daari baantane se bhi ittafaq karliya.
1001.title: European Union ka muhajreen ke tamam camp band karne ka faisla

news_detail: California : Aqwam e Mutahidda ka kehna hai ke 2017 ke douran dehshat gardi ke mukhtalif waqeat mein 10 hazaar se zayed bachay halaak ya mazoor hue hain jab ke 8 hazaar bachon ko dehshat gardi ke waqeat mein istemaal kya gaya.
