Qabil zikar baat yeh hai ke aqwam mutahidda ney Israel aur Hammas ko fehrist mein shaamil nahi kya hai halaank mahireen ney un ki shamoliat ki sifarish ki thi. do saal qabal aqwam mutahidda ney Saudi Arbia ko fehrist mein shaamil kya thatahm sakht ehtijaj ke baad is waqt secretary general banki moon ney Saudi Arbia ko fehrist se hatadena tha jis par ghhor zair iltiwa hai. is saal ki fehrist mein Saudi Arbia par ziyada tanqeed nahi ki gayi taham yeh wazeh kardiya ke Yemen mein shiaon ke baaghi group Houties ke khilaaf larney walay arab mumalik ke ittehaad bachon ki halakat ka zimma daar hai. aqwam mutahidda ki Children and Armed Conflict (CAAS) ki salana report ke mutabiq khanah jungi aur dehshat gardi ke waqeat mein bachon ki halakaton aur mazoori ke waqeat mein izafah dekhney mein aaya hai. guzashta baras 2017 mein duniya ke 20 mukhtalif mumalik mein musallah tanazeaat ki zad mein aa kar 10 hazaar se zayed bachay halaak ya mazoori ka shikaar hue. un mein ziyada tar bachay shaam, Yemen aur Afghanistan mein halaak aur mazoor hue. aqwam mutahidda ki report ke mutabiq bachon ki halakaton ki wajah hamla awaron ka tawatar se aspatalon aur schoolon ko nishana banana hai jis mein 2016 ke muqaabla mein izafah dekhney mein aaya hai. ilawa azeen guzashta baras bachon ke bunyadi haqooq ki khilaaf warzi ke 21 hazaar se zayed waqeat record kiye gaye jab ke 8 hazaar se zayed bachon ko intahaa pasand jamaaton ney apni musallah jid-o-jehad ke liye istemaal kya. Report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke soudan, Iraq , shaam, Yemen aur Afghanistan mein bachon ke bunyadi insani haqooq ki surat_e_ haal nihayat takleef da hai. report mein kaha gaya hai ke bachon ke haqooq ke manafi ikees hazaar se zayed khilaaf varziyan record ki gayi hain aur haqeeqat mein yeh iss se kahin ziyada ho sakti hain. saal 2016 mein aisi karwaiyon ki tadaad saarhay pandrah hazaar ke lag bhag theen. is report mein yemeni jung mein bachon ki halakat ko khaas tor par wazeh kya gaya hai. is report mein bataya gaya ke Pakistan asasi banned tanzeem Jaish e Mohammad aur Hizab ul Mujahideen ney guzashta baras jammu o Kashmir mein Security Forces ke sath tassadum mein bachon ko bharti aur istemaal kya. is report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke nkslayts ki janib se bhi khaas kar chhatees garh aur jharkhnd mein bachon ko bharti karne aur inhen istemaal karne ki mutawatar it-tila-aat masool hoti rahi hain. musallah groups ke khilaaf Security Forces ke Operations ke douran bachay halaak aur zakhmi hotay rahay hain. report mein sarkari data ke hawala se bataya gaya ke Naxalites se mutasirah ilaaqon mein 188 shehri halaak hue taham bachon se mutaliq koi makhsoos data dastyab nahi hai
1014.title: Aik saal mein 10 hazaar bachay dehshat gardi ke waqiaat mein halaak ya mazoor hue: UNO

news_detail: Indonesian jazeera bali par koh Augung ka aatish fishan jumaraat se phatt parna shuru sun-hwa, zaireen ilaqa mein rehne walay aik laakh dehation ko ghar chore dainay ka intebah

bali : Indonesia ke jazeere bali mein aatish fishan phatnay ki wajah se airport mein hazaron sayah phas gaye hain. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq bali mein aatish fishan phatnay se dhowen ke baadal aasmaanon ko chone lagey, chngaryan hawaon ke sath Fiza mein bikhar gayeen jab ke fiza mein hiddat ka izafah ho gaya. do hazaar meter oonchai taq dhowen ke kalm pahonch gaye hain. shehri intizamia ne red alert jari kardiya alawa azeen Anaguarah rai Airport ki 280 prwazon ko moattal kardiya gaya jis se 15 hazaar 7 so musafir hawai adday par hi phas gaye. muqami intizamia ke mutabiq aatish fishan phatnay se ird gird ilaqay mein abad aik laakh afraad abad hain jinhein ghar chorney ki hadaayat kar di gayi thi taham hakoomati intibah ke bawajood ilaqa mein ab bhi hazaron afraad –apne gharron mein mojood hain. mahireen arazyat ka kehna hai ke aatish fishan ke poori shiddat se kisi bhi waqt phatt sakta hai jis se barray pemanay par lave ke phelnay ke imkanaat numaya hain jab ke yeh khadsha bhi hai ke yeh aatish fishan kayi hafton taq mutharrak reh sakta hai. wazeh rahay ke Augung ka aatish fishan aakhri baar 1963 mein phataa tha jis se 1100 se zayed afraad halaak hue they.
886.title: Indonesia mein aatish fishan phat para, hazaron afraad phas gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik Engineering Taliba apne teen Seniors par is ki asmat raizi karne aur blackmail karne is ghanaoone feal ki filmbandi karne ka ilzaam aed kya hai. asmat raizi ki mutasirah Taliba ko is ke Seniors aik saal se is video ki bunyaad par blackmail kar rahay they. Andhra pradesh ke zila krishna mein police ney shikayat ki mosoli par tenu pralzam meem aed kya hai. do mulzim Siva Reddy aur Krishna Vamsi ney February  2017 mein hotel mein munaqidah aik birth d party mein lladki ke mashroob mein kuch mladya aur phir is ki mobayyana tor par asmat raizi ki. police ney kaha ke mulzim ney is feal ki film bandi bhi ki aur is se jinsi khwahish ki takmeel karne video ke zareya blackmail bhi kya. harasani ko bardasht nah karte hue 22 sala Engineering Taliba ney zila krishna mein agri peli mein college intizamia se shikayat ki’ lekin intizamia ney poli ce se shikayat nahi ki. mutasirah lladki ney kaha ke is ki bajaye intizamia ney ladkon se video zaya kardainay aur lladki se maffi mangnay ke liye kaha. police ke bamawajib teesray mulzim ney guzashta do mah se lladki ko blackmail karna shuru kyaavr 10 laakh rupay ada karne ka mutalba kya basorat deegar video ko awam mein phailadene ki dhamki di, jis par lladki ney sorat e haal ke baarey mein apne walidain se tabadlah khayaal kiya aur is ke waalid ney jummay ko police mein bazabta shikayat darj karwai. lladki ney chand mah qabal hi apna course mukammal karliya thatahm aik aur classe meet d parveen usay yeh kehte hue lladki ko apni jinsi khwahish poori karne ka mutalba kar raha tha ke is ke paas video ki copy mojood hai aur is ki jinsi taskeen ke mutalba ko poora nah karne ki soorat mein Website par video up load kardainay ki dhamki di. police ney ladkon par ijtimai asmat raizi aur jurm ki filmbandi karne aur usay black karne ke liye istemaal karne par aayi tea act ke tehat ilzamaat aed kiye. mutasirah ko medical tst ke liye bhaij diya gaya aur police ney kaha ke mazeed tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain.
898.title: Seniors ney Andhra ki Engineering Taliba ki asmat raizi ki

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen o Rukn Parliamnent Hyderabad Mr. Asaduddin Owaisi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi aur Sadar BJP Mr. Amit Shah par yeh challenge karte hue baras parre ke agar un mein juraat hai to woh Hyderabad parlimani halqa se muqaabla krdkhayin. woh aaj yahan aik zabardast rally ke baad khitaab karte hue kaha ke har koi Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen se Hyderabad ki nashist chean lainay koshan hai. unhon ney kaha ”mein inhen challenge karta hoon ke agar un mein juraat hai to woh Hyderabad se Majlis ke khilaaf muqaabla karkay dikhain. hatta ke mein Sadar congress Rahul gandhi ko challenge karta hon ke Hyderabad se intikhabaat mein muqaabla karen, yahi nahi balkay BJP aur congress dono mil kar bhi Majlis ko Hyderabad se shikast nahi day satke.’ ‘ Mr.Asaduddin Owaisi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko jadugar P C  Sarkar qarar dete hue markazi hukoomat par Aqliaton aur Daliton par kiye jaaney walay hamlon ko roknay mein nakami par sakht tanqeed ki. Modi, awam se keh rahay hain ke 25 June ko yom siyah manayeen. unhon ney yeh wazeh kiya ke awam ney gandhi jee ka qatal, babri masjid ka inhedam, gujrat ke fasadaat aur azad hindustaan mein paish anay walay deegar pur-tashaddud waqeat ko faramosh nahi kiye hain. unhon ney ilzaam aed kya ke hkmran BJP, RSS ke agenda ko is andaaz mein rubay amal laa rahi hai ke aqltyon ke sath imtiaz barta ja raha hai.
909.title: Modi, Amit Shah aur Rahul Gandhi ko Hyderabad se muqaabla karne Asad Owaisi ka challenge

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein “blue whale” video game se mutasir aik 12 sala ladke ne gilaay mein phanda daal kar khud kashi kar li. yeh waqea jumaraat ke roz Abha shehar mein paish aaya. mazkoorah ladke ke cosuon abdulah Fahid ne Al Arabiaia dot net ko bataya ke aas ke mamu ka beta blue whale game ke chungal mein phas kar apni jaan ganwaa betha jo bachon ko khail ke douran aglay marhala mein muntaqil honay ka challenge deta hai. Saudi sikoriti hakkaam maamla ki tehqiqaat kar rahay hain. wazeh rahay ke internet par blue whale Nami game Sarif ko 50 roz ke douran challenge karta rehta hai aur hatmi challenge mein woh khailnay walay se khud kashi ka mutalba karta hai. yeh game Sarif se is ki zaati maloomat ke ilawa aisi tasweer ya video bhi talabb karta hai jo challenge ko qubool kar ke mission poora karne ka saboot day sakay. abdulah Fahid ki janib se apne mamu ke betay ki khud kashi se mutaliq tweet social media par wasee pemanay par phail gayi. mukhtalif halqon ki janib se mutalba kiya gaya hai ke bachon ko is game ke khatray se bachanay ke liye mutaliqa idaray fori mudakhlat kar ke aagahi aur kari nigrani ko yakeeni banayen
923.title: Saudi Arabia mein “blue whale” game ke shikaar 12 sala ladke ki khud kashi

news_detail: Shumali Japan mein aik Japani starts up company ki janib se tayarkarda rocket, nakaam taur par daaghe janay ke chand seconds mein hi aag ke golah mein tabdeel hogaya aur zameen par gir kar tabah hogaya. Japan ke shumal bayeed mein waqay jazeera Hokkaido ke Taiki town mein interstellarTechnologies ne ‘MOMO-2’ rocket tayyar kya tha. Yeh rocket 100 kilomitr bulandi par khala pounchanay wala tha. Baghair aadmi ka khalaa hamza mein chorra janay wala 2. 7 million dollar laagat ka yeh rocket daaghe janay ke baad baa-mushkil 60 fate ki bulandi par pouncha hi tha ke achanak woh zameen par aana shuru sun-hwa aur zameen par girtay hi aag ki lapeto mein agaya aur saaray ilaqa mein dhuwan phail gaya. Is haadsa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi huwa hai.
944.title: Japani rocket daaghe janay ke sath hi gir kar tabah

news_detail: Thailand ke purisraar gharon mein gum honay wali bachon ki football team aur in ke coach ka tahaal kuch pata na chal saka aur un ke zindah rehne ke imkanaat waqt guzarnay ke sath sath maand padte jarahay hain. Aik hafta se zayed waqt guzarnay ke baad bhi Thai janglaat ke darmiyan mojood un garoon mein gumshudaa bachon ka koi suraagh nai mil saka. doosri janib bachao o operation ke liye America aur Bartania ke baad Australia ney bhi mahireen ka aik dasta Thai land bhaij diya hai. muqami hakkaam ka kehna hai ke garoon mein pani ki satah kam honay ke baad talash ka kaam mazeed taiz kardiya gaya hai. wazeh rahay Thai land mein under 16 football team ke 12 khiladi apne coach ke hamrah sair o tafreeh ki gharz se aik ghaar mein gaye they, jis ka dahana shadeed barish ke baad pani ney band kar diya. ittila mlitay hi imdadi teamon ney karwai shuru kar di thi, rescue hakkaam ka kehna hai ke ghaar taq pounchanay ke liye kisi aur rasta ki talaash mein hain taham khiladion ke zaati istemaal ka kuch samaan ghaar ke dhanay se mil gaya hai. Suba Chiang Rai  mein jahan Luang ghaar waqay hain wahan ke Governor Narongsak Osottanakorn ney aaj akhbaari numaindon ko bataya ke Thai Navy ki Rescue Team ke arkaan aik dahana ke bilkul qareeb pahonch gaye hain jahan samjha jata hai ke gumshudaa khiladion ney pana le rakhi hai. pani mein phansay hue un khiladion taq pounchanay ke liye ghouta Khor musalsal koshisho mein lagey hue hain. unhon ney kaha ke ghaar se inhen nikaal lainay ke baad un ke takhlia aur qareebi hospital muntaqil karne aur tibbi imdaad baham pohanchanay ka mukammal mansoobah tayyar rakha gaya hai. jadou garon ki aik team bhi ghaar mein phansay khiladion ka pata laganay hakkaam ki madad ko pahonch chuke hain magar woh bhi kuch kehnay ke muaqqaf mein nai hain.
959.title: Thailand, gharon mein gum bachon ka hafta baad bhi kuch pata na chal saka

news_detail: Uttarakhand mein musafir bus barsati naala mein ja giri jis ke nateeja mein 48 musafir halaak aur mutadid afraad zakhmi ho gaye. media ke mutabiq haadsa Uttarakhand ke Paudi Garhwal  zila mein paish aaya, haadsa ka shikaar bus mein 60 se zayed afraad safar kar rahay thay ke bad qismat musafir bus haadsa ka shikaar ho gayi. 45 musafireen brsr mauqa hi halaak hogaye jabkay mazeed teen musafireen hospital pohnchaye janay par murda qarar diye gaye. ittila mlitay hi police aur imdadi temen haadsa ke maqam par pohnchain aur bus mein phansay musafiron ko bahar nikaalte ki koshishen shuru kar dein. 8 zakhmion ko fauran Dhomkot hospital ke emergency ward mein pohanchaya. Aini shahideen naay bataya ke bus tizrftari ke baais driver ke qabose bahar hokar 100 meter gehray barsati naalay mein ja giri jis ke baad bus 2 hisson mein toot gayi. police aur imdadi teamon ke sath muqami afraad bhi bus ke musafiron ko imdaad pohanchanay mein masroof hain. Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat naay haadsa par –apne gehray ranj o dukh ka izhaar kya aur mahlukeen ke afraad khandan ke liye do laakh rupay aur zakhmion ke liye pachaas hazaar rupay muawza ka elaan kya
973.title: Uttarakhand mein musafir bus naala mein ja giri, 48 musafir halaak

news_detail: Aik alamnaak waqea mein Delhi ke mauza Barari mein waqay aik ghar ki chat se 7 khawateen aur 4 mardon sameit 11 afraad ki lashen mushtaba haalat mein bar aamad hui hain. halaak shdgan mein teen na baligh bhi shaamil hain. yeh waqea Barari ke sunnat nagar gali number 2 mein paish aaya. waqea ki ittila milnay ke baad police jab pohanchi to inhen mushtaba haalat mein 10 lashen jaal se lataki hui milein un ke mun aur ankhoo par lungi ke kapday ko phaar kar pattiyan baandhi gayi theen jabkay aik sun Raseedah khatoon ki laash zameen par pari thi. bataya ja raha hai ke woh khatoon un bachon ki maa hai. is baat ka andesha zahir kya ja raha hai ke un ka gala dabaya gaya hoga. parosion ke mutabiq kuch hi din qabal khatoon ki nawasi prinka ki mangni hui thi. khatoon ka teesra beta Chitturgarh mein rehta hai, jis ka naam dinesh hai. dinesh civil contractor hai aur woh abhi Chitturgarh mein hi hai. bataya ja raha hai ke mahlook kunba ki karanna ki dukaan thi. raat taqreeban pauney baara bajay unhon ney apni dukaan band ki thi. yeh dukaan rozana Ali alsbh hi khil jaya karti thi, lekin aaj subah jab aik aadmi doodh lainay gaya aur dukaan band dekhi, to is ki wajah jan-nay ke liye jab woh is ke ghar gaya to ghar ka darwaaza khula sun-hwa tha. woh seerihoon se oopar pouncha to dekha ke ghar ke log chat par lagi jaal se latkay hue hain. baad mein is ney dosray parosion ko is ki ittila di aur phir police ko bulaya gaya. mohalla ke logon ka kehna hai ke bhatih kunba rajsthan se yahan aaya tha. ghar mein sun Raseedah khatoon ke ilawa un ki aik beti, do betay, do bahuen, do potyaan, do potay aur aik nawasi thi. Poton ki Umar 16. 17 saal ke darmain bataaye jarahi hai. sun Raseedah khatoon ki nawasi Priyanka ki guzashta mah hi mangni hui thi, is ki bhi laash ladkhadte hui payi gayi. police ney is khsoos mein qatal ka aik muqadma darj karliya hai chunkay 77 sala khatoon ki mout dam ghatney se waqay hui. cheif minister Delhi Mr. Arvind Kejriwal ney maqam haadsa ka mushahida kya. Delhi police ki crime branch ko tehqiqaat tafweez kar di gayi hain. ghar ki talashi ke douran police ko kuch dasti tehreer par mabni notice miley hain jo khandan ke mazhabi umoor ki injaam dahi ki taraf ishara karte hain. police ney bataya ke notice isi andaaz mein paye gaye jis andaaz mein mutasireen ke moun aur aankh bandhay hue thay.
990.title: Delhi mein aik hi khandan ke 11 afraad ki lashen chat par dastyab

news_detail: Amrici sadar Donal Trump ke qanooni musheer Rudy Giuliani ke mutabiq” agar hum yeh kahin ke Irani nizaam ka ekhtataam qareeb hai to yeh haqeeqat se baeed ho ga “. unhon neh kaha ke Tehran mein nizaam ka suqoot aik saal ke douran waqay ho jaye ga. Hafta ke roz “Mujahideen Khalq ” ke zair qayadat Irani qaumi council baraye muzahmat ki conference se khitaab karte hue Giuliani ka kehna tha ke “Iran mein muzahireen ke khilaaf crack down aur tashadud aur halakaton ki tadaad yeh bawar karati hai ke azadi bohat qareeb hai aur is nizaam ka suqoot na Guzir hai “.  Giuliani ke mutabiq 2009 hamza mein aisa ho sakta tha taham Amrici hukoomat aas waqt Irani awam ke ehtijaj ke sath nahi khari hui, taham ab Amrici sadar ki janib se Iran mein muzahireen ke liye tayeed ka izhaar kya gaya hai. Trump ke musheer neh Europi mumalik ko bhi tanqeed ka nishana banaya jinhon neh Irani nizaam ke sath tijarti aur iqtisadi taluqaat barqarar rakhay hue hain.  Giuliani ke mutabiq Europi mumalik aisay nizaam ko raqum ki adaigi kar rahay hain jo khawateen aur bachon ko haqooq se mahroom karta hai aur logon ko qatal kar raha hai mehez is vaastaa ke aan ka nazriya ya mazhabi pas manzar mukhtalif hai.  Giuliani neh Irani nizaam ke sath kaam karne wali companiyon ke boycott aur Tehran par aed pabandiyan sakht karne ka mutalba kya. Trump ke musheer neh Amrici sadar ke Irani johri moahida se alahdgi ikhtiyar karne ke faisla ko saraha.  Giuliani neh is moahida ko khatarnaak qarar dete hue kaha ke Trump yeh bawar kara chuke hain ke woh duniya mein dehshat gardi ki sab se barri sarparast riyasat ke sath har gaz mamlaat nahi karen ge.  Giuliani ke nazdeek Iran mein aik ghair johri aur jamhoori riyasat tashkeel dainay ke liye mutabadil mojood hai jo insani haqooq ka ehtram kere aur aqliton ke haqooq ka tahaffuz kere. unhon neh zor diya ke haliya ehtijaj 2009 hamza se mukhtalif hain kyun ke is martaba muzahirey poooray Iran mein ho rahay hain jin mein har tabqa shaamil hai. apni guftagu ke ekhtataam par Trump ke musheer neh kaha ke” Iran mein ab tabdeeli ka waqt aa chuka hai. mein umeed karta hon ke aindah baras yeh conference Tehran mein ho gi”.

Dusri janib Amrici aur arab wafood neh Irani oppostion ki conference ke sath izhaar yak jehti karte hue mutalba kiya hai ke khatta mein Irani nizaam ka muqaabla bain al aqwami tor se kya jaye. Donal Trump ke strategic musheer Newt Gingrich neh –apne khitaab mein kaha ke “Ali Khamenei ka nizaam sabiq Soviet Union se kahin ziyada kamzor hai. haliya ehtajaji silsilay ke ilawa Iran mein shehrion ki muashi haalat neh Irani nizaam ko kamzor karna shuru kar diya hai “. idhar France mein Yemen ke safeer Riaz yasin neh yemeni sadar Abdul Rabba Mansoor Hadi ki janib se Irani awam ko salam paish karte hue kaha hai ke” hum Irani nizaam ki khuli aur dshmnanh mdakhlton par rokkk laganay ke liye mil kar kaam karen ge jis neh tamam hado ko paar kar liya hai”
1006.title: Saal bhar ke andar Irani nizaam ka suqoot ho jaye ga: Musheer Trump

news_detail: Agar aap Dubai mein kisi ki harkaat o saknaat ko camera ki aankh mein band karna chahtay hain to aisa mat karen. dosaron ki video ya tasweer kashi karna niji umoor mein mudakhlat karne ke mutradif hai aur nateeja mein 1,50,000 taa 5,00,000 darham yani 28 lakh rupay taa 93 lakh rupay jurmana ada karna hoga, alawa azeen aik saal qaid ki saza hogi. Dubai police ney is jurm mein 1 shakhs ko girftar bhi kar liya hai. Dubai police ney jummay ki shaam roads and tansport athartiz ( are tea ae ) kstmr care center par rotay hue shakhs ki video bananay par 1 shakhs ko girftar karliya, mulzim ney video samaji rabton ki Websites par bhi jari kar di thi jo dekhte hi dekhte vayrl hogayi. are tea ae ney apni tweets mein likha ke video mein nazar anay wala rota sun-hwa shakhs cars taxi ka mulazim nahi aur na hi is ke naam par koi bohat barray jrmane registered hain. mazkoorah shakhs apne rishta daar par honay walay 20 hazaar rupay dirham ke jurmana ki maloomat lainay head quarters aaya thajo cars taxi frnchayz ka driver tha, are tea ae ke mutabiq tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain ke driver par jurmana kyun kya gaya. are tea ae ney kaha ke hum ney mutaliqa hakkaam par zor diya hai ke jis shakhs ney video banakar social media par jari ki is ke khilaaf qanooni karwai ki jaye. Dubai police ney bhi awam ko khabardaar kya hai ke baghair ijazat kisi bhi shakhs ki tasweer ya video nah banayen kyunkay aisa karna qanonan jurm hai. cyber crime ke 2012 ke Federal Decre Law number 5 ke mutabiq jo bhi shakhs kisi aur ke niji maamla mein dakhal andazi kere ga usay aik laakh pachaas hazaar se 5 lakh darham tak ke barray jrmane ka saamna karna parsakta hai jabkay is ke sath aik saal qaid ki saza bhi di ja sakti hai
1017.title: Dubai mein baghair ijazat video ya tasweer banana jurm qarar

news_detail: Turkey ke Sadar Tayyab Erdogan ne mulk ke Sadarati intikhabaat mein apni kamyabi ka elaan kardiya hai aur kaha hai ke un ki party ne bhi Parliamani intikhabaat mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. itwaar ke din hui dohri raye dahi mein 56 million se zayed raye dahindon ko vote daalnay ka mustahiq qarar diya gaya tha. malik ki tareekh mein pehli martaba sadarat aur parliman ke intikhabaat back waqt hue they. Sadar Tayyab Erdogan ne ne ghair sarkari nataij ka hawala dete hue kaha ke woh intikhabaat jeet chuke hain. unhon ne apni Istanbul ki rihaishgah par kaha ke intikhabaat ke ghair sarkari nataij wazeh ho chukay hain. un nataij ke mutabiq malik ne mujh par sadarat ki zimma daari aur ohda sonpa hai. unhon ne kaha ke un ki party justice and development party ( AK party ) ki zair qayadat mahaaz ne bhi Parliamani intikhabaat mein kamyabi haasil karli hai. Asal oppostion party ne kaha ke is waqt shikast qubool karlena qabal az-waqat hogaavr kaha kay hamein yaqeen hai ke Erdogan ne 8 July ki azmaish se bachney hanooz 50% votes ki had ko paar nahi kya hai. Supreme Election Council ne hanooz qatee nataij ka elaan nahi kya hai. Hukumat Turkey ke aik tarjuman Bekir Bozdag ka kehna hai ke Tayyab Erdogan dobarah muntakhib ho chukay hain. Unhon ne apne twitter par likha ke Turkey ke awam ne Erdogan ku naiy nizaam ke tehat Turkey ke pehlay Sadar/ aamilana ikhtiyarat ka haamil Sadar muntakhib karliya hai. Turkey awam ab se Sadar Erdogan kahey gi.

Qabal azeen mausula ittila ke mutabiq Turkey mein Sadarati intikhabaat ke liye polling ke baad ginti ka amal jari hai aur kal daaley gay voton mein 70. 5 fisad ki ginti mukammal hogayi hai. Sadarati intikhabaat ke ghair hatmi aur juzwi nataij ke mutabiq Sadar Rajab Tayyab Erdogan ko qareeban 56 fisad votes ke sath apne hareef umeedwaron par bartari haasil hai. Sadar Erdogan ke madd e muqabil Secular Republican Party ke umeedwaar Mehram Anech ne 29. 4 fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Agar koi bhi Sadarati umeed waar kal daaley gay voton mein se 50 fi sad se ziyada vote nah le saka to 8 July ko dobarah dosray marhalay mein Sadarati intikhabaat hon ge. si an an tark aur dosray muqami nashriyati idaron ke mutabiq Sadar Erdogan ki hukumran jamaat Insaaf aur Taraqqi Party ( AK Party ) ne Parliamani intikhabaat mein daaley gay 61. 1 fisad votes mein se 45. 18 fisad votes haasil kar liye hain. is ki ittihadi qaumi tehreek party ne 11. 78 fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Is terha un dono jamaaton ko Parliamani intikhabaat mein wazeh bartari haasil honay ki umeed hai. Turkey mein pehli martaba wast mudti Sadarati aur Parliamani intikhabaat ke liye bayakk waqt vote daaley gay hain. Dusray do Sadarati umeedwaron Qaum Parast Good Party ke Miral Aeksaz ne saat fisad vote haasil kiye hain. Kurd Nawaz Peoples Democratic Party ke umeedwaar Salahuddin Demrits ke haq mein 6 fisad se bhi kam vote daaley gay hain. Democratic Party  ko Parliamani intikhabaat mein bhi koi ziyada pazeerai haasil nahi hosaki hai. is ko 10 fi sad se bhi kam vote haasil hue hain. agar woh kul daaley gay voton mein se das fisad se ziyada vote haasil na kar saki to phir is ke hissay mein parliament ki koi nashist bhi nahi aaye gi.
877.title: Sadar Turkey Tayyab Erdogan ne apni kamyabi ka elaan kardiya

news_detail: Muzaffar Nagar. Yahan aaj aik bhangaar ki dukaan mein hue aik dhamaka mein 4 afraad bashamool do rahgir halaak hogaye aur teen log zakhmi hogaye. Police ney bataya ke shehar ke Servant Road ilaqa mein waqay aik scrapshop mein dhamaka se wahan puranay samaan ko ulat palat karne walay 50 sala Tazeem aur 55 sala Shahzad barsar mauqa halaak hogaye. Superintendent of Police (city) Umbir Singh ney kaha ke deegar do mahlukeen mein do rahgir hain jin ki shanakht hanooz nahi hosaki. Dhamaka ke baais do rahgir zakhmi hogaye thay jo hospital mein jaanbar na hosakay. Mazeed teen log jo dhamaka ke waqt wahan se guzar rahay thay zakhmi hogaye jinhein hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Circle Officer Harish Bhadoria ney kaha ke dhamaka us waqt huwa jab chand log dukaan mein puranay samaan ko tod rahe thay. Police aur fire brigade ke ohdedar muqam e haadisa pahonch gay aur bachao kaam ka aaghaz kardiya. Police ohdedaron ney bataya ke muqam haadisa ko mohar band kardiya gaya hai aur us maaddah ka pata laganay ke liye jaanch shuru kar di gayi jis ke baayes dhamaka huwa. Police ke sarbarah Anant Dev ka kehna hai ke dhamaka Uttar Pradesh ke maghribi hissay mein waqay muzaffar Muzaffarnagar mein huwa, dhamaka ka sabab aur is ki noiyat ke baarey mein mukhtalif pehloun se tehqiqaat jaari hain, dhamaka time device se kya gaya ya is ki wajah kuch aur thi abhi is ki tasdeeq nahi kar satke taa hum dhamaka shadeed noiyat ka tha jis ki awazz kai kilometer tak suni gayi. Anant Dev ka kehna hai ke dhamaka ke maqam se khoon alood hathora aur iskaro driver mila hai jis ki bunyaad par gumaa noon hai ke dhamaka kisi cheez ko tornay ke douran huwa.
891.title: Uttar Pradesh ki scrap shop mein dhamaka, 4 halaak

news_detail: Saudi Arbia ki Police ne un it-tila-aat ki tardeed kar di hai ke Saudi hukoomat ki khawateen ko gaari khud chalanay ki ijazat ke baad pehlay hi roz khatoon driver se pehla hadasa hogaya. Social Media par is khsoos mein aik video vayrl hogaya jis mein yeh daawa kya gaya ke hadasa paish anay wali gaari aik khatoon chala rahi thi taham khush qismati se is hadasa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi sun-hwa. Saudi khawateen ko driving ki ijazat 28 saal baad mili hai. Social Media mein yeh khabar phailai gayi ke ijazat ke pehlay hi roz Abdul Aziz road par khatoon driver ki gaari hadasa ka shikaar ho gayi. hadasa mein khatoon driver mehfooz rahen, is khsoos mein aik video bhi jari ki gayi jis mein yeh dekha ja sakta hai ke gaari ka agla hissa zameen ki janib jabkay gaari ka pichla hissa sun-hwa mein muallaq hai. tabook ke red krisnt ke aik ohdedar ne kaha ke yeh afwaah hai. unhon ne bataya ke operations room ko yeh ittila di gayi thi ke tabook ilaqa mein 30 sala mard ko hadasa paish aaya. inhen king Khalid hasptl ko muntaqil kya gaya jahan un ki haalat mustahkam hai
903.title: Saudi Arab mein khatoon driver se pehlay hadasa ki afwaah

news_detail: Paris : France mein musalmanoon par hamla karne ki mansoobah bandi karne walay dayen baazu se talluq rakhnay walay 10 shiddat pasand esaion ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq France aur bahera room ke jazeera Corsica mein dayen baazu se talluq rakhnay walay 10 intahaa pasandon ko girftar kya gaya hai, yeh afraad mukhtalif maqamat par musalmanoon ki abadi aur msajd par hamla karne ke liye mansoobah bandi kar rahay thay. girftar muliman mein aik aisa 65 sala French shehri bhi shaamil hai, jo maazi mein police ahelkaar raha hai. hirasat mein liye gaye shiddat pasandon ko namaloom maqam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai jahan un se tafteesh ke douran ahem maloomat ke husool ki tawaqqa ki ja rahi hai. France ke wazeer e dakhla Gerard Collomb  ne shiddat pasandon ki giraftari ki tasdeeq karte hue director general intelli jins ka shukriya ada kya. media se guftagu karte hue unhon ne dgsi ki dehshat gardi ke khilaaf karwaiyon ki tareef ki aur dehshat gardi aur shiddat pasandi ko jarr se ukhaar phainknay ke azm ka iada kya hai. wazeh rahay ke France mein shiddat pasandon ki janib se aqlityon ki ibadat gaahon ko nishana bananay aur tarkin watan ke khilaaf nafrat amaiz muhim chalanay ke waqeat mein izafah dekhnay mein aaya hai jis ke sad-e-baab ke liye France ki hukoomat ne malik ki intelli jins idaray ke sarbarah ko ahem zimma dariyan tafweez ki theen.
920.title: France mein musalmanoon par hamlon ke mansoobay nakaam, 10 intahaa pasand girftar

news_detail: Wizarat e dakhla ney intibah jari kya hai ke Wazeer e Azam nerinder Modi ki jaan ko khatrah hai. un ki jaan ko ab taq se bara khatrah hai. wizarat dakhla ney tamam reyaston ke police sarbarahon ko maktoob likh kar aagah kiya hai ke Wazeer e Azam nerinder Modi ko na maloom khatrah la-haq ho gaya hai. qaumi salamti council ney Wazeer e Azam ki hifazat se mutaliq mukhtalif idaron ko bataya hai ke malik ki sab se barri siyasi jamaat ki qayadat chunkay Modi ke hathon mein hai isi liye 2019 ke aam intikhabaat ke liye woh sab se ahem hadaf hain, lehaza inhen ghair zurori naqal vhrkt, logon mein ghul mil jaany aur hujoom se door rehne ka mahswara diya gaya hai. wizarat dakhla ney Modi ki Security ke hawalay se naye zabita e ikhlaq jari kiye hain jin ke tehat kisi ko bhi Modi ke qareeb anay ki ijazat nahi hogi hatta ke special protikshn group (SPG) ki paishgi ijazat ke baghair ghair mutaliqa wazeer aur afsaraan bhi Modi ke intehai qareeb nahi aapayenge. samgha jata hai ke SPG ney Modi kojo hkmran BJP ke asal muhim chalanay walay hain, mahswara diya ke woh road shows mein kami kar dein jis se bara khatrah la-haq rehta hai. aik ohdedar ney bataya ke Wazeer e Azam se kaha gaya hai ke woh 2019 intikhabaat ki muhim mein rallies mein hissa lainay ki bajaye jalson se khitaab karen chunkay is mein hifazati intizamaa karna sahal hota hai. close protikshn team ( si pi tea ) ko Wazeer e Azam ki salamti ke naye qawaid se aagah kardiya gaya hai aur inhen la-haq khatrah ke baray mein aagah kardiya gaya. si pi tea se kaha gaya ke zaroorat parney par Wazeer e Azam ke qareeb anay walay wuzraa aur ohdedaron ki bhi jama talashi li jaye. Modi ki qareebi hifazati team ko bhi un ke aas paas ghair zurori insaan ki mojoodgi ka khayaal rakhnay ke liye khaas hadaayat jari kar di gayeen hain. guzashta mah sakht Security ke bawajood 1 shakhs Modi ke peeron ko chone mein kamyaab ho gaya tha, wizarat dakhla ka kehna hai ke Modi se awaami raabtey ko bhi mazeed kam karne ki zaroorat hai. Modi ke sath chalne wali kmandoz ki hifazati team ke arkaan ki tadaad mein izafah kya jaye ga. police ka kehna hai ke hum Wazeer e Azam ko hadaayat to nahi kar satke magar un se awaami masrofiyat ke baray mein thora mohtaat honay ki darkhwast zaroor ki hai. pauney police ki janib se Wazeer e Azam ko jaan se maardenay ki saazish se mutaliq adalat ko 7 June ko aagah kiye jaany ke baad Modi ki Security ka azsare nau jaiza liya gaya.
936.title: Modi ki jaan ko khatrah la-haq

news_detail: Myanmar ki Afwaaj ney riyasat Rakhine Operation ki Command ke aik General ko fouj se bar tarf kardiya jis ke nateeja mein zayed az  7 laakh Rohingya musalman malik ki sarhad paar karkay parosi Bangladesh mein panah Guzeen hogaye. Myanmar ki Musallah Afwaaj ney jo Tatmadaw kehlati hai, myanmar ke 7 senior military ohdedar Bashmole bar tarf shuda Major General Maung Maung Soe par European Union ki janib se aayed kardah taaza tahedidaat ke chand ghanton baad hi aik bayan mein bartarfi ka elaan kya hai. European Union Council ney aik bayan mein kaha ke saton par is liye tahedidaat aed kiye gaye hain ke woh 2017 ke dosray wast mein Rakhine riyasat mein Rohingya awam ke khilaaf haqooq insani ki sangeen khilaaf vrzyon aur mazalim mein mulawis rahay hain. un khilaaf vrzyon mein ghair qanooni qatal, jinsi tshddavr munazzam andaaz mein Rohingya awam ke gharon aur amarat ko aag lagana shaamil hai. April mein European Union ney myanmar par aslah tahedidaat ko sakht kardiya tha aur Tatmadaw ko military traning aur taawun par imtenaa aed kardiya thajo myanmar ki naamzad shehri qayadat wali hukoomat ke control se bahar hogayi thi. keneda ney bhi myanmar par taaza tahedidaat aed kar di hai. Tatmadaw ney aaj jari kardah bayan mein kaha ke Major General Maung Maung Soe ko intehapasandon ke hamlon se nimatnay mein naaqis karkardagi par bar tarf kardiya gaya hai. Maung Maung Soe 2017 ke avaakhr mein kiye gaye tabadlah se pehlay western command ke sarbarah they jo Rohingya musalmanoon ke khilaaf kiye gaye operation ki nigran car thi. aik aur military ohdedaar jin par tahedidaat aed kiye gaye hain woh Third Bureau of Operations ke Deputy Major General Aung  Kyaw Zaw hain, inhen istifa dainay ki ijazat di gayi hai. bayan mein un ke talluq se kaha gaya ke un ki karkardagi mein kuch khamiyan theen. writers ke sahafion ki janib se aik ijtimai qabar ke daryaft kiye jane ke baad April mein 7 fojion ko 10 Rohingya Muslims ko qatal karne mein mulawis honay par jail ki saza di gayi
948.title: European Union ki tahedidaat ke baad Myanmar ney General ko barkhast kardiya

news_detail: Thailand mein bachon ki Football Team coach sameit sailaabi pani se bharay Gaar mein phans gayi, navy ke tairaak aur under water drones ne talashi muhim shuru ki thi taham pani ki satah barh janey aur taiz barish ke baais bachao ke kamon ko earzi tor par rokkk diya. khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq bachon ki Team hafta ki shumali Thailand mein soobah Chiang Rai mein Tham Luang Nang Non gaar mein Naujawan Khiladi pani mein phans gaye hon ge .

Yeh Team hafta ki shab lapata hui thi, Team mein giyarah se solah baras ke baara bachay aur un ka pachees sala coach shaamil hai, shadeed baarisho ke baais pani se bharay Gaar ke bahar bachon ki cyclen aur un ke jootay bhi mil gaye hain. chay se das kilometer lambay Gaar ke pani mein navy ke tairaak, under water drones aur imdadi kaarkunon ki temen bachon ki talaash kar rahi hain. soobah Chiang Rai ke deputy governor Passakorn Boonyalak ne kaha ke hunooz hamein umeed hai ke Gaar mein phansay hue Khiladi zinda hon ge
967.title: Thailand: Bachon ki Football Team sailaabi pani se bharay Gaar mein phans gayi

news_detail: Khayaal rahay ke Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne Muslim aksariati mumalik Iran , Yemen , shaam, Somalia, Chad aur Libya ke bashindon par America mein dakhla par pabandi aayed ki thi baad azan is fehrist mein shumali Korea aur Venezuela ko bhi shaamil kya gaya tha. America ke cheif justice jaan robrts ne Donald Trump ke sadaarti hukum nama ke khilaaf dair ki jaanay wali darkhwaston ko mustard kardiya jis mein kaha gaya tha ke is faisla se musalmanoon ke khilaaf imtiazi sulook barta gaya ya phir Amrici Sadar ke paas yeh ikhtiyar nahi ke woh yeh faisla le saken. cheif justice ne ahthyat brtte hue Trump ke muhajreen aur bilkhushoos musalmanoon ke khilaaf ishtial angaiz bayanaat ki tayeed nah karte hue kaha ke Trump ki is policy ke muaser honay ke hawala se hum kuch nahi keh satke hain. doosri janib Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne bhi samaji rabita ki Website par apni tweet mein khushy ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke’ Supreme Court ne Trump ki safri pabandi ko barqarar rakha hai ‘. wazeh rahay Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne guzashta saal ibtidayi tor par 6 Muslim mumalik par 90 roz ke liye safari pabandi aayed ki thi jisay baad azan qanooni shakal day di gayi thi lekin is faisla ko Supreme Court ki matehat apilit court ne ghair aaeni qarar dete hue kaladam qarar dyatha. is sadaarti hukum nama ke khilaaf America bhar mein muzahirey kiye gay aur baad azan Trump intizamia ne is adalti faislay ko Supreme Court mein challenge kya tha jis ne ibtidayi tor par safri pabandi ko juzwi tor par bahaal kya tha.
983.title: U S Supreme Court ka Muslim mumalik par safari pabandi barqarar rakhnay ka faisla

news_detail: Holland ke ewaan zaireen ke baad ewaan baala ne bhi naqaab par juzwi pabandi ka bill Manzoor kar liya, jis ke baad kayi awaami muqamat par naqaab par pabandi lagadi gayi hai. bil ki manzoori ke baad public tansport, taleemi idaron, sahet ke idaron aur aspatalon mein naqaab par pabandi hogi. dayen baazu ke leader Geert Wilders ne naqaab par pabandi se mutaliq bil ki manzoori ke baad harzah saraai karte hue kaha hai ke yeh malik mein d aslamayzishn ki janib pehla qadam hai, agla iqdaam Netherlands ki tamam msajd ko band karna hoga. wazeh rahay ke belgium, France , Denmark aur spain sameit 13 Europi malik pehlay hi naqaab par pabandi laga chuke hain. dutch ke 75 rukni chimbr ne is khsoos mein 31 ke muqaabla 44 arkaan ki manzoori se yeh bil Manzoor karliya jo 2016 se ewaan ki manzoori ka muntazir tha. is amtnaa ke haq mein Holland ki chaar ke mnjmlh teen partiyan haq mein theen. darasal dutch kabeena ne is mansoobah ko 2015 mein hi manzoori day thi. is qanoon ki manzoori ke baad amtnaa ki khilaaf warzi par 400 Euro yani taqreeban 31, 927 Hindustani rupay jurmana aed karne ki tajweez hai
999.title: Holland ke awaami muqamat par naqaab par pabandi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Dukhtar Chief Minister wo Rukn Lok Sabha Nizamabad K Kavitha ne bil akhir Rukn Rajya sabha o musheer hukoomat Telangana  D Srinivas ko un ki mukhalif party sar garmion ki Padaash mein party se kharij karne ka mutalba kardiya hai. aaj bazabta tor par K Kavitha ne apni Nizamabad rahaish gaah par aik press conference mein D Srinivas ki mukhalif party sar garmion ki nishandahi karte hue inhen party se bar tarf karne ke mutalba par mabni Chief Minister o party sarbarah  ke Chandar shikhr rau ke mosooma maktoob ki naqal paish ki. is mauqa par party se talluq rakhnay walay chand arkaan assembly aur party ke senior qaideen bhi mojood thay. yeh maktoob saddar zila TRS ke zareya rawana kya gaya hai. D Srinivas se rabt peda karne par unhon ne fori koi rad-e-amal zahir nahi kya .

Guzashta chand dinon se party halqon mein D Srinivas ke mustaqbil ke baarey mein mukhtalif qiyaas aarayyan ki jarahi theen. jab se D Srinivas ke farzan D Arvind ne BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar ki tab hi se D Srinivas kute are s mein nazar andaz kiye jaaney ko wazeh tor par mehsoos kya ja raha tha. party programon mein bhi D Srinivas ko faramosh kya jaaney laga tha. inhen programon mein stage par madoo karna bhi gavaaraa nahi kya ja raha tha jis ko D Srinivas khud mehsoos karne lagey thay. guzashta chand dinon se yeh it-tila-aat masool horahee theen ke D Srinivas Delhi mein Congress party ke senior qaideen se rabita qaim kiye hue hain aur woh Congress party mein shumuliat ka zehan bnarhe hain. yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke party halqon mein yeh baat mashhoor hochuki thi K Kavitha aindah intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha ki bajaye assembly ke liye muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhti hain. yeh kaha jaaney laga tha K Kavitha halqa assembly Jagityal se muqaabla karne ka zehan bnalya hai. isi liye woh Jagityal par ziyada tawajah dainay lagi hain magar d Arvind ke BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karne ke baad inhen aindah intikhabaat mein Nizamabad Lok Sabha ke liye BJP ke aik taaqatwar umeed waar ke tor par ubhara jaaney laga jis ki wajah se Nizamabad halqa mein TRS ko sakht muqaabla darpaish ho sakta hai. bataya jata hai ke un halaat ke paish e nazar Chief Minister ne apni Dukhtar se kaha ke woh assembly ki bajaye Lok Sabha ke liye apni tawajah markooz kere. doosri janib D Srinivas apne farzand ke BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar kar lanay ke baais aik ajeeb sorat e haal se dochar thay. Androon TRS inhen mushtaba nazron se dekha jaaney laga tha .

Telangana ki siyasat par gehri nazar rakhnay walon ka khayaal hai ke D Srinivas ko darasal –apne siyasi mustaqbil se ziyada apne dono frzndon ke siyasi mustaqbil ki fikar la-haq hogayi hai. inhen bhi yeh yaqeen hai ke un ke farzand ke Nizamabad Lok Sabha se muqaabla karne ki soorat mein TRS mein un ki waqat baqi nahi rahay gi aur agar TRS se K Kavitha hi muqaabla karti hain to un ke farzand ki kamyabi ke imkanaat mohom ho jatay hain. Nizamabad mein chunkay Congress party hunooz taaqatwar nahi ban payi hai is liye agar woh Congress mein dobarah shumuliat ikhtiyar kar lete hain to Congress mein aik nai jaan askati hai. is terhan Nizamabad Lok Sabha ke liye muqaabla dorkhi ki bajaye sah rukhi hojaye ga aur voton ki taqseem ki soorat mein BJP ki kamyabi ke imkanaat barh jatay hain. isi liye woh TRS se alhdgi ki soorat mein BJP ki bajaye Congress mein shumuliat ko tarjeeh day rahay hain .

D Srinivas ko party se be dakhal karne ke mutalba par androon TRS party yeh behas shuru hogayi ke aakhir kin bunyadon par shikastkhorda D Srinivas ko party mein shaamil kya gaya aur inhen ohdon aur rutbon se nawaza gaya aur aaj phir un ki wafadaari par shak karte hue inhen bar tarf karne ka mutalba kya ja raha hai. party ke senior qayedeen ka yeh kehna hai ke TRS party ne apni hareef siyasi partiyon ko kamzor karne doosri partiyon ke tamam ahem qaideen ko targheeb dete hue TRS mein shaamil karliya aur inhen rijhaane ke liye ohdon se bhi nawaza jabke Telangana jad-o-jehad se hi party ka parcham thaamnay walay qaideen ko yaksar nazar andaz kardiya gaya hai. party ke senior qaideen ne naam zahir nah karne ki shart par bataya ke guzashta chaar baras taq party ke wazraa, muntkhiba awaami numainday aur ohday panay walay qaideen ne inhen nazar andaz kar rakha tha, hatta ke un qaideen ke paas un se baat karne ki bhi fursat nahi thi magar ab intikhabaat ke paish e nazar un qaideen ko ab telephones bhi anay lagey hain aur un se shkaytan yeh bhi kaha ja raha hai ke woh party sar garmion se kyun kinara kashi ikhtiyar kar rahay hain. un qaideen ka kehna hai ke yeh sab intikhabaat ke paish nazar kiya ja raha hai aur jon hi intikhabaat khatam ho jaien ge woh phir se apni party mein ajnabi ho jaienge
1022.title: D Srinivas aur TRS

news_detail: Aik chaukas musafir ney 26 nav-umar ladkiyon ko smuggle honey se bacha liya. Media ke mutabiq riyasat utar pradesh mein 1 shakhs train mein safar kar raha tha ke is ney mehsoos kya ke yeh larkiyan pareshani mein hain aur ru bhi rahi hain. is tweet par sikoriti ohdedaron ney Muzaffarpur. Bandra Awadh Express Train se ladkiyon ko bchalya jin mein ziyada tar no umar theen. is ney apne tweet par Railway ko tweet kya tha. Is ney tweet kya ke woh train ke S-5 coach mein safar kar raha hai yeh mehsoos kya ke taqreeban 25 ladkiyan rorhi hain aur ghair mehfooz mehsoos kar rahi hain. Musafir ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi, wazeer railway Pyosh Goel, Junior Minister Manoj Sinha, Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh yogi aadtih nath ko apne tweet mein tag kya tha. Tweet intibah ke ghanton andar Varanasi aur Lucknow mein ohdedar, Railway Police aur Railway Protection Force ke ohdedar vn ke sath harkat mein aagaye aur ladkiyon ko bchalya. Gorakhpur mein railway police ney child line ke sath police ke Antitrafficking Squad ko taawun faraham kya, baad azan kuch police ohdedar saada libaas mein captain ganj mein train mein daakhil hue aur inhen Gorakhpur taq scart faraham kya. yeh larkiyan do mard admion ke sath payi gayi theen jin ki umrein 22 aur 55 baras ki theen. Ladkiyon ke walidain ko aagah kardiya gaya.
896.title: Musafir ke aik tweet ney 26 ladkiyon ki jaan bchali

news_detail: Saudi Arabia mein guzashta chand barson ke douran mukhtalif shahriation ki haamil gharelo khadimaon ki janib se qatal aur dhaawon ki mukhtalif karwaiyon ka irtikaab kya gaya “Al Arabia dot net” ke mutabiq is douran 10 badtareen juraim drjِ zail hain:
912.title: Saudi Arabia: Gharelo khadimaon ke irtikaab kardah 10 bhayanak tareen jarayim

news_detail: Bangkok: Thailand mein rescue ahelkaar zair e aab ghaar mein phansay 13 mein se 6 bachon ko bahafazat nikaalte mein kamyaab hogaye hain. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq imdadi team ke ehalkaron ne kamyaab rescue operation ke douran ziraab ghaar mein phansay school football team ke 12 kam sun khiladion aur coach mein se 6 bachon ko bahar nikaalte mein kamyaab ho gay hain. rescue team ne 6 bachon ko do waqfon mein ghaar se bahar nikala. Ghaar se nikalay jane walay pehlay 4 bachon ko ambulance ke zareya field hospital le jaya gaya jahan un ka jismani muaina kya gaya jab ke deegar dobchon ko ghaar ke dhanay par qaim camp mein ibtidayi tibbi imdaad di gayi baad azan un do bachon ko bhi hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. rescue team, Thailand behria aur Amrican Navy ke aala hukkaam ne aik aala satah ke ijlaas mein ghaar mein phansay bachon ko nikaalte ke liye inhen teraaki sikahnay, pani nikal jane ka intzaar karne aur bachon tak pounchanay ke liye dosray rastay ke a? pshn par ghhor kya jis ke baad a? j subah dramayi andaaz mein imdadi kaam ka aaghaz kya gaya. wazeh rahay ke school football team ke 12 nau umar khilari aur coach 30
June ko picnic manatey hue aik ghaar mein daakhil hue jahan achanak pani bharnay ke baais yeh log zair aabb ghaar ke ikhtitami hissa mein phas gay they. rescue team ne 2
July ko un bachon ka suraagh laga liya tha jis ke baad operation mein taizi aagai thi.
924.title: Thailand ke ghaar mein phansay 13 mein se 6 bachon ko bahafazat nikaal liya gaya

news_detail: Tehran: Iran ne Parliament aur Ayatullah Khamini ke mazaar par hamlon ke ilzaam mein 8 afraad ko phansi day di. irani adliya ke sarkari khabar rasan idaara maizaan news agency ke mutabiq Daulat Islamia Iraq o Shaam ( ISIS ) se talluq rakhnay walay 8 afraad ko szaye mout day di gayi. phansi panay walon mein Sulaiman Muzafari, Ismael Sufi, Rehman Behrose , Majeed Murtuzai, Sarosh Azeezi, Ayub Ismayli, Khusru Ramazani aur Usmaan Behrose shaamil hain. 7 June 2017 ko Tehran mein Parliament aur Ayatullah Khamini ke mazaar par hamlon mein 18 afraad halaak aur 50 se zayed zakhmi ho gaye thay. ISIS ne is hamla ki zimma daari qubool ki thi .

Is hamla mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein barray pemanay par pakar dhkrh hui jin mein se 20 afraad par muqadma chalaya gaya. un mein se 8 ko phansi day di gayi hai jab ke baqi 12 se zayed mulzimaan ke khilaaf adalti karwai ab bhi jari hai. Parliament aur mazaar par hamla ke rad-e-amal mein irani force pasdaran inqilab ne shaam mein ISIS ke thikanon par missile hamlay bhi kiye thay
939.title: Iran ne Parliament par hamla ke ilzaam mein 8 afraad ko phansi daydi

news_detail: Hyderabad. zila Prakasm ke Aarthavedu mandal mein intermediate mein zair taleem aik taalib ilm ne apni hi class mein parhnay wali aik larki ko is ki taraf se diye gaye mohabbat nama ko hawala karne se inkaar karne par satwen jamaat ke aik taalib ilm Rajesh ko aag lagadi. Police ne bataya ke Ranjit is baat par barham tha ke Rajesh ne is ke diye gaye mohabbat nama ko is ki mehbooba ke hawala karne ki bajaye usay phaar diya tha. is ne ladke par petrol chhrhk kar aag lagadi. buri terhan jhulas jaaney walay Rajesh ko qareebi hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya hai, is ki haalat tashweesh naak hai. police ne Ranjit ko girftar karte hue jail bhaij diya hai.
955.title: Mehbooba ko Love Letter dainay se inkaar par ladke ne kamsin ko aag lagadi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Chief Ministerr Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ne Law Commission of India se aaj wazahat ki ke TRS, 2019 se mulk mein tamam reyaston ke liye bayak waqt assembly intikhabaat ke ineqad ke liye amaada hai. TRS Rukn Parliament Mr. B. Vinod Kumar ne aaj is mauaqqaf se Law Commission ko waaqif karwaya  ne is masla par Dehli mein tamam siyasi partiyon se un ki aaraa haasil karne aik ijlaas talabb kya tha. Baadazan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke TRS, mulk mein parlimani intikhabaat ke sath Riyasati Assemblion ke bayak waqt intikhabaat ke liye tayyar hai. unhon ne bataya ke is khsos mein Chief Ministerr Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ka aik maktoob election commission ke hawala kya hai. unhon ne kaha ke yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke riyasat mein qabal az waqt intikhabaat munaqqid ho saktay hain aur TRS kisi bhi waqt intikhabaat ka saamna karne tayyar hai jis se election commission ko bhi waaqif karwaya gaya hai. Mr. Vinod Kumar ne kaha ke mulk mein Parliament aur tamam Riyasati Assemblion ke liye bayak waqt intikhabaat munaqqid karne ke masla par mabahes kayi dahon se jari hai aur moodi hukoomat ya bi jay pi ne is masla ko abhi nahi cherra hai. Law Commission 1986 se is masla par tabadlah khayaal kar raha hai aur chand siyasi partiyan aur reastain yaksaa noiyat ke intikhabaat ke liye amaada nahi hain is liye ke un ki hukomatain mukhtalif waqton par muntakhib hoti rehti hain. unhon ne kaha ke Parliament aur Assemblion ke liye bayak waqt mushtarqa intikhabaat ka ineqad mufeed hoga markaz aur reyaston mein kaamil hukmarani yakeeni hogi aur waqt aur paison ki bachat hogi. do tlgo reyaston mein 2019 mein intikhabaat honay jarahay hain aur hamara khayaal hai ke doosri reastain bhi aisa hi karen. hatta ke moodi hukoomat ke daur mein bhi har saal kisi nah kisi riyasat mein intikhabaat hotay rahay. unhon ne kaha ke raqam aur waqt ki bachat ki barbadi se bachney tamam reyaston mein bayak waqt intikhabaat ki tajweez behtar hai
969.title: TRS, Parlimani o Riyasti Assemblion ke bayak waqt intikhabaat ke haq mein

news_detail: Sadar Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan ka apne ohda ka jaiza lainey se qabal hi Mulk mein aik neye farmaan ke tehat hukkaam ney mukhtalif mehakmon se talluq rakhney walay 18500 se ziyada sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf  kardiya hai aur Mulk bhar mein baara tanzeemon, teen akhbarat aur aik Television Channel ke dafatir bhi band kardiye hain. Turkey ke sarkari Gazette mein itwaar ko shaya kiye gay farmaan ke mutabiq bar tarf shuda 18632 mulazmeen mein 8998 police afsar aur ahelkaar hain. Unhein dehshat gard tanzeemon aur groupon se talluq aur qaumi salamti ke manafi sar garmion mein mulawis honey ke ilzaam mein bar tarf kya gaya hai. sarkari hukum ke tehat bartarfion ki talwar musallah afwaj ke ehalkaron par bhi chalaye gayi hai aur army ke 3077 fojion, fazaiya ke 1949 ehalkaron aur behria ke 1126 ehalkaron ku mulazimaton se nikaal diya gaya hai. Wizarat Insaaf aur is se mutaliqa idaron ke 1052 mulazmeen, neem fouji daston Gender Mary ke 649 arkaan aur 192 sahili muhafizon ko bhi farigh kardiya gaya hai. neye farmaan ke tehat 199 asateza ko subukdosh kya gaya hai jabkay fouj aur mukhtalif wazaraton se talluq rakhney walay 148 mulazmeen ko bahaal kardiya gaya hai. Wazeh rahay ke July 2016 mein sadar Rajab Recep Tayyip Erdogan ke khilaaf nakaam fouji baghaawat ke baad se Turkey mein hungami haalat nafiz hai aur is ki muddat mein no martaba tosee ki jachki hai. tark media ke mutabiq sarkari mulazmeen ki bartarfi ka yeh aakhri hukum nama ho sakta hai aur hungami haalat bhi somwaar ko khatam honey ka imkaan hai. mojooda hungami haalat ke hukum ki muddat 19 July ko khatam hogi. qabal azeen July 2016 ke baad se hungami haalat ke hukum naamon ke tehat aik laakh das hazaar se ziyada sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf kya ja chuka hai jabkay mazeed hazaron ko ghair qanooni sar garmion mein hissa lainey ke ilzaam mein moattal kardiya gaya tha. Turkey ney America mein muqeem Fatahullah Golen par sadar Recep Tayyip Erdogan ki hukoomat ka takhta ulatney ke liye musallah fouji baghaawat ke tane baney ban’ney ka ilzaam Ayad kya tha. tark hukoomat ney jin sarkari mulazmeen ko bar tarf ya moattal kya hai, un ki aksariyat ka talluq Golen tehreek hi se hai. hukoomat is ko ”Fatah Allah Terror Organization” ke naam se pukarti hai aur is ney is saal ke awail mein kaha tha ke is tanzeem se talluq ke ilzaam mein 77 hazaar se ziyada afraad ko girftar kya gaya hai. taham allama fatah Allah Golen ney nakaam baghaawat se latalqi zahir ki thi aur un ka bilisraar kehna hai ke un ki tanzeem puraman hai.
986.title: Turkey mein 18 hazaar se zayed mulazmeen bartarf

news_detail: Israeli parasiciuter general ney zirhrast Turk khatoon sayah par dehshat gard tanzeem se wabastagi aur shyoni riyasat ko khatray mein daalney mein ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad karne ki tayariyaan shuru kar di hain. doosri janib khatoon sayah ki giraftari aur is ke khilaaf muqadma par Turkey aur Israel ke darmain taluqaat mein mazeed tanao samney aaya hai. Turk khatoon shehri Ebru  Ozkan ko Israeli fouj ney 11

June 2018 ko Ben Gurion hawai adda se istanbul jatay hue hirasat mein le liya tha. 27 sala Ozkan ko khufia idaara ‘Shin Bet’ ke ahelkaron ney hirasat mein liya jis ke baad is ke khilaaf mashkook andaaz mein Israeli fouji adalat mein trial shuru kardiya gaya tha aur un par Hamas ko senkron dollars muntaqil karne ka ilzaam aayed kya gaya. Ozkan ke wakeel ka Umara Khamaisi ney ‘Reuters’ ko bataya ke un ki moklh ko hirasat ke arsa mein apne wakeel se milney aur Turkey mein baat cheet karne ki ijazat bhi nahi di gayi. Un ka kehna tha ke Israeli hakkaam Ozkan par be bunyaad muqadma chala rahay hain. is par Ayad ilzaam mein kaha gaya hai ke Ozkan ney qeemti itar ki paanch botelain smuggle ki theen jinhein farokht karkay woh raqam Hamas ko dena chahti thi. un par israeli riyasat ki salamti ko khatray mein daalney aur aik dehshat gard tanzeem se talluq ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad karne ki tayari ki ja rahi hai. wakeel difaa ka mazeed kehna hai ke shyoni hakkaam ney Ozkan par islami tehreek muzahmat ( Hamas ) se talluq ka ilzaam Ayad kya hai taham Ozkan ney tamam ilzamaat mustard kardiye hain. guzashta jummay ko Turk wazeer kharja Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu ney Israel mein girftar apni shehri ke baarey mein poochy gay aik sawal ke jawab mein kaha ke’ Ozkan hamari behan hain aur un ki ba izzat rihayi ke liye har mumkin iqdamaat kiye jayen ge. unhon ney Israel par ilzaam Ayad kya ke woh Turk shehrion ko al quds mein dakhlay se rokney ke liye un ke khilaaf be bunyaad ilzamaat ke tehat muqadmaat qaim karkay inhen khauf zada kar raha hai.
998.title: Itar ki sheeshian “smuggling” ke ilzaam mein Turk sayah Israel mein girftar

news_detail: Aik aur Saudi ladki online video game ‘Blue Whale’ ka shikaar ban gayi hai. Madinah Munawwara ki aik 13 sala ladki ney yeh game ka hissa ban’nay ke baad –apne ghar mein phansi le kar khudkushi karli. is se qabal bhi Saudi Arbia mein aik 12 sala larka Abdul Rahman al ahmari ney June ke avaakhr mein yeh khail khailtay hue aisa hi iqdaam karte hue khud ko halaak kardiya tha. is jaan lewa khail ney ab taq 100 se zayed jaanen le li hain. bataya jata hai ke is khail ka hissa ban’nay walon ko 50 dinon mein online diye jaaney walay 50 challenges ko poora karna hota hai. ibtida hi se is game mein diye jaaney walay challenges khatarnaak hotay hain aur jon jon khailnay wala un challenges ko poora karte hue agay barhta jata hai, challenges khatarnaak se khatarnaak tareen aur jaan lewa ban jatay hain. Saudi Arbia mein haliya hafton mein yeh dosra waqea hai. yaad rahay ke is khail ke maujjid Philipp Budeikin  ko roosi hakkaam ney guzashta hafta girftar karte hue usay jail bhaij diya hai. is ney aik interview mein yeh qubool kya tha ke is ka maqsad no Umar logon ko khudkushi ki taraf dhakelna hai. Saudi arab mein Madinah Munawwara ki police ney aik bayan mein sarkari tor par is baat ki tasdeeq ki hai ke khudkushi karne wali ladki ke iqdaam ke peechay asal muharrak video game hai. is hawala se media tarjuman Hussain Al Khathany ney bataya ke jummay ki subah 8:00 baje Security hukkaam ko yeh ittila mousool hui ke aik bachi ko murda haalat mein hospital pohanchaya gaya hai. bachi ke ahal khanah ney bataya ke aan ki beti ney Madinah Munawwara ke junoob mein waqay aik gaon mein –apne ghar ke andar gilaay mein phanda daal kar khudkushi kar li aur yeh aik video game ke assar ka nateeja hai
1010.title: Blue Whale game ney Saudi Arbia mein aik aur jaan le li

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Secretary Dr. S. K. Joshi ney ohdedaron ko idayat di ke rud e Musi River nadi ke farogh aur greater Hyderabad municiple karporasion ke hudood mein double bedroom makanaat ki taamer se mutaliq kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye. Secretriat mein senior ohdedaron ke sath jaiza ijlaas mein kaha ke Musi River ke farogh ke kamon ke ziman mein Zila Collector aur deegar mutaliqa mehakma jaat ke mabain rabita o irtebaat ke liye aik khusoosi ohdedar ka taqarrur kya jaye ga. Director Enforcement Vigilance and Disaster Management Mr. Vishwajit ki zair e qayadat khusoosi team ko jo malba ki safai ke kamon ki nigrani karti hai munasib amlah aur saaz o samaan faraham kiye jany chahiye. malba ko daalnay ke liye aik earzi dmpng yard ki nishandahi ki jaye. unhon ney kaha ke malba ke mazeed ambaar ke tadaruk ke liye tamam imkani maqamat par blue sheets daal diye jayen. unhon ney kaha ke rod Musi River aur buffer zone par qabzon ki nishandahi ke Survey ka kaam androon aik mah mukammal karliya jaye. Survey mein qabzin ke samaji o muashi haalat aur un ki abadi ko bhi shaamil kya jaye. mehakma aab paashi ke ohdedaron ko idayat di gayi ke godavri se taaza pani chorra jaye. isi terhan mushtarqa muaina kya jaye, takhmeenah tayyar kya jaye aur master plan tayyar kya jaye. Principal Secretary mehakuma Baldi Nazam o Nasq o Shehri Taraqqiat Mr. Aravind Kumar ney kaha ke aik International Design muqaabla munaqqid kya gaya jis mein 10 teamon ney apna registration karwaya aur 9 agencio ney apne design daakhil kiye hain. qabza jaat ki barkhastgi ke liye khusoosi hikmat e amli waza ki gayi hai. Musi River ke farogh ke pehlay marhala mein teen kilometer ki patti par shajar kaari ki jaye gi aur dosray marhala mein s tea piz taamer kiye jayen. tatheer shuda pani baghbani aur ziraat ke liye istemaal kya jaye ga. Survey aur qabzon ki barkhastgi ke kamon ke baad taraqiyati kaam shuru kiye jayen ge. unhon ney kaha ke bapu ghaat ke qareeb Musi River aur eesa nadiyon ke sngm se mut-tasil 61 aekar araazi par aik khusoosi sayahati prajkt farogh diya jaye ga .

Chief Secretary Mr. s ke joshi ney GHMC ohdedaron ko hidayat di ke GHMC hudood mein 109 muqamat par double bedroom, hall kitcehn ki taamer ke kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye. mahana asaas par darkaar funds ki tajaweez hukoomat ko rawana ki jayen. Police Outposts, Fire Stations, CC TV cameras ki tanseeb, External & Internal Infrastructure ki tajaweez mutaliqa mehakumay tayyar karen. Police aur mutaliqa Zonal Commissioners GHMC ki janib se tafseeli muaina ke baad tamam Zones mein Traffic Islands ki nishandahi ki jaye. Chief Secretary ney kaha ke pedastrians ki sahoolat ke liye zebra crossings, junctions ke farogh aur sarkon ki tosee ke kaam bhi agay bherhaye jayen
1028.title: Musi River ke farogh aur double bedroom makanaat ke kamon mein sura_t paida ki jaye: Chief Secretary

news_detail: Kurnool-Wazir Panchayat Raj hukoomat Andhra Pradesh Nara Lokesh ke Kurnool ke daura ke mauqa par Anjuman Taraqi Urdu Kurnool ki janib se Urduzban ki taraqqi wo deegar masayal ke silsila mein numayindagi ki gayi. Numaindagi mein bataya gaya ke riyasat Andhra Pradesh se shaya honay walay Urdu akhbaraat ke liye mehakma it-tila-aat o taaluqaat e aamma se talluq ke bagair raast salana kam se kam 10 crores rupey Manzoor karkay ishtiharaat jari karen, Kurnool mein qaim Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University mein Sheikh ul jamia ki haisiyat se khidmaat injaam dainay walay Dr. Muzafar Ali ku Urdu se la-taluqi aur Ahle Urdu se dushmani ki buniyad par Urdu University ku zawal par lane ke nateeja mein bar tarf karte hue kisi behtar Sheikh ul Jamia  aljamah kar taqarrur amal mein layajaye, shehar Kurnool mein qayim Government Minority Junior College mein khidmaat anjam dainay walay gair Urdu daan Principal ke bajaye kisi Urdudan Principal ka taqarrur karte hue Regular tadrisi wo gair tadrisi amlah ka taqarrur amal mein layajaye, Government Minority Pre-metric Girls Hostel mein khidmaat injaam dainay wali Muazzif ST khatoon ke bajaye kisi Urdudan aur harkiyati khatoon ka taqarrur karte hue Muslim ladkiyon ki taleemi taraqqi mein haath bataya jaaye . Minorities Finance Corporation, mein khidmaat injaam dainay walay gair Urdu daan Executive Director Hemachandra ki  karkardagyon par tahqiqaat karte hue kisi Urdudan Executive Director ka taqarrur amal mein layajaye, isi daftar mein  aarzi khidmaat injaam dete hue darkhwast guzaron ke sath badtameezi karne walay Mukaram Khan ko bartarf kiya jaye, berozgaar Muslim naujawanon ku rozgaar se marboot karne ke liye Minorities Fianance Corporation ki janib se jari kiye janey walay bank link qarza jaat ke bajaye raast qarza jaat jari kiye jayen, Dolhn scheme ku Chandranapally Kanuka mein tabdeel karne ke bajaye dulhan scheme hi ku barqarar rakha jaaye aur Minorities Welfare Department se munsalik rakhen, Roshni package par pur tarha amal karte hue riyasat ke har sarkari daftar par Urdu zaban mein Boards lkhwayin aur aqliati dafatir mein khidmaat injaam dainay walay tamam mulazmeen ke liye Urduzban lazim qarar dein, Wazeer e Azam pandrah nukati programme ke silsila mein har maah pabandi se nashist muqarrar karen, tamam afsaraan ki shirkat kolazmi banayen aur is puri tarha amal karen. is wafad mein sadar Kareemullah Khan sahib ke alawa, Afsar Pasha, khaleel Ahmed , Rasheed Ahmed aur Azmatullah Khan shareek rahay
904.title: Wazir Panchayat Raj ke dora ke mauqa par Anjuman Taraqi Urdu ki numayindagi

news_detail: Iran mein police ney social media bilkhushoos ‘Instagram’ par dance ki video post karne ke ilzaam mein mutadid khawateen ko hirasat mein liya hai. un mein aik 18 sala do Sheza bhi shaamil hai. insta gram par mutanazia video post karne ke ilzaam mein ghair pesha war rqasaon ki grftaryon par awaami halqon mein sakht gham vghse ki lehar daud gayi hai. doosri janib hakkaam ka kehna hai ke khawateen ki giraftari’ inqalabi eqdaar’ ki tauheen ke jurm mein amal mein layi gayi hai. Micro Bloging Website ‘Twitter’ par samaji kaarkunon ney “Maida . hadbadi hash tag’ aur ‘برقص تا برقصیم’ ( tum raqs karo taakay mein bhi raqs karoon ) ke unwanat se muhim shuru ki hai jis mein shehrion ney barh charh kar hissa liya hai. police ney dance ki tarbiyat dainey wali mutadid khawateen ko bhi girftar kya hai. hakkaam ka kehna hai ke yeh grftaryan adalat ke hukum par amal mein layi gayi hain. girftar khawateen ko sarkari TV par ‘aitraaf jurm’ karne par majboor kya gaya hai. girftar ki gayi khawateen mein do ki shanakht Maida aur binaa ke naamon se ki gayi hai aur un ke mobayyana itrafi bayanaat bhi TV channel prnshr kiye gaye hain. Maida ko yeh kehte suna ja sakta ke is ney –apne dance ki video is liye insta gram par post ki taakay usay ziyada se ziyada followers milein taham usay muqami moseeqi ke muqaabla mein aur maghribi moseeqi ko Iran mein pasand kiye jane ki ziyada tawaqqa nahi. sarkari TV par dukhaay gaye bayan mein Maedeh ko rotay hue yeh kehte dekha ja sakta hai ke is ney ghirakhlaqi iradah se –apne dance ki footage insta gram par post nahi ki. mein sirf yeh janna chahti thi ke log usay kitna pasand karen ge
918.title: ‘Instagram’ par dance ki video post karne par dosheeza girftar

news_detail: French President Emmanuel Macron ne pirke roz parliment se khitaab mein islam ke hawala se aik pur-israr bayan diya jis par siyasi halqon mein miley jalay tabsaray jari hain. unhon ne yaqeen dilaya ke woh malik mein Muslims mazhabi azadi ke liye qanoon saazi karen ge. French President ne maghribi Paris mein’ Versailles ke maqam par parliment ke ijlaas se khitaab mein kaha ke’ islam aur jamhooria France ke darmiyan paicheedgi ka koi sabab hargiz nahi hai ‘. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke woh khizaa ke parlimani season mein France mein Muslims ke umoor ko mazeed sahal bananay ke liye naye qawaid waza karen ge. un ka kehna tha ke hum Muslims ko –apne malik mein apne mazhab ke mutabiq zindaganian basar karne ke liye mazeed saholaten muhayya karen ge aur inhen har mumkin azadi faraham karen ge taakay woh –apne mazhabi umoor ko kisi rukawat ke baghair ada kar saken. President Emmanuel Macron ke is bayan par ewaan mein taliyan bajai gayeen. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke islam aur jamhooria France ke darmiyan taluqaat mein kisi qisam ki paicheedgi nahi honi chahiye. islam ke baray mein sakht geer soch hamein tashkeek aur riyasti qawaneen ko mazhabi azadi mukhalif qanoon saazi ki taraf nahi le ja satke. un ka kehna tha ke France mein logon ko samaji aur mazhabi azadi hai aur malik ko kisi khaas mazhabi tabqa ki alamat banana insani aur mazhabi azadi ke manafi hai. khayaal rahay ke France mein agarchay abadi ki aksariyat esaiyat par mushtamil hai magar malik mein Muslims ki tadaad saath laakh se zayd aur msajd ki tadaad 2500 batayi jati hai.
933.title: French President ka Muslims ko mukammal mazhabi azadi dainay ka elaan

news_detail: Thailand mein guzashta do hafton se ghaar mein phansay mazeed4 bachon aur un ke coach ko aaj bahafazat bahar nikaal liya gaya jabke is se qabal 8 bachon ko bahar nikaal liya gaya tha. Is ke sath hi rescue operation mukammal hogaya. Operation mangal ki shaam mukammal huwa. yeh operation intehai khatarnaak tha jisay Thailand behria ke kmandoz naay bakhoobi paya takmeel taq pohanchaya. bachay ghaar se nikalay jane ke baad hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain taham un ki haalat khatrah se bahar hai. tamam bachon aur coach ki zehni haalat bhi behtar btai jarahi hai. Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ki aik report mein bataya gaya hai ke bachon ka blood test aur x-ray kiye gaye hain. sirf do bachon mein phephray ki soozish ka shuba zahir kya gaya hai jin ka aalaj jari hai. bachay abhi mazeed kuch roz hospital mein zair e ilaaj rahen ge. kuch bachon ka talluq junior foot baal team se hai jabkay aik un ka coach hai. rescue operation pichlle kayi din se waqfay waqfay se jari raha. 12 bachay aur un ke coach 23 June ko ghaar mein pani bhar jane ke sabab phas gaye they
946.title: Ghaar mein phansay tamam bachon konkal liya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad shehar mein Metro rail Stations jadeed o asri Smart Parking saholaten baham pohanchaney wazeer Baldi nazm o nasq o shehri taraqyat Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ki hadaayat par Hyderabad Metro Rail Limited ( HMRL ) ney Miyanpur-Ameerpet-Nagole ki karkard  30 kilometer patti par waqay 24 Metro Rail Stations par awaami-khangi shiraakat daari ki asaas par ISPMS (Integrated Smart Parking Managment Systme) ke farogh ka mansoobah tayyar kya hai aur bolyon ko qatiat day di hai. Managing Director HMRL Mr. N. V. S. Reddy ney bataya ke teen companiyon ney boli mein hissa liya tha M/s Zruti Solutions ko licencee ke taur par muntakhib karliya gaya hai jo M/s Egile Parking Solutions Private Limited ke sath technical collaborations haasil kere gi, aakhir uz zikr Company Smart Parking ka bain-ul aqwami tajurbah rakhti hai. M/s Zaruti Solutions  8 crores rupay ka sarmaya lagaye gi aur un 24 Metro railway Stations par aalmi miyaar ka ”on street smart parking facilities” baneye gi aur un ki dekh bhaal kere gi aur chalaye gi. Yahi nahi balkay 20 barson ki muddat mein HMRL ko 7 crores rupay ki raqam bhi ada kere gi. ”Park Hyderabad” ke brand naam ke tahet HMRL ka marboot smart parking system aik jame digital solutions asasi hogajo saaray parking umoor ke ihata kozyad_h insani mudakhlat ke baghair chalaye ga. yeh aik stizn mobile App bhi rakhay ga jo Metro Stations par tamam on street smart parking lots se bar waqat maloomat faraham kere ga. Two wheelers aur four wheelers ke malkin apne GPS ko istemaal karte hue kisi bhi Metro Station ka safar karne se qabal apni matlooba parking ki farahmi digital jaanch kar saktay hain. Yeh log apne smart phone par apni location service ko istemaal kar saktay hain aur system un 24 Metro Stations par taqreeban 4, 000 two wheelers parking bays aur 400 four wheelers parking bays mein apni gaari ko park karne dastyab bays ko display kere ga. parking shrhin two wheelers ke liye fi ghanta 3 rupay aur four wheelers ke liye 8 rupay fi ghanta honge
963.title: Hyderabad Metro Stations par jadeed parking saholaten

news_detail: Madina Munawwara ki Development Authority ney Masjid Nabwi ki ziyarat ke liye aney walay zaireen ki sahoolat aur sadkon par traffic ka boojh kam karne ke liye chaar zameen doze surangen (under paas) tayyar kiye hain. Al Arabia dot net ke mutabiq Madina Munawwara Development Authority ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Masjid Nabwi ke zaireen ke liye yeh nai sahoolat Madina ke governor shehzada Faisal ban Salman bin Abdul Aziz ki masaaye ka nateeja hai. Paidal under paas number 2 aur 3 ki lambai 125 meter hai jin ke dono atraaf mein chaar electric seedhiyan aur mazoor afraad ke liye aamad wo raft ke rastay baneye gaye hain. Majmoi taur par surangoon ke andar 12 barqi seedhiyan aur aam seedhiyan bhi tayyar ki gayi hain jin se guzar kar Masjid Nabwi ke shumali simt tak ba aasani pouncha ja sakta hai. un paidal raastoon ki tayari se jahan zaireen ko Masjid Nabwi taq barah e raast rasai ki sahoolat miley gi wahein Masjid ke gird markazi maqam tak gadiyon ke rush se bhi bacha jasakay ga. Masjid Nabwi taq paidal rasai ke liye tayyar kardah un charon zameen doze raastoon ko jadeed tareen sahulaton se aarasta kya gaya hai. surangoon ko thanda rakhney ke liye ayyrkndishn ka bandobast hai. aag lagney ki soorat mein aag bujhaney ke alaat, roshni, Hidayat ke liye behtareen sound system, shehrion ki mehfooz naqal wo harkat ke liye monitoring camera aur jagah jagah shehrion ki zaroori reh numai ke liye screen nasb hain. yeh charon zameen doze rastay Masjid Nabwi ke qareeb waqay colonies se marboot hain. salam tunnel Masjid Nabwi ke junoob maghrib mein, Al Awali junoob mashriq ki simt aur do nai surangen Masjid ke shumali markazi ilaqay se milaane ke liye tayyar ki gayi hain.
976.title: Zaireen Masjid Nabwi ke liye 4 paidal zameen doze rastay tayyar

news_detail: Riyadh: Fitness club mein khawateen ke liye mukhtas jagah mein na munasib libaas ke sath daakhil honay walay ghair mulki shakhs ko Mulk badar kardiya gaya. Arab Media ke mutabiq Social Media par viral honay wali aik tasweer par Saudi hukkaam ney notice letay hue nah sirf ghair mulki ko mumlikat se bahar nikaal diya balkay mazkoorah club ko earzi tor par band kardiya. twitter par share honay wali tasweer mein dekha ja sakta hai ke short pehnay aik ghair mulki shakhs fitness club mein khawateen ki intzaar gaah mein daakhil hogaya aur wahan mojood bahijaab khawateen usay dekh kar dang reh gayeen. aik khatoon ney is manzar ko camera ki madad se mobile mein mehfooz karliya aur baad azan is ki shikayat social media ke zareya hakkaam taq pohanchai, Saudi wizarat labour and social development ney muamlay ka notice letay hue tehqiqaat ke baad ghair mulki shakhs ko Mulk badar kardiya jab ke fitness jim ko earzi tor par band kardiya.
988.title: Short pehan kar Saudi khatoon ke samnay anay wala shakhs Mulk badar

news_detail: Indore. City Police ne budh ko aik 27 sala gungay o behray nojawan ko burhenapa namodaar hokar do khawateen ko video call karne ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya. mulzim ki tarha khawateen jinhon ne shikayat darj karwai samaat o goyai se mahroom hain. Superintendent of Police Indore Cyber Cell Mr. Jitendra Singh ne bataya ke Amul Gaikwad ko jo aik hotel mein kaam karta hai, Maharashtra ke zila Ahmednagar se girftar karliya gaya. Do goongi o behri khawateen ne guzashta mah shikayat darj karwai thi ke aik namaloom shakhs inhen Whatsapp aur Emoji Applications ke zareya chehra par mask laga kar barhena haalat mein inhen video calls kar raha hai. SP ne bataya ke hum ne amol gayikwad ko girftar karkay ishaaron ki zabaan ke mahireen ki madad se pooch gach ki hai. Mr. singh ne bataya ke mulzim ne iqraar kya ke goongon o behroon ke wats up group se shikayat kunindah khawateen ke phone numbers haasil karte hue inhen fehash video callls kiye hain
1012.title: Khawateen ku fahush video calls karne par goonga o behra nojawan girftar

news_detail: New Delhi: Bihar mein 2019 Lok Sabha aur Assembly intikhabaat mein BJP aur JDU ke darmiyan rassa kashi ki khabron ke darmiyan BJP ke Qaumi Sadar Amit Shah jumeraat ko Patna puhanche hain, jahan unhon ne wazeer aala Nitish ke sath nashta kya aur raat ko ashayih par bhi dobarah mulaqaat karen ge .

. Bihar mein BJP. JDU hukoomat ki tashkeel ke baad Amit Shah ki Nitish Kumar se yeh pehli mulaqaat ki hai. samjha jata hai ke is mulaqaat mein 2019 ke Lok Sabha wo Assembly intikhabaat mein nashiston ki taqseem par baat cheet karenge yani baday bhai aur chhotey bhai ke kirdaar ka faisla hoga. Nistish ne pehlay hi saaf kiya hai ke agar woh nashiston ke btware se mutmaen nahi hotay to agay sochen ge. Raat ka khana Nitish Kumar ki mojooda rahaish gaah 7 circular road par hoga. yahan bhi Bihar BJP ke kuch makhsoos qaideen maduo hain, lekin jahan tak nashiston ki taqseem par baat cheet ka maamla hai BJP aur JDU ke qaideen ka yeh maanna hai ke koi qatee faisla aik do nashiston mein karlena mumkin nahi hai. mulaqaat ke sath dono partiyon ke darmiyan nashiston ki taqseem par ghhor vkhoz shuru hojaye galikn kab taq Nitish Kumar ko un ki marzi mawafiq nashistain di jayen gi yeh sab kuch Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Amit Shah par inhisaar karta hai. BJP qaideen ka kehna hai ke qaumi Sadar pehlay apne party kaarkunon aur qaideen ke sath tabadlah khayaal karte hue party ki haqeeqi surathaal aur Nitish Kumar ke sath mafahmat ke baad ki surathaal ka jaiza len ge aur phir is baat ka intzaar kiya jaye ga ke JDU kitni nashiston par apna daawa paish karti hai. is waqt, Bihar ke bohat se rehnumao ka maanna hai ke Nitish ke saath mufahimat karna behtar hai. Agar Nitish NDA se alehadgi ikhtyar karte hain to azeem ittehaad ko is ka faida uthae ga.
1027.title: Bihar mein hukoomat ke qiyam ke baad, Nitish Kumar. Amit Shah ki paheli mulaqat

news_detail: Kabul. Afghanistan ke shumal mashriqi subah Panjsher ke zila Khenj ke aik dehaat Peshghor mein kal raat zameen khiskane se kam az kam 10 afraad halaak aur 300 makanaat tabah hogaye. ohdedaron ne bataya ke do Helicopters bachao teamon aur raahat kaari saaz o samaan ke sath mutasirah moza ko rawana kiye gaye. kal raat zameen khiskane ke baais yeh dehaat beh gaya tha. National Disaster Managment Authority ke tarjuman Umar Muhammadi ne bataya ke zameen khiskane ke baad malba ke neechay dab jane walay afraad ko bachanay tarjeeh di jarahi hai. Afghanistan mein kayi khitun mein barish ke mausam mein waqfa waqfa se zameen khiskane ke waqeat paish atay hain, janglaat ke katao ki wajah se un waqeat mein izafah hwa hai. Sadar Afghanistan Ashraf Ghani jo Nato Conference mein shirkat ke liye Brussels mein hain hakkaam ko Hadayat di ke mutasireen ko darkaar saholaten baham pohanchai jayen.
1036.title: Afghanistan mein zameen khiskane se kam az kam 10 halaak 300 makanaat tabah

news_detail: Hussam al Sabhi dehshatgrdanh hamla mein apni dono aankhon se mahroom hogaye they .

Shaed aap ko yaad hoga ke aaj se do saal peshtar 29 ramdhan al mubarak ko Masjid Nabawi mein aik dehshat grdanh khud kash hamla huwa tha. Is hamla mein Emergency Services ka aik ahelkaar apne peshawarana faraiz anjaam dete hue apni beenaye kho baitha, androon aur beron Mulk taweel ilaaj ke baad aaj woh watan wapas to agaya hai magar Rouza e Rasool salle Allahau aleh wasallam ki pehray daari par apni aankhon ki beenaye ke khojane ke baais hamesha ke liye mahroom hochuka hai. Saudi Arab ka yeh bahadur siphai ‘Hussam al Sabhi al Harbi’ hai. Masjid Nabawi mein khud kash hamla ke nateeja mean zakhmi honay ke baad inhen alryaz ke aik hospital muntaqil kya gaya aur wahan se Spain le jaya gaya. Ab un ke zakhamo ka ilaaj hochuka hai magar beenaye ki Nemat se woh mahroom hogaye. Agarche is Nemat ki mehroomi nay inhen Rouza e Rasool salle Allahu alehi wasallam ki pasbani ke Sharf se bhi mahroom kardiya hai magar is Nemat ki mehroomi bhi aik Nemat se kam nahi hai ke un ka naam un logon mein shaamil hogaya jinhon nay apni zindagion ki parwah kiye baghair Rouza e Rasool salle Allahu alehi wasallam ki pasbani karte rahay hain. ‘Al Arabia dot net’ nay Hussam al Sabhi al Harbi ke halaat wo khayalat par roshni daaltay hue bataya hai ke alhrbi ko darjah soum ka Shah abdalaziz award se bhi nawaza gaya .

Apne sath paish aeye alamnaak waqea ki rudaad bayan karte hue alhrbi nay bataya ke’ meri aankhon ki beenaye chalay jana koi barri baat nahi. mein nay –apne watan ke liye pesha warana zimma daari ki anjaam dahi mein beenaye khoyi hai aur yeh bhi mere liye kisi dosray security ahelkaar ki terhan baais Sharf hai. Masjid Nabawi mein emergency forces ke ahelkar Haram ki hifazat par maamoor they aur roz maraah ki bunyaad par apni duty ke auqaat mein tabdeeli bhi karte. hamari zimma daryon mein Masjid Nabawi ki hifazat ke sath wahan anay walay zaireen, Hajjaj wo Mutamareen ki har mumkin madad bhi shaamil thi. mujhe Masjid Nabawi ki hifazat par mamoor hue daidh saal guzar gaye they. do baras qabal 29 ramdhan ko hum apne apne makhsoos muqamat par security ki zimma dariyan anjaam day rahay they. mein Haram e Nabawi se chay meter daur tha. aftaari se chand minute qabal hum saat afraad aik jagah jama hue taakay Rouza iftaar kar saken. Abhi hum baithy hi they ke aik ajnabi shakhs hamaray qareeb aaya. is ki harkaat kaafi ajeeb wo gahrib theen aur woh dekhnay se hi mashkook lag raha tha. is ney aik bag utha rakha tha aur Haram ke barey mein pooch raha tha. Is ka yeh sawal ghair fitri tha. Jab hamein is ke barey mein mazeed shak guzra aur hum ney is ke khilaaf karwai ka socha hi tha ke is nay khud ko dhamaka se uda diya. Is ke nateeja mein mere chaar saathi mauqa par shaheed aur mein aur aik dosra saathi ahelkaar zakhmi hogaye. zakhmi honay wala dosra security ahelkaar kayi roz tak Coma mein raha. inhen Allah nay Shifa di aur ab woh tandrost hain’.

Al Harbi ney apne sath aeye waqea ke barey mein mazeed bataya ke jab mujhe hospital muntaqil kya gaya to is waqt mere jism par jagah jagah jalan ho rahi thi magar beenaye mein is waqt kho chuka tha. taweel ilaaj ke baad mein tandrost hogaya. phir mein nay shadi ki aur ab aik beti ‘Turuf’ ka baap hoon. Mere ilaaj ka dorania paanch mah par muheet raha. Zakhmi honay se qabal hamari mangni hochuki thi aur shadi ki tayyariyan ki ja rahi theen. Dehshat gardi ke alamnaak waqea nay meri baen aankh mukammal khatam kar di jab ke dayen aankh ka Adsa bhi nakara hogaya. yun mein beenaye ki Nemat se mukammal tour par mahroom hochuka hon’ .

aik sawal ke jawab mein Hussam alhrbi nay bataya ke jab mein ilaaj ke baad watan wapas lota to awam ke aik jam e gafeer ne mera istaqbaal kya. Mujhe fakhr hai ke mein apne watan aur haram Nabawi ke difaa ke douran apni beenaye se mahroom huwa. mein nay apni Basarat watan ke liye qurbaan ki hai. Hamari hukoomat ney mere ilaaj mein koi kami nahi chodi aur androon wo bairoon Mulk ilaaj ke liye har mumkin taawun kya. Guzashta mangal ko mujhe Shah Abdul Aziz award se bhi nawaza gaya jo mere liye aik aur aizaz hai. hukoomat aur riyasat ki is be payaan tavajja ko hamaray heroes aur bahadur sipahi kabhi faramosh nahi kar saktay
916.title: Rouza e Rasool ki pasbani karte hue beenaye se mahroom sipahi

news_detail: Syria mein insani haqooq ke nigaran group اAl-Marsad ney peer ke roz bataya ke shumali soobah Aleppo mein aik askari thikaane par bomb baari ke nateejay mein Bishar hukoomat ke humnawa 9 musallah afraad halaak ho gay. Shami hukoomat ney itwaar ki shab honey wali is karwai ka ilzaam Israel par aed kya hai. Al-Marsad ke director Rami Abdul Rahman ney francesi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke maaray jane walon mein 6 Shami Shaamil hain taham deegar citizenship ka taayun nahi kiya ja saka. Rami ke mutabiq bombari mein Aleppo ke mashriqi dehi ilaqa mein Alnairab ke fouji hawai adday ke nazdeek irani pasdaran inqilab ke jungjuon ko nishana baneya gaya. yeh markaz larai ke mhazon par khoraak aur deegar logistic support faraham karta hai aur yahan hathyaaron ka godaam nahi paaya jata. is se qabal Shami hukoomat ke media ney aik fouji zareya ke hawala se bataya tha ke itwaar ki shab Israeli missilon ney” hamaray aik askari thikana ko nishana baneya jis ke nateeja mein sirf maadi nuqsaan pouncha “. July ke mahiney mein yeh teesra mauqa hai jab Israel ney Shaam mein askari thikanon ko nishana baneya. is se qabal Shami hukoomat rawan mah ki aath aur baara tareekh ko –apne elanaat mein Israel ko Al-Taifur ke askari hawai adda par bombari ka zumedaar thehra chuki hai. Israel ney aas waqt janoobi Shaam mein teen thikanon par hamlon ka elaan kya tha. Shami hukoomat ka kehna tha ke is ke difai nizaam ney Israeli missilon ka rasta rokkk liya
928.title: Aleppo par Israeli bombing mein Bishar ki forces ke 9 arkaan halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Itwaar ki shaam Secunderabad Railway Station par Telangana Express train mein safar karne walay 8 kam umar Muslim bachon ko rok liya gaya jin ke baaray mein yeh samgha gaya ke inhen zabardasti kahin le jaya ja raha hai. Secunderabad Railway Police ne mehsoos kya ke yeh bachay mushtaba haalat mein safar kar rahay hain jin ke sath aik aadmi safar kar raha tha. Police ne un bachon ko rok kar mazeed tahaqeeq ke liye mehakma behbood atfaal ke hawala kardiya. Police ne bataya ke yeh bachay Uttarpradesh ke Rampur se yahan laaye gay thay jin ke sath aik aadmi safar kar raha thajs ka naam Ahmed hai. is shakhs ne police ko bataya ke woh un bachon ko Gulshan colony, Hyderabad mein waqay aik deeni madrassa mein shareek karwanay un ke walidain ki marzi se yahan laya tha.
