Police ne is shakhs ke bayan par yaqeen na karte hue mazeed tahaqeeq ke liye mehakma bahbodi e atfaal ke ohdedaron ke hawala kardiya. yahan yeh baat qabil e ghaur hai ke Telangana khaas kar Hyderabad mein qaim dainee madaris mein muqami bachon ki adam dasteyabi ke baayis shumali hind ki reyaston se talluq rakhnay walay bachon ko yahan lakar madarson mein parhaya ja raha hai.
940.title: Telangana Express mein safar karne walay 8 Muslim bachay rok liye gay

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jhirrah, Asifnagar mein aik 24 sala tarkari farosh ko mamooli si takraar par is ke doston ney chaaku ghonp kar qatal kardiya. Mutwafi Eisa Mohammad , New Kishan Nagar Jhirrah, Asifnagar ka rehne wala tha. Eisa hafta ki shab 11:45 bajey apne teen doston ke hamrah Ganga Bowli, Jhirrah mein waqay aik hotel mein khana khanay gaya tha. yeh charon aapas mein aik dosray se guftagu kar rahay thay ke Eisa Mohammad aur deegar mein Bahes o takraar shuru hogayi, un logon ney is ke seenah aur jism ke deegar hisson par waar karte hue buri terhan zakhmi kardiya. Mangalhat Police Inspector Mr. R. Srinivas Reddy ke mutabiq Eisa Mohammad shadeed zakhmi hokar gir pada, muqami logon ki ittila par Mangalhat Police maqam waardaat pahonch krase Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kiya jahan woh itwaar ke din ilaaj ke douran zakhamo se jaanbar nah ho saka. Eisa Mohammad ke khandan ki shikayat par Mangalhat Police ney tazirat hind ki dafaa 302 ke tehat qatal ka muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya. police ney teen mlzmin mein se do ki shanakht mustafa aur Mahmood ki hesiyat se ki, yeh dono Autodrivers hain aur Ganga Bowli ke rehne walay hain. mlzmin ki talaash shuru kar di gayi hai.
957.title: Bahes o takraar par doston ke hathon naujawan ka qatal

news_detail: Prince Charels aur Prince william ney Sadar America Donald Trump se un ke chaar roza daura ke mauqa par mulaqaat karne se inkaar kardiya. reports mein id-daa kya ke shehzadon ney daura mein hissa lainay se inkaar kardiya aur Malika Bartania ko tanha hi Sadar America se mulaqaat karne ke liye chhorhdya. Is ke bajaye Prince of Wales (69) ney Highgrove mein aik Board meeting aur Gloucestershir Police ke saath aik programme mein shirkat ki jabkay Duke of Cambridge (36) ney Charity Polo Match mein hissa liya. sunday times ney mehal ke aik fard ke hawala se bataya ke kaha ke shehzada Charels aur shehzada william ki yeh masrofiyat Trump ke daura ki tehqeer mein nahi hai. Unhon ney saadgi se inkaar kardiya. Malika ke liye akailey jana nihayat hi ghair mamooli baat hai. yeh id-daa kya gaya ke shehzadon ney dora ke liye intizamaa se mutaliq tabadlah khayaal ke douran apne taraddud ko wazeh kya. Prince philip (97) ke guzashta baras augst mein Shahi faraiz se subuk doshi ke baad Prince Charels aksar Malika ke hamrah sun-hwa karte hain. Buckingham Palace ney kaha ke hamesha se hi yeh mansoobah banaya gaya tha ke Mr. Trump aur un ki ahliya Melania ka Malika tanha hi kher muqaddam karen gi chunkay un kaya dora sarkari noiyat ka nahi hai
972.title: Bartanwi shehzadon ney Trump se mulaqaat karne se inkaar kardiya

news_detail: Riyasat Maghribi Bengal ke Midnapur mein Wazeer e Azam nrindr moodi ke jalsa mein aik tent ke grjane se 20 se zayed afraad zakhmi hogaye. Wazeer e Azam ney is haadsa mein zakhmi hojane walon ki Hospital pahonch kar ayadat ki. wazeer e azam ney jalsa se khitaab karne se qabal tent mein umadd anay walay apne hamion se khwahish ki thi ke woh mohtaat rahen. zakhmion ko Midnapur Medical College & Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. khush qismati se koi bhi shadeed zakhmi nahi sun-hwa. bi jay pi kaarkunon aur muqami logon ney bataya ke jab pur josh hamion ney tent ke aahinii salakhon par charh gaye to shamyana gir pada. yeh log sheh nasheen ka nazarah karne shamyana ke aahinii salakhon par charhna shuru hogaye. West Midnapur District police ke sarbarah Mr. Alok Rajurya ne bataya ke shamyana ke gir pad jane par aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat karen ge. shamyana ke gir padnde ke baad logon ki bhaag daud shuru hogayi jis ki wajah se kuch log zameen par grprhe jinhein bhagnay walon ney roond diya.
992.title: Modi ke jalsa mein pndal gir pada. 20 zakhmi

news_detail: Ajmer: Pakistan mein intekhabat 2018 mein hissa lainay walay mukhtalif jamaaton ke umeed waar apni kamyabi ke liye dua karne Ajmer Khwaja Gareeb Nawaz ki Dargaah pahonch gaye. sabiq wazeer e azam Pakistan aur haliya intikhabaat mein Pakistan peoples party ke umeed waar Raja Parvez Ashraf samait muslim league (noon) aur deegar siyasi jamaaton ke umeed waar Ajmer shareef mein waqay Maroof sufi buzurag hazrat khwaja ghareeb nawaz ki dargaah puhanche, chadar charhai aur intikhabaat mein kamyabi ke liye dua ki. dargaah khwaja ghareeb Nawaz ke khadim syed bilal Chishti ka kehna tha ke sabiq wazeer e azam Raja Parvez Ashraf , Muslim League (noon) ke umeed waar syed Imran Shah walii aur deegar jamaaton ke umeed waar dargaah par haazri day chuke hain jab ke rozana ki bunyaad par darjanon umeedwaron ki mobile calls bhi masool horahee hain jin mein intikhab mein kamyabi ke liye dua karne aur chadaway chadhanay ki istada ki jati hai. Pakistan mein siyasat daano ka apni intikhabi muhim ka aaghaz sufi buzurgon ki drgahon par haazri ke sath karne ka rivaaj aam hai jab ke wazeer e azam aur saddar ke kaleedi aur ahem ohdon ke liye umeedwaron ko kisi sufi buzurag ka mutaqid hotay bhi dekha gaya hai. haal hi mein Pakistan mein tehreek insaaf ke sarbarah Imran Khan ne bhi apni ahliya bashri bi bi ke hamrah Punjab mein waqay sufi buzurag ki dargaah par haazri di thi jab ke maazi mein be nazeer bhto, Asif Ali Zardari aur Nawaz shareef ko bhi sufi buzurgon se dua karate dekha gaya hai.
1003.title: Pakistani siyasatdaanon ki Dargah Ajmer Shareef par haazri

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik Additional Public Prosecutor Hyderabad mein aik case mein paishgi zamanat ke husool mein muawnat ke liye rishwat letay hue rangay hathon pakda gaya. Anti Corruption Bureau (ACB) ke ohdedaron ney peer ko Sri Ram Reddy ko 10, 000 rupay talabb aur qubool karte hue rangay hathon pakad liya. Sri Raam Reddy Rangareddy District Court mein Additional Public Prosecutor ki hesiyat se khidmaat injaam day raha tha. jahez harasani ke muqadma mein mulzim number 1 ko zamanat haasil hogayi thi jabkay mulzim number 2 ko zamanat haasil nahi horahee thi. mulzim public prasikotr ke paas se rishwat ke tor par di gayi raqam bar aamad karli gayi.
1021.title: Additional Public Prosecutor rishwat letay hue girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad- Deputy Chief Minister Telangana janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney kaha hai ke hukoomat khusosan Chief Minister janab K. Chandarshekhar Rao aazmin hajj ki Falah o behbood se gehri dilchaspi rakhtay hain aur un ki khidmat ke liye funds ki koi qillat nahi rahay gi. is saal hukoomat ney Haj Committee ke liye chaar crore rupiye Manzoor kiye hain aur agar zaroorat ho to mazeed funds faraham kiye jayen ge. aaj subah Haj House mein Telangana State Haj Committee ke zair e ihtimaam muntakhib aazmin hajj ke liye teen roza teeka andazi camp ka iftitah karte hue unhon ney un khayalat ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke aazmin hajj ko bimarion se mehfooz rakhnay ke liye teeka andazi be had zurori hai agar koi teekay nah le to is ku Jeddah Airport par pareshani hosakti hai. unhon ney kaha ke Haj House mein Hyderabad aur ranga ready ke teen hazaar aazmin ki teeka andazi ka intizam kya gaya hai. Deputy Chief Minister ney aazmin hajj ki khidmat ke liye saddar nasheen janab Mohammad Masehullah Khan Special Officer Professor S.A. Shukoor aur arkaan hajj committee ki dilchaspi aur lagan ki sataish ki. janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney kaha ke Telangana malik bhar mein qaumi yakjahti aur firqa waranah hum ahangi ki misaal hai. janab Bandaru Dattatria M.P. ney kaha ke aazmin hajj ki khidmat ke liye bulaa lehaaz mazhab o millat log atay hain. aaj kal khawateen ki khud ikhtiyari mein izafah hota ja raha hai’ safar hajj mein bhi khawateen Mehram ke baghair ja sakti hain. saddar nasheen riyasti Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney kaha ke Haj Committee aazmin ki behtar se behtar khidmat ka azm rakhti hai. Aazmin ko vidaa karne ke liye anay walay rishta daaron ki sahoolat ke liye woh Haj Camp ke douran Haj House ke qareeb waqay function hall –apne zaati srfh par haasil kar rahay hain taakay aazmin ke rishta daar wahan t_hr saken. is ke ilawa hajj camp ke douran Haj House mein free y fai ki sahoolat bhi faraham ki jaye gi. Janab Mohammad Saleem MLC o sadarnasheen Telangana Waqf Board ney kaha ke aazmin ko is saal mazeed behtar khidmaat faraham ki jayen gi. Special Officer Professor S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke vaccination camp Institute of Preventive Medicines,  District Medical& Health Officer aur Princes Esra Hospital ke taawun o ishtiraaq se kya ja raha hai jo teen din jari rahay ga. Is mauqa par Haj Committee ke arkaan janab Mohammad Farooq Hussain MLC, janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed,  janab Mohammad Shafi, janab Arifuddin, Dr. Aqeel Hashmi aur janab Abu Talah Amjad ke alawa mohtarma Mamta Gupta Corporator aur janab Irfan Shareef Assistant Secretary Haj Committee bhi maujood they .

* kal mangal 17 July ko 10:30 bajay din taa 4:00 bajay shaam Haj House mein cover number 3001 taa cover number 6000 ke aazmin ki teeka andazi hogi. Aazmin se khwahish ki gayi hai ke woh bank chalaan’ ya cover number ki slip zaroor apne sath layein
1033.title: Haj House mein seh roza teeka andazi programme ka iftitah

news_detail: Swami Paripurnanda ke riyasat mein dakhla par imtina ke khilaaf BJPney aaj mobayyana tor par Chief Minister ke camp office par dharna dainay ka mansoobah banaya tha taham Police ney BJPke arkaan qanoon saaz Assembly o arkaan Qanoon Saaz Council aur ahem qaideen ko ahteyati tor par girftar karte hue nakaam banadiya. Swami Paripurnanda ko reyasti Police ney Telangana se kharij karte hue un par riyasat mein dakhla par imtina aed kardiya hai. un par mnafrt phelanay aur awam ko tashadud ke liye uksanay ka ilzaam hai .

qayed Aiwaan Telangana Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ko aaj Police ney Himayatnagar mein girftar karliya aur inhen Kanchan Bagh Police station ko muntaqil kardiya. Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ney apni giraftari ke baad twitter par arkaan Assembly ko girftar karne ki hidaayat dainay par Chief Minister Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao ko un ki aamranah zehniat ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya. unhon ney –apne bayan mein kaha ke ke si are ki jabirana o aamiranah zehniat se riyasat ke jamhoori tane banay ko sangeen nuqsaan pahonch raha hai. Sarbarah mumlikat ke tor par Chief Minister, arkaan Assembly o arkaan Qanoon-saaz Council se mulaqaat ke paband hain, yahan si am, arkaan Assembly ki giraftari ka hukum dete hue jamhoriat ka mazaq uda rahe hain. BJPke arkaan Assembly Swami Paripurnanda ke riyasat se ikhraj ke masla par tabadlah khayaal karne CM ke appointment ke liye darkhwast ki thi. Mujhe Assembly mein BJPLegislature ke daftar jatay hue rasta mein girftar karliya gaya. BJP arkaan Assembly o arkaan Qanoon-saaz Council ki rehaish gaahon aur dafatir par subah se hi bhaari Police tainaat kar di gayi. yeh tea are s mein khauf o hraas ko zahir karta hai. Police ney beya noon kya ke yeh iqdaam BJPqaideen ko Chief Minister ke camp office par jama honay se baaz rakhnay kya gaya hai. am ail si Mr. Ramchandra Rao ko ghar par nazar band kardiya gaya jabkay Mr. G. Kishan Reddy ko Police commissionaire Office Basheer Bagh ke qareeb hirasat mein le liya gaya, isi terha sadar riyasti BJP Dr. K. Laxman ko MLA Quarters par hirasat mein le kar Ramgopalpet Police station muntaqil kya gaya. Khairatabad MLA Mr. Ch. Ramchandra Rao aur senior qayied Mr. Baddam Bal Reddy ko Police ney Assembly ke baab ud dakhila ke qareeb girftar karte hue Bolaram Police station muntaqil kardiya. rukan Assembly gosha mehal Mr. Raja Singh ko bhi Police ney ghar par hi nazar band rakha
1043.title: BJP Qaideen ki ahteyati giraftari

news_detail: Je

ddah: Saudi Arab mein honay wali Ulema Conference ney Afghanistan mein jung bandi ki zaroorat par zor dete hue Hukumat aur Taliban se mazakraat shuru karne ka mutalba kya. Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ke mutabiq Saudi shehzada Khalid Al Faisal ki zair sarbarahi Jeddah mein Ulema Conference hui jis mein duniya bhar se 200 se zayed mazhabi rehnumao ney shirkat ki. Conference ke ekhtataam par’ Makkah Declaration’ jari kya gaya jis mein Afghanistan mein fariqain se jung bandi karkay aman mazakraat shuru karne ka mutalba kiya gaya. aalamia mein kaha gaya ke Afghanistan mein mojood fariqain jung bandi karkay tashadud, ikhtilafat aur baghaawat ke khtama ke liye Islami eqdaar par mabni barah e raast aman mazakraat shuru karen. ikhtitami khitaab mein Islami mumulk ki tanzeem o aayi si ke sarbarah Yousuf bin Ahmed Al Usaimeen ney kaha ke Makkah Declaration masla Afghanistan ka pur aman sharai hal paish karta hai. Saudi farman rawa Shah Salman ney kaha ke Makkah Conference se Afghanistan mein salamti aur istehkaam ka naya baab khulay ga. doosri janib Afghan Taliban ney Conference ke ineqad se pehlay hi usay mustard karte hue Saudi Arab ke baarey mein bhi intahi sakht bayan jari kya. Taliban ke bayan mein kaha gaya ke Afghanistan ki jung koi muqami androoni tanaza nahi balkay aik Islami mulk par Kuffaar ki jarhiyat hai jis ke khilaaf Taliban ki muzahmat jehaad farz hai, kisi ko yeh haq haasil nahi ke is jehaad ko fasaad qarar day aur nah hi woh aisa karne den ge. Taliban ney kaha ke Saudi Arab ki Hukumat aur Ulema se yeh umeed nahi ke woh Kuffaar aur Islam ki jung mein Amrici hamla aawar ka sath den ge, balkay woh tawaqqa karte hain Islami Conference pehlay ki terhan un ki jaaiz jad-o-jehad ki himayat kere gi. Taliban ke isi sakht rad-e-amal ki wajah se Makkah Declaration mein Afghan Taliban ke khilaaf koi Fatwa nahi jari kya gaya aur sirf aalamia par hi aktfa karliya gaya. warna is Conference ke dawat nama mein Afghanistan mein jari Taliban ki jid-o-jehad ko dehshat gardi aur Taliban ko ghairqanooni musallah giroh aur juraim pesha afraad keh kar puraka gaya tha. kal Conference mein shareek Islami askalron aur ulama ke aik wafad ney Jeddah mein Shah Salman ban abdalaziz se bhi mulaqaat ki thi. Khadim ul Harmain al Sharifain ney un ka khirmqdm kya aur Conference ke ineqad par o aayi si ko saraha. Unhon ney ulama ke wafad se guftagu karte hue kaha ke ”Aap behtareen log hain jo Islam aur Musalmanoon ke liye khidmaat anjaam day rahay hain, un ki safoon mein ittehaad peda kar rahay hain aur Islami duniya ko jangoon, buhranon aur intahaa pasandi aur dehshat gardi ki lanaton se nikaal rahay hain. Allah taala ney Saudi mumlikat ko Al Hrmain al Sharifain ki khidmat ka Sharf bakhsha hai aur yeh kaam hum apne aaba ke daur se karte chalay arhay hain”. Shah Salman ney kaha ke ”Saudi Arab Afghan awam ko un ke buhranon aur phir is ke nateejay mein khanah jungi ke aaghaz ke baad se insani aur maali imdaad muhayya kar raha hai aur woh Afghan awam ke mukhtalif groupon ke darmain ikhtilafat aur taqseem ke khatmay ke liye musalsal marboot siyasi koshishen bhi kar raha hai”. unhon ney kaha :” Aaj hamein umeed hai ke aap (Ulama) ki koshisho ke nateeja mein Afghanistan mein maazi ka safha band karne aur aik naya safha kholnay mein madad miley gi.
913.title: Afghan Hukumat aur Taliban jung bandi karkay mazakraat shuru karen, Makkah Declaration

news_detail: Panaji. Congress party ki Goa Unit ne kal Guinness World Records se mutalba kya ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke naam barri tadaad mein beron Mulk ke asfaar karne ka record darj kya jaye. maktoob mein kaha gaya ” hum Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ka naam tajweez karte hue khushi o musarrat mehsoos karte hain jinhon ne apni chaar sala meyaad ke douran 52 Mumalik ke 41 asfaar karte hue aalami record qaim kya hai.” Goa Congress ke tarjuman Sankalp Amonkar ki janib se likhe gaye maktoob ki naqal media ke hawala ki gayi. maktoob mein id-daa kya gaya ke Wazeer e Azam Modi ne –apne bairooni asfaar par 355, 30, 38, 465 rupay kharch kiye hain. maktoob mein kaha gaya ”Wazeer e Azam, Hindustan ki nai nasal ke liye Role Model ban chuke hain chunkay, duniya bhar ke Mumalik mein kisi bhi Mulk ke Wazeer e Azam ne bairooni Mumalik ka (is qader ziyada) daura nahi kya hai.” Maktoob mein bataya gaya ”hum aap ko aagah karna chahtay hain ke un ke daur mein Hindustani rupiya ki qader US dollar ke muqaabla ghat kar 69. 03 tak pahonch kar Hindustani Currency ko nihayat hi kamzoor aur Asia mein badtareen muzahira karne wali Currency banadiya hai. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Amonkar ne id-daa kya ke Wazeer e Azam ne Hindustan se ziyada waqt bairoon Mulk guzara hai.
926.title: Guinness World Records mein Modi ka naam register karne Goa Congress ka mutalba

news_detail: Aurangabad. Maharashtra ke zila Hingoli mein aik Zilla Parishad School ke bawarchi khanah mein 60 nihayat hi zahreeley dahari daar naag saanp paye gaye. mehakma taleem ke aik ohdedar ney bataya ke Marhatwada khitta mein aurang abad se 225 kilomitr ke faasla par Pangra Bhokare mauza mein Zilla Parishad ki janib se chalaye jaany walay aik school mein itni bhaari tedaad mein saanpon ko dekh kar talba aur amla mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. unhon ney bataya ke khatoon bawarchi ney kal raat dekha ke pakwaan ke liye istemaal honay wali lakrion ke dhair ke paas do dahari daar naag saanp hain baad azan is ney mazeed 58 saanp bhi dekh liye. school ke head master Tirymbak Bhusle  ney kaha ”itni bhaari tedaad mein saanp dekh kar hum khaufzadah hogaye. Kayi dehati lathyon aur patharon ke sath yahan poanch gaye magar hum ney inhen saanpon ko maardenay se baz rakha. aik saanp pakarney walay wiki dalaal ko talabb kya gaya aur do ghanton ki tug o do ke baad is ney tamam saanpon ko pkrhlya aur inhen sheeshon mein band kardiya. School Administrator Bhim Rao Bhokare ney bataya ke baad azan saanpon ko Forest Officer J D Kachway ke hawala kardiya gaya
942.title: School ke bawarchi khanah se 60 saanp dastyaab

news_detail: Bidar- Karnataka mein zila Bidar ke taalluqa Aurad ke mauza Murki mein hujoom ke hamla mein aik Hyderabadi naujawan halaak hogaya jabkay do shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Barham hujoom ne jummay ko bacha aghwaa karne ka shuba zaher karte hue Hyderabadi naujawanon ko buri tarah zad o koub kya jis ke nateeja mein Mohammad Azam Nami naujawan halaak hogaya jabkay Talha Ismayeel aur Mohammad Salman buri tarah zakhmi hogaye. Yeh sab apne dost Mohammad Basheer ke sath taalluqa Aurad ke Hundikera mauza ke liye car mein jarahay thay. Mohammad Basheer jo hyderabad mein kaam karte hain, doston ko apne aayee mauza ko madou kya tha. Hundikera jatay hue un logon ne snacks khanay Balkot Tandah ke paas apni car roki thi. un logon ne Mohammad Ismayeel ke laaye hue chocolates askole bachon mein taqseem kiye. Ismayeel haal hi mein qutar se lautay thay, jis par muqami log samjhay ke yeh log bachay aghwaa karne walay hain aur inhen zad o koub karna shuru kar diya halaanke Basheer inhen muqami zabaan mein sorat e haal se aagah karne ki koshish karte rahay. Joon hi Basheer aur un ke dost, hamla awaron se bachney ke liye car mein sawaar hokar rawana hogaye, muqami logon ne mauza Murki mein rehne walay apne doston ko phone karte hue un se khwahish ki ke car ko rokain, jis par Murki walon ne sarrak par darakht kaat kar daal diya aur rasta rokkk diya. jon hi car Murki ke qareeb pohanchi car is se tkrakr phisal gayi, jis ke baad hujoom ne Azam ko gaari mein se ghaseet kar bahar nikala aur lathyon aur patharon se maarna shuru kardiya. hujoom ko roknay teen police kanstbl bhi wahan puhanche taham Azam jisay sir par chout lagi barsar mauqa halaak hogaye. Police ne deegar teen naujawanon ko bchalya aur inhen Bidar ke hospital mein shareek karwaya. mazeed ilaaj ke liye inhen aaj hyderabad muntaqil kya gaya. Aurad police ne kayi daf-aat ke tehat namaloom logon ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya taham ta haal koi giraftari amal mein nahi aayi. aayi jee pi Mr. Murugan aur SP Mr. Dev Raj aaj mauza ka daura karne walay thay. Police is khsoos mein community meetings munaqqid karte hue shaoor Beda karna chahti hai. Mr. Dev Raj ne kaha ke soshil media ke rule ki bhi hum tehqeeq karen ge. hum jantay hain ke dehation ne phone calls kiye thay
971.title: Bidar mein hujoom ke hamla mein Hyderabadi halaak

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki patti mein Israeli fouj aur Falasteeni muzahmat karon ke darmiyan guzashta chobees ghanton ke douran jhadpon ke baad fariqain misar ki salisi ke tehat jung bandi par mutfiq ho gaye hain. Palestine ki muzahmati tanzeem islami jehaad ne Gaza mein Falasteeni muzahmat karon aur Israel ke darmiyan jung bandi ki tasdeeq ki hai. islami jehaad ka kehna hai ke fariqain mein jung bandi misar ki koshisho se amal mein aayi hai. islami jehaad ke tarjuman dawod Shahab ne bataya ke hafta ke roz Misri hakkaam ke sath musalsal rabton ke baad Gaza ki patti mein Israeli fouj aur muzahmat karon ke darmiyan kasheedgi kam karne par ittafaq kya gaya hai. misar ne sunah 2014 hamza ke jung bandi moahida ko fa-aal rakhnay ke liye dono fareeqon par dabao dala. neez moahida mein ilaqai aur aalmi quwatoon ne bhi apna kirdaar ada kya hai. Misri Rukn Parliament Mohammad Hamza ne ‘Alhads’ news channel se baat karte hue kaha ke Gaza mein Falasteeni muzahmati groupon ne Israel ke sath jung bandi ke liye misar ki tajaweez qubool karne ka elaan kya hai. unhon ne mazeed kaha ke fariqain mein jung bandi par amal daraamad chand ghanton ke andar andar shuru ho jaye ga. drayn asna islami tehreek muzahmat (Hamas) ne bhi aik bayan mein Israel ke sath jung bandi ki khabron ki tasdeeq ki hai. khayaal rahay ke hafta ke roz Israeli fouj ne Gaza ki patti par kayi maqamat par shadeed bombari ki thi jis ke nateeja mein do bachay shaheed aur aik 25 shehri zakhmi hogaye thay. samjha jata hai ke 2014 ke baad Israel ka Palestine par sab se bara hamla tha. Falasteeni muzahmat karon ki taraf se Israeli bombari ke jawab mein rakton se hamlay kiye gaye.
984.title: Hamas aur Israel mein jung bandi par ittafaq

news_detail: Washington: Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne tauseeq kar di hai ke dobarah sadarati daud mein shaamil hon ge, un ka kehna hai ke un ki danist mein koi sakht muqaabla ki tawaqqa nahi hai, koi nahi hai jo mujhe shikast day sakay. Aik interview mein Amrici Sadar Donald Trump ne 2020 ka bhi election ladnay ka elaan karte hue kaha ke har koi mujhe dobarah Sadar dekna chahta hai jab ke hareef jamaat mein koi aisa umeed waar nazar nahi aata jo mera muqaabla kar sakay. social Media ke istemaal ke baarey mein Amrici Sadar ka kehna tha ke jaali khabron ke khilaaf twitter behtareen hathyaar hai aur is se baat barah e raast awam taq pohanchti hai. Sadar Trump ne mazeed kaha kay woh duniya mein aman chahtay hain, shumali Korea aur roos ke sath taluqaat is baat ka saboot hain taham hamein Amrici mafaad ke liye bhi kaam karna hai
1002.title: 2020 mein bhi mujhe koi shikast nahi day sakta : Trump

news_detail: Dukhtran e  Millat ki sarbarah Asiya Andrabi aur deegar do ke khilaaf darj baghaawat ke muqadma mein pooch gach ke liye National Investigation Agency (NIA) ne jummay ke din Srinagar ke aik sahafi Auquib Javed ko Dehli talab kya hai. Agency ne sahafi ko hidayat di ke woh 15

July ko Dehli mein agency ke Headquarters mein haazir rahen. Auquib Javed aik accreditated jrnlst hain aur woh Kashmir aabzror ke liye kaam karte hain. NIA ne wizarat dakhla ki hiadaayat par Andrabi aur un ki tanzeem ke khilaaf jis par qanoon (insidaad) ghair qanooni sargarmian ke tehat imtina ayed kya gaya hai, Jaria saal April mein aik muqadma darj kya tha. f aayi are ke mutabiq markazi hukoomat ko yeh it-tila-aat masool huien ke Asiya Andrabi aur un ke saathi sufi Fahmida aur Nahida Nasrin ‘Dukhtran e  Millat’ ke naam par aik dehshat gard tanzeem chala rahi hain, jis ko qanoon (insidaad) ghair qanooni sargarmian ke pehlay schedule mein shaamil kya gaya hai. f aayi are mein ilzaam aed kya gaya ke woh mukhtalif media plate farms istemaal karte hue baghiana ithaam aur nafrat angaiz tqririn philarhe hain jo hndstan ki salmiyat, salamti aur Iqtidaar e aala ke liye khatrah hai. Dukhtran e  Millat, Asiya Andrabi ke zareya union of India se jammu vkshmir ki alhdgi ki khulay tor par waqalat karti hai aur jehaad karne aur hndstan ke khilaaf tashadud ka istemaal karne ki targheeb deti hai. is ke ilawa Andrabi aur un ki tanzeem par kayi ilzamaat aed kiye gaye hain. Jaria saal April mein jammu o Kashmir police ne barray pemana par muzahira karne aur ilaqa mein sangbaari karne ka mansoobah bananay ke ilzaam mein Asiya Andrabi ko annt naag se grftarkya tha. inhen adalat ki janib se zamanat Manzoor kardainay ke bawajood bhi raha nah karte hue inhen mukhtalif muqadmaat mein maakhoz kardiya gaya.
1019.title: Asiya Andrabi baghaawat case: NIA ne Srinagar ke Reporter ko Dehli talab kya

news_detail: Sabiq captain Indian Cricket Team o sabiq Rukn Parliament Muradabad Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne Secunderabad Lok Sabha aindah aam intikhabaat 2019 mein muqaabla karne ke apne iraadon ka inkeshaf kiya hai. Captain ne yeh bhi wazahat kar di ke 2019 aam intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha Secunderabad se un ke muqaabla karne ka qatee faisla party high kamaan kere gi. yaad rahay ke Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne 2009 ke intikhabaat mein halqa parliment morad abad riyasat Uttarpradesh se congress party ke ticket par muqaabla karte hue kamyabi haasil ki thi taham 2014 ke intikhabaat mein inhen halqa Lok Sabha Tonk Saway, Rajasthan se shikast ka saamna karna para tha. Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne kaha ke Secunderabad ki awam chahati hain ke woh un ke halqa se muqaabla karen. Unhon ne kaha ke jab unhon ne Secunderabad halqa ka dora kya to awam ne un se khwahish ki ke woh Secunderabad se muqaabla karen. captain ne bataya ke unhon ne party High Command aur ae aayi si si ke tlnganh umoor ke nigran ko is baat se aagah kardiya hai. yaad rahay ke congress party ke baaz senior qaideen ne Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ko Hyderabad Lok Sabha se muqaabla karne ki khwahish ki thi jahan se saddar majlis ittehaad almslmin Barrister Asadudin Owaisi guzashta do miaadon se bhaari aksariyat se muntakhib hotay arhay hain. Mr. Mohammad Azharuddin ne aik sawal ka jawab dete hue kaha ke woh kamyabi ya shikast ke barey mein nahi sochte lekin awam chahati hai ke woh Secunderabad halqa Parliman se muqaabla kere
1032.title: Captain Azharuddin Secunderabad se muqaabla ke khwahan!

news_detail: Inquilabi gulukar Gaddar ne kaha kay woh Iqtidaar chahtay hain jis ke liye woh 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ke khwahan hain. Aaj yahan Sundarya Vignan Kendr mein Bahujan Left Front (BLF) ke zair e ihtimaam seminar se khitaab karte hue Gaddar ne kmyonst partiyon par zor diya ke woh muttahid ho jaien. unhon ne kaha ke ‘Laal-Neelay Parcham’ ke naara ke sath aik nai parliment le anay ki zaroorat hai. unhon ne ilzaam aed kya ke bi jay pi, awam kodaktr B. R. Ambedkar policy ke naam par gumraah kar rahi hai. unhon ne kaha ke Bahujan Rajya adheekar sirf isi soorat mein mumkin hai ke laal aur neel parcham muttahid ho jaien. Unhon ne kaha ke laal aur neelay prchmon ke ittehaad ke liye mubahis jari hain. unhon ne kaha ke laal aur neelay prchmon ke ittehaad ko dekhte hue mujh mein intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ki khwahish paida horahee hai. Unhon ne bataya ke un ka naam fehrist raye dahindgaan mein shaamil nahi hai lekin ab haq raye dahi ke liye mein apna naam fehrist raye dahindgaan mein darj karwaun ga.
1047.title: Gaddar intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ke khwahan

news_detail: Rusia ke darul-hakoomat Moscow ke Luzhniki Stadium mein khailay gaye FIFA aalmi Cup Football Tournament ke Final Match mein France , Croatia ko 4:2 Goals se shikast day kar naya aalmi Champion ban gaya hai. is terhan France guzashta 20 barson mein doosri martaba football Champion ban gaya hai. France aaj teesri martaba final match khail raha tha. France ki team aalami aizaz ke husool ke liye shuru se hi achay khail ka muzahira karti rahi hai. pehlay half mein France ko do aik bartari haasil hai. France ki team ne Croatia ke khilaaf pehlay Goals karkay bartari haasil karli lekin yeh Goals is ke khilari guraiz mann ki barah e raast kick par nahi sun-hwa tha balkay Croatia ke khilari mndo zöe catch ke head se baal un ke –apne hi net mein chali gayi. is ke thori der ke baad Croatia peeri ke sich ne France ko Goals karkay match aik aik se barabar kardiya magar francesi frwd guraiz mann ne pinlti par shandaar Goals karkay apni team ko aik martaba phir bartari dila di. unhon ne apni baayen taraf Football ko kick lagai jabkay Croatia ke Goals keeper ne mukhalif simt mein dayyo lagai aur yun woh Goals bachanay mein nakaam rahay. dosray half mein bhi France ki team Croatia bhi Sabqat barqarar rakhi. Croatia ne aik ghanta tak France ka zabardast difaa kya taham batadreej woh peechay hoti gayi. France aur Croatia ne Simi final match khailnay wali teamon mein koi tabdeeli nahi ki hai. wazeh rahay ke France ki Football team ne is Tournament ke naak out marhaly ke tenu matchon mein muqarara 90 minute mein kamyabi haasil ki thi jabkay Croatia ki team izafi waqt mein apne match jeetnay mein kamyaab hui thi
1061.title: FIFA aalmi Football Cup: France naya Champion

news_detail: Telugu filmon ke Naqid Kathi Mahesh ko jin ke Hindoon ke Devta, Ram ji ke khilaaf kiye gaye remarks par Hindu barham aur naraaz hain, aik baar phir Chittoor Police ne peer ko giraftar karte hue Bengaluru ko wapas bhaij diya. Kathi Mahesh jinhein Telangana Police ne riyasat se kharij karte hue dakhla par amtnaa aed kardiya hai, Police ko bataya ke woh Chittoor mein apne aabadi mauza Yalamanda ko jarahay hain, taham Police ne kaha ke un ke aabadi dehaat mein inhen Hindu tanzeemon se khatrah la-haq ho sakta hai, aur un se kaha ke woh apne dehaat ko na jayen, lekin Kathi ne wapas lotney se inkaar kardiya. jab unhon ne apne dehaat ke liye rawana honay ki koshish ki to Police ne inhen giraftar karte hue Bengaluru le kar chali gayi. aik aur ittila ke mutabiq Kathi Mahesh ne Chittoor ke pails mein press conference karna chahtay they taham Police ne inhen aisa karne se rokkk diya. yaad rahay ke aik muqami Telugu Channel par mubahis mein hissa letay hue Telugu filmon ke Naqid Kathi rmish ne Hindoon ke Devta Ram ji aur un ki ahliya sita ji ke khilaaf kuch qabil aitraaz jumlay ada kiye they jis par un ke khilaaf mazhabi jazbaat ko rujhanaat ko thais pohanchanay ke ilzamaat ke tehat Banjara  Hills Police station mein Hindu tanzeemon ne shikayaat darj ki theen jis par un ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya tha aur Telangana Police ne inhen 6 mah ke liye hyderabad mein dakhla par amtnaa aed kardiya tha. Police ne inhen giraftar karte hue Chittoor mein un ke aabadi muqam par chod diya tha jahan se unhon ne Social Media par apne tabsaray post kar rahay they.
927.title: Filmon ke Naqid Kathi Mahesh dubara giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ne Rainbow Hospitals ke baaray mein yeh pata chalne par ke Hospital anay walay mareezon aur un ke afraad khandan se parking fee wusool ki jarahi hai. shehar ke aik samaji jehed car ki janib se Hospital ke khilaaf Banjara Hills Police Station mein shikayat ke indraaj ke baad yeh karwai ki gayi hai. yaad rahay ke tijarati idaron ke amarat mein muft parking ki saholaten baham pohanchanay se mutaliq jari kardah sarkari ehkaam se mutaliq yeh Sarahat kar diye jane ke bawajood ke stand-alone Theaters, Hospitals aur deegar tijarati idaron par is ka itlaq hoga aur yeh ke Hospitals ki bills aur Out Patient Department ki receipts ki peshkashi par muft parking faraham ki jani chahiye, Hospitals ki janib se parking fees wusool ki jarahi thi. Banjara Hills Police Station mein Hospital ke khilaaf muqadma darj kya gaya hai. Hospital ki janib se two wheelers ke liye 20 rupay aur four wheelers ke liye 50 rupay parking fees wusool kar raha tha aur ghanta ki asaas par izafi raqam wusool kar raha tha. shehar ke deegar hospital jaisay comes, apolo, kir bhi parking fees wusool kar rahay hain. Hyderabad ke insidaad rishwat satani jahedkaar mister Vijaya gopal ne 11 July ko Rainbow Hospitals ke khilaaf Banjara Hills Police station mein shikayat darj karwai thi. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh deegar haspatalon ke liye bhi taizana hai jo GO se mutaliq Sarahat kar diye jane ke bawajood parking fees wusool kar rahe hain. jahekaar ka kehna hai ke Banjara Hills Police ne baday hi behas o takraar ke baad muqadma darj kya hai. Police ko shikayat ke indraaj ke baad muqadma darj karne aik hafta darkaar huwa. Unhon ne kaha kay awam ne twitter ke zareya Police ko is janib mutwajjah kya tha. qanoon greater Hyderabad municiple karporishn 1955 ki daf-aat ke tehat khilaaf warzi karne walon ke khilaaf tazeeri karwai ki ja sakti hai. yeh GO jis ka itlaaq 1

April 2018 se ho raha hai, ibtidayi 30 mints ke liye muft parking ki sahoolat faraham karta hai, is ke baad bhi agar Sarif tijarti idaara se khridi ka saboot paish karta hai to is se parking fees wusool nahi ki jaye gi. GHMC ne 24 April ko yeh wazahat kardiya tha ke muft parking ke khawayed ka itlaq Stand-alone Theaters, Hospitals aur deegar tijarti idaron par bhi hoga. Is wazahat mein yeh bhi Sarahat kar di gayi thi ke Hospital bil ya Out Patient Department ki raseed paish karte hue muft parking ki sahoolat haasil ki ja sakti hai. Vijaya ne kaha ke parking fees ki vasuli par tijarti idaron ka vaqtan fouqtan muaina karne ka GHMC ku ikhtiyar haasil hai. Parking Fee Rules ki khilaaf warzi hota dekhnay walay bhi un se shikayat darj krwaskte hain, lekin shikayaat ki yaksoi ka nizaam ghair karkard hai. Is liye awam ke liye yeh behtar hai ke agar woh dekhen ke tijarti idaron ki janib se parking fees qawaid ki khilaaf warzi ki jarahi hai to woh muqami Police station se rujoo hon.
941.title: Parking fee ki vasuli par Rainbow Hospitals ke khilaaf muqadma darj

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Ishrat Jahan ki maa ney 2004 muqadma ke mulzimeen do Muazzif Police ohdedaron ki darkhwast bra_aat ke khilaaf aaj adalat mein apna aitraaz daakhil kardiya hai. Ishrat Jahan ko deegar teen ke sath aik farzi Encounter mein qatal kardiya gaya tha. Mohtarma Shamima Kausar ney yahan CBI ki khusoosi adalat mein Gujarat ke retired Police Officers D G Vanzara aur N K Amin ki janib se daakhil kardah darkhwast bra_aat ki yeh kehte hue mukhalfat ki ke dono mulzimeen ke khilaaf thos shawahid mojood hain. khusoosi CBI court ke judge mister J K Pandia jinhon ney dono mulzimeen aur CBI ke dalail ki samaat ke baad aaj apna hkmnamh mehfooz rakha tha, kaha ke woh mutasirah ki taraf se uthae gaye aitrazaat ki roshni mein is maamla par mazeed samaat karen ge. mohtarma Shamima Kausar ney apne wakeel P I Parvez ke tavassut se daakhil kardah apni darkhwast azrdari mein kaha ke dono mulzimeen ko bra_aat nahi di jani chahiye chunkay un ke khilaaf thos shawahid o saboot mojood hain. unhon ney kaha ke record mein maujood shawahid zahir karte hain ke yeh dono Ahmedabad ke muzafaat mein is muqam par maujood they Jahan Ishrat Jahan aur deegar 4 ko 2004 mein goli mardi gayi thi. Mohtarma Kausar ney

ka hawala dete huvey kaha ke case mein maakhoz deegar mulzimeen ke sath yeh dono mustaqil tor par rabt mein they. Adalat ney un dono mulzimeen ki muqadma se kharij karne ki darkhwast par dono mulzimeen aur is case ki tehqeeq karne wali tehqiqati agency CBI ke wukla ki samaat 30

June ko khatam kar di thi. Vanzara ney sabiq incharge DGP Gujarat Police P P Pande ki muwafiqat mein darkhwast bra_aat daakhil ki thi. pi pi pande ko na kafi shawahid ki binaa February mein is muqadma se kharij kardiya gaya tha. Vanzara ney apni darkhwast mein ye bhi id-daa kya ke Central Agency ki janib se daakhil kardah charge sheet ”mann ghadat” thi aur un ke khilaf koi Laiq mazawalat (prosecutable) mawaad maujood nahi hai. Sabiq sarbarah Gujarat ATS ne kaha kegawahoon ke bayanaa t”intehai mashkook” hain.

Adalat ney pehlay hi Amin ki darkhwast par samaat ko mukammal karliya tha. Mumbra, Mumbai se talluq rakhney wali 19 sala Ishrat Jahan aur deegar teen Javed Sheikh @ Pranesh Pilayi, Amjad Ali Akbar Ali Rana aur Zeeshan Johar ko Ahmedabad ke muzafaat mein 15 June 2004 ko aik farzi Encounter mein golian mardi gayi theen. Us waqt Police ney yeh id-daa kya tha ke un charon ka dehshat gardon se talluq hai aur woh us waqt ke Chief Minister Gujarat Narendra Modi ko qatal karne ki saazish rachi thi. Taham Gujarat high High Court ki janib se tashkeel kardah special investy gation team ney yeh nateeja agz kiya tha ke yeh Encounter ‘farzi’ tha jis par Adalat ney muqadma ko riyasti Police se wapas lekar CBI ke hawala kardiya tha. CBI ney 2013 mein daakhil kardah pehli charge sheet mein 7 Police ohdedaron Bashmool aayi pi s Officers pande, Vanzara aur jee ail singh ke naam mulzimeen ke tor par shaamil kiye they. Un tamam par deegar ilzamaat ke ilawa aghwaa, qatal aur saazish ke ilzamaat aed kiye gaye they. Vanzara ka naam mushtaba gangster Shahabuddin aur us ke Muawin Tulsi Ram ke mobayyana farzi Encounter ke muqadma mein bhi shaamil hai. Inhen guzashta baras Mumbai ki adalat ney bari kardiya.
956.title: Ishrat Jahan case: Gujarat ke sabiq Police ohdedaron ki darkhwast bra_aat ke khilaaf maa ka aitraaz daakhil

news_detail: Aqliat aur Aksariyat ki istelahaath mein baat na karne aur tamam tabqaat ki bulaa imtiaz taraqqi ka daawa karne wali BJP sarkar ke liye Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen o rukan parliment hyderabad Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ke aqliton aur Musalmanoon ke liye ab taq kiye gay iqdamaat ke baare mein pouchye jaany par nah sirf BJP camp chairag pa hai balkay bohat se Media Houses bhi juz buzz ho rahay hain. Barrister Asad Owaisi ke pouchye gay sawalaat par misbet mubahis karne se guraiz kyajarha hai. Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ny Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par yeh kehte hue tanqeed ki ke guzashta chaar barson mein un ki hukoomat ny aqliton aur Musalmanoon ke liye kuch nahi kya hai. Barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi ny kaha’ ‘ CRPF, CISF, ATBPs yeh tamam markazi hukoomat ke tehat hain, mein markaz ko challenge karta hon ke chaar barson ka data paish kere ke aqliton ki kitni bhartiya hui hain.”Unhon ny kaha ke Wazeer e Azam ka pandrah nukati programme takeedan bayan karta hai ke markazi hukoomat ki mlazmton mein aqliton ki shiraakat daari barhai jaye gi, is khsoos mein bohat thora hi kya gaya hai. BJP ki zair qayadat an d ae May 2014 hamza mein Iqtidaar mein aayi hai. CRPF, CISF, ATPB yeh sab markaz ke tehat hain. BJP chaar barson se mrkzmin Iqtidaar par hai. Wazeer e Azam barray zor se kehte hain ke woh aik haath mein quran Majeed aur dosray haath mein compooter dena chahtay hain, is liye bitayen ke guzashta chaar barson mein aap ny Musalmanoon ke liye kya kya hai. unhon ny istafsaar kya ke guzashta chaar barson mein markazi shoba ke tehat bankon, railway aur markazi neem fouji forces mein kitney aqliton ke taqarurrat kiye gay hain. Barrister Asad ny kaha ”aap wizarat Aqliati umoor ki Website dekhen jis mein bataya gaya ke kitney aqliton Bashmole musalman aur isaai ko mukhtalif sarkari mehakmon mein mulaazmaten mili hain. Website par 2013 taq ka data hai.’ ‘ unhon ny kaha ke hukoomat ko chahiye ke bankon, railway aur deegar markaz ke zair e intizam awaami shoba ke idaron mein taqarrurat kiye gay hain aur un mein kitney aqlitin hain. BJP ny aqliton ke liye kuch nahi kya aur mujhe hukoomat se sawal karne ka poora poora haq haasil hai
981.title: Mulazimaton mein Musalmanoon ke sath musawaat kyun nahi?

news_detail: NewDelhi . Narendra Modi Hukumat ke khilaaf Telugu Desam party ki paish kardah tehreek adam-etemaad par jummay ko mubahis hon ge. Aaj Parliament ke mansoon ijlaas ke pehlay din lunch waqfa ke baad jon hi lok sabha ke ijlaas ka aaghaz sun-hwa, speaker lok sabha mrs smtra mahajan ney kaha ”tehreek par jumma 20 July ko mubahis kiye jayen ge jis ke baad tehreek par raye dahi hogi.” Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke is din waqfa sawalaat nahi hon ge aur koi aur karwai nahi hogi siwaye tehreek adam-etemaad par mubahis ke. Waqfa sifar ke douran mrs mahajan ney Telugu Desam, Congress aur Nationalist Congress Party ke tamam arkaan aur deegar tamam ka naam liya jinhon ney mumasil tehreek adam-etemaad paish kiye they. speaker ney Parliament ke budget session ke douran aisay hi tehreek ko qubool nahi kya tha jis par Telugu Desam Party, Telangana Rashtra Samithi aur deegar Opposition Parties ney mutawatar shore o ghul bapaa kardiya tha. Tehreek ko is bunyaad par mustard kardiya tha ke mukhtalif mauzuaat par mutawatar ehtejajon ke bayis ewaan ki karwai nahi chalaye ja sakti. oppostion partiyon ney aandhra pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf, haugume tashadud, khawateen o Daliton ke khilaaf mzalm aur darj fehrist aqwam ke liye qanoon ko kamzor karne jaisay mozuaat par hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam-etemaad pesh ki thi. Speaker ney kaha ke 50 se zayed arkaan tehreek ki taied karte hain is liye tehreek Adam-etemaad paish karne ki ijazat di jati hai
995.title: Modi hukoomat ke khilaaf Tehreek adam-etemaad par jummay ko mubahis

news_detail: Dhaka: Bangladesh mein manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf shuru kiye gaye crackdown operation mein halakaton ki tadaad ab 200 se tajawaz kar gayi hai, sainkdon mushtaba dealers ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. wazeer sanat Aamir Hussain Imu ney bataya ke 18

May se Mulk-geer satah par shuru kardah insidaad manshiat muhim ke douran qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ney mushtaba manshiat farosh aur manshiat ke aadi 37, 225 afraad ko girftar kya gaya hai. unhon ney bataya ke 25, 575 cases mein mushtaba afraad ko padra gaya hai. unhon ney bataya ke Mulk ki jailon mein jumla 89, 589 qaidi hain jin mein 42 feesad manshiat se mutaliq muqadmaat ke mulzim hain .

Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Bangladesh mein do mah se jari manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf Operation mein taizi aagai hai. Police ke hathon marwaye adalat tarz ki karwai mein ab tak 200 se zayed afraad maaray ja chuke hain. Bangladeshi hukkaam ney Philipine ki tarz par manshiat ke kaarobar aur smuglers ke khilaaf karwai ko jari rakhney ka Endyia diya hai. Dusri janib insani huqooq ke liye kaam karne wali tanzeemon ney is soorat e haal par tashweesh ka izhaar karte hue kaha hai ke maamla kitna hi sangeen kyun nah ho marwaye adalat qatal ki ijazat nahi di ja sakti. qanoon aur adaltin honey ke bawajood Police ka bandooq se faisla karna durust amal nahi. hukoomat ko apne tareeqakar mein tabdeeli lana hogi. Wazeh rahay ke Bangladesh mein aasabi nizaam par asar andaaz honey wali adwiyaat Caffeine aur  Methamphetamine ke ajzaa par mushtamil tablet ‘Yaba’ ka be daregh istemaal kya jata hai is nasha aawar goli ki khareed o farokht ghair qanooni hai jis ke khilaaf hukoomat ney Crackdown Operation ka aaghaz kya hai.
1011.title: Bangladesh mein manshiat faroshon ke khilaaf Crackdown mein 200 se zayed mulzimeen halaak

news_detail: Qoum parastana qanoon saazi karte hue Israel ko Yahoodi awam ke liye aik Qaumi watan qarar diya gaya aur sirf Yahoodi qbayil ko tarjeehat par mabni qanoon ko aaj manzoori day di gayi. Yeh Israeli qanoon sazoon ki janib se Jaria hafta manzurah mutanazia billls mein se aik hai jis ki mukhalfat oppostion ne ki aur naqideen ne usay ghair jamhoori aur jabirana qarar diya. ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq Israeli Parliament ne Mulk ko yahudion ki Qaumi riyasat bananay ka mutanazia bill Manzoor karliya. bill ke haq mein 62 jabkay mukhalfat mein 55 vote daaley gaye. is qanoon ke tehat bator sarkari zabaan arabi ke darjay ko ghata diya gaya hai aur Yahoodi abadkari mein izafay ko Qaumi mafaad qarar diya gaya hai. Mutanazia qanoon mein maqboza beeet almuqaddas (Jerusalem) ko Israel ka mukammal aur mutahidda dar-ul-hukumat tasleem kya gaya hai. Israeli Parliament ke arab arkaan ne is qanoon saazi ko shadeed tanqeed ka nishana banatay hue usay jamhoriat ki mout qarar diya. Israel ke wazeer e azam Binyamin Nitin Yahoo ne bill ko srahte hue is ki manzoori ko’ faisla kin lamha’ qarar diya. Wazeh rahay ke Israel ki 90 laakh abadi mein se taqreeban 20 feesad arab hain jab ke Mulk mein un ke sath dosray darjay ke shehrion jaisa bad tareen sulooq kya jata hai. is bill ki manzoori se ghair Yahoodi Israeli aqliaton par door ras nataij muratab honge aur maqboza Maghribi Kinara mein basnay walay Palestenians ke huqooq daba diye jayenge aur Israel mein un ka difaa karne walon ki hesiyat ghat jaye gi. Is bill ki tadween karne walon ka id-daa hai ke is ka maqsad yeh hai ke Israel ke Yahoodi kirdaar ko brhhawa diya jaye. Israel Arab sector ke parliamentrian jo Mulk ki 8. 5 million abadi ka taqreeban 21 feesad hotay hain yeh kaha ke yeh qanoon yahudion ki baladasti ka izhaar hai jo inhen dosray darja ka shehri banakar rakh deta hai. Knesset( qanoon saaz committee ) mein Joint List Arab FAction ke quied Aiman Adeh ne kaha ke aaj mere bachon aur Falasteeni Arab shehrion ke bachon ko yeh kehna hoga ke mumlikat ne yeh elaan kardiya ke woh hamein yahan nahi dekhnaa chahti hai. Israel mein aik Falasteeni haqooq insani tanzeem ”Adalah” ke Director General Hassan Jabreen ne kaha ke qanoon ke kaleedi nakaat nasli asbiyat par mabni hain jo na sirf ghair ikhlaqi hain balkay bain ul aqwami qanoon ke tehat mamnua hai. unhon ne kaha ke mumlikat ke 1. 5 million Falasteeni shehrion, mashriqi Yaroshallam aur golan pahariyoon ke awam ke bawajood dastoori tor par Israel ko sirf Yahoodi awam ki mumlikat banadiya gaya hai aur Israel ko khusoosi nasli mazhabi kirdaar ko Yahoodi bnadyagya.
1025.title: Israel ko Yahoodi Qaumi riyasat qarar dainay ka qanoon manzoor

news_detail: Istanbul ki aik adalat ney bazam khud aik islami firqa ke rehnuma aur Tv par tableegh karne wali shakhsiyat Adnan Oktar ku jo Harun Yahya se bhi janey jatay hain, 160 deegar pairokaron sameit mukhtalif ilzamaat ki mazeed tafteesh ke liye police ke hawalay kar diya hai. Un ke kayi pairokaar pehlay se hi zair hirasat hain aur un ki tafteesh ki jarahi hai. Adnan Oktar par juraim pesha gang qaim karne, dhoka dahi aur jinsi istehsal ke ilzamaat hain. tark khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq police ney paanch mukhtalif sobon mein kayi jayidadon par karwai ki taakay maali juraim ke hawala se shawahid haasil kiye ja saken. Istanbul Police ney mukhtalif logon ki janib se fouj daari shikayaat darj krwane par is firqa ke khilaaf karwai karte hue 120 rehaishgaahon aur dafatir par  chaape maaray. Shikayat kunindgan mein 11 sala ladkiyon ke walidain se le kar 40 sala Umar ki khawateen hain .

Adnan Oktar ney adalat mein paish kardah charge sheet ki sahet se inkaar karte hue apni rihayi ka mutalba kya aur kaha ke un ke beron mulk rawabit Turk mumlikat ko kamzor karne ke bajaye is ki quvvat badhaane ka bayis hain. Unhon ney id-daa kya ke woh aik saazish ka shikaar baneye gaye hain aur yeh ke woh aik qoum parast aur Ataturkish hain. unhon ney kaha “mujh par aayed jinsi istehsal ke ilzamaat be bunyaad hain. Main awaami aankh mein rehta hon. Har koi mujhe jaanta hai chunkay main awam aur Tv par rehta hoon. Main jin muqamat par rehta hon woh tamam janey pehchane hain” Adnan Oktar ney bataya ke un ki mahana aamdani 3500 Turkish Liras hain jo 730 dollars ke mumasil hoti hai. Inhen 11 July ki awleen sa-aton mein hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. Un ke firqa jaisay group par aik mujremana tanzeem qaim karne, kamsin bachon ke jinsi istehsal, na balighon ke sath mubashrat, aghwaa, qanoon tax ki khilaaf warzi aur qanoon insidaad e dehshat gardi ki khilaaf warzi karne jaisay ilzamaat aayed kiye gaye hain. Harun Yahya ke ihata ki talashi ke douran police ney 6 truckload Historical artifacts aur qadeem nawadiraat ke alawa 400 se zayed yadgar tughre, 7 hathyaar aur 3, 000 se zayed bulltes, luxury cars aur qabil lehaaz naqad raqam ko bar aamad kya hai.

Adnan Oktar ney 1982 mein Istanbul mein apni Islami tanzeem ki bunyaad rakhi thi. Is waqt se Adnan Oktar ney bohat doulat jama ki aur asar o rusookh badhaya. Agarchay mahireen ke mutabiq yeh janna ya maloom karna mushkil hai ke un ki aamdani ka zareya kya hai. haal hi mein Adnan ney aik Tv channel shuru kya hai jis ko woh apne aqayed ki tableegh jis mein bilkhushoos Islam ki tashreeh ke liye istemaal karte hain. Turkey ke sahafion ke mutabiq Adnan ke kuch pairokaar din mein kaam karte hain jab ke deegar un ke firqa ke hawalay se kitaaben tehreer karte hain, media par tashheer karte hain ya tanzeem ke liye karkun bharti karte hain. Harun Yahya ke naam se kitabon mein ‘nazriya irtiqa ke jhoot’ ke baaray mein bataya gaya hai aur yeh kitaaben sarkari hakkaam, ghair mulki sifarat karon aur sahafion ko irsaal ki jati hain. Woh 300 se zayed kitabon ke musannif hain jinhein 73 zabanon mein tarjuma kya gaya hai. Aik naye firqa ke mubalagh Adnan Oktar ka sab se mutanazia pehlu un ki ‘khatoon pairokaron ki fouj’ hai jo bohat ziyada banaou singaar karti hain aur bohat kam kapdon mein malbos hoti hain aur un khawateen ko aksar Adnan ka chulbuli ladkiyon ka haram kaha jata hai. Woh un ke sath raqs o suroor ki mahfilen sajaate hain aur un sab harkato ko mazhabi pairaye mein paish karte hain. Adnan ki tanzeem ko tark karne walay arkaan daawa karte hain ke Adnan –apne pairokaron ki brain washing karte hain, unhein black mail kya jata hai aur jinsi ghulam banaya jata hai aur un mein aksariyat khawateen ki hai. yaad rahay Adnan aur un ki tanzeem ke mutadid arkaan kayi baar mukhtalif mawaqay par Israel ja chuke hain aur wahan un ki aala mazhabi aur siyasi shaksiaat se mulaqaat ho chuki hain jabkay baaz senior Israeli hakkaam Adnan se milney turkey bhi aa chuke hain. aik baras pehlay Adnan ki sarbarahi mein aik wafad ney Israeli parliman ka dora kya tha jahan aala hakkaam se mulaqaat ka mauqa mila aur Israeli wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu se khusoosi taur par taaruf karaya gaya tha. Maazi mein bhi Adnan un ilzamaat ko mustard kar chuke hain aur apni zaat par un hamlon ko Bartanwi khufia services ki nigrani mein honey wali bain ul aqwami saazish qarar day chuke hain. Turkey zaraye ablaagh mein inhen nihayat hi badnaam zamana firqa ke sarbarah se mausoom kya jata hai
1038.title: Adnan Oktar @ Harun Yahya girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad, Nampally mein Haj House mein aazmeen Haj ko mehfooz qiyam ki saholaten faraham karne aaj Camp mein aatish faro alaat ki karkardagi ka jaiza liya gaya aur aag lag janey ki soorat mein is par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira kiya gaya. fire brigead mehakma ke amlah ney aaj Haj House poanch kar aatish fer alaat ki sahet ka jaiza liya aur aag par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira bhi kya. fayrbrigid ke ohdedaron ney bataya ke Haj House mein chunkay back waqt aik hazaar se zayed afraad muqeem hotay hain, is liye un ki salamti ko yakeeni bananay nagehani waqeat se nimatnay ke liye tamam tar ahteyati iqdamaat kiye gaye hain. Camp ke bahar aik fire tender maujood rahay ga aur do Bullet vehicles bhi honge jabkay amlah ke 15 arkaan tainaat rahenge. Sadarnasheen Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masih Allah Khan ney bataya ke Hyderabad Embarcation pointe se riyasat tlnganh ke ilawa aandhra pradesh aur Hyderabad krnatk ilaqa ke taqreeban 8, 000 aazmeen Haj, muqaddas maqamat ke liye rawana hon ge. Unhon ney bataya ke Haj House mein qaim Haj Camp mein yakam augst taa 15 augst 25 qaafley rawana hon ge. un aazmeen ka Haj Camp mein do din qiyam rahay ga. aazmeen ko Camp mein qiyam ke douran arram da saholaten baham pohanchanay ki tamam tar tayyariyan mukammal karli jarahi hain. aazmeen ki khidmat ke liye mukhtalif mehakma jaat ke ohdedar mojood rahen ge. Volunteers ki bhi aik badi tadaad aazmeen ki hama waqt khidmat par mamoor rahay gi.
1051.title: Haj Camp mein aag par qaboo panay ka amli muzahira

news_detail: Misar ki sab se badi dainee dars gaah jamea Al-Azhar ne guzashta roz Israeli Knesset (Legislative Committee) mein Manzoor honay walay Yahoodi Qaumiat aur Yahoodi haq khud iradyat se mutaliq mutanazia qanoon ki shadeed alfaaz mein muzammat ki hai. Al-Azhar ka kehna hai ke Israeli parliment se Manzoor honay wala qanoon shyoni riyasat ki nasal parastana policy aur gair Yahoodion ke sath bughz wo unaad ka wazeh saboot hai. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Israel ko ‘Yahoodi Qaumi Mumlikat’ qarar dainay ka qanoon sara sar nasal-parasti aur bughz ka shaksana hai jis ne sehyoni riyasat ke tausee-pasandana aur ghasibana qabzay ki policy ko mazeed be naqaab kardiya hai. Al-Azhar ki taraf se kaha gaya hai ke Israeli riyasat ki taraf se Palestine mein Yahoodi abadkari ke farogh, badnaam zamana’ elaan balfor’ ke baad Falasteeni Qaum ke haqooq ghasab karne ke tamam iqdamaat, Amrici intizamia ki taraf se al Quds ko Israel ka dar-ul-hukumat tasleem karne jaisay iqdamaat baatil aur na qaBill qubool hain. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Palestine ka tareekhi tashakkus Arabi zabaan aur Arab tahazeeb vtmdn ke sath wabasta hai. Palestine mein mukhtalif mazahab aur garohoon ki mojoodgi ke bawajood Arabi zabaan ko hamesha bartar darjah haasil raha hai magar shyoni riyasat aik soochey samjhay mansoobay ke tehat nasal parastana iqdamaat ko farogh day rahi hai. Al-Azhar ne Falasteeni Qaum ki qurbanion, un ke azm istiqlal, apni azad riyasat ke husool ke liye jaddo-jehed aur Al-Quds ko is ke dar-al-hakoomat bananay ke liye qurbanion ko tasleem kya aur kaha ke flstinyon ki qurbaniyan shyoni nasal parasti ko nakaam bana den gi. khayaal rahay ke Israeli parliment ne riyasat mein sirf yahood ko haq khud aradit dainay ke mutanazia qanoon ki manzoori day di hai. shyoni riyasat ki Arab aqliat ne is qanoon ko, nasal parastana qarar day kar mstr daal kar diya hai. wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu ki dayen baazu ki Qaum parast makhloot hukoomat ki janib se parliman mein paish kardah ”qaumi riyasat ke qanoon” ke haq mein 62 arkaan ne vote diya hai jabkay 55 arkaan ne is ki mukhalfat ki hai aur 2 Billl par raye shumari ke waqt ghair haazir rahay they. 120 arkaan par mushtamil Parliament ke baaz Arab arkaan ne is qanoon ke khilaaf sakht naaray baazi ki aur is par voting ke baad kagahzat phaad diye. Intahaa pasand wazeer e azam Binyamin Netanyahu ne Knesset mein voting ke baad kaha ke ”Sehuniat aur Israel ki tareekh mein yeh aik faisla kin marhala hai”. Is mutanazia qanoon ka Bill Israel ke satarhween yom Tasees ke mauqa par pehli martaba parliment mein paish kya gaya tha aur is par do mah se ziyada arsa taq behas hoti rahi hai. is mein kaha gaya hai ke ”Israel yahood ka tareekhi madrِ watan hai aur unhein is mein qaumi khud aradit ka khaas al khaas haq haasil hai”. is Bill ke tehat Arabi ki abrani ke sath Israel ki aik sarkari zabaan ki hesiyat khatam kar di gayi hai. is ka darjah ghata kar ab is ko ”khusoosi hesiyat” day day gayi hai aur is ke tehat yeh Israeli idaron mein murawej rahay gi. Israel mein abad arbo ki abadi athaara laakh ke lag bhag hai. woh kal 90 laakh abadi ka 20 fi sad hain. woh aik taweel arsa se yeh shikayat karte chalay arhay hain ke un se Israel mein dosray darjah ke shehri ka sa sulooq kya ja raha hai.
1064.title: Yahoodi Qaumiat ka Israeli qanoon nasal-parastana: Al- Azher

news_detail: Jalalabad: Afghanistan ke shehar Jalalabad mein Sikhs ki abadi prkhodksh hamla mein 10 Sikh bashindon samait kam az kam 20 afraad halaak aur 20 se zayed zakhmi hogaye. saddar Afghan Ashraf ghanni ke Jalalabad mein aik hospital ke iftitah karne ghanton baad dhamaka sun-hwa jis ke nateeja mein shehar mein Maqabirat square ke atraaf imaarton aur shops ko nuqsaan pouncha. Afghan media ke mutabiq Jalalabad mein honey walay khudkush hamla mein Sikhs ko nishana baneya gaya, hamla hotay hi sikoriti idaron ney jaye waqooa ko ghairay mein le liya jab jabke bachau o raahat kaari idaron ney zakhmion aur laashon ko hospital muntaqil kya. ghair musadeqa it-tila-aat ke mutabiq hamla governor house ke nazdeek sun-hwa. Sobai Governor Ataa Allah Khogyani ney waqea aur halakaton ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke hamla khudkush tha, taham unhon ney hamla se mutaliq mazeed tafseelaat se aagah nahi kya. it-tila-aat hain ke Sikhs ka aik group Afghan saddar Ashraf ghanni se mulaqaat ke liye ja raha tha jo is waqt soobay ke dora par they. khayaal rahay ke Afghanistan mein rehne walay Sikhs par honey wala yeh hamla guzashta kayi dahaiyo ka sab se bara hamla hai. is hamla mein Sikh baradri ke aik sayasatdan otaar singh khaalisa bhi halaak hogaye jo october mein munaqqid shudni parlimani intikhabaat mein muqaabla ke khwahan they. Afghanistan mein aik nashist Sikh aqliton ke liye mukhtas hai. bataya jata hai ke khud kash bambaar ney khud ko is gaari se takradiya jis mein Sikh sawaar they.
899.title: Afghanistan mein Sikhs par khudkush hamla, 20 afraad halaak

news_detail: Paris: France ka matloob tareen gangster filmi scene ki terhan jail toud kar helicopter ke zareya faraar hogaya. Badnaam zamana gangster ne action se bharpur filmon mein honay walay scene ko haqeeqi zindagi mein karkay dikha diya, France ke dar-al-hakoomat Paris mein gangster ‘Redoine Faid’ ne jail se faraar ka aisa tareeqa apnaya ke sab dang reh gaye. Gangster ke sathiyon ne apne sarghanah ko faraar karanay ke liye bada mansoobah tayyar kya, Paris ke muzafati ilaqa mein qaid Redoine ko faraar karanay ke liye thoday faasla par jhadion mein aik helicopter utaara gaya aur phir musallah afraad jail mein daakhil hogaye. jail ke maheman khanah mein pehlay se maujood sarghanah apne sathiyon ke sath jail se nikal kar Helicopter tak chala aya, musallah afraad ne helicopter ke pilot ko pehlay hi mughwi bana kar rakha tha jis ke zareya makhsoos faasla taiy karne ke baad gangster aur is ke saathi helicopter se utar kar gaafi mein sawaar hogaye aur har thofay faasla par gadiyaan tabdeel karte rahay. Police ka kehna hai ke gang ko aakhri baar aik safaid gaadi mein dekha gaya aur un ki talaash ke liye search operation shuru kardiya gaya hai. 46 sala gangster ‘Redoine Faid’ ko 2010 mein dacoity aur is waardaat mein Police ahelkaar ke qatal par 25 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. is se qabal bhi badnaam zamana gangster jail toud kar faraar hochuka tha. is gangster ne jail mein aik daha guzarnay ke baad –apne pirol officer ko yeh qaail kerwatay hue ke woh badal chuka hai 2009 mein mashroot to rapar raha sun-hwa tha. is ke baad se is ki maqboliat mein izafah hota gaya tha chunkay woh apne maazi ki yaado aur Paris mein aik mujrim ke tor par apne ubharnay ki dastanoon ko bayan karte hue mukhtalif tally vision shows mein namodaar hota raha aur kitaaben likhna shuru ki theen
914.title: France ka badnaam zamana gangster jail se helicopter ke zareya faraar

news_detail: Japan ke shenshah Akihitoki tabiyat baggar gayi, jis ke baad tamam masrofiyat mansookh kar di gayi hain, Shahi hakkaam ke mutabiq Akihitoki sehat ko monitor kya ja raha hai. shenshah ko dimaghi nuqs dam ke bayes ghabrahat aur matli honay lagi. yeh sorat e haal dimagh ko khatir khuwa khoo noon nah pounchanay ke baais paish aati hai. japani Shahi khandan ke sarbarah 84 sala Akihitobemaar ho gay hain, Shahi khandan ke umoor ko dekhnay wali Emperial House hold agency ke mutabiq AkihitoTokyo ke ampril palace mein hain jahan un ki sehat ko monitor kya ja raha hai. shenshah Akihitoaglay saal 30

April ko raza karana taur par apne takhat se dastaberdar ho jaien ge. shenshah Akihitoke baad un ke barray betay aur walii ehad naro hito Japan ke naye shenshah ki zimma dariyan sanbhalain ge. japani news agency ke mutabiq malka Japan Michiko, Akihitoke cousin Prince Takamado ki Dukhtar shehzadi Ayako se mulaqaat karen gi jo aik 32 sala aam shakhs se apni mangni karne ke elaan ke baad Shahi joray se aaj mulaqaat karne wali theen.
930.title: Shenshah Japan bemaar ho gay

news_detail: Amrici riyasat Arizona mein police ke mutabiq aik 92 sala khatoon ne care home mein jaaney se bachney ke liye apne 72 sala betay ko goli maar kar halaak kar diya. adalti dastawizaat ke mutabiq Anna Mae Blessings Nami khatoon ko unhen ‘care home’ mein bhejnay betay ke iraadon ka pata chal gaya tha. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq mazkoorah khatoon ne Arizona mein waqay –apne ghar se jis mein woh aur un ka beta apni dost ke sath rehta tha bahar nikaltay hue kaha ‘tum ne meri zindagi li is liye mein tumhari le rahi hon.’ Anna Mae Blessings ne police ko bataya ke woh khud ko bhi maarna chahti theen. muqami media ka kehna hai ke yeh waqea do July ki subah meri koupa county mein fountains hills ke qasba mein paish aaya. mrs blesings jin ke betay ka naam zahir nahi kya gaya chahtay they ke un ki walida care home muntaqil ho jayen kyunkay un ka apni walida ke sath’ rehna mushkil tha. ‘Anna Mae Blessings ne apne betay ke sath behas ke douran sunah 1970 ki dahai mein khareeda gaya revolver nikaal kar apne betay par goli chala di, un ke paas dosra revolver bhi mojood tha. police ne Anna Mae Blessings ke maray hue betay ko talaash kar liya jis ki gardan aur jabray mein golion ke nishaan they. is ke baad Anna Mae Blessings ne apne betay ki 57 sala dost ki janib revolver ka rukh kya jinhon ne un se revolver chean kar kamray ke aik konay mein pheink diya jis par woh dosray revolver se waar karna chahti theen magar woh nakaam rahen. mazkoorah khatoon ke betay ki dost ne wahan se bhaag kar police ko bulaya. police ne mrs blessings ko un ke bad room mein talaash kar liya. unhon ne baad mein police ko bataya ke inhen un ke aamal ke liye hamesha ki neend sulaa diya jana chahiye
945.title: America: ‘old home’ bheejwane ki koshish pa maa ne betay ka qatal kar diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke Gowliguda mein waqay qadeem sntrl Bus station (CBS) Hanger jo Mississippi Hanger aaj  subah ki awleen sa-aton mein munhadim hogaya. yeh Bus shelter jo zayed az  85 saal tak zair istemaal thalikn inhedam ke baais koi jani nuqsaan nahi pouncha chunkay hakkaam ne Bus station ki boseedgi ko malhooz rakhtay hue 5 din qabal hi usay band kardiya tha. yeh hanger Nizaam hukmaran ki janib se un ke tansport flat ki parking ke liye taamer kya gaya tha, baad azan usay aik arsa tak shehar ke mean Bus Stand ke tor par istemaal kya jata raha hai. mahatma gandhi Bus station ki taamer ke baad usay city Busoon ke liye istemaal kya jata raha. greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ke hukkaam ne usay munhadim kardainay ka faisla kya tha taham muqami awam ki mukhalfat ki wajah se is mansoobah ko tark kardiya gaya tha. Muqami awam chahti thi ke is maqam ko aik tareekhi yadgar ke tor par mehfooz kya jaye. Principal Secretary Tansport o Incharge Managing Dirctor  Telangana state road tansport corporation mister snil sharmaa aaj subah is maqam ka dora karne walay thay taham jumaraat ki subah 7:00 bujey hi yeh shade az khud munhadim hogaya. mister snil sharmaa ne is zimn mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke yeh structure bohat qadeem tha aur bohat boseedah hochuka tha. Unhon ne bataya ke shade ki haalat ko dekhte hue guzashta paanch din qabal hi usay band kardiya gaya tha.
960.title: Gowliguda ka qadeem Bus Stand Mississippi  hanger munhadim

news_detail: Israel ke aik sabiq wazeer Gonen Segev ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein muqadma ki samaat shuru hogayi hai. Gonen Segev 1995 aur 1996 hamza mein Israeli kabeena mein tawanai aur infrastructure ke wazeer rahay they. un ke khilaaf guzashta mah jung ke zamana mein dushman ko maloomat faraham karne aur ryastِ Israel ke khilaaf jasoosi ke ilzaam mein fard e jurm Ayad kya gaya tha. tehqiqaat se yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke unhon ney Iran ki intelli jins ke liye jasoosi ki thi aur riyasat Israel ko nuqsaan pohanchanay ki koshish ki thi. Israel ki dakhli security ki zimma daar agency Shin beeet ke mutabiq sabiq wazeer nigeria mein irani sfar t- khanah se rabita mein rahay they. woh is africi malik mein bhi kuch arsa muqeem rahay they. baad mein unhon ney Iran ka safar kya tha aur –apne sath rabita rakhnay walay irani intelli jins ke agent se mulaqaat ki thi. 62 sala Gonen Segev ke khilaaf muqadma ki band kamrah mein samaat ki jarahi hai aur sahafion ko adalat mein daakhil honay ki ijazat nahi di gayi. unhein maghribi Africa ke malik gani mein dakhla ki ijazat nah milnay par May mein Israel wapsi par girftar kar liya gaya tha. Segev ney irani agents ko tawanai ki market, Israel mein security tansibaat, siyasi aur security idaron ki imaarton aur hakkaam ke baaray mein maloomat faraham ki theen. doosri janib mister Segev ke wukla ka kehna hai ke un ke mokl par Ayad kardah ilzamaat ki ziyada tar tafseel riyasat ke nafiz kardah black out mein haasil ki gayi hai. is hawala se bohat thori maloomat faraham ki gayi hain aur is terhan aik gum raah kin ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki gayi hai. un ka kehna hai ke frdِ ilzaam ke mawaad se aik mukhtalif tasweer samnay aati hai jabkay is ki mukammal tafseel ko Afsha nahi kya gaya hai aur is ko rokkk liya gaya hai. Gonen Segev sabiq Israeli wazeer e azam Isac Robin ki labour hukoomat mein wazeer rahay they aur unhon ney flstineyon ke sath oslo doum moahida ke haq mein faisla kin vote dainay ke liye apni dayen baazu ki jamaat ko kher baad keh diya tha. woh maazi mein bhi fouj daari ilzamaat mein qaid bhagat chuke hain. un par 2004 hamza mein niether lindz se aik safarti passport par qowat bakhash 30 hazaar golian Israel smuggle karne ki koshish ke ilzaam mein fard jurm Ayad kya gaya tha. unhon ney is passport ki muddat khatam honay ke baad khud hi ja-al saazi se aakhri tareekh barha li thi. 2005 hamza mein unhon ney peli bargin samjhota ke tehat un ilzamaat ka aitraaf kar liya tha. un par cradet card ke fraud ke ilzaam mein bhi fard jurm Ayad ki gayi thi
975.title: Sabiq Israeli wazeer ke khilaaf Iran ke liye jasoosi ke ilzaam mein muqadma ki samaat

news_detail: Thailand: Shumali Thailand ke suba mein tang ghaar mein phansay 12 nau umar footbaal khiladion aur un ke 25 sala coach ko bahar nikaalte ki sar tod koshish ki jarahi hai. mahireen ney khabardaar kya hai ke coach sameit tamam bachay bohat kamzor aur laghar ho chukay hain aur inhen tera kar bahar nikalna namumkin hai. Aalmi media ke mutabiq bachon ki umrein 11 se 15 baras ke darmain hain aur woh apne coach ke sath ghaar mein puhanche they ke barish hogayi aur kayi kilometer taweel is ghaar mein barish ka pani bharna shuru hogaya tha. tamam afraad ko ghaar ke aakhri kinare par aik qadray onche jagah par panah leni padi thi aur woh wapas anay se qassar they. aik hafta se zayed waqt ki talaash ke baad jab wahan chand ghouta Khor puhanche to unhon ney bachon ko bhook ki haalat mein dekha. is ke baad inhen ghiza aur duwaein pohanchanay ka kaam shuru sun-hwa. is ghaar ka naam Tham Laung hai. Ab tak gharoon mein ghouta khori ke darjanon mahireen ney un bachon tak pounchanay ki koshish ki hai jis ke liye inhen kayi kilometer tairna parta hai jis mein 10 se 12 ghantay lag jatay hain. taham ghaar mein phansay afraad ki bahafazat wapsi ke liye Thailand ki behria, America o Bartania aur deegar mumalik ke maahir ghouta khoron bachao o raahat kaari ke mahireen, garoon mein bachao ka tajurbah rakhnay walay mahireen aur deegar afraad ney bachon ko bachanay ke liye kayi aapshnz par ghhor shuru kardiya hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke aindah chand dinon baad baarisho ka silsila shuru hojaye ga aur ghaar mein pani bharnay se aakhri panah gaah bhi doob sakti hai. isi liye pipes ke zareya fi ghanta hazaron letter pani bahar nikala ja raha hai taakay usay bachon tak pounchanay se roka jasakay. mehakma mosmiyat ney is hafta ilaqa mein shadeed baarisho ki paish goi kar di hai. yahi wajah hai ke bachao mahireen ki tashweesh waqt ke sath sath barhti jarahi hai. ghouta khoron ke mutabiq surang numa ghaar ke domqamat intahi tang hain aur bachon ko wahan se nikaalte ke liye inhen teraaki seekhna laazmi hai lekin un bachon ki aksariyat tairna nahi janti. doosri soorat mein yeh bachay mazeed kayi mah tak wahan phansay rahen ge aur manson khatam honay ke baad ghaar sokhne par hi wapas nikal saken ge. ghaar mein tareqi hai aur pani intahi gadla bhi hai jo phansay hue logon tak rasai mein mazeed mushkilaat ki wajah ban raha hai. taham aik ghouta Khor ney wahan poanch kar video banai hai jis mein tamam bachon ko behtar haalat mein dekha ja sakta hai aur woh apna taaruf karate nazar atay hain. is ke baad Thailand behria ke fouji wahan tak puhanche aur bachon ko tibbi imdaad aur khana pohanchaya aur un ke zakhamo par marham patti bhi ki. tamam bachay kamzoree mehsoos kar rahay lekin koi jani khatray se dochar nahi. doosri janib pani ki barri miqdaar ko ghaar se nikala ja raha hai lekin ghaar ke dhanay se dobarah pani andar daakhil ho raha hai. bachon ko teraaki sikahnay ki koshish bhi ki jarahi hai. riskyo amlah fibre aaptk line ko bachon tak pohanchanay ki koshish kar raha hai taakay woh apne walidain se baat kar saken aur mahireen nafsiat ney kaha hai ke yeh un ke liye bohat hosla afzaa amal hoga. doosri janib bachon ki panah gaah ke qareeb surang khodnay ki koshish bhi ki jarahi hai jis ke liye 20 se 30 temen kaam kar rahi hain. mahireen aik aik inch jagah ko dekh rahay hain taakay wahan koi qudrati darz ya rasta nikal aeye aur usay khoud kar raah nikaali jasakay. is ke bawajood barish se ghaar mein mazeed pani bhar jaane ka challenge ab bhi sab se bara khatrah bana sun-hwa hai.
989.title: Thailand ke ghaar mein phansay Junior Footballers ko bachanay ke liye sar tod koshishen jari

news_detail: Islamabad ki ehatasab Adalat ne Nawaz Sharif family ke khilaaf dair even field refrences ka faisla snadya hai, Nawaz shareef ko 10 saal qaid aur 8 million pound jurmana aed kya gaya hai. adalti faisla mein Nawaz shareef ki Sahebzadi maryam Nawaz ko 7 saal qaid aur 2 million pound jurmana aed kya gaya hai jabkay un ke shohar captain (Rtd) Safdar ko aik saal ki saza sunai gayi hai. Adalat ne Avenfield apartments ki zabti ke ehkamaat bhi diye hain, NAB Prosecutor ke mutabiq ehatasab Adalat ka faisla Supreme Court ke faisla ki toseeq hai. NAB Prosecutor ne media se guftagu mein bataya ke ehatasab Adalat ke faisla se saabit hogaya ke even field apartmnts corruption ki raqam se banaye gaye hain, NAB Adalat ne even field apartmnts ki wifaq ke tehat zabt karne ka hukum diya hai. NAB Prosecutor ke mutabiq hil metal case aur flag ship refrences apne ikhtitami marahil mein hain, saabit hogaya ke even field apartmnts 1993 se shareef family ki malkiat thay. ehatasab Adalat ke judge Mohammad Basheer ne even field refrences ka faisla band kamrah mein sunanay se qabal fariqain ke wukla ko kamrah Adalat mein talabb kya. is mauqa par NAB Prosecutor sardar muzaffar abbasi aur fariqain ke wukla ko rostrm par bulaya gaya. is moqa par adalti amlah ne bataya ke abhi wukla aur judge sahib mein tabadlah khayaal ho raha hai jab faisla sunaya jaye ga to media ko andar bulaya jaye ga. ehatasab Adalat ne teen din pehlay refrences par faisla mehfooz kya tha, Nawaz shareef ki janib se un ki wapsi taq faisla moakhar karne ki appeal ki gayi thi jabkay peoples party aur tehreek insaaf ne faisla moakhar karne ki mukhalfat ki thi. faisla ke waqt kamrah Adalat khicha khch bhara sun-hwa tha jabkay Adalat ke andar bhi sikoriti ke khusoosi intizamaa kiye gaye thay. ehatasab Adalat ke judge Mohammad Basheer ne Nawaz shareef ki janib se un ki wapsi taq faisla moakhar karne ki darkhwast mustard kar di aur apna faisla suna diya
1007.title: Nawaz Sharif ko 10, Maryam Nawaz ko 7 saal qaid ki saza

news_detail: Malaysian Wazeer e Azam dr Mahatir Mohammad ney aaj kaha ke Islamic Scholar o Mubaligh Deen Dr. Zakir Naik ko jo India ko matloob hain, wapas nahi bheja jaye ga. Dr. Zakir Naik is waqt beron mulk ke daura par thay jab 2016 mein Indian hukoomat ney un ke aur un ke idaara Islamic Research Foundation (IRF) ke khilaaf mazhabi mnafrt phelanay aur dehshat gardi ko farogh dainay ke ilzamaat ke tehat karwai ki thi, baad azan Dr. Zakir Naik mulk wapas loutne ki bajaye Malaysia pahonch gay jahan inhen mustaqil sukunat ikhtiyar karne ki ijazat di gayi thi. maazi mein kayi groups ney hukoomat se khwahish ki thi ke Dr. Zakir Naik ko un ke bayanaat aur rujhanaat ko malhooz rakhtay hue mulk se kharij kardiya jaye. Dr. Zakir Naik ke khilaaf national investy gation agency ( an aayi ae ) aur Enforcement Directorate (ED) ney mukhtalif muqadmaat darj kiye hain.

Wazeer e Azam Malaysia ka kehna hai ke jab tak woh yahan kisi qisam ka masla peda nahi karte, inhen wapas nahi bheja jaye ga chunkay inhen mustaqil muqeem ka moaqqaf ataa kya gaya hai. unhon ney kaha ke panah gzinon ko panah dainay Malaysian policy ka jahan tak maamla hai hamara mulk apna insani fareeza injaam deta rahay ga. yoropi mumulk ko is ki taqleed karna chahiye. unhon ney kaha’ ‘ hamaray mulk anay walay panah gzinon ke liye hum hamesha maheman Nawaz rahay hain is haqeeqat ke bawajood ke un ki tadaad bohat ziyada hai. hum ney inhen qubool kya.’ ‘

Do din qabal achanak Bharti media mein yeh khabar phailai gayi ke Malaysian hukoomat ney Dr. Zakir Naik ko India ke hawala karne se ittafaq karliya aur inhen hirasat mein le liya gaya aur woh India laaye jarahay hain, agarchay khud Dr. Zakir Naik aur Indian hakkaam ney un it-tila-aat ki tardeed kar di thi. wizarat umoor kharja ney guzashta January mein Malaysian hukoomat se rasmi tor par Dr. Zakir Naik ko mulk ke hawala karne ki khwahish ki thi taham Malaysian hukoomat ney ta haal is par koi karwai nahi ki hai agarchay dono mumulk ke darmiyan mlzmin ki hawalgi ka moahida hai. inhen mulk wapas laane ki sifarati koshishen ki jarahi hain magar aaj Wazeer e Azam Malaysia Mahatir Mohammad ney aaj wazeh kardiya ke un ki hukoomat, Dr. Zakir Naik ko Bharat ke hawala karne ka koi iradah nahi rakhti. un par yeh ilzaam hai ke Bangladesh mein 2016 mein hue aik hamla ke mlzmin Dr. Zakir Naik ke madah thay is hamla mein 22 log maaray gay thay. un ke idaara aayi are f par imtina aed kardiya gaya hai aur un par 18 crore rupay se zayed raqam beron mulk se haasil karne ke bhi ilzamaat hain .

Dr. Zakir Naik ney bhi un it-tila-aat ki yeh kehte hue tardeed kar di thi ke woh is waqt mulk wapas nahi lotin ge jab tak inhen yeh yaqeen nah hojaye ke un ke khilaaf aadlanh karwai ki jaye gi. Malaysia ke muqami akhbar’ f am tea news’ ney Dr. Zakir Naik ke wakeel shehar Aldeen Ali ke hawala se bataya ke inhen wizarat umoor kharja ke wazeer se un ke ikhraj ki rasmi darkhwast mousool nahi hui hai. Malaysia se ikhraj ki khabar ghalat hai. Ali ney kaha ke abhi tak hum ko yeh hadaayat hai ke hamaray mokl ko Bharat hawalgi ki kisi bhi karwai ko challenge kya jaye. hamein is khsos mein dastawizaat diye jaany hon ge .

Malaysian Wazeer e Azam ki wazahat aur elaan ke baad yeh baat ab wusooq ke sath kahi ja sakti hai ke Dr. Zakir Naik ko mustaqil qareeb mein mulk wapas lana India ke liye nihayat hi mushkil hai. Dr. Zakir Naik ko Malaysia mein mustaqil sukoonat ikhtiyar karne ki ijazat day diye jaany ke bayis un ki tehweel mlzmin moahida ke bawajood ikhraj ko yakeeni banana bohat hi mushkil hoga. awwal to Dr. Zakir Naik ko hawala karne Indian hukoomat ki darkhwast par Malaysian hukoomat koi misbet karwai nahi kere gi aur bil farz India apni safarti koshisho mein kamyaab bhi hojata hai aur aindah dinon mein Malaysian hukoomat is par amaada bhi hojati hai to wahan ke qanoon ke mutabiq un ke ikhraj ko adalat mein challenge kya jaye ga. is soorat mein Malaysian hukoomat ya wahan ki qanoon nafiz karne wali agencio ke liye yeh zurori hojata ke Dr. Zakir Naik ki mojoodgi se Malaysia ko la-haq khatrah se adalat ko qaail karwaya jaye.
1058.title: Dr. Zakir Naik ko kharij nahi kya jaye ga : Wazeer e Azam Malaysia

news_detail: Yemen ki hukoomat ne ilzaam ayed kya hai ke Iran Nawaz Houthi militia ki janib se mulk mein musallat ki gayi jung ke nateeja mein bees laakh se zayd bachay mehnat mushaqqat karne par majboor hogaye hain. yemeni khatoon wazeer baraye samaji umoor o mehnat Abtaj Al Kamal ne bataya ke Houthis ki musallat kardah jung ke nateeja mein do million se zayd bachay mehnat mushaqqat par majboor hain. un ka kehna tha ke Houthi militia ki taraf se yemeni bachon ko jung ke eendhan ke tour par istemaal karne ka silsila hanoz jari hai. ab tak Houthi militia 23 hazaar bachon ko jung ke liye bharti karchuki hai. Rawan saal ke douran ab tak 2500 bachon ko jung ke liye bharti kya gaya. khabar rasan idaray ‘Saba’ ke mutabiq wazeer baraye samaji umoor ka kehna hai ke jung ke baais 45 laakh yemeni bachay taleem se mahroom hogaye hain. Houthis ki taraf se jung ke douran schoolon ko danista tour par nishana banaya ja raha hai. Houthis ke hamlon mein mulk bhar mein 2372 school kulli ya juzwi taur par tabah ho chukay hain jab ke 1500 schoolon ko Houthis ne apne campaign mein tabdeel kar rakha hai. Abtaj Al Kamal ka mazeed kehna tha ke Houthi shiddat pasand yemeni bachon ko jung mein jhonknay ka silsila bhi jari rakhay hue hain. bachon ko schoolon se utha kar jungi tarbiyat marakaz muntaqil kardiya jata hai. walidain ko bhi bachon ko jung ke liye bheejwane par majboor kya ja raha hai. unhon ne kaha ke Yemen mein Houthis ki janib se thopi gayi jung ke baais bachpan intehai aziat naak ban gaya hai
1075.title: Yemen mein Houthis ki jung ke bayes 2 M bachay mushaqqat par mjboor

news_detail: Narendra Modi naay chaar saal Iqtidaar mein rehne ke baad Telugu Desam Party aur deegar partiyon ki janib se paish kardah tehreek adam etemaad ku arram se shikast dainay mein kamyaab hochuki hai. Din bhar jari mubahis ke baad hui raye dahi mein tehreek adam etemaad ki tayeed mein 126 vote daaley gaye jabkay mukhalfat mein 325 vote daaley gaye. 451 rukni ewaan mein tehreek adam etemaad ko shikast dainay ke liye bar sar e Iqtidaar BJP ko 226 vote darkaar they. Navin Patnaik ki BJD, Telangana ki bar sar e iqteadar TRS aur BJP ki haleef Shiv Sena ney raye dahi mein hissa nahi liya. Tamilnadu ki bar sar e iqtedaar AIADMK ney hukoomat ki tayeed mein vote diya. Raye dahi mein cross voting nahi hui.
Tehreek adam etemaad aik rukn Lok Sabha paish karsaktha hai agr woh samjhta hai ke maujuda Hukumat aiwaan mein aksariyat se mahroom hogayi hai
Yeh tehreek Rajya Sabha mein paish nahi ki ja sakti
tehreek adam etemaad paish karne rukan Lok Sabha ko wajoh paish karne ki zaroorat nahi
Speaker Lok Sabha ki janib se tehreek ko qubool karne ke liye kam az kam 50 arkaan ki tayeed zaroori hai
Hukumat ko aiwaan Lok Sabha mein raye dahi mein apni aksariyat saabit karna padta hai basurat e deegar usay mustafi hona padta hai
Azaadi ke baad se ab tak 27 tahrikaat adam etemaad paish kiye ja chukay hain
India- china jung ke fauri baad Acharia Kriplani ney augst 1963 mein pehli tehreek adam etemaad paish ki thi
indra gandhi ney sab se ziyada 15 Tehreekaat e adam etemaad ka saamna kya
Lal Bahadur Shastri aur Narsimha Rao ney teen martaba, Murarji Desai ney do martaba aur Jawahrlal Nehru, Rajiv Gandhi aur Atal Bihari Vajpayee ney aik aik martaba is tehreek ka musbet saamna kya hai
Vajpayee ney Iqtidaar sanbhalne ke baad ewaan mein tehreek etemaad paish karte hue aik vote se haar gaye thay
tamam tehreekaat adam etemaad ko shikast ka saamna karna pada siwaye Murarji  Desai ke khilaaf paish kardah tehreek ke-Unhon ney July 1979 mein tehreek par mubahis ke douran istifa day diya tha
Is se qabal aakhri martaba tehreek adam etemaad 15 baras qabal Vajpayee hukoomat ke khilaaf paish ki gayi thi
teen tehreekaat adam etemaad ke baayes Hukomatain zawaal Pazeer hui theen .
vajpayee hukoomat ke khilaaf 1999 Sonia gandhi ki Tehreek adam etemaad par Vajpayee hukoomat aik vote ke baayes shikast khagyi
H D Deveguda hukoomat ke khilaaf 1997 mein Congress ki tayeed wapas le lainay ke baayes 10 mah ki hukoomat girgaee thi
V P Singh hukoomat 1990 mein tehreek adam etemaad ki hiddat ka saamna ki thi aur 10 November 1990 ko tehreek adam etemaad mein shikast khagyi
949.title: Modi Hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam etemaad ko shikast

news_detail: Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State Mr. Allipuram Venkateshwar Reddy ne Indra Gandhi Stadium New Delhi mein Womens National Boxing Camp ka daura kya aur Chief Coach Mr. Shiv Singh aur International Boxer Mary Kom ke ilawa Telangana ki boxer Nikhat Zareen se mulaqaat ki aur anay walay asian aur world chmpyn ship ke liye tayario par tabadlah khayaal kiya jo bil-tarteeb August aur November mein munaqqid honay walay hain. Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State ne Chief Coach se un muqablon ki tayario ke baray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya aur Chief Coach ne kaha ke Nikhat Zareen ka mustaqbil roshan hai aur woh apne 51 kilgoram wet Zumra ki khiladion mein aik talented Boxer hai. Coach ne yeh bhi kaha ke hum tamam seniors ko un ke wazan ke zumra mein jaanch kar rahay hain aur woh yaqeenan acha muzahira karen gi. Mary Kom bhi Nikhat Zareen ko bharpoor taawun kar rahi hain aur un ka hosla brhharhi hain. Manipur hukumat ne Mary Kom ko Fakhr e Manipur riyasat qarar diya hai.
