Is mauqa par Sadarnashin Sports Authority of Telangana State ne Nikhat Zareen ko mubarakbaad dete hue kaha ke woh fakhr Telangana banin gi.
968.title: sadarnashin Telangana Sports Authority ki Nikhat Zareen se naik tawaquaat

news_detail: Gaza: Palestine ki mahsoor patti Gaza par Israeli fazaiya ki bombari aur zameeni fouj ki firing se 4 Falasteeni shaheed hogaye. wizarat sahet ke mutabiq Gaza ki mahsoor patti ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Israeli fazaiya ney mutadid hamlay kiye jab ke sarhad ke qareeb ehtijaj karne walay afraad par qaabiz fouj ney raast nishana banakar golian barsain. Junoobi Gaza ke ilaqa Khan Younis mein Israeli jungi tayyaron ki bombari ke nateeja mein do Falasteeni shaheed hue jab ke rafa ke ilaqa mein golian lagney se aik nojawan shaheed sun-hwa. Gaza ki sarhad par ehtijaj ke douran qaabiz fouj ki goli lagney se 27 sala Badwaan shaheed hwa, muzahireen par aansoo gas ki shelling ki gayi aur seedha nishana taak kar golian barsayi gayeen jis se 120 afraad zakhmi hue. Muzahmati tehreek Hamas ka kehna hai ke fazai bombari mein shaheed honey walon ka talluq un ki jamaat se tha. Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Hamas ke mutadid thikanon ko tabah kardiya hai. Ghasib yahodi mumlikat ney sarhad ke qareeb jummay ko aik fouji ki halakat ka bahana karte hue yeh wehshiana karwai ki hai, Israel ka kehna hai ke faujion ke aik qaafla par ki gayi firing mein aik fouji shadeed zakhmi hogaya jo baad azan jaanbar nahi ho saka. Gaza sarhad par mahino se jari muzahmat mein mara jaaney wala yeh pehla Israeli fauji hai. Israel ki fouj ka kehna hai ke is ney Hamas ke 25 thikanon ko nishana baneya hai. Fauj ney kaha ke Gaza patti par Hamas ke military nishaanon ko barray pemana par nishana baneya gaya hai
982.title: Gaza par Israel ke wehshiana hamlay, 4 Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: Damuscus: Shaam ke junoob maghribi soubay Daraa mein Shami afwaj ki fazai karwai mein 11 bachon samait 26 afraad jaan bahaq ho gay hain. Shaam mein insani huqooq ke nigaran group Al-Marsad ke mutabiq junoobi Shaam ke soubay Daraa mein ISIS tanzeem ke zair-e qabza ilaqay par shadeed fazai bomb-baari ki gayi. bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq roos aur Shaam ki ittihadi fouj ke laraka tayyaron nay raat gay junoob maghribi soobah Daraa ke makhsoos ilaaqon mein fazai bombari ki jis ke nateeja mein 26 afraad jaan bahaq ho gay hain jin mein 11 masoom bachay bhi Shaamil hain. Shami hukoomat ka kehna tha ke mazkoorah ilaqa baaghi jamaaton ke zair tasallut thay. Shaam mein fazai hamla is waqt kya gaya jab aqwam mutahidda ke high commissionaire ki janib se Daraa mein phansay 1.40 lakhs shehrion ko pur aman muqam tak muntaqili ke liye mehfooz guzargah aur munasib mauqa faraham karne ki appeal ki thi. Taham Shami hukoomat ka daawa hai ke is ilaqa mein ISIS ke intahaa pasand group Khalid bin Waleed nay 30 hazaar shehrion ko insani dhaal bana rakha hai .

Al-Marsad ke director Rami Abdul Rahman nay francesi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke jummay ke roz roosi aur Shami jungi tayyaron nay Daraa ke junoob maghrib mein dehi ilaqa” Houzz Al yarmouk” ko poooray din hamlon ka nishana banaya. is ilaqa par ISIS tanzeem se talluq rakhnay walay aik group Fusaill Khalid bin Walid” ka control hai. karwai ke nateeja mein 26 Shami shehri apni jaanon se haath dho baithy jin mein 11 bachay bhi hain. un ke ilawa darjanon afraad zakhmi bhi hue jin mein baaz ki haalat naazuk hai. Al-Marsad ka kehna hai ke hamlon mein kayi dehaat aur qasbay fazai hamlon aur barrel bomb ke dhmakon ki lapait mein aeye jin mein Taseel, Hait , Sahm ul Julan aur Al Sahjrah Shaamil hain. Musalsal bomb-baari ke nateeja mein infrastructure ko badi tabahi ka saamna karna para aur baaz ilaqay mukammal tor par barbaad ho gay. askari operation aur tsfie ke muahiday ke zareya Daraa soobah ka 90 fi sad hssh wapas lainay ke baad ab Shami hukoomat ki fouj ke liye sirf ISIS tanzeem ke zair qabza kuch ilaaqon ko control mein lena baqi reh gaya hai. Shaam mein kaam karne walay riskyo tanzeemon ke mutabiq fazai hamlon mein Daraa ke mukhtalif ilaaqon ke anfra astrkchr mukammal tor par tabah ho gay hain. Sainkdon makanaat munhadim ho gay hain aur ilaqa mein khauf o hraas phail gaya hai. Zakhmion ko tibbi imdaad muhayya ki ja rahi hai. shadeed zakhmion ko tibbi saholaten haasil nah honay ke baayes halakaton mein izafah ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha hai. wazeh rahay ke Shaam mein 2011 se shuru honay wali khanah jungi mein ab taq 3 laakh 50 hazaar afraad jaan bahaq ho chukay hain jab ke lakhoon khandano ko darbadar hona para hai.
996.title: Daraa mein Shami fouj ki bombari mein 11 bachon samait 26 afraad jaan bahaq

news_detail: Lions Club. Mehr Organization ne Lions Club of Charminar Centennial ke ishtiraaq se ”Tiranga hai meri jaan” munsarim kardah Rally ko Lion Vijay Kumar Sethi ne jhandi dikhayi.Is mauqa par, Lion Affan Quadri qadri saddar Charminar Centennial, Lion Aleem bag, Lion kamal, Lion dinesh, Lion Javed Khan aur Lion Amoodi bhi maujood they. Youm e azaadi ki munasibat se Qaumi Parcham ki Azmat ke izhaar ke taur par is Rally ka ihtimaam kya gaya tha jo tareekhi Charminar se rawana hokar mughal poora pohanchi jis mein o s am college ke taqreeban 250 talba ne 125 bikes ke sath hissa liya. Yeh talba apne hathon mein qaumi parcham thaamay hue they aur ‘Tiranga hai meri jaan’ naaray lga rahe they. Yeh Rally Charminar se bar-aamad hokar chowk, Puranapul, Bahadurpura, Tadban, Shamsheer Ganj, Falaknuma,Chandrayan Gutta Phisal Banda, Santosh Nagar aur Eidi Bazar se hotay hue mughal poora pohanchi. Rally ka ekhtataam qaumi taranah par huwa. Lion Affan Quadri aur Lion Amoodi ne Rally ki nigrani ki.
1009.title: Tiranga hai meri jaan’ Rally ka ihtemaam

news_detail: Saudi Arab ney Israeli Knesset se jumaraat ke roz Manzoor hay” Yahoodi qomiat” ke mutanazia qanoon ki manzoori ki shadeed muzammat karte hue usay dotok andaaz mein mustard kar diya hai. Saudi Wizarat kharja ke senior zaraye ka kehna hai ke Yahoodi qaumiat ka usool bain ul aqwami qanoon aur insani huqooq ke usoolon ke manafi hai. is qanoon ki manzoori se Israel Palestine tanaza ke hal ki bain ul aqwami koshishen mutasir hon gi. zaraye ney bain al aqwami baradri par zor diya ke woh apni zimma dariyan mehsoos karte hue is qanoon ka muqaabla karen. Neez Falasteeni awam ke khilaaf nasli imtiaz par mabni Israeli koshisho ko bhi roknay ki zaroorat hai kyunkay un iqdamaat se flstinyon ki qaumi shanakht aur Musallimah qanooni huqooq ko khatraat la-haq hotay hain. mutanazia Israeli qanoon par shyoni parliment mein jumaraat ke roz aik dhuwan daar mubahisay ke baad votng hui jis mein 120 arkaan Knesset mein se 62 ney is qanoon ke haq mein vote diya. ewaan mein Arab Israelion ki numaindagi karne walay arkaan ney is shyoni qanoon ko malik mein nasal parastana nizaam ki bunyaad qarar diya.
1018.title: Saudi Arab ney Israel ka manzurah Yahoodi qomiat ka qanoon mustard kar diya

news_detail: American mehkuma Insaaf ney jummay ko elaan kya ke Texas ki aik Adalat ney hind asasi aik farzi Call Centre aur money laundering scam ke 21 arkaan ko mukhtalif noiyat ki sazayen tajweez ki hain, deegar teen ko Jaria saal ke awail mein saza di ja chuki hai. Un shehrion ko 20 baras tak jail ki saza sunai gayi hai. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq American adalat ney scandal mein mulawwis 21 Bharati naujawanon ko 4 se 20 saal ki saza sunai hai, Call Centre agent museebat mein phansay Americans ko value cards khareedne par dabaau daaltay thay jabkay inkaar ki soorat mein unhen giraftari ki dhamki dete thay. jaali Call Centre ka hadaf umar raseedah American shehri aur ghairqanooni taarkin watan the jabke saza mukammal honay ke baad mutadid zair e hirasat mujrimon ko Mulk badar kardiya jaye ga. Mehakma Insaaf ney bataya ke mulzimeen ney Bharat mein Call Centre qayim kiye thay, jin ke zareya American zaeef shehrion aur ghair qanooni taarikeen ko American tax ya Emigration Department se zahir karte hue jurmane ada karne ya phir giraftari ya malik se ikhraj ka saamna karne ki dhamkiyan diya karte thay. Mehakuma ney 56 afraad aur  5 Bharati Companiyon par shanakhti chori, American ohdedar ka talbees shakhsi karne, barqi dhoka dahi aur money laundering ki saazish karne ke ilzamaat waza kiye thay. Maharashra ke Thane zila mein Police ney October 2016 mein taqreeban 500 Call Centre mulazuimeen ko hirasat mein liya tha. Ohdedaron ney kaha tha ke yeh racket rozana taqreeban aik crore rupay ainth raha tha. American Federal Bureau ney 15 october 2016 ko Bharat ki qanoon nafiz karne wali agencies ke sath mil kar tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kya tha. baadazaan un mulzimeen par ilzamaat waza kiye gaye aur saabit honay par inhen saza sunai gayi. saza ki takmeel ke baad un mulzimeen ko malik badar kardiya jaye g.
1035.title: Call Centre scandal mein 21 Hindustanion ko 20 saal tak ki saza

news_detail: Bengaluru. Aik ghair mamooli case mein Police Commissionerate mein Vanita Sahyavani  Womens’ Help Line) mein haal hi mein ek case pouncha jis mein aik 31 sala Taajir ney yeh darkhwast ki ke is ki sabiqa girlfriend ke sath us ki qabil aitraaz haalat mein li gayeen tasaveer aur videos bar aamad ki jaye. Dance Bar ki Raqqasa ney usay yeh dhamkian dete hue ke woh un tasaveer ko online post kardainay aur khaas kar biwi aur rishta daaron ko bhaij dainay ki dhamki dete hue 2.5 crore rupay mobayyana taur par wusool karli. Mazkurah Taajir ko Rajasthan ke aik MLA ney mahswara diya ke woh Police mein shikayat darj karwaye magar woh apne naam ka inkishaaf hojane ke dar se aisa karne se guraiz karta raha tha. Taajir Bengaluru ke aik mashhoor khandan ka fard hai jis ka ke are markt ke qareeb sanitarywear ka holesale ka kaarobar hai, 2016 ke wast mein shehar ke ek martaba dance baar gaya tha aur wahan woh aik 24 sala Raqqasa par farifta ho gaya tha, woh is ki khatir aksar dance baar jana shuru kya aur is Raqqasa ko tuhaayef dainay shuru kardiye. Aurat ney yeh bhaanp liya ke nojawan is ka girwidah hogaya hai usay apne aastn home ke ghar par madoo karne lagi. Aur woh badi hushiyari se Taajir ke khandan ki tafseelaat, is ki maali haalat haasil karne lagi. Hatta ke is ney Taajir ki biwi ka phone number bhi haasil karliya. baar dancer ney apne bistar par Taajir ke sath qabil aitraaz haalat mein videos bhi tayyar kiye aur kayi jaghon par khufia andaaz mein filmbandi bhi karli. Kuch mawaqay par is ney Taajir ke ilm mein laakar videos bhi shoot kiye thay. Chand mah baad Taajir ney is se is liye doori ikhtiyar krna shroa kar di ke Raqqasa ney usay un lamhaat ke videos dikha kar yeh dhamki di ke woh un videos ko online post kar dein gi aur Taajir ki biwi ko whatsapp karde gi. Raqqasa ney aisa nah karne ke liye is se pesey btorne shuru kiye, ibtida mein raqmi mutalba chand lakhoon rupay tak sun-hwa karta tha, woh is baat se nawaqif tha ke Raqqasa ka boy freind is se tawwan wusool karne ka mansoobah bnarha hai, woh khatoon ke mutalba ko poora karta raha hatta ke Bengaluru tamam five star hotlon mein khatoon ke sath qiyam kya is ke liye qeemti ashya khareed kar diya karta raha aur kayi mawaqay par partiyon par lakhoon rupay kharch kya. is terhan do baras mein khatoon ney is se 2.5 crore rupay batore liye. Taajir ney Raqqasa ke videos sameit is ke ghar tak pahonch jaaney ke dar se is ke iradey jaanne ke liye is se mutsadam huwa. Raqqasa aur is ke boyfreind ney Taajir ko hatmi taur par maamla ki yaksoi ke liye 75 laakh rupay ka mutalba kya. Soorat e haal se pareshan haal Taajir ney Rajasthan mein apne aik MLA dost se mahswara kya jis par unhon ney Police se rujoo honay ka mahswara diya. Taajir ney Police help line se rujoo ho kar apna mudda bayan kya aur kaha ke woh Raqqasa par kharch kardah raqam ki wapsi ka mutamanni nahi hai balkay woh chahta hai ke is Raqqasa ke paas mojood videos aur tasaveer delete kar diye jayen. Help-line ki councillar ney inhen mahswara diya ke woh bazabta aik shikayat darj kurwaye magar Taajir ney is zimn mein abhi apna zehan nahi banaya hai.
1045.title: Raqqasa ney video jari kardainay ki dhamki dey kar taajir se  2.5 crores battor liye

news_detail: Seol: janoobi Korea ki aik adalat nay sabiq Sadar Park Geun-hye  ku Mamlikati A gency se ghair qanooni tor par funds haasil karne aur intikhabi qawaneen ki khilaaf warzi karne par mazeed 8 baras ki saza sunai hai. Park jo Mulk ki awsleen khatoon Sadar reh chuki hain pehlay hi se bsdunwanyon, rishwat khori, ikhtiyarat ka najaaiz istemaal aur Mumlikat ke raaz afsha karne ke ilzamaat mein 24 barson ki saza kaat rahi hain. Un ilzamaat par 2016 mein un ka muwakhza kya gaya. Nai saza ka mutawatar itlaq hoga jis kamtlb yeh sun-hwa ke 66 sala Park ko majmoi tor par 32 baras ki jail ki saza bhughtna parre ga. Park ko ghair zaroori funds jama karne par 6 saal aur intikhabaat ke nataij par asr andaaz honay ke jurm mein mazeed 2 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. adalat nay fariqain ke dalail suneney ke baad dono muqadmaat mein majmoi tor par 8 saal qaid ki saza sunai. Samaat ke douran janoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar faisla suneney ke liye mojood nahi theen taham adalat nay un ki ghair mojoodgi mein hi faisla suna diya. wazeh rahay ke Junoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar Park Geun-hye ko corruption ke alzmat par awaami dabao ke paish e nazar 2017 mein mansab se hata diya gaya tha jis ke baad aan par qaim muqadmaat ki samaat huien. corruption ilzamaat aur hakoomati raaz Afsha karne par Park ko 24 pehlay baras ki saza sunai gayi thi aur aaj do mukhtalif muqadmaat mein mazeed 8 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai.
1065.title: Junoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar ko majmoi taur par 32 saal jail ki saza

news_detail: Kenya ki aik adalat ne 24 sala Malika e Husn Ruth Kamande ko apne boyfriend ko chaaqo ke pay darpay waar karkay qatal karne ke jurm mein sazae mout sunai hai. sabiq Malika e Husn Kamande par Insani Huqooq ki tanzeemon ki taraf se bhi shadeed tanqeed ki gayi thi aur apne mehboob ko chaaqu ke 22 waar karkay be rehmi ke sath mout ke ghaat utaarnay ke iqdaam ko’ ghiransani’ feal qarar diya tha. khayaal rahay ke sazae mout panay wali 24 sala roth Kamande ne apne muqadma ki samaat ke arsa mein

mein hissa liya aur Mulk ki Malika e Husn ka title haasil kya tha. Is waqt yeh Kenya ki jail 1095 mein qaid thi. Is par ilzaam tha ke is ne sunah 2015 ko apne boyfriend Fareed Mohammad ko chaaqu ke pay darpay 22 waar kar kay mout ke ghaat utaar diya tha. Mulzima ne Adalat ko bataya ke dono mein us waqt jhagda shuru hogaya tha jab is ne apne boyfriend ke room par Aids Control Programme ka aik zard card dekha jis se zahir hota tha ke woh aids ka mareez hai. Fareed ne raaz ka afsha hojane par kaha tha ke woh usay maar kar khud ko bhi maar daaley chun ke woh jaan chuki thi ke Fareed HIV positive hai. Is ne bataya ke woh apne hathon ke ba is ke seenah par girgya jis par is ne khud ko bachanay ke liye is ki aankhon mein apni donoon ungelian gaad dien aur us par qaboo paker pay darpay waar kiye. Kamande ke khilaaf qatal ka muqadma malik ki sprim court mein chalaya gaya jahan jumaraat ko khatoon judge justice Jessie Lesit ne mulzima ke khilaaf case ka faisla sunaya. Judge ne apne faisla mein likha ke ‘mein chahti hon ke naujawan is baat ko samjhain ke apne dost ka qatal ya apni mayoosi ka badla lainay ke liye kisi dosray ki jaan lena khud apni jaan ko khatray mein daalnay ke mutradif hai’. Un ka kehna tha ke achi baat to yeh hai ke hamein gussa thook kar dosray ke sath rawadari aur tahhaamul ke sath paish aana chahiye. adalat ne mulzima par trial ke douran ghair shafaaf bartao ka bhi ilzaam Ayad kya aur kaha ke is ne maqtool nojawan ke mobile phone se data gayab karne aur shawahid mitanay ki koshish ki thi. Jurm saabit honay par bhi is ne kisi qisam ki sharmindagi ka izhaar nahi kya. Khayaal rahay ke Kenya mein saza e mout ka qanoon barson se raayej hai magar sanh1987 ke baad kisi mujrim ko sazae mout nahi di gayi. maqtool ke ahal khanah ne adalti faisla ko srahte hue usay apni kamyabi qarar diya hai.
1081.title: Kenya ki  Husn ki Malika e Husn ko sazae mout

news_detail: Bengaluru. Bengaluru ke Bowring Institute mein lockers ki adam dasteyabi ki mamool ke mutabiq aik shikayat par ki gayi karwai mein chonkadine wala inkishaaf sun-hwa aur teen lockers se 500 crore rupay maliyat ki naqd raqm, qimti ashya, bank aur zameen ki dastawizaat baraamad huien. Club ki shikayat par Income Tax ke ohdedaron ne zakheera ko zabt karliya aur raqam ke zaraye ka pata chalanay tehqeeq ka aaghaz kardiya. Club ke Badminton aur Squash Incharge Sandeep ne chand workers ke sath mil kar jumaraat ke din aik arsa se zair istemaal nah rehne walay lockers ko toda tha aur lockers numbers 69, 71 & 78 mein 6 zipper-lock walay Bags rakhay hue thay. Amlah ne Institute ke secretary H. S.  Srikanth ke ilm mein yeh baat layi, chunkay shaam hochuki thi is liye Police ko mutala kardiya gaya. Srikanth ne bataya ke chunkay lockers din dhaly khole gaye thay, is liye hum ziyada kuch nahi kar sakay. hum ne dekha ke is mein kuch naqad raqam hai is liye hum ne Police ko mutala kardiya. Koi khatrah nah letay hue Institute ke hakkaam ne Police ke sath Income Tax ohdedaron ko mutala krdyajs ke douran rqomat ka zakheera bar aamad sun-hwa. Bags kholnay par ohdedaron ne paaya ke 3.73 crore rupay maliyat ki do hazaar rupay qadar ki currency Notes aur bairooni currency aur 500 rupay qader ki17 lakh rupay maliyat ki Notes thay. IT ohdedaron ne lockers se bar aamad 6 Bags zabt karte hue naqad, 7 taa 8 crore rupay laagat ke heere, 650 gram wazan ke talai biscuits, 50 lakh rupay maliyat ki do qeemti ghadiyaan aur Bengaluru ke muzafaat Dewanhalli aur Begure ilaqa ke atraaf zameenat ke mamlaat se mutaliq dastawizaat ki inventory tayyar ki. is ke alawa Bags mein blank cheques, 50 crores, 30 crores aur 15 crores waghera qader ke be-tareekh cheques bhi maujood thay. Srikanth ke mutabiq dastakhat shuda cheques par mushtamil aik mukammal Cheque Book bhi thi. Darin asna ohdedaron ko un ke aik rukn ki ghair mamooli darkhwast mousool hui jo Institute mein paish aaye waqeaat se aagah ho chukay thay. Srikanth ne kaha ”aik rukn Avinash Amarlal Kukreja ne id-daa kya ke woh Bags un ke hain. unhon (Avinash) ne darkhwast ki ke mein dastawizaat un ke hawala kardoon aur naqad raqam aur qeemti ashya apne paas rakh le sakta hoon basoorat deegar is ke waalid tumhe qatal kar dein ge.” Srikanth ne Institute ka record mulahiza karne ke baad paaya ke Avinash Bowring Institute ka 1993 se rukn hai aur Bangalore Club ki bhi rukniat rakhta hai. Srikanth ne inkishaaf kya ke woh banglore Club ko baqaida aaya karta tha jabkay woh Bowring Club mein shaed hi dekha gaya tha Albata un ki maa Kiran Amarlal apne doston ke sath Bowring Institute baqaidagi se aaya karti hain.
951.title: Bengaluru mein Badminton Club ke lockers se 500 crores maliyat ki ashya bar aamad

news_detail: Israeli ladaka tayyaron ne maghribi Sham mein itwaar ko fouji nishanon par hamlay kiye jis ke nateeja mein mutadid fouji halaak hogaye. Syria aur Lebanon se mossola it-tila-aat ke bamawajjib Israeli fazaiya ne junoob maghribi shaam mein Hama ilaqa mein Masyaf ke muzafaat mein chand ahdaaf par hamlay kiye. Lebnani news channel ke mutabiq labnani hawai patti se Israeli jet tayyaron ne Messiles daage hain. shaam ki khabar rasan agency sana ne kaha ke chaar Messiles daage gaye. Libnani it-tila-aat mein bataya gaya ke aik scienci idaara ko hadaf banaya gaya jabkay Bartanwi huqooq insani nigran car group ne kaha ke jis muqaam kohdf bnayagya woh aik Messiles warehouse hai jisay Bishar al asad rjim ki janib se istemaal kya jata hai. mukhalif zaraye ne ittila di ke hadaf  ke muqaam par Iranians ki maujoodgi ki ittila par yeh hamla kiya gaya hai. Is muqaam ko Messiles ke farogh aur chemical hathyaaron ki tayari ke liye istemaal kya ja raha tha. shaam ka kehna hai ke hummus ke qareeb irani ayr bees ko nishana banaya gaya. it-tila-aat mein daawa kya gaya ke is hamla mein 11 halaak hue hain Shami ayrport par hamlon mein irani Messiles nishana banay hain. guzashta baras kaha jata hai ke Israel ne Masyaf ke qareeb ek hadaf par hamla kya tha. Mobayyana Israeli hamla Bashar Asad ke nyoklyir ree ayktr ko Israel ki janib se chean lainay ke theek 10 barson baad is muqaam kohdf banaya gaya hai. Shami army general command ne nishana ko aik military idaara qarar diya aur kaha ke is muqaam ki qareebi jagah ko nishana banaya gaya jahan kam faasla par zameen se zameen par waar karne walay Messiles rakhay jatay thay.
965.title: Syria mein fouji hadaf par Israeli fazaiya ka hamla

news_detail: Kathmandu. South Asian Olympic Committee (SAOC) ne Cricket ke khail ko 13

South Asian Games mein shaamil karliya hai jis ki guzashta roz manzoori di gayi. Yeh Games 9 se 18 March 2019 tak Kathmandu mein khailay jayen ge. Is se qabal 2011 mein Bangladesh mein khele gaye South Asian Games mein Cricket ko shaamil kya gaya tha taham 2016 mein Bharat mein khailay gaye 12

Asian Games mein Cricket ko shaamil nahi kya gaya tha. Pakistan Olympic Association ke mutabiq South Asian Olympic Committee ne Cricket sameit 25 khelon ki bazabta manzoori daydi hai. Aglay saal munaqqid honay walay South Asian Games mein mardon aur khawateen dono ke Cricket muqablay karaye jayen ge. Agarchay in games mein kaunsa tareeqa e kaar ikhtiyar kya jaye ga hanoz taye nahi kya gaya hai taham quawwi imkaan hai ke T20 ko ikhtiyar kya jaye ga. Yeh bhi bataya ja raha hai ke mardon ke Zumra mein teen senior khiladion ke sath under 23 Cricketers rakhay jayen ge jabkay khawateen ke Zumra mein sirf senior khiladi hi hissa le payen ge. Hindustan mein munaqidah pichlle muqablon mein 8 mumalik ne hissa liya tha aur yeh 23 khelon ko shaamil kya gaya tha. Bangladesh ne un khelon ke iftitahi muqablon ki 1984 mein maizbani ki thi is martaba South Asian Olympic Committee se Afghanistan ki dast bardari ke baais hissa lainay mumalik ki tadaad ghatt gayi magar un muqablon mein 27 discipline rakhay gaye hain.
980.title: South Asian Games mein Cricket bhi shaamil

news_detail: Johnsburg: Junoobi Africa mein namaloom bandooq bardaroon ny 11 taxi driveron ko firing kar ke mout ke ghaat utaar diya. is hamla mein chaar afraad bhi shadeed zakhmi hogaye. money bas mein sawaar Gauteng Taxi Association ke afraad saathi driver ke janazay mein shirkat ke liye Johnsburg gay thay. Wapsi par un ki gaadi par namaloom afraad ki janib se firing kar di gayi, hamla mein 11 afraad halaak jabkay 4 shadeed zakhmi hue. Hukkaam ka kehna hai ke is ilaqa mein taxi par hamla aam hain taham mukhtalif pehluo se waqea ki tafteesh ki jarahi hai. Yeh waqea kal raat 8 : 00 bujey paish aaya. money bas par ghaat lagaakar hamla kiya gaya.
993.title: Junoobi Africa mein firing se 11 taxi driver halaak

news_detail: Telangana ko Hindustan mein behtareen hukmarani wali riyasaton mein teesra muqaam haasil huwa hai. Think Tank Public Affairs Centre (PAC) ke jari kardah awaami umoor Asharia 2018 mein Kerala ko 2016 se mutawatir teesray baras Mulk ki behtareen nazam o nasq wali riyasat ka muqaam ataa kya hai. paanch sarkardah badi riyasaton mein Tamilnadu, Telangana, Karnataka aur Gujarat riyasaton ka number aata hai jo behtareen nazam o nasq faraham karti hain. Maliyati intizam, iqtisadi azadi, shfafiat aur jawab dahi mein Telangana sarkardah paanch riyasaton mein shaamil hai. Report ke mutabiq Madhya Pradesh, Jharkand aur Bihar fehrist mein sab se neechay hain jahan samaji aur muashi adam-musawaat bahut ziyada paye jatay hain. Asharia, riyasaton mein nazam o nasq ki karkardagi ka data base framework ke zareya tajzia karta hai, samaji o muashi taraqqi woh kis terhan faraham karte hain is ki darjaa bandi karta hai. Riyasaton ki darjaa bandi abadi ke aitbaar se do zumron badi aur chuuti Riyasaton ke taur par ki gayi hai. Jin riyasaton ki abadi do crores se zayed hai inhen badi riyasaton mein shumaar kya gaya hai. Choti Riyasaton ke zumre mein behtareen nazam o nasq faraham karne wali Riyasaton mein Himachal Pradesh sare fehrist hai jis ke baad Goa, Mizoram, Sikkim aur Tripura ka number aata hai jabkay Nagaland, Manipur aur Meghalaya is fehrist mein sab se neechay atay hain.
1004.title: Hindustan mein behtareen hukmarani wali riyasaton mein Telangana ko teesra muqaam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ko ‘bhikaryon se pak’ shehar bananay ki sayee ke taur par City Prison Department ne zayed az 9, 000 bhikaryon ko pakad liya hai. Inspector General Telangana Prison Department Mr. A Narsimha ne bataya ke jumla 300 bhikaryon ko baaz-abaadkari markaz ko bhej diya gaya jahan inhen taleem di jaye gi aur rozgaar faraham kya jaye ga. Police ne November 2017 mein bhikaryon ke khilaaf muhim ka aaghaz kya tha. Inspector General ne bataya ke un ke liye mukhtalif programmes waza kiye gaye hain jin mein taleemi programme bhi shaamil hai. Jo bhikari qabil aur jismani taur par fit hain hum unhen rozgaar bhi faraham kar rahay hain. Yeh jail nahi hai balkay baaz-abaadkari markaz jaisa hai. Unhon ne kaha ke bhikaryon ko pakadney ke baad agar woh apne makanaat ko wapas lautna chahtay hain to hum un ke rishta daaron ko talab karte hain aur phir un ki counselling karte hain aur unhen riha kardete hain. Unhon ne kaha ke shehar mein bhikaryon ko pakadney ki muhim jari rahay gi. alawa azeen ehkaam ki khilaaf warzi karne wale Taazirat e Hind ke mutaliqa dif-aat ke tehat Hyderabad city Police Act ki dif-aat ke mutabiq saza ke mustahiq hon ge. Mehakma Muhabis (Prison) Telangana ka maqsad Hyderabad ko bhikaryon se pak shehar banana hai aur hum chahtay hain ke saari riyasat Telangana mein is muhim par amal aawri ho. Mr. Narsimha ne bataya ke Director General Muhabis ne bhi hukoomat Telangana ko aik maktoob rawana karte hue saari riyasat Telangana ko bhikaryon se pak bananay ki muhim shuru karne ki ijazat talab ki hai. Unhon ne bataya ke guzashta baras ke avaakhr mein hum ne yeh muhim shuru ki thi aur is zimn mein do mraz baaz-abaadkari ka intizam kya tha. aik mard bhikaryon ke liye Chanchalguda Jail mein hai aur dosra khatoon bhikaryon ke liye Chirlapally Jail mein hai.
1024.title: Hyderabad mein 9, 000 bhikaari pakad liye gaye. 300 ko marakaz baaz-abaadkari bhaij diya gaya

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein wizarat insaaf naay khawateen ko adalat se aan ki Talaq ki decree jari honay ki ittila dainay ke liye mobile phone ke tasdeeqi SMS ki Service shuru ki hai. Yeh SMS National Information Center ki janib se bheja jaye ga. yeh iqdaam baaz khawateen ki shikayaat ke paish e nazar kya gaya hai jin ki janib se yeh baat samnay aayi ke inhen Talaq ki decree jari honay ki bar waqat ittila nahi mil saki. Saudi wazeer insaaf aur Supreme Judicial Council ke sarbarah Waleed Al-Samaani ney National Information Center ke sath marboot web link ka iftitah kya tha jis ka maqsad Nikah ki tasdeeq ke baad shadion ka computer mein indraaj hai. Is terha shehrion ke mutaliq maloomat ke data bank mein shohar aur biwi dono ki azdawaji haalat ki tajdeed ho jaye gi. In tamam iqdamaat ka maqsad ghair tasdeeq shuda shadion aur tlaqon ke wujood ko rokna hai. is liye ke adam-tasdeeq ke sabab samaji masayel janam letay hain aur fariqain ke huqooq ke zeyaa ka andesha hota hai.
1039.title: Saudi Arab: Khawateen ko Talaq ki decree ki ittila dainay ka naya tareeqa

news_detail: Unan ke dar-ul-hakoomat Athens ke nawahi ilaqa mein waqay janglaat mein aag lag gayi jis ne dekhte hi dekhte wasee ilaqa ko apni lapait mein le liya. jungle mein lagi aag ne muzafaat mein samandar ke kinare Resorts bhi jal kar khakstar hogaye. is aag mein Resorts, makanaat aur karen bhi jal gayeen. aag ki lapeto aur dhuwen se bachney ke liye sayah aur makeen saahil samandar ki simt daud parre. ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq aag phailtay phailtay jungle se bahar rehaishi ilaqa tak pahonch gayi, is ki shiddat itni ziyada thi ke mutadid logon ko jaan bachanay ka mauqa hi nah mil saka aur woh apne gharon mein hi zindah jal gaye jab ke bohat si hlaktin dam ghatney se bhi huien. Ab tak atishzadgi se 50 afraad ki halakat ki tasdeeq hogayi hai jab ke sainkdon afraad zakhmi hain jin mein se mutadid ki haalat tashweesh naak hai. shehar ke hospital laashon aur zakhmion se bhar gaye hain aur qayamat ka samaa hai. sirf aik ilaqay Rafina se 26 lashain mili hain. har aankh ashkbaar hai aur log aag mein la patah honay walay apne pyaron ki talaash mein ro rahay hain. 100 se zayed ghar aur emiratein jal kar mukammal tor par khakstar ho chuke hain. Mutasirah ilaaqon se 700 se zayed afraad ko mehfooz maqamat ki taraf muntaqil kya gaya hai. sainkdon fire tindrz ke ilawa tayyaray aur helly kaptrz bhi aag bujhanay mein masroof hain. hukoomat ke mutabiq ab ziyada tar ilaqay mein aag par qaboo paaya ja chuka hai.
1054.title: Unan ke janglaat mein khofnaak atishzadgi, 50 afraad halaak, sainkdon zakhmi

news_detail: Guntur. Guntur mein Suvarnabharti Nagar ki rehne wali aik jismani mazoor khatoon ne SP Urban se rujoo hotay hue shikayat ki ke chand parosi inhen yeh dhamki dete hue blackmailkar rahay hain ke is ki beti ki nahate hue li gayi tasweerain Social Media par post kar dein ge. Khatoon ne bataya ke un ki beti aik sarkari hostel mein qiyam karte hue X Class mein taleem parhi hai. Woh garmayi tatilat mein apne ghar aayi hui thi. Chand padosion ne un ki beti ki nahate hue tasaveer khech len aur ab inhen dhamki day rahay hain ke woh makaan ka takhlia karde basorat deegar un tasaveer ko Social Media par post kar deinge. Police, tahaqeeq kar rahi hai.
1072.title: Beti ki barhana tasaweer ke zareya maa ko blackmail karne ka ilzaam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadarnashin Telangana State Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko hidaayat di hai ke woh farz shanasi aur lagan o mehnat ke sath khidmaat injaam den aur jin Hujjaj karaam ko un ke supurd kya gaya hai un ki bar waqat madad o rahnumai karte rahen. unhon ney aaj seh pehar Haj House mein riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kaha ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko Hajion aur Haj Committee o hukoomat ke darmiyan ahem kari samgha jata hai’ un ki behtareen aur itminan bakhash khidmaat ka aitraaf kya jaye ga aur un ko toseefi sanad aur award se nawaza jaye ga. Woh zimma darion se mun nah morhin aur zaroorat ke waqt Hujjaj karaam ko dastyab rahen’ aazmeen Hajj ki rawaangi se le kar un ki watan wapsi tak un ki behtar se behtar tareeqa par madad o rahnumai karte rahen aur mehnat o justojoo ke sath khidmaat injaam den taakay kisi ko kisi qisam ki shikayat ka moqa nah miley. Agar woh itminan bakhash karkardagi ka muzahira nah karen to un ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. Is ijlaas se khitaab karte hue special officer Telangana State Haj Committee Prof  S. A. Shukur ney Khadim ul Hujjaj ki zimma darion aur faraiz ke ilawa Hujjaj karaam ke masail aur un ko darpaish anay wali mushkilaat se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke aazmeen hajj ko Khadim ul Hujjaj se kaafi umeeden wabsta hoti hain aur woh Saudi Arbia mein hukoomat aur Haj Committee ke numainday samjhay jatay hain. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj apne faraiz aur zimma darion se ghaflat karen aur waqt par’ khasosan kisi haji ke intqaal yaksi aur nagehani soorat e haal mein dastyab nah rahen to is se kaafi dushwari aur uljan peda hoti hai aur Haj Committee aur hukoomat ki karkardagi par harf aata hai. Haj Committee kaafi paisa kharch karkay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko rawana karti hai. unhon ney kaha tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj ko jacket day ye jayen ge aur woh hamesha usay pehnay rahen. jacket istemaal nah karne walon ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. anho n ney intibah diya ke Hadayat aur usoolon ki khilaaf warzi karne walay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko wapas talabb karliya jaye ga. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj munasib andaaz mein khidmaat injaam nah den to Haj Committee un ke khilaaf karwai karne par majaboor hojaye gi. un ko nah sirf black list kya jaye ga balkay un par jo masarif aed hue hain woh un se wusool karliye jayen ge. professor s ae shkor ney mazeed kaha ke aazmeen hajj jin imaarton mein qiyam karen ge is imarat mein muqeem tamam aazmeen hajj ko un ke phone number day diye jayen ge aur building ke office ke paas un ke naam aur phone number ke astikrz bhi laga day ye jayen. Unhon ney kaha ke aazmeen hajj jab bhi phone karen to un ka jawab diya jaye aur un ki jo bhi madad karna ho woh ki jayen. Counsel General ya mualim ya Hukoomat Saudi arab ki janib se vqtan fawaqtan di jaany wali Hadayat aur notson se bhi aazmeen ko waaqif kerwatay rahen’ is ke ilawa tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj rozana apni karkardagi aur Hujjaj karaam ki naqal o harkat aur un ke qaym ke talluq se reyasti Haj Committee ko waaqif kerwatay rahen. Saudi Arab mein qiyam ke dauran qurbani ke token aur train aur bas ke bres late Hajion tak pahonchayin. Bemari’ haadsa’ raqam ya samaan khojane’ kisi aazim e Hajj ke bhichar jaany aur amwaat ki soorat mein Khadim ul Hujjaj aazmeen ki madad karen. Khadim ul Hujjaj Saudi arab mein qiyam ke douran aik register rakhen jis mein un ki karkardagi ka ka record rakhen aur wapsi ke baad usay Haj Committee mein daakhil karen. Is mauqa par assistant secretary janab Urfan shareef bhi mojood they.
1090.title: Khadim ul Hujjaj faraiz se kotahiyon par karwai ka intibah

news_detail: Palestine ke ilaqa West Bank mein guzashta roz aik Falasteeni ladke ke fidai hamla mein aik Yahoodi abadkar ki halakat aur do ke zakhmi honay ke waqea ke baad gaasib Sahyoni hukoomat ne intiqami karwai ke tehat West Bank mein Yahoodion ke liye 400 gharron ki taamer ki manzoori di hai. Israel ke shiddat pasand wazeer difaa Avigdor Liebermanne aik Yahoodi abaadkar ke qatal ke jawab mein Falastinion ko 400 Yahoodion ke makanaat ki taamer ki shakal mein qeemat chukane par majboor kiya hai. Micro blogging website ‘twitter’ par post kardah aik bayan mein Israeli wazeer difaa Lieberman ne kaha ke Falastinion ki’ dehshat gardi’ ka behtar jawab Yahoodi abad kaari mein izafah hai. mein West Bank ke ilaqa Ramallah mein ‘Adam’ Yahoodi colony mein mazeed 400 makanaat ki taamer ka elaan karta hon. khayaal rahay ke jumeraat ko West Bank ke wasti shehar Ramallah mein qaim ‘Adam’ Yahoodi colony ke qareeb aik Falasteeni naujawan ne chaaqo ke pay darpay waar karkay kam se kam aik Yahoodi abaadkar halaak aur do zakhmi kardiye thay. Israeli fouj ki jawabi karwai mein satrah sala hamla aawar bhi shaheed hogaya tha. Israeli fouj ka kehna hai ke Falasteeni ladke ne Yahoodi abad karon par chaaqo se hamlay kiye jis ke nateejay mein mutadid Yahoodi zakhmi hogaye. Baad azan aik Yahoodi abaadkar zakhamo ki taab na laatay hue dam toad gaya. zakhmi honay walay abad karon ku Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai.
1008.title: Falasteeni chaaqo hamla ke jawab mein Yahoodion ke liye 400 gharron ki taamer

news_detail: Australian nashriyati idaara ney apni aik report mein daawa kiya hai ke America aglay mah Iran ki atomic tansibaat par hamlon ki tayari kar raha hai. report ke mutabiq Australia bain ul aqwami Intelligence ittehaad five Is ka rukn hai is liye woh hamla se mutaliq America se intelligence maloomat ka tabadlah bhi kar raha hai. Doosri janib Australvi wazeer e azam Malcolm Turnbull ney report ko mustard karte hue usay afwaah qarar diya aur kaha ke poori duniya Iran se mutaliq Amrici Sadar ke ravayye se aagah hai. Report se mutaliq Iran ki Alquds Force ney Sadar trmp ko khabardaar kya hai ke America ko aisi kisi bhi karwai se guraiz karna chahiye. is report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya tha ke Australvi taawun ke alawa Bartanwi asasejaat bhi istemaal kiye jayen ge.
1016.title: ”America ki aglay mah Iran par hamlay ki tayari”? ?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naidu apni party ke do Arkaan Assembly B. Rama Rao aur Pandurthi Venkatesh par ohdedaron ke sath ghair mohazib rawayya ikhtiyar karne par barhami ka izhaar kya. Telugu Desam Party ke Rukn Assembly ne Reniganta Airport par amlah ke sath nazebah rawayya ikhtiyar kya tha. Chief Minister ki mudakhlat par rukan assembly neh amlah se moazrat khawahi karli. Rajahmundry Sub-Collector Office mein Venkatesh ke tursh rawayya par sakht tanqeed ki jarahi hai. Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ne Arkaan Assembly ko intibah diya ke jab woh ohdedaron se mulaqaat karen to woh apni hudood ko na phalangen. Telugu Desam sarbarah ne kaha ke woh koi bhi qaayed un ki hukoomat ki badnami ka sabab banay ga to woh bardasht nahi karen ge.
1030.title: Chandrababu Naidu apne Arkaan Assembly ke tursh rawayya par barham

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein jummay ki shab ‘haalat nasha mein gaadi chalanay ke khilaaf muhim’ ke douran ek shakhs ko haalat nasha mein gaadi challatay hue pakad lene par us ne masroof tareen sadak ke bichon beech lait kar khud kashi kar lenay ki koshish karte hue kaafi hungama aarai ki. Police ohdedaron aur wahan maujood sahafion ne usay wahan se mehfooz jagah par muntaqil kya. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue is shakhs neh bataya ke woh khandani masayel se aajiz aakar sharaab noshi ki aur woh chahta tha ke apni jaan day day. Mulzim ne kaha ke woh is se qabl bhi haalat nasha mein gaadi chalanay ke ilzamaat ka saamna karchuka hai. Muhim ke douran police neh zayed az 126 gadiyon ko zabt karliya aur khaation ki Begumpet Police Station par counselling ki jaye gi
1042.title: Haalat nasha mein gaadi challatay hue pakdae jaaney walay shakhs ka iqdaam khudkushi

news_detail: Timber Depot. Chandrayangutta mein aaj subah ki awaleen sa-aton mein aik Timber Depot mein zabardast aag lag gayi. Aag lagnay ki wajah ka hanooz pata nahi chal paaya hai. Fre Brigade ke ohdedaron ney tehqiqaat Police ke hawala kardainay ka faisla kya hai. Ohdedaron ney bataya ke Depot mein aag par qaboo panay ke liye koi hifazati iqdamaat nahi kiye gaye they. Hatta ke aag par qaboo panay ke liye aatish faro aalaat aur water sump bhi maujood nahi tha. Depot mein koi watchman bhi nahi tha. Yeh aag subah 6:30 bajey lagi. Ittila milnay par Mogulpura Fire Station se aik fire tender pahuncha aur aag par qaboo panay 4 water tankers istemaal kiye gaye. Do ghanton ki kawishon ke baad aag par qaboo pa liya gaya. Is haadsa mein koi jani nuqsaan nahi pouncha.
1059.title: Timber Depot mein aatishzadgi

news_detail: Chittoor. Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne ke masla par aik naujawan ney khudkushi karli. Mutawafi jo aik paarcha bafinda tha, aik khudkushi note choda jis mein is ki khudkushi ki asal wajah yeh batayi gai hai ke Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne se inkaar kardiya gaya. Yeh waqya Madanpally, Chittoor mein paish aaya. Police ko laash ke paas se aik khudkushi note aur aik yateem khanah ki paanch hazaar rupay ki raseed mili hai. Shaed mutawafi ney ye yeh chandah yateem khanah ko diya hoga. Mutawafi ney raseed ke peechay note likha. kayi siyasi partiyan, Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ataa karne ka mutalba karte hue aik arsa se ehtajaji muzahira kar rahi hain.
1074.title: Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi mauqqaf ke masla par naujawan ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein aaj mukhtalif jismani mazoori ke shikaar 7481 afraad mein 7. 82 crores rupay ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Telangana Disabled Welfare Society aur Telangana Old Age Welfare Society ki janib se aaj numayesh maidan par aik taqreeb munaqqid ki gayi. Is taqreeb mein mukhtalif nauiyat ke Mazureen jaisay jismani mazureen, andhon, behroon aur zaheni mazureen ko un ki zaroorat ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mohammad Mahmood Ali, Finance Minister Mr. Etala Rajendar aur Home Minister Mr.  N. Narrsimha Reddy, wazeer afzaish moyshyan aur Mr. Srinivas Yadav wazeer Excise Mr. T. Padma Rao Gaud ney maheman khusoosi ki hesiyat se shirkat ki aur mustahqeen mein yeh ashya taqseem kee. Commissioner for Persons with Disability Mrs. B. Shailaja ney bataya ke pehlay marhala mein jismani mazoor 465 afraad mein 3.48 crores rupay maliyat ki motor bikes, 247 afraad mein trycycles, calpers aur artificial limbs, aur 50 afraad mein 25 laakh rupay maliati Battery operated Wheelchairs, Basarat se mahroom afraad mein 86.80 lakhs rupay maliyat ke laptops (JAWS software ke sath ) ke alawa mp3 palyers, Daisy players, walking sticks aur Braille Books taqseem kiye gaye. Samaat se mahroom 1712 afraad mein 60 lakhs rupay maliyat ke aala e samaat aur 1712 afraad mein 1.96 crores rupay maliyat ke 4G smart phones aur zehni mazureen mein 9.8 lakhs rupay maliyat ke 300 teaching and learning materials aur 54. 86 lakhs rupay maliyat ki wheelchairs taqseem kiye gaye. Is mauqa par Mr. M Jagadeshwar Secretary Women, Child and Disables Welfare bhi maujood they.
1086.title: Mazureen mein 7.82 crores rupay maliyat ki imdadi ashya ki taqseem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Alhadah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ki tehreek ke douran Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke sarbarah o Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao, Asif jahi hukmraanon ki taareef o tauseef karte hue nahi thakte thay aur TRS qaideen har baras un ki mazaar par pahonch kar inhen kharaaj aqeedat paish kya karte thay magar nai riyasat ki tashkeel aur Iqtidaar par aajane ke baad TRS qaideen ne Asif jahs ko faramosh hi kardiya tha magar aik arsa baad TRS qaideen ko Huzoor Nizam Mir Osman Ali Khan yaad aaye hi gai aur aaj un ki 54 ween barsi ke mauqa par inhen khiraaj e aqeedat paish karne un ki mazaar par puhanche. Shaed is liye bhi inhen Huzoor Nizam yaad aaye ke phir se intikhabaat qareeb arahay hain. Nizam Saltanat ke saatwen o aakhri farmaa rava Huzoor Nizam Mir Osman Ali Khan Bahadur ku un ki 54 win barsi ke mauqa par zabardast khiraaj aqeedat paish kya gaya. Riyasti wuzraa Mrs. Mohammad Mahmood Ali Deputy Chief Minister, wazeer e dakhla N. Narsihmha Reddy ke alawa Mir Osman Ali Khan ke arkaan khandan ne aaj Masjid e Judhi King Kothi mein maujood Mir Osman Ali Khan ki mazaar par pohanch kar Gul afshani ki aur chadar chadhai. Is mauqa par khitaab karte hue janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ne kaha ke Mir Osman Ali Khan ka daur e Sultaani mein riyaya mil jul kar raha karti thi unhon ne Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ko parwan chadhanay mein ahem kirdaar ada kya. Unhon ne kaha ke awam ki behbood ke liye Asif Jahi farmaanrava ne kaar haaye numayaan anjaam dyie. Taleem ke farogh ke liye un ke iqdamaat misali hain. Osmania University is ki zindah misaal hai. Nizam ke daur mein riyasat mein koi firqa waranah danga fasaad nahi huwa. Hyderabad riyasat ke Indian Union mein inzimaam ke bawajood woh apni riyasat, mulk aur apne mulk ki awam se be intahaa mohabbat rakhtay they. China se Hindustan ki jung ke mauqa par unhon ne 5 tan sona indian union hukoomat ko atiyah diya tha. unhon ne bataya ke jab Aligarh Muslim University ke aik wafd un se maali imdaad ke liye rujoo huwa to unhon ne Muslim University ke sath hindu university madras ke arbab ko bhi talab karte hue inhen bhi imdaad di. kisanon ki behbood aur zaraat ke farogh ke liye Huzoor Nizam ne kayi Dams taamer karwaye hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamaray Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao bhi Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ko parwan chadha rahay hain aur samaaj ke har tabqa ki Falah o behbood ke liye numayaan iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Wazeer e dakhla Mr, N Narsihma Reddy ne kaha ke Nizam ka daur Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ka aaynahdaar tha. Is daur mein Hindus aur Muslims ko taraqqi ke masawi mawaqay faraham kiye gay they bilkul isi tarz par hamaray Chief Minister Mr. Chandrashekar Rao iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Mr. Narsimha Reddy ne kaha ke hamaray Chief Minister ne musalmanoon ki falah o behbood ke liye woh kuch kya jo Huzoor Nizam ne bhi nahi kya. Ramadhan mein Musalmanoon ko dawat e iftaar ka ihtimaam kya ja raha hai aur ghareeb Musalmanoon mein kapde taqseem kiye jarahay hain. Azadi ke 70 barson mein Musalmanoon ke liye jo kuch nahi kya gaya woh Chandrashekar Rao kar rahay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke TRS hukoomat mein musalmanon ke liye kayi iqdamaat kiye jarahay hain. Mutahidda riyasat Andhra Pradesh mein jab hamaray Chandrashekar Rao ji markaz mein wazeer they to unhon ne Manmohan Singh hukoomat par dabaoo daaltay hue Sachar Committee tashkeel dainay lagai thi, yeh aur baat hai ke Congress Hukoomat ne Sachar committee ki sifarshaat par amal aawri nahi ki. s says, s tiz, bi says aur aqliaton ke liye angrezi medium ke Iqamti Schools qayaim kiye gay. Yaad rahay ke mister ke Chandrashekar Rao ne ke bi are park ko Asif Jahs se mansoob karne ka wada kya tha magar abhi taq is park ka naam tabdeel nahi kya jaska.
1102.title: TRS ko Huzoor Nizam phir yaad aaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Haj Committee ke maazi mein kiye gaye maali tasarrufaat par shubhat ka saya badhta ja raha hai, chunkay guzishta baras jo umoor anjaam dyie gaye they wohi is baras taqreeban do tahai kam masarif par injaam panay lagey hain. Yaad rahay ke guzishta barson mein Riyasti Haj Committee, Special Officer ki nigrani mein kaam injaam diya karti thi. is martaba hukoomat ny reyasti Haj Committee tashkeel di hai jis ki nigrani mein aazmeen Hajj ki safar muqaddas par rawaangi ke intezemaat kiye jarahay hain. Jab supplying samaan ki farahmi ke liye order dainay ka maamla paish aaya to Committee ney faisla kya ke is martaba namzadgi ki asaas par yeh umoor allot karne ki bajaye open tender ka tareeqa ikhtiyar kya jaye. Is faisla ka yeh nateeja nikla ke lakhoon rupay ki bachat hogayi. Dilchasp baat yeh hai ke guzishta baras jis company ney 22.40 lakhs rupay ke aiwaz apni khidmaat paish ki theen usi company ney waisay hi sahulaton ki farahmi ke liye sirf 6.40 laakh rupay mein yeh umoor anjaam dainay par aamadah hogayi. Is terha afraat zar aur qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke bawajood taqreeban do tahai raqam ki bachat hui. Isi terha guzishta baras Hajj Camp ke liye aarzi bait ul khala ki sarbarahi ke liye 20 lakhs rupay kharch kiye gaye thay magar is martaba Haj Committee ney kiraya par aarzi bait ul khala Units haasil karne ki bajaye inhen kharid lene ka faisla karliya jis par sirf 16 laakh rupay ke hi masarif aaye. Sadarnashin Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney kaha ke hum ney yeh taye kya ke namzadgi ki asaas par kaam allot karne ki bajaye open tender rakhay jayen aur hum ney Media ke samnay khulay mein tenders khole thay. Unhon ney yeh bhi bataya ke hum aazmeen ko behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohanchanay koshaan hain. Unhon ney bataya ke jo aarzi bait ul khala khareeday gaye hain woh deeni ijtemaat mein muft faraham kiye jayen ge. Sawal yeh paida hota hai ke Company aik baras baad taqreeban do tahai kam damon par tender haasil karne par amaada kyun hogayi. umooman hota yeh hai ke waqt guzarnay ke sath qeematon mein izafah ke paish e nazar tenders ki ijrayi ya kamon ki namzadgi mein aik makhsoos had tak izafah ko tasleem bhi kya jata hai magar is martaba ulti Ganga behnay lagi. Namzadgi ki bajaye open tender ke zareya kaam tafweez karne ka faisla karne par wohi company jis ney guzashta baras 22.40 laakh rupay wusool kiye thay is martaba sirf 6.40 laakh rupay ki kam qeemat par amaada kaisay hogayi? Is liye zaroorat is baat ki hai ke Haj Committee ke hisabaat ki fori audit karwai jaye aur Central Vigilance ya kisi aur tehqiqati idaara ke zareya tehqiqaat karwai jayen taakay is scandal mein Haj Committee ke ohdedaron ke rule ka pata chal sakay.
1117.title: Telangana Haj Committee ke maazi ke maali tasarrufaat par shubhat ka saya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Government Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein judwaan bachiyon ko janam dainay wali maa aur aik bachi ke intqaal par la parwahi ka ilzaam aayed karte hue marhooma ke rishte daaron naay Hospital mein zabardast ehtijaj kiya aur Hospital ke amlah par das hazaar rupay ki rishwat talabb karne ka ilzaam aayed kya. Shamsabad ki saakin Rizwana Begum zauja Jahangir Pasha ko zachgi ke liye Government Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Marhooma ke rishtedaaron ney bataya ke Hospital mein shareek karne par pehlay yeh btayagya ke normal delivery hogi magar kuch dair bad un se kaha gaya ke Cesarean ke zareya zachgi karna padegi, phir un se yeh kaha gaya ke zachgi mein paichidgyan paida hogayi hain aur inhen judwaan bachay hain. Un se aakhir mein yeh kaha gaya ke ya to bachon ko bachaya ja sakta hai ya phir maa ko jis par khandan walon naay maa ko bacha lene ki isteduaa ki aur phir thodi dair baad inhen bataya gaya ke do judwaan bachiyan paida hui hain aur aik bachi faut hochuki hai jabkay doosri bachi ki bhi haalat nihayat hi naazuk hai aur se Nilofer Hospital muntaqil karna padega. Kuch der baad inhen yeh bataya gaya ke maa bhi faut hochuki hai. Rishtedaaron ney ilzaam aayed kya ke is douran un se das hazaar rupay rishwat talab ki gayi. Waqea ki ittila milnay par Majlis Ittehaad ul lMuslimeen ke Corporator Mr. Mustafa Ali Muzaffar Hospital puhanche aur mutawafiah ke rishta daaron se baat cheet ki aur unhen mahswara diya ke woh ehtijaj karne ki bajaye Police mein shikayat darj kurwaye. Mr. Mustafa Ali Muzaffar ney bataya ke Hospital mein dakhla ke sath hi har marhala par un se rishwat talab ki gayi. Unhon ney kaha ke is Hospital mein daakhil honay se le kar Hospital se discharge honey tak rishwat talab ki jati hai. Hospital mein ehtijaj mein shiddat par ACP Charminar Mr. B Anjaiah aur Inspector Charminar Mr. K Chandarshekar Reddy wahan bhaari jamiat ke sath poanch gaye aur surathaal par qaboo paaya. mister bi Anjaiah ney bataya ke is khsoos mein mossola aik shikayat par muqadma darj karliya gaya aur baad postmortem mazeed karwai ki jayegi.
1138.title: Maternity Hospital Pitlaburj mein zacha aur nauzaida faut, Rishte daaron ka ehtijaj

news_detail: Osama bin Laden ke sabiq Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko jummay ke din Tunisia ki jail se raha kardiya gaya. 42 sala Tunisian shehri ko jail se aboori tor par raha kardiya gaya chunkay judge ka yeh ehsas tha ke un par koi bhi ilzaam waza nahi kya jaska. Tunisia ki insidaad e dehshat gardi adalat ney Osama bin Laden ke sabiq zaati Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko raha karne ka hukum diya hai. Tunisia ki insidaad e dehshat gardi police ke tarjuman Sufyan Al Salaiti ney bataya ke haal hi mein Germany se nikalay jaany walay bin Laden ke sabiq Muhafiz Sami Al Aiydudi ko raha karne ka hukum diya gaya hai. guzashta roz Al Aiydudi ko adalat mein paish kya gaya. adalat ney mulzim ki mojoodgi mein kaha ke mulzim praayd kardah koi bhi ilzaam saabit nahi ho saka hai. taham rihayi ke bawajood Tunisian hakkaam Al Aiydudi se pooch gach kar saktay hain. Tunisian hakkaam ney kaha ke dehshat gardi ke shuba mein hum Sami ki tafteesh karen ge aur is douran woh malik chore nahi ja sakain ge. yaad rahay ke Germany mein girftar y ke baad wahan ki adalat ney inhen guzashta baras inhen Germany se wapas bhaij dyie jaany se is bunyaad par rokay rakha tha ke watan loatne par is ke sath aziat rasani aur ghair sulooq ka saamna karna parsakta hai.
1020.title: Osama bin Laden ka sabiq Muhafiz Tunisia ki jail se raha

news_detail: Unan ke dar-ul-hukoomat Athens ke sahili ilaqon mein lagnay wali khauf naak aag naay wasee ilaqa ko apni lapait mein le rakha aur aag bujhanay koshishen bhi jari hain. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq aatish zadgi ke nateeja mein ab tak kam se kam 88 afraad halaak hogaye hain. it-tila-aat ke mutabiq guzashta roz aag mein jhulse do jurwan bachon sameit mazeed teen bachay jaan bahaq hogaye. aatish zadgi ke baais honay wali halakaton ke baad Mulk mein sakht sadma ki kefiyat hai. Unani wizarat sahet ke mutabiq hafta ke roz hospital layi gayi aik jhlsi khatoon dam toar gayi jab ke aag mein jhulse bisyon afraad ki haalat khatray mein hai. Juma ke roz Unani Wazeer e Azam Alexis Tsipras ney aik bayan mein Mulk mein lagnay wali khauf naak aatish zadgi mein hukoomat ki nakami ka aitraaf kya aur tasleem kya tha ke reyasti idaray aag par qaboo panay mein nakaam rahay hain. Unan ki tareekh mein yeh apni noiyat ki khatarnaak aatish zadgi hai jis naay wasee abadi ko apni lapait mein le rakha hai. aag par qaboo panay ke liye kayi riskyo temen din raat kaam kar rahi hain.
1034.title: Unan mein khauf naak aatish zadgi, halakatain 88 tak pahonch gayeen

news_detail: Pakistan ke intikhabaat mein Imran Khan ki Party ke sab se badi party ke taurr par ubharnay aur un ke Wazeer e Azam ban jane ke imkanaat roshan hojane par Imran Khan ke madahon ko Bollywood adakar Aamir Khan ka woh wada bhi yaad agaya jo unhon naay kabhi Imran Khan se kya tha. Bollywood Mr. Perfectionist Aamir Khan ney maazi mein Imran Khan se wada kya tha ke jab woh intikhabaat jeet jayen ge to woh is ka jashnn Pakistan aakar manayeen ge. Huwa kuch yun tha ke intikhabaat 2013 se qabal daura Bharat ke douran Imran Khan aik taqreeb mein shareek hue jis mein Bollywood sitaron samait kayi naamwar shaksiaat naay shirkat ki. Is mauqa par Imran Khan se sawal o jawab ke douran Bollywood adakar Aamir Khan chairman tehreek insaaf ke jawabaat se be hadd mutasir hue aur unhon naay inhen musalihat pasand aur pukhta nazriye ka maalik qarar diya. un ka kehna tha ke’ mera dil kehta hai ke aap kamyaab hon ge kyun ke aap kayi saloon se mehnat kar rahay hain, jab aap naay apni jad-o-jehad shuru ki thi to kayi challenges ka saamna tha jis par datay rahay’. Doosri janib Imran Khan ney bhi inhen mukhatib karte hue kaha tha ke phir aap ko intikhabaat se qabal Pakistan aana parre ga, jis par Aamir Khan naay wada kya ke’ mein intikhabaat se pehlay nahi balkay jab aap jeet jayen ge tab Pakistan aakar aur apne sath bohat saaray hindustani doston ko lakar aap ki jeet ka jashnn manaaun ga’. Imran Khan aur Aamir Khan ke darmiyan yeh mukalama 2013 ke intikhabaat se qabal sun-hwa lekin 2018 ke intikhabaat mein Imran Khan ki jamaat naay nah sirf barri kamyabi haasil ki balkay Imran Khan malik ke wazeer e azam ban’nay ki position mein hain. un dinon parosi malik mein soshil media par Aamir Khan ko un ka wada yaad dilaya ja raha hai aur umeed ki jarahi hai ke woh apna wada poora karte hue Imran Khan ke Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf lainay ki taqreeb ya phir is khsos mein manaye jane wali kisi taqreeb mein woh zaroor shirkat karen ge.
1046.title: kya Imran Khan se kya huwa wada poora karen ge Aamir Khan?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi khandan ke liye tafreeh, saneha mein tabdeel hogayi. aik hi khandan ke 6 afraad sadak haadsa mein halaak hogaye. zila Nalgonda mein hue aik bhayanak sadak haadsa mein hyderabad, Jhirrah se talluq rakhnay walay aik hi khandan ke 6 afraad Bashmole do khawateen aur aik sher halaak aur 4 zakhmi hogaye. yeh haadsa Nagarjuna Sagar State Highway par Nasrapally, mandal Nabdrapalli ke qareeb paish aaya. touli chocky se talluq rakhnay walay is khandan ke log tafreeh ke liye Nagarjuna Sagr gaye hue thay wapsi par subah ki awleen sa-aton mein yeh haadsa paish aaya jis mein 4 afraad barsar e mauqa halaak hogaye jabkay do log hospital muntaqil karne ke douran jaanbar nah hosakay. muqami logon ke mutabiq yeh gaadi tizrftari se jarahi thi ke driver nay gaadi par qaboo khodya jis ke nateeja mein gaadi jis mein 10 afraad sawaar thay, aik compound wall se takra gayi. haadsa itna bhayanak tha ke mahlukeen ko gaadi ka aqbi sheesha toar kar bahar nikalna para. mahlukeen ki shanakht Mohammad Moin , Thammu, Mustafa, Saddam , Akhtar , Aisha ki hasiyat se ki gayi.
1062.title: Nalgonda mein sadak haadsa, Hyderabadi khandan ke 6 log halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Hajj committee ke ishtiraaq se chishtia foundetion ke zair e ihtimaam aaj mehboob function hall, Misri ganj, Hyderabad mein aakhri tarbiati camp munaqqid sun-hwa. Telangana, aandhra pradesh aur hyderabad krnatk ilaqa se talluq rakhnay walay zayed az  7,000 aazmeen Hajj 1
August se Hajj House Hyderabad se rawana hon ge. Hajj House mein  28

July se aazmeen Hajj ki aamad shuru hojaye gi jahan inhen safar Hajj se mutaliq tamam dastawizaat hawala kiye jayen ge aur un ki zareya tayyarah rawaangi ke tamam umoor injaam diye jayen ge. aazmeen Hajj ke aakhri tarbiati camp mein ulama mshaykhin ke ilawa Hajj committee ke ohdedaron nay is mauqa par khitaab karte hue mnask Hajj par tafseeli roshni daali aur safar muqaddas ke douran aazmeen Hajj ki janib se umooman ki jaany wali ghaltion aur be ehtiaton ki nishandahi ki. sadarnashin Telangana Hajj committee mister Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue bataya ke Hajj haoz mein qaim camp se hi aazmeen Hajj ki 1
Augst taa 15

August tak rawaangi amal mein aeye gi. reyasti Hajj committee nay naqais se pak intizamaa mukammal karliye hain. Hajj Camp mein hi hawai safar ke tamam umoor injaam diye diye jayen ge. Shams abad ayrport ke khusoosi trmnl se aazmeen Hajj ki rawaangi amal mein aeye gi jahan aazmeen ki muawnat aur rahnumai ke liye Hajj committee ke ohdedar mojood rahen ge. Hajj tarbiati camp ke knoynr molana Mohammad Khwaja Shah Shujauddin Ifteqari Haqqani Pasha ney aazmeen Hajj ka khaairmaqdam kya aur Hajj camp ke ineqad ke aghraaz o maqasid par roshni daali.
1071.title: Aazmeen Hajj ke aakhri tarbiati camp ka ineqad

news_detail: Dahod. Gujarat ke Dahod zila mein dakait honey ke shuba mein zado ko bay karkay halaak kardiya jabkay is ka saathi zakhmi hogaya. Ajmal Ajmal Vahoniya mulk mein hujumi tashadud ka taaza shikaar bana hai. police ney aaj bataya ke aik darjan se zayed afraad ka aik group hafta ki shab daaka daalney ki gharz se Jahold  Administrative Division mein kaali Mahodi mauza gaye hue thay. Inspector Limidi police station Mr. P.M Jadal ney kaha ke jab dehation ko un ki naqal o harkat ke baarey mein pata chala to woh aik maqam par akhatta hogaye. Joon hi unhon ney ‘dakuon’ ko dekha hujoom ney un ka takub kya aur un mein se dono ko pakad liya deegar faraar honey mein kamyaab hogaye. Barham hujumion ney mobayyana taur par un ko zado kob karna shuru kardiya aur Police ke pounchaney tak inhen shadeed zakhmi kardiya. Police wahan pahonch kar shadeed zakhmion ko Dahod government hasptl muntakil kya jahan Ajmal ko murda qarar diya gaya. zakhmi Bharu  Mathur Palas ziralaj hai. Yeh dono hi Dahod Sub-Jail se haal hi mein mukhtalif fouj daari muqadmaat mein jail ki saza bhugatney ke baad reha hue thay. police ko dyie gaye bayan mein plas ney kaha ke is ki mulaqaat Ajmal Vahoniya is jail mein hui jahan dono qaid thay. Dono hi taye kya tha ke is gaon mein mulaqaat karen ge jahan 100 se zayed dehation ney taiz dhaar hathyaaron se un par hamla kardiya. police ney takreeban 100 dehation ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya. Jaria mah ke avyl mein akbar Khan ko rajsthan ke alor zila mein gaaye ki muntakili ke shuba mein hamla karkay halaak kardiya tha. maharashra ke mauza Dhole mein bacha chori karne ka shuba karte hue 5 khanah bdoshon ko hujumion ney mardeya tha. Pandrah din qabal mdhih pradesh mein aik khatoon ko bhi barham hajhoom ney bacha chor honey ka shuba karte hue halaak kardiya tha. hyderabad mein bhi mah e Ramzan mein bhi aik mukhanns ko bacha chor honey ka shuba karte hue halaak kardiya gaya tha.
1089.title: Gujarat mein Dacoit ke shuba mein aik fard hujumi tashadud mein halaak

news_detail: Jerusalem. Palestine mein muzahmatkar naujawan ladki Ahed Tamimi ko 8 mah qayed ke baad guzashta shab riha kardiya gaya hai. Bain ul aqwami khabar rasaan idaray ke mutabiq Israeli faujion ke mun par thapad raseed karne wali nidar ladki Ahed Tamimi ko jail mein 8 mah ki qaid o band ki savbtin uthany ke baad guzashta shab rihayi mil gayi hai. 8 mah ki sakht takaleef naazuk, kam sun ladki ke paya istiqlal ko mutazalzal nahi kar saken. Israeli hakkaam ney Ahed Tamimi ki rihayi ki tasdeeq kar di hai. Israel ke mehkuma mahabis ke tarjuman ney media ko bataya ke Ahed Tamimi aur un ki walida Nariman ko riha kardiya gaya hai. Donon qaidyoun ko un ke rehaishi ilaqa maghribi kinare bhaij diya gaya hai. Doosri janib Ahed Tamimi ney jail se azad honey ke baad press conference karne ka elaan kya hai. Ahed Tamimi ka poora gharana samaji karkun aur muzahmatkaar ke taur par shohrat rakhta hai. Wazeh rahay Palestine mein do Israeli sipahiyon ko tamancha raseed karne aur dhakkay dainey ki video manzar e aam par aney ke baad jurrat o bahduri ka isteara ban’ney wali naujawan ladki Ahed Tamimi ko qaabiz Israeli fouj ney December 2017 ko walida ke hamrah ghar se giraftar kya tha.

Ahed Tamimi  16 baras ki ladki hai jo Palestine mein honey walay Israeli mazalim ke khilaaf apni aawaz buland karti hai. Ahed Tamimi ko Israeli fouj ney hirasat mein lainey ke baad is par baara ilzamaat aed kiye thay jo usay das baras taq jail ki salakhon ke peechay rakh satke thay. Ahed Tamimi Palestine ke aik gaon nabi Saleh mein rihaish Pazeer aik solah sala Falestini karkun hai. Ahed ke waalid Basim altmimi ka shumaar Israel ke khilaaf –apne watan ki azadi ki pur aman jad-o-jehad karne walon mein kya jata hai. Ahed Tamimi ka naam do saal qabal bhi is waqt khabron mein aaya tha jab un ki aik Israeli fouji ke haath par katney ki tasweer shaya hui thi jo un ke chhootay bhai ko girftar karne ki koshish kar raha tha. Is waqea se qabal 2012 mein bhi Ahed Tamimi ke Israeli faujion ke sath takraar aur haatha payi ki tasaveer manzar e aam par aayi theen jis ke baad inhen Turkey ke sadar Rajab Tayyab Erdogan ney mulaqaat ke liye bulaya tha aur inhen award se bhi nawaza tha. Ahed Tamimi ko hirasat mein kyun liya gaya hai? Bani Saleh mein kayi barson se har hafta Yahoodi bastiyoun ki taamer ke khilaaf ehtijaj kya jata hai. Aisay hi aik ehtijaj ke douran apne ghar mein daakhil honey walay Israeli faujion ko rokney ke liye Ahed Tamimi ney aik Israeli fauji ke chehray par thapad dey mara jis ki video Falasteeni sociall media par viral ho gayi thi.

Un fojion ney Ahed Tamimi ke 14 sala cousin ke sar par rubber ki goli maari thi aur ansoo gas ke shells Ahed Tamimi ke ghar par phainky thay jin ki wajah se Ahed Tamimi ke ghar ki khidkion ke sheeshay toot gaye thay. Is waqea ke teen din baad Israeli fauj ney raat mein Ahed Tamimi ke ghar mein daakhil ho kar usay hirasat mein le liya tha aur maghribi kinare mein waqay Israel ki aik Jail mein qayim khusoosi fauji adalat mein Ahed Tamimi par fardِ jurm aayed ki gayi thi. Ahed Tamimi par Israeli fouji par hamla karne, fouji ki pesha waranah zimma daryon ki injaam dahi mein rukawat daalney aur fouji ehalkaron par pathrao karne ke ilzamaat aed kiye gaye thay.
1100.title: Palestine ki bahedur beti Ahed Tamimi jail se riha

news_detail: DMK sarbarah o sabiq Chief Minister Tamilnadu mister am Karunanidhi ki haalat ab mustahkam hai. hospital intizamia ne kaha ke un ki haalat mein behtari aayi hai. DMK sarbarah ki haalat bigad jaanie ki khabar aam hotay hi hazaron haami Kauvery hospital ke atraaf jama hogaye thay. raat der gaye jari kardah blitn mein hasptl ne kaha ke un ki haalat mustahkam hai. un ki haalat mein behtari ko hospital intizamia ne ”transient setback” (waqtia bigaad) qarar diya. qabal azeen mossola ittila mein bataya gaya tha ke bemaar DMK sarbarah Karunanidhi ki sorat e haal aaj shaam achanak baggar gayi jis ke baais Chief Minister E.  Palaniswami ne apna daura Koimabtore mukhtasir karkay Chennai ke liye rawana hogaye hain. Karunanidhi ke arkaan khandan is hospital mein maujood hain jahan inhen jummay ke din shareek karwaya gaya tha. un ke haami hospital ke atraaf jama ho chukay hain. Tamilnadu ke 5 martaba Chief Minister rehne walay 95 sala Karunanidhi ko do din qabal shareek hospital karwanay ke baad pehli martaba dekha gaya tha jab un ki party aaj subah tasweer jari ki thi. Karunanidhi ko pishaab ki naali mein infection hochuka tha. Naib Sadar Jamhooria Hind Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ne aaj Kauvery hasptl pahonch kar un ki ayadat ki. hospital ki janib se kal jari kardah bayan mein kaha gaya tha ke un ka blood pressure mustahkam hai aur yeh ke un ki sehat par kari nazar rakhi gayi hai. woh guzashta aik baras se woh manzar aam par nahi arhay thay siwaye is ke ikka daka waqt party daftar pahunchte thay. woh kabhi kabhar apni ghar ke bahar aakar apne hamion ko haath lahrakar apna deedar kara diya karte thay
1122.title: DMK sarbarah Karunanidhi ki haalat ab mustahkam

news_detail: Indonesia ke mashhoor sayyahati jazeera Lombok mein 6.4 shiddat ke zalzala ney tabahi mchadi, zalzala ke natije mein 5 bachon samait 14 afraad halaak aur 162 zakhmi hogaye jabkay hazaron makanaat ko bhi nuqsaan pouncha hai. Indonesia ke sayahati jazeera Lombok mein subah saweray zameen larazne se log ghabra kar gharon se bahar nikal aaye, zalzala se mutadid makanaat girgye, imaarton ko nuqsaan pouncha jabkay malbay taley dabney se mutadid afraad zakhmi hogaye hain. mutasirah ilaaqon mein bijli aur muwasilat ka nizaam bhi mutasir hai jabke rahatkaari o bachao ahelkaaron ki ilaqa mein imdadi karwaiya jari hain taham hakkaam ney halakaton mein izafah ka khadsha zahir kya hai. aik ittila mein bataya gaya ke zalzala ke baais zayed az  1,000 makanaat ko nuqsaan pouncha hai. Bali ke qareeb makanaat ko taham koi nuqsaan nahi pouncha. mashriqi Lombok zila mein ziyada nuqsaan pouncha hai jahan 10 afraad halaak ho chukay hain.
1146.title: Indonesia mein taaqatwar zalzala, 14 afraad halaak, 162 zakhmi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Alhaidah riyasat Telangana ki tashkeel ke baad pehli martaba tashkeel panay wali Bar Council of Telangana State mein kam az kam do Muslim arkaan shaamil honay ke imkanaat hain. Council ke intikhabaat mein 9 muslim umeedwaar maidan mein they, taham sirf do umeedwaar Mrs. Z. H. Javed aur M. A. K. Mukeet ki kamyabi ke imkanaat roshan hain. council ke liye 29
June ko raye dahi hui thi jis mein 86 umeed waar maidan mein they. Aur 23

July se raye shumari ka aaghaz huwa. Paheli tarjeeh ke votes ke natayej ki rou se Mr. Z. H. Javed ney 548 vote haasil karte hue choutha maqam haasil kya jabkay Mr. M. A. K. Mukeet ko 370 vote haasil huve aur inhen 16
muqam haasil huwa hai. Dosray tarjeehi votes ko shumaar karne ke baad umeedwaron ke maqam mein tabdeeli runuma hosakti hai. Qatayi natayej ka elaan 31
July ko kardiya jaye ga. Mr. Z. H. Javed mutahidda Andhra Pradesh ki aakhri Bar council mein woh waahed Muslim rukn ki haisiyat se shaamil they.
1162.title: Bar Council of Telangana State mein do Muslim umeedwaron ki kamyabi ke imkanaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner Hyderabad City Police Mr. Anjani Kumar ney Mohammad Saleem @ Sunil Shetty @ Ibrahim @ Setty Saleem Kanchan Bagh saariq ke khilaaf 26 July ko PD act p d act laago kya. Auto driver Mohammad Saleem Errakunta zila Ranga Reddy, pur- tayyush zindagi basr karne hyderabad aur Rachakunda Police Commissionerate hudood mein mqfl gharron ko nishana banatay hue sarqa kya karta tha. Woh is se qabal Hyderabad o Rachakonda kanda police kmshnrit ke hudood mein sarqa aur naqb zani ki 14 wardaton mein mulawis tha aur awaami muqamat- par is noiyat ke juraim karte hue khauf o hraas paida kar raha tha. Awaami sukoon aur qanoon o zabt ki barqarai ko yakeeni bananay Police ney usay crime number 20/2018 mein tazeerat Hind ki daf-aat 454 aur 380 ke tehat adalti tehweel mein day diya.
1031.title: Saariq ke khilaaf PD Act laago

news_detail: Hyderabad. New Century School Kukatpally, Hyderabad mein aaj aik alamnaak haadisa mein chauthi jamaat ki do Taalibaat stage ki chhat aur deewar gir jaane se barsar e  mauqa halaak hogai jabkay deegar Talaba zakhmi hogaye jin mein 2 ki haalat naazuk btai jati hai. Mahlook donon Taalibaat Mahi Kirtana aur Chndana deegar Talaba ke sath Krate ki mashq kar rahay thay. Yeh haadisa dopehar 2:30 bajey ke qareeb paish aaya. Haadisa ke waqt wahan maujood logon ney malba mein dabey 5 Talaba ko bachaaya aur baad azan ambulance talab karli gayi. Assistant Commissioner of Police Kukatpally, Cyberabad Commissionerate Mr. Bhujanga Rao ney bataya ke donon Taalibaat barsar e mauqa halaak hogain jabkay deegar zakhmi paanch Talaba ko fauri qaribi Hospital muntaqil kya gaya. Anupma Hospital ke aik Doctor ney bataya ke jumla 6 Talaba ko Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya. Baad azan aik aur ladki ko Hospital laya gaya. Do ladkyon  ko murda qarar diya gaya jabkay aik taalib e ilm ke paiyr ki haddi mein fracture agaya aur us ke hathon aur pait mein chouten aayi hain. Do Talaba ko ibtidayi tibbi imdaad faraham karne ke baad inhen dosray hosspital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Kukatpally MLA Mr.  Madhavaram Krishna Rao ney School aur Hospital ka daura kya aur kaha ke hum ney School ka daura kya aur yeh dekha ke woh aik qadeem taamer thi. School intizamia ki laparwahi ke baayis do masoom bachon ki jaanen talaf hogai. Sarkari ohdedar bhi is ke barabar zimma daar hain jo ney aisay Schools ki ijazat dete hain. hum tahaqeeq karen ge aur pata chalayein ge ke is haadsa ke liye kaun zimma daar hain. Unhon ney bataya ke School intizamia ke 2 afraad ko Police ney hirasat mein le liya hai jabkay aik mafroor hai. unhon ney mahlook Taalibaat ke khandan ko tayaqqun diya ke hukoomat zaroor  exgratia jari kere gi. Unhon ney kaha ke hamari yeh koshish hogi ke is School ka ijazat nama mansookh kardiya jaye, hamein school mein pehlay se hi taleem par hai hain bachon ke baaray mein bhi sochna hoga, inhen fori kisi dosray school mein shareek karwana mushkil hoga. Walidain ki shikayat par police ney School intizamia ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya hai.
1040.title: Stage ki chhat o deewar gir jane se do Taalibaat halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Riyasat ke 300 aazmin par mushtamil aazmin Hajj ke teesray qaafla ko aaj shaam Deputy Chief Minister janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ‘ wazeer e dakhla janab N Narsimha Reddy’ Musheer Aqliati Behbood janab A K Khan ney Hajj House se rooh parwar manzar aur Labbaik ki sadaaon ki goonj mein suye Haram vidaa kya. Is mauqa par Sadarnashin Telangana Stat Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan Sadarnashin Telangana Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC’ Secretary mahkuma Aqliati Behbood janab M.Dana Kishore,  Telangana stat Hajj committee professor S. A. Shukur’ arkaan Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed ” janab M.A. Shafi,  janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Mohammad Imtiaz Khan, Mohammad Arifuddin rukn Waqf Board janab M.A. Waheed Khan waqf aur  dosray maujood thay. janab Mohammad Mahmood Ali ney aazmin e Hajj ko vidaa karte hue un se Mulk o Qoum aur riyasat ki taraqqi o khushhali aur Chief Minster ki sahet o darazi umar ki dua karne ki khwahish ki aur kaha ke hukoomat Telangana samaaj ke deegar tabqaat ke sath sath Aqliton khusosan Musalmanoon ki taraqqi ke liye koshan hain. Shadi Mubarak, Scholarship aur Urdu zabaan ki taraqqi o tarweej aur Hujjaj ki falah o behbood se un ko gehri dilchaspi hai aur woh is talluq se khusoosi iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Janab NNarsimha Reddy ney Hujjaj karaam ko un ke azm safar par mubarakbaad paish ki aur kaha ke woh aik muqaddas safar par jarahay hain aur Allah un ki duayen qubool karta hai is liye woh watan ki khushhali aur aman o amaan ke liye dua karen. Sadarnashin Hajj committee janab Mohammad Mashullah Khan ney kaha ke Hajj committee Hajion ki khidmat mein masroof hai agar koi kotahi hai to is ko door kya jayega. . Khushii ki baat hai ke Hyderabad Embarcation Pointe number one hai. Janab Mohammad Saleem ney dua ki ke aazmin, Allah ki hifazat mein jayen aur Allah ki hifazat mein kheriyat ke sath wapas ayen. Whatsapp,  selfie aur photos mein dil na lagayen balkay Allah se lau lagayen. Secretary mhkuma aqliati bahbood janab M Dana Kishore ney kaha ke unhon ney Makkah Mukramah aur Madinah Munawwara ke baarey mein bohat kuch suna hai aur woh Hajion se khwahish karte hain ke woh qoum aur riyasat ke liye duayen karen. Special Officer Prof. S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke Hajj Committee ki janib se aazmin ki bhalai aur un ki dekh bhaal ke liye munasib iqdamaat kiye jatay hain, aur is kaam mein mukhtalif mahkumon ka taawun haasil rehta hai. Maulana Inaam ur Rehman Jameel ney dosray qaafla ke aazmin se khitaab karte hue kaha ke Rasool Allah pbuh ney Maidan Arfat mein ummation ki mughfirat ki dua farmai hai yeh duaon ka safar hai is liye jitni hosakay duayen karte rahen. Maulana Dr. Sheikh Mohammad Abdul Ghafoor ney teesray qaafla ke aazmin ko mukhatib karte hue un ko mufeed mashwaron aur duaon se nawaza. Safaid Ahram mein malboos aazmin insani masawaat ka aisa mutasir kin muzahira kar rahay they jo aam halaat mein dekhnay mein nahi aata. Rishtadaa ray aur ahbaab aankhon mein ansoo aur lab par duaon ke sath un ko vidaa karne ke liye Hajj House mein jama hue they. Kal shab 10:30 bajey se Hujjaj karaam ki Airport muntaqili shuru hui raat 2:00 bajey doosri fllight ney udaan bhari. Kal shab Hajj House mein pehli bus ko Sadarnashin Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan, Sadarnashin Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC Sadarnashin Telangana State Aqliati Commission janab Mohammad Qamaruddin,  Special Officer Hajj committee Prof.S. A. Shukoor,  arkaan Hajj committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed , janab M.A. Shafi , janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Mohammad imtiaz Khan ‘ janab Mohammad Arifuddin ke alawa janab Mohammad Jahangir Janab Arshad Khan aur dosaron ney jhandi dikha kar vidaa kya. aaj tak teen flights ke zareya jumla 900 aazmin Makkah Mukramah ke liye rawana ho chukay hain. Do flights  ke aazmin Jeddah mein utar kar busoon ke zareya Makkah Mukramah mein apni rahaish gaahon ko pounchanay ke baad Umrah ki saadat se sarfraz bhi ho chukay hain.
1057.title: Aazmin e Hajj ka teesra qaafla rawana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Police ney jummay ke din Chaitanya school DD colony, Hyderabad ke aik teacher ko taalibat ke sath nazaibah rawayya ikhtiyar karne aur unhen jinsi taur par harasan karne ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya hai. Ladkiyon ki shikayat par un ke walidain ney students Union ke qayedeen ke sath school pahunche aur teacher ke sath marpeet ki aur school ke furniture ko nuqsaan pohanchaya. School intizamia ney Police ko soorat e haal se waaqif karwaya. Barham walidain, Police se bhi ulajh gay aur us ki mojoodgi mein bhi usay marpeet karne ki koshish ki. walidain ke ehtijaj ke baayis school ke ihata mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. police nay Ramesh nami teacher ko hirasat mein le liya. police ke mutabiq mulzim ki shanakht Ramesh ki hesiyat se ki gayi jo ladkiyon ko heajaan angaiz videos dikha kar unhen rijhaane ki koshish kar raha tha. Police ney teacher ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya. Walidain nay Police se mutaleba kya ke taalibat ke sath oochhi harkatein karne walay is teacher ko sakht se sakht saza dilae jaye. ladkiyon ney bataya ke woh inhen lunch ke waqfa mein fehash videos aur tasaveer dikha kar un se waisa hi karne ke liye kaha karta tha aur woh inhen galaay laganay ki bhi koshish karta tha. Bataya jata hai ke jab barham walidain, school puhanche to Ramish wahan se faraar honay ki koshish ki taham woh pkrhlya gaya aur usay buri terhan petta gaya
1076.title: Jinsi harasani par Chaitanya School ka teacher giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mehakma Baldi Nazm o Nasq o Shehri Taraqiyat, Hukumat Telangana ney Falaknuma mey Secunderabad-Falaknuma Broadguage Line par maujooda Road-over-Bridge ke mutawazi 47.1 crores rupay ki laagat se ek aur Road over Bridge ki taamer ke liye G.O Jari kardiya hai. Commissioner Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ney Standing Committee ko tajaweez rawana ki thi. Standing Committee ney is ki tauseeq karte hue Hukumat se intizami manzoori ke liye tajaweez ko Hukumat Telangana ko rawana karne ki sifarish ki thi. Hukumat Telangana ney 47.1 crores rupay ki laagat se Falaknuma mein Secunderabad-Falaknuma Broadguage Line par maujooda Road over Bridge ke mutawazi ek aur Road over Bridge ki taamer ke liye intizami manzoori day di hai.
1085.title: Falaknuma mein ek aur Roadover Bridge

news_detail: Shumali Korea ne jang Korea mein halaak honay walay Amrici faujion ki baqyaat 65 saal baad Amrici hukoomat ke hawalay kar dein. Bain u aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq jang e Korea ke 65 saal baad shumali Korea se Amrici faujion ki baqyaat taboton mein band karkay America muntaqil kar di gayi hain. Amrici Sadar Donald Trump aur shumali Korea ke sarbarah Kim Jong Un ke darmiyan honay wali mulaqaat mein Amrici faujion ki baqyaat wapas karne ka moahida huwa tha. Halaak faujion ke taboton ko Aqwam e Mutahidda ke jhanday mein lapeta gaya hai. Yeh baqyaat America rawana karne se qabal Junoobi Korea ke shehar Ausaan mein taqreeb munaqqid hui jis mein America , Aqwam e Mutahidda aur Junoobi Korea ke 500 arakeen ne shirkat ki. Koriyai jang mein halaak honay walay Amrikyon ki baqyaat 55 taboton mein Amrici riyasat Hawai pahunchain jahan Naib Sadar Mike Pence ne inhen qubool kya. Is mauqa par taqreeb bhi munaqqid hui. 1950 se 1953 tak Shumali Korea aur Junoobi Korea ke darmiyan jang hui thi. Ss jang mein Shumal ko China  aur Soviet Union jabkay Junoob ko America ki himayat haasil thi. Pahelay Korea aik hi mulk tha jis par 1910 se 1945 tak Japan ne hukoomat ki. Doosri jang azeem mein Japan ki shikast ke baad 1948 mein usay do hisson Shumal aur Junoob mein taqseem kardiya gaya. Shumali Korea Soviet Union ke hissa mein aur Junoobi Korea America ko mila. Is ke nateeja mein Shumali Korea par Communist nazriaat ka ghalba raha. Un dinov aalmi taqaton ke darmiyan cheqlish shuru hui jis ka nateeja jang ki soorat mein nikla jis mein 12 lakh afraad halaak hue jin mein 35 hazaar se ziyada Amrici fouji bhi shaamil thay. iI jang ke nateeja mein Korea ki dono riyastain mukammal taur par tabah o barbaad hogyin. Aik maahir forensic ne kaha ke ibtidayi jaanch se zahir hota hai ke baqyaat Amrrikyon ke hi hain. Yeh Sadar America Donald Trump aur Shumali Korea ke Kim Jong Un ki June mein hui choti mulaqaat ke mushtarka elamia ke chaar nukaat mein se aik nukta yeh bhi tha ke Amrici faujion ki baqyaat auta di jaye gi. Sadar America Donald Trump ne baqyaat lautanay par Shumali Korea ke qayed Kim Jong Un ka shukriya ada karte hue tawaqqa zahir ki ke un se dobarah mulaqaat hogi.
1096.title: Shumali Korea ne 65 saal baad Amrici faujion ki lashen wapas kar dein

news_detail: September 2001 ko America ke World Trade Center aur Pentagon ki imaarton par hamlon ke baad pehli baar Al Qaeda ke baani maqtool Osama bin Laden ki walida Alia Ganam ke tasuraat manzar-e-aam par aeye hain. Un ka kehna hai ke awail umri mein mere betay ko Islam pasandon ne zehni taur par yarghamal bana liya tha aur inhen brainwash kya gaya. Bartanwi akhbar ‘Guardian’ mein shaya honay walay Alia Ganam ke taaza tasurat mein un ka kehna hai ke un ke betay Osama ban Laden ki Jeddah mein douran taalib ilmi Ikhwan ul Muslimoon ke Rohani musheer kehelwanay walay Dr. Abdullah  Azam ke sath mulaqaat huyi. Bin Laden Shah Abdulaziz University mein is waqt muashiaat ke taalib ilm thay. Napasandeedah sar garmion ki wajah se Saudi Hukoomat ne Abdullah Azam ko malik se be dakhal kar diya tha. baad azan woh Ikhwan ul Musilmoon ke Rohani peshwa ban gaye. Alia Ganam ka kehna hai ke Osama bin Laden ko is waqt zehni tor par yarghamal banaya gaya jab is ki umar bees saal ke lag bhag thi. usay brain wash kya gaya. bees saal tak umar mein hamein Osama bin Laden aik aur shakhsiyat jab ke is ke baad aik naya shakhs dikhayi deta hai. Bin Laden ki Shami nazaad walida ka kehna hai ke unhon ne bachpan Shaam ke shehar Allazqia mein basar kya. Sanh 1950 ke wast mein un ka khandan Saudi Arab muntaqil ho gaya. Un ka kehna hai ke Osama bin Laden ne khandan ki mukhalfat ke bawajood apne sarmaya ka aik bara hissa Afghanistan jung par sirf kya. Un ka mazeed kehna tha ke jihadi sargarmion mein hissa lainay ki wajah se Osama bin Laden ko khandan ke dosray afraad ki mukhalfat ka saamna tha. un ki apne khandan ke sath aakhri mulaqaat 1999 mein Afghanistan ke shehar qndhar ke qareeb hui jahan ban Laden muqeem thay. khayaal rahay ke Alia Ganam ne sunah 1960 mein apne shohar aur bin Laden ke waalid se Talaq le li thi. Yeh Talaq bin Laden ki paidaiesh ke teen saal ke baad hui. is ke baad unhon ne Mohammad Alattas nami aik karobari shakhs ke sath shadi ki. ‘Guardian’ ke mutabiq bohat pehlay se bin Laden poori duniya mein insidaad e dehshat gardi ka pehla hadaf ban gaye thay. Unhon ne Saudi Arab ke shehrion ko mashriq aur maghrib ke darmain deewar bananay ki koshish ki. Akhbar ne Bartanwi intellignce ke aik Officer ke hawala se bataya hai ke bin Laden ne 9/11 ke hamlon ke liye qasdan Saudi jungjuon ka istemaal kya. Unhen yaqeen tha ke Saudion ke zareya America par hamla karanay se maghrib Saudi arab ka nizaam tall pitt kardey ga. Woh amlan aik nai jung shuru karne mein to kamyaab hogaya magar woh jung jis ki Osama bin Laden ko tawaqqa thi shuru nahi hui.
1114.title: Osama bin Laden ko awail umri mein hi zehan saazi ki gayi : Walida ka bayan

news_detail: Denmark mein hukkaam ne aam muqamat par naqaab pahannay par pabandi ke naye qanoon ki khilaaf warzi karne par jummay ke din aik 28 sala naujawan ladki par jurmana aayed kya.
