Police ahalkaar David Borchersen ne aik khabar rasaan agency ko bataya ke jummay ke roz Norchalan ilaqa ke shumal mashriq mein aik shopping center par Police ko talab kya gaya jahan aik naujawan ladki ka us aurat ke sath jhagda ho raha tha jis ne ladki ke chehra se naqaab noch dala tha. Borchersen ke mutabiq “jhagday ke douran ladki ka naqaab gir gaya tha taham hamaray pounchanay tak woh usay dobarah laga chuki thi”. Police ne mazkoorah ladki ki naqaab pehnay hue tasweer le li aur phir shopping center ke aik camera se jhagday ki video bhi haasil kar li. Baad azan naujawan ladki ko aagah kar diya gaya ke is par aik 1,000 Kroner (156 dollar) jurmana aayed kya gaya hai jis ka chalaan usay ba zareye daak mausool ho jaye ga. Police ne ladki se mutalba kya ke ya to woh naqaab utaar day ya phir is muqam aammah se Koch kar jaye. Borchersen ke mutabiq ladki ne koch karne ka ikhtiyar istemaal kya. 1

August 2018 se Denmark mein mutanazia qanoon naafiz ul amal ho gaya hai jis ke mutabiq muqamat aama par burqa ya naqaab pahannay par pabandi hai. Aam muqamat par burqa ya naqaab (jis mein sirf ankhen zahir hoti hain) pahannay par 1,000 Krone jurmana ho ga. Is khilaaf warzi ku dohraane par jurmana 10,0000 Krone tak ho sakta hai. Pabandi ke qanoon mein chehra chhupanay ke deegar zaraye bhi shaamil hain maslan masnoyee  daarhi ya phir aisa mask jis mein sirf ankhen nazar aati hon. insani haqooq ke karkunaan ne is pabandi ko khawateen ke haqooq ki khilaaf warzi qarar diya hai jab ke qanoon ka difaa karne walay halqon ka kehna hai ke is se musalman muhajreen ziyada behtar soorat mein Denmark ke muashray mein zam ho saken ge. khawateen ka naqaab Europe mein aik hssas mauzo ban chuka hai aur Belgium, France aur Germany pehlay hi naqaab pahannay par pabandi aed kar chuke hain
1131.title: Denmark mein qanoon e naqaab ki khilaaf warzi par paihla jurmana

news_detail: Hyderabad. All India Small Scale Industries Minorities Committee ki janib se berozgaar naujawanon aur khawateen ko ‘khud kamao khud khao’ programme ke tehat mukhtasir sarmaya se sanati o karobari unit shuru karne ke talluq se shaoor beydaari aur guidance ke liye itwaar 5

August ko 10:30 bajey se 1:00 bajey din tak Madinah Education center Nampally rubaroo Public Garden mein aik free workshop munaqqid kya ja raha hai. Committee ke sadar janab s Z. Saeed ne kaha ke hukoomat Hind ke sanati tarbiati idaara NIMSMSME / Nisiat Hyderabad ke sabiq Faculty Mr. CHVS Murthy mukhtalif aisi scheme ki jaankaari aur rahnumai faraham karen ge jin ke liye hukoomat Hind ke alawa riyasti hukoomat ki janib se subsidy bhi faraham ki jati hai. Naib Sadar Mr. Samson Prakash ne kaha ke jin afraad ne Facebook aur email mil par apne naam register kurwaye hain woh waqt ki pabandi ke sath shirkat karen. Committee ka maqsad ghareeb’ be sahara aur berozgaar afraad ko maloomat faraham karna aur un ko rozgaar ki taraf raghib karna hai.
1155.title: Khud kamao khud khao programme ka aaj free Workshop

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke agar hamaray galay bhi kaat dyie jayen tab bhi hum Musalmaan hi banay rahen ge. Haryana mein aik Musalmaan ki Daadhi jabran mundhwa diye jany ki it-tila-aat ke tanazur mein Barrister Owaisi ka yeh bayan samnay aaya hai. Barrister Owaisi ne itwaar ku markaz mein barsar iqtedaar BJP ko challenge kya ke agar jurraat ho to Mizoram aur Jammu and Kashmir mein National Register of Citizen (NRC) ke tehat survey karwaye. Sabiq Sadar Majlis janab Abdul Wahid  Owaisi ki barsi ke mauqa par Ahmed Nagar mein aik jalsa aam se khitaab karte hue Assam mein NRC ke musavvida fehrist se 40 lakhs afraad ko madakhilatkaar qarar dete hue kharij kardainay par Sadar BJP Amit Shah par zabardast tanqeed ki aur BJP hukoomat ko challenge kya ke deegar riyaston mein bhi aisa hi kar dikhaay. Unhon ne media reports ke hawala se kaha ke Tripura ko maujooda Chief Minister 1971 mein Bangladesh mein paida hue they. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke jab oppostion parties, Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke khilaaf tehreek ada etemaad paish ki theen us waqt Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ne Narendra Modi ke galay lag kar BJP par etemaad ka izhaar kya. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne tanzia andaaz mein kaha ke do mard aik dosray se galay miley chunkay un ke gharon mein koi aur nahi hai. Sadar Majlis ne ilzaam aayed kya ke 2014 mein BJP ke Iqtidaar mein anay ke baad hujumi tashaddud mein 86 feesad izafah huwa hai aur mutasireen mein 96 feesad Musalmaan hain jinhein gaau kashi ke naam par qatal kya gaya. Gaaye ki raksha ke naam par Musalmanoon ko nishana banaya ja raha hai aur Wazeer e Azam khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye hue hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamaray galay bhi kaat dyie jayen bhi to hum Daadhi badhana nahi chodenge. Yeh Musalmanoon ka dastoori haq hai. Unhon ne kaha ke dobarah Iqtidaar panay ke liye BJP, 2019 ke intikhabaat ka saamna nafrat aur firqa parasti ke maahol mein karna chahti hain. Jalsa se Majlis Ittehaad ul Muslimeen ke Arkaan Assembly aur mazhabi rehnumaoon ne bhi khitaab kya.
1169.title: Hamaray galay kaat dyie bhi jayen to hum Daadhi badhayain ge : Barrister Asad Owaisi

news_detail: Patna. Patna mein do dinon se jari taiz barish ney na sirf nashebi ilaaqon mein rehney walay makeeno ki mushkilaat ko sangeen banadiya hai balkay Nalanda Medical College and Hospital (NMCH) mein shareek mareezon ke la-haq khatrah ko bhi badha diya hai. Barish ka Paani hafta ki shaam Hospital ke ICU aur General wards mein dar aaya hai. Itwaar ke din ICU mein ghutnon barabar Paani tha jis mein tairti machhliyan aur hashrat ul arz bhi dikhayi dey rahay thay, jis ke baayes mareezon ke timardaaron aur nurses ke liye badi uljhanain paida hogyin. Hospital ke nurses aur neem-tibbi amlah ko mareezon ki nighdasht ke liye Paani se guzar kar jana pad raha tha. Kayi mareez ghair muthar halaat ke paish e nazar infection ke dar se Hospital chod kar chalay gay. Hospital ke hukkam ney id-daa kya ke woh be bas hain chunkay barish ke mauqa par Hospital mein barsati Paani ka daakhil hojana daayemi masla hai. Suprintendent NMCH Dr.  Andand Prasad Singh ney kaha ”hum Paani ko pump karte hue kharij karney ki koshish kar rahay hain jis ke liye teen ghantay darkaar hon ge. Nashebi ilaqa mein honay ki wajah se hamein har saal mutasir hona parta hai.” Dr. singh ney kaha ke beshtar mareezon aur un ke timaar-daaron ki janib se ihata mein dar aaye barsati Paani se badboo aane ki shikayat karney par ICU ke mareezon ko din mein dosray surgical ICU mein muntaqil kardiya gaya. ICU mein shareek aik mareez ke Timar daar ney kaha ”dekhen yeh jagah kis terha jahannum mein tabdeel hogayi. ICU jatay hue machhliyan aur keeday dikhayi dete hain. yahan saanp bhi ho saktay hain. aisi napak sorat e haal se mareez mazeed bemaar ho ja sakte hain.”
1015.title: Paani mein mahsor Nalanda Hospital ke ICU mein mareez aur machhliyan

news_detail: Mumlikat Saudi Arab jahan zuyuf ur Rehman (Hajj Pilgrims) ko mumkina taurr par behtar se behtar saholaten baham pohanchanay koshaan rehti hai wahein woh ghair qanooni taur par Hajj karne walon ke khilaaf sakht geer iqdamaat karne par majboor hai, chunkay aisay Aazmeen Hajj ke baais intizamaa mein khalaal parta hai jis ki wajah se un Aazmeen Hajj ko mushkilaat aur takaleef ka saamna karna padta hai jo bazabta taur par Hajj ke liye sarzamen muqaddas pahunchte hain. Saudi Arab ke dayriktorit general baraye passports ne aik bayan mein wazeh kya hai ke Hajj ke mauqa par muqami satah par gahir khanooni tareeqa se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil karne walay afraad ke sahelkaron ko qaid aur jrmanon ki sazaon ka saamna karna parre ga. dayriktorit general baraye passports ne kaha hai ke Hajj season mein gair majaz afraad ko Aazmeen Hajj mein shaamil honay se roknay ke liye intizami committees qaim ki gayi hain. Yeh committees ghairqanooni tareeqon se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil karne mein mulawis afraad ke khilaaf karwai karen gi aur aisay afraad ko qaid aur jurmanon ki sazaon ka saamna karne ke sath kayi doosri thadidat ka bhi saamna hoga. Saudi Arab ki sarkari news agency ‘SPA’ ne apni report mein bataya hai ke field hukkaam ne Makkah Mukrama mein baaz dakhli marakaz se aisay mutadid afraad ko hirasat mein le liya hai jo ghair qanooni tareeqon se logon ko Aazmeen Hajj mein shaamil karne ki koshish kar rahay they. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Hajj ke mauqa par tamam intizami aur qanooni commitees 24 ghanton ki bunyaad par mutharrak rahen gi aur kisi bhi khilaaf warzi ki soorat mein qanoon haath mein lainay walay shakhs ko barsar e mauqa saza di jaiygi gi. Har us shakhs ko jo kisi ghair majaz shakhs ko Hujjaj karaam mein shaamil karne ki koshish kere ga usay kam se kam 15 din qaid aur 10,000 Riyal jurmana aayed kya jaye ga. Agar woh ghair mulki hai to usay saza poori honay ke baad Mulk-badar kardiya jaye ga aur dobarah us ke mumlikat mein Dakhla par pabandi aayed kar di jaye gi. Qanoon ki khilaaf warzi mein madad karne walay sahelkaaron ki gadyaan bhi zabt ki ja sakti hain. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Saudi Arab ka koi bashindah agar ghair qanooni tareeqon se logon ko Hujjaj mein shaamil kere ga to usay bhi pehlay marhala mein 15 din qaid aur 10,000 Riyal jurmana aur doosri baar aisa karne par 2 mah qaid aur 50,000 Riyal jurmana aayed kya jaye ga. Teesri baar aisa karne par 6 mah qaid aur 50,000 Riyal jurmana hoga.
1029.title: Ghair majaz Hajj sahelkaron ko qaid aur jurmana ki sazayen

news_detail: New Delhi. Assam ney peer National Register of Citizens ka qatayee mussavidah jari karte hue jumla 3. 29 crore darkhwast gzaron mein 2, 89, 83, 677 afraad ko ahal qarar diya hai. is ka matlab yeh huwa ke 40-41 lakhs Assamyon ko takneeki taur par Hindustani tasleem karna band kardiya jaye ga. Coordinataur Sailesh jinhon ney qatayee mussavidah jari kya is baat par zor diya ke ‘yeh sirf aik mussavidah hai aur qatayee fehrist nahi hai, jin logon ko shaamil nahi kya gaya hai woh apna id-daa aur aitraaz daakhil kar saktay hain.’ Unhon ney kaha ke qatayee mussavidah par id-daa aur aitraaz ka amal 30
augst se shuru kya jaye ga aur 28

September tak jari rahay ga. Awam ko aitrazaat ke liye khatir khuwa aur munasib mauqa faraham kya jaye ga. kisi bhi haqeeqi Hindustani ko kisi qisam ka khauf karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. sarhadi riyasat Assam mein kayi dahun se shehrion ko apni shahriat saabit karne ka masla darpaish hai, chunkay mutawatir hukoomaton ka yeh id-daa raha hai ke riyasat mein padosi Mulk Bangladesh se ghair qanooni taur par dar aney walay Assam mein qiyam karte hue khud ko Hindustani saabit karne koshan rehtay hain jabkay Bangla zabaan bolney walay Assamyon ka yeh id-daa hai ke woh Bangladesh ke nahi balkay Hindustani riyasat maghribi bangal se naqal makani karte hue yahan dahun se muqeem hain. Yaad rahay ke shahriat se mahroom kar diye jaane walon mein aik badi tadaad Musalmanoon ki hai jin ki maadri zabaan Bangla hai. Assam Mulk ki wahid riyasat hai jahan apne shehrion ki Qaumiat ka Register hota hai. Assam mein rehne walay beshtar Musalmanoon ko yeh kehte hue Hindustani shehri tasleem karne se inkaar kardiya jata hai ke woh padosi Mulk Bangladesh se ghair qanooni taur par dar aeye hain. Kuch logon ka yeh khayaal hai ke woh ghair majaz taur par raye dahi mein hissa letay hain aur riyasat ki abadi ki haiyat tabdeel kardete hain. Shehrion ke Qaumi Register mein apne naam ke indraaj ke liye Assamyon ko yeh dastawizi suboot faraham karna padta hai ke un ka khandan Assam mein 24 March 1971 se muqeem hai, is tareekh ke dosray din Bangladesh ki azadi ki jung ka aaghaz huwa tha. Yeh jung 16
December 1971 ko khatam hui jis ke baad Bangladesh ka sarkari taur par wajood amal mein aaya tha. Taham Sheikh Mujeeb ur Rehman ney usi saal 24

March ko Bangladesh ke aik azad Mumlikat honey ka elaan kya tha, tab Bangladesh ilaqa ke jo is waqt Mashriqi Pakistan kehlata tha wahan ke makeeno ney Maghribi Pakistan ke khilaaf guerrilla  jad-o-jehad ka aaghaz kya tha. Isi liye NRC ney 24

March 1971 ki neem shab ki tareekh ko paimana baneya hai. Yeh id-daa kya jata hai ke is guerilla jad-o-jehad ke douran hazaron Bangladeshi naqal makani karte hue ghair qanooni taur par Assam mein daakhil hogaye they. Pahela NRC 1951 mein tayyar kya gaya tha, us saal mardum shumari ke mutabiq Assam ki abadi 80 lakhs hi thi. Riyasti Hukoomat, Markazi Hukoomat aur ba asar all Assam Students Union( AASU) ke mabain 2005 ke aik seh fariqi moahida ki muwafiqat mein 1951 ke NRC ko up date kya ja raha hai. moahida 1985 Assam Moahida par amal daraamad ke amal ka hissa hai. is ke baad NRC ko update kiye jaane ka amal shuru huwa tha taham Riyasat ke kayi maqamat par tashadud phoot padney par rok diya gaya tha. Is ke baad 2009 mein aik NGO Assam Public Works (APW) ney Supreme Court mein aik marafa daakhil karte hue riyasat mein ghair mulkion khaas kar Bangladeshion ki nishandahi ki isttedua ki, nateeja mein Supreme Court is masla mein shaamil hui aur NRC par nazr e sani ka aaghaz huwa. Yeh teen barson ka process raha hai. Process ke aaghaz par zayed az 3.29 crores awam ney apni shahriat saabit karne ke liye dastawizaat daakhil kiye. NRC ke pehlay mussavidah mein jo guzashta baras December mein jari kya gaya tha 1.9 crores logon ko shaamil kya gaya tha. NRC ki qatayee fehrist 30

June ko jari kar di gayi hai jis mein 3.29 crores darkhwast guzaron ke minjumala 2.89 crores logon ko shaamil kya gaya hai jabkay taqriban 41 lakhs logon ki shahriat tasleem nahi ki gayi. Riyasat mein qatayee mussavidah ki ajrayi ke baad peda shuda surathaal se nimatney ke liye Central Forces ki bhaari jamiat ko tainaat kardiya gaya hai.

Chief Minister West Bengal Ms. Mamata Banerjee ney NRC ke qatayee mussavidah mein takreeban 40 lakhs Bangla zabaan bolney walay shehrion ki shahriat tasleem na karne par shadeed radd-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha kay Markazi hukoomat is mussavidah ki aad mein apne agenda ko agay badhaane mein jutti hui hai. Qatayee mussavidah ki ijrayi par aaj Parliament mein Mamta Banerjee ki Party Trinamul Congress ke arkaan ney zabardast hungama aarai ki hai. Unhon ney kaha ke woh Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se kehna chahti hon ke awam ko bachayen, inhen tanha nah chore den. Ms. Mamata Banerjee ney kaha ke inhen aziat rasani ka dar hai, log apne hi Mulk mein Panah-Gazeen ban kar reh jayen ge. Yeh takseem karo hukoomat karo ki policy hai. Awam ko yaka o tanha kya ja raha hai. .. yeh insaaniyat ko tabah kardey gi. Unhon ney kaha ke woh shakhsi taur par is masla ko Wazeer e Azam se rujoo kere gi. Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke itna bada qadam uthany se qabal hukoomat ko Maghribi Bengal hukoomat se tabadlah khayaal nahi karna chahiye?

Markazi Wazeer e Dakhla Mr. Rajnath Singh ney NRC ke qatayee mussavidah ki ijrayi mein 40 lakhs afraad ke naamon ki adam-shumoliat par honey walay aitrazaat ke radd-e-amal mein kaha ke kisi ko abhi ghabraney ki zaroorat nahi hai chunkay yeh qatayee fehrist nahi hai. Jin afraad ka naam is mussavidah mein shaamil nahi kya gaya hai unhen apna muaqqaf paish karne ka mauqa faraham kya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke is ko siyasi masla banaya ja raha hai. Unhon ney kaha ke kuch log ghair zurori taur par khauf o hraas phelaney ki koshish kar rahay hain.
1044.title: Assam ney qatayee NRC mussavidah jari kardiya. 40 lakhs ki shahriat ko khatrah

news_detail: Aisa lagta hai ke Iran apne sakhtgeer mazhabi iqdamaat par amal aawri mein riayat ki simt agay badh raha hai aur mumlikat, awam mein payi jaany wali azad khayaali ke agay surangoon honay par mayel nazar aa rahi hai. Iran mein aik arsa se awam ka aik makhsoos group sakht geer mazhabi thdidat ki khil kar mukhalfat par utar aaya hai jis ke aik hissa ke taur par khawateen ney kaamil hijaab ke luzoom ke khilaaf muzahiron ka aaghaz kardiya tha. Is soorath e haal se nimatnay ke liye Irani Parliament ney apne tehqeeqi markaz ke zareya aik Report tayyar karwai aur is tahaqeeq ke aghaz kardah natayej ko manzar aam par laatay hue aitedaal pasandi ki rawish ikhtiyar karne ki janib mahol tayyar kya ja raha hai.

Iran mein aik Survey Report mein inkishaaf huwa hai ke sirf 35 feesad Irani khawateen ke hijaab par yaqeen rakhti hain. Yeh Report Irani Parliament ke zair e intizam tehqeeqi markaz ki janib se tayyar ki gayi. Report ke mutabiq log ab Mulk mein phailay is mazhar ki parwah nahi kar rahay hain jis ko shiddat pasand anasir ki janib se “juzwi hijaab” qarar diya jata hai. Is hijaab mein ziyada tar khawateen aur ladkiyan trouser aur taweel coat ke sath sirf sar ke balon ka kuch hissah dhaanp layte hain aur burqa nahi pehanti hain. Yeh report 43 safhaat par mushtamil hai. Is mein bawar karaya gaya hai ke hijaab ke maamla mein hukumati mudakhlat ko awam ki taizi se badhti hui mukhalfat ka saamna hai aur mazhabi, sarkari aur security hukkaam Irani muashera mein “kaamil hijaab” ki bajaye “juzwi hijaab” ke phailtay hue rujhan se nimatnay mein nakaam ho chuke hain. Report ke mutabiq juzwi hijaab pahannay wali khawateen ke shana bshanh mukammal hijaab karne wali khawateen theheri nazar aati hain aur un mein bhi hakoomati mudakhlat ke hawalay se mukhalfat mein izafah dekhnay mein aa raha hai. Irani Parliament ke tehqeeqi markaz ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke muashera mein akhlaqiaat ki nigaran khusoosi Police aur Mazhabi Authorities ke kaam jari rakhnay par shadeed mukhalfat payi jati hai. Report mein bataya gaya hai ke Iran mein 70% khawateen laazmi hijaab par yaqeen nahi rakhti hain aur juzwi hijaab ke hawalay se umomi nazar yeh muashra mein phail chkahe. report mein is janib bhi tawajah dilae gayi hai ke 85 % se ziyada khawateen juzwi hijaab ikhtiyar karti hain aur woh jabri hijaab aur hijaab ke maamla mein hukumati mudakhlat ke hawala se manfi muaqqaf rakhti hain. Yaad rahay ke jabri ya laazmi hijaab ki mukhalfat mein muhim ka aaghaz 27

December 2017 ko yani Iran mein hukumraan nizaam ke khilaaf bhadakne walay awaami ehtijaj se aik roz pehlay huwa tha. Vida Mowahed nami aik 31 sala ladki ney dar-ul-hukumat Tehran ke wast mein sadak par khaday ho kar apna hijaab utaara apne scarf ko aik chhadi par muallaq kar ke logon ke samnay fiza mein buland kya. Mazkoorah ladki ko girftar kar liya gaya taham woh Irani khawateen ke mutalba ki alamat ban gayi. Baad azan bohat si Irani khawateen aur ladkiyon ney Tehran mein shara “inqilab” ki is larki ki pairwi ki aur Mulk mein laazmi hijaab ke musallat kiye jaany par ehtijaj ka rasta apnaya. Yeh tehreek ab bhi mukhtalif sooraton mein jari o saari hai aur is ki aawaz aalmi satah par poanch gayi hai. is wajah se Irani hakkaam naay darjanon khawateen ko girftar kar ke jail mein band kya.
1055.title: Sirf 35 Irani hijaab karne ke qaayel: Parliamani Report

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik alamnaak sadak haadsa mein Tank bund par do talba halaak hogaye. Bike sawaar aik paidal rahrau ko jo sadak uboor kar raha tha bachanay ki koshish mein gaadi par qaboo khodya. Yeh saneha itwaar ki raat mein paish aaya. Teen talba aik Pulsar gaadi par sawar they. Teesra taalib e ilm zakhmi hogaya. Mutwafi talba ki shanakht 19 sala Vijay, intermediate taalib ilm saakin Chintal Jedimetlaaur 19 sala Sai Manoj Polytechnic student saakin Kukatpally ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Chintal ka saakin 19 sala Rajesh Yadav zakhmi hogaya jo Balanagar ke hospital mein zair e ilaaj hai. Yeh bhi Polytechnic ka taalib e ilm hai. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Tank bund par Kandukuri Vireshalingam ke mujassima ke qareeb itwaar ki shab 12 : 45 bujey paish aaya. Vijay jo gaadi chlarha tha is waqt apni gaadi par qaboo khodya jab sadak uboor karne wala aik rahrau achanak un ki gaadi ke samnay agayaa. Rahrau ko takaraane se bachney ki koshish mein Vijay ney achanak Breaks lagadiye jis ke baayes gaadi phisal gayi aur teenon sadak par girgaye. Gandhi Nagar Police Inspector Mr. R Srinivas ney kaha ke Vijay 3:00 bajey shab jaanbar na  hosaka jabke Mnoj ney aaj subah 5:30 bajey aakhri saans li. Vijay ney apne ghar walon ko bataya tha ke woh apne aik dost ki birthday party mein ja raha hai.
1068.title: Tank bund par rahrau ko bachanay ki koshish mein do talba halaak

news_detail: Israeli Bahria ney itwaar ko Gaza ki patti ki samandari nakabandi todney ki koshish karne walay Europi imdadi karkunaan ki aik kashti pakad li hai. Kashti par Norway ka parcham lehra tha. Israeli fouj ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”un (imdadi karkunaan) ki sargarmi kisi ghair mamooli waqea ke baghair hi khatam hogayi hai aur isi waqt is kashti ko Israeli bandargaah Ashdod muntaqil kya ja raha hai”. Al Awda nami is kashti se wabsta imdadi group ney kaha hai ke is par baaes afraad sawaar thay aur iss par adwiyah aur tibbi samaan lada sun-hwa tha. Freedom Flotilla ittehaad ke aik bayan ke mutabiq isi group ki aik doosri kashti ki aindah chand roz mein isi ilaqa mein aamad mutawaqqa hai. is kashti ka naam azad y hai aur is par soydsh parcham lehra raha hoga. Scandinavia ke mumalik se May ke wast mein chaar kashtiyan Gaza mein mahsoor Falastinion ke liye imdadi samaan le kar rawana hui theen. Unhon ney Gaza tak pounchaney mein 28 mukhtalif bandargahon par qiyam kya hai. Is muhim mein shaamil baqi do Kashtian Palermo ki bandargaah par qyaam ke baad apni manzil ki janib rawana hochuki hain. Al Awda ke pakdae jaaney ke baad Flotilla ittehaad ney aik bayan jari kya hai aur is mein yeh kaha hai ke ”Israeli Bahria hamein intibah jari kar rahi hai aur woh yeh daawa kar rahi hai ke hum bain ul aqwami qanoon ki khilaaf warzi ke murtakib ho rahay hain. Is ney imdadi kashtiyon ko rokney ke liye kisi bhi zaroori iqdaam ki dhamki di hai”. Bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke ”dar haqeeqat wahid zaroori iqdaam yeh ho sakta hai ke Gaza ki naka bandi khatam kar di jaye aur tamam Falastinion ko azadana naqal vhrkt ki azadi di jaye”. Israeli Bahria ne sirf Gaza ki naka bandi todney ki koshish ke liye aney wali maghribi mumalik ki kashtiyan ko pakad leti hai balkay woh Gaza ki bandar gaah se Europe ki taraf jaaney wali kashtiyon par bhi dhawa bol deti hai. Is ney chand haftay qabal Gaza se Europe jaaney wali aik kashti ko rawana honey ke thori der baad hi pakad liya tha. flstinyon ney May mein bhi aik kashti ke zareya Israel ki bahri naka bandi torney ki koshish ki thi lekin is ko bhi Gaza se chand kilometer door pakad liya gaya tha. Israeli fouj Gaza ki patti se flstinyon ki kashtiyon ko chay samandari mil se bahar nahi jaaney deti hai. wazeh rahay ke Israel ney 2008 se Gaza ki patti ki barri, bahri aur fazayi naka bandi kar rakhi hai. Aqwam e Mutahidda ke ohdedar aur insani huqooq ki aalami tanzeemen mutadid martaba Israel se Falasteeni ilaqa ka bgrhti hui insani soorat e haal ke paish e nazar muhasra khatam karne ka mutalba krchki hain.
1084.title: Israeli Bahria ney Gaza ki naka bandi torney ki koshish karne wali Norway ki kashti pakad li

news_detail: Nellore:  Ek muthayurkun waqea mein aik naujawan khatoon  Nellore police se rujoo hotay hue shikayat ki ke RTC  ke aik driver ne usay dhamki di hai ke agar woh usay mubashrat karne na dey to woh is ke bhai ko jaan se maar daaley ga. Ladki jo  Nellore town ke  Pallemkondia  ilaqa mein rehti hai kaha ke RTC  bus driver Sheikh Hussain ne is ke ghar ke bahar park ki gayi bike ko bhi jala diya tha. Ladki ke mutabiq jab woh intermediate ki taleem parahi thi us ki dosti bus Driver se hogayi, taham is ke walidain ko is ki bhanak lag gayi aur unhon ne is se doori Ekhtiyar karne ka intibah diya tab se ladki apne ghar par hi rah rahi hai, taham driver is ko tang kar raha hai ke is ke sath jismani taluqaat qaim kere basorat deegar woh is ke bhai ka qatal karde ga. Ladki ki shikayat par Police ne aik muqadma darj karliya.
1094.title: Jismani taluqaat qaim karne sabiq girlfriend ko  RTC driver ki dhamki

news_detail: Hyderabad. John Abraham ki aanay wali film “Satyamev jayate”  mein Moharam ke maatam ke manazair ko intahi ghatiya andaaz mein paish karne aur Musalmanoun ke Mazhabi jazbaat ko bhadkane par Hyderabad Police ne filmsaaz company  Emmy Entertainment  aur Milap Milan Zaveri  aur deegar ke khilaaf  taazeerat e Hind ki defeat  295-A, 153A r/w 34 aur Cinimatography  Act ki dafaat  7(1) (a) ke tahet muqaddma darj karliya. Is khusoos mein Shia Biradari ke zaakreen o ulama o amayedeen par mushtamil ek  wafad ne Deputy Commissioner of Police Hyderabad Mr.V Satyanarayana se mulaqaat karte hue film mein paish kardah maatam ke manazair ko oochay aur ghatiya andaaz mein pesh karne par Shia Biradari ke jazbaat se waaqif karwatay hue kaha ke film ki Peshkash se Musalman khaas kar Ke Shia  Baradari ke Mazhabi jazbaat  majrooh hotey hain is liye woh chahtey hain ke film mein se Maatam ke manazir ko nikaal diya jaye chunkay un manazair ke baghair bhi film ko pesh kya ja sakta hai aur is se film ki asal kahani par koi farq nahi padta. DCP South Zone ne kaha ke aaj un se Shia Biradari ke mazhabi rehnuma mulaqaat kiye aur film se mutaliq un se shikayat kiye hain. unhon nay kaha ke purane shehar mein abadi ka bada hissa Shia  Biradari ka hai aur un ka ehsaas hai ke is film mein maatam se mutaliq pesh kiye gaye manazair se Shia Biradri ke mazhabi jazbaat ko theis pohunchi hai. Unhon nay kaha ke tehreeri shikayat ki mosuli par Dabirpura Police Station mein ek muqaddama darj karliya gaya hai. Syed Ali Jafferi Advocate ney is khusoos mein Police Station mein ek shikayat darj karwatay hue maatam ke manazair ke pas e manzar mein adakaar John Abraham ki janib se ek baheemana qatal karne ke manazir rakhay gaye hain aur is douraan ek mashhoor qawwali ” Tajdar e Haram” ka bhi wird kiya ja raha hai. Yeh qawwali  Paighambar e Islam pbuh. ki midhat mein hai. Is douran ek qatal ka manzer rakhna intehae na munasib hai. Unhon ney bataya ke yeh qawwali Paighambar e Islam Hazrat Mohammad pbuh. ki Shaan o Riffat bayaan karti hai jis ke pase manzar mein qatal jaise ghinauna jurm dikhaya gaya hai. Unhon ney apni shikayat mein yeh bhi kaha ke maloom huwa hai ke film ki shooting ke douran Mumbai ke muqami Shia logoun ney aiteraaz kya tha aur film ke producer aur director  ki janib se yeh tayakhun  diya tha ke film se aisay manazir nikaal diye jayen ge magar  trailer  se aisa lagta hai ke woh manazir film mein shaamil rakhay gaye hain. Unhon ney kaha ke yeh manazir Musalmanoun ki dili aazari aur un ke mazhab ki tauheen karte hue danista tor par shaamil kiye gaye hain jo Cinimatography Act. 1952 ki dafaa 5 B ke bhi khilaaf hai. Shikayet mein Supreme Court ki ruling ka bhi hawala diya gaya hai.
1115.title: Film “Satyamev jayate” ke khilaaf Shia biradari ka ehtejaj

news_detail: Saudi Arab ke farmaa rava Shah Salman bin Abdulaziz ne Yemen ki qaumi fouj aur sodani fouj ke sho-hada ke khandano ke 1500 afraad ki Hajj ke douran mein sarkari maizbini ka hukum diya hai. Yemen aur soudan ke yeh fouji jung zada parosi malik mein Houthi Shiah baghion ke khilaaf Saudi Arab ki qayadat mein Arab ittehaad ke operation faisla kin tofaan aur operation umeed ki bahaali mein lartay hue shaheed hue hain. un sho-hada ke khandano ki Shah Salman ke maheman nawazi ke programme baraye Hajj aur omra ke tehat maizbini ki jaye gi. Saudi Arab ki wizarat baraye ‘Islami Umoor aur Dawah wo Irshad’ is programme ki nigran hai. Saudi wazeer baraye Islami Umoor aur Dawah wo Irshad Sheikh Abdullatif bin Abdulaziz ne aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”is programme aur Shah Salman ke hukum se Yemen mein hamaray bhaiyon ki sarzamen aur awam ke difaa ke liye un sho-hada ki dilerana qurbinion ki tehseen zahir hoti hai. Allah taala un sho-hada ki mughfirat farmaen”. Un ka kehna tha ke Saudi Arab ke dosray sarkari mehakmon ke sath rawabit se un sho-hada ke khandano ko saholaten baham pohanchanay ke liye tamam zaroori iqdamaat kiye jayen ge taakay woh baasani Hajj ada kar saken.
1128.title: Yemeni aur Sodani sho-hada ke khandano ki Hajj par sarkari maizbini

1187.title: Jismani taluqaat qaim karne sabiq girlfriend ko  RTC driver ki dhamki

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nafrat ke maahol mein aman ke payam ko aam karne Mulk ki khawateen uth khadi hui hain. Yeh pehal khawateen ne shaed is liye bhi ki hogi ke nafrat aur tashadud ka sab se ziyada khumyaza inhen hi bhugahtna padega. Qaumi satah par huqooq insani ke liye sargaram khawateen ne is khusoos mein beda uthaya aur 22
September taa 13

october 2018 Mulk bhar se khawateen ki paanch riyaalian nikaalne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Yeh riyaalian Kerala, Tamlinadu, Jammu and Kashmir , Shumal Mashriqi Hindustan aur Delhi se Delhi tak nikaali jayen gi. Har riyaalian mein kam az kam 25 khawateen hissa lengi. Is dauraan 200 Shehron aur Gaon ka ihata kya jaye ga. Mumtaz samaji jahedkaar mohtarma Shabnam Hashmi bataya ke adam tashadud Hindsutan ke liye Hindustan ki khawateen ki janib se ihtimaam kiye jane walay is March ”Battain Aman Ki” ka maqsad nafrat aur tashadud ke mahol mein pyar, mohabbat aur aman ke payam ko aam karna hai aur logon tak yeh payam pahunchana hai ke nafrat aur tashaddud se kuch haasil nahi hoga balkay pyar aur aman ke zareya hi hum is Mulk ko taraqqi ki raah par gamzan kar saktay hain. Unhon ne kaha ke hamara asal maqsad Dastoor par jo hamla kya jarha hai is ko rokna aur jamhuriat ko bachana hai. Unhon ne bataya ke yun to is Mulkgeer tehreek se hazaron tanzeemen jari rahen gi magar har rally mein kam az kam 25 khawateen hamesha rahen gi, yeh rallyian october mein Dehli poanch kar aik jalsa mein tabdeel hogi. un tamam rallyon ke liye malia muqami taur par hi tanzeemen apne taur par kar rahi hain. Is khusoos mein aaj yahan ‘Lamakaan’ Banjara Hills par khawateen ki mukhtalif tanzeemon ka aik ijlaas munaqqid huwa jis se mohtarma Shabnam Hashmi aur deegar khawateen ne khitaab kya aur rally ke inseraam ke silsila mein Laiha amal ko qatiyat di.
1048.title: Nafrat o tashadud ke khilaaf khawateen ki Mulkgeer muhim

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rajya Sabha mein aaj TRS ke tamam 6 arkaan ney Parliament ke aiwaan baala ke Nayeb Sadarnashin ke bawaqar ohda ke liye jntadl (U) ke umeedwaar Harivansh Narayana Singh ke haq mein vote dete hue UPA ke haami Congressi umeedwaar B.K. Hari Prasad NDA ke tayeedi umeedwaar ki kamyaabi ki raah hamwar ki. Harivansh ney 20 votes ki aksariyat se kamyaabi haasil ki. Janata Dal umeedwaar ko 125 aur Congressi umeedwaar ko 105 votes haasil hue. Tawaqqe ke mutabiq Telugu Desam Party jis ney Andhra Pradesh ko khusoosi muaqqaf ataa karne mein nakaami par BJP se apne taluqaat munqita karliye, NDA umeedwaar ke khilaaf vote dete hue apni barhami ka izhaar kya. Telugu Desam ke arkaan Rajya Sabha ney Congressi umeedwaar ke haq mein vote diya. YSR Congress Party ney pehlay hi yeh elaan kardiya tha ke woh raye dahi mein hissa lainey se ijtinaab karegi. Nayeb Sadarnashin Rajya Sabha ka intikhab 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein barsar e iqtedaar BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA aur Congress ki zair r qiyadat UPA ke liye jaanch ka paimana tasawwur kya ja raha tha. Rahul Gandhi ke Congress ki qiyadat sanbhaalne ke baad aik ahem tabdeeli yeh aayi ke kay wo partiyan jo Congress ka sath dainey amaada nahi theen woh Congress ke sath mafahimat karti nazar aa rahi hain. Agarchay TRS ney Rajya Sabha ke Nayeb Saddarnashin ke liye ki jaane wali raye dahi mein kis ki taayeed kere gi wazeh nahi ki thi. Intikhabaat se qabal Chief Minister Bihar Mr. Nitish Kumar ney KCR se rabita karte hue un ki Party ke umeedwaar ko kamyaab bananey mein taawun karne ki khwahish ki thi. Yeh poochney par ke aaya BJP, TRS ko NDA ke naey haleef ke taur par dekhtii hai? Telangana BJP ke tarjuman Krishna Sagar Rao ney kaha ke hum TRS ko an d ae ke imkani Haleef ke tor prnhin dekhte, lekin hum nahi jantay ke 2019 aam intikhabaat ke kya hoga. BJP se TRS ki qurbat ko kuch arsa se mehsoos kya ja raha tha aur yeh baat wazeh hoti jarahi thi ke BJP ke teyin TRS naram gosha rakhti hai. Talaq e salasa par bill ke masla par ho ya Modi Hukoomat ke khilaaf tehreek adam etemaad ka masla TRS ney raye dahi se ijtinaab kya tha magar is martaba BJP ke tayeedi umeedwaar ke haq mein vote dete hue yeh wazeh ishara dey diya hai ke woh BJP ke sath chahay intikhabi mafahmat kere ya na kere magar woh aiwaan mein BJP ki hamnawa bani rahay gi.
1077.title: BJP ko TRS ki shakal mein aik neya dost mil gaya?!

news_detail: Taliban ne mashriqi Afghanistan ke aik soobah Ghazni ke dar-al-hakoomat Ghazni par jumah ki subah mukhtalif simton se hamla kardiya hai, Taliban aur Hukoomati Forcess ke darmiyan shadeed jharpen jari hain. Sarkari dafatir par firing karte rahay aur Police Headquarters ka muhasra karliya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Jaria mah ke avaakhr mein mutawaqqa jung bandi se qabal Afghan hukoomat par dabao banaye rakhnay Taliban yeh karwai ki hai. Ghazni shaher par subah ki awleen sa-aton se hi yeh hamlay shuru kar diye gay hain. media reports ke mutabiq Taliban aur Hukoomati Forcess ke darmiyan jhadpon mein darjanon afraad halaak aur so se zayed zakhmi ho chukay hain, jabkay Taliban hamla mein marnay walon mein 14 Security ahlkarbhi shaamil hain. Afghan media ke mutabiq Taliban ke hamla-aawaron ne mukhtalif simton se daakhil ho kar shaher par dhawa bol diya, Taliban ke hamlon ke baad kabul Ghazni Highway traffic ke liye band kardiya gaya hai. Doosri janib Ghazni Police cheif ka daawa hai ke Ghazni shaher par Hukoomati Forcess ka control ab bhi barqarar hai aur Hukoomati Forcess aur Taliban ke darmiyan jhadpen shaher se bahar ho rahi hain. Rukan Wifaqi Council Nasir Faqeeri ne kaha ke shaher ke klidi maqamat ko shorish pasandon ke control mein chalay jaaney se roknay ke liye Afghan military izafi forces ko taiynaat kar rahi hai. Taliban ke tarjuman Zabeehullah Mujahid ne twitter par kaha ke Taliban ne Ghazni mein hukoomat ke beshtar intizami dafatir par control haasil karliya hai jin mein Police Headquarters aur Police Stations bhi shaamil hain. darjanon sarkari Security Forces ke ahelkaar maaray gay hain. is ke barkhilaf aik sobai Security ohdedar ne tardeed ki hai ke Taliban jangju shaher Ghazni mein daakhil hue hain. sorat e haal pur aman hai albatta golion ki bochaaron ki aawazian suni gayeen, jo barri baat nahi hai. sobai governor ke tarjuman arif noori ne kaha ke mortar attack mein shahri makanaat aur army check points ko nishana banaya gaya hai aur Taliban jungjuon ki darjanon lashain galiyo par bikhri padi hain. Aljazeera ke mutabiq is jharap mein kam از kam 39 jangju aur 14 fouji halaak hue hain. yeh bhi it-tila-aat masool horahee hain ke Taliban ke hamla ko paspaa karne ke liye Amrici jungi tayyarah aur Helicopters ne fazai hamlay shuru kar diye hain.
1087.title: Taliban ka Afghani shaher Ghazni pur hamla, darjanon afraad halaak

news_detail: Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi, markazi hukoomat ke 50 lakh mulazmeen ke cheharon par muskurahat le ayen ge jo is baat ke muntazir hain ke 7

Pay Revision Commission ki sifarishaat se paray un ke mutalibaat puray kiye jayen ge. Zee news mein zaraye ke hawala se aik report paish ki gayi jis mein bayan kya gaya ke Wazeer e Azam nrindr moodi markazi hukoomat ke mulazmeen ko ail tea si ke tehat bairon Mulk safar karne ka ikhtiyar haasil karne ki ijazat dey sakte hain taham woh kis Mulk ka daura karenge is ka faisla hukoomat apne taur par kere gi. Report mein yeh bhi id-daa kya gaya ke ibtida mein mulazimeen ko kam az kam 10 Mumulik ka safar karne ki ijazat di jaye gi. fi al-waqt markazi hukoomat ke mulazmeen androon Mulk safar ke liye rukhsat aur bilasoodi paishgi le satke hain.
1101.title: Markazi sarkari mulazimeen ko bairon Mulk ke safar ki ijazat diye jaane ka imkaan

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib Sadar e Jamhooria Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ne aaj kaha ke yaklakht teen Talaq dainay ko tazeeri jurm qarar dainay walay mujawaza qanoon ka Bill parliment ke aindah ijlaas mein rakha jaye ga chunkay Rajya Sabha mein partiyan kisi moahida par pounchanay se qassar rahay. zaraye ne kaha ke parliment ke aindah ijlaas se qabal is musevida qanoon ke nifaz ke liye Hukoomat is khusoos mein aik Ordinance ya Emergency Executive Order manzoor kar sakti hai. Parliament ka ijlaas jari na rehne ki soorat mein Hukoomat hangami iqdamaat ke taur par Ordinence ya Hangami Aamilana Hukum jari karne ka ikhtiyar rakhti hai. Sadarnashin Rajya Sabha Mr. Venkaiah Naidu ne kaha ke partiyon mein ittafaq raye qayim na honay ki wajah se aaj Talaq salasa Bill ko aiwaan mein nahi rakha jaye ga. kabeena ki janib se mujawwiza qanoon mein tarameem ki manzoori ke dosray din hi Hukoomat aaj is Bill ko parliament ke manson ijlaas ke aakhri din Rajya Sabha mein paish karne ka iradah rakhti thi. Paheli tarmeem yeh ki gayi thi ke bayak waqt teen Talaq day dainay par jisay Talaq Bidaa se bhi mausoom kya jata hai sirf khatoon ya is ke khooni rishta daar ya phir Aqab Nikah se judey koi fard ki janib se hi Police mein shikayat ki jasakay gi. Doosri tarmeem yeh ki gayi ke shohar ke Talaq Bidaa ko wapas le lainay aur dobarah mil jul kar rahne par bahami amaadgi ki soorat mein mutlaqa darkhwast guzar ko apni darkhwast wapas lainay ki ijazat haasil rahay gi. Teesri tarmeem yeh ki gayi ke sirf magistrate hi zamanat ke majaz hon ge. Is tarmeem ki ru se shikayat kunindah khatoon ke bayan ki samaat ke baad hi Magistrate mulzim shohar ko zamanat par rihaa karne ka faislah kar saktay hain. Siyasi partiyon ka yeh mutaliba tha ke teen saal qaid ki saza ko wapas liya jaye aur shikayat ke indraaj ke baad sirf Magistrate ki bajaye Police ohdedar ko bhi zamanat par rihaa karne ka ikhtiyar diya jaye jisay Hukoomat ne qubool nahi kya. asal Bill ko guzashta baras hi lok sabha mein manzoori haasil hogayi thi taham Rajya Sabha mein yeh Bill ruka huwa tha jahan BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA is waqt aqliat mein hai.
1120.title: Rajya Sabha mein Talaq Bill ki peshkashi tal gayi

news_detail: Pakistani jail mein 6 saal se qaid Bharati Engineer qaid ki muddat jald poori honay par watan lout jaye ga. Pakistani adalat ne is ki jald rihayi ki tasdeeq kar di. Hamid  Ansari nami Software Engineer ghair qanooni tareeqa se Pakistan mein November 2012 mein daakhil huwa tha, is ne do din Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein apne aik dost ke paas rehayish ikhtiyar ki thi jis ke baad woh aik hotel muntaqil ho gaya. Intelligence ko khabar hone par usay hotel se hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. 15

December 2015 ko jasoosi ke ilzaam mein usay fouji adalat ki janib se teen saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. Hamid  Ansari ne tafteesh ke douran is baat ka aitraaf kiya hai ke woh ghair qanooni tor par Afghanistan se Torkham ke rastay Pakistan mein daakhil huwa. Hamid ki walida ka daawa hai ke un ke betay ki internet par aik Pakistani khatoon se bhi dosti hogayi thi jis se milnay ke liye Hamid Nihaal Pakistan gaya tha. Douran qaid Hamid Nihaal  Ansari ke wakeel qaazi Mohammad Anwar advocate ne Peshawar High Court ke aik bench ko bataya tha ke un ke Bharati maukkil par teen martaba jail ke andar hamla kiya gaya hai. Unhon ne adalat se yeh bhi kaha tha ke un maukkil ko is jagah rakha gaya hai jahan szaye mout panay walay qaidyoun ko rakha jata hai. Hamid ki walida ki taraf se Supreme Court ki insani huqooq ki cell mein aik darkhwast dayer ki gayi thi jis mein un ke betay ki baazyabi ki istedua ki gayi thi. Unhon ne umeed zahir ki hai ke December mein is ki qaid ki muddt poori honay ke baad usay jald reha kar diya jaye ga, unhon neh betay ki jald rihayi ke liye Imran Khan ko bhi khat likh kar darkhwast ki hai .

Varsuwa Mumbai se talluq rakhnay wali Hamid  Ansari ki walida Fouzia ko umeed hai ke un ka beta December mein joon hi qaid ki muddat poori hojaye gi woh wapas apne Mulk aajay ga. Fouzia ne jumaraat ko sabiq MLA Mr. Krishna Hegde se mulaqaat karte hue un se darkhwast ki ke woh Hindustani Cricketers Sunil Gawaskr aur Kapil Dev se khwahish karen ke Imran Khan ki taqreeb halaf bardari mein shirkat ke mauqa par woh Pakistani Wazeer e Azam se  Ansari ki aajilana rihayi ke baarey mein baat karen. Fouzia jo haal hi mein Andheri ke aik maroof college se professor ki haisiyat se retire hui hain, apne betay ki aajilana rihayi ke liye wazeer kharja mohtaram sshma soraj se mulaqaat karne Dehli gayi hui theen jahan woh aik haadsa ka shikaar hogayi theen jis ki wajah se un ki mltipl surgery hui hai. haqooq insani ke jahedkaar Jatin Desai ne bataya ke Pakistani adalat neh  Ansari ki aajilana rihayi ki darkhwast ko is liye mustard kardiya ke Pakistani hukoomat ne qaid ki saza mukammal hotay hi inhen Hindustan bhej dainay ka wada kya hai.
1137.title: Mumbai ka Engineer Hamid Ansari, Pakistani jail se kab rihaa hoga?

news_detail: Munnar. Mutawatar do dinon se jari barish ke baayis Kerala ke Idukki zila mein chaay ke baagaat ke liye mashhoor Munnar mein zameen khisakne ki wajah se aik Resort ko jaanay wali sadak ke masdood hojane se wahan kam az kam 60 sayyah phans gay. Resort mein jo log phans gay un mein 20 bairooni sayyah hain. Ohdedaron ney kaha ke bairooni sayyaho ka talluq Rusia, Saudi Arabia aur Oman mumalik se hai. Kerala ke wazeer sayahat Mr. Kadakampally Surendaran ney kaha ke Munnar ke Pallivasal mein Plum Judi Resort mein maujood tamam sayyah mehfooz hain. Resort mein sayyahon ke phans jaanay ka ilm us waqt huwa jab aik sayyah ney apni pareshaniyon par aik video post ki jisay aik Telivsion Channel par telecast kya gaya. Riyasat mein guzishta do dinon se shadeed barish horahee hai. Sayyahon ko bahifazat nikaalne ke liye fouj ko talab karliya gaya. Darin asna America ney Americion shahrion ko safri intibah diya ke un ilaaqon ka daura na karen jahan zameen khisakne aur sailaab ka khadsha hai. Kerala mein ab tak 26 log halaak hogaye jin mein Idukki mein zameen khiskane se marnay walon mein 11 log bhi shaamil hain, taham jummay ke din barish se judi halakat ki report nahi hai aur na hi kahin zameen khiskane ka waqea paish aaya hai. jumaraat se hi Idukki mein Cheruthoni ke dam ke 5 darwazay khol dyie gay hain. Cheruthoni town ke zaireen ilaaqon ke logon ka takhlia krwadya gaya tha.
1154.title: Zameen khisakne ke baad Munnar ke Resort mein 60 sayyah phans gaiy

news_detail: Chairman Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf Imran Khan 18
August ko Pakistan ke Wazeer e Azam ke ohday ka halaf leinge. Is baat ka izhaar Tehreek Insaaf ke senator Faisal Javed Khan ney kya hai, unhon ney bataya ke Imran Khan 18
August ko Wazeer e Azam ke ohday ke liye halaf leinge. Ibtida mein kaha ja raha tha ke woh 11
August ko halaf lenge phir baad mein 13
August aur is ke baad 15
August ke hawalay se khabrain garam theen ke is din Imran Khan bataur Wazeer e Azam Pakistan ohda ka halaf lenge. Sadar Mumlikat Mamnoon Hussain ney Qaumi Assembly ka ijlaas 13

August ko talab kya hai, is ijlaas mein nau muntakhib arakeen Qaumi Assembly halaf leing jis ke baad Speaker aur Deputy Speaker Qaumi Assembly ka chunao hoga, Wazeer e Azam ke intikhab ke liye Assembly ijlaas yaum e azaadi ki tateel ke baad talab kya jaye ga. Zaraye ke mutabiq Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ke Chairman Imran Khan 18
August ko vuzaratِ e uzma ka halaf leinge PTI ke rehnuma o Senator Faisal Javed ney bhi 18

August ki tareekh muqarrar honay ki tasdeeq kar di. Doosri janib hizab e ikhtilaaf ke grand alliance ney Imran Khan ke madd e muqabil Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Miyan Shahbaz Sharif ko vuzaratِ uzma ke liye umeedwaar naamzad kya hai, Peoples Party ke Khurshid Shah ko Speaker Qaumi Assembly aur Mutahidda Majlis Amal ke maulana Asad Mahmood ko Deputy Speaker ka umeedwaar naamzad kya hai. Wazeh rahay ke aam intikhabaat 2018 mein Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ney Qaumi Assembly mein bhaari aksariyat haasil ki jis ke baad wifaq mein hukoomat bananay ke liye is ki ittihadi jamaaton mein MQM, BNP (Mengal), BAP aur Muslim League (Q) shaamil hain jabke PTI ko ab taq mutadid azad umeedwaron ki himayat bhi haasil hochuki hai. ilawa azeen election commission of Pakistan ney vote ki raazdari zahir kar ney par azkhud notice case mein Chairman Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf Imran Khan ki maafi qubool karli. Election Commission of Pakistan ney Imran Khan ki maafi qubool karne ke baad un ki NA 53 se kamyabi ka notification jari karne ka hukum bhi dey diya hai.
1167.title: Imran Khan ki halaf bardari 18th  August ko hogi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Osmania University ne tawaqqe ke mutabiq security wajohaat ka bahana banatay hue Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura Campus ki ijazat dainay se inkaar karte hue Congress Party ko jhatka dey diya hai. Joint Director University Estate Cell ne tlgo department ke pi each d reserch askalr Mr. K. Manvatha Roy ki janib se daakhil kardah darkhwast ka jawab dete hue kaha ke talba tanzeemon ki janib se Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura se mutaliq ki gayi darkhwast ko security wajohaat ki binaa par mustard kya jata hai chunkay woh special security courage ke tehat hain. unhon ne is jawab ki naqool University wise chancellor ke secretary aur registrar aur o s d ko bhi rawana ki hai. tea pi si si ke tarjuman Mr. Manvatha Roy ne is mauqa par khitaab karte hue ilzaam aed kya ke hukoomat Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura University ki ijazat dainay se rad kardiya hai chunkay is University mein cheif minister Mr. ke Chandar shikhr rao qadam rakhnay ke muaqqaf mein nahi hain. unhon ne kaha ke Mr. ke si are ke dabao mein aakar joint Director University Estate Cell ne security wajohaat ka bahana banatay hue Tagore Auditorium mein Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke jalsa ki ijazat dainay se inkaar kardiya. Talba tanzeemon ne 14
August ko Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura University ki ijazat ke liye 4

August ko darkhwast di thi. TRS se mulhiqa talba tanzeem TRSV ne Mr. Rahul Gandhi ko intibah diya tha ke woh is waqt tak University mein qadam na rakhay jab tak ke woh Telangana awam se maffi mangay aur shaheedan e Telangana ki yadgar par apni naak rgde. Is tanzeem ke qayedeen ne Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke daura e University mein rakhne daalnay ka bhi intibah diya tha.
1186.title: Rahul Gandhi ko Osmania University ka daura karne ki ijazat dainay se inkaar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad “She Teams” ne aaj awaami nizaam hamal o naqal (Public Transport) mein harasani ke khilaaf muhim ke hissa ke taur par Metro Trains mein shaoor baydaari muhim chalaye. Mohtarma Shikha Goel Additional Commissioner  of Police Crimes o Incharge She Teams ne aaj Metro Trains mein Ladkiyon aur khawateen ke sath chaid chhad aur harasani ke insidaad ke liye chalaye jaany wali muhim mein hissa liya. Unhon ne bataya ke ‘Hyderabad She Teams’ ne July ke maheena mein public tansport mein harasani ke khilaaf muhim ka aaghaz kya tha. Guzishta hafta ‘Radio Mirchi’ ne bhi is muhim mein ishtiraaq shuru kardiya. Mohtarma Shikha Goel ne kaha ke is muhim ke hissa ke taur par MMTS, RTC basoon aur Autos mein She Teams ke ohdedaron ne safar kya aur un mein safar karne wali khawateen aur Ladkiyon se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke woh bilaa khauf safar karen aur zaroorat padney par Police ki madad haasil karen. Unhon ne bataya ke She Teams ki is muhim ka maqsad yeh hai ke kisi bhi ladki ko kisi bhi qisam ki harasani na ho aur woh aazadana taur par jab chahay jahan chahay bilaa khauf safar karen. Inhen kisi se darnay ya khaufzadah honay ki zaroorat nahi. Agar aisi ko yi nagehani baat hojaye to 100 Dial karen, Police aap ki madad ke liye 5-10 minute mein pahonch jaye gi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke khawateen ke liye Hyderabad duniya ke mehfooz tareen shehron mein se aik hai aur hamara maqsad hai ke Hyderabad ko sare fehrist muqam par pohanchaye. Unhon ne Hyderabadi naujawanon ki satayish karte hue kaha ke beshtar ladke shareef hotay hain aur woh Ladkiyon se chaid chhaad nahi karte. Unhon ne kaha ke woh doosron ko bhi Ladkiyon ko harasan karne se rokain aur apnay doston ki bhi hausla afzai karen.
1201.title: Ladkiyon ko harasani ke khilaaf Metro Trains mein ‘She Teams” ki muhim

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi High Court ne aaj aik darkhwast ko mustard krdyajs mein 2010 mein aik qaumi shahrah ki tausee ke liye National Highway Authority of India ko sarkari arazi ki farokhtgi se Chief Minister Rajasthan Vasundhara Raje aur un ke farzand ko mobayyana taur par 1.97 crores rupay muaweza ke husool ke khilaaf FIR ke indraaj aur CBI ke zareya tehqiqaat ka mutalba kiya gaya tha. Justice R K Gauba neh darkhwast ko mustard kardiya jis mein khusoosi CBI adalat ke 18 April 2015 ke faisla ko bhi challenge kya gaya tha. Zaireen adalat ne Ms Vasundhara Raje aur un ke farzand ke khilaaf ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat ka hukum dainay se yeh kehte hue inkaar kardiya tha ke qanoon insidaad rishwat satani ke tehat paishgi ijazat haasil nahi ki gayi. Rajasthan ke aik vakeel ne yeh muqadma daayer kya tha. Vakeel Srijana Shrestha ki darkhwast ke bamawajib Raje, 2010 mein jab yeh mobayyana maamla paish aayatha us waqt awaami mulazmeen nahi thay aur Rajasthan riyasti assembly mein Qaayed Oppostion thein. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya ke Ms Raje aur un ke farzand ne Dholpur town mein Dholpur Palace se mut-tasil 567 murabba meter qaata arazi ki malkiat ka daawa kya aur National Highway Authority of India ko 1.97 crores rupay mein farokht kardiya jis se sarkari khazana ko khasara huwa.
1041.title: Vasundhara Raje ke khilaaf FIR ke liye darkhwast kharij

news_detail: Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar Amado Boudou ko badunwanion aur rishwat khori ke jurm mein 5 saal 10 mah qaid ki saza sunadi gayi hai. Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar Amado Boudouko mangal ke roz badunwanion ke ilzamaat saabit honay par 5 saal 10 mah qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. Un par rishwat lainay aur sarkari mamlaat mein be zabtagyon ka ilzaam hai. Amado ko wifaqi foujdaari adalat se ” Ciccone case” ke silsila mein saza sunai gayi hai, un par ilzaam tha ke unhon nay apni mann pasand ”Ciccone Printing Company” ko sarkari thaika dlwaya jis ke badlay is Company se Commission wusool kya. Ciccone Printing Company Argentina ki wahid niji company hai jo sarkari currency note chaapti hai. Amado par 90 hazaar Pesos  (3,214US$) jurmana kya gaya hai. Is ke alawa Amado par zindagi bhar keliye kisi bhi qisam ka sarkari ohda rakhnay par bhi pabandi aayed kar di gayi hai. Amado Boudou ney 2011 se 2015 tak Argentina ki Sadar Christina Fernandez ke sath khidmaat anjaam di theen. Amado par bud unwani ka muqadma 2012 se chal rhatha, is case mein ”Ciccone Printers ke sabiq maalik Nicholas Ciccone ko bhi mujrim qaraar diya gaya tha. Amado Boudou ney khud par lagaye gaye tamam ilzamaat ki tardeed karte hue kaha hai ke sayasatdan jo taaqatwar rastay par chaltay hain, inhen pehlay to media baad azan adalti nizaam ka saamna karna parta hai. Argentina ki Anti Corruption Agency ki sarbarah Laura Alonso ney is muqadmay ki samaat ki aur kaha ke Argentina ki tareekh mein pehli baar Naayeb Sadar ko saza huvi hai, Argentina ki Adalat ab badunwaan logon ko saza dainay ke liye khud mukhtaar hai jis ke umoor mein mudakhilat ki sarbrahِ e Mumlikat ko bhi ijazat nahi. Wazeh rahay ke Amado Boudou ney apni saza ke khilaaf appeal daayer karne ka elaan bhi kya hai.
1060.title: Argentina ke sabiq Naayeb Sadar ko badunwanion ke ilzaam mein 5 saal 10 mah qaid

news_detail: Hyderabad 8. Sultan Shahi, Mughalpura, Hyderabad se talluq rakhnay wali aik Azim Hajj mohtarma Hafiza bi zauja Mirza Qutubuddin Baig umar 70 saal ka aaj subah Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein intqaal hogaya. Woh cover number TSR-7172-2-0 ke tehat apne betay Amjaduddin Baig ke hamrah 1

Augst ko ba-azm Hajj rawana hui then, un ko tannafus ki shikayat ke baayis kal Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Special Officer Telangana Stat Haj Committee professor S.A. Shukoor ney Khadim ul Hujjaj ko un ki namaz e janaza aur tadfeen ke liye fauri karwaiya karne ki hidayat di. Baad maghrib namaz e janaza Haram Shareef mein ada ki gayi aur tadfeen Makkah Mukaramah ke qabrastaan ‘Sharyeen’ mein amal mein aayi.

Hajj se qabal yeh riyasat e Telangana ki paheli Azim Hajj hain jin ka intqaal huwa hai. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masiullah Khan aur Special Officer Prof. S.A. Shukoor ney marhoom ke lawahiqeen se baat ki aur un se izhaar taaziyat karte hue sabar Jameel ki talqeen ki. Hyderabad Emabrcation pointe se talluq rakhnay walay tamam Hujjaj karaam Makkah Muazzama mein apni apni rehayesh gaahon mein muqeem hain aur kheriyat se hain. Hajj Mission aur khadim ul Hujjaj se musalsal rabt rakha gaya hai aur Hujjaj karaam ki sehat wo slamati ke talluq se maloomat haasil ki jarahi hain. Un se qabal 20 Hindustani Aazmin e Hajj, Makkah Mukramah aur Madinah Munawwara mein intqaal kar gaye hain.
1073.title: Sultan Shahi, Hyderabad ki aik Azim Hajj ka Makkah Muazzama mein intqaal

news_detail: Delhi High Court ney budh ke din qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein yeh kehte hue ke bheek mangney ko na qabil taazeer qarar diya ke bheek mangney ke amal par jurmana aayed karne ki gunjayeshen ghair dastoori hai aur khatam kardainey ki mutaqazi hain. Kaarguzar Chief Justice Gita Mittal aur Justice C Hari Shankar par mushtamil ek bench ney kaha ke is faisla ka hatmi nateeja yeh hoga ke bheek mangney ka mobayyana irtekaab karne walay afraad ke khilaaf ‘Qanoon Bombay Insdaad Gadagari’ ke tehat qanooni karwai ke khtama ki mutaqazi hogi. Adalat ney kaha ke Dehli Hukoomat, maamla ke samaji o iqtisadi pahelu par tajruabaati tajzia ke baad jabri gadagari ke kisi racket ka khatema karne mutabadil qanoon saazi kar sakti hai. Bench ney kaha ke qanooni gunjaish jo gadagari ko aik jurm tasawwur karti hai aur zimni umoor jaisay is jurm se nimatney mein ohdedaron ke ikhtiyarat ki Dehli tak wusat ghair dastoori hai aur khtama ki mutaqazi hai. High Court ney 16

May ko istafsaar kya tha ke aaya kis terha us Mulk mein bheek maangna jurm ho sakta hai jahan hukoomat, giza aur mulazimat faraham karne se qassar ho. High Court mafaad aama ki do darkhwaston se nimat rahi thi jis mein istedua ki gait hi ke gadagari ko na qabil taazeer qarar diya jaye. Markazi Hukoomat ney kaha tha ke agar gurbat ki wajah se bheek mangi jaye to woh jurm nahi hona chahiye. Mumtaz samaji jahedkaar Harsh Mandar aur Karnika Suhwani ney mafaad e aamma ki darkhwast mein istedua ki thi ke gadagari ko na qabil istighasa qarara dainey ke ilawa qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein bheek maangne ke liye bunyaadi insani aur asaasi hauooq dyie jayen. Unhon ney shaher mein bhikaryon ke liye maujood tamam homes mein munasib giza aur tibbi saholaten faraham kiye jayen. Markazi hukoomat aur AAP Hukoomat ney 2016 mein Adalat ko bataya tha ke wizarat samaji insaaf gadagari ko na qabil taazeer qarar daine aur gadagron aur be gharon ki baazabadkaari ke liye aik mussavvida bill tayyar kia tha lekin qanoon mein tarmeem ki tajweez ko baad azan tark kardiya gaya. Mazkoorah qanoon ke mutabiq gadagari par pehli saza ki soorat mein 3 baras se zayed ki saza e qaid aur aiaada par 10 saal qaid ki saza ka hukum dainey ki gunjaish faraham karta hai. Fi al-waqt gadagari par koi markazi qanoon nahi hai aur beshtar riyaston ney Bombay Insdaad Gadagari Qanoon 1959 ko ikhtiyar kya hai ya phir is ki tarz par apna qanoon waza kya hai jo gadagari ko jurm grdanta hai.
1088.title: Qaumi dar-ul-hukoomat mein bheek maangna jurm nahi: High Court

news_detail: Hyderabad. University of Hyderabad ke M.A. saal awwal ke taalib ilm ne aaj University Campus mein mobayyana taur par khudkushi karli. Rajinish jo Utharkhand se talluq rkhtahe, ‘I’ Hostel ke apne kamrah mein latakta huwa paaya gaya. Talba ke mutabiq 20 sala Rajinish ne M.A. English Course mein dakhla liya tha taham do din qabal apna dakhla mobayyana taur par mansookh karliya aur jumeraat ko ghar wapas lotney wala tha. Is ne apne doston se kaha tha ke woh Campus mein apne aap ko dhaal nahi parha hai. Woh Hostel mein muqeem wahid taalib ilm tha aur kisi ko bhi room allot nahi kya gaya tha. Aik Taalib e Ilm ne bataya ke jab is ke dost kamrah mein puhanche to woh latakta huwa paaya gaya. Gachi Bowli Police ne post mortem ke liye laash ko Osmania General Hospital ko muntaqil kya. Police ne bataya ke usay koi khudkushi note dastyab nahi huwa, khudkushi ki wajohaat ka hanooz pata nahi chal saka. Aik muqadma darj karte hue tahqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya gaya. Androon aik mah University of Hyderabad mein Taalib e Ilm ki doosri khudkushi hai.
1103.title: University of Hyderabad mein Taalib e Ilm apne room mein latakta huwa paaya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahekuma sahet o tababat mazeed 6′ Wellness Centers’ Jaria mah shuru karne ke moaqqaf  mein hai. Mahekuma Siddipet, Kukatpally, Nalgonda, Adilabad, Nizamabad aur Mahboob Nagar mein naye Wellness Center shuru kar raha hai. Mahekuma ke ohdedaron ney bataya ke Siddpet, Kukatpally aur Nalgonda ke Wellness Center ke liye amlah ke taqarruraat ka amal pahelay hi mukammal hochuka hai. Unhon ney bataya ke maabaaqi Wellness Center ke liye amlah ke taqarrurat ka amal androon do yaum mukammal karliya jaye ga. Riyasti Hukoomat ney haal hi mein faisla kya ke Hyderabad mein waqay maujooda Wellness Center ke alawa Gandhi Government Hospital aur Osmania General Hospital mein bhi Wellness Center qaayim kiye jayen.
1116.title: Jaria mah mazeed 6 ‘Wellness Center’ ka aaghaz

news_detail: Hyderabad. National Investion Agency NIA ney Hyderabad ke 8 naujawanon se aaj mutawatir dosray din bhi apne daftar waqay Begumpet mein tafteesh jari rakhi aur samjha jata hai ke kal yani jumeraat ko bhi mazeed tehqeeq ki jaye gi. Bataya jata hai ke un 8 mushtaba naujawanon ke alawa mazeed 4 naujawanon se bhi mobayyana pooch gach ki. Jin naujawanon se tafteesh ki gayi woh Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shaheen Nagar aur Pahadi Shareef se talluq rakhtay hain. Hyderabadi naujawanon se pooch gach se aghz kardah natayij aur un naujawanon ke baarey mein abhi tak kuch bhi nahi kaha hai taham maloom huwa hai ke yeh jaanch hanoz paya takmeel ko nahi pohanchi hai chunkay un naujawanon ko jumaraat ke din bhi agency ke daftar pounchanay ki hadaayat di gayi hai. Zaraye ke bamawajib Agency ke ohdedar un naujawanon ke aik dosray ke saath rawabit ke sath sath Abu Dhabi ke ISIS Module ke sath un naujawanon ke taluqaat par tavajjuh markooz ki hai aur is silsila mein January 2016 mein aik muqadma darj kya gaya tha. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon ke gharon par kiye gaye dhaavon mein zabt kardah ashya ke baarey mein istefsaraat kiye gaye.
1136.title: Hyderabadi naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh teesray din bhi jari rahay gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jaria saal ka aakhri Suraj Gahen (Solar Eclips) 11 August ko waqay hoga taham Hindustan se is ka mushahida nahi kya jasakey ga. Chand khabar rasan idaron aur News Portals ke zareya Hindustan mein bhi Suraj Gahen ka nzarah kiye jane se mutaliq kiye gaye id-daa ke baayis aik uljhan paida hogayi hai magar haqeeqat yeh hai ke 11
August ko wuqoo pazeer honay wala juzwi Suraj Gahen, Hindustan mein qabil  e deed nahi hai. Is juzwi Suraj Gahen sirf mehdood ilaaqon mein hi mushahida kya ja sakta hai. 11

August ko waqay honay walay Suraj Gahen ka mushahida duniya ke chand hisson mein hi kya ja sakta hai jaisay Shumali o Mashriqi Asia, Europe mein Scandinavian region( Norway , Swedan Denmark aur Finland, Iceland aur Feurio jazair ) Greenland, Nunavat ke atraaf Canada ke barfani khitton aur Shumal Maghribi Hissa. Suraj Gahen is waqt runuma hota hai jab Suraj aur zameen ke darmain chaand haail hojata hai. Suraj Gahen umooman amavas ko aur chaand Gahen, punam ko waqay hota hai. 11

August ko waqay honay wala Suraj Gahen pehlay muqam par aalmi miyaari waqt ke mutabiq 08:02:08 bajey( Hyderabadi waqt ke mutabiq 13:32:08 yani daidh bajey din) ko shuru hoga, azam tareen Gahen 09:46:24 bajey(Hyderabad ke waqt ke mutabiq 15:16:24 yani sawa teen bajey seh pahar) hoga aur aakhri muqam par juzwi Suraj Gahen ka mushahida11:30:40 ( Hyderabad ke waqt ke lehaaz se 17:00:40 yani 05:00 bajey shaam) tak dekha jasakay ga. Aik baat qabil e zikar hai ke kabhi bhi Suraj Gahen tanha wuqoo pazeer nahi hota hai. Yeh hamesha Chaand Gahen ke do hafton qabal ya baad runuma hota hai. Umooman mutawatar do Gahen hotay hain aur kabhi kabhar aik hi Gahen mausam mein teen bhi waqay hotay hain. 11

August ke Suraj Gahen ke baad 5-6 January 2019 ko juzwi Suraj Gahen waqay hoga jo Asia aur Pacific khitta mein dekha jasakay ga jabkay 20-21 January ko kaamil Chaand Gahen hoga jo Europ, Asia, Africa , North America , Pacific, Indian Ocean aur Antartic mein dekha jasakay ga.
1148.title: Hafta ko Suraj Gahen magar Hindustan mein nzarah nahi kya jasakey ga

news_detail: Aap ko yeh jaan kar bada hi taajjub hoga ke duniya ke sab se badi aaabadi walay Mulk Cheen, aabadi mein khatir khuwa izafah na honey se pareshan hai. Jee haan yeh sach hai ke Cheen jahan aabadi par qaboo paney taqreeban 50 baras qabal sirf aik hi bacha paida karne ki ijazat di gayi thi, ab woh naujawanon ki tadaad mein kami se pareshan hai chunkay is Mulk ki aabadi mein nojawanon aur kam umar bachon ki tadaad ghatti hui hai. Yahi wajah hai ke Cheen ney apni aik bacha ki paidaiesh ki policy ko khatam karte hue do bachay paida karne walidain ko targheeb di hai magar is ke bhi mutawaqqa nataayij baraamad na honey par ab aisa lagta hai ke teen bachay paida karne walidain ko targheeb dainey ki koshish ki jaye gi. Duniya ke sab se gunjaan aabad Mulk Cheen mein ” One Child Policy” khatam karkay do bachon ki ijazat dainey ke bawajood aabadi mein kami dekhi ja rahi hai aur ab yeh qaumi masla bhi bantaa ja raha hai. Cheeni sarkar ney naujawanon se jaldi shadi kar ke khandan shuru karne ka mutaliba kar diya. Guzashta dinon Cheen ke aik sarkari akhbar mein surkhi lagai gayi ke ‘bachay ki paidaiesh khandani maamla hai aur qaumi masla bhi.’ Hukoomat awam ko ziyada bachay paida karne ke liye hauslaafzai karti nazar aa rahi hai. Aik aur Cheeni akhbar mein aik safha ka column chaapa gaya jis mein intibah jari kya gaya ke Cheen mein paidaiesh ki kam sharah mayeeshat aur muashra par asar andaaz hona shuru ho gayi hai. Column ke is tukde ney lakhoon mubasireen ki tawajah apni taraf mabzool karli. Cheen ki muqami samaji rabita Website Vibo par bhi is unwan se beshumaar post aur un par comments dekhe jarahay hain. Aisay comments ya hashtag jo hukoomat ke khilaaf jatay hain woh fauri gayab kar diye jatay hain taakay un se awam ki hausla shikni na ho. Yeh tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke Cheen Jaria saal ke avaakhr mein bachon ki paidaiesh par tahdeed ko mukammal tor par barkhast kardey ga .

Alawa azeen Cheen mein aik sarkari dak ticket bhi jari kya gaya hai jis mein bachon ki tadaad mein izafay ki hauslaafzai ki gayi hai. Aisa hi aik dak ticket 2016 mein jari kya gaya tha jis mein art work ke zariye walidain ko aik bachay ke bajaye do bachay paida karne ki hauslaafzai ki gayi thi. Cheeni Hukoomat ney aik aur dak ticket jari kya hai jis mein khinzeer ke aik jode ko is ke teen bachon ke sath dikhaya gaya hai. Cheen mein har saal aik naam se mansoob hota hai is terha 12 sala cheeni bruji (zodiac) alamati daira ka 12 waan saal ‘saal khinzeer’ kehlata hai jo is martaba 2018-19 mein waqay ho raha hai. Is ‘saal e khinzeer’ ki munasibat se Cheeni Hukoomat ney aik dak ticket jari kya hai jis mein khinzeer ke aik jode ko teen bachon ke sath dikha gaya. Isi terha 2016 mein jo ‘saal e bandar’ tha bandaron ke do bachon ko dikhaya gaya tha. Is dak ticket se yeh andaaza kya jaaney laga hai ke Cheen ab do bachay nahi balkay teen bachay paida karne ki hauslaafzai kere ga. Cheen ke qaumi idaara shumariyat ke mutabiq 2017 mein Cheen mein aik crore 72 lakh se zayed bachay paida hue jo ke 2016 ke muqaabla mein kam hain. Idaare ke mutabiq 2016 mein Mulk mein aik crore 78 lakh bachon ki paidaiesh hui thi. Cheen ki aabadi 1 arab 37 crore ke lag bhag hai aur woh aabadi ke aitbaar se ab bhi duniya ka sab se basa Mulk hai. Aabadi par qaboo paney ke liye Cheen ki hukoomat kayi dahaiyon se ‘One Child Policy’ ka sakhti se nifaaz karti chali aa rahi thi jisay 2015 mein marhala waar khatam karne ka faisla kiya gaya tha. Cheen ki Communist Hukoomat ney 1970 ki dahai ke aakhri barson mein badhti hui aabadi par qaboo paney ke liye ‘One Child Policy’ naafiz ki thi jis ki khilaaf warzi karne walay walidain ko bhaari jurmanon aur baaz auqaat mutawaqqa maaon ko zabardasti isqat e hamal ka saamna karna padta tha. Cheeni hukkaam ke mutabiq ‘One Child Policy’ ke khatima ka faisla Mulk mein umar raseedah afraad ki tadaad mein izafah aur qabil e kaar aabadi ki tadaad mein kami ke khatrah ke paishِ e nazar kya gaya tha. ‘Aik Bacha Policy’ ke khatima ke aaghaz ke aglay hi baras 2016 mein Cheen mein sharahِ paidaiesh mein numaya izafah record kya gaya tha lekin nai adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq 2017  mein yeh sharah dobarah kam hui hai taham mehakuma shumariyat ke adaad o shumaar ke bawajood Cheen ke sahet aur khandani mansoobah bandi ke qaumi commission ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke guzashta saal bhi Cheen mein shrhِ paidaiesh ‘mamool se khasi buland’ rahi hai.
1184.title: Cheen sharah paidaiesh mein kami se pareshan !

news_detail: New Delhi. Markazi kaabeena ney apni biwion ko bayak waqt teen Talaq dainay ke qusoor-waar paye jane walay mardon ko zamanat ki farahmi ki gunjaish shaamil karne ki manzoori dey di hai. Sarkari zaraye ke bamawajib is jurm ko na qabil zamanat baqi rakhnay ke bawajood mulzim ko zamanat ataa karne ki Magistrate ko ijazat ki gunjayesh faraham ki gayi hai. Talaq salasa Bill ka maqsad Mardon ki janib se yaklakht Talaq e Salasa dainay sadiiyon puranay fayl ko kalaadam qarar dena hai. Yaad rahay ke Talaq e Salasa par Supreme Court ki Hidayat par guzishta baras Lok Sabha ney Nikah par Muslim khawateen ke huqooq ke tahaffuz ke bill ko manzoori dey di thi taham Modi Hukoomat ke liye uos waqt Rajia Sabha mein is Bill ko Manzoor karwana kuch dushwaar tha chunkay BJP ki zair e qiyadat NDA Hukoomat ko Rajya Sabha mein khatir khawha aksariyat haasil nahi thi. Opposition ki janib se is bill mein tarameem ke liye kiye jane walay mutalibaat mein aik zamanat ki gunjayish ki farahmi bhi tha. Aaj manzoori di gayi tarameem mein yeh hai ke Magistrate ko zamanat manzoor karne ke ikhtiyaraat haasil ho jaienge. Mujawwiza Qanoon ka itlaaq sirf Talaq salasa jisay ”Talaq bidat” bhi kaha jata hai par hi hoga aur yeh mutasirah khatoon yeh haq bhi ataa kere ga ke woh apne aur apne zair e parwarish bachon ke liye munasib naan o nafqah talab karte hue Magistrate se rujoo ho. Alawa azeen khatoon apne na baaligh bachon ke haq hizanat bhi Magistrate se talab kar sakti hai. Is mujawwiza Qanoon ke mutabiq Talaq salasa dainay ki soorat mein mulzim shohar ko teen saal ki saza hogi. Dabaoo ko door karte hue markazi wazeer qanoon Mr. Ravi Shankar Prasad ney aaj kaha ‘kaabeena ney Talaq se mutaliq mujawaza qanoon mein tarameem ko manzoori di hai. Agar koi shaohar apni biwi ko yaklakht teen Talaq dey deta hai to waisi soorat mein FIR isi soorat mein qabil dast andazi (Police ko baghair parwana giraftari ke girftar karne ka haq ) jurm hoga jab mutasirah khatoon ya is ke khooni rishta daar ya un ke nikah se judey huwa koi shakhs shikayat darj karta hai .

Guzishta baras Supreme Court ney aik darkhwast ko darkhwast e aama ke taur par qubool karte hue aik tareekh saaz faisla sunaate hue bayak waqt di jane wali Talaq ko na sirf ghair Islami balkay ghair dastoori qarar dete hue kaladam qarar diya tha aur markazi hukoomat ko hidayat di thi ke is ziman mein munasib qanoon saazi ki jaye. Guzishta maah sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko aik maktoob rawana karte hue mutaliba kya tha ke Parliament ke manson ijlaas mein khawateen ko tahaffuz ke bil ki manzoori ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Aik din baad markazi wazeer qanoon mister rawi Shankar prasad naay maktoob ka jawab dete hue kaha tha ke khawateen ko tahaffuz, Talaq e salasa aur Nikah Halal se mutaliq bills ki manzoori ke liye aik dosray se haath milatay hue naye mamlaat kiye jayen.
1204.title: Talaq e Salasa: Magistrate ke zareya zamanat ki gunjayesh ko kaabeena ki manzoori

news_detail: Hyderabad. Yaum e Azadi tqarib ke paish e nazar aaj ilaqa Golconda mein Police ne ghar ghar talashi muhim shuru ki. Yaad rahay ke Golconda ke daman mein hi Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao 15

August ke mauqa par rasam parcham kushai anjaam dete hain. Is khusoos mein DCP West Zone ki nigraani mein aaj raat Golconda Police Station hudood mein ghar ghar talashi muhim chalaye gayi. Taqreeban 210 Police ki do teams ne Cordon and Search mein hissa liya. Is muhim mein 400 makanaat ki talashi li gayi. Police ne 22 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein le liya jin ke mujrim anaasir ke sath taluqaat they jabkay aik Rowdisheeter ko bhi hirasat mein liya gaya hai aur munasib dastawizaat na honay ki binaa par 44 gadiyon ko bhi zabt karliya. Additional DCP Mr. Venkateshwar ne Media se baat cheet karte hue bataya ke aman o amaan ki barqarari aur ghair samaji anasir ki sarkoobi ke liye ghar ghar talashi li gayi. Unhon ne kaha ke is muhim ke dsuraan Police ko muqami awaam ka bharpoor taawun haasil raha hai. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh muhim muqami awam ki khwahish aur rowdii anaasir ki srgarmyon se mutaliq shikayaat ki asaas par chalayi gayi.
1053.title: Jashnn e Azadi taqreeb ke paish e nazar Golconda mein ghar ghar talashi

news_detail: Makkah Mukrama ki Police ney bataya hai ke Hajj ke liye aeye ek shakhs ney zaireen ke hujoom se faida uthatay hue chhalang laga kar Baab e Kaaba par chadh dauda, taham Police ney usay wahan se utaar liya aur us ke khilaaf zurori qanooni karwai shuru kar di gayi hai. Police ka kehna hai ke Baab e Kaaba par chadhne wala shakhs nafsyaati mareez hai. Us ke Baab e Kaaba par chhalang laganay ke waqeye ki video ke barey mein baat karte hue Police ney kaha ke sehan Mutaaf mein zaireen ke ghayr-maa’mooli hujoom ke baais raat baara bujey 1 shakhs ney Mutaaf ki mamnooa hudood se agay badh kar Baab e Kaaba par chhalang lagai. Taham mauqa par mojood Security Ahelkaron ney usay neechay utaar liya. Police se baat karte hue is shakhs ney baab kaaba par chhalang laganay par moazrat ki aur kaha ke woh nafsyaati awariz ka shikaar hai.
1067.title: Nafsyaati mareez aazim Hajj ne ‘Baab e Kaaba’ par chhalang laga di

news_detail: Americi shahar Seattle ke Sea-Tac Airport se baghair ijazat uraya jaany wala Commercial tayyarah Katron island mein gir kar tabah ho gaya. media reports ke mutabiq tayyaray ki ‘chori’ ki report raat 8:30 bajey ke qareeb mili jabkay 15 minute baad hi Katron island ke qareeb se dhuwen ke baadal uthaty hue dekhe gaye. Do Americi ladaka tayyaray F15 ney bhi baghair ijazat udne walay tayyarah ka taqub shuru kya, taham is se qabal hi woh gir kar tabah ho gaya. Seen hawalay se Sea-Tac Airport ney apne twitter paighaam mein likha, ‘aik Airline ke mulazim ney baghair ijazat Sea-Tac airport se aik tayyarah udaya, jis mein koi musafir nahi tha, jo girkar tabah ho gaya hai jabkay Airport par mamool ka operation bahaal kar diya gaya hai.’ Fizaya Company ney apne twitter pegham mein likha, ‘hum Horizan Air Q 400 tayyarah ke baghair ijazat udaaye jaany ke waqeye se aagah hain, lekin is mein koi musafir nahi tha.’ Zaraye ke mutabiq hijacker ney Katron jazeeray par kayi chakkar lagaye aur mukhtalif kartab dekhata raha. Is douran tayyarah kabhi oopar kabhi neechay aata rhaa aur kabhi qalabazyan bhi lein jis ke baad woh Katron jazeeray mein hi gir kar tabah hogaya. Piaris County Police ke hukkaam ke mutabiq tayyarah ko aghwa karne wala Airlines ka mechanic tha jis ki umar 29 baras thi,Jo fiza mein tayyarah ke sath stunts karte hue ya phir jahaaz udane ke tareeqon se la ilmi ki bana par, jahaz ko crash kargaya. Ibtidayi tehqiqaat ke mutabiq tayyarah girnay ki wajah pilot ki jahaaz udaane ke tareeqon se la ilmi aur fiza mein kartab dikhnana ho sakti hai.
A 29-year-old airline mechanic stole the Horizon Air Q400 from Sea-Tac International Airport and crashed it near Ketron Island. There were no passengers aboard.
— Brendan Grainger (@Highflyermel)
1092.title: America mein hijack kya gaya tayyarah gir kar tabah

news_detail: Lahore: Tehreek Insaaf ke Chairman Imran Khan ki ahliya Bushra Bibi ke sabiq Shaohar Khawar Fareed Maneka ney doosri shadi karli. Pakistani zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq PTI Chairman Imran Khan ki teesri ahliya aur bahot jald Pakistan ki khatoon e awwal ka aizaz haasil karne wali Bushra Bibi ke sabiq Shaohar Khawar Maneka ney Samira Agha naami 40 sala khatoon se doosri shadi karli. Khawar Maneka ke qareebi saathi Lateef Khan ney un ki doosri shadi ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha ke Khawar Maneka ki shadi Lahore mein anjaam payi jis mein un ke doston, qareebi rishta daaron aur un ke bachon ney shirkat ki. Khawar Maneka Bushra Bibi ke sabiq shohar hain un dono ki Talaq ke baad Imran Khan ney 6 mah qabal Bushra Bibi se shadi ki thi. Wazeh rahay ke Bushra Bibi Imran Khan ki teesri biwi hain, is se qabal Imran Khan ney Jemima Gold Smith se paheli shadi ki thi jis se un ke do baite Qasim aur Suleman hain jab ke doosri shadi Reham Khan se ki thi taham yeh shadi sirf 10 mah hi chal saki baadazaan dono ke dramyan alehadgi hogayi.
1110.title: Imran Khan ki ahlia ke sabiq Shaohar ney doosri shadi karli

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer e dakhla Mr. Naini Narsimha Reddy ne Eid uz Zoha ke mauqa par safai suthrayi ke liye ‘Team Bakrid’ ki janib se guzishta do barson se jari muhim ki satayish ki aur kaha ke aayindah Baqr Eid ko hum Musalman aur Hindu bhai mil kar pur-aman aur shandaar andaaz mein manayeen ge aur apne apne ilaaqon mein safai suthrayi ka khaas khayaal rakhen ge. Baqr Eid ke mauqa par safai suthrayi ke liye mahkuma Police aur mehakma baldia ki janib se bhi bharpoor taawun kya jaye ga. Unhon ne is khusoos mein ‘Team Bakrid’ ki janib se chalaye jaane wali Tehreek ki satayish ki. Moulana Ilyas Shamsi khateeb Masjid Osmania Sultan Bazar o Sadar Reformers Front of India ne teen saal qabal Baqr Eid ke mauqa par zabihah janwaron ke ghair mustamla ajzaa (unused parts) ko phaink dyie jaane se phaelnay walay taffun aur is ke sehat aama par honay walay asraat ko mehsoos karte hue aik tehreek shuru ki thi aur awam se khwahish ki thi ke woh zabihah janwaron ke ghair mustamila aaza ko sadkon par phaink dainay ki bajaye inhen kachrah kundyon mein hi dalain. Unhon ne is khusoos mein Police aur GHMC ohdedaron se bhi rabita qayim karte hue Baqr Eid ke teen dinon ke douran safai ke liye khusoosi muhim chalanay par razamand karliya. Is khusoos mein moulana Ilyas Shamsi ne naujawan samaji kaarkunon ki aik team hi tashkeel dey di jo raza karana taur par Eid e Qurbaan ke mauqa par sargaram rehtay hain aur Police aur GHMC ohdedaron se taawun o ishtiraaq karte hue qurbani ke janwaron ki nakara ashya ki aajilaana nikasi ko yakeeni banatay hain. yeh team badhtay badhtay ab taqriban 500 samaji jahedkaaron ki aik mazboot team ban gayi hai jo shehar ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Baqr Eid ke mauqa par sargaram hotay hain. molana Ilyas shamsi ka kehna hai ke islam mein taharat/paaki ko badi ahmiyat di gayi hai. Isi terha aik Musalman kisi ke liye takleef dah nahi ho sakta, lekin hum ne jab yeh mehsoos kya ke hamari thodi si be ahteyati ki wajah se na sirf dosaron ko takleef pohanchti hai balkay hamari apni sahet par bhi is ke muzir asraat muratab hotay hain is liye hum ne Baqr Eid ke mauqa par yeh tehreek shuru karne ka faisla kya tha jis ke bohat hi musbit nataij bar aamad hue hain. Hamein sarkari mehakmon ki janib se bharpoor taawun haasil ho raha hai.
1123.title: Eid uz Zoha ke mauqa par paki ko yakeeni bananay ‘‘Team Bakrid’’ mutharik

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hussain Sagr Lake Police ne aik khatoon aur is ke 4 bachon ko jummay ke din khudkushi kar lenay se bchalya. Tafseelaat ke bamawajib khatoon apne bachon ke sath jheel ke paas mushtaba haalat mein ghoom rahi thi aur woh musalsal roye jarahi thi. Police ki aik gashti team ne is ke iraadon ko bhaanp letay hue Lake Police Station le aayi. tahqeeq par pata chala ke is ka shohar guzishta chand dinon se mamooli baton par jhagda kar raha tha aur mobayyana taur par najaaiz taluqaat rakhta hai. Khatoon ne bataya ke is ke shohar ne jumeraat ko bhi is se jhagda kya aur usay zad o kob bhi kya tha. Halaat se mayoos hokar khatoon apne 4 bachon samait khudkushi kar lenay ke iradah se Hussain Sagr pohanchi theen. Police ne is ki counseling ki aur phir mazeed counseling ke liye bharosa center bhaij diya.
1143.title: Hyderabad Lake Police ne khudkushi karne wali khatoon aur 4 bachon ko bchalya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hindustan ki jad-o-jehad aazadi mein deegar aqwam ke muqaable Musalmanoon ka bhi barabar ka role raha hai. Aazadi ke 71 baras guzar jaaney ke baad Musalmanoon se hubb ul-watni ki sanad maangna jahalat aur be waqoofi hai. Ab waqt agaya hai ke tamam Hindustani is terha ki jahalat ke khilaaf uth khaday hon. Naamwar moarriq o maahir e taleem Captain L Pandu Ranga Reddy ney aaj Salaar e Millat Auditorium Urdu Maskan Khilwat mein Razakarana tanzeemon Seva aur Chishti Foundation Hyderabad ke zair e ihtimaam ”jad-o-jehad Aazadi hind mein Musalmanoon ka role” unwan par munaqidah Seminar se maheman khusoosi khitaab karte hue un khayalat ka izhaar kya. Seminar ki sadarat janab syed Haider Ali Engineer Sadar Seva ney ki. Captain L. Pandu Ranga Reddy ney kaha ke Hindustan ki Aazadi mein Hyderabadion ka bhi bohat bada role hai. 1857 mein Bartania ki Residency par hamla karne walay aalim e deen Moulvi Alaauddin aur Pathan Turrebaaz Khan thaiy, jis par unhen kala pani ki saza di gayi thi. Kothi College ke rubaroo sadak ko Turrebaaz  Khan se mausoom kya gaya lekin aaj koi bhi un ka naam nahi laita. ‘Jai Hind’ ka naara Subhash Chandra Bose ke saathi Hasan Safrani ney diya tha. Tirange ki tayyari ka sehra P. Venkaiah ko diya jata hai jo ke sara sar ghalat hai. Tiranga jhanday ka design Surayya Tayyab Jee ney tayyar kya tha yeh tamam Hyderabadi thaiy. Sardar Nanak Singh Nashtar Sadar International Sikh Center for Interfaith Relations ney apne khitaab mein kaha ke Hindustan mein Islam talwar ki bunyaad par nahi phela balkay buzurgon ke pyar o mohabbat ki bunyaad par deen ko farogh haasil huwa, yahan tak ke Golden Temple Amritsar ki jagah aur Nanded ke Grudwarah ki jagah bhi Musalmanoon ney atiyah di thi, Grudwarah ke liye araazi ki qeemat bhi lena Musalman malkin ney gawara nahi kya tha. Hyderabad riyasat par taqreeban 500 saal tak Musalman hukumaran rahay, unhon ney awaam ke dilon par hukoomat ki. Taqseem e Hind ke zimma daar Mohammad Ali Jinah nahi thay woh sirf Aazadi mein Musalmanoon ko barabar ka haq chahtay thay un ki daleel yeh thi ke woh aqliat ko aksariyat ka ghulam nahi banana chahtay, ab Dalai Lama ney khud kaha ke Nehru taqseem e Hind ke zimma daar thay, is se yeh baat saabit hoti hai ke Jinah Mulk ki taqseem ke zimma daar thay. Janab Syed Ahmed Pasha Quadri Motammad e Umomi Majlis o Rukn Assembly Charminar ney kaha ke Aazadi ki jad-o-jehad mein Musalmanoon ki qurbanion se nai nasal ko waaqif karwana zarori hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Urdu zabaan ney Aazadi ki tehreek mein aik jaan daal di thi, ‘Inquilab Zindabad’ ke naara se Angrezon ko sakht pareshani thi. Ulma karaam Tehreek Aazadi ke moujjid thaiy. Hindustan tamam mazahab ke maanne walon ka aik guldasta hai jahan tamam pyar wo mohabbat se rehtay hain lekin baaz firqa parast taqaten hamein aapas mein taqseem karna chahti hain, hamein apne Hindustani honey par fakhr hai. Unhon ney kaha ke zulm ke sath hukmarani nahi ki ja sakti. malik mein tamam ke sath masawi insaaf hoga to Mulk mazeed taraqqi kere ga. Dig Vijay Jain advocate (Jain Singh Hyderabad) ney kaha ke Hindustan, Sri Ram, Gautam Budh aur Khwaja Ghareeb Nawaz

ki sarzamen hai lekin bad qismati se yahan firqa parast taqaten janam le kar baaz sawal utha rahi hain. Jad-o-jehad Aazadi mein Musalmanoon ke role ko janney ke liye firqa paraston ki sanad ki zaroorat nahi hai. Dig Vijay Jain ney kaha ke Gandhi ji ki satiya girah tehreek ke zimmadaar Battak Miyan Ansari thaiy. Angrezon ke khilaaf Gandhi Ji ki tehreek adam taawun par Kerala se 2337 Musalmanoon ney apni jaanun ka nazrana paish kiya tha. Sarhadi Gandhi Khan Abdul Gaffar Khan ki aawaz par Peshawar ke qissa khawani bazaar mein taqreeban 200 Pathanon ney apni jaanen watan ke liye qurbaan kar di theen. Kakuri train waqea mein teen mujahideen ko kaala paani ki saza di gayi thi jin mein Ashfaqullah Khan Shaheed shaamil thay. Mulk ki kayi riyaston ke rajaaon Rani Laxmi Bai, Nana Bhai Peshwa aur Maha Rana Partab ke sipah salaar Musalman thaiy. Aazadi ki pehli jung Palasi mein Siraj ud Dowla ney Angrezon se muqaabla kya. Digvijay Jain ney kaha ke naiy Bharat ki taamer ke liye tamam Hindustanyon ko mil kar jad-o-jehad karne ki zaroorat hai. Mohtarama Sudha Jain Miss India Asia Pacific 2017-18 ney kaha ke Aazadi ki ladai mein khawateen bilkhushoos Muslim khawateen bhi shaamil theen.
