Begum Hazrat Mahel ki qurbanion ko faramosh nahi kiya ja sakta. Unhon ney apne amal, kirdaar aur shairi ke zareya Aazadi ke matwalon mein hararat jagayee. Abadi Bano Begum jinhein B amma ke naam se bhi jana jata hai inhen apne bachon ke sath Aazadi ka naara laganey par pakad liya gaya tha, woh bapardah khatoon honey ke bawajood jad-o-jehad Aazadi mein shareek theen. Moulana Syed Mohammad Ali Quadri Al-Hashmi  Mumshad Pasha Sadar markazi Majlis Qadriah ney kaha ke Delhi ki Jamia Masjid se allama Fazl Haq Khairabadi ney sab se pehlay Angrezon ke khilaaf jehaad ka Fatwa jari kya jis ke baad 1857 ki paheli Jung e Aazadi ka waqea paish aaya. Is ke baad jitni bhi tahriken bapaa huien un mein ulama aur mashaiykh paish paish thay. Convenor seminar janab Shujauddin Ifteqari Haqqani Pasha Sadar Chishti Foundation wo Naib Sadar Seva ney khair maqdami khitaab kya aur karwai chalaye. Aakhir mein janab Mohammad Mastan Secretary Seva ney shukriya ada kya. Nawab Abrarullah Khazin Seva wo General Secretary Chishti Foundation, janab Mohammad Makhdum Ali Khan secretary M K Education Society aur Siraj Mohiuddin Ifteqari Aadil Pasha Secretary Chishti Foundation ney intizamaat ki nigrani ki aur mehmanon ka khair maqddam kya. Saint Sulaiman School ki talibaat ney ibtida mein qaumi geet aur aakhir mein qaumi taranah paish kya.
1157.title: Musalmanoon se hubb ul-watni ki sanad maangna jahalat aur be waqoofi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tahqiqati Agency National Investigation Agency (NIA) ki markazi team jo guzashta aik hafta se Hyderabad mein camp kiye hue hai, January 2016 mein darj muqadma ke silsila mein apni tahaqeeq o tafteesh taqreeban mukammal karli hai aur tawaqqa hai ke Agency aaj ya kal is case ki peshraft ke baaray mein jaankaari deiy gi. Yaad rahay ke NIA ne January 2016 mein Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) ke saath taluqaat qaayim karne aur dehshat gardanah kaarwaiyon mein mulawis honay ke ilzamaat ke tehat Mulk ke chand naujawanon ke khilaaf Delhi mein aik muqadma darj kya tha aur is case ke silsila mein jari apni tehqiqaat ko wusat dete hue mazeed tafteesh ke liye 6

August ko Hyderabad mein mukhtalif muqamat par chaapay maaray thaiy. Aisay hi aik chhapa Rachakonda Police Comssionarate mein Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar ke aik makaan par mara gaya tha aur aik 19 sala mushtaba naujawan se din bhar pooch gach ki gayi thi. Ghair musaddeqa zaraye ke mutabiq isi terha shaher ke deegar muqamat se bhi kuch naujawanon se pooch gach ki gayi thi. Un tamam naujawanon ko agarchay hirasat mein nahi liya gaya tha taham unhen mazkoorah muqaddama ke silsila mein jari chhaan been ke silsila mein NIA Branch Office waqay Begumpet haazir honay ki hadaayat di gayi thi, jahan un naujawanon se musalsal 5 dinon tak tafteesh ki jati rahi hai aur un ke mulawis honay ke baaray mein haqayiq ka pata chalanay ki koshish ki jati rahi hai. Maaloom huwa hai ke NIA ne apni taheqiqaat mukammal karli hai aur bataya jata hai ke Agency iss nateeja par pahonchi hai ke baadi-un-nazr mein un mushtaba naujawanon ke khilaaf dehshat gardanah sargarmion mein mulawis honay ke shawahid paye jatay hain. Zaraye se yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke jin naujawanon se guzishta 5 dinon se tafteesh ki jarahi thi unhen rozana is hidayet ke sath shaam ko apne ghar jaaney ki ijazat di jarahi thi ke woh dosray din Agency ki shaakh ke daftar par haazir hon lekin hafta ke din kuch naujawanon ko ghar jaaney nahi diya gaya aur un ke arkaan khandan se kaha gaya ke woh unhen chod kar chalay jayen, jis se yeh andaza kya ja sakta hai ke Agency ke ohdedaron ki Hyderabad camp ke douran ki gayi tahaqeeq o tafteesh aakhri marhala mein daakhil hochuki hai. Samgha jata hai ke itwaar ke din naujawanon ko hirasat mein lainay ki qanooni karwaiya mukammal karli jayen gi aur un naujawanon ko peer ke din adalat mein paish karte hue un ka remand haasil karliya jaye ga. Yeh bhi tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke Agency ki janib se Hyderabad camp ke douran ki gayi tahaqeeq o tafteesh aur un naujawanon ke mulawis honay aur un ki giraftari ke baaray mein aagah kiya jaye ga. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ko mushtaba naujawanon ke gharron par kiye gaye chapon mein kuch aisi ashya dastyab hui hain jin se un naujawanon ke dehshat gardanah sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke shubhat ko taqwiyat pahunchti hai. Yeh wisooq se nahi kaha ja sakta ke NIA ne aakhir kitney naujawanon se pooch gach ki hai aur un mein se kitney naujawanon ke khilaaf baadi-un-nazr mein jurm saabit hota hai aur NIA ki tehqiqaat hatmi marhala daakhil hogayi hai ya phir un naujawanon se ki gayi tafteesh aur ab tak ki tahaqeeq se koi naya pehlu samnay aata hai.
1172.title: Hyderabadi naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh aakhri marhala mein daakhil?!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency National Investigation Agency ( nia ) ne dehshat gardi ki sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar, Hyderabad ke aik 19 sala naujawan Abdul Qadeer ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Yaad rahay ke NIA ki aik khusoosi team jo Delhi se January 2016 mein Agency ki janib se darj aik case ki tehqiqaat ke ziman mein yhan aayi hui thi, 6

August ko Abdul Qadeer ke makaan waqay Shah Hills, shaheen nagar mein chhapa mara tha aur Abdul Qadeer sameit ghar ke afraad se din bhar pooch gach ki thi. Ghar ki talashi ke dauran NIA ke ohdedaron ne kuch ashya zabt ki theen jin ke baaray mein khayaal kya jata hai ke woh dehshat grdanah sargarmion ko anjaam dainay istemaal hoti hain. Agency ne ghar se kuch qabil aitraaz mawaad bhi zabt kya tha. NIA ne is naujawan se musalsal 5 dinon tak apni tafteesh jari rakhi. Unhen din bhar Agency ke Branch Office waqay Begumpet par rozana talab kya jata raha tha aur din bhar tafteesh karne ke baad dosray din dobarah daftar pounchanay ki Hadayat ke sath wapas lota diya jata tha taham hafta 11

August ko usay ghar jaaney ki ijazat nahi di gayi aur un ke waalid se kaha gaya ke woh tanha wapas lout jayen. Maloom huwa hai ke aaj subah Abdul Qadeer ke ghar walon ko agency ke ahdidaro n ne ittila di ke un ke bacha ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. Samjha jata hai ke peer ko kal NIA ki khusoosi adalat mein paish kya jaye ga. Abhi tak Agency ki janib se is naujawan ko giraftar karliye jaaney ki ittila nahi di gayi hai aur na hi yeh maaloom ho saka hai ke sirf Abdul Qadeer ko hi hirasat mein le liya gaya hai ya phir dosray nojawanon ko bhi hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. samjha ja raha tha ke NIA ne hyderabad mein camp ke douran 5 dinon tak apni tehqiqaat ko samaitt diya hai aur kisi bhi waqt hyderabad mein ki gayi karwaiyon ke baaray mein media ko aagah kere gi.
1192.title: NIA ki janib se shaheen nagar ka Abdul Qadeer girftar?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency “National Investigation Agency (NIA)” ne dehshat gardi ki sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein 24 sala Mohammad Abdullah Basit saakin Hafiz Baba Nagar aur 19 sala naujawan Abdul Quadeer saakin Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar, Hyderabad ko girftar karliya hai. NIA ne un do naujawanon ki giraftari ki tauseeq kar di hai. Iss khusoos mein NIA ke jari kardah press note mein bataya gaya hai ke Agency ne 28

January 2016 ko Police Station NIA, New Delhi mein aik muqadma Sheikh Azher ul Islam, Mohammad Farhan Sheikh aur Adnan Hasn aur un ke naamaloom sathiyon ke khilaaf ISIS s se taluqaat rakhnay aur ISIS s ki taraf se Hindustani Muslim naujawanon ki nishandahi karne, targheeb dainay, intahaa pasand bananay, taqarrur karne aur tarbiyat dainay ke ilzamaat par taazirat e Hind ki dafaa 120B aur qanoon insidaad ghair qanooni sargarmian 1967 ki daf-aat 18, 18A & 18B ke tehat aik muqadma darj kya gaya tha. NIA ne tehqiqaat ki takmeel par 25 July 2016 ko chargesheet paish kar di thi. Trial ke douran do mulzimeen Azhar ul Islam aur Mohammad Farhan Sheikh ko qusoor waar pakar 7 saal ki qaid ki saza di gayi jabkay Adnan Hasan ke khilaaf trayil jari hai. NIA ke bamawajib deegar mulzimeen ke khilaaf mazeed tehqiqaat jari theen, mazeed tehqiqaat mein yeh inkishaaf huwa ke Hyderabad ka saakin Abdullah Basit jo Adnan Hasan se rabita mein raha tha woh aur is ke kuch saathi mustaqil aik dosray se rabita mein thay aur ISIS s ki sargarmion ko hndstan mein phelanay saazish kar rahay thay. Iss silsila mein 6

August ko Hyderabad ke 7 muqamat par chaapay maaray gay aur jurm mein mulawis honay ke kaseer shawahid dastyab hue. Zabt shuda ashya ko si f s ail Hyderabad ko jaanch ke liye bhaij diya gaya hai. Ab tak ki gayi ibtidayi pooch gach par yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke Mohammad Abdul Qadeer aur deegar saathi Hindstan mein dehshat grdanh sargarmia anjaam dainay ka iradah rakhtay thay.
1206.title: NIA ki janib se 2 Hyderabadi naujawanon ki giraftari ki tauseeq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandar Shekar Rao ki bahen Leelamma ka aaj yahan aik khangi Hospital mein dehaant hogaya, jis ke baayes woh apne daura Dehli ko mukhtasir karte hue zareya tayyarah 1:00 bajay din ghar lout gaye. Leelamma jo kuch arsa se Yashoda Hospital mein zair e ilaaj theen jahan unhon nay aakhri saans len. Un ki laash un ki rehaishgaah muntaqil kar di gayeen. Mr. K Chandar Shekar Rao ki ahliya Shoba, Wazeer Aabpaashi Mr. Harish Rao aur khandan ke deegar afraad Hospital pahonch kar khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya. Wazeer Information Technology wo Baldi Nazam o Nasq Mr. K. T. Rama Rao jo Rajanna Sircila  zila ke daura par they apna programme multawi karte hue ghar pahonch gaye. Zila Sircila  mein Yellareddypait mandal ke mauza Padira ki Leelamma ke pasmaandgaan mein shohar Shankar Rao aur do farzand Kantha Rao aur Madhusudan Rao hain. Chief Minister ki aik aur bahen ka guzashta February mein dehaant hogaya tha.
1050.title: Chief Minister Telangana ki bahen chal baseen

news_detail: Nizamabad. Telangana Jana Samithi (TJS) ke sarbarah Professor Kodandaram ko peer ke din yahan Bhiknoor Toll Gate par Police ne is waqt hirasat mein le liya jab woh police ki janib se hirasat mein liye jarahay kisanon se mulaqaat karna chahtay they. Police ne unhen mutala kya ke zila mein qanoon zaabta e foujdaari ki dafaa 144 ko nafiz kardiya gaya hai aur unhen kisanon se mulaqaat karne ki ijazat nahi hai. Yahan yeh zikar karna zaroori hai ke aabpaashi ke liye SRPS ke pani ki ijrayi ke liye kisanon ka mutalba shadeed ehtijaj mein tabdeel hogaya. Armoor Sub division ke apne mawaziaat mein kisanon ke ehtijaj ke baayis Police ne dafaa 144 nafiz kar diya hai. Police jamiat ko saaray zila mein taiynaat kardiya gaya hai. Subah mein Professor Kodandaram ne Gun Park Hyderabad mein alahdah Telangana riyasat ke muhim jo Professor Jai Shankar ko un ki barsi ke mauqa par khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya.Is mauqa par khitaab karte hue Prof.Kodandaram ne ProfJai Shankar ke alfaaz duhraey ke ‘awam ko alhadah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ke baad bhi muhim chalana padega.’ Unhon ne kaha ke Tehreek Telangana ke samraat sab tak pohanchanay professor jiye Shankar ke maqsad ko poora karne ke liye har aik ko Tahrikaat chalana padega. Unhon ne kaha ke professor Jai Shankar ne Tehreek Telangana mein sanjeedgi aur jazba ke tehat hissa liya. Is se qabal TJS ke daftar mein Professor Jai Shankar ke portrait ko phoolmaala paish karkay khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya
1070.title: Prof Kodandaram ki Bhiknoor Toll Gate par giraftari

news_detail: Lashkar e Toiba ke mushtaba Operative Habib ur Rehman ki Delhi Airport par giraftari ke dosray din qaumi tehqiqati agency ‘National Investigation Agency (NIA)’ ney aaj Hyderabad ke puranay shehar mein saat maqamat par tosiyee dhave kiye. Un dhaavon ke talluq se mutazaad daawe kiye jatay rahay hain. Khabar rasan idaron ke mutabiq yeh dhaave subah 5:00 bajey se shaam 5:00 bajey tak jari rahay. Bataya jata hai ke yeh dhaave ISIS se talluq ke silsila mein 2016 ke aik muqadma mein kiye gay hain. ND Tv ke mutabiq Agency ke tarjuman ney kaha ke Hyderabad mein Hyderabad Police Commissionerate aur Rachakonda Police Commissionerate mein mushtaba afraad ke makanaat par dhaavon ke douran Agency ney digital alaat aur ishtial angaiz mawaad zabt kya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke mazeed tehqiqaat jari hain aur woh mazeed kuch batanay se inkaar kardiya. NIA ney 2016 case mein apni tehqiqaat mukammal karli hai aur 11 afraad ke khilaaf chargesheet paish kar di hai jin mein teen mafroor hain. Is muqadma mein ilzaam hai ke kuch naujawanon ney Mulk ke khilaaf saazish karte hue dehshatgard sargarmion ko anjaam dainay mein mulawis rahay hain. Mumbai Mirror ke mutabiq yaum e Azadi se qabal un dhaavon ko kaafi ahmiyat di jarahi hai. Un chapon mein bataya jata hai ke Dehli aur Gujarat ki NIA teams ney hissa liya. Ghair musadeqa it-tila-aat ke mutabiq NIA ney 6 afraad ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Aik aur zaraye ke bamawajib NIA ney 2016 mein Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) naami tanzeem se talluq rakhnay wali aik touli ke 9 afraad ko girftar kya tha jabkay teen ko mafroor bataya gaya tha. NIA ki teames do din qabl hi Hyderabad pahonch gayi then, 2016 ke case ke silsila mein do mushtaba afraad ka pata chalanay Telangana Police ka taawun haasil kya tha. Telangana Police ke ohdedaron ney kaha ke hum ko bataya gaya ke yeh 2 afraad mazhab se mutaliq shiddat pasand rawish ikhtiyar karliye they. NIA ohdedaron ney un se tafteesh ki taham bazabta taur par hanooz nahi bataya gaya ke aaya baadi un nazr mein un ke khilaaf koi muqadama banta hai ya nahi.

Rachakonda Police Commissionerate ke Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar Ranga Reddy District ke aik makaan par bhi aaj NIA ke ohdedaron ney dhawa kya aur Abdul Quddus (54) aur un ke farzand Abdul Qadeer (19) se khandan ke deegar afraad ke sath pooch gach ki. NIA ki team subah 5:00 bajey se shaam 5:00 bajey tak tafteesh karti rahi aur aik Laptop aur khandan ke afraad khandan ke cell phones zabt karliye aur un se kaha ke mazeed tafteesh ke liye woh kal yani 7

August ko subah NIA ke daftar waqay Begumpet mein haazir hon. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ney makhsoos IP address aur Cell Phone numbers ke sath mutawatir Pakistan se rabita ki bunyaad par nazar rakhna shuru ki thi aur aaj NIA ki aik team yahan pahonch gayi. Tafteesh ke douran pata chala ke Abdul Quddus ke rishtedaar Pakistan ke Hyderabad aur Sindh ke Saqar zila mein rehtay hain. Abdul Quddus apne farzand ke sath apne rishtaedaaron se musalsal baat cheet kya karte they. Taweel tafteesh ke baad NIA ke ohdedaron ney Abdul Quddus aur in ke farzand ko yeh hidaayat dete hue chhodh diya ke woh kal Agency ke daftar puhanche. Aik ittila yeh bhi mil rahi hai ke ta haal kisi ki girftari amal mein nahi aayi hai. Abdul Qadeer ney bataya ke un se poocha gaya ke aaya woh un ke betay ki sar garmion se waaqif hain to unhon ney bataya ke un ka beta deen ki tableegh karta hai, woh nahi jantay ke woh kin se milta hai aur kya kuch karta hai. Unhon ney bataya ke deen ki tableegh se mutaliq kuch pamphlets ko bhi zabt kya gaya hai.
1082.title: Hyderabad mein NIA ke chaapay

news_detail: Hyderabad. (press note) Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union  (TUWJU) ki riyasati committee ka aik ahem ijlaas itwaar ko Noble Hall, Mustafa Towers, Lakdi ka pul mein munaqqid huwa jis mein Union ki Hyderabad Unit ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi. Tanzeem ke ohdedaron aur arkaan ki mutafiqa raaye se Senior sihafi janab Sajjad ul Hasnain ko Hyderabad unit ka Sadar muntakhib kya gaya jabkay janab Mohammad Shujauddin Ifteqari ka moutemad e Umoomi (Secretary General) ke taur par intikhab amal mein aaya. Isi terha Sayyad Yahya Pasha Quadri, Mohammad Saghiruddin, Mohammad Asif Ali aur Mohammad Hussamuddin ko Nayeb Sudoor muntakhib kya gaya. Organising  Secretaries ke taur par Khaleel Farhad, Anees ur Rahman, Syed Baqar Hussain, Mohammad Subhan, Nawab Abrar aur Mohammad Wajidullah Khan ko muntakhib kya gaya. Mohammad Abdul Mohsin, Mustafa Mohsin, Mohammad Manzoor aur Mohsin Sheikh ka Secretaries ki hesiyat se intikhab kya gaya. Mohammad Muttabe Ali Khan ko Khazin muqarrar kya gaya jabkay Mohammad Rafi , Mohammad Abdul Azeem, Mohammad Abdul Zameer, Mohammad Abdul Akram, Syed Abrar aur Mohammad Akram ko ba-haisyiat Arkaan e Amila muntakhib kya gaya. Qabal azeen ijlaas se khitaab karte hue Union ke sarparast Mohammad Sajid Meraj ne kaha kay jab tak Urdu sihafion mein ittehaad o ittafaq qayim nahi hota aur Urdu sihafi apni salahiyaton o taaqat ka muzahira nahi karte, unhen insaaf milnay wala nahi hai. Unhon ne Telugu sahafion ke masawi Urdu sahafion ko bhi sarkari mara-aat aur sahulaton ke liye jad-o-jehad jari rakhnay ka elaan kya aur Union ke tamam arkaan ko mahswara diya ke woh Tanzeem ko mazboot bananay ke liye apna apna rule sargarmi ke sath ada karen. Unhon ne kaha kay Union ki Hyderabad unit ki tashkeel ke sath hi tanzeem ki taaqat mein mazeed izafah hojagaya hai. Ab yeh Tanzeem mazeed sargarmi ke sath Urdu sihafion ko un ka haq dilanay ke liye apni jad-o-jehad ko agay badhayegi. Unhon ne aayindah mah Union ka Generalbody ijlaas munaqqid karte hue Urdu sihafion ke huqooq ke liye mukhtalif mhazon par taizi ke sath iqdamaat roba e amal laane ka bhi elaan kya. Union ke riyasti Sadar Ather Moin ne apne khitaab mein kaha ke hamein mil jul kar agay badhna hai. Union mein is ke har aik rukn ki ahmiyat hai. Kisi bhi rukn ke sath kahin bhi koi na-insafi hoti hai to Union na sirf is ke khilaaf aawaz uthaayegi balkay apne rukn ko insaaf dilanay ke liye har mumkin qadam bhi uthaayegi. Riyasti Sadar ne bhi tamam Urdu sihafion ke mabain ittehaad o ittefaq ko laazmi qarar diya aur kaha ke ittehaad ke baghair koi bhi maqsad haasil nahi kiya ja sakta. Union ke riyasati Secretary General Mohammad Layeeq , Naib Sudoor Mohammad Abdul Hakeem, Mohammad Abdur Rawoof Aazmi aur Secretary Mohammad Rafeeq Patel ne bhi khitaab kya. Ijlaas mein tanzeem ko har satah par mustahkam bananay ke liye iqdamaat par ghaur o khouz kya gaya. Arkaan ne apni raye se ohdedaron ko waaqif karaya aur mukhtalif masayel se aagah bhi kya. Un masayel ki yaksoi ke liye jald iqdamaat ka faisla bhi kya gaya. Ijlaas mein riyasti Khazin Syed Wajid Hussaini, Arkaan Amila aur Union ke deegar ohdedaaron ne shirkat ki. Aakhir mein Hyderabad unit ke nau muntakhib ohdedaron ko mubarkbad paish ki gayi.
1098.title: TUWJU Hyderabad Unit ki tashkeel

news_detail: Film Nagar, Banjara Hills mein peer ki shab aik khatoon ney apne shohar ka mobayyana qatal kardiya. Mahlook ki shanakht Jagan khangi mulazim ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Woh haalat nasha mein apne ghar pahonch kar biwi se jhagdnay laga. khatoon ney gussa mein aakar gala ghoontnay se qabal machar kash spray ko apne shohar ke mun mein undail diya jis ki wajah se woh saans nahi le paaya. Postmartem ke liye laash ko Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Khatoon ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. Khatoon ke khilaaf qatal ka muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Police mazeed tehqiqaat kar rahi hai.
1111.title: Khatoon ney shohar ke mun mein machar kash spray undailkar halaak kardiya Hyderabad.

news_detail: Hyderabad- Commissioner Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha hai ke Aazmin e Hajj, Makkah Muazzama mein riyasat Telangana bilkhushoos Hyderabad ki Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ki barqarari aur yahan rehne walay awam ke khushhali ke liye’ aur khaas taur par nai nasal ki munasib tarbiyat’ rahnumai aur Falah o behbood ke liye khusoosi dua karen. Unhon ney kaha ke Aazmin ko vidaa karna un ki khush naseebi hai’ Aazmin e Hajj khush naseeb hain ke unhen Allah taala ney apne darbaar mein haazri ke liye talab kya hai. Aaj Haj House mein Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko jhandi dikha kar vidaa karte hue unhon ney in khayalat ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke aazmin ki madad aur khidmat karne walay bhi khush naseeb hain. Commissioner Police ney Aazmin e Hajj ko mahswara diya ke woh tamam shanakhti dastawizaat hamesha apne sath rakhen. unhon ney kaha ke woh muqamat Muqaddisa mein apne Mulk aur Shaher ke safeer hain is liye wahan discipline aur safai ka khaas khayaal rakhen. Unhon ney Aazmin e Hajj se khwahish ki ke woh Makkah Muazzama mein jitna bhi waqt guzray woh duaon aur ebadaat karte rahen kyunkay dua mein aisi taaqat hai jis se insaan ki zindagi mein aik tabdeeli aati hai. Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha ke adai Hajj ke baad insaan mein aik numayaan tabdeeli aati hai lehaza Hajj se wapsi ke baad woh aisa kuch Karen ke hamaray muashra mein aik musbit tabdeeli aeye aur hamari nai nasal mein achi aadaten aur salahiyaten parwaan chadhein. Commissioner ney kaha ke agar aik fard hi kisi ke haq mein dua kardey to badi baat hoti hai aaj yahan itney saaray log hain aur un ki duayen lena un ki khush qismati hai. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC ney Aazmin se kaha woh Harmain Sharifain mein Facebook’ Whatsapp waghera ke istemaal se guraiz karen aur selfie lainey par tavajja nah den’ jo waqt mil raha hai usay ibadton ke zareya Allah aur Allah ke rasool ko raazi karne ki koshish karte rahen. Sadarnasheen Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Maseehullah Khan ney kaha ke Aazmin e Hajj Allah ke maheman hain aur un ki khidmat har musalman ka farz aur baayis khush naseebi hai, unhon ney Aazmin se khwahish ki ke woh aik farz ki takmeel ke liye jarahay hain is liye woh apna tamam waqt ibadaat mein sarf karen. Special Officer Prof. S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke Telangana State Hajj Committee Aazmin e Hajj ki rawaangi ke alawa un ki wapsi aur Saudi Arab mein un ke qiyam ke douran un ki har terha se madad aur rahnumai ke intizamaat karti hai. Maulana hafiz Mohammad Osman Naqshbandi Imam Makkah Masjid ne Hujjaj karaam ko baaz zaroori ahteyati baton se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke woh tavajja aur inhimak ke sath manasik Hajj ada karen. Hyderabad se ab tak Hujjaj karaam ke jumla 12 qaafilon ke zareye 3, 600 Aazmin, Makkah Mukramah pahonch gaye. Aaj 12 wein qaafila ke zareye 300 Aazmin rawana hue, jin ki flayit ney theek 4:00 bajay udaan bhari. Is mauqa par Director mehakuma Aqliati Bahbood janab Shahnawaz Qasim,  arkaan Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed,  janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Imtiyaz Khan, janab Arifuddin ke alawa DCP Central Zone Mr. Vishwa Prasad DCP Traffic Mr. Babo Rau, Additional DCp Mr. Mohammad Taajuddin,  Assistant Secretary Hajj Committee janab Irfan Shareef aur dosray maujood thaiy. Budh 8
August ko do qaafilon ke zareye 600 Aazmin barahJeddah, Makkah Muazzama rawana honge. Pahela qaafila 6:00 bajay shaam aur dosra qaafila 10:00 bajay shab parwaaz kerega.

Aaj ke band ke paish e nazar shehar mein RTC buses bhi band rahin, taham RTC ki janib se Aazmin ki buses ki rawaangi ka khusoosi intizam kya gaya. Hajj Camp, Nampally se Rajiv Gandhi International Airport ke Hajj Terminal tak jo special buses chalaye gayeen. Har do basoon ke sath Police scart rakha gaya aur is terhan Police Scort ki nigrani mein Aazmin ki rawaangi amal mein aayi. Telangana State RTC ki janib se aala ohdedar camp ke aaghaz se hi shaksi taur par buses ki rawaangi ki nigrani kar rahay hain. Un mein Mr. C Vinod Kumar Regional Manager Hyderabad Region, Smt. Sudha Parimala Divisional Manager Charminar, Smt. Samira Afreen Dpot Manager Fallaknuma aur Mr. K V V Reddy Depot Manager Mehdipatnam shaamil hain jo har qaafiley ki rawaangi ke mauqa par Hajj House mein maujood rehtay hain. Janab Sheikh Basha Retd. Divisional Manager APSRTC Hajj Committee ki taraf se buses ke intizamaat ki nigrani karte hain.
1139.title: Commissioner Police Hyderabad ney Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko vidaa kya

news_detail: Chennai. DMK sarguru  94 sala M Karunanidhi m. Karunanidhi ka aaj shaM chinayi ke Kauveri Hospital mein dehant hogaya. Unhon ney 5 martaba Tamilnadu ke Chief Minister ki hesiyat se khidmaat anjaam di aur 6 dahun tak Tamilnadu ki siyasat par chaaye rahay. Woh apne sakht tareen mukhalif M G Ramchandran aur un ke baad Jaya Lalitha se hamesha nabrid aazma rahay. M Karunanidhi ko 18 July ko Trachea Tube  ki tabdeeli ke liye Hospital mein shareek kya gaya. 28

July ko blood pressure mein kami ke baayis dubarah shareek e Hospital kiya gaya tha.Woh guzishta aik baras se kabhi Hospital mein to kabhi bahar rah rahay they. Aik saal se ziyada woh awaMi progrMmes se door hi rehne lagey they. kabhi kabhar woh party ke daftar pahonch jaya karte they ya phir apne ghar ke oopar bahar nikal kar apne hMion ko haath lehra kar apna deedar krwadya karte they. Kal shab hi yeh khabar aagai thi ke un ki haalat bigadney lagi hai tahM aaj subah Karunanidhi ke arkaan e khandan aur Hospital walon ney kaha tha ke un ki haalat mein sudhaar araha hai. un ki sahet bigad jaane ki khabar aM hotay hi un ke hazaron madah Kauvery Hospital ke bahar jMa hona shuru hogaye they. HMion ko muntashir karne Police ko halki si taaqat ka istemaal bhi karna pada.

Karunanidhi siyasat mein qadM rakhnay se qabal M G RMchandran aur Jaya Lalitha ki terha filmi duniya se wabista thaiy aur Periyar EVR ki zair e qayadat Dravidian tehreek ke liye khud ko waqf kardiya tha. DMK nazriya saaz CN Anadurai ke faut hojane ke baad M Karunanidhi 1969 mein Chief Minister banay. Teen saal baad M G Ramchandran se un ki un ban hogayi aur unhon ney aakhir uz zikr qaayed ko Party se nikaal diya, jis par Ramchandran ney All India Anna Dravida Manitra Khazagamur ( AIADMK ) ki binaa daaltay hue zindagi bhar Karunanidhi se siyasi taur par nabrid aazma rahay. Un ke baad Jaya Lalitha bhi Karunanidhi ke khilaaf zindagi bhar ladte rahen. AIADMK 1977 mein Iqtidaar mein aagai aur Ramchandran ney apni hayaat mein DMK ko intikhabi kamyabi haasil honay nahi di. M G R ki mout ke baad Karunanidhi 1989 mein dobarah Iqtidaar haasil kya taham Rajiv Gandhi ki jazbati halakat ke baad inhen Iqtidaar se be dakhal kardiya gaya chunkay yeh ta-assur tha ke Rajiv Gandhi ka qatal karne wali Lankan tanzeem LTTE ke sath un ke qareebi rawabit rahay hainJaya K Lalitha par bdanwanyon ke sangeen ilzamat ke baad woh dubarah 1996 mein Iqtidaar mein lout aeye they. Is terha kabhi woh Iqtidaar mein hotay to kabhi un ki badtareen hareef Jaya Lalitha Iqtidaar mein hoteen. M Karunanidhi ki mout par Sadar Jamhooria Hind Mr. Ram Nath Kovind, Wazeer e Aazam Mr. Narendra Modi, Congress sarbarah Sonia Gandhi aur Sadar Rahul Gandhi ke alawa mukhtalif riyaston ke wuzraye aala ney apne ranj o ghM ka izhaar kya.
1152.title: ‘DMK’ ke Sargruh M Karunanidhi ka dehant

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein Transport ki hadtaal ka asar juzwi raha hai. Hadtaal ke baayis RTC ney mehdood paimana par apni services chalaye jabkay shehar mein nisf se zayed Autos sadkon se gayab rahay. Cabs bhi sadkon par kam hi dikhayi dyie. RTC basoon aur autos ki kami ko awam ney Metro Train ki khidmaat se istifada karte hue poora karliya. Mangal ke din subah se hi Metro Trains khucha khuch bhari hui rahen. TSRTC Drivers Unions, Auto Drivers Unions  aur Taxi Drivers ney Motor Vehicles Act mein tarmeem ke khilaaf shehar Hyderabad mein hadtaal ka elaan kya tha. Metro hukkaam ney dareen asna din bhar izafi Trains chalayein. Din bhar main har 6 minute mein aik train rakhi gayi thi jabkay raat mein aik ghanta ziyada trains chalanay ka faisla kiya gaya. Aaj raat 11:00 bajey Nagole aur Miyapur se aakhri train chalaye jayegi jo neem shab ko apni aakhri manzil par pohunche gi.
1168.title: Hyderabad mein Transport hadtaal ka juzwi asar

news_detail: Hyderabad. National Investigation Agency (NIA) ke ohdedaron ne aaj Hyderabad ke Begumpet mein waqay apne ilaqayi daftar mein mangal ko din bhar ISIS se talluq ke silsila mein 2016 mein darj aik muqadma ke silsila mein taqreeban 6 naujawanon se tafteesh ki hai jin mein kuch naujawanon se is se qabal bhi pooch gach ki gayi thi. NIA ne 2016 mein ISIS se taluqaat qaim karne aur Mulk ke khilaaf saazish ke ilzaam mein aik muqadma darj kya tha aur Mulk bhar se 9 afraad ko girftar kya tha. Is case mein chargesheet ki peshkashi ke ziman mein tafteesh ko wusat dete hue hyderabad mein maujood chand mushtaba naujawanon se pooch gach ki jarahi hai taakay un ke mulawis honay ke imkanaat ka jaiza liya jaye. Is case mein maazi mein bhi chand Hyderabadi naujawanon se pooch gach ki thi. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency ki janib se Hyderabad mein kiye gaye dhaavoun aur mushtaba naujawanon se mutaliq jari tafteesh ke baray mein kisi qisam ka bayan sarkaari taur par jari na kiye jane ke baayis zaraye ablaagh mein mutazaad daaway kiye jarahay hain aur ghair musaddiqa khabron ke hawala se atkal pacho lagaye jarahay hain. Yaad rahay ke peer ke din NIA ki mukhtalif teamon ne shehar ke mukhtalif muqamat par mushtaba naujawanon ke gharron par chaapay maartay hue un naujawanon se pooch gach ki thi aur un ke zair istemaal Laptop, Computers and Cell Phones waghera zabt karliye thay. Un naujawanon mein kuch ko yeh Hidayat dete hue hirasat mein nahi liya gaya tha ke woh mangal ke din Agency ke daftar waqay Begumpet report karen. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon ko din bhar pooch gach ke baad raat 9:00 bajey ke qareeb budh ke din bhi daftar aanay ki hidayat dete hue gharon ko jane ki ijazat daiy di. Bataya jata hai ke un naujawanon se tafteesh alahda alahda mukhtalif sessions mein ki gayi aur aik dosray ko samnay paish karte hue un ke baray mein daryaft kya gaya. Tafteeshi ohdedaron ne un naujawanon ki roz marrah ki masrofiyaat ke baray mein istefsaraat kiye gai aur online raabton se mutaliq bhi jaanch ki gayi. Un naujawanon mein Mehdipatnam aur shaheen Nagar ilaqa ke aik aik naujawan bhi shaamil hain. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ki teams Hyderabad mein teen din qabal hi pahonch gayi theen jin ke taawun ke liye Karnataka aur Maharashtra se talluq rakhnay wale Intelligence ohdedaron ki teams bhi hain.
1191.title: Mushtaba naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh jari

news_detail: Americi riyasat California ke shumali ilaqa mein do hafta qabal lagi aag mumlikat jadeed ki tareekh ki sab se badi aag banti jarahi hai. Un janglaat mein lagi aag tareekh ki bhayanak tareen aag ban gayi, taqreeban 2 laakh 83 hazaar se zayed aekar par phaily aag bujhanay ke liye tayyaron ki madad le li gayi. California ke jungle mein lagi aag ke sholay aur dhowen ke baadal meilon door se dekhe jasaktay hain. Bhadakti aag ne 80 se zayed ghar tabah kardiye aur 7 log halaak ho chukay hain jabkay hazaron afraad ko ghar choadnay par majaboor kardiya. Aag par qaboo panay din raat 3, 900 ka amlah tag o dou kar raha hai. Yeh aag sab se pehlay 27 July ko lagi thi. Yeh tareekh ki panchwin bad tareen aag hai.Is aag ko 2017 mein lagnay wali aag se bhi khatarnaak qarar diya ja raha hai jis ne Santa Barbra aur Ventura Counties mein 2 laakh 81 hazaar se zayed acres arazi jala kar khaak kar di thi. Shulon ki yeh lapait New York shehar se bhi badi hai aur ab Los Angeles ke size ki hoti jarahi hai. Is aag ko Mendocino Complex Fire se mousoom kya jata hai jo darasal ‘Clear Lake’ ke dono janib lagi do aag hain. Garam hawaon ka mausam aur sookhi ghaas aag par tail ka kaam kar rahay hain. Un do fires ke darmain ka faasla ab baa-mushkil 3 kilometer hi rah gaya hai. Is aag ne 443. 4 murabba miles ko apni lapait mein le liya hai .

Amrici riyasat California ke governor Jerry Brown ne janglati aag ki shiddat dekhte hue wifaqi hukoomat se imdaad talab kar li hai. Brown ne kaha hai ke be-qaboo aag ko control karna aik intahi mushkil amal hai aur reyasti wasail na kafi hain. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke aag se mutasirah ilaqa ki public health aur tahaffuz ko barah e raast shadeed khatraat ka saamna hai aur un mein kami laane ke liye markazi hukoomat ki izaafi imdaad zaroori hai. Sadar Trump ne bhi samaji rabita Website par pegham jari karte hue usay riyasat ki tareekh ki badi aafaat qarar diya hai. Tarjuman White House ka kehna hai ke mutasirah ilaqa ke logon ko aarzi rehayish aur gharon ki marammat ki sahoolat faraham ki jaye gi. Aag se ab tak 7 afraad ki mout waqay hochuki hai. Junoobi Spain ke janglaat mein bhi aag lagi hui hai senkdon firefighters aur tayyaron ki madad se aag par qaboo panay ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Spain ka dar-ul-hukoomat Madrid,in dinon shadeed garmi ki lapait mein hai jahan guzashta roz darja hararat 40 degree centigrade record kya gaya. Portugal ke sayahati maqam forest hills mein lagi aag ko bujhanay ke liye aik hazaar se zayed firefighters koshish kar rahay hain, France ke dar-ul-hukoomat Paris ke muzafati ilaqa mein bhi aag lagi hui hai, jis par abhi tak qaboo nahi paaya jaska hai.
1207.title: California mein lagi aag tareekh ki bad tareen aag banti ja rahi hai

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ney kaha ke aaj wazeh kardiya ke who ‘Hindutva’ ke qaail nahi hai. Nah hi mautadil Hindutva par aur nah hi jarehana Hindutva par un ka aiqaan hai. Mudeer hazraat aur Senior Sahafion ke sath tabadlah khayaal karte hue Rahul Gandhi ney is baat se ittafaq nahi kya ke woh aksariati tabqa ko rijhaane aitdaal pasand Hindutva se maghloob hue hain. Unhon ney kaha ”woh kisi bhi noiyat ke Hindutva chahay woh naram Hindutva ho ya phir sakht geer Hindutva eeqaan nahi rakhtay.” Unhon ney kaha ke mazhabi rehnumaon se mulaqaat karna aur mazhabi muqamat ka daura karne mein koi qabahat nahi hai. Unhon ney  kaha ke Wazir e Azam Narendra Modi ke sath un ke ikhtelafat nazriyati hain, shakhsi nahi. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney  id-diaa kya ke BJP aayenda Intikhabaat mein Lok Sabha ki 230 nashistain haasil nahi kar payin gi, is terha Narendra Modi ke dobarah Wazir e Azam ban’nay ka sawal hi paida nahi hota. Unhon ney  kaha ke Uttar Pradesh aur Bihar mein ghair BJP Partiyon ke maabain intekhabi mafahmat ke baayis to awwal BJP ki taaqat mein kami aajay gi, alawaazeen BJP ki kayi haami partiyan bashmole Shiv Sena Modi ke doosri miyad ke liye Wazir e Azam ban’nay ke haami nahi hain. Sadar Congress ney  kaha keBJP ko shikast dainay un ki party azeem tar ittehaad tashkeel dainay koshan hai. Woh purazm hain ke Congress ki zair e qayadat azeem tar ittehaad aayendha Hukumat tashkeel daigi. Unhon ney  is sawal ka raast jawab dainay se ehteraaz kya ke Congress aur deegar ghair BJP partiyon ke aksariyat haasil karne ki soorat mein Wazir e Azam kaun hoga? Unhon ney  sirf itna kaha ke is par gaur wo khouz kya jaye ga. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ney  aisa koi ahed bhi nahi kya ke Karnataka tarz par markaz mein Congress ko hatmi aksariyat haasil na honay ki soorat mein BJP ko iqtidaar se door rakhnay sab se badi party honay ke bawajood doosri partiyon ko tashkeel e Hukumat ki dawat denge? Parliament mein Wazir e Azam se un ke baghalgeer honay se mutaliq poochnay par unhon ney  kaha ke is ka maqsad yeh jatana tha ke woh fard se nafrat nahi karte. Unhon ney  kaha ke Wazir e Azam magar rad-e-amal mein sard thay. Unhon ney  ilzaam aed kiya ke Modi apne siyasi harifon ka ehtram nahi karte. Rahul Gandhi ney  Mulk mein badhti adam rawadari par tashweesh ka izhaar kya. unhon ney  kaha ke Aqliaten Adam tahaffuz ka shikaar mehsoos kar rahay hain. Unhon ney  kaha ke party ki reyasti units, Ilaqaayi satah par hum khayaal partiyon se ittehaad karne ke liye azad hain. Unhon ney  is yaqeen ka izhaar kiya ke Telangana mein Congress Iqtidaar mein aeyegi. Andhra Pradesh mein party ke muaqqaf se mutaliq istefsaar par kaha ke un ki party wahan apna muaqqaf behtar bana rahi hai. Unhon ney  kaha ke do crore nojawanon ko mulaazimaten faraham karne ke wada ko Modi ney  faramosh kardiya. Unhon ney  kaha ke China 24 ghanton mein 50,000 logon ko mulazmat faraham karta hai jabkay Hindustan mein is muddat mein sirf 458 mulaazmaten faraham hoti hain. Shadi se mutaliq istafsaar par Rahul Gandhi ney  kaha ke Congress ke sath un ki Shaadi kab hi ke hochuki hai.
1056.title: Mujhe na hi mautadil aur na hi Jaareh Hindutwa par yaqeen hai: Rahul Gandhi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher Hyderabad mein 72

yaum e jashnn azaadi badey hi tuzk wo Ehtesham se manaaya gaya. Shaher ke mukhtalif mohalla jaat aur colonies mein rehaishi Unitd ki janib se bhi taqreeb parcham kushai anjaam di gayi. Dilshad Nagar, Reti Bowli, Mehdipatnam mein Dilshad Nagar Youth & Welfare Association ki janib se bhi josh o khurosh ke sath yaumw e azaadi taqreeb ka ihtimaam kya gya aur parcham kushai anjaam di gayi. Janab Mohammad Bande Ali sahib retired judge ne mahemaan e khusoosi ki haisiyat se shirkat ki aur parcham kushai anjaam di aur Mulk ki azaadi ke liye qurbaniyan dainay walay mujahideen azaadi ko khiraaj e aqeedat paish kya. Iss mauqa par janab Syed Akbar Hussain Chairman Telangana State Minorities Corporation, janab Mohammad Raheemullah Khan Niyazi Incharge Nampally Assembly Constituency tlnganh Rashtra Samiti, janab Swami Sub Inspector Asifnagar Police Station, janab Mohammad Farooq Sadar Association, janab Mohammad Salah secretary, janab Ali Seddiq rukn, janab Mohammad Anwar aur Association ke deegar arkaan bhi maujood thaiy. Iss mauqa par colony ke bachon ne nazmein bhi paish keen.
1069.title: Dilshad Nagar Mehdipatnam mein parcham kushai

news_detail: New Delhi. Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki tabiyat aaj aik baar achanak biggad gayi jo ilaaj ke liye All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) mein shareek hain. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney AIIMS pahonchkar sabiq Wazeer e Azam ki sahet ke baray mein jankari haasil ki, woh taqreeban 50 minute tak Hospital mein rahay. Guzishta do dino se Vajpayee ko life support system par rakha gaya hai. woh is waqt bawiqaar Institute mein zair e ilaaj hain. Vajpayee ko gurde ki naali mein infection, pishaab ki naali mein infection, pishaab ki kami aur seenah ki sukad ke baayis 11

June ko All India Institute of Medical Sciences mein shareek karwaya gaya tha, Diabities ke aarzah mein mubtala  93 sala qaayed ka aik hi gurda kaarkard hai aur unhen 2009 mein stroke bhi aaya jis ki wajah se un ki quwat e idraak congnitive abilities mein kami aagai thi. AIIMS ki janib se raat der gaye jari kardah Health Bulletin ke mutabiq guzashta 24 ghanton se un ki sahet naazuk hai aur unhen life support system par rakha gaya hai. Vajpayee ke arkaan khandan ko bhi mutala kardiya gaya hai. Markazi Wazeer Science and Tecnologi Harsh Vardhan, Wazeer Finance Arun Jetly, Wazeer Railway Pyush Goel, Wazeer Textile Smriti Irani aur deegar ney Hospital pahonch kar buzurag qaayed ki sahet ke baray mein jankari haasil ki.
1083.title: Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki haalat naazuk

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jawaharr High School ke khilaaf Reinbazar Police Station mein ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen karne ka aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. School intizamia ki janib se 72

jashnn  eazadi ki munasbat se School ki imarat par kuch hangings awezan (erect) kiye gaiy thaiy jis mein Hyderabad ke Rukn e Parliament aur deegar Arkaan e Assembly ki qadaavr tasaveer ke pas e  manzar mein Qaumi Parcham dikhaya gaya tha jis se aisa mehsoos ho raha tha keh yeh qaayideen, Qaumi Parcham ko roond kar chal rahay hain. Social Media par yeh tasaveer viral hogai. Station House officer Reinbazaar ke mutabiq Police Station ki patrolling party, yaum e azadi ke mauqa par gasht mein thi. Iss party ke aik rukn Krishna ne yeh dekha ke Jawaharr High School ki imarat par siyasi qaideen ki tasaveer awezan hain jis ke pas e manzar mein ‘Qaumi Parcham’ hai, jinhein dekh kar aisa mehsoos ho raha tha ke ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen horahee hai. Iss liye insidaad tauheen qaumi tazeem 1971 ki difaa 2 bah mutaliq ‘Qaumi Parcham’ o dastoor e Hind ki tauheen ke tehat School ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Yeh poochnay par ke School ke Correspondent Ayub Shah ka yeh kehna hai ke banners unhon ne nahi lagaye balkay School ke staff ne lagaye hain to Inspector ne kaha ke hum tehqiqaat karenge magar waisay School ka intizamia hi is ka zimmadaar hota hai.
1093.title: ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen par Jawaharr School ke khilaaf muqadma

news_detail: Vijayawada. Shaadi se do din qabal se dolha ghar se gayab hai. It-tila-aat ke mutabiq Vijayawada ke rehne walay Nagendra ki aaj Shaadi honay wali thi magar woh guzashta do din se la patah hai. Bataya jata hai ke Nagendra  14

August ko apne doston aur rishta daaron mein shaadi ke ruqye taqseem kar raha tha taham is ke baad se woh la patah hai, tab se hi is ke arkaan e khandan is ka pata chalanay ki koshisho mein hain. Is ke walidain ney Police mein apne betay ki ghumshudgi ki shikayat darj karwayi jis ki asaas par Dolhe ke sale phone number se is ka pata chalanay ki koshish kar rahi hai. Pooch gach par police ko pata chala ke Nagendra Shaadi karne mein dilchaspi nahi rakhta tha.
1127.title: Shaadi se do din qabal Dolha gayab.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizamabad zila mein aaj Ek indohnak haadsa mein B.Tech ka taalib e ilm halaak hogaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke 21 sala (VREC ka B.Tech ka taalib e ilm tha) Mohammad Abdul Aziz farzand janab Mohammad Abdul Shukoor saakin Ahmedpura Colony aaj subah car mein imthehaan likhnay ki gharz se ja raha tha ke Armoor road par sadak haadsa ka shikaar hogaya. Mossola it-tila-aat ke mutabiq is haadse main deegar 5? nojawan bhi zakhmi hogaye jinhein Nizamabad District  Headquters Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke mahlook naujawan janab Ahmeduddin maalik Bharat Cycle Stores Bodhan ka nawasa hota hai. Haadse ki ittila pa kar Rukn e Assembly Bodhan Mr. Mohammed Shakeel Aamir ne Hospital pahonch kar gham zada khandan ko pursa diya aur zakhmion ki ayadat ki.
1141.title: Armoor Road par sadak haadsa. Nizamabad B.Tech taalib e ilm halaak

news_detail: Warangal Zila Collector Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney aik Video Channel ko video interview mein yeh tasleem kya ke unhen hukumat ki janib se allot kardah 133 sala qadeem Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ke is iqraar par aik tanaza paida hogaya hai. Zila Collector ney haal hi mein muqami Web Channel ko dyie gaye aik interview mein kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke zila intizamia ki janib se inhen allot kardah sarkari Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ka yeh video Social Media par Viral hogaya hai. Zila Collector ke is daaway ki kisi maahir e mafooq ul fitrat waqhiyat ke zareya tauseeq to nahi karwai gayi taham un ke is iqraar se aik tanaza paida hogaya hai ke woh zaeef ul-etqadi (Superstition) par yaqeen rakhti hain. Is video mein IAS ohdedar, Bungalow ke barey mein dilchusp maloomat ka tabadlah karte hue nazar aati hain sath hi unhon ney yeh id-daa kya ke is qadeem imarat mein un ke hamrah aik bhoot bhi deera jamaye hue hai. Is Bangalow ka sang e buniyaad 133 saal qabal yahan mamoor suprident superintendent Engineer ki ahliya Mrs George Palmer ney rakha tha. Yaad rahay ke Asif jahi daur mein george Palmer hi sarkain bichenay ke umoor ke nigran they. Woh mukhtalif muqamat bashamool Karimnagar, Warangal aur Khamam waghera mein sarkari Bunglow taamir karne ke bhi nigran they. Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney is interview mein yeh bhi kaha ke 130 saal se ziyada qadeem is imarat mein shagaaf parney shuru hogaye hain. Unhon ney bataya ke imarat ke aik kamrah ki chhat 20 fit buland hai. Bangalow mein koonay hain jis ki wajah se barish ka pani imarat mein andar daakhil ho raha hai. Imarat ki Tazaeen ka kaam fi al-waqt chal raha hai. Zila Collector ney bataya ke un ka jaiza lainay se qabal Ohdedaron ney shayed taantrikon ko talabb kya tha aur pehli manzil par kuch jhaad phoonk ki thi. Unhon ney mujhe aagah kiya tha ke mein pehli manzil par shab bisri nah karoon jo store room ke tor par istemaal hota hai chunkay vha n aik bhoot hai. Zila Collector ney kaha ke unhon ney saaray ilaqa ki safai karwai hai magar Bangalow ki pehli manzil par raat guzarnay ki kabhi jurrat nahi ki chunkay wahan aik bhoot 133 saal se intzaar kar raha hai.
1158.title: Warangal zila collector ke Bungalow mein bhoot rehta hai, Collector ka id-daa.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Tennis Star Sania Mirza ne Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par pauda lagaya. Sania Mirza ne Harita Haram Programme ke hissa ke taur par 72 wein jashnn azaadi ke mauqa par pauda lagaya. Unhon ne kaha ‘mein ne Sania Mirza Tennis Academy  mein parcham kushai aur Yum e Aazadi taqreeb ke baad Harita  Haram Programme ke hissa ke taur par pauda lagaya hai.” Sania Mirza ne Wazir e sanat o hirfat, baldi nazam o nasq, Information Technology Minister ke T Rama Rao aur American Consul General Hyderabad Cathrine Hadda ka is Chanlange aur pehal par shukriya ada kya. Unhon ne apne tweet paiyaam mein kaha ke woh apne tamam Social Media family ko sabz mustaqbil ke liye naamzad karti hain.
1171.title: Sania Mirza ne pauda lagaya

news_detail: New Delhi- Teen waqton ke Wazeer e Azam wo  Mulk ke senior siyasatdan Atal Bihari Vajpayee ka aaj shaam dehaant hogaya. All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) ne un ki maut ka elaan kya jahan woh 9 hafton se zair e ilaaj thay. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ne 24 ghanton mein do martaba Hospital ka daura kya. Mulk bhar ke sarkardah siyasatdan Hospital pahonchh kar un ki sehat ke baray mein jankari haasil karte rahay thay. BJP ke 93 sala qad aawar siyasatdan ko 11
June ko gurday ki naali aur pishaab ki naali mein soozish par Hospital mein shareek karwaya gaya tha. Un ka aik hi gurda hi karkard tha.

Atal Bihari Vajpayee 25 December 1924 ko aik school teacher ke gharana mein Gawaliarr Madhya Pradesh mein paida hue. Unhon ne 1942 mein ‘Hindustan Chod do Tehreek’ mein hissa letay hue siyasat mein daakhil hue. Unhon ne Victoria College Gawaliarr se Political Science mein Post Graduate kya. Vajpayee Bhartya Jan Sangh, Janata Party aur Bharatya Janata Party ke baani rukan rahay hain. Woh 1957 mein pehli martaba dosray Lok Sabha ke liye muntakhib hue jis ke baad woh 1967, 1971, 1977, 1980, 1991, 1996, 1998, 1999 aur 2004 mein Lok Sabha ke liye muntakhib hotay rahay, jabkay 1986 mein woh Rajya Sabha ke rukn muntakhib hue. 1977 taa 1979 Mulk ke wazeer kharja bhi rahay. Woh pehli martaba 16

May 1996 ko Wazir e Azam banay jab us waqt ke Sadar e Jamhuria Hind Dr. Shankar Dayal Sharma ne BJP ko sab se badi party ke taur par ubharnay par tashkeel e hukoomat ki dawat di thi taham woh 13 din tak hi is ohda par barqarar reh sakay chunkay unhen koi doosri party taayeed karne par amaada nahi hui thi. Vajpayee ne 19
March 1998 ko dobarah Wazeer e Azam ke ohda ka halaf liya, 13 mah baad 17

April 1999 ko woh tehreek etemaad mein aik vote ki shikast ke baayis un ki hukoomat zawaal pazeer hogayi. Yeh wahid hukoomat rahi hai jo tehreek adam etemaad mein shikast se dochar hui. Vajpayee ne teesri martaba 13

October 1999 ko Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf liya. Un hi ke daur mein Dehli- Lahore Bus Service ka aaghaz huwa. Vajpayee ke hi daur mein jab woh 13 din ki hukoomat ke baad namzad Wazeer e Azam thay Kargil ki jung paish aayi thi jo BJP ki bhaari aksariyat se kamyaabi yakeeni hui thi. Isi terha Vajpayee ke hi daur mein Decemeber 1999 mein Indian Airlines ke tayyarah ka aghwaa karkay Kabul le jayagya tha. Aghwaa kunindon ne Hafiz Sayeed ki rihayi par mughawiah musafireen ko riha kya tha. Un hi ke daur mein 13

December 2001 ko Parliament par hamla huwa tha. Isi terha 2002 mein jab woh Wazeer e Azam thay, Gujarat ka khonraiz tashadud bhadka tha, jis mein aik hazaar se zaayed Musalman shaheed hogaye thay. Vajpayee ko 2015 mein Mulk ke aala tareen Civil Award ‘Bharat Ratan’ se sarfraz kya gaya. Vajpayee jo aik shayar aur musannif bhi thay, aik darjan se zayed kitaaben likhi hain.
1188.title: Atal Bihari Vajpayee chal base

news_detail: Ek ghair mamooli waqia mein driver ney Telugu Desham Party ke rukan Assembly mida Malikarjuna Reddy ke waalid ke paas se jab un ki car Kurnool Zila mein ek hotel ke paas thahri hui thi 50 lakh rupay le kar chala gaya. Rukn Assembly ke waalid Rama Krishna Reddy jo Tirumala Trupathi Devasthanam Board ke rukn bhi hain kaha ke un ke waalid jab lunch karne hotel mein daakhil hue to driver car le kar faraar hogaya jis mein 50 laakh rupay rakhay hue they. MLA ney muqami Police mein shikayat darj karwai. Mulzim ko pakad ney Police sargaram hochuki hai. Rama Krishna Reddy Hyderabad se Kadapa jarahay they ke Kurnool mein Raj Vihar Hotel mein dopehar ka Khana khane ke liye ruke they. Unhon ney car mein bag rakh kar is ki nigrani karne ke liye driver ko chohod rakha tha jis mein 50 lakh rupay rakhay hue they, lekin jab woh wapas lautay to driver mobayyana taur par raqam le kar gayab hochuka tha. Police CCTV footage aur deegar tafseelaat ka jaiza letay hue driver ko pakadney ki koshisho mein lagi hui hai.
1212.title: MLA ke waalid ke 50 lakh rupay le kar driver faraar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shehar Hyderabad mein aik Travels Agency ‘Al-Burraq Umrah aur Hajj’ waqay lakdi ka pull ke khilaaf Saifabad Police Station mein shikayat darj karwai gayi ke takhriban 52 afraad se Hajj par bhejney ka wada karkay dhoka diya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Hajj par rawana honey ke khawhishmand hazraat se Travels Agency ne fikis 2.5 lakh rupay wusool kiye thay. Is terha Agency ney 1.30 crore rupay se zayed wusool karliye thay. Mutasireen ney Hajj ko rawaangi ki umeeden khatam hojane par Agency ke khilaaf Saifabad Police Station pahonch kar shikayat darj karwai. Mutasireen ney bataya ke kuch logon ney to teen mah qabal adai kar di thi jabkay kuch logon ney aik daidh mah qabal ruqomat ada kar diye thay. Aik mutasirah shakhs ney Police Station mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha kay hamein dhoka diya gaya hai. Hum se Passport aur deegar ahem dastawizaat ruqomat sameit le liye gaye thay aur hamari teeka andazi bhi kar di gayi thi aur Asif nagar ke aik function hall mein hamari tahiati taqreeb bhi munaqqid ki gayi thi. Aik mutasira shaks ney bataya ke hamein aakhri martaba yeh bataya gaya tha ke hamari 13

August ko rawangi hogi magar uss din hamein bataya gaya ke Visa Endorsment nahi ho paaya hai is liye woh Hajj Visa ke bajaye Visit par Makkah Mukarama ko bhejney ki koshish kar rahay hain jis ko hum ney yeh kehte hue mustarad kardiya ke aisa karna ghair qanooni hai. Agency ney akhirkaar hamein hamaray Passports aur ruqumaat wapas lauta dene ka wada kya aur aaj Agency ke daftar pahunchney ke liye kaha gaya. Din bhar hamein yeh kehte hue taala jata raha hai ke abhi raqam nahi aayi hai. Aik aur mutasir ney bataya ke un ke chaar logon ka group tha jin se 10 lakh rupay wusool kiye gaye thay. Unhon ney bataya ke First Lancer ke Relief Hospital ke Dr. Afzal aur dosray bhi is Scandal mein mulawis hain, jinhon ney hamein na sirf iss Travels Agency ke zareya Hajj adaa karne ki targheeb di thi balkay wohi tamam umoor ki njaam dahi karte rahay thay, hatta ke ruqumaat bhi unhon ney wusool kiye thay magar aaj yeh keh rahay hain ke Travels Agency walay un ke sirf dost hain aur un ka is agency se koi talluq nahi hai. Mutasireen ney bataya ke Police ohdedaron ney kaha ke woh tahaqeeq karen ge. Police ney tahaal is khysoos mein koi muqadma darj nahi kya hai.
1080.title: Ek aur Travels Agency ki dhoka dahi. 52 afraad Hajj karne se mehroom

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat e Telangana ne sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ke dehaant aur kal un ki aakhri rusumaat ke paish e nazar buzurg rehnuma ke ehteraam mein jumma 17

August ko aam taateel ka elaan kya hai. Tamaam sarkari dafaatir, neem sarkari idaray, awaami shoba ke idaray, Corporations Boards, taleemi idaray waghera band rahen ge. Markazi Hukoomat ne pehlay hi 7 roza qaumi soug ka elaan kya hai. Iss dauran Qaumi Parcham nisf bulandi par lehrata rahay ga aur tamam tafrihi programmes mansookh kar diye gaye hain. Ibtida mein Telangana mein taateel ke talluq se uljhan payi jati thi chunkay sabiq Wazeer e Azam ke dehaant par Chief Secretary ki janib se Zila Collectors aur Commissioners of Police and Superintendents of Police ke liye jari kardah crash message mein sirf markazi hukoomat ki janib se elaan kardah qaumi soug ka hi tazkara kya gaya tha. Taham baad azan taateel ka elaan kya gaya jis ki ittila barsar e iqtedaar TRS ke tarjuman angrezi akhbar “Telangana Today’ aur Telugu News Channel ‘T News’ ke zareya tateel ke elaan ki khabar aam hui.
1091.title: Telangana Hukumat ka Juma ko taateel ka elaan

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik nagehani haadsa mein Police ki gaadi ne GHMC ki jaroob kash (sweeper) khatoon ko kuchal diya. Reinbazar Police Station ke hudood mein Bada Bazar y Junction ke paas GHMC ki khatoon jaroob kash, barish ke pani ki safai kar rahi thi ke Police ki aik patroling jeep ne moud lainay ke baad sadak par safai ka kaam karne wali khatoon Sai Amma (52) ko rond diya jis ke nateeja mein woh buri terha zakhmi hogayi. Zakhmi khatoon ko fauri Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan unhen murda qarar day diya gaya. Police gaadi chalanay walay Head Constable Ashok ne joon hi Junction ke paas gaadi ko moda, unhon gaadi par qaboo khodya aur sadak par safai karne wali GHMC karamchari ko rond dala, halaanke moudd letay waqt un ki gaadi ki raftaar intahi sust thi taham jon hi unhon ne moudd liya achanak un ki gaadi ki raftaar badh gayi aur khatoon ko kuchal diya. Is khusoos mein Ashok ke khilaaf crime number 124 of 2018 ke tehat aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Iss waqea ki ittila milnay par Commissioner Police ne Head Constable ki muattali ke ehkaam jaari kar diye. Unhen girftar karliya gaya hai.
1104.title: Police gaadi ne GHMC jaroob kash ko rond daala

news_detail: Hyderabad. Duniya bhar ke taleemi idaray aur asateza meyaari tadrees ke paband ahed hain taakay inhen ikeeswein sadi mein aalami shehri ke taur par tayyar kya jasakay. Inn khayalat ka izhaar mohtarma Katherine Hadda, Amrici Counsel General mutayinah Hyderabad ne aaj ”asateza angrezi zabaan, deeni madaris ke do roza tarbiyati programme” ke iftitahi ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kya. Dr Mohammad Aslam Parvez, Vice Chancellor ne sadarat ki. Mohtarma Hadda ne workshop ke shurka ka hawala dete hue kaha ke ”geographiyai aitebaar se mukhtalif ilaaqon se talluq rakhnay ke bawajood badi had tak Muslim bradri ki khidmaat se wabista idaron mein naujawanon ko zewar taleem se aarasta karna aap sab ka mushtarka wasf hai. ”Unhon ne kaha ke junoobi Hind ki 3 riyasaton Telangana, Karnataka aur Kerala ke alawa markazi zair e intizam ilaqa Paduchery se 90 asateza na muwafiq mausmi halaat se nimat te hue iss programme mein hissa le rahay hain. America, bunyadi khawandgi se le kar sanati aur aala taleemi mawaqay ki farahmi tak wasee tar taleemi masayel se nimatnay ki pehal ka hissa raha hai. Taham aisay tabqaat mein jinhein tareekhi taur par meyaari taleem tak rasai mein zabardast mushkilon ka saamna karna pada hai, un mein Amrici sifarat khana ke angrezi zabaan mein tarbiyati programme sab se ziyada maqbool aur asar angaiz rahay hain. molana azad national urdu university mein ilaqai daftar angrezi zabaan, Amrici sifarat khana, nai Dehli aur Amrici Counsel General, Hyderabad ke zair e ihtimaam is programme ka ineqaad amal mein aaya hai. Washington ke bain ul aqwami taleemi idaara World Learning, ke taawun se honay walay programme ke ineqad mein Urdu University ke markaz Peshawarana Farogh baraye Asateza e Urdu Zariya Taleem aur Tarbiyat wo Taayinaati Cell taawun kar rahay hain. Dr. Mohammad Aslam Parvez ne apni sadaarati taqreer mein MANUU ko bar e sagheer ki sab se badi University qarar diya jahan Urdu zariye se aala taaleem faraham ki jarahi hai. Unhon ne deeni madarson ke talba ke liye mukhtalif rabita (bridge) courses ke mutaliq bataya aur kaha ke MANUU mein pehli martaba samaji uloom, arts aur science ke alawa aur deegar asri mazameen bashmole computer science, poly technique aur commerce waghera mein dakhlay ke liye yeh course chalaye jarahay hain. Unhon ne deeni madaris ke sath Urdu University ke rishte ko ”khusoosi” qarar diya. Dr Luis Scott, Trainer World Learning ne programme ke mutaliq mukhtasir maloomat faraham kee aur bataya ke is ka pehla marhala MANUU hi mein January mein munaqqid huwa tha. Professor H. Khadija Begum, Coordinator ne khair muqaddam kya. Janab Misbah Anzer , Asst. Professor CPDUMT ne karwai chalaye. Dr Mohammad Yousuf Khan, Incharge Tarbiyat wo Tayinaati Cell ne shukriya ada kya. Yahan yeh waazeh karna Zaroori hai ke jahan chand deeni idaron aur un ke muntazmeen mein Americi sifarat khanah ki janib se chalaye jany walay programon ke talluq se khusoosi dilchaspi payi jaati hai balkay kuch to aisay bhi hain jo Amrici sifarat khanah ki qurbat panay ke liye kuch bhi karne amaada nazar atay hain wahein aam musalmanoon mein America ki musalmanoon ke tain itni dilchaspi ko shak ki nazron se dekha jata hai aur yeh sawal kiya jata hain ke aakhir Americi sifarat khanah ko musalmanoon ke deeni madaris se itni dilchaspi kyun hai aur America deeni madaris ke zareya apne kaun se maqasid poooray karna chahta hai?
1119.title: Asateza, talba ko aalami shehri bananay ke liye paband ahed: Katherine Hadda

news_detail: Hyderabad. Gulbarga (Kalaburagi) Riyasat Karnataka se talluq rakhnay walay aik aazim e Hajj Janab Abdussattar umar 69 saal ka gurday fail hojane ke baayis jumeraat ki subah Makkah Muazzama ke Al-Noor Hospital mein inteqaal hogaya. Woh cover number KAF-15503-2-0 ke tahet apni ahliya ke hamrah 10

August ko Hyderabad se ba azm Hajj rawana hue they. Special Officer Telangana State Hajj Committee Prof. SA Shukoor ney Hajj Mission aur khadim  ul Hujjaj ko un ki namaz e janaza aur tadfeen ke liye fauri karwaiyan karne ki hidayat di. Namaz e janaza Haram Shareef mein ada ki gayi aur tadfeen Makkah Mukarrama ke qabrastan Shaaryeen mein amal mein aayi. Sadarnasheen Telegana State Hajj Committee Janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan aur Special Officer Prof. SA Shukoor ney izhaar taaziyat karte hue marhoom ke ayizza ke liye saber Jameel ki talqeen ki. Iss dauraan Hyderabad embarkation point se talluq rakhnay walay tamam Hujjaj karaam Makkah Muazzama mein apni apni rehayish gaahon mein muqeem hain aur kheriyat se hain. Hajj Mission aur khadim ul Hujjaj se musalsal rabt rakha gaya hai aur Hujjaj karaam ki sehat o wo salamati ke talluq se maloomat haasil ki jarahi hain.
1132.title: Gulbarga ke aazim e Hajj ka Makkah Muazzama mein intqaal

news_detail: Mecca Mukarrama mein Hajj season ke dauran kayi jazbati manazair dekhnay ko mlitay hain. Aisay hi aik waqea mein shaam ki jung mein aik dosray se judda hojane walay bhai, Mecca Mukarama mein mil gay. Adayie Hajj ke liye aik bhai Syria se yahan pouncha tha jabkay dosra bhai Jordan se yahan se pouncha tha aur dono aik dosray se mil kar intehayi jazbati hogaye. Social Media par aik jazbati Video Clip gardish kar raha hai. Is Video mein do Shami bhaiyon ko aabdeedah haalat mein aik dosray ke sath galaay mlitay hue dekha ja sakta hai. Yeh dono bhai Shaam mein khanah jungi ke sabab aik dosray ko kho baithy they taham Hajj ke safar ke silsila mai Mecca Mukarama pahonchney par qudrat ney unhey phir se mila diya. Dono bhaiyon mein aik Jordan mein jab ke dosra Syria mein reh raha hai. Video Clip mein ahraam mein malboos dono bhai intahi jazbati andaaz se baghal geer huve hain. Video ko dekhnay wala insaan bhi dono bhaiyon ki kaifiyat ka andaza karte hue khud ko jazbati honay se rok nahi paata.
1151.title: Jung ke bichde Hajj mein mil gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Banjara Hills Police Station ke hudood mein waqay Brindavan Colony, Tolichowkhi mein muqami makeeno ki salamti ko behtar bananay ke maqsad se nasab kardah Closed Circuit Television (CC Tv) Cameras ki tanseeb ke do din baad hi teen naujawanon ney chori karli taham Cameras ney disconnect kiye jaany tak chori ke manazair ko nah sirf qaid kya balkay recorders mein un ko mehfooz bhi kardiya. Banjara Hills Police ney aisay 8 Camera chori karne walay teen naujawanon ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Muqami logon ney shikayat darj karwai ke 10

August ki shab 8 Cameras aur connecting wires ka sarqa karliya gaya hai. Brindavan Colony Wellfare Association ke ohdedaron ney apni shikayat mein bataya ke Park Area aur Masjid e Fatima ke atraaf lagaye gaye CC Tv Camera sarqa karliye gaye hain. Park aur Masjid ke ilaqa ki behtar nigrani aur ghair samaji sargarmion ki sarkubi ke liye yeh camera sirf do din qabal yani 8

August ko hi nasab kiye gaye thay. Sareqeen ney un Cameron ka sarqa to karliya magar unhen kya maloom tha ke jin Cameron ka woh sarqa kar rahay hain wohi Camare un ki harkaton ko apne record mein mehfooz bhi kar rahay hain. Banjara Hills Police ney bataya ke Masjid mein rakhay gaye Digital Video Recoder (DVR) aur monitoring systems ney chori ke manazair ko bhi mehfooz karliya. Tehqeeq ke dauran Police ney DVR mein mehfooz footages ka mushahidah kya aur is dauran muqami ilaqa ke hi teen qusoorwaar naujawanon ki nishandahi karli gayi. Inspector Banjarahills Mr K Srinivas ney bataya ke un footage ki madad se hum ney khation ki nishandahi karli aur unhen girftar karliya hai. Aisay hi noiyat ke waqiyat shehar ke deegar maqamat par bhi paish aaye hain. Teen naujawanon ney Police ko bataya ke woh CCTv Cameras ki tanseeb se nakhush thay, chunkay woh raat ke auqaat is ilaqa mein ghuma phira karte thay. Woh nahi chahtay thay ke un ki naqal o harkat par nigrani rakhi jaye. Karkhana Secunderabad ke aik taajir ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya gaya jis ney apne mulazim ko community CCTv tod daine ki mobayyana hidayat dey raha hai. Woh nahi chahta tha ke deegar makeeno ko is ki naqal o harkat ka pata chalay. Taham yeh tod phod dosray CCTv Camera mein qaid hogayi.
1166.title: CC Tv Cameras ki tanseeb ke do din baad hi chori. Teen girftar

news_detail: Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf ke Chairman o sabiq Cricket Captain Imran Khan ney aaj Qaumi Aassembly mein wizarat Uzma ka intekhaab jeet liya hai. Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ke liye 172 vote darkaar they jabkay  PTI Chairman Imran Khan ney 176 vote haasil kiye aur un ki mukhalifat mein khaday sabiq Wazeer e Aazam Nawaz Shareef ke bhai Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Shahbaz Shareef ney 96 vote haasil kiye. Parlimani ijlaas Speaker Qaumi Assembly Asad Qaisar ki nigrani mein huwa jabkay voting division ki buniyaad par ki gayi thi. Is se qabal Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ke liye Qaumi Assembly mein raaye shumari ka amal shuru wo mukammal huwa jis ke baad voteon ki ginti shuru kar di gayi thi .

Qaumi Assembly mein Tehreek e Insaaf aur itehadiyon ki tadaad 175 hai jabkay Muslim League (N) ke arakeen ki tadaad 97 hai. Peoples Party ke bhi Qaumi Assembly mein 54 arakeen hain taham unhon ne Muslim League (N) ke umeedwaar ko vote na dainay ka faisla kya hai jabkay 4 azad arakeen bhi Qaumi Assembly ka intekhab jeetay hain. Ijlaas mein Pakistan Peoples Party ke Co-Chairman aur sabiq Sadar Asif Ali Zardari ne shirkat nahi ki jabkay Chairman Bilawal Bhutto ne apne aik bayan mein kaha ke intekhabi amal mein hissa na lena hamara jamhoori haq hai. Ijlaas ke aaghaz mein Speaker ne arakeen ko qaayed aiwaan ke intekhab ke tareeqa e kaar se mutaliq aagah kiya jis ke baad ghantiyan bajanay ka hukum diya. Chairman Tehreek e Insaaf Imran Khan ke Qaumi Assembly pahonchney par mehmaan gallery mein maujood afraad ne khade hokar taliyan bajayen jabkay is mauqa par PTI arkaan ne naaray baazi ki. Wazeer e Aazam ke intekhab ki karwai dekhney ke liye mehmanon ki badi tadaad gallery mein aagai thi jis mein PTI ke karkunaan ki badi tadaad shaamil thi. Mehmanon ki gallery rush ke baayis band kar di gayi thi. Imran Khan ki Parliament House aamad ke mauqa par sahafion ne un se sawalaat kiye aur aik sawal ke jawab mein unhon ne kaha ke match abhi khatam nahi huwa, match jari hai, khawab abhi poora nahi huwa, aik marhala poora huwa. Imran Khan ke liye lobby ‘A’ aur Shahbaz Sharif ke liye lobby ‘B’ banai gayi thi. Aik lobby se Imran Khan ko vote dainay aur doosri lobby se Shahbaz Shareef ko vote dainay walon ko guzarna tha. Dono lobbies Speaker ke dayen aur baen janib waqay hain. Peoples Party ke arakeen ne intekhabi amal mein hissa nahi liya aur woh apni nashiston par hi baithay rahay jabkay Jamaat e Islami ke rukn Maulana Abdul Akbar Chitrali bhi apni nashist se nahi uthhe. Ijlaas ke dauran Muslim League (N)  ki janib se Peoples Party ko mananay ki aik aur koshish ki gayi. Shahbaz Sharif khud Chairman PPP Bilawal Butto ki nashist par gaye aur un se mulaqaat ki. Is mauqa par Javed Murtuza Abbasi sameit deegar rehnuma bhi un ke hamrah they taham Shahbaz Sharif ki koshish nakaam hui. Shahbaz Sharif ne blavl bhuto Zardari se apne haq mein vote dainay ki darkhwast ki jis par Bilawal Bhutto Zardari ne moazrat karli.
1183.title: Imran Khan Pakistan ke 22 wein Wazeer e Aazam muntakhib

news_detail: Saudi Arab ke junoob maghribi ilaqa Jazan mein aik ghar se 35 saal se rassiyon aur zanjeeroon mein jakdey aik zehni mareez shakhs ko baaziyaab  karanay ke baad Hospital muntaqil kya gaya hai. Hukkaam ka kehna hai ke zanjeeroon mein jakda shakhs zehni aur nafsiyati mareez hai aur is ke ahal e khanah ney usay dosaron ko takleef pohanchaye janey ke dar se ghar mein zanjeeroon mein bandh rakha tha. Al-Arabia.net ke mutabiq Saudi wizarat Labour wo samaji behbood ke Jazan mein ohdedar Engineer Ahmed Alqunzi ney bataya ke Huroob Governeri mein deyaar Alsahalil ke maqam par aik ghar mein barson se 1 shakhs ko qaid rakhnay ki ittila mili. Ghar par chhapa maar kar 1 shakhs ko baaziyaab  karaya gaya aur usay Hospital muntaqil kya gaya hai. Is ki haalat kaafi tashweesh-naak hai. Woh zehni aur nafsiyati awarz ka shikaar hai. Taham Hospital mein hukoomat ki nigrani is ka ilaaj mualja jari hai. Al-Qunzi ney kaha ke mazkoorah shakhs ki Umar 35 saal se zayed hai. Is ke ahal e khanah ney usay ghar mein bandh kar rakhnay ka yeh juwaz paish kya hai ke agar woh usay khula chortay to woh ghar mein mojood kisi bachay ya parosion ko nuqsaan pouncha sakta tha. Hukoomati ohdedar ka kehna hai ke nafsiyati mareez ko zanjeeroon mein jakadnay ke maamla ki tehqiqaat ki ja rahi hain magar usay gharelo tashadud mein shaamil nahi kiya ja sakta.
1200.title: Saudi Arab mein 35 saal se zanjeeroon mein jakda Shakhs baaziyaab

news_detail: Hyderabad. Seylaab ke qhehar se dochar Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ki madad ke liye Gulf Mumalik aagay aaye hain. Maghribi asiayi mumalik mein guzishta 50 barson se zayed Keralites ki badi tadaad rehti hai. Sharjah ke hukmaraan Sultan Bin Mohammad Alqasmi ne hafta ke din Kerala ki madad ke liye 4 Crores rupey ki maali imdaad ka elaan kya hai. Mutahidda Arab Amaraat (UAE) ne bhi mumkina taawun ka teyqun diya hai. Gulf Mumalik mein Khelaji  awam ki qayim tanzeemen aur afraad ne Kerala mein seylaab ke mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye funds ikhatta karna shuru kardiya hai. Tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke raza karana tanzeemon ki janib se Gulf Mumalik se taqreeban 100 crores rupay ki imdaad faraham ki jaye gi. Ameer UAE Khalifa Bin Zayed Al-Nahayan ne jummay ki shab twitter payam mein kaha ke UAE mein hamari kamyaab kahani ke pas e parda Kerala ke awam hamesha se rahay hain aur hanooz hain. Hum par khusoosi zimmadari hai ke hum khaas kar in muqaddas aur meheraban dinon mein mutasirah awam ki madad karen. Yeh bhi it-tila-aat mausool hui hain ke Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zaid Al-Nahayan ne Kerala mein Seylaab ke mutasireen ko raahat ki farahmi ke liye Shaikh Mohammad ki nigrani mein aik hangami Committee ki tashkeel ka hukum diya hai. Kerala kaaf ki 3 crore aabaadi ke taqreeban 10 feesad log riyasat mein nahi rehtay. Kerala ke har teesray ghar ka fard kisi na kisi Gulf Mulak mein kaam karta hai.
1217.title: Kerala Seylaab ke mutasireen ko Gulf mumalik ka dast e taawun

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik baar phir Mulk bhar mein Zul Hijjah ke chaand ki Ruyat ke masla par mutazaad it-tila-aat aati rahen jis ki wajah se awam mein uljhan payi gayi. Hyderabad mein bhi Ruyat Hilal Committee ney ibtida mein adam Ruyat ka elaan kardiya tha taham baad azan faisla par nazarsani ki gayi. Sadar Majlis Ulema e Deccan ney bil akhir Zul Hijjah ka chaand nazar aane ka elaan kardiya. Markazi Ruyat Hilal Committee Sadar Majlis Ulema e Deccan ney qabal azeen chaand nazar anay ka elaan kardiya tha taham baad azan wazahat ki ke Madurai mein chaand nazar aaney ki ittila mausool hui jis par Chennai ke Qaazi Salahudding sahib se rabt paida karkay is ki tasdeeq haasil ki gayi aur sharai shahadat ki takmeel ke baad ruyat ki tasdeeq ki jati hai. Mausam barish ke baayis Mulk ke beshtar hisson mein matlaa abr-aalood rehne ki wajah se Ruyat Hilal mein dushwari paish aayi chunancha Mulk ke beshtar hisson mein ibtida mein adam Ruyat ka elaan kardiya gaya aur phir baad azan Ruyat ki tauseeq ke baad faisla par nazar e sani ki gayi. Ruyat Hilal ki tauseeq ke baad Hyderabad mein ab Eid uz Zuha 23
August ki bajaye 22
August ko hogi,taham Delhi mein Ruyat Hilal ke masla par raat dair gaye tak bhi uljhan baqi rahi.
1052.title: Zul Hijjah ka chaand nazar agaya, Hyderabad mein 22nd August ko Eid uz Zuha

news_detail: New Delhi. Jawahir Lal Nehru University ke Student Leader Umar Khalid par paiir ke din nai Delhi mein Constitution Club ke bahar namaaloom hamla awarne golian chalayein taham woh zakhmi honay se bach gaye. Police ne kaha ke 2:00 bajay dopehar ko jab Umar Khalid Constitution Club Rafi Marg mein munaqqid shudni aik seminar banwan ”khauf se paray aik azadi ki simt” (Towards A Freedom Without Fear) mein shirkat ke liye ihata mein daakhil ho rahay they, hujhoom mein se aik aadmi namodaar hotay hue un par pistol taan di. Ayini shahideen ne kaha ke is shakhs ne Umar Khalid par golian chalayein taham golian Umar Khalid ko nahi lagein. Police ka kehna hai ke aadmi ne pistol taan di thi taham fire nahi kya. Umar Khalid ka kehna hai ke un par hamla kiya gaya tha aur unhon ne firing ki aawazian sunen. Umar Khalid ne kaha ”Constitution Club ke bahar tea stall par main apne doston ke sath chaaye noshi kar raha tha ke aik hatta katta aadmi aqab se aaya aur apne hathon se meri gardan daboch li. Main ne mehsoos kya ke is ke haath mein bandooq thi, is liye mein ne is ke haath ko thaamay rakhnay ki koshish ki, mujhe dar tha ke woh kahin mujh par goli nah chalade. Is ne mujh par qaabu palaya aur mujhe zameen par gira diya. Iss ke baad uss ne mujh par goli chalaye. Jab mere doston ne is ko roknay ki koshish ki to woh bandooq pheink kar faraar hogaya. Main ne faasla par goli chalne ki aawaz suni. Bandooq se zaroor goli chalaye gayi.” Police ne kaha ke hum Student Leader ke bayan ka tajzya kar rahay hain. DSP Delhi Police Mr. Madhur Verma ka kehna hai ke yeh pata chalanay ki koshish ki jarahi hai ke aaya bandooq se goli chalaye gayi ya nahin. Umar Khalid ka kehna hai ke un par hamla huwa. Kisi ne un ko daboch liya aur peechay dhakail diya aur is ke baad is ne Khalid par goli chalanay ki koshish ki, lekin woh aisa nahi krska. Khalid ke mutabiq is ne hawa mein goli chalaye aur awam ne is ka taaqqub kya. Police ohdedar ne kaha ke hum Club ke gate par nasb CC tv camera ki footage ki jaanch kar rahay hain taakay hamla aawar ki shanakht ki jasakay. Yeh waqea yaum e aazadi se sirf do din Parliament se qareeb paish aaya jo high security area shumaar kya jata hai. Police waqea ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai aur hamla aawar ke wahan bhagtay hue chod di gayi pistol ko seize karliya gaya hai. yeh seminar ‘United Against Hate’ naami tanzeem ki janib se munaqqid kya ja raha tha. Baad azaan Khalid ne kaha ke Mulk mein aik qisam ke khauf ka mahol ban gaya hai aur koi bhi hukoomat ke khilaaf aawaz uthata hai usay dhmkaya ja raha hai. Indian Express ki report mein kaha gaya ke Ashish Pandey ke mutabiq jo us waqea ke waqt tea stall ke paas maujood thaiy, Umar Khalid chaaye noshi ke baad apne doston ke hamrah Club ko wapas lout rahay they aur jab woh Club ki gate ke qareeb puhanche to aik aadmi un se takarya jis ke nateeja mein jhagda shuru huwa, do doston ne madakhilat ki jabkay teesra dost madad ke liye pukarnay laga. Hamla aawar bach kar faraar honay mein kamyaab hogaya. Jab woh INS building ke qareeb pouncha to woh phisal gaya aur is ki bandooq neechay girgaee magar woh usay chod kar faraar hogaya. Aisa ho sakta hai ke jab bandooq neechay girnay lagi to woh ittafaq se chal gayi hogi.Baaz Ayini shahideen ka kehna hai ke bazahir woh tanha lagta tha magar is ke sath dosaron ki maujoodgi ke imkanaat ko bhi mustard nahi kiya ja sakta. Aik Ayini Shahid ne bataya ke hamla aawar ne do golya n chalayein.

Sadar Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen o Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne JNU Student Leader Umar Khalid par hamla ke baad aik tanzia tweet kya aur naam nihaad qoum paraston ko nishana banaya. Unhon ne apne twitter par likha ”9 pm qoum parasto tumhe nafrat paida karna aur har ek ku aur kisi ko bhi jo Supreme Leader ki mukhalfat karta hai qoum dushman qarar dena mubarak ho, jaissa ke aaj ka #’woh aik goli ka hi mustahiq hai’? sharamnaak”

Rukn Assembly Gujarat Mr. Jignish Mewani ne kaha ke hamla karne walay BJP aur RSS ke siwa koi dosray nahi ho saktay. Unhon ne kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke Umar Khalid par wohi logon ne hamla kya hai jinhon ne Gauri Linkesh,Pansaare, Kulbargi aur  Dabulkar ku jaan se mara tha. Unhon ne kaha ke Wazeer e Azam ko apna mun kholna chahiye aur aisay logon ko police tahaffuz faraham karna chahiye. Unhon ne kaha ke Modi ji ku mera challenge hai ke woh zail ke chaar masayel par chaar barson ke douran unhon ne jo kuch kya is par chaar minute mutwatir baat kare. 1. do crores mulazimaten,2.  Kisanon ki khodkshyan,3. Daliton, aqliaton aur khawateen par hamla aur 4. ifraat e zar.
1066.title: JNU Student Leader Umar Khalid par hamla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Vishwa Hindu Parishad, Bajrang Dal aur BJP samait daayen baazu ki deegar Hindu tanzeemon ney aaj ehtejaaj kya. Un tanzeemon ke darjanon kaarkunon ney aaj Hyderabad o  Ranga Reddy Collectorates par Hindu devataaon ki tauheen, Hindoon ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh kiye janay aur Hindu mazhabi rehnumaon ki tehqeer ke khilaaf ehtejaaji dharna diya. Hyderabad Collectorate par munsarim dharney mein sabiq markazi wazeer o Rukn Parliament Mr. Bandaru Datatrya ney bhi hissa liya. Ehtejajyon ney ilzaam aayed kya ke Telangana riyasat mein TRS hukoomat mein Hindoon ke devtaon ki tauheen karne aur un ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh karne ke waqeat barh gaye hain. Mukhalifin ko khuli chhut di gayi hai ke woh Hindoon ke devataaon ke khilaaf zabaan darazi kere aur is par sadaye ehtijaj buland karne walon ko dabaya ja raha hai. Mr.  Bandaru Datatrya ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue kaha ke Hindoon ke jazbaat ko thaiys pshonchanay walon ke khilaaf karwai karne mein buri terha nakaam hogayi hai jis ki wajah se un ke hauslay buland ho rahay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP is masla par khamosh nahi rahay gi. Daayen baazu ki Hindu tanzeemon ke qaideen nay ilzaam aed kya ke hukoomat dohra miyaar ikhtiyar kar rahi hai. Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko thaiys pahonchaney walon ko khuli chhut daiy rakhi gayi hai aur is ke barkhilaf ghair Hindu bradarion ki khushnodi haasil karne mein lagi hui hai. Baad dharna, ehtejajyon ney Zila Collector ko aik yad dasht paish karne ki koshish ki taham unhen Zila Collector ke daftar ke andar daakhil honay nahi diya gaya. Ehtejajion ne Swami Parimanand ke khilaaf Telangana Police ki  jaanib se ki gayi karwai ki bhi sakht mazammat ki aur un par riyasat mein dakhla par aayed imtina ko barkhast karne ka mutaliba kiya. Ehtejajyon ko Hyderabad Police ney hirasat mein le liya aur unhen mukhtalif Police Stationon ko muntaqil kardiya gaya. Ehtijaj ke baayis kaafi dair tak traffic mein khalal pada. Ehtejaaji Jai Sri Ram, Police zulm band karo ke naaray lgarhe thaiy.
1078.title: Daayen Baazu ki Hindu tanzeemon ka Hyderabad aur Ranga Reddy Collectorates par dharna

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner Hyderabad City Police ney 15 augst ko yom azaadi ke mauqa par Qilah Golconda prayed ground par ‘Yaum e Aazadi Parade’ ke liye intizamaat ke zimn mein awam ko mahswara dya ke woh Qilah Golconda, Prade Grounds ki simt jatay hue apne sath koi hand bag, briefcase, camera, tiffin careers ya kisi qisam ke containers sath na le jayen. Agar koi fard 15

August ko aisi ashya le jatay hue paaya jaye to is ki Police jama talashi le gi aur jaanch kere gi. Iss liye awam se khwahish ki jati hai ke iss khusoos mein Police ka taawun kere chunkay yeh security ka takaza hai. Hyderabad City Police ney Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par traffic ke rukh mein tabdeeli aur Qilah Golconda mein mukhtalif zumron mein gaadiyon ki parking ke liye alaheda elamia jari kya hai.
1099.title: Golconda mein Yaum e Azzadi taqreeb. Police tahdidaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qilah Golconda mein 15

August ko Yaum e Aazaadi ke mauqa par 10:00 bajey din Parcham kushai aur Parade ki munasibat se Golconda ke atraaf traffic ke munasib nazam ko yakeeni banaaney Hyderabad police ne traffic tahdidaat aayed ki hai jis ke mutabiq 15

August ko 7:00 bajey subah se 12:00 din tak Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda aaney wali traffic aam gadiyon ki aamad o raft band rahay gi. Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda mein dakhla ko Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par takreeb parcham kushai ke liye madoo kiye gay afraad ke liye 7:30 bajey subah taa 11:00 bajey din tak istemaal ki jayen gi jo A, B aur C Car Passes ke haamil hon ge. Secunderabad, Banjara Hills, Masab Tank, Mahdi Patnam ki taraf se A, B aur C car passes ke sath aaney walay tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Reti Bowli aur Nanal Nagar Junction se aagey badain aur baayen moud letay hue Balika Bhavan,Langar Houz Bridge, Tipu Khan Bridge, Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza aur Qilah Golconda Gaate ki taraf badhne daayen janib moud len. Neechay utrney ke baad ‘A Car Pass’ holders ko chahiye ke woh apni gadiyaan Fort Gate ke samnay main road par yani Fatah Darwaza Road par park karen. Jabkay ‘B Car Pass’ ke haamil mehmanon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh apni gadiyaan Golconda Bus Stop par park karen jo Gate se 25 meter ke faasla par hai aur ‘C Car Pass’ ke haamil maduyeen Golconda Bus Stop ke qareeb right turn letay hue Football/Boys Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Tamam maduyeen jo D, E aur F Car Pass ke sath atay hain woh Qilah Golconda ko Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi (Banjara Darwaza) ki taraf se barah Sheikhpet Naala aur Toli Chowki ayen chunkay unhen Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza se daakhil honay nahi diya jaye ga. ‘D Car Pass’ ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh Priya Darshini School Golconda ke paas utar jayen aur apni gadiyon ko parking ke liye Indira Priya Darshini School ke andar bhaij den. ‘E Car Pass’  ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi agay badh kar Golf Club ki simt baen moud len aur Jammali Darwaza ki taraf dayen janib moud kar aur apni gadiyaan Owaisi/GHMC Play Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Jo Qilah Golconda ke Main Gate se sirf 600 meter ke faasla par hai. ‘F Car Pass’ ke sath muqam takreeb aaney wali gadiyaan yani aam logon ki gadiyon walon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Langar Houz flayover ke neechay se aayen aur ‘U’ turn lein aur Fatah Darwaza ki simt jaany daayen janib moud le lein aur Fatah Darwaza ke qareeb HUDA Park par apni gadiyaan park karen. Sheikhpait aur Toli Chowki se aaney walay aam log apni gadiyaan Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi mein park karen. Un do muqamat se takreeb  ke muqam tak pahonchaaney ke liye muft RTC buses par sawaar ho saktay hain. Wapasi mein bhi inhen yeh sahoolat muyassar rahay gi.

Taqreeb ke ekhtetaam par A, B aur C Car Passes ki haamil gadiyaan Makai Darwaza, Ramdev Guda Langar Houz waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘D Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Banjara Darwaza, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘E Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Bada Bazaar Fatah Darwaza ya Jamali Darwaza, Golf Club, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera aur Langar Houz waghera se bahar nikleen gi. ‘G Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan yani aam log sirf apni parking ki jaghon se hi wapas lautenge. Tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi hai ke aasaan shanakht ke liye woh apne mutaliqa Car Passes gaadiyon ke wind screen ke baayen janib numayan taur par chiaspaan karen. Mazeed bran un se khwahish ki gayi hai ke woh dawat nama par ki gayi sarahat ke mutabiq bar waqat pahonch jayen. Alawa azeen un se yeh khwahish ki gayi ke woh route par, gadiyon se utrney ke muqamat aur gadiyon ki parking ki jaghon par taayinaat Traffic Police amlah ke sath taawun karen. Secunderabad Parade Ground par bhi Yaum e Aazadi ki munasibat se traffic tahdidaat aayed ki gayi hain. Tyoli Junction par traffic ko Broke Bound aur NCC Junction ki simt mod di gayi aur Tyoli se Plaza aaney wali gadiyon par 8:00 bajey subah taa 10:00 bajey din tak tahdidaat aayed rahengi. Golconda ke Main Gate par Boarding ke liye maduyeen ke drivers ku talab karne public address system ki sahulat rahegi.
1113.title: Golconda par Yaum e Aazadi taqreeb. Gaadiyon ka rukh aur traffic tahdidaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ki High Court se aaj Hindus ke mazhabi rehnuma Swami Paripoornanand ko badi raahat mili hai.
