Unhen shaher badar kiye jaanay ke ehkaam ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwast par muazziz High Court ney un ke shaher badar kiye jaanay ke ehkaam par hukum iltiwa jari kardiya hai. It-tila-aat ke mutabiq Swami Paripoornanand Hyderabad pohnchain ge aur mazeed bayanaat ke liye qiyam karen ge. Guzishta maah High Court mein Swami Paripoornanand ney teen alhadah Petitions mein Hyderabad, Cyberabad aur Rachakonda ke Commissioners aur Telangana ke Principal Secretary (dakhla) ki janib se un ke khilaaf jari kardah ehkaam ikhraj ko challenge kya tha. Unhen deegar bradarion aur un ke qayedeen ko nishana banatay huve isthiaal angaiz bayanaat dainay ka ilzaam aayed karte hue qanoon insidaad ghair samaji o khatarnaak sargarmian 1980 ke tehat unhen 6 mah ke liye 11

July ko Hyderabad se shaher badar kardiya gaya tha. Adalat ney qabal azeen is darkhwast ko samaat ke liye qubool karliya tha jis mein yeh id-daa kya gaya tha ke mazkoorah qanoon ke tehat shaher badar karne ke liye fard ka ghunda hona zaroori hai. Yaad rahay ke Telugu filmon ke naaqid o adakar Kathi Mahesh ney aik Television show mein HIndus ke bhagwaan Ram ke talluq se remark kya tha jis par Hindu bradri mein gham o gussa paaya jata tha. Swami Paripoornanand ney is bayan ke khilaaf sakht rad-e-amal zahir karte hue elaan kya tha ke woh Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko thais pohanchanay walay bayanaat ke khilaaf Shiva Temple Bod Uppal se Yadadri tak Dharmika Chaitnya Yatra’ nikalenge.Swami Paripoornanand se qabal Kathi ko bhi 6 mah ke liye shaher badar kya ja chuka hai. Kathi ney Hindus ke bhagwaan Ram ko dhoka baaz qarar dainay ke sath sath kayi naazaiba remarks bhi kiye thay aur yeh tak kahe diya tha ke Sita Devi ko Rawan ke sath hi rehna chahiye tha chunkay woh Lanka mein behtar zindagi guzar sakti thi.
1130.title: Swami Paripoornanand ko shaher badar karne ke ehkaam par High Court ka hukum iltiwa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Congress Rahul Gandhi ney aaj inteqhabaat ka saamna karne Congress Party ki tayarion ka jaiza liya. Yaad rahay ke Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K.Chandrashekar Rao ney kaha tha ke woh Telangana Riyasat mein Reyasti Assembly ke inteqhabaat shumal ki chaar riyaston ke sath kar wane ke haq mein hain jahan Jaria saal mah Decemeber mein inteqhabat munaqqidshudni hain. Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke iss bayan ke baad siyaasi halqon mein yeh charchay honey lagey hain ke Telangana Assembly ke inteqhabaat waqt se paheley munaqqid ho saktay hain. Rahul Gandhi ney apne daura e Telangana ke dosray din aaj lecture dainey ki bajaye party qaideen ke sath dubado baat cheet ki aur un ke khayalat ki samaat ki. Unhon ney party ke kayi ahem qaideen ke sath shakhsi taur par waqt guzarah aur un ki hausla afzai ki ke woh bilaa khauf aur ghair janibdari ke party ki kamzoriyon ki nishandahi karen. Zaraye ke mutabiq Rahul Gandhi ney intehai inkisari aur apni makhsoos muskurahat ke saath har qayed se alahda alahda baat cheet ki. Congress qayideen un ke liye apne sadar ka waqt nikaalna aur un ki baat sunna gavaaraa karne par bahot hi masroor nazar arahay thay. Rahul Gandhi ney party qaideen ki baat cheet bohat hi tahammul se suntay rahey aur darmain mudakhlat nahi ki. Woh androon party, jari aapsi rassa kashi ko daur karne koshan hain. Samjha jata hai ke unhon yeh taasur diya ke un ki daanist mein Party mein jari dakhli kashakash, Telangana mein ayendah inteqhabaat mein mehngi pad sakti hai. Unhon ney dakhli ikhtelafat ko door karne ke liye party qaideen par zor diya ke aapas mein ek dosray ke khilaaf ulhajtay rehne se ziyada ahem party ko dobarah Iqtidaar mein lana hai. Agar Party qaideen aur karkun yun hi ek dosray ke khilaaf rahenge toh hum asal maqsad se door ho jaien ge. Ijlaas ke baad Sabiq wazir Sarweypally Satanarayana ney kaha ke tamam qaideen khushi mehsoos kar rahay hain ke Rahul Gandhi ney un ke sath waqt guzara. Umooman is qad ke qayideen, apni party ke kaarkunon se khitaab karkay chalta bantaa hai magar Rahul Gandhi ney party kaarkunon ko Sunna gavaaraa kiya. Is mauqa par mojud ahem qayideen mein Saddar Pradesh Congress Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy, Sabiq wuzraa Mohammad Ali Shabir, K Jana Reddy, Sabiq markazi wazir S Jaipal Reddy aur sabiq Rukn e Parliament K. Renuka Choudary shaamil hain.
1164.title: Rahul Gandhi ne taqreer karne ki bajaye kaarkunon ko sunna pasand kya.

news_detail: Afghanistan mein Taliban Tehreek ke anasir ne Mulk ke shumal mein waqay fauji adda par hamla kar ke qabza karliya aur kam  az kam 17 Afghan faujion ko halaak aur 15 ko zakhmi kar diya. Muqami zimmaydaraan ne mangal ke roz bataya ke guzishta do roz mein ladai ke douran darjanon Afghan faujion ko qaidi bhi bana liya gaya. Afghanistan ke soobay Faryab ki council ke sarbarah Mohammad Tahir Rahmani ka kehna hai ke Taliban ne itwaar ke roz se shuru honay walay hamlon mein Gormach ke ilaqa mein waqay fauji adda mein maujood tanks aur gola barood par qabza kar liya hai. Hum adda mein daakhil nahi ho sakay aur is ka bada hissah abhi tak Taliban ke zair e control hai. Ilaqai ohdaydaaron ke mutabiq Taliban ne 40 Afghan fojion ko qaidi bana liya jab ke ladai mein uss ke apne 30 musallah arkaan halaak hue. Afghanistan ke shumal mein Taliban ka yeh hamla aisay waqt mein huwa jab ke Mulk ke junoobi mashriq mein Ghazni soobah mein jharpon ka silsila jari hai. Guzishta hafta shuru honay wali jhadpon mein ab tak sainkdo afraad halaak aur zakhmi ho chuke hain. Is douran Afghan fauj ko Amrici jungi tayyaron ki muawinat haasil hai. Ghazni se faraar honay walay Afghan shehrion ka kehna hai ke ladai ke nateeja mein shehar mein bijli aur pani ki farahmi ka silsila munqita ho gaya hai aur har taraf tabahi aur barbadi pheli hui hai. Taliban ke tarjuman Zabeehullah Mujahid ne id-daa kya ke 57 faujion ne Taliban ke agay hathyaar daal dyie aur deegar 17 ko fauji qaidi bana liya gaya hai aur 8 Humvee gaadiyan zabt karli gayi hain.
1181.title: Taliban ka fauji adda par qabza,Darjanoo Fauji qaid.

news_detail: Gaza aur Israel ke darmiyan taweel jung bandi ke liye Israeli Wazeer e Azam Benjamin Netanyahu aur Misri Sadar Alsisi ne khufia mulaqaat ki hai. Israeli media kay mutabiq Misar mein 22

May ko hui khufia mulaqaat mein Hamas-Israel jung bandi ke maamla par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya hai. Israeli aur Palestenian Authorities ki janib se iss report ke hawalay se tardeed ya tasdeeq ke liye koi bayan samnay nahi aaya hai. Misar aur Aqwam e Mutahidda Israel aur Hamas ke darmiyan taweel jung bandi ke liye saalisi ki koshishen kar rahay hain. Israeli akhbarat ke mutabiq Israeli Wazeer e Azam Netanyahu ne Sadar Misar Abdel Fattah el-Sisi se mulaqaat ke liye mah May mein Misar ka khufia dora kya tha. It-tila-aat mein namaloom Amrici ohdedaron ke hawala se kaha gaya ke is dora ka asal maqsad Gaza patti mein intizamaa aur wahan Palestinian Authority ki wapsi aur Israel aur Gaza ke hukumraan ke darmiyan jung bandi, Gaza patti par israeli aur Misri naka bandi mein narmi par tavajja markooz karna tha. Bataya jata hai ke is mulaqaat mein Hamas ke zair tahweel Israeli faujion aur do fojion ki laashon ki wapsi ko yakeeni bananay par bhi tabadlae khayaal kiya gaya. Alawaazeen Sadar America ke mansoobah aman par bhi ghhor o khoz kya gaya, is mansoobah aman ko abhi aam nahi kya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke mulaqaat mein Abdel Fattah el-Sisi ne is baat par zor diya ke Gaza patti par Palestinian Authority ki wapsi ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Un ka yeh kehna tha ke chahay yeh batadreej kya jaye aur Hamas ki janib se paishgi shart ke taur par hathyaar daalnay se kyun nah inkaar kardiya jaye. Sadar Misar ne kaha ke Israel, Arab mumlikaton aur bain ul aqwami bradri ko chahiye ke woh Palestinian Authority Mahmoud Abbas par dabao daaley ke woh Gaza ka nazam o nasq sambhaal le. Report ke mutabiq Israeli Wazeer e Azam ke hamrah chand musheeron aur security ahelkaron ki mukhtasir si team thi. Woh Cair mein sirf chand ghantay hi tawaquf kiye aur Jerusalem wapas laotne se qabal Sesi ke sath iftaar kya tha. Is ke baad se Hamas aur Israeli ke darmiyan tassadum ke kayi waqeat paish aeye. Israel ne Hamas ki janib se hamlon ka ilzaam aayed karte hue Gaza patti par kayi baar fazai hamlay bhi kiye thay jin mein kayi Palestenian bashmole bachay maaray gaye. Netanyahu ne guzashta itwaar ko bhi Gaza patti mein Hamas ke khilaaf apni karwaiya anjaam dainay ka intibah diya tha. Sisi aur Netanyahu ki khufia mulaqaat ke baaray mein Muslim duniya mein yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke Gaza patti se Hamas ko be dakhal karne ke liye Israel aur Misar aik dosray se taawun kar rahay hain aur unhen kayi Arab Mumalik ki bhi darparda taayeed o himayat haasil hai, Taham aam Musalmanoon mein yeh ta-assur paaya jata hai ke Hamas ke khilaaf Palestenian Authority ki taayeed karna darasal Israel ki taayeed karne ke mumasil hai. Aisa lagta hai ke Misar aur chand Arab Mumalik ghair mehsoos tareeqa se Gaza patti se Hamas ko be dakhal karne ke aik khufia mansoobah par amal pera hain.
1199.title: Israeli Wazeer e Azam aur Misri Sadar ki khufia mulaqaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar All India Congress Party Mr. Rahul Gandhi ne apne do roza daura e Hyderabad ke dosray din Gun Park waqay rubaroo Assembly imaraat pahonch kar “Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana” par Telangana Riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye shaheed honay walay jahedkaron ko qhiraaj paish kya aur un ki rawaangi ke fauri baad TRS ke qayideen ne yadgar ka doodh se abhishek kya. Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke ‘Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana’ pahonchney par barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki talba tanzeem ke qayideen ne intibah diya tha jis ke paish e nazar Police ne security ke wasee tar intizamaat kiye thaiy. Mr. Rahul Gandhi aaj seh pahar Telangana ke party qaideen aur kaarkunon ki bhaari tadaad ke sath Gun Park pahonche aur Yadgar par phool malaayen paish ki aur Shaheedan e Telangana ko qhiraaj paish kya. Mr. Rahul Gandhi ne dosray din Hyderabad mein masroof tareen din guzara. Unhon ne talba ke sath bhi tabadlah khayaal kiya aur party ke qaideen ke sath dubado baat cheet ki aur un ke khayalat ki samaat ki. Sadar Congress ba zarea tayyarah Dehli wapsi se qabal Saroornagar Stadium mein Ek jalsa se bhi khitaab kiya. Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke Yadgaar Shaheedan e Telangana ka daura karne ke baad barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke qaayideen aur party se mulhiqa talba tanzeem ke qaayideen ne Yadgar ko doodh se dhoya. TRS qaayideen Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke wahan se rawana honay ke kuch dair baad Gun Park puhanche aur ‘Yadgar Shaheedan e Telangana’ ka doodh se abhishek kya. TRS qaideen ne aysa karte hue yeh taassur diya ke Sadar Congress Mr.Rahul Gandhi ke yahan pounchanay se ‘Yadgar Shaheedan e Telangana’ ki naqadri hui hai, is liye is ko pak karne ke liye doodh ka abhishek diya gaya. Rukn Parliament Mr. Balka Saman, Deputy Mayor Mr. Baba Fasiuddin, sargaram quied Mr. Muqeet Chanda aur kayi sargaram qaideen ne is abhishek mein hissa liya aur Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke yahan pounchanay par apni barhami ka izhaar kya. TRS qaideen ka yeh istadlaal tha ke Telangana ke sath sab se ziyada na insafi Congress ke hi daur mein hui hai. Alahda Telangana Riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye chalaye gayi dono tahrikaat ko Congress hi ne kuchalnay ki koshish ki thi jis ke nateeja mein sainkddon Telangana awam ko apni jaanun ka nazrana paish karna pada. TRS qaayideen ka kehna hai ke ab jabkay itni qurbanion ke baad Telangana haasil huwa, Congress Party, Telangana awam ki taayeed haasil karne Shaheedan e Telangana se apni hamdardi jatanay ki koshish kar rahi hai jo sirf aur sirf vote batorne ka Ek harba hai.
1220.title: Rahul Gandhi ka Shaheedan e Telangana ko qhiraaj. TRS ne doodh se abhishek kardiya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem ney aaj Eidgha Mir Aalm ka daura karte hue Eid uz Zuha ki tayariyon ka jaayiza liya. Un ke hamrah Rukn Assembly Bahadurpura Mr. Mouzam Khan , CEO Waqf Board Mr. Shahnawaz Qasim , DCP South Zone Mr. V Satiyanarayana ke alawa Waqf Board, GHMC aur water Board ke  ohderaan bhi maujood thay. Mr. Saleem ney bataya ke har saal ki terha is saal bhi Eidgha Mir Aalm mein Eid uz Zuha ki namaz ke intizamaa kiye jarahay hain. Mausam e barish ke paish e nazar Eidgha ke androoni ihata mein Teen Shade dala gaya hai. Sadarnasheen Waqf Board ney bataya ke tamaam mehakuma jaat ke sath taawun o ishteraak aur behtar rabita ke sath Waqf Board intizamaat kar raha hai. Unhon nay awam se appeal ki ke woh intizamia ke sath taawun o ishteraaq karen aur safai suthrayi ka khaas khayaal rakhen. Zabiha janwaron ke ghair mustamila  aaza ki ko sadkon aur galiyouon mein pheenk dainay ki bajaye un ki behtar nikasi ko yakeeni banayen aur is khusoos mein GHMC amlah ke sath taawun karen. Har saal ki terha is saal bhi Eidgha Mir Aalm mein Eid ki namaz 9:30 bajey ada ki jaye gi. Imam o khateeb Mecca Masjid Moulana Mohammad Rizwan Qureshi imamat karenge aur khutba denge. Namaz se qabal Moulana Hussamuddin Sani Jaffer Pasah AMir e Millat e Islamia Telangana aur Moulana Saifuddin (Jamia Nizamia) ka bhi khitaab hoga.
1095.title: Sadarnasheen Waqf Board ka Eidgha Mir Alam ka daura

news_detail: Hyderabad. Selaab se dochar Kerala ke awam ki madad mein Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen bhi shaamil hogayi hai. saddar kal hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeeno rukan parliment barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi nay aik tweet kya jis mein unhon nay kaha ke un ki party nay faisla kya hai ke –apne trust’ Majlis Charitble Trust’ ke zareya Kerala flood relief ke liye 16 lakh rupay ka atiya diya jaye. Yeh raqam kal Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief0 Fund mein jama krwadi jaye gi. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke is ke alawa hum 10 lakh rupay maliyat ki adwiyaat bhi Kerala rawana karen ge. unhon nay awam se khwahish ki ke woh agay badhen aur Kerala ki madad karen.
1112.title: Selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke liye Majlis ki imdaad

news_detail: Makkah Mukramah. Makkah Mukramah mein taiz o tund hawa ne Kabatullah ke Kiswa is terha udney laga ke Kabatullah ki diwaren andar se jhanknay lagen. Social Media par tasaveer aur videos gasht karne lagen jin mein yeh nzarah dikhaya gaya ke taiz o tund hawaon ne Kabatullah ko dhaankne wala ghilaaf udney laga jis ki wajah se andar se Kabatullah ki diwaaren nazar anay lagien. Ghilaaf Kabah jisay ‘Kiswa’ kaha jata hai ke khalis resham se tayyar kya jata hai aur is par talai dhagon se Quran Majeed ki ayaat se sajaya jata hai. har saal Yaum e Arfa ke mauqa par Kiswa ko tabdeel kya jata hai, aur is din Masjid e Haram taqreeban khaali hoti hai chunkay isi din tamam Hujjaj karaam mnasik Hajj ki adai ke hissa ke taur par Maidan e Arfat mein jama ho jatay hain. Kiswa ke apni jagah se hatt jaany ke baad aur hawaon ki raftaar mein jon hi kami aayi workers ne fori Kiswa ko apni jagah par le aaya. Kal ghilaaf e Kabah ko tabdeel kardiya jaye ga. Arfat se mausula it-tila-aat ke mutabiq itwaar ki shaam ko jald pahonch jaany walay Hujjaj karaam ka Arfat mein taiz hawaon aur barish ne istaqbaal kya. Aadhay ghanta tak yeh silsila jari raha aur phir sab kuch jon ka ton waisay hi hogaya.

1133.title: Makkah Mukramah mein taiz o tund hawaayen aur baarish

news_detail: Saudi Arab  ki hukoomat aur niji idaray mil kar sab Allah ke mehmanon ke aaraaam raahat aur manasik Hajj ki adai mein un ki muawnat mein masroof hain. Aik falahi tanzeem ‘Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ne Hujjaj karaam ke liye aik nai sahoolat muta-arif karai hai. Tanzeem ki taraf se Hujjaj aur muatamarin ke liye 18 se 24 ‘Sleeping Capsule’ mobile kamray tayyar karaye hain. Hujjaj karaam manasik Hajj ki adai ke dauran inhen mukhtasir waqt mein sustaane ke liye istemaal kar satke hain.’Al Arabia.net’ ke mutabiq ‘Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ki taraf se muta-arif karaye gaye ‘sleeping Capsule’ ko ‘Hotel Gift’ qarar diya ja raha hai. Is tanzeem ka mousmi daftar mashaar Muqaddisa mein Hai jo Hujjaj aur muatamrin ko deegar kayi Services bhi faraham karti hai. Tanzeem ki sarparasti Wizarat Labour wo Samaji Behbood ke Director General Abdullah Bin Ahmed al-Tawi karte hain.’Sleeping Capsule’ aazmin Hajj ke liye Hajj ke mauqa par yeh apni noiyat ki aik munfarid sahoolat hai.’Hotel Gift’ teen murabba meter par mushtamil chhootey chhootey mobile kamray hain jinhein aik se dosray maqam par ba aasani le jaya ja sakta hai. Sheeshay, Plastic aur Fibre se tayyar kardah un kamron ko ‘Maqnateesi Chaabi’ ki madad se khoola aur band kya ja sakta hai. Un mein aik bistar bichaa hota hai jis ke sath aik takiya bhi hai, jab ke Sleeping Capsule ki androoni gunjaish 2.64 murabba meter aur oonchai 1.2 meter hai. Hujjaj karaam is mein aaraam karne ke sath kayi dosray ahem umoor bhi anjaam dey sakte hain. Is mein mobile phone charge karne, Suraj ki garmi se bachney, apni marzi ke mutabiq daraja hararat set karne aur pasand ki roshni ka ihtemaam karne ki sahoolat hai. In Sleeping Capsule ko aik dosray ke sath sath ya aik dosray ke oopar bhi rakha ja sakta hai. Is mein chadhne ke liye seedhi maujood hai jo balai Sleeping Room tak pahuncha sakti hai. Un kamron mein toilet, haath mun dhonay aur nahanay ki sahoolat bhi maujood hai. Tanzeem ke Director General Mansoor Al-Amr ne bataya ke aalmi sateh par is terhan ke mobile Sleeping Room Japan mein tayyar kiye jatay hain. Baaz dosray mulkon ke shehron mein bhi yeh sahoolat maujood hai.’Hadiyat ul Haaj’ ki taraf se pehli baar Hujjaj karaam ke liye yeh sahoolat haasil ki gayi hai taakay bohat ziyada rush ke auqaat mein aazmin ko kuch dair aaraam ki sahoolat faraham karna hai. Aik sawal ke jawab mein unhon ne kaha Hujjaj karaam ko yeh sahoolat mukammal taur par muft mein faraham ki jati hai, taham Japan se is ki daraamad par aik lakh Euro se zayed ke akhrajaat aaye hain. Al-Amr ka kehna tha ke fil-waqt rozana 60 Hujjaj karaam un Sleeping Rooms se istefada kar saktay hain magar un kamron ki tadaad badhaane ke nateejay mein un se istefada karne walon ki tadaad mein bhi izafah ho sakta hai.
1150.title: Hajion ke liye’Sleeping Capsule’ ki nai service

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K.Chandrashekar Rao ki janib se deegar riyaston ke sath Telangana mein bhi Assembly intekhabaat karwney Election Commission se darkhwast aur mah September mein hi umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kardainay ke elaan ke baayis na sirf TRS qaiydeen balkay deegar Partiyon ke qayideen ko bhi yeh lagnay laga hai ke riyasat mein qabal az waqt intekhabaat munaqqid ho saktay hain. Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke shana ba shana jad-o-jehad karne walay Professor Kodandaram ki zair qayadat nai tanzeem Telangana Jana Samiti (TJS) bhi intekhabi maidan mein qismat aazmai ke liye par tol rahi hai. Professor Kodandaram Sadar ney pehlay hi is azm ka izhaar kya tha ke un ki Party Telangana ki tamam 119 Assembly nashiston par apne umeed waar khada kere gi, aik baar phir apne is azm ka izhaar kya hai. Phir ke din akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Professor Kodandaram ney kaha ke TJS aayindah intekhabaat 2019 mein tanha 119 nashiston par muqaabla keregi taham unhon ney waqt se qabal intekhabaat ke ineqad ke liye jo wajuhaat batai jarahi hain un se ittafaq nahi kya.
1165.title: TJS 2019 intekhabaat mein tanha muqaabla keregi: Professor Kodandaram

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ke tameeri kaam aakhir kaar takmeel ke marhala mein daakhil ho chukay hain aur ab Waqf Board ke arbaab ko yeh umeed ho chuki hai ke jaria mah ke awakhir tak taameeri kaam mukammal ho jaiyen ge. Yaad rahay ke mehakuma Road And Building ki nigrani mein yeh taamiraat anjaam di jarahi hain, jis ke liye hukoomat Telangana ki grant in aid Waqf Board ke tavassut se jari ki jarahi hai. Sadaarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem aur Chief Executive Officer Mr. Shahnawaz Qasim ne aaj Jamia Nizamia pahonch kar Auditorium ke taameeri kaamon ka mushahida kya. Yaad rahay ke do saal qabal Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ki taameer ka mansoobah banayagya tha. Is khusos mein MIM ne TRS hukoomat se khwahish ki thi ke Jamia Nizamia mein Auditorium ki taamer sarkari kharch par ki jaye, jis par Chief Minister K. Chandarshekar Rao ne amaadgi zahir ki aur is ziman mein pehlay 10 Crores Rupay ibtida mein jari karne ki manzoori di gayi thi jis ko baad azan badha kar 14.65 Crore rupay kardiya gaya. Chief Minister ke hi haathon March 2015 mein is Auditorium ka sang e bunyaad rakha gaya tha. Aaj daura karne ke baad Mr. Mohammad Saleem ne kaha ke agarchay tameeri kamon mein kuch takheer hui hai magar ab yeh aakhri marhala mein daakhil hochuki hain aur tawaqqa hai ke August ke awakhir tak tameeri kaam  mukammil hojaye ga aur bahut jald is ka iftetah Chief Minister K.Chandrashekar Rao ke hathon amal mein aayega. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh apni nauiyat ka aik munfarid Auditorium hoga. Is mauqe par Sheikh ul Jamia Jamia Nizamia Maulana Mufti Khaleel Ahmed ne bhi tawaqqa zahir ki ke Auditorium ki taameer ke kaam is mah ke ekhtataam tak mukammal karliye jayen ge. Unhon ne kaha ke dua hai ke kaam jald se jald mukammal ho jaien ge. Unhon ne kaha ke Sadaarnasheen aur CEO ne aaj daura kya aur woh bhi yaqeen dilarahe hain ke yeh kaam August ke ekhtetaam tak mukammal ho jayenge.
1185.title: Jamia Nizamia Auditorium ke tameeri kaam ki awakhir August tak takmeel: Mohammad Saleem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ameer Millat e Islamia Telangana o Andhra Pradesh Maulana Hussamuddin Saani Jaffer Pasha ney kaha ke Eid uz Zuha ke mauqa par janwarion ki qurbani karna aik deeni fareeza hai. Qurbani ki bajaye zarooratmandon ki madad karne se qurbani ke farz ki adayi nahi hosakti is liye is ka koi mutabadil nahi hai. aajkl yeh afwahen chal rahi hain ke qurbani ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke museebat zadgaan ko dey dainey se qurbani hojaye gi. Qurbani aur khairaat o dast giry allag maamla hai. Maulana Jaffer Pasha ne aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke yeh soch ghalat hai ke khandan ki taraf se aik janwar zubah kardiya jaye aur baaqi afraad khandan ke naam ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke mutasireen selaab ki madad ke liye dey di jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke Islam mein is baat ki gunjayish nahi hai ke jin par qurbani farz ho woh janwar ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam khairaat kardey, chahay halaat kuch bhi kyun nah hon. Unhon ney baaz gooshon ki janib se is martaba janwaron ki qurbani karne ki bajaye is ki raqam Kerala ke selaab se mutasireen ki imdaad ke liye day dainey ki baabat kaha ke qurbani mouqoof nahi hosakti. Haan albatta aap chahain to qurbani ka fareeza anjaam dainey ke baad jitni chahay, Kerala ke mutasireen ki imdaad kar saktay hain. Eid uz Zuha ke mauqa par janwaron ki qurbanion mein jahan apne ghar walon ka khayaal rakha jata hai wahein ghareebon ka bhi khayaal rakhen. hamaray amal se kisi ko bhi takleef nah honey paye, jo bhi janwar zibah karte hain is ki video graphi nah karen, tamasha nah baneyen chunkay yeh qurb e Ilahi ka maamla hai, numayesh ke liye nahi hai balkay Allah se aap ki mohabbat ka imthehaan hai, is imthehaan ko mazaq ka zareya nah baneyen. Aap janwar jo zubah karen is ki nakara ashya raastoon mein daal kar dosaron ke liye takleef ka mojab nah baneyen. Qurbani ke mauqa par un logon ko bhi nah bhulain jo pani mein mahsor hain. ahlyan Kerala apne aap ko selaab ke pani mein mahsor mehsoos kar rahay hain. qurbani ka koi badal nahi hai. Unhon ney bataya ke aaj Jamia Masjid Dar us Shifa mein baad isha jalsa yaad ibrahim khalil Allah alaihi salam rakha gaya hai is jalsa mein Kerala aur deegar ilaaqon ke mutasireen e selaab ke liye dua bhi ki jaye gi. Unhon ney musalmanoon se yeh bhi khwahish ki ke woh qanoon ki paasdari karen aur aisi koi harkat nah kere jis se aap qanoon ki girift mein asaktay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke aisa koi mauqa faraham na karen jis se aman dushmanon ko hamari riyasat ki ganga jamni tahazeeb ko darham barham karne ka mauqa faraham nah karen.
1202.title: Kerala ke mutasireen ki imdaad se qurbani ada nahi hojati. Maulana Jaffer Pasha

news_detail: Pakistan ke nau muntakhab Wazeer e Kharaja Shah Mahmood Qureshi ney id-daa kya ke Bharat ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney kal khat bheja hai jis mein Imran Khan ko Wazeer e Azam ban’ney ki mubarakbad di hai aur mazakraat ki dawat bhi di hai. Wazeer e Kharja Shah Mahmood Qureshi apne ohda ka halaf lainey ke baad Daftar e Kharja poanch gaye. Wazeer e kharja ka mazeed kehna hai ke inhen Bharat ke sath darina masail ka idraak hai, Bharat ki Wazeer e Kharaja ke liye mera pegham hai ke ‘Kashmir’ Pakistan aur Bharat mein tanazeaat ki bunyadi wajah hai, dono Mumalik hamsaye aur atomici quvvat hain, Bharat se tasalsul ke sath dialogue ki zaroorat hai. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke ayindah mah aqwam e mutahidda ka ijlaas honey wala hai, beroni Mumalik Pakistan ke safeer haakim nahi hain, Mulk ko aalsmi tanhai se nikaalte ke liye iqdamaat karenge, Pakistan ka mafaad sab se muqaddam hai. Shah Mahmood Qureshi ney kaha ke Pakistan aur America mein etemaad ka fuqdaan hai jisay door karna chaahunga, America ke sath maazi mein kaam karne ka bhi mauqa mila hai, tarjeehat samney rakh kar Amrici Wazeer e Kharja se baat karoonga. Wazeer e Kharsja Shah Mahmood Qureshi ka kehna hai ke C-Pack bahut ahem mansoobah aur game changer hai, Chinese safir ko dawat di hai ke woh C-Pack par paishraft se aagah karen. Wazeer e Kharaja ka kehna hai ke Afghanistan aur Pakistan ko aik dosray ki zaroorat hai, Afghanistan Wazeer e Kharaja se rabita karkay dora kabul ki khwahish rakhtay hain.
1215.title: Mazakraat ke liye Pakistan ko Modi ki dawat: Pakistani Wazeer e Kharaja

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi nay Babri Masjid-Ram Mandir milkiyat muqadma mein Supreme Court ka faisla Hindus ke haq mein na anay ki soorat mein Ram Mandir ki taamir ko yakeeni bananay Parliament mein qanoon saaz karne Deputy Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh Keshav Prasad Morya ke bayan ka sakht note letay hue un ke bayan ko behooda qarar diya aur kaha ke is terha ki batein karte hue kis ko daraya ja raha hai? Aam intikhabaat 2019 ko dheyaan mein rakhtay hue Bharatiya Janata Party Babri Masjid milkiyat tanazia ko intikhabi mauzo bananay ke darpay hai, jis ki kadi ke taur par Uttar Pradesh ke Deputy Chief Minister Keshav Prasad Morya ney haal hi mein kaha ke Adalat mein hamaray mawafiq faisla na anay ki soorat mein Babri Masjid ki jagah Ram Mandir ki taamir ke liye Parliament mein qanoon ki manzoori ka ikhtiyar khula huwa hai. Yaad rahay ke Supreme Court mein Babri Masjid muqadma ki qatayi samaat jari hai. Morya ney kaha awam ka aiqan hai ke Supreme Court ka faisla jald aajay ga aur Ram Mandir ki taamir mein haayel rukawaten door ho jaiengi. Ya to faisla jald aayega ya phir mazakraat ke zareya hum koi hal dhondh nikaal leinge ya phir Parliament ke zareya qanoon saazi ka teesra ikhtiyar khula huwa hai. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi nry aik qaumi news channel se baat cheet karte hue istafsaar kya ke Deputy Chief Minister kaisi zabaan istemaal kar rahay hain? Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke aaya woh kisi ko dhamki dey rahay hain ke agar faisla un ke haq mein nahi aaya to qanoon saazi karte hue Mandir taamir ki jaye gi? Unhon nry poocha ke tum Dastoor ki kaunsi difaa ke tahet tum qanoon banasakte ho jab ke maamla Supreme Court mein zair douran hai? Yeh mayoosi ki khuli alamat hai aur woh darasal awam ka dheyaan btane ki koshish kar rahay hain taakay Bharat ke awam un se mulazimton, afraat e zar, ashya ki qeematon mein izafah, Kashmir mein jo kuch ho raha hai, selaab se mutasirah Kerala ki fauri imdaad na karne se mutaliq makhsoos sawalaat na kar saken. Sangh Pariwar aur BJP ke log har dosray din dheyaan hatao technic ko ikhtiyar karte hain.
1229.title: Qanoon saazi ke zareya Ram Mandir ki taamir ka eindiya . Uttar Pradesh ke Deputy Chief Minister ke bayan par Barrister Owaisi ki nukta cheeni

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein manasik e Hajj ki adai ke dauran maidan Arafat mein waqoof ke waqt aik Arduni (Jordanian) khatoon ne bache ko janam diya. Saudi Arab ki sarkari news agency ‘SPA’ ke mutabiq aik Arduni Hajn ko dard e zeh shuru honay ke baad Jabl e Rahma ke Hospital laya gaya jahan is ne bache ko janam diya hai. Hospital intizamia ki taraf se maa aur bacha ko har mumkin tibbi sahoolat muhayya ki gayi hai aur dono ki sahet tasalii bakhash hai. Waalid ne betay ka naam Jabal al Rhmah Hospital ke Director ki nisbat se ‘Wazah’ rakha hai.
1242.title: Maidan e Arafat mein Jordanian Hajan ne bache ko janam diya

news_detail: HEH The Nizam’s Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhay gaye nawadiraat do kg wazni  Heere aur Ruby jade Tiffin Box, Cup Saucer aur golden spoon ka sarqa. Sarqe ka pata chalanay Police ki 10 Teams tashkeel. Commissioner Police aur deegar aala ohdedaron ka daura. Administrative Officer Nizam’s Museum ki shikayat par muqadma darj

Hyderabad. Nizam’s Museum se naadir ashiya ka sarqa karliya gaya hai. Sarqa karne walon ne Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayeen qeemti ashya ka sarqa karliya jin mein HEH Nizam ke zair e istemaal tilai (golden) tiffin box, aik cup aur aik saucer aur aik tilai chamcha shaamil hain. Bata ya jaata hai ke International Market mein in antique pieces ki qeemat 1-2 crore ho sakti hai. Yeh Museum jahan waqay hain uss se ½ km ke faasle par Police Station, ACP aur DCP ke dafaatir maujood hain. Yeh waardaat itwaar ki raat mein paish aayi aur Nizam’s Museum ke Administrative Officer Shaukat Hussain mein Police yeh shikayat darj karwai ki jab peer ke din Museum ko khola gaya tha to yeh paaya gaya ke aik showcase ka locks tootay hue hain aur aik tiffin box, aik tea set aur chamcha gayab hain. Unhon ne bataya ke sarqa karne walay ventilation ke zareya andar daakhil hue aur jis gallery mein yeh nawadiraat rakhay hue thae is ke CC Tv camera ko nuqsaan pohanchaya aur aik showcase mein rakhi hui yeh ashya sarqa karli. Unhon ne bataya ke Museum mein chaar galleries hain aur yahan ki qeemti ashya ki nigrani ke liye 10 CC Tv camera nasb hain. Museum ki nigrani ke liye din mein 5 aur raat mein 3 security personals maamoor hain. Unhon ne bataya ke Police ki mukhtalif teamon ne muqam e waardaat se shawahid akhatta kiye hain, figner prints waghera haasil karli gayi hain aur sniffer dogs ki bhi khidmaat se istifada kiya gaya hai. Shikayat ki mausooli par Mir Chowk Police ne aik muqadma darj karte hue mulzimeen ka pata chalanay 10 teams tashkeel di hai. Commissioner Police Hyderabad  Mr. Anjani Kumar ne Museum ka daura kya. Bataya jata hai ke saariq/sariqeen ne Museum ki pehli manzil par aahani grill khol kar andar daakhil hue aur mazkurah ashya ki chori karkay faraar hogaye. Police ko shuba hai ke yeh jaankaar afraad ki hi karstani ho sakti hai. Bataya jata hai ke tiffin box do kg wazni hai jis par heere aur ruby jaday hue hain. Iss Museum mein Nizam ke zair e istemaal kayi qeemti ashya maujood hain. Bataya jata hai ke iss Museum mein 700-800 kg wazan ki besh baha ashya maujood hain jin ki bain ul aqwami market mein qadar aik mehdood andaza ke mutabiq 2,000 crore rupiya se bhi zayed hai. Pahele yeh Museum ground floor par tha jis ko baad azan first floor par muntaqil kya gaya hai. yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke jis imarat mein yeh Museum waqay hai woh Prince Mukaram Jah Bahadur Trust ke tahet hai aur Museum Prince Mufakham Jah Bahadur ke Trust ke tahet hai. Guzishta kayi dinon se is imarat se Museum ke takhlia ke liye Prince Mukaram Jah Bahadur Trust ki janib se prince Mufakham Jah Bahadur ke Trust ko notices jari ki jarahi theen. Founder and Managing Trustee  Deccan Heritage Trust Dr. Mohammad Safiullah ne bataya ke Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayi ashya agarchay Prince ki zaati milkiat mein hain lekin yeh aik qaumi asasa bhi hai jis ki hifazat sirf Trust par hi nahi balkay hukoomat par bhi aayed hoti hai. Unhon ne kaha ke yeh qeemti ashya jis imarat mein rakhi gayi hain woh Museums ke liye International miyaraat par khari nahi utarti hai. Hukoomat ko chahiye ke woh is Museum mein rakhi gayi nawadiraat aur qeemti ashya ki hifazat aur un ki munasib display ke intizamaa kiye jayen aur is ke liye salana grant manzoor ki jaye.
1108.title: Nizam’s Museum se nawadiraat ka sarqa

news_detail: Hyderabad. Lumbini Park aur Gokul Chat Bhandar mein August 2007 ko hue bomb dhamakon ka muqadma aaj faisal kardiya gaya hai. Iss case mein makhoz 5 mulzimeemn mein 2 mulzimeemn Anique Shafeeq Saeed aur Ismayeel Choudhri ko qusoorwaar paaya gaya hai jabkay deegar 3 mulzimeemn ko na kafi saboton ke baayis bari kya gaya hai. 25

August 2007 ko shaher ke do muqamat Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park mein dhamakay hue thae jin mein majmoi taur par 42 log halaak hogaye thay jabkay 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thae. shaher ke deegar muqamat par mazeed do bombs ko nakara banadiya gaya. shehar ke tafrehi maqam ”Lumbini Park” mein 25

August 2007 ko shaam 7:45 bajey  aik zordaar dhamaka huwa jis ke 5 minutes baad hi qalb shaher mein masroof tareen muqam Koti par Chat ki mashhoor dukaan ”Gokul Chat Bhandar” ke paas aik aur dhamaka huwa. Baad azan shaher ke do muqamat se do bombs ko bar aamad kya gaya aur unhen phatt padney se qabl hi nakara banadiya gaya tha. Un dhmakon mein marnay walay mukhtalif tabqaat se talluq rakhtay thae jin mein bachay, talba aur khawateen bhi shaamil thay. Un judwaa bomb dhmakon ka muqadma 27
August ko faisal honay wala tha jis ko Second Additional Metropolitan Sessions Judge Mr. T. Srinivas Rao ney 4

September tak moakhar kardiya tha aur aaj 11 saal baad muqami adalat ney Anique shafeeq Saeed aur Ismayeel Choudhri ko qusoorwaar qarar diya gaya jabkay Mohammad Sadiq Nisar Ahmed Badshah Sheikh , Farooq Sharfuddin Turkish aur Mohammad Tariq Anjum Ahsen ko bari kardiya gaya hai. Adalat qusoorwaar paye gaye mulzimeemn ki saza ka peer ko elaan kere gi. Yeh mulzimeemn in dinon Chiralapally Jail mein mahruse hain. Un charon mulzimeen ko pahley Maharashtra ki ATS ney girftar kya tha jinhein baad azan transit warrant par Gujarat muntaqil kya gaya tha. fi al-waqt woh Chirlapally Jail mein mahruse hain.
1121.title: Gokul Chat. Lumbini Park Bomb Blasts: 2 qusoorwaar 2 bari

news_detail: Hyderabad. Zila Khamam mein Aswarapurpet Assembly halqa se talluq rakhnay walay Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke Senior qayed Kondalkandla  Venkat Reddy ney chand qaideen ke sath party ko khairbad keh diya. Woh zila ke Chandrugonda aur Annapureddypalle Mandals ke maqbool aam qayed hain. Venkat Reddy jo sabiq wazeer Jalgam Prasad Rao ke pairokaar thae apne siyasi career ka aaghaz uss waqt kiya tha jab Anjhani Chief Minister Y S Rajshekhar Reddy Congress ke qayed thae. Venkat Reddy ney congress party mein apni khidmat anjaam di thi aur Kothagudem halqa Assembly mein Party ki kamyabi mein kaledi role ada kya tha. Baad azan woh YSR Congress party mein shaamil hogaye thea. Woh chand saal qabal Congress party ke aik aur kalidi qayed Thati Venkateshwarulu ke hamrah TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiyar ki thi. Maloom huwa hai ke sabiq wazeer Jalgam Prasad Rao ney Venkat Reddy se riyasat mein siyasi tabdeelion par tabadlah khayaal tha aur yeh elaan kya tha ke woh mutahidda Khamam Zila ke kisi aik halqa assembly se muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhtay hain. Venkat Reddy ke is faisla se ab yeh wazeh hochuka hai ke woh Congress Party mein bahut jald shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge.
1145.title: Khamam  ke Senior qayed TRS ko khairbad keh diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Driver Empowerment Programe ke tahet aaj Minorities Finance Corporation ki janib se drivers mein gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi hai. Is programe ke tahet Uber, Maruti Motors aur State Bank of India ke ishtiraak ke sath 342 istefada kunindgaan mein cars taqseem ki gayeen. Yeh Cars 60% subsidy par di jaati hain. Aaj 15.20 Crores rupay maaliat ki gaadiyan taqseem ki gain. Taqreeb se khitaab karte hue Sadar Majlis wo  Rukn e Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat ka yeh iqdaam khush aayind hai. Hukoomat ko chahiye ke is khussos mein jo darkhwasten zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajilana yaksoi kardein. Kisi bhi hukoomat ki karkardagi ka paimana yeh ho sakta hai ke un ke daur e hukoomat mein aqliaton ke sath insaaf huwa hai ya nahi. Kya un ki jaan o maal ya ibadat gaahon ko khatrah to nahi hai. Aqliaton ke liye jo bhi iqdamaat kiye jatay hain unko kis tarha paish kiya jata hai. Aaya un iqdamaat ko ehsanaat par mahmool kiya jata hai ya phir yeh bawar karwaya jata hai ke aqliaton ko un ka haq diya ja raha hai. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney kaha ke hum ney TRS hukoomat ki taayeed ki hai aur guzashta 4 barson mein yahan koi firqa warana fasaad nahi huwa hai.Telangana hukoomat ney Minorities ke liye Jaria saal 2025 crore kiya hai, kiya yeh hum par ahsaan kar rahay hain ya un ka haq day rahay hain. Dastoor mein article 30 mein kiya gaya hai. Ayein ki tamheed mein hik_h gurbat ke khatima, masawaat, adal aur azaadi ka zikar kiya gaya hai jo tamam hindustaniyo ke liye yaksaa honey chahiye. Telangana ke Minorities ko TRS hukoomat ney haq diya hai aur hamein apna haq mil raha hai aur Musalmanoon ke liye aik baat badi ahem hai ke aaj Telangana mein musalmanoon ki pasmandagi, kamzori ko door karne talim ko farogh de rahi hai. Telangana mein 206 Aqamti Schools mein pachaas hazaar se zayed bachay aur bachiyan taleem parahe hain aur un par fi kas aik lakh rupay salana kharch kiye jarahay hain. Barrister Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat mein baironi mumalik aala taleem ke liye 800 tulba ke liye fi kis 20 lakh rupay faraham kiye jarahay hain. Hamare  bachay aala taleem haasil karne ka khawab poora kar rahay hain. Sadar Majlis ney wuzraa aur ohdedaron se khuwahish ki ke woh gadiyon ki farahmi ke liye jo 130 darkhwasten hanoz zair e tasfia hain un ki bhi ajjlana yaksoi kar di jaye. Unhon ney TRS qayideen ko mukhatib karte huwe kaha ke aap ki party ka imtiazi nishaan bhi gaadi hai is liye jitna hosakay ziyada se ziyada gaadiyaan dijiye. Unho ney az-rahe mizah kaha ke aap gadiyaan dijiye hum aap ki gaadi ke engine hain usay agay bedhate rahen ge. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney 50 hazaar rupay ke loans ki farahmi ki scheme ki bhi darkhwasten saal ded saal se zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajlana yaksoi karne par zor diya. Aaj 342 gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi. Taqreeb se Mrs Mahmood Ali Deputy Chief Minister, Naini Narsimha Reddy, Bandaru Datatriya  sabiq wazeer aur Syed Akbar Hussain Sadarnasheen Minorities Finance Corporation, A.K .Khan Advisor to CM on Minorities Affaris Minister aur deegar ney bhi khitaab kiya. Is mauqa par Sadarnasheen Telangana Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem , Sadarnasheen Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masiullah Khan ,Sadarsheen SETWIN Mr. Syed Inayat Ali Baqri aur MLC Mr. Farooq Hussain bhi maujood thae.
1159.title: Minority Drivers mein 342 Cars ki taqseem

news_detail: Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul muslimeen wo Rukn e Parliment Hyderabad Barrister AsaduddinOwaisi ney qabal aaz waqt intekhabaat ka yendia dae diya hai. Unhon ney bhi aaj ishara diya hai ke 6

September ko munaqqid shudni cabinet meeting mein riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla kiya ja sakta hai. Barsar  eqtedaar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah o Chief Minister Mr.K Chandrashekhar Rao ney un ki Party ki hukoomat ke 4 saal ki takmeel par munaqqid kardah jalsa aam ‘Pragathi Nivedana’ se qabl kuch aisay isharay dae rahae thae jis se yeh samjha ja raha tha ke woh Assembly tahleel karte hue meyaad se qabl intekhabaat munaqqid karwney ke khwaahan hain magar unhon ney Pragathi Ninvedana mein aisa koi elaan nahi kya hai al-batta uss din munaqidah Cabinet meeting ke baad reyasti wuzraa ney yeh bataya tha ke Cabinet ka aik aur ahem ijlaas 6

September ko munaqqid honey wala hai. Bataya jata hai ke do din baad munaqqid shudni Cabinet Meeting mein Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla kiya ja sakta hai ya phir riyasati  hukoomat ki zamaam mein tabdeeli layi ja sakti hai. Monorities Finance Corporation ki janib se Drivers mein cars ki taqseem ki aik taqreeb se khitaab karte hue Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney bhi kuch aisay isharay dyie hain jin se un qiyaas araiyon ko taqwiyat millti hai ke Assembly tahleel karte hue jaria saal Decemeber mein hi Mulk ki deegar chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana Assembly ke liye bhi intekhabaat ko yaqhini baneya jayega. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke Cabinet ka 6
September ko munaqqid shudni ijlaas tareekhi hoga. Yahi nahi balkay unhon ney TRS party qaayedeen se khuwahish ki ke woh Dargaah hazrat Barhana Shah ke ihata mein kampliks ki taamer ka kaam bhi 6

September se qabal shuru kar dein aur gaadiyon ke liye dyie jaane wale  qarza jaat ki maabaqi darkhwaston ki bhi yaksoi kar dein. Unhon ney ishaaron ishaaron mein kaha ke gadiyon ki taqseem se TRS ko intekhabi faida puhanchega chunke ittafaq se TRS ka nishaan bhi car hi hai.
1175.title: Barrister Owaisi ne bhi qabal az-waqat intekhabaat ka yendia dae diya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtriya Samiti hukoomat  ki chaar sala karkardagi se aawam ko waaqif karwane munaqidah jalsa aam ” Praghathi Nivedhan” ki kamyabi ke baad TRS party teen din baad aik aur jalsa aam munaqqid karne ka iradah rakhti hai. Tawaqqu to yeh ki jarahi thi ke ” Praghati Nivedhan” mein hi Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar deinge magar aisa kuch bhi nahi huwa. Baaz logon ka yeh maanna hai ke Praghathi Nivedhan se aik din qabl huwi barshami taiz hawaon ke baayis Chief Minister ke qad e azam cutout ke ukhad kar zameen par girjane ko badshugoon mante huwe qabl az-waqat intekhabaat ke liye Assembly ki tahleel ke elaan ko moakhar kardiya gaya tha. Praghati Nivedana ke din hi munaqidah Cabinet Meeting mein yeh tye karliya gaya tha ke 6 September ko Cabinet ka aik aur ijlaas munaqqid kiya jaye ga. Ab maloom huwa hai ke 6

September ko Cabinet Meeting mein riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ka faisla karliya jaye ga aur dosray din zila Siddipet ke Husnabad mein aik aur jalsa aam munaqqid karte huwe is mein intekhabaat ka bagal baja diya jaye ga.
1193.title: Qabl az waqt intekhabaat: Elaan ke liye aik aur jalsa!

news_detail: Moulana Mahmood Madani General Secretary Jamiat Ulema e Hind ney Uttarakhand High Court ke zareya mazhabi idaron ke fatwa par aayed kardah pabandi ko Dastoor ke bunyadi huqooq aur Superem Court ke faisla ke khilaaf qaraar diya hai. Moulana Mahmood Madani ki yeh arzi kal Superem Court mein daakhil kar di jaye gi. Unhon ney apni arzi mein kaha ke High Court ka yeh faisla Constitution of India ki dafaa 26 aur Vishwa Lochan Madan case banam Hukoomat e Hind mein Superem Court ke sadir kardah faisla se mutsadam hai. Arzi mein istadlaal kiya gaya hai ke Dastoor e Hind ki dafaa 26 (b) mein har aik ko apne mazhabi masayel mein khud ke intizam ka haq diya gaya hai, lehaza usay koi bhi adalat khatam nahi kar sakti. Iss ke alawa High Court ka mazkoorah faisla Constitution ki dafaa 141 se bhi mutsadim hai jis ke tahet kisi bhi adalat ko Superem Court ke faislay ke khilaaf faislay ka haq haasil nahi hai. Unhon ney kaha ke mazhabi idaron se jari kya jaaney wala fatwa hargiz kisi ko is par amal karne ke liye majboor nahi karta balkay khud petitioner ke jawab mein sharai hukum ki wazahat hoti hai, aisay mein usay kisi tarha insani waqar aur Dastoor ke khilaaf nahi kaha ja sakta. Moulana Madani ney is baat par hairat ka izhaar kiya ke fazil judge ney sirf aik din ke andar wakeel ke zarey paish kardah akhbar ke tarashe ki bunyaad par faisla kardiya aur soorat waqea ki khatirkhuwa tafteesh ki zaroorat tak mehsoos nahi ki. Sach to yeh hai ke jis waqia ke madd e nazar faisla diya gaya hai is waqia ka fatwa se koi talluq nahi hai. Mutaliqa akhbar se bhi zahir hota hai ke woh panchayat ke logo ka faisla tha jis mein kisi aalim ya mufti ka naam tak bhi zikar nahi hai. Wazeh ho ke 3

August ke Amar Ujala mein yeh khabar shaya hui thi ke Lashkar mein asmat dari se mutasirah khatoon aur is ke ahal khanah ko muqami panchayat ney insaaf dilaney ke bajaye gaon se bahar nikal ney ka hukum de diya. Moulana Madani ney is azm ka izhaar kiya ke Jamiat Ulema e Hind Muslim aqliat ke mazhabi huqooq o shanakht ke liye har mumkin jidd o jahed jari rakhegi aur is muqadma ke silsila mein wukla se mashwera karne ke baad Adalat e Uzma mein poori quwat se apna muaqqaf paish kere gi.
1205.title: Fatwa par pabandi ka maamla: Jamiat Ulma ki arzi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Madina Education and Welfare Society 6

September barooz jumeraat Lateefuddin Hall, Madina Public School, Himayat Nagar mein 10:30 am ko Madina Degree College and PG College ki Silver Jubilee taqreeb munaqqid kar rahi hai. Secretary Society janaab K.M Arifuddin ney bataya ke jumeraat ki yeh taqreeb saal bhar munaqeed  ki janay wali taqarib ka aaghaz hai. General Secretary Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Dr. K Kesahv Rao mehmaan e khusoosi hon ge, unhi ke hathon 1994 mein Degree College ki imarat ka iftetah amal mein aaya tha. Taqreeb ki sadarat Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mahmood Ali karen ge. Mudeer roznama Siasat janab Zahid Ali Khan aizazi maheman hon ge.
1222.title: Madina College ki Silver Jubilee

news_detail: Gujrat ke sabiq IPS Officer Mr. Sanjiv Bhatt ko aaj subah Gujrat Police CID (Crime) ne 1996 ke aik case mein girftar kar liya hai. Yeh wohi Jarry IPS Afsar hain jinhon ne Mulk ki sab se taaqatwar shakhsiyat ke khilaaf watan ko ma baad Godhra fasadaat ke talluq se sachaai batane uth khaday huwe thae. Inhen Banskantha Police ki janib se 1996 mein darj manshiat ke aik muqadma ke silsila mein girftar kiya gaya jis waqt woh wahan Superintendent of Police thae. Gujrat High Court ki January mein di gayi aik hidayat par Gujrat CID ne is muqadma ki tahaqeeq ki hai. Mr. Bhatt ke alawa deegar kayi Police ohdedaron se pooch gach ki jarahi hai. Mr. Bhatt aur deegar ki giraftari ki touseeq ke alawa CID is masla par koi tabserah nahi kar rahi hai. January mein Higch Court ne CID(Crime) ko hidayat di thi ke 1996 mein darj kardah aik FIR ki tayhaqeeq kere jis mein Rajasthan ke aik wakeel ke khilaaf mobayyana taur par 1.5 kg  narcotics rakhnay par aik muqadma darj kiya gaya tha. Iss case mein Gujrat High Court ke sabiq Judge Ramanlal Jain bhi mulawis thae. Case ki tafseelaat ke mutabiq Palanpur mein Lajwanti City Hotel ke aik kamrah se manshiat bar aamad huwe thi aur Police ne Sameer Singh Raj Purohit nami aik wakeel ke khilaaf yeh id-daa karte huwe muqadma darj karliya tha ke un ke qabza mein manshiat payi gayeen. Taham baad azan Rajasthan Police ne yeh id-daa kiya ke Raj Purohit ko mobayyana taur par Rajasthan ke Pali mein un ke ghar se aghwaa kiya gaya aur Banskuntha Police ki janib se manshiat ka parcel rakha gaya.

Taaqatwar siyasatdanon ke khilaaf aawaz uthany ki Sanjiv Bhatt ko badi qeematein chukani padi. Unhen ibteda mein be dast o paa karne ke liye farzi muqadmaat mein phansaya gaya. Unhen kayi Commissions aur courts mein apna bayan darj karwatay rehna pada. Aur phir markazi wizarat e Dakhila ne unhen August 2015 mein yeh kehte huwe mulazimat se barkhast kardiya ke woh duty se ghair haazir rahay hain, halaan ke woh uss douran Nanavati Commission ke rubaru apna bayan qalamband karwa rahay thae. Un ki 27 sala khidmaat ke bawajood badteenat hukoomat ne baghair wazifa ya gratuity ke mulazmat se be dakhal kardiya. Haal hi mein hukoomat ne haqeer security cover se dastbardari ikhtiyar karli jo unhen aur un ki family ko farhaam kiya gaya tha. Yahan tak hi iktafa nahi kya gaya balkay Ahmedabad Muncipal Corporation ne ghair majaz tamirat ke jurmane ke taur par un ki khandani rahaish gaah ka kitchen aur Bathroom munhadim kardiya, halaank un ki darkhwast Superem Court mein zair iltewa hai. Jis waqt Godhra saneha paish aaya tha uss waqt Sanjiv Bhatt State Intelligence Ggandhi Nagar mein Deputy Commissioner Incharge of Internal Security thae. Is saneha ke douran jis mein aik hazaar se zayed musalmanoon ka qatal huwa tha, beshtar police ohdedar khamooshi ikhtiyar karne mein apni aafiat mehsoos ki thi magar Sanjiv Bhatt ne farz shanasi ka behtareen muzahira karte huwe be khauf apne faraiz anjaam diye aur intelligence se imkani fasadaat ke baaray mein apni reports paish karte rahay. Rukn Parliament Ahsan Jaffri ki bewa Zakia Jaffri ki janib se darj karwai gayi shikayat mein Sanjiv Bhatt ki bheji gayeen advisories ko ahem shahadat ke taur par paish kiya tha. Sanjiv Bhatt ne natayej ki parwah kiye baghair na sirf Zakia Jafferi ki darj kardah shikayat ki tehaqeeq karne wali SIT ke rubaroo apna bayan qalamband karwaya balkay 2002 ke qatal e aam mein riyasati nazam o nasq machinery  ke role ko be naqaab karte huwe aur taaqatwar mulzimeen bashmool uss waqt ke Chief Minister Gujrat Narendr Modi ko bachanay SIT ki koshishon ko aashkaar karte huwe Superem Court mein aik mufasil halaf nama bhi daakhil kiya tha. Superem Court mein Sanjiv Bhatt ke daakhil kardah halaf nama mein wazeh taur par uss waqt ke Chief Minister Gujrat Narendra Modi ke role ko be naqaab kiya gaya tha jinhon ne aala Police ohdedaron koh hidayat di thi ke Hindus ko apni barhami ka izhaar karne ka khula mauqa faraham kiya jaye. Bad qismati se Superem Court ki janib se muqarrar kardah khusoosi Special Investigation Team ne un ke ilzamaat ko mustard kardiya aur Narendr Modi aur riyasat ke deegar taaqatwar siyasatdanon ko Clean Chit dete huwe case ko band kardainay ki report daakhil kar di. Is closer report ko Gujrat ki aik adalat mein challenge kiya gaya hai aur Sanjiv Bhatt hanooz aik ahem gawah hain. Sanjiv Bhatt ne Superem Court mein halaf nama daakhil karne ke ilawa justice Nanavati Commission aur qaumi aqliati Commission ke rubaroo halfia bayanaat diye.
1239.title: Modi ko benaqaab karne walay sabiq IPS Sanjiv Bhatt girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Janaab Mohammad Raheemuddin Ansari ney aaj ba haisiyat Sadar Urdu Academy apne ohda ka jaiza haasil karliya. Aik saada si taqreeb mein Janaab Mohammad Raheemuddin Ansari ke jaiza lainay ke umoor anjaam diye gaye. Secretary Urdu Academy Professor S.A Shukoor ney nau naamzad Sadar Acadamey ka isteqbaal kiya aur unhen ohda ka jayeza paish kya. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney iss mauqa par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh apne sabiq tajrubaat ko barooaykar laatay huwe Urdu Academy ko uphar se yak fa-aal idaara mein tabdeel karne ki koshish karen ge. Unhon ney kaha ke maazi mein jab woh Urdu Academy ke sadar thae usss waqt bhi Urdu zabaan o adab ke farogh ke liye akhtraay Programme shuru kiye gaye thay jin mein ITO ke ishteraaq se ‘Aoo Urdu Seekheen’ Programme chalaya gaya jis se Mulk bhar mein ghair Urdu daan afraad ko ghar baithy urdu seekhnay ka mauqa mila tha. Unhon ney bataya ke un ke daur mein Urdu ki kayi ahem kitaaben shaya karne ka mauqa mila tha jin mein ‘muraqa Chuqtayee’ ki dobarah ashaat thi jis ke rasam ajra anjaam dete huwe is waqt ke Nayeb Sadar Jamhooria Hind janab Hamid Ansari ney kaha tha ke agar iss kitaab ki rehnomayi ke liye inhen kisi beroni mulk bhi madoo kiya jata to woh is mein shirkat karte. Janaab Raheemuddin Ansari ke hi daur sadarat mein ‘daftari eslehaath’ ki bhi pheli martaba taba-at amal mein aayi thi. Yahi nayi balkay 40 naye Urdu Computers qayim kiye gaye thay. Unhon ney bataya ke Urdu Academy ki scheme ko Ahsan andaaz mein ruba amal laya gaya tha. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney kaha ke un ki yeh khush qismati hai ke apni maadri zabaan ki khidmat ke liye inhen Telangana Riyasat mein Urdu Academy ke pahelay sadar ki haisiyat se naamzad kiya gaya hai. Un ki koshish hogi ke tamam Asnaaf mein Urdu zabaan ki taraqqi o tarweej ke liye kuch akhtraay iqdamaat kiye jayen. Unhon ney kaha ke maazi mein bhi unhen Urdu Adab se wabasta kayi ahem shakhsiyation aur Urdu Academy ke amlah ka bharpur taawun haasil tha aur tawaqqu karte hain ke aayindah bhi yeh jari rahay ga. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari ney inhen Sadar naamzad karne par Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao aur Sadar Majlis o Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi  se bhi izhaar tashakkur kiya. Is mauqa par janab Ziyauddin Nayyar Nayeb Sadar Kul Hind Taair millat, Janab Syed Ahmed ul Husaini Sayeeed al-Quadri, janab Muneeruddin Mukhtaar aur dosray maujood thae.
1252.title: Raheemuddin Ansari ne Urdu Academy ke sadar ki haisiyat se jaiza haasil karliya

news_detail: Warangal. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke sath hi kaarguzar Chief Minister o sarbarah Telangana Rashtriya Samiti K Chandrashekhar Rao rao ney party ke 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kar di hai. party ki jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein sirf do maujuda Arkaan e Assembly ke naam shaamil nahi hain taham 5 Assembly halqon ke umeedwaron ke naam jari nahi kiye gaye hain iss se yeh ishara milta hai ke yeh 5 maujooda Arkaan e Assembly bhi Party ka dobarah ticket haasil karne se mehroom reh jayen ge jin mein M Sudhir Reddy (halqa Assembly Medchal ), C Kanaka Reddy (Malkajgiri), B Shooba (Chopadandi), B Sanjiv Rao(Vikarabad) aur Konda Surekha(East Warangal) shaamil hain. Jahan tak mohtarma Konda Sulekha ka talluq hai un ke khandan ki Warangal aur uss ke atraaf o aknaaf zabardast siyasi dhak hai. Mohtarma Konda Sulekha ke shohar Mr. Konda Murlidhar Rao TRS Party ke Rukn Legislative Council hain. Siyasi tajzia nigaron ka kehna hai ke Narsimhampet, Parkal, Bhopalpally,Palakurti, Warangal East aur Warangal West Assembly halqon mein yeh khandan raaye dahindon par apna asar rakhta hai. Haliya dinon mein Konda Sulekha aur un ke shohar Konda Murlidhar Rao ka naam siyasi halqon mein garmaya huwa tha. Yeh siyasi joda apne halqa asar mein apni munfarid shanakhat rakhta hai. Yeh kisi bhi siyasi party se wabasta rahen magar un ki maqboliat mein kami nahi aati. Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein 2014 mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karne se qabl yeh joda 2013 tak YSR Congress Party se juda huwa tha. TRS Party mein inhen nazar andaz kiya jata raha hai. Mohtarma Konda Sulekha Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki cabinet mein jagah paney se qassir rahi thein. Yahi nahi balkay un ke halqa intekhab mein bhi party unhen nazar andaaz karti rahi. Paalakurti ke Rukn Assembly Mr. E. Dayakar Rao aur un ke bhai Errabali Pradeep Rao Warangal East mein apne taur par party programes karte huwe un ke liye mushkilaat khadi karte rahay. Alawa azeen Mayor Mr. N Narendar aur sabiq wazeer Baswa Raju Saraiah bhi is joday ke mukhalif hogaye thay. Konda Sulekha ke khandan ki siyasi taaqat ko mehsoos karte huwe mumkin hai ke Congress Party inhen dobarah Party mein shaamil karte huwe siyasi faida haasil karne ki koshish kere gi aur agar aisa hota hai to Warangal aur uss ke atraaf o aknaaf ka siyasi mahol badi had tak tabdeel hojaye ga aur candidates ke intekhabi imkanaat par bhi asar padsakta hai. Maloom huwa hai ke Party ticket se mehroomi ke sath hi Congress ke chand sarkardah qaayedeen, Konda Murlidhar Rao aur Konda Sulekha se rabita qaayim karne mein jut gaye hain aur inhen Party Ticket dainey ka wada karte huwe Congress mein dobarah wapas aajane ki targheeb day rahay hain.
1106.title: Konda Murlidhar aur Konda Surekha ki Congress mein wapsi?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kaarguzar Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney aaj Assembly ki tahleel ke baad Pragathi Bhavan mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet ke douran sahafion ke sawalaat ke jawabaat dete hue Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen aur Bharatiya Janata Party se TRS ke taluqaat ke barey mein wazahat ki aur Party ka moaqqaf zahir kya. jahan unhon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ke sath Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki dosti ka khil kar izhaar kya wahein unhon ney yeh wazeh kardiya ke BJP ke sath TRS ki koi mafahmat nahi hai. unhon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ke sath Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke dostana taluqaat ka bermila izhaar karte hue kaha kay Majlis ke sath un ki Party ke dostana taluqaat hain. Unhon ney bataya ke yaqeenan Majlis ke sath hamaray dostana taluqaat istewaar hain aur intikhabaat mein agarchay hum ney koi mafahmat nahi ki taham dono partiyon ke darmiyaan dostana muqaabla hoga. Unhon ney kaha ke hum mil jul kar kaam kar rahay hain. Iqtidaar sambhalnay ke baad hamari yeh koshish thi ke Hukumat chalaney mein kisi qisam ka koi khalal na ho. Unhon ney bataya ke kis tarha Telangana ki tashkeel ke baad TRS Hukoomat ke qiyaam ke baad Majlis se qurbat badhi. Unhon ney bataya ke intikhabaat ke baad Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney unhen Delhi se phone kya aur kaha ke Telangana riyasat nahi ban’ney tak nahi bani magar aaj riyasat ban gayi, kya Telangana riyasat ko jeeney nahi dete, mein aap ke sath hoon. Unhon ney bataya ke un ki darkhwast ke baghair riyasat ke mafaad mein aur paidaar istehkaam ke liye raza karana taur par TRS Hukoomat ki taayied karne wali Party ka naam MIM hai. Yaqeenan ab woh hamari Haleef Party hai aur hamaray darmiyan muqaabla bhi dostana hai. BJP se taluqaat ke barey mein istefsarat ka jawab dete hue Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi se apni mulaqaat ki bhi tauzih paish karte hue kaha ke unhon ney Wazeer e Azam se khufia mulakaatein nahi ki balkay elania taur par un se mulakaatein ki. Unhon ney yeh wazeh kardiya ke TRS aik secular Party hai, sad feesad secular hai taham kuch log yeh bawar karwney ki koshish kar rahay hain ke TRS ka jhukao BJP ki taraf badhta ja raha hai. Jahan tak Wazeer e Azam se un ki mulakaton ka talluq hai woh aik Chief Minister aur aik Wazeer e Azam ki mulaqat hai. Unhon ney kaha ”mein aik riyasat ka Chief Minister hoon aur woh Mulk ke Wazeer e Azam hain. Wazeer e Azam se mulaqaat ke mujhe 64 mawaqay haasil hotay hain. Kal hi mein ney Wazeer e Azam se baat cheet ki hai. Markazi hukoomat aur riyasti hukoomat ke darmiyan taluqaat dastoori noiyat ke hotay hain. Har Chief Minister ko Wazeer e Azam se baat karni padti. Wazeer e Azam ijlaas talabb kere to Chief Minister ko shirkat karni padti. Yeh sarkari taluqaat hain, shakhsi taluqaat nahi. aik taraf Majlis se hamari dosti hai aur phir doosri taraf BJP se mafahmat kis tarha hosakti hai.”
1126.title: MIM-TRS-BJP: KCR ki wazahat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Meerpet Police Station ke hudood mein Gayitiri  Nagar ka saakin Police Constable Upender ney jummay ko apne makaan mein khudkushi karli. Woh Chief Minister Camp Office par Constable ke taur par faraiz anjaam dae raha tha. Mutawafi ney jaraseem kush dawa pi kar khudkashi karli. Qabal azeen woh Santosh Nagar Police Station mein Constable ki hesiyat se faraiz anjaam dae raha tha. Chunkay woh apni Duty ko baqaidagi se anjaam nahi day parha tha is liye is ko haal hi mein Chief Minister ke Camp Office par taiynaat kiya gaya tha. Woh wahan rujoo ba kaar hogaya magar wahan par bhi duty se ghair haazir rehne laga tha. Police ohdedaron ka kehna hai ke woh khandani masayel mein uljha huwa tha iss liye duty pabandi se anjaam nahi dae parha tha. Khudkushi ki ittela par muqami Police, fauri wahan pohanchi aur laash ko  postmortem ke liye dawakhana Osmania muntaqil kardiya.
1140.title: Chief Minister Camp Office par taiynaat constable ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. State Election Commission ney riyasat mein qabl az-waqat intekhabaat ke ziman mein zila District Collector ke sath aik ijlaas munaqqid kiya. Yeh ijlaas Chief Electoral Officer Telangana Mr. Rajat Kumar ki sadarat mein munaqqid huwa. Rajat Kumar ney kaha ke riyasat mein qabl az-waqt intekhabaat ka ilm honay par Central Election Commission ki janib se yeh ijlaas talabb kiya gaya tha. Chief Electoral Officer ney kaha ke riyasat mein Assembly tahleel karne se Governor ke ittefaq ke baad hum ney Central Election Commission ko aagah kiya tha. Unhon ney kaha ke woh Mulk geer Election Schedule rakhtay hain. Ijlaas mein Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) aur Voter Verified Paper Audit Trail (VVPT) par shaoor beedar kiya gaya. Unhon ney yeh bhi kaha keElectoral List ko finalise karne ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tawareekh ka elaan kiya jaye ga. Telangana mein intekhabaat ke zimn mein Mr. Rajat Kumar peer ko Delhi rawana ho rahay hain taakay markazi Election Commission ke ohdedaron se tabadlah khayaal kar saken.
1153.title: Electoral List ko finalise karney ke baad Elections: CEO

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party se ahem qaideen ka inkhilah hanooz jari hai. Caretaker Chief Minister o sarbarah Telangana Rashtriya samiti Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ki janib se Telangana Assembly tahleel aur umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kardete huwe intekhabi bagal bajade ney ke bawajood bhi Telangana Rashtriya Samiti mein deegar partiyon ke qaayideen ki shumouliyat ka silsila thama nahi hai. Doosri partiyon se TRS mein taaza shumouliyat par amaada honay wali aik ahem shakhsiyat sabiq Speaker Andhra Pradesh Assembly Mr. K. Suresh Reddy hain. Mr. Suresh Reddy guzishta Assembly intekhabaat mein apni shikast ke baad se sargaram siyasat se doori ikhtiyar kiye huwe thae. TRS sarbarah ke farzand Mr. KT Rama Rao wazeer Information Technology and Municipal Administration & Urban Development  ney aaj Party ke rufaqa ke hamrah jummay ki subha Mr. K. Suresh Reddy ki rihayish gaah pahonch gaye aur unhen TRS mein shumuliat aqtiyar kar lenay ki targheeb di. Mr. Suresh Reddy ney bhi TRS mein shumuliyat se ittefaq karliya aur kaha ke androon do yaum bazabta taur par TRS mein shumuliyat ikhtiyar karlen ge. Party sarbarah o kaarguzar Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ki hidaayat par Government Advisor wo sabiq Rukn e Parliment Mr. Vivek aur sabiq wuzraa Mr. Purshunath Reddy aur Mr. Jeevan Reddy ney bhi Mr. Suresh Reddy ki rehayish gaah pahonch kar party mein un ka istaqbaal kiya. Mr. Suresh Reddy tashkeel Telangana ke baad se khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye huwe thae. Woh 2004-09 mein mutahidda Andhra Pradesh mein riyasti Assembly ke Speaker rah chuke hain. Woh sabiq Chief Minister Y.S Raj Shekar Reddy ke qareebi rafeeq thae. Mr. Suresh Reddy halqa Assembly Balkonda se do martaba muntakhib ho chukay. Unhon ney 2009 mein Armoor halqa Assembly se muqaabla kiya tha taham woh shikast se dochar hogaye thay. Intekhabaat mein shikast aur Dr. YS Raj Shekar Reddy ki mout ke baad woh party sargarmion se door hotay chalay gaye thae.
1170.title: Suresh Reddy TRS mein shaamil honay aamada

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel karte huwe Telangana Rashtirya Sameti ke sarbarah o Kaarguzar Chief Minister K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney riyasat mein intekhabi mahol ko garma diya hai. Telangana Rashtriya Sameti ney amlan intekhabi muhim ka aaghaz karte huwe aaj zila Sangareddy ke Husnabad mein apna phela intekhabi jalsa munaqqid kiya hai. Deegar siyasi partiyan bhi inteqhabat ke liye apni apni tayario mein lagi huwi hain. Mukhtalif siyasi partiyon ke qaayideen ke Telangana mein programmes ko qatiat di jarahi hai. Sadar Telugu Desham Party o Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu Telangana mein intekhabaat ka jaiza lainey 8

September ko Hyderabad pahonch rahay hain. Samjha jata hai ke woh Hyderabad mein party ke senior qaayideen se intekhabaat ki mansoobah bandi ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Isi tarha saddar Bharatiya Janata Party Mr. Amit Shah bhi Telangana ka dora karne walay hain. Bataya jata hai ke woh 15

September ko Mahboob Nagar mein aik badey jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge. Telangana mein BJP ki nashiston mein izafah karne ke liye Mr. Amit Sha aik hafta se zayed Telangana mein qiyam karne ka bhi iradah rakhtay hain taakay woh raast apni nigrani mein intekhabi muhim chala saken. Sabiq Sadar Congress Party Mrs. Sonia Gandhi bhi 16

September ko Hyderabad ka daura kar sakti hain. Mrs. Sonia Gandhi ke alawa Congress ki intekhabi muhim ke liye Party Sadar Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke aik se zayed tours ka programme baneya ja raha hai. Maloom huwa hai ke Congress Party ke ahem qaideen Delhi pahonch chuke hain taakay intekhabaat ke silsila mein Party ka laiha amal tayyar karne markazi qaayideen se guft o shaneed ki jasakay. Telangana mein Congress Party ki intekhabi muhim ki nigrani ke liye Party ke Senior qaayed Mr. Gulam Nabi Azad bhi kuch dinon ke liye Hyderabad mein Camp karen ge.
1190.title: Badi siyasi shakhsiyation ki Telangana mein aamad

news_detail: New Delhi. Chief Election Commission of India Mr. O.P Rawat ne Telangana Assembly ki 6

September jummeraat ko tahleel ki taraf ishara karte huwe aaj kaha ke nujoomi paish qhiyasioon par riyasat mein intekhabaat ki tareekh taye nahi ki jati. Mr. Rawat ney kaha ke geherayee o geerayee se jaiza lainay ke baad hi hum taye karen ge ke aaya Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Rajasthan aur Mizoram ke sath Telangana Assembly ke bhi intekhabaat karwaye jayen ya nahi. Siyasi halqon mein yeh baat gasht kar rahi hai ke Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke liye 6

September ka intekhab is liye kiya kyunkay 6 ka adad un ke liye naik shagoon hai. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney Siddipet se apni intekhabi muhim ka bhi aaghaz isi liye kiya ke 2014 mein bhi unhon ne yahin se intekhabi muhim shuru ki thi jo un ke liye achi saabit huwi. Mr. Rawat ney kaha ke Telagana mein Assembly intekhabaat Electoral Panel ki janib se mukammal tayari karliye jane ke baad hi munaqqid kiye jayen ge. Unhon ney kaha ke Telagana ke Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Rajat Kumar se report ki mausoli ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tareekh taye ki ja sakti hai. Mr. Rajat Kumar jo peer ke din Delhi ka daura karne walay hain, Central Election Commission ko apni report paish karen ge. Unhon ney bhi aaj yahan yeh ishara diya hai ke Telagana mein Electoral List ko finalise karne ke baad hi intekhabaat ki tareekh ka elaan kiya jaye ga.
1209.title: Nujoomi paish qhiyasiyoon par Election ki tareekh taye nahi ki jati: CEC

news_detail: Brazil ke bartari rakhnay walay sadaarti umeed waar Jaer Bolsonaro ko jin par jaan lewa qatilana hamla hwa tha Sao Paulo ke Albert Einstein Israelite Hospatal muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Muqami media ke mutabiq un par aik rally ke dauran chaako se waar karkay shadeed zakhmi kardiya gaya. Mulk ki junoob mashriqi riyasat Minas Gerais ke Juiz de Fora city mein intikhabi muhim ke dauran chaako ke hamla se right wing ke umeedwaar Bolsonaro shadeed zakhmi hogaye. Hamla se un ke pait aur chhaati par shadeed zakham aeye hain. Sadarati umeedwaar ke betay Flavio Bolsonaro ne apne waalid ke zakhamo ko shadeed tareen qarar daitay hue apne tweet paigham mein kaha hai ke 60 sala sadaarti umeed waar ke jigar aur phephday shadeed zakhmi honay se badi miqdaar mein khoon bahe gaya hai. Surgery karne walay Dr. Luiz Henrique Borsatone bataya ke inhen mukammal sehat yab honay ke liye kam az kam do mah darkaar hon ge. Unhen androoni taur par gaheri chouten aayi hain jis ke baayis un ki jaan ko khatrah la-haq hogaya tha. Woh apni intikhabi muhim ke dauran apne haamion mein ghiray hue thae ke un ke shikam ke nichle hissa par chaako se hamla kiya gaya. Hamla aawar ko fauri giraftar karliya gaya. Latin America ke baday malik Brazil mein sadaarti intikhabaat 7
October ko munaqqid honge.
1225.title: Brazil ke Sadarati umeedwaar par jaan lewa hamla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ko challenge  karte hue High Court ke aik wakeel Rapolu Bhaskar ney High Court mein aik writ darkhwast dair ki hai. Schedule se 9 mah qabl Assembly ko tahleel kardainay par darkhwast guzar ney aitraaz kya hai. Unhon ney istadlaal paish kya ke qabl az waqat Assembly tahleel kardainay ke baayis taraqqiati kaam inhitaat ka shikaar ho jaien ge. Unhon ney kaha ke qabl az waqt intikhabaat se crore ha rupay awaami fund ka beja kharch hoga. Unhon ney High Court se istedua ki ke Election Commission ko hidayat di jaye ke maujooda Assembly ki 5 sala meyaad ki takmeel ke bad hi intikhabaat munaqqid kiye jayen. Iss writ darkhwast par samaat mangal ko hogi.
1238.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf high court mein darkhwast

news_detail: Uttar Pradesh ke shaher Lucknow ke maroof ilaqa Hazratganj Choraha ko sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bahari Vajpayee se mausoom karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Lucknow Municipal Council ney Hazratganj Chorahe ka naam tabdeel kar ke sabiq Wazeer e Azam Anjhani Atal Bihari Vajpayee ke naam par ‘Aatal Chowk’ rakhne ka faisla kiya hai. Muqami media ke mutabiq Lucknow ke bichon beech waqay Hazratganj Chowk ko Atal Chowk naam dainey ka yeh iqdaam sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki maut ke baad un ki Lucknow shaher se be panah wabastagi aur unhen khiraaj e tehseen paish karne ke liye kiya gaya hai. Lucknow ki Mayor ka kahena hai ke ‘Shaher ke councillors ney mutadid baar shaher ki sadkon aur chorahon ko un ke naam se mansoob karne ki darkhwasten di theen aur hum chahtay thae ke kuch achchca aur ahem muqam Vajpayee sahib ke naam karen. Lehaza yeh faisla kiya gaya hai ke Lucknow ke sab se ziyada ahem aur sab se baday Chorahe ko un ke naam se mansoob kar dete hain. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke sirf yahi nahi balkay paanch dafaa Lucknow se Parliamani intekhab jeetney walay Vajpayee ka mujassima bhi chorahe par nasab kiya jaye ga. Is ke sath sath un ki 51nazmein, taqriren aur deegar yadgaar mujassima ke sath lagai jayen gi. Iss se qabl Chhattisgarh ki riyasti hukoomat ney riyasat ki nai Rajdhani naya Raipur ka naam badal kar Chhattisgarh ko State ka darjah dainey walay sabiq Wazeer e Azam Atal Bihari Vajpayee ki yaadon ko qaayim rakhney ke liye un ke naam par Atal Nagar rakhney ka faisla kiya tha.
1256.title: Lucknow ka Hazratganj ab Atal Chowk Hoga

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samithi Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao tawaqqu hai ke kal ke jalsa aam ” Pragathi Nivedaana” mein Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar dein ge. Yun to Telangana Assembly ki miyaad May 2019 tak hai taham Mr Chandrashekhar Rao schedule ke mutabiq aam intekhabaat ke sath riyasti Assembly ke intekhabaat se bachney ke liye kal munaqqid shudni jalsa aam ”Pragathi Nivedana” mein riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ka elaan kar dein ge taakay Election Commission mulk ki deegar chaar riyasaton Mizorm, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh aur Chhattisgarh ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat ka bhi elaan kar sakay. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai KCR apne umeedwaron ka bhi kal hi elaan kar dein ge. Muzkoorah chaar riyasaton ki Assembly ki miyad December aur January mein khatam ho rahi hai. Kal ke programme ko Mulk ki tareekh ke sab se badey siyasi jalsa se tabeer kiya ja raha hai jis mein TRS apni siyasi taaqat ka muzahira karne jarahi hai. Is jalsa aam se qabal Telangana riyasati Cabinet ka ijlaas munaqqid hoga jis mein Assembly ki tahleel ki sifarish manzoor ki ja sakti hai. Chief Minister ke farzand aur un ke siyasi janasheen Mr. KT Rama Rao ney jo KCR Cabinet mein ahem qalamdaan rakhtay hain id-daa kya ke aap hamaray party qaayed se kal ahem siyasi elanaat ki tawaqqu kar saktay hain jis se riyasat mein siyasi mahol yaqeenan garma jaye ga. Taham abhi tak na hi Chief Minister aur na hi Party ke kisi ahem qaayed ney ta haal Assembly ki tahleel ke baray mein koi wazeh ishara diya hai. TRS Party ki sar garmion aur Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki janib se kiye jaaney walay ealanat ko dekh kar har koi yeh qiyaas kar raha hai ke KCR kal ke ijlaas mein Assembly ko tahleel karte huwe awaam se khat etemaad haasil karne ka elaan kar dein ge. Telangana Rashtriya Samithi ki hukoomat ki miyaad May 2019 tako hai aur Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat schedule ke mutabiq Lok Sabha ke intekhabaat ke sath hi hon ge. Tashkeel e Telangana ki chauthi saalgirah 2

September ko hai aur TRS Hukoomat isi din apni chaar sala karkardagi ko awaam ke samnay paish kere gi. Doosri janib bataya jata hai ke saddar BJP Mr. Amit Sha ney party qaideen ko yeh ishara diya hai ke saal ke avaakhr mein intekhabaat ka saamna karna hoga jis ke liye abhi se tayario ka aaghaz kardiya jaye.
1107.title: Kiya KCR Assembly tahleel kar deinge ?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ney aaj Janaab Mohammad Rahimuddin Ansari ko Sadanashin Urdu Acadamy naamzad kiya hai. Chief Minister ney is khusoos mein file par dastakhat kar diye hain aur tawaqqu hai ke shaam tak is khusos mein GO jari kardiya jaye ga. Urdu Acadamy ke Board Of Directors ka hanooz elaan nahi kya jayega. Janaab Rahimuddin Ansari is se qabl bhi Congress ke daur e hukoomat mein Urdu Acadamy ke Sadar ki haisiyat se khidmaat anjaam dey chuke hain. Janab Mohammad Rahimuddin Aansari Telangana ki Muslim tanzimon ke Wifaaq ‘United Muslim Forum’ ke Sadar aur Jamia Islamia Dar-ul-Uloom Hyderabad muatamed hain. Woh All India Muslim Personal Law board ke rukan bhi hain. Janab Mohammad Rahimuddin Ansari, Moulana Mohammad Hammeeduddin Aqil Hussami RH ke damad aur  Moulana Hussamuddin Sani Jaffer Pasha ke brother-inlaw hotay hain.
1125.title: Rahimuddin Ansari Sadanashin Urdu Acadamy naamzad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Senior Siyasatdan Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed ka 88 baras ki umar mein aaj inteqaal hogaya. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed 15

August 1930 ko Warangal mein paida hue thae. Woh Lok Sabha ke liye chaar martaba muntakhib huwe aur markazi wazeer bhi rahe chuke. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed 2000 tak Congress Party se wabista rahey aur Congress se istefa dainey ke baad BJP mein shumuliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Vajpai Hukumat ne unhen Saudi Arab ke liye Bharat ka safeer bhi naamzad kiya tha. Janab Kamaluddin Ahmed ne mutahidda Andhra Pradesh mein Congress Party ke sadar ki haisiyat se bhi khidmaat anjaam di thi aur RTC ke bhi Sadarnashin rahe chuke thae.
1142.title: Veteran Politician Kamaluddin Ahmed ka intqaal

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ne hafte ko riyasat ke tamam bijli idaron ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ne sarkari mulazimeen ke khutoot par bijli ke shouba ke mulazimeen ke liye Jame Health Scheme ka bhi elaan kya. Pragati Bhavan mein bijli ke mukhtalif shoubon se talluq rakhney walay mulazmeen ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue mulazimeen ki khidmaat ki satayish ki ke un ki kaawishon ke baayis nau tashkil shuda riyasat Telangana mein bijli ke bohraan par khabu paney mein paheli kamyabi haasil hui hai. Unhon ne kaha ke qaleel muddat mein hum ne tamaam shoubon ke liye 24 ghantay bijli ki farahmi ko yakeeni banaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ne kaha ke hum ne Pay Revision Commission se tankhwahon par nazr e saani ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya jis par 22 taa 24 feesad izafah ki tajweez saamne aayi. MR. KCR ne bataya ”mein ne Prabhakar Rao (Sadarnashin o Managing Director Genco & Transco) se poocha ke pichli martaba Pay Revesion kitna kya gaya tha to unhon ne bataya ke 30 feesad, mera khayaal hai ke pichli martaba jitna diya gaya tha is se kam nahi ho sakta. Phir mujh se 32% izafah ki sifarish ki gayi. Mein 35% izafah ka elaan kar raha hon.” Unhon ne kaha ke maujooda Health Scheme jo 3 lakh tak tibbi ikhrajaat bardashat karti hai aur khidmaat ke douran mazeed adayigyon ka imkaan nahi rehta hai is par nazar e saani ki zaroorat hai. Unhon ne kaha ke woh Prabhakar Rao aur deegar ohdedaron se kahe hain ke woh aik azadana Health Scheme waza karen jis mein masarif par kisi qisam ki tahdeed na ho. Yeh scheme aap aur aap ke arkaan e khandan ke liye tamaniat bakhash hogi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke bijli ke idaron ka intezamia bill collectors ki khidmaat ko baqaida bananay ke masla ka bhi jayeza le ga jo is waqt contract asaas par kaam kar rahay hain. Is mouqe par Chief Minister ki dukhtar wo Rukn Parliament Nizamabad Mrs. K Kavita aur bijli shoubon ke aala ohdedar bhi maujood thae.
1156.title: Bijli ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision: KCR

news_detail: Hydairabad. Kuch dair ki taiz barish ney Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke kal munaqqid shudni ”Pragathi Nivedana” ke jalsa gaah ko tahess nahess kardiya. Aaj shaam hui kuch dair ki taiz barish aur toofaani hawaon se jalsa aam ke liye kiye gaye tamaam intizamaat par pani phir gaya hai. Jalsa gaah mein eistaada Chief Miister o Sadar TRS Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ke qad aawar kat oats zameen par dhair hogaye, banners aur hoardings ukhad gaye. jalsa gaah mein bichaya gaye qaleen bhi barish ke baais kharab hogaye aur shahnasheen ke taur par baneya gaya pindal bhi apni raunaq kho baitha. Jagah jagah pani jama hogaya hai. Jalsa gaah ko kal ke liye phir se tayyar rakhney ke liye mazdooron ko raat bhar kaam par maamoor kardiya gaya hai. zameen ko khushk karne ke bhi intizamaat kiye jarahay hain. jalsa ke aaghaz se qabl barish ki tabah karyon par sarkari missionaries bhi pareshan hogayi hai. sarkari afsaraan ko ab yeh dar lagney laga hai ke agar kal jalsa ke mauqa par isi tarha ki barish hogi to bhagdar mach janey ke khadshaat ko mustard nahi kiya ja sakta hai. Iss liye kal jalsa ke dauran barish honey ki soorat mein awam ki wapsi aur gadiyon ke phas janey ke baayis jo afratafri phailay gi iss ke baray mein ohdedar mutafakkir nazar arhay hain. Pragathi Nivedana ke jalsa gaah mein barish ki tabah karyon ki ittila pakar party ke senior qayedeen bashmool awaami numainday aur wuzraa bhi Kongara Kalan pahonchney lagey hain. Telangana Rashtra Samithi ka ye jalsa darasal riyasati hukoomat ka jalsa hai jo TRS ki chaar sala karkardagi ko awam ke samney paish karne ke liye munaqqid kya ja raha hai magar is jalsa ko kuch iss andaaz mein paish kya ja raha hai jaisay yeh TRS ki siyasi taaqat ka mazhar hai. Yeh bhi samgha ja raha hai ke Chief Minister KCR apni chaar sala karkardagi awam ke samney paish karne ke baad awam ka taaza khat e etemaad haasil karne ka elaan karenge aur sath hi woh Telangana Assembly ke liye apni party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar dein ge.
1173.title: Pragathi Nivedana ki tayyarion par pani phir gaya.

news_detail: Hyderabad. SETWIN Mini Buses ki challan aur Moiyan auqaat par nazar rakhnay Mehkuma Transport ney faisla kya hai ke shehar mein chalaye jaany wali is ki tamam Buses mein Radio Frequency Identification ( RFID ) Tags nasb kiye jayen. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporaqtion zone mein kaam karne walay Telangana State Road Transport Corporation (TSRTC) mein kaam karne walay Drivers ki shikayat par ke SETWIN Mini Buses un Routs par chalaye jarahi hain jo un ke liye nahi muqarrar ki gayi hain, Mehkuma Transport ney yeh iqdaam karne ka faisla kya hai. RIFD Devices, Electromagnetic Fields ko istemaal karte hue cheezon se judey Tags ki khudkaar shanakht aur un ko track karte hain. Un Tags ki tanseeb se SETWIN ki gaadiyon ki nigrani karen ge aur agar yeh un ke liye mukhtas Routs ko chod kar kisi dosray Routs par chalaye jati hain to yeh device gaadiyon ki naqal o harkat ke talluq se Mehkuma Transport ko aagah karde ga. SETWIN Transport Services ke tehat 100 Mini Buses hain aur 57 mukhtalif Routs bashmool Secunderabad, Dilsuknagar, Mehdipatnam, Langar Houz aur Ameerpet par chalayi jaati hain aur rozana 50,000 musafireen ko aik muqam se dosray muqam par muntaqil karti hain. TSRTC ke ohdedaron ke mutabiq chunkay Mini Buses mobayyana taur par TSRTC Routs par chalaye jarahi hain, coopration ki aamdani mutasir horahee hain. RIFD Tags se SETWIN Buses ki nigrani mein madad miley gi is liye Buses ko deegar Routs par le jaany ka koi imkaan nahi rahay ga. Executive Director (GHZ) TSRTC Proshatam Naik ney kaha ke Mehkuma Transport ka yeh aik bada iqdaam hai jis se Mini Buses ki naqal o harkat par nigrani rakhi jaye gi. Unhon ney kaha ke RIFD Tags ki tanseeb ke baad agar koi Bus deegar Routs par chalaye jati hain to mutaliqa hakkaam jurmana aed karen ge chunkay inhen bas ke location ke baarey mein aagah karde ga. yahi nahi balkay SETWIN Mini Buses mobayyana tor parbas biz par musafireen ko bas bharnay ke liye are tea si Buses ke liye mushkilaat peda karte hain.
1197.title: SETWIN Buses par nazar rakhnay RFID Tags

news_detail: Palakollu ke Telugu Desam Party  (TDP) ke Rukn Assembly Rama Naidu ke khilaaf sarkari aab paashi schemes ko anjaam dainay walay aik Contractor ney yeh kehte hue Police mein shikayat darj karwai ke aakhir uz zikr ney MLA ko commission na dainay par unhen dhmkaya aur harasan kya ja raha hai. Contractor Prudhuvi Raj ney Dist. Suprintendent of Police se rujoo hotay hue Rukn Assembly ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai. Unhon ney muqami Circle Inspector Krishna Kumar ki bhi shikayat ki ke Police ohdedar, Rukn e Assembly ki madad kar rahay hain. Unhon ney yeh bhi kaha ke Police ohdedar ney un ke waalid ko raat mein talab karte hue dhmkaya.
1213.title: Telugu Desam Party ke MLA ke khilaaf Contractor ki Police mein shikayat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Reliance Jio mein kaam karne walay aik aadmi ko itwaar ke din Ramanthapur mein bijli ke aik khambay par chadhtay hue cable laganay ki koshish karne par aag pakad li. Police ke mutabiq 30 sala Venkanna cables laganay ki koshishon ke dauran bijli ke taron mein ulajh gaya.
