Jjab is ney bijli ke taron se khud ko chhudanay ki koshish ki to usay taron mein daudnay wali bijli se photnay wali chingariyon ney pakad liya aur us ko aag lag gayi. Raah guzarnay walon nay yeh manzar dekh kar usay neechay utaara aur Gandhi Hospital muntaqil kya. Woh 60 feesad tak jhulas gaya aur us ki haalat bahut hi naazuk hai. Police ney aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai.
1230.title: Uppal mein Cable taar laganay walay ko aag pakad li

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukoomat Telangana ney peer ko tamam sarkari mulazmeen ko Dearness Allownce ki aik qist Manzoor ki hai. TRS ke tarjuman Telangana Today ki report mein kaha gaya ke Chief Minister daftar se jari kardah press release ke mutabiq Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ke faisla ke nateeja mein mulazmeen ko 1

January 2018 se itlaq ke sath 1. 572% ki aik qist ke sath majmoyi taur par 27.248 D.A. haasil hoga. Sarkari mulazimeen taqreeban 9 mah se is izafah ke muntazir thae. Mulazimeen ke D.A. ki hanooz aik aur qist ki manzoori dena baqi hai.
1245.title: Mulazmeen ke liye D.A. ki manzoori

news_detail: Hyderabad. Delhi High Court ney Qaumi Senior Secondary School ke liye 4000 gaz jagah faraham karne aur behtareen sahulaton se lais asri School taameer karne Hukoomat ko hidaayat di. Adalat ney yeh faisla janab Feroz Bakht Ahmed, Chancellor Molana Azad National Urdu University ki mafaad aama darkhwast par guzashta hafta kya. Adalat ney faisla dete hue kaha ke ghurba aur msakin ke liye tamam agencies, jaisay DDA, MCD, Director of Education, CBSE, Hukoomat e Delhi aur Markazi Hukoomat sabhi mil kar taawun karen aur aik misaali Urdu Medium School ko qaayim karkay yeh saabit kar dein ke Hindustani adliya insaaf pasand hai aur baghair koi farq kiye, barabari se sabhi ke huqooq ki nigehbani karti hai.

janab Feroz Bakht ki qanooni musheer mohtarma Tayyiba Siddiqui ki darkhwast ko hizab mukhalif ke wukla ney bhi himayat ki. Yeh School taqseem e Hind ke baad, un logon ney taameer kya tha keh jinhon ney, Pakistan janay ke bajaye hindostan ka intikhab kya aur purani Delhi mein apne gharron ke qareeb Qaumi School ke naam se yeh darsgaah taameer ki jo us waqt taqreeban 2200 murabba gaz mein bani hui thi aur is mein taqreeban 1200 bachay zair e taleem thae. Is ki bunyaad bataur e Primaray School padi aur 1964 mein yeh Secondary School bana, jab ke 1975 mein yeh Senior Secondary School ban gaya. Taham is School ko Emergency ke dauran 30

June 1976 ko masmaar kardiya gaya tha lekin is ki taameer nau nah hosaki. Iss tarha yeh 42 baras baad Qaumi Senior Secondary School ki imarat ki taameer nau ki umeed bandhi hai. Musheer qanoon janab Ateeb Siddiqui , samaji karkun ney apne bayan mein Delhi High Court ke faisla ka khair muqaddam karte hue usay tareekhi qarar diya. Janab Mohammad Iqbal Malik, General Secretary, Friends for Education ney kaha ke School ki taameer mein kaun haath btate hain, iss ka intzaar rahay ga. Unhon ney adalat ke faisla ka khair muqaddam karte hue janab Feroz Bakht Ahmed ko kamyaab jadd o jahed par mubarakbaad di.
1260.title: Qaumi Urdu School Delhi ke haq mein Adalat ka faisla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ka aik ahem ijlaas aaj Sadarnasheen Waqf Board Janaab Mohammad Saleem ki sadarat mein munaqqid huwa jis mein Mahboobnagar aur Sangareddy azlaa mein Waqf Board ki janib se Haj House aur Toopran mein shadi khanah taamer karne ka faislah kiya gaya hai. Mohammad Saleem ney akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe bataya ke Waqf Board ke masaarif par Bhubaneshwar University ke mukhtalif courses mein Telangana riyasat ke 100 Muslim bachon ko dakhla dilanay ka faisla kiya gaya jahan behtareen courses chalaye jarahay hain. Unhon ney bataya ke hamaray ilm mein yeh baat aayi hai ke darjah chaharum ke mulazmeen ki had umar 65 baras hai aur woh 60-70 hazaar rupay mahana taankhuwa haasil kar rahay hain jabkay woh yahan khidmaat anjaam dainay ke muaqqaf mein bhi nahi rehtay hain. Hum ney faisla kiya hai ki is khusoos mein riyasti hukoomat se murasilat karte huwe Waqf Board mein kaam karne walay mulazmeen ki had Umar ko 60 baras tak mehdood kardiya jaye. Is khusoos mein aindah faisla kiya jaye ga. Isi terhan aayindah ijlaas mein Board ke ohdedaron ko Assistant Secretary ke ohdon par taraqqi ke masla ka bhi jayeza liya jaye ga jis ke liye aayindah hafta Zila Committee ka ijlaas munaqqid hoga. Janaab Mohammad Saleem ney bataya ke Auqafi jayidadon par najayiz qabzon ki barkhastgi ke liye aik khusoosi ijlaas wukla ke sath munaqqid kiya jaye ga. Unhon ney bataya ke Bandalaguda mein Noori Shah se mutaliq auqafi jayedad par ki gayi Registries ki barkhastgi ke qanooni pahlu ka bhi jaiza liyajaye ga chunkay is khusoos mein aik fareeq ki janib se Waqf Board ke khilaaf Urdu akhbarat mein aik notice jari ki gayi hai. ijlaas mein auqafi idaron ke liye 11 intezami Commision ki tashkeel aur teen marhale ki namzadgi ki manzoori ke ilawa do auqafi jayidadon par tamirat ke liye tamirati commission ki tashkeel ki bhi manzoori di gayi hai.
1105.title: Sangareddy aur Mahboobnagar mein Haj House aur Toopran mein function hall ki taamer

news_detail: Saudi wizarat Hajj o Umra ney Jaria saal Umra mausam safar ke bajaye 1

Mohram 1440h se hi shuru karne ka faisla karliya. Umra visa ki ijrayi ki karwai shuru kar di gayi hai. Wizarat Hajj o Umra ne yeh ittela dete huwe wazeh kiya ke Saudi Vision 2030 ke tahet taye kiya gaya tha ke salana 30 million moutamareen arz e muqaddas aaya karen. Is maqsad ki takmeel ke liye moutamareen ko jumla saholaten faraham karne ka bandobast kiya jaye ga. Saudi wizarat Hajj o Umra ka kehna hai ke wizarat e kharija ke taawun o ishterak se Umra Visa ki Ijrayi ka amal shuru kardiya gaya hai. Vision 2030 ke mutabiq khariji moutamareen ki tadaad 2022 tak 15 million aur 2030 tak 30 million tak pahonch jaye gi jabkay 2030 mein Hujjaj ki tadaad 4.5 million tak badha di jaye gi. 1439h ke dauran baironi Mumalik se 70 lakh se ziyada moutamareen arz e muqaddas aeye. Naib wazeer Hajj o Umra abdalftah Mushat ne bataya ke Hajj o Umra karwai ka bunyadi dhancha o moutamareen ko paish ki jaaney wali khidmaat ka silsila az sar e no muratab kiya gaya hai. Iss baat ka ehtemaam kiya ja raha hai ke na sirf Umra khidmaat paish ki jayen balkay khidmaat ki tayari bhi ki jaye. Mushat ne bataya ke hawai adon par moutamareen ki karwai 30 se 40 minute ke bajaye chand lamhoon mein mukammal karli jaye gi. Iss hawala se matlooba iqdamaat karliye gaye hain. Iss ka wada Saudi vision 2030 mein kiya gaya tha. Guzashita baras Hujjaj ki immigration aur Custom ki karwai mehdood peymane par un ke Mulk hi mein anjaam dainay ka tajruba kiya gaya tha. Imsal is ka daira wasee kardiya gaya hai.
1118.title: Naye Umra Visa ki ijrayi

news_detail: New Delhi. Maharashtra Hukoomat ne aaj Supreme Court mein daakhil kardah apne halaf nama mein yeh id-daa kiya ke huqooq e insani ke 5 jahadkaron (Activists) ko banned Organization CPM ( Maoist) se talluq rakhnay ke pukhta saboton ki buniyaad par girftar kiya gaya tha na ke ikhtelaaf raye ki wajah se. Adalat e Uzma ne 29
August ko giraftarshudgan ko 6

September tak ghar par nazarband rakhnay ki hidayat dainay ke sath kaha ke ‘Democracy mein ikhtelaaf raye safety valve’ hai. Maharashtra Police ne mumtaz Historian Romila Thaper aur deegar 4 ki darkhwast par jawabi halaf nama daakhil karte huwe ilzaam aayed kiya ke woh Mulk mein pur-tashaddud karwaiyon ko anjaam dainay aur Security Forces par ghaat lagaakar hamla karne ki mansoobeh bandi kar rahay thay. Huqooq insani ke 5 jahadkaron ko Pune Police ne 28

August ko Bhimakoregaon tashadud muqadma mein Mulk ke mukhtalif maqamat se girftar karliya tha. Riyasti Police ney kaha ke khatirkhah shawahid maujood hain jo un ke is id-daa ko zaayel kardete hain ke unhen ikhtelaaf raye rakhnay par girftar kiya gaya hai. Police ney Thaper Economists Prabhat Patnayak aur Devaki Jain, Socialogist Satish Deshpande aur Legal Expert Maja Duruwala ki janib se daayer kardah darkhwast ke qanooni juwaz ko challenge karte huwe kaha ke woh is maamla mein tehqiqaat ke liye woh ajnabi hain.
1135.title: Activists ka Maoist se talluq: Maharashtra Police

news_detail: New Dehli. Tazirat e Hind ki dafaa 377 ke wujoob ko challenge karte huwe daakhil kardah darkhwaston par Supreme Court Budh ko apna faisla sadir kere gi. Supreme Court yeh taye kere gi ke aaya raza karana hum jins parasti ka jurm hona durust hai ya nahi. Adalat Uzma  ney 17

July ko apna faisla mehfooz rakha tha ke aaya dafa 377 ko qabil e taazeer rakha jaye ya nahi. Qabl azeen markazi Hukumat  ney IPC 377 ke mustaqbil ka faisla Supreme Court par chod diya tha aur Adalat e Uzma  ney apne taraf se yeh sakhat ishara diya tha ke woh hum jins parasti ko jurm qarar dainay wali dafaa ko kaladam kardey gi. Mulk ki aala adalat  ney kaha ke hatta ke Tazirat e Hind ki dafa 377 ke qanooni jawaz ka tamam paheloun se chhan phatak  karte huve iss fayl ki taaazirat ko khatam kardiya jaye to bhi raza karana hum jins parasti par iss bradari se juday imtiyaaz aur samaji badnami ka khadsha baqi rehta hai. Dehli High Court  ney 2009 mein dafaa 377 ko qabil e taazeer jurm barkhast karne ke haq mein faisla diya tha taham 2013 mein Suresh Kumar Koushal ba muqabla Naz Foundation Case mein Supreme Court ki do rukni judge ki bench ney is faisla ko kaladam kardiya tha. Adalat Uzma  ney May mein faisla kiya tha ke Indian Institute of Technology ke LGBT Alumni Asosition ki janib se dafaa 377 ki barkhastgi ka mutaliba karte huwe daakhil kardah darkhwast ki samaat kerey gi. Qabal azeen 27

April ko Humsafar Trust ke Ashok Rao Koi aur Arif Jaffer ney bhi dafaa 377 ke khilaaf darkhwasten dayer ki thi. Iss dafaa mein yeh kaha gaya ke koi bhi fard kisi aurat, mard ya janwar ke sath ghair fitri tareeqa se mubashrat karta hai to woh 10 saal ki sazaye qaid ka mustawajib hoga aur is par jurmaana bhi aayed hoga.
1149.title: SC: IPC 377 par Budh ko faisla

news_detail: Hyderabad- Makkah Masjid aur Shahi Masjid Public Garden yaqeenan Hyderabad ka fakharya hissa hain magar un do Masjidoon ke minbar o maharab ki khidmaat anjaam dainay walay jayyad Ulama ki badi hi naqadri horahi hai. Un donun Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam mouzeneen ki Salaries intehai haqeer hain. Aap yeh jaan kar taajjub o herat mein phad jayinge ke un dono Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam, Khateeb aur Mouzeneenki salaries, un Masjidoon mein barsar e paikaar Homeguards ki tankhwahon se bhi kam hain. Makka Masjid ke aik Homeguard ko takribaan 22,000 rupay mahana mushahra diya jata hai jabkay Makka Masjid ke Aaima karaam, Khateeb aur Mouzeneen ke sath sath Shahi Masjid ke Imam o khateeb aur mouzzin ki salary sirf 17,500 rupay mahana hain. Shahi Masjid mein sirf aik hi Imam hain jo khitabat ke bhi farayiz anjaam dete hain jabkay Makka Masjid mein Khateeb aur Imam alag alag hain. Jahan tak Khateeb, Imam aur Mouzzin ka maamla hai un ki tankhwahon mein bhi koi imtiyaz nahi hai. Sabhi ko yakmusht 17,500 rupay mahana diye jatay hain. Yahan yeh zikar zurori hai ke un dono Masjidoon ke Imam o Khateeb ke mansab par maamoori ke liye behtareen se behtareen fard ka intekhab kiya jata hai aur yaqeenan ab tak un dono Masjidoon mein un manasab par jo log bhi Faiz huwe hain woh yaktaaye zamana rahay hain. Shahi Masjid Public Garden ke Imam o Khateeb Phd Scholar aur kaamil ul Hadees  hain jabkay Makka Masjid ke khateeb aur Imam dono hi Kaamil ul Hadees aur M.A. hain. Afsoos ke sath kahena padta hai ke hamaray shaher ki yeh do ahem Masjidoon jin ka intizam mehakuma Aqliati Bahbood ki raast nigrani mein hai, un ke Aima Mouzzineen aur Khateeb ki salary aik Homeguard se bhi kam hai. Sabiq Secretary Mahkuma Aqliati Bahbood Mr. Umar Jaleel ne un do Masjidoon ke Aaima karaam o Khateeb ki tankhwahon mein munasib izafah ke liye file tayyar karkay maliyati manzoori ke liye tajweez mahkuma fiance  ko rawana ki thi magar mahkuma Finance ne kin bunyadon par is tajweez ko mustarad kardiya maloom nahi. Hamari Ibadaat mein Khushoo o Khuzoo ke liye hamari yeh koshish hoti hai ke un do Masjjdoon mein hamari namazain ada hon. Shshrr ki kayi badi shaksiyatoon un do Masjidoon mein namazain ada karte hain magar ab tak shayed hi kisi ne yeh jan ney ki koshish ki hai ke un ka mushahra itna haqeer kyun hai aur un mein izafah ke liye abhi tak kisi ne koi koshish nahi ki hai.
1176.title: Makkah Masjid-Shahi Masjid : Aaimma karaam ki Salaries Homeguard se bhi kam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ney Telangana Assembly ko tahleel kardiya. Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ki sadarat mein Pragathi Bhavan mein munaqidah Cabinet ke aik ahem ijlaas mein Telangana Assembly ko tahleel karne ki qarardad manzoor ki gayi jis ke baad Chief Minister kuch wuzraa ke humrah Raj Bhavan pahonch kar Governor Mr. E.S. L. Narsimhan se mulaqaat ki aur Cabinet ki qarar daad paish karte hue reyasti Assembly tahleel karne ki sifarish ki hai. Chief Minister Mr. ke chndrshikhr rao ney election commission of India ko mah decemeber mein malik ki deegar chaar reyaston mein honey walay Assembly intikhabaat ke sath hi Telangana Assembly ke intikhabaat ke liye iqdamaat karne ki raah hamwar karne ke liye Telangana Assembly ko tahleel kardainey ka faisla kya hai. Woh nahi chahtay thay ke aam intikhabaat ke sath hi riyasti Assembly ke intikhabaat munaqqid hon. Agarchay Telangana Assembly ki miyad May 2019 tak hai magar woh abhi Assembly tahleel nahi karte to election commission of India ko aam intikhabaat se ain qabal Telangana Assembly ke intikhabaat ke liye amaada kana mushkil tha. isi liye Mr. ke Chandrashekar Rao ney September mein hi Assembly tahleel kardainey ka faisla kya hai. woh darasal reyasti hukoomat ke chaar saal ki takmeel par munaqidah Pragathi Nivedana mein hi riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ke faisla ka elaan karne walay thay magar namaloom wajohaat ki binaa unhon ney is faisla ko aaj tak ke liye moakhar kardiya hai. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao kal Sangareddy ke Husnabad mein aik jalsa aam mein party umeedwaaron ki pehli fehrist bhi jari kardainey walay hain.
1189.title: KCR ne Assembly tahleel kardi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf aik naujawan ney aaj Raj Bhavan ke rubaroo iqdaam khudsozi ki. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ki Raj Bhavan aamad se kuch dair qabl aik naujawan ne Raj Bhavan ke rubaroo –apne aap par petrol chhidak kar aag laga lene ki koshish ki taham wahan maujood Media ke numayindon aur Security ohdedaron ney usay aisa karne se baaz rakha. Cabinet mein riyassti Assembly ki tahleel ki qarar daad manzoor karne ke baad Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao, Cabinet ke faisla se Governor ko waaqif krwane aur Assembly ki tahleel ki sifarish paish karne ke liye Raj Bhavan pounchanay walay thay. Akhbaari numainday Raj Bhavan ke baab ud dakhila  ke rubaroo Chief Minister ki aamad ke muntazir thay ke aik naujawan wahan pouncha jis ke haath mein aik plastic ka can tha jis mein petrol bhara huwa tha aur is ney Jai Telangana ke naaray lagatay hue aanan faanan khud par petrol chhidak liya aur jaib mein haath daal kar diya silai nikaalne wala hi tha ke is ke qareeb mauood media ke numaindon ney is ke haath pakad liye aur usay khud ko aag laga lene se baaz rakha. Wahan maujood security ohdedar bhi pahonch gay aur uss par qaboo pa liya. Media ke numaindon ke poochnay par is ney apna naam Eshwar bataya aur kaha ke woh Nizaam College ka taalib ilm hai. Uss ney bataya ke Chief Minister Mr. Chandarshekar ney bahut se wada karte hue nayi Telangana riyasat ki annan hukoomat sambhlaa magar apni meyaad ki takmeel se bahut pahelay hi Assembly tahleel karne ka faisla karliya taakay woh phir se Telangana mein Iqtidaar haasil kar sake. Iss naujawan ney kaha ke wadon ki takmeel ke baghair hi Assembly tahleel kardainay se woh mayoos hogaya hai.
1210.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf naujawan ka iqdaam khudsozi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ke baad aaj dopehar Pragathi Bhavan mein munaqidah aik Press Conference mein riyasat ke 105 Assembly halqon ke liye party umeedwaaroon ki fehrist jari karte huwe tajassus ko khatam kardiya. 109 Assembly halqon ke minjumla Party ki jari kardah 105 ki fehrist mein sirf 2 Muslim umeedwaar Aamir Shakeel Ahmed (Bhodhan) aur Inayat Ali Baqri (Bahadurpura) hi shaamil hain. TRS ki jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein masiwaye Hyderabad riyasat bhar mein sirf do naye chehray hain. Maabaqhi tamam maujooda Arkaan Assembly ko hi dobarah azmaane ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney maujooda Assembly ki miyaad ke khatam honey se qabl hi Assembly tahleel karte huwe aawam ka dobarah khat etemaad haasil karne ka faisla kiya taakay riyasat mein asal Oppostion Party Congress ko intekhabi tayaarion ka ziyada mauqa nah mil sakay. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Assembly ki miyaad May 2019 tak hai magar Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly tahleel karte huwe mah November/Decemeber mein hi intekhabaat munaqqid karne ke liye Election Commission ki raah hamwar kar di hai chunkay Decemeber aur January mein Mulk ki chaar riyaston ki Assembly ki miyaad khatam honey jarahi hai. Abhi se Assembly ki tahleel ke baayis Election Commission of India ko un chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat ka elamia jari kar ney mai aasani hojaye gi. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki qabl az waqt Assembly ki tahleel ke iqdam ko kuch log siyasi door andeshi par mahmol kar rahay hain to kuch logon ka yeh maanna hai ke is faisle ke pas parda un ki zaeef ul-eteqaadi karfarma hai.
1227.title: TRS umeedwaron ki fehrist, sirf 2 Muslims

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ke nigraan Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ne kaha ke tawaqqu hai ke riyasti Assembly ke intekhabaat mah e November mein munaqqid hon ge jabkay natayij ka Decemeber ke phelay hafta mein elaan kardiya jaye ga. Chief Minister Mr K Chandrashekhar Rao ne Praghati Bhavan mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke Mulk ki deegar riyaston Madhya pradesh, Rajasthan aur Chittisgarh ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat November mein munaqqid hon ge. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney aawam se khwahish ki ke woh TRS ko dobarah Iqtedaar sounpe chunkay woh achi tarha jantay hain ke Party ne aawam ki behbood ke liye kaam kiya hai. Unhon ney is etemaad ka izhaar kiya ke unhon ney ne tamam waday bashmool intekhabi manshoor mein kiye gay wadon ko poora kiya hai. Hum ne Kisaanon ke liye Rythu Bandhu Scheme aur Rythu Bheema Scheme ko bhi roba amal laya jo hamaray intekhabi manshoor mein shaamil nahi thay.
1247.title: November mein Assembly intekhabaat: KCR

news_detail: Amravati. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu ke farzand o General Secretary Telugu Desam Party Mr. Nara Lokesh ney kaha ke karguzaar Chief Minister Telangana o Sadar TRS Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke sath hi umeedwaron ka elaan karte huwe badi ghalti ki hai. Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao faisla saazi mein ujlat baz saabit huwe hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Mr. Chandhrashekhar Rao ki janib se jari kardah umeedwaron mein kayi umeedwaron ko aawam ki narazgi ka saamna hai. Intekhabaat mein nisf se zayed umeedwaron ko nakami ka monh dekhnaa pade ga. Telangana riyasat mein intekhabaat mein Telugu Desham Party ke hissa lainay se mutaliq kiye gaye istefsaar par Wazeer Information Tecnology Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke is khusoos mein Party munasib faisla kere gi. Unhon ney yeh ishara bhi diya ke un ki Party zaroor Telangana Assembly intekhabaat mein hissa le gi. Samjha jata hai ke Telugu Desham Party, Telangana ki tamam Assembly nashiston par apne umeed waar khada kar ney ki bajaye makhsoos nashiston par hi apne umeedwaar maidan mein utaarey gi. Mutahidda Andhra Pradesh ki taqseem ke baad Telangana mein Telugu Desam Party ka dhancha kaafi kamzor hogaya hai. Party se wabsta kayi ahem qaideen ney party ko khirbad kehte huwe Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ya phir doosri siyasi partiyon jaisay Congress aur BJP mein shamouliyat ikhtiyar karli hai. Party mein ab aisa koi chehra nahi hai jo Telangana mein maqbool aam ho. Telugu Desam Party sarbarah Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ko itni fursat nahi hai ke woh apni riyasat ke umoor ki anjaam dahi ko chod kar Telangana mein intekhabi muhim chalaye. Hatta ke Mr. Lokesh bhi Telangana mein ziyada maqbool nahi hain. Agar Telangana mein Telugu Desam Party kuch karna chahti hai to usay anjahani N.T Rama Rao ke pote film adakar Jr.NTR par hi takiya karna pade ga aur shayed woh bhi Telangana mein intekhabi muhim chalanay se ziyada dilchaspi nahi rakhtay.
1261.title: KCR ney badi ghalti karli: Nara Lokesh

news_detail: Hyderabad. Barsar Iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke siyasi taaqat ke muzahira ke liye 2

September ko munaqqid shudni Pragathi Nivedana ki tayyariyan shor wo zor se jari hain. Jalsa gaah ke muqam aur is ko janay walay tamam raastoon ko gulaabii parchamon, banners,hoardings aur cut-outs se nahla diya gaya hai magar banners waghera par Urdu nadarad aur Muslim qayedeen nazar andaz kar diye gaye hain. Hatta ke Deputy Chief Minister Mr.Mahmood Ali ki bhi tasweer kahin dikhayi nahi par rahi hai. Pragati Nivedana ki taiyarion se Muslim qayedeen ko badi had tak daur hi rakha gaya tha sirf Deputy Mayor Mr. baba Fasihuddin hi kisi had tak un taiyarion se judey rahay, shayed is ki aik wajah yeh bhi hosakti hai ke woh GHMC se wabasta hain. Muslim qayedeen is jalsa aam ke baray mein is waqt harkat mein aeye jab akhbarat aur television ke zareya inhen is programme ka pata chala. Agarchay aaj kuch Corporations aur Boards ke Sudoor ne akhbaari numayindon ke hamrah jalsa gaah ka mushahida kya hai magar aisa lag raha tha ke woh muntazmeen mein se nahi hain balkay woh khud mushahida karne aeye hain. Yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke Pragati Nivedana se khitaab ke liye sirf aik Muslim qayed ko mauqa diya jaye ga. Yaad rahay ke TRS Mulk ki tareekh ke sab se baday siyasi muzahira ke liye Outer Ring Road ke qareeb Kongara Kalan mein ,1600 acres arazi ka intikhab kya gaya hai. Gadiyon ki parking ke liye 1000 acres araazi ka raqba mukhtas kya gaya hai. Chief Minister wo sadar TRS Mr. ke Chandarshekar is jalsa mein taqreeban 4 ghantay khitaab karte hue TRS hukumat ki chaar sala karkardagi ka jayeza paish karenge. Samjha jata hai ke TRS is jalsa aam se riyasat mein apna intikhabi bagal baja degi aur Mr. Chandrashekar Rao tawaqqa hai ke Party umeedwaron ka bhi elaan kar deinge taakay woh abhi se intikhabi tayarion mein jut jaayein. Chief Mnister ne ab tak jo isharay dyie hain is se aik siyasi gosha mein yeh qiyaas aarayyan ki jarahi hain ke Mr. Chandarshekar Rao is jalsa aam mein hukumat tahleel karte hue naya khat e etemaad haasil karne ka elaan kar saktay hain. Party sargarmion se Muslims ko door rakhnay aur Urdu zabaan ko yaklakht nazar andaaz kar diye janay par Muslim halqon mein yeh chay-megoyaan honay lagi hain ke kahin yeh sab BJP se TRS ki khurbat aur khufia mafahmat ka nateeja to nahi hai?
1097.title: Pragathi NIvedana: Urdu nadarad, Muslim qayedeen nazar andaz

news_detail: Jaan ke lale jab pad jate hain to achay achay surma bhi apni hehkidi bhool jatay hain. Aisa hi kuch Nederland ke badbakht qanoon saaz Geert Wilders ke sath huwa aur is ne qatal ki dhamkion aur dosaron ki zindagion ko la-haq khatraat ke sabab paighambar islam ke cartoon ka muqaabla mansookh karne ka elaan kya hai. Geert Wilders ne apne bayan mein kaha hai ke ‘Islami tashadud ke khatraat ke sabab mayen ney faisla kiya hai ke ab cartoon bananay ka muqaabla nahi ho ga. Unho ne aik tehreeri payam mein kaha ke Islami tashadud ke mutasireen ko la-haq khatrah ke paish e nazar unhon ne faisla kya ke cartoon muqaabla ko jari nah rakha jaye. Inhen la-haq khatrah ke paish e nazar 24 ghantay security ghairay mein rehne lagey hain. Paygambar e Islam ke khakay bananay ka yeh muqaabla rawan saal November mein Nederland ki parliman mein Geert Wilders ki siyasi jamaat ke daftar m karne ka elaan kiya gaya tha. Holland mein aik Pakistani nazaad shehri ko hirasat mein le liya gaya jis ne Social Media ‘Facebook’ par Urdu mein payam diya tha jis mein unhon ne gustakhana cartoo
1109.title: Jab jaan ke lale padte hain….. Gustakhana Cartoon muqaabla mansookh

news_detail: Saudi Arab mein films ki numayesh par lagi 35 sala pabandi ki barkhastgi ke baad Bollywood ki paheli film numayesh ke liye paish kar di gayi hai. Bollywood ke namwaar adakaar Akshey Kumar ki film’Gold’ Saudi Arab mein guzashta roz numayesh ke liye paish ki gayi. Hidayat karah Reema Kagti ki film ‘Gold’ mein Akshey Kumar aur Mouni Roy ney markazi kirdaar ada kiya hai. Is film ki kahani Bharat ki 1984 ki Hockey Team ke pas e manzar ki akkaasi kar rahi hai, jab England mein honey walay Olympics muqablon mein Hockey Team ney pahela Gold Medal haasil kiya tha. Is film mein Akshey Kumar ney India  Hockey Team ke Coach ka kirdar nibaya hai. Saudi Arab ke Cinema ghar mein film Gold ki numayesh par apne khayalat ka izhar karte huwe Akshey Kumar ney Social Media par tweet kiya jis mein kaha ke film Gold paheli Bollywood film hai jo Saudi Arab mein release ki jarahi hai jis par woh nihayat hi khush hain.
1124.title: ‘Gold’ Saudi Arab mein release honay wali paheli Bollywood Film

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad High Court ney barasar-e-ektadaar Telangana Rashtriya samiti ke siayasi taaqat ke muzayhere ke taur par 2

Septembar ko munaqid kiye jane wale jalsa-e-aam Pragathi Nivedana ke khilaaf wakeel wo Sadar Environment Protection Committee Mr Pujari Siridar ki daakhil karada arzi ko kharij kar diya. Mr. Pujari ney Pragathi Nivedana se Evironment ko pahunchne wale nuqsanaat ki duhaee dete hue ye istedlaal pesh kiya tha ki agar woh apani chaar saala karkardagi ko awaam ke robaru pesh karana chahate hain to awaam ko takaleef mein mubtela karne ki bajaay unhen Techonology ko istimaal karte hue Social Media ke zariya farog dena chahiye. High Court ne darakhast ko kharij karane se qabl Hukumat se vazahat talab ki thi jisne waada kiya ke Evironment ko kisi  qisam ka nuqsaan pahunchaye bagair programme ko munsarim kiya jayega. Advocate Ganaral ne Adaalat ko waaqif karavaya ke Hukumat ney jalsa-e-aam ke liye tamaam taiyariyaan mukammal karli hai aur waada kiya ki mahauliyat ko kisi qisam ka nuqsaan pahunchaye bagair Public Meeting munaqid ki jayegi.
1144.title: Pragathi Nivedana ke khilaf darakhast kharij

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority HMDA ney LRS darkhast guzaron ko badi raahat dete huye ibtedayi adayigyon ki adam adai ke baayis ruki huwi LRS darkhaston ki processing ke liye di gayi mohlat mein tausee ki hai. LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ki aakhri tareekh ko 31
October tak tausee di gayi hai. Qabl azeen HMDA ne LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ke liye 31

August tak mohlat di thi. Ibtedayi adayigyon mein taakhir ke baayis kayi darkhaston ki yaksoi nahi ho payi is liye Commissioner ney is ziman mein di gayi mohlat mein tausee karne ka faisla kiya hai. HMDA ke ohdedaron ko hidayat di gayi ke woh aisay darkhwast guzaron ko aagah karen jinhon  ney ibtedayi adaigi nahi ki hai aur unhen batayen ke 30
September tak 10,000 rupay bataur e ibtedayi adai ki jaye aur 15

October tak LRS puri processing dey diye jayen. Principal Secretary Baldi nazam o nasq wo shehri taraqhiyat Mr. Aravind Kumar ney bhi ohdedaron ko hidayat di thi ke zair e iltiwa darkhwaston ki yaksoi 30

october tak kar dein. HMDA zariye ke bamawajib  1. 76 lakh se zayed darkhaston ki yaksoi kar di gayi hai aur 61,000 darkhasten mustard ki gayeen jabkay 54 darkhasten dastawizaat ki kami ke baayis zair e tasfia hain. 1,694 darkhaston par karwai jari hai. No Objection Certificate paish na kiye jane par 2,237 darkhasten radd kar di gayeen.
1179.title: LRS applications ki processing ki tareekh mein tausee

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hukomat, Telangana mein School children mein khel kood ke farogh ke liye mandal sateh par bhi iqdamaat kar rahi hai. Khel Kood ko farogh dainay ki policy ke hissa ke taur par ibtida mein mandal sateh par Inter School muqablay munaqqid kiye jarahay hain. Is programme ke hissa ke taur par Bahadurpura mandal mein khelon ke muqaabla ke ineqad ke liye aaj Deputy Education Officer Mr. Ravi Kumar ki sadarat mein aik ijlaas munaqqid huwa jis mein senior Physical Director Janaab S. I. K. Zabiuddin ko Organizing Secretary muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Bahadurpura mandal mein 10 taa 12 September Kho-Kho, Kabbadi aur Volleyball stream mein muqablay munaqqid honge jis mein mandal ke tamam sarkari aur ghair sarkari recognised Schools ke tulba hissa le satke hain. Janab l Zabiuddin ney school intizamia se khwahish ki ke woh un muqablon mein hissa lainay ke liye apne idaron ka registration 6 taa 8 September Umdah Bazaar School mein karwaen. Unhon ney bataya ke mandal sateh par muqablon ke baad zilai sateh ke muqablay aur phir reyasti sateh ke muqablay bhi munaqqid kiye jayenge taakey school mein zair e taaleem tulba mein nisabi taleem ke sath sath khel kud ka bhi shauq parwan chadhe. Is mauqa par Bahadurpura mandal ke Senior Physical Directors Mrs. Sajid Hussain Junaidi, K Mahesh, Raju, Salahuddin, Khadeer Baswa aur mohtarma G Venkat Laxmi bhi maujood thay.
1194.title: Zabiuddin School Games ke Organising Secretary muqarrar

news_detail: Pakistan ney security khadshaat aur Governor Nangarhar ke guards ki amlay se haatha payi ke baad Jalalabad mein Consulate band kar diya. wazeer kharija Pakistan Shah Mahmood Qureshi ka kehna hai ke shehrion ke tahaffuz ke liye Jalalabad Consulate band kya gaya. tafseelaat ke mutabiq, security khadshaat aur Afghan hukkaam ki amlay se hathapayi ke baad Pakistan ney Jalalabad mein apna Consulate band kar diya. Wizarat e kharija ney khat likh kar Afghan hukoomat ko aagah kar diya, khat mein wazeh kya gaya hai ke security wajohaat ke baayis Consulate band kya gaya. Pak wizarat e kharija ke mutabiq Afghan soobah Nangarhar ke Governor, Consulate ke umoor mein mudakhlat kar rahay thae, Governor Nangarhar hayaat Allah hayaat 28

August ko guards ke sath Pakistani Consulate mein daakhil hue jahan guards ney amlay se bad zubani aur haatha payi ki, Kabul mein Pakistani sifarat khana ney waqea ka fori notice letay hue Consulate band kar diya. Kabul mein Pakistani aymbisi ney tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke Afghan wizarat kharija ko waqea ki fauri ittila kar ke Governor Nangarhar ki be ja madakhilat se aagah kiya gaya, Afghan hukoomat se Consulate ki Security badhaane ka mutaliba kiya gaya. Pakistani sifarat khana ney Governor Nangarhar ke iqdaam ko vyana convention ki khilaaf warzi qrarde diya aur Afghan hukoomat par wazeh kya gaya hai ke security ki 28 augst ki position par bahaali taq Consulate band rahay ga.
1219.title: Pakistan ney Jalalabad mein apna Consulate band kardiya

news_detail: Pakistan ke aik sobai Rukn e Assembly ko Karachi mein sar-e-aam aik shahri ko thapad maarna mahenga pad gaya. Rukn e Sindh Assembly ke Rukn Dr.Imran Ali Shah ke khilaaf na sirf un ki party Tehreek Insaf ney sakht karwai ki balkay Supreme Court ney bhi un par bhaari jurmana aayed kardiya. Dr. Imran Ali Shah ka aik video social media par viral hogaya tha jis mein unhon ney aik gaadi raan ko mehez is liye thapad maaray thay ke woh apni gaadi ko un ki gaadi se agay le jana chahta tha. Supreme Court ney is waqea ka az khud notice letay hue 30 lakh Pakistani rupay Dams Fund mein jama karwney ka hukum diya. Yahi nahi balkay khud un ki Party ney bhi karwai karte hue unhen aik mah ke liye party ki rukniat se moattal kardiya aur un par 5 lakh rupay Aidhi Foundetion ko atiyah dainey aur edhi trust ke sifarish kardah 20 orthopedic mareezon ka ilaaj karwney ki bhi hidayat di hai.
Apologise to that citizen
, tender written and video apology for your unacceptable violent behaviour
RT
: Full video of PTI MPA beating a citizen.
— وزیراعظم عمران خان (@SjPTI)

Chief Justice Pakistan Justice Saqib Nisar ney tehreek insaaf ke Rukn e Sindh Assembly Imran Ali Shah ki janib se is waqea par maafi mangney par shahri tashadud az khud notice ki yaksoi karte hue inhen dem fund mein 30 lakh rupay jama karaney ka hukum day diya hai. Supreme Court Karachi registary mein Chief Justice Pakistan Justice Saqib Nisar ki sarbarahi mein Imran Ali Shah tashadud az khud notice ki samaat hui. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah ki sarzanish karte hue istefsaar kya ke aap ney kya soch kar shahri ko thapad mara, koi janwar ko bhi is tarha nahi maarta, yeh na qabil e maafi jurm hai, hum nahi choden ge, aap awam ke numainday hain toh iss tarha tashadud karen ge, mein bahar aata hon, mujhe maarkar dikhayen. jis par Imran Ali Shah ney izhaar e nadamat karte hue kaha ke sorry sir, mein sharminda hoon. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah se makalimay ke douran remarks diye ke kya sorry,mein ney bachpan mein mulazim ko belt se mara tha, mere waalid ney bhi mujhe do baar sabaq sikahney ke liye mara tha. Chief Justice ney tashadud ka nishana ban’ney walay Dawood Chauhan se istafsaar kya ke izzat ka koi muawza nahi hota, aap muawza le kar baith gaye, aap ney kyun maaf kya, jis par Dawood Chauhan ney kaha ke naamzad Governor mere ghar par chal kar aaye. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah se istafsaar kya ke aap ney kitney thapad maaray thay, Imran Shah ney bataya ke 4 thapad maaray thay, Chief Justice ney remarks diye ke aap ko bhi sar-e-aam isi tarha 4 thapad maaray jayen ge. Dawood Chauhan ney adalat ke rubaroo kaha ke mujh par paisey lene ka ilzaam lagaya gaya, Imran Shah par aik saal tak badi gaadi par pabandi aayed ki jaye, woh bhi hamari tarha safar karen, Dawood Chauhan ke betay ney jazbati hokar kaha ke PTI ki social media team ney hamaray khilaaf muhim chalayee, 3 social media mimbraan ney hamari tazheek ki, inhen kam az kam awaami numainda nahi rehna chahiye. Chief Justice ney remarks diye ke woh az khud karwai karte hue kisi par ahsaan nahi kar rahay hain, is tarha ke log firaon ban jatay hain, woh un ko sabaq sikhana chahtay hain. yeh barri gaari ke baghair nahi reh payen ge. Chief Justice ney Imran Shah ko mukhatib karte hue remarks diye ke logon ki izzat aur ehtram karna sikho, koi khayaal karo, logon ki tazheek karte ho, sar-e aam maffi mango. Adalti hukum par Imran Shah ney Dawwod Chauhan se maafi mangi aur usay galaay lagaya. Chief Justice ney Imran Ali Shah ki janib se maafi mangney par 30 lakh rupay Dams Fund mein jama karaney ka hukum dete hue maamla nimta diya.
1232.title: Shahri ko thapad marna Pakistan ke Rukn e Assembly ko mahenga pad gya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ney Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah kardiya hai. Marriage/Talaq, Qhula ke Certificates  ki fees ko 200 rupay se badha kar 300 rupay kardiya  hai jabkay yahi Certificate Tatkal ke tehat jari karne ki fees ko 300 rupay se badha kar 400 rupay kardi gayi hai. Sadar Nasheen Waqf Board Janaab Mohammad Saleem ney aaj Hajj House Nampally mein waqay Waqf Board ke headquarters mein Quzath Section ka muayina kiya jis ka baad tazaeen e nau aaj iftetah amal mein aaya. Unhon nay bataya ke Passport Office ki tarha yahan bhi Tatkal ke tehat darkhwaston ke adkhal aur ijrayi ke liye alahda counters rakhay gaye hain. Awaam ki sahoolat ke liye na sirf printes ka izafah kiya gaya hai balkay amlah bhi badhaya gaya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Tatkal scheme ke tehat daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par Certificate usi din jari kar diye jayen ge jis se khaas kar azlaa se anay walay logon ko faida hoga. Isi tarha aam zumra ke tahet daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par bhi dosray din hi Certificates jari kardey ye jayen ge. Telangana Waqf Board ney tabdeeli mazhab ke Certificates ki ijraayi masdood kar di thi taham ab is ki bhi ijrayi amal mein layi jarahi hai.
1246.title: Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah

news_detail: Amrici hukoomat ney Falastini panah gazinon ki behbood ke liye qaayim kardah UNO ki ‘Relief and Works Agency’ (UNRWA) ki maali imdaad mukammal taur par khatam kar di hai. Jummay ke roz Amrici hukoomat ke aik zimma daar zariya ney bataya ke Sadar Donald Trump ke hukum par Falasteeni panah gazin agency ‘UNRWA’ ki maali imdaad mukammal taur par band kar di gayi hai. Khayaal rahay ke rawan saal January mein Amrici hukoomat ney Falastini panah gazinon ko di jaany wali salana imdaad mein 65 million dollar ki kami karte hue imdadi raqam 60 million dollar tak mehdood kar di thi. America ki taraf se ‘UNRWA’ ki imdaad khatam kiye jaany ke nateeja mein imdadi agency ko shadeed dhakka puhanche ga kayunkay yeh idaara Jordan, Lebanon, Syria South Jordan aur Gaza ki patti mein lakhoon Falasteeni panah gazinon ki kifalat karta hai. Falasteeni panah gazinon ki imdaad khatam karne ka Amrici iqdaam apni noiyat ka naya elaan nahi. Aik hafta peshtar Amrici hukoomat ney Falasteeni Authority ko Gaza aur garbh Urdan mein shshri galah behbod ke liye di jaany wali 20 crore dollar ki imdaad bhi rok di thi. Amrici intizamia ki taraf se aqwam mutahidda ke idaara ‘UNRWA’ par shadeed tanqeed ki jati rahi hai. Amrici qaumi salamti ke musheer John Bolton is tanqeed mein paish rahay hain. Doosri janib Falasteeni qayadat ney America ki taraf se imdaad band kiye jaany ko inteqami siyasat qarar diya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke flstinyon ki imdaad is liye band ki gayi kyunkay hum ney beet al quds ko Israel ka da-rul-hakoomat tasleem karne ke Amrici elaan ko mustard kardiya tha. Darien asna German wazeer kharja  Heiko Maas ney kaha hai ke un ka Mulk ‘UNRWA’ki maali muawinat mein izafah kere ga. Un ka kehna tha ke maujooda halaat mein Falasteeni panah gazinon ki imdaad rokna khitta ko aik nayi kasheedgi se dochar karna aur ghair yakeeni kaifiyat paida karna hai.
1262.title: America ne UNWRA ki imdaad band kar di

news_detail: Hyderabad. krnatk mein payi janay wali qabil lehaaz tlgo abadi ko Raghib karneJanta Dal ( s ) naay elaan kia keh agar woh Iqtidaar mein aeye gi to Bengaluru mein’ Telangana Bhavan’ taamer kere gi. Kanada Rashtra Telangana Association ke press release ke bamawajib Janta Dal ( s ) ki manshoor saaz committee ke sadrnasheen  PGR Sandhya nay Bidar ki Basvakalyan halqa assembly mein munaqidah aik ijlaas mein yeh tayaqun diya. sabiqChief Minister oJanta Dal ( s ) quayed Mr. kumaraswami 2 May ko Basvakalyan mein munaqadshudni aik intikhabi jalsa mein is ka bazabta elaan karen ge. Mr. sandhya is halqa assembly seJanta Dal ( s ) ke umeed waar hain. Kanada Rashtra Telangana Association ke baani sadrnasheen Mr. Sandip Kumar Maktala ke bamawajib Bengaluru mein aik Telangana Bhavan ki zaroorat hai chunkay shehar ki 15 feesad se zayed abadi do tlgo reyaston se talluq rakhti hai. Mr. sandhya naay kaha ke party ke intikhabi manshoor mein Bengaluru mein Telangana Bhavan ki taamer ke wada ko shaamil kya jaye ga aur party ke Iqtidaar mein anay ke fori baad is ki tameel ki jaye gi. unhon naay halqa assembly mein Telangana ke raye dahindon se Janta Dal ( s ) ki taied karne ki khwahish ki.
697.title: Bengaluru mein Telangana Bhavan taamer karne janata dil ka waada

news_detail: Hyderabad. shehar ke aik are tea aayi jahdkaar Rakesh Reddy Dubbudu aur un ki team ki janib se Wazeer e Azam ke androon mulk doroon par kiye gaye tajzia se inkishaaf hota hai ke Wazeer e Azam mister Narendra Modi ny ghair bi jay pi Iqtidaar wali reasatain jaisay Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Odhisa aur West Bengal riyasaton ka bohat kam dora kya, is ke barkhilaf BJP ki zair Iqtidaar reastain jaisay gujrat, maharashra aur utar pardesh ka mutadid martaba dora kya. Wazeer e Azam ki Website par mojood data ke tajzia se yeh bhi inkishaaf hota hai ke Modi ke beshtar androon mulk doray un reyaston ke doray aisay mauqa par kiye gaye jab un reyaston mein intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. Modi ny sab se ziyada gujrat ka dora kya jahan se woh talluq rakhtay hai jis ke baad utar pardesh ka dora kya jahan ke aik assembly halqa Waranasi se woh lok sabha mein numaindagi karte hain. raakesh ready Dubbudu ke mutabiq ziyada tar log Modi ke beron mulk doroon par baat karte hain magar hum ny guzashta char barson ke douran Narendra Modi ke Wazeer e Azam ban janay ke baad un ke androon mulk doroon ka mufasil tajzia kya hai. 2014 taa 2018 ke data ke tajzia mein Narendra Modi ke sarkari doray aur niji doray shaamil hain jo unhon ny party programon mein shirkat ke liye kiye they. yeh wazeh hai ke un ke ziyada tar doray election ka saamna karne wali reyaston ke rahay hain. janoobi hind mein unhon ny sab se ziyada Tamilnadu riyasat ka dora kya. is baat ka imkaan hai ke ghair BJP Iqtidaar wali reastain Wazeer e Azam ko ziyada madoo nah kere lekin yeh baat Shahid hai ke ghair mulki wafood ki ziyada tadaad gujrat, maharashra aur Uttaraprades ka ziyada dora kiye hain. unhon ny bataya ke 2017 mein Narendra Modi ny Gujarat aur Uttarapradesh ke alahda alahda 21 doray kiye jahan reyasti assembly ke intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. 2015 mein sab se ziyada dora riyasat Bihar ka kya gyaj_han is saal assembly intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. isi terha Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny 2014 ziyada tar MaharashtraJammu and Kashmir , Jharkhand aur Haryana ke ziyada doray kiye jahan is saal election munaqqid honay walay they. Chhatisgarh aur Goa jahan agarchay BJP ki hukoomaten  hain magar un riyasaton mein shaamil hain jis ka wazeer e azam ny bohat kam dora kya. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny guzashta chaar barson mein Andhrapradesh ka 5 martaba aur Telangana ka sirf 4 martaba dora kya. Modi ny sab se ziyada androon mulk doray 2017 mein kiye jis ke baad saal 2016 mein kiye.
707.title: Narendra Modi, intikhabaat ka saamna karne wali aur BJP Iqtidaar wali reyaston ka dora ziyada karte hain

news_detail: Hyderabad. Delhi ke laal qilah ki dekh bhaal ka thaika Dalmia group ko mil gaya hai jabkay ITC Hotels ney hyderabad ke tareekhi yadgar’ Charminar’ ki dekh bhaal ki zimma daari lainay se apni dilchaspi ka izhaar kya hai aur maktoob izhaar dilchaspi daakhil kya hai. ITC agency hi wahid hai jis ney Charminar ki dekh bhaal karne ka iradah zahir ki hai aur wizarat sayahat o aasarqdimh ki yadgar Project ko ikhtiyar karne qaim kardah oversite and vision committee ki janib se is darkhwast ko qatiat dena baqi hai. GMR sports private limited jo Dehli Daredevils IPL team ko promote kar rahi hai, ko qilah Golcondaki dekh bhaal ke liye is ke maktoob izhaar dilchaspi ko mukhtasir fehrist mein shaamil karne ke baad markazi hukoomat ki janib se maktoob amaadgi bheja gaya hai. GMR sports ke zaraye ke bamawajjib company ney malik ke 7 tareekhi yadgar Bashmool laal qilah ki dekh bhaal ke liye مکتوبات izhaar dilchaspi daakhil kiye they aur hamein maktoob amaadgi masool sun-hwa hai, ab hamein vision bid paish karna hai. Committee, vision bid ka Project qawaid ke mutabiq jaiza le gi, agar hamari boli ko qatiat di jati hai aur muntakhib kyajata hai to hamein hukoomat hind ke sath aik yaddasht e mafahmat par dastakhat karna hoga.
716.title: Charminar ku ITC aur Quillah Golconda ko GMR goad lainay tayyar

news_detail: Marakish nay Iran ke sath safarti taluqaat munqita karne ka elaan kardiya hai. is naay yeh faisla Iran ki janib se sahara ki alahdgi pasand tehreek’ Polisario Front’ ki himayat ke rad-e-amal mein kya hai. Polisario Front marakish se saheraawi awam ke liye azaadi ke naam par goreela jung lardte rahi hai. is waqt aqwam mutahidda ki mudakhlat ke baad is Front aur marakish ke darmain jung bandi hai. mrakshi wazeer kharja Nasir Boritha nay mangal ke roz sahafion se guftagu karte hue kaha ke t_hran mein mrakshi sifarat khanah band kar diya jaye ga aur Rabat mein mtayin irani safeer ko mulk se be dakhal kar diya jaye ga. unhon naay Iran aur Lebanon ki Shiah malaysia hizab Allah par Polisario Front ki himayat aur is ke jngjoon ko askari tarbiyat dainay ka ilzaam Aayed kya hai. irani hukoomat naay marakish ke is elaan aur ilzaam par fori tor par kisi rad-e-amal ka izhaar nahi kya hai .
728.title: Polisario Front ki himayat : Marakish ka Iran se sifarti taluqaat munqita karne ka elaan

news_detail: Turkey ke shehar Azmir mein mukhtalif mumalik ki musallah afwaj ki mushtarqa fouji mashqen shuru hogayi hain. un mashqon mein Saudi arab aur maizban Turkey ke ilawa mutadid mumalik ki tenu musallah afwaj ke dastay aur khusoosi units hissa le rahay hain. Saudi arab ke brri aur behri daston ke ilawa Shahi fazaiya ke pandrah laraka jet bhi un mashqon mein shareek hain. Saudi commander colonel abdulah ban Mohammad Al Zarebi nay bataya hai ke musallah afwaj ke dastay dost mumalik ke sath mukhtalif fouji mashqen kar rahay hain. woh behri mashqon mein talashi aur jungi mahol mein risko ki karwaiyon mein hissa le rahay hain. unhon nay kaha ke yeh jungi mashqen shareek mumalik ki musallah afwaj ke liye barri ahmiyat ki haamil hain aur woh mtnoa fouji teknikon ko apni Herbi salahiyat mein izafay ke liye browe car laa satke hain. yeh dosra mauqa hai ke Saudi arab ki musallah afwaj Turkey mein un EFES mashqon mein shareek hain. is se pehlay unhon nay 2016 mein Turkey mein munaqidah un mashqon mein shirkat ki thi
737.title: Turkey mein Saudi arab sameit mukhtalif mumalik ki fouji mashqen

news_detail: Islami jamhooria Iran , sipahh pasdaran inqilab aur Aira noon ka markazi bank dehshat gardon ke America par tayyarah hamlon mein muawnat ke qasoor waar hain jin ke nateeja mein kam se kam teen hazaar afraad halaak hogaye they. adalat mein muqadma dair karne walay mutasirah khandano ke aik wakeel Robert Hyfeel ny kaha hai ke wifaqi adalat ko Iran ki janib se Al Qaeda ko muhayya ki gayi maali imdaad ke saboot paish kiye gaye hain aur is ki yeh maadi imdaad hi Al Qaeda ke nine eleven hamlon ka aik sabab bani thi jis se hlaktin huien, secron afraad zakhmi hue aur tabahi hui thi. wifaqi judge ny Iran ko hukum diya hai ke woh har mutasirah maa baap ko 85 laakh dollars, har mutasirah khawand ya biwi ko aik crore 25 laakh dollars, baap ya maa mahroom hojane walay har bachay ko 85 laakh dollars aur har mutasirah behan ya bhai ko saarhay 42 laakh dollars ki raqam ada kere. Iran ny America mein –apne khilaaf harjanay ke is muqadmay ki samaat ke aaghaz ke baad se khamoshi ikhtiyar kiye rakhi hai. is liye is baat ka kam hi imkaan hai ke woh un mutasirah khandano ko adalat ke faisla ki paasdari karte hue koi raqam ada kere ga . .
747.title: Americi judge ka Iran ko 9 / 11 ke mutasirah khandano ko 6 arab dollars ada karne ka hukum

news_detail: America mein istighasa ke numaindon ne mangal ke roz bataya ke columbia se talluq rakhnay walay janwaron ke aik Doctor par manshiat ki America smuggling karne ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai. mazkoorah Doctor ne maya heroen ke pikton ko ktte ke palon ki anton mein chupaya tha. New York ke mashriqi hissa mein istighasa ke daftar ke mutabiq mulzim Andres Lopez ko mangal ke roz broklin ki wifaqi adalat mein talabb kya gaya jahan is par heroen America laane aur taqseem karne ke hawala se ilzamaat aed kiye gay. akhbaari reporton ke mutabiq 38 sala lopiz ka kehna hai ke woh be qasoor hai. istighasa ke zaraye ke mutabiq qasoor waar thehraye jaane ki soorat mein columbia ke Doctor ko Umar qaid ki saza ka saamna ho ga. zaraye ka kehna hai ke is baat ka bhi shuba hai ke lopiz 10 baras se ziyada arsa se America manshiat laane ki saazish mein shareek hai. istighasa ke mutabiq lopiz huspania mein girftar sun-hwa tha jis ke baad usay malik badar kar ke America bheja gaya
759.title: America : Coumbian Doctor par kutton ki antadiyon mein manshiat smuggle karne ka ilzaam

news_detail: Bharat ki shumali aur maghribi reyaston mein rait ke tufaan ne tabahi mchadi, Rajashtan aur Uttar Pradesh mein mukhtalif hadsaat mein 100 afraad halaak ho gaye. shumali aur wasti reyaston mein chalne wali zor daar aandhi ne sab kuch tehass nehass kardiya, 130 kilometer fi ghantay ki raftaar se chalne wali hawaon ne darakhton ko jarr se ukhaar diya, bijli ke pol gir gaye, kayi gharon ki diivaaren aur chhtin bhi zamee bose hogyin. Bharti hakkaam ke mutabiq yopi ke 40 azlaa mein tufaan ke baais painsath afraad halaak hue aur 47 zakhmi hogaye, Rajashtan mein 33 afraad ki halakaton ki tasdeeq ki gayi hai. Uttar Pradesh mein sab se ziyada Agra mein sab se ziyada tabahi mchi, jahan sarkari ohdedaron ke mutabiq 36 afraad halaak aur 35 zakhmi hogaye. Uttar Pradesh mein Agra ke ilawa Bijnor, Bareli, Saharanpur, Peelibheet, Ferozabad, Chitrakot, Muzaffar nagar, Raye Bareli, Unnao azlaa mein tofani hawaon se nuqsaan pouncha hai. Rajashtan mein dhool poor zila sab se ziyada mutasir raha jahan 17 logon ki mout waqay hogayi. Dholpur mein marnay walon mein do ka talluq yopi ke Agra se hai.
1235.title: Shumali o maghribi reyaston mein rait ka tufaan, 100 se zayed halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh mein aaj dopehar tofani hawaon aur taiz barish ke nateeja mein 10 hlaktin hui hain. Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh se ta haal 5, 5 halakaton ki it-tila-aat hain. dono tlgo reyaston mein aaj tofani hawaon, saalah baari aur barish ke baais kayi jaghon par darakht aur bijli khambay jarr se akhar gay. nashebi ilaqon mein barish ka pani daakhil hogaya jis ki wajah se kayi ghanton taq trafik mein khlal raha. taiz hawaon aur barish ke baais barqi sarbarahi par bhi bura assar para. raat der gay taq bhi kayi ilaqon mein bijli ki sarbarahi bahaal nahi hosaki thi. do janoobi reastain Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh guzashta chand dinon se shadeed garmi ki lapait mein the aaj dhuwan daar barish aur tofani hawaon ke baais mausam achanak tabdeel hogaya aur darja hararat mein zabardast gravt aagai. ghair mousmi barish ke baais mamool ki zindagi mein khlal peda hogyaavr faslun ko bhaari nuqsaan pouncha. Telangana ke dar-al-hakoomat Hyderabad aur muzafaat mein tofani hawaon, saalah baari aur taiz barish ke baais kayi ilaqay kuch der ke liye zair aabb aagaye, darakhton aur khmbon ke akhar jaane ke baais kayi jaghon par kayi dirtk rasta masdood reh gaya magar jee each am si ke emergency amlah ne pani ki nikasi aur jaroon se ukhad gay darakhton aur khmbon ko fori htadya. kayi maqamat par darakhten grjane se gariyon ko nuqsaan pouncha. shehar ke muzafaat Karman Ghat mein barish ke douran darakht ke neechay khail raha aik bacha bijli ki zad mein aakar halaak hogaya. Telangana ke wazeer abkari mister Padma rau jinhon ne Hyderabad ke kuch mutasirah maqamat ka dora kiya aur akhbari numaindon ko bataya ke jee each am si ko 45 darakhton ke ukhad jaane ki it-tila-aat masool hui hain. shehar ke 25 maqamat par barish ka pani jama hojane ki bhi shikayaat masool hui hain. wazeer tawanai mister jagadish ready ne bataya ke taiz hawaon ke baais 1, 250 bijli khmbon ko nuqsaan pounchanay ki it-tila-aat masool huien. hakkaam ne Hyderabad aur Warangal mein do emergency control rooms bhi qaim kiye hain. unhon ne kaha ke hum bijli sarbarahi ko bahaal karne koshan hain. aandhraprdish ke vshakha ptnm, Vizyanagaram aur Srikakulam azlaa mein bhi tofani hawae aur barish ka zor raha hai. janoobi sahili Andhra aur Rayalseema khitton mein bhi zabardast barish hui. Andhra Pradesh ke Guntoor aur Prakasam azlaa mein bijli girnay se 3 afraad halaak hogaye. gntor town mein 1 shakhs is par hoardings grjane ke baais halaak hogaya. zila Kurnool mein 1 shakhs darakht ke grjane par neechay dab kar halaak hogaya. taiz barish ke baais, aam, dhaan, makayi aur deegar faslun ko zabardast nuqsaan pouncha hai .
1249.title: Telangana aur Andhra mein tofani hawaon ke sath taiz barish. 10 hlakaten

news_detail: America mein New Zealand ke sifarat khana se wabsta fouji atashi kmodor Alfred Keating sifarat khana ke ghusal khaanoon mein khufia camera laga kar khawateen ehalkaron ki videos bananay ke ilzaam mein un dinon –apne malik mein muqadma ka saamna kar rahay hain. New Zealand herald Nami muqami akhbar ke mutabiq New Zealand sifaratkhane ke ghusal khaanoon mein khufia cameron ka inkishaaf guzashta baras July mein sun-hwa tha. akhbar ke mutabiq sabiq fouji atashi neh adalat se douran muqadma istada ki thi ke karwai ke douran is ka naam zahir nah kya jaye. jummay ke roz is zimn mein pehli samaat hui. isi akhbar ke mutabiq New Zealand police neh apni noiyat ke anokhay waqea ki tafteesh ke liye America ka dora bhi kya tha. police ki tehqiqaat ke nateeja mein sabiq fouji ahelkaar par ghair qanooni tareeqa se sharamnaak manazair ko khufia cameron ke zariye monitor karne ka ilzaam Aayed kya gaya. athawan sala kmodor Alfred neh ilzamaat sach saabit honay par –apne ohday se istifa day diya tha aur un dinon New zealandmein mojood hain. ahelkaar ke qareebi zaraye ka kehna hai ke fouji atashi jinsi hawas mein mubtala hain. Keating America mein –apne malik ke sifarat khana mein aik aala aur zimma daar ohda par Faiz they. woh Amrici hum mansab ohdedaron se New zealandse mutaliq mutadid ahem mamlaat mein –apne malik ki numaindagi kar chuke they. is baat ka ihtimal hai ke Keating ko sharamnaak iqdaam ki Padaash mein aik se do baras ki qaid ki saza suna di jaye
1267.title: New zealand ke fouji atashi neh sifarat khana ke ghusal khanaay mein khufia camera kyun lgwaya ?

news_detail: Hyderabad. national Crime Record Bureau (CRB) ke mutabiq Telangana Mulk ki paanch riyasaton mein shaamil hai jahan logon ke jaan dae dainay ke iqdamaat ke waaqiaat ziyada runuma hotay hain. NCRB Telangana riyasat mein 2014 ke dauran khudkushi karne ke waaqiaat fi lakh 26. 5 hai. Pondicherry khudkushi ke waaqiaat ke lehaaz se Mulk ki sar e fehrist riyasat hai jahan khudkushi karne walon ki tadaad fi lakh 40.4 hai. Kull Hind ausat sharah isi muddat ke dauran 10.6 waaqiaat fi lakh hai. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ke tahet Hyderabad ki maujooda abadi ke hisaab se Hyderabad mein takhmeenan har saal 2,650 afraad khudkushi karte hue apni jaan dae dete hain. Haliya World Health Organization ki aik report mein kaha gaya ke Hindustan mein 15-29 baras ki Umar ke naujawanon mein fi lakh abadi khud kushi ka rujhan ziyada paaya jata hai. khud kashi karne ke pas parda muharikaat kya hain. Iss khusoos mein NCRB ney bhi 2004 aur 2014 ke darmiyan khud kushi ke waaqiaat ka tajzia kya hai aur yeh nishandahi ki hai ke Hindustan mein khudkushi ke waaqiaat ki badi wajah khandani tanazeaath hain. Khudkushi ke 28% waaqiaat khandani aur rishta daari ke umoor se judey hue thae. Doosri badi wajah bemari hai jis ke baayis 18% log khudkushi karte hain. Mahireen ke mutabiq umooman is tarha ke sangeen iqdamaat karne ke peechay kayi wajuhaat karfarma hoti hain. Doctors ka kahena hai ke Hindustan ke naujawan un naakamiyoo par qaboo panay se qaasir rehtay hain jis ke baayis mayoosi pahelti hai. Mayoosi ka ilaaj na honay ke baayis khwahish ki adam takmeel par badhtay dabao, mutawatir be izzati, rishton ka toot jaana wagaira khudkushi karne ki taraf mael karte hain.
1134.title: Khudkushi waaqiaat mein Telangana ka panchawan muqaam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Zaraye se maloom huwa hai ke Nizam’s Museum se sarqa karli gayi naadir ashya ko bar aamad karne mein Hyderabad Police kamyaab hogayi hai. Iss khusoos mein ta haal Police ne kisi qisam ki maloomat ka tabadlah nahi kya hai. Saariqon ne 2
September Itwaar ki shab Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakhi gayeen qeemti ashya ka sarqa karliya tha jin mein 7

Nizaam ke zair istemaal Golden Tiffin Box, Cup & Saucer aur aik Golden Spoon shaamil hain. Hyderabad Police ne masrooqa nawadiraat ko baraamad karne aur mulzimeen ko pakadney ke liye 10 khusoosi Teams tashkeel di theen. Un teamd ne mauqa waardaat ka jaiza lainay aur Museum ke mulazmeen ke talluq se maloomat ikhatta karne ke baad chand afraad ko mushtaba fehrist mein rakhtay hue un ka pata chalanay ki koshish ki thi aur un ke cell phones ki tracking shuru kar di gayi thi. Maloom huwa hai ke Police ko ibtida mein yeh ittila mili thi ke saariq Bidar mein maujood hain magar jab tak Police wahan pahonch paati woh Mumbai ke liye rawana hogaye thae. Maloom huwa hai ke theek aik hafta ke andar Police ne un saariqon ko bil-aakhir Mumbai mein daboch hi liya. Bataya jata hai ke Police ne is khusoos mein teen mulzimeen ko hirasat mein le liya hai aur unhen tayyarah ke zareya Hyderabad muntaqil bhi kardiya gaya hai. Police ne masrooqa nawadiraat ko bhi baraamad karliya hai. Yaad rahay ke yeh wardaat Itwaar ki raat mein paish aayi thi aur Nizam’s Museum ke Administrative Officer Mr. Shaukat Hussain ne Police mein yeh shikayat darj karwai thi ke jab peer ke din Museum ko khoola gaya tha to yeh paaya gaya ke aik showcase ke locks tootay hue hain aur aik Tiffin Box, aik piyali aur tashtari aur Golden Spoon gayab hain. Unhon ne bataya tha ke sarqa karne walay ventilation ke zareya andar daakhil hue aur jis gallery mein yeh nawadiraat rakhay hue thae uss ke CC TV camera ko nuqsaan pahonchaya aur aik showcase mein rakhi hui yeh ashya sarqa karli. Bataya jata hai ke Tiffin Box do kg wazni hai jis par Diamonds aur Ruby jadey hue hain. Iss Museum mein Nizaam ke zair e istemaal kayi qeemti ashya maujood hain. Aik andaza ke mutabiq iss Museum mein 700- 800 kg tak wazan ki besh baha ashya mauood hain jin ki bain ul aqwami markt mein qadar ek mehdood andaza ke mutabiq  Rs. 2,000 crore se bhi zayed hai. Yahan yeh baat qabil e zikar hai ke maazi mein bhi Asif jahs ki zair e istemaal kayi naadir ashya sarqa karli gayi theen magar un ko baraamad nahi kya jaska tha. Yeh paheli martaba hai ke Police ne androon aik hafta masroqa nawadiraat ko bar aamad karliya hai.
1147.title: Nizam’s Museum ke masrooqa nawadiraat baraamad?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ney Congress leader o sabiq Rukn e Assembly T Jaya Prakash Reddy @ Jagga Reddy ko peer ke din dhoka dahi karte hue Passport haasil karne ke ziman mein darj aik muqadama mein giraftar kar liya. Police zaraye ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ko hirasat mein le liya gaya aur un se pooch gach ki jarahi hai. Iss case ki tehqeeq se juday aik Police ohdedar ney bataya ke hamein it-tila-aat mili hain ke Jagga Reddy ney apni ahliya, beti aur betay ke naam par haasil kardah Passports par teen logon ko America bheja hai. Police ohdedaar ne yaad dilaya ke 14 baras qabal uss waqt ke Arkaan e Assembly Soyam Bapu Rao aur Kasipetta Lingaiah ko aisay hi ilzamaat mein girftar karliya tha. Police zaraye ke bamawajib  Amrici hukoomat ke ohdedaron ke paas ghair majaz taur par Hindustan se emigration ka data maujood hai. Data ka tajzia karne par woh mutajub hogaye ke teen afraad farzi dastawizaat ki asaas par America mein daakhil honay mein kamyaab hogaye thae. Iss baat ka pata chalne par Hyderabad Commissioner ki Task Force ke ohdedaron ney Jagga Reddy ko hirasat mein letay hue kayi ghanton tak un se pooch gach ki. Maloom huwa ke Task Force ke ohdedaron ney chand dastawizaat miley jin se is baat ka ishara milta hai ke farzi dastawizaat paish karte hue Jagga Reddy ke arkaan khandan ke naamon par chand Passports haasil kiye gai. Tafteesh kunindgaan musaddiqa reports ki tauseeq kar rahay hain ke Jagga Reddy ke hamrah 2004 mein Jagga Reddy ke hamrah aik mard aur do khawateen ney America ka safar kya tha, taham yeh teen afraad America mein hi ruk gai aur Jagga Reddy Hyderabad wapas laut gay. Zaraye ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ko un par aayed ilzamaat par North Zone Police Hyderabad ke hawala kardiya jaye ga. Rabt paida karne par DCP North Zone Ms. B. Sumati ney tauseeq ki ke sabiq Congress Government Whip ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Congress leader ney Passports ke husool aur America ka Visa haasil karne apne ohda ka najaayez faida uthaya. Ms Sumati ney kaha ke Jagga Reddy ke kisi bhi rukn e khandan ney Passport haasil nahi kya. Darin asnaa Sadar Telangana Pradesh Congress Committee Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy ney kaha ke woh aaj raat Director General of Police Mr. M. Mahinder Reddy se mulaqaat karen ge.
1163.title: Former MLA Jagga Reddy giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kul Hindd Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ney apne tamam Arkaan e Assembly ko dobarah party ticket dete hue tajassus ko khatam kardiya. Iss martaba bhi shaher ke 7 Assembly halqon se jis ki numaindagi Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen karti hai maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi ticket diya gaya hai aur sirf itni tabdeeli ki gayi hai ke janab mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko jo halqa Assembly Yakutpura ki numaindagi karte arhay they unhen Charminar halqa Assembly se umeedwaar naamzad kiya gaya hai aur Charminar halqa Assembly ki numaindagi karne walay janab Syed Ahmed Pasha Quadri ko Yakutpura se umeedwaar banaya gaya hai. Assembly ki tahleel ke baad se baaz halqon mein yeh chaymegoyaan ho rahi theen ke is martaba kam az kam do maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko drop karte hue do naye umeedwaron ko maidan mein utaara jaye ga. Yahi wajah thi ke Majlis ke ticket ke husool ke liye kayi naujawan qaayideen intikhabaat ke liye zehni taurr par tayar ho gai thae. Maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi dobarah ticket dyie janay ke bawajood ta haal aisa koi ishara nahi milta ke ticket se mahroom qaayideen baghaawat par amaada hain. Agarchay ticket ke khwaahan qaayideen kuch mayoos hue hain magar unhon ney party qiyadat ke faislay ko qubool karliya hai. Saddar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ki jari kardah pehli fehrist ke mutabiq qaayed Muqannana Majlis janab Akbaruddin Owaisi (Chandrayangutta ), janab Mumtaz Ahmed Khan (Charminar), janab Ahmed Pasha Quadri (Yakutpura), janab Mohammad Muazzam Khan (Bhadurpura), janab Ahmed bin Abdullah Balala (Malakpet ), janab Jaffer Hussain Meraj (Nampally) aur Janab Kausar Mohiuddin (Karvan) umeedwaar hon ge. Bataya jata hai ke party aik aur fehrist jari kere gi jis mein shaher aur azlaa ke chand halqay shaamil hon ge, taham doosri fehrist bhi bamushkil 3 taa 5 umeedwaron par mushtamil hogi.
1182.title: Majlis ki pehli fehrist. koi naya chahera nahi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizam’s Museum se besh baha nawadiraat ke sansani khaiz sarqa mein mulawis 2 mulzimeen ki giraftari aur maal e masroqa baraamad kar lenay ki aaj Police ney tauseeq kar di hai. Yaad rahay ke ‘Y This News’ ney hi sab se phelay mulzimeen ki giraftari ki ittila di thi. Jaria mah ki 2 tareekh ko Nizam’s Museum se Heere aur Rubi jadey 2 kg Gold Tiffin Box,Cup & Saucer aur aik Golden Spoon sarqa karliye gaye thae jin ki international market mein qeemat Crores rupay hai, un mulzimeen ke qabza se masroqa nawadiraat ko baraamad karliya gaya hai. Giraftar shudgan 2 mulzimeen ki shanakht Mohammad Ghouse Pasha urf Khooni Ghouse (23) Centering Worker Rajendranagar aur Mohammad Mubeen (24) Welding Worker saakin Rajendranagar ko Police ney peer ki shab giraftar karliya tha. Commissioner Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar ney aaj un mulzimeen ki giraftari ki tauseeq karte huwe bataya ke dono ney jurm ke irtikaab karne se 45 din qabal Museum pahonch kar mukammal jaiza letay huwe sarqa ka mansoobah banaya tha. Un mulzimeen ney 45 din baad jurm ka iss liye irtikaab kiya ke CCTV Footage mein bhi un ka ihata na hosakay chunkay umooman CC Tv Footage Recorder ki memory aik mah baad aaz khud delete hojati hai. Yeh dono bachpan ke dost aur door ke rishtedaar hain aur sarqa ki waardat mein mulawis hain. Mulzimeen ke bayan ke mutabiq un dono ney roshan daan se andar daakhil huwe jis ki unhon ney 45 din qabal hi nishandahi karli thi. Is ka sara mansoobah Mubeen ney tayyar kiya tha jis ney 45 din qabl Visitor ke taur par Museum ka daura kiya tha aur naaqis security intezamaa ka pata chalaya. Is ney apne mansoobah ko anjaam dainay ke liye Ghouse se baat ki aur dono ney is ko anjaam dainay ka faisla karliya. Yeh dono naadir ashya ka sarqa karne mein taqreeban kamyaab hogaye. Un dono ney ventilator se neechay utarney aur oopar chadhne ke liye aik rassi par das gaanth bandhay thae. Mubeen ney oopar rah kar rassi ko thaame rakha aur Ghouse rassi ke zariye neechay uttra aur showcase ka lock tod kar is mein rakhi huwi naadir ashiya ko thaam kar rassi ke zariye hi oopar chadh gaya. Yeh logon ney Museum mein apna koi suraagh nahi choda tha albatta ventilator ke atraaf un dono nay jo nishanaat chodey thae is ki buniyaad par hi un ki shanakhat ki gayi. Un dono ney jurm ke irtikaab ke baad apne kapday tabdeel karliye aur Police ko gumraah karne ilaqa mein ghoomnay lagey. Umooman mujrimeen jurm ke irtikaab ke sath hi maqam waardaat ko fauri chod detain hain. Is ke baad un dono ney Zaheerabad simt Mutangi par Highway ka rukh kiya aur chupkay se service road se wapas aagaye taakay Highway par nasb CCTV cameras mein yeh nazar aeye ke woh shaher chod kar chalay gaye hain. Is ke baad woh bas ke zariye masruqa Golden Spoon sath Mumbai ke liye rawana huwe taakay imkani kharidaron ko bataur namoona dikha sakhen. Jab inhen achi peshkash nahi mili to woh wapas lout aeye aur achi peshkash ka intzaar karne lagey. Hyderabad Police ke aik ohdedar ney kaha ke Tiffin Box ko King Nizaam istemaal kere ya nah kere maloom nahi magar un choron mein se aik ney rozana is mein khana khaya hai. Un do mulzimeen ney mazkoorah masroqa ashya ke sath Museum mein rakhi aik muqaddas kitaab bhi churanay ka iradah kiya tha. Jab woh is kitaab ko churanay walay hi thae ke qareebi Masjid se ki maghrib ki azaan ki aawaz sunai di jis ki wajah se woh kitaab churanay se daargaye aur apna iradah tark kardiya. Police ney bataya ke aadi sarqeen ki naqal o harkat ki chhaan been ke dauran yeh pata chalne par ke Mubeen gayab hai, Police is case ko hal karpayi hai.
1203.title: Nizam’s Museum ke masroqa nawadiraat bar aamad’ 2 mulizmeen giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ke Jagtial zila mein paahadi ki aik ghaat Road par se Telangana RTC ki aik Bus ke khayi mein girjane se kam az kam 52 afraad bashmool 4 bachay halaak hogaye jabkay deegar 10 zakhmi hogaye. superintendent of Police Jagtial Mr. Snidhu Sharma ney hadisa ke fauri baad bataya tha ke ab tak 45 Musafireen halaak ho chukay hain aur zakhmion ko qareebi sarkari Hospitalon mein muntaqil kiya gaya hai, baad mein mausoola ittela ke mutabiq shaded 7 zakhmi bhi jaanbar nahin ho sake. Jagtial Bus Depot ki yeh Bus jis mein 60 se zayed musafireen safar kar rahay thae, Shaniwaarpet moza se barah kondaghatu Road aur Mutiampet villages Jagtial jarahi thi ke 11:45 bajey din khayi mein girgaee jis ke baayis yeh haadsa paish aaya. 2 darjan se zayed musafireen barsar e mauqa halaak hogaye thae jabkay Bus se 7 zakhmi bachon ko nikala gaya tha jin mein 4 halak hogay. Marne walon mein 32 khawateen bhi shaamil hain. Shadeed zakhmion ko Karimnagar aur Hyderabad ke Hospitalon ko muntaqil kiya jaraha tha magar yeh jaanbar na ho sake, mahlukeen ki laashon ko postmortem ke liye Jagtial ke sarkari Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Yeh haadisa uss waqt paish aaya jab ghaat road ke aakhri mod par driver ney Bus par qaboo khodiya jis ke nateeja mein Bus khayi mein ja giri. Sadak se guzarnay walon aur muqami dehation ney bachao ka kaam kiya. District Collector Jagtial Mr Sharat ne bachao kamon ki nigrani ki. Kaarguzar Chief Minister Mr.K Chandrashekar Rao ney is haadisa par gahray dukh ka izhaar karte huwe muhalekeen ke pasmandgan se izhaar taaziyat kiya. Unhon ney hukkaam ko hidayat di ke zakhmion ko fauri tibbi imdaad baham pohanchai jaye. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney Bus haadisa ke mahlukeen ke wirsa ko 5 lakh rupay ex-gratia dainay ka elaan kiya. Wazeer Tansport Mr. Mahender Reddy ney kaha ke Kondaghato ghaat road par yeh phela andohnak haadsa hai.
1216.title: Jagtial mein Bus khayi mein girpadi 52 halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Leader Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney halqa Assembly Charminar se Majlis ki janib se Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko umeedwaar naamzad kiye jaanay par tabsarah karte huwe kaha ke Majlis ki qiyadat un se khaufzadah hai, yahi wajah hai ke un se muqaabla ke liye 5 meqaat se Assembly ke rukn rehne walay Senior Leader ko un ke maqabil khada kiya gaya hai. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh Congress Party ke ticket par Charminar Constituency se muqaabla karne walay hain. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney kaha ke Majlis ki qiyadat ney kisi bhi halqa mein apne maujooda umeedwaar ko tabdeel nahi kiya hai magar sirf Charminar halqa ke umeedwaar ko Yakutpura ke Rukn e Assembly se tabdeel kardiya hai. Unhon ney Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko Charminar se umeedwaar bananay par kaha ke darasal Majlis ko yeh dar paida hogaya hai ke Charminar ki nashist se Majlis ke maujooda MLa ki kamyabi ke imkanaat mohom hain isi liye guzishta 25 barson se Yakutpura ki numaindagi karne walay Leader ko Charminar se umeedwaar banaya gaya hai. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse jinhein guzishta baldi intekhabaat mein Majlis ke muqabil shikast ka saamna bhi huwa tha aur jinhein polling ke din zad o kob bhi kiya gaya tha yeh daawa kar rahay hain ke Charminar se aik sher ka muqaabla sher se hoga. Mr. Mohammed Ghouse ney yeh zahir karne ke liye ke Majlis ke umeedwaar Mr. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan ko apni shikast ka khauf lahaq hai, kaha ke woh abhi se dargahon ki ziyarten karne lagey hain jinhon ney is se pahelay kabhi dargaah nahi gay thae Mr. Mohammed Ghouse jin ke ticket ko party ney abhi qatiat nahi di hai, khud ko Charminar se Congress ke umeedwaar ke taur par paish kar rahay hain. Iss istefsaar par ke Congress aur Telugu Desam Party ke darmiyan intekhabi mafahmat ki soorat mein halqa Assembly Charminar se kon muqaabla karen ge unhon ney kaha ke Congress aur Telugu Desham Party mein mafahmat ki soorat mein inhen poora yaqeen hai ke Telugu Desham Party Leader Mr. Ali Masqati bhi unhi ka naam paish karen ge chunkay Mr. Ali Masqati ney 2009 mein muqaabla kiya tha jabkay unhon ney 2015-16 mein intekhabaat ka saamna kiya ha. Mr. Ghouse ney kaha ke Majlis ko apni shikast ka khauf hai is liye aaj paheli martaba 5 meqaat se Assembly mein numaindagi karne walay dargahon ke doray karne lagey hain.
1233.title: Congress Leader Mohammed Ghouse ke buland bangh daaway

news_detail: Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Pakistan  Nawaz Sharif ki ahliya Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ka London mein inteqaal hogaya. Guzishta raat un ki haalat aik baar phir intehai tashweesh-naak ho gayi thi jis ke baad unhen aik martaba phir ventilator par muntaqil kar diya gaya tha. Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke lungs ney kaam karna chodh diya tha jis ke baad un ki haalat tashweesh naak batayi jati thi aur unhen ventilator par muntaqil kar diya gaya tha. Muslim League (N) ke Sadar Shahbaz Shareef ney Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal ki tasdeeq kar di hai aur kaha hai ke un ki maiyat Pakistan laane ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Hussain Nawaz ney bhi apni walida ke inteqaal ki tasdeeq ki hai taham abhi hatmi tur par yeh nahi kaha ja sakta ke woh un ki maiyat ke sath Pakistan aa saken ge ya nahi. 68 sala Begum Kulsoom Nawaz Cancer ke aarzah mein mubtala theen aur June se London ke Harley Street Cilinic mein zair e ilaaj theen. April 1971 mein un ki Nawaz Shareef se Shaadi huwi thi. Nawaz Shareef, un ki Dukhtar Maryam aur daamaad Captain (Rtd) Mohammad Safdar Adalat e ehatasab ki janib se July mein corruption ke aik case mein di gayi saza par Rawalpindi mein Adiala jail mein qaid ki saza kaat rahay hain. Nawaz Shareef, Maryam aur Mohammad Safdar ko jail mein Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal se aagah kardiya gaya hai. Wazeer e Azam Pakistan Imran Khan ney Begum Kulsoom ke inteqaal par izhaar e  taaziyat kiya hai. Aik bayan mein unhon ney kaha ke qanoon ke mutabiq Kulsoom ke arkaan khandan aur wirsaa ko tamam saholaten faraham ki jayen gi. Wazeer e Azam ney London mein Pakistani High Commission ko hidaayat di ke marhomah ke arkaan e khandan ko tamam darkaar saholaten baham pahonchai jayen. Un ke pasmandgan mein shohar aur do ladke aur do ladkiyan Hasan, Hussain , Maryam aur Asma hain.
1254.title: Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ka London mein inteqaal

news_detail: Europi Mulk Belgium ke siyasi akhadhe ki chaar badi jamhoori siyasi jamaaton ney Mulk mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ke liye koshan ‘Islam’ Party par pabandi laganay ki koshishen shuru kar di hain. Belgium ki dayen baazu, aitedaal pasand aur bayen baazu se talluq rakhnay wali chaar siyasi partiyon ney dastoor mein aik tarmeemi bill paish karne ka elaan kiya hai jis mein mazhabi bunyadon par siyasat mein sargaram honay aur Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ka mutalibah karne se roknay ki sifarish ki jaye gi, jis ke liye yeh taweel paish ki jarahi hai ke is mujaweza aaeni tarmeem ka maqsad Mulk ke dastoor ke liye khatrah ban’ney wali jamaaton par pabandi aayed karna hai. Belgium ke Rukn e Parliment Richard Miller ka kehna hai ke ‘Islam’ party ke numaindon ney khulay bundon Mulk ka adalti nizaam tabdeel karkay islami sharai adalti nizaam nafiz karne ki khwahish ka izhaar kiya hai, taham un ke gair jamohori nazriaat par manfi rad-e-amal ke khadshay ke paish nazar unho ney apne programme ke baaz nukaat tabdeel kiye hain. ‘Islam’ party ke sarbarah ney apne  islami sharai qawaneen ke nifaz ki koshisho ka bermila izhaar kiya hai. ‘Islam’ party ke Morocan rukn Abdul Hayi Baqali Tahiri ney kaha ke ‘haan mein pooray wusooq aur wazahat ke sath kehta hon ke hamari jamaat ka manshoor Belgium ke dastoor ko islami sanchay mein dhalna aur Belgium mouashra mein Islami qawaneen ke nifaz ki koshish karna hai’ unhon ney mazeed wazahat ki ke Islami sharai qawaneen duniya ke kayi dosray mulkon mein bhi raayej hain. Hum islami qawaneen ko aik Role Model ke tour par paish karna chahtay hain. ‘Islam’ party ki Belgium mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ki koshishon par Mulk ke siyasi aur samaji halqon ki taraf se shadeed tanqeed ki jarahi hai. Awaami halqon mein bhi Belgium ki Islami jamaat aur uss ki Mulk mein tabdeeli ki koshisho ko mashkook qarar diya hai. Mulk ki chaar badi jamhoori siyasi partiyon Socialist Party, Human Democratic Party, Reformer Movement aur Challenge Party ney ‘Islam’ party ki raah roknay ki koshishen teez kardi hain aur Tahiya kya ke Parliment mein Islam Party ki koshishon ko nakam banaye jaye ga. Yahan yeh baat qabil zikar hai ke Belgium mein Musalman aqliyat mein hain is ke bawajood Islam Party  Mulk mein sharai qawaneen ke nifaz ki batein kar rahi hai.
1268.title: Belgium mein Islami Shariyat ke nifaz ke khilaaf ‘jamhoori’ quwatoon ka gath jod

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party, Telugu Desham Party aur Communist Party Of India ney Telangana mein intekhabi ittehaad ka elaan kardiya hai aur mutaleba kiya ke intekhabi nataij tak Telangana riyasat mein Sadar Raj nafiz kiya jaye. Saddar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti o Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly tahleel karte huwe qabl az waqt intekhabaat ki raah hamwar ki hai. Governor Telangana & Andhra Pradesh Mr ESL Narsimhan ney Assembly tahleel karne Cabinet ki sifarish ko qubool karte huwe Mr. Chandrashekar Rao aur un ki Council of Ministers se riyasat ke umoor ki nigrani karne ki khwahish ki hai. Congress, Telugu Desham Party, Communist Party aur Telangana Jana Samiti ke qaideen ney aaj shaam Governor Mr. ESL Narsimhan se Raj Bhavan mein mulaqaat ki aur mutaleba kiya ke Telangana mein jahan Assembly tahleel kar di gayi hai intekhabaat ke ineqad tak Sadar Raj nafiz kardiya jaye. Party leaders ney kaha ke Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke Chief Minister barqarar rehtay huwe saaf o shafaaf intekhabaat ka ineqaad na mumkin hai. Telangana mein qabl az waqt intekhabaat thopne ki soorat mein hum Suprem Court se Rooju hon ge. Yaad rahay ke saal ke avaakhir mein Assembly intekhabaat ko yakeeni bananay Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ko tahleel kardiya tha. Unhen intekhabaat ke elaan tak kaarguzar Chief Minister muqarrar kiya gaya hai. Baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huee Sadar Telangana Pradesh Congress Committee Captain Uttam Kumar Reddy ney kaha ke Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney Assembly tahleel kardainay ke baad Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe na sirf yeh kaha ke unhon ney Election Commission ke ohdedaron se baat cheet ki balkay yeh tak elaan kardiya ke November ke aakhir mein intekhabaat munaqqid honge aur Decemeber mein natayij ka elaan kardiya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke Election Commission ki janib se intekhabi Schedule ko raazdari mein rakhna chahiye tha magar unhon ney sab kuch aashkaar kardiya. Congress ney Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao ko BJP aur Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ka pittoo qarar dete huwe kaha ke Jaria saal intekhabaat munaqqid nahi kiye jasakte chunkay Electoral List par nazarsani ka kaam jari hai. Governor ko paish kardah mahezar mein Oppostion Partiyon ke leaders ney ilzaam aayed kiya ke Mr Chandrashekar Rao Iqtedaar ka ghalat faida utha rahe hain aur Assembly ki tahleel ke baad ghair qanooni aur ghair dastoori iqdamaat kar rahay hain. Mahezar mein kaarguzar hukoomat ki janib se teen mhazon par ki gayi mudakhilat ki nishandahi ki gai ke 12 musheeron ka taqarrur kiya gaya hai jis ki koi zaroorat nahi hai, nazam o nasq unhen ab bhi tankhwahin aur bhatta ada kar raha hai. Isi tarha mansoobeh bandi bordke arkaan bhi hukoomat ke ikhtiyarat ka istemaal kar rahay hain, Chand Arkaan e Assembly aur mukhtalif Corporations ke Sudoor ko Cabinet Rank diya gaya hai aur un mein se chand TRS ke ticket par muqaabla karne walay hain jo ghair qanooni aur ghair dastoori hai. Congress Party, intekhabi mafahmat ke liye Telugu Desham Party aur baen baazu party ke ilawa Telangana Jana Samiti se baat cheet kar rahi hai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh o Sadar Telugu Desham Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu aur General Secretary CPI Mr. Sudhakar Reddy ke intekhabi mafahmat ka khairmaqdam karne ke baad hikmat e amli tayyar karne paanch rukni Monitoring Committee tashkeel di hai. Governor se mulaqaat karne walon mein Congress Party ke Captain Uttam Kumar, K Jana Reddy, DK Aruna, Sadar Telangana Jana Samiti Professor Kodandaram, Mr. Ravala Chandra Shekhar Rao aur deegar shaamil hain.
1286.title: Telangana mein Sadar Raj nafiz karne oppostion ka mutaliba

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ney budh ko Koregaon. Bhima tashadud muqadma mein maakhoz 5 Activists ki ghar par nazarbandi mein 17

September tak tausee kar di hai. Adalat e Uzma huqooq insani ke Jahedkaron Professor Varavara Rao, Arun Ferieria Varnun Gonsalves, Sudha Bhardwaj aur Gautam Navlakha ki giraftari ke khilaaf daayir kardah darkhwast ki samaat kar rahi thi. Chief Justice Deepak Misra, Justice  A.M Khanvelkar aur D.Y Chandrachod par mushtamil bench ney Historian Romila Thapar aur deegar chaar ki daayir kardah petition par samaat ko is darkhwast par ke petitioners ki numaindagi karne walay Senior Wakeel Mr. Abhishek Manu Singhvi dusri adalat mein masroof hain, 17
September tak multawi kardiya. Maharashtra Police ney guzishita baras 31
Decemeber ko Koregaon Bhima mein munaqidah ”Yalghaar Parished” jalsa ke baad phoot padney walay tashadud ke silsila mein darj aik muqadma mein Jaria saal 28
August ko mazkoorah paanch Jehadkaron ko girftar karte huwe un par wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke qatal ki saazish karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha. Dosray din 29

August ko Adalat e Uzma ne un Jehadkaron ki giraftari par yeh kehte huwe aiteraaz kiya tha ke ikhtelaaf raye, jamhoriat ka Safety Valve hai aur un ko ghar par nazarband rakhnay ki hidaayat di thi jis par un Jehadkaron ko jail se un ke ghar muntaqil kardiya gaya tha.
1161.title: Varavara Rao ke House Arrest mein tausee

news_detail: Nalgonda. Mahatma Gandhi University (MJU) Nalgonda ki Executive Council ney 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ko barkhast karne ki qarardaad manzoor ki hai chunkay tehqiqati Committee ney un taqqururat mein be irregularities ko paaya hai. Special Chief Secretary (Education) Mr. Ranjeev R Acharya ney bhi Executive Council ke ijlaas mein shirkat ki aur ijlaas ke ayendah mein 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ke taqqururat ke masle ko shaamil karne khusoosi pahel ki. Maloom huwa hai ke Executive Council ke ijlaas mein MGU ke sabiq Vice Chancellor Katta Narsimha Reddy aur Registrar Pochanna ko memos jari karne ka faisla kiya hai jin ke zamana mein yeh taqqururat amal mein aaye thae. September 2011 mein elamia jari karte huwe University mein zayed az 32 Associate Professors aur Assistant Professors ke taqqururat amal mein aaye thae jabkay aik Assistant Professor ke post ko elamia number 1/2011 ke sath fill kiya gaya tha. 32 psots mein 6 Associate Professor ke posts thae.
