Jab chand be rozgaar umeedwaron ney Education Minister aur Higher Education Department ke ohdedaron ko aik memorandum paish karte huwe University mein Associate Professrors aur Assistant Professors ki jayidadon par taqqururat mein be irregularities ka ilzaam aayed kiya to Hukoomat ney Ooctober 2016 mein sabiq Vice Chancellor Osmania University ki zair e qayadat aik 3 members Committee tashkeel dete huwe tehqiqaat ka hukum diya tha aur Committee ko hidayat di thi ke androon aik mah report daakhil kare taham Inquiry Committee ki tashkeel ke androon aik hafta Executive Council ney rules ki khilaaf warzi karte huwe 31 Associate Professorors aur Assistant Professors ke probation period ko manzoori dae di thi. Ilzaam hai ke maujuda Vice Chancellor University Khwaja Altaf Hussain ney is maamle mein kalidi rule ada kiya. Inquiry Committee ney October 2016 mein hi apni report Hukoomat ko paish kar di thi. Agarchay Special Chief Secretary ney University Vice Chancellor ko April 2018 mein hi hidayat dey di thi ke faculty ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye jo ney invaild Certificates  rakhte hain aur darkaar ahliat ke haamil nahin hain lekin is par koi karwai nahi ki gayi. Jis ke baad Special Chief Secretary ney peer ko Executive Council ka ijlaas 32 Associate Professors  aur Assistant Professors ke khilaaf karwai ke wahid agenda par talab kiya. Zaraye ke mutabiq tehqiqati committee ney paaya ke aik fard ney University mein Italy ki University ki asaas par Associate Professor ka post haasil kiya jo UGC ke guidelines ke mutabiq durust nahi hai. Un 32 faculty ki aksariyat deegar riyaston ki Universition ke asnaad rakhnay wali hai jo ghair maaroof hain. Associate Professor ki jayedad ke liye aik umeedwaar jo Phd mukammal karliya hai ahal hota hai lekin jin 6 Associate Professors ka taqarrur kiya gaya hai un mein koi bhi UGC ki sharait par poora nahi utarrta. UGC ke mutabiq Assistant Professor ke liye 200 Acadamic Performance Score ka haamil hona hoga magar 2016 mein taqarrur kiye gaye 24 Assistant Professor mein koi bhi umeedwaar 50 ke score se ziyada ka haamil nahi tha.
1178.title: MGU 32 Asst Professors ko barkhast kardey gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad High Court baraye Telangana o Andhra Pradesh ney aaj Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ki janib se riyasati Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf daayir kardah darkhwast ko kharij kardiya hai. Yeh darkhwast Nalgonda ke Advocate Mr. Rapolu Bhaskar ney Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke dosray din High Court mein darkhwast daayir karte huwe istedua ki thi ke Election Commission of India ko hidayat di jaye ke riyasati Assembly ki 5 sala miyaad ki takmeel se qabl intekhabaat na karwanay ki hidayat di jaye. Advocate ney apni darkhwast mein bayan kiya tha ke paishgi intekhabaat se awaami khazana par bhaari maali bojh aayed hoga aur TRS ney riyasat mein qabl az waqt intekhabaat ke liye koi mouzoon wajah nahi batay hai. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke riyasati Assembly ke intekhabaat, aayindah saal munaqqid shudni Lok Sabha ke intekhabaat ke saath karwaye jaaney ki soorat mein 200 crore rupay ki awaami raqam ki bachat hogi. Yaad rahay ke riyasati Assembly ki miyaad aayindah saal May tak thi taham Sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti o Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney aayindah baras Lok Sabha intekhabaat ke sath riyasati Assembly ke bayak waqt intekhabaat se guraiz karne ke liye riyasati Assembly ko Jaria mah ke awayil mein tahleel kardiya tha takey Election Commission ko saal ke avaakhir mein Mulk ki deegar chaar ryastaon ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat karwanay mein aasani hojaye.
1195.title: Assembly ki tahleel ke khilaaf darkhast HC mein kharij

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ayodhya mein Babri Masjid ki jagah par Ram Mandir taameer karne ke apne wada ko wafa na karne ka Bharatiya Janata Party par ilzaam aayed karte huwe Antararashriya Hindu Parishad (AHP) ke Sadar Praveen Togadia ney aaj kaha ke Mandir ki taameer ka mutaleba karte huwe 21

October ko Lucknow taa Ayodhya ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Rally nikaali jaye gi. Yahan akhbaari numayindon se baat cheet karte huwe Praveen Togadia ney kaha ke BJP hukoomat ney Ayodhya mein Ram Mandir ki taameer ke apne wada ko faramosh kardiya hai, is liye AHP ney faisla kiya hai ke hukoomat ki janib se Mandir ki taameer mein takheer ke khilaaf bator ehtejaj 21

October ko ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Really munazzam ki jaye. Unhon ne kaha ke BJP ney Talaq e salasa par imtena ke liye Parliament mein qanoon paish kiya hai magar Ram Mandir ki taameer ke liye koi iqdaam nahi kiya. Praveen Bhai Togadia jinhon ne Vishwa Hindu Parishad se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karte huwe Anatarashtriya Hindu Parishad ke naam se aik nai tanzeem qaayim ki hai phir se sargaram dikhayi dey rahay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke agar Hukumat is masla par ahadband hai to usay chahiye ke Parliament mein aik qanoon manzoor karte huwe Mandir ki taameer kare. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP ko yeh wazeh karna hoga ke aaya woh Hindon ki taayeed chahti hai ya nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP, Hindon par inhisaar karti hai aur Hindu, BJP par inhisaar nahi karte. Unhon ney yeh bhi ilzaam aayed kiya ke BJP hukoomat ghair qanooni Bangladeshiyon ko Mulk se nikaal bahar karne mein nakaam rahi hai. AHP leader ney kaha ke Telangana Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao kisanon ke liye achha kaam kar rahay hain aur un jaisa kaam Mulk ki kisi riyasat mein nahi ho raha hai taham ilzaam aayed kiya ke Bhagyanagar (Hyderabad) mein Hindu mehfooz nahi hain.
1214.title: Praveen Togadia ki Chalo Ayodhya rally

news_detail: Hyderabad. Deputy Chief Commissioner, Election Commission Of India Mr. Umesh Sinha ney aaj kaha ke Telangana mein intekhabaat ki tayyariyan sahih khutoot par jari hain aur aayndah intekhabaat mein har ahal voter ko Vote ka haq haasil honay ko yakeeni bananey ohdedar har ghar pohnchain ge. Chief Electoral Officer aur Telangana mein District Election Officers, Election ke liye achi tarha tayyar hain aur Election Commission Schedule jari kere ga. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel ke baad Mulk ki chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana mein bhi intekhabaat ke ineqad ka jaayiza lainay Election Commission of India ney Telangana ko aik Team Deputy Election Commissioner Mr. Umesh Sinha ki qayadat mein rawana kiya tha jis ney recognized political parties ke leaders aur District Collector aur Superintendent of Police ke alawa Election Commission ke ohdedaron se mulakaatein ki aur intekhabat ki tayarion ka mukhtalif paheloun se jaayiza liya. Apne do roza daura ke baad Secretriat mein apni team aur Chief Electoral Officer Telangana Mr Arjit Kumar ke sath akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mr. Umesh Sinha ney kaha ke voters ke naamon ki shumoliat se mutaliq siyasi partiyon ki janib se uthaye gaye tamam umoor ki yaksovi karne ki hidaayat di gayi hai. Unhon ney bataya ke riyasati Assembly 6

September ko tahleel kar di gayi thi aur Election Commission se aajilana intekhabaat ki khwahish ki gayi thi is liye hum soorat e haal ka jaiza lainay aur intekhabaat ki taiyarion ke baray mein aagahi haasil karne Telangana ka daura kiya. Unhon ney bataya ke team ke Delhi pahonchnay ke baad report Election Commission of India ko paish kar di jaye gi. Election Commission hi Telangana mein intekhabat ka faisla kere ga aur taareekh ka elaan kere ga. Unhon ney kaha ke siyasi partiyon ki janib se paish kardah khayalat aur khadshaat ko note kiya gaya hai aur intekhabi schedule ke baaray mein faisla karne hum apni report paish karen ge. Zilayi ohdedaron ko hidayat di gayi hai ke androon do haftay har eligible voter ko mauqa faraham kiya jaye aur ghaltion ki islaah ki jaye aur jin ahal raye dahinde ke naam hazaf kar diye gaye hain un ke naamon ki shumoliat ko yakeeni banaya jaye. Election Commission ki team ney pahelay din siyasi partiyon ke numayindon ke sath mulaqaat ki aur un ki aaraa haasil ki. Beshtar siyasi partiyon ney paishgi intekhabaat ki mukhalifat ki. Team ney azlaa mein intekhabaat ki taiyarion ka bhi jaiza liya. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai ke team ki report daakhil kardainay ke baad mukhtalif paheloun ka jayiza letay huwe Election Commission of India October ke dosray haftay mein elamia jari karsaktha hai aur November ke avaakhir mein polling hosakti hai jaissa ke karguzaar Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney tawaqqu zahir ki thi. Chief Electoral Officer Mr. Ajit Kumar ney kaha ke markazi team ney Chief Secretary Dr. S.K Joshi aur Secretary mehakuma dakhila aur intekhabaat ki taiyarion se munsalik deegar aala ohdedaron se mulaqaat ki. Unhon ney kaha ke riyasat mein Election Machinery, Eelection Commission ki hidaayat par schedule ke mutabiq intekhabaat karwanay tayyar hai.
1228.title: Telangana mein intekhabat – Election Machinery tayyar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chennur halqa e Assembly se maujooda rukn Nallela Odelu ko ticket se mahroom na karne ka Chief Minister o sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao se mutaleba karte huwe un ke aik kattar haami ney Rukn e Parliament Peddapally Mr. Balka Suman ki maujoodgi mein khud suzi ki koshish ki. Mr. Suman zila Mancherial mein Jaipur mandal ke Indaram mein taqreeb sang e buniyaad mein shirkat ke liye aaye huwe thay. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly ki tahleel ke baad apni Party ke 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist jari ki thi jin mein taqreeban tamam maujooda Arkaan e Assembly ko hi ticket diya gaya tha taham jin maujooda MLAs ko ticket se mahroom kiya gaya un mein Nallela Odelu bhi shaamil hain. Taqreeb mein Rukn e Parliament ki shirkat ka pata chalne par Gattia wahan pahoncha aur kerosene chidak kar khud ko aag lagali. Is naujawan ko lagi aag bujhanay ki koshish karne walay teen logon  ko bhi aag pakad li jis ke baayis yeh charon shadeed taur par jhulas gaye. Wahan maujood logon ney aag bujhai aur unhen Hospital mein shareek karwaya. Nallela Odelu mutawatir teen meqaat se kamiyaab hotay rahay hain aur woh aayindah intekhabaat mein TRS Party ke ticket se mahroom honay walon mein shaamil hain.
1243.title: Maujuda MLA ki ticket se mehroomi,naujawan ka iqdaam e khudsozi

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Patidar tabqa ke liye tahaffuzaat ke jehedkaar Hardik Patel ney aaj 19 dinon baad apni ghair muayana muddat ki bhook hadtaal ko khatam kar diya halan ke un ke aur Hukoomat e Gujrat ke darmiyan Patidar tabqa ke liye quota aur zirayi qarza jaat ki maafi ke masla par koi baat cheet nahi huwi. Hardik Patel ney Patidar bradari ke leaders Naresh Patel aur CK Patel ke hathon Nimbu ka sharbat pi kar bhook hadtaal khatam karne ke baad kaha ke meri bradri ke liye quota aur zirayi qarza jaat ki maafi ke liye jad-o-jahed jari rahey gi. Hardik Patel ney Patidar tabqe ko deegar pasmandah tabqaat (OBC) Zumra ke tahet tahaffuzaat aur Gujrat ke kisanon ke qarza jaat maaf karne ka mutaleba karte huwe 25

August ko apni rihaish gaah waqay Ahmed Nagar mein ghair muayana muddat ki bhook hadtaal ka aaghaz kiya tha. Baad azan unhon ney apne saathi Alpesh Katheria ki rehaie ka bhi mutaleba shaamil karliya jinhein Mulk se ghaddari ke ilzaam mein girftar kiya gaya tha. 25 sala Hardik ko guzishta jummay ko hadtaal ke 14 wen din sahet bigad jaaney par Hospital mein shareek karwa diya gaya tha. Hospital mein do din guzarnay ke baad woh apne makaan wapas aagaye thae aur bhook hadtaal ko jari rakha tha. Hospital mein woh mashroob le rahey thar aur Glucose chadhaya ja raha tha taham unhon ney solid ghiza ke istemaal se guraiz kiya tha. BJP ki zair qayadat hukoomat ney 4

September ko is ehtejaj par rad-e-amal zahir karte huwe id-daa kiya tha ke Hardik ki quota tehreek siyasi muharikaat par mabni hai jis ko Congress ki pusht panahi haasil hai. Riyasti wazeer e tawanai Saurabh Patel ney tab kaha tha ke mazakiraat ke liye hukoomat ka darwaaza khula hai magar ta haal koi baat cheet nahi huwi.
1258.title: Hardik Patel ki bhook hadtaal khatam

news_detail: New Delhi. Sharai Adalat ki tarz par Hindu Court tashkeel dainay ke maamle par Allahabad High Court mein samaat huwi. Iss douran riyasati hukoomat ki janib se jawab daakhil karne ke liye Court se mohlat talabb ki gayi jis par High Court ney riyasati hukoomat ko 17
September tak jawab daakhil karne ka waqt dey diya. Wazeh ho ke Akhil Bhartiya Hindu Mahasabha ke elaan ke khilaaf Kanpur Ankit Kumar Singh ney darkhwast di jis par aayindah samaat ab 17

September ko hogi. Adalat ney Hindu Mahasabha ke Secretary aur Meerut ke zila sadar samiti riyasti hukoomat aur deegar oppostion jamaaton se jawab talab kiya tha. Adalat ney is maamla mein DM Meerut aur Hindu Court mein taiynaat Judge Dr. Pooja Shikan Pande ko fareeq bananey ka hukum dete huwe dono ko notice jari kiya hai. Wazeh ho ke Kanpur ke Ankit Singh ney High Court mein darkhwast daakhil kar ke Hindu Court ki tashkeel ko Challenge karte huwe kaha ke Hindu tanzeemon ney maghribi Uttar Pradesh ke baaz azlaa mein Hindu Court bana rakhi hai. Un ka kahena hai ke adalaton par muqadamaat ka boojh hai aur logon ko bar waqat insaaf nahi mil pa raha. Isi ko dheyaan mein rakhtay huwe shariah Court ki tarz par Hindu Court ki tashkeel ki gayi hai. Adalat ney DM aur Hindu Court mein taiynaat Dr. Pooja Shikan ko iss mein fareeq banatay huwe unhen notice jari kiya hai. Sath hi maamle mein ‫UP hukoomat se mukammal maloomat bhi talab ki gayeen.
1275.title: Hindu Court, UP ‬ Hukoomat ko HC ki notice

news_detail: Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi aur Wazeer e Kharija Sushma Swaraj ney sabiq Wazeer e Azam Pakistan Nawaz Sharif ki Ahliya Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke inteqaal par taaziyat ka izhaar kiya hai. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki taraf se Nawaz Sharif ke naam taziyati khat bheja gaya hai, jis mein unhon ne Sabiq Pakistani Wazeer e Azam ko mukhatib karkay likha hai ke ”mein aap aur sogwaar khandan ki isteqamat ke liye duago hon”. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke’ Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke intqaal ka sun kar gahera sadma pahoncha, mein khuda se daago hon ke woh aap aur aap ke ahal khanah ko is na qabil talaafi nuqsaan ko bardasht karne ka hausla dey aur Begum Sahibaa ki rooh ko sukoon ataa farmaiye. Narendra Modi ney mazeed kaha ke ‘Begum Kulsoom ke sath honay wali mulakaton ki Khushgawar yaden hamesha sath rahen gi. Samaji rabita ki Website twitter par pegham mein Bhartiye Wazeer e Kharija Sushma Sawaraj ney bhi Begum Kulsoom Nawaz ke intqaal par gehray dukh aur afsos ka izhaar kiya hai aur kaha ke woh Ghamzadah khandan se dili taaziyat karti hain. Un ki rooh ko sukoon miley.
1290.title: Modi aur Sushma Swaraj ne Nawaz Shareef ko pursa diya

news_detail: Amrici Sadar ki Security Team mein paheli baar aik Bharati nazaad Sikh ko shaamil kiya gaya hai. Anshdip Singh Bhatia ney guzishta hafta tarbiyat mukammal honey par Sadar Trump ki hifazat ki zimmadariyan sambhaal li hain. Security Team mein shaamil honay se pahelay unhen huliya tabdeel karne ke liye kaha gaya tham Anshdip na maney aur qanooni chara joyi se mukhalifeen ko shikast di. Ludhyana mein paida hue Anshdip Singh Bhatia ko bil akhir Amrici Sadar ki Security Team mein shaamil karliya gaya hai. Woh darasal Uttar Pradesh ke Kanpur se talluq rakhtay hain. Sabiq Wazeer e Azam Indira Gandhi ke Sikh Security amlah ke hathon halakat ke baad phoot padney walay 1984 ke mukhalif Sikh fasadaat mein un ka khandan Ludhyana Punjab muntaqil hogaya tha. Un fasadaat mein Anshdip ke chacha ki jaan chali gayi aur un ke waalid par teen martaba qatilana hamla huwa tha. Anshdip jab 10 baras ke thay un ke waalid Devindar Singh 2000 mein apne khandan samait America muntaqil hogaye thae.
1310.title: Trump ki Security mein Sikh ahelkaar shaamil

news_detail: Hyderabad. Riyasati Wazeer Information Technology & Municipal Administration & Urban Development Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ne Nizams Institute of Medical Sciences (NIMS) mein aaj10 crore rupay ki laagat se qaayim kardah apni noiyat ke munfarid Cancer Center ka iftitah kya. 50 beds par mushtamil iss Anchololgy Unit ko Megha Engineering Infrastructures Limited (MEIL) ne farogh diya hai jo Corporate Hospitals ke khutoot par tamam ultra modern sahulatoun se lais hai. Iss Center mein Intensive Care Unit mein 5 bistar hain jabkay mardon ke liye 12, khawateen ke liye 10 aur bachon ke liye 11 bistar rakhay gaye hain aur 12 bistaron par mushtamil Speciality Liekumiea ward bhi hai. 18,000 sft par muheet mukammal Airconditioned cancer center mein aik khusoosi Ancology Critical Care Unit (ACCU ) bhi hai. Cancer Center ki imarat ka kaam June 2017 mein shuru kya gaya tha jisay sirf aik saal ki muddat mein mukammal karliya gaya hai. MEIL hukkaam ke mutabiq saari imarat falls ceiling, LED lights se muzayyan aur, CC Cameras, Electrical Room aur aik bed lift se lais hai. ICU you mein Oxygen aur Vaccum Pressure sahoolat faraham ki gayi aur wards mein har dosray bistar ko Oxygen aur Vaccum saholaten faraham ki gayi hain. Iss imarat mein Doctors Room, Faculty Room, Store Room, Processing Room aur Staff Rooms ki bhi gunjaish rakhi gayi hai jo is Center ko kisi Cancer ke mareezon ko darpaish kisi bhi nagehani surat e haal se nimatnay ka ahal banata hai. Iss mauqa par wazeer e sehat Mr. C. Laxma Reddy, Chairman MEIL Mr. Pippi Reddy aur Co-founder & Managing Director MEIL Mr. Krishna Reddy bhi maujood thae.
1160.title: NIMS mein ultra modern cancer center ka iftitah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtra Samiti mein tashkeel e Telangana ke baad sailaab ki manind leaders aur Workers shaamil hotay chalay jarahay thae, hatta ke guzishta dinon tak bhi yeh silsila jari tha. Guzishta intekhabaat mein TRS ki zabardast lehar ke bawajood doosri partiyon ke Ticket par muntakhib honay walay aksar awaami numaindey bhi TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karliye thae magar ab aisa lagta hai ke barsar e iqtedar TRS se qaayideen ki kinara kashi ka aaghaz honay laga hai. Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke Rukn Qanoon Saaz Council Mr. Bhuphathi Reddy ney aaj Telugu Producer Bandla Ganesh ke hamrah Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi se mulaqaat karte huwe Congress Party mein bazabta shamoliat ikhtiyar karli hai. Mr. Bhupathi Reddy ney guzishta budh ko yeh elaan kiya tha ke woh Congress Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karlen ge chunkay TRS ke andaaz karkardagi se aajiz aachukay thay. Unhon ney kaha ke TRS Party qiyadat ney Telangana tehreek ke dauran kaleedi rule ada karne walay qaayideen ko nazar andaaz kardiya hai. Congress Party mein shumoliat ke baad akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mr. Bhupathi Reddy ney kaha ke woh Nizamabad Rural halqe Assembly se TRS ke umeedwaar maujooda Rukn e Assembly Mr. Baji Reddy Gorverdhan ke khilaaf muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhtay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Baji Reddy Goverdhan un ki qurbanion ke baayis pichle 10 baras se Nizamabad se Assembly mein noumaindagi kar rah hain. Unhon ney yeh kahete huwe  ke TRS Party par narazgi ka izhaar kiya ke un tamam usoolon ko faramosh kardiya gaya jin par Party ki buniyaad rakhi gayi thi. Baaz zaraye ka kahena hai ke zila Nizamabd ke hi aik Senior Leader o Rukn Rajiya Sabha Mr. D Srinivas jin hein party ney buri terha nazar andaz kardiya hai woh bhi TRS ko khairbad kahete huwe Congress Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar kar lenay walay hain.
1177.title: TRS MLC Bhupathi Congress mein shaamil

news_detail: Amrici riyasat Massachusetts ke shehar Boston mein Gas pipe line ke leakage se mutadid gharon mein Gas dhamakon ke baad aag bhadak uthi, hadsaat mein 1 shakhs halaak, jabkay mutadid zakhmi ho gaye. Boston ke nazdeek teen ilaqon mein Gas dhamakon aur aag lagnay ke 70 hadsaat runuma huwe, jis ke baad tenon ilaqon ke pareshan haal log sadkon par nikal aaye. Logon ke sakdon par bad hawas ho kar nikal padney se ird gird ki sadkon par Traffic jaam hogaya. Hukkaam ney logon se appeal ki hai ke woh apna ghar chodtay waqt gas ko band kar den, mutasirah ilaqon mein bijli bhi band kar di gayi hai. Muqami Gas Company ney kaha hai ke un ilaqon mein Gas ko mukammal taur par band karne mein kuch waqt lag sakta hai. Massachusetts Emergency Managment Agency ka kehna hai ke ziyada pressure ki wajah se Gas Line mein aag bhadak uthi hai taham taheqeeq kunindgan aag lagnay ki wajuhaat ka pata chalarhe hain. Is haadse mein aik report ke mutabiq shumali Boston ki teen Communities ke 39 makanaat mein aag lag gayi. Hukkaam ney bataya ke Larence ka aik 18 sala nojawan L Rabson ki car par dhamaka ke baais aik ghar ki chimni girjane se buri tarha zakhmi hogaya tha jisay dawakhana muntaqil kiya gaya jahan shaam mein woh jaanbar nahi ho saka. Monchester State Police ney un makeeno se appeal ki hai jin ke gharon ko Columbia Gas Company ke zariye gas sarbarah ki jati hai woh apne makanaat ka takhlia kar dein. Jumeraat tak aag par qaboo pa liya gaya hai magar hunooz kayi ilaqay khamosh aur andhere mein hain chunkay makeen ghar chode kar chalay gaye aur barqi Companiyon ney barqi sarbarahi masdood kar di hai taakay is terha ke waqhiyat se bacha jasakay. Tenoon counties mein jummay ko Schools ko band kardiya gaya hai. Aik makeen Razin ney kaha ke woh tasawwur bhi nahi kar saktay ke dhamaka mein tabah hojane wala un hi ka ghar hai jisay woh do saal qabal hi khareeda tha. Unhon ney kaha ke un ka ghar mukammal tabah hogaya aur roh barbaad.
1198.title: Boston mein gas dhamakay, 70 hadsaat

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi Police ke aik Sub Inspector ke betay ke khilaaf ismat raizi aur ziyad-ti ka muqadma darj karliya gaya jis ko aik Video mein aik ladki ko buri tarha zad o kob karte huwe dikhaya gaya tha. Yeh Video Social Media par bahot ziyada viral huwa. Yeh video ghaliban Delhi ke Uttam Nagar mein waqay aik khangi daftar mein 2

September ko li gayi thi. Iss video mein aik naujawan ko kohniyoon aur latoon se aik ladki ko zad o kob karte huwe dikha ya gaya jis ki shanakhat Rohit Tomar ke taur par ki gayi hai. Iss video mein woh ladki ko zameen par pataka huwa, Thapaden ghoonse aur lateen maarta huwa dikhayi diya aur ladki baar baar uss se maffi chaah rahi thi aur bakhash dainay ki ilteja kar rahi thi. Social Media par is video ke viral honay ke baad mukhtalif gooshon se is ki muzammat ki jane lagi aur uss ko kiafer e kirdaar tak pahonchaney ka mutaleba zor pakadney laga tha taham is ke khilaaf kisi qisam ki karwai nahi ki gayi. Wazeer e Dakhila Hind Mr. Rajnath Singh ki mudakhilat ke baad hi iss ki giraftari amal mein aayi hai. Unhon ney twitter par Commissioner Police Delhi ko hidayat di ke woh munasib tehqiqaat kere. Wazeer e Dakhila ne apne tweet mein kaha ”Aik ladki ko aik naujawan ki janib se buri terha zado kob karne ke video ke baaray mein mujhe ilm huwa hai. Mein ney Delhi Police Commissioner (Amuliya Patnaik) se phone par baat ki hai aur un se kaha hai ke munasib karwai ki jaye.” Ladki ko zad o kob kiye jane ki rerecording karne walay naujawan ki bhi aawaz record huwi jis mein woh keh raha tha ke Rohit, Ladki ko chod dey lekin is ka koi asar nahi huwa. Iss naujawan ko zad o kob karne se baz rakhney kisi ne mudakhilat nahi ki. Iss waqeye ke khilaaf jumeraat tak koi shikayat mauusool nahi huwi thi taham jab is be rahem naujawan Rohit ne apni sabiqa girlfriend ko yeh video bhaij kar dhamki di ke agar woh shadi se inkaar kardey gi to is ka bhi yeh hashar hoga. Jis par iss Ladki ney Police mein Rohit ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai. Yeh naujawan Delhi Police ke aik Sub Inspector ka beta bataya jata hai.
1211.title: Ladki ko zad o kob karne wala naujawan girftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Golconda Police Station hudood mein Toli Chowki ilaqa mein waqay aik maroof School ki aik saadhay chaar sala ladki ki ismat raizi ki ittila par mutasirah ladki ke khandan walon aur sainkdon logon ne raat mein pur-tashaddud ehtijaj kya. Tafsilaat ke bamawajib PP II mein zair e taleem aik ladki ke waalid ne Golconda Police Station mein shikayat darj karwai ke Azaan International School” ke security incharge Jeelani nami naujawan ne un ki ladki ki ismat raizi ki hai. Ladki ke waalid ne bataya ke jab woh daidh bajey apni bachi ko school se ghar le jany pahonche to ladki ne unhen bataya ke is ke naazuk hisson mein dard ho raha hai. Jab ghar pahonch kar bachi ki jaanch ki gayi toh pata chala ke makhsoos hissa se khoon ris raha hai jis par woh school pahonch kar intizamia se shikayat kiye aur school ke aik teacher ke hamrah aik khangi hospital mein ladki ka muayina karwaya jahan doctoron ne bataya ke ladki ke sath jinsi zayadati ki gayi hai jis par unhon ne Golconda Police Station pahonch kar school intizamia ke khilaaf shikayat darj karwai hai. Police ne ladki ke tibbi jaanch ke liye usay Nilofer Hospital muntaqil kya hai. Ladki ke waalid ne bataya ke yahan doctoron ne bataya ke ladki ke naazuk hisson se khoon ke ikhraj ko roknay ke liye cesarean karna padega. Unhon ne bataya ke ladki ne khud unhen bataya ke school mein garden ilaqa mein exhibition chal rahi thi jahan unhen security par mamoor Jeelani nami naujawan ne usay chocolate dainay ka bahana karte hue school imarat ke aik kone mein le kar gaya aur uss ki ismat raizi karne ki koshish ki. Iss waqea ki ittila milnay ke baad log sainkdon ki tadaad mein school ke bahar jama hogaye aur school ki imlaak ko nuqsaan pahonchaya. Ehtejajyon ke sath huqooq insani karkun bhi jama hogaye aur khaati ke khilaaf sakht karwai ka mutalba kya. Aik ehtajaji khatoon ne jo kaafi barham thi kaha ke school intizamia ko jab is sharamnaak waqea ke baray mein bataya gaya to khaati ke khilaaf karwai karne mein taawun ki bajaye yeh taweel paish karne lagey ke aisa waqea ho hi nahi sakta balkay ladki girgaee hogi jis ki wajah se usay chott aayi hogi. Barham ehtejajyon ne school ke kanch phod diye aur pathrao kya. Barham ehtejajyon ko muntashir karne ke liye Police ko halki si taaqat ka istimaal karna para. school intizamia ki janib se bhi Police mein shikayat karwai gayi jis mein bataya gaya ke school ki aik Taliba ke walidain se Jeelani saakin Nadeem colony ke baray shikayat mousool hui ke is ne ladki ke sath school ke ground mein jinsi zayad-ti ki hai. Ladki ne Jeelani ki shanakht karli hai. School intizamia ki shikayat mein bataya gaya ke jaanch karne par is ke zaireen jama par khoon ke dhabbay paye gaye. Mulzim tafteesh mein taawun nahi kar raha hai. School intizamia ne is maamla ki jaanch karne aur sakht karwai karne ki darkhwast ki hai. school ke paas Police ki bhaari jamiat ko tainaat kardiya gaya hai. Golconda Police ne aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Bataya jata hai ke Police ne mulzim ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Iss waqea ki ittila paker rukan assembly karwaan mister Kausar Mohiuddin bhi muqam e waqea par pahnch gaye aur ehtejajyon se baat cheet ki aur tayaqun diya ke mulzim ke khilaaf sakht se sakht karwai ke liye Police se numaindagi ki jaye gi
1224.title: Kamsin Taliba ki ismat raizi ka ilzaam. Azaan School par ehtijaj

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Bharatiya Janata Party Mr. Amit Shah ne aaj  Telangana  mein Assembly ke liye party ki intekhabi muhim ka amlan aaghaz kardiya. BJP sarbarah Begumpet Airport se khusoosi Helicopter ke zariye Mehboob Nagar ke liye rawana hon ge jahan who ek jalsa se khitab karenge. Mr. Amit Shah ney Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao par sakht hamley karte huwe intekhabi muhim ka aaghaz kiya hai. Unhon ney Mr. Chandrashekar Rao par khushamdi siyasat karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Mehboob Nagar rawaangi se qabal Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe Mr. Amit Shah ney Mr. Chandarshekar Rao par All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen aur Left Parites ki imaa par kaam karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Unhon ney kaha ke agar TRS dobarah Iqtedaar par wapas aati hai to woh Vote Bank siyasat kere gi. Unhon ney istefsaar kiya ke aqliaton ke liye 12% tahaffuzaat ki tajweez paish karna  ‘khushamdi siyasat’ nahi hai? Woh jantay hain ke hamara dastoor mazhab ki asaas par tahaffuzaat ki ijazat nahi deta. Agar yahi hukoomat dobarah aaye gi to riyasat mein Vote Bank siyasat jari rahay gi. Sadar BJP ney KCR se ‘Aik Mulk aik intekhabaat’ par apna muaqqaf zahir karne ka mutaleba kiya aur kaha ke party jis ney ibtida mein bayak waqt intekhabaat ki himayat ki thi bad qismati se agay badh gayi aur iss ko bigaad diya aur Assembly ko tahleel kardiya. Unhon ney kaha ke Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney aik choti riyasat ko do alhdah intekhabaat (Assembly aur Lok Sabha ) ke ikhrajat  bardasht karne par majaboor kardiya. Mr. KCR ney apne buland bangh waadon ko wafa nahi kiya hai. Mr. Shah ney Chief Minister par aam aadmi par maali boojh aayed karne aur tauham parasti mein mubtala honay ka ilzaam aayed kiya. Unhon ney mazeed kaha ke party Telangana mein tamam nashiston par muqaabla kere gi aur riyasat mein aik mazboot aur faisla kun taaqat ban kar ubhrey gi. Mr. Amist Shah aik roza daura par aaj subah yahan pahhonche hain aur woh Telangana mein Party ki intekhabi hikmat e amli aur intekhabi manshoor ke baaray mein reyasti qaayideen ko hidayat den ge. Sadar Telangana BJP Dr. K Laxman ke mutabiq BJP sadar mukhtalif groups ke hamrah ijlaas mein shirkat karen ge aur woh puranay shaher ki aik mandir ka bhi daura karen ge. Unhon ney bataya ke Mr. Amit Shah 10 din baad dobarah Telangana ka daura karen ge aur Karimnagar mein aik jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge.
1237.title: KCR par hamlon ke sath Amit Shah ki intekhabi muhim

news_detail: Israeli Faujion ney jummey ke roz Palestine ke ilaqa Gaza ki sarhad par mukhtalif waqhiyat mein aik 12 sala ladke samait teen Falastinyon ko goli maar kar shaheed kar diya. Falastini wizarat dakhila ney kaha hai ke 12 sala ladke Shadi Abdul Aal ko Gaza ke shumali hissa mein goli maari gayi. Jab ke 21 sala Hani Afna aur Mohammad Shukor ko junoobi Gaza aur Al-Burj ke sahili ilaaqon mein do allag allag waqhiyat mein golian maar kar shaheed kiya gaya. Gaza ki wizarat sahet ke bayan ke mutabiq sarhad ke sath mukhtalif ilaaqon mein Falastinyon ke ehtejaj ke douran Israeli Faujion ki firing se kam az kam 50 afraad zakhmi bhi huwe. Gaza mein security zaraye ney bataya hai ke Gaza shehar ke qareeb Hamas ki aik chowki par aik Israeli tank ney chadhai kar di. Israel ki Fauj ney kaha hai ke Gaza ke mukhtalif hisson mein honey walay hungamon mein andazan 13 hazaar afraad shaamil thae. Un mein se kayi log tyre jala rahay thae aur kayi aatish geer madah phaink rahay thae. Baday paimanay par ehtejaj aur Israeli Security Forces ke sath jhadpon ka yeh naya silsila 30 March se shuru huwa tha aur tab se har jummay ko muzahiray kiye ja rahay hain. Is arsa ke douran Israeli firing se kam azkam 179 Falastini shaheed ho chuke hain. Israel ney Gaza ki patti ka muhasra kar rakha hai aur is ka kehna hai ke Hamas ko allag thalag karne ke liye aisa karna zaroori hai. 2008 se Israel aur Hamas ke darmiyan teen jaangein ho chuki hain. Insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ka kehna hai ke taqreeban 20 lakh abadi ka muhasra aik tarha se ijtemai saza ke mutaradif hai.
1270.title: Gaza ki Sarhad par Israeli Fauj ki firing se teen Falastini shaheed

news_detail: Wazeer Information Technology Andhra Pradesh Mr. Nara Lokesh ney Andhra Pradesh mein bhi qabal az waqt intekhabaat se mataleq zaraye ablaagh ki ittelaaat ko mazhaka khaiz qarar diya. Andhra Pradesh mein bhi paishgi intekhabaat se mutaliq Republic Channel par qiyaas par mabni nashar kardah aik khabar par wazeer ney wazahat ki ke un ki party, intekhabaat ke liye ujlat mein nahi hai aur riyasat mein intekhabaat schedule ke mutabiq hi hon ge. Mr. Nara Lokesh ney kaha ke Telugu Desham hukoomat apni paanch sala meyaad mukammal kere gi. Unhon ney Telangana Assembly ki miyad se 9 mah qabal tahleel par afsos ka izhaar kya.
1285.title: Andhra Pradesh mein paishgi intekhabaat nahin: Nara Lokesh

news_detail: Falasteeni Sadar Mahmud Abbas ney khabardaar kya hai ke Israel Masjid e Aqsa ko musalmanoon aur Yahudion ke darmiyan taqseem karne ki saazish kar raha hai. Un ka kahena hai ke Qibla e awwal ki zamani aur makani taqseem ke sangeen natayij samnay ayen ge aur un ka zimma daar Israel hoga. Ramallah mein Tanzeem Azaadi e Falasteen ke aik ijlaas se khitaab mein unhon ney kaha ke ‘aik hassas masla Masjid e Aqsa ka hai jis ke baray mein Israel apni sazishain aur chaalein chal raha hai. Hamaray paas Israeli resha duwanyon ke thos shawahid maujood hain. Israel Musalmanoon ki tarha Yahudion ko bhi Masjid e Aqsa mein ibadat ka haq dilwana chahta hai. Dosray alfaaz mein Israel Masjid e Ibrahimi alsharif ki tarha Masjid e Aqsa ko bhi Yahudion aur Musalmanoon ke darmiyan zamani aur makani aitebaar se taqseem karna chahta hai. Khayaal rahay ke 1994 mein West Jordan ke shaher Al-Khaleel mein qaayim tareekhi Jamia Masjid Ibrahimi mein aik Yahudi daheshatgard ney namaz ada karne walay Falastinion par golian chalayein jis ke nateeja mein 29 namazi shaheed hogaye thae. iss ke baad Masjid e Ibrahimi ko Yahudion aur Musalmanoon ke darmiyan taqseem kardiya gaya tha. Masjid e Aqsa ki tarha Israel aur Yahudi Masjid e Ibrahimi ki malkiat ka bhi daawa karte hain. 1967 ke baad Israel ney Yahudion ko saiyahati maqasid ke liye Masjid e Aqsa mein dakhila ki ijazat dae rakhi hai magar Yahudi abaadkaar Qibla e Awwal mein ghus kar jabran Talmudi talimaat ke mutabiq mazhabi rusumaat bhi ada karte hain. Isi hawala se baat karte hue Sadar Mahmud Abbas ka kahena tha ke Masjid e Aqsa mein jo kuch ho raha hai iss ke baray mein hum Jordanian bhaiyon se salah wo mahswara kar rahay hain taakay hum aik muaqqaf le kar aalami adalat e insaaf se rujoo kar saken. Falasteeni Authority, Israel aur Jordan ke darmiyan taye paye moahida ke tahet Masjid e Aqsa aur Al-Quds mein maujood deegar muqamat e  muqaddisa ki nigrani, hifazat, mulazmeen ki tankhwahon ki adai aur deegar intizami umoor Jordan ke paas hain. Yaad rahay ke Musalmanoon ke Qibla e Awwal Masjid e Aqsa par Yahudion ke apna haq jatanay ki koshish ke talluq se ‘Y This News’ ney bahut pahelay hi aagah kardiya tha aur bataya tha ke kis tarha adalat ke zareya se Masjid e Aqsa mein bhi Yahudion ko ibadat ka haq dilanay ki saazish rachi jarahi hai .
mulahiza karen. .. .. .. . .
1300.title: Masjid e Aqsa ko taqseem karne ki sazish: Mahmud Abbas

news_detail: Mahbunagar. Khazana ke mutlashion ney Murthi ke neechay khazana chhupa honey ki aas mein aik tareekhi Mandir mein Bashweshvara ke mujasma ko dynamite lagaakar dhamaka se uda diya. Yeh waqia Nawabpet mandal mein Marikal village ke qareeb itwaar ki subah awwaleen sa-aton mein paish aaya. Village mein bomb dhamaka ki aawaz sun kar dehati jaag uthhe aur dhamaka ke muqam par pahonch kar dekha ke Mandir mein Murthi ko dhamaka se uda diya gaya hai. Dehation ney police ko is waqea ki ittila di. Muqam e waqia par pahonchney par Police ney paaya ke badmashon ney jo muqam waqia se faraar honey mein kamyaab hogaye Basweshwara ke mujasma ko dynamite laga kar uda diya. Police ko shuba hai ke un badmashon ney mujasma ke neechay khazana chhupa huwa honae ki aas mein Mandir ko nishana baneya hoga chunkay yeh Mandir bahuat qadeem aur tareekhi hai. Police, khazana ke mutlashion ki talaash mein hai.
1314.title: Mahbunagar mein khazana ke lalach mein Mandir mein dhamaka

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hussain Sagr Lake Police ne aik khatoon aur is ke 4 bachon ko jummay ke din khudkushi kar lenay se bchalya. Tafseelaat ke bamawajib khatoon apne bachon ke sath jheel ke paas mushtaba haalat mein ghoom rahi thi aur woh musalsal roye jarahi thi. Police ki aik gashti team ne is ke iraadon ko bhaanp letay hue Lake Police Station le aayi. tahqeeq par pata chala ke is ka shohar guzishta chand dinon se mamooli baton par jhagda kar raha tha aur mobayyana taur par najaaiz taluqaat rakhta hai. Khatoon ne bataya ke is ke shohar ne jumeraat ko bhi is se jhagda kya aur usay zad o kob bhi kya tha. Halaat se mayoos hokar khatoon apne 4 bachon samait khudkushi kar lenay ke iradah se Hussain Sagr pohanchi theen. Police ne is ki counseling ki aur phir mazeed counseling ke liye bharosa center bhaij diya.
361.title: Hyderabad Lake Police ne khudkushi karne wali khatoon aur 4 bachon ko bchalya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tahqiqati Agency National Investigation Agency (NIA) ki markazi team jo guzashta aik hafta se Hyderabad mein camp kiye hue hai, January 2016 mein darj muqadma ke silsila mein apni tahaqeeq o tafteesh taqreeban mukammal karli hai aur tawaqqa hai ke Agency aaj ya kal is case ki peshraft ke baaray mein jaankaari deiy gi. Yaad rahay ke NIA ne January 2016 mein Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) ke saath taluqaat qaayim karne aur dehshat gardanah kaarwaiyon mein mulawis honay ke ilzamaat ke tehat Mulk ke chand naujawanon ke khilaaf Delhi mein aik muqadma darj kya tha aur is case ke silsila mein jari apni tehqiqaat ko wusat dete hue mazeed tafteesh ke liye 6

August ko Hyderabad mein mukhtalif muqamat par chaapay maaray thaiy. Aisay hi aik chhapa Rachakonda Police Comssionarate mein Balapur Police Station ke hudood mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar ke aik makaan par mara gaya tha aur aik 19 sala mushtaba naujawan se din bhar pooch gach ki gayi thi. Ghair musaddeqa zaraye ke mutabiq isi terha shaher ke deegar muqamat se bhi kuch naujawanon se pooch gach ki gayi thi. Un tamam naujawanon ko agarchay hirasat mein nahi liya gaya tha taham unhen mazkoorah muqaddama ke silsila mein jari chhaan been ke silsila mein NIA Branch Office waqay Begumpet haazir honay ki hadaayat di gayi thi, jahan un naujawanon se musalsal 5 dinon tak tafteesh ki jati rahi hai aur un ke mulawis honay ke baaray mein haqayiq ka pata chalanay ki koshish ki jati rahi hai. Maaloom huwa hai ke NIA ne apni taheqiqaat mukammal karli hai aur bataya jata hai ke Agency iss nateeja par pahonchi hai ke baadi-un-nazr mein un mushtaba naujawanon ke khilaaf dehshat gardanah sargarmion mein mulawis honay ke shawahid paye jatay hain. Zaraye se yeh bhi maloom huwa hai ke jin naujawanon se guzishta 5 dinon se tafteesh ki jarahi thi unhen rozana is hidayet ke sath shaam ko apne ghar jaaney ki ijazat di jarahi thi ke woh dosray din Agency ki shaakh ke daftar par haazir hon lekin hafta ke din kuch naujawanon ko ghar jaaney nahi diya gaya aur un ke arkaan khandan se kaha gaya ke woh unhen chod kar chalay jayen, jis se yeh andaza kya ja sakta hai ke Agency ke ohdedaron ki Hyderabad camp ke douran ki gayi tahaqeeq o tafteesh aakhri marhala mein daakhil hochuki hai. Samgha jata hai ke itwaar ke din naujawanon ko hirasat mein lainay ki qanooni karwaiya mukammal karli jayen gi aur un naujawanon ko peer ke din adalat mein paish karte hue un ka remand haasil karliya jaye ga. Yeh bhi tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke Agency ki janib se Hyderabad camp ke douran ki gayi tahaqeeq o tafteesh aur un naujawanon ke mulawis honay aur un ki giraftari ke baaray mein aagah kiya jaye ga. Bataya jata hai ke NIA ko mushtaba naujawanon ke gharron par kiye gaye chapon mein kuch aisi ashya dastyab hui hain jin se un naujawanon ke dehshat gardanah sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke shubhat ko taqwiyat pahunchti hai. Yeh wisooq se nahi kaha ja sakta ke NIA ne aakhir kitney naujawanon se pooch gach ki hai aur un mein se kitney naujawanon ke khilaaf baadi-un-nazr mein jurm saabit hota hai aur NIA ki tehqiqaat hatmi marhala daakhil hogayi hai ya phir un naujawanon se ki gayi tafteesh aur ab tak ki tahaqeeq se koi naya pehlu samnay aata hai.
371.title: Hyderabadi naujawanon se NIA ki tafteesh aakhri marhala mein daakhil?!

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency National Investigation Agency ( nia ) ne dehshat gardi ki sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar, Hyderabad ke aik 19 sala naujawan Abdul Qadeer ko hirasat mein le liya hai. Yaad rahay ke NIA ki aik khusoosi team jo Delhi se January 2016 mein Agency ki janib se darj aik case ki tehqiqaat ke ziman mein yhan aayi hui thi, 6

August ko Abdul Qadeer ke makaan waqay Shah Hills, shaheen nagar mein chhapa mara tha aur Abdul Qadeer sameit ghar ke afraad se din bhar pooch gach ki thi. Ghar ki talashi ke dauran NIA ke ohdedaron ne kuch ashya zabt ki theen jin ke baaray mein khayaal kya jata hai ke woh dehshat grdanah sargarmion ko anjaam dainay istemaal hoti hain. Agency ne ghar se kuch qabil aitraaz mawaad bhi zabt kya tha. NIA ne is naujawan se musalsal 5 dinon tak apni tafteesh jari rakhi. Unhen din bhar Agency ke Branch Office waqay Begumpet par rozana talab kya jata raha tha aur din bhar tafteesh karne ke baad dosray din dobarah daftar pounchanay ki Hadayat ke sath wapas lota diya jata tha taham hafta 11

August ko usay ghar jaaney ki ijazat nahi di gayi aur un ke waalid se kaha gaya ke woh tanha wapas lout jayen. Maloom huwa hai ke aaj subah Abdul Qadeer ke ghar walon ko agency ke ahdidaro n ne ittila di ke un ke bacha ko hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. Samjha jata hai ke peer ko kal NIA ki khusoosi adalat mein paish kya jaye ga. Abhi tak Agency ki janib se is naujawan ko giraftar karliye jaaney ki ittila nahi di gayi hai aur na hi yeh maaloom ho saka hai ke sirf Abdul Qadeer ko hi hirasat mein le liya gaya hai ya phir dosray nojawanon ko bhi hirasat mein le liya gaya hai. samjha ja raha tha ke NIA ne hyderabad mein camp ke douran 5 dinon tak apni tehqiqaat ko samaitt diya hai aur kisi bhi waqt hyderabad mein ki gayi karwaiyon ke baaray mein media ko aagah kere gi.
386.title: NIA ki janib se shaheen nagar ka Abdul Qadeer girftar?

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaumi Tehqiqati Agency “National Investigation Agency (NIA)” ne dehshat gardi ki sar garmion mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein 24 sala Mohammad Abdullah Basit saakin Hafiz Baba Nagar aur 19 sala naujawan Abdul Quadeer saakin Shah Hills, Shaheen Nagar, Hyderabad ko girftar karliya hai. NIA ne un do naujawanon ki giraftari ki tauseeq kar di hai. Iss khusoos mein NIA ke jari kardah press note mein bataya gaya hai ke Agency ne 28

January 2016 ko Police Station NIA, New Delhi mein aik muqadma Sheikh Azher ul Islam, Mohammad Farhan Sheikh aur Adnan Hasn aur un ke naamaloom sathiyon ke khilaaf ISIS s se taluqaat rakhnay aur ISIS s ki taraf se Hindustani Muslim naujawanon ki nishandahi karne, targheeb dainay, intahaa pasand bananay, taqarrur karne aur tarbiyat dainay ke ilzamaat par taazirat e Hind ki dafaa 120B aur qanoon insidaad ghair qanooni sargarmian 1967 ki daf-aat 18, 18A & 18B ke tehat aik muqadma darj kya gaya tha. NIA ne tehqiqaat ki takmeel par 25 July 2016 ko chargesheet paish kar di thi. Trial ke douran do mulzimeen Azhar ul Islam aur Mohammad Farhan Sheikh ko qusoor waar pakar 7 saal ki qaid ki saza di gayi jabkay Adnan Hasan ke khilaaf trayil jari hai. NIA ke bamawajib deegar mulzimeen ke khilaaf mazeed tehqiqaat jari theen, mazeed tehqiqaat mein yeh inkishaaf huwa ke Hyderabad ka saakin Abdullah Basit jo Adnan Hasan se rabita mein raha tha woh aur is ke kuch saathi mustaqil aik dosray se rabita mein thay aur ISIS s ki sargarmion ko hndstan mein phelanay saazish kar rahay thay. Iss silsila mein 6

August ko Hyderabad ke 7 muqamat par chaapay maaray gay aur jurm mein mulawis honay ke kaseer shawahid dastyab hue. Zabt shuda ashya ko si f s ail Hyderabad ko jaanch ke liye bhaij diya gaya hai. Ab tak ki gayi ibtidayi pooch gach par yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke Mohammad Abdul Qadeer aur deegar saathi Hindstan mein dehshat grdanh sargarmia anjaam dainay ka iradah rakhtay thay.
394.title: NIA ki janib se 2 Hyderabadi naujawanon ki giraftari ki tauseeq

news_detail: New Delhi. Jawahir Lal Nehru University ke Student Leader Umar Khalid par paiir ke din nai Delhi mein Constitution Club ke bahar namaaloom hamla awarne golian chalayein taham woh zakhmi honay se bach gaye. Police ne kaha ke 2:00 bajay dopehar ko jab Umar Khalid Constitution Club Rafi Marg mein munaqqid shudni aik seminar banwan ”khauf se paray aik azadi ki simt” (Towards A Freedom Without Fear) mein shirkat ke liye ihata mein daakhil ho rahay they, hujhoom mein se aik aadmi namodaar hotay hue un par pistol taan di. Ayini shahideen ne kaha ke is shakhs ne Umar Khalid par golian chalayein taham golian Umar Khalid ko nahi lagein. Police ka kehna hai ke aadmi ne pistol taan di thi taham fire nahi kya. Umar Khalid ka kehna hai ke un par hamla kiya gaya tha aur unhon ne firing ki aawazian sunen. Umar Khalid ne kaha ”Constitution Club ke bahar tea stall par main apne doston ke sath chaaye noshi kar raha tha ke aik hatta katta aadmi aqab se aaya aur apne hathon se meri gardan daboch li. Main ne mehsoos kya ke is ke haath mein bandooq thi, is liye mein ne is ke haath ko thaamay rakhnay ki koshish ki, mujhe dar tha ke woh kahin mujh par goli nah chalade. Is ne mujh par qaabu palaya aur mujhe zameen par gira diya. Iss ke baad uss ne mujh par goli chalaye. Jab mere doston ne is ko roknay ki koshish ki to woh bandooq pheink kar faraar hogaya. Main ne faasla par goli chalne ki aawaz suni. Bandooq se zaroor goli chalaye gayi.” Police ne kaha ke hum Student Leader ke bayan ka tajzya kar rahay hain. DSP Delhi Police Mr. Madhur Verma ka kehna hai ke yeh pata chalanay ki koshish ki jarahi hai ke aaya bandooq se goli chalaye gayi ya nahin. Umar Khalid ka kehna hai ke un par hamla huwa. Kisi ne un ko daboch liya aur peechay dhakail diya aur is ke baad is ne Khalid par goli chalanay ki koshish ki, lekin woh aisa nahi krska. Khalid ke mutabiq is ne hawa mein goli chalaye aur awam ne is ka taaqqub kya. Police ohdedar ne kaha ke hum Club ke gate par nasb CC tv camera ki footage ki jaanch kar rahay hain taakay hamla aawar ki shanakht ki jasakay. Yeh waqea yaum e aazadi se sirf do din Parliament se qareeb paish aaya jo high security area shumaar kya jata hai. Police waqea ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hai aur hamla aawar ke wahan bhagtay hue chod di gayi pistol ko seize karliya gaya hai. yeh seminar ‘United Against Hate’ naami tanzeem ki janib se munaqqid kya ja raha tha. Baad azaan Khalid ne kaha ke Mulk mein aik qisam ke khauf ka mahol ban gaya hai aur koi bhi hukoomat ke khilaaf aawaz uthata hai usay dhmkaya ja raha hai. Indian Express ki report mein kaha gaya ke Ashish Pandey ke mutabiq jo us waqea ke waqt tea stall ke paas maujood thaiy, Umar Khalid chaaye noshi ke baad apne doston ke hamrah Club ko wapas lout rahay they aur jab woh Club ki gate ke qareeb puhanche to aik aadmi un se takarya jis ke nateeja mein jhagda shuru huwa, do doston ne madakhilat ki jabkay teesra dost madad ke liye pukarnay laga. Hamla aawar bach kar faraar honay mein kamyaab hogaya. Jab woh INS building ke qareeb pouncha to woh phisal gaya aur is ki bandooq neechay girgaee magar woh usay chod kar faraar hogaya. Aisa ho sakta hai ke jab bandooq neechay girnay lagi to woh ittafaq se chal gayi hogi.Baaz Ayini shahideen ka kehna hai ke bazahir woh tanha lagta tha magar is ke sath dosaron ki maujoodgi ke imkanaat ko bhi mustard nahi kiya ja sakta. Aik Ayini Shahid ne bataya ke hamla aawar ne do golya n chalayein.

Sadar Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen o Rukn Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne JNU Student Leader Umar Khalid par hamla ke baad aik tanzia tweet kya aur naam nihaad qoum paraston ko nishana banaya. Unhon ne apne twitter par likha ”9 pm qoum parasto tumhe nafrat paida karna aur har ek ku aur kisi ko bhi jo Supreme Leader ki mukhalfat karta hai qoum dushman qarar dena mubarak ho, jaissa ke aaj ka #’woh aik goli ka hi mustahiq hai’? sharamnaak”

Rukn Assembly Gujarat Mr. Jignish Mewani ne kaha ke hamla karne walay BJP aur RSS ke siwa koi dosray nahi ho saktay. Unhon ne kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke Umar Khalid par wohi logon ne hamla kya hai jinhon ne Gauri Linkesh,Pansaare, Kulbargi aur  Dabulkar ku jaan se mara tha. Unhon ne kaha ke Wazeer e Azam ko apna mun kholna chahiye aur aisay logon ko police tahaffuz faraham karna chahiye. Unhon ne kaha ke Modi ji ku mera challenge hai ke woh zail ke chaar masayel par chaar barson ke douran unhon ne jo kuch kya is par chaar minute mutwatir baat kare. 1. do crores mulazimaten,2.  Kisanon ki khodkshyan,3. Daliton, aqliaton aur khawateen par hamla aur 4. ifraat e zar.
410.title: JNU Student Leader Umar Khalid par hamla

news_detail: Hyderabad. Vishwa Hindu Parishad, Bajrang Dal aur BJP samait daayen baazu ki deegar Hindu tanzeemon ney aaj ehtejaaj kya. Un tanzeemon ke darjanon kaarkunon ney aaj Hyderabad o  Ranga Reddy Collectorates par Hindu devataaon ki tauheen, Hindoon ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh kiye janay aur Hindu mazhabi rehnumaon ki tehqeer ke khilaaf ehtejaaji dharna diya. Hyderabad Collectorate par munsarim dharney mein sabiq markazi wazeer o Rukn Parliament Mr. Bandaru Datatrya ney bhi hissa liya. Ehtejajyon ney ilzaam aayed kya ke Telangana riyasat mein TRS hukoomat mein Hindoon ke devtaon ki tauheen karne aur un ke mazhabi jazbaat ko majrooh karne ke waqeat barh gaye hain. Mukhalifin ko khuli chhut di gayi hai ke woh Hindoon ke devataaon ke khilaaf zabaan darazi kere aur is par sadaye ehtijaj buland karne walon ko dabaya ja raha hai. Mr.  Bandaru Datatrya ney is mauqa par khitaab karte hue kaha ke Hindoon ke jazbaat ko thaiys pshonchanay walon ke khilaaf karwai karne mein buri terha nakaam hogayi hai jis ki wajah se un ke hauslay buland ho rahay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP is masla par khamosh nahi rahay gi. Daayen baazu ki Hindu tanzeemon ke qaideen nay ilzaam aed kya ke hukoomat dohra miyaar ikhtiyar kar rahi hai. Hindus ke mazhabi jazbaat ko thaiys pahonchaney walon ko khuli chhut daiy rakhi gayi hai aur is ke barkhilaf ghair Hindu bradarion ki khushnodi haasil karne mein lagi hui hai. Baad dharna, ehtejajyon ney Zila Collector ko aik yad dasht paish karne ki koshish ki taham unhen Zila Collector ke daftar ke andar daakhil honay nahi diya gaya. Ehtejajion ne Swami Parimanand ke khilaaf Telangana Police ki  jaanib se ki gayi karwai ki bhi sakht mazammat ki aur un par riyasat mein dakhla par aayed imtina ko barkhast karne ka mutaliba kiya. Ehtejajyon ko Hyderabad Police ney hirasat mein le liya aur unhen mukhtalif Police Stationon ko muntaqil kardiya gaya. Ehtijaj ke baayis kaafi dair tak traffic mein khalal pada. Ehtejaaji Jai Sri Ram, Police zulm band karo ke naaray lgarhe thaiy.
421.title: Daayen Baazu ki Hindu tanzeemon ka Hyderabad aur Ranga Reddy Collectorates par dharna

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jawaharr High School ke khilaaf Reinbazar Police Station mein ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen karne ka aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. School intizamia ki janib se 72

jashnn  eazadi ki munasbat se School ki imarat par kuch hangings awezan (erect) kiye gaiy thaiy jis mein Hyderabad ke Rukn e Parliament aur deegar Arkaan e Assembly ki qadaavr tasaveer ke pas e  manzar mein Qaumi Parcham dikhaya gaya tha jis se aisa mehsoos ho raha tha keh yeh qaayideen, Qaumi Parcham ko roond kar chal rahay hain. Social Media par yeh tasaveer viral hogai. Station House officer Reinbazaar ke mutabiq Police Station ki patrolling party, yaum e azadi ke mauqa par gasht mein thi. Iss party ke aik rukn Krishna ne yeh dekha ke Jawaharr High School ki imarat par siyasi qaideen ki tasaveer awezan hain jis ke pas e manzar mein ‘Qaumi Parcham’ hai, jinhein dekh kar aisa mehsoos ho raha tha ke ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen horahee hai. Iss liye insidaad tauheen qaumi tazeem 1971 ki difaa 2 bah mutaliq ‘Qaumi Parcham’ o dastoor e Hind ki tauheen ke tehat School ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Yeh poochnay par ke School ke Correspondent Ayub Shah ka yeh kehna hai ke banners unhon ne nahi lagaye balkay School ke staff ne lagaye hain to Inspector ne kaha ke hum tehqiqaat karenge magar waisay School ka intizamia hi is ka zimmadaar hota hai.
1269.title: ‘Qaumi Parcham’ ki tauheen par Jawaharr School ke khilaaf muqadma

news_detail: Vijayawada. Shaadi se do din qabal se dolha ghar se gayab hai. It-tila-aat ke mutabiq Vijayawada ke rehne walay Nagendra ki aaj Shaadi honay wali thi magar woh guzashta do din se la patah hai. Bataya jata hai ke Nagendra  14

August ko apne doston aur rishta daaron mein shaadi ke ruqye taqseem kar raha tha taham is ke baad se woh la patah hai, tab se hi is ke arkaan e khandan is ka pata chalanay ki koshisho mein hain. Is ke walidain ney Police mein apne betay ki ghumshudgi ki shikayat darj karwayi jis ki asaas par Dolhe ke sale phone number se is ka pata chalanay ki koshish kar rahi hai. Pooch gach par police ko pata chala ke Nagendra Shaadi karne mein dilchaspi nahi rakhta tha.
1284.title: Shaadi se do din qabal Dolha gayab.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizamabad zila mein aaj Ek indohnak haadsa mein B.Tech ka taalib e ilm halaak hogaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke 21 sala (VREC ka B.Tech ka taalib e ilm tha) Mohammad Abdul Aziz farzand janab Mohammad Abdul Shukoor saakin Ahmedpura Colony aaj subah car mein imthehaan likhnay ki gharz se ja raha tha ke Armoor road par sadak haadsa ka shikaar hogaya. Mossola it-tila-aat ke mutabiq is haadse main deegar 5? nojawan bhi zakhmi hogaye jinhein Nizamabad District  Headquters Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya hai. Bataya jata hai ke mahlook naujawan janab Ahmeduddin maalik Bharat Cycle Stores Bodhan ka nawasa hota hai. Haadse ki ittila pa kar Rukn e Assembly Bodhan Mr. Mohammed Shakeel Aamir ne Hospital pahonch kar gham zada khandan ko pursa diya aur zakhmion ki ayadat ki.
1299.title: Armoor Road par sadak haadsa. Nizamabad B.Tech taalib e ilm halaak

news_detail: Warangal Zila Collector Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney aik Video Channel ko video interview mein yeh tasleem kya ke unhen hukumat ki janib se allot kardah 133 sala qadeem Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ke is iqraar par aik tanaza paida hogaya hai. Zila Collector ney haal hi mein muqami Web Channel ko dyie gaye aik interview mein kaha ke inhen yaqeen hai ke zila intizamia ki janib se inhen allot kardah sarkari Bangalow mein aik bhoot rehta hai. Un ka yeh video Social Media par Viral hogaya hai. Zila Collector ke is daaway ki kisi maahir e mafooq ul fitrat waqhiyat ke zareya tauseeq to nahi karwai gayi taham un ke is iqraar se aik tanaza paida hogaya hai ke woh zaeef ul-etqadi (Superstition) par yaqeen rakhti hain. Is video mein IAS ohdedar, Bungalow ke barey mein dilchusp maloomat ka tabadlah karte hue nazar aati hain sath hi unhon ney yeh id-daa kya ke is qadeem imarat mein un ke hamrah aik bhoot bhi deera jamaye hue hai. Is Bangalow ka sang e buniyaad 133 saal qabal yahan mamoor suprident superintendent Engineer ki ahliya Mrs George Palmer ney rakha tha. Yaad rahay ke Asif jahi daur mein george Palmer hi sarkain bichenay ke umoor ke nigran they. Woh mukhtalif muqamat bashamool Karimnagar, Warangal aur Khamam waghera mein sarkari Bunglow taamir karne ke bhi nigran they. Mohtarma Amarapali Kata ney is interview mein yeh bhi kaha ke 130 saal se ziyada qadeem is imarat mein shagaaf parney shuru hogaye hain. Unhon ney bataya ke imarat ke aik kamrah ki chhat 20 fit buland hai. Bangalow mein koonay hain jis ki wajah se barish ka pani imarat mein andar daakhil ho raha hai. Imarat ki Tazaeen ka kaam fi al-waqt chal raha hai. Zila Collector ney bataya ke un ka jaiza lainay se qabal Ohdedaron ney shayed taantrikon ko talabb kya tha aur pehli manzil par kuch jhaad phoonk ki thi. Unhon ney mujhe aagah kiya tha ke mein pehli manzil par shab bisri nah karoon jo store room ke tor par istemaal hota hai chunkay vha n aik bhoot hai. Zila Collector ney kaha ke unhon ney saaray ilaqa ki safai karwai hai magar Bangalow ki pehli manzil par raat guzarnay ki kabhi jurrat nahi ki chunkay wahan aik bhoot 133 saal se intzaar kar raha hai.
1316.title: Warangal zila collector ke Bungalow mein bhoot rehta hai, Collector ka id-daa.

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Police ne Azaan International School mein aik masoom ladki ke sath jinsi ziyadati ke case ki Fast Track Court mein aajilana samaat ko yakeeni banaye gi. Police ne mulzim Mohammad Jelani Security Supervisor ki giraftari ki tauseeq karte hue kaha ke aaj usay Adalat mein paish kya ja raha hai. Deputy Commissioner of Police West Zone Mr. A. R. Srinivas ne aaj aik press conference mein mulzim ki giraftari aur Police tehqiqaat par roshni daali. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein kaha ke is waqea ke ziman mein School intizamia ke khilaaf ta haal koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya chunkay is jurm ka irtikaab infiradi taur parr kya gaya hai aur shikayat kunindah ne bhi School intizamia ke khilaaf koi shikayat nahi ki hai, albatta walidain se baat cheet karne par unhon ne bataya ke ibtida mein School intizamia ne do ghanton tak taawun nahi kya. Tehqiqaat mein is baat ka pata chalaya jaye ga. Mr. Srinivas ne kaha ke Police ki tamam tar tawajah asmat raizi ke muqadma par markooz hai. Taham DCP ne bataya ke unhon ne zila collector se baat ki hai aur unn se khwahish ki hai ke woh tehqiqaat karwaen ke aaya School chalanay se mutaliq murawwija qawayid ki khilaaf warzi to nahi ki gai hai. Iss khusoos mein DEO ko tehqiqaat karne ki hidayat di gayi hai. Yeh poochnay par ke School mein maazi mein bhi isi tarha ke waqeat runuma ho chukay thae? DCP ne kaha ke hamein abhi tak aisi koi shikayat mausool nahi hui hai. Unhon ne kaha ke agar walidain aisa koi waqea hota hai aur woh Police se rujoo nahi hue thae toh Police kya kar sakti hai? Police ke press note mein ab tak ki gayi tahaqeeq ki roshni mein bataya gaya ke 14

September ko mutasirah ladki apne walidain ke sath School pahonchi aur wahan se Headmistress ke hamrah woh Jaya Bhushan Hospitl Mehdipatnam pahonche. Ibtidayi tibbi imdaad ke baad Doctor ne inhen mutasirah ladki ko dosray hospital ko le jaany ka mashwara diya. Woh dobarah School pahonche aur School mein mutasirah ladki ne Headmistress aur deegar amlah ki maujoodgi mein mulzim ki shanakht ki. Mutasirah ko fauri Nilofer Hospital rujoo kya gaya jahan usay shareek dawakhana karliya gaya. Ladki ki surgery ki gayi aur is ka ilaaj jari hai. Hyderabad City Police ki Clues Team ne muqam waardaat ka daura kya aur muaayina kya. Waldain, Headmistress, Class Teacher aur aaya aur deegar ke tafseeli bayanaat record kiye gaye. Mutasirah ladki ki ashya, Director Telangana Forensic Sciences Laboratory ko tajzia aur report ke liye bhej di gayeen. Press note mein bataya gaya ke iss case mein na baligh ladki par jabran dakhuli jinsi ziyadati saabit hoti hai. Yeh bhi kaha gaya hai ke mutasirah ladki ka ilaaj jari hai aur Crpc ki dafaa 164 ke tahet mutasirah ladki ka tafseeli bayan Magistrate ki janib se record kya jaye ga aur medical report ka intzaar hai. Iss case ki tahqiqaat ACP Asifnagar Mr. K. Ashok Chkravarti ki nigrani mein Mr. Mohammad Munawar Deputy SP incharge Golconda Police Station kar rahey hain jabkay Additional DCP West Zone Mr. Venkateshwarlu case ki paishraft par nigrani rakhay hue hain.
1174.title: Azaan School jinsi ziyadati case: Mulzim ki giraftari ki tauseeq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukn e Parliament Hyderabad wo Sadar All India Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen Barrister Asaduddin  Owaisi ney Azaan International School mein aik masoom ladki ke sath jinsi zayadati ke case mein aaj Commissioner of Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar aur Dist. Collector Hyderabad Mr. M Raghunandan Rao se mulaqaat karte huwe School intezamia ke khilaaf District Education Officer ki tehqiqati report ki roshni mein sakht karwai karne aur aajilana  tehqiqaat karne ka mutaleba kiya. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Commissioner Police se khwahish ki ke maamla ki hsasasiat ko dekhte huwe case ki tehqiqaat CCS ke hawale ki jaye aur School mein tanseeb tamam Electronic devices zabt karliye jayen. Unhon ney School intezamia ke khilaaf bhi muqadma darj karne aur School ki kushadgi ki ijazat na dainey ka bhi mutaleba kiya hai. Barrister Asaduddin ke hamrah sabiq Rukn e Assembly Karwan wo Majlisi umeedwaar Mr. Kausar Mohiuddin ke alawa mutasirah ladki ke waalid aur dosray rishte daar bhi maujood thae. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Dist. Collector se bhi mulaqaat ki aur un se khwahish ki ke DEO ki report ki roshni mein School intezamia ke khilaaf sakht karwai ki jaye aur is baat ko yakeeni banaya jaye ke School ki dobarah kushadgi na hosaki. Ladki ke waalid ney baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke woh Sadar Majlis ke shukarguzar hain ke unhon ney shakhsi dilchuspi letay huwe na sirf Commissioner Police Hyderabad se numaindagi ki hai balkay Dist. Collector ke paas bhi pahonch kar numaindagi ki hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney teyqun diya ke khaati ko kaifar e kirdaar tak pahonchaya jayega aur School intezamia ke khilaaf bhi sakht se sakht karwai ko yakeeni banaya jaye ga. Yaad rahay ke kal School ke rubaru kiye jaaney walay muzahira ke dauran ehtejajyon ney Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ki qayadat par School intezamia ki pusht panahi ka ilzaam aayed karte huwe naaray bhi lagaye thae. Ladki ke waalid ney bhi Majlis ke khilaaf barhami ka izhaar kiya tha taham raat mein Majlis ke sabiq Rukn e Assembly Mr. Kausar Mohiuddin ney mutasirah ladki ke ghar pahonch kar ahal e khandan se mulaqaat karte huwe is ghalat fahmi ka azaala kiya tha ke Majlis kisi bhi mulzim hatta ke School intizamia ki pusht panahi nahi kar rahi hai balkay Majalsi qiadat, mutasirah khandan ke sath hai jis par raat mein hi ladki ke waalid ney apni ghalti ka ehsas karte huwe majalsi qayadat se moazarat khawahi karli thi.
1196.title: Azaan School case, Barrister Owaisi mutharrik

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mohabbat karne walay aik jodey ney un ke waalidain ki janib se Shadi ki tajweez ko mustarad kardey ney par itwaar ko Shankarpally mein apni jaan dae di. 22 saala Yellesh aur 19 saala Lavania kuch arsa se aik dosray se payar karte thae aur dono ney faisla kiya tha ke apne waalidain ki marzi se aik dosray ke sath shadi karne ka faisla kiya tha lekin un dono ney apne apne waalidain ko bataney par un ke waalidain ney un ki shadi ki tajweez ko thukra diya. Sorat e haal se mayoos hokar Yellesh ney apne ghar ke qareeb aik darakht se phansi le kar khudkushi karli, Yellesh ki khudkushi ki ittila milnay ke fori baad ladki ney bhi khud ko aag lgali aur apni jaan dey di. Police ney khudkushi ka muqadma darj karliya.
1218.title: Waalidain ke Shadi se inkaar par premi jode ne jaan dey di

news_detail: Amravati. Zila Nanded main Dharmabad ki adalat ki janib se nonbailable arrest warrant se mutaliq dilchasp inkeshaaf karte huwe Chief Minsiter Andhra Pradesh N Chandrababu Naidu ney kaha ke unhen ta haal aisa koi warrant mausool nahi huwa hai. Qanoon tanzeem jadeed Andhra Pradesh par amalaawri par mukhtasir muddati waqfa e sawalaat ke dauran Assembly mein baat karte huwe Mr. Chandrababu Naidu ney kaha ke unhen adalat se kisi qisam ki communication mausool nahi hui hai jaisa ke is barey mein chand dinon qabl khabrain manzar aam par aayi theen. Unhon ney kaha ke woh is masla par mutaliqa ohdedaron se tabadla e  khayaal kiye hain aur is par munasib iqdaam kiya jaye ga. Unhon ney kaha ke unhen Andhra Pradesh ki sarhad par Maharashtra Police ney girftar kiya tha magar riyasat mein nahi. Uss waqt Maharashtra Police ney kaha tha ke Telugu Desam Party leaders ke khilaaf koi case nahi hoga aur unhen khusoosi flight ke zariye Hyderabad bhej diya gaya tha. Lekin ab achanak yeh khabar aayi hai ke adalat ney nonbailable arrest warrant jari kiya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Babli project ki taameer ghair qanooni thi. Unhon ney wazahat ki ke yeh project, Godavari River par SRS project ke hudood ke andar hai. Shumali Telangana ke kisanon ko is project ki takmeel par dariyaee pani parapne haq se mahroom hona pade ga.
1231.title: Koi arrest warrant nahi mila: Chandrababu Naidu

news_detail: Guzishta intikhabaat mein Narendra Modi ko Wazeer e Azam ke taur par paish karte hue BJP ko Iqtidaar mein laane mein Mulk geer satah par muhim chalanay walon mein aik bada aur ahem naam Ramdev Baba ka hai jinhon ney mantaqi aur falsfiyana andaaz ikhtiyar karte hue un azhaan ko bhi badalne mein ahem kirdaar ada kya tha jo mazhabi bughz aur firqa parastana afkaar se pak thae. Aam shaherion ki zindagion mein aik inqalabi tabdeeli ka khawab dikha kar Baba Ramdev jaisay logon ney nai nasal ko BJP ka hamnava banadiya tha. Naujawanon ko rozgaar ki farahmi, kalay dhun ki wapsi, ashya e zaroriah ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke sath sath Ayodhya mein Ram Mandir ki taameer, Jammu & Kashmir ke khusoosi mauaqqaf ko khatam karne Dastoor mein tarmeem, Common Civil Code ka nifaaz jaisay waday karte hue Mulk ke voters ko raghib kya gaya tha magar jab bhaari aksariyat se BJP hukoomat mein aayi aur Narendra Modi Wazeer e Azam ban gaye to jo-jo waday kiye gaye to un ke barkhilaf kaam kya gaya. Mulk ki jo sorat e haal thi iss ko mazeed ab-tar kardiya gaya. Guzishta intikhabaat mein Narendra Modi ke gun ganay walay aur un ka purzor difaa karne walay ab un kanam lainay se bhi katraane lagey hain. shaed Ramdev Baba jaise logon ka bhi zameer unhen andar se malamat kar raha hai magar un mein itni jurraat nahi hai ke jis shiddat se woh Modi ki tayeed kiye thae ab itni hi shiddat se un ki mukhalifat kare .

Ramdev Baba ney ND Tv ke Youth Conclave mein aaj hissa letay hue kuch baatein ki hain jis se yeh saaf zaahir hota hai ke woh bhi Narendra Modi se mayoos ho chukay hain. BJP ke kattar haami rahne walay Ramdev Baba ney aisa lagta hai ke woh Modi se doori ikhtiyar karne ka ye rasta nikaal liye hain ke siyasat se hi doori ikhtiyar karli jaye. Un se jab yeh poocha gaya ke aaya woh aayindah Lok Sabha intikhabaat mein BJP ke liye muhim chalayein ge? Toh unhon ney kaha ”mein kayun karoon ga? Mein un ke liye muhim nahi chlaon ga. Mein siyasat se dastbardar ho chuka hon. Mein tamam parties ke sath hon aur mein azad hon.” Ramdev ney kaha ke woh ghair janibdaar hain na hi dayen bazu ke aur na hi bayen baazu ke. Kisi ko bhi un par ungli nahi uthani chahiye chunkay woh kayi ahem umoor mein ”Moun Yoga” ikhtiyar kiye hue hain. Unhon ney kaha ke aajkal woh kisi ko nahi chaid rahay hain magar koi unhen cheday ga to woh unhen choden ge bhi nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par tanqeed karna awam ka buneyadi haq hai. Taham unhon ney kaha ke Wazeer e Azam Modi ney achay kaam kiye hain jaisay Swach Bharat aur koi bada scam honay nahi diya. Iss ke bawajood woh yeh kehnay se chup nahi reh sakay ke Raffal deals par sawalaat uthaye jarahay hain. Ramdev Baba ney kaha ke Modi hukoomat ki policies qabil e tareef hain lekin ab un mein se kuch mein islaah ki zaroorat hai. Qeematon mein izafah bada masla hai aur Modi ji ko jald hi islahi iqdamaat karna hoga, iss mein nakami ki soorat mein ‘mehengai ki aag toh Modi sarkar ko bahut mehngai pade gi’ Yoga guru o baani Patanjali Ayurved ney yeh bhi id-daa kya ke woh petrol aur diesel ko 40-35 rupay per litre farokht kar saktay hain agar hukoomat ijazat dae. Agar hukoomat mujhe ijazat deti hai aur tax mein kuch riayat deti hai to mein Hindustan mein petrol, diesel 40-35 rupay per litre dae sakta hoon. Eendhan ko GST ke tahet khareedna hoga na ke 28% tax laago kiya jaye. Unhon ney kaha ke agar hukoomat chahay to petrol aur diesel ki qeematein itni oonchai tak nahi pahonch sakteen aur un mein kami ki ja sakti hai. Ramdev Baba ney kaha ke mahengai Narendra Modi hukoomat ke liye bahut mahengi saabit hogi .
1244.title: Mahengai Modi ko mahengi pade gi: Baba Ramdev

news_detail: Russia ki defence ministry ke elaan ke mutabiq Russia ka aik fouji tayyarah jis mein 14 askari ahalkal sawaar thae, peer ko raat gaye Syria ke saahil ke nazdeek Mediterranean Sea ke oopar parwaaz ke douran radar ki screen se gayab ho gaya. Yeh waqhiya muqami waqt ke mutabiq raat 11:00 bajey paish aaya jab ke isi douran Syria ke shaher Latakia ko Israel ki janib se missile hamlon ka nishana banaya ja raha tha. Mangal ke roz jari bayan mein Russian ministry of defence ney bataya hai ke ” IL. 20 tayyarah ke amlah se uss waqt rabita munqita huwa jab woh Hmeimim ke fazai adda ki janib wapsi ke douran Syria ke saahil se 35 kilo meter ki doori par Mediterranean Sea ke oopar mehve parwaaz tha”. Bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke fouji tayyarah ke amla ke anjaam ke baaray mein abhi tak koi ilm nahi aur tayyarah ki talaash jari hai. wizarat difaa ke mutabiq tayyarah ke radar screen se gayab honay ke waqt Israel ke chaar F16 tayyaray Syria ke soobay Latakia mein Infrastructure ko nishana bana rahay thea. Latakia Mulk ke shumal maghrib mein Shami sadar Bishar Al Asad ka garh shumaar kiya jata hai. Doosri janib Russian khabar rasan Agency “RIA Novosti ” ney aik askari zaraye ke hawale se bataya hai ke Shami fazai difai nizaam ney Israeli hamlon ke jawab mein firing ki. Russian defence ministry ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke “tayyarah se jis waqt rabita munqita huwa usi douran hamaray radars ney mazkoorah ilaqa mein maujood French Fighter behri jahaaz par se missile daaghe jaany ka pata chalaya”. Idhar Paris ney fauri taur par Russia ke ilzaam ki tardeed kar di hai. Francesi fouj ke tarjuman ka kehna hai ke “French afwaj is hamla mein kisi taur bhi mulawis honey ki tardeed karti hin”. Shami hukoomat ney pir ke roz aik behri missile hamla ki tasdeeq ki jis ke douran sahili shehar Latakia mein mutadid thikanon ke ilawa Hmeimim ke fouji adda ko bhi nishana banaya gaya. Shami hukoomat ke zair e intezam media ke mutabiq Latakia mein Technical Industries Corporation ko nishana bananey walay missilon aur drone tayyaron par rok laga di gayi aur is douran missile shikan nizaam ney un mein se kayi ko maar giraya. Syria mein insani haqooq ke nigaran Group Al-Marsid ke mutabiq hamla mein Latakia mein Technical Industries Corporation ke godowns mein golah barood ke depots ko tabah kar diya gaya. Idhar Israeli fouj ney Shami thikanon par Israeli fazai hamlon ke douran tayyarah ke la patah honay se mutaliq Russian ministry of defence ke elaan par tabsarah se inkaar kar diya. Israeli fouj ki tarjuman ney peer ki shab aik bayan mein kaha ke “ham bahar se aney wali khabron par tabsarah nahi karte”. Tarjuman ney apni qayadat ke sath iss maamla par behas ke liye mohlat talab kar li. Doosri janib aik Amrici ohdedar ka kehna hai ke America yeh samjhta hai ke Syrian hukoomat ki tayyarah shikan toup ney ghair danista taur par Russian fighter ko maar giraya, jis ke baaray mein Russian media ka kehna hai ke woh peer ki shab Mediterranean Sea ke oopar “Lapata” ho gaya. Amrici ohdedar ney British khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke America ke nazdeek Shami hukoomat ke difai nizaam ney Israeli missiles ka rasta rokney ke douran ghalti se Russia tayyarah maar giraya.
1259.title: Syria par Israeli Missile hamla, Russian fighter la patah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nalgonda mein ghirat ke naam par Paranay Perumala ke sansani khaiz qatal mein Malakpet ke saakin Mohammad Abdulbari ko peer ke din girftar karliya gaya hai. Yeh wohi Abdulbari hai jo sabiq wazeer e dakhla Gujrat Harin Pandya ke qatal muqadma mein giraftari ke baad bari hogaya tha. Miryalaguda Police ka kahena hai ke Abdulbari ney Amruta Varshani ke waalid T. Maruthi aur Bihar ke qatilon ke darmyiaan mushtaba Mamlat karwai thi. Police ney iss qatal ke silsila mein muqami Congresi Leader Mohammad Kareem ko bhi hirasat mein le liya hai. Yaad rahay ke Amruta Varshani  ney jo dalit naujawan Pranay Perumala  se shadi rachali thi jis se woh piyar karti thi. Perumala par khanjaron se hamla karkay is waqt halaak kardiya gaya jab woh apni haamila biwi ka checkup karwane ke baad Hospital se wapas lout raha tha. Police ka kehna hai ke is qatal ke silsila mein 7 afraad bashmool qaatil ko Bihar mein girftar karliya gaya hai. Iss qatal ke liye toli ko aik Crore rupay dainey ki peshkash ki gayi thi aur qatilon ko 18 Lakh rupay bhi ada kiye ja chukay thae. Aik Senior Police ohdedar ke hawala se Times of India ne khabar di ke ladki ke waalid Maruthi Rao ney Mohammad Kareem ke tavassut se Abdulbari se rabita qhayam kiya aur qatal ke aiwaz aik Crore rupay dainey ki peshkash ki gayi. Maruthi Rao ney paishgi ke taur par 50 lakh rupay bhi ada kar diye thae. Senior Police ohdedar ney bataya ke Abdulbari, Nalgonda ke Asghar Ali ka saathi hai aur woh bhi Harin Pandia qatal case mein bari hochuka hai. Abdulbari ko Asghar Ali ke sath Central Bueuro of Investigation ki janib se 2003 mein girftar kiya gaya tha. Un par POTA ke tahet muqadma darj kiya gaya tha. Ahmedabad ki Session Court ney 2010 mein tamam mulzimin ko bari kardiya tha aur High Court ney bhi zaireen adalat ke faisla ko barqarar rakha tha. Harin Pandia qatal muqadma se bari honay ke baad Asghar Ali aur Abdulbari ko mushtaba dehshatgard Mirza Fayaz Baig ki Police hirasat se 1996 mein faraari mein madad karne ke ilzaam mein Central Crime Station Hyderabad ney girftar karliya tha. January 2013 mein yeh dono Baig ke case se bhi bari hogaye. Nalgonda ka mutawin Abdulbari Saleem Nagar, Malekpet mein muqeem tha. Perumala ke qatal ki saazish mein Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke sabiq Rukn e Assembly Viresham ka bhi naam liya ja raha tha taham aik Police ohdedar ney kaha ke is qatal mein un ka koi role nahi hai. Mohammad Kareem aur ladki ke waalid dono dost hain aur zameenat ke mamlaat karte hain. Mohammad Kareem ki iss qatal mein girftary ke baad Congress Party ney unhen sadar town ke ohda se barkhast kardiya hai. Paranay aur Amruta ney January mein shadi karliye thae aur woh kuch dinon ke liye ruposh hogaye thae chunkay unhen dar tha ke jaan se mardiya jaye ga.
1274.title: Nalgonda qatal mein Muslim naujawanon ka role!

news_detail: New Delhi. Convener Aam Aadmi Party wo Chief Minister Delhi Mr. Arvind Kejriwal, un ke naayib Mr. Manish Sisodia aur party ke deegar 11 arkaan e Assembly ko Chief Secretary par hamla ke muqadme mein Delhi Court ki janib se Summon jari kiya gaya hai. Adalat ney unhen hidayat di ke 25

October ko woh shakhsi taur par haazir hon. Police ney apni 1,300 Pages ki Charge Sheet mein ilzaam aayed kya ke Kejriwal, Sisodia aur deegar ney Delhi Chief Secretary Anshu Prakash ko jaan se mardeney ya shadeed Chout pohanchaney, sarkari farayiz anjaam dainey mein rukawat paida karne aur unhen nuqsaan pahonchaney ki saazish ki hai. Aam Admi Party ke leaders par Chief Secretary ko mahruse rakhney, danista tauheen karne, ishtiaal angezi karne aur ghair qanooni taur par jama honay ka bhi ilzaam aayed kiya gaya hai. Kejriwal aur Sisodia ke aawa jin deegar arkaan e Assembly ke khilaaf fard jurm ayed kiya gaya un mein Amanatullah Khan , Prakash Jarwal, Nitin Tyagi, Ritu Raj Goind, Sanjiv Jha, Ajay Dut, Rajesh Rashi, Rajesh Gupta, Madan lal, Praveen Kumar aur Dinesh Mahania shaamil hain. Anshu Prakash ney ilzaam aayed kiya ke 19
aur 20

Feb ki darmiyani shab Kejriwal ki rehayishgah par jab unhen aik ijlaas ke liye talab kiya gaya tha to uss waqt un ke sath zor zabardasti ki gayi. Apni shikayat mein Prakash ney kaha tha ke ibtida mein unhen dhamkaya gaya aur baad azan Amanatullah Khan aur Prakash Jarwal ney un par hamla kiya. Iss waqhiye ke bad Aam Admi ke arkaan e Assembly Amanatullah Khan aur Jarwal ko girftar karliya gaya tha lekin Delhi Police ko un se pooch gach ke liye hirasat mein dainey se inkaar kardiya gaya tha taham Dehli hukoomat ney ilzaam ko ‘boogs’ aur’ fake’ qarar diya aur kaha ke yeh BJP ki zair e qayadat markazi hukoomat ki inteqami karwai hai. Jo ilzamaat aayed kiye gaye hain woh saabit hojane ki soorat mein Kejriwal aur deegar arkaan e Assembly ko 7 saal ki jail hosakti hai.
1288.title: Kejriwal, Manish Sisodia aur 11 MLAs ko Delhi Court ka summon

news_detail:
Hyderabad. Markazi Cabinet ney budh ko Ordinance manzoor karte huwe yaklakhth Triple Talaq (Talaq Biddah) ko mustawajib sazaye qaid kharar dete huwe Ordinance ko manzori dey di hai. Yaad rahay ke guzishta baras August mein Supreme Court ki aik paanch rukni bench ney Triple Talaq ko ghair dastoori qarar dete huwe markazi hukoomat ko hidayat di thi ke is ke tadaruk ke liye munasib qanoon saazi ki jaye, jis ke baad Modi hukoomat ney Lok Sabha mein iss khusoos mein bill ”Muslim khawateen (tahaffuz huqooq zojiat) 2017” paish karte huwe manzoori haasil karli thi taham Rajya Sabha mein khatir khawah aksariyat na honey ke baayis Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Marriage) Bill ko paish nahi kiya jaska tha. Bad azaan Union Cabinet ney is bill mein chand tarameem ko manzoor di thi. Iss Ordinance ke ahem khad o khhaal yeh hain ke agar koi bayak waqt Teen Talaq dey ga jis ke liye Adalat e Uzma ney Talaq  Bidda ki istelaah bhi istemaal ki hai to woh teen saal sazaye qaid ka mustawajib hoga. Triple Talaq ke khilaaf shikayat karne ka haq iss khatoon ko hoga jis ko Talaq di gayi hai ya phir iss ke khooni rishta daar ya phir woh afraad jo iss ke Nikah ke umoor se munsalik rahay thae. Isi tarha sirf khatoon ki imaa par hi masalihat wo mafahmat ki gunjaish rahay gi, iss ka matlab yeh hoga ke agar koi khatoon yeh shikayat kere ke usay Talaq Bidda dey di gayi hai magar shohar usay apnana bhi chahay to yeh isi waqt mumkin hoga agar shikayat kunindah khatoon bhi is par amaada ho. Isi tarha is Ordinance ki ru se Talaq Bidda ki shikayat par mulzim ko Police Station se zamanat nahi mil sakay gi. Magistrate ko hi zamanat dainey ka ikhtiyar hoga. Magistrate ke liye bhi yeh laazim ho ga ke zamanat manzoor karne se qabl shikayat kunindah khatoon ka moaqqaf bhi jaaney aur is ke istedlaal ki samaat kare. Triple Talaq se alahda honey walay jooday ki na baligh aulaad par Haq e Hisanat khatoon ka hoga yani na baaligh aulaad khatoon ki zair e parwarish diye jayen ge aur mulzim par iss khatoon aur is ke bachon ko naan wo nufqa ada karna hoga. Is Ordinance ka itlaaq Jammu & Kashmir par nahi hoga.
Wazeer e Qanoon Mr. Ravi Shankar Prasad ney aaj Delhi mein aik Press Conference mein iss Ordinance ki manzoori se waaqif karwatay huwe kaha ke Triple Talaq ke waqhiyat ki rok tham ke liye Ordinence ki manzoori aik dastoori ujlat thi chunkay January 2017 se September 2018 tak Triple Talaq ke 430 waqhiyat runuma ho chukay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke hum ney badi koshish ki thi ke is maslae par Congress ka sath le sakay magar Congress Party ney Vote Bank ke dabaaoo mein aakar is Bill ko Parliament mein ittefaq raaye se manzoori dilaney mein hukoomat ka sath nahi diya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke woh aur Mr. Anant Kumar ney is khusos mein Congress ke leader Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad se mutadid martaba baat karne ki koshish ki magar koi musbit radd-e-amal nahi aaya. Ordinance ki manzoori par Congress Party ney apne awaleen radd-e-amal par kaha ke Amnded Bill ney hamari tashweesh ko door nahi kiya hai ke kis tarha mutasirah khatoon ko naan wo nafqa ada kiya jaye ga jab Talaq dainey wala shohar jail bhaij diya jaye ga. Congress Leader Mr. Randeep Surjewala ney kaha ke hum ney tajweez paish ki thi ke shohar ki jayedad ko qurq (seize) karliya jaye lekin Modi hukoomat, Muslim khawateen ko insaaf dilaney mein dilchaspi nahi rakhti hai. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn e Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney Ordinence par apna radd-e-amal zahir karte huwe kaha ke Narendra Modi hukoomat, Musalmanoon ko nishana banana chahti hai. Triple Talaq Ordinence ka masawaat se koi lena dena nahi hai. Yeh mughalita dainey hukoomat ka harba hai.
1303.title: Triple Talaq ke khilaaf Ordinance manzoor

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress ke senior leader Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney aaj Rafale Deal par Modi hukoomat ko zabardast tanqeed ka nishana banatay huwe kaha ke Rafale Deal ko manzar e aam par laane se hukoomat guraiz kar rahi hai. Gandhi Bhavan Hyderabad mein Press Conference se khitaab karte huwe kaha ke Modi hukoomat aiwaan e Parliament mein Rafale Deal par kuch bstaney se qasir hai aur Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ney khamoshi ikhtiyar kar rakhi hai is liye hum majaboor hain ke har riyasat pahonch kar Rafale Deal ke baarey mein awam se rujoo ho rahay hain. Unhon ney bataya ke 2007 mein hamari afwaaj ney mehsoos kiya ke Hindustan par aik taraf se China aur doosri taraf se Pakistan taaqatwar ho rahay hain. Is liye hamari UPA hukoomat ney hamari afwaaj ki difai salahiyaton ka jaiza letay hue Air Force aur wizarat difaa ki sifarshaat par 126 fighter planes kharidney ka faisla kiya hai. Hukoomat ney 12

Decemeber 2012 ko bainul aqwami tender ki kushadgi amal mein aayi thi. 6 Mumalik mein se aqal tareen qeematon ki peshkash karne wali Company Rafale ki thi. Is tender mein yeh shart bhi thi ke 18 fighters tayyar shuda sarbarah kiye jayen aur 108 fighters hamaray desh mein tayyar kiye jayen ge. Uss waqt yeh taye kiya gaya tha ke French Company mai yeh tayyaray difaa ke idaara Hindustan Aeronautic Limited (HAL) mein tayyar kiye jayen ge. Iss ka faydah yeh hoga ke hum jadeed tareen tayyaray apne taur par tayyar kar saken ge taakay dosray Mumalik se kharidney ki naubat nahi aaaye gi aur hamaray Engineers ko rozgaar faraham hoga. Unhon ney bataya ke 2013 mein mazakiraat ka aaghaz huwa aur 2014 mein HAL aur French Company Rafale ke darmiyan moahida bhi hogaya. Iss dauran hamari hukoomat chali gayi.
