Bharat yeh umeed kar raha tha ke iss Deal mein paishraft hogi. Unhon ney bataya ke April 2015 mein Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi France ka daura karte hain. Do din qabal jab Secretary Foreign Affairs se media ney poocha ke kiya Wazeer e Azam Rafale Deals par bhi tabadlah e khayaal karen ge to unhon ney kaha ke iss mauzo par guftagu nahi hogi aur un mamlaat mein pahelay jo kuch hochuka hai usi par amal hoga, lekin Wazeer e Azam baironi Mulk hi thae ke media mein yeh khabar aagai ke Wazeer e Azam ney is Deals  ko khatam kardiya aur 126 fighters ke bajaye sirf 36 fighters hi khareede jayen ge. Unhon ney 90 tayyaray kam kar diye. Is ki ittela kisi ko bhi nahi di gayi. Yahi nahi jab qeematon ki baat aati hai to sab ko hairat hogi ke is mein ghair mamooli izafah hogaya. Jis waqt hum ney Deal taye ki thi uss waqt un ki Currency ki qader ke mutabiq Hindustani rupay mein IL1 tayyarah 533 Crore rupay qeemat mein tha aur Modi Ji ney jis waqt yeh Deal ki tab isi tayyarah ki qeemat 1670 crore rupay hogayi. Qeematon mein teen guna izafah hogaya. Unhon ney difaa ki Company HAL mein tayyaron ki tayari ka thaika dainey ke bajaye aik khangi company ko dey diya. Yeh Hindustani awam ke liye tashweesh ka baayis hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 2007 mein jab Mulk ke liye 126 fighters ki zaroorat thi jab ke uss waqt China aur Pakistan se jung ke khatraat kam thae aur ab jabkay yeh khatrah badh gaya hai magar Modi hukoomat ney fighters ki tadaad ghatadi. Wazeer e Azam ney baironi Mulk ke daura se wapsi ke baad Committee ki dastakhat haasil kiye. Unhon ney istefsaar kiya ke khangi company ka kiya record hai. Kiya iss company ney pahelay koi iss maidan mein kaam kiya hai jabkay sarkari company ney ab tak 4060 tayyaray tayyar karchuki hai.
1317.title: Rafale Deal, Mulk ki salamti se khilwaad: Ghulam Nabi Azad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rukn Assembly Warangal East Mrs. Konda Surekha ney Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekhar Rao se yeh wazahat karney ka mutalba kiya ke TRS ki janib se jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein un ka naam shaamil kyun nahi kiya gaya. Hafta ko Somajiguda mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Mrs. Konda Surekha ney usay Telangana ke pasmandah tabqaat aur khawateen ki badi beizzati par mahmool karte huwe Kaarguzar Chief Minister aur TRS sarbarah se mutaliba kiya ke un ke naam ko rokay rakhne ke pas e parda muharikaat kiya hain. Unhon ney kaha ke Telangana wahid riyasat hai jahan kisi khatoon ko cabinet mein shaamil nahi rakha gaya. Unhon ney yeh istefsaar kiya ke khatoon Arkaan Assembly (B Shooba aur K Surekha) ke naamon ko pheli fehrist mein shaamil na karney ki wazahat karen. Unhon ney kaha ke woh mazeed 3 din tak intezaar karengi aur uss ke baad party ke naam khula maktoob rawana karengi aur apney mustaqbil ke mansoobah se media ko aagah karengi. Unhon ney bataya ke woh guzishta intekhabaat mein 55 hazaar ki bhaari aksariyat se kamyaab huwi theen. Mrs. Konda Surekha ney bataya ke unhon ney Mr. KT Rama Rao se baat cheet ki thi jinhon ney un se poocha tha ke Party Ticket unhen diya jaye ya phir un ki dukhtar ko, jis par unhon ney Mr. KT Rama Rao se wazeh taur par keh diya tha ke Party Ticket unhen diya jaye aur un ki dukhtar Shamita ko nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke un ke talluq se Warangal Party halqon mein yeh ghalat bawar karwaya gaya ke woh apney khandan ke liye do ticket talab kar rahi hain.
1129.title: KCR Ticket na dainay ki wazahat karen: Konda Surekha

news_detail: Hyderabad. Wazeer Information Technology o Baldi nazm o nasq o shahri Taraqiyat Mr. KT Rama Rao ney Sadar Pradesh Congress Captain Uttam Kumar par palat kar waar kiya jinhon ney yeh kaha tha ke Mr. KT Rama Rao siyasat mein dakhila se qabl America mein bartan dhoya karte thae. Mr. KT Rama Rao ney Congress qaayed ke remarks par apne twitter payam mein tabserah karte huwe kaha ke unhon ney waisay hi bartan dhuain hain jaisay har Hindustani, America mein apne bartan dhota hai. Unhon ney kaha ke Congress sarbarah Mr. Ruhal Gandhi ke barkhilaf jinhein unhon ney ‘Pappu’ qarar diya, iss Mulk mein apni kamaai khud kiye hain. Wazeer Information Technology ney yeh nishandahi karte huwe ke 2014 ke intekhabaat ke dauran Telangana Pradesh Congress ke sarbarah ki car se 2.5 crore rupay bar aamad huwe thae, Uttam Kumar par awam ki raqam lootney ka ilzaam ayed kiya. Mr. KTR ney suboot ke tour par car mein muntaqil ki jane wali raqam ki tasweer bhi munsalik ki hai. Unhon ney Twitte kiya ke ”Dear Uttam Garu mein ney America mein apne ghar mein bartan dhuai honge (Jaisa ke America mein har Hindustani apne ghar mein dhota hai). Mujhe faqar hai ke mein ney kaam kiya aur aap ke Pappu ke barkhilaf apne bal par aik bawiqar zindagi guzari. Aap ke jaisa mein ney awam ki raqam loot kar apni car mein nahi jalaya”. MR KT Rama Rao ney isi par iktafa nahi kiya balkay AICC State Incharge Kuntaiah par bhi zarb lagai jinhon ney ilzaam aayed kiya tha ‘Apple’ aur ‘Sumsung’ Companies ney KTR ki bad unwaan siyasat ke baayis Telangana mein apne shops ke qiyam ke baarey mein apna zahen badal diya hai. Unhon ney jawabi waar karte huwe Kuntaiah ko ‘Delhi Sultanete’ aur Scamgress joker se mauosoom kiya. Unhon ney kaha ke Apple ney 3500 mulazmeen ke sath apna kaam shuru kardiya hai.
1180.title: Mein ‘Pappu’ ki terha nahi hon: KTR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Osmania General Hospital ke Doctors ney Hospital ke liye nai imarat ki taamer ke apne motalebe mein shiddat paida karte huwe bataur ehtijaj aaj helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj kiya. Doctors aik arse se Osmania General Hospital ki qadeem imarat ki khasta haali par kayi martaba shikayaat darj karwachke hain magar qadeem imarat ki jagah naayi imarat taamer karne par hukoomat taraddud ka shikaar rahi hai chunkay Hospital ki qadeem imarat ke inhedam par aik gosha mukhalfat kar raha hai. Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation ney bhi imarat ki boseedgi ko dekhte huwe usay munhadim kardainay ki Notice dey rakhi hai. Naayi imarat ki taamer ke mutalebe ko hukoomat ke nazar andaz kardainay par Doctors ney munfarid andaaz mein apna ehtijaj darj karwane aaj helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj kiya. Yaad rahay ke guzishta mah mareezon par chhat ka palaster ukhad kar girjane ke teen waqhiyat runuma ho chukay hain. Doctors ney kaha ke woh masla ki yaksoi tak apna ehtijaj jari rakhain ge. Aik Dr ney kaha ke kisi bhi waqt hamaray suron par chhat gir sakti hai is liye hum apne aap ko bachaaye rakhnay Duty par helmet pahannay ka faisla kiya hai. Doctors ney jumaraat ko Regular Wards  ki bajaye Hospital Campus par Nurses aur Junior Doctors Association ke ishteraak se Outpatient Stalls qaim kiye.
1208.title: Osmania Hospital ke Doctors ka helmet pehan kar mareezon ka ilaaj

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mohram, ganesh tehwaron aur intikhabaat ke paish e nazar Hyderabad City Police, South Zone ki janib se hafta ko 6:00 bajey taa 8:30 bajey Railway Track ke atraaf nihayat hassas ilaqay jaisay Al-Jubail colony (Chandrayangutta Police Station), Farooq Nagar (Falaknuma Police Station) mein DCP Mr. V. Satyanarayan ki qiyadat mein Cordon and Search Operation anjaam diya gaya, jis mein 250 Police ohdedaron ney hissa liya. Iss dauran 42 mushtaba afraad ko hirasat mein le liya gaya. Police ki janib se Mobile Electronic Finger Print devices istemaal karte hue barsar e mauqa jaanch padtaal karne par 12 rowdysheeters ki nishandahi ho payi hai. Mazeed bran 148 wheelers, 9 Autos, 2 fourwheelers ko munasib documents na honey ki binaa zabt karliye gai hain. Isss muhim ke dauuran 2 ghair qanooni slaughters aur shahed aur adrak mein milawat ke do units ka pata chalaya gaya hai. Iss khusoos mein Falaknuma Police Station ney Mohammad Muzaffaruddin ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karte hue 30 kg adrak ka paste zabt karliya jabkay Syed Zaheer Ahmed ke khilaaf muqadma darj karte hue 90 kg shahed zabt karliya. Chandrayangutta Police ney do ghair qanooni slaughters ke khilaaf bhi muqadma darj karliya.
1221.title: Al-Jubail colony aur Farooq Nagar mein Cordon & Search

news_detail: Hyderabad. Gachibowli X Roads, Hyderabad mein aaj subah aik taiz raftaar Bus ney teen Rahroon ko kuchal dala. Yeh waqea peer ki subah 7:00 bajay paish aaya. Bus number 87 Lingampally se Koti jane wali Telangana State Road Transport Corporation ki bus ney jo raftaar ki had se taiz daud rahi thi daftar jane waloon ko roond dala. Bataya jata hai ke yeh teen log sadak uboor kar rahay thae ke aik taiz raftaar Bus ki zad mein aagaye. Woh Bus Stop ke paas thahre huwe thae aur phir sadak uboor karna hi chahtay thae ke taiz raftaar Bus aa pohanchi aur inhen kuchal dala. Haadse ke fauri baad Driver, Bus chod kar faraar hogaya. Inspector Raidurgam Police Station Mr. Ram Babu ney bataya ke tehqiqaat ki jarahi hain. Bus Driver ke khilaaf tazirat e Hind ki dafaa 304 (a) aur 279 ke tehat laaparwayi ke nateeja mein mout ka sabab ban’nay ka muqadma darj karliya gaya hai. Unhon ne bataya ke aayini shahideen se baat cheet karne par patachala ke Driver be-ehteyati se gaadi chala raha tha aur uss ki raftaar bhi bahut taiz thi. Ayini shahideen ke mutabiq gaadi bahut taiz thi aur junction ke paas bhi driver ne gaadi ki raftaar kam nahi ki thi. Teen mahalukeen ki shanakht Janardhan mutawatin Banglore, Dashrath saakin Nanakramguda aur Hamid ki hesiyat se ki gayi. Haadsa ke baad kuch der ke liye is masroof tareen sadak par Trafic jaam rahi. Mahaukeen ki laashon ko postmortem ke liye Omania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Yeh pata chalanay ke liye haadese kis tarha paish aaya Aini shahideen ke bayanaat bhi qalamband kar rahi hai aur CCTV Footage bhi haasil kar rahi hai. June mein aisay hi aik haadese mein Shamirpet par Bus ki takkar se do bike sawaar halaak hogaye thae.
1241.title: Bus ney teen logon ko kuchal dala

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein August 2007 mein Lumbini Park aur Gokul Chat Bhandar mein huwe twin Bomb blasts mein maakhoz 2 mulzimeen Anique Shafeeq Sayeed aur Ismail Choudhry ko Hyderabad ki khusoosi adalat ney phansi ki saza sunadi hai jabkay do mulzimeen Farooq Sharfuddin Turkash aur Mohammad Sadiq Asrar Sheikh ko 4

September ko ilzamaat mansuba se bari kardiya gaya tha. Aik aur mulzim Tariq Anjum ko Cherlapally Jail mein qaim aik khusoosi adalat ney muqadma ke 7 ahem mulzimin ko panah dainay aur un ki madad karne ka qusoorwaar paaya hai aur usay umar qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. Is mulzim ke khilaaf deegar mulzimin ke sath fard e jurm aayed nahi kiya gaya tha balkay Adalat mein mutawazi muqadma mein samaat ki jarahi thi. Yaad rahay ke Khusoosi Adalat ne 4
September ko is muqadma mein 2 mulzimeen Anique Shafeeq Sayeed aur Ismail Choudhry par fard e jurm aayed kardiya tha aur un ki saza ke liye aaj ka din muqarrar kiya tha. 25
August 2007 mein shaam ke waqt Lumbini Park aur Gokul chat Bhandar mein huwe Bomb dhamako mein 42 afraad halaak aur 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thay.
1255.title: Twin Bomb Blasts. 2 mulzimin ko phansi aur aik ko umar qaid ki saza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq Wazeer Mr. Danam Nagender ney jinhon ney haal hi mein Telangana Rashtriya Samiti mein shumuliat ikhtiyar ki thi, Party Ticket se mehroomi ke khadshaat ke paish e nazar TRS ko khairbad keh dainay ki afwahon ki muzammat karte huwe kaha ke nahi ticket nah dey ye jaaney ki soorat mein woh TRS ki fatah ke liye kaam karen ge. Mr. Nagender ney kaha ke unhon ney ghair mashroot taur par TRS mein shumoliat ikhtiar ki thi aur agar unhen ticket na bhi diya jaye to woh Party ki kamyabi ke liye koshaan rahen ge. Unhon ney id-daa kiya ke intekhabaat ke baad Mr. Chandra Shekhar Rao dobarah Chief Miniter banein ge. Apni rehaish gaah par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe  unhon ne ilzaam ayed kiya ke Congress Party ke qaideen yeh afwaah philarhe hain ke woh TRS chode rahay hain. Mr. Danam Nagender ke barey mein yeh mashhoor hai ke woh ujlat mein faislay karte hain. Iss se qabal bhi Dr Y S Rajshekhar Reddy ke zamana mein jab unhen halqa Assembly Nampally se ticket na dete huwe halqa Lok Sabha Secunderabad se muqaabla karne ki peshkash ki gayi to unhon ney usay qubool na karte huwe Telugu Desam Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karli thi aur Telugu Desam ke ticket par Nampally halqa Assembly se kamyabi haasil karli thi taham unhon ney Dr. Rajshekhar Reddy ki kabeena mein jagah panay ke liye Telugu Desam Party aur Assembly ki rukniat se istefa dete huwe dobarah muqaabla kiya tha jis par unhen nakami ka saamna karna pada tha. Unhon ney Assembly halqon ki darjah bandi ke baad Khairtabad halqa Assembly se Congress ke ticket par muqaabla kiya tha magar bad qismati se woh 2014 ke Assembly intekhabaat mein aik baar phir shikast se dochar hogaye thar. Ab ayen intekhabaat se qabal unhon ney Congress ko aik baar phir kherbad kehte huwe barsareqhtedar TRS mein shamoliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Un ki shamoliat ke 2 hafton baad hi Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly tahleel kardiya aur 105 umeedwaron ki pheli fehrist bhi jari kar di jis mein un ka naam shaamil nahi kiya gaya. Agarchay TRS ney hanooz Khairtabad se Party Ticket kisi ko nahi diya hai magar siyasi halqon mein yeh baat mashhoor hogayi ke Mr. Danam Nagender ko iss martaba Assembly ka Ticket nahi diya jaye ga balkay unhen Lok Sabha intekhabaat ke liye tayyar kiya ja raha hai jis se woh nakhush hain. Ab yeh chay megoyiaan bhi shuru hogayi theen ke woh TRS ko bhi chod dainay walay hain.
1271.title: Danam ne party chod deney ki tardeed kar di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Aik badi tabdili mein Hukoomat e Andhra Pradesh ney peer ko Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein 2 rupay ki kami kar di hai. Naayi qeematon ka itlaq mangal se hoga. Chief Miniter Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney aaj dopehar eendhan ki qeematon par nazar e saani ka elaan kiya. Mulk bhar mein aaj Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein izafah ke khilaaf aaj manaye gay Bharat Band ke dauran Andhra Pradesh ke awam ko qeematon mein thodi si raahat mili hai. Hukoomat Rajasthan ney bhi itwaar ko eendhan par Vat mein 4% takhfeef kar di thi aur is par nisf shab se amalaawri bhi hogayi thi, jis ke baais Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein 2.5 feesad ki kami aayi thi. Mr. Chandra Babau Naidu ney aik aala sathi ijlaas ke baad Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein takhfeef ka elaan kiya. Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney kaha ke Markazi Hukoomat, Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ko khaam tail ki qeematon par mahmool karte huwe awam ko gumraah kar rahi hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 2013-14 ke douran khaam tail ki qeematein fi Barail 105. 52 barrel dollar thi lekin jab khaam tail ki qeematein gir kar 46 dollar tak pahonch gayi theen tab bhi markaz ne Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein takhfeef nahi ki. Ab khaam tail ki qeemat fi barrel 70 dollar hai lekin markazi hukoomat rozana Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein man maani izafah kar rahi hai. Mr. Chandra Babu Naidu ney kaha ke un ki Hukoomat ney qeematon mein izafah se awam ko honay wali dushwardariyon ko mehsoos karte huwe Petrol aur Diesel par VAT ki sharah mein kami karte huwe apni riyasat ke awam ko juzwi raahat dainay ka faisla kiya hai, jis se reyasti khazana par 1,120 crore rupay ka izafi boojh ayed hoga.
1292.title: AP mein Petrol aur Diesel mein 2 rupay ki kami

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress Party ki zair e qayadat 22 mukhtalif partiyon ki janib se Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein be tahasha izafah ke khilaaf aaj maneye gaye Bharat band Telangana mein koi assar nahi raha albatta sirf oppostion partiyon ka ehtijaj dekhney ko mila jabke Andhra mein band ka asar juzwi raha hai. Telangana riyasat mein band ka kaarobar ke ibtidayi auqaat mein mila jula raad-e-amal raha aur din mein 12 bajey ke baad to tamam karobari idaray khulay dekhe gaye. Ta haal koi nagzhani waqea paish nahi aaya hai taham shehar ke mukhtalif muqhamat aur Telangana bhar mein Congress aur Oppostion Partiyon ney ehtajaji muzahirey kiye aur jagah jagah Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke putlaay Nazar e aatish kiye. Communist Party Of India ke qaideen ney Narendra Modi hukoomat ke iqdamaat ko mustarad karte huwe bator ehtijaj sadak par kabadi khela. Congress Party, Left partiies aur Telugu Desham Party ke qaayideen ney RTC Bus Depots ke rubaroo dharna diya taakay Busoon ko bahar nikal ney se roka jaye. Police ney darjanon ahtejajyon ko hirasat mein le liya aur inhen mukhtalif Police Stationon mein mahruse rakha gaya hai. Telangana mein barsara-e-iqtedar Telangana Rashtriya Samiti aur is ki haleef Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ney band ki tayeed nahi ki hai. Agarchay Andhra Pradesh mein barsara e iqtedar Telugu Desham Party ney bhi band ki tayeed ka bazabta elaan nahi kiya taham is ke kaarkunon ney Andhra Pradesh aur Telangana Petrol aur Diesel ki qeematon mein izafah ke khilaaf kiye jane walay ehtejaj mein hissa liya. Bharat Band ehtejaj ke baais din mein kuch der ke liye RTC Bus Service mutasir rahi taham phir mamool ke mutabiq baseen chalaye gayeen. Telangana RTC ke aik oudedar ney bataya ke riyasat ke kisi bhi hissa mein Bus Service mutasir nahi huwi hai aur hum mamool ke mutabiq baseen chalarhe hain. Vice Chancellor Osmania University Professor S Chandar ney bataya ke Pre Phd imthehaan jo peer ko munaqqid honey walay tha multawi karte huwe mangal ko rakha gaya hai. Un ke mutabiq University se mulhiqa tamam Collages khulay hain.
1305.title: ‘Bharat Band’ Telangana mein be asar

news_detail: New Delhi. Delhi High Court ney peer ko Congress qaayideen Mrs. Sonia Gandhi aur Sadar Congress Mr. Rahul Gandhi ki 2011-12 ke liye un ke Tax Assessments ko kholnay ke faisla ko challenge karte huwe daakhil kardah Writ darkhwast ko kharij kardiya. Justice S Ravindra Bhat aur Justice A K Chawla par mushtamil aik bench ney kaha ke Writ darkhwasten nakaam hogayi hain. Bench ney Congress qaayed Oscar Fernandes ki Writ darkhwast ko kharij kardiya, unhon ney bhi un ke saal 2011-12 ke Tax Assessments ke dubarah khole jany ko Challenge kiya tha. Nakam tax mehkuma ki janib se yeh id-diya kiye jany ke baad ke saal 2011-12 ke liye Rahul Gandhi ka assessment dubarah khoola gaya jis ko challenge karte huwe Writ darkhwast daayir ki gayi thi. Adalat ul aaliya ne apna faisla 16

August ko mehfooz kiya tha. Adalat ne mehkuma Tax se zabani daryaft kiya tha ke Sonia Gandhi, Rahul aur Farnandiz ke khilaaf faisla ke elaan tak koi ahem qadam nah uthae. Senior Advocate P Chidambaram ney Sonia Gandhi ki janib se paish hotay huwe kaha tha ke inhen Additional Solicitor General Tushar Mehta ke zabani bayan par bharosa hai. Mehta ney istadlaal paish kiya tha ke Congress qaideen ne mehkuma Tax par beja ilzaam aayed kiya hai magar is ka koi manfi assar nahi pade ga. Congress qaayideen ke khilaaf Income Tex ke cases uss waqt uth khaday huwe jab BJP qayed Subramaniyam Swami ney National Herald case ke silsila mein aik zaireen adalat ke rubaroo aik khangi faujdaari shikayat daayir ki. Shikayat mein Sonia , Rahul aur deegar par sirf 50 lakh rupay ada karte huwe dhoka dainay aur Fands ka tagalub karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya gaya jis ke zareya Young India (YI) ney 90. 25 crore rupay wasool karne ka haq haasil kiya jo Associated Journals Limited (AJL) Congress party ko ada shudni hai. Yeh ilzaam hai ke  AJL November 2010 mein 50 lakh rupay ke sarmaya se shuru kiya gaya, IJL ke taqreeban tamam share holdings haasil karliye jo National herald news paper chalata hai. Is amal mein YI ney AJL ke 90 crores rupay ke baqaya jaat bhi haasil karliye. Tax Department ney kaha ke YI mein Rahul ke assessment se unhen 154 crore rupay ki aamdani haasil hogi na ke 68 lakh rupay ki jaissa ke qabal azeen assessment mein zahir kiya gaya. Mehkuma ney phelay hi YI ko 2011-12 ke assessment ke liye YI ko 249.15 crore rupay ki notice jari kar di hai.
1320.title: Tax case mein Delhi High Court mein Sonia aur Rahul ki darkhwast mustarad

news_detail: South Korea ke Rukn Parliament Roh Hoe-chan ney bad-unwani ke ilzamaat par dil bardashta hokar khud kashi karli, unhon ney apni zindagi ka khtama apne flat ki 17 win manzil se kood krkya, un ki umar 62 saal thi. ghair mulki khabar rasan agency ke mutabiq qanoon saaz assembly ke teen martaba ke Rukn Roh Hoe-chan par Korea ke Maroof blogger ”Druking” se 44 hazaar dollars zayed ki raqam lainey ka ilzaam tha. Rukn Parliament Roh Hoe-chan ko Social Media par zabardast tanqeed ka saamna tha jis par woh sakht dil bardashta they, unhon ney aik martaba raqam lainey ka aitraaf karte hue kaha tha ke raqam ki lain deen ka maamla allag aur mukhtalif noiyat ka hai mein is raqam ke aiwz inhen kisi qisam ka faida p_hnchnane ka wada nahi kya hai. sabiq Sadar Roh Moo-hyun jinhon ney 2003 taa 2008 tak Mulk ki khidmat injaam di thi, bad-unwani ke scandal ki tehqeeq par 2009 mein aik teela se kood kar khudkushi karli thi.
987.title: Raqam lainey ke ilzaam par South Korea ke Rukn e Parliament ki khud kashi

news_detail: Attapeu : Asian Country Laos mein aik zair e taamer Dam ke totnay se pani dehaton mein daakhil hogaya jis ke nateeja mein sainkdon afraad la patah aur darjanon gaon zair aabb aagaye. Bain ul aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq junoob mashriqi Asiayi Mulk Laos ke soobay Attapeu mein waqay zirtamir hydro electric Dam totnay se 5 Billion cubic pani 6 dehaton ko –apne sath baha le gaya. Selaab ke baais sainkdon afraad la patah jab ke 6 hazaar 6 so afraad be ghar hogaye, la patah afraad ke halaak hojane ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha hai. Xepian-Xe Nam Noy Dam par 410 mega watt bijli paida karne ke liye power station qaim kya ja raha tha jis ke liye 2013  mein 1. 2 billion dollar ke project ka aaghaz kya gaya tha jo 2019  mein mukammal kya jane wala tha. Is power plant se haasil honay wali 90 feesad bijli Thailand ko farokht ki jani thi jab ke maabaqi bijli muqami grid station ke liye mukhtas thi. Dam par qaim power plant ki taamer ke khilaaf muqami an jee auz aur maholiyati tanzeemon ney apne khadshaat ka izhaar karte hue usay muqami abadi ke liye khatrah qarar diya tha aur yeh khadsha zahir kya tha ke muqami abadi ko pani ki qillat ka bhi saamna ho sakta tha. Is power station par kaam karne wali companiyon ka talluq Thailand aur North Korea se hai jab ke aik muqami company bhi shaamil hai. selaab ke baais taahad nigah pani hi pani hai jis ki wajah se logon nay chaton par panah le rakhi hai. rescue idaron ko mutasirah ilaqay taq pounchanay ke liye shadeed mushkilaat ka saamna hai. helly kaptrz ki madad se selaab mein phansay afraad ki mehfooz ilaqay mein muntaqili ka amal jari hai. ohdedaron nay pani mein phansay afraad ko bachanay ke liye kashtiyan le aeye hain. Dam taamer karne wali janoobi Korea ki company nay kaha ke shadeed barish aur selaab ke nateeja mein Dam toot gyaavr woh Dam ke qareeb dehation ko bachanay mein Laos hukoomat ka taawun kar rahi hai. s ke engineering and construction ke tarjuman nay kaha ke hum aik hungami team chlarhe hain aur Dam ke qareeb ke dehaton mein makeeno ke takhlia aur un ko bachanay ki mansoobah bandi kar rahay hain. company ke aik aur ohdedar nay kaha ke yeh wazeh hojane par ke Dam toot jaye ga fauri 12 dehaton ko khaali kardainay ki hadaayat day di gayi thi. janoobi Korea ki wizarat kharja nay aik payam mein kaha ke company ke 50 workers aur Korea western power ke teen mulazmeen ko jo tameeri prajkt ke paas qiyam kiye hue they bchalya gaya hai.
1000.title: Laos mein Dam totnay se 6 dehaat bahe gay, sainkdon afraad la patah

news_detail: Amrici hukoomat ki janib se intiqami karwai ke tehat Falasteeni panah gzinon ki behbood ke zimma daar idaara Relief and Works Agency ‘UNRWA’ ki imdaad band karne ke baayis Agency mein kaam karne walay 250 Falasteeni mulazmeen ko farigh karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai. you an relief and works Agency (UNRWA) ka qiyam sanh 1949 eeswi ko amal mein laya gaya tha. Yeh idaara kul 50 lakhs Falasteeni panah gzinon mein se 30 lakhs panah gzinon ka boojh uthae hue hai. Sanh 1948 eeswi ki jung mein shyoni riyasat ke Palestine par qabza ke douran nikalay gaye Falasteeni androon mulk, Jordan, Lebanon aur Syria mein badi tadaad mein maujood hain. Doosri janib Falasteeni shehrion neh Amrici pabandion aur ‘UNRWA’ ki taraf se mulazmeen ko nikalay jaanay ki shadeed muzammat karte hue is ke khilaaf shadeed ehtijaj shuru kya hai.’UN’ Relief Agency ‘UNRWA’ ke tarjuman Chris Gunness ne aik bayan mein bataya ke Amrici imdaad ki bandish ke baad hamein Palestine ke andar idaara ke sath kaam karne walay 250 mulazmeen ko barkhast karna para hai. un ka kehna tha ke hum garbh Ardun ke 154 aur Gaza ki patti ke 113 mulazmeen ke contract ki tajdeed nahi kar rahay hain. Agency ki janib se farigh kiye gaye mulazmeen ko bta diya gaya hai. Tarjuman ka kehna tha ke Falasteeni mulazmeen ko nikaalte ki wajah America ki taraf se ‘UNRWA’ ki 300 million salana imdaad kam karne ka iqdaam hai. Tarjuman ne bataya ke Agency ke sath kaam karne walay mazeed 500 so Falasteeni mulazmeen ko full time mulazmat ki bajaye part time par rakha jaye ga. Khayaal rahay ke Amrici hukoomat ne chand mah qabal elaan kya tha ke Palestine panah gzinon ko di jaanay wali salana 36 crore dollar ki imdaad kam karkay sirf chay crores tak mehdood kar di gayi. Amrici imdaad ka hajam Falasteeni panah gzinon ko milnay wali kul imdaad ka 30% tha. Katoti ke baad Agency ko ghayr-maa-mooli maali mushkilaat ka saamna karna pada hai. America ki taraf se Falasteeni panah gzinon ki relief Agency ko di jaanay wali imdaad mein kami ke nateeja mein idaray ko taleem, sehat aur hungami imdaad sameit kayi dosray shobo mein apni services ko mehdood karna pada hai. ‘UNRWA’ ki janib se Falasteeni mulazmeen ko nikalay jaanay ke iqdaam par Gaza aur garbh urdan mein ‘Agency’ ke khilaaf Falasteeni muzahirey kar rahay hain. Mulazimat mein tausee na milnay par aik shehri ne khud suzi ki koshish ki jab ke khawateen aur bachon ka ehtijaj ke douran un ro ro kar bura haal hogaya hai.
1013.title: Trump intezamia ne 250 Falasteeni khandano ke cholhe bujhadiye

news_detail: Qaabiz Israeli fouj ney Palestine ke ilaqay Gaza ki patti par budh ki shaam wehshiana bombari karkay kam se kam teen Palestenians ko shaheed kar diya. Falasteeni wizarat sahet ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke Israeli fouj ki taraf se ki gayi bombari mein teen Falasteeni shaheed hue hain. muqami zaraye ka kehna hai ke Gaza mein Israeli foujion par firing ke waqea ke baad sahyoni fouj ney Hamas ke thikanon samait kayi deegar askari campon par bombari ki. yeh kasheedgi paanch roz qabal Hamas aur Israel ke darmain misar aur aqwam mutahidda ki taraf se karai gayi jung bandi ke baad samnay aayi hai. Qabal azeen Gaza ki mashriqi sarhad par Palestenians ki firing se mutadid Israeli fouji zakhmi hogaye they. Un mein se aik ki haalat khatray mein bayan ki jati hai. Zakhmi Israeli foujion ko hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Gaza par bombari ke baad yahodi kalonyon mein khatray ke siren bhi bajaye gaye hain. Israeli afwaj ney id-daa kya ke Ghazah ke islami hukmraanon Hamas se talluq rakhnay walay 7 fouji thikanon par aartilri bombari ki gayi hai.
1023.title: Gaza par Israeli bombari mein teen Falasteeni shaheed

news_detail: Aam intikhabaat 2018 mein ghair sarkari o ghair hatmi natayej ke mutabiq Pakistan Tehreek-e- Insaaf pehlay aur Muslim League (N) dosray number par hai, taham (N) League ne intikhabi natayej mustard kardiye hain jabkay Peoples Party, MMA, MQM sameit taqreeban tamam siyasi jamaaton ne election ki shafafit par tahaffuzaat o khadshaat ka izhaar kya hai. Express News ke mutabiq intikhabi amal mein Tehreek-e- Insaaf, Muslim League (N), Peoples Party aur MMA sameit kul 122 siyasi o mazhabi jamaaton ne hissa liya. Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf (PTI) ko 122 nashiston par kamyaab mili hai jabkay Muslim League (N) 53 nashiston ke sath dosray, Peoples Party 38 nashiston ke sath teesray aur Mutahidda Majlis e Amal 8 nashiston par bartari ke sath chouthay number par hai. MQM Pakistan 7 nashiston par jab ke 17 nashiston par azad umeedwaar kamyaab hue hain. malik bhar mein Qaumi Assembly ki 270 nashistain hain jin mein se 141 Punjab mein, 61 Sindh mein, 16 Balochistan mein aur 51 nashistain Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein hain. qaumi assembly ki do nashiston par mukhtalif wajohaat ki bana par election multawi kiye gaye. Intekhabi amal mein Tehreek-e-Insaaf, Muslim League (N) aur Peoples Party sameit kul 122 siyasi o mazhabi jamaaton ne hissa lia hai. Pakistan Tehreek-e- Insaaf ke chairman Imran Khan ne wifaq aur sobon mein hukoomat saazi ke liye Committees tashkeel dainay ka faisla kya hai. Intekhabaat mein wazeh kamyabi haasil kar lanay ke baad Chairman PTI Imran Khan ne wifaq aur sobon mein hukoomat saazi ke liye Committees tashkeel dainay ka faisla kya hai, cometion ki sifarshaat ki roshni mein hukoomat saazi ka amal mukammal kya jaye ga. zaraye ka kehna hai ke cometion ke liye naamon ki namzadgi chair mean PTI aaj Bani gala mein honay walay ijlaas mein karen ge. yeh Committees azad umeedwaron ke sath rabton ki bhi majaz hon gi. Darin asna Pakistan Cricket Team ke sabiq Captain Shahid Khan Afridi ne intekhabaat mein kamyabi par Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf ke Chairman Imran Khan ko mubrakbad di hai.

PTI chairman Imran Khan ki Sabiqa ahliya Jemima Goldsmith ne PTI ki kamyabi par naik khwahisaat ka izhaar kya hai aur Imran Khan ko mubarak baad di hai. Social Media par paigam dete hue Jemima ka kehna hai ke 22 saal ki jadd o jahad aur qurabanion ke baad mere beton ke walid Pakistan ke aglay Wazeer e Azam hain. Unhon ne kaha ke Imran Khan ke liye challenge hai ke woh zehen mein rakhen ke siyasat mein kyun aae. unhon ne aik aur tweet mein kaha ke Imran Khan ka 1997 ka pehla election yaad hai jab woh siyasat mein naye aaye they, Imran Khan 1997 mein ghair azmooda aur nazryaati they. 1997 ke Election ke baad Imran ne phone kiya aur kaha hum ne haar mein clean sweep kya hai. Is se qabal bhi unhon ne tweet karte hue Pakistan ko intikhabaat ki mubarak di aur Imran Khan ko khobsorat, paglay, piyaray aur puranay dost qarar diya tha. Unhon ne mazeed kaha tha ke yahan tumharay vote ginnay walon ko umeed hai, inhen vote ginnay do. Un logon ko woh rehnuma mil ja yega jis par woh yaqeen rakhtay hain. ‘Pakistan zindah baad’.

22 years later, after humiliations, hurdles and sacrifices, my sons’ father is Pakistan’s next PM. It’s an incredible lesson in tenacity, belief  & refusal to accept defeat. The challenge now is to remember why he entered politics in the 1st place. Congratulations
— Jemima Goldsmith (@Jemima_Khan)
1234.title: Ab Pakistan par Imran Khan ki Hukoomat hogi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mahkuma Barqi ke aarzi mulazmeen ne, un ki mulaazmaten mustaqil karne Chief Minster ke wada ki adam takmeel par aaj saari riyasat Telangana mein ehtejaji muzahira kiya. Apne derina mutalibaat ki adam yeksuwi ke khilaaf aaj Hyderabad mein bhi mukhtalif muqamat par Mahkuma barqi ke dafatir par ehtejaji muzahira kiya. aarzi mulazmeen ki mukhtalif Unions ki mushtarika Majlis amal ke qaideen ne bataya ke un ke derina mutalibaat ki yeksuwi se TRS hukoomat gorezan hai, jis ki wajah se aarzi mulazmeen kayi mushkilaat se dochar hain. Chief Minster Mr. K. Chandrashekhar Rao ke aarzi mulazmeen ki mulazimaton ko mustaqil karne ka wada kiye aik arsa beeet chuka hai magar is janib hanoz koi misbet paish Raft nahi ki jaski. Union qaideen ne bataya ke Telangana riyasat mein jumla 23, 667 aarzi mulazmeen hain. is ke ilawa Outsourcing par 6-8 hazaar afraad bil collection par mamoor hain. Unhon ne bataya ke Labour Act ke mutabiq aarzi mulazmeen ke Provident Fund aur ESI mein aajir ko bhi apna hissa ada karna hota hai magar aajir ki janib se jo hissa hota hai woh raqam bhi mulazmeen ki tankhwahon se mnha karli jarahi hai, jabkay oot sorsng par kaam karne walay Bil Collectors ko aik bil ki vasuli par sirf aik rupiya diya jata hai. Inhen bhiESI aur PF ki saholaten faraham nahi hain. union qaideen ne mutalibaat ki Adam yeksuwi par ehtijaj mein shiddat peda karne ki bhi dhamki di hai.
1253.title: Mahkuma Barqi ke aarzi mulazmeen ka ehtejaji muzahira

news_detail: New Delhi. New Delhi mein land honey walay Air Asia India ke tayyarah ke bait-alkhala se aik nauzaida ki murda laash padi mili. Police aur Airlines zaraye ke bamawajjib yeh Airlines ka tayyarah gohati se New Delhi pouncha tha. New Delhi ayrport Police station ke aik ohdedar ney bataya ke aik khatoon ko jo tayyarah mein sawaar thi aur jis par parwaaz ke douran tayyarah mein bache ko janam dainey ka shuba kya ja raha hai, Police ney hirasat mein le liya hai. Air Asia India ney kaha ke tayyarah ke amlah ko landing ki tayari ke douran toiletpaper mein lipta huwa nauzaida bacha murda pada mila. Airlines ney bataya ke is ney Mulk ke shehri hwabazi authority aur Directorate General of Civil Aviation ko is baaray mein mutala kardiya hai. Police ke tehqiqati ohdedar ney bataya ke mushtaba khatoon ney parwaaz ke douran tayyarah mein bacha ko janam dainey se inkaar kardiya hai is liye is khatoon ko hospital muntaqil kya jarha hai taakay wahan pata chalaya jasakay ke aaya khatoon ney bacha janam diya hai ya nahi. Takheer se mousula ittila mein bataya gaya ke aik 19 sala Taekwondo khiladi ney tafteesh ke douran yeh iqraar karliya hai ke is ka hamal girgya tha. Police ney is khusus mein Tazeerat Hind ki dafaa 318 ke tehat laash ki khufia nikasi ke zareya paidaiesh chhupaney ke ilzaam mein aik muqadma darj karliya hai aur bataya ke nauzaida bacha ki laash ka postmortem karwaya jaye ga taakay yeh pata chala ya jasakay ke bacha ki madar reham mein Umar kya thi. Yeh wazeh nahi ho saka ke isqaat hamal huwa hai ya phir mamool ke mutabiq bacha ki paidaiesh hui hai aur aisa huwa hai to bacha paidaiesh ke waqt zindah tha ya murda? Aik Police ohdedar ney naam zahir nah karne ki shart par bataya ke khiladi ke khilaaf koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya jo jummay ko Junoobi Korea ka safar karne wali hai. Majmoi surat e haal ko dekh kar aisa lagta hai ke khiladi ko isqaat e hamal huwa hai. Aksar khatoon khiladi baday muqablon mein shirkat ke liye haamela ban jati hain chunkay hamal theharney ke teen mah tak haamela aurat ki jismani taaqat, aam dinon se badhi hui hoti hai taakay woh dosray khiladion par ghalib aasakay.
1273.title: Air Asia India ke tayyarah se murda nauzaida baraamad

news_detail: New Delhi. Mulk mein saal 2017 mein 822 firqa waranah tashadud ke waqeat mein 111 afraad halaak hogaye. Markazi Mamlakati wazeer e Dakhla must Hansraj Gangaram Ahir ney aaj Rajya Sabha ko bataya ke 2016 mein is terha ke 703 waqeat mein 86 aur 2015 mein 751 waqeat mein 97 logon ney apni jaanen ganwayen hain. Mamlakati Wazeer e Dakhla ney tehreeri jawab mein kaha ke law and order, aman o zabt aur firqa waranah hum ahangi ki barqarari aur khation ke khilaaf karwai ki bunyadi zimmadaari reyasti hukoomaton aur markaz ke zair e intizam ilaaqon par aed hoti hai. unhon ny kaha ke Mulk mein firqa waranah hum ahangi ki barqarari ke liye markazi hukoomat mukhtalif tareeqon jaisay antli jins it-tila-aat ki farahmi, intibahi payamaat aur ahem tabdeelion par waqtan foqtan mashwaron ke zareya reyasti hukoomaton ki muawnat karti hai.
1289.title: Mulk mein guzashta baras firqa waranah tashadud mein 111 afraad halaak

news_detail: Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf, Qaumi Assembly ki 119 nashistain jeetnay ke baad sab se badi jamaat ban gayi lekin hukoomat bananay ke liye usay 137 nashistain darkaar hain. Imran Khan Qaumi Assembly ki 5 nashiston par kamyaab hue aur inhen 4 nashistain chhodna hon gi, isi terha Ghulam Surwar Khan 2 nashiston par jeete hain aur inhen bhi aik nashist chhodna hogi, yun Tehreek e Insaaf ki Qaumi Assembly ki 119 mein se 5 nashistain kam ho kar 114 reh jayen gi. Saada aksariyat aur mazboot hukoomat ke qiyam ke liye Tehreek e Insaaf ko azad umeedwaron aur deegar hum khayaal siyasi jamaaton se ittehaad ki zaroorat hogi jabkay jeetnay walay azad umeedwaron ki tadaad 15 hai taham hum khayaal jamaaton mein Grand Democratic Alliance ke paas 2, Awaami Muslim League aik, Pakistan Muslim League (Q) 4, Balochistan Awaami Party aik aur MQM ke paas 8 nashistain hain. Azad umeedwaar 3 din mein kisi bhi siyasi jamaat mein shaamil honay ka faisla kar sakte hain, is terha Tehreek e Insaaf aur azad umeedwaron samait tamam itihadiyon ki tadaad 145 banti hai jo saada aksariyat se ziyada hai. Doosri janib Pakistan Muslim League (N) ney Qaumi Assembly mein ab tak 63, Pakistan Peoples Party ney 40, mMtahidda Majlis e Amal ney 12, Awaami National Party ney aik aur Balochistan National Party Mengal ney 4 nashistain haasil ki hain, is terha oppostion jamaaton ki majmoi nashiston ki tadaad 120 banti hai.
1306.title: Hukoomat saazi ke liye PTI ki mansoobah bandi

news_detail: Qaabiz sahyoni fouj aur Police ne mujremana ghunda gardi aur jabar o istibdaad ka bad tareen muzahira karte hue jummay ke roz Masjid e Aqsa mein namaz ke liye anay walay Falastinion ko Masjid mein daakhil honay se rok diya aur Qibla e Awwal ko Nmazyon ke dakhla ke liye band kardiya gaya. Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf aur Francesi khabar rasan agency ke nama nigaar ke mutabiq sahyoni police ki badi tadaad ne mashriqi Bait ul Muqaddas mein daakhil honay ke baad Masjid e Aqsa ke atraaf koapne ghairay mein le liya. Masjid mein namaz Jummay ki adai ke liye anay walay Falasteeni namazyon ko zado kob kya gaya aur inhen ishtial angaiz andaaz mein wahan se nikaal diya. Aini shahideen ke mutabiq Israeli Police ke wehshiana tashadud ke baad Falasteeni namazyon ne shadeed ehtijaj kya. Falasteeni shehrion aur Israeli fouj ke darmain jhadpen bhi huien. Jab Israeli Forcess ne ansoo gas, asleha aur ruber mulamma kaari ki dhaati golian barsaaen to darjanon Falasteeni zakhmi hogaye. Masjid e Aqsa ke ihata mein hue tassadum mein do Israeli fouji bhi zakhmi hogaye. Falasteeni Mehakima Auqaaf ke tarjuman ne bataya ke Israeli police ne Masjid e Aqsa ke tamam darwazay band karne se qabal tamam dakhli darwazon ke bahar khardaar taren laga den. Falasteeni wazeer Umoor d Mazhabi Mohammad Al-Habbash ne yeh kehte hue ke muqaddas maqam par tall abib ki karwai insani Waqar ke magaayer hai, Masjid e Aqsa compound par Israeli thdidat ko Nazi tafteesh ke mutradif qarar diya. unhon ne Masjid e Aqsa mein Falastinion ke dakhla par Tahdeed par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke sadkon ko block kardiya gaya, thdidat aayed kar di gayeen, darwazon ko band kardiya gaya, sarkain masdood kar di gayeen aur Umar ki Tahdeed aed kar di gayeen, 40 baras se kam Umar ke logon ko ibadat karne se rokkk diya gaya. unhon ne istafsaar kya ke hum tareekh ke kis daur mein reh rahay hain? kya Nazi tafteesh ke daur mein? kya woh doosron ke sath wohi kuch karna chahtay hain jo yahodi barhon mein, ehad wasti ki salebi adalaton ya Nazi adalaton mein un ke sath kya jata raha hai? Masjid e Aqsa ke Gates kayi ghanton taq band kardainay par urdan ne Israeli ishtaal angezi par shadeed barhami ka izhaar kya.
1329.title: Israeli fouj ka jabar, Masjid e Aqsa mein nmazyon par Tahdeed

news_detail: Hyderabad. City Commissioner of Police Mr. Anjani Kumar Hyderabad ney aaj kaha ke shaher mein Moohram aur Ganesh aik saath waqay honay ki wajah se is martaba hamein bahut ziyada tayyariyan karni padi hain taham un do Programon ke bhi pur aman insram ko yaqini bananay na sirf bhaari Police jamiat ko tainaat kiya gaya hai. Dono shaharon mein iss martaba Hyderabad aur bairon e Hyderabad ki 14,000 Police jamiat tainaat hai. Mr. Anjani Kumar kumar ney aaj yahan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke mehakuma Police, GHMC deegar mahkuma jaat ke saath ishteraak karte huwe nuqaayes se pak intizamaat ko yakeeni bana raha hai. Unhon ne bataya ke mahkuma Police ke aala ohdedaron ne GHMC ke aala ohdedaron ke hamrah Ganesh juloos ke mabada Balapur taa visrarjan ke muqaam Hussainsagar jheel tak juloos guzarney ke tamam raaston ka muaayina o mushahida kiya. Mr. Anjani Kumar ney bataya ke is martaba Ganesh aur Moohram ek saath waqay honey ki wajah se South mein mukammal aur East Zone juzwi taur par Mohram ki sargarmian rahen gi iss liye hamari yeh koshish hai ke yeh dono juloos gudmud na honey paaye. Unhon ney bataya ke Murtiyon ke visarjan mein waqt ke zayan ke bachaney ke liye hum ne aik device ikhtiyar kiya hai jis ki madad se mortiyon ki visarjan mein sahoolat hogi aur waqt ki bachat hogi. Shehar ki sab se badi Ganesh moorti ‘Khairtabad Ganesh’ ke jald se jald visarjan ki koshish ki jarahi hai. Iss se pahlay visarjan ke dosray din raat ke waqt virsarjan huwa karta tha magar iss martaba hum iss ka visarjan jald karwana chahtay hain. Commissioner Police ney bataya ke har moorti ke sath Geo Tagging ki gayi hai jis se is moorti aur mandali se mutaliq tamam tafseelaat se aagahi haasil hojaye gi. Unhon ney bataya ke is technology ke zariye jo QR Code generate kiya gaya hai is ki scanning karte huwe hamaray officers apne cell phones par bhi tamaam tafseelaat haasil karlay saken ge.
1223.title: Moohram aur Ganesh bandobast ki tayyariyan mukammal: CP

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union (TUWJU) ney wast October mein Urdu sahafion aur Union ke arkaan ka aik jalsa e aam munaqqid karne ka faisla kiya hai taakay Urdu sahafion ke saath jari lagataar na insafyon ke khilaaf aawaz uthatay hue hal talab masayil ki janib Hukoomat ki tawajah mabzool karai jasakay. Iss silsilay mein Union ke riyasti aur zilai zimma daraan ka aik ijlaas aaj Nobel Hall, Mustafa Tower, Lakdi ka pul mein munaqqid huwa jis mein jalsa e aam ki tayarion aur is ke kamyaab ineqaad ke liye istaqbalia committee ke saath deegar mukhtalif committees ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi. Jalsa e aam mein Urdu ki mashhoor o Maroof shakhsiyation ke alawa brsar iqtedaar wo oppostion partiies ke aala qaideen ko madoo karne ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein GO 239 par dubarah ghaor o khouz kya gaya. Yeh GO bilkhushoos Urdu sahafion ke mafadaat par zarb lagaata hai is liye Union ney hukoomat par is GO se dast bardari ke liye dabaau daalnay ka faisla kya hai. Iss silsilay mein masaayee ke liye mukhtalif iqdamaat uthaye jaayen ge aur aala ohdedaron se dubarah numayindagi ki jaye gi. Urdu sahafion ko double bedroom makanaat ki farahmi ko yakeeni bananay ke liye bhi iqdamaat par ghaor kya gaya aur accreditation card se mahroom sahafion ko bhi health card ki ijrayi ke liye mo-asir koshishon ke aaghaz ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein Union ke zilai sudoor aur deegar ohdedaron ney mukhtalif sathon par Urdu sahafion ke sath na-insafi aur sarkari ohdedaron ke taasub ki shikayat ki aur kaha ke iss rujhan ke sidd-e-baab ke liye mo-asar koshishon ki zaroorat hai. Bilkhusuoos sarkari idaron mein Urdu sahafion ke sath mutasub rawayya ikhtiyar kya jata hai jis ke khilaaf aawaz uthany ki zaroorat par zor diya gaya. Union ke ohdedaron ney Union ke aik Mujalla ki ishaat ka bhi faisla kya hai aur is silsilay mein bhi aik committee ki tashkeel amal mein layi gayi hai. Sarparast Union janab Mohammad Sajid Meraj ney khitaab karte hue jalsa aam ke silsilay mein tashkeel di gayi mukhtalif committees ke zimma daraan se khwahish ki ke woh aik kamyaab jalsa aam ke ineqad ke liye tayarion ka fauri aaghaz kar dein. Unhon ney kaha ke Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union ke qiyam ka maqsad Urdu aur Urdu sahafion ki taraqqi aur falah o bahbood ko yakeeni banana hai aur Union iss mission mein musalsil sargaram hai. Pas e parda aur paish parda dono taraf Union ki sargarmian jari hain. Unhon ney Union ke zilai ohdedaran se khwahish ki ke woh Union ko mazboot se mazboot tar bananay ke liye anthik jad-o-jahad karen taakay mustaqbil mein iss ke samraat se na sirf maujooda Urdu Sahafi balkay Urdu sahafion ki aanay wali naslen bhi mustafeed hosakin. Union ke riyasati saddar janab Ather Moin ney apne khitaab mein phir aik baar tamam ohdedaran aur arkaan se appeal ki ke woh hamesha muttahid rahen kayunkay ittehaad hi hamein insaaf dilasakta hai. Unhon ney yaqeen dilaya ke Union, Urdu sahafion bilkhusoos apne arkaan ki falah o bahbood ke liye har mahaaz par sargarmi ke saath kaam kar rahi hai. Riyasati naayeb sadoor janab Mohammad Abdulhakeem aur janab Rawoof Aazmi, riyasati General Secretary janab Laeequddin aur riyasati Secretary Mirza Ghani Baig ney bhi ijlaas se khitaab kya. Union ke riyasati Secretary janab Rafeeq patel ki qiraat kalaam e pak se ijlaas ka aghaz amal mein aaya. Ijlaas mein Nayeb Sadar Mohammed Akbar Mohiuddin, Secretaries Mufti Mohammed Rayees Qasmi, Zubair Ahmed Khan , Khazin Syed Wajid Hussaini, arkaan e aamila Mohammad Riyazuddin, Mohammed Fazal Pasha, Mohammad Siraj Masood, Mohammad Yousuf , Syed Chand Pasha, Mohammad Siddiq , Mohammad Abdulazeem, Sheikh Jameel , Mohammad Ishaq Sohail, azlaa ke sudoor wo muatamadeen Syed Sajjad ul Hasnain, Syed Baqar, Syed yahya Pasha Quadri, Mohammad Muttabi Ali Khan , Mohammed Mohsin, Sheikh Mohsin, Sheikh Farhaad Khalil, Mohammed Abdul Azeem (Greater Hyderabad), Mohammad Irfan, Jafar Rasheed, Mohammad khaliluddin(Jagtial), Mohammad Sayeed Mohiuddin, Aleem Danish ( United Warangal), Mohammad Imtiazuddin (Medak) ), Sahkir Samad (Karimnagar), Mohammad Abid Ahmed (Asifabad), Mohammad Aleemuddin (Kamareddy),  Shahid Ahmed Tawakkal (Adilabad), Mohammad Usman (Nizamabad), Ashfaq Ahmed, Syed Amjad (United Nalgonda), Mohammad Ghaus (Nagar Kurnool), Mohammad Ilyasuddin (Siddipet) aur deegar azlaa ke zimma daraan ney shirkat ki .
1236.title: TUWJU ka October mein jalsa e aam

news_detail: Hyderabad. Rajya Sabha mein Leader of Opposition Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney kaha ke Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel sirf aur sirf Congress ki dain hai iss mein Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ka koi role nahi hai. Mr. Ghulam Nabi Azad ney Hyderabad mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe kaha ke alhaidah Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel sirf aur sirf Congress Party ki wajah se huwi hai. TRS Party ka iss mein koi role nahi raha hai. Unhon ney kaha ke alhaidah riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye Telagana se talluq rakhney walay Party ke arkaan e Assembly, arkaan Qanoon Saaz Council aur Party ke ohdedaron ney Party qiyadat par zor diya tha ke alhaidah riyasat tashkeel di jaye jis par Congress Working Committee ke ijlaas mein ghaor o khoz kiya gaya. Congress Working Committee ke ijlaas mein iss khusoos mein qarar daad manzoor ki gayi aur phir Dr, Manmohan Singh ki hukoomat ney aik qanoon ki tadween karte huwe Praliament ke dono aiwanon mein is ko Manzoor kerwatay huwe naayi riyasat ki tashkeel ko yakeeni banaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke TRS chahtay huwe bhi Telagana riyasat tashkeel nahi dey sakti hai. Yeh sirf Congress hi hai jis ney alhaidah Telagana riyasat ko tashkeel diya hai. TRS ka yeh daawa ke Telagana is ki wajah se tashkeel paaya hai ghalat hai. Yeh poochney par ke chaar saal baad ab aap yeh daawa kyun kar rahay hain twanhon ney kaha ke Media ney is khosos mein chaar saal baad sawal kiya hai is liye woh ab haqeeqat bata rahay hain.
1251.title: Telangana riyasat Congress ki dain: Azad

news_detail: Trump intizamia ne China ki fouj par Russian fighter planes aur Missile System kharidne par pabandi lagadi. Russia se fighter planes aur Missile System kharidne par America ne China ke fouji idara par pabandi lagai hai, Amrici mahkuma e kharija ke mutabiq woh fauri taur par Chinese fouj ke aik unit par pabandi ka itlaq karega. Amrici mahkuma e kharija ka kahna hai ke Russia se s U 35 fighter planes aur Missile System s 400 kharidne par China par pabandiyan hain. Amrici mahkuma e kharija ka kahna hai ke America Chinese fouj ki branch Economic Development Department aur mahkuma ke director par fauri pabandi nafiz karega. Khabar-rasan agency ke mutabiq Chinese agency aur is ke sarbarah export licence aur American Financial System ke liye block kardiya gaya hai. Chinese agency aur iss ke sarbarah ko is fehrist mein bhi shaamil karliya gaya jis ke zareya woh americion ke sath business nahi kar saken ge. Amrican intizamia ne Russian military aur intelligence se talluq rakhnay wali mazeed 33 afraad aur companiyon ko black list kya hai. Chinese idaara ka Russian hathyaaron ki kharidari ka iqdaam Russia par aayed Amrici pabandion ki khilaaf warzi hai, jis ke tahet Russia ki difai sanat ke sath baday paimanay par lain daen karne walay teesray fareeq par pabandiyan lag sakti hain .
1264.title: China par Russian Fighters, kharidne par America ki pabandi

news_detail: Adilabad. Adilabad se talluq rakhnay walay do naujawan pani ke beech Selfie lainay ki koshish mein gharq hogaye. Do mutwafi Sonu (22)  aur Sophil (23) deegar do ke saath Mohram ki rusomaat ka mushahida karne bicycle par Chandrapur zila ke Rajurah gay hue thae. Ghar wapas hotay hue jumeraat ko yeh charon Penang Mukudabad, Maharashtra mein kashti rani karne gay. Jab yeh log paani ke bichon beech pahnch gay to un mein se aik naujawan ne kashti par Selfie lainay ki koshish ki jis ki wajah se kashti aik taraf jhuk gayi aur paani mein ulat gayi. Muqami logon ne naujawanon ko gharqaab hotay hue dekh kar un ko bachanay ki koshish ki taham un mein se do pahelay hi doob chuke they. Deegar do naujawan Amir aur Irfan ko ilaaj ke liye RIMS muntaqil kardiya gaya.
1279.title: Selfie jaan lewa saabit, Adilabad ke do naujawan gharq

news_detail: Hyderabad. Islam mein Yaum e Ashora ki badi ahmiyat o ifadiyat hai. Isi din kayi anbiya-e karaam par Rabb e kaayenaat ka fazl wa karam huwa hai. Mohram ki 10 tareekh ko Yaum e Ashora ki munasibat se Sunni hazraat roza rakhtay hain jabkay ahal e tashayo wo tafzilee hazraat nawasa e Rasool sale Allah alaihi wasallam hazrat Syedna Hussain ibn Ali aur un ke khanwadah aur Ansar ki shahadat ka maatam karte hain. Isi munasibat se agarchay shaher ke mukhtalif muqamat par shiyayee aqayed ke mutabiq Alam aur Taziye nikalay jatay hain taham puranay shaher mein markazi maatami juloos nikala jata hai. Sadiiyon se chali aa rahi riwayaat ke mutabiq iss markazi maatami juloos ka markaz e nigah ”Bibi ka Alam” hota hai jo haathi par baraamad hota hai. Yeh Alam din mein Dabirpura mein waqay Alawa Bibi se baraamad hota hai aur mukhtalif aashorkhaanoon se guzarta huwa barah Charminar, Chadarghat par ekhtataam pazeer hota hai. Yeh Bibi ka Alawa pahelay Qutub Shahi daur mein Qila Golconda mein waqay tha jisay baad azan Asif Jahi daur e hukoomat mein maujooda muqam par muntaqil kardiya gaya hai. Iss Alam ke baaray mein yeh kaha jata hai ke iss Alam mein lakdi ka aik tukda hai jis ke baaray mein yeh daawa kya jata hai ke woh Khatoon e Jannat, Batool e Rasool sale Allahu alaihi wasallam hazrat Bibi Fatima ko ghusal maiyat diya gaya tha. Iss Alam ko kayi Shahoon ney qeemti nazraane paish kiye hain. Nasir ud Dowla ney heere Nazar kiye they. Nizaam haftum Mir Osman Ali Khan Bahadur ney apni waalida mohtrama ki yaad mein iss Alam ko 6 Adad qeemti heere aur jawahraat nazar kiye thae. Agarchay yeh Alam ahal e tashayyo ki janib se unhi ki riwayaat ke mutabiq nikala jata hai magar is ke mutwalli aik Sunni hain.

Iss markazi maatami juloos ke hamrah ahal tashayyo nange paiir chaltay hue shuhda e Karbala se apni aqeedat ka izhaar karte hain. Maatami giroh juloos ke sath sath chaltay hue noha padhte hain jabkay azaa daaron ki toliyan neem barhena hokar zanjeeri wo khooni maatam karte hue apne jism ko gazind pahonchate hue shuhda e Karba e ahal Baiyt athaar se apni waraaftgi wo aqeedat ka izhaar karte hain. Juloos ke Charminar par pahonchanay par Deputy Commissioner of police South Zone Police Mr. M. V. Satyanarayana ney dhatti chadhai. Shaher mein aaj ke din ki munasibat se jagah jagah sabilein lagai gayi theen aur logon mein sharbat taqseem kya gaya. Kayi Masajid mein waqea Karbalaa par khusoosi programmes ka ehtimaam karte hue falsafah e shahadat ko paish kya gaya hai. Yaum e Ashora ki fazeelat ki munasbat se aaj nafil roza bhi rakha gaya. Mahkuma Police ki janib se naqayis se pak bandobast kya tha jabke GHMC aur Water Board ki janib se bhi julusion ki sahoolat ke liye khusoosi intizamaa kiye gaye thae. Maatam karne walon ki marham patti ke liye mukhtalif Hospitals ki janib se Medical Team tainaat ki gayi theen.
1295.title: Yaum e Ashora, tareekhi Bibi ka Alam ka juloos

news_detail: Riyadh. Telangana NRI Journalists Association Saudi Arabia (TNJASA) ki janib se Hindustan ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein hukoomat ki janib se azaadi e sahaafat ke khilaaf ki jarahi sazishon aur azaadi sahaafat par shikanja kasnay ki koshisho ki mazammat karte hue Hindustan ki sahafati bradari aur sahafion ke sath izhaar yaganagat kya gaya. Convenor TNJASA janab K.N. Wasif ney Telangana Union of Working Journalists, Hyderabad Union of Working Journalists, Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Union, Telangana Urdu Working Journalists Federation aur deegar tanzeemon ki janib se Hyderabad aur Mulk ke deegar shahron mein munaqqid ki gayi ehtajaji rallies aur sahafion ke tamam mutalibaat ki bharpoor taayeed ka elaan kya. Unhon ney hukoomat e Hind se mutaliba kya ke Hindustan mein azaadi e sahaafat ko yakeeni banaya jaye aur hukoomat ki policies ke khilaaf sadaye ehtijaj buland karne walay sahafion ke khilaaf ki jaanay wali karwayyon par rok lagai jaye kayon ke azad sahafat sahatmand jamhoriat ke liye be had zroori hai. TNJASA ke deegar arakeen Mohammad Saifuddin , Ghouse Arsalan , Syed Zia Rahman , Mir Mohsin Ali , Mohammad Tajammul Ali Khan , Mohammad Abdul Basit, Mohammad Ameenuddin Ansari aur Abdur Rahman Mirza Baig ney hukoomat Hind se mutaliba kya ke Mulk mein azaadi e sahaafat ko yakeeni banaya jaye.
1307.title: NRI Journalists Saudi Arabia ka Hind ke sahafion se izhaar e yaganagat

news_detail: Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke qad aawar leader wo Irrigation Minister Mr. Hrish Rao ney jummay ke din Siddipet ke Ibrahimpur mein aik jalsa aam mein yeh iradah zahir karte huwe ke woh siyasat se subukdosh hojana chahta hain, sab ko hairat mein daal diya. Mr. Harish Rao ney kaha ke siyasat se kinara kashi ikhtiyar kar lenay ke bawajood maein awam ki khidmat anjaam deta rahon ga. Siyasat se khushyun ke sath subukdosh honay ki khawahish ka izhaar karte huwe Mr. Harish Rao ney kaha ke aap tamam se mujhe be panah pyar o mohabbat mila hai. Yahi meri zindagi ke liye kaafi hai. Ijlaas se khitaab karte huwe Mr. Harish Rao ney awam se kaha ke Congress Party ko vote na dein. Agar Congress ko vote dey kar Iqtedaar sonpa gaya to woh tamam industries Andhra Pradesh muntaqil kar dein ge jis se hamari riyasat ke awam ka bada nuqsaan hoga. Mr. Harish Rao jinhon ne Ibrahimpur ko adopt kiya hai pichle intekhabaat mein un ki taied o himayat karne par dehation se izhaar tashakor kiya.
1326.title: Siyasat se subukdosh hona chahta hoon: Hrish Rao

news_detail: Misar ki aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Hosaini Mubarak ke dono beyton Alaa aur Gamal Mabarak ki budunwani ke ilzaam mein giraftari ka hukum dainey walay judge ko muqadme ki samaat se door rakhney ke liye dayar kardah darkhwast manzoor kar li hai. Yeh darkhwast wakeel safai ney daayir ki hai aur fauri taur par adalat ke is faisla ki qanooni buniyaad maloom nahi hosaki hai. Cairo ki aik adalat ke judge Ahmed Abul Fatoh ney guzishta hafta ke roz Alaa aur Gamal ko Stock Market mein mobayyana utaar chadhaoo ke ilzaam mein giraftar kar ney ka hukum diya tha. Sarkari istighasa ney un dono bhaiyon sameit paanch afraad par apni Front Companies ke zariya baaz Banks ke shares ki kharidari ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha aur unhon ney is se mutaliq samjhoton se Stock Market ko aagah nahi kiya tha. Yeh paanchon afraad guzishta hafta ke roz qahira mein fouj daari adalat mein muqadma ki samaat ke douran mein haazir thae aur judge ke hukum par wahein unhein hirasat mein le liya gaya tha. Judge ney is muqadma ki mazeed samaat 20

October tak multawi kar di thi. Abhi tak yeh maloom nahi ho saka ke aaya Alaa aur Gamal Mubarak ki rihayi ke liye ab qanooni kaarwai shuru ki jaye gi ya nahi. Wazeh rahey ke Gamal Mubarak apne waalid Hosaini Mubarak ke daur e sadarat mein hukumaran jamaat ki aik ahem committee ke sarbarah rahay thae aur unhein waalid ka siyasi janasheen khayaal kiya jata tha. Un ke badey bhai Alaa Mubarak siyasat se door rahay thay lekin un par waalid ke assar wo rusookh ko baruwekar laatey huwe bhaari doulat kamaney ke ilzamaat aayad kiye gaye thay. Unhein 2011 mein Hosaini Mubarak ke iqtedaar ke khtama ke baad mutadid martaba thoday thoday waqfay ke baad girftar kiya jata raha tha lekin teen saal qabal unhein jail se raha kardiya gaya tha. Un se do saal ke baad 2017 mein un ke waalid Hosaini Mubarak ko bhi jail se riha kardiya gaya tha. Sabiq sadar aur un ke dono beyton ko May 2015 mein bad unwani ke aik muqadma mein teen, teen saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi thi. Un par qaumi khazana se aik Crore Euro (1.15 Crores Dollars) ki raqam sadaarti mehal ki Tazaeen o Araish par urane ke ilzaam mein muqadma chalaya gaya tha. Taham unhein jab yeh saza sunai gayi thi, iss waqt tak woh qaid ki yeh muddat jail mein poori kar chuke thae.
1339.title: Misar: Alaa aur Gamal Mubarak ki giraftari, judge ko hataane ki darkhwast Manzoor

news_detail: Aqwama mutahidda ki aik naayi report mein bataya gaya hai ke duniya bhar mein Poverty Line se neechay zindagi guzarney walon 1.3 arab afraad mein nisf tadaad bachon ki hai. Yeh baat Aqwama mutahidda ke taraqiyati Programme aur Oxford Poverty and Human Development ki janib se jumaraat ke roz jari honey walay Multidimentional Poverty Index mai batai gayi. Report ke mutabiq 104 Mumalik mein 1.3 arab aisay afraad hain jin ki darjah bandi Poverty Line se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ki hesiyat se ki gayi hai. Un mein 18 baras se kam Umar ke 66.2 crore kam seen bachay shaamil hain. Report mein kaha gaya hai ke Poverty Line se neechay zindagi guzarney walay afraad ki aksariyat yane 1.1 Arab afraad dehi ilaaqon mein rehtay hain. Dehi ilaaqon mein gurbat ki sharah shehri ilaaqon ke muqaabla mein chaar gunaa ziyada hai. Aqwama mutahidda ki report ke mutabiq duniya bhar ke ghareeb afraad mein se 83% sehraye Azam ke junoob mein Africa ke ilaqa aur junoobi Asia mein rehte hain. Report mein bataya gaya hai ke baaz Mumalik mein hukoomat ke taraqiyati mansoobon ke zariya gurbat ke khatame ke silsila mein misbat nataij ko yakeeni banaya gaya hai. Maslan Bharat mein is noeyat ke mansubon ke baais 2005  se 2016  ke darmain  27.1 crore afraad gurbat ke daire se bahar aaye. Report mein Aqwama mutahidda ke taraqiyati programme ke Director Achun Stainzer ka kehna hai ke agarche gurbat ki sharah bilkhushoos bachon mein intehai buland hai, is ke bawajood gurbat ke khatame ke liye paish Raft mumkin hai. Aqwama mutahidda har aisay shakhs ko gurbat ke daira mein shumaar karti hai jis ki yomiya aamdani 1.9 dollar se ziyada na ho. Gurbat ke khatame mein Bharat ki peshraft inteheae ahem hai. Junoob Asia  Mumalik mein sirf Maldives  hi sharah ke aitebaar se Hindustan se agay hai. 2005 se kabal Bharat mein Poverty Line se neechay zindagi buser karne waloun ki sharah 54.7 feesad thi jo ab ghatt kar 27.5 feesad hogaye hai. Is terha Poverty Line se neechay zindagi busr karne walon ki tadaad junoob Asian Mumalik mein sirf Maldives  mein hi Hindustan se kam hai aur yeh farq bhi sirf 1.9 feesad ka hi hai. Yeh sharah Nepal mein 35.4 feesad, Bangladesh mein 41.1 feesad aur Pakistan mein 43.9 feesad hai.
1350.title: Duniya mein 1.3 arab Poverty line se neechay : UN

news_detail: Mumbai . ICICI  Bank limited ne aaj kaha ke cheif executive Managing Director Chanda Kochhar ke khilaaf aik gumnaam whistleblower ke aed kardah ilzamaat ki tehqiqaat ki jaye gi. Bank ne bataya ke tehqiqaat ki qayadat aik azad fard kere ga. un ilzamaat ki jaanch ki jaye gi ke cheif executive Bank ke qawaid se mutaliq qawaid ki pasdar y nahi kartin aur un ke iqdamaat mein ‘tassadum mafadaat’ hai. Bank ko un ilzamaat ka saamna hai ke Kochhar ne mobayyana tor par video kaan group ko qarza jaat ki farahmi mein madad ki. video kaan ke banyan ne Kochhar ke shohar ki janib se qaim kardah qabil e tajdeed tawanai company mein sarmaya kaari thi. Bank ne Kochhar ki himayat ki aur un ilzamaat ko afwaah, be bunyaad aur darogh goi par mabni qarar dyatha. ab ICICI  ke board ne faisla kya ke aik panel tashkeel diya jaye jis ki qayadat aik azad fard kere ga. maamla ki qatee yaksoi ke liye tahaqeeq mein tamam pehluo ko shaamil kya jaye ga
597.title: ICICI  Bank apni CEO  Chanda Kochhar ke khilaaf shikayaat ki tahaqeeq kere ga

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Legal Metrology ke hukkaam naay itwaar ko Hyderabad ke kayi barray Multiplexes par dhave kiye aur kaha ke shehar mein 14 Multiplexes ke khilaaf 105 muqadmaat darj kiye hain. jin Multiplexes par dhave kiye gaye un mein chand barray Malls Bashmole GVK One one, prasads, Inorbit aur Manjira Mall aur deegar shaamil hain .

sarfeen ki janib se shehar ke mukhtalif Multiplexes mein mashrobat hatta pani ke liye bhi Azam tareen qeemat se zayed qeemat wusool karne ki shikayaat ki mosoli par yeh dhave kiye gaye. assistant kntrolr Legal Metrology Hyderabad, Mr. Bhaskar rau Mr. Bhaskar ready naay  dhaavon ke douran kaha ke ashya ki Azam tareen qeemat yaksaa honi chahiye. aik hi shye ke liye do alahda qeematein nahi honi chahiye. unhon naay bataya ke dhaavon ke douran hum naay paaya ke Kinley jaisay brands jo pani tayyar karte hain, pani ke aik product jo asal markt mein baicha jata hai is ki qeemat 10-12 rupay ke darmain hai, wohi pani Multiplexes mein 60 rupay mein farokht kiye jatay hain jo Metrology qawaid ke Sarih khilaaf hai. sarfeen ki shikayaat par 15 teamon naay dhave kiye. hum naay paaya ke paap corn aur soft drink glasses par nah hi qeemat aur nah wazan darj tha. hum ney Legal Metrology  (packaged commodity) Rules 2012 ke tehat muqadmaat darj kiye .

kntrolr of Metrology Mr. Akun Sabharwal naay aik bayan mein kaha ke tamam dubba band ashya par Azam tareen qeemat farokht darj honi chahiye. guzashta mah bhi mehakma naay Hyderabad mein chaar barray Malls par dhave kiye they aur qawaid ki khilaaf warzi par kiye oot lets ke khilaaf 100 se zayed muqadmaat darj kiye they. ohdedaron naay 72 laakh rupay maliyat ki ashya bhi zabt kiye they. ohdedaron naay qawaid ki khilaaf warzi karne par jaisay Azam tareen qeemat farokht se zayed qeemat par ashya ki farokhtagi aur farokht ki jaany wali ashya se mutaliq laazmi maloomat ki Adam farahmi par muqadmaat darj kiye gaye .

Telangana Metrology department naay yeh bhi kaha ke koi Sarif agar woh yeh mehsoos kere ke qawaid ki khilaaf warzi hui hai, woh watsapp number 7330774444 par ya Email: clm-ts@nic.in par apni shikayaat rawana kar saktay hain
618.title: Multiplexes mein Azam tareen qeematon se zayed vasuli ke khilaaf karwai

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer sanat Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ny aaj mehakma sanat ki salana report Hyderabad mein jari ki. is taqreeb se khitaab karte hue wazeer ny kaha ke tijarat ko sahal bananay mein Telangana pehlay rank mein hai, tea s. aayi paas sarmaya kaari ko Raghib karne mein apna rule ada kya hai. June 2015 se jab yeh tareeqa car roshnaas karwaya gaya 1. 23 laakh crore rupay ki sarmaya kaari hui hai jis mein 47 fisad guzishta maali saal ka hissa hai. unhon ny bataya ke riyasat ny majmoi reyasti gharelo pedawar ( jee s d pi ) mein 10. 4 feesad farogh haasil kya hai jabkay salana qaumi ost 6. 6 feesad raha hai. Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ny kaha ke qaumi majmoi gharelo pedawar par Telangana ki maeeshat ka hissa barha hai jo saal 2017-18 mein 4. 37 feesad tha jabkay yeh 2016-17 mein 4. 28 feesad tha. wazeer ny kaha ke 2017-18 ke douran TSIIS kalidi infrastructures ke sath 148 Insdustrial Parks farogh dyie aur 460 sanaton ke liye 195. 25 crore rupay allot kiye.
1266.title: Telangana ki majmoi gharelo pedawar GSDP mein 10. 4 feesad farogh : KTR

news_detail: Mutahidda Arab Amarat ke walii ehad aur mulk ki executive council ke chairman al Sheikh Mohammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan ney dar-al-hukoomat Abu Dhabi ki taiz raftaar iqtisadi taraqqi ke teen sala programme ke tehat 50 arab darham 13. 6 billion dalrke iqtisadi package ka elaan kya hai. amarat ki sarkari khabar rasan agency” vam” ke mutabiq mutahidda arab amarat ke saddar al Sheikh khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan ki hadaayat par executive council ke sarbarah o deputy sprim commander mutahidda arab amarat musallah afwaj al Sheikh Mohammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan ney 90 roz ke andar andar teen sala iqtisadi programme ki tafseelaat jari karne ka faisla kya hai. is iqtisadi programme ke tehat Abu Dhabi mein buneyadi dhanchay ki taamer, tosee, chhootey, darmiyanay aur barray sanati, samaji, iqtisadi aur khidmaat ke shoba mein soul sector ko ziyada se ziyada sarmaya kaari ke mawaqay faraham karna hai

Amarati hukoomat ki taraf se Abu Dhabi mein taraqiyati shoba mein sarmaya karon ki hosla afzai ke liye kayi purkashish iqdamaat ka bhi elaan kya gaya hai. jin companiyon ko Abu Dhabi mein apni services ke liye do saal ke qiyam ki ijazat di gayi hai inhen muft work permit jari kiye jayen ge. is ke ilawa sh_hrmin taraqiyati shobay mein kaam mein dilchaspi rakhnay wali farmon aur sarmaya karon ko un ki pasand ke shobo mein kaam ke liye fori ijazat naame jari kiye jayen ge. taraqiyati shobay mein kaam aur sarmaya kaari ka mahol peda karne ke sath sath al Sheikh Mohammad bin Zayed ney muqami shehrion ke liye hakoomati aur public sector mein aglay paanch saal tak kam se kam rozgaar ke 10 hazaar mawaqay peda karne ke bhi ehkamaat sadir kiye gaye hain. mazeed bran Sheikh Mohammad ney yeh bhi hadaayat di ke khangi shoba ke suppliers ke baqaya jaat ki yaksoi mein sar-at peda ki jaye aur tibbi nighdasht aur taleem ke shoba ke ilawa baldi umoor ki behtari ke liye iqdamaat kiye jayen. teesri hadaayat mein Sheikh Mohammad ney hukum diya ke anfrastrkchr, rehaishi, tijarti vsnati jayidadon ke liye building rigolishnz par nazar sani ki jaye taakay laagat ko kam aur Abu Dhabi ki shehri trqyat mein taawun kya jasakay. unhon ney ayko torazm ko bhi farogh dainay ki hadaayat di.
1283.title: Abu Dhabi ki barq raftaar taraqqi ke liye 50 arab darham ka package

news_detail: Guzashta roz tawanai ke Israeli wazeer ney aik aisa bayan diya jis par mashriq e wastamein aik nai hal-chal dekhnay mein aayi hai. Israeli wazeer ney inkishaaf kya ke Lebanon aur Israel ke darmain sarhadoon ke tanaza ke hal ke liye America salisi ki koshishen kar raha hai. un ke is bayan ke baad tavajja aik baar phir Lebanon ki dakhli soorat e haal ki taraf mabzol hogayi hai. yeh khabrain bhi aa rahi hain ke America tail ke badlay Lebanon aur Israel ke darmain sarhadoon ka tanaza hal karne ke liye apna kirdaar ada karna chahta hai. zaraye ka kehna hai ke Lebanon aur Israel buri aur behri sarhadoon ke taayun ke liye tail ko bah tor waseela istemaal kar saktay hain. dono mumalik tail ke mushtarqa mansoobon ke zariye yeh masla hal karne ki salahiyat rakhtay hain .

yeh paish Raft aik aisay waqt mein samnay aayi hai jab Israel ki taraf se yeh kaha ja raha hai ke Lebanon ney Albloken mein oil field 6 aur 9 mein tail ki talaash ke liye ahem marahil tey karliye hain. Israel Lebanon ke un mansoobon ko mutanazia qarar day kar un par apna haq jatlane ki koshish kar raha hai. labnani hukoomat ke aik zimma daar zareya ney apni shanakht zahir nah karne ki shart par’ Al Arabia dot net’ ko bataya ke haal hi mein qasr ke maqam par aik ahem ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein labnani saddar mishl Aun , wazeer e azam Saad Hurairi aur parliment ke speaker Nabia buri ke bajaye director general security umoor major general abbas ibrahim, aqwam mutahidda ki aman fouj ‘Unifiel’ ke rabitakaar Brigedier Amen Farhaat, aur Brigedier Rouli Faris ney shirkat ki. is ijlaas mein America ki taraf se paish ki gayi is tajweez prghor kya gaya jis mein Lebanon aur Israel ke darmain tail ke mushtarqa mansoobon ke badlay sarhadoon ke taayun ki baat ki gayi hai. zaraye ka kehna hai ke fariqain yani Israel aur Lebanon bil wasita honay wali baat cheet mein ghair sarkari tour par is terhan ki tajaweez par pehlay bhi ghhor karte rahay hain magar ab yeh bazabta ajlason mein zaire ghor tajweez ban chuki hai. zaraye ka kehna hai ke tail ke badlay sarhadoon ke taayun ki Amrici tajweez par baat cheet misbet simt mein agay barh rahi hai. Israel ney Lebanon ke baaz mutanazia ilaqon se inkhilah par amaadgi zahir ki hai jab ke khushki ke 13 mutanazia maqamat mein se 8 par fariqain mein moahida tey pagya hai.
1296.title: Tail ke badlay Lebanon-Israel sarhadoon ke taayun ka Amrici formula

news_detail: Mumbai. Bombay High Court ne ” Whatsapp” par bheje gay qanooni notice ko kaghazi notice ke barabar qarar day dyahe, Muaziz adalat ne yeh faisla credit card ke na dahindah Sarif ke khilaaf aik case mein diya jis ke zimma aik laakh 17 hazaar rupay wajib alada hain. times of India ke mutabiq Bombay High Court ke justice Mr. Gautam Patel ne douran samaat kaha ke Whatsapp par bheje gay qanooni notice ko is liye qanooni tasleem karte hain ke is service mein blue tick (neelay nishaan) se pegham padhne ki nishandahi hojati hai. credit card ke defaulter Sarif ke khilaaf darkhwast guzaar ne muaqqaf ikhtiyar kya tha ke Rohidas Jadhav Nami defaulter Sarif ne apni rihahish tabdeel karli thi, jis ki wajah se usay adaigi ka qanooni notice is ki rihahish gaah par nahi bheja ja saka tha taham Sarif ka phone number online tha aur is ka yeh number hamaray record mein bhi mojood tha. isi bunyaad par credit card ke defaulter Sarif Rohidas Jadhav ko pi d f file aur pegham ki shakal mein Whatsapp par usay qanooni notice bheja gaya, jisay unhon ne nah sirf dekha balkay file down load bhi ki. Muaziz adalat ne Dur khwast guzaar ka uzar tasleem karte ho ye Whatsapp par bheje gay qanooni notice ko qanooni tasleem karliya. company ke wakeel Mr. Murlidhar Kale ne kaha ke chunkay Sarif ne apni rihahish gaah tabdeel karli thi is liye inhen majaburan online app ke zareya notice bhejna para. tafseelaat ke bamawajib jadho 2010 mein 85, 000 rupay ke credit card baqaya jaat ada shudni tha. masalihati amal ke tehat inhen 8 feesad sood ke sath raqam ada kardainay ki hadaayat di gayi thi. jab woh raqam ada karne mein nakaam hogaye to bank ne manzoora award par amal-dar-aamad ke liye 2015 mein aik darkhwast amal-dar-aamad daakhil ki. is waqt taq yeh raqam 1. 17 laakh rupay taq jap_hnchi. guzashta do barson se bank, jadho ko tanaza se mutaliq notice jari karne koshan tha chunke unhon ne apna kiraya ke makaan ki rihahish ko muntaqil karliya tha. qawaid yeh bayan karte hain ke notice shakhsi tor par ya registered post ke zareya rawana ki jaye. qanoon information technology ke nifaz ke baad jo electronic murasilaat ko shahadat ke tor par tasleem karta hai, adalaton ne fariqain ko tanaza mein riwayati tareeqa car ke ilawa email ke zareya notice rawana karne ki ijazat di hain. Jaria saal ke awail mein Dehli ki aik metropolitan magistrate ki adalat ne gharelo tashadud ke aik muqadma mein khatoon ko Australia mein muqeem –apne begana shohar ko Whatsapp ke zareya Saman rawana karne ki ijazat di thi.
1319.title: Bombay High Court :’Whatsapp’ ke zareya rawana kardah qanooni notice qabil amal

news_detail: New Delhi. hukoomat hind ke musheer e aala baraye Iqtesadiyaat Mr. Arvind Subramanian ney apni miyad ki takmeel se mahino qabal mustafi hogaye. markazi wazeer khazana Mr. Arun Jaitley ney kaha ke Chief Economic Advisor Arvind Subramanian ohda par chaar baras taq khidmaat injaam dainay ke baad America wapas lout jayen ge. Mr. Arun Jaitley ney apne Facebook ke aik post mein kaha ”woh –apne khandan ke israar par America wapas lautna chahtay hain. Unhon ney mere liye koi mauqa nahi diya aur mujhe un ki baat manni pari.”  Mr. Jaitley jo surgery ke baad hospital mein zair e ilaaj hain kaha ke Mr. Subramanian ney chand din qabal un se video conferencing ke zareya baat ki. Unhon ney kaha ”un ki wajohaat personal hain magar un ke liye nihayat hi ahem hain.” Mr.Subramanian ne jo Peterson Institute for International Economics ke senior fellow hain, 16

October 2014 ko teen baras ki muddat ke liye Hindustan ke Chief Economic Advisor ki haisiyat se khidmaat anjaam dena shuru ki thi, jis mein tausee ki gayi thi. unhon ney yeh ohda us waqt qubool kya tha jab un ke peshroo Mr. Raghuram Rajan RBI ke Governor bana diye gaye. Mr. Jaitley ney apne post mein kaha ke teen sala meyaad ki takmeel par mein ney un se khwahish ki thi ke mazeed muddat ke liye woh is ohda par barqarar rahen. is waqt bhi unhon ney kaha ke woh apne khandani taqazoon aur mojooda ohda ke darmain paase jarahay hain.
1330.title: Musheer e aala baraye Iqtesadiyaat Arvind Subramanian meyaad se qabal mustafi

news_detail: New Delhi. Note bandi ke douran mansookh shuda Notes sab se ziyada deposit karne walay Cooperative Bank ka bhartia jnta party ke qaumi saddar se talluq honay se mutaliq story Reliance ke Websites Bashmole news 18, Times Now, First Post aur new Indian Express par post ki gayi thi taham achanak hi yeh story ko htadya gaya. un Websites ne apni posts ko wapas lainay ki koi wazahat nahi ki. yaad rahay ke moodi sarkar ne 8 November 2016 ko achanak 500 rupay aur 1000 rupay qader ki currency noton ko mansookh karne ka elaan kardiya tha jis ke baad un currency noton ko Bankon ke tavassut se wapas karne ki shehrion ko mohlat di gayi thi. news agency’ aayi ae an s’ ne yeh khabar jari ki thi .

Mumbai ke aik RTI karkun ki qanoon haq aag_hi ke zareya haasil kardah maloomat ke mutabiq Ahmedabad District Cooperative Bank( ADCBI ) ne jis ke aik dayrktr bi jay pi ke qaumi saddar mister Amit Shah bhi hain, note bandi ke baad 745. 59 crore rupay maliyat ke 500 rupay aur 1000 rupay ke mansookh shuda Notes deposit karwaye jo Cooperative Banks ki janib se jama karwai gayi rqomat mein sab se ziyada hai. note bandi ke 5 dinon baad 14 November se tamam district Cooperative Bankon ko mansookh shuda Notes tasleem karne se mana kardiya gaya tha taake aisay Bankon ke tavassut se kalay dhun ke deposits ko roka jasakay. Bank ke Website ke mutabiq kayi barson se mister Amit Shah mazkoorah Bank ke Director hain. RTI Activist Mr. Manoranjan S Rai ne bataya ke Ahmed abad district Cooperative Bank ke baad dosray number par rajkot Cooperative Bank ne 693. 19 crore rupay maliyat ki mansookh shuda Notes haasil kiye they, jis ke Chairman Jayesh Bhai Vithal  bhai Rudadiya hain jo Gujrat ke Chief Minister Vijaya Rupani ki hukoomat mein cabinet wazeer hain. Un dono Banks ne Gujrat ke reyasti satah ke Cooperative Bank’ Gujrat state Cooperative Bank limited se bohat ziyada hai jis ne1.11 crore rupay ke mansookh shuda Notes wusool kiye they. un Websites ne agarchay yeh khabar post ki thi magar achanak hi un posts ko apni Websites se htadya aur is ki koi wajah bhi nahi batayi gayi.
1340.title: Khauf e Amit Shah? Mansookh- shuda currency aur Cooperative Bank se mutaliq story ko Websites se htadya gaya

news_detail: Iran mein American dollar aur sonay ki qeematein mulki tareekh mein ghair masbooq satah tak buland honay ke baad dar-al-hakoomat ke wasti ilaqa mein mashhoor ” Bazar e Tehran” mein hadtaal dekhnay mein aayi. Al Arabia dot net ki aik report ke mutabiq guzashta 40 barson mein pehli martaba aik dollar ki qeemat 90 hazaar irani rial tak poanch gayi. irani” radio zamana” ney ney media zaraye ke hawala se bataya ke bazaar Tehran mein paiir ki subah shuru honay wali hadtaal dollar ke maqabil irani currency ki shadeed giravat par ehtijaj ke taur par ki ja rahi hai. idhar irani saddar husn Rohani ki aik tasweer ney Iran mein social media ke halqon ko chairag pa kar diya hai. tasweer mein Rohani sports track suit mein dikhayi day rahay hain jis par irani halqon ney Rohani ko tanqeed ka nishana banatay hue kaha hai ke saddar malik mein ghair masbooq noiyat ke haliya iqtisadi bohraan se ghaflat bart rahay hain. dollar ki qeemat 90 hazaar rial tak pounchanay aur Rohani ki mazkoorah tasweer ke phail jane ke chand ghanton baad secron dukaan malkaan aur irani shehri ehtajaji muzahiray ke liye sarkon par nikal kharray hue. muzahireen ney is mauqa par mukhtalif siyasi aur muashi naaray bhi lagaye maslan” shaam se niklo aur hamaray haal ki fikar karo “. social media par jari tasaveer aur video clips mein hukoomat ki iqtisadi policion par gussa mein baphray hue majmuoon ko dekha ja sakta hai

yaad rahay ke Bazar e Tehran ko irani maeeshat ki sheh rigg kaha jata hai. saal 1979 hamza mein is bazaar mein honay wali hadtaal Shah Iran ki hukoomat ke suqoot ke markazi awamil mein se thi. idhar dar-al-hakoomat Tehran mein money aykschinjz ney currency ke shadeed utaar charhao ke andesha ke sabab naqad currency bilkhushoos American dollar ki khareed o farokht se inkaar kar diya hai. baaz irani shehrion ney social media par bataya hai ke qaumi currency ki qader mein shadeed giravat roz maraah ki zindagi ko barah e raast mutasir kar rahi hai aur ghizai ashya ki qeematein baqaidagi ke sath barh rahi hain. baaz logon ka kehna hai ke woh aik hafta ke liye ghizai ashya ka zakheera kar rahay hain kyun ke is douran qeematon mein izafah ka andesha hai
1351.title: Iran: “Bazar e Tehran” ki hadtaal ney Shah Iran ke suqoot ki yaad dila di

news_detail: Bhagoda sharab ka tajir Vijay Mallya jo hndstan ko Bankon ke qarza jaat ka na dehindagi Main matloob hai, aaj apni khamoshi torte hue kaha ke woh Bank na dehindagi ka Poster Boy aur awaami barhami ka nishana ban gaya hoon. Mallya jo fi al-waqt Bartania Main panah liya sun-hwa hai wahan se ikhraj ke muqadma ka saamna kar raha hai. unhoon ne ilzaam aed kya ke hukoomat aur qarz dainay walay Bankon ki imaa par CBI aur Enforcement Directorate ne un ke khilaaf mukhtalif be ja aur bain jhotay ilzamaat ke sath charge shits daakhil kiye hain. Mallya ne bataya ke unhoon ne Wazeer e Azam aur wazeer khazana dono ko 15 April 2016 ko maktubaat rawana kiye hain taakay apni baat btaskin taham dono Main se kisi ke paas koi jawab nahi aaya. unhoon ne mazeed kaha’ ‘ Main mujhe syastdanon aur media ki janib se 9, 000 crore rupay chori karkay bhaag janay jaisa mulzim banaya gaya jo kay King Fisher Airlines ko qarz dyie gay hain. chand qarz faraham karne walay Bankon ne mujhe aik danista qarz na dahindah qarar day diya gaya.’ ‘ Mallya ne jo haaliya dinon Bartania se hndstan ke ikhraj ke khilaaf apna difaa kar rahay hain, yeh bhi kaha ke Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) aur Enforcement Directorate (E D) ne un ke khilaaf charge shits daakhil kiye hain.
1360.title: Main Bank na dehindagi ka Poster Boy ban gaya hoon: Vijay Mallya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Attapur pillar number 143 ke qareeb masroof tareen sadak par 1 shakhs ka Traffic Constable ki maujoodgi mein din dhadhe qatal kardiya gaya hai. Qatal ke manazair ko muqami logon ney apne apne cellphones ke cameras mein mehfooz karliya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq chaar afraad ney Ramesh naami shakhs ko rok liya aur un mein se 1 shakhs V Kishan Goud ney kulhaadi se paey dar paey waar karte hue iss ka qatal kardiya jabkey Laxman Goud ne qaatil ke qareeb kisi ko aane se rokta raha. Baad azaan in donon ne khud ko Police ke haawale kar diya.Qaatil iss qadar barham nazar arhha tha ke woh kulhaadi se paey dar paey waar karta raha aur iss ke qareeb aanay walon ko bhi kulhaadi se darane ki koshish ki. Woh qatal ke kuch dair baad wahan ruka raha. Aik mulzim ney maqtool ko pakad kar gira diya aur dosray ney iss par paey dar paey waar kiye jabkay deegar do mulzil laathian lehratey huve awaam ko qaatil ke qareeb jaany se rokay rakhtay rahay. Aik marhala par aik naujawan ney mauqa pakar qaatil ki kamar par laat maari jis se woh ladkhada kar zameen par gir pada magar fauri uth khada huwa aur doosron ko apne qareeb aanay se rokay rakhta raha. Yeh tasalii kar lenay par ke maqtool ke jism mein jaan baqi nahi rahi, mulzimeen sadak par ghumte rahay aur kuch dair baad bikes par wahan se rawana hogaye. Qatal ka saara manzar qareebi waqay CC Tv cameras ney mehfooz karliya. Kuch dinon se masroof tareen sadkon par din ki roshni mein qatal ki waardaat mein izafah honey laga hai jis se andaza hota hai ke shahar mein aam logon ki jaan kitni mehfooz hai. Bataya jata hai ke maqtool Ramesh qabal azeen Shamsabad  Mochintal mein Mahesh Goud naami shakhs ke qatal ka asal mulzim tha. Maqtool isi qatal muqadma mein adalat mein haazri ke baad wapas lout raha tha. Bataya jaata hai ke Ramesh ne pyaar ke maamle mein Mahesh Goud ka qatal kar diya tha.
1248.title: Attapur mein din dhadhe qatal ke mulzim ka qatal

news_detail: Dehli. Supreme Court ne aaj markazi hukoomat ke Aadhaar qanoon ke fawaid ki bohat sataish ki aur is ke dastoori juwaz ko bahaal rakha. Adalat e Uzma ne darkhwast guzaron ki tashweesh ko door kya ke Aadhaar card fard ki niji maloomat sab par ayaan ho jatay hain aur markaz se kaha ke jitna jald mumkin hosakay data ke tahaffuz ke liye sakht qanoon waza kare.
