Supreme Court ne ruling di ke khangi idaray Aadhaar ke liye israar nahi kar saktay aur yeh bhi kaha ke school mein dakhlon ke liye qaumi shanakhti number yakeeni taur par laazmi nahi hai. Chief Justice Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qayadat paanch rukni dastoori bench ke Justice Mr.  A K Sikri ne kaha ke samaaj ke nazar andaaz kardah tabqa ko Aadhaar card ba-ikhtiar banata hai aur  nhen shanakht dilaata hai. Aadhaar, deegar shanakhti sadaqatnaama se mukhtalif hai chunkay is ki naqal nahi ki ja sakti. unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke Aadhaar card aur shanakht ke darmiyan aik bunyadi farq hai. unhon ne kaha ke aik martaba biometric maloomat mehfooz karli jati hain to woh system mein hamesha mehfooz rehti hain. Justice Sikri ne yeh bhi kaha ke behtar honay se behtar munfarid hona achchca hai. Unhon ne kaha ke Aadhaar indraaj ke liye you aayi d ae aayi ki janib se khafeef aabadyati aur shehrion ka biometric data ekhatta kya jata hai aur kisi dosray fard ko muntaqil nahi hota. insani Waqar ka nazriya ko faisla mein tosiay andaaz mein bayan kya gaya. Chief Justice Misra, Justice A k Sikri, Justice A M Khanwelkar, D Y Chandarchod  aur Ashok Bhushan ne Aadhaar qanoon ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwaston ki samaat ki thi aur 38 dinon taq samaat ke baad 10
May ko apna faisla mehfooz kardiya tha .
1263.title: Qanoon Aadhaar durust magar Mobile aur Bank se marboot karne ki zaroorat nahi

news_detail: Denmark mein Police ne apni aik khatoon ahelkaar ke khilaaf tahqiqaat shuru kar di hai. Iss khatoon Police ahelkaar ka qusoor yeh hai ke iss ne dar-ul-hukoomat Copenhagenmein guzishta mah chehray ke naqaab par Hukoomat ki janib se aayed kardah pabandi ke khilaaf ehtajaji muzahira ke dauran insani hamdardi ke jazbay se maghloob hokar aik naqaab posh khatoon ko galay se laga liya tha. Bartanwi khabar rasan agency Reuters ke photo grapher ne 1

August ko paish aaye is waqeye ki tasaveer bana li theen. Un mein naqaab posh khatoon Denmark bhar mein awaami muqamat par Muslim khawateen ke chehray ke naqaab odhanay par aayed kardah pabandi ke khilaaf ehtijaj ke dauran mein rooti hui nazar aa rahi theen aur unhein is khatoon ahelkaar ne bazahir dilaasa dainay ki koshish ki thi. Mulk ki hukumraan liberal jamaat Venstre ke aik leader Marks Kenth ka kahna hai ke ”iss tasweer ne Police ko ghair raza karana taur par aik bohat hi hassas noiyat ki siyasi bshes mein ulajhney par majaboor kardiya hai”. Un sahib aur dosray naaqideen ne Police ki tavajjoh Social Media par virel honay wali un tasaveer ki janib dilae thi aur uss khatoon ahelkaar ke khilaaf tahqiqaat ka mutalba kya tha. Unn ka kahna hai ke ”Police ka kaam qanoon ka nifaz hai, yeh nahi ke woh qanoon ki mukhalifat karne walon hi ke galay milna shuru hojaye” .
1277.title: Danish khatoon Police ahelkaar ke khilaaf ba-hijab khatoon se galay milnay ki tahqiqaat

news_detail: Riyadh. Saudi Majlis e Shoora ne budh ke ijlaas mein khawateen ko judge bananay aur baghair Mehram unhen safar karne ki ijazat se mutaliqa sifarishaat mustard kar dein. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Rukn e shoora Iqbal Darindari ne sifarish paish karkay mutalba kya tha ke baaligh khawateen ko apne sarparast ki ijazat ke baghair safar ki ijazat di jaye. Kuch arsay qabal iss qisam ki sifarish par kaafi hungama hwa tha. Garma garam bahes hui thi taham voting nahi hui thi. Budh ko ijlaas mein bahas hui. Security Committee ne sifarish mustard kar di. muaqqaf yeh apnaya gaya ke iss sifarish ka asal hadaf iss Shahi farmaan ke ijra ke baad khud bakhud poora hochuka hai jis mein unhon ne tamam sarkari idaroon ko takeed ki hai ke koi bhi khidmat paish karte ya khusoosi karwai mukammal karte waqt sarparast ki manzoori ka khawateen se mutalba na kya jaye. Jahan tak baghair ijazat namay ke khawateen ke safar ki karwai ka maamla hai toh iss ka talluq sirf mahakuma Passport ya wizarat r dakhila se nahi balkay un ke sath wizarat e mehnat o samaji farogh jaisay mutaliqa idaron se bhi hai. agar mehakma passport ko kisi adalat se yeh hidayat mausool hogi ke khatoon safar karne ki majaz nahi ya sarparast ki ijazat ke baghair passport jari karanay ya tausee karanay ki majaz nahi to aisi soorat mein mahakuma passport is hidayat par fauri tameel karega lehaza wizarat dakhila se iss sifarish ka koi lena dena nahi. Security Committee ke samnay baghair Mehram ke khawateen ko safar ki ijazat dainay ki sifarish ka juwaz yeh paish kya gaya ke khawateen par iss qisam ki pabandi mard o zan ke darmiyan barabari aur insaaf par qaayim Islami Shariat ke bunyadi usoolon ke manafi hai. Alawa azeen iss qisam ki pabandi laganay se khawateen ki qanooni ahliat mutasir hoti hai. Kisi ko bhi khawateen par apni marzi thopne ya uskay saath na samajh jaisay insaan wala maamla karne ka ikhtiyar nahi ya tafreeq ki koi bhi shakal apnane ka kisi ko haq nahi jabkay sarparast ki ijazat se khawateen ke safar ko bandhna Saudi nizaam e hukoomat ke manshoor ke bhi manafi hai. Manshoor mein huqooq o faraiz ke hawalay se mard o zan ke darmiyan koi farq nahi kya gaya. Itna hi nahi balkay manshoor ki dafaa 36 mein yeh baat wazeh kar di gayi hai ke ”kisi bhi shakhs ke tasaruffaat par qaid o band lagana ya usay hawalaat ya jail mein band karna kisi ka haq nahi. Aisa bahukum e qanoon hi mumkin hoga. Iss se qabl Saudi khawateen ko Judge ke mansab par faayez karne se mutaliq qarardad ke draft ke haq mein 53 arkaan e shoora ne apna faisla dediya. Draft ki manzoori ke liye kam az kam 76 arkaan ki manzoori laazmi hai. Yeh allag baat hai ke Shoora ke maatahet Islami wo Adalati umoor ki Committee ne sharai aur qanooni ahliat rakhnay wali khawateen ko adalati manasab par sarfraz kiye jaaane ki sifarish mustarad kar rakhi hai. Lateefa al Shalan, Ataa al Sabitee aur Faisal al Fazil ne sifarish paish ki thi. Al Fazil aur al Shalan ne kaha ke sifarish ke haq mein 53 votes ka aana tawaquaat se baala tar hai. Arkaan e Shoora ki voting ka nateeja tawajjuh talab raha. Tawaqqa se kahin ziyada vote aeye. Ab hum kamyaabi ke kaafi qareeb pahonch gaye hain.
1301.title: Saudi Majlis e Shoora: Baghair Mehram safar ki sifarishaat mustard

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Courtne aaj apne 1994 ki apni ruling par nazar sani karne se inkaar kardiya ke hukoomat woh zameen haasil kar sakti hai jis par Masjid taamer ki gayi. Apex Court ne iss waqt yeh ruling di thi ke namazain ya ibadaten kahin bhi ada ki ja sakti hain aur is ke liye aik Masjid zaroori nahi hai. Supreme Court ne is ruling ko wasee tar bench se rujoo karne se inkaar kardiya. Adalat e Uzma ne kaha ke agar yeh faisla kya jata hai ke faisla par nazarsani ki jaye to iss se Ayodhya tanaza muqadma ki samaat mein takheer ka shikaar hojaye gi jis ki samaat 29

October ko hogi. Supreme Courtne 1994 mein yeh kaha tha ke namaz kahin bhi ada ki ja sakti hai aur yeh ke aik Masjid iss ke liye zaroori nahi hai. Muslim fariqain ne kaha ke yeh faisla un ke liye ghair wajibi hai aur yeh ke yeh decades qadeem faisla Ayodhya mein mutanazia zameen mein kaleedi rule ada kare ga jise  2010 mein Alahabad High Court ki jaanib se teen hisson mein taqseem kardiya gaya tha. Adalat ul Aaliya ne is qaata e araazi ko jis par Babri Masjid khadi thi Hindu aur Muslim fareeqon mein baant diya tha aur asal hissa hndon ko day diya gaya. chay sadiiyon qadeem Babri Masjid ko 6 decemeber 1992 mein hndon ki mtshdd tanzeemon se talluq rakhnay walay hazaron Kaarsewak ne munhadim kardiya tha. Zameen ko teen hisson mein taqseem karne Alahabad High Court ke faisla ko Hindus aur Muslims ki janib se Supreme Courtmein challenge kiya gaya. Agar Adalat Uzma apni 1994 ki ruling par wasee tar bench par nazar sani ka faisla karti to Ayodhya mein Babri Masjid ki malkiat ke muqadma ki yaksoi mein takheer hojati aur brsraqtdar bi jay pi ko apne aik ahem intikhabi wada ki Adam takmeel par Hindus ke mtshdd groupon ke ataab ka saamna karna parta.
1315.title: Supreme Court ka 1994 ki ruling par nazr e sani se inkaar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen wo Rukn e Lok Sabha Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne aaj kaha ke hukoomat yeh ta-assur dainay ki koshish kar rahi hai ke Talaq Biddah(bayak waqt teen Talaq) Muslim khawateen ko adal dilaata hai jabkay haqeeqat is ke khilaaf hai. Iss Ordinance ke nifaaz ke baad se Muslim khawateen ki zindagi ajeeran ban jaye gi. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne aaj daralslam mein aik press conference se khitaab karte hue kaha ke is Ordinance ki ru se shawahid ki farahmi shikayat kunindah khatoon ke supurd ki gayi hai jo iss ke liye nihayat hi mushkil hai. Isi tarha iss Ordinance ke mutabiq Talaq dainay wala shohar, apni mutalqa biwi aur bachon ke liye Maintenance ada karne ka paband hoga. Unhon ne istegfsaar kya ke jab kisi fard ko teen baras ke liye jail ki saza suna di jati hai to woh kaisay jail mein rehtay hue mutalqa biwi aur bachon ke masarif ada karne ka mukallif hoga? Aur jab woh shakhs teen saal ki saza bhugat kar jail se bahar aaye ga to kya yeh khatoon iss ka istaqbaal kar paye gi aur woh kya usay qubool karle ga? Jail ki saza khatam honay ke baad kya yeh dono aik khushaal zindagi basar kar paeinge? Unhon ne kaha ke agar hukoomat ko waqai aisi Muslim khawateen se hamdardi hai to usay chahiye ke aisi khawateen ke roz marrah ke akhrajaat ki pabajayee sarkari khazana se kare aur iss ke liye ibtida mein 500 crore rupay ka fund manzoor kare. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke 2011 ki mardum shumari ke adaad wo shumaar ke mutabiq Mulk mein 24 lakh khawateen aisi hain jin ke shohar ne nah hi Talaq di aur nah hi un ki kifalat ki zimma daari bardasht ki hai. Un khawateen mein 22 lakh khawateen ghair Muslim hain. Hukoomat itni kaseer khawateen ke saath hamdardi ka muzahira kyun nahi kar rahi hai? Un ke liye kuch kayun nahi karti? Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke ghair fitri jinsi af-aal aur badkaari jo ab tak taazeeri juraim thae, Supreme Court ne inhen ghair taazeeri qarar dete hue jaayez qarar dae diya hai aur Nikah jo islam mein aik moahida hai jo deewaani noiyat ka haamil hota hai iss maamla mein taazeeri saza tajweez ki jarahi hai. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke yeh ajeeb baat hai ke agar koi ghair Muslim apni biwi ko chod deta hai to iss ko aik saal ki saza hai aur ab wohi fayel koi Muslim karta hai to uss ke liye teen saal ki saza muqarrar ki gayi hai. Unhon ne istefsaar kya ke aik jaisay jurm ke liye saza mein imtiyaaz kayun barta gaya hai. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein yeh wazahat ki ke Talaq e Biddah par Muslim khawateen Adalat e Uzma se rujoo nahi hui balkay Adalat e Uzma ke sabiq judges ne jo aik Hindu ladki ke apne walidain ki jayidadon mein uss ke hissa ke liye daayer kardah darkhwast par faisla sunaate hue yeh kaha tha ke Muslim khawateen ke sath bhi na-insafi horahee hai aur hum iss ko mafaad e aamma ki darkhwast mutasswur karte hue is ki samaat karen ge aur phir kuch NGOs aur kuch Muslim khawateen adalat se rujoo hue. Yeh wohi judge sahiban thae jinhon ne SC, ST ke khilaaf mazalim ki rok thaam ke qanoon par faisla diya tha. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ne kaha ke darasal Modi hukoomat sangeen awaami masayel jaisay corruption, mehengai waghera se awam ki tawajjuh hataane Talaq salasa ke masla ko istemaal kar rahi hai. Maulana Khalid Saifullah Rahmani ne kaha ke dastoor mein yeh wazahat ki gayi hai ke aisay qawaneen jo pehlay se mojood hain aur dastoor ke khilaaf nahi hon ge woh barqarar rahen ge. Shariat Application Act 1937 ko bhi isi liye barqarar rakha gaya tha aur qanoon ke tehat yeh tamaniat di gayi ke musalmanoon ke aayli 10 masail ki jin mein Nikah aur Talaq bhi shaamil hain, yaksoi sharai ehkaam ke mutabiq hogi. anho n ne kaha ke chor darwaaza ke zareya yeh Ordinance manzoor kya gaya hai. Jab is khsoos mein bil parliment mein paish kya gaya to oppostion partiyon ne is par aitraaz kya tha aur is ka jaiza lainay ke liye Slect committee se rujoo karne ki sifarish ki thi. unhon ne kaha kay Slect Committee se rujoo karne ki soorat mein bill ke barey mein aaraa paish karne ki Musalmanoon ko sahoolat haasil hoti thi magar Ordinance ki manzoori se qabl Modi hukoomat ne Musalmanoon ke ulama wo danishwaron se mushawarat karna munasib nahi samgha hatta ke Muslim khawateen ki kisi anjuman se bhi hukoomat ne mushawarat nahi ki. Janab Raheemuddin Ansari rukan Muslim Personal Law Board ne bataya ke Board ne Ordinance ke khilaaf kal shaam aik jalsa aam Darussalam Ground par rakha hai jis se Muslim personal law board ke zimma daar, ulama, mshaykhin aur Ikaber khitaab karen ge.
1324.title: Talaq Ordinance se Muslim khawateen ki pareshaniyan badhengi: Asad Owaisi

news_detail: Aqwam e Mutahidda mein Insani Huqooq ki Council ney Myanmar ke hawala se aik team tashkeel dainay ki manzoori dae di hai. Yeh team 2011 se Myanmar mein murtakib jarayim ke baarey mein shawahid ikathay kere gi. Un shawahid ko Mulk mein insani huqooq ki paamali karne walay anasir ke taqub mein istemaal kya ja sakta hai. Iss silsila mein jumaraat ke roz 47 arkaan par mushtamil Insani Huqooq ki Council mein raye shumari hui. Council ke 35 arkaan ney aik “khud mukhtaar mechanism” tashkeel dainay ke haq mein aur 3 ney mukhalifat mein vote diya. Iss ka maqsad Council ki janib se haqayiq jan-nay walay Commission ko paya takmeel tak pahunchana hai. Commission ke barkhilaf mazkoorah mechanism ke paas aisay shawahid hon ge jin ko fouj daari noiyat ke ilzamaat ki pairwi mein istemaal kya ja sakay ga. Nai team ki tashkeel ke liye qarar daad Austria ke zair e qayadat Europi union aur Pakistan ke zair e qayadat Islami taawun tanzeem ki janib se mushtarka taur par paish ki gayi. China, Borundii aur Philippines ney qarar daad ki mukhalfat ki jab ke saat mumalik ney voting mein hssh nahi liya. Nai team apne kaam ka aaghaz aindah chand mah mein kar dae gi.Iss douran August 2017 mein Myanmar mein shuru honay walay bharpoor Security Operation ka jaayiza liya jaye ga. Insani huqooq ki jamaaton ka kahna hai ke is operation ke nateeja mein hazaron afraad apni jaanun se haath dho baithy aur lakhoon Rohingya Musalman Bangladesh naqal e makani kar gay. geneva mein Myanmar ke safeer Kyaw Moe Tun ney is qarardad ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya. Unhon ney kaha ke qarardad ke liye guzishta mah haqayiq jan-nay walay Commission ki janib se jari maloomat par inhisaar kya gaya, un mein bahut si baatien aisi theen jin ki tasdeeq nahi ho saki. Nai qarardad ke zareya is baat ke liye raah hamwar ho gi ke United Nations, Myanmar mein jarayim ke baarey mein saboot jama karne ke wastay lakhoon dollar mukhtas kare. UN ke tahqeeq karon ke mutabiq yeh jarayim ijtimai nasal kushi aur deegar jungi jarayim ki satah tak pahonch gay thae. Ghalib gumaan hai ke is faisla ke nateeja mein Myanmar mein askari qayadat par dabaaoo mein izafah ho ga aur woh jungi jarayim ke sabab tehqiqaat ka hisssah ban jayen ge. Lehaza yeh shaksiaat giraftari ke imkaan ke khauf se Myanmar ke bahar safar karne se pahlay sochnay par majboor ho jayen gi. Mahireen ney Myanmar ki hukoomat ke jarayim par bain al aqwami adalat ke nazarsani karne ke imkaan par shukook ka izhaar kya hai. Mahireen ke nazdeek yeh iqdaam aalmi salamati Council ki manzoori ke sath mashroot hai jahan China usay veto karne ka haq mehfooz rakhta hai.
1336.title: Myanmar jarayim ke saboot jama karne UN ki Team

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) ke sarbarah Mr. Sharad Pawar ke Rafale fighter aircrafts ki maamalat mein Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki himayat karne ke dosray din Party ke General Secretary Mr. Tariq Anwar ney party ki rukiniyat aur Kathiar Lok Sabha nashist se jummay ko istefa dey diya hai. Kathiar mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe aaj Mr. Tariq Anwar ney kaha ke Rafale ladaka tayyaron ki maamalat par National Democratic Analysis ( NDA) ke ikhtiyar kardah mouaqqaf ki taayeed mein Mr. Sharad Pawar ke bayan se unhen takleef pohanchi hai. Mr. Tariq Anwar ney kaha ”Mr. Sharad Pawar ney aik Marathi news Channel ko diye gaye interview mein kaha tha ke Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi par Rafale maamalat par shuba nahi kiya ja sakta. mein bayan se ittefaq nahi karta. NCP ko deegar oppostion partiyon ke un ilzamaat ka saamna hai ke maazi mein is ney BJP ki madad karne ki koshish ki thi. Aik aisay waqt mein jab saari oppostion partiyan Rafale maamalat par aik Joint Parliamentary Committee ka mutalba kar rahi hain aur yeh aam ta assur paaya jata hai ke kuch na kuch badunwaniyan huwi hain aur NDA apne tajir doston ko madad karne ki koshish kar rahi hain, mein NCP ke moaqqaf ki himayat nahi karta. Iss liye mein ney party ke tamam ohdon ke sath sath Lok Sabha nashist se istefa dainey ka faisla kiya hai. Marathi News Channel ko diye gaye aik interview mein Sharad Pawar ney kaha tha ke awam ko Wazeer e Azam ke iraadon par koi shuba nahi hai taham wazeer e difaa Nirmala Sitharaman ki janib se Rafale maamalat mein paish kardah istadlaal ke nateeja mein awam ke zehnon mein uljan peda huwi hai.
1346.title: Tariq Anwar ney NCP aur Lok Sbha se istefa dey diya

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ke aik tareekh saaz faisla mein riyasat Kerala ke Sabari Mala Mandir mein tamam Umar ki khawateen ko dakhila ki ijazat dey di gayi. Mulk mein kayi aisay Temples hain jin mein sadiyon se koi aurat daakhil nahi huwi hai. Un Mandiron mein Kerala ka mashhoor Mandir ‘Sabari Mala’ bhi shaamil tha. Supreme Court ney khawateen ke is Mandir mein dakhla par barson se aayed pabandi khatam kar di. Chief Justice of India Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qayadat paanch rukni aaeni bench ney is maamla par samaat ke ekhtetaam par 1

August ko mehfooz kiye gaye adalati faisla ko sunaya, jis mein adalat ney Mandir mein khawateen ke dakhilay par sadiyon se ayed pabandi ko khatam kardiya. Chief Justice ney faisla sunatay huwe kaha ke ibadat karne ka haq tamam aqeedat mandoon ko diya jata hai aur sanaf (gender) ki buniyaad par is mein koi tafreeq nahi ki ja sakti. Paanch jajon mein aik Judge ney faisla se ikhtelaaf kiya. Chief Justice aur Mr. Justice A.M Khanwelkar ney chaar jajon ka faisla tehreer kiya. Qabal azeen aisi aurtain jo 10 taa 50 baras Umar ki hoti hain aur jinhein haiz aata hai un par Mandir ke ihata mein daakhil honey par imtenaa tha. Yeh aqeedah hai ke Mandir mein jin ki Moorti aistaadah hai woh Ayyappa Barhamchari thae. Chief Justice ney faisla padh kar sunatay huwe kaha ke aurtain kisi bhi ayetbar se mardon se haqeer nahi hain. Aik taraf aurton ki deviyon ke taur par pooja ki jati hai lekin doosri taraf un par thedidaat aayed hain. Bhagwan se talluq ki tauzeeh hayatiati o jismani saakht ki buniyaad par nahi ki ja sakti. Chief Justice ney kaha kay muqaddas jagah par aurton par dakhila par pabandi jinsi tafreeq hai. Unhon ney kaha ke 10-50 baras ke group ki khawateen ko dakhila se rokay rakhnay ki riwayat ko laazmi mazhabi riwayat tasleem nahi kiya ja sakta. Aqeedat, tafreeq par mabni nahi hosakti. Bhakti mein masawaat par pidrana tasawwur ko thopa nahi ja sakta. Mazhab bunyadi taur par bhakti se marboot tarz e hayaat hai. Sabarimala ki riwayat Hindu khawateen ke huqooq ke khilaaf hai. Justice Chandrachud ney kaha ke khawateen ko rokay rakhna aazdi, Waqar aur masawaat ke haq ki khilaaf warzi hai. Khawateen ko mehez is liye mahroom rakhna ke inhen haiz aata hai bilkuliya ghair dastoori hai.
1358.title: Sabari Mala mein khawateen daakhil hosaktin: S C

news_detail: Hyderabad. Congress ki zair e qayadat siyasi mahaz se naakhush Professor Kodandaram ki Telangana Jana Samithi Party ab doosri raahein talaash kar rahe hain. TJS sarbarah ab BJP ki nazrain bichaya huwe hain. Congress ki zair qayadat siyasi mahaaz ney jise azeemtar ittehaad par mahmol kiya ja raha hai, TJS ko 3 nashiston se ziyada chodney par amaada nahi hai. Zaraye ke mutabiq Professor Kondandaram ab zafrani party ki janib nazrain bichaya huwe hain. Yeh afwaah bhi gasht kar rahi hai ke Professor Kodandaram ney Bharatiya Janata Party ke senior quied Mr. Bandaru Dattatreya se khufia mulaqaat kar chukay hain. Nau tashkil shuda Telangana Jana Samithi jo paheli martaba intekhabi siyasat mein hissa lainey jarahi hai ibtida mein yeh daawa kiya tha ke Telangana ki tamam nashiston par apne umeedwaar khada kere gi magar yeh dekha ja raha hai ke TJS ke banner par muqaabla karne ke liye koi taaqatwar umeedwaar agay nahi aaraha hai. Surathaal ko bhaanp letay huwe Professor Kodandaram ney siyasi ittehaad karne ki koshish ki magar un ki partiyon ko mukhalif TRS Parties ziyada ahmiyat nahi dey rahi hain. Unhon ne haal hi mein yeh bayan diya tha ke TJS tanha TRS ko shikast dainey ke mauqqaf nahi hai taham kayi Assembly halqon mein woh tawazun par asar andza ho sakti hai, isi liye woh TRS hukoomt saazi se rokney ke liye deegar parties ke sath intekhabi mafahmat karna chahti hai. Ab deikhna yeh hai ke BJP, TJS ke sath mafahmat ke liye amaada hoti hai ya nahi aur hoti hai to woh kitni nashiston ki peshkash karti hai.
1368.title: Prof Kodandaram ki ab BJP par nazrain

news_detail: Hyderabad. Mohabbat karne walay aik jodey ney un ke waalidain ki janib se Shadi ki tajweez ko mustarad kardey ney par itwaar ko Shankarpally mein apni jaan dae di. 22 saala Yellesh aur 19 saala Lavania kuch arsa se aik dosray se payar karte thae aur dono ney faisla kiya tha ke apne waalidain ki marzi se aik dosray ke sath shadi karne ka faisla kiya tha lekin un dono ney apne apne waalidain ko bataney par un ke waalidain ney un ki shadi ki tajweez ko thukra diya. Sorat e haal se mayoos hokar Yellesh ney apne ghar ke qareeb aik darakht se phansi le kar khudkushi karli, Yellesh ki khudkushi ki ittila milnay ke fori baad ladki ney bhi khud ko aag lgali aur apni jaan dey di. Police ney khudkushi ka muqadma darj karliya.
373.title: Waalidain ke Shadi se inkaar par premi jode ne jaan dey di

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nalgonda mein ghirat ke naam par Paranay Perumala ke sansani khaiz qatal mein Malakpet ke saakin Mohammad Abdulbari ko peer ke din girftar karliya gaya hai. Yeh wohi Abdulbari hai jo sabiq wazeer e dakhla Gujrat Harin Pandya ke qatal muqadma mein giraftari ke baad bari hogaya tha. Miryalaguda Police ka kahena hai ke Abdulbari ney Amruta Varshani ke waalid T. Maruthi aur Bihar ke qatilon ke darmyiaan mushtaba Mamlat karwai thi. Police ney iss qatal ke silsila mein muqami Congresi Leader Mohammad Kareem ko bhi hirasat mein le liya hai. Yaad rahay ke Amruta Varshani  ney jo dalit naujawan Pranay Perumala  se shadi rachali thi jis se woh piyar karti thi. Perumala par khanjaron se hamla karkay is waqt halaak kardiya gaya jab woh apni haamila biwi ka checkup karwane ke baad Hospital se wapas lout raha tha. Police ka kehna hai ke is qatal ke silsila mein 7 afraad bashmool qaatil ko Bihar mein girftar karliya gaya hai. Iss qatal ke liye toli ko aik Crore rupay dainey ki peshkash ki gayi thi aur qatilon ko 18 Lakh rupay bhi ada kiye ja chukay thae. Aik Senior Police ohdedar ke hawala se Times of India ne khabar di ke ladki ke waalid Maruthi Rao ney Mohammad Kareem ke tavassut se Abdulbari se rabita qhayam kiya aur qatal ke aiwaz aik Crore rupay dainey ki peshkash ki gayi. Maruthi Rao ney paishgi ke taur par 50 lakh rupay bhi ada kar diye thae. Senior Police ohdedar ney bataya ke Abdulbari, Nalgonda ke Asghar Ali ka saathi hai aur woh bhi Harin Pandia qatal case mein bari hochuka hai. Abdulbari ko Asghar Ali ke sath Central Bueuro of Investigation ki janib se 2003 mein girftar kiya gaya tha. Un par POTA ke tahet muqadma darj kiya gaya tha. Ahmedabad ki Session Court ney 2010 mein tamam mulzimin ko bari kardiya tha aur High Court ney bhi zaireen adalat ke faisla ko barqarar rakha tha. Harin Pandia qatal muqadma se bari honay ke baad Asghar Ali aur Abdulbari ko mushtaba dehshatgard Mirza Fayaz Baig ki Police hirasat se 1996 mein faraari mein madad karne ke ilzaam mein Central Crime Station Hyderabad ney girftar karliya tha. January 2013 mein yeh dono Baig ke case se bhi bari hogaye. Nalgonda ka mutawin Abdulbari Saleem Nagar, Malekpet mein muqeem tha. Perumala ke qatal ki saazish mein Telangana Rashtra Samiti ke sabiq Rukn e Assembly Viresham ka bhi naam liya ja raha tha taham aik Police ohdedar ney kaha ke is qatal mein un ka koi role nahi hai. Mohammad Kareem aur ladki ke waalid dono dost hain aur zameenat ke mamlaat karte hain. Mohammad Kareem ki iss qatal mein girftary ke baad Congress Party ney unhen sadar town ke ohda se barkhast kardiya hai. Paranay aur Amruta ney January mein shadi karliye thae aur woh kuch dinon ke liye ruposh hogaye thae chunkay unhen dar tha ke jaan se mardiya jaye ga.
384.title: Nalgonda qatal mein Muslim naujawanon ka role!

news_detail: Adilabad. Adilabad se talluq rakhnay walay do naujawan pani ke beech Selfie lainay ki koshish mein gharq hogaye. Do mutwafi Sonu (22)  aur Sophil (23) deegar do ke saath Mohram ki rusomaat ka mushahida karne bicycle par Chandrapur zila ke Rajurah gay hue thae. Ghar wapas hotay hue jumeraat ko yeh charon Penang Mukudabad, Maharashtra mein kashti rani karne gay. Jab yeh log paani ke bichon beech pahnch gay to un mein se aik naujawan ne kashti par Selfie lainay ki koshish ki jis ki wajah se kashti aik taraf jhuk gayi aur paani mein ulat gayi. Muqami logon ne naujawanon ko gharqaab hotay hue dekh kar un ko bachanay ki koshish ki taham un mein se do pahelay hi doob chuke they. Deegar do naujawan Amir aur Irfan ko ilaaj ke liye RIMS muntaqil kardiya gaya.
1280.title: Selfie jaan lewa saabit, Adilabad ke do naujawan gharq

news_detail: Mudhole. halqa assembly Mudhole ke Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies ( IIIT ) Basar mein Engineering II year ki Taliba ney teesri manzil se chhalang lagaakar khudkushi karli. tafseelaat ke mutabiq IIIT Basar engineering saal doum mein zair taleem Anusha naami Taliba ney teen manzila imarat se chhalang laga kar khudkushi karli Taliba zila Siddipet ke mauza Mandapally ki mutawattin hai. Khudkushi ki wajah mohabbat mein nakami batayi jarahi Taliba ki kitaab se College intizamia ko aik khudkushi note bhi araamad huwa hai jisay police ke hawala kardiya gaya hai. Police ney is khusoos mein aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Laash ko postmortem ke liye sarkari hospital bhaij diya gaya hai aur mutwafi Taliba ke arkaan e khandan ko mutalla kardiya gaya hai.
1297.title: Basar IIIT ki Taliba ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Cyberabad Commissionerate mein Mailardeopally Police Station ke hudood mein Shastripuram Mainn Road par teen naamaaloom afraad ney aik workshop mein daakhil hokar hammer se hamla karkay 50 sala Amjad naami shakhs ka qatal kardiya. Sahiti Colony, Nice Hotel ke saakin Amjad plywood karkhana mein kaam kar rahay thay. Woh apne kaam mein masroof thay ke teen naamaaloom hamla aawar wahan pahonche aur un par hamla karte hue un ke sar par aik wazni hammer se waar kardiya jis ke baayes un ke sar par shadeed chout aayi aur woh barsar e mauqa hi halaak hogaye. Qatal ki ittila milnay par Inspector of Police Mailardeopally Mr. A Sataya wahan pahonch gaye aur mauqa waardaat ka mushahida kya aur ayini shahideen se ibtidayi maloomat haasil kee. Clues Team ko talabb karte hue muqaam e waardaat se shawahid ikhatta ki gayeen. Panchnama karne ke baad laash ko postmortem ke liye Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Police ney kaha ke hanooz hamla awaron ki shanakht nahi hosaki aur na hi qatal ki wajohaat ka pata chal paaya hai. Mr. Sataya ney bataya ke iss ilaqa ke CC Tv footage ke zareya hamla aawron ki shanakht ki jarahi hai.
1312.title: Shastripuram mein qatal ki waardaat

news_detail: Visakapatnam. Telugu Desam Party ke Rukn e Assembly Araku Mr. Kidari  Sarveshwara Rao aur sabiq Rukn e Assembly  Sivera Soma ko itwaar ki dopehar Dumbriguda Mandal ke mauza Thottangi mein Maoists ne golian maar kar halaak kardiya. Yeh waqea intahaa pasand tanzeem CPI Maoists ki tasees ke hafta taweel tqarib ke douran paish aaya. Maoists ne 27

September tak hafta taweel jashn mananay ka elaan kya tha. Zaraye ke bamawajib Kidari  Sarveshwara Rao jo Araku halqa e Assembly se YSRCP ke ticket par muntakhib hue thae taham baad azan Telugu Desam Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Woh aik sabiq Rukn e Assembly Mr. Soma aur deegar haamion ke hamrah Dumbriguda Mandal jarahay thae ke yeh haadisa paish aaya. Taqreeban 60 Maoists bashmool women cadre iss hamla mein mulawis hain. Bataya jata hai ke yeh qaideen ”Gram Darshini” programme mein shirkat ke liye jarahay thae ke Maoists ka aik group dehation ke saath pahonch kar MLA ki car ko rok diya. Joon hi MLA aur sabiq MLA ke Personal Security Officers gaadi se utre, un se AK 47 hathyaar chean liye gaye aur Sarveshwara aur Soma par qareeb se golian chaladi gayeen. Police ko shuba hai ke is hamla mein Maoists ki Andhra-Odehesa Border Committee ke Secretary Rama Krishna ki zair e qayadat Maoists ka group mulawis ho sakta hai. DIG Visakapatnam range Mr. Srikant ne bataya ke un ke paas waqea ke baare mein kuch maaloomat hain taham hum haqaaiq ka pata chlarhe hain. Rurel SP Mr. Rahul Dev Sharma ne kaha ke mahkuma e Police ne Naxalites ki hit list mein shaamil tamam syastdanon ko pahelay hi se notices jari kar diye thae ke dihaton ka daura karne se qabal nazm wo nasq ko agah kardiya jaye. Lekin Rukn e Assembly Kidari  aur sabiq Rukn e Assembly Soma ke Dumbriguda mandal ke daura ke baare mein Police ko aagah nahi kya gaya tha. Deegar zaraye ka kehna hai ke Maoists ne un do qaideen ko baat cheet karne ke liye talab kya tha aur jab woh wahan pahonche toh Maoists ne un par ilzaam aayed kya ke maazi mein hue encounter ke liye woh zimma daar hai jis ki saza ke taur par unhen maut ke ghaat utaar diya gaya hai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naido ne iss waqea ki muzammat karte hue mutwafi qaayideen ke arkaan khandan ko pursa diya. New York rawaangi se qabal unhon neh Police ke ohdedaron se tabadlah khayaal kiya. Unhon ne kaha ke jamhoriat mein tashadud ki gunjaish nahi hai.
1333.title: Maoists ne MLA aur sabiq MLA ko golian maardien

news_detail: Podili. Zila Prakasam ke Podili  mandal mein mangal ki subah aik bada haadsa tal gaya, 80 bachon ko le jaaney wali Bus ulat gayi taham sirf chaar bachay hi zakhmi huwe, muqami logon ney bachon ko Bus se nikaal liya. Gitanjali English Medium School ki yeh Bus Maarripodi mandal ke mauza Pannur se bachon ko le kar Podili mandal ke Viswanthapuram le jarahi thi. Bus mein route ke villages se talluq rakhnay walay 80 bachay pahelay hi se sawaar ho chukay thae, Katurivari Palem mauza ke qareeb aik culvert par Driver ney Bus par qaboo khodia aur Bus sadak ke kinare ludakh kar ulat gayi. Qareebi khaiton mein kaam karne walay muqami log wahan pahonch gaye aur bachon ko fauri Bus se nikaal liya. Chaar bachay is haadesa mein zakhmi hogaye aur unhen Ambulance mein Podili Hospoital muntaqil kiya gaya. Talba ke Parents jo muqam e haadisa pahonch gaye thae School intezamia par ilzaam aayed kiya ke 120 bachon ke liye sirf aik Bus istemaal ki jarahi hai. Unhon ney yeh bhi ilzaam aayed kiya ke driver Subaiah nihayat hi la parwah hai aur woh musalsal gadi chillatay huwe Mobile Phone par baatein karta rehta hai. Principal Bhagya Laxmi ney haadisa aur walidain ke ilzamaat par tabsarah karne se inkaar kardiya.
1344.title: School Bus ulat gayi magar bara haadisa tal gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Attapur pillar number 143 ke qareeb masroof tareen sadak par 1 shakhs ka Traffic Constable ki maujoodgi mein din dhadhe qatal kardiya gaya hai. Qatal ke manazair ko muqami logon ney apne apne cellphones ke cameras mein mehfooz karliya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq chaar afraad ney Ramesh naami shakhs ko rok liya aur un mein se 1 shakhs V Kishan Goud ney kulhaadi se paey dar paey waar karte hue iss ka qatal kardiya jabkey Laxman Goud ne qaatil ke qareeb kisi ko aane se rokta raha. Baad azaan in donon ne khud ko Police ke haawale kar diya.Qaatil iss qadar barham nazar arhha tha ke woh kulhaadi se paey dar paey waar karta raha aur iss ke qareeb aanay walon ko bhi kulhaadi se darane ki koshish ki. Woh qatal ke kuch dair baad wahan ruka raha. Aik mulzim ney maqtool ko pakad kar gira diya aur dosray ney iss par paey dar paey waar kiye jabkay deegar do mulzil laathian lehratey huve awaam ko qaatil ke qareeb jaany se rokay rakhtay rahay. Aik marhala par aik naujawan ney mauqa pakar qaatil ki kamar par laat maari jis se woh ladkhada kar zameen par gir pada magar fauri uth khada huwa aur doosron ko apne qareeb aanay se rokay rakhta raha. Yeh tasalii kar lenay par ke maqtool ke jism mein jaan baqi nahi rahi, mulzimeen sadak par ghumte rahay aur kuch dair baad bikes par wahan se rawana hogaye. Qatal ka saara manzar qareebi waqay CC Tv cameras ney mehfooz karliya. Kuch dinon se masroof tareen sadkon par din ki roshni mein qatal ki waardaat mein izafah honey laga hai jis se andaza hota hai ke shahar mein aam logon ki jaan kitni mehfooz hai. Bataya jata hai ke maqtool Ramesh qabal azeen Shamsabad  Mochintal mein Mahesh Goud naami shakhs ke qatal ka asal mulzim tha. Maqtool isi qatal muqadma mein adalat mein haazri ke baad wapas lout raha tha. Bataya jaata hai ke Ramesh ne pyaar ke maamle mein Mahesh Goud ka qatal kar diya tha.
1355.title: Attapur mein din dhadhe qatal ke mulzim ka qatal

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi nazaad 25 sala naujawan ko jummay ke din Hyderabad pahonchanay par apni muashuqa ka mazhab tabdeel kerwatay hue shadi ka jhansa dainay ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya gaya hai. Rachakonda police ne Safdar Abbas Zaidi ko aik 25 sala khatoon ko dhoka dainay ke ilzaam mein uss waqt giraftar karliya jab woh Dubai se wapas Hyderabad lauta. Malkajgiri Police ke mutabiq arushifa ka saakin Zaidi Dubai mein rehaish pazeer hogaya tha, khatoon se iss ki mulaqaat uss waqt hui thi jab yeh dono Hyderabad mein Software Company mein kaam karte thae. Jald hi dono mohabbat mein giraftar hogaye aur aik dosray se taluqaat istewwar karliye. kuch waqfa ke baad Zaidi Dubai ke liye muntaqil hogaya aur uss ki girlfriend bhi kuch dinon baaubai chali gayi chunkay ladke ne shadi karne ka wada kya tha. Iss ke baad ladki ne apna mazhab tabdeel karte hue islam qubool karliya chunkay mulzim ne kaha tha ke shadi ke liye aisa karna zaroori hai. Hatta ke dono ke khandan iss shadi ke liye amaada thae aur Jaria saal April shadi ki tareekh taye kar di gayi thi, taham kuch mah baad iss joday mein ikhtilafat ubharna shuru hogaye jis ke nateeja mein shadi mansookh kar di gayi. Shikayat ki asaas par Police ne IPC ki daf-aat 376 (asmat raizi ki saza), 417 (dhoka dahi ki saza) aur 420 (fraib aur ahadshikni bashmool jaedad ki muntaqili) ke tahet muqadma darj karliya aur mulzim ki talaash ka notice jari kya. Jummay ke din Hyderabad Airport par pahunchnay par mulzim ko girftar karte huve adalti tehweel mein day diya gaya .
1367.title: shadi ka jhansa dainay par NRI giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Cyberabad Police ne naabaalighon ke sath jinsi jarayim karne ki padaash mein 2 Teachers ko hirasat mein le liya hai. 2 asatiza Syed Akbar (55) aur d Santosh kumar (25) ko Police ne hafta ke din do alag alag cases mein giraftar karliya. Aik mulzim Syed Akbar government uppar primaray school Muchintal, Shamsabad mein Headmaster ki haisiyat se farayiz anjaam dey raha tha. Iss ne taaleem mein taawun karte hue aik sabiqa taliba ke sath taluqaat istewaar karliye. Baad azaan iss ne ladki ka aghwaa karte hue usay qilah Golconda le aaya aur khufia taur par iss ladki se shadi karli aur usay jinsi taur par harasan karna shuru kardiya tha. Doosra mulzim Santosh jo St. Agatha model school Sanathnagar mein teacher ki haisiyat se kaam karta hai, ishhq ke naam par dasvin jamaat ki aik Taliba ko phansa aur aur is ka jinsi istehsal kya. Iss ne ladki ko aik cell phone tohfa diya aur rafta rafta usay pyar ke daam mein phaans liya. Jab mutasirah lad ki ke walidain ne phone par un ki baton ka notice liya. Iss ne ladki ko apne rishta daaron ke ghar le gaya aur 12 dinon tak usay wahan Mahruse rakha aur is douran is ladki ka jinsi istehsal karta raha. Cyberabad Police ne un dono ko naabaalighon ke sath jinsi ziyadati karne ki ilzaam mein qanooni ahteyati hirasat (PD Act) ke tahet giraftar kya. Cyberabad Police Commissioner Mr. V Sajjanar ke mutabiq dono teachers ko giraftar karliya gaya. Unhon ne kaha ke un do teachers ne pyar ke naam par na baligh ladkiyon ko phaans kar un ka jinsi istehsal kya hai jis ki wajah se aam logon ka usatza par etemaad mutazalzal hogaya hai aur iss se saari tadrisi bradari ki tazleel hui hai. Iss tarha ke waqeat se deegar larkiyan nah sirf khaufzadah hain balkay school jane mein khud ko ghair mehfooz samajhney lagi hain.
1374.title: jinsi ziyadation par 2 Teachers ke khilaaf PD Act

news_detail: New Delhi. Professor Varavara Rao ke khandan ke aik fard ney Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke qatal ke ilzaam mein paanch Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat se Supreme Court ke inkaar par tabsarah karte huwe usay badbaqtana aur ghair mutawaqqa qarar diya. Yeh paanch Activists inn dinon apne ghar par mahroos hain. Baen baazu ke qalamkaar ko guzishta mah Pune Police ney Hyderabad se girftar karliya tha jabkay Vernon Gonsalves aur Arun Ferreira ko Mumbai se, Trade Union Leader Mrs. Sudha Bhardwaj ko Faridabad, Haryana aur Civil Liberties leader Mr. Gautam Navlakha ko New Delhi se girftar karliya gaya tha, taham Supreme Court ki hidayat par unhen apne apne gharo par mahroos rakha gaya hai. Adalat e Uzma ney aaj Koregaon Bhima tashadud muqadma ke silsila mein paanch Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat karne se inkaar kar diya. Adalat ney kaarkunon ki fauri rihayi ki darkhwast ko bhi mustarad kar diya. Professor Varavara Rao ke nephew Venu Gopal Rao ney kaha ”yeh badbaqtana aur ghair mutawaqqa hai chunkay jis andaaz mein saari karwai chalayi gayi aur Judges ney jo rad-e-amal diya tha iss se hum yeh tawaqqu kar rahay thae ke muqadma kharij kardiya jaye ga. Adalat mein maan ghadat shawahid ke jhoot ka bhanda phoot jane ke bawajood aaj ka faisla hamari tawaquaat aur umidon ke khilaaf aaya hai.”Agarchay adalat ney madakhilat se inkaar kardiya taham is ney ghar par nazar bandi mein chaar hafton ki tausee kar di hai. Akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte huwe Professor Varavara Rao ki ahliya Hema Lata ney kaha ke hum is faisla ki tawaqqu nahi kar rahay thae. Mein aur Varavara Rao maamla ko adalat tak le jane par hamaray wukla ka shukriya ada karte hain. Adalat mein honey wali mubahis ke paish e nazar hum yeh tawaqqu kiye thea ke giraftari ka muqadma kharij kardiya jaye ga. Professor Varavara Rao ko 28
August ko Pune Police ney Hyderabad se girftar kiya tha taham 30

August ko Supreme Court ki Hidayat par inhen ghar par Mahruse rakha gaya hai. Mr. Vinu Gopal ney kaha ke Professor Varavara Rao aur deegar ke khilaaf darj muqadma ko barkhast karne Bombay High Court ya Hyderabad mein High Court se rujoo hon ge.
1250.title: Activists ki giraftari mein madakhilat nahin: SC

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana ki Caretaker Government mein wazeer aab paashi Mr. Harish Rao aaj aatishbazi haadesa mein uss waqt bach gaye jab woh Sangareddy zila mein intikhabi muhim ke hissa ke taur par nikaali gayi aik bike Rally mein hissa le rahay thae. Wazeer ke istaqbaal ke liye ki jarahi aatishbazi ke baayis ilaqa mein phail gaye kaseef dhuwen ki wajah se Rally mein bhagdad much gayi. Ptakhon ki wajah se ilaqa mein badi door tak dhuwan phail gaya tha. Rally mein shaamil chand gadiyon ko ptakhon se nikalney wali aag bhi pakad li jis ki wajah se afra tafri phail gayi. Iss haadsa se honay wali bhagdad ke baayis kayi gaadi ranon ney apni gadiyaan chod kar bhaag khaday hue. Ptakhon se nikalney walay kaseef dhuwen mein Wazeer bhi phas gaye thae taham un ke gunmen ney unhen mehfooz taur par bahar nikaal liya .
1265.title: Harish Rao aatishbazi haadsa mein bach gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Charminar par safai aur sthrayi ko yakeeni bananay Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) ke iqdamaat ke samraat haasil honay shuru hogaye hain. Markazi hukoomat ney tareekhi imarat’ Charminar’ ko soch Bharat mission ke tehat ‘Special Swach Iconic  Places’ qarar diya hai. Peenay ke pani aur safai ki wizarat 2

October ko New Delhi mein Commissioner GHMC Mr. M. Dana Kishore ko Swach Bharat Mission ke chaar sala tqarib mein yeh award paish kere gi. Charminar ko dosray marhala mein Swach Iconic Places mein shaamil kya gaya hai. Aik arsa se nazar andaaz kiye janay ke baad Charminar Pedastrian Project ko maujooda Telangana hukoomat ney shuru kya tha aur iss par khusoosi tavajjhu di thi. Iss Project ke kaam aik waqt taizi se shuru hue thae magar aik baar phir yeh sust rawi ka shikaar hogaya hai .
1287.title: Charminar ko qaumi award

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabadi nazaad 25 sala naujawan ko jummay ke din Hyderabad pahonchanay par apni muashuqa ka mazhab tabdeel kerwatay hue shadi ka jhansa dainay ke ilzaam mein girftar karliya gaya hai. Rachakonda police ne Safdar Abbas Zaidi ko aik 25 sala khatoon ko dhoka dainay ke ilzaam mein uss waqt giraftar karliya jab woh Dubai se wapas Hyderabad lauta. Malkajgiri Police ke mutabiq arushifa ka saakin Zaidi Dubai mein rehaish pazeer hogaya tha, khatoon se iss ki mulaqaat uss waqt hui thi jab yeh dono Hyderabad mein Software Company mein kaam karte thae. Jald hi dono mohabbat mein giraftar hogaye aur aik dosray se taluqaat istewwar karliye. kuch waqfa ke baad Zaidi Dubai ke liye muntaqil hogaya aur uss ki girlfriend bhi kuch dinon baaubai chali gayi chunkay ladke ne shadi karne ka wada kya tha. Iss ke baad ladki ne apna mazhab tabdeel karte hue islam qubool karliya chunkay mulzim ne kaha tha ke shadi ke liye aisa karna zaroori hai. Hatta ke dono ke khandan iss shadi ke liye amaada thae aur Jaria saal April shadi ki tareekh taye kar di gayi thi, taham kuch mah baad iss joday mein ikhtilafat ubharna shuru hogaye jis ke nateeja mein shadi mansookh kar di gayi. Shikayat ki asaas par Police ne IPC ki daf-aat 376 (asmat raizi ki saza), 417 (dhoka dahi ki saza) aur 420 (fraib aur ahadshikni bashmool jaedad ki muntaqili) ke tahet muqadma darj karliya aur mulzim ki talaash ka notice jari kya. Jummay ke din Hyderabad Airport par pahunchnay par mulzim ko girftar karte huve adalti tehweel mein day diya gaya .
1302.title: shadi ka jhansa dainay par NRI giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Cyberabad Police ne naabaalighon ke sath jinsi jarayim karne ki padaash mein 2 Teachers ko hirasat mein le liya hai. 2 asatiza Syed Akbar (55) aur d Santosh kumar (25) ko Police ne hafta ke din do alag alag cases mein giraftar karliya. Aik mulzim Syed Akbar government uppar primaray school Muchintal, Shamsabad mein Headmaster ki haisiyat se farayiz anjaam dey raha tha. Iss ne taaleem mein taawun karte hue aik sabiqa taliba ke sath taluqaat istewaar karliye. Baad azaan iss ne ladki ka aghwaa karte hue usay qilah Golconda le aaya aur khufia taur par iss ladki se shadi karli aur usay jinsi taur par harasan karna shuru kardiya tha. Doosra mulzim Santosh jo St. Agatha model school Sanathnagar mein teacher ki haisiyat se kaam karta hai, ishhq ke naam par dasvin jamaat ki aik Taliba ko phansa aur aur is ka jinsi istehsal kya. Iss ne ladki ko aik cell phone tohfa diya aur rafta rafta usay pyar ke daam mein phaans liya. Jab mutasirah lad ki ke walidain ne phone par un ki baton ka notice liya. Iss ne ladki ko apne rishta daaron ke ghar le gaya aur 12 dinon tak usay wahan Mahruse rakha aur is douran is ladki ka jinsi istehsal karta raha. Cyberabad Police ne un dono ko naabaalighon ke sath jinsi ziyadati karne ki ilzaam mein qanooni ahteyati hirasat (PD Act) ke tahet giraftar kya. Cyberabad Police Commissioner Mr. V Sajjanar ke mutabiq dono teachers ko giraftar karliya gaya. Unhon ne kaha ke un do teachers ne pyar ke naam par na baligh ladkiyon ko phaans kar un ka jinsi istehsal kya hai jis ki wajah se aam logon ka usatza par etemaad mutazalzal hogaya hai aur iss se saari tadrisi bradari ki tazleel hui hai. Iss tarha ke waqeat se deegar larkiyan nah sirf khaufzadah hain balkay school jane mein khud ko ghair mehfooz samajhney lagi hain.
1323.title: jinsi ziyadation par 2 Teachers ke khilaaf PD Act

news_detail: Hyderabad. Azaan International School Tolichowki mein na baaligh ladkiyon ke jinsi istehsal ke 2 waqeaat se nakhush High Court ne hafta ke din Commissioner School Education ko hidayat di ke imkanaat talaash kare ke School intizamia ko kis tarha mehkuma ki raast nigrani mein laya ja sakta hai. Adalat ul Aalia ne Commissioner School Education se kaha ke adalat ko peer tak iss baaray mein aagah kiya jaye. Azaan School ke aik taalib e ilm ke waalid Mir Yousuf Ali ki dair kardah aik darkhwast par Mr. Justice A Rajshekar Reddy ne yeh hidayat di. Darkhwast mein bayan kya gaya ke AP Educational Institutes Rules 1993 aur GO MS No. 1 of 1994 ki khilaaf warzi karte hue School chalanay par School ke Chairman aur Principal ke khilaaf koi karwai nahi ki gayi. Darkhwast guzar ki janib se paish hotay hue wakeel janab abdalmtin Qureshi ne bataya ke kisi qisam ke ahteyati iqdamaat kiye baghair taqreeban 2, 000 talba ke saath School chalaya ja raha hai. Unhon ne adalat ko aik na baaligh Taliba ke sath jinsi ziyadati ke waqea se Adalat ko waaqif kerwatay hue kaha ke phlay case mein FIR ke indraaj ke baad dosray din aisa hi aik aur waqea report huwa hai. Yeh do waqeaat zahir karte hain ke intizamia, idaara chalanay ka ahal nahi hai. Justice Rajshekar ne darkhwast mein bayan kardah nukaat par rad-e-amal zahir karte hue sharamnaak waqeat par naagawari ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke bachon ki salamati ke paish e nazar iss maamla ko aajilaana taur par nimtany ki zaroorat hai. Judge ne aayindah samaat peer ko muqarrar karte huve Commissioner se kaha ke School ko mehkuma ke raast nigrani mein laanay ke iqdamaat ki tajweez ke sath adalat se rujoo hoon.
1334.title: Azaan School ko raast nigrani mein lainay ka Laiha amal paish kya jaye: HC

news_detail: Iran ki aik Inqilab Adalat ki janib se’ fasaad fi al arz’ ke ilzaam mein teen karobari shaksiaat ko sazae maut aur badunwani ke ilzaam mein 32 ko 10 se 20 saal tak qaid ki sazayen sunai gayi hain. Irani Judicial Council ke tarjuman Ghulam Hussain Mohsini Ayji ne khabar rasan idaray ‘Irna’ se baat karte hue kaha ke inqilab adalat ki taraf se mulzimaan ko di gayi sazaon ki tauseeq ke liye cases Supreme Court ko irsaal kiye gaye hain. khayaal rahay ke Iran mein iqtisadi adalatein Supreme leader ki ijazat se Judicial Council ke Chairman ki taraf se banai gayi hain. yeh adaltin do mah qabal irani currency ki achanak giravt ke baad bana gayi theen. Insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ne Iran mein mulzimaan ko andha dhund phansi aur qaid ki sazaon par Irani iqtedaar ko shadeed tanqeed ka nishana banaya hai. Haal hi mein Irani Prosecutor General Abbas Jaffer Doulatabadi ne kaha tha ke currency ke sath utaarcharhhao ke ilzaam mein 53 afraad ko hirasat mein liya gaya tha .
1345.title: Iran mein teen taajiron ko sazae maut, 32 ko qaid

news_detail: Amravathi- Wazeer Information Technology Mr. Nara Lokesh ney naujawanon ke liye be Unemployment pension ki bawaqar scheme ‘Mukhyamantry Yuvanistam’ par jaiza ijlaas liya. Iss mauqa par Mr. Lokesh ney kaha ke ahal be rozgaar naujawanon apni darkhwasten bhaij satke hain aur har mah ki 25 tareekh tak un ko process karliya jaye ga. unhon nay kaha ke zayed az 2 lakh naujawan ‘Unemployment Pension’ ke liye ahal qarar paaye gaye hain. Unhon ney kaha ke hukoomat har account mein 3
Octobar ko  1,000 rupay deposit karwaye jayen ge chunkay 2
October ko aam tateel hoti hai .
1357.title: Andhra mein be Unemployemnet Pension 3rd  October ko

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sabiq sadar JNU Students Union Dr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke Mulk ko aik aur ghulami ki taraf dhakelnay ki mansoobah band koshishen ki jarahi hain jis ke hissa ke taur par hamare azhaan par qabza kya ja raha hai. Hamari sochon ko firqa parast banaya ja raha hai. Jhooti baatein phailai jarahi hain aur aisa maahol tayyar kya ja raha hai ke hum khud hi qusoor waar samajh batayein. Dr. Kanhaiya Kumar yahan Sundarayya Vignan Kendra mein ”Safeguarding the Constitution” par extension lecture dey rahay thae jis ka ihtimaam roznama Siasat ney kya tha. Janab Zahid Ali Khan Editor Siasat ney taqreeb ki sadarat ki. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke hamaray zahnon ko ghair haqeeqi baaton ko qubool kar lenay ke liye amaada karne mutwatir ghalat baaton ko phailaya ja raha hai. Pahlay entertainment industry ko istemaal kya gaya. Sachin Tendulkar ke zareya invertor baichnay ki koshish ki gayi to kabhi yeh daawa kya gaya ke Fair and Lovely laganay se chahrhay ka rang gora hota hai to kabhi ghee ko khalis desi gaaye ke ghee ke naam se Patanjali ka ghee baicha jata hai. Unhon ney kaha ke ab apne maqasid ko panay ke liye zaraye ablaagh ko istemaal kya jany laga hai. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke Mulk ko Parliamani jamhoriat ki bajaye sadaarati jamhoriat ki taraf dhakela ja raha hai. Iss ka asal maqsad Corporate shoba mein maujood apne chand doston ko faida pahunchana hai. Iss tarha iss Mulk ko khamoshi se dictatorship ki taraf dhkela ja raha hai. Yeh sawal khada kya ja raha hai ke Modi nahi to kaun? Unhon ney kaha ke yeh Congress ke muntakhib arkaan e Parliament par inhisaar karta hai ke Wizarat e Uzma ke ohda ke liye woh apnon mein se kis ka intikhab karte hain. Unhon ney istafsaar kya ke Modi se qabal aisa sawal kya kabhi poocha gaya? Unhon ney kaha ke Telivision Channel par teen hazaar rupay ada karte hue aik aisay fard ko laya jata hai jis ke sar par topi aur chehra par daadhi saji hoti hai, jis ko Musalmanoon ka numayinda banaya jata hai aur iss ke muqabil aik aisay shakhs ko laya jata hai jis ki peshani par aik lamba sa tilak hota hai jo Hindus ka numainda ban kar baithta hai aur darmyaan mein anchor hota hai aur yeh tenun bahes karte hain ke Mulk ka Wazeer e Azam kaun hona chahiye aur un do kiraye ke tatton ki raaye ko do firqoun ki raaye par mahmool kya jata hai. Unhon ney kaha ke aik saazish ke tahet jis mein media ka ahem rule hai, awam ko darpaish asal masayel ki taraf se tavajjoh hataane ke liye ghair ahem mauzuaat ko cheda jata hai aur be faiz mubahis kiye jatay hain. Jabkay asal masayel yeh hain ke iss Mulk ka naujawan be rozgaar hai, kisanon ko un ki fasal ki aqal tareen qeematein nahi mil parhi hain aur woh khud kashi kar rahay hain, awam ke crore ha rupay bankon se karzzzz le kar log Mulk se faraar ho rahay hain. note bandi aur jee s tea ki aarr mein ameer ghranon ko fayida pahonchaya ja raha hai. Mr. Kanhaiya Kumar ney kaha ke hamein mantaqi baheson mein uljhaya ja raha hai taakay asal masayel ki janib hamari tavajjoh mabzol na honay paye jis ke liye hamaray zahnon ko firqa parast banaya ja raha hai. Mahol kuch aisa paida kya jarha hai ke hum be rozgari, badunwanyon aur Mulk ki salamti jaisay ahem masayel ki taraf tavajjoh dainay ki bajaye, firqa parasti ka shikaar ban kar nafrat ka muzahira karne lagen. Unhon ney kaha ke Modi hukoomat mein guzishta saadhe chaar barson mein aisay aisay siyah karname anjaam diye gaye hain ke un ka ihata karna mushkil hogaya hai. Unhon ney kaha kay Britishers ney Mulk par hukmarani karne ke liye phoot daalo aur hukoomat karo ka harba ikhtiyar kia tha aur aaj unhin ki policy ko agay badhate hue tavajjoh hatao aur hukoomat karo ki policy ko ikhtiyar kya gaya hai. Inn dinon yeh koshishen ki jarahi hain ke Dastoor ki rooh ko khatam kardiya jaaye jis ke zariye chand makhsoos gharanon ko fayeda pahonchaya jaaye. Students leader ney kaha ke aaj zaroorat iss baat ki hai ke hum un saazishon ka shikaar ban’nay ki bajaye hum mein ittehaad paida karen aur Mulk ko nuqsaan pahoanchanay wali taqaton ke khilaaf uth khaday hon. Nafrat ka jawab nafrat se nahi diya ja sakta zahanat se dena hoga aur aapasi mohabbat ke zareya hamein yeh saabit karna hoga ke hum jazbati naaron ka shikaar nahi banin ge. Lecture ke baad samayeen ke sawalaat ke jawabaat dete hue kaha ke Mulk mein nafrat ka jo mahol peda kya ja raha hai is ke pas e parda saazish ko samjhna hoga. Ab yeh waqt munasib nahi hai ke Rahul ya Owaisi ji se sawal kya jaye balkay yeh waqt Modi se sawal karne ka hai, unn se aik aik paayi ka hisaab poochnay ka hai. Editor Siasat janab Zahid Ali Khan ney sadarat ki aur kaha ke Hyderabad Ganga Jamuni tahzeeb ka aik qadeem shaher hai. Yahan ke log aapas mein mil jul kar aisay rehtay aaye hain jaisay chaar so barson se Charminar, apne haath uthaye yeh dua kar rahay hon ke ae parwardigaar Hindu, Muslim, Sikh aur Eisaai ko yahan phalnay phoolnay ka mauqa faraham kere. Jabkay sabiq Rukn e Parliament Mr. Aziz Pasha aur riyasati Secretary CPI Mr. Chada Venkat Reddy ney bhi mukhatib kya.
1366.title: Hamaray azhaan par qabza ki koshishen: Kanhaiya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Caretaker Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ney un se numayindagi karne walay Jamat e Islami ke wafad ko yeh tayaqun diya ke Telangana Rashtra Samithi apne intikhabi manshoor mein Aqliaton ke liye Sub Plan ka elaan kere gi aur Aqliaton ki behbood ke liye mawazna mein khatir khuwa gunjaish faraham ki jaye gi.
1375.title: Aqliaton ke liye Sub Plan rakhney KCR ka Jamat e Islami se wada

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib saddar jamhooria ko cheif justice sprim court Mr. justice deepak Misra ka ehatasab karne ki notice paish kar di gayi hai. malik ke 7 oppostion partiyon ke 64 arkaan parliment ne aaj naib saddar jamhooria o sadrnasheen ewaan baala ( Rajia sabha ) Mr. vinkya nayido ko cheif justice of India Mr. justice deepak Misra ke khilaaf tehreek ehatasab paish ki hai. yeh pehal sprim court ke kal ke faisla ke paish e nazar ki gayi jis mein Sohrab Aldeen farzi encounter muqadma ki samaat karne walay si bi aayi ke khusoosi judge Mr. bi each lohya ki pur asraar mout ki azadana tehqiqaat karne ke mutalba ko mustard kardiya gaya. saat oppostion partiyon se talluq rakhnay walay 64 arkaan parliment ki dastakhat shuda aik notice Mr. vinkya nayido ko hawala ki gayi jis mein cheif justice of India ka muhasba karne ka mutalba kiya gaya. notice ehatasab par dastakhat karne walon mein congress, an si pi, si pi am, si pi aayi, samaaj waadi, b_hojn samaaj party aur muslim league se talluq rakhnay walay arkaan parliment shaamil hain. senior congress quied Mr. Kapil Sibbal ne kaha ke notice mein muhasba ke liye cheif justice ke manfi rawayya ki 5? wajohaat paish ki gayi hain. yaad rahay ke Rajia Sabha mein tehreek ehatasab paish karne notice ko kam az kam 50 arkaan ki taied zurori hai jabkay lok sabha mein paish karne ke liye 100 arkaan ki taied zurori hai. sadrnasheen Rajia sabha ko jab tehreek ehatasab paish kar di jati hai to woh is ki merritt ka jaiza letay hain ke aaya ewaan baala mein yeh notice paish ki jani chahiye ya nahi. Mr. couple Sibbal ne notice ki hawalgi ke baad baat karte hue kaha ke jab se justice Misra aeye hain tab se un ke rawayya par sawalaat uth rahay hain, jis ki misaal sprim court ke chaar jajon ki / 12 January ki press conference hai. tashweesh ki baat yeh hai ke chaar jajon ki yad dasht tareeqa car ki yaksoi nahi ki gayi. Mr. Sibbal, sprim court ke senior chaar judges ki January mein ki gayi press conference ka hawala day rahay they. unhon ne kaha ke muhasba hi wahid rasta hai. congress quied ne kaha ke notice tehreek ehatasab par dastakhat karne walay arkaan parliment ki fikar mandi yeh hai ke jamhoriat kamzor par jaye gi. hum chahtay hain ke hamaray dastoori nutt work ke dhaaray mein yeh din kabhi nah aeye. notice paish karne se qabal quied oppostion Rajia sabha Mr. ghulam nabi azad ne tamam oppostion partiyon ke numaindon se mulaqaat ki jinhon ne feb mein sadr e jamhuria hind Mr. Ramnath Kovind ku darkhwast paish ki thi jis mein judge lohya ki pur asraar mout ki tahaqeeq karne ka mutalba kya tha. cheif justice Mr. justice Misra ki barkhastgi ki notice ke liye sprim court ke jajon ki press conference ka hawala diya gaya .
378.title: Cheif Justice ke khilaaf tehreek ehatasab ki notice Naib Sadr e Jamhuria ko paish

news_detail: Bangalore- Karnataka BJP ke sarbarah Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke agar BJP ke qaumi saddar Mr. Amit Shah inhen ijazat den to woh cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf halqa assembly bdami se muqaabla karne ke liye tayyar hain. Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke party ke qaumi saddar ki swabdid par hai ke bdami se cheif Karnataka ke khilaaf kon muqaabla kere. agar un se kaha jaye to woh Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf apni qismat azmaane tayyar hain aur agar woh kisi aur ko muqaabla karne ke liye kahin ge to woh muqaabla kere ga. Chikmagalur mein akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Mr. Yeddyurappa ne kaha ke yeh to yakeeni hai ke halqa assembly bdami se hamara umeed waar taaqatwar hoga jo cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ko shikast day ga. sabiq cheif Karnataka ne kaha ke BJPki qaumi qayadat ne is khsoos mein faisla krchki hai. Bagalkot ka halqa assembly dosra halqa intikhab hoga jahan se cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah12

May ko munaqqid shudani intikhabaat mein muqaabla karen ge. woh Mysore ke halqa assembly Chamundeshwari se muqaabla kar rahay hain. dosray halqa intikhab se muqaabla ke baray mein tajassus ko khatam karte hue samgha jata hai ke Mr. Siddaramaiah 24

April ko halqa assembly bdami se bhi apna parcha namzadgi daakhil karen ge. halqa assembly bdami se cheif Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ke khilaaf BJP ke sabiq Chief Minister Yeddyurappa ke muqaabla karne ki paish qayasion ke darmain BJP ke rukan Parliament Mr. B. Sri Ramulu ne kaha ke woh party faisla ki tameel karen ge. unhon ne kaha ke bdami se muqaabla karne ke baray mein hamari party qayadat faisla kere gi aur party ke aik paband discipline fouji ki terhan hum party faisla ka ehtram karen ge aur agar party mujhe kisi aur halqa se muqaabla karne ke liye kahe gi to mein is ki tameel karoon ga. Chief Karnataka Mr. Siddaramaiah ne jinhon ne Chamudeshwari se pehlay hi apna parcha daakhil kar chukay hain akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha ke un par baghal coat aur vjye poora ke muqami party qaideen ka dabao hai woh bdami halqa assembly se bhi muqaabla karen chunkay is se is regain mein congress ki kamyabi ke imkanaat barh jatay hain. yeh poochnay par ke bdami se un ke khilaaf rukan parliment Mr. Sri Ramulu  ko BJP maidan mein utaarnay ka iradah rakhti hai to cheif Karnataka ne kaha ke inhen faisla karne dijiye, mujhe koi khauf nahi ke mere khilaaf kon umeed waar hai. unhon ne kaha ke Chimandeshwari ke raye dahindon ne pehlay hi yeh un ke haq mein apna vote dainay ka tye kar chukay hain .
1281.title: Chief Minister Karnataka ke khilaaf muqaabla karne Yeddyurappa tayyar

news_detail: Mulk mein kayi siyasi partiyan barson se aayi IT se wabasta aur engineering pas e manzar rakhnay walay qaideen rakhti hain jo aala ohdon tak bhi puhanche hain jin mein Chief Minister Goa Mr. ManhoarParikar, Congress ke Mr. Jai Ramesh aur Rashtriya Lok Dal ke Mr. Ajit Singh bhi hain

New Delhi . Indian Institute of Technology ke farigh 50 Engineers ke aik group ny apni apni mlazmton ko tark karte hue darj fehrist aqwam, darj fehrist qbayil aur deegar pasmandah tabqaat ke haqooq ke liye jad-o-jehad karne aik nai siyasi party banam’ ‘ b_hojn azad party’ ‘ qaim ki hai. party ko election commission of India ki manzoori kaantzar hai. Dehli ke cheif mnstr mister aravind Kejriwal ki’ aam aadmi party’ ke qiyam aur Dehli qaumi dar-al-hakoomat par Iqtidaar haasil karne ke kayi barson baad yeh party wujood mein aa rahi hai. mister Kejriwal bhi Indian Institute of Technology Khargapoor ke farigh hain. Election Commission of India ki manzoori mil janay ke baad yeh bahhar se –apne siyasi safar ka aaghaz kere ga. b_hojn azad party aindah Assembly intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ka iradah rakhti hai jo saal 2020 mein muqarrar hai. yeh siyasi group 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein muqaabla karne ka iradah nahi rakhta. IIT Delhi se 2015 ke graduate Mr. Navin Kumar ka kehna hai ke hum ko yi ujlat mein intikhabi amal mein shaamil hotay hue un chand chhootey siyasi group ki terhan nahi ban-na chahtay hain jin ke azaim to barhay hain magar imkanaat mohom hain. 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein hissa lainay ka hamara koi iradah nahi hai Albata hum 2020 hamza mein munaqqid shudni Assembly intikhabaat mein munazzam andaaz mein maidan mein atrin ge. hamari party ka registration hojane ke baad hum hamari party ke zilai aur bock units qaim karen ge jo hamaray matloob groups par maidan mein kaam karna shuru kar dein ge. unhon ny kaha ke hum kisi siyasi party ya nazriya ke khud ko mukhalif ke tor par paish nahi karna chahtay hain balkay hum –apne nazriaat se awam ku waaqif krwayn ge. malik mein kayi siyasi partiyan barson se IIT se wabsta aur engineering pas manzar rakhnay walay qaideen rakhti hain jo aala ohdon taq bhi puhanche hain jin mein Chief Minister Goa Mr. Manohar Parikar, Congress ke Mr. Jayram Ramesh aur Rashtriya Lok Dal ke Mr. Ajeet Singh bhi hain .
1298.title: IIT ke Engineers ki siyasi party

news_detail: New Delhi. Naib Sadar jamhooria hind o sadrnasheen Rajya sabha Mr. am Venkaiah Naiduney aaj Chief justice Supreme Court Mr. justice deepak Misra ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza ko mustard kardiya. Naib Sadar jamhooria ney kal itwaar ko mahireen dastoor o qanoon se congress ki zair qayadat 7 oppostion partiyon ki janib se paish kardah tehreek muwakhza ka mukhtalif pehluo se jaiza liya tha aur aaj tehreek muwakhza ko mustard kardainay ka elaan kya tha. bataya jata hai ke Naib Sadar jamhooria ney Attorny General Mr. K. K. Vinugopal, sabiq judge Supreme Court Mr. B. Sudarshan Reddy aur Rajya Sabha Secretriat ke senior ohdedaron se notice par mushawarat ki thi. Mr. M. Venkaiah Naidu ney –apne daura Hyderabad ko mukhtasir karte hue kal Dehli poanch gaye they. Congress Party sameit 7 oppostion partiyon ney jummay ke din sadrnasheen Rajya Sabha se mulaqaat karte hue 64 arkaan Parliament ki dastakhaton ke sath Chief Justice Supreme Court ke muwakhza ke liye notice paish ki thi jis par un 7 arkaan Rajya Sabha ki bhi dastakhaten shaamil theen jo haal mein apni miyad poori kar chukay hain. tehreek muwakhza par dastakhat karne walay arkaan parliment ka talluq congress, NCP, CPM, CPI, BSP aur Muslim league se hai. Congress ki zair e qayadat oppostion partiyon ney aik be nazeer iqdaam mein Supreme Court of India ke khilaaf ilzamaat aed karte hue un ka muwakhza karne ki appeal ki thi. azad hind stan ki tareekh mein pehli martaba Chief Justice of India ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza paish ki gayi thi. sadrnasheen Rajya sabha ki hesiyat se Mr. Venkaiah Naidu ko yeh ikhtiyar haasil hai ke woh tehreek mawakhiza qubool kere ya mustard kere, taham senior advocate Supreme Court Mr. Prashant Bhushan ney istafsaar kya ke Naib Sadar jamhooria ney kin bunyadon par tehreek muwakhza ki notice ko mustard kya hai ?
1313.title: Chief Justice of India ke khilaaf tehreek muwakhza ki notice mustard

news_detail: Lucknow-BJPke liye Lok Sabha aur UP Assembly intikhabaat mein be waqat saabit honay walay Uttar Pradesh ke sarkardah qaideen par 2019 ke aam intikhabaat mein takiya karne par markazi qayadat amaada nazar nahi aati hai. reyasti tanzeem aur srkarki kasrat ke darmain, Wazeer e Azam nerinder moodi aur party ke qaumi saddar, Amit Shah khud lok sabha intikhabaat se qabal yahan ki zameen naapen ge aur mahol peda karen ge. Amit Shah ka jahan raatain gaon mein busr karne ka programme ban raha hai wahein Wazeer e Azam nerinder moodi bhi taraqiyati programon ke bahanay you pi ke chakkar kaatetay rahen ge. Gorakhpur aur Phoolpur ke zimni intikhabaat mein shikast ke baad, BJPqayadat Uttar Pradesh ke baare mein bohat ziyada fikarmand hai. samaaj waadi party aur b_hojn samaaj party ke darmain intikhabi mafahmat aur dohri mukhalif hukoomat lehar ke khatrah ko bhi BJPmehsoos kar rahi hai. sab se barri pareshani yeh hai ke aindah intikhabaat mein agar Uttar Pradesh se muntakhib honay walay umeedwaron ki tadaad mein zabardast kami aati hai to is ki pabajayee kahin aur se karni mushkil hai. shumali hind mein BJPaik aitbaar se –apne urooj par hai avrjnobi reyaston mein khatir khuwa maqboliat haasil nahi hopayi hai, isi liye party Uttar Pradesh mein har haal mein 2014 hamza mein kiye gaye muzahira ka iada karna chahti hai jis ke liye moodi aur Shah ney yahan ki zimma daari –apne kaandhon par uthany ka faisla kya hai. BJPke aala zaraye ka kehna hai ke party ke qaumi saddar, riyasat ke har zone mein raat busr karna shuru kar dein ge. tanzeemi aitbaar se bi jay pi, Uttar Pradesh mein 6 zones rakhti hai. Amit Shah har zone mein kam az kam do gaon mein shab bisri zaroor karen ge. aisay dehaton ka intikhab kya jaye ga jahan dlt aur pasmandah tabqaat ki abadi ghalib ho. markazi o reyasti hukoomaton ki schemaat par tabadlah khayaal ke ilawa party kaarkunon ke sath ghhor o khoz aur zameeni satah par party ke moaqqaf ka jaiza lena jaisay umoor bhi Amit Shah ke ayjnd_h ka hissa hon ge. deegar qaumi qaideen aur naamwar chehray bhi yahi tareeq car ikhtiyar karen ge. nawway ke diye mein bhi isi terhan ‘Gaon Chalo Abhyan’ jaisay programme party kamyabi se injaam day chuki hai. Shah ki is pehal se party tanzeem aur hukoomat par behtar amal aawri ka dabao bhi bana rahay ga .
1325.title: Amit Shah gaon mein shab bisri ka iradah rakhtay hain

news_detail: New Delhi . hukoomat Delhi naay Delhi aqliati commission ( d am si ) ko aagah kiya hai ke muslim asateza ko school auqaat ke douran jummay ki namaz ada karne ki ijazat nahi di ja sakti. d am si ke chairman mister Zafar ul Islam Khan ka kehna hai ke Delhi hukoomat ke mehakma taleem naay aik darkhwast par tehreeri jawab mein kaha hai asateza jummay ki namaz ke liye’ ‘ apni classen chore kar’ ‘ nahi jasakte kyunkay is se’ ‘ talba ke mafadaat ko nuqsaan puhanche ga.’ ‘ unhon naay mazeed bataya ke mehakma taleem ka kehna hai ke qawaneen mein narmi nahi ki ja sakti, classes aik bujey dopehar shuru hon gi aur asateza ko 12 bjkr 45 minute par school pohanchna hoga. wazeh rahay ke nai Delhi schools ke muslim asateza naay namaz jummay ki adaigi ke liye Delhi aqliati commission se rujoo hotay hue inhen namaz jummay ki adaigi ke liye riayat dainay ki khwahish ki thi jis ke jawab mein commission naay is masla par mehakma taleem aur teen baldiyat se jawab talabb kya tha. mister Zafar Al Islam naay bataya ke baldiyat se jawab masool hona hai. mister Khan naay kaha’ ‘ asateza naay hamein bataya ke markazi wizarat dakhla ka 1954 hamza ka hkmnamh jo yeh kehta hai ke mulazmeen apni thankhowa se kuch minhai karte hue ebadaat ke liye jasakte hain. hum naay wizarat dakhla ko maktoob bheja hai yeh jan-nay ke liye ke aya ye qaida hanoz qabil itlaq hai ?’ ‘ unhon naay bataya ke wizarat dakhla se jawab hanoz wusool nahi sun-hwa hai.
1337.title: Jummay namaz ke liye asateza ko waqfa nahi. Dehli hukoomat ka moaqqaf

news_detail: Gujarat assembly ke speaker Mr. rajndr Trividi ney itwaar ke din dlton ke peshwa Dr.  B. R. Ambedkar ko barhaman qarar daitay hue aik naya tanaza khada kardiya hai. gandhi nagar mein’ megha Barhamin Business Summit’ se khitaab karte hue kaha ke aik qabil hasti ko barhaman qarar dainay mein koi qabahat nahi hai. Dr. B.R. Ambedkar ko barhaman kehnay mein mujhe koi taraddud nahi hai. aik qabil fard ko barhamin kehnay mein koi qabahat nahi hai. is tanazur mein Wazeer e Azam Mr. Narendra Modi ko bhi mein barhaman kehta hon .

Mr. Trividi aik aur qadam agay barhatay hue kaha ke lard raama aik Kshatriya they aur karishna aik OBC ( deegar pasmaanda tabqaat mein se ) they. bi jay pi ke rukan parliment Mr. Udit Raj ney Trividi ke remarks par sakht tanqeed ki avr kaha ke un ke remarks qabil aitraaz aur ghair mutawaqqa hai. inhen andaza nahi hai ke is terhan ke remarks karte hue unhon ney party ko na qabil talaafi nuqsaan pohanchaya hai. aik ittila ke mutabiq itwaar ko Gujarat ke anaa se talluq rakhnay walay dlton ke aik group ney budh mat ikhtiyar karliya tha. unhon ney id-daa kya ke yeh faisla is liye kya gaya ke inhen hindu tasleem nahi kya jaata aur manadir mein daakhil honay se roka jata hai. Udit Raj ney ijtimai to ray par dlton ka budh mat ikhtiyar karna aik’ khatarnaak sorat e haal’ hai, jis ki asal wajah samaji Adam masawaat hai. unhon ney kaha ke wajah samaji na-insafi hai, moonchh rakhnay par bhi dlton ko petta ja raha hai. mein nahi jaanta ke un ke paas is ka mutabadil kya hai. qabal azeen aisa hi aik waqea krnatk ke Kulbargi zila mein paish aaya jahan 60 dlt khandano ney budh mat ikhtiyar karliya.
1348.title: Gujarat Speaker ney B.R. Ambedkar aur Narendra Modi ko barhamin qarar diya

news_detail: Srinagar. BJP se talluq rakhnay walay jammu o Kashmir ke naye deputy cheif mnstr Kavindar Gupta ny –apne ohda ka jaiza lainay ke din hi kthoah asmat raizi o qatal waqea ko mamooli waqea qarar diya. jammu o Kashmir ki kabeena mein rdo badal ke aik ghanta ke andar hi deputy cheif mnstr Kavindar Gupta ny Kathua mein aik na baligh larki ki mutawatar asmat darri karne ke baad qatal kar diye janay ke waqea ko mamooli qarar diya jabkay is andohnak aur insaaniyat soaz waqea ki muzammat mein saari duniya mein muzahira kiya ja raha hai. Rasana aik choti si baat hai. hamein sochna chahiye ke aindah is ka iada nah honay paye aur larki ko insaaf miley. hukoomat ko is noiyat ke kayi challenges ka saamna hai. mister Gupta ny akhbaari numaindon se kaha ke hamein رسانا ko ziyada bhao ( ahmiyat ) nahi di jani chahiye. Kathua ke moza Rasana mein aik na baligh larki ke aghwaa, nasha aawri, ijtimai asmat raizi aur qatal ke ilzaam mein girftar logon ki taied mein nikaali gayi Rally mein BJPke sabiq wazraa ki shirkat par payi janay wali barhami o narazgi ke baad phir isi masla par naye deputy cheif mnstr ny yeh qabil aitraaz remark heran kun hai. is waqea ki mutasirah aik na baligh muslim larki thi jabkay tamam mlzmin ka talluq hindu tabqa se hai. zaani o qatilon ki taied mein hindu yaktaa munch ki nikaali gayi Rally mein shirkat karne walay Kathua ke rukan assembly Rajiv Jasrotia ki kabeena mein shirkat par aitraaz kya ja raha hai. Hindu yaktaa munch ki Rally mein shirkat par do BJPwazraa laal singh aur Chandra prakash ko istifa dainay par majaboor hona para tha. BJPqayed Ram Madhav ny id-daa kya ke jammu vkshmir ki kabeena mein rdo badal ka talluq Kathua waqea se qatee nahi hai. hamari hukoomat ny Iqtidaar ke teen baras mukammal karliye they is liye hum ny kabeena mein tabdeeli ka faislah kya aur do naye cheharon ko shaamil kya. are s s se talluq rakhnay walay 59 sala Kavindar Gupta ku Nirmal Singh ki jagah mehbooba mufti ke naib ke tor par kabeena mein shaamil kya gaya hai .
1363.title: Kathua asmat raizi waqea aik chhota waqea : naye Deputy Chief Minister jammu o Kashmir

news_detail: Hyderabad. shehar ke aik are tea aayi jahdkaar Rakesh Reddy Dubbudu aur un ki team ki janib se Wazeer e Azam ke androon mulk doroon par kiye gaye tajzia se inkishaaf hota hai ke Wazeer e Azam mister Narendra Modi ny ghair bi jay pi Iqtidaar wali reasatain jaisay Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Odhisa aur West Bengal riyasaton ka bohat kam dora kya, is ke barkhilaf BJP ki zair Iqtidaar reastain jaisay gujrat, maharashra aur utar pardesh ka mutadid martaba dora kya. Wazeer e Azam ki Website par mojood data ke tajzia se yeh bhi inkishaaf hota hai ke Modi ke beshtar androon mulk doray un reyaston ke doray aisay mauqa par kiye gaye jab un reyaston mein intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. Modi ny sab se ziyada gujrat ka dora kya jahan se woh talluq rakhtay hai jis ke baad utar pardesh ka dora kya jahan ke aik assembly halqa Waranasi se woh lok sabha mein numaindagi karte hain. raakesh ready Dubbudu ke mutabiq ziyada tar log Modi ke beron mulk doroon par baat karte hain magar hum ny guzashta char barson ke douran Narendra Modi ke Wazeer e Azam ban janay ke baad un ke androon mulk doroon ka mufasil tajzia kya hai. 2014 taa 2018 ke data ke tajzia mein Narendra Modi ke sarkari doray aur niji doray shaamil hain jo unhon ny party programon mein shirkat ke liye kiye they. yeh wazeh hai ke un ke ziyada tar doray election ka saamna karne wali reyaston ke rahay hain. janoobi hind mein unhon ny sab se ziyada Tamilnadu riyasat ka dora kya. is baat ka imkaan hai ke ghair BJP Iqtidaar wali reastain Wazeer e Azam ko ziyada madoo nah kere lekin yeh baat Shahid hai ke ghair mulki wafood ki ziyada tadaad gujrat, maharashra aur Uttaraprades ka ziyada dora kiye hain. unhon ny bataya ke 2017 mein Narendra Modi ny Gujarat aur Uttarapradesh ke alahda alahda 21 doray kiye jahan reyasti assembly ke intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. 2015 mein sab se ziyada dora riyasat Bihar ka kya gyaj_han is saal assembly intikhabaat munaqqid honay walay they. isi terha Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny 2014 ziyada tar MaharashtraJammu and Kashmir , Jharkhand aur Haryana ke ziyada doray kiye jahan is saal election munaqqid honay walay they. Chhatisgarh aur Goa jahan agarchay BJP ki hukoomaten  hain magar un riyasaton mein shaamil hain jis ka wazeer e azam ny bohat kam dora kya. Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ny guzashta chaar barson mein Andhrapradesh ka 5 martaba aur Telangana ka sirf 4 martaba dora kya. Modi ny sab se ziyada androon mulk doray 2017 mein kiye jis ke baad saal 2016 mein kiye.
1371.title: Narendra Modi, intikhabaat ka saamna karne wali aur BJP Iqtidaar wali reyaston ka dora ziyada karte hain

news_detail: Bharat ki shumali aur maghribi reyaston mein rait ke tufaan ne tabahi mchadi, Rajashtan aur Uttar Pradesh mein mukhtalif hadsaat mein 100 afraad halaak ho gaye. shumali aur wasti reyaston mein chalne wali zor daar aandhi ne sab kuch tehass nehass kardiya, 130 kilometer fi ghantay ki raftaar se chalne wali hawaon ne darakhton ko jarr se ukhaar diya, bijli ke pol gir gaye, kayi gharon ki diivaaren aur chhtin bhi zamee bose hogyin. Bharti hakkaam ke mutabiq yopi ke 40 azlaa mein tufaan ke baais painsath afraad halaak hue aur 47 zakhmi hogaye, Rajashtan mein 33 afraad ki halakaton ki tasdeeq ki gayi hai. Uttar Pradesh mein sab se ziyada Agra mein sab se ziyada tabahi mchi, jahan sarkari ohdedaron ke mutabiq 36 afraad halaak aur 35 zakhmi hogaye. Uttar Pradesh mein Agra ke ilawa Bijnor, Bareli, Saharanpur, Peelibheet, Ferozabad, Chitrakot, Muzaffar nagar, Raye Bareli, Unnao azlaa mein tofani hawaon se nuqsaan pouncha hai. Rajashtan mein dhool poor zila sab se ziyada mutasir raha jahan 17 logon ki mout waqay hogayi. Dholpur mein marnay walon mein do ka talluq yopi ke Agra se hai.
1379.title: Shumali o maghribi reyaston mein rait ka tufaan, 100 se zayed halaak

news_detail: Israeli Parliament (Knesset) ki janib se rawan saal manzoor kardah naam nihaad  ‘Yahodi Qoumiyat’ ke qanoon ke khilaaf somwaar ko maqboza maghribi kinare aur androon Palestine mein mukammal hadtaal ki gayi. Hadtaal ke mauqa aur talimi aur karobari idaray band rahay aur sadkon par traffic na honay ke barabar thi. Khayaal rahay ke Israel ney chand mah qabal aik naya qanoon manzoor kiya tha jis ke tahet sehyoni riyasat ko poori duniya ke Yahudion ka ‘Qaumi Watan’ qarar diya gaya tha. Falasteeni awam aur aalami satah par Israel ke is mutanazia qanoon ke khilaaf sakht ehtejaj kiya gaya Jordon River ke maghribi kinare, shumali aur junoobi Falasteeni ilaaqon mein bhi hadtaal ki gayi. Iss mauqa par sadkon par traffic na honey ke barabar thi jab ke karobari tabqa ney bhi hadtaal mein bharpoor sath diya. School, jamiyaat aur deegar aawami idaray band rahay. Naqideen aur insani huqooq ki tanzeemon ka kahna hai ke ‘Yahoodi Qoumiyat’ ka qanoon sehyoni riyasat ko nasal parast bananey ki taraf aik nayi paishraft saabit hoga aur is qanoon par amal daari se Israel mein abad ghair Yahoodi aqwam ke bunyadi haqooq pamaal karne ki raah hamwar hogi. Taham Israeli hukoomat ka muaqqaf hai ke woh mojooda Israeli tshkhs ko bahaal karne ke liye is qanoon ki manzoori tak pohanchi. Albata naqideen usay arab aqliat ke khilaaf nasal parasti aur jamhoori aqdaar ki nafi ka qanoon qarar dete hain.
1276.title: Israel ke ‘Qoumiyat ka Qanoon’ ke khilaaf Palestine mein aam hadtaal

news_detail: Sweden ki aik adalat ney Nobel Academy mein jinsi harasani aur asmat raizi ke scandal ke markazi kirdaar French citizen Jean-Claude Arnault ko qusoorwaar qarar dey kar 2 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. Stockholme ki zilai adalat ke judge ney apne faisla mein kaha hai ke ”accused asmat raizi ka qusoorwaar qarar paaya gaya hai. Is ney 5
aur 6

October 2011 ki darmiyani shab is jurm ka irtikaab kiya tha. Iss ko 2 saal qaid ki saza ka hukum diya jata hai. Majrooh fareeq ke nuqsaan ka azaala kardiya gaya hai”. Stockholm ke aik cultural center ke sarbarah Jean-Claude Arnault ke khilaaf 18 aurton ney jinsi hamlon aur harasani ke ilzamaat ayed kiye thea. Yeh sahib aik Maroof saqafati shakhsiyat hain aur Sweden ki Nobel Academy se wabasta thae. Aik qanooni firm ko un sahib ke Academy par asraat ki tehqiqaat ke liye kaha gaya tha. Adalat ney un mein se aik aurat ke ilzaam par mulzim ko mujrim qarar diya hai. Mr. Claud ke khilaaf guzishta saal aurton ko jinsi tor par harasan karne aur un par jinsi hamlon ke ilzamaat manzar-e-aam par aanay ke baad Nobel inaam baraye adab ke teen judge sahibaan apne ohdon se mustafi hogaye thae. Wazeh rahay ke 18 arkaan par mushtamil Nobel Committee mein shaamil judge sahiban ka sharayet ke tahyat taqarrur kiya jata hai aur fanni taur par unhein committee ko khairbaad kehney ki ijazat nahi hoti hai. 1989 mein teen Judges ney Academy se mustafi honey ka elaan kar diya tha aur unhon ney yeh faisla Academy ki janib se Iran ke rehbar e inqilab Ayat Allah rooh Allah khmini ki muzammat mein bayan jari nah karne par kiya tha lekin Academy ney un ka istifa Manzoor nahi kiya tha. Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini ney tab tauheen aamaiz kitaab ” shaytani ayaat” ke musannif Salman Rushdi ke khilaaf qatal ka Fatwa jari kiya tha.
1291.title: Nobel Academy mein asmat raizi, mulzim ko 2 saal ki saza

news_detail: Iraqi Parliament ki janib se Barham Saleh ko sadar muntakhib kiye janey ke chand ghantay baad Adel Abdulmahdi ko wazeer e azam muqarrar karte huwe inhen cabinet tashkeel dainey ki dawat di gayi hai. 76 sala Abdul Mahdi Brijwazia khandan se talluq rakhtay hain. Un ka khandan maazi mein siyasat mein sargaram raha hai. Un ke waalid Iraq ke Shah Faisal awwal ke daur mein wazeer aur Parliament ke rukn bhi rah chuke hain. Abdul Mahdi ney France , Syria aur Lebanon mein taleemi safar kya. Apne is safar mein unhon ney mukhtalif nazriaat ka bhi mutaleya kiya. Nationalism, ishtirakiat aur Islami afkaar un ke mutalea mein rahay. Sabiq wazeer e azam Ayaad Alavi ke daur mein woh wazeer khazana ke ohde par fayez rah chuke hain jab ke sadar Jalal Taliban ke sath naib sadar ke ohde par bhi fayez rahay magar kuch arsa baad ikhtelafat ki binaa par istefa dey diya tha. Iraqi dastoor ke mutabiq Adel Abdul Mahdi 30 din tak apni Cabinet tashkeel den ge jisay manzoori ke liye Parliament mein paish kiya jaye ga. Siyasi taur par Abdul Mahdi Iran ke haami Supreme Islami Council se talluq rakhtay hain taham un ke Amrici democrates rehnumaon ke sath bhi achay taluqaat qaim hain.
1304.title: Adel Abdul Mahdi Iraq ke Wazeer e Azam muqarrar

news_detail: New Delhi. Justice Ranjan Gogoi ney 46
Chief Justice of India ki haisiyat se ohda ka halaf liya. Woh Justice Deepak Misra ke janasheen hoon ge jo 1

October ko subukdosh huwe hain. Sadar e jamhooria Ram Nath Singh Koind ney Rashtrapati Bhavan mein Justice Gogoi ko ohda ka halaf dilaya. Wazeer e Azam Hind Narendra Modi, Speaker Lok Sabha Sumitra Mahajan, wazeer e dakhila Rajnath Singh, wazeer finance Arun Jetli, sabiq wuzraye azam Dr. Manmohan Singh aur HD Devegoda aur deegar Rashtrapati Bhavan ke Darbaar Hall mein munaqidah taqreeb mein shareek thay. 63 sala Justice Ranjan Gogoi shumal mashriqi khitta se talluq rakhney walay pahelay Chief justice of India hain. Woh is ohda par sirf 13 mah tak hi fayez rahen ge aur 17

November 2019 ko subukdosh ho jaien ge. Justice Gogoi naram go aur sakht judge ki haisiyat se jane jatay hain. Woh un chaar jajon mein shaamil thay jinhon ney Cheif Justice Misra par aik press conference mein tanqeed ki thi aur Supreme Court ke master of roster ke taur par cases ki Judges ko supurdagi mein apne role ka ghalat istemaal karne ka ilzaam aayed kiya tha. Justice  Gogoi 18
November 1954 ko paida huwe aur 1978 mein advocate ki haisiyat se apna indraaj karwaya tha. Unhon ney Gowhati High Court mein Constitution, Taxation aur Company Affirs  par practice ki thi. Inhen 28
Feb 2001 ko Gowhati High Court ka mustaqil judge muqarrar kiya tha aur 9
September 2010 ko un ka Punjab & Haryana High Court tabadlah kiya gaya tha. Justice Gogoi 12
Feb 2011 ko Punjab o Haryana High Court ke Chief Justice muqarrar kiye gaye aur 23
