April 2012 ko Supreme Court ke judge ki haisiyat se taraqqi paye.
1318.title: Justice Ranjan Gogoi 46th Chief Justice of India

news_detail: Hyderabad. Jamat e Islami ke wafad ki Caretaker Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao se mulaqaat ke chouthay din hi Congress leaders ka aik wafad captain Uttam Kumar ki qayadat mein Jamat e Islami ke daftar pahonch gaya aur aayindah intikhabaat ke ziman mein Jamaat ki taayid talab ki. Congress Leaders ney taqreeban teen ghanton tak tabadlah khayaal kiya. Jamat e Islami ke ohdedaron ke sath malik ke siyasi halaat aur muslim masail par tafseeli guftagu ki. bataya jata hai ke Jamat e Islami ke leaders ney Congress leaders par yeh wazeh kardiya ke Congress, badhti firqa parasti ke paish e nazar Hindutwa ke taiyen naram gosha ikhtiyar kya aur soft Hindutwa ka muzahirah karne lagi hai. Alawa azeen Shariat mein mudakhlat ki koshisho ko hum bardasht nahi kar saktay. Baad azan akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Captain Uttam Kumar ney kaha ke Jamat e Islami aik badi tanzeem hai aur Nusalim par is ka aaccha asar hai. Hum ney jamaat ke leaders se kaha ke Telangana mein aayindah intikhabaat se qabal yeh baat malhooz rakhen ke moodi ki hukoomat tashkeel paney ke baad malik ke halaat kya rukh ikhtiyar kiye hain. malik mein musalmanoon par hamlon mein izafah huwa hai. Agar aayindah intikhabaat mein bhi woh Iqtidaar par aajay gi to Constitution mein hi tarmeem kar dein ge. captain Uttam Kumar ney kaha ke hum ney jamaat ke leaders se kaha ke inhen yeh faisla karna hai ke Telangana Assembly riyasat mein konsi party ko Iqtidaar tafweez karna chahiye chunkay is ke asraat aam intikhabaat par bhi parney walay hain. Ameer Jamat e Islami Hind halqa Telangana & Odhisa janab Hamid Mohammad Khan ney kaha ke ijlaas mein Congress leaders ke sath awam ko darpaish masail aur Muslimske masayil par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya aur hum ney hamari jamaat katayyar kardah demand of charter paish kiye aur iss ke ahem nukaat par tabadlah khayaal kiya jin mein qaabile zikar Minorities ke liye sub-plan, tahaffuzaat ki farahmi aur taleemi farogh ke sath sath iqtesaadi taraqqi ke iqdamaat shaamil hain. unhon ney bataya ke hum mukhtalif partiyon se tabadlah khayaal ki rudaad aur partiyon ke intikhabi manshoor ko malhooz rakhtay hue apni report markazi aur qayadat ko rawana kar dein ge aur markaz ki Hadayat ki roshni mein hum yahan apna muaqqaf paish karen ge. is mauqa par Mr. Mohammad Ali Shabir aur Abid Rasool Khan bhi maujood thay
1328.title: Jamat e Islami ke daftar Congress leaders pahonch gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Nizam Hyderabad ke mashhoor Khilwat (Chowmahalla Palace) ki tazaeen e nau ka kam taiz raftari ke sath jari hai. Yeh Palace jis mein 4 chhootay chhootay mahal hain, sayyahon ke liye nihayat hi purkashish hai. Iss ki azmat e rafta ki bahaali ke liye haal hi mein Belgium ke 19 fanoos dobarah latakaye gaye hain. Mahal ki taameer taqreeban 200 saal pahelay huwi thi. Yeh Mahal apne anokhay andaaz ke tarz e taameer ke liye mashhoor hai. Iss mein tamam sarkari taqarib bashmool Nizam ki takht nasheeni ki taqarib bhi huwa karti theen. Is ke tahaffuz aur tazaeen e nau ka kaam taqreeban mukammal hogaya hai. Ziyada tar kaam rang  wo roghan aur imaarton ki marammat se mutaliq hain. Tawaqqu ki jarahi hai ke November tak yeh kaam mukammal karliye jayen ge. Rozana hazaron afraad Chowmahalla Palace dekhen ke liye purana shahar aatay hain. Palace mein Nizam Deccan ki janib se Shahi mehmanon aur sarkari mehmanon ko tahraya bhi jata tha. Yeh apne Darbar Hall ke liye bhi mashhoor hai. Iss mein Mughlia tarz ki ghumbaden, kamanain aur Irani tarz ki aster kaari, paicheeda naqqashi ka kaam bhi kiya gaya hai. Iss mein baagaat bhi lagaye gaye hain jo pur kashish hain. Islaah o marammat aur tazaeen nau ke zariye uski azmat  barqarar rakhne ki koshishen jari hain. Iss silsilay mein 35 lakh rupiye kharch kiye jayen ge. Iss kaam ke liye pesha waranah salahiyaton ke haamil karigron ki khidmaat haasil ki gayi hain jo riwayati tarz ki taknik ka istemaal kar rahay hain taakay is ke Waqar aur miyaar ko barqarar raka jasakay.
1342.title: Khilwat Palace ki tazaeen wo aarayish

news_detail: Lucknow- ” Ayushman Bharat ” scheme khat e iflaas se neechay zindagi busar karne walay khandano (Below Poverty) ke liye hai, iss se istifada karne walon ki fehrist mein Uttar Pardesh ke kaabini wazeer Satish Mahana aur un ke khandan ka naam bhi shaamil hai. Ittela milney par wazeer ney fehrist dekhney ke baad DM ko jaanch aur kaarwai ki hidayat di. Sab se badi sahat Bima Yojana ki shakal mein haal hi mein wazeer e azam Narendra Modi ney Ayushman Bharat Yujana shuru ki hai. Iss mein ghareeb gharanon ko Registered kar ke 5 lakh rupiye tak ke ilaaj ki sahoolat di jani hai. Ahliat ki mutadid sharayet hain. Un ke alawa 2011 ki BPL fehrist se bhi naam liye gaye hain magar mustahiqeen ke naamon ke intekhab mein abhi se jealsaazi shuru hogayi. Iss kaam se munsalik sarkari macinary apni marzi se logon ke naam shaamil kar rahi hai. Is ka khulasa khud wazeer Industrial Development Satish Mahana ney kiya. Darasal inhen ittela mili ke un ka aur un ke ahale khandan ka naam fehrist mein maujood hai. Iss par unhon ney DM Vijay Vishwas Pant ko phone aur khat tehreer kar ke wazeh kiya ke woh issss scheme ke mustahiq nahi, iss liye tarjeehi buniyad par unka naam hazaf karkay hajatmandon ke naam shaamil kiye jayen.
1352.title: BPL ki list mein wazeer bhi shaamil

news_detail: Madinah Munawwara. Punjab Pakistan ke shahar Gujrat ki khatoon Naseem Akhtar ney duniya bhar mein apni noiyat ka Quran pak ka munfarid nuskha Madinah Munawwara ko tohfa ke taur par paish kar diya. Yeh Quran pak ka aisa nuskha hai jisay na to qalam se likha gaya hai na is ki tayari mein roshnayee istemaal huwi hai aur na hi koi aur tehreeri maadah istemaal kiya gaya hai. Quran e pak ka yeh kaamil nuskha Pakistan ki Naseem Akhtar ney 35 baras mein tayyar kiya. Unhon ney 1987 mein kapdey par kadhai ke zareya ayaat likhna shuru kiya tha aur 2018 mein usay mukammal kiya. Unhon ney Quran pak ka aik aik harf bawazu rah kar raat ke pichlle pehar mein tayyar kiya. Unhon ney Hajj ke mauqa par Quran pak ka yeh nuskha Madinah Munawwara ke al Quran alkarim ajaayeb ghar ko tohfay ke taur par paish kiya. Zimma daraan ney geherai aur geerai se jayiza le kar usay Museum mein numayesh ke liye rakh diya. Qareeb se dekhney par hi pata chalta hai ke Quran kareem haath se nahi balkay kapdey par kadhai ke zariye tayyar kiya gaya hai. Naseem Akhtar ke haath se kapdey par kadhai se likhe gaye Quran Majeed ki 10 volumes hain aur har volume mein Quran e Majeed ke teen sepaare hain. Naseem Akhtar ka kahna hai ke unhen khushi hai ke unhon ney 32 saal qabl jis muqaddas kaam ka beda uthaya tha woh mukammal kar liya. Unhon ney kaha ‘mein ney 32 saal bawazo waqt guzaraa. Jab mein Quran e Majeed haath se kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhna shuru kiya to yahi socha tha ke Quran Majeed ke iss naadir nuskha ko mein Madinah shareef ki library mein le kar jaoongi’. Aur un ka yeh khawab poora hogaya. Naseem Akhtar ney bataya ke woh Quran e Majeed jis kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhtien woh kapda khusoosi taur par Faisalabad se mangwaati theen. Naseem Akhtar ney daawa kiya ke Quran e Majeed ka aisa nuskha duniya bhar mein kahin bhi maujood nahi lehaza un ka yeh karnaama Guinness Book of World Records mein shaamil kiya jaye. Kapdey par kadhai kar ke likhe gaye Quran Majeed ka kal wazan 55 kilo gram hai jabkay is ki har jald ki 22 inch lambai aur 15 inch choraai hai. Quran Majeed ke kal safhaat 724 hain jabkay kadhai ke liye kalay aur gulaabii rang ke dhaagay ke 84 dabbay istemaal kiye gaye hain.
1365.title: Kapdey par kadhai ka Quran pak, nuskha ab al- Quran al Karim Museum ki zeenat

news_detail: South Korea ki aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Lee Myung-Bak ko badunwani ke ilzaam mein 15 saal qaid ki saza sunai hai. Sabiq hukoomati ohdedaron ko sazayen sunaye jaaney ka yeh naya waqea hai. Maujooda hukoomat ki taraf se security affairs mein ghaflat baratney par sabiq hukkaam ko qaid aur jurmanon ki sazayen sunai jati rahi hain. Central Seol mein qayim aik adalat ney sabiq sadar Lee ko rishwat lainey aur dhoka dahi samait kayi dosray ilzamaat mein qaid ki saza sunai. Inhen qaid ke sath 13 arab von yani 1 crore 15 lakh dollar ka jurmana bhi ayed kiya gaya hai. Sabiq sadar ki adalti karwai barah e raast Tv par nashar ki gayi aur kaha gaya ke mulzim ko sakht tareen saza di jaye gi. Taham kharabi sehat ki binaa par Lee khud wahan mojood nahi thay. South Korea ke sabiq sadar par rawan saal 16

April ko rishwat, dhoka dahi aur ohda ke najaaiz istemaal par fard jurm Ayad ki gayi thi. South Korea ki adalat ka kehna hai ke gariyon ke spear parts tayyar karne wali aik company “Das” sabiq sadar ki malkiyat hai taham Lee ka daawa hai ke woh company un ke bhai ki hai. Adalat ka kehna hai ke sabiq sadar ney dhoka dahi se company ko 24 Arab von ka fayedah pohanchaya tha.
1377.title: Sabiq Sadar South Korea ko 15 saal ki saza

news_detail: England mein hakoomati ohdedaron aur aam shehrion ne 1 shakhs ka pata chalaya hai jis ney khud ko musalsal 40 saal se aik jhonpdi mein muqeed kar rakha tha. Bartanwi hakkaam ney mazkoorah shakhs ki shanakht nahi ki taham un ka kahna hai jhonpdi se nikalay jane walay shakhs ne musalsal 40 saal isi jagah zindagi guzari. Iss jhonpdi ki lambai pauney do meter 6 foot aur choraai pauney 2 meter hai. Iss shakhs ki umar 58 saal bataaye jati hai. Jab woh iss jhonpdi mein aaya to uss waqt is ki umar 18 saal thi. Mazkoorah jhonpdi shumal maghribi England mein waqay’ Cambera’ shehar ke nawahi ilaqa’ Carlisle’ mein waqay hai. Wahan se milney walay shakhs ko tibbi muaney ke liye Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya hai. Usay zaroori jismani aur nafsiati muawnat faraham ki ja rahi hai. Muqami akhbarat ke zareya se pata chala hai ke police ney aik 79 sala shakhs ko giraftar kiya hai jis par aik 58 sala shakhs ko ghulam bananey ka shuba zahir kiya gaya hai.
1383.title: England mein ek shakhs 40 saal se jhonpdi mein qaid

news_detail: New Delhi- Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke beron malik doroon ke liye fazai asfaar par ab taq hue akhrajaat ke barey mein bohat jald hi inkishaaf hojaye ga. sntrl information commission naay Air India ko Hadayat di ke Modi ke beron malik asfaar par tayyar kardah bills ke records se mutaliq tamam tafseelaat ka inkishaaf kardey, chunkay Wazeer e Azam ke beron malik asfaar ke akhrajaat sarkari khazana se ada kiye jatay hain is liye awam ko is ke barey mein jankari dainay mein koi qabahat nahi hai, usay tijarti raaz ki aad mein chupaya nahi ja sakta. sntrl information commission naay Air India ke is istadlaal ko mustard kardiya ke yeh maloomat tijarti raaz hai aur usay awaami shoba ki company amanat ke tor par chupaye rakhti hai aur qanoon haq aag_hi ke daira car se paray hai. information commissionaire Amitava Bhattacharya naay kaha ke Albata yeh istadlaal qabil qubool ho sakta hik_h Wazeer e Azam ke dora y mutaliq tawareekh, waqfa aur dora kardah maqamat ke barey mein jankari ki farahmi qanoon haq aag_hi ki dafaa 8 ya 9 ke tehat mustasna hain. yaad rahay ke aik darkhwast guzar Lokesh Batra naay 2016-17 ke douran Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ke beron malik doroon ki tawareekh, waqfa aur maqamat aur un ke asfaar par banai gayeen bills ki tafseelaat talabb ki theen jis ko Air India naay mustard kardiya tha. ibtida mein Air India naay usay tijarti raaz qarar dete hue maloomat faraham karne se inkaar kardiya taham dosray istafsaar par yeh istadlaal paish kya gaya ke Wazeer e Azam ke daftar ki Hadayat ke paish e nazar woh mazkoorah maloomat faraham karne se qaasir hai .
1282.title: Wazeer e Azam ke bairooni doroon par kharch kardah raqam ke barey mein jald hi pata chal jaye ga

news_detail: New Delhi- Supreme Court ny aaj Adhaar qanoon ke dastoori juwaz ko is bunyaad par ke is se huqooq insani aur haq posheedgi ki mumkina tor par khilaaf warzi hui hai aur is se shehri par mutawatar nigrani hoti hai, challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwaston par apni 38 yaumi samaat ke baad apna faisla mehfooz kardiya hai. cheif justice Mr. justice Deepak Misra aur Mr. justice A. K. Sikri, Mr. Justice A.M. Khanvilkar, Mr. justice D.Y. Chandardhod aur Mr. justice Ashok Bhushan par mushtamil dastoori bench ny darkhwaston par 38 dinon tak kiye gaye mubahis ke ekhtataam par aaj –apne faisla ko mehfooz kardiya. un darkhwaston par 17 January se hafta mein teen din mubahis kiye gaye. yeh istadlaal paish kya gaya ke qanoon Adhaar kisi fard ke bunyadi haq ki baadi al nazr mein khilaaf warzi kya hai. qanoon Adhaar ka majmoi asr yeh raha ke yeh’ haq posheedgi’ par asr andaaz hota hai aur data ke tahaffuz ke liye koi sikoriti nahi hai aur dastoor hind mein shehrion kohqoq insani ki di gayi zamanat ke har pehlu ki khilaaf warzi hoti hai. Adhaar number ki’ ‘ sidng’ ‘ ke liye hukoomat ka israar yani mukhtalif data bees mein Adhaar number ka indraaj ka tareeqa car. mazeed barran Adhaar number rakhnay se shanakht ke sarqa ka bhi khatrah paaya jata hai. Adhaar number ki rakhnay wala shanakhti saariq, kisi ke Adhaar ke number se marboot deegar data bees mein mehfooz maloomat taq rasai haasil karsaktha hai. yeh nuqta bhi paish kya gaya ke qanoon Adhaar, samaaj ke kamzor aur majrooh tabqaat ko dosray darjah ke shehri jaissa sulooq karta hai chunkay woh hukoomat se fawaid aur mara-aat haasil karte hain. jin logon ny fawaid haasil nahi kiye woh Adhaar haasil karne par majaboor hotay hain chunkay yeh deegar mukhtalif qawaneen se marboot hai. yeh badni artbat, shakhsi khudikhtiyari ko mutasir karta hai aur har kisi ko Adhaar rakhnay jibilli nuqs ko aksata hai. majmoi qanooni scheme baghair Adhaar ke hindustaan mein guzarna namumkin banata hai. bi jay pi ny agarchay is waqt Adhaar ki mukhalfat ki thi jab woh oppostion mein thi taham an d ae hukoomat ny Adhaar qanoon ka yeh kehte hue difaa kya ke yeh Sabiqa you pi ae hukoomat ka policy faisla thajs ny shehrion ke liye Adhaar asasi shanakht roshnaas karwai thi. mojooda hukoomat ny sirf Sabiqa hukoomat ke policy faisla ko barqarar rakha. hukoomat ny shehrion ki nigrani ke shubhat ya yeh is baabat trdidki ke wusool karne walay idaron ko faraham kya jaaney wala data ghalat jagah nahi rakha gaya is liye ke makhfi maloomat ka tabadlah nahi kiya ja sakta. adalat mein yeh bataya gaya ke Adhaar scheme ke liye jama kardah maloomat mukammal tor par mehfooz hain aur raazdari mein rakhi gayi hain aur data ki khilaaf warzi kaswal hi peda nahi hota. sirf qanoon ke ghalat istemaal ke imkanaat ki bunyaad par is ke dastoori juwaz ko khatam nahi kiya ja sakta
1308.title: Adhaar Card par Supreme Court ka faisla mehfooz

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana state antgritid common Entrance tst ( TS ICET ) 2018 ke nataij ka elaan multawi kardiya gaya jo aaj shaam jari kiye janey walay they. ab yeh nataij 10 June ko jari kiye jayen ge. TS ICET 2018 ka imthehaan 23 aur 24 May ko Telangana state council of higher education ki taraf se Kakatiya university, Warangal ney munaqqid kya tha. riyasat bhar mein 60 marakaz par jumla 61, 439 talba ney ICET ka imthehaan diya tha. yeh imthehaan Telangana ki tamam universition mein master course jaisay MBA aur MCA courses mein dakhlon ke liye munaqqid kya gaya tha. umeed waar, nataij ke zimn mein mazeed maloomat ke liye Telangana state council far higher education (TSCHE) ke website
mulahiza kar saktay hain.
1322.title: Telangana TS ICET 2018 ke nataij ka elaan multawi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Intermediate Public Advance Supplimentary Examinations munaqidah May 2018 (general/vocational) ke nataij jumma ko 10:00 bajey din jari kiye jayenge. Special Chief Secretary mehakma aala taleem Mr. Ranjive R Acharya kal 10:00 bajey din Telangana State Board of Intermediate ke daftar waqay Nampally, Hyderabad mein jari karen ge. sarkari taur par nataij ki ijrayi ke baad mukhtalif Websites Bashamool https: //tsbie.cgg.gov.in ; www.bie.telangana gov.in par mulahiza kiye jasakte hain. Secretary Telangana State Board of Intermediate Dr. A. Ashok ney bataya ke Junior Colleges ke Principals http: //admi.tsbie.cgg.gov.in par Board ki janib se inhen faraham kardah user Ids aur paaswords istemaal karte hue apne apne colleges ke nataij mulahiza kar saktay hain.
1332.title: Telangana Intermediate Advance Supplementary Examinations ke jumma ko nataij

news_detail: New Delhi. Medical Council of India ki sifarish par wizarat sahet ney mulk bhar ke 82 Medical Colleges  ku taleemi saal 2018-19 ke liye dakhla dainay se mana kardiya hai. Medical Council of India ney un Medical Institutes ke muaina ke douran Colleges mein payi janay wali mukhtalif khamion aur kotahiyon ki nishandahi ki thi. Council ney apni report mein asal wajohaat mein anfrastrkchr, fiklti aur wasail ke na kafi hona ka zikar kya tha. aik sarkari ohdedar ney bataya ke Council ki sifarish par un Colleges ko Jaria taleemi saal bachon ko dakhla dainay se baz rakha gaya hai. Jin 82 Medical Colleges par dakhla ke liye imtenaa ayed kya gaya un mein 70 khangi aur 12 sarkari Coleeges hain, imtenaa ke baais MBBS ki 64, 000 dastyab nashiston mein 10, 000 nashistain mehdood ho jaien gi. ohdedar ney bataya ke ilawa azeen hukoomat ney 68 naye Colleges ke qiyam ki tajaweez ko bhi radd kardiya hai jin mein 31 sarkari aur 37 khangi shoba ke Coleeges hain. February mein markazi cabinet ney 2021-22 taq sarkari funds se naye 24 Medical Colleges ke qiyam ke mansoobon ko manzoori di thi. ilawa azeen 58 deegar Medical Coleeges jo 2019 hamza taq qaim aur District Hospitals se judey rahen ge, un ki bhi manzoori di gayi. Telangana ke 4 Medical Coleeges ko bhi taleemi saal 2018-19 mein dakhla dainay ki ijazat dainay se inkaar kardiya gaya hai jis ke baais khangi shoba mein MBBS ki 2, 200 nashiston mein kam از kam 600 nashiston ki kami hojane ka khadsha hai. jin chaar Medical Colleges mein jinhein dakhla dainay se mana kardiya gaya hai un mein Mahavir Institute of Medical Sciences Vikarabad, Maheshwara Medical college and Hospital Medak, S V S Medical College Mahboobnagar aur Mallareddy Medical college for Women Hyderabad shaamil hain. Telangana mein teen naye Medical Colleges T R R Institute of Medical Sciences Sangaredyy, Dr. Patnam Mahindar Reddy Institute of Medical Sciences aur Surabhi Institute of Medical Sciences Medak ke qiyam ki tajweez ko wizarat ney radd kardiya hai. wizarat ke ohdedaron ney id-daa kya ke Telangana ke Medical Colleges mein dakhlon par imtenaa ke bawajood riyasat mein MBBS ki nashiston mein koi kami waqay nahi hogi chunkay Siddipet mein aik sarkari Medical college aur do Private Medical Coleeges Ayaan Institute of Medical Sciences aur RVM Institute of Medical Sciences and Reserch Center ko manzoori day di gayi jis ke baayes nashiston mein 450 ka izafah hoga
1343.title: Mulk ke 82 Medical Colleges par talba ko dakhla dainay par imtenaa

news_detail: Aik ahem iqdaam karte hue Modi sarkar ney Joint Secretary satah ki 10 jayidadon par khangi afraad ke liye darwazay khol day ye. is satah ke ohda par takarrur ke liye aik fard ko Public Service Commission ki janib se munaqqid kiye janay walay Civil Services imtehanaat mein merritt mein kamyaab hona parta hai. itwaar ko barray akhbarat mein shaya aik ishtihar ke mutabiq mehakma Personal and Training, hukoomat Hind mein senior posessions par mutwazi takarrurat karne ja raha hai. awaami ya khangi shoba mein kaam karne wala koi bhi 40 baras umar ka shakhs darkhwast day sakta hai. Mehakma Personal and Training ke ishtihar ke mutabiq 10 ghair mamooli salahiyaton ke haamil afrad ki talaash mein hai jo revenue, Financial Services, Economic Affairs, Agriculture, Cooperation & Farmers’ Welfare, Road Transport and High Ways, Shipping, Environment’ Forests and Environment Change , New & Renewable Energy, Civil Aviation aur Commerce ke shoba mein expertise hoon. yeh takarrurat teen saal ki muddat ke liye hon ge aur karkardagi behtar hogi to meyaad ko badha kar 5 saal tak kya jaye ga. un ohdon par muntakhib darkhwast gzaron ko bhi joint secretary ko di janay wali tnkhwahin di jayen gi yani 144200-218200 rupay mahana ( pey matrix ki 14 win satah ). mazeed bran woh hukoomat hind mein isi mumasil ki satah par dyie janay walay bhte aur sahulaton ke bhi mustahiq hon ge. khawahish mand umeedwaron ko 15 June taa 30 July online darkhwasten website http://lateral. nic par daakhil karni hon gi. is ishtihar ke mutabiq Neeti Ayog ney sab se pehlay khangi shoba ke afraad ke liye is terhan ke khulay takarrurat karne ki sab se pehlay tajweez paish ki thi.
1354.title: Civil Services kamyaab na bhi hon to IAS jaisay thaat baat payen

news_detail: Mutahida arab Amarat ki Cabinet ney aik nai visa saholaten aur bima (insurance) policy muta-arif karanay ki manzoori di hai jis ke tehat ab ghair mulki workers ko salana 60 Darham baimay ke liye ada karna hon ge. is se pehlay unhein 3000 Darham ada karna padte hain. Cabinet ka ijlaas UAE ke naib sadar, wazeer e azam aur Dubai ke hukmaran Sheikh Mohammad bin Rashed ke zair sadarat huwa. Cabinet ki Manzoor kardah nai bima scheme ke tehat niji shobay mein kaam karne walay Tarik einِ watan ke huqooq ka tahaffuz kya gaya hai aur is se aajron par izafi maali boojh bhi kam hoga. is se karobari idaron ko zar zamanat ki shakal mein jama karaye gaye 14 arab Darham ki raqam wapas mil sakay gi. naye nizaam ke tehat har karkun ki bima policy ki qader 60 Darham salana hogi. baimay se khidmaat ke khatmay ki soorat mein worker ko fawaid haasil hon ge, chhtyon ka allowence aur muqarrar waqt se ziyada kaam ka allowence miley ga, wajib ul ada ujrat ki adai hogi, wapsi ka ticket aur kaam ke douran zakhmi honay ki soorat mein fi karkun 20 hazaar Darham taq muawza miley ga .

Amarat ki Cabinet ney zaireen, makeeno, khandano aur malik mein zayd almeaad qiyam karne walay logon ke liye mukhtalif visa sahulaton ki bhi manzoori di hai. Cabinet ney mojooda Iqamti nizaam par nazarsani ki hai aur is ke tehat mutahidda arab Amarat mein apne walidain ke haan qiyam karne walay talba ke visas mein taleem mukammal karne ki soorat mein do saal taq tosee di jasakay gi. Cabinet ke aik naye faisla ke tehat ab mutahidda arab Amarat ke kisi bhi hawai addah par utrney walay transit musafir vn se pehlay 48 ghantay ki koi dakhla fees wusool nahi ki jaye gi aur transit visas mein sirf 50 Darham ki adai par 96 ghantay ke liye tosee karai jasakay gi. UAE ke tamam hawai adon par qaim khusoosi kaontron par yeh transit visas haasil kiye ja sakain ge. Cabinet ney zayd almeaad rehne walay logon ko raza karana taur par malik chorney ka aik mauqa dainay ke faisla ki bhi manzoori di hai. is soorat mein un ke passport par ”no entry” ki mohar lagai jaye gi. mulazmat ki talaash mein UAE anay walon ke liye chay mah ki muddat ka aik naya visa muta-arif karaya jaye ga taakay Cabinet ke alfaaz mein ”purazm log” is arsay ke douran mein –apne liye mulaazmaten talaash kar saken. Cabinet ney mutahidda arab Amarat aur roosi federation ke darmain tey shuda aik samjhotay ki bhi manzoori di hai jis ke tehat dono mulkon ke shehri aik dosray ke visas se mustasna hon ge. is se dono mumalik ke darmain taluqaat ko mazeed farogh haasil hoga.
1361.title: Amarat Cabinet ney nai visa saholaten aur Tarik eِ watan workers ke liye bima scheme muta-arif karadi

news_detail: Khawateen ke liye ab Hindustan duniya ka badtareen muqaam ban gaya hai. Jinsi tashadud, azkar rafta saqafati riwayaat aur ladkiyon ki smuggling ke baais Hindustan duniya ka khatarnaak tareen mulk ban gaya hai. khawateen ke sath jinsi ziyadati aur jabri mushaqqat ke waqeat ki wajah se Bharat ko sab se khatarnaak mulk qarar diya gaya hai. Aalami mahireen ki raye par mushtamil Thomson Reuters Foundation ke Survey mein jinsi tashadud, harasani, zehni aur gharelo tashadud sameit khawateen ko darpaish mukhtalif qisam ke khatraat par sawalaat kiye gaye. Survey fehrist ke mutabiq khawateen se ziyadati, jinsi harasani aur tashadud mein Bharat number one qarar paaya hai jabkay Afghanistan ka dosra, shaam teesra, somalia choutha aur Pakistan chhatay hain jabkay maghribi mumulk mein America wahid mulk hai jo 10 sare-fehrist mumulk mein shaamil hai. wazeh rahay ke das sare fehrist mulkon mein shaamil America wahid maghribi mulk hai. mahireen ka kahena hai ke fehrist mein pehla number zahir karta hai ke Bharat mein khawateen ke tahaffuz ke liye khatirkhah iqdamaat nahi kiye jarae hain. mahireen ne mazeed kaha ke is Survey ki zaroorat ‘Me too” muhim ke baad mehsoos ki gayi, ‘Mr too’ muhim mein duniya bhar se hazaron khawateen apne sath paish aaye jinsi harasani ke waqeat manzar aam par rulain. aisi hi noiyat ka 2011 mein kiye gaye Survey mein Hindustan ka muqaam Afghanistan , kango aur Pakistan ke baad choutha tha. taaza Survey mein pehlay muqaam par Hindustan pahonch gaya hai aur Afghanistan , shaam, somalia aur Saudi Arbia bal tarteeb dosray, teesray aur chouthay muqaam par hain .

Thomson Reuters Foundation ne 26 March taa 4 May ke douran duniya bhar ke 548 mahireen se kaha gaya tha ke woh darjaa bandi mein tibbi nighedasht, saqafati riwayaat, imtyazaat, jinsi tashadud, ghair jinsi tashadud aur insanon ki smuggling ke pemana jaat ko malhooz rakhtay hue apni aaraa paish karen. 130 crore shehrion ke sath abadi ke lehaaz se duniya ke dosray barray mulk ne khawateen ke sath jinsi tashadud wo harasani, khawateen ko saqafati, qabayili aur riwayati tareeqa karon se la-haq khatraat aur mulk jahan khawateen ziyada tar insani istehsal Bashmole jabri bandhwa mazdoori, jinsi ghulami aur gharelo mehkoomi ke teen sawalaat mein pehla muqaam paaya hai. yeh nataij sirf aik takleef da haqeeqat ki toseeq karte hain. nai Dehli mein 2012 mein aik naujawan ladki ki ijtimai asmat raizi ke waqea ne Hindustan mein khawateen ki salamti ke talluq se kiye jan_e_ walay ehtijaj ka aik ahem mourr saabit sun-hwa taham qawaneen ko behtar bananay aur Wazeer e Azam Narendra Modi ki janib se khawateen ke liye shuru kardah schemes jaisay ‘beti bachao aur beti padhao’ roshnaas karwanay ke bawajood qadamat psndavr pidrana mulk mein khawateen aur ladkiyon ko sakht mzalm ka saamna hai. 2012 taa 2016 khawateen ke khilaaf jarayeem ke muqadmaat Bashmole asmat raizi, acid hamla, jahez harasani amwaat mein taqreeban 40 feesad izafah ke sath 3, 38, 954 tak pahonch gaye. hatta ke yeh tadaad asal waqeat se bohat hi kam hain chunkay asmat raizi aur jinsi harasani ke liye police, wukla, aur doctors se rujoo honay par bhi zulm ka shikaar banai jati hain jis ki wajah se woh –apne par honay walay mzalm ki shikayat karne se bhi ghbrati hain. Hindustan mein insani smuggling bhi aik barhta sun-hwa masla hai jahan 2016 mein aisay 15, 000 cases darj kiye gaye hain jin mein dot_hayi khawateen hain. seks work ya gharelo mulazma ke tor par baiche jan_e_ wali khawateen mein beshtar 18 baras se bhi kam Umar ki hain.
1372.title: Bharat khawateen ke liye khatarnaak  tareen mulk

news_detail: Duniya insanon ke liye pehlay se ziyada khatarnaak hogayi, aalmi aman se mutaliq bain ul aqwami report ke mutabiq shaam Duniya ka khatarnaak tareen mulk qarar paaya hai. Globle Peace Index ney qiyam aman se mutaliq Duniya ke 163 Mumalik ki darjah bandi ki hai. Is fehrist mein dosra number Afghanistan , teesra Sudan ka hai. Globle Peace Index ney report androoni bohranon se honay wali halakaton, qatal o siyasi khauf o hraas sameit 23 mukhtalif awamil ko mad e nazar rakh kar banai hai. report ke mutabiq Duniya bhar mein musalsal chouthay saal aman ki sorat e haal kharab hui hai jis ke baad aman napaid ho raha hai, fehrist ke mutabiq Iraq bad tareen Mumalik ki fehrist mein chouthay number par hai. Aalmi aman se mutaliq report mein panchwin number par Yemen aur chhatay number par Kango hai, Russia ko dasvin number par rakha gaya hai jabkay Pakistan terhavi number par hai. darjah bandi ke mutabiq shumali Korea chaudhween, Turkey 15
, Israel 18
, Egypt 22
, Palestine 23
aur Hindustan 28the positions par hain. Is kamtlb yeh huva ke aman ke aitbaar se Hindustan ka maqam 163 Mumalik mein 137
muqam hai .

Mehez 3.5 lakh abadi par mushtamil Europe ka Mulk Iceland guzashta 10 saal se badastoor Duniya ka pur aman tareen Region qarar diya gaya hai. Newzealand, Austria , Portugal aur Denmark paanch pur aman tareen mulkon mein shaamil hain. Srilanka, Chad, Columbia aur Uganda ke sath Hindustan un Mumalik mein shaamil hai jahan amwaat ki tadaad mein kami aayi hai. report ke mutabiq aman ke aitbaar se 92 Mumalik ki sorat e haal bigri hai jabkay 71 Mumalik mein behtari aayi hai.
1384.title: Duniya pehlay se ziyada khatarnaak hogayi, bad tareen Mumalik ki fehrist

news_detail: New Delhi. Supreme Court ney aaj kaha hai ke Markaz se jawab ki mausoli ke baad musalmanoon mein tauddud e  azwaaj ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwaston ki Dasturi Bench ke zareya samaat ke liye listing ki jaye gi. adalat Uzma ney tauddud e  azwaaj aur Nikah Halala ko challenge karte hue daakhil kardah darkhwaston ki aajilana listing par gaur karne ka tayaqqun diya hai. Chief Justice Deepak Misra aur Justice AM Khanwelkar aur Justice D.Y. Chandarchore par mushtamil aik Bench ney senior advocate v shikhr ki is darkhwast ko qubool karliya ke darkhwaston ki qatee yaksoi ke liye paanch rukni Dasturi Bench ke rubaroo samaat ke liye list mein rakhi jaye. Dehli ki aik muslim khatoon darkhwast guzar Sameena Begum ki taraf se paish hotay hue un ke wakeel ney Supreme Court ko bataya ke un ki moklh ke sasural walay Supreme Court mein dair kardah darkhwast se dastbardari ikhtiyar karne ke liye dhamka rahe hain ya phir ssrali ghar chod dene ke liye dabao daal rahay hain. Supreme Court ney kaha ke woh un ki darkhwast ki deegar darkhwaston ke sath samaat ki jaye gi jo aik se zayed biwion se shadi ko challenge karte hue daakhil ki gayi hain. Markaz y hukoomat, darkhwast gzaron ke sath Board par paish hoga. Talaq e bidat ko gair Dasturi qarar dyie jane ke baad Markazi hukoomat ney apni aaraa ke zareya un tamam darkhwaston par apni muwafiqat paish karne ki tayari krchki hai jo ”Nikah Halala” aur ”Tauddud e  azwaaj” ko ghair Dasturi qarar dainay ki istada karte hue Supreme Court mein daakhil ki gayi hain. Supreme Court ney un darkhwaston ki samaat se ittafaq kya tha. zaraye ke mutabiq Markazi hukoomat Nikah Halala aur tauddud e  azwaaj ke khilaaf darkhwast gzaron ki taied krea gi. Supreme Court ney un mozuaat par dair kardah darkhwaston ki samaat karne se ittafaq karte hue Markazi Hukumat aur wizarat qanoon ko notice jari ki thi aur tauddud e  azwaaj aur Nikah Halala ki gunjaish faraham karne walay muslim personal law (Sharia) ki daf-aat ko ghair Dasturi qarar dainay ka mutalba par mabni dair darkhwaston par apna muaqqaf paish kere. Markazi hukoomat ney un do mamlaat mein darkhwast gzaron ki himayat karne ki tayyariyan shuru kar di hain. Talaq bidat ke khilaaf Supreme Court mein kamyaab darkhwast baazi karne wali bhartih muslim mahela andoln (BMMA) ney Nikah Halala aur Tauddud e  azwaaj ko khatam karne ka mutalba karne walay darkhwast gzaron ka sath dainay ka faisla kya hai. times of India ke mutabiq bi am am ae ki Zakia sooman ney kaha ”Hum chahtay hain ke Nikah aur khandan ke tamam umoor ko Qurani asasi qanoon ke zareya aik jame andaaz mein baqaida banaya jaye jo dastoor ke bhi tabay ho. hum chahtay hain ke ”Halala” ko aik fouj daari jurm aur ”tauddud e  azwaaj” ko ghair qanooni qarar diya jaye. Hamara Aiqan hai ke fi zamana quran,’ tauddud e  azwaaj’ ki ijazat nahi deta. hum hindu aur isaai khawateen ko haasil qanooni tahaffuz mangte hain.”
1386.title: Supreme Court mukhalif Nikah e  Halala wo tauddud e  azwaaj darkhwaston ko Dasturi Bench se rujoo kere gi

news_detail: Bengaluru. Aik ghair mamooli case mein Police Commissionerate mein Vanita Sahyavani  Womens’ Help Line) mein haal hi mein ek case pouncha jis mein aik 31 sala Taajir ney yeh darkhwast ki ke is ki sabiqa girlfriend ke sath us ki qabil aitraaz haalat mein li gayeen tasaveer aur videos bar aamad ki jaye. Dance Bar ki Raqqasa ney usay yeh dhamkian dete hue ke woh un tasaveer ko online post kardainay aur khaas kar biwi aur rishta daaron ko bhaij dainay ki dhamki dete hue 2.5 crore rupay mobayyana taur par wusool karli. Mazkurah Taajir ko Rajasthan ke aik MLA ney mahswara diya ke woh Police mein shikayat darj karwaye magar woh apne naam ka inkishaaf hojane ke dar se aisa karne se guraiz karta raha tha. Taajir Bengaluru ke aik mashhoor khandan ka fard hai jis ka ke are markt ke qareeb sanitarywear ka holesale ka kaarobar hai, 2016 ke wast mein shehar ke ek martaba dance baar gaya tha aur wahan woh aik 24 sala Raqqasa par farifta ho gaya tha, woh is ki khatir aksar dance baar jana shuru kya aur is Raqqasa ko tuhaayef dainay shuru kardiye. Aurat ney yeh bhaanp liya ke nojawan is ka girwidah hogaya hai usay apne aastn home ke ghar par madoo karne lagi. Aur woh badi hushiyari se Taajir ke khandan ki tafseelaat, is ki maali haalat haasil karne lagi. Hatta ke is ney Taajir ki biwi ka phone number bhi haasil karliya. baar dancer ney apne bistar par Taajir ke sath qabil aitraaz haalat mein videos bhi tayyar kiye aur kayi jaghon par khufia andaaz mein filmbandi bhi karli. Kuch mawaqay par is ney Taajir ke ilm mein laakar videos bhi shoot kiye thay. Chand mah baad Taajir ney is se is liye doori ikhtiyar krna shroa kar di ke Raqqasa ney usay un lamhaat ke videos dikha kar yeh dhamki di ke woh un videos ko online post kar dein gi aur Taajir ki biwi ko whatsapp karde gi. Raqqasa ney aisa nah karne ke liye is se pesey btorne shuru kiye, ibtida mein raqmi mutalba chand lakhoon rupay tak sun-hwa karta tha, woh is baat se nawaqif tha ke Raqqasa ka boy freind is se tawwan wusool karne ka mansoobah bnarha hai, woh khatoon ke mutalba ko poora karta raha hatta ke Bengaluru tamam five star hotlon mein khatoon ke sath qiyam kya is ke liye qeemti ashya khareed kar diya karta raha aur kayi mawaqay par partiyon par lakhoon rupay kharch kya. is terhan do baras mein khatoon ney is se 2.5 crore rupay batore liye. Taajir ney Raqqasa ke videos sameit is ke ghar tak pahonch jaaney ke dar se is ke iradey jaanne ke liye is se mutsadam huwa. Raqqasa aur is ke boyfreind ney Taajir ko hatmi taur par maamla ki yaksoi ke liye 75 laakh rupay ka mutalba kya. Soorat e haal se pareshan haal Taajir ney Rajasthan mein apne aik MLA dost se mahswara kya jis par unhon ney Police se rujoo honay ka mahswara diya. Taajir ney Police help line se rujoo ho kar apna mudda bayan kya aur kaha ke woh Raqqasa par kharch kardah raqam ki wapsi ka mutamanni nahi hai balkay woh chahta hai ke is Raqqasa ke paas mojood videos aur tasaveer delete kar diye jayen. Help-line ki councillar ney inhen mahswara diya ke woh bazabta aik shikayat darj kurwaye magar Taajir ney is zimn mein abhi apna zehan nahi banaya hai.
1278.title: Raqqasa ney video jari kardainay ki dhamki dey kar taajir se  2.5 crores battor liye

news_detail: Seol: janoobi Korea ki aik adalat nay sabiq Sadar Park Geun-hye  ku Mamlikati A gency se ghair qanooni tor par funds haasil karne aur intikhabi qawaneen ki khilaaf warzi karne par mazeed 8 baras ki saza sunai hai. Park jo Mulk ki awsleen khatoon Sadar reh chuki hain pehlay hi se bsdunwanyon, rishwat khori, ikhtiyarat ka najaaiz istemaal aur Mumlikat ke raaz afsha karne ke ilzamaat mein 24 barson ki saza kaat rahi hain. Un ilzamaat par 2016 mein un ka muwakhza kya gaya. Nai saza ka mutawatar itlaq hoga jis kamtlb yeh sun-hwa ke 66 sala Park ko majmoi tor par 32 baras ki jail ki saza bhughtna parre ga. Park ko ghair zaroori funds jama karne par 6 saal aur intikhabaat ke nataij par asr andaaz honay ke jurm mein mazeed 2 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai. adalat nay fariqain ke dalail suneney ke baad dono muqadmaat mein majmoi tor par 8 saal qaid ki saza sunai. Samaat ke douran janoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar faisla suneney ke liye mojood nahi theen taham adalat nay un ki ghair mojoodgi mein hi faisla suna diya. wazeh rahay ke Junoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar Park Geun-hye ko corruption ke alzmat par awaami dabao ke paish e nazar 2017 mein mansab se hata diya gaya tha jis ke baad aan par qaim muqadmaat ki samaat huien. corruption ilzamaat aur hakoomati raaz Afsha karne par Park ko 24 pehlay baras ki saza sunai gayi thi aur aaj do mukhtalif muqadmaat mein mazeed 8 saal qaid ki saza sunai gayi hai.
1294.title: Junoobi Korea ki sabiq Sadar ko majmoi taur par 32 saal jail ki saza

news_detail: Kenya ki aik adalat ne 24 sala Malika e Husn Ruth Kamande ko apne boyfriend ko chaaqo ke pay darpay waar karkay qatal karne ke jurm mein sazae mout sunai hai. sabiq Malika e Husn Kamande par Insani Huqooq ki tanzeemon ki taraf se bhi shadeed tanqeed ki gayi thi aur apne mehboob ko chaaqu ke 22 waar karkay be rehmi ke sath mout ke ghaat utaarnay ke iqdaam ko’ ghiransani’ feal qarar diya tha. khayaal rahay ke sazae mout panay wali 24 sala roth Kamande ne apne muqadma ki samaat ke arsa mein

mein hissa liya aur Mulk ki Malika e Husn ka title haasil kya tha. Is waqt yeh Kenya ki jail 1095 mein qaid thi. Is par ilzaam tha ke is ne sunah 2015 ko apne boyfriend Fareed Mohammad ko chaaqu ke pay darpay 22 waar kar kay mout ke ghaat utaar diya tha. Mulzima ne Adalat ko bataya ke dono mein us waqt jhagda shuru hogaya tha jab is ne apne boyfriend ke room par Aids Control Programme ka aik zard card dekha jis se zahir hota tha ke woh aids ka mareez hai. Fareed ne raaz ka afsha hojane par kaha tha ke woh usay maar kar khud ko bhi maar daaley chun ke woh jaan chuki thi ke Fareed HIV positive hai. Is ne bataya ke woh apne hathon ke ba is ke seenah par girgya jis par is ne khud ko bachanay ke liye is ki aankhon mein apni donoon ungelian gaad dien aur us par qaboo paker pay darpay waar kiye. Kamande ke khilaaf qatal ka muqadma malik ki sprim court mein chalaya gaya jahan jumaraat ko khatoon judge justice Jessie Lesit ne mulzima ke khilaaf case ka faisla sunaya. Judge ne apne faisla mein likha ke ‘mein chahti hon ke naujawan is baat ko samjhain ke apne dost ka qatal ya apni mayoosi ka badla lainay ke liye kisi dosray ki jaan lena khud apni jaan ko khatray mein daalnay ke mutradif hai’. Un ka kehna tha ke achi baat to yeh hai ke hamein gussa thook kar dosray ke sath rawadari aur tahhaamul ke sath paish aana chahiye. adalat ne mulzima par trial ke douran ghair shafaaf bartao ka bhi ilzaam Ayad kya aur kaha ke is ne maqtool nojawan ke mobile phone se data gayab karne aur shawahid mitanay ki koshish ki thi. Jurm saabit honay par bhi is ne kisi qisam ki sharmindagi ka izhaar nahi kya. Khayaal rahay ke Kenya mein saza e mout ka qanoon barson se raayej hai magar sanh1987 ke baad kisi mujrim ko sazae mout nahi di gayi. maqtool ke ahal khanah ne adalti faisla ko srahte hue usay apni kamyabi qarar diya hai.
1309.title: Kenya ki  Husn ki Malika e Husn ko sazae mout

news_detail: Bengaluru. Bengaluru ke Bowring Institute mein lockers ki adam dasteyabi ki mamool ke mutabiq aik shikayat par ki gayi karwai mein chonkadine wala inkishaaf sun-hwa aur teen lockers se 500 crore rupay maliyat ki naqd raqm, qimti ashya, bank aur zameen ki dastawizaat baraamad huien. Club ki shikayat par Income Tax ke ohdedaron ne zakheera ko zabt karliya aur raqam ke zaraye ka pata chalanay tehqeeq ka aaghaz kardiya. Club ke Badminton aur Squash Incharge Sandeep ne chand workers ke sath mil kar jumaraat ke din aik arsa se zair istemaal nah rehne walay lockers ko toda tha aur lockers numbers 69, 71 & 78 mein 6 zipper-lock walay Bags rakhay hue thay. Amlah ne Institute ke secretary H. S.  Srikanth ke ilm mein yeh baat layi, chunkay shaam hochuki thi is liye Police ko mutala kardiya gaya. Srikanth ne bataya ke chunkay lockers din dhaly khole gaye thay, is liye hum ziyada kuch nahi kar sakay. hum ne dekha ke is mein kuch naqad raqam hai is liye hum ne Police ko mutala kardiya. Koi khatrah nah letay hue Institute ke hakkaam ne Police ke sath Income Tax ohdedaron ko mutala krdyajs ke douran rqomat ka zakheera bar aamad sun-hwa. Bags kholnay par ohdedaron ne paaya ke 3.73 crore rupay maliyat ki do hazaar rupay qadar ki currency Notes aur bairooni currency aur 500 rupay qader ki17 lakh rupay maliyat ki Notes thay. IT ohdedaron ne lockers se bar aamad 6 Bags zabt karte hue naqad, 7 taa 8 crore rupay laagat ke heere, 650 gram wazan ke talai biscuits, 50 lakh rupay maliyat ki do qeemti ghadiyaan aur Bengaluru ke muzafaat Dewanhalli aur Begure ilaqa ke atraaf zameenat ke mamlaat se mutaliq dastawizaat ki inventory tayyar ki. is ke alawa Bags mein blank cheques, 50 crores, 30 crores aur 15 crores waghera qader ke be-tareekh cheques bhi maujood thay. Srikanth ke mutabiq dastakhat shuda cheques par mushtamil aik mukammal Cheque Book bhi thi. Darin asna ohdedaron ko un ke aik rukn ki ghair mamooli darkhwast mousool hui jo Institute mein paish aaye waqeaat se aagah ho chukay thay. Srikanth ne kaha ”aik rukn Avinash Amarlal Kukreja ne id-daa kya ke woh Bags un ke hain. unhon (Avinash) ne darkhwast ki ke mein dastawizaat un ke hawala kardoon aur naqad raqam aur qeemti ashya apne paas rakh le sakta hoon basoorat deegar is ke waalid tumhe qatal kar dein ge.” Srikanth ne Institute ka record mulahiza karne ke baad paaya ke Avinash Bowring Institute ka 1993 se rukn hai aur Bangalore Club ki bhi rukniat rakhta hai. Srikanth ne inkishaaf kya ke woh banglore Club ko baqaida aaya karta tha jabkay woh Bowring Club mein shaed hi dekha gaya tha Albata un ki maa Kiran Amarlal apne doston ke sath Bowring Institute baqaidagi se aaya karti hain.
1321.title: Bengaluru mein Badminton Club ke lockers se 500 crores maliyat ki ashya bar aamad

news_detail: Johnsburg: Junoobi Africa mein namaloom bandooq bardaroon ny 11 taxi driveron ko firing kar ke mout ke ghaat utaar diya. is hamla mein chaar afraad bhi shadeed zakhmi hogaye. money bas mein sawaar Gauteng Taxi Association ke afraad saathi driver ke janazay mein shirkat ke liye Johnsburg gay thay. Wapsi par un ki gaadi par namaloom afraad ki janib se firing kar di gayi, hamla mein 11 afraad halaak jabkay 4 shadeed zakhmi hue. Hukkaam ka kehna hai ke is ilaqa mein taxi par hamla aam hain taham mukhtalif pehluo se waqea ki tafteesh ki jarahi hai. Yeh waqea kal raat 8 : 00 bujey paish aaya. money bas par ghaat lagaakar hamla kiya gaya.
1331.title: Junoobi Africa mein firing se 11 taxi driver halaak

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ko ‘bhikaryon se pak’ shehar bananay ki sayee ke taur par City Prison Department ne zayed az 9, 000 bhikaryon ko pakad liya hai. Inspector General Telangana Prison Department Mr. A Narsimha ne bataya ke jumla 300 bhikaryon ko baaz-abaadkari markaz ko bhej diya gaya jahan inhen taleem di jaye gi aur rozgaar faraham kya jaye ga. Police ne November 2017 mein bhikaryon ke khilaaf muhim ka aaghaz kya tha. Inspector General ne bataya ke un ke liye mukhtalif programmes waza kiye gaye hain jin mein taleemi programme bhi shaamil hai. Jo bhikari qabil aur jismani taur par fit hain hum unhen rozgaar bhi faraham kar rahay hain. Yeh jail nahi hai balkay baaz-abaadkari markaz jaisa hai. Unhon ne kaha ke bhikaryon ko pakadney ke baad agar woh apne makanaat ko wapas lautna chahtay hain to hum un ke rishta daaron ko talab karte hain aur phir un ki counselling karte hain aur unhen riha kardete hain. Unhon ne kaha ke shehar mein bhikaryon ko pakadney ki muhim jari rahay gi. alawa azeen ehkaam ki khilaaf warzi karne wale Taazirat e Hind ke mutaliqa dif-aat ke tehat Hyderabad city Police Act ki dif-aat ke mutabiq saza ke mustahiq hon ge. Mehakma Muhabis (Prison) Telangana ka maqsad Hyderabad ko bhikaryon se pak shehar banana hai aur hum chahtay hain ke saari riyasat Telangana mein is muhim par amal aawri ho. Mr. Narsimha ne bataya ke Director General Muhabis ne bhi hukoomat Telangana ko aik maktoob rawana karte hue saari riyasat Telangana ko bhikaryon se pak bananay ki muhim shuru karne ki ijazat talab ki hai. Unhon ne bataya ke guzashta baras ke avaakhr mein hum ne yeh muhim shuru ki thi aur is zimn mein do mraz baaz-abaadkari ka intizam kya tha. aik mard bhikaryon ke liye Chanchalguda Jail mein hai aur dosra khatoon bhikaryon ke liye Chirlapally Jail mein hai.
1362.title: Hyderabad mein 9, 000 bhikaari pakad liye gaye. 300 ko marakaz baaz-abaadkari bhaij diya gaya

news_detail: Unan ke dar-ul-hakoomat Athens ke nawahi ilaqa mein waqay janglaat mein aag lag gayi jis ne dekhte hi dekhte wasee ilaqa ko apni lapait mein le liya. jungle mein lagi aag ne muzafaat mein samandar ke kinare Resorts bhi jal kar khakstar hogaye. is aag mein Resorts, makanaat aur karen bhi jal gayeen. aag ki lapeto aur dhuwen se bachney ke liye sayah aur makeen saahil samandar ki simt daud parre. ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq aag phailtay phailtay jungle se bahar rehaishi ilaqa tak pahonch gayi, is ki shiddat itni ziyada thi ke mutadid logon ko jaan bachanay ka mauqa hi nah mil saka aur woh apne gharon mein hi zindah jal gaye jab ke bohat si hlaktin dam ghatney se bhi huien. Ab tak atishzadgi se 50 afraad ki halakat ki tasdeeq hogayi hai jab ke sainkdon afraad zakhmi hain jin mein se mutadid ki haalat tashweesh naak hai. shehar ke hospital laashon aur zakhmion se bhar gaye hain aur qayamat ka samaa hai. sirf aik ilaqay Rafina se 26 lashain mili hain. har aankh ashkbaar hai aur log aag mein la patah honay walay apne pyaron ki talaash mein ro rahay hain. 100 se zayed ghar aur emiratein jal kar mukammal tor par khakstar ho chuke hain. Mutasirah ilaaqon se 700 se zayed afraad ko mehfooz maqamat ki taraf muntaqil kya gaya hai. sainkdon fire tindrz ke ilawa tayyaray aur helly kaptrz bhi aag bujhanay mein masroof hain. hukoomat ke mutabiq ab ziyada tar ilaqay mein aag par qaboo paaya ja chuka hai.
1370.title: Unan ke janglaat mein khofnaak atishzadgi, 50 afraad halaak, sainkdon zakhmi

news_detail: Guntur. Guntur mein Suvarnabharti Nagar ki rehne wali aik jismani mazoor khatoon ne SP Urban se rujoo hotay hue shikayat ki ke chand parosi inhen yeh dhamki dete hue blackmailkar rahay hain ke is ki beti ki nahate hue li gayi tasweerain Social Media par post kar dein ge. Khatoon ne bataya ke un ki beti aik sarkari hostel mein qiyam karte hue X Class mein taleem parhi hai. Woh garmayi tatilat mein apne ghar aayi hui thi. Chand padosion ne un ki beti ki nahate hue tasaveer khech len aur ab inhen dhamki day rahay hain ke woh makaan ka takhlia karde basorat deegar un tasaveer ko Social Media par post kar deinge. Police, tahaqeeq kar rahi hai.
1380.title: Beti ki barhana tasaweer ke zareya maa ko blackmail karne ka ilzaam

news_detail: Attapeu : Asian Country Laos mein aik zair e taamer Dam ke totnay se pani dehaton mein daakhil hogaya jis ke nateeja mein sainkdon afraad la patah aur darjanon gaon zair aabb aagaye. Bain ul aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq junoob mashriqi Asiayi Mulk Laos ke soobay Attapeu mein waqay zirtamir hydro electric Dam totnay se 5 Billion cubic pani 6 dehaton ko –apne sath baha le gaya. Selaab ke baais sainkdon afraad la patah jab ke 6 hazaar 6 so afraad be ghar hogaye, la patah afraad ke halaak hojane ka khadsha zahir kya ja raha hai. Xepian-Xe Nam Noy Dam par 410 mega watt bijli paida karne ke liye power station qaim kya ja raha tha jis ke liye 2013  mein 1. 2 billion dollar ke project ka aaghaz kya gaya tha jo 2019  mein mukammal kya jane wala tha. Is power plant se haasil honay wali 90 feesad bijli Thailand ko farokht ki jani thi jab ke maabaqi bijli muqami grid station ke liye mukhtas thi. Dam par qaim power plant ki taamer ke khilaaf muqami an jee auz aur maholiyati tanzeemon ney apne khadshaat ka izhaar karte hue usay muqami abadi ke liye khatrah qarar diya tha aur yeh khadsha zahir kya tha ke muqami abadi ko pani ki qillat ka bhi saamna ho sakta tha. Is power station par kaam karne wali companiyon ka talluq Thailand aur North Korea se hai jab ke aik muqami company bhi shaamil hai. selaab ke baais taahad nigah pani hi pani hai jis ki wajah se logon nay chaton par panah le rakhi hai. rescue idaron ko mutasirah ilaqay taq pounchanay ke liye shadeed mushkilaat ka saamna hai. helly kaptrz ki madad se selaab mein phansay afraad ki mehfooz ilaqay mein muntaqili ka amal jari hai. ohdedaron nay pani mein phansay afraad ko bachanay ke liye kashtiyan le aeye hain. Dam taamer karne wali janoobi Korea ki company nay kaha ke shadeed barish aur selaab ke nateeja mein Dam toot gyaavr woh Dam ke qareeb dehation ko bachanay mein Laos hukoomat ka taawun kar rahi hai. s ke engineering and construction ke tarjuman nay kaha ke hum aik hungami team chlarhe hain aur Dam ke qareeb ke dehaton mein makeeno ke takhlia aur un ko bachanay ki mansoobah bandi kar rahay hain. company ke aik aur ohdedar nay kaha ke yeh wazeh hojane par ke Dam toot jaye ga fauri 12 dehaton ko khaali kardainay ki hadaayat day di gayi thi. janoobi Korea ki wizarat kharja nay aik payam mein kaha ke company ke 50 workers aur Korea western power ke teen mulazmeen ko jo tameeri prajkt ke paas qiyam kiye hue they bchalya gaya hai.
1385.title: Laos mein Dam totnay se 6 dehaat bahe gay, sainkdon afraad la patah

news_detail: New Delhi. New Delhi mein land honey walay Air Asia India ke tayyarah ke bait-alkhala se aik nauzaida ki murda laash padi mili. Police aur Airlines zaraye ke bamawajjib yeh Airlines ka tayyarah gohati se New Delhi pouncha tha. New Delhi ayrport Police station ke aik ohdedar ney bataya ke aik khatoon ko jo tayyarah mein sawaar thi aur jis par parwaaz ke douran tayyarah mein bache ko janam dainey ka shuba kya ja raha hai, Police ney hirasat mein le liya hai. Air Asia India ney kaha ke tayyarah ke amlah ko landing ki tayari ke douran toiletpaper mein lipta huwa nauzaida bacha murda pada mila. Airlines ney bataya ke is ney Mulk ke shehri hwabazi authority aur Directorate General of Civil Aviation ko is baaray mein mutala kardiya hai. Police ke tehqiqati ohdedar ney bataya ke mushtaba khatoon ney parwaaz ke douran tayyarah mein bacha ko janam dainey se inkaar kardiya hai is liye is khatoon ko hospital muntaqil kya jarha hai taakay wahan pata chalaya jasakay ke aaya khatoon ney bacha janam diya hai ya nahi. Takheer se mousula ittila mein bataya gaya ke aik 19 sala Taekwondo khiladi ney tafteesh ke douran yeh iqraar karliya hai ke is ka hamal girgya tha. Police ney is khusus mein Tazeerat Hind ki dafaa 318 ke tehat laash ki khufia nikasi ke zareya paidaiesh chhupaney ke ilzaam mein aik muqadma darj karliya hai aur bataya ke nauzaida bacha ki laash ka postmortem karwaya jaye ga taakay yeh pata chala ya jasakay ke bacha ki madar reham mein Umar kya thi. Yeh wazeh nahi ho saka ke isqaat hamal huwa hai ya phir mamool ke mutabiq bacha ki paidaiesh hui hai aur aisa huwa hai to bacha paidaiesh ke waqt zindah tha ya murda? Aik Police ohdedar ney naam zahir nah karne ki shart par bataya ke khiladi ke khilaaf koi muqadma darj nahi kya gaya jo jummay ko Junoobi Korea ka safar karne wali hai. Majmoi surat e haal ko dekh kar aisa lagta hai ke khiladi ko isqaat e hamal huwa hai. Aksar khatoon khiladi baday muqablon mein shirkat ke liye haamela ban jati hain chunkay hamal theharney ke teen mah tak haamela aurat ki jismani taaqat, aam dinon se badhi hui hoti hai taakay woh dosray khiladion par ghalib aasakay.
1390.title: Air Asia India ke tayyarah se murda nauzaida baraamad

news_detail: Japan ke wazeer e azam Shinzō Abe ko Israeli wazeer e azam ke ghar par jootay mein meetha paish karne ki tasaveer ne naya tanaza khara kardiya hai. bain al aqwami media reports ke mutabiq japaani tahazeeb vsqaft mein jootay ko intahi hattak amaiz tasawwur kya jata hai, to kya Israeli wazeer e azam ne Japaani hum mansab se safarti aadaab se hatt kar rawayya brta hai? Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ki report ke mutabiq guzashta hafta japaani wazeer e azam Abe aur un ki ahliya ko Israeli wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu ne apni rahaish gaah par ashayie par madoo kya, jis ke aakhir mein dhaat ke banay jooton mein meetha paish kya gaya, Shinzō Abe ne yeh meetha baghair kisi hichkichahat ke khalya lekin is baat ko Japan ke safeeron ne pasand nahi kya .

Japan ke umoor par nazar rakhnay walay tajzia nigaron aur sfartkaron ne is iqdaam par herat ka izhaar kya aur sath hi usay Israel ka intahi ghair hassas aur ehmaqana feal qarar diya hai kyunkay Japan mein jootay se kam ahmiyat ki koi cheez ka tasawwur bhi mojood nahi, japaani –apne gharon balkay –apne dafatir mein bhi jootay utaar kar daaqil hotay hain. is hawala se mazeed yeh bhi kaha ja raha hai ke japaani wazeer e azam o deegar wuzra  aur arakeen parliman bhi –apne dafatir mein jootay pehan kar nahi jatay, Israeli wazeer e azam ke ashayie mein kya gaya iqdaam bilkul aisa hi hai ke kisi yahodi maheman ko khanzeer ki shakal ke bartan mein khana paish kya jaye. aik japaani sifaratkaar ne Yedioth Ahronoth se baat karte hue kaha’ kisi bhi Saqafat mein jootay ko maiz par nahi rakha jata, is amal ko injaam dainay walay ke zehan o dil mein kya tha? agar yeh mazaq tha to hamein yeh acha nahi laga, hum –apne Wazeer e Azam ke sath honay wali is bud sulooki par naraaz hain .

Israeli wazeer e azam aur japaani hum mansab ke ashayie ki tasaveer aur ghair safarti rawayya samaji raabtey ki Websites par zair behas hai, ab dekhna yeh hai ke duniya bhar ke mumalik ko beeet almuqaddas mein –apne safarti dafatir kholnay par raazi karne mein koshan Israeli wazeer e azam ke is iqdaam ke nataij kya nikaltay hain
1327.title: Israel mein Japaani wazeer e azam ke liye jootay mein meetha rakh kar tawaze?

news_detail: Mumbai. Mumbai police se wabsta aik constable ny yeh kehte hue ke woh –apne khandan ki kifalat se aajiz hai chunkay woh do mah se apni thankhowa se mahroom hai,’ uniform mein bheek mangnay’ ki ijazat talabb ki. mehakma ke sarbarah Commisioner of Police Mumbai Mr. Datta Padsalgikar aur Chief   Minister Maharashtra Mr. Devendra Fadnavis ke mosooma maktoob mein constable Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao ny apni bemaar ahliya ki dekh bhaal aur ghar ke akhrajaat ki pabajayee ke liye bheek mangnay ki ijazat talabb ki hai. Local Arms Unit se wabsta Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao ny –apne maktoob mein bataya ke woh 20 taa 22 March rukhsat haasil kya tha, taham un ki ahliya ke paiir mein fracture aagaya is liye woh rukhsat ke ekhtataam par duty par rujoo bah car nah ho saka. Ahir Rao jin ki posting Shiv Sena sarbarah Mr. Udhav Thakre ki rahaish gaah’ ‘ Mathusri ‘ par Security team ke sath hai, id-daa kya ke unhon ny un ki Unit ke incharge ko phone par hungami rukhsat ke baray mein ittila di thi ke woh mazeed paanch dinon taq rukhsat par rahay ga. apni biwi ke ilaaj ke baad woh 28 March ko rujoo bah car hogaya. lekin is ke baad se usay thankhowa nahi mil parhi hai aur nah hi usay kuch bataya ja raha hai. maktoob mein is ny kaha ke usay apni bemaar ahliya ka ilaaj karna hai, zaeef walidain aur beti ki dekh bhaal karna aur haasil kardah karzz par mahana aqsat bhi ada karna hai, chunkay mujhe meri thankhowa aisaal nahi ki jarahi hai is liye woh un akhrajaat ki pabajayee karne se qassar hai. is liye main aap se chahta hon ke mujhe uniform mein bheek mangnay ki ijazat di jaye. Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao tabsarah ke liye dastyab nahi ho saka. Deputy Commisioner of Police, Local Arms Unit Mr. Vasant Jadahv se rabita karne par unhon ny kaha ke yeh maamla shoba nazam o nasq ke tehat hai is liye woh is par tabsarah nahi kar saktay.
1335.title: Mujhe uniform mein bheek mangnay diya jaye, do mah se thankhowa se mahroom police constable ki Chief Minister se faryaad

news_detail: Japan mein railway ke nizaam ko duniya ka sab se mayaari aur behtareen nizaam qarar diya jata hai. is ki deegar khoobiyon ke sath waqt muqarara par rail gadiyon ki aamad waraft bhi hai, magar haal hi mein aik rail gaadi –apne waqt muqarara se 25 skind pehlay rawana hui to is par railway company’ jee west’ ko awam se moazrat karna pari hai. hindustaan ka yeh haal hai ke Shatabdi jaisi trainenbhi ghanta bhar takheer se chalne lagey to bhi railway ki taraf se koi moazrat khawahi nahi ki jati. yahi nahi balkay musafireen ko haqeeqi sorat e haal se waaqif karwana bhi munasib nahi samgha jata. akhbar’ daily mil’ ki report ke mutabiq’ jee west’ ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke company –apne gahkon aur swaryon ko rail gaadi pachees second qabal rawana karne paish anay wali mushkil par moazrat talabb karti hai. rail gaadi ki qabal از waqt rawaangi ki wajah rail gaadi ke ohdedar ki ghalat fehmi batayi ja rahi hai. gaadi ke hakkaam naay samgha ke plate form se gaadi ki rawaangi ka waqt 7 : 11 hai. unhon naay tamam bogyon ke darwazay is waqt band kar diye jab dekha ke plate form par koi bhi musafir train ke qareeb khara dikhayi nahi day raha. jee west company ki rail gaadi ki Hyogo shehar ke Neshi  Akashi Railway station se rawaangi ka waqt 7 : 12 bujey din tha magar gaadi aadha minute se chand second pehlay hi rawana ho gayi. Japan mein rail gadiyon ki aamad waraft ko poori duniya mein namoonay ke tour par paish kya jata hai jahan koi bhi rail gaadi das seconds se ziyada takheer ka shikaar nahi hoti
1347.title: Train 25 second muqarara waqt se pehlay rawana karne par Japani company ki moazrat

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Gujarat ke aik sarkari ohdedar ny daawa kya ke woh Kalaki hai, yani Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar aur woh daftar haazir nahi ho sakta chunkay woh aalmi zameer badalny aik’ ‘ Tappssea ‘ ‘ kar raha hai. sardar  Sarovar Punarvast Agency (SSPA) se wabsta Suprintending Engineer Ramesh Chandra Fefar ny wajah numai notice ke jawab mein kaha ke is ki Tappssea ke baais malik mein achi barish horahee hai .

Wazeer e Azam , markazi wazraa, Chief Minister aur Governors jab deomalai kahaaniyon ko science ki taraqqi ki alamat saabit karne ke darpay hoon to aik sarkari mulazim khud ko Kalaki Avtar samajhney lagey to koi herani nahi hooni chahiye. inhen jari kardah wajah numai notice aur is ka jawab soshil media par vayrl hogaya. Fefar ny aaj raaj coat mein apni rahaish gaah par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha’ ‘ is ke bawajood agar aap ko yaqeen nah ho, mein dar haqeeqat Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar hoon aur anay walay dinon mein yeh saabit kar dikhaoonga. mein jab March 2010 mein daftar mein tha is waqt jaan paaya ke mein Kalaki Avtar hoon, tab se mere paas muqaddas taqtin hain.’ ‘ agency ki janib se inhen teen din qabal jari kardah wajah numai notice ke jawab mein kaha ke woh daftar nahi aasakta chunkay woh’ Tappssea ‘ karne mein mashgool hai. –apne do safhaat par mushtamil jawab mein Fefar ny kaha ke aalmi zameer ko badalny ke liye woh panchwin’ بْعد’ mein daakhil hotay hue ghar mein Tappssea kar rahay hain. woh aisi Tappssea daftar mein baith kar nahi kar saktay. unhoon ny id-daa kya ke un ki jari Tappssea ke baais hndstan mein guzashta 19 barson se achi barish horahee hai. unhoon ny kaha ke SSPA ko yeh faisla karna chahiye ke agency ke liye un ka daftar mein baithna aur waqt guzari karna ziyada ahem hai ya phir malik ko qeht saali se bachanay koi thos kaam kere. chunkay woh Kalaki Avtar hai is liye malik mein achi barish horahee hai. notice ke mutabiq Mr. Fefar guzishta 8 mahino mein sirf 16 din hi daftar haazir hue
1356.title: Mein Kalaki, Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar hoon, daftar haazir nahi ho sakta : Gujarat ka sarkari mulazim

news_detail: Israeli jail mein qaid aik Falasteeni aseer aas tarbooz ki tasweer ko bahar bhejnay mein kamyaab ho gaya jo aas neh 17 baras ke taweel arsay ke baad dekha tha. Israeli jailon mein taweel arsay se qaid aseer abbu Mahmood neh tasweer ke sath munsalik –apne tabsaray mein bataya ke” jail intizamia neh tarbooz par taqreeban 18 baras se aed pabandi ko utha liya. intizamia neh har chay qaidyoun mein aik tarbooz taqseem kya aur hum ab Azaan maghrib ka intzaar kar rahay hain “. Israeli jailon mein 13 baras guzaarne walay aik qaidi ibrahim Samhan neh bataya ke qaabiz hakkaam neh 2000 hamza mein beeet almuqaddas ki antfazh tehreek ke waqt se qaidyoun ke liye tarbooz par pabandi aed kar di thi. inhen andesha tha ke tarbooz ke zariye baaz cheezon ko khufia tor muntaqil kya ja sakta hai. Samhan ke mutabiq aik qaidi ke liye yeh iqdaam aziat rasani aur usay mehroomi ka ehsas dilanay ke mutradif tha. qaabiz hakkaam qaidyoun ke liye baaz saadi si ashya maslan ice kareem, khusbhoo, tasbeeh ke rangeen danay, chamchay aur sheeshay ke glass waghera bhi mamnoo qarar dete hain. maazi mein qaidyoun ki janib se jail mein apni roz maraah ki zindagi behtar bananay ke wastay hrhtalon ka ihtimaam kya jata raha hai. sonay ke liye takiye ka husool qaidi ke liye intahi khush bakhti shumaar ki jati hai. isi terhan yakam ramadaan ko Israeli hakkaam ki janib se jailon mein tarbooz ke dakhlay ki ijazat dena bhi hai
1369.title: Israeli jailon mein 18 baras baad Falasteeni qaidyoun ke liye” tarbooz” ki aamad!

news_detail: Bairut : Lebanon ki police ko 52 sala be ghar aur maazoor bhikaran ki laash aik gaadi se mili aur sath hi khatoon ke paas karodon rupay honay ka inkishaaf bhi sun-hwa hai. ghair mulki khabar-rasan idaara ke mutabiq labnani police ko aik kharab gaadi mein laash dikhayi di, police ny –apne qabzay mein lekar tafteesh ka aaghaz kya tou pata chala ke yeh laash 52 sala bhikaran fatima usmaan ki hai jo Lebanon ki sarkon par bheek manga karti thi jab ke khatoon ko dil ka dora para jis ke sabab un ki mout waqay hui. doosri janib labnani police kwasi gaadi se karodon rupay bhi miley, jis mein woh khatoon rahaish Pazeer bhi thi aur iss ke ilawa 52 sala bhikaran ka koi aur thikaana nahi tha, police ku bhikaran ke samaan se 5 million lebanani pound yani ( 3 hazaar 333 dollar ) miley jab ke mazeed tafteesh karne par pata chala ke khatoon ka aik bank account bhi hai .

police ny bhikaran ke account ki maloomat ki tou pata chala ke un ke saving account mein 1. 7 billion labnani pound yani 1. 12 million dollar maujud they jo hindustani currency mein taqreeban 12 crore ki raqam banti hai. baad azan khatoon ki walida aur 7 behan bhaiyon ny khatoon ki laash wusool karkay usay –apne aabadi gaon le gaye.
1378.title: Lebanon ki 52 sala crorepati bhikaran

news_detail: Harmain Sharifain ke umoor ki General Presidency ne” Zam Zam : Aabb mubarak” ke naam se aik dastawizi film tayyar ki hai. film mein kunwein se aabb Zam Zam ke niklny aur is ke baad mukhtalif maqamat tak pounchanay ke marahil ko tafseel se paish kya gaya hai. Zam Zam ka kunwan masjid haraam ke andar Mataaf ke sehan mein Bait Allah se 21 meter ke faaslay par zair zameen waqay hai .

Saudi sarkari khabar rasan agency SPA ke mutabiq film mein bataya gaya hai ke Zam Zam ke kunwein se bahar anay walay meethay pani ki ost raftaar kam az kam 11 litre fi second aur ziyada se ziyada 18. 5 litre fi second hai. Zam Zam ke kunwein ki geherai sirf 31 meter hai. kunwein se pani khenchnay ke liye do bhaari pmpon ka sahara liya jata hai jo shfton mein 24 ghantay kaam karte hain. pani ko kheanch kar khud car tareeqay se khusoosi pipe linon ke zariye” king abdullah ban abdalaziz project” bheja jata hai. yeh project Makkah Mukramma ke ilaqay kudi mein waqay hai .

dastawizi film mein dekhaya gaya hai ke aabb Zam Zam ko khusoosi tankers ke zariye Madina Munawwara bheja jata hai. un tankers mein mojood pani is tareeqa se muqffil kya jata hai ke woh masjid nabwi mein mutaliqa ahal car hi khol sakta hai. aam dinon mein rozana ostan 1. 5 laakh litre Zam Zam Madina Munawwara bheja jata hai jab ke Ramadhan aur Haj ke season mein yeh miqdaar rozana 4 laakh litre tak poanch jati hai. Aabb Zam Zam ko jaraseem se pak coolers mein bhar kar Masjid Haraam aur Masjid Nabawi pohanchaya jata hai. is ke baad battery se chalne wali gadiyon ke zariye un coolers ko hrmin mein mutayyan mukhtalif maqamat tak pohanchaya jata hai. coolers ki majmoi tadaad 40 hazaar ke qareeb hai jin mein peenay ke liye thanda aur saada dono halaton mein aabb dastyab hota hai. coolers ke sath plastic ke disposable glass rakhay jatay hain jin ka yomiya istemaal 20 laakh ke qareeb hai .

sarkari adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq masjid haraam mein aabb Zam Zam ka yomiya istemaal 7 lakh litre ke qareeb hai jab ke Ramadhan aur Haj ke season mein yeh miqdaar yomiya 20 lakh litre tak pahonch jati hai. Harmain ke umoor ki Presidency Aabb Zam Zam ke tahaffuz aur usay kisi bhi qisam ke jaraseem aur aloodgi se pak rakhnay ke liye hama waqt koshan rehti hai. is silsila mein 24 ghanton ke douran mukhtalif maqamat se Zam Zam ke pani ke yomiya 100 namoonay le kar un ko is maqsad ke liye banai gayi khusoosi laboratory mein test kya jata hai .

saal 2010 hamza mein King Abdullah bin Abdul Aziz Zam Zam Water Project ka qiyam amal mein aaya. Makkah Mukramma ke ilaqa kudi mein waqay is mansoobah ka maqsad aabb Zam Zam ko sahal tareen tareeqon se logon tak pahunchana hai. is ke ilawa aabb Zam Zam ke tahaffuz aur usay aloodgi waghera se pak rakhna hai. yeh mansoobah aabb Zam Zam ko zakheera karne ke liye markazi khud car where house par mushtamil hai. is ke zariye rozana aabb Zam Zam ke 10 litre walay 15 laakh can takseem kiye jatay hain
1382.title: Aabb Zam Zam kaisay awam tak pohanchana hai?

news_detail: France ke dar-al-hakoomat Paris mein haqeeqi Spider Man ney bacha ko bachanay ke liye apni jaan par khail gaya. Africi nazaad Muslim nojawan balcony se bachay ko latakta dekh kar tees second mein chothi manzil taq charh gaya, bacha ki jaan bachanay wala 22 sala Mohammad Gassama Paris ka hero ban gaya. Frnch President Emmanuel Macron ney Mohammad Gassama ku sadarati mehal madoo kya aur France ki shehriat dainay ka elaan kardiya jabkay Paris ke mayor ney Mohammad Gassama ko ” Spider Man” ka khitaab diya hai. Mohammad Gassama behtar mustaqbil ki talaash mein apna mulk Mali chod kar France aaya hai. bacha ko bachanay ke saaray manazair ko wahan mojood kayi shahideen ney –apne –apne cameron aur cellphones mein mehfooz karliya aur se soshil media par post kardiya jis ke baais Mohammad Gassama ko kuch hi der mein shohrat haasil hogayi. francesi khabar rasan zaraye ke mutabiq is ladke ko tanha chore kar is ke waalid shopping mein mehv hogaye they .

Mohammad Gassamaہ ney bataya ke jab is ney dekha ke imarat ke neechay thehray shahideen oopar dekhte hue cheekh o pukaar kar rahay to unhon ney imarat par nazar dorhayi aur chothi manzil par inhen aik bacha latakta sun-hwa nazar aaya. unhon ney kaha ke woh fori is bacha ko bachanay imarat par charhne lagey, Allah ka shukar hai ke unhon ney bacha ko bchalya. saddar France Mr. Micron ney inhen sadaarti mehal ‘Elysee’ madoo karte hue ghair mamooli karnaama injaam dainay par un ki sataish ki. saddar ney inhen medal bhi paish kya. unhon ney saddar ko bataya ke jaisay hi unhon ney bacha ko dekha woh daud parre aur sarrak paar karte hue imarat par charh doray aur bacha ko bchalya. unhon ney saddar ko bataya ke woh bacha ko bachanay ke baare mein aik lamha bhi der nahi kiye. unhon ney kaha lillah ney meri madad ki. Allah ka shukar ke mein ney bacha ko bchalya.’ ‘ Gassamaہ ney saddar ko apni kahani sunai. saddar ney un se kaha ke tum ney bacha ki jaan bachaai, tumhari hosla afzai karni chahiye. Mr. Micron ney kaha’ ‘ chunkay yeh aik istasnai iqdaam hai, hum yaqeenan aaj aap ke tamam kaghzat ko baqaida bnadin ge, aur agar aap chahain to aap ko shehriat dainay ki karwai bhi shuru kar dein ge taakay aap francesi ban kar reh saken.’ ‘
1389.title: Paris mein haqeeqi Spider Man bachay ko bachanay jaan par khail gaya

news_detail: America mein aik televangelist ney –apne pirokaron se kaha hai ke woh unhein un ka choutha jet jahaaz kharidne ke liye chandah den kyun ke inhen aisa karne ke liye’ kkhuda vand’ ki janib se hukum diya gaya hai. Jessi Doplantis ney bataya ke unhein kkhuda ney kaha hai ke woh paanch crore 40 laakh dollar maliyat taqreeban 360. 48 crore hindustani rupay maliyat ka falkn seven x jahaaz khareedain. America mein kisi televangelist ka jahaaz rakhna ghayr-maa’mooli nahi hai, lekin is ke liye chnde ki darkhwast ney tanaza khara kar diya hai. twitter par sarfeen ney kaha hai ke unhein is par yaqeen nahi aa raha aur woh bible ki ayaat ka hawala day rahay hain jin mein hiras aur’ jaali payghambaroon’ se khabardaar kya gaya hai. kuch logon ney kaha hai ke yeh raqam ghareebon ki madad ke liye istemaal honi chahiye. apni Website par aik video pegham mein 68 sala Doplantis yun wazahat karte hain :’ aap jantay hain mere paas teen mukhtalif jet jahaaz rahay hain, mein ney unhein istemaal kya hai aur unhein Yasooh maseeh ke liye chalaya hai.’ baaz logon ka khayaal hai ke padrion ke paas tayyaray nahi honay chahiye. mera khayaal hai ke padrion ke paas har mumkin waseela hona chahiye, har mumkina zareya, taakay injeel ko duniya bhar taq pohanchaya ja sakay. unhon ney kaha ke jo jet unhon ney 12 saal qabal khareeda tha woh un ke liye ab mozoon nahi raha kyun ke woh bulaa ruke parwaaz nahi kar sakta aur unhein eendhan ke liye bhaari raqam kharch karna padtee hai. aik tasweer mein woh apne teen jahazoo ke paas kharray nazar atay hain, oopar likha hai :’ yeh malkiat ke baare mein nahi hai, yeh tarjeehat ke baare mein hai.’ Doplantis ney apni darkhwast ki yeh keh kar tojeeh paish ki hai ke eesa maseeh ney kaha tha ke duniya bhar mein jao aur injeel ka pegham har Zee rooh taq pouncha do. kya hum aisa karen ge? meri itni Umar nahi bachi ke mein car ya behri jahaaz ya train ke zariye safar kar sakun, lekin jahaaz par yeh safar mumkin hai.’ 2015 mein Doplantis ki aik video aayi thi jis mein woh aik aur televangelist kinith cop land ke sath kharray hain aur cop land keh rahay hain ke musafiron walay jahaaz par safar karna aisa hi hai Jessiay’ aik lambi tube mein shaitano ke sath safar karna.’ yeh pehla mauqa nahi ke America mein kisi televangelist ney jahaaz kharidne ke liye awam se chandah manga ho. sunah 2015 hamza mein Amrici mubalagh Creflo  Dollar ney –apne pirokaron se kaha tha ke is ke liye 6 crore dollar ki raqam jama karen taakay is se –apne liye’ gulf stream jee 650′ model ka tayyarah khareed saken. rawan saal aik televangelist kahen  Cobland ney apne hamion ke chnde se panchawan gulf stream tayyarah khareed kya tha
1393.title: ‘kkhuda ney hukum diya hai ke chnde se naya jet tayyarah khariden’ : Amrici televangelist

news_detail: Huston: Amrici riyasat Texas mein 1 shakhs ko saanp ke katay hue sar neh duss liya jis ke baais woh marnay ke qareeb poanch gaya aur usay bachanay ke liye anti snake dawa ke 26 dose diye gaye jabkay umomi taur par saanp dsne par do taa chaar dose hi dyie jatay hain. mutasarah shakhs ki biwi Jennifer Sutcliffe neh american TV ko bataya ke is ke shohar baagh mein kaam kar rahay they ke achanak unhon neh taqreeban chaar foot taweel aik saanp dekha jisay unhon neh bailcha se kuchal kar khatam kardiya. khatoon neh bataya ke lekin jab un ke shohar neh saanp ki baqyat ko utha kar inhen phenkna chahta to saanp ke katay hue sar neh bhi inhen duss liya aur is neh apna sara zeher jism mein chore diya jis ke baad inhen fori taur par qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan inhen anti snake dawa di gayi, taqreeban aik haftay baad hi un ki haalat kisi qabil hosaki is douran inhen bachanay ke liye dawa ke 26 dose diye gaye. university of ayrizona viper insti tute ki Dr. Lisle neh saanp ko maartay waqt ya usay kaatnay se mutaliq awam ko khabardaar karte hue kaha hai ke yeh janwaron ke sath aik sifakana amal hai ke usay kaat diya jaye. khayaal rahay ke aik saanp marnay ke kayi ghanton baad taq bhi dsne ki salahiyat rakhta hai.
1396.title: Amrici shehri ko saanp ke katay hue sar neh duss liya

news_detail: Japani Shehzadi Ayako ne aam shehri se shadi ka elaan kya hai, is se qabal un hi ke khandan ki do shehzaadiyan dil ke hathon majaboor ho kar Shahi rutba chodhne ko tayyar huien. Japan ke Shahi zaraye se maloom sun-hwa hai ke Shahensha Akihito ke marhoom cousin Takamodo ki teesri aur sab se chuute Dukhtar shipping firm ‘NYK Line’ se wabsta 32 sala Kei Moriya nami aik aam shehri se rishta izdiwaj mein munsalik honay ka ardah rakhti hain. dono aik saal se aik dosray ko jantay hain, guzashta roz unhon ne 12 augst ko mangni jabkay shadi 29 october ko karne ka elaan kya hai. Shehzadi aaya ko ne samaji Falah o behbood mein master ki degree haasil kar rakhi hai., un Kei Moriya se pehli mulaqaat un ki walida Shehzadi Takamodo ke zareya hui. Shehzadi Takamodo, Moriya ke walidain ko aik flahi tanzeem ke sargaram karkun ki hesiyat se janti hain, unhon ne’ Ayako’ ki aalmi flahi sar garmion mein dilchaspi dekhte hue Moriya ki  walidain se mulaqaat karwai. aalmi flahi sar garmion mein maloomat aur zehni hum ahangi honay ke ilawa’ Ayako’ aur Moriya mein doosri baatein bhi mushtarik hain, dono ko askiyng, kitabon aur safar se bhi gehri dilchaspi hai. Japan ke Shahi qanoon ke tehat ‘Ayako’ ko ‘Moriya’ se shadi karne ke baad apna Shahi rutba tark karna parre ga yani phir inhen Shehzadi ki hesiyat se nahi balkay aik aam shehri ki hesiyat se zindagi guzaarni ho gi. Shehzadi Ayako Japani Shahi khandan ki woh pehli fard nahi jo aik aam shehri se shadi karne apna Shahi rutba chodd rahi hain, is se qabal Japani Shahensha Akihito ki sab se badi poti, 25 sala Shehzadi Mako ne bhi Tokyo ki aik qanooni firm se wabsta’ Kei Komoro nami shakhs se shadi kar ke Shahi khandan ko chodhne ka iradah rakhti hain taham abhi un ki shadi takheer ka shikaar hai. un ka kehna hai ke abhi woh shadi ke liye tayyar nahi hain. Shehzadi Ayako ki phophi, Shehzadi Sayako ne bhi 2005 mein apni Shahi hesiyat thukraate hue aik aam Japani Yoshuki Kroda se shadi karli thi jis ke baad se aaj tak woh aik mamooli se ghar mein muqeem hain jahan inhen saaray kaam khud hi karna parte hain. agar Shehzadi Mako aur Shehzadi Ayako Shahi rutba chodd deti hain to Japani Shahi khandan ke arkaan ki tadaad ghatt kar 17 reh jati hai, jis ki wajah se un par Shahi umoor ki injaam dahi ka boojh barh jaye ga. yaad rahay ke Shahi khandan mein 2006 se qabal 40 baras tak koi mard rukan peda nahi sun-hwa tha taham shehzada Hisahito ki 2006 hamza mein paidaiesh se Shahi khandan ko aik mard waris mil chuka hai.
1341.title: Aik aur ‘Japani Shehzadi’ Shahi rutba chodhne chali

news_detail: Indonesian khandan us waqt dang reh gaya jab un ke ghar ki khatoon jinhein unhon ne 18 monthsqabal samandar mein doubtey dekha tha woh isi saahil par zindah salamat be hoshi ki haalat mein payi gayi. pichlle saal January ke awail mein maghribi java mein aik bohat barri samandari lehar 53 sala Nining Sunarsih ko baha le gayi thi aur hakkaam usay murda samajh baithy thay. doosri janib murda samjhi jaany wali khatoon ki laash athaara mahino mein kabhi bhi nahi mili jabkay khatoon ke khandan ko is baat ki umeed thi ke Nining Sunarsih zindah mil jaye gi aur yeh moujza samnay agayaa. khatoon ke khandan ka kehna hai ke un ke waalid ko pur asraar khawab anay lagey to woh hafta ke roz isi saahil par wapas gaye aur unhon ne dekha ke Nining Sunarsih 18 months baad be hoshi ki haalat mein isi saahil par pari hui hai jabkay jis raat usay samandari lehar baha le gayi thi isi waqt ke kapray bhi is ne Zaib tan kiye hue hain. Sunarsih ko fauri tor par hospital le jaya gaya jahan doctoron ne bataya ke khatoon ki jismani haalat behtar hai aur tawaqqa hai ke woh poori terhan sehat yab hojaye gi
1353.title: 18 months qabal samandar mein doobi khatoon zindah mil gayi

news_detail: Mehboob se mulaqaat ke liye ‘chaand aur tarre tod laane’ ki romanvi battain ab khyaali tasawurat se badh kar haqeeqat ka roop dharti dikhayi deti hain. agarchay chaand tarre todna to mehez mohawra istemaal kya jata hai magar do mohabbat karne walon ka chaand par milaap, izhaar mohabbat aur aik dosray ko shadi ka pegham ikeeswen sadi ka’ junooni’ aur sab se pur josh safar ban-na ab khawab nahi raha hai.’ Al Arabia dot net’ ke mutabiq heran kin shadion ke intizamaa ki tafsilat shaya karne wali ‘Apoteosurrise’ Nami agency ney aik naya plan tarteeb diya hai jis ke tehat sunah 2022 hamza mein chaand par parwaaz ke douran mohabbat karne wala jora aik dosray ko shadi ke liye’ prapose’ kar sakay ga. chaand ki satah par yeh mashoor safar gulukar Frank Sinatra ke geet ‘Fly Me to the Moon’ se shuru hoga. Aik hafta tak jari rehne walay is munfarid khalayi sfrke liye dono [ aashiq aur mashooq ] aik azad casole mein safar karen ge. woh is safar mein zameen se bahar khala mein aik dosray ke sath mohabbat ke izhaar aur shadi ke liye aik dosray ko prapose kar saken ge. taham yeh safar harkas o nakas ke bas ki baat nahi. is ke liye tamam tekniki aur zurori maloomat ke husool ke sath ahteyati tadabeer ka samjhna na guzeer hoga. magar is se bhi pehlay jore ke paas sfrke akhrajaat jo aik crore 45 laakh dollar taq ho saktay hain ka intizam bhi hona chahiye. agency ke mutabiq khala mein shadi ke liye proposal 13. 8 arab saal ke insani safar ka sab se khobsorat aur junoon aamaiz andaaz hoga. sfrki tayario ka aaghaz March 2022 hamza ko hoga. is ke liye dono afraad ko www.proposeinspirs com par khud ko registered karana hoga jis ke baad woh aglay paanch mah mein darj zail noiyat ke intizamaa ki tayari karen ge .
inhen musalsal baara hafta taq jismani aur takneeki tarbiyat di jaye gi .
muqarara tareekh par Amrici riyasat Florida ke Kennedy Space Center mein pohanchna hoga .
Richard Strauss ke geet ‘Also Sprach Zarathustra, op. 30’ ki dhun bajtay hi dono sayaho ko apne wazan ke inedaam ka ehsas karte hue khusoosi hilmt ko istemaal karna hoga.
Is ke teen din baad woh chaand se 200 ya 300 kilometer ki masafat par parwaaz kar rahay hon ge .
wahan un ka zameen se 30 minute ke liye rabita munqita hojaye ga. yeh woh waqt hoga jab woh casole mein chaand ke tareek hissay par urr rahay hon ge .
chaand ke madaar ke nisf safar ke douran geet ‘Fly Me to the Moon’ chal padega. Is mauqa par dono aik dosray ko shadi ki angushteri jo, un ke khalayi libaas mein mojood hogi paish kar saken ge .

Chaand ki satah ke qareeb se woh zameen ka heran kin nzarah karen ge jis ke baad un ki wapsi ka chaar roza safar shuru hoga. yun yeh insani tareekh ka shadi ki proposal ka pur josh safar –apne ekhtataam ko puhanche ga.
1364.title: ‘Insani tareekh mein shadi ki sab se purjosh’ proposal ka ‘khalayi safar ‘

news_detail: Itwaar ke roz social media par gardish mein anay walay aik video clip mein Moroco ke wazeer tawanai wo madaniyat apne jism ko record darja hararat mein intahi garam rait ke andar dafan kiye hue nazar aa rahay hain. Morocan wazeer Aziz al Ribah ney malik ke junoob mashriqi qasba Mazruka mein ilaaj ki gharz se khud ko matti ke andar dabaya taa ke woh khud ko darpaish joron ke baaz amraaz se Shifa pa saken. mazkoorah sahrayi ilaqa garam rait ke zareya ilaaj ke hawalay se jana jata hai. video mein Morocan wazeer gardan taq qabar jaisay garhay mein madfoon nazar aa rahay hain, yeh garha khusoosi tor par un ke liye tayyar kya gaya tha. wazeer ke sir ko gole chhatri se saya faraham kya gaya. is terhan Aziz al Ribah rait ke ghusal se lutaf andoz hotay nazar aa rahay hain.
1376.title: Morocan Minister ko sehra mein zindah kyun dafan kya gaya?

news_detail: Bartania mein 87 sala Manny Davison aur un ki 82 sala ahliya Brigitta ko us waqt shadeed dhachka pouncha jab 60 Crores pound maliyat ki meeras haasil karne ke baad un ke betay aur beti ney apne maa baap ko aalishaan ghar se nikaal diya. Ab yeh walidain aur un ki aulaad aik dosray ke khilaaf adalat mein qanooni jung lar rahay hain. Is gharana ke betay aur beti ko milney wali meeras mein aik aalishaan bangla, karodon pound ki jayedad, bhaari miqdaar mein soney jawahraat aur 1. 7 crore pound se ziyada ke nawadiraat aur fun paaray shaamil hain. Many davidson aur un ki ahliya Brigitta ney apni tamam tar doulat properly ke shoba mein din raat mehnat kar ke kamaai. taham ab yeh dono apni 57 sala beti Maxine aur 55 sala betay jerald se adalat mein nabard aazma hain. walidain ney apni beti aur betay ke khilaaf muqadma dair kar rakha hai taa ke woh yaadgaar nawadiraat aur puraney fun paaron ka shaan daar majmoa wapas haasil kar len jo jumla amlaak ke sath un ki aulaad ke paas chala gaya hai. Bartania mein is gharane ke markazi aur Ali shaan ghar “Lyegrove House ” ke hawala se maamla yeh hai ke walidain is ghar ko khandan ke nasal dar nasal makaan ke taur par dekhney ke khwahish mand they. taham 2011 mein davidson aur un ki ahliya monako muntaqil honey ke baad jab 2015 mein watan lautay to un ko is aalishaan ghar se be dakhal kya ja chuka tha. is tanaza ka markazi pehlu woh do” ikhtiyaari trust” hain jo davidson ney 1967 hamza mein baneye they aur –apne betay aur beti ko is ke markazi beneficiaries ke tor par naamzad kar diya tha .
