Taham 2011 se khandani taluqaat mein bigaad aana shuru huwa jab ke ziyada tar maal o doulat qanooni tor par davidson ke betay aur beti ke haath mein aati rahi. un ikhtiyaari trsts ke hawala se ikhtilaaf ka tasfia aakhir kaar Maxine aur jerald ke haq mein sun-hwa aur dono walidain khasaray ke haq daar thehray. Albata ab yeh khandan aik baar phir ikhtilaaf ke dairay mein hai aur is martaba is ki bunyaad 600 ke qareeb yaadgaar nawadiraat aur fun paaray hain. Davidson aur Brigitta ke beta aur beti apne walidain ki khatir 1. 7 Crore pound maliyat ki un ashya se kisi taur bhi dast bardaar honey ke khwahish mand nahi hain jab ke yeh raqam dono aulaad ko haasil honey wali majmoi doulat 60 Crore pound ke muqablay mein kuch hesiyat nahi rakhti. Ab Davidson ko is amar par shadeed afsos hai ke unhon ney meeras par tax ke andaishay ke sabab apni aulaad ke liye ikhtiyaari trsts kyun baneye.
1381.title: Aulaad ko 60 Crores pound paish karne walay walidain ke sath aisa bhi ho sakta hai

news_detail: Mesa. Arizona ke Hospital mein bohat saaray bachon ki kilkariyaan suneney ko milnay wali hain jahan ki 16 Nurses haamila hogayi hain. Yeh Nurses Maternity Ward ki nahi balkay Intensive Care Unit ki hain. Intensive Care Unit ki 16 narses ney haal hi mein yeh paaya ke woh sab ki sab haamila hain. Yeh 16 Nurses mukhtalif Intensive Care Unit se talluq rakhti hain. Nurse Juliyan Garrow ney kaha ke hum sab ney eksaath chuttiyan panay ke liye yeh mansoobah banaya. Mesebena Desert Medical Center ki narson ney az-rah mazaq kaha ke unhon ney samjha ke woh samjhi theen ke pani mein kuch hai jab yeh wazeh hogaya ke woh sab ki sab October aur January ke darmain bachon ko janam day payengi. Nurses Rotchet Sherman ney kaha ke Facebook Group kholnay tak mein nahi samjhti thi ke hum yeh jaan payen ge ke hum mein se kitni haamila hain. Nurse Peg Packerd ney kaha ke mein jantee hoon ke hum mein se kuch ney baaraavari ka ilaaj karwaya hai. Narses ney kaha ke hum sab pasand karti hain ke hamal ki shadeed khwahish ki tamaniat ke liye sab mil kar Cafetaria jayen. Aik nurse ney bataya ke is ney Cafetaria ke worker se kaha tha ke aaya who ” haamola dost” salad bar ko bhedha sakte hain aur tajweez paish ki thi ke achaar aur zaitoon rakh sakte hain. Aur dosray din se achaar aur zaitoon wahan paye gaye. Yeh Nurses September aur February ke darmyan 12 hafton ke liye rukhsat zachgi par ja sakti hain jis ki wajah se Hospital mein narson ki qillat paida hosakti hai jis ko rafa karne ke liye Hospital intezamia mutabadil intezamat  karne par ghour kar raha hai. Hospital intezamia ney un narson ke liye khusoosi dheela dhala libaas diya hai.
1387.title: Arizona ke aik Hospital ki 16 Nurses bayak-waqt haamila

news_detail: Mumbai mein aik aisa fankar bhi hai jo type writer se Potrait banata hai. Media ke mutabiq Mumbai shehar ke aik ghar se din raat clickety-clack, Clickety-clack ki aawazen aati thiin, pata karne par maloom huwa ke aik zayeef shehri ‘ Chandra Khand Bhide’ type writer ki madad se naya art takhleeq kar rahay hain. 72 sala Chandra Khand Bhide ney media se guftagu karte huwe bataya ke woh type writer ki madad se kayi mashoor shaksiaat ke Potrait bana chuke hain jo kaafi had tak un se mumasilat rakhtay hain. Aik interview mein Chandra Khand Bhide ney bataya ke woh ab tak Gandhiji, Jawarlal Nehru, Indira Gandhi, Charlie Chaplin Rajiv Gandhi, Kapil Dev, Bala Thackray aur Harry samait kayi mashhoor shaksiaat ki tasaveer bana chuke hain. Unhon ney kaha ke un ka shouq un ka jazba hai. Bhide ney bataya ke woh 12 se zayed noumayshon mein hissa le chuke hain aur ab woh apne ilaqe ke aik bohat baday star ban gaye hain jabkay iss se qabl woh Union Bank of India ke Administrative Department mein Clerk ki haisiyat se kaam karte thae. Unhon ney kaha ke un ki jawani se yeh khwahish thi ke woh Art School jayen taakay Art ki mukammal taleem un ko faraham hosakay lekin un ke waldain Art School ke akhrajaat bardasht nahi kar saktay thae aur isi liye woh aik typist ban gaye. Bhide ney mazeed kaha ke jab unhon ney type writer ke zareya Potrait bananay ka kaam shuru kya to woh uss waqt mehez (x) ka istemaal karte thae phir woh aahista aahista baqi huroof ko bhi apni tasweeron mein shaamil karne lagey Bhide ney bataya ke unhon ney iss kaam ka aagaz apne bhagwan Ganesh ki tasaveer bananay se kya. Media reports ke mutabiq Bhide ko aik Potrait bananay mein 15 minute ka waqt lagta hai jabkay is Potrait mein sirf rang bharnay mein unhen kayi ghantey lag jatay hain Bhide ney bataya ke chunkay type writer mein ‘Delete’ ka option maujood nahi iss liye kisi bhi ghalti ki soorat mein unhen poori tasweer dobarah se banana padti hai. Interview ke ekhtataam mein unhon ney bataya ke woh ab Malika Elizebath, Donald Trump aur kayi badi shaksiaat ki tasaveer bananay ka iradah rakhtay hain .
1391.title: Type Writer se Potrait bananay wala fankar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Yun to Hyderabad kayi cheezon ke liye mumtaz hai. yahan ki yadgaar imaaraton ki apni aik infiradiat hai. Fun e taamer ke aitbaar se Hyderabad mein aisi bahot si emiratein hain jo apni misaal aap hai. jahan tak msajd ka talluq hai Hyderabad mein kayi aisi msajd hain jo nihayat hi purkashish hain aur dekhnay walon ko apni taraf mutwajjah krliti hain magar aik aisi bhi Masjid hai jis ko khud Hyderabadion ne faramosh kardiya hai. Yeh Masjid na hi fun taameer ka koi ajooba hai aur na hi itni badi hai ke iss ko shumaar kya jasakay magar yeh Masjid bahot jald na sirf apni infiradiat manwale gi balkay bain ul aqwami sayyahon ko bhi Hyderabad ki taraf raghib kere gi. Raqba ke aitbaar se yeh duniya ki sab se choti Masjid hai jis mein baushkil 10 musalli hi namaz ada kar saktay hain. Yeh Masjid agarchay bulandi par waqay hai magar abhi tak iss ki taraf koi mutwajjah nahi huwa hai magar Hyderabad mein assaar Qadima se dilchaspi rakhnay walon ke aik group ne is Masjid ki ifadiyat ko bhaanp liya aur ab is Masjid ko duniya ki sab se choti Masjid ka darjah dilanay ka bedah uthaya hai. Ji haan hum baat kar rahay hain Dargaah hazrat Syed Shah Imaduddin Mohammad Mahmood al Hussaini ki pahadi par waqay Masjid ki. Yeh Mir Mahmood ki pahadi Kishan Bagh mein waqay hai. Pahadi par chadh kar jab aap Dargaah ke entrance ke qareeb pahonchain ge to aap ko seedhi janib aik weeraan dhancha nazar aeye ga aur is ke Minar o Mehrab dekh kar aap jaan jayen ge ke yeh Masjid hi hai. Jab aap qareeb jaakar dekhen ge to aap ko hairat hogi is choti se Masjid mein na sirf mehrab hai balkay chota sa minbar bhi hai aur imam ke peechay sirf do safoon ki gunjayish hai aur aik saf mein bamushkil 5 musalli hi thaher satke hain. Agar aap zehan par thora sa zor den ge to waqai aap bhi yeh sochnay lagen ge ke is se choti bhi koi Masjid hosakti hai. Jahan tak hamari maloomat hain iss se choti to koi Masjid nahi hai magar Bhopal mein waqay dhai seedhi ki Masjid ko duniya ki sab se choti Masjid tasawwur kya jata hai. Raqba ke etebaar se dekha jaye to Hyderabad mein payi jaany wali yeh Masjid Bhopal ki Masjid se sirf aadhi hai. Iss Masjid ke seedhi janib seedhiyan bhi jis ke zareya oopar jaya ja sakta hai. Oopar aik mundair bana sun-hwa hai, jahan se shayed Azaan di jati thi. Bataya jata hai ke yeh Masjid hazrat syed Shah Imaduddin Mohammad Mahmood al Husaini ne hi taamer karwaya jinhon ne Abdullah Qutub Shah ke zamana mein Iraq se Hyderabad aamad ke baad Mir Aalam talaab ke aik janib waqay aik pursukoon pahadi ko apna maskan banalya tha. Woh darasal Iraq ke rehne walay thae magar apne peer hukum ki tameel mein Hyderabad ka rukh kya aur is pahadi ko muntakhib kya jahan un ki aakhri aaram gaah hai. Hazrat Mahmood ul Hussaini ke baray mein kaha jata hai ke unhon ne apni hayaat mein hi apni aakhri aaram gaah taamer karwali thi aur uss ki taamer ke liye unhon ne mazdooron ko jo muawza diya karte thae woh uss waqt ke Badshah ki janib se mazdooron ko diye jaany walay muawza se dugna huwa karta tha. Bataya jata hai ke woh haamila khawateen ko bhi dugna muawza diya karte thae. Iss Masjid ke baray mein hamein tareekh mein koi mawaad to nahi milta hai magar yeh samjha jata hai ke is Masjid ko bhi aap hi ne taamer karwaya tha. Tarz e taameer aur hazrat ke zamana ke aitbaar se itna to kaha ja sakta hai ke yeh Qutub Shahi daur ki Masjid hai. Muqami logon mein yeh baat mashhoor hai ke yeh Masjid jinoon ki hai. Shayed yeh wajah hai ke Dargaah ke atraaf abadi badh jaany ke bawajood bhi insaan iss Masjid mein namaz ada karne se ghabrate hain. Agarchay Dargaah ke ihata mein aik hissa ko Masjid mein tabdeel kardiya gaya hai magar iss Masjid ko abaad karne ki koshish nahi ki gayi. Mutawalli ki bhi adam dilchaspi ke baayis yeh Masjid aik khandhar mein tabdeel hokar rahe gayi is ke bawajood agar thodi si marammat kar di jaye to yeh Masjid kayi baras tak sahih wo saalim rah sakti hai. Maahir assaar e qadima janab Mohammad Safiullah ne bataya ke hamari yeh koshish hai ke is Masjid ko duniya ki sab se choti Masjid ka darjah dilaya jaye. Iss khusoos mein un ke aik dost Haseeb Jafferi ki nigrani mein iss Masjid ki paimayesh ki jarahi hai taakay iss Masjid ko duniya ki sab se choti Masjid honay ka darja haasil kya jaye. Unhon ne bataya ke haal hi mein unhon ne Bhopal ka daura kya tha taakay Hyderabad ki is Masjid ka Bhopal ki iss Masjid se mawazna kya jaye jisay ab tak duniya ki sab se choti Masjid samjha gaya hai. Mr. Safiullah ne kaha ke Hyderabad ki yeh Masjid haqeeqat mein Bhopal ki Masjid se choti  hai. Unhon ne iss yaqeen ka izhaar kiya ke jab hum is Masjid ke hudood arabaa paish kar dein ge to duniya yeh tasleem karley gi ke waqai Hyderabad ki iss Masjid se choti Masjid koi aur nahi hai. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke Turkey walay bhi yeh daawa karte hain ke un ke paas bhi duniya ki sab se choti Masjid hai jis mein imam ke alawa sirf do log hi namaz ada kar saktay hain magar koi bhi iss ko Masjid tasleem nahi karta chunkay sirf do logon ke liye banai gayi jagah ko Masjid kehna durust nahi hai. Unhon ne hukoomat Telangana se bhi khwahish ki ke is Masjid ki nighadasht ke iqdamaat kiye jayen chunkay jab is Masjid ko duniya ki sab se choti Masjid ka darjah mil jaye ga to s ka mushahida o nzarah karne ke liye duniya ke konay konay se log aanay lagen ge.
1394.title: Hyderabad mein duniya ki sab se choti Masjid!

news_detail: Australia mein Strawberries se purasraar aadhi soyyan (silver rod) nikalney lagien jis se sahehri khaufzadah ho gaye hain, mehakuma sahet ney awam se Strawberries istemaal nah karne ki appeal kar di. Australia ki riyasaton Queensland, New Southwales aur Victoria mein Strawberries se niddles nikal aayen, jis ke baad mehakuma sahet ney shahrion se appeal ki hai ke woh pahelay se khareedi hui Strawberries istemaal na karen. Niddles nikalney ke waqeye ke baad mutaliqa dono brands ney market se maal wapas mangawa liya hai. Police ney waqeye ki tehqiqaat shuru kar di hain, niddles wali strawberry khanay se 1 shakhs ko hospital bhi jana para .

Queensland Police ka kahena hai ke maghribi Brisbane ki aik supermarkt mein Strawberry phalon ki aik tokri mein aik chubhai huvi nisf suyi dastyab honay ke baad woh aik mushtaba ”copycat” waqea ki tehqiqaat kar rahi hain. ”Copycat” aik istilaah hai jo pur-tashaddud qatal ya khudkushi ke talluq se sansani khaiz tashheer ke liye istemaal ki jati hai jis ke nateeja mein waisay hi tasaworati kahaniyan ghadi jati hain. Police is mujrim ki talaash mein hai jis ney Strawberry mein silai machine ki soyyan chuboyi  hain. Strawberry mein se silver rods nikalney ki khabar aam honay ke sath hi mumlikat ke Chief Medical Officer ko yeh mahswara dena pada ke Strawberry ke istemaal mein ahtiyat ki jaye. Police ney bataya ke Koles ke aik mulazim ney apne kaam ki jagah se khareeday gaye Strawberries ki tokri mein silai soyi dekhi. Yeh Strawberries ke oopri hissa mein chuboyi hui theen. Aik Police ohdedar ney awam se khwahish ki ke woh apni Strawberries mein kuch bhi ghair mamooli cheez dekhen to woh Police ko ittila dein ya phone par aagah karen. Aik kisaan ney kaha ke is mausam mein jo hamaray liye pahley se hi kuch aaccha nahi hai, is tarha ke waqiaat ki baday paimana par tashheer ke nateeja mein hamara kaarobar thap hokar rah jaye ga. Police ney Strawberries mein soyyon ke paye jany ke mutadid waqeat ki tauseeq karte hue kaha ke mangal ke din Gladstone mein aik bacha school ko Strawberries le kar gaya tha aur jab is ney chhery ko khaya toh iss ke moonh mein soyi chubh gayi. Angela Stevenson nami khatoon ka kehna hai ke woh apne bacha ke liye Strawberry ko moonh mein chabaya toh iss ney paaya ke Strawberry ke andar soi chuboiy huvi hai. jis par is ney fauri school ko phone kar ke aagah kardiya ke un ke bacha ke tiffin mein Strawberries hain aur is ko prkha jaye. phone karne ke 5? minute baad school se inhen phone aaya ke aap ney der kar di aur bataya ke aap ke bacha ney is Strawberry ko chaba liya jis mein soi chuboiy hui thi. Khush qismati se is ney mun se woh soi nikaal li aur apni teacher ko aagah kiya.
1397.title: Australia mein Strawberry se niddles baraamad

news_detail: Paris: Aap ney bachon ki kahaaniyon filmon bilkhushoos ‘Hansel and Gretel’ mein aik ghar dekha hoga jo mukammal tor par Chocolate aur khaney peenay ki ashya se bana hota hai lekin ab France mein aik aisa hi chhota cottage banaya gaya hai jis ki har shai chocolate se bani hai. Iss ghar ki dewarain, chhat, aatish daan, ghadiyaal, kitaaben aur yahan tak ke fanoos bhi Chocolate se dhaalay gaye hain. Paris ke junoob maghribi nawah mein qayim is cottage ko France ke mashhoor chocolate designer jain lok Jean-Luc Decluzeau ney banaya hai. Iss ki khaas baat yeh hai ke batkhon ka talaab aur khud bistar tak chocolate se baney hain yani naam ki chand cheezon ke siwa ghar ka beshtar hissa chocolate se banaya gaya hai. Jean-Luc ney poori zindagi chocolate se hairat angaiz ashya takhleeq ki hain aur ab is ghar ki tayari ke liye bhi unhon ney bohat se naye andaaz aur technique par kaam kiya hai. Lekin ab sawal hai ke kiya iss ghar mein raha ja sakta hai  to iss ka jawab isbaat mein hai. Hotels ki booking ki aik bain ul aqwami website ke mutabiq jo log yahan raat guzaarna chahtay hain woh 5
aur 6

October ko yahan tehhar sakte hain. Yahan rukney walay afraad chocolate ghar mein aik workshop mein hissa le saken ge taakay woh isi terha ke chocolate ghar ka aik model bana saken. Iss ke alawa yahan ke dilkash phool baagh mein baith kar lazeez khaney bhi khaa sakenge.
1399.title: Chocolate se bana Ghar jahan aap reh bhi satke hain

news_detail: Bulgaria se sarhad uboor kar ke Serbia ki hudood mein daakhil honay wali haamla gaaye ku murawijja qawaneen ki takmeel ke baghair wapas lout anay par ”ghair qanooni hijrat” ke qanoon ke tehat sazae mout sunadi gayi. Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq guzashta roz Bulgaria ke sarhadi ilaqa mein waqay aik gaaye ghalti se sarhad uboor kar ke ghair Europi union malik Serbia ki sarhad mein daakhil hogayi thi. sarhad ke paar Serbia ke dehation ney gaaye ko pakad kar dekh bhaal shuru kar di. is douran gaaye ke maalik ney sarhad par patroling karne walay ehalkaron se rabita kya jinhon ney gaaye ko Serbia ke dehation se le kar maalik ke hawalay kardiya aur yun gaaye dobarah Bulgaria pahonch gayi. taham Bulgaria ki intizamia ney gaaye ki aaeni dastawizaat aur qanooni zaroriat poori kiye gaye baghair Serbia ki sarhad uboor kar ke Bulgaria mein dakhlay ka sakht action letay hue ghair qanooni taur par sarhad uboor karne ke jurm mein gaaye ko sazae mout sunaate hue kaha ke qanooni baat yeh hai ke jurm sarzad huva hai lekin kis se huva hai yeh ahem nahi hai. aaeni dastawizaat ke baghair sarhad uboor karna sangeen jurm hai jis ki saza mout hai. gaaye ko is terha sazae mout sunaye janay ke baad social media mein is faislay ko mazhaka khaiz qarar dete hue sarifeen ney shadeed nuqta cheeni ki aur duniya bhar mein yeh trained ban gaya. wazeh rahay ke Serbia Europi union mein shaamil nahi jab ke Bulgaria Europi union mein shaamil malik hai jahan ghair Europi union mumalik se shadeed ikhtilafat ke baais immigration ke sakht qawaneen mojood hain aur sakht jaanch partaal aur thaka dainay wali kaghazi karwai ke baad hi ghair Europi union mumalik ke afraad ko dakhlay ki ijazat millti hai.
1338.title: Bulgaria mein sarhad uboor karne wali gaaye ko sazae mout sunadi gayi

news_detail: Masjid e  Nabawi mein anay walay zaireen ki nazron mein Saudi security ahal-kar numaya tareen hesiyat ke haamil nazar atay hain. yeh ahal car Masjid e  ke tamam hisson aur raastoon mein khidmaat injaam dete hue ibadat ke liye pursukoon mahol ko yakeeni bananay mein masroof amal hotay hain. is hawala se aik security afsar ne Al Arabia news channel ko bataya ke tamam bazaar aur dukanain bhi security ahal karon ki khufia aur elania mojoodgi se mustafeed hoti hain. Is douran traffic ki ravani jari rakhnay par bhi khusoosi tavajja di jati hai. Masjid e  Nabawi mein Special Forces ke sarbarah Major General Abdul Rahman Almusham aur un ke saathi Masjid e  Nabawi ka rukh karne walon ki security ko yakeeni bananay ke liye hama waqt sargaram rehtay hain. unhon ne bataya ke” hamara kaam, jagah aur waqt sab mutayyan hai. duniya bhar se mukhtalif rang o nasal aur saqafat ke haamil afraad ki aamad ke bawajood Allah ke fazl se guzashta aik baras se security ahal karon ki tandahi aur chaabak dasti mazeed qabil tehseen ho gayi hai “. Masjid e  Nabawi mein baab salam ke rastay se anay walay zaireen ki aamad o raft ko munnazam rakhnay par khusoosi tavajja di jati hai taa ke roza rasool sale Allah aleh wasallam par salaam ke vaastaa Mawajh shareef anay walon ko kisi qisam ki dhakam pail ka saamna nah ho. is ke ilawa naye intizamaa ke nateeja mein ab Mawajh shareef par anay walon aur pehli saf mein mojood afraad ke darmain jagah ki koi tangi peda nahi hoti hai. major general Abdul Rahman Almehsham ke mutabiq Masjid e  Nabawi mein imam ko rasool Allah sale Allah aleh wasallam ke musalle par wapas laane ke sabab baab salam se Mawajh shareef par duroood o salaam ki gharz se anay walay afraad ke guzarnay mein barri sahoolat peda ho gayi hai. ramadaan mubarak mein Masjid e  Nabawi mein insanon ka aik samandar umadd aata hai. taham is douran bhi raat aur din mukhtalif noiyat ki khidmaat zaireen aur namazion ke jmِ Ghafeer ka istaqbaal karti nazar aati hain.
1349.title: Masjid e  Nabawi mein security ahal- karon ki khidmaat

news_detail: Uttar Pradesh Board imtehanaat ke Jaria saal ke aik Topper ka josh o walwala is waqt mayoosi ki nazar hogaya jab Chief Minister Yogi Yogi Adityanath ki janib se usay paish kardah Cheque bounce hogaya, is par sitam zrifi yeh hui ke usay Cheque ke bounce hojane ka harjana bhi ada karna pada. Uttar Pradesh Secondary Education Board ke dasvin jamaat ke imtehanaat mein riyasat bhar mein satwaan rank laane walay Alok Misra ko Lucknow mein tahniati taqreeb ke liye 29 May ku talabb kya gaya tha aur imtehanaat mein 93. 5 feesad nishanaat haasil karne par Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath ki janib se aik laakh rupay ka Cheque paish kya gaya tha. taalib ilm ke waalid ney 5

June ko Bank mein Cheque deposit karwadia jis par inhen bataya gaya ke dastakhaton ke main na khanay ke bayeis Cheque bounce hochuka hai, jis ke liye unhen harjana bhi ada karna pada. Taalib ilm ko paish kardah Cheque par Rajkumar Yadav District Inspector of Schools Barabanki ke dastakhat hain. Young Stream College ke taalib ilm Alok ney kaha ”Chief Minister se Cheque pakar mein bohat khush tha. .. . lekin Cheque jama krwane ke do dinon baad pata chala ke woh bounce hogaya. .. is ki wajah se kuch mayoosi hui”. Rabita karne par yadav ney kaha ke taalib ilm ko aik aur cheque diya gya aur maamla ki yaksoi kar di gayi hai. unhon ney kaha ke kisi dosray taalib ilm se aisi shikayat masool nahi hui hai. district magistrate ade bhano trpathi ney maamla ko sangeen qarar dete hue kaha ke kisi qisam ki kotahi payi janay par karwai ki jaye gi.
1359.title: UP Board ke aik Topper ko diya gaya Chief Minister Yogi ka Cheque bounce!

news_detail: Visakapatnam. Andhra Pradesh ke Visakapatnam zila ke qabayeli ilaqon mein mareezon aur zaeef o mazoor hazraat ko bambus par muntakil karne ka sadiiyon purana tareeqa aaj bhi raaij hai. 1 shakhs naay apni haamela biwi ko chand khawateen aur do mardon naay aik jhoola bana kar usay –apne jismon par laad kar ambulance tak muntakil kya. bataya jata hai ke mean road tak hi ambulance poanch payi thi jo is khatoon ke gaon se 6 kilometer ke faasla par hai. dehation naay bataya ke chand saal qabal kachi sarrak barish mein beh gayi thi jis ki durust karne ki koshish nahi ki gayi. Gamila  Lingu ko jummay ko dard zeh shuru sun-hwa chunkay kottapratala mandal ke moza Anuku mein hamal o naqal ke jadeed zaraye mojood nahi hai. agarchay muqami logon naay 108 ambulance ko cal kya tha taham mozoon sarrak rabita nah honay par gaari bar waqat dehaat ko nahi poanch saki. koi dosra rasta nah paker rishta daaron naay khatoon ko ambulance ki jagah tak pohanchaya jahan se is khatoon ko ambulance ke zariye qaribi Mandal Headquarters hospital muntakil kya gaya jahan is naay aik bacha ko janam diya. is waqea ki ittila milnay par muqami rukan assembly anita naay sarrak bichenay ke iqdamaat ka aaghaz kya
1373.title: Haamela khatoon ku Ambulance tak pohanchanay 6 kilometer tak jhulay mein le jana pada

news_detail: Aik Nigerian shakhs ney apne baap se izhaar mohabbat mein un ke faut hojane par sirf taboot mein dafan karne ki bajaye inhen 32 million Nigerian currency ki maliyat wali aik nai BMW car mein dafan kya. is shakhs ki shanakht Azubuike ke taur par ki gayi hai. Reports ke mutabiq taboot ki bajaye –apne baap ko nai BMW car mein ltakr usay pehlay se hi khode gay aik barray garhay mein dafan kardiya. yeh tadfeen riyasat Anambara ke aik village Ihiala LGA, MBOSI mein amal mein aayee jahan Azubuike ke waalid sukoonat Pazeer they.
1388.title: Nigerian bashindah ney baap ko BMW gaadi mein dafan kya

news_detail: Jakarta. Indonesia mein aik bohat bade azdahay ney aik khatoon ko zindah nigal liya aur is waqea se ilaqa mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. 27 foot taweel azdahay ko pakad kar jab is ka pait chaak kya gaya to is ke pait se khatoon ki luaab mein luthri hui mukammal laash bar aamad hui jis mein un ke kapray bhi numaya they. 54 sala khatoon do bachon ki maa thi aur jis ney brown saari aur surkh bouse pehna huwatha aur is ke kapday bhi qabil e shanakht they. Tiba nami khatoon Indonesia ke ilaqa junoob mashriqi slavisi ki rehaishi theen jo jumaraat ki raat se gayab thi aur agli subah is ke baiton ko aik jagah is ke chappal miley. is ke baad jab logon ney is ki talaash shuru ki to qareeb hi aik azdaha dekha gaya jis ka pait buri terhan phoola huwatha. yeh manzar dekh kar log ronay lagey aur fauri taur par azdahe ko maar kar is ka pait cheera gaya. maida ke andar khatoon ki laash maujood thi aur is ka sar saanp ki dum ki janib tha jis se zahir hota hai ke azdahe ney pehlay khatoon ka sar nigla tha. taham is waqt taq bohat der hochuki thi aur azdahe ke shikam mein khatoon dam toar chuki thi. Indonesia ke is ilaqa mein barray azdahe paye jatay hain jo chhootey Mamels aur janwaron ko zindah nigal letay hain lekin kabhi kabhi woh bachon aur khawateen ko bhi apna niwala banatay hain
1392.title: Indonesia mein 27 foot taweel azdaha khatoon ko zindah nigal gaya

news_detail: Bain ul aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Amrici riyasat California mein muammar parking plaza ki chothi manzil se gaadi neechay utaarnay ki koshish ke douran samnay se aati car ko dekh kar ghabra gayeen aur tawazun khokar gaadi ke break par paon rakhnay ke bajaye accelerator daba diya jis se gaadi ki raftaar taiz aur be qaboo ho kar hifazati jangla torti hui Hawa mein muallaq hogayi. Rescue idaray nay lohay ke janglay aur taron mein phas kar aadhi se ziyada Hawamein muallaq gaadi se muammar khatoon ko bahafazat nikaal kar baad azan gaadi ko bhi neechay utaar liya. khatoon ko qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan un ka mukammal tibbi muaina kya gaya. doctoron ka kehna hai ke khatoon ki tabiyat behtar hai taham woh is waqt haadsay ke baais zehni dabao ka shikaar hain. rescue idaray ke maahir ehalkaron ki tasaveer social media par vayrl hogyin jis par sarfeen nay ehalkaron ke jazbay ki tareef ki.
1395.title: Hawamein muallaq gaadi se muammar khatoon ku bahifazat utaar liya gaya

news_detail: Israeli mahireen Assaar e Qadima ney maqboza Bait al Muqaddas mein khdayi ke douran masjid aqsa al mubarak se mut-tasil slwan qasba se matti se tayyar kardah aik choti nayaab takhti daryaft ki hai jis par Arabi zabaan ke alfaaz darj hain. mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh mohar nahi hosakti. Taham ghalib imkaan yeh hai ke yeh koi taveez hai jo is dormin tahaffuz ke liye likha gaya. Israel ke aik maahir Assaar e Qadima Hebrew University ke Rothberg International School ke Dr. Nitzan Amitai- Preiss ka kehna hai ke matti se tayyar kardah is tukde ka hajam aik centi meter hai aur is par Arabi zabaan par mushtammil do sutoor wazeh dekhi ja sakti hain. pehli satar mein ” کریم یتکل علی اللہ ” aur doosri satar mein ”اللہ رب العالمین” ( kareem, Allah par hi tawakkal karta hai. Allah Tamam aalam ka Rab hai ) ke alfaaz munaqash hain. mahireen ka kehna hai ke bah zahir yeh kisi tehreer ka hissa ya dastawizaat ki mohar nahi lagta balkay yeh Abbasi daur mein likha gaya koi taveez hai kyunkay is daur mein is khittay mein taveez gunday ka culture aam tha aur yeh qareeban aik hazaar saal purana taveez hai. yeh Givati Parking Lot par aik chhootay se kamrah ki khdayi ke douran plaster flooring ke darmain mohar band mila. muqami akhbarat ke mutabiq mahireen ka kehna hai ke wusooq se nahi kaha ja sakta ke usay danista tor par farsh ke neechay dabaya gaya tha ya phir kareem Nami shakhs ki yeh taveez kho gai thi. Mauhqiqeen ki aaraa ke mutabiq is liye ke is taveez mein sorakh nahi jaisa ke umooman is mein dhaga proker gilaay mein pehna jata hai. hum sirf qiyaas kar saktay hain ke yeh kisi zewar mein jura gaya tha yaphr kisi qisam ke dubba mein mehfooz rakha gaya tha .

Falasteeni maahir assaar Qadima aur wizarat sayahat ke sabiq secretary dr Hamdan Taah ka kehna hai ke yeh aik heran kin daryaft hai. is se hum Abbasi daur hukoomat ke aakhri zamana ki riwayaat aur aqaed ka andaza laga sakte hain. is terhan ke taveez nah sirf abbas daur mein thay balkay aaj hamaray daur mein bhi mojood hain. dr Taah ka kehna tha ke al quds mein Israel ki khudayion ke douran ab taq aisi un ginat ashya aur dastawizaat mili hain magar shyoni hukoomat inhen manzar-e-aam prnhin latayen halaank Israel al quds mein dsyon tareekhi islami maqamat aur arab tahazeeb ke marakaz ki khudayian kar chuki hain jin mein qadeem Yaroshallam mein baab Al-Khaleel, Al-Magariba aur Alsharf kalonyan jaisay ahem aur tareekhi maqamat bhi shaamil hain. unhon ney kaha ke shyoni riyasat al quds mein khudayion ke zareya aik to poooray shehar ka naqsha tabdeel karne ke liye koshan hai aur doosri taraf woh shehar mein yahudion ki qadeem tahazeeb ki talaash aur mazumaa hekal sulemani ki bunyadon ki talaash mein hai taakay is ki aarr mein duniya ke samnay al quds ko yahudion ka shehar saabit kya jasakay. Israeli mehakma assaar Qadima ki al quds mein jari Khudayion mein Israel ki abrani universition ka taawun bhi haasil hai. Bait al Muqaddas mein khilafat abbas ki kayi barri barri tareekhi emiratein theen. aik centi meter ka tareekhi tukda un ke samnay koi hesiyat nahi rakhta. un se bhi qabal al quds mein Umavi mehlaat, girja ghar aur secron tareekhi maqamat shehar ke islami aur arab tashkees ki gawahi dete hain
1398.title: Bait al Muqaddas se matti ke dheelay par likha aik hazaar saal purana taveez daryaft

news_detail: Chouti mouti cheezon ki chori mamool ki baat hai magar darjanon tonnes wazni crane jaisi bhaari machine ka aik malik mein chori honey ke baad dosray malik mein poanch jana bulaa shuba na qabil yaqeen waqea lagta hai, magar haqeeqat mein aisa aik waqea hochuka hai. Al Arabia dot net ney is hairan kun waqea ki tafseelaat bayan ki hain. tafseelaat ke mutabiq chand mah qabal Germany mein 48 tonnes wazni crane chori hui jisay malik bhar mein dhoonda gaya magar is ka koi suraagh nah mila. teen mah ke baad pata chala ke woh crane to Misar poanch chuki hai. Germany ke shehar Stuttgart mein gum honey ke baad Misar se milney wali crane ke waqea ney logon ko herat mein daal diya hai. Germany police ney waqea ki tehqiqaat shuru kar di hain magar choron ney aisa kaam krdkhaya ke sikoriti idaron custom hakkaam ko kaanon kaan khabar tak nah hui ke aik dio hekal machine chori honey ke baad aik se dosray malik pouncha di gayi. yeh guzashta 19 March ka waqea hai jab Germany ke shehar Stuttgart mein 48 tonnes wazan crane achanak gayab hogayi. is ke maalik ney police ke paas crane chori ki shikayat darj karai aur crane ka number aur is ki deegar tamam tafseelaat police ko muhayya kar dein. police ney tamam mutaliqa idaron ki madad se gum honey wali crane ka suraagh laganey ki poori koshish ki magar koi pata nah chala. police ney choron ka pata chalaney ke liye mujrim ki nishandahi par paanch hazaar Euro inaam ka bhi elaan kya. crane ke maalik ka kehna hai ke crane ki qeemat 2 laakh Euro hai. aur usay aakhri baar Germany ke ilaqa a38 mein Arfort ki taraf le jatay dekha gaya. 20 March ko Germany ke akhbarat mein bhi crane chori ki khabrain shaya huien. behri aur buri bandar gahon ko bhi crane ki gumshudgi ke baarey mein ba khabar kya gaya. yahan tak ke teen mah ke baad crane ke baarey mein pata chala ke woh Misar ke shehar iskandriya pouncha di gayi hai aur is waqt iskandriya ke custom hakkaam ke paas hai. Germany ke akhbarat mein crane ki gumshudgi se ziyada is ki bar aamad ko heran kin qarar diya ja raha hai. log yeh sochney par majboor aur heran hain ke jahan aik soi bhi beron malik baghair chhaan bain ke nahi ja sakti wahan 48 tonnes wazni crane bhala kaisay chali gayi. crane chor usay samandar hi ke rastay mukhtalif mumalik se guzar kar Misar le gaya.
1400.title: Germany mein gayab honey wali 48 tonnes wazni crane Misar se baraamad

news_detail: France: Atharhaween sadi mein banaya gaya guldaan France ke aik ghar ke bala khana (attic) mein rakha tha jisay Sotheby’s France nelaam ghar ko farokht karne keliye diya gaya. Nelaam ghar walon ne is ki qeemat 5 se 7 laakh Euro rakhi thi lekin woh apni mujawaza qeemat se bhi 10 gina zayed qeemat par farokht hogaya aur yun is nelaam ghar se farokht honay wali sab se mehngi shye bhi saabit sun-hwa. yeh guldaan aik khandan ko waarsat mein mila tha jisay bekar samajh kar kayi saal kabaar khane mein rakha gaya. phir usay qeemat ke taayun ke liye aik nelaam ghar ko day diya gaya. Sotheby’s France mein asiayi nawadiraat ke maahir Oliver Willmar ne kaha ke guldaan farokht karne wala shakhs metro train se safar karkay aaya aur mere office mein aakar jooton ka aik dubba khoola jis mein akhbar mein lipta sun-hwa aik qadeem guldaan tha. Is guldaan ki khoubsurti dekh kar mein heran reh gaya. guldaan ki lambai 30 centi meter hai jo bulb numa saakht rakhta hai aur is par sabz, neelay, peelay aur jamni shades mein khobsorat naqsh o nigaar banaye gay hain. porcelain se bana guldaan China ke chung ahdِ saltanat (Xing Dynasty) se talluq rakhta hai jo China ka aakhri Shahi ehad bhi tha. Is par parinday aur hiran bhi naqsh hain aur oopri gardan par sunehri kasheeda kaari ki gayi hai. guldaan ki sab se khaas baat aik mohar hai jo Qianlong farmaa rawan ki mohar hai jo 1736 se 1796 taq China par hukmaran raha tha, isi liye yeh aik nayaab shye ka darjah rakhta hai. doosri dilchasp baat yeh hai ke nelamee shuru hotay hi boli dainay walon mein ziyada se ziyada raqam laganay ka muqaabla shuru hogaya aur sirf 20 minute mein is ki boli 19 million dollar par poanch kar khatam hui. taham khredar ne apna naam, shanakht aur malik ko khufia rakhnay ki darkhwast ki hai. nelaam ghar ne dhai crore rupay bator commission liya hai aur baqiya raqam is ke maalik ko di hai.
1401.title: jootay ke dabbay mein milnay wala guldaan 129 Crores rupay mein farokht

news_detail: Junoobi aur Shumali Koreas ke darmain mangal ke roz askari nauyat ki baat cheet hui hai. Yeh baat cheet America ke is inkishaaf ke baad kasheedgi mein izafah ke beech ho rahi hai jis mein Washington ka kahna hai ke Pyongyang ke qareeb Missile Factory mein aik baar phir sargarmion ka ilm huwa hai. Junoobi Korea ki sarhad ke nazdeek waqay Shumali Korea ke gaon Panmunjom mein honay wala yeh ijlaas June ke baad se fariqain ke darmain doosri mulaqaat hai. mulaqaat ka maqsad kasheedgi ke khtama aur tamam muandana karwaiyon par rok laganay ke hawalay se is muaqqaf par kaam jari rakhna hai jis par rawan baras April mein dono Koreas ke srbrahan ney amaadgi ka zahir ki thi. Junoobi Korea ke senior mazakraatkar aur wizarat difaa mein Shumali Korea se mutaliq policy ke zimmaydaar Kim DoJuen  ney sahafion ko aagah kiya ke woh kasheedgi ko khatam karne aur aetmaad saazi ke liye “markazi” noiyat ke iqdamaat yakeeni bananay ki poori koshish karen ge. Junoobi Korea ki wizarat difaa ney guzashta hafta bataya tha ke woh samjhotay ki simt pehlay qadam ke taur par shadeed tareeqa se qilah band sarhad par phailay pehray daari ke thikanon aur saaz o samaan mein kami karne ka iradah rakhti hai. idhar aik senior Amrici zimma daar naay paiir ke roz Bartanwi khabar rasan agency ko bataya ke Amrici intelli jins agencio naay Shumali Korea ki aik factory mein aik baar phir sar garmion ka pata chalaya hai jis mein bain albar aazmi bilstk missile tayyar kar lia tha. yeh missile America taq pounchanay ki salahiyat rakhta hai. Amrici wazeer kharja Mike Pompeo ney guzashta hafta Senate mein kharja taluqaat ki Committee ko bataya ke Shumali Korea naay johri bomb se mutaliq eendhan ki tayari ka silsila jari rakha sun-hwa hai. yeh paish Raft guzashta mah singapore mein Shumali Korea ke sarbarah kam jong aan ki Amrici saddar donald trmp se mulaqaat ke bawajood samnay aayi hai. kِm naay is mulaqaat mein ehad kya tha ke woh johri hathyaaron ki talfi par kaam karen ge. doosri janib Shumali Korea ke media naay guzashta chand roz mein Junoobi Korea ko kari nuqta cheeni ka nishana banaya hai. Shumali Korea mein hkmran jamaat ke sarkari akhbar’ ‘ rodongja sinmun” ka kehna hai ke Civil hukoomat khud se koi aik qadam uthae baghair, ,, johari hathyaaron ki mukammal talfi ke baad pabandiyan uthae janay ke intzaar mein”waqt zaya” kar rahi hai.
1026.title: Shumali Korea ki Missile Factory mein dobarah sargarmian, America ka id-daa

news_detail: America ki janib se Falasteeni panah gzinon ki maali imdaad band kiye jane ke baad ab naam nihaad qawaneen ke zareya Falasteenion ki apne ilaqon mein wapsi aur abad kaari ke haq ko khatam karne ki nai saazish shuru ki gayi hai.’Al Arabia dot net’ ke mutabiq Amrici Congress mein aik naya Bill paish kya gaya hai jis mein Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad kam se kam zahir karne ki sifarish ki gayi hai. Naqideen nay is Bill ko Falasteenion ke ‘haq wapsi’ ku naaqabil e talaafi nuqsaan pohanchanay ki aik nayee saazish se tabeer kya hai. Amrici Congress mein yeh naya Bill Republican Party ke rukn Doug Lamborn ney paish kya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke aqwam mutahidda nay jung ke baad chay laakh Falasteenion ki wapas un ke ilaqon mein abadkari aur muhajreen ki maali kifalat ke liye ‘UNRWA’ Agency qayim ki. 70 saal guzarnay ke baad duniya bhar mein Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad 53 laakh se tajawaz kar gayi hai. Falasteeni panah gzinon ki doosri aur teesri nasal bhi panah gazeen qarar di ja rahi hai. Un par bhaari budget sarf ho raha hai. Unhi ki wajah se panah gzinon ka na khatam honay wala masla paida huwa. Lehaza doosri aur teesri nasal mein shaamil Falasteenion ko panah gazeen shumaar nah kya jaye. Unhon ney tasleem kya ke Falasteeni panah gazeenon ki behbood ke le qaim kardah ‘Relief and Works Agency’ UNRWA ko siyasi aur iqtisadi taur par is liye kamzor kya ja raha hai taakay woh kam se kam Falasteeni panah gzinon ka bojh uthaye. Un ke naye mussavida qanoon ka maqsad yeh hai ke panah gazeenon ka ‘status’ sirf un Falasteenion ko diya jaye jo 1948 ki jung mein Palestine se nikalay gaye. Un ki aulaad aur doosri aur teesri nasal ko un mein shaamil na kya jaye. Isi terha un Falasteenion ko bhi panah gazeen qarar na diya jaye jo dosray Mulkon ki shehriat haasil kar chukay hain. Aisi soorat mein Falasteeni panah gazeenon ke liye 50 lakh dollars ki raqam hi kaafi rahay gi. Washington mein Middle East Peace Institute ki khatoon Director Lara Friedman ka kehna hai ke Americi Congress mein paish kardah Bill ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gzinon ki maali imdaad roknay ke liye qanoon saazi nahi balkay is ka maqsad Falasteeni panah gzinon ki tadaad kam se kam karne ki koshish hai. Jab ‘UNRWAا’ Agency par Falasteeni panah gzeenon ki doosri aur teesri nasal ka bojh nahi rahay ga to un ke maslay ko aasani ke sath hal kya ja sakta hai. Aik dosray tajzia nigaar David Boulak ka kehna hai ke 70 saal guzarnay ke baad Falasteenion ki badi tadaad ab Israel ke zair e intizaam Yahoodi muashra mein wapas jane ke khwaahan nahi hain. Raye aama ke jaizon se pata chalta hai ke Falasteeni panah gzinon ko Israel mein abaad honay mein koi dilchaspi nahi.
1037.title: Falasteeni panah gzinon ke ‘haq e wapsi’ ko khatam karne Amrici saazish

news_detail: Rusia mein Police teen naujawan ladkiyon par jo aapas mein saggy behnain batayi jati hain apne Mafia Boss waalid par jinsi, jazbaati aur jismaani ziyadtion ke baad usay chaqu se waar karkay halaak karne ka iqraar karne par Kristina (19), Angelina (18) aur Maria (17) ke khilaaf qatal ke ilzamaat aayed kiye hain. Maqtool ki shanakht Mikhail Khachaturyan ki hesiyat se ki gayi hai. Rusian zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq ‘sang dil’ baap ki teeno baityon ney apne waalid ki sakhtiyon aur beja tasahddud se tang aakar bil akhir usay mout ke ghaat utaar diya. Maqtool ke jism par chaaqo ke waar ke kayi nishaanat thay aur us ki laash flats ke Mosco block ke lift ke paas pafi mili. Teeno baityon ney iqraar kya ke unhon ney mil kar apne waalid ko mout ke ghaat utaar diya hai aur Police ke samney id-daa kya ke woh heroin ka nasha karne ka aadi tha aur kayi martaba un ki asmat raizi karne aur jaan se maardeney ki dhamkian di theen. teeno baityon ka kehna hai ke un ke waalid ney un ki zindagi ajeeran bana rakhi thi. Woh rozana un ki marpeet karta, ghar mein band rakhta aur terha terha ke tashadud ke harbe istemaal karta, nashay ka aadi tha. Tang aakar bil-aakhir unhon ney sang-dil waalid se gulu khulasi ke liye usay chaaqo aur kulhadhe ke waar karkay mout ki neend sulaa diya. Roos mein qanoon nafiz karne waley idaron ke zaraye ka kehna hai ke apne waalid ki qaatil teen ladkiyon ko hirasat mein liya gaya hai.

Mikhail Khachaturyan ke baray mein mukhtalif aaraa samney aayi hain. Aik taraf woh sakht mazhabi shakhs tha aur baityon ko ghar ke andar bhi mazhabi libaas istemaal karne par sakhti se Kaarband karne ki koshish karta magar doosri taraf woh manshiat mafia ka bhi sarghana tha. Khud bhi manshiat istemaal karta. Police ka kehna hai ke jab unhon ne maqtool ki gaadi ki talashi li to is mein inhen aatsheen asleha aur do kilogram heroin bhi mili. Hirasat mein li gayi teeno ladkiyon ney apne waalid ko qatal karne ka aitraaf kya hai. Un ka kehna hai ke baap ney un ki zindagi azaab bana rakhi thi jis ke baayis unhon ney usay hamesha ke liye khatam karne faisla kya. Kristina ney kaha ke hum is se nafrat karti theen, hum chahti theen ke aisa kuch hojaye ke ya to woh gayab hojaye ya hum is ko kabhi na jaanen. Teeno ney id-daa kya ke waardaat ke din bhi un ke baap ney un par chaaqo se hamla karne ki koshish ki magar is martaba un teeno ney us par qaboo paate hue par pay darpay waar karna shuru kar diye. Ahal e mohalla aur Khachaturyan ke jan-ney walay bhi usay aik sakht-geer aur sang-dil shakhs ke taur par jantay hain. 57 sala Khachaturyan ney teeno baityon ko school bhejney ke bajaye inhen ghar mein band kar rakha tha aur un ki naqal wo harkat par nazar rakhney ke liye khufia cameras laga rakhtay thay. Us ney aik beti par jinsi tashadud bhi kya magar woh unhen jismani aur zehni taur par har waqt tashadud ka nishana banata rehta. Padosion ka kehna hai ke Mikhail aik baar apne pooray khandan ko jungle mein le gaya aur unhen qatal karne ki dhamkian den. Us mauqa par is ki biwi faraar hogayi. Us ney bachon ko sakhti ke sath mana kardiya ke woh apni walida se rabita na karen. Aik muqami TV Channel 112 ke mutabiq Khachaturyan ney aik beti par jinsi tashadud kya jis par is ney khud kashi ke liye badi miqdaar mein golian kha li theen taham doctors ney usay maut se bchalya. Aik baar Khachaturyan ka beta apne aik dost ko le kar ghr aaya to Khachaturyan ney shor machana shuru kardiya ke us ajnabi ke sath us ki baityon ke najaayez taluqaat hain. Rusia mein sarkari satah par is waqea ki tafseelaat samney nahi ayen taham zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq girftar ki gayi teeno ladkiyon ko apne waalid ke qatal ke jurm mein muqadma ka saamna hai aur unhen 15 saal tak qaid ki saza hosakti hai.
1049.title: Teen baityon ney ‘Mafia Boss’ baap ko qatal kardiya

news_detail: Israeli adalat ney mangal ke roz aik faisla mein Falasteeni Shaeyrah Dareen Tatour ko paanch mah qaid ki saza suna di. woh do barson se ghar mein nazar-band hai. Dareen ney adalti faisla par apna rad-e-amal zahir karte hue kaha ke yeh ghasib mumlikat ki adalat hai. Yeh aik fastai mumlikat hai aur Yahoodi Qaumi Mamlikati Qanoon sirf yeh zahir karta hai ke yahan nasli asbiyat payi jati hai. Yeh saza mujhe rok nahi paye gi. Mein koi pehli qaidi hoon? aur na hi mein aakhri qaidi hosakti hoon? Dareen par ilzaam hai ke unhon ney Social Media par apne aik Qasida aur bayan ke zareye logon ko dehshatgardi par ubhaara. Dareen ney Facebook aur Youtube par aik record shuda video post ki thi jis mein woh pas manzar mein apna arabi Qasida ” قاوم يا شعبي قاومهم (mere logon ka difaa karo, un ka difaa karo. ..)” parh rahi hain jab ke video mein naqaab posh Falasteeni Israeli fojion par pathrao karte nazar aa rahay hain. khatoon Shaeyrah ney apna yeh Qasida october 2015 mein nashar kya jab Falastinyon ki janib se Israelion ke khilaaf churay se hamlon, firing aur gaadi se kuchalnay ki karwaiyon ki aik lehar ney sir uthaya tha. Is ke chand roz baad Israeli fouj ney 36 sala Dareen ko girftar kar liya. Israeli istighasa ke numaindon ke mutabiq Falasteeni Shaeyrah ney Social Media par jo kuch nashar kya woh tashadud ke liye ishtial angazi ke zumray mein aata hai. Dareen ney is muaqqaf ko mustard kar diya. Israeli istighasa ke mutabiq Dareen Tatour par aik Falasteeni muzahmati tanzeem “Islami Jehaad” ki himayat ka bhi ilzaam hai. Israel mazkoorah jamaat ko dehshat gard shumaar karta hai. Nasra shehar mein adalat ke andar sahafion se guftagu karte hue Dareen ney kaha ke inhen jail ki saza ki tawaqqa thi. Is faislay mein koi hairat ki baat nahi kyun ke jab Israeli Adalat mein koi Falasteeni mulzim hota hai to usay insaaf nahi milta. Bilkhushoos jab ke bunyadi taur par muqadma siyasi nauiyat ka ho jaissa ke Falasteeni Shaeyrah ke muamlay mein tha. Dareen Tatour ka talluq un Falastinyon ki nasal se hai jo Arabs aur Jews ke darmain 1948 ki jung ke baad apni araazi mein maujood rahay aur wahan Israeli riyasat qaim kar di gayi. Is dauran asleha ke zor par qatal aam ke zareya lakhoon Falastinyon ko apne gharron ko choarnay par majboor kar diya gaya.
1063.title: Social Media par Qasida post karne wali Falasteeni Shaeyrah ko jail ki saza

news_detail: Hyderabad. Drake ke geet ”In My Feelings” par bardhtay ‘Kiki Challenge’ par stunt karne ki koshisho mein kayi naujawan duniya bhar mein haadsa ka shikaar ho chukay hain. a. is challenge mein chalti gaadi se bahar kood kar ya nikal kar ‘kiki, do you love me’ ki geet ke dhun par raqs karna hota hai, magar aisa karte hue duniya bhar mein kayi log haadsa ka shikaar ho chukay hain. Chalti gaadi se kood kar raqs karne ki koshish aik ahcha tajurbah hargiz nahi ho sakta hai. Yeh pagal pan ab Hindustan mein bhi phialta ja raha hai. is terhan ki harkat karte hue mukhtalif soshil media par ki janey wali posts par comments aur tbsron se nojawanon mein aik ajeeb se junoon peda hogaya hai ke woh bhi aisa kar saktay hain. Is online junoon ke baais walidain ko apne bachon ki fikar la-haq hogayi hai ke kahin un ke ladle bhi aisa karte hue kisi haadsa ka shikaar nah ho jaien. Bataya jata hai ke instagram par sirf mangal ke din #inmyfeelingschallenge ka hashtag  4 lakh martaba istemaal hochuka hai. sorat e haal ki sangeen noiyat ko bhaanp letay hue. Hindustani Police ney awam ko mutnabba kya hai ke woh is challenge ko injaam nah den. jiye poor, bangloru, aur Mumbai mein police ney pehlay hi is khsos mein warnings dey chuki haiHyderabad Traffic Police ney aik qadam agay barhatay hue hyderabad trafik police ney aik press note jari karte hue intibah diya ke chalti gaadi se atrkr ya kood kar raqs karne walon ke khilaaf awaami ke liye takleef ka baais ban’ney aur dosray raharaun ki jaan ke liye khatrah ban’ney ki binaa par Tazirat Hind ki dafaa 268 aur Hyderabad City Police Act ki dafaa 70(b) ke tehat muqadma darj kya jaye ga. Additional Commissioner of Police Traffic ke press note mein kaha gaya ke Hyderabad Traffic Police ney mehsoos kya ke kayi naujawan drivers ‘Kiki Challenge’ ke zair asar chalti gadiyon se kood kar sadkon par raqs kar rahay hain. Chalti gaadi se koodney aur sarrak ke darmiyan mein raqs karne se jaan ka khatrah kayi gina barh jata hai. is terhan ki harkato se nah sirf driver ki jaan ko khatrah kahq rehta hai balkay doosron ki jaan ko bhi khatrah peda hojata hai. Is terha ki harkato se fouj daari karwaiya la-haq hoti hain. Sadkon par is terha ki be-tuki harkatein karne se koi bhi nagehani waqea runuma ho sakta hai. Traffic Police ney naujawanon se khwahish ki ke woh is terha ki harkatein karne se guraiz karen. Police ney press note mein kaha ke mehfooz taur par gaadi chalaate hue salamat rahen. Zindagi mein kaaramad challenge ko qubool karen, chunkay aap malik ka mustaqbil hain.
1079.title: “Kiki Chlallenge” aap ko jail ki Hawa khila sakta hai !

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ney aaj Gajwel mein ‘Telangana ko Haritha Haram’ programme ke chouthay marhala ka aaghaz kya. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ney indra chowk par ‘kadam’ (cadamba) ka pauda lagaya. Town mein logon ney record 1,00,116 pauday lagaye. Wuzraa, Arkaan e Parliament, Arkaan Assembly aur deegar muntakhiba awaami numaindon ney riyasat bhar mein aaj ‘Haritha Haram’ programme mein hissa lete hue shajarkari ki. Chief Minister ney Praganapur, Mulg  aur Turkapally  villages mein Kora Nagaraju ki rihaishgaahon par nariyal ke bhi darakht lagaye. Chief Minister ney Gajwel jatay hue Forests Research Station Mulug ka bhi daura kya jahan unhon ney Singarapally jungle ka tahaffuz karne par mehakma ke ohdedaron ki kawishon ki sataish ki aur majmui taur par 5 lakhs rupay inaam ka elaan kya aur izafi amlah aur funds ki farahmi ka tayaqqun diya. Chief Minister ney mahireen ke mahswara par kadamb ka pauda laganay ka faisla kya. Yeh pauda tibbi khususiyaat ke sath sath mazhabi ahmiyat ka bhi haamil hai.
1402.title: Haritha Haram ke chouthay marhala ka Gajwel mein aaghaz

news_detail: Aamir Khan ne aik niji TV ko interview dete hue bataya ‘woh Pakistan nahi jarahay aur unhen PTI se Imran Khan ki halaf bardari ki taqreeb mein shirkat ka koi dawat nama mausool nahi huwa.’ Guzashta roz Pakistan Tehreek e Insaaf ke tarjuman Fawad Chowdry ne kaha tha ke mutawaqqa Wazir e Azam ki halaf bardari ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye un ki jamaat ne Aamir Khan , Kapil Dev, Sunil Gawaskar samait kayi naamwar shaksiaat ko dawat naame bhaij diye hain jabkay Aamir Khan ka kehna hai ke inhen PTI ki taraf se Pakistan aanay ka koi dawat nama ta haal mausool nahi huwa hai. Tawaqqa hai ke Imran Khan 11

August ko Pakistan ke Wazeer e Azam ki hesiyat se halaf lenge. Aik niji Channel ‘News 18’ ne twitter par aik post share karte hue bataya ke adakar Aamir Khan ko dawat nama nahi mila, Woh Pakistan nahi jarahay. Channel ke mutabiq Aamir Khan ne kaha ke agar is marhala par unhen dawat nama mausool bhi hota hai to woh Pakistan jane se qassar rahen ge chunkay woh in dinon bahut ziyada masroof hain
— I am not going to Pakistan. Haven't received an invitation for
's swearing-in:
tells News18 |
— News18 (@CNNnews18)

Wazeh rahay ke aaj se taqriban 6 saal qabal Imran Khan ne yahan Hindustan mein aik taqreeb mein maheman e khusoosi ki hesiyat se shirkat ki thi jahan Pakistani gulukar Ali Zafar aur Aamir Khan bhi maujood thay, taqreeb ke maizban ne Aamir Khan se Imran Khan ke mutaliq apni raye ka izhaar karne ko kaha to Aamir Khan ne sab se pehlay Imran Khan ki tareef ki aur kaha aap ne tamam salawon ka bohat achay tareeqa se jawab diya. Is ke alawa Aamir Khan ne un ke junoon aur jazbah ki bhi tareef ki aur sath hi dua dete hue kaha tha ke Pakistan mein aisi hukoomat aeye jo waqai Pakistan ke masail hal kar sakay aur jo Pakistan mein khushhali laaye. yeh nah sirf Pakistan ke liye achaa hoga balkay hamaray liye bhi achaa hoga. Aakhir mein Imran Khan ne Aamir Khan ko 2013 ke election se qabal Pakistan aanay ki dawat di jis par Aamir Khan ne kaha kay jab aap election jiiten ge to mein aap ki jeet ka jashnn mananay Pakistan aon ga aur akela nahi balkay bohat saaray Hindustanion ko saath le kar aoanga. Pakistan Tehreek Insaaf ke Chairman aur mutawaqqa Wazeer e Azam Imran Khan 2013 ke election mein kamyaab nah hosakay, unhon ne himmat na harte hue mazeed jad-o-jehad ki aur saal 2018 ke intikhabaat mein jeet un ki hui jis par Pakistani gulukar o  adaakar Ali Zafar ne tweet ke zareya Aamir Khan ko unka wada yaad karaate hue kaha ke aap ke Pakistan aaney ka wada poora karne ka waqt agaya hai.
1403.title: Aamir Khan, Pakistan nahi jayenge

news_detail: America aur Turkey ke darmain Americi shehri aik Easaai Paadri ke khilaaf dehshat gardi aur jasoosi ke ilzamaat aayed karte hue muqadma chalanay aur us ko zair hirasat rakhnay ke maamla par sifarti kasheedgi mein shiddat aagai hai aur Americi mehakma khazana ney Turkey ke wazeer insaaf aur wazeer e dakhla par pabandiyan aayed kar di hain. Moahida shumali oqiyanus ki tanzeem Nato ke dono rukn mumalik ke darmain wajah nazaa Americi Paadri Andrew Krig Brunson is waqt Turkey ke shehar Izmir mein apne ghar par nazar-band hain. Un ke khilaaf dehshat gardi ki himayat aur jasoosi ke ilzamaat mein muqadma chalaya ja raha hai aur yeh ilzamaat saabit honay par unhein 35 saal taq qaid ki saza sunai ja sakti hai. Yeh bhi maloom huva hai ke Americi wizarat khazana ney Turkey ke dono wuzraa ke America mein asasa jaat munjamad kardainay ka bhi elaan kya hai. Yeh pabandiyan Global Magnitsky Act of 2016 ke tehat aayed ki gayi hain jo Americi Hukoomat ko bdunwanyon aur huqooq insani ki khilaaf wazion par afraad, companiyon aur deegar idaron ko nishana bananay ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh qanoon asasa jaat ke injmaad, androon America safri tahedidaat aur Americi idaron ke sath tijarat par pabandiyan aayed karne ki ijazat deta hai. Turkey ney Americi iqdaam ka sakht note letay hue intibah diya ke woh bhi waisay hi intiqami karwai kere ga. Ankara ney kaha ke woh Paadri ke masla par qadam peechay nahi le ga. Wizarat kharja ney intibah diya ke America mehakma khazana ke jarehana faisla ka jawab waisay hi day ga .

White House ki khatoon tarjuman Sarah Sanders ney Washington mein budh ko sahafion se guftagu karte hue kaha hai : ”hum is baat mein yaqeen rakhtay hain ke woh (Paadri) Turk hukoomat ki ghair munsifana aur bilajawaz tawajah ka shikaar hain”. tarjuman ney kaha ke Turkey ke wazeer insaaf AbdulhamitGul aur wazeer e dakhla Suleyman Soylu ko pachaas sala Paadri Brunson ko zair hirasat rakhnay mein kirdaar par pabandion ka hadaf banaya ja raha hai. Americi wazeer khazana stone Noshin ney aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ”Paadri Brunson ki ghair munsifana hirasat aur tark hakkaam ki janib se un ke khilaaf musalsal sitam saada lafzon mein bilkul bhi qabil qubool nahi hai. Sadar Donald Trump yeh baat kayi martaba wazeh kar chukay hain aur America yeh tawaqqa karta hai ke Turkey Paadri ko fauri taur par reha kardey ga”. Paadri Brunson Aegean sea ke kinare waqay shehar Izmir mein esaion ke protstnt firqa ke aik charch ke nigran they. woh Americi riyasat shumali kairo lena se talluq rakhtay hain. Turk hukkaam ney unhein do saal tak jail mein qaid rakhnay ke baad guzashta haftay hi Izmir mein un ke ghar muntaqil karkay nazar-band kardiya tha lekin un ki malik se bahar jaaane ki darkhwast ko mustard kardiya tha. Americi Paadri ko october 2016 hamza mein Turkey mein girftar kya gaya tha. Us waqt Sadar Rcep Tayyip Erdogan ki hukoomat ka takhta ulatnay ki nakaam saazish mein mulawis sarkari mulazmeen aur afraad ke khilaaf sakht crack drown kya ja raha tha. tark hakkaam ney Paadri par kaladam kurdistan workers party ( pi ke ke ) aur khodsakhtah jilaa-watan aalim Fatahullah Golan ki himayat ka ilzaam ayad kya tha. Turkey aur baaz Europi mumalik ney PKK ko aik dehshat gard tanzeem qarar day rakha hai. America ka yeh muaqqaf hai ke Turkey ke paas Paadri ke khilaaf aayed kardah ilzamaat ke koi thos saboot nahi hain jabkay tark saddar Racep Tayyip Erdogan yeh wazeh kar chukay hain ke unhein pabandion se daraya dhmkaya ja sakta hai aur na zair e asr laya ja sakta hai. Taham woh is baat ka ishara day chuke hain ke Easaai Paadri ka Americi riyasat Pennsylvania mein muqeem Fatahullah Golan se tabadlah kya ja sakta hai.
1404.title: Paadri ko zair e hirasat rakhnay par America ney Turkey ke do wuzraa par pabandiyan aayed kar dein

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Police ne mujrimeen ki shanakht mein tafteesh kunindgaan ohdedaron ki sahoolat ke liye apne Mobile Application TSCOP ke liye aik aur tool ka izafah kya hai. Director General of Police Telangana Mr. M. Mahindra Reddy ne aaj Hyderabad mein aik press conference se khitaab karte hue bataya ke ‘chehra ki shanakht ka nizaam’ tafteesh kunindgaan ko kisi fard ke chehra ka CCTNS ke database mein mehfooz mujrimeen ki digital photos se taqabul karte hue mushtaba mujrimeen ka pata chalanay mein madad mil sakti hai. Database mein matloob afraad, gumshudaa afraad, qanoon shikan afraad aur media mein pehlay hi se shaya girftar shuda afraad ki tasaveer mehfooz hain. Unhon ne wazeh kiya ke adalaton mein soorat shanasi ki taknik ko adalaton mein bataur shahadat istemaal nahi kya jata. Unhon ne bataya ke is tool se mushtaba afraad ke baaray mein yeh pata chalanay mein madad miley gi ke aaya woh maazi mein kisi jurm mein mulawis to nahi hai. Unhon ne bataya ke is se gumshudaa afraad, ghair shanakht shuda laashon ki shanakht karne mein bhi madad miley gi aur CC TV cameras mein qaid kisi waardaat ke footage ka taqabul hamaray database mein mojood tasaveer se taqabul karte hue qanoon shikan afraad ka pata chalanay mein barri madad miley gi. Unhon ne bataya ke hum androon aur bairon riyasat akhbarat mein shaya girftar afraad ki tasaveer ko bhi database mein shaamil kya ja raha hai. yahi nahi balkay is database ko mazeed muaser bananay ke liye hum qadeem records ko bhi upload kar rahay hain. Unhon ne aik sawal ke jawab mein bataya ke is system ke zareya hamaray database mein maujood 10-15 baras qabal li gayi tasaveer se mushtaba fard ka taqabul kya ja sakta hai. Mr. Mahindra Reddy ne bataya ke hum Mulk ki deegar reyaston se bhi mujrimeen ki tasaveer aur in ke baaray mein maloomat aur dastyab data haasil kar rahay hain taakay deegar riyaston se hamari riyasat mein daakhil honay walay qanoon shikan afraad par kari nazar rakhi jasakay. Unhon ne bataya ke is system se tehqeeq o tafteesh karne walay Police ohdedaron ko is nai sahoolat se juraim ka pata laganay mein barri madad miley gi.
1405.title: Telangana Police ne aik aur tool ka izafah kya. Mobile App ke liye soorat shanasi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Commissioner ki Task Torce Central Zone aur West Zone teams ne moatbar ittila milnay par 8 afraad par mushtamil do tolion ko pakad liya jo Markazi o Riyasti hukoomaton ke mukhtalif mukhtalif mahukma jaat jaisay Railway, Revenue, Education waghera mein mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue masoom be rozgaar nojawanon ko dhoka dainay mein mulawis hain. un do tolyon neh 100-150 nojawanon ko mehakma railway mein ‘Ticket Collector’, ‘Commercial Clerk’ aur ‘Point Man’ mahkuma maal mein ‘Junior Assistant’ Mahkuma Taleem mein Junior Assistant’ aur ‘Attender’ ki mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue un se bhaari ruqomat battor len aur inhen farzi ehkaam taqarruraat, maktoob tarbiyat rawana kiye. Un ke qabza se naqad 24. 1 lakhs rupay aur jaali ehkaam taqarruraat, farzi shanakhti cards waghera zabt karliye gai, mulizimeen ke naam Vardhanapu Gangadhar  (35) saakin Kakinada, Pitla Dattadhari (28) Pait Basheerabad, M shiva Reddy (27) Uppal, K. Rajesh (31) Uppal, Aerokanda Swami (32) Vanasthalipuram, Makira Kranti Kumar (30) Zamistanpura, (Yamsani  Viresham (49) Huzoorabad, Kareemnagar, Mekanda Srikant (35) Ramnagar Secunderabad aur  P. Padma Reddy Vanasthalipuram hain. Un mulzimeen ka tareeqakar yeh tha ke woh mulazimton ke khawahish-mand naujawanon ko un ke doston aur rishta daaron ke tavassut se mulaqaat karte hue unhen mukhtalif sarkari mehakumon mein mulaazmaten faraham karne ka jhansa dete hue inhen 10-25 lakhs rupay talab karte aur bataur paishgi 1-10 laahd rupay fi umeed waar wusool kar lete. Umeedwaron se paishgi raqam haasil kar lenay ke baad woh inhen farzi SMSes, Emails aur Appointment Letters bheja karte they aur inhen aik maqam par talab karte hue un se ruqumaat bator lete. Waqt taalne ke liye yeh toliyan aisay umeedwaron ku Durgapur,  Asansol (Maghribi Bengal) aur Khurdah (Asam) training ke liye talabb karte. Is ke baad inhen ticket collector ka uniform pehnakar inhen Secundrabad Railway Station par khada karte aur apni taraf se aik mah ki thankhowa bhi ada karte they. Jab umeedwaar, un se rujoo hotay to woh khud ko muqami siyasatdaan zahir karte aur yeh bawar karwaate ke un ke mukhtalif sarkari mahkuma jaat mein zabardast asar o rasookh hai. Hatta ke woh khusoosi mahakuma jati Quota/Ministers Quota/Deceased Quota waghera ke tehat imtehanaat mein shirkat ke baghair bhi mulaazmaten dila saknay. Is terha woh un se aik taa das laakh rupay bator paishgi aur asli Certificates waghera haasil kar lete.

Un mulazmeen ke khilaaf mukhtalif police stationon mein 10 muqadmaat darj kiye ja chukay they. police neh awam se appeal ki ke woh sarkari mehakmon aur multi national companiyon mein mukhtalif jayidadon par taqarrur ke liye kisi darmiyani shakhs ki baton mein na ayen.
1406.title: Mulazimton ka jhansa dainay wali do toliyan aur srghanh giraftar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Qaayed Muqannana Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ney aaj puranay shaher mein Metro Rail Project ke aaghaz ke imkanaat ka jaayeza liya aur ohdedaron ko hidaayat di ke Project ke aaghaz ke baad kisi qisam ki takheer nah ki jaye. janab Akbar Owaisi ne party ke Arkaan e Assembly Mrs. Mumtaz Ahmed Khan , Ahmed Pasha Quadri aur Ahmed Balal aur Hyderabad Metro Rail Limited ke aala ohdedaron ke hamrah puranay shaher ka daura kya. Unhon ney Project ki route ka bhi jaayeza liya chunkay iss route ke aaghaz mein sab se badi rukawat, iss ki raah mein haail mazhabi muqamaat hain jin ki wajah se route ko design karne mein badi takheer hui hai. Tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke aik martaba kamon ka aaghaz hojaye to androon teen baras is ki takmeel karli jaye gi. Yeh kaam Darusshifa taa Falaknuma shuru kya jaye ga. Iss Project ke baayis sadak ki tausee ke nateeja mein zayed az 1,000  jayidadon par assar padega. Isss Project ke liye sadak ki tausee mein jaayeedad se mahroom hojane walon aur taajireen ke liye package bhi dainay par hukoomat ghaur kar rahi hai. Iss route par sadak mein tausee ko bohut mehdood rakha gaya taakay ziyada jayidadon ko nuqsaan na pahunche. Puranay shaher mein Metro Rail Project Jubilee Bus Station taa Falaknuma raahdaari par mushtamil hoga jo 15 kilometer ki musafat rakhay ga jis par 15 station hon ge. Yeh raahdaari puranay shaher mein 5.5 kilometer taweel hogi aur Darusshifa, Purani Haveli, Mir Alam Manndi, Moghalpura, Hari Bowli, Shah Ali Banda se hotay hue Falaknuma par khatam hogi. Taa haal iss route par Jubilee Bus Station taa Mahatma Gandhi Bus station Imliban tak kaam chal raha hai jo bahut jald mukammal hojaye ga aur puranay shaher ke kamon ki takmeel tak Imliban tak hi train chalanay ka mansoobah hai, Jisay baad azan Darusshifa se jood diya jaye ga. Janab Akbar Owaisi ney Darusshifa tak Falaknuma Metro Rai line ke kamon ke baarey mein tafseelaat haasil keen aur Metro Rail ke mujawaza Stations ke muqamat ka bhi mushahida kya. Janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ney ohdedaron se Project ke aaghaz aur iss ke zimn mein haayel dushwaryon ke baarey mein bhi tabadlah khayaal kiya aur unhen tayaqqun diya ke Majlis ki janib se is khsoos mein bharpoor taawun kya jaye ga. Tawaqqa hai ke aayindah mah se hi puranay shaher mein Metro Rail ke taameeri kaamon ka amali aaghaz kardiya jaye ga.
1408.title: Akbar Owaisi ney puranay shaher mein Metro Rail ke kaamon ka jaayeza liya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadar Telangana Jana Samithi Professor Kodandaram tawaqqa hai ke Telangana Assembly ke chand halqon ke liye Party umeedwaron ka elaan mah September mein kar deinge. Barsar e iqtedar Telangana Rashtra Samithi aur badi oppostion party Congress ney bhi pehlay hi yeh elaan kardiya hai ke woh September mein Party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar deingi. zaraye ke mutabiq Telangana Jana Samithi (TJS) ke sarbarah par zabardast dabao hai ke mukhalif TRS votes ki taqseem ko roknay doosri hum khayaal partiyon se intikhabi mafahmat ki jaye. Party zaraye ney inkishaaf kya hai ke chand qaayedeen, intikhabi mafahmat ke haq mein hain aur unhen yeh mahswara bhi dae rahay hain ke woh Telangana Riyasat mein mukhalif TRS partiyon ka aik riyasti satah ka wifaq tayyar kere taham is soorat mein Telangana Jana Samithi ko baa-mushkil 20-25 nashiston par hi iktafa karna padega aur yeh pehal doosri partiyon ki janib se umeedwaron ke elaan se qabal hi karna padegi jis ke imkanaat mohom nazar arahey hain chunkay Congress Party bhi Telangana mein tanha muqaabla karne ke darpay hai. Telangana mein Lef Parties aur Telugu Desam Party ka bhi muaqqaf koi behtar nahi hai.
1409.title: Prof. Kodandaram bhi Sep mein kuch umeedwaron ka elaan karenge

news_detail: Nalgonda- Miryalaguda ke saakin janab Mohammad Khan (70) ka baad adayee e Hajj Makkah Mukramah mein qalb par hamla ke baayis inteqaal hogaya. Yahan mausula it-tila-aat ke mutabiq woh manasik  Hajj  ki adayee ke baad Makkah Mukramah wapas lout gai thae ke un ke qalb par hamla huwa. Unhen qareebi Hospital muntaqil kiya gaya tab tak un ki rooh qafas e unsari se parwaaz kar gayi. Un ke psmandagan mein 7 betay aur 4 betyan hain. Un ka khandan Sitaram Puram, Miryalaguda mein muqeem hai.
1410.title: Miryalaguda ke Haaji ka Makkah Mukramah mein intqaal

news_detail: Peddapalli. Zila Peddapalli ke mauza Hanumantupet mein hafta ki subah aik bada haadsa tal gaya. Bachon se ladi aik School Bus barqi Transformer se takra gayi taham Bus mein sawaar bachay mehfooz rahay. Bus ke Transformer se takaraane ke baad woh Transformer se judey taaron par jhoolti rahay, aur yahi taar Bus ko khait mein ulat janey se bachaaye rakhay. Jis waqt yeh haadsa paish aaya is waqt barqi sarbarahi masdood thi jis ki wajah se koi bada sadesa paish nahi aaya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq qareeb 8:45 bajey subah driver ney Sukhmaya kamaan ke qareeb gadi modte hue Bus par qaboo khoodia aur Bus be qaboo hokar Transformer se takra gayi. Transformer se takaraane ke baad Bus ulat hi padtee thi ke Transformer se judey taron ney Bus ko palti khanay se rokay rakha. Yeh Bus Crescent High School ki thi aur haadsa ke waqt 50 bachon ko school le jarahi thi. Jis waqt yeh haadsa paish aaya Bus mauza Vennampalli mandal Kalvasri Rampoor se bachon ko sawaar kar leney ke baad wapas Peddapalli lout rahi thi. Is haads se 8 bachon ko mamooli chouten ayen jinhein fori firstadd diya gaya.
1411.title: Peddapalli mein 50 Schooli bachay karishmati taur par bach gaye.

news_detail: Musalmanoon ke qibla e awwal Masjid Aqsa par ab Yahoodi apna haq jataney ki koshish kar rahay hain. Yaad rahay ke aik arsa daraaz se Yahoodi, Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer ke khawab dekh rahay hain. Yahoodion ke Talmudi aqaayed ke aitbaar se saari kaayenaat par un ke tasallut ke liye Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer bhi aik lahiqa hai aur who chahate hain ke Masjid Aqsa ko bhi Haikal e Sulemani mein shaamil karle. Yaad rahay ke Masjid Aqsa tulu e islam se hi Musalmanoon ke liye aik muqaddas muqam hai jis ki taraf rukh karte hue Musalmanoon ney kayi barson tak salaat ada ki thi. yahin par Allah ke Rasool sale Allahu alaihi wasallam ney Meraaj ke mauqa par anbiaye ki imamat ki thi. Haal hi mein Israel ki Supreme Court ney Benjamin Netayahu ki hukoomat ko hidayat di ke Mashriqi Yaroshallam ki Masjid e Aqsa Complex mein Yahoodi ibadat par derina imtena ka jawaz paish kere. Israeli roznaman ‘Maarive’ ney jummay ko report di ke Israel ki aala Adalati Authority ney hukoomat ko 60 din ki mohlat di ke woh wazahat kere ke maqam Muqaddisa ke nuqta ishtiaal par Yahoodion ko ibadat karne se rokay rakha gaya hai. Adalat ney aik NGO ‘Israeli Center for the  Promtion of Democracy and Human Rights’ ki janib se daakhil kardah aik darkhwast par hukoomat se wazahat talabb ki hai. Iss tanzeem ney usay Masjid ke Complex mein ”ghair Muslim par hukoomat ki tahedidaat” se taabeer kya hai. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya ke Israeli Police wazeh taur par imtiyaazi Polices ( Yahoodion ke khilaaf ) ko laago karne apne ikhtiyarat ka istemaal kar rahi hai jo haq e ibadat ki khilaaf warzi hai. NGO ney kaha ke temple mount (yani Masjid al Aqsa Complex ) mein ghair Muslim visitors ke dakhila par imtina kayi dahon se hai. Yaad rahay ke Israeli hukkaam ney 2003 se Yahoodion ko Masjid al Aqsa Complex mein Yahoodi settlers ko izafi tadaad mein dakhla ki ijazat di hai taham hanoz inhen androon e Masjid ibadat karne ki ijazat nahi hai. Israel ney 1967 ki Arab-Israel jung mein mashriqi Yaroshallam par qabza kar liya tha jis ko aaj tak aalmi bradari ney qubool nahi kya hai. Aisa lagta hai ke Masjid Aqsa ko mukammal taur par apne qabza mein kar laney ki aik saazish ke taur par adalat ko istemaal karne ki koshish ki jarahi hai jis ke zareya pehlay Masjid Aqsa ke Islami takaddus ko khatam karte hue usay Musalmanoon aur Yahoodion ke liye mushtarik muqaddas muqam ke taur par taslim krwa liya jaye aur baad azan yahan se Musalmanoon ko mukammal taur par be-dakhal kardainey ke baad usay munhadim karte hue Haikal e Sulemani ki taamer ko yakeeni banaya jaye.

Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf aur Mazhabi Umoor ki taraf se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Qibla e Awwal par Musalmanon ke siwa kisi aur qoam ka koi haq nahi. Qibla e Awwal ko nuqsaan pouncha to is ka zimma daar Israel hoga. Masjid Aqsa ka 144 donam ka Raqba khalis Qibla e Awwal ke liye waqf hai jisay kisi dosray maqsad ke liye istemaal nahi kiya ja sakta aur na hi is par kisi doosri qaum ka koi haq hai. Falasteeni mehakuma Auqaaf ki taraf se yeh bayan Israeli hukkaam ki taraf se is iqdaam ke radd e amal mein jari kya gaya hai jis mein sehyoni hukkaam ney police se Yahoodi abaadkaron ko Qibla e Awwal par dhaavon se rokney aur Talmudi taalimaat ke mutabiq mazhabi rusomaat ki adayigi se mana karne ki wazahat talabb ki hai. Wizarat e Auqaaf ke bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke Masjid Aqsa sehyoni riyasat ke kisi qanoon ki paband nahi aur na hi sehyoni riyasat ko Qibla e Awwal par koi ikhtiyar haasil hai. Qibla e Awwal par sirf qanoon Rabbani nafiz hota hai aur wohi qanoon hai jo Masjid e Aqsa ke Islami tshakhus ki baqaa ka zamin hai. Bayan mein khabardaar kya gaya hai ke Masjid e Aqsa ke barey mein sehyoni riyasat ke tamam qawaneen aur faislay na qabil e qubool hain. Unhon ney khabardaar kya hai ke intahaa pasand Yahoodi abaadkaron ko Qibla e Awwal par dhaavon ki ijazat dena mazhabi jung chhaidney ke mutradif hai.
1412.title: ”Masjid e Aqsa” mein Yahoodion ko ibadat ka mauqa faraham karne ki saazish

news_detail: Riaz- Wizarat e Tijarat o Sarmaya kaari ney Hajj 1439H ke dauran Makkah Mukramah, Madina Munawwara, Mashaar e Muqaddisa mein tijarati marakiz wo khaney peeney ki ashya farokht karne wali mukhtalif dukanon par 23 hazaar se ziyada chaapay maaray. 1. 3 million ghair qanooni ashya zabt ki gayeen. 1700 se ziyada tijarati khilaaf varziyan record ki gayeen. Wizarat Tijarat ney sarifeen se appeal ki ke woh kisi bhi tijarati khilaaf warzi ke ilm mein aney par pehli fursat mein 1900 par rabita karen ya ” Balagh Tijari” application ya internet par Wizarat ki Website par mutala karne ki zahmat karen.

Makkah Mukramah. Saudi Wizarat Hajj o Umrah ney imsaal Hujjaj ki 746 gumshudaa ashya wapas kar dein. Hujjaj karaam ke mukhtalif maqamat par chhootey barray bag gum kiye hue thay. Unhon ney reports bhi kardi theen. Wizarat e Hajj ney gumshudaa chhootey badey bag 25
August tak wapas kiye thae.

Makkah Mukramah. Imssal Hajj mausam mein shareek judges ney Canada ke aik Haji ke haq mein faisla didya. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Canada ke Haji ka qeemti samaan chori hogaya tha. Woh aik mualim se package haasil karkay Hajj kar raha tha. Khaimay mein wapas aaya to pata chala ke uski belt gayab hai. Jis mein 30 hazaar Riyal se ziyada naqad mehfooz thay. Visa Card, Canada ka shanakhti Card aur niji tasaveer bhi rakhi hui theen. Canada ke Haji ney mualim se shikayat ki. CC cameras ki madad se pata lgaliya gaya ke aik safai karkun ney Canadian ki raqam aur card chori kiye hain. Karkun ney apni karstani ki video dekh kar Iqbal e jurm karliya. Judge ney usay ibrtnak saza sunadi .

Makkah Mukramah- 60 sala Bangladeshi Haji ney Makkah Mukramah ke al Musfilah mohalla ke aik hotel mein khudkushi karli. Tafseelaat ke mutabiq Bangladeshi Haji hotel ke taharat khanah ki chhat se latka huwa paaya gaya. Dam ghutney aur oxygen munqita hojane par zindagi se haath dho baitha. Makkah Mukramah ki Police ney jaye waqooa ka muaina karkay ibtidayi report mein bataya ke Bangladeshi Haji ke jism par tashadud ka koi nishaan nazar nahi aaya bazahir khudkushi ka case lagta hai. Mutawafi ki na-ash sard khanaay mein mehfooz kar di gayi. Matlooba karwai mukammal karkay tadfeen amal mein layi jaayegi.
1413.title: Hajj aur jarayim : Hajj mein 13 lakh ghair qanooni ashya zabt

news_detail: Catholic Mission ke Ruhani Peshwa Pope Francis ney Ireland mein itwaar ko Church ko hila dene walay bachon ke jinsi istehsal ke scandal par Khuda se maafi maangi hai. Pope ney ”khulay aam khoon” ke liye ”Khuda se maafi ke khawastgaar” hue aur ”sachaai aur adal” ki talaash ke liye sakht iqdamaat karne ka mutalibah kya. Ireland mein Pope ke daura ke mauqa par Padrion ki jinsi ziadation ke khilaaf zabardast muzahira kiya gaya. Pope Francis ney daura Ireland mein Padrion ki janib se ziyadati ke shikaar mutasireen se mulaqaat ki. Dublin mein Pope Francis ke aizaz mein istaqbalia ka ihtemaam kya gaya jis mein Irish Wazeer e Azam aur istehsaal ke shikaar baaz afraad ney bhi shirkat ki. Vatican tarjuman ke mutabiq Pope Francis ki Dublin mein ziadati ke shikaar afraad se mulaqaat taqreeban daidh ghantay taq jari rahi. iss mauqa par Pope ney khitaab karte hue kaha ke girja gharon mein bachon se ziadati ke waqeaat sharam naak hain, yeh makrooh aur nafrat amaiz jurm hai aur Church ki intizamia is jurm ko rokney mein nakaam rahi hai. Unhon ney Saint Mary Cathedral Church mein khitaab mein kaha ke agar social media ko aitdaal aur hosh mandi ke sath istemaal kya jaye to yeh faiday mand ho sakta hai. Pope ke daura ke mauqa par ziadati ke waqeat ke khilaaf Dublin mein baaz muqamat par muzahiray bhi kiye gay, baaz muzahireen ney galay mein bachon ke jootay bhi latka rakhay thae. Muzahireen ney istehsaal ke shikaar afraad se yakjehti ka izhaar kya aur Vatican se mutaliba kya ke ziadati mein mulawis Padrion ke khilaaf sakht karwai ki jaye. Wazeh rahay ke Pope Francis haftay ko Ireland ke tareekhi daura par Dublin pahonche hain aur pichlle 39 saal mein Ireland ka daura karne walay woh pehlay Pope hain.
1414.title: Padrion ki jinisi ziadation par Pope Francis khuda se maafi ke khawastgar

news_detail: Hyderabad. Haalat e nasha mein gaadi challan jaan lewa aur qanoonan jurm hai magar jis ney zindagi mein kabhi sharaab ko chuwa tak nahi uss ko haalat e nasha mein zahir karna bhi kisi jurm se kam nahi. aisay hi aik case mein aik gaadi raan Syed Zaheeruddin Quadri ko Drunken Drive ke mauqa par rok kar breath analyzer ke zareya yeh pata challany ki koshish ki gayi ke aaya woh haalat e nasha mein to nahi hai. Breath Analyzer ney nasha ke 43 am jee points zahir kiye. Traffic Police ney is ke khilaaf aik muqadma darj karliya. Zahirudin jnhon ney zindagi mein kabhi nasha nahi kya woh Breath Analyzer ke nateeja se hairan thae aur Police ohdedaron par zor dae rahe thae ke yeh nateeja ghalat hai chunkay woh nasha karte hi nahi. Unhon ney Police se israar kya ke un ke khoon ka muaina kya jaye aur haqeeqat ka pata chalaya jaye. Woh wahan maujood Police ohdedaron se ulajh pade. Un ki baat suni un suni kardainay par woh Traffic Police station pahunche aur wahan maujood ohdedaron se baat cheet ki jis par unhen Osmania General Hospital le jaya gaya aur un ki jaanch ki gayi jis par yeh pata chala ke waqai woh nasha kiye hue nahi hain, jis se Traffic Police ko khiffat uthani padi. Police ohdedar khud bhi hairat zada hai ke machine ney kaisay ghalat report di hai. Unhon ney mutalba kya ke un Police ohdedaron ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye jinhon ney machine ke ghalat tajzia ki bunyaad par un ke khilaaf haalat nasha mein gaadi challany ka challan kya aur aayindah se ghalat tajziye paish karne walay machinon ka istemaal tark kardiya jaye.
1415.title: Drunken Drive. Traffic Police ko khiffat uthani padi

news_detail: Washington: Americi Sadar Donald Trump apni Company ki ‘housekeeper’ ke muashaqa mein mubtala thae jis se un ka aik bacha bhi hai. Americi nashriyati idaara CNNA ney apni khusoosi report mein inkishaaf kya hai ke Sadar Trump ka apni Company ki housekeeper ke sath 2015 mein muashaqa raha hai jis ke nateeja mein aik bacha ki paidaiesh bhi hui. Iss ghair azdawaji talluq ke gawah Donald Tower ke aik darbaan Dino Sajudin hain. Trump Tower ke darbaan Sajudin ney Americi Sadar ke apni mulazima se muashaqa aur bacha ki paidaiesh se mutaliq maloomat Americi magazine AMI ko farokht ki theen jis mein muashaqa ki poori kahani bayan ki gayi thi. AMI ney aik moahida ke tehat yeh sotry 30 hazaar Americi dollar ke aiwaz kharidi. Moahida ke tehat Sajudin ko kahani kisi aur ko dainay ya kahin aur bayan karne par 1 million Americi dollar ki raqam ada karna ho gi. Magazine AMI ke sarbarah Trump ke dost hain iss liye unhon ney yeh kahani shaya nahi ki jab ke muahiday ke baayis Sajudin kahani ko kisi aur se bayan nahi kar saktay they. Yun yeh scandal dab gaya. Lekin ab Sajudin ke wakeel ney CNN ko bataya hai ke AMI se moahida khatam kar diya gaya jis ke baad un ke muakkil kisi ko bhi yeh sotry farokht karne ya kisi ke bhi samnay bayan karne ke liye azad hain. Wazeh rahay Americi Sadar Donald Trump ko pahelay hi magazine ‘Play Boy’ ki model Karen McDougal aur Stormy Daniels ke sath najaaiz taluqaat rakhnay aur sadaarti intikhab ke dauran dono models ko khamosh rehne ke liye raqum ki adaigi par tafteesh ka saamna hai. Iss muqadma mein Trump ke wakeel Michael kohn pehlay hi wada maaf gawah ban chuke hain.
1416.title: Americi Sadar Trump aik aur jinsi scandal mein

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke Amusement Park ‘Lumbini Park’ aur talan ki maroof dukaan ‘Gokul Chat Bhandar’ mein 11 saal qabal hue bomb dhmakon ka faisla jo aaj sunaya janey wala tha wo   4
September tak moakhar kardiya gaya hai. Yaad rahay ke 25

August 2007 ko shaher ke do muqamat Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park mein dhamakay hue thae jin mai majmoi taur par 42 log halaak hogaye thae jabkay 50 se zayed zakhmi hogaye thae. Shaher ke deegar muqamat par mazeed do bombs ko nakara banadiya gaya. Shaher ke tafrehi muqam ”Lumbini Park” mein 25

August 2007 ki shaam 7:45 bajey aik zor daar dhamaka huwa jis ke 5 minute baad hi qalb e shahar masroof tareen muqam Koti par Chat ki mashhoor dukaan ” Gokul Chat Bhandar” ke paas aik aur dhamaka huwa. Baadazan shaher ke do maqamat se do bombs ko bar-aamad kiya gaya aur unhen phatt padney se qabal hi nakara banadiya gaya tha. Un dhamakon mein marnay walay mukhtalif tabqaat se talluq rakhtay thae jin mein bachay, tulba aur khawateen bhi shaamil thae. Un judwan bomb dhmakon ka muqadma 27

August peer ko Faisal honay wala tha. is khusoos mein Hyderabad Police ki Counter Intelligence wing ney aik muqadma darj kiya tha aur Mohammad Sadiq , Ansar Ahmed Badshah Shaikh, Akbar Ismail choudhry aur Syed Anique Shafeeq ko girftar karte hue adalat mein paish kiya gaya tha jo un dinon Cherlapallay Jail mein mahruse hain. Un charon ko pehlay Maharashtra ki ATS ney girftar kya tha jinhein baad-azan Transit Warrant par Gujrat muntakil kiya gaya tha. Fil-waqt woh  Cherlapallay Jail mein mahroos hain. Mulzimeen ke Wakeel Janab Shaikh Khalid ne bataya ke is muqadma ka aaj faisla sadir kiya janey wala tha taham faisla tehreeri taur par tayyar na hone ki wajah se moakhar kardiya gaya aur ab 4
September ko yeh muqadma faisal kiya jaye ga.
1417.title: Gokul Chat aur Lumbini Park Bomb Blasts ka faisla 4th  September tak moakhar

news_detail: Mudhole. halqa assembly Mudhole ke Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies ( IIIT ) Basar mein Engineering II year ki Taliba ney teesri manzil se chhalang lagaakar khudkushi karli. tafseelaat ke mutabiq IIIT Basar engineering saal doum mein zair taleem Anusha naami Taliba ney teen manzila imarat se chhalang laga kar khudkushi karli Taliba zila Siddipet ke mauza Mandapally ki mutawattin hai. Khudkushi ki wajah mohabbat mein nakami batayi jarahi Taliba ki kitaab se College intizamia ko aik khudkushi note bhi araamad huwa hai jisay police ke hawala kardiya gaya hai. Police ney is khusoos mein aik muqadma darj karte hue tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai. Laash ko postmortem ke liye sarkari hospital bhaij diya gaya hai aur mutwafi Taliba ke arkaan e khandan ko mutalla kardiya gaya hai.
1226.title: Basar IIIT ki Taliba ki khudkushi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher ki aik muqami adalat ney jumaraat ke din ohdidaro n ko hadaayat di ke Paradise Group se talluq na rakhnay wali un tamam Hotels ke Boards nikaal dein jo Paradise ke naam se hain jis ki taameel mein kal aur aaj Paradise ke naam se chalaye janey wali un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie jo Secunderabad mein waqay Paradise Hotel ke malikeen ke group ”Paradise Group” se talluq nahi rakhtay. Adalati ehkaam par un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie gaye jinhon ney ghair qanooni taur par apni Hotels ke naam ‘Paradise’ ke naam par khe thae. Paradise group of Hotels ki janib se aik darkhwast dair karte hue ilzaam aayed kya gaya tha ke shaher mein kayi Hotels un ki Hotel ka naam istemaal karte hue chalaye jarahi hain jin mein food courts se le kar Hotels tak shaamil hain. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya tha ke aisi Hotels ki jaanib se un ke brand ka ghalat istemaal kya ja raha hai jis se Paradise Group ka waqar mutasir ho raha hai. Adalati ehkaam par ghair majaz naam istemaal karne wali un Hotels se signboards ko na sirf nikaal diya balkay is naam ke labels aur food items ko bhi zabt karliya. Paradise Group shaher mein Paradise ke naam se Hotels ka aik chain chalata hai, is ki Biryani duniya bhar mein mashhoor hai. Iss Group ney Hotels chalanay ke liye Paradise ke naam ka copy right aur logo ka registration haasil karliya hai jis ke baais dosray Paradise ke naam aur iss se mushabihat rakhnay walay andaaz bhi ikhtiyar nahi kar saktay.
1240.title: Paradise naam ka ghair majaz istemaal, Hotels ke signboard hata diye gaye

news_detail: Hyderabad. Cyberabad Commissionerate mein Mailardeopally Police Station ke hudood mein Shastripuram Mainn Road par teen naamaaloom afraad ney aik workshop mein daakhil hokar hammer se hamla karkay 50 sala Amjad naami shakhs ka qatal kardiya. Sahiti Colony, Nice Hotel ke saakin Amjad plywood karkhana mein kaam kar rahay thay. Woh apne kaam mein masroof thay ke teen naamaaloom hamla aawar wahan pahonche aur un par hamla karte hue un ke sar par aik wazni hammer se waar kardiya jis ke baayes un ke sar par shadeed chout aayi aur woh barsar e mauqa hi halaak hogaye.
