Qatal ki ittila milnay par Inspector of Police Mailardeopally Mr. A Sataya wahan pahonch gaye aur mauqa waardaat ka mushahida kya aur ayini shahideen se ibtidayi maloomat haasil kee. Clues Team ko talabb karte hue muqaam e waardaat se shawahid ikhatta ki gayeen. Panchnama karne ke baad laash ko postmortem ke liye Osmania General Hospital muntaqil kardiya gaya. Police ney kaha ke hanooz hamla awaron ki shanakht nahi hosaki aur na hi qatal ki wajohaat ka pata chal paaya hai. Mr. Sataya ney bataya ke iss ilaqa ke CC Tv footage ke zareya hamla aawron ki shanakht ki jarahi hai.
1257.title: Shastripuram mein qatal ki waardaat

news_detail: Hyderabad. Azaan International School ke aik mulazim par kamsin bachi ke sath ziyadati ke ilzam ke tanazur mein mahkuma e taleem ki janib se ta hukm e saani idaare ki kushadgi par rok lagadene se pareshan talba ke Parents ney mustaqbil ka laiha amal tayyar karne aaj yahan aik mushawarti ijlaas munaqqid kya jis mein aik hazaar se zayed Parents ney shirkat ki. Ijlaas mein Azaan International School mein zair e taleem deegar bachon ke mustaqbil ke baaray mein aik mabsoot hikmat e amli tayyar karne Parents ki Association qaayim karte hue iqdamaat karne ka faisla kiya gaya. Ijlaas mein shirkat karne walay auwliyaye talba ney ittefaq raaye se arkaan aamila par mushtamil aik Adhoc Committee tashkeel di hai. Iss Executive Committee ney ijlaas mein mazkoorah waqea ke tanazur mein ghalib halaat ka jaayiza liya. Ijlaas mein Azaan School ki ladki ke saath 14

September ko paish aaye waaqea ki muzammat ki gayi aur tamaam Parents ney kamsin ladki aur is ke arkaan e khandan ke sath izhaar e hamdardi kya. Association ko walidain aur auwlia e talba ney bashmole intizami khamion ke School Administration ke talluq se kayi shikayaat keen aur intizamia ke mutkabbirana rawayya ki shikayat ki. Adhoc Committee ney Parents  ko yaqeen dilaya ke bachon ke sarpraston ki tamam shikayaat ki yaksoi ke liye thos iqdamaat kiye jayen ge. Ijlaas ka yeh ehsaas tha ke School ki ghair muayana muddat ke liye School ki masdoodi se School mein zair e taleem bachon ki na sirf taleem mutasir ho rahee hai balkay un ke azhaan par manfi asraat bhi pad rahe hain. Ijlaas mein Executive Committee ko yeh ikhtiyar diya gaya hai ke masla ki yaksoi ke liye tamam mutaliqa Authorities bashmool District Education Officer, District Collector aur mahkuma taaleem ke aala ohdedaron se rujoo hotay hue aajilaana taur par qaabil e qubool hal talaash kya jaye aur zaroorat padney par qanooni charah joyi bhi ki jaye taakay munazzam aur mehfooz mahol mein bachon ki taleem ka silsila jari reh sakay. Prents ki tanzeem ney maamla ki tehqeeq karne walay Police ohdedaron ki satayish ki aur un se izhaar tashakkur kya aur umeed zahir ki ke haqayiq ka pata chalate hue khaati ko qarar e waqai saza dilae jaye gi.
1272.title: Azaan International School ki adam kushadgi, Parents pareshan

news_detail: Dr. Kafeel Khan ko aik baar phir giraftar karliya gaya hai. Kafeel Khan jinhein guzishta baras Gorakhpur ke sarkari Hospital mein Oxygen ki kami ke baayis sherkhawr bachon ki halakaton par giraftar kar liya tha Jaria saal zamanat par riha hue thay. Teen mah qabl un ke bhai par bhi jaan lewa hamla huwa tha. Police ne kaha ke Kafeel Khan ko District Hospital mein Doctors ke sath ulajhney aur mareezon ke ilaaj mein khalal paida karne ke ilzaam mein hafta ko giraftar karliya gaya hai. Kafeel ke bhai Adil Khan ne kaha ke un ke bhai riyasat mein dimaghi soozish ki alamaat se honay wali amwaat par Media Conference ko mukhatib karne ja rahay thay ke unhen giraftar karliya gaya hai. Suprintendent of Police Sabhraj Singh ne kaha ”Police ko it-tila-aat mausool hoyin ke aik fard Hospital mein daakhil huwa aur Hospital mein shareek mareezon ke ilaaj mein khalal daal raha hai. Woh Doctors ke saath ulajhney laga. Iss fard ko giraftar karliya gaya jis ne khud ki shanakht Kafeel Khan ke taur par kaarwaayi. Kafeel un 9 mulzimeen mein se aik hain jinhein August 2017 mein Baba Raghu Das Medical college mein Oxygen ki sarbarahi mein khlal ke baais chaar din mein 63 bachon ki amwaat ke silsila mein giraftar karliya gaya tha. Unhen November 2017 mein Uttar Pradesh Police ne giraftar kya tha aur April 2018 mein Allahabad High Court ne unhen zamanat par riha krdyatha. Dr. Kafeel Khan ke bhai Kashif Jameel par June mein naamaaloom hamla awaron ne golian chalaye theen taham woh is hamla mein baal baal bach gaye thay.
1293.title: Dr. Kafeel Khan aik baar phir giraftar

news_detail: Visakapatnam. Telugu Desam Party ke Rukn e Assembly Araku Mr. Kidari  Sarveshwara Rao aur sabiq Rukn e Assembly  Sivera Soma ko itwaar ki dopehar Dumbriguda Mandal ke mauza Thottangi mein Maoists ne golian maar kar halaak kardiya. Yeh waqea intahaa pasand tanzeem CPI Maoists ki tasees ke hafta taweel tqarib ke douran paish aaya. Maoists ne 27

September tak hafta taweel jashn mananay ka elaan kya tha. Zaraye ke bamawajib Kidari  Sarveshwara Rao jo Araku halqa e Assembly se YSRCP ke ticket par muntakhib hue thae taham baad azan Telugu Desam Party mein shumoliat ikhtiyar karli thi. Woh aik sabiq Rukn e Assembly Mr. Soma aur deegar haamion ke hamrah Dumbriguda Mandal jarahay thae ke yeh haadisa paish aaya. Taqreeban 60 Maoists bashmool women cadre iss hamla mein mulawis hain. Bataya jata hai ke yeh qaideen ”Gram Darshini” programme mein shirkat ke liye jarahay thae ke Maoists ka aik group dehation ke saath pahonch kar MLA ki car ko rok diya. Joon hi MLA aur sabiq MLA ke Personal Security Officers gaadi se utre, un se AK 47 hathyaar chean liye gaye aur Sarveshwara aur Soma par qareeb se golian chaladi gayeen. Police ko shuba hai ke is hamla mein Maoists ki Andhra-Odehesa Border Committee ke Secretary Rama Krishna ki zair e qayadat Maoists ka group mulawis ho sakta hai. DIG Visakapatnam range Mr. Srikant ne bataya ke un ke paas waqea ke baare mein kuch maaloomat hain taham hum haqaaiq ka pata chlarhe hain. Rurel SP Mr. Rahul Dev Sharma ne kaha ke mahkuma e Police ne Naxalites ki hit list mein shaamil tamam syastdanon ko pahelay hi se notices jari kar diye thae ke dihaton ka daura karne se qabal nazm wo nasq ko agah kardiya jaye. Lekin Rukn e Assembly Kidari  aur sabiq Rukn e Assembly Soma ke Dumbriguda mandal ke daura ke baare mein Police ko aagah nahi kya gaya tha. Deegar zaraye ka kehna hai ke Maoists ne un do qaideen ko baat cheet karne ke liye talab kya tha aur jab woh wahan pahonche toh Maoists ne un par ilzaam aayed kya ke maazi mein hue encounter ke liye woh zimma daar hai jis ki saza ke taur par unhen maut ke ghaat utaar diya gaya hai. Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N. Chandrababu Naido ne iss waqea ki muzammat karte hue mutwafi qaayideen ke arkaan khandan ko pursa diya. New York rawaangi se qabal unhon neh Police ke ohdedaron se tabadlah khayaal kiya. Unhon ne kaha ke jamhoriat mein tashadud ki gunjaish nahi hai.
1311.title: Maoists ne MLA aur sabiq MLA ko golian maardien

news_detail: Hyderabad. Governor Telangana & Andhra Pradesh Mr. E. S. L. Narsimhan ne Ameerpet interchange station se Ameerpet. L B Nagar route par Metro Services  ko jhandi dikhayi. Passengers aaj shaam 6:00 bajey se iss route par Metro Train mein safar kar saken ge. Governor Mr. Narsimhan ne Train ko jhandi dikhaane ke baad Minister Municipal Administration & Urban Development Mr. K. T. Rama Rao, Rukn e Parliament wo sabiq markazi Wazeer Mr. Bandaru Dattariya aur deegar ke hamrah L. B. Nagar Station tak Metro Train ke safar se mahzooz hue. Iss mauqa par khitaab karte hue Governor ne shahrion se appeal ki ke woh ziyada se ziyada Metro Train ka istemaal karen is se na sirf aloodgi mein kami aeye gi balkay eendhan ki bhi bachat hogi aur waqt ki bhi bachat hogi. Mr. Narsimhan ne kaha ke mein ne Hitect City route ke liye 15

December ki tareekh muqarrar ki thi. Wazeer baldi nazm o nasq wo shahri taraqiat Mr. K. T. Rama Rao ne kaha ke Hyderabad Metro, Mulk mein sab se behtar hai. Unhon ne kaha ke darasal iss route par Metro Train ka aaghaz guzashta mah hi hona chahiye tha taham commissionaire Metro Rail safety clearance mein takheer ki wajah se ab iss route par Train ka aaghaz kya ja raha hai. Baad azaan Governor ne Wazeer aur deegar senior ohdedaron ke hamrah Khairatabad Station se cycle istemaal karte hue Raj Bhavan wapas lautay.
1407.title: Ameerpet-L B Nagar route par Metro Rail ka aaghaz

news_detail: Libya ke dar-ul-hakoomat Tripoli mein 5 lakh bachay mutharab jangju Militias ke darmiyan jari ladai ke nateeja mein khatray se dochar ho chukay hain. United Nations ke tahet huqoqqِ atfaal ke idaara UNICEF ney peer ko aik bayan mein kaha hai ke guzishta 48 ghantay ke douran mein Tripoli ke junoob mein ladai mein shiddat ke baad se mazeed 1200 se ziyada khandan be ghar hogaye hain. UNICEF ka kehna hai ke Tripoli aur iss ke nawahi ilaaqon mein August se jari musallah jhadpon ke nateeja mein 25 hazaar se ziyada afraad be ghar ho chukay hain. Un mein nisf tadaad bachon ki hai. United nations ki iss Agency ke Middle East aur shumali Africa mein Director Garrett Kapler ney kaha hai ke ” Mazeed bachon ko jung ke liye bharti kiya ja raha hai jis se woh fauri khatrah se dochar ho chukay hain aur ladai mein shareek aik bacha mara bhi ja chuka hai”. Libya ki wizarat sahet ke hafta ki shab faraham kardah adaad wo shumaar ke mutabiq Tripoli aur iss ke nawahi ilaqa mein guzishta aik mah se mutharab jungju groups ke darmiyan jari ladai ke nateeja mein 115 afraad halaak aur kam se kam 400 zakhmi ho chukay hain. Ladai se mutasirah ilaaqon se be ghar honay walay afraad ko aik Schoolon mein aarzi taur par thehraya ja raha hai jis ke paish e nazar 3

October se naye taleemi saal ka aaghaz mumkin nazar nahi araha hai aur iss mein takheer hojaye gi. UNICEF ke mutabiq ladai se mutasirah ilaaqon ke makeeno ko khoraak, bijli aur pani ki qillat ka saamna hai. Ladai mein shiddat se taarkinِ e watan ki mushkilaat mein bhi izafah hochuka hai. Kapler ka kahna tha ke ”Senkdroon girftar panah gzinon aur taarikeen e watan ko tashadud ki wajah se zabardasti doosri jaghon par muntaqil kiya ja raha hai. Un ke alawa bahut se taarkin e watan aisay marakaz mein phas kar rahe gaye hain, jin ki haalat intehai naguftah bah hai. Wazeh rahay ke Aqwama mutahidda ki masalihati koshisho ke nateejay mein 4

September ko mutharab Militias ke darmiyan jung bandi huwi thi lekin guzishta haftay Tripoli ke junoobi ilaaqon mein Tarbona aur Misrat se talluq rakhne wali Militias aur Tripoli mein Libya ki qaumi hukoomat ke tahet Militias mein dobarah ladai chhid gayi thi.
1418.title: Tripoli mein 5 lakh bachay ‘khatray’ se dochar: UNICEF

news_detail: Podili. Zila Prakasam ke Podili  mandal mein mangal ki subah aik bada haadsa tal gaya, 80 bachon ko le jaaney wali Bus ulat gayi taham sirf chaar bachay hi zakhmi huwe, muqami logon ney bachon ko Bus se nikaal liya. Gitanjali English Medium School ki yeh Bus Maarripodi mandal ke mauza Pannur se bachon ko le kar Podili mandal ke Viswanthapuram le jarahi thi. Bus mein route ke villages se talluq rakhnay walay 80 bachay pahelay hi se sawaar ho chukay thae, Katurivari Palem mauza ke qareeb aik culvert par Driver ney Bus par qaboo khodia aur Bus sadak ke kinare ludakh kar ulat gayi. Qareebi khaiton mein kaam karne walay muqami log wahan pahonch gaye aur bachon ko fauri Bus se nikaal liya. Chaar bachay is haadesa mein zakhmi hogaye aur unhen Ambulance mein Podili Hospoital muntaqil kiya gaya. Talba ke Parents jo muqam e haadisa pahonch gaye thae School intezamia par ilzaam aayed kiya ke 120 bachon ke liye sirf aik Bus istemaal ki jarahi hai. Unhon ney yeh bhi ilzaam aayed kiya ke driver Subaiah nihayat hi la parwah hai aur woh musalsal gadi chillatay huwe Mobile Phone par baatein karta rehta hai. Principal Bhagya Laxmi ney haadisa aur walidain ke ilzamaat par tabsarah karne se inkaar kardiya.
1419.title: School Bus ulat gayi magar bara haadisa tal gaya

news_detail: New Delhi. Duniya ki sab se badi jamhoriat mein siyasat ki tajreem ko ”Pareshan kun” qarar dete huwe Supreme Court ney Parliament se kaha ke iss laanat se nimatney iqdamaat waza kare. Supreme Court ney Parliament par chod diya ke mujremana ilzamaat ka saamna karne walay umeedwaron ko intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se baz rakha jaye ya phir unhen sirf isi soorat mein na ahel qarar diya jab unhen saza hojati hai. Adalat e Uzma mafaad aama ki darkhwaston ki samaat kar rahi thi jis mein yeh istedua ki gayi ke kisi fard ke khilaaf adalat ki janib se fard e jurm aayed kiye janey ke baad usay intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se na ahel qarar diya jaye. Chief Justice Mr. Justice Deepak Misra ki zair e qiadat 5 rukni bench ney umeedwaron ko hidaayat di ke intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se qabal Election Commission ko apne mujremana pas e manzar se aagah kare. Chief Justice ney faisla sunaate huwe badunwani ko ”Qaumi iqtesadi daheshatgardi” qarar diya. Adalat ney siyasi partiyon aur umeedwaron se kaha ke hamaray jamhoori nizaam mein badhtay mujrimaana waqhiyat par rok laganey parcha namzadgi daakhil karne ke baad kam az kam teen martaba apne mujremana records ke baarey mein akhbarat aur Television Channels ke zariya aagah kare. Adalat ney kaha hai ke  shahrion ka yeh haq hai ke woh apne umeedwaron ke maazi ke baarey mein aagah rahay. Supreme Court ney siyasi partiyon ke liye yeh laazim kardiya ke apni Website par apne umeedwaron ke baarey mein tamam tafseelaat faraham kere. Iss ney yeh bhi hidaayat di ke siyasi umeedwaron ke baarey mein Print aur Electronic Media mein wasee tar tashheer ki jaye. Fi al-waqt sangeen juraim jaisay qatal, asmat raizi aur aghwaa ke ilzamaat mein saza paney walon ko intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se baaz rakha gaya hai. Mubahis ke douran Attorny General Mr. K.K Venugopal ney markazi hukoomat ki numaindagi karte huwe kaha ke qasoorwaar saabit honey aik fard ko masoom samgha janay ke nazriya ka hawala diya aur kaha ke aik fard ko aik party ticket par intekhabaat mein muqaabla karne se mahroom karna iss ke haq e raaye dahi se inkaar hai jis mein muqaabla karne ka haq bhi shaamil hai. Darkhwaston par markazi hukoomat ki janib se mukhalifat karte huwe bayan diya ke yeh adalat ke dairakaar mein nahi hai ke woh na ahliat ke liye naye paimaney muqarrar kere.
1420.title: Mujrimon ko siyasat se door rakhnay Parliament iqdaam kare: SC
